original: RV_1,112.06c yābhiḥ karkandhuṃ vayyaṃ ca jinvathas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ karkandhum vayyam ca jinvathaḥ tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.07a yābhiḥ śucantiṃ dhanasāṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ taptaṃ gharmam omyāvantam atraye /
analyzed: yābhiḥ śucantim dhanasām suṣaṃsadam taptam gharmam omyāvantam atraye

original: RV_1,112.07c yābhiḥ pṛśnigum purukutsam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ pṛśnigum purukutsam āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.08a yābhiḥ śacībhir vṛṣaṇā parāvṛjam prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ cakṣasa etave kṛthaḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ śacībhiḥ vṛṣaṇā parāvṛjam pra andham śroṇam cakṣase etave kṛthaḥ

original: RV_1,112.08c yābhir vartikāṃ grasitām amuñcataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ vartikām grasitām amuñcatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.09a yābhiḥ sindhum madhumantam asaścataṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ yābhir ajarāv ajinvatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ sindhum madhumantam asaścatam vasiṣṭham yābhiḥ ajarau ajinvatam

original: RV_1,112.09c yābhiḥ kutsaṃ śrutaryaṃ naryam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ kutsam śrutaryam naryam āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.10a yābhir viśpalāṃ dhanasām atharvyaṃ sahasramīḷha ājāv ajinvatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ viśpalām dhanasām atharvyam sahasramīḍhe ājau ajinvatam

original: RV_1,112.10c yābhir vaśam aśvyam preṇim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ vaśam aśvyam preṇim āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.11a yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije dīrghaśravase madhu kośo akṣarat /
analyzed: yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije dīrghaśravase madhu kośaḥ akṣarat

original: RV_1,112.11c kakṣīvantaṃ stotāraṃ yābhir āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: kakṣīvantam stotāram yābhiḥ āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.12a yābhī rasāṃ kṣodasodnaḥ pipinvathur anaśvaṃ yābhī ratham āvataṃ jiṣe /
analyzed: yābhiḥ rasām kṣodasā udnaḥ pipinvathuḥ an aśvam yābhiḥ ratham āvatam jiṣe

original: RV_1,112.12c yābhis triśoka usriyā udājata tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ triśokaḥ usriyāḥ udājata tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.13a yābhiḥ sūryam pariyāthaḥ parāvati mandhātāraṃ kṣaitrapatyeṣv āvatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ sūryam pariyāthaḥ parāvati mandhātāram kṣaitrapatyeṣu āvatam

original: RV_1,112.13c yābhir vipram pra bharadvājam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ vipram pra bharadvājam āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.14a yābhir mahām atithigvaṃ kaśojuvaṃ divodāsaṃ śambarahatya āvatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ mahām atithigvam kaśojuvam divodāsam śambara hatye āvatam

original: RV_1,112.14c yābhiḥ pūrbhidye trasadasyum āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ pūḥ bhidye trasadasyum āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.15a yābhir vamraṃ vipipānam upastutaṃ kaliṃ yābhir vittajāniṃ duvasyathaḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ vamram vipipānam upastutam kalim yābhiḥ vitta jānim duvasyathaḥ

original: RV_1,112.15c yābhir vyaśvam uta pṛthim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ vyaśvam uta pṛthim āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.16a yābhir narā śayave yābhir atraye yābhiḥ purā manave gātum īṣathuḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ narā śayave yābhiḥ atraye yābhiḥ purā manave gātum īṣathuḥ

original: RV_1,112.16c yābhiḥ śārīr ājataṃ syūmaraśmaye tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ śārīḥ ājatam syūmaraśmaye tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.17a yābhiḥ paṭharvā jaṭharasya majmanāgnir nādīdec cita iddho ajmann ā /
analyzed: yābhiḥ paṭharvā jaṭharasya majmanā agniḥ na adīdet citaḥ iddhaḥ ajman ā

original: RV_1,112.17c yābhiḥ śaryātam avatho mahādhane tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ śaryātam avathaḥ mahā dhane tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.18a yābhir aṅgiro manasā niraṇyatho 'graṃ gacchatho vivare goarṇasaḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ aṅgiraḥ manasā niraṇyathaḥ gram gacchathaḥ vivare go arṇasaḥ

original: RV_1,112.18c yābhir manuṃ śūram iṣā samāvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ manum śūram iṣā samāvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.19a yābhiḥ patnīr vimadāya nyūhathur ā gha vā yābhir aruṇīr aśikṣatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ patnīḥ vimadāya nyūhathuḥ ā gha vā yābhiḥ aruṇīḥ aśikṣatam

original: RV_1,112.19c yābhiḥ sudāsa ūhathuḥ sudevyaṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ sudāse ūhathuḥ su devyam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.20a yābhiḥ śantātī bhavatho dadāśuṣe bhujyuṃ yābhir avatho yābhir adhrigum /
analyzed: yābhiḥ śantātī bhavathaḥ dadāśuṣe bhujyum yābhiḥ avathaḥ yābhiḥ adhrigum

original: RV_1,112.20c omyāvatīṃ subharām ṛtastubhaṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: omyāvatīm subharām ṛta stubham tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.21a yābhiḥ kṛśānum asane duvasyatho jave yābhir yūno arvantam āvatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ kṛśānum asane duvasyathaḥ jave yābhiḥ yūnaḥ arvantam āvatam

original: RV_1,112.21c madhu priyam bharatho yat saraḍbhyas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: madhu priyam bharathaḥ yat saraḍbhyaḥ tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.22a yābhir naraṃ goṣuyudhaṃ nṛṣāhye kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ naram goṣuyudham nṛṣāhye kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ

original: RV_1,112.22c yābhī rathāṃ avatho yābhir arvatas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ avathaḥ yābhiḥ arvataḥ tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.23a yābhiḥ kutsam ārjuneyaṃ śatakratū pra turvītim pra ca dabhītim āvatam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ kutsam ārjuneyam śata kratū pra turvītim pra ca dabhītim āvatam

original: RV_1,112.23c yābhir dhvasantim puruṣantim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ dhvasantim puruṣantim āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.24a apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtaṃ no dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām /
analyzed: apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtam naḥ dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām

original: RV_1,112.24c adyūtye 'vase ni hvaye vāṃ vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
analyzed: a dyūtye vase ni hvaye vām vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau

original: RV_1,112.25a dyubhir aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhir aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ /
analyzed: dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhiḥ aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ

original: RV_1,112.25c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,113.01a idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir āgāc citraḥ praketo ajaniṣṭa vibhvā /
analyzed: idam śreṣṭham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ āgāt citraḥ praketaḥ ajaniṣṭa vibhvā

original: RV_1,113.01c yathā prasūtā savituḥ savāyaṃ evā rātry uṣase yonim āraik //
analyzed: yathā prasūtā savituḥ savāyam evā rātrī uṣase yonim āraik

original: RV_1,113.02a ruśadvatsā ruśatī śvetyāgād āraig u kṛṣṇā sadanāny asyāḥ /
analyzed: ruśat vatsā ruśatī śvetyā agāt āraik u kṛṣṇā sadanāni asyāḥ

original: RV_1,113.02c samānabandhū amṛte anūcī dyāvā varṇaṃ carata āmināne //
analyzed: samāna bandhū amṛte anūcī dyāvā varṇam carataḥ āmināne

original: RV_1,113.03a samāno adhvā svasror anantas tam anyānyā carato devaśiṣṭe /
analyzed: samānaḥ adhvā svasroḥ anantaḥ tam anyā anyā carataḥ deva śiṣṭe

original: RV_1,113.03c na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe //
analyzed: na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe

original: RV_1,113.04a bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām aceti citrā vi duro na āvaḥ /
analyzed: bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām aceti citrā vi duraḥ naḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_1,113.04c prārpyā jagad vy u no rāyo akhyad uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: prārpyā jagat vi u naḥ rāyaḥ akhyat uṣāḥ ajīgaḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,113.05a jihmaśye caritave maghony ābhogaya iṣṭaye rāya u tvam /
analyzed: jihmaśye caritave maghonī ābhogaye iṣṭaye rāye u tvam

original: RV_1,113.05c dabhram paśyadbhya urviyā vicakṣa uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: dabhram paśyadbhyaḥ urviyā vicakṣe uṣāḥ ajīgaḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,113.06a kṣatrāya tvaṃ śravase tvam mahīyā iṣṭaye tvam artham iva tvam ityai /
analyzed: kṣatrāya tvam śravase tvam mahīyai iṣṭaye tvam artham iva tvam ityai

original: RV_1,113.06c visadṛśā jīvitābhipracakṣa uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: visadṛśā jīvitā abhipracakṣe uṣāḥ ajīgaḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,113.07a eṣā divo duhitā praty adarśi vyucchantī yuvatiḥ śukravāsāḥ /
analyzed: eṣā divaḥ duhitā prati adarśi vyucchantī yuvatiḥ śukra vāsāḥ

original: RV_1,113.07c viśvasyeśānā pārthivasya vasva uṣo adyeha subhage vy uccha //
analyzed: viśvasya īśānā pārthivasya vasvaḥ uṣaḥ adyā iha subhage vi uccha

original: RV_1,113.08a parāyatīnām anv eti pātha āyatīnām prathamā śaśvatīnām /
analyzed: parāyatīnām anu eti pāthaḥ āyatīnām prathamā śaśvatīnām

original: RV_1,113.08c vyucchantī jīvam udīrayanty uṣā mṛtaṃ kaṃ cana bodhayantī //
analyzed: vyucchantī jīvam udīrayantī uṣāḥ mṛtam kam cana bodhayantī

original: RV_1,113.09a uṣo yad agniṃ samidhe cakartha vi yad āvaś cakṣasā sūryasya /
analyzed: uṣaḥ yat agnim samidhe cakartha vi yat āvaḥ cakṣasā sūryasya

original: RV_1,113.09c yan mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇāṃ ajīgas tad deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadram apnaḥ //
analyzed: yat mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇām ajīgaḥ tat deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadram apnaḥ

original: RV_1,113.10a kiyāty ā yat samayā bhavāti yā vyūṣur yāś ca nūnaṃ vyucchān /
analyzed: kiyāti ā yat samayā bhavāti yāḥ vyūṣuḥ yāḥ ca nūnam vyucchān

original: RV_1,113.10c anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣam anyābhir eti //
analyzed: anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣam anyābhiḥ eti

original: RV_1,113.11a īyuṣ ṭe ye pūrvatarām apaśyan vyucchantīm uṣasam martyāsaḥ /
analyzed: īyuḥ ṭe ye pūrvatarām apaśyan vyucchantīm uṣasam martyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,113.11c asmābhir ū nu praticakṣyābhūd o te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ u nu praticakṣya abhūt ā u te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān

original: RV_1,113.12a yāvayaddveṣā ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtā īrayantī /
analyzed: yāvayat dveṣāḥ ṛta pāḥ ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī

original: RV_1,113.12c sumaṅgalīr bibhratī devavītim ihādyoṣaḥ śreṣṭhatamā vy uccha //
analyzed: su maṅgalīḥ bibhratī deva vītim iha adya uṣaḥ śreṣṭhatamā vi uccha

original: RV_1,113.13a śaśvat puroṣā vy uvāsa devy atho adyedaṃ vy āvo maghonī /
analyzed: śaśvat purā uṣāḥ vi uvāsa devī atho adyā idam vi āvaḥ maghonī

original: RV_1,113.13c atho vy ucchād uttarāṃ anu dyūn ajarāmṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ //
analyzed: atha u vi ucchāt uttarām anu dyūn ajarā amṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_1,113.14a vy añjibhir diva ātāsv adyaud apa kṛṣṇāṃ nirṇijaṃ devy āvaḥ /
analyzed: vi añjibhiḥ divaḥ ātāsu adyaut apa kṛṣṇām nirṇijam devī āvaḥ

original: RV_1,113.14c prabodhayanty aruṇebhir aśvair oṣā yāti suyujā rathena //
analyzed: prabodhayantī aruṇebhiḥ aśvaiḥ ā uṣāḥ yāti su yujā rathena

original: RV_1,113.15a āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citraṃ ketuṃ kṛṇute cekitānā /
analyzed: āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citram ketum kṛṇute cekitānā

original: RV_1,113.15c īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnāṃ vibhātīnām prathamoṣā vy aśvait //
analyzed: īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām vibhātīnām prathamā uṣāḥ vi aśvait

original: RV_1,113.16a ud īrdhvaṃ jīvo asur na āgād apa prāgāt tama ā jyotir eti /
analyzed: ud īrdhvam jīvaḥ asuḥ naḥ āgāt apa prāgāt tamaḥ ā jyotiḥ eti

original: RV_1,113.16c āraik panthāṃ yātave sūryāyāganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: āraik panthām yātave sūryāya aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ

original: RV_1,113.17a syūmanā vāca ud iyarti vahni stavāno rebha uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
analyzed: syūmanā vācaḥ ud iyarti vahniḥ stavānaḥ rebhaḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_1,113.17c adyā tad uccha gṛṇate maghony asme āyur ni didīhi prajāvat //
analyzed: adyā tat uccha gṛṇate maghoni asme āyuḥ ni didīhi prajāvat

original: RV_1,113.18a yā gomatīr uṣasaḥ sarvavīrā vyucchanti dāśuṣe martyāya /
analyzed: yāḥ gomatīḥ uṣasaḥ sarva vīrāḥ vyucchanti dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_1,113.18c vāyor iva sūnṛtānām udarke tā aśvadā aśnavat somasutvā //
analyzed: vāyoḥ iva sūnṛtānām udarke tāḥ aśva dāḥ aśnavat soma sutvā

original: RV_1,113.19a mātā devānām aditer anīkaṃ yajñasya ketur bṛhatī vi bhāhi /
analyzed: mātā devānām aditeḥ anīkam yajñasya ketuḥ bṛhatī vi bhāhi

original: RV_1,113.19c praśastikṛd brahmaṇe no vy ucchā no jane janaya viśvavāre //
analyzed: praśasti kṛt brahmaṇe naḥ vi uccha ā naḥ jane janaya viśva vāre

original: RV_1,113.20a yac citram apna uṣaso vahantījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram /
analyzed: yat citram apnaḥ uṣasaḥ vahanti ījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram

original: RV_1,113.20c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,114.01a imā rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ

original: RV_1,114.01c yathā śam asad dvipade catuṣpade viśvam puṣṭaṃ grāme asminn anāturam //
analyzed: yathā śam asat dvipade catuṣpade viśvam puṣṭam grāme asmin anāturam

original: RV_1,114.02a mṛḷā no rudrota no mayas kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhema te /
analyzed: mṛḷa naḥ rudra uta naḥ mayaḥ kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhema te

original: RV_1,114.02c yac chaṃ ca yoś ca manur āyeje pitā tad aśyāma tava rudra praṇītiṣu //
analyzed: yat śam ca yoḥ ca manuḥ āyeje pitā tat aśyāma tava rudra praṇītiṣu

original: RV_1,114.03a aśyāma te sumatiṃ devayajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ /
analyzed: aśyāma te sumatim deva yajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ

original: RV_1,114.03c sumnāyann id viśo asmākam ā carāriṣṭavīrā juhavāma te haviḥ //
analyzed: sumnāyan id viśaḥ asmākam ā cara ariṣṭa vīrāḥ juhavāma te haviḥ

original: RV_1,114.04a tveṣaṃ vayaṃ rudraṃ yajñasādhaṃ vaṅkuṃ kavim avase ni hvayāmahe /
analyzed: tveṣam vayam rudram yajñasādham vaṅkum kavim avase ni hvayāmahe

original: RV_1,114.04c āre asmad daivyaṃ heḷo asyatu sumatim id vayam asyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: āre asmat daivyam heḍaḥ asyatu sumatim id vayam asya ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_1,114.05a divo varāham aruṣaṃ kapardinaṃ tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ namasā ni hvayāmahe /
analyzed: divaḥ varāham aruṣam kapardinam tveṣam rūpam namasā ni hvayāmahe

original: RV_1,114.05c haste bibhrad bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma cchardir asmabhyaṃ yaṃsat //
analyzed: haste bibhrat bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma chardiḥ asmabhyam yaṃsat

original: RV_1,114.06a idam pitre marutām ucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyo rudrāya vardhanam /
analyzed: idam pitre marutām ucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyaḥ rudrāya vardhanam

original: RV_1,114.06c rāsvā ca no amṛta martabhojanaṃ tmane tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa //
analyzed: rāsvā ca naḥ amṛta marta bhojanam tmane tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa

original: RV_1,114.07a mā no mahāntam uta mā no arbhakam mā na ukṣantam uta mā na ukṣitam /
analyzed: mā naḥ mahāntam uta mā naḥ arbhakam mā naḥ ukṣantam uta mā naḥ ukṣitam

original: RV_1,114.07c mā no vadhīḥ pitaram mota mātaram mā naḥ priyās tanvo rudra rīriṣaḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ pitaram mā uta mātaram mā naḥ priyāḥ tanvaḥ rudra rīriṣaḥ

original: RV_1,114.08a mā nas toke tanaye mā na āyau mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ toke tanaye mā naḥ āyau mā naḥ goṣu mā naḥ aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ

original: RV_1,114.08c vīrān mā no rudra bhāmito vadhīr haviṣmantaḥ sadam it tvā havāmahe //
analyzed: vīrān mā naḥ rudra bhāmitaḥ vadhīḥ haviṣmantaḥ sadam id tvā havāmahe

original: RV_1,114.09a upa te stomān paśupā ivākaraṃ rāsvā pitar marutāṃ sumnam asme /
analyzed: upa te stomān paśu pāḥ iva akaram rāsvā pitar marutām sumnam asme

original: RV_1,114.09c bhadrā hi te sumatir mṛḷayattamāthā vayam ava it te vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: bhadrā hi te sumatiḥ mṛḍayattama athā vayam avaḥ id te vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_1,114.10a āre te goghnam uta pūruṣaghnaṃ kṣayadvīra sumnam asme te astu /
analyzed: āre te go ghnam uta pūruṣa ghnam kṣayadvīra sumnam asme te astu

original: RV_1,114.10c mṛḷā ca no adhi ca brūhi devādhā ca naḥ śarma yaccha dvibarhāḥ //
analyzed: mṛḷa ca naḥ adhi ca brūhi deva adhā ca naḥ śarma yaccha dvibarhāḥ

original: RV_1,114.11a avocāma namo asmā avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu no havaṃ rudro marutvān /
analyzed: avocāma namaḥ asmai avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu naḥ havam rudraḥ marutvān

original: RV_1,114.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,115.01a citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ /
analyzed: citram devānām ud agāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ

original: RV_1,115.01c āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca //
analyzed: āprāḥ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca

original: RV_1,115.02a sūryo devīm uṣasaṃ rocamānām maryo na yoṣām abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: sūryaḥ devīm uṣasam rocamānām maryaḥ na yoṣām abhī eti paścāt

original: RV_1,115.02c yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram //
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ devayantaḥ yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram

original: RV_1,115.03a bhadrā aśvā haritaḥ sūryasya citrā etagvā anumādyāsaḥ /
analyzed: bhadrāḥ aśvāḥ haritaḥ sūryasya citrāḥ etagvāḥ anumādyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,115.03c namasyanto diva ā pṛṣṭham asthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ //
analyzed: namasyantaḥ divaḥ ā pṛṣṭham asthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyas

original: RV_1,115.04a tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvam madhyā kartor vitataṃ saṃ jabhāra /
analyzed: tat sūryasya deva tvam tat mahi tvam madhyā kartoḥ vitatam sam jabhāra

original: RV_1,115.04c yaded ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthād ād rātrī vāsas tanute simasmai //
analyzed: yadā id ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthāt āt rātrī vāsaḥ tanute simasmai

original: RV_1,115.05a tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyor upasthe /
analyzed: tat mitrasya varuṇasya abhicakṣe sūryaḥ rūpam kṛṇute dyoḥ upasthe

original: RV_1,115.05c anantam anyad ruśad asya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyad dharitaḥ sam bharanti //
analyzed: anantam anyat ruśat asya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyat haritaḥ sam bharanti

original: RV_1,115.06a adyā devā uditā sūryasya nir aṃhasaḥ pipṛtā nir avadyāt /
analyzed: adyā devāḥ uditā sūryasya niḥ aṃhasaḥ pipṛta niḥ avadyāt

original: RV_1,115.06c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,116.01a nāsatyābhyām barhir iva pra vṛñje stomāṃ iyarmy abhriyeva vātaḥ /
analyzed: nāsatyābhyām barhiḥ iva pra vṛñje stomān iyarmi abhriyā iva vātaḥ

original: RV_1,116.01c yāv arbhagāya vimadāya jāyāṃ senājuvā nyūhatū rathena //
analyzed: yau arbhagāya vimadāya jāyām senā juvā nyūhatuḥ rathena

original: RV_1,116.02a vīḷupatmabhir āśuhemabhir vā devānāṃ vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā /
analyzed: vīḍu patmabhiḥ āśu hemabhiḥ vā devānām vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā

original: RV_1,116.02c tad rāsabho nāsatyā sahasram ājā yamasya pradhane jigāya //
analyzed: tat rāsabhaḥ nāsatyā sahasram ājā yamasya pradhane jigāya

original: RV_1,116.03a tugro ha bhujyum aśvinodameghe rayiṃ na kaś cin mamṛvāṃ avāhāḥ /
analyzed: tugraḥ ha bhujyum aśvinā uda meghe rayim na kaḥ cit mamṛvān avāhār

original: RV_1,116.03c tam ūhathur naubhir ātmanvatībhir antarikṣaprudbhir apodakābhiḥ //
analyzed: tam ūhathuḥ naubhiḥ ātmanvatībhiḥ antarikṣa prudbhiḥ apodakābhiḥ

original: RV_1,116.04a tisraḥ kṣapas trir ahātivrajadbhir nāsatyā bhujyum ūhathuḥ pataṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ kṣapaḥ tris ahā ativrajadbhiḥ nāsatyā bhujyum ūhathuḥ pataṅgaiḥ

original: RV_1,116.04c samudrasya dhanvann ārdrasya pāre tribhī rathaiḥ śatapadbhiḥ ṣaḷaśvaiḥ //
analyzed: samudrasya dhanvan ārdrasya pāre tribhiḥ rathaiḥ śata padbhiḥ ṣaṣ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_1,116.05a anārambhaṇe tad avīrayethām anāsthāne agrabhaṇe samudre /
analyzed: an ārambhaṇe tat avīrayethām an āsthāne agrabhaṇe samudre

original: RV_1,116.05c yad aśvinā ūhathur bhujyum astaṃ śatāritrāṃ nāvam ātasthivāṃsam //
analyzed: yat aśvinau ūhathuḥ bhujyum astam śata aritrām nāvam ātasthivāṃsam

original: RV_1,116.06a yam aśvinā dadathuḥ śvetam aśvam aghāśvāya śaśvad it svasti /
analyzed: yam aśvinā dadathuḥ śvetam aśvam agha aśvāya śaśvat id svasti

original: RV_1,116.06c tad vāṃ dātram mahi kīrtenyam bhūt paidvo vājī sadam id dhavyo aryaḥ //
analyzed: tat vām dātram mahi kīrtenyam bhūt paidvaḥ vājī sadam id havyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_1,116.07a yuvaṃ narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradatam purandhim /
analyzed: yuvam narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradatam purandhim

original: RV_1,116.07c kārotarāc chaphād aśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śataṃ kumbhāṃ asiñcataṃ surāyāḥ //
analyzed: kārotarāt śaphāt aśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śatam kumbhān asiñcatam surāyāḥ

original: RV_1,116.08a himenāgniṃ ghraṃsam avārayethām pitumatīm ūrjam asmā adhattam /
analyzed: himena agnim ghraṃsam avārayethām pitumatīm ūrjam asmai adhattam

original: RV_1,116.08c ṛbīse atrim aśvināvanītam un ninyathuḥ sarvagaṇaṃ svasti //
analyzed: ṛbīse atrim aśvinā avanītam ud ninyathuḥ sarva gaṇam svasti

original: RV_1,116.09a parāvataṃ nāsatyānudethām uccābudhnaṃ cakrathur jihmabāram /
analyzed: parāvatam nāsatyā anudethām uccābudhnam cakrathuḥ jihma bāram

original: RV_1,116.09c kṣarann āpo na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya //
analyzed: kṣaran āpaḥ na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya

original: RV_1,116.10a jujuruṣo nāsatyota vavrim prāmuñcataṃ drāpim iva cyavānāt /
analyzed: jujuruṣaḥ nāsatya uta vavrim prāmuñcatam drāpim iva cyavānāt

original: RV_1,116.10c prātirataṃ jahitasyāyur dasrād it patim akṛṇutaṃ kanīnām //
analyzed: prātiratam jahitasya āyuḥ dasrā āt id patim akṛṇutam kanīnām

original: RV_1,116.11a tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ rādhyaṃ cābhiṣṭiman nāsatyā varūtham /
analyzed: tat vām narā śaṃsyam rādhyam ca abhiṣṭiman nāsatyāḥ varūtham

original: RV_1,116.11c yad vidvāṃsā nidhim ivāpagūḷham ud darśatād ūpathur vandanāya //
analyzed: yat vidvāṃsā nidhim iva apagūḍham ud darśatāt ūpathuḥ vandanāya

original: RV_1,116.12a tad vāṃ narā sanaye daṃsa ugram āviṣ kṛṇomi tanyatur na vṛṣṭim /
analyzed: tat vām narā sanaye daṃsaḥ ugram āvis kṛṇomi tanyatuḥ na vṛṣṭim

original: RV_1,116.12c dadhyaṅ ha yan madhv ātharvaṇo vām aśvasya śīrṣṇā pra yad īm uvāca //
analyzed: dadhyaṅ ha yat madhu ātharvaṇaḥ vām aśvasya śīrṣṇā pra yat īm uvāca

original: RV_1,116.13a ajohavīn nāsatyā karā vām mahe yāman purubhujā purandhiḥ /
analyzed: ajohavīt nāsatyā karā vām mahe yāman puru bhujā purandhiḥ

original: RV_1,116.13c śrutaṃ tac chāsur iva vadhrimatyā hiraṇyahastam aśvināv adattam //
analyzed: śrutam tat śāsuḥ iva vadhrimatyāḥ hiraṇyahastam aśvinau adattam

original: RV_1,116.14a āsno vṛkasya vartikām abhīke yuvaṃ narā nāsatyāmumuktam /
analyzed: āsnaḥ vṛkasya vartikām abhīke yuvam narā nāsatya amumuktam

original: RV_1,116.14c uto kavim purubhujā yuvaṃ ha kṛpamāṇam akṛṇutaṃ vicakṣe //
analyzed: uta u kavim puru bhujā yuvam ha kṛpamāṇam akṛṇutam vicakṣe

original: RV_1,116.15a caritraṃ hi ver ivācchedi parṇam ājā khelasya paritakmyāyām /
analyzed: caritram hi veḥ iva acchedi parṇam ājā khelasya paritakmyāyām

original: RV_1,116.15c sadyo jaṅghām āyasīṃ viśpalāyai dhane hite sartave praty adhattam //
analyzed: sadyas jaṅghām āyasīm viśpalāyai dhane hite sartave prati adhattam

original: RV_1,116.16a śatam meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvaṃ tam pitāndhaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: śatam meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvam tam pitā andham cakāra

original: RV_1,116.16c tasmā akṣī nāsatyā vicakṣa ādhattaṃ dasrā bhiṣajāv anarvan //
analyzed: tasmai akṣī nāsatyāḥ vicakṣe ādhattam dasrā bhiṣajau anarvan

original: RV_1,116.17a ā vāṃ rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya kārṣmevātiṣṭhad arvatā jayantī /
analyzed: ā vām ratham duhitā sūryasya kārṣma iva atiṣṭhat arvatā jayantī

original: RV_1,116.17c viśve devā anv amanyanta hṛdbhiḥ sam u śriyā nāsatyā sacethe //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu amanyanta hṛdbhiḥ sam u śriyā nāsatyā sacethe

original: RV_1,116.18a yad ayātaṃ divodāsāya vartir bharadvājāyāśvinā hayantā /
analyzed: yat ayātam divodāsāya vartiḥ bharadvājāya aśvinā

original: RV_1,116.18c revad uvāha sacano ratho vāṃ vṛṣabhaś ca śiṃśumāraś ca yuktā //
analyzed: revat uvāha sacanaḥ rathaḥ vām vṛṣabhaḥ ca śiṃśumāraḥ ca yuktā

original: RV_1,116.19a rayiṃ sukṣatraṃ svapatyam āyuḥ suvīryaṃ nāsatyā vahantā /
analyzed: rayim su kṣatram su apatyam āyuḥ su vīryam nāsatyā vahantā

original: RV_1,116.19c ā jahnāvīṃ samanasopa vājais trir ahno bhāgaṃ dadhatīm ayātam //
analyzed: ā jahnāvīm samanasā upa vājaiḥ tris ahnaḥ bhāgam dadhatīm ayātam

original: RV_1,116.20a pariviṣṭaṃ jāhuṣaṃ viśvataḥ sīṃ sugebhir naktam ūhathū rajobhiḥ /
analyzed: pariviṣṭam jāhuṣam viśvatas sīm sugebhiḥ naktam ūhathuḥ rajobhiḥ

original: RV_1,116.20c vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatāṃ ajarayū ayātam //
analyzed: vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatān ajarayū ayātam

original: RV_1,116.21a ekasyā vastor āvataṃ raṇāya vaśam aśvinā sanaye sahasrā /
analyzed: ekasyāḥ vastoḥ āvatam raṇāya vaśam aśvinā sanaye sahasrā

original: RV_1,116.21c nir ahataṃ ducchunā indravantā pṛthuśravaso vṛṣaṇāv arātīḥ //
analyzed: niḥ ahatam ducchunāḥ indravantā pṛthuśravasaḥ vṛṣaṇau arātīḥ

original: RV_1,116.22a śarasya cid ārcatkasyāvatād ā nīcād uccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ /
analyzed: śarasya cit ārcatkasya avatāt ā nīcāt uccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ

original: RV_1,116.22c śayave cin nāsatyā śacībhir jasuraye staryam pipyathur gām //
analyzed: śayave cit nāsatyā śacībhiḥ jasuraye staryam pipyathuḥ gām

original: RV_1,116.23a avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,116.23c paśuṃ na naṣṭam iva darśanāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathur viśvakāya //
analyzed: paśum na naṣṭam iva darśanāya viṣṇāpvam dadathuḥ viśvakāya

original: RV_1,116.24a daśa rātrīr aśivenā nava dyūn avanaddhaṃ śnathitam apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: daśa rātrīḥ aśivena nava dyūn avanaddham śnathitam apsu antar

original: RV_1,116.24c viprutaṃ rebham udani pravṛktam un ninyathuḥ somam iva sruveṇa //
analyzed: viprutam rebham udani pravṛktam ud ninyathuḥ somam iva sruveṇa

original: RV_1,116.25a pra vāṃ daṃsāṃsy aśvināv avocam asya patiḥ syāṃ sugavaḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: pra vām daṃsāṃsi aśvinau avocam asya patiḥ syām sugavaḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_1,116.25c uta paśyann aśnuvan dīrgham āyur astam ivej jarimāṇaṃ jagamyām //
analyzed: uta paśyan aśnuvan dīrgham āyuḥ astam iva id jarimāṇam jagamyām

original: RV_1,117.01a madhvaḥ somasyāśvinā madāya pratno hotā vivāsate vām /
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya aśvinā madāya pratnaḥ hotā vivāsate vām

original: RV_1,117.01c barhiṣmatī rātir viśritā gīr iṣā yātaṃ nāsatyopa vājaiḥ //
analyzed: barhiṣmatī rātiḥ viśritā gīḥ iṣā yātam nāsatyā upa vājaiḥ

original: RV_1,117.02a yo vām aśvinā manaso javīyān rathaḥ svaśvo viśa ājigāti /
analyzed: yaḥ vām aśvinā manasaḥ javīyān rathaḥ su aśvaḥ viśaḥ ājigāti

original: RV_1,117.02c yena gacchathaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tena narā vartir asmabhyaṃ yātam //
analyzed: yena gacchathaḥ su kṛtaḥ duroṇam tena narā vartiḥ asmabhyam yātam

original: RV_1,117.03a ṛṣiṃ narāv aṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsād atrim muñcatho gaṇena /
analyzed: ṛṣim narau aṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsāt atrim muñcathaḥ gaṇena

original: RV_1,117.03c minantā dasyor aśivasya māyā anupūrvaṃ vṛṣaṇā codayantā //
analyzed: minantā dasyoḥ aśivasya māyāḥ anupūrvam vṛṣaṇā codayantā

original: RV_1,117.04a aśvaṃ na gūḷham aśvinā durevair ṛṣiṃ narā vṛṣaṇā rebham apsu /
analyzed: aśvam na gūḍham aśvinā durevaiḥ ṛṣim narā vṛṣaṇā rebham apsu

original: RV_1,117.04c saṃ taṃ riṇītho viprutaṃ daṃsobhir na vāṃ jūryanti pūrvyā kṛtāni //
analyzed: sam tam riṇīthaḥ viprutam daṃsobhiḥ na vām jūryanti pūrvyā kṛtāni

original: RV_1,117.05a suṣupvāṃsaṃ na nirṛter upasthe sūryaṃ na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam /
analyzed: suṣupvāṃsam na nirṛteḥ upasthe sūryam na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam

original: RV_1,117.05c śubhe rukmaṃ na darśataṃ nikhātam ud ūpathur aśvinā vandanāya //
analyzed: śubhe rukmam na darśatam nikhātam ud ūpathuḥ aśvinā vandanāya

original: RV_1,117.06a tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyam pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman /
analyzed: tat vām narā śaṃsyam pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman

original: RV_1,117.06c śaphād aśvasya vājino janāya śataṃ kumbhāṃ asiñcatam madhūnām //
analyzed: śaphāt aśvasya vājinaḥ janāya śatam kumbhān asiñcatam madhūnām

original: RV_1,117.07a yuvaṃ narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathur viśvakāya /
analyzed: yuvam narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvam dadathuḥ viśvakāya

original: RV_1,117.07c ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade duroṇe patiṃ jūryantyā aśvināv adattam //
analyzed: ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade duroṇe patim jūryantyai aśvinau adattam

original: RV_1,117.08a yuvaṃ śyāvāya ruśatīm adattam mahaḥ kṣoṇasyāśvinā kaṇvāya /
analyzed: yuvam śyāvāya ruśatīm adattam mahaḥ kṣoṇasya aśvinā kaṇvāya

original: RV_1,117.08c pravācyaṃ tad vṛṣaṇā kṛtaṃ vāṃ yan nārṣadāya śravo adhyadhattam //
analyzed: pravācyam tat vṛṣaṇā kṛtam vām yat nārṣadāya śravaḥ adhyadhattam

original: RV_1,117.09a purū varpāṃsy aśvinā dadhānā ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam /
analyzed: purū varpāṃsi aśvinā dadhānā ni pedavaḥ ūhathuḥ āśum aśvam

original: RV_1,117.09c sahasrasāṃ vājinam apratītam ahihanaṃ śravasyaṃ tarutram //
analyzed: sahasra sām vājinam apratītam ahi hanam śravasyam tarutram

original: RV_1,117.10a etāni vāṃ śravasyā sudānū brahmāṅgūṣaṃ sadanaṃ rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: etāni vām śravasyā sudānū brahma āṅgūṣam sadanam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_1,117.10c yad vām pajrāso aśvinā havante yātam iṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam //
analyzed: yat vām pajrāsaḥ aśvinā havante yātam iṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam

original: RV_1,117.11a sūnor mānenāśvinā gṛṇānā vājaṃ viprāya bhuraṇā radantā /
analyzed: sūnoḥ mānena aśvinā gṛṇānā vājam viprāya bhuraṇā radantā

original: RV_1,117.11c agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā saṃ viśpalāṃ nāsatyāriṇītam //
analyzed: agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā sam viśpalām nāsatyā ariṇītam

original: RV_1,117.12a kuha yāntā suṣṭutiṃ kāvyasya divo napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā /
analyzed: kuha yāntā suṣṭutim kāvyasya divaḥ napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā

original: RV_1,117.12c hiraṇyasyeva kalaśaṃ nikhātam ud ūpathur daśame aśvināhan //
analyzed: hiraṇyasya iva kalaśam nikhātam ud ūpathuḥ daśame aśvinā ahan

original: RV_1,117.13a yuvaṃ cyavānam aśvinā jarantam punar yuvānaṃ cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam aśvinā jarantam punar yuvānam cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,117.13c yuvo rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyāvṛṇīta //
analyzed: yuvoḥ ratham duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyā avṛṇīta

original: RV_1,117.14a yuvaṃ tugrāya pūrvyebhir evaiḥ punarmanyāv abhavataṃ yuvānā /
analyzed: yuvam tugrāya pūrvyebhiḥ evaiḥ punarmanyau abhavatam yuvānā

original: RV_1,117.14c yuvam bhujyum arṇaso niḥ samudrād vibhir ūhathur ṛjrebhir aśvaiḥ //
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum arṇasaḥ niḥ samudrāt vibhiḥ ūhathuḥ ṛjrebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_1,117.15a ajohavīd aśvinā taugryo vām proḷhaḥ samudram avyathir jaganvān /
analyzed: ajohavīt aśvinā taugryaḥ vām proḍhaḥ samudram avyathiḥ jaganvān

original: RV_1,117.15c niṣ ṭam ūhathuḥ suyujā rathena manojavasā vṛṣaṇā svasti //
analyzed: niḥ tam ūhathuḥ su yujā rathena manaḥ javasā vṛṣaṇā svasti

original: RV_1,117.16a ajohavīd aśvinā vartikā vām āsno yat sīm amuñcataṃ vṛkasya /
analyzed: ajohavīt aśvinā vartikā vām āsnaḥ yat sīm amuñcatam vṛkasya

original: RV_1,117.16c vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānv adrer jātaṃ viṣvāco ahataṃ viṣeṇa //
analyzed: vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānū adreḥ jātam viṣvācaḥ ahatam viṣeṇa

original: RV_1,117.17a śatam meṣān vṛkye māmahānaṃ tamaḥ praṇītam aśivena pitrā /
analyzed: śatam meṣān vṛkye māmahānam tamaḥ praṇītam aśivena pitrā

original: RV_1,117.17c ākṣī ṛjrāśve aśvināv adhattaṃ jyotir andhāya cakrathur vicakṣe //
analyzed: ā akṣī ṛjrāśve aśvinau adhattam jyotiḥ andhāya cakrathuḥ vicakṣe

original: RV_1,117.18a śunam andhāya bharam ahvayat sā vṛkīr aśvinā vṛṣaṇā nareti /
analyzed: śunam andhāya bharam ahvayat sā vṛkīḥ aśvinā vṛṣaṇā narā iti

original: RV_1,117.18c jāraḥ kanīna iva cakṣadāna ṛjrāśvaḥ śatam ekaṃ ca meṣān //
analyzed: jāraḥ kanīnaḥ iva cakṣadānaḥ ṛjrāśvaḥ śatam ekam ca meṣān

original: RV_1,117.19a mahī vām ūtir aśvinā mayobhūr uta srāmaṃ dhiṣṇyā saṃ riṇīthaḥ /
analyzed: mahī vām ūtiḥ aśvinā mayaḥ bhūḥ uta srāmam dhiṣṇyā sam riṇīthaḥ

original: RV_1,117.19c athā yuvām id ahvayat purandhir āgacchataṃ sīṃ vṛṣaṇāv avobhiḥ //
analyzed: athā yuvām id ahvayat purandhiḥ āgacchatam sīm vṛṣaṇau avobhiḥ

original: RV_1,117.20a adhenuṃ dasrā staryaṃ viṣaktām apinvataṃ śayave aśvinā gām /
analyzed: adhenum dasrā staryam viṣaktām apinvatam śayave aśvinā gām

original: RV_1,117.20c yuvaṃ śacībhir vimadāya jāyāṃ ny ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣām //
analyzed: yuvam śacībhiḥ vimadāya jāyām ni ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣām

original: RV_1,117.21a yavaṃ vṛkeṇāśvinā vapanteṣaṃ duhantā manuṣāya dasrā /
analyzed: yavam vṛkeṇa aśvinā vapantā iṣam duhantā manuṣāya dasrā

original: RV_1,117.21c abhi dasyum bakureṇā dhamantoru jyotiś cakrathur āryāya //
analyzed: abhi dasyum bakureṇa dhamantā uru jyotiḥ cakrathuḥ āryāya

original: RV_1,117.22a ātharvaṇāyāśvinā dadhīce 'śvyaṃ śiraḥ praty airayatam /
analyzed: ātharvaṇāya aśvinā dadhīce śvyam śiraḥ prati airayatam

original: RV_1,117.22c sa vām madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāv apikakṣyaṃ vām //
analyzed: sa vām madhu pra vocat ṛtāyan tvāṣṭram yat dasrau apikakṣyam vām

original: RV_1,117.23a sadā kavī sumatim ā cake vāṃ viśvā dhiyo aśvinā prāvatam me /
analyzed: sadā kavī sumatim ā cake vām viśvāḥ dhiyaḥ aśvinā prāvatam me

original: RV_1,117.23c asme rayiṃ nāsatyā bṛhantam apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthām //
analyzed: asme rayim nāsatyāḥ bṛhantam apatyasācam śrutyam rarāthām

original: RV_1,117.24a hiraṇyahastam aśvinā rarāṇā putraṃ narā vadhrimatyā adattam /
analyzed: hiraṇyahastam aśvinā rarāṇā putram narā vadhrimatyai adattam

original: RV_1,117.24c tridhā ha śyāvam aśvinā vikastam uj jīvasa airayataṃ sudānū //
analyzed: tridhā ha śyāvam aśvinā vikastam ud jīvase airayatam sudānū

original: RV_1,117.25a etāni vām aśvinā vīryāṇi pra pūrvyāṇy āyavo 'vocan /
analyzed: etāni vām aśvinā vīryāṇi pra pūrvyāṇi āyavaḥ vocan

original: RV_1,117.25c brahma kṛṇvanto vṛṣaṇā yuvabhyāṃ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
analyzed: brahma kṛṇvantaḥ vṛṣaṇā yuvabhyām su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema

original: RV_1,118.01a ā vāṃ ratho aśvinā śyenapatvā sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ /
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ aśvinā śyena patvā su mṛḍīkaḥ su avām yātu arvāṅ

original: RV_1,118.01c yo martyasya manaso javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā vātaraṃhāḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ martyasya manasaḥ javīyān tri vandhuraḥ vṛṣaṇā vāta raṃhāḥ

original: RV_1,118.02a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena tricakreṇa suvṛtā yātam arvāk /
analyzed: tri vandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena tri cakreṇa suvṛtā yātam arvāk

original: RV_1,118.02c pinvataṃ gā jinvatam arvato no vardhayatam aśvinā vīram asme //
analyzed: pinvatam gāḥ jinvatam arvataḥ naḥ vardhayatam aśvinā vīram asme

original: RV_1,118.03a pravadyāmanā suvṛtā rathena dasrāv imaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokam adreḥ /
analyzed: pravat yāmanā suvṛtā rathena dasrau imam śṛṇutam ślokam adreḥ

original: RV_1,118.03c kim aṅga vām praty avartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhur viprāso aśvinā purājāḥ //
analyzed: kim aṅga vām prati avartim gamiṣṭhā āhuḥ viprāsaḥ aśvinā purājāḥ

original: RV_1,118.04a ā vāṃ śyenāso aśvinā vahantu rathe yuktāsa āśavaḥ pataṅgāḥ /
analyzed: ā vām śyenāsaḥ aśvinā vahantu rathe yuktāsaḥ āśavaḥ pataṅgāḥ

original: RV_1,118.04c ye apturo divyāso na gṛdhrā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahanti //
analyzed: ye apturaḥ divyāsaḥ na gṛdhrāḥ abhi prayaḥ nāsatyā vahanti

original: RV_1,118.05a ā vāṃ rathaṃ yuvatis tiṣṭhad atra juṣṭvī narā duhitā sūryasya /
analyzed: ā vām ratham yuvatiḥ tiṣṭhat atra juṣṭvī narā duhitā sūryasya

original: RV_1,118.05c pari vām aśvā vapuṣaḥ pataṅgā vayo vahantv aruṣā abhīke //
analyzed: pari vām aśvāḥ vapuṣaḥ pataṅgāḥ vayaḥ vahantu aruṣāḥ abhīke

original: RV_1,118.06a ud vandanam airataṃ daṃsanābhir ud rebhaṃ dasrā vṛṣaṇā śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: ud vandanam airatam daṃsanābhiḥ ud rebham dasrā vṛṣaṇā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,118.06c niṣ ṭaugryam pārayathaḥ samudrāt punaś cyavānaṃ cakrathur yuvānam //
analyzed: niḥ taugryam pārayathaḥ samudrāt punar cyavānam cakrathuḥ yuvānam

original: RV_1,118.07a yuvam atraye 'vanītāya taptam ūrjam omānam aśvināv adhattam /
analyzed: yuvam atraye vanītāya taptam ūrjam omānam aśvinau adhattam

original: RV_1,118.07c yuvaṃ kaṇvāyāpiriptāya cakṣuḥ praty adhattaṃ suṣṭutiṃ jujuṣāṇā //
analyzed: yuvam kaṇvāya apiriptāya cakṣuḥ prati adhattam suṣṭutim jujuṣāṇā

original: RV_1,118.08a yuvaṃ dhenuṃ śayave nādhitāyāpinvatam aśvinā pūrvyāya /
analyzed: yuvam dhenum śayave nādhitāya apinvatam aśvinā pūrvyāya

original: RV_1,118.08c amuñcataṃ vartikām aṃhaso niḥ prati jaṅghāṃ viśpalāyā adhattam //
analyzed: amuñcatam vartikām aṃhasaḥ niḥ prati jaṅghām viśpalāyai adhattam

original: RV_1,118.09a yuvaṃ śvetam pedava indrajūtam ahihanam aśvinādattam aśvam /
analyzed: yuvam śvetam pedavaḥ indra jūtam ahi hanam aśvinā adattam aśvam

original: RV_1,118.09c johūtram aryo abhibhūtim ugraṃ sahasrasāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vīḍvaṅgam //
analyzed: johūtram aryaḥ abhibhūtim ugram sahasra sām vṛṣaṇam vīḍu aṅgam

original: RV_1,118.10a tā vāṃ narā sv avase sujātā havāmahe aśvinā nādhamānāḥ /
analyzed: tā vām narā su avase sujātā havāmahe aśvinā nādhamānāḥ

original: RV_1,118.10c ā na upa vasumatā rathena giro juṣāṇā suvitāya yātam //
analyzed: ā naḥ upa vasumatā rathena giraḥ juṣāṇā suvitāya yātam

original: RV_1,118.11a ā śyenasya javasā nūtanenāsme yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: ā śyenasya javasā nūtanena asme yātam nāsatyā sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_1,118.11c have hi vām aśvinā rātahavyaḥ śaśvattamāyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau //
analyzed: have hi vām aśvinā rāta havyaḥ śaśvattamāyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_1,119.01a ā vāṃ ratham purumāyam manojuvaṃ jīrāśvaṃ yajñiyaṃ jīvase huve /
analyzed: ā vām ratham puru māyam manaḥ juvam jīra aśvam yajñiyam jīvase huve

original: RV_1,119.01c sahasraketuṃ vaninaṃ śatadvasuṃ śruṣṭīvānaṃ varivodhām abhi prayaḥ //
analyzed: sahasra ketum vaninam śatadvasum śruṣṭīvānam varivaḥ dhām abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_1,119.02a ūrdhvā dhītiḥ praty asya prayāmany adhāyi śasman sam ayanta ā diśaḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvā dhītiḥ prati asya prayāmani adhāyi śasman sam ayanta ā diśaḥ

original: RV_1,119.02c svadāmi gharmam prati yanty ūtaya ā vām ūrjānī ratham aśvināruhat //
analyzed: svadāmi gharmam prati yanti ūtayaḥ ā vām ūrjānī ratham aśvinā āruhat

original: RV_1,119.03a saṃ yan mithaḥ paspṛdhānāso agmata śubhe makhā amitā jāyavo raṇe /
analyzed: sam yat mithas paspṛdhānāsaḥ agmata śubhe makhāḥ amitāḥ jāyavaḥ raṇe

original: RV_1,119.03c yuvor aha pravaṇe cekite ratho yad aśvinā vahathaḥ sūrim ā varam //
analyzed: yuvoḥ aha pravaṇe cekite rathaḥ yat aśvinā vahathaḥ sūrim ā varam

original: RV_1,119.04a yuvam bhujyum bhuramāṇaṃ vibhir gataṃ svayuktibhir nivahantā pitṛbhya ā /
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum bhuramāṇam vibhiḥ gatam sva yuktibhiḥ nivahantā pitṛbhyaḥ ā

original: RV_1,119.04c yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir vṛṣaṇā vijenyaṃ divodāsāya mahi ceti vām avaḥ //
analyzed: yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ vṛṣaṇā vijenyam divodāsāya mahi ceti vām avaḥ

original: RV_1,119.05a yuvor aśvinā vapuṣe yuvāyujaṃ rathaṃ vāṇī yematur asya śardhyam /
analyzed: yuvoḥ aśvinā vapuṣe yuvāyujam ratham vāṇī yematuḥ asya śardhyam

original: RV_1,119.05c ā vām patitvaṃ sakhyāya jagmuṣī yoṣāvṛṇīta jenyā yuvām patī //
analyzed: ā vām pati tvam sakhyāya jagmuṣī yoṣā vṛṇīta jenyā yuvām patī

original: RV_1,119.06a yuvaṃ rebham pariṣūter uruṣyatho himena gharmam paritaptam atraye /
analyzed: yuvam rebham pariṣūteḥ uruṣyathaḥ himena gharmam paritaptam atraye

original: RV_1,119.06c yuvaṃ śayor avasam pipyathur gavi pra dīrgheṇa vandanas tāry āyuṣā //
analyzed: yuvam śayoḥ avasam pipyathuḥ gavi pra dīrgheṇa vandanaḥ tāri āyuṣā

original: RV_1,119.07a yuvaṃ vandanaṃ nirṛtaṃ jaraṇyayā rathaṃ na dasrā karaṇā sam invathaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam vandanam nirṛtam jaraṇyayā ratham na dasrā karaṇā sam invathaḥ

original: RV_1,119.07c kṣetrād ā vipraṃ janatho vipanyayā pra vām atra vidhate daṃsanā bhuvat //
analyzed: kṣetrāt ā vipram janathaḥ vipanyayā pra vām atra vidhate daṃsanā bhuvat

original: RV_1,119.08a agacchataṃ kṛpamāṇam parāvati pituḥ svasya tyajasā nibādhitam /
analyzed: agacchatam kṛpamāṇam parāvati pituḥ svasya tyajasā nibādhitam

original: RV_1,119.08c svarvatīr ita ūtīr yuvor aha citrā abhīke abhavann abhiṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: svarvatīḥ itas ūtīḥ yuvoḥ aha citrāḥ abhīke abhavan abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,119.09a uta syā vām madhuman makṣikārapan made somasyauśijo huvanyati /
analyzed: uta syā vām madhumat makṣikā arapat made somasya auśijaḥ huvanyati

original: RV_1,119.09c yuvaṃ dadhīco mana ā vivāsatho 'thā śiraḥ prati vām aśvyaṃ vadat //
analyzed: yuvam dadhīcaḥ manaḥ ā vivāsathaḥ u thā śiraḥ prati vām aśvyam vadat

original: RV_1,119.10a yuvam pedave puruvāram aśvinā spṛdhāṃ śvetaṃ tarutāraṃ duvasyathaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam pedave puru vāram aśvinā spṛdhām śvetam tarutāram duvasyathaḥ

original: RV_1,119.10c śaryair abhidyum pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraṃ carkṛtyam indram iva carṣaṇīsaham //
analyzed: śaryaiḥ abhidyum pṛtanāsu duṣṭaram carkṛtyam indram iva carṣaṇīsaham

original: RV_1,120.01a kā rādhad dhotrāśvinā vāṃ ko vāṃ joṣa ubhayoḥ /
analyzed: kā rādhat hotrā aśvinā vām kaḥ vām joṣaḥ ubhayoḥ

original: RV_1,120.01c kathā vidhāty apracetāḥ //
analyzed: kathā vidhāti apracetāḥ

original: RV_1,120.02a vidvāṃsāv id duraḥ pṛcched avidvān itthāparo acetāḥ /
analyzed: vidvāṃsau id duraḥ pṛcchet avidvān itthā aparaḥ acetāḥ

original: RV_1,120.02c nū cin nu marte akrau //
analyzed: nū cit nu marte akrau

original: RV_1,120.03a tā vidvāṃsā havāmahe vāṃ tā no vidvāṃsā manma vocetam adya /
analyzed: tā vidvāṃsā havāmahe vām tā naḥ vidvāṃsā manma vocetam adya

original: RV_1,120.03c prārcad dayamāno yuvākuḥ //
analyzed: prārcat dayamānaḥ yuvākuḥ

original: RV_1,120.04a vi pṛcchāmi pākyā na devān vaṣaṭkṛtasyādbhutasya dasrā /
analyzed: vi pṛcchāmi pākyā na devān vaṣaṭkṛtasya adbhutasya dasrā

original: RV_1,120.04c pātaṃ ca sahyaso yuvaṃ ca rabhyaso naḥ //
analyzed: pātam ca sahyasaḥ yuvam ca rabhyasaḥ naḥ

original: RV_1,120.05a pra yā ghoṣe bhṛgavāṇe na śobhe yayā vācā yajati pajriyo vām /
analyzed: pra yā ghoṣe bhṛgavāṇe na śobhe yayā vācā yajati pajriyaḥ vām

original: RV_1,120.05c praiṣayur na vidvān //
analyzed: praiṣayuḥ na vidvān

original: RV_1,120.06a śrutaṃ gāyatraṃ takavānasyāhaṃ cid dhi rirebhāśvinā vām /
analyzed: śrutam gāyatram takavānasya aham cit hi rirebha aśvinā vām

original: RV_1,120.06c ākṣī śubhas patī dan //
analyzed: ā akṣī śubhaḥ patī dan

original: RV_1,120.07a yuvaṃ hy āstam maho ran yuvaṃ vā yan niratataṃsatam /
analyzed: yuvam hi āstam mahaḥ ran yuvam vā yat niratataṃsatam

original: RV_1,120.07c tā no vasū sugopā syātam pātaṃ no vṛkād aghāyoḥ //
analyzed: tā naḥ vasū su gopā syātam pātam naḥ vṛkāt aghāyoḥ

original: RV_1,120.08a mā kasmai dhātam abhy amitriṇe no mākutrā no gṛhebhyo dhenavo guḥ /
analyzed: mā kasmai dhātam abhī amitriṇe na u mā akutrā naḥ gṛhebhyaḥ dhenavaḥ guḥ

original: RV_1,120.08c stanābhujo aśiśvīḥ //
analyzed: stanābhujaḥ aśiśvīḥ

original: RV_1,120.09a duhīyan mitradhitaye yuvāku rāye ca no mimītaṃ vājavatyai /
analyzed: duhīyan mitradhitaye yuvāku rāye ca naḥ mimītam vājavatyai

original: RV_1,120.09c iṣe ca no mimītaṃ dhenumatyai //
analyzed: iṣe ca naḥ mimītam dhenumatyai

original: RV_1,120.10a aśvinor asanaṃ ratham anaśvaṃ vājinīvatoḥ /
analyzed: aśvinoḥ asanam ratham an aśvam vājinīvatoḥ

original: RV_1,120.10c tenāham bhūri cākana //
analyzed: tena aham bhūri cākana

original: RV_1,120.11a ayaṃ samaha mā tanūhyāte janāṃ anu /
analyzed: ayam samaha mā janān anu

original: RV_1,120.11c somapeyaṃ sukho rathaḥ //
analyzed: soma peyam sukhaḥ rathaḥ

original: RV_1,120.12a adha svapnasya nir vide 'bhuñjataś ca revataḥ /
analyzed: adha svapnasya niḥ vide bhuñjataḥ ca revataḥ

original: RV_1,120.12c ubhā tā basri naśyataḥ //
analyzed: ubhā tā basri naśyataḥ

original: RV_1,121.01a kad itthā nṝṃḥ pātraṃ devayatāṃ śravad giro aṅgirasāṃ turaṇyan /
analyzed: kad itthā nṝn pātram devayatām śravat giraḥ aṅgirasām turaṇyan

original: RV_1,121.01c pra yad ānaḍ viśa ā harmyasyoru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ //
analyzed: pra yat ānaṭ viśaḥ ā harmyasya uru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ

original: RV_1,121.02a stambhīd dha dyāṃ sa dharuṇam pruṣāyad ṛbhur vājāya draviṇaṃ naro goḥ /
analyzed: stambhīt ha dyām sa dharuṇam pruṣāyat ṛbhuḥ vājāya draviṇam naraḥ goḥ

original: RV_1,121.02c anu svajām mahiṣaś cakṣata vrām menām aśvasya pari mātaraṃ goḥ //
analyzed: anu sva jām mahiṣaḥ cakṣata vrām menām aśvasya pari mātaram goḥ

original: RV_1,121.03a nakṣad dhavam aruṇīḥ pūrvyaṃ rāṭ turo viśām aṅgirasām anu dyūn /
analyzed: nakṣat havam aruṇīḥ pūrvyam rāj turaḥ viśām aṅgirasām anu dyūn

original: RV_1,121.03c takṣad vajraṃ niyutaṃ tastambhad dyāṃ catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde //
analyzed: takṣat vajram niyutam tastambhat dyām catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde

original: RV_1,121.04a asya made svaryaṃ dā ṛtāyāpīvṛtam usriyāṇām anīkam /
analyzed: asya made svaryam dāḥ ṛtāya apīvṛtam usriyāṇām anīkam

original: RV_1,121.04c yad dha prasarge trikakum nivartad apa druho mānuṣasya duro vaḥ //
analyzed: yat ha prasarge trikakubh nivartat apa druhaḥ mānuṣasya duraḥ var

original: RV_1,121.05a tubhyam payo yat pitarāv anītāṃ rādhaḥ suretas turaṇe bhuraṇyū /
analyzed: tubhyam payaḥ yat pitarau anītām rādhaḥ su retaḥ turaṇe bhuraṇyu

original: RV_1,121.05c śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ paya usriyāyāḥ //
analyzed: śuci yat te rekṇaḥ āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payaḥ usriyāyāḥ

original: RV_1,121.06a adha pra jajñe taraṇir mamattu pra rocy asyā uṣaso na sūraḥ /
analyzed: adha pra jajñe taraṇiḥ mamattu pra roci asyāḥ uṣasaḥ na sūraḥ

original: RV_1,121.06c indur yebhir āṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcañ jaraṇābhi dhāma //
analyzed: induḥ yebhiḥ āṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcam jaraṇā abhi dhāma

original: RV_1,121.07a svidhmā yad vanadhitir apasyāt sūro adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ /
analyzed: su idhmā yat vanadhitiḥ apasyāt sūraḥ adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ

original: RV_1,121.07c yad dha prabhāsi kṛtvyāṃ anu dyūn anarviśe paśviṣe turāya //
analyzed: yat ha prabhāsi kṛtvyān anu dyūn anarviśe paśviṣe turāya

original: RV_1,121.08a aṣṭā maho diva ādo harī iha dyumnāsāham abhi yodhāna utsam /
analyzed: aṣṭā mahaḥ divaḥ ādaḥ harī iha dyumnāsāham abhi yodhānaḥ utsam

original: RV_1,121.08c hariṃ yat te mandinaṃ dukṣan vṛdhe gorabhasam adribhir vātāpyam //
analyzed: harim yat te mandinam dukṣan vṛdhe go rabhasam adribhiḥ vātāpyam

original: RV_1,121.09a tvam āyasam prati vartayo gor divo aśmānam upanītam ṛbhvā /
analyzed: tvam āyasam prati vartayaḥ goḥ divaḥ aśmānam upanītam ṛbhvā

original: RV_1,121.09c kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvañ chuṣṇam anantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ //
analyzed: kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvam śuṣṇam anantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ

original: RV_1,121.10a purā yat sūras tamaso apītes tam adrivaḥ phaligaṃ hetim asya /
analyzed: purā yat sūraḥ tamasaḥ apīteḥ tam adrivas phaligam hetim asya

original: RV_1,121.10c śuṣṇasya cit parihitaṃ yad ojo divas pari sugrathitaṃ tad ādaḥ //
analyzed: śuṣṇasya cit parihitam yat ojaḥ divaḥ pari su grathitam tat ādaḥ

original: RV_1,121.11a anu tvā mahī pājasī acakre dyāvākṣāmā madatām indra karman /
analyzed: anu tvā mahī pājasī a cakre dyāvākṣāmā madatām indra karman

original: RV_1,121.11c tvaṃ vṛtram āśayānaṃ sirāsu maho vajreṇa siṣvapo varāhum //
analyzed: tvam vṛtram āśayānam sirāsu mahaḥ u vajreṇa siṣvapaḥ varāhum

original: RV_1,121.12a tvam indra naryo yāṃ avo nṝn tiṣṭhā vātasya suyujo vahiṣṭhān /
analyzed: tvam indra naryaḥ yām avaḥ nṝn tiṣṭhāḥ vātasya su yujaḥ vahiṣṭhān

original: RV_1,121.12c yaṃ te kāvya uśanā mandinaṃ dād vṛtrahaṇam pāryaṃ tatakṣa vajram //
analyzed: yam te kāvyaḥ uśanāḥ mandinam dāt vṛtra haṇam pāryam tatakṣa vajram

original: RV_1,121.13a tvaṃ sūro harito rāmayo nṝn bharac cakram etaśo nāyam indra /
analyzed: tvam sūraḥ haritaḥ rāmayaḥ nṝn bharat cakram etaśaḥ na ayam indra

original: RV_1,121.13c prāsya pāraṃ navatiṃ nāvyānām api kartam avartayo 'yajyūn //
analyzed: prāsya pāram navatim nāvyānām api kartam avartayaḥ yajyūn

original: RV_1,121.14a tvaṃ no asyā indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivo duritād abhīke /
analyzed: tvam naḥ asyāḥ indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivas duritāt abhīke

original: RV_1,121.14c pra no vājān rathyo aśvabudhyān iṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai //
analyzed: pra naḥ vājān rathyaḥ aśva budhyān iṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai

original: RV_1,121.15a mā sā te asmat sumatir vi dasad vājapramahaḥ sam iṣo varanta /
analyzed: mā sā te asmat sumatiḥ vi dasat vāja pramahas sam iṣaḥ varanta

original: RV_1,121.15c ā no bhaja maghavan goṣv aryo maṃhiṣṭhās te sadhamādaḥ syāma //
analyzed: ā naḥ bhaja maghavan goṣu aryaḥ maṃhiṣṭhāḥ te sadhamādaḥ syāma

original: RV_1,122.01a pra vaḥ pāntaṃ raghumanyavo 'ndho yajñaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe bharadhvam /
analyzed: pra vaḥ pāntam raghu manyavaḥ ndhaḥ yajñam rudrāya mīḍhuṣe bharadhvam

original: RV_1,122.01c divo astoṣy asurasya vīrair iṣudhyeva maruto rodasyoḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ astoṣi asurasya vīraiḥ iṣudhyā iva marutaḥ rodasyoḥ

original: RV_1,122.02a patnīva pūrvahūtiṃ vāvṛdhadhyā uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne /
analyzed: patnī iva pūrva hūtim vāvṛdhadhyai uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne

original: RV_1,122.02c starīr nātkaṃ vyutaṃ vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ //
analyzed: starīḥ nā atkam vyutam vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ

original: RV_1,122.03a mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vāto apāṃ vṛṣaṇvān /
analyzed: mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vātaḥ apām vṛṣaṇvān

original: RV_1,122.03c śiśītam indrāparvatā yuvaṃ nas tan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ //
analyzed: śiśītam indrāparvatā yuvam naḥ tat naḥ viśve varivasyantu devāḥ

original: RV_1,122.04a uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā pāntauśijo huvadhyai /
analyzed: uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā huvadhyai

original: RV_1,122.04c pra vo napātam apāṃ kṛṇudhvam pra mātarā rāspinasyāyoḥ //
analyzed: pra vaḥ napātam apām kṛṇudhvam pra mātarā rāspinasya āyoḥ

original: RV_1,122.05a ā vo ruvaṇyum auśijo huvadhyai ghoṣeva śaṃsam arjunasya naṃśe /
analyzed: ā vaḥ ruvaṇyum auśijaḥ huvadhyai ghoṣa iva śaṃsam arjunasya naṃśe

original: RV_1,122.05c pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvana āṃ acchā voceya vasutātim agneḥ //
analyzed: pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvane ām acchā voceya vasutātim agneḥ

original: RV_1,122.06a śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havemota śrutaṃ sadane viśvataḥ sīm /
analyzed: śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havā imā uta śrutam sadane viśvatas sīm

original: RV_1,122.06c śrotu naḥ śroturātiḥ suśrotuḥ sukṣetrā sindhur adbhiḥ //
analyzed: śrotu naḥ śrotu rātiḥ su śrotuḥ su kṣetrā sindhuḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_1,122.07a stuṣe sā vāṃ varuṇa mitra rātir gavāṃ śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre /
analyzed: stuṣe sā vām varuṇa mitra rātiḥ gavām śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre

original: RV_1,122.07c śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃ nirundhānāso agman //
analyzed: śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyas puṣṭim nirundhānāsaḥ agman

original: RV_1,122.08a asya stuṣe mahimaghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ suvīrāḥ /
analyzed: asya stuṣe mahi maghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_1,122.08c jano yaḥ pajrebhyo vājinīvān aśvāvato rathino mahyaṃ sūriḥ //
analyzed: janaḥ yaḥ pajrebhyaḥ vājinīvān aśvāvataḥ rathinaḥ mahyam sūriḥ

original: RV_1,122.09a jano yo mitrāvaruṇāv abhidhrug apo na vāṃ sunoty akṣṇayādhruk /
analyzed: janaḥ yaḥ mitrāvaruṇau abhidruh apaḥ na vām sunoti akṣṇayā adruh

original: RV_1,122.09c svayaṃ sa yakṣmaṃ hṛdaye ni dhatta āpa yad īṃ hotrābhir ṛtāvā //
analyzed: svayam sa yakṣmam hṛdaye ni dhatte āpa yat īm hotrābhiḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_1,122.10a sa vrādhato nahuṣo daṃsujūtaḥ śardhastaro narāṃ gūrtaśravāḥ /
analyzed: sa vrādhataḥ nahuṣaḥ daṃsu jūtaḥ śardhastaraḥ narām gūrta śravāḥ

original: RV_1,122.10c visṛṣṭarātir yāti bāḷhasṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadam ic chūraḥ //
analyzed: visṛṣṭa rātiḥ yāti bāḷha sṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadam id śūraḥ

original: RV_1,122.11a adha gmantā nahuṣo havaṃ sūreḥ śrotā rājāno amṛtasya mandrāḥ /
analyzed: adha gmantā nahuṣaḥ havam sūreḥ śrota rājānaḥ amṛtasya mandrāḥ

original: RV_1,122.11c nabhojuvo yan niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinā rathavate //
analyzed: nabhaḥ juvaḥ yat niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinā rathavate

original: RV_1,122.12a etaṃ śardhaṃ dhāma yasya sūrer ity avocan daśatayasya naṃśe /
analyzed: etam śardham dhāma yasya sūreḥ iti avocan daśatayasya naṃśe

original: RV_1,122.12c dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātī rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam //
analyzed: dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātiḥ rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam

original: RV_1,122.13a mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāser dvir yat pañca bibhrato yanty annā /
analyzed: mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāseḥ dvis yat pañca bibhrataḥ yanti annā

original: RV_1,122.13c kim iṣṭāśva iṣṭaraśmir eta īśānāsas taruṣa ṛñjate nṝn //
analyzed: kim iṣṭa aśvaḥ iṣṭa raśmiḥ ete īśānāsaḥ taruṣe ṛñjate nṝn

original: RV_1,122.14a hiraṇyakarṇam maṇigrīvam arṇas tan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya karṇam maṇi grīvam arṇaḥ tat naḥ viśve varivasyantu devāḥ

original: RV_1,122.14c aryo giraḥ sadya ā jagmuṣīr osrāś cākantūbhayeṣv asme //
analyzed: aryaḥ giraḥ sadyas ā jagmuṣīḥ ā usrāḥ cākantu ubhayeṣu asme

original: RV_1,122.15a catvāro mā maśarśārasya śiśvas trayo rājña āyavasasya jiṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: catvāraḥ mā maśarśārasya śiśvaḥ trayaḥ rājñaḥ āyavasasya jiṣṇoḥ

original: RV_1,122.15c ratho vām mitrāvaruṇā dīrghāpsāḥ syūmagabhastiḥ sūro nādyaut //
analyzed: rathaḥ vām mitrāvaruṇā dīrgha apsāḥ syūma gabhastiḥ sūraḥ na adyaut

original: RV_1,123.01a pṛthū ratho dakṣiṇāyā ayojy ainaṃ devāso amṛtāso asthuḥ /
analyzed: pṛthuḥ rathaḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ ayoji ā enam devāsaḥ amṛtāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_1,123.01c kṛṣṇād ud asthād aryā vihāyāś cikitsantī mānuṣāya kṣayāya //
analyzed: kṛṣṇāt ud asthāt aryā vihāyāḥ cikitsantī mānuṣāya kṣayāya

original: RV_1,123.02a pūrvā viśvasmād bhuvanād abodhi jayantī vājam bṛhatī sanutrī /
analyzed: pūrvā viśvasmāt bhuvanāt abodhi jayantī vājam bṛhatī sanutrī

original: RV_1,123.02c uccā vy akhyad yuvatiḥ punarbhūr oṣā agan prathamā pūrvahūtau //
analyzed: uccā vi akhyat yuvatiḥ punarbhūḥ ā uṣāḥ agan prathamā pūrva hūtau

original: RV_1,123.03a yad adya bhāgaṃ vibhajāsi nṛbhya uṣo devi martyatrā sujāte /
analyzed: yat adya bhāgam vibhajāsi nṛbhyaḥ uṣaḥ devi martyatrā sujāte

original: RV_1,123.03c devo no atra savitā damūnā anāgaso vocati sūryāya //
analyzed: devaḥ naḥ atra savitā damūnāḥ anāgasaḥ vocati sūryāya

original: RV_1,123.04a gṛhaṃ-gṛham ahanā yāty acchā dive-dive adhi nāmā dadhānā /
analyzed: gṛhaṃgṛham ahanā yāti acchā dive dive adhi nāmā dadhānā

original: RV_1,123.04c siṣāsantī dyotanā śaśvad āgād agram-agram id bhajate vasūnām //
analyzed: siṣāsantī dyotanā śaśvat āgāt agram agram id bhajate vasūnām

original: RV_1,123.05a bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmir uṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva /
analyzed: bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmiḥ uṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva

original: RV_1,123.05c paścā sa daghyā yo aghasya dhātā jayema taṃ dakṣiṇayā rathena //
analyzed: paścā sa daghyāḥ yaḥ aghasya dhātā jayema tam dakṣiṇayā rathena

original: RV_1,123.06a ud īratāṃ sūnṛtā ut purandhīr ud agnayaḥ śuśucānāso asthuḥ /
analyzed: ud īratām sūnṛtāḥ ud purandhīḥ ud agnayaḥ śuśucānāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_1,123.06c spārhā vasūni tamasāpagūḷhāviṣ kṛṇvanty uṣaso vibhātīḥ //
analyzed: spārhā vasūni tamasā apagūḍhā āvis kṛṇvanti uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_1,123.07a apānyad ety abhy anyad eti viṣurūpe ahanī saṃ carete /
analyzed: apa anyat eti abhi anyat eti viṣurūpe ahanī sam carete

original: RV_1,123.07c parikṣitos tamo anyā guhākar adyaud uṣāḥ śośucatā rathena //
analyzed: parikṣitoḥ tamaḥ anyā guhā akaḥ adyaut uṣāḥ śośucatā rathena

original: RV_1,123.08a sadṛśīr adya sadṛśīr id u śvo dīrghaṃ sacante varuṇasya dhāma /
analyzed: sadṛśīḥ adya sadṛśīḥ id u śvas dīrgham sacante varuṇasya dhāma

original: RV_1,123.08c anavadyās triṃśataṃ yojanāny ekaikā kratum pari yanti sadyaḥ //
analyzed: anavadyāḥ triṃśatam yojanāni ekaikā kratum pari yanti sadyas

original: RV_1,123.09a jānaty ahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇād ajaniṣṭa śvitīcī /
analyzed: jānatī ahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇāt ajaniṣṭa śvitīcī

original: RV_1,123.09c ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāmāhar-ahar niṣkṛtam ācarantī //
analyzed: ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāma ahar ahar niṣkṛtam ācarantī

original: RV_1,123.10a kanyeva tanvā śāśadānāṃ eṣi devi devam iyakṣamāṇam /
analyzed: kanyā iva tanvā śāśadānā ām eṣi devi devam iyakṣamāṇam

original: RV_1,123.10c saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastād āvir vakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī //
analyzed: saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastāt āvis vakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī

original: RV_1,123.11a susaṃkāśā mātṛmṛṣṭeva yoṣāvis tanvaṃ kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam /
analyzed: su saṃkāśā mātṛ mṛṣṭā iva yoṣā āvis tanvam kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam

original: RV_1,123.11c bhadrā tvam uṣo vitaraṃ vy uccha na tat te anyā uṣaso naśanta //
analyzed: bhadrā tvam uṣaḥ vitaram vi uccha na tat te anyāḥ uṣasaḥ naśanta

original: RV_1,123.12a aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvavārā yatamānā raśmibhiḥ sūryasya /
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ viśva vārāḥ yatamānāḥ raśmibhiḥ sūryasya

original: RV_1,123.12c parā ca yanti punar ā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānā uṣāsaḥ //
analyzed: parā ca yanti punar ā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānāḥ uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_1,123.13a ṛtasya raśmim anuyacchamānā bhadram-bhadraṃ kratum asmāsu dhehi /
analyzed: ṛtasya raśmim anuyacchamānā bhadram bhadram kratum asmāsu dhehi

original: RV_1,123.13c uṣo no adya suhavā vy ucchāsmāsu rāyo maghavatsu ca syuḥ //
analyzed: uṣaḥ naḥ adya su havā vi uccha asmāsu rāyaḥ maghavatsu ca syuḥ

original: RV_1,124.01a uṣā ucchantī samidhāne agnā udyan sūrya urviyā jyotir aśret /
analyzed: uṣāḥ ucchantī samidhāne agnau udyan sūryaḥ urviyā jyotiḥ aśret

original: RV_1,124.01c devo no atra savitā nv artham prāsāvīd dvipat pra catuṣpad ityai //
analyzed: devaḥ naḥ atra savitā nu artham prāsāvīt dvipad pra catuṣpad ityai

original: RV_1,124.02a aminatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni /
analyzed: a minatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni

original: RV_1,124.02c īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām āyatīnām prathamoṣā vy adyaut //
analyzed: īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām āyatīnām prathamā uṣāḥ vi adyaut

original: RV_1,124.03a eṣā divo duhitā praty adarśi jyotir vasānā samanā purastāt /
analyzed: eṣā divaḥ duhitā prati adarśi jyotiḥ vasānā samanā purastāt

original: RV_1,124.03c ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti //
analyzed: ṛtasya panthām anu eti sādhu prajānatī iva na diśaḥ mināti

original: RV_1,124.04a upo adarśi śundhyuvo na vakṣo nodhā ivāvir akṛta priyāṇi /
analyzed: upa u adarśi śundhyuvaḥ na vakṣaḥ nodhāḥ iva āvis akṛta priyāṇi

original: RV_1,124.04c admasan na sasato bodhayantī śaśvattamāgāt punar eyuṣīṇām //
analyzed: admasad na sasataḥ bodhayantī śaśvattamā agāt punar eyuṣīṇām

original: RV_1,124.05a pūrve ardhe rajaso aptyasya gavāṃ janitry akṛta pra ketum /
analyzed: pūrve ardhe rajasaḥ aptyasya gavām janitrī akṛta pra ketum

original: RV_1,124.05c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīya obhā pṛṇantī pitror upasthā //
analyzed: vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ ā ubhā pṛṇantī pitroḥ upasthā

original: RV_1,124.06a eved eṣā purutamā dṛśe kaṃ nājāmiṃ na pari vṛṇakti jāmim /
analyzed: eva id eṣā purutamā dṛśe kam na ajāmim na pari vṛṇakti jāmim

original: RV_1,124.06c arepasā tanvā śāśadānā nārbhād īṣate na maho vibhātī //
analyzed: arepasā tanvā śāśadānā nā arbhāt īṣate na mahaḥ vibhātī

original: RV_1,124.07a abhrāteva puṃsa eti pratīcī gartārug iva sanaye dhanānām /
analyzed: abhrātā iva puṃsaḥ eti pratīcī gartāruh iva sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_1,124.07c jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsā uṣā hasreva ni riṇīte apsaḥ //
analyzed: jāyā iva patye uśatī su vāsāḥ uṣāḥ hasrā iva ni riṇīte apsaḥ

original: RV_1,124.08a svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonim āraig apaity asyāḥ praticakṣyeva /
analyzed: svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonim āraik apaiti asyāḥ praticakṣya iva

original: RV_1,124.08c vyucchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasyāñjy aṅkte samanagā iva vrāḥ //
analyzed: vyucchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasya añji aṅkte samana gā iva vrāḥ

original: RV_1,124.09a āsām pūrvāsām ahasu svasṝṇām aparā pūrvām abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: āsām pūrvāsām svasṝṇām aparā pūrvām abhī eti paścāt

original: RV_1,124.09c tāḥ pratnavan navyasīr nūnam asme revad ucchantu sudinā uṣāsaḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ pratna vat navyasīḥ nūnam asme revat ucchantu su dināḥ uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_1,124.10a pra bodhayoṣaḥ pṛṇato maghony abudhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu /
analyzed: pra bodhaya uṣaḥ pṛṇataḥ maghoni a budhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu

original: RV_1,124.10c revad uccha maghavadbhyo maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī //
analyzed: revat uccha maghavadbhyaḥ maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī

original: RV_1,124.11a aveyam aśvaid yuvatiḥ purastād yuṅkte gavām aruṇānām anīkam /
analyzed: ava iyam aśvait yuvatiḥ purastāt yuṅkte gavām aruṇānām anīkam

original: RV_1,124.11c vi nūnam ucchād asati pra ketur gṛhaṃ-gṛham upa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ //
analyzed: vi nūnam ucchāt asati pra ketuḥ gṛhaṃgṛham upa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ

original: RV_1,124.12a ut te vayaś cid vasater apaptan naraś ca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau /
analyzed: ud te vayaḥ cit vasateḥ apaptan naraḥ ca ye pitu bhājaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_1,124.12c amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya //
analyzed: amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣaḥ devi dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_1,124.13a astoḍhvaṃ stomyā brahmaṇā me 'vīvṛdhadhvam uśatīr uṣāsaḥ /
analyzed: astoḍhvam stomyāḥ brahmaṇā me vīvṛdhadhvam uśatīḥ uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_1,124.13c yuṣmākaṃ devīr avasā sanema sahasriṇaṃ ca śatinaṃ ca vājam //
analyzed: yuṣmākam devīḥ avasā sanema sahasriṇam ca śatinam ca vājam

original: RV_1,125.01a prātā ratnam prātaritvā dadhāti taṃ cikitvān pratigṛhyā ni dhatte /
analyzed: prātar ratnam prātaritvā dadhāti tam cikitvān pratigṛhya ni dhatte

original: RV_1,125.01c tena prajāṃ vardhayamāna āyū rāyas poṣeṇa sacate suvīraḥ //
analyzed: tena prajām vardhayamānaḥ āyuḥ rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sacate su vīraḥ

original: RV_1,125.02a sugur asat suhiraṇyaḥ svaśvo bṛhad asmai vaya indro dadhāti /
analyzed: suguḥ asat su hiraṇyaḥ su aśvaḥ bṛhat asmai vayaḥ indraḥ dadhāti

original: RV_1,125.02c yas tvāyantaṃ vasunā prātaritvo mukṣījayeva padim utsināti //
analyzed: yaḥ tvāyantam vasunā prātaritvaḥ mukṣī jayā iva padim utsināti

original: RV_1,125.03a āyam adya sukṛtam prātar icchann iṣṭeḥ putraṃ vasumatā rathena /
analyzed: ā ayam adya su kṛtam prātar icchan iṣṭeḥ putram vasumatā rathena

original: RV_1,125.03c aṃśoḥ sutam pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīraṃ vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ //
analyzed: aṃśoḥ sutam pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīram vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_1,125.04a upa kṣaranti sindhavo mayobhuva ījānaṃ ca yakṣyamāṇaṃ ca dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: upa kṣaranti sindhavaḥ mayobhuvaḥ ījānam ca yakṣyamāṇam ca dhenavaḥ

original: RV_1,125.04c pṛṇantaṃ ca papuriṃ ca śravasyavo ghṛtasya dhārā upa yanti viśvataḥ //
analyzed: pṛṇantam ca papurim ca śravasyavaḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ upa yanti viśvatas

original: RV_1,125.05a nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śrito yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gacchati /
analyzed: nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śritaḥ yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gacchati

original: RV_1,125.05c tasmā āpo ghṛtam arṣanti sindhavas tasmā iyaṃ dakṣiṇā pinvate sadā //
analyzed: tasmai āpaḥ ghṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ tasmai iyam dakṣiṇā pinvate sadā

original: RV_1,125.06a dakṣiṇāvatām id imāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatāṃ divi sūryāsaḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvatām id imāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatām divi sūryāsaḥ

original: RV_1,125.06c dakṣiṇāvanto amṛtam bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvantaḥ amṛtam bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_1,125.07a mā pṛṇanto duritam ena āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ suvratāsaḥ /
analyzed: mā pṛṇantaḥ duritam enaḥ āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ su vratāsaḥ

original: RV_1,125.07c anyas teṣām paridhir astu kaś cid apṛṇantam abhi saṃ yantu śokāḥ //
analyzed: anyaḥ teṣām paridhiḥ astu kaḥ cit a pṛṇantam abhi sam yantu śokāḥ

original: RV_1,126.01a amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhāv adhi kṣiyato bhāvyasya /
analyzed: amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhau adhi kṣiyataḥ bhāvyasya

original: RV_1,126.01c yo me sahasram amimīta savān atūrto rājā śrava icchamānaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ me sahasram amimīta savān a tūrtaḥ rājā śravaḥ icchamānaḥ

original: RV_1,126.02a śataṃ rājño nādhamānasya niṣkāñ chatam aśvān prayatān sadya ādam /
analyzed: śatam rājñaḥ nādhamānasya niṣkām śatam aśvān prayatān sadyas ādam

original: RV_1,126.02c śataṃ kakṣīvāṃ asurasya gonāṃ divi śravo 'jaram ā tatāna //
analyzed: śatam kakṣīvān asurasya gonām divi śravaḥ jaram ā tatāna

original: RV_1,126.03a upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattā vadhūmanto daśa rathāso asthuḥ /
analyzed: upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattāḥ vadhūmantaḥ daśa rathāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_1,126.03c ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasram anu gavyam āgāt sanat kakṣīvāṃ abhipitve ahnām //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasram anu gavyam āgāt sanat kakṣīvān abhipitve ahnām

original: RV_1,126.04a catvāriṃśad daśarathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasyāgre śreṇiṃ nayanti /
analyzed: catvāriṃśat daśa rathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasya agre śreṇim nayanti

original: RV_1,126.04c madacyutaḥ kṛśanāvato atyān kakṣīvanta ud amṛkṣanta pajrāḥ //
analyzed: mada cyutaḥ kṛśanāvataḥ atyān kakṣīvantaḥ ud amṛkṣanta pajrāḥ

original: RV_1,126.05a pūrvām anu prayatim ā dade vas trīn yuktāṃ aṣṭāv aridhāyaso gāḥ /
analyzed: pūrvām anu prayatim ā dade vaḥ trīn yuktām aṣṭau ari dhāyasaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_1,126.05c subandhavo ye viśyā iva vrā anasvantaḥ śrava aiṣanta pajrāḥ //
analyzed: su bandhavaḥ ye viśyāḥ iva vrāḥ anasvantaḥ śravaḥ aiṣanta pajrāḥ

original: RV_1,126.06a āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkeva jaṅgahe /
analyzed: āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkā iva jaṅgahe

original: RV_1,126.06c dadāti mahyaṃ yādurī yāśūnām bhojyā śatā //
analyzed: dadāti mahyam yādurī yāśūnām bhojyā śatā

original: RV_1,126.07a upopa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ /
analyzed: upa upa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ

original: RV_1,126.07c sarvāham asmi romaśā gandhārīṇām ivāvikā //
analyzed: sarvā aham asmi romaśā gandhārīṇām iva avikā

original: RV_1,127.01a agniṃ hotāram manye dāsvantaṃ vasuṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ vipraṃ na jātavedasam /
analyzed: agnim hotāram manye dāsvantam vasum sūnum sahasaḥ jātavedasam vipram na jātavedasam

original: RV_1,127.01d ya ūrdhvayā svadhvaro devo devācyā kṛpā /
analyzed: yaḥ ūrdhvayā su adhvaraḥ devaḥ devācyā kṛpā

original: RV_1,127.01f ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭim anu vaṣṭi śociṣājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭim anu vaṣṭi śociṣā ājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ

original: RV_1,127.02a yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā yajamānā huvema jyeṣṭham aṅgirasāṃ vipra manmabhir viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ /
analyzed: yajiṣṭham tvā yajamānāḥ huvema jyeṣṭham aṅgirasām vipra manmabhiḥ viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,127.02d parijmānam iva dyāṃ hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: parijmānam iva dyām hotāram carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_1,127.02f śociṣkeśaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ yam imā viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ //
analyzed: śociṣkeśam vṛṣaṇam yam imāḥ viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ

original: RV_1,127.03a sa hi purū cid ojasā virukmatā dīdyāno bhavati druhantaraḥ paraśur na druhantaraḥ /
analyzed: sa hi purū cit ojasā virukmatā dīdyānaḥ bhavati druhantaraḥ paraśuḥ na druhantaraḥ

original: RV_1,127.03d vīḷu cid yasya samṛtau śruvad vaneva yat sthiram /
analyzed: vīḍu cit yasya samṛtau śruvat vanā iva yat sthiram

original: RV_1,127.03f niḥṣahamāṇo yamate nāyate dhanvāsahā nāyate //
analyzed: niḥṣahamāṇaḥ yamate nāyate dhanvāsahāḥ nāyate

original: RV_1,127.04a dṛḷhā cid asmā anu dur yathā vide tejiṣṭhābhir araṇibhir dāṣṭy avase 'gnaye dāṣṭy avase /
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit asmai anu duḥ yathā vide tejiṣṭhābhiḥ araṇibhiḥ dāṣṭī avase gnaye dāṣṭī avase

original: RV_1,127.04d pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣad vaneva śociṣā /
analyzed: pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣat vanā iva śociṣā

original: RV_1,127.04f sthirā cid annā ni riṇāty ojasā ni sthirāṇi cid ojasā //
analyzed: sthirā cit annā ni riṇāti ojasā ni sthirāṇi cit ojasā

original: RV_1,127.05a tam asya pṛkṣam uparāsu dhīmahi naktaṃ yaḥ sudarśataro divātarād aprāyuṣe divātarāt /
analyzed: tam asya pṛkṣam uparāsu dhīmahi naktam yaḥ sudarśataraḥ divā tarāt a prāyuṣe divā tarāt

original: RV_1,127.05d ād asyāyur grabhaṇavad vīḷu śarma na sūnave /
analyzed: āt asya āyuḥ grabhaṇavat vīḷu śarma na sūnave

original: RV_1,127.05f bhaktam abhaktam avo vyanto ajarā agnayo vyanto ajarāḥ //
analyzed: bhaktam a bhaktam avaḥ vyantaḥ ajarāḥ agnayaḥ vyantaḥ ajarāḥ

original: RV_1,127.06a sa hi śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇir apnasvatīṣūrvarāsv iṣṭanir ārtanāsv iṣṭaniḥ /
analyzed: sa hi śardhaḥ na mārutam tuviṣvaṇiḥ apnasvatīṣu urvarāsu iṣṭaniḥ ārtanāsu iṣṭaniḥ

original: RV_1,127.06d ādad dhavyāny ādadir yajñasya ketur arhaṇā /
analyzed: ādat havyāni ādadiḥ yajñasya ketuḥ arhaṇā

original: RV_1,127.06f adha smāsya harṣato hṛṣīvato viśve juṣanta panthāṃ naraḥ śubhe na panthām //
analyzed: adha sma asya harṣataḥ hṛṣīvataḥ viśve juṣanta panthām naraḥ śubhe na panthām

original: RV_1,127.07a dvitā yad īṃ kīstāso abhidyavo namasyanta upavocanta bhṛgavo mathnanto dāśā bhṛgavaḥ /
analyzed: dvitā yat īm kīstāsaḥ abhidyavaḥ namasyantaḥ upavocanta bhṛgavaḥ mathnantaḥ dāśāḥ bhṛgavaḥ

original: RV_1,127.07d agnir īśe vasūnāṃ śucir yo dharṇir eṣām /
analyzed: agniḥ īśe vasūnām śuciḥ yaḥ dharṇiḥ eṣām

original: RV_1,127.07f priyāṃ apidhīṃr vaniṣīṣṭa medhira ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ //
analyzed: priyān apidhīṃr vaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ

original: RV_1,127.08a viśvāsāṃ tvā viśām patiṃ havāmahe sarvāsāṃ samānaṃ dampatim bhuje satyagirvāhasam bhuje /
analyzed: viśvāsām tvā viśām patim havāmahe sarvāsām samānam dampatim bhuje satya gir vāhasam bhuje

original: RV_1,127.08d atithim mānuṣāṇām pitur na yasyāsayā /
analyzed: atithim mānuṣāṇām pituḥ na yasya āsayā

original: RV_1,127.08f amī ca viśve amṛtāsa ā vayo havyā deveṣv ā vayaḥ //
analyzed: amī ca viśve amṛtāsaḥ ā vayaḥ havyā deveṣu ā vayaḥ

original: RV_1,127.09a tvam agne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamo jāyase devatātaye rayir na devatātaye /
analyzed: tvam agne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamaḥ jāyase devatātaye rayiḥ na devatātaye

original: RV_1,127.09d śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ /
analyzed: śuṣmintamaḥ hi te madaḥ dyumnintamaḥ uta kratuḥ

original: RV_1,127.09f adha smā te pari caranty ajara śruṣṭīvāno nājara //
analyzed: adha smā te pari caranti ajara śruṣṭīvānaḥ na ajara

original: RV_1,127.10a pra vo mahe sahasā sahasvata uṣarbudhe paśuṣe nāgnaye stomo babhūtv agnaye /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe sahasā sahasvate uṣarbudhe paśuṣe na agnaye stomaḥ babhūtu agnaye

original: RV_1,127.10d prati yad īṃ haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve /
analyzed: prati yat īm haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve

original: RV_1,127.10f agre rebho na jarata ṛṣūṇāṃ jūrṇir hota ṛṣūṇām //
analyzed: agre rebhaḥ na jarate ṛṣūṇām jūrṇiḥ hotar ṛṣūṇām

original: RV_1,127.11a sa no nediṣṭhaṃ dadṛśāna ā bharāgne devebhiḥ sacanāḥ sucetunā maho rāyaḥ sucetunā /
analyzed: sa naḥ nediṣṭham dadṛśānaḥ ā bhara agne devebhiḥ sacanāḥ sucetunā mahaḥ rāyaḥ sucetunā

original: RV_1,127.11d mahi śaviṣṭha nas kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai /
analyzed: mahi śaviṣṭha naḥ kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai

original: RV_1,127.11f mahi stotṛbhyo maghavan suvīryam mathīr ugro na śavasā //
analyzed: mahi stotṛbhyaḥ maghavan su vīryam mathīḥ ugraḥ na śavasā

original: RV_1,128.01a ayaṃ jāyata manuṣo dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭha uśijām anu vratam agniḥ svam anu vratam /
analyzed: ayam jāyata manuṣaḥ dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ uśijām anu vratam agniḥ svam anu vratam

original: RV_1,128.01d viśvaśruṣṭiḥ sakhīyate rayir iva śravasyate /
analyzed: viśva śruṣṭiḥ sakhīyate rayiḥ iva śravasyate

original: RV_1,128.01f adabdho hotā ni ṣadad iḷas pade parivīta iḷas pade //
analyzed: adabdhaḥ hotā ni sadat iḷaḥ pade parivītaḥ iḷaḥ pade

original: RV_1,128.02a taṃ yajñasādham api vātayāmasy ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā /
analyzed: tam yajñasādham api vātayāmasi ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā

original: RV_1,128.02d sa na ūrjām upābhṛty ayā kṛpā na jūryati /
analyzed: sa naḥ ūrjām upābhṛtī ayā kṛpā na jūryati

original: RV_1,128.02f yam mātariśvā manave parāvato devam bhāḥ parāvataḥ //
analyzed: yam mātariśvā manave parāvataḥ devam bhāḥ parāvataḥ

original: RV_1,128.03a evena sadyaḥ pary eti pārthivam muhurgī reto vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradad dadhad retaḥ kanikradat /
analyzed: evena sadyas pari eti pārthivam muhur gir retaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat dadhat retaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_1,128.03d śataṃ cakṣāṇo akṣabhir devo vaneṣu turvaṇiḥ /
analyzed: śatam cakṣāṇaḥ akṣabhiḥ devaḥ vaneṣu turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_1,128.03f sado dadhāna upareṣu sānuṣv agniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu //
analyzed: sadaḥ dadhānaḥ upareṣu sānuṣu agniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu

original: RV_1,128.04a sa sukratuḥ purohito dame-dame 'gnir yajñasyādhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati /
analyzed: sa su kratuḥ purohitaḥ damedame gniḥ yajñasya adhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati

original: RV_1,128.04d kratvā vedhā iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe /
analyzed: kratvā vedhāḥ iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe

original: RV_1,128.04f yato ghṛtaśrīr atithir ajāyata vahnir vedhā ajāyata //
analyzed: yatas ghṛtaśrīḥ atithiḥ ajāyata vahniḥ vedhāḥ ajāyata

original: RV_1,128.05a kratvā yad asya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate 'gner aveṇa marutāṃ na bhojyeṣirāya na bhojyā /
analyzed: kratvā yat asya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate gneḥ marutām na bhojyā iṣirāya na bhojyā

original: RV_1,128.05d sa hi ṣmā dānam invati vasūnāṃ ca majmanā /
analyzed: sa hi sma dānam invati vasūnām ca majmanā

original: RV_1,128.05f sa nas trāsate duritād abhihrutaḥ śaṃsād aghād abhihrutaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ trāsate duritāt abhihrutaḥ śaṃsāt aghāt abhihrutaḥ

original: RV_1,128.06a viśvo vihāyā aratir vasur dadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇir na śiśrathac chravasyayā na śiśrathat /
analyzed: viśvaḥ vihāyāḥ aratiḥ vasuḥ dadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇiḥ na śiśrathat śravasyayā na śiśrathat

original: RV_1,128.06d viśvasmā id iṣudhyate devatrā havyam ohiṣe /
analyzed: viśvasmai id iṣudhyate devatrā havyam ohiṣe

original: RV_1,128.06f viśvasmā it sukṛte vāram ṛṇvaty agnir dvārā vy ṛṇvati //
analyzed: viśvasmai id su kṛte vāram ṛṇvati agniḥ dvārā vi ṛṇvati

original: RV_1,128.07a sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamo hito 'gnir yajñeṣu jenyo na viśpatiḥ priyo yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamaḥ hitaḥ gniḥ yajñeṣu jenyaḥ na viśpatiḥ priyaḥ yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ

original: RV_1,128.07d sa havyā mānuṣāṇām iḷā kṛtāni patyate /
analyzed: sa havyā mānuṣāṇām iḷā kṛtāni patyate

original: RV_1,128.07f sa nas trāsate varuṇasya dhūrter maho devasya dhūrteḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ trāsate varuṇasya dhūrteḥ mahaḥ devasya dhūrteḥ

original: RV_1,128.08a agniṃ hotāram īḷate vasudhitim priyaṃ cetiṣṭham aratiṃ ny erire havyavāhaṃ ny erire /
analyzed: agnim hotāram īḍate vasu dhitim priyam cetiṣṭham aratim ni erire havya vāham ni erire

original: RV_1,128.08d viśvāyuṃ viśvavedasaṃ hotāraṃ yajataṃ kavim /
analyzed: viśvāyum viśva vedasam hotāram yajatam kavim

original: RV_1,128.08f devāso raṇvam avase vasūyavo gīrbhī raṇvaṃ vasūyavaḥ //
analyzed: devāsaḥ raṇvam avase vasūyavaḥ gīrbhiḥ raṇvam vasūyavaḥ

original: RV_1,129.01a yaṃ tvaṃ ratham indra medhasātaye 'pākā santam iṣira praṇayasi prānavadya nayasi /
analyzed: yam tvam ratham indra medha sātaye pākā santam iṣira praṇayasi pra anavadya nayasi

original: RV_1,129.01d sadyaś cit tam abhiṣṭaye karo vaśaś ca vājinam /
analyzed: sadyas cit tam abhiṣṭaye karaḥ vaśaḥ ca vājinam

original: RV_1,129.01f sāsmākam anavadya tūtujāna vedhasām imāṃ vācaṃ na vedhasām //
analyzed: sa asmākam anavadya tūtujāna vedhasām imām vācam na vedhasām

original: RV_1,129.02a sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cid dakṣāyya indra bharahūtaye nṛbhir asi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cit dakṣāyyaḥ indra bhara hūtaye nṛbhiḥ asi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_1,129.02d yaḥ śūraiḥ svaḥ sanitā yo viprair vājaṃ tarutā /
analyzed: yaḥ śūraiḥ svar sanitā yaḥ vipraiḥ vājam tarutā

original: RV_1,129.02f tam īśānāsa iradhanta vājinam pṛkṣam atyaṃ na vājinam //
analyzed: tam īśānāsaḥ iradhanta vājinam pṛkṣam atyam na vājinam

original: RV_1,129.03a dasmo hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇam pinvasi tvacaṃ kaṃ cid yāvīr araruṃ śūra martyam parivṛṇakṣi martyam /
analyzed: dasmaḥ hi sma vṛṣaṇam pinvasi tvacam kam cit yāvīḥ ararum śūra martyam parivṛṇakṣi martyam

original: RV_1,129.03d indrota tubhyaṃ tad dive tad rudrāya svayaśase /
analyzed: indra uta tubhyam tat dive tat rudrāya sva yaśase

original: RV_1,129.03f mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya saprathaḥ sumṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ //
analyzed: mitrāya vocam varuṇāya saprathaḥ su mṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ

original: RV_1,129.04a asmākaṃ va indram uśmasīṣṭaye sakhāyaṃ viśvāyum prāsahaṃ yujaṃ vājeṣu prāsahaṃ yujam /
analyzed: asmākam vaḥ indram uśmasi iṣṭaye sakhāyam viśvāyum prāsaham yujam vājeṣu prāsaham yujam

original: RV_1,129.04d asmākam brahmotaye 'vā pṛtsuṣu kāsu cit /
analyzed: asmākam brahma ūtaye vā pṛtsuṣu kāsu cit

original: RV_1,129.04f nahi tvā śatru starate stṛṇoṣi yaṃ viśvaṃ śatruṃ stṛṇoṣi yam //
analyzed: nahi tvā śatruḥ starate stṛṇoṣi yam viśvam śatrum stṛṇoṣi yam

original: RV_1,129.05a ni ṣū namātimatiṃ kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhir araṇibhir notibhir ugrābhir ugrotibhiḥ /
analyzed: ni su nama atimatim kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhiḥ araṇibhiḥ notibhiḥ ugrābhiḥ ugra ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,129.05d neṣi ṇo yathā purānenāḥ śūra manyase /
analyzed: neṣi naḥ yathā purā anenāḥ śūra manyase

original: RV_1,129.05f viśvāni pūror apa parṣi vahnir āsā vahnir no accha //
analyzed: viśvāni pūroḥ apa parṣi vahniḥ āsā vahniḥ naḥ accha

original: RV_1,129.06a pra tad voceyam bhavyāyendave havyo na ya iṣavān manma rejati rakṣohā manma rejati /
analyzed: pra tat voceyam bhavyāya indave havyaḥ na yaḥ iṣavān manma rejati rakṣaḥ hā manma rejati

original: RV_1,129.06d svayaṃ so asmad ā nido vadhair ajeta durmatim /
analyzed: svayam saḥ asmat ā nidaḥ vadhaiḥ ajeta durmatim

original: RV_1,129.06f ava sraved aghaśaṃso 'vataram ava kṣudram iva sravet //
analyzed: ava sravet agha śaṃsaḥ vataram ava kṣudram iva sravet

original: RV_1,129.07a vanema tad dhotrayā citantyā vanema rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīryaṃ raṇvaṃ santaṃ suvīryam /
analyzed: vanema tat hotrayā citantyā vanema rayim rayivas su vīryam raṇvam santam su vīryam

original: RV_1,129.07d durmanmānaṃ sumantubhir em iṣā pṛcīmahi /
analyzed: durmanmānam su mantubhiḥ ā īm iṣā pṛcīmahi

original: RV_1,129.07f ā satyābhir indraṃ dyumnahūtibhir yajatraṃ dyumnahūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: ā satyābhiḥ indram dyumna hūtibhiḥ yajatram dyumna hūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,129.08a pra-prā vo asme svayaśobhir ūtī parivarga indro durmatīnāṃ darīman durmatīnām /
analyzed: pra prāḥ vaḥ asme sva yaśobhiḥ ūtī parivarge indraḥ durmatīnām darīman durmatīnām

original: RV_1,129.08d svayaṃ sā riṣayadhyai yā na upeṣe atraiḥ /
analyzed: svayam sā riṣayadhyai yā naḥ upeṣe atraiḥ

original: RV_1,129.08f hatem asan na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇir na vakṣati //
analyzed: hatā īm asat na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇiḥ na vakṣati

original: RV_1,129.09a tvaṃ na indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi pathāṃ anehasā puro yāhy arakṣasā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi pathām anehasā puras yāhi arakṣasā

original: RV_1,129.09d sacasva naḥ parāka ā sacasvāstamīka ā /
analyzed: sacasva naḥ parāke ā sacasva astamīke ā

original: RV_1,129.09f pāhi no dūrād ārād abhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhy abhiṣṭibhiḥ //
analyzed: pāhi naḥ dūrāt ārāt abhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhi abhiṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_1,129.10a tvaṃ na indra rāyā tarūṣasograṃ cit tvā mahimā sakṣad avase mahe mitraṃ nāvase /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra rāyā tarūṣasā ugram cit tvā mahimā sakṣat avase mahe mitram na avase

original: RV_1,129.10d ojiṣṭha trātar avitā rathaṃ kaṃ cid amartya /
analyzed: ojiṣṭha trātar avitā ratham kam cit amartya

original: RV_1,129.10f anyam asmad ririṣeḥ kaṃ cid adrivo ririkṣantaṃ cid adrivaḥ //
analyzed: anyam asmat ririṣeḥ kam cit adrivas ririkṣantam cit adrivas

original: RV_1,129.11a pāhi na indra suṣṭuta sridho 'vayātā sadam id durmatīnāṃ devaḥ san durmatīnām /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ indra suṣṭuta sridhaḥ vayātā sadam id durmatīnām devaḥ san durmatīnām

original: RV_1,129.11d hantā pāpasya rakṣasas trātā viprasya māvataḥ /
analyzed: hantā pāpasya rakṣasaḥ trātā viprasya māvataḥ

original: RV_1,129.11f adhā hi tvā janitā jījanad vaso rakṣohaṇaṃ tvā jījanad vaso //
analyzed: adhā hi tvā janitā jījanat vaso rakṣaḥ haṇam tvā jījanat vaso
