original: RV_1,130.01a endra yāhy upa naḥ parāvato nāyam acchā vidathānīva satpatir astaṃ rājeva satpatiḥ /
analyzed: ā indra yāhi upa naḥ parāvataḥ na ayam acchā vidathāni iva satpatiḥ astam rājā iva satpatiḥ

original: RV_1,130.01d havāmahe tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ sute sacā /
analyzed: havāmahe tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ sute sacā

original: RV_1,130.01f putrāso na pitaraṃ vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vājasātaye //
analyzed: putrāsaḥ na pitaram vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭham vājasātaye

original: RV_1,130.02a pibā somam indra suvānam adribhiḥ kośena siktam avataṃ na vaṃsagas tātṛṣāṇo na vaṃsagaḥ /
analyzed: pibā somam indra suvānam adribhiḥ kośena siktam avatam na vaṃsagaḥ tātṛṣāṇaḥ na vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_1,130.02d madāya haryatāya te tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase /
analyzed: madāya haryatāya te tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase

original: RV_1,130.02f ā tvā yacchantu harito na sūryam ahā viśveva sūryam //
analyzed: ā tvā yacchantu haritaḥ na sūryam ahā viśvā iva sūryam

original: RV_1,130.03a avindad divo nihitaṃ guhā nidhiṃ ver na garbham parivītam aśmany anante antar aśmani /
analyzed: avindat divaḥ nihitam guhā nidhim veḥ na garbham parivītam aśmani anante antar aśmani

original: RV_1,130.03d vrajaṃ vajrī gavām iva siṣāsann aṅgirastamaḥ /
analyzed: vrajam vajrī gavām iva siṣāsan aṅgirastamaḥ

original: RV_1,130.03f apāvṛṇod iṣa indraḥ parīvṛtā dvāra iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ //
analyzed: apāvṛṇot iṣaḥ indraḥ parīvṛtāḥ dvāraḥ iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ

original: RV_1,130.04a dādṛhāṇo vajram indro gabhastyoḥ kṣadmeva tigmam asanāya saṃ śyad ahihatyāya saṃ śyat /
analyzed: dādṛhāṇaḥ vajram indraḥ gabhastyoḥ kṣadma iva tigmam asanāya sam śyat ahi hatyāya sam śyat

original: RV_1,130.04d saṃvivyāna ojasā śavobhir indra majmanā /
analyzed: saṃvivyānaḥ ojasā śavobhiḥ indra majmanā

original: RV_1,130.04f taṣṭeva vṛkṣaṃ vanino ni vṛścasi paraśveva ni vṛścasi //
analyzed: taṣṭā iva vṛkṣam vaninaḥ ni vṛścasi paraśu eva ni vṛścasi

original: RV_1,130.05a tvaṃ vṛthā nadya indra sartave 'cchā samudram asṛjo rathāṃ iva vājayato rathāṃ iva /
analyzed: tvam vṛthā nadyaḥ indra sartave ccha samudram asṛjaḥ rathān iva vājayataḥ rathān iva

original: RV_1,130.05d ita ūtīr ayuñjata samānam artham akṣitam /
analyzed: itas ūtīḥ ayuñjata samānam artham akṣitam

original: RV_1,130.05f dhenūr iva manave viśvadohaso janāya viśvadohasaḥ //
analyzed: dhenūḥ iva manave viśva dohasaḥ janāya viśva dohasaḥ

original: RV_1,130.06a imāṃ te vācaṃ vasūyanta āyavo rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣiṣuḥ sumnāya tvām atakṣiṣuḥ /
analyzed: imām te vācam vasūyantaḥ āyavaḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣiṣuḥ sumnāya tvām atakṣiṣuḥ

original: RV_1,130.06d śumbhanto jenyaṃ yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam /
analyzed: śumbhantaḥ jenyam yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam

original: RV_1,130.06f atyam iva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye //
analyzed: atyam iva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye

original: RV_1,130.07a bhinat puro navatim indra pūrave divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto vajreṇa dāśuṣe nṛto /
analyzed: bhinat puraḥ navatim indra pūrave divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto vajreṇa dāśuṣe nṛto

original: RV_1,130.07d atithigvāya śambaraṃ girer ugro avābharat /
analyzed: atithigvāya śambaram gireḥ ugraḥ avābharat

original: RV_1,130.07f maho dhanāni dayamāna ojasā viśvā dhanāny ojasā //
analyzed: mahaḥ dhanāni dayamānaḥ ojasā viśvā dhanāni ojasā

original: RV_1,130.08a indraḥ samatsu yajamānam āryam prāvad viśveṣu śatamūtir ājiṣu svarmīḷheṣv ājiṣu /
analyzed: indraḥ samatsu yajamānam āryam prāvat viśveṣu śatamūtiḥ ājiṣu svarmīḷheṣu ājiṣu

original: RV_1,130.08d manave śāsad avratān tvacaṃ kṛṣṇām arandhayat /
analyzed: manave śāsat avratān tvacam kṛṣṇām arandhayat

original: RV_1,130.08f dakṣan na viśvaṃ tatṛṣāṇam oṣati ny arśasānam oṣati //
analyzed: dakṣan na viśvam tatṛṣāṇam oṣati ni arśasānam oṣati

original: RV_1,130.09a sūraś cakram pra vṛhaj jāta ojasā prapitve vācam aruṇo muṣāyatīśāna ā muṣāyati /
analyzed: sūraḥ cakram pra vṛhat jātaḥ ojasā prapitve vācam aruṇaḥ muṣāyati īśānaḥ ā muṣāyati

original: RV_1,130.09d uśanā yat parāvato 'jagann ūtaye kave /
analyzed: uśanāḥ yat parāvataḥ jagan ūtaye kave

original: RV_1,130.09f sumnāni viśvā manuṣeva turvaṇir ahā viśveva turvaṇiḥ //
analyzed: sumnāni viśvā manuṣā iva turvaṇiḥ ahā viśvā iva turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_1,130.10a sa no navyebhir vṛṣakarmann ukthaiḥ purāṃ dartaḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ navyebhiḥ vṛṣa karman ukthaiḥ purām dartar pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ

original: RV_1,130.10b divodāsebhir indra stavāno vāvṛdhīthā ahobhir iva dyauḥ //
analyzed: divodāsebhiḥ indra stavānaḥ vāvṛdhīthāḥ ahobhiḥ iva dyauḥ

original: RV_1,131.01a indrāya hi dyaur asuro anamnatendrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhir dyumnasātā varīmabhiḥ /
analyzed: indrāya hi dyauḥ asuraḥ anamnata indrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhiḥ dyumna sātā varīmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,131.01d indraṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dadhire puraḥ /
analyzed: indram viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ dadhire puras

original: RV_1,131.01f indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā //
analyzed: indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā

original: RV_1,131.02a viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekaṃ vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svaḥ saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekam vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svar saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak

original: RV_1,131.02d taṃ tvā nāvaṃ na parṣaṇiṃ śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi /
analyzed: tam tvā nāvam na parṣaṇim śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi

original: RV_1,131.02f indraṃ na yajñaiś citayanta āyava stomebhir indram āyavaḥ //
analyzed: indram na yajñaiḥ citayantaḥ āyavaḥ stomebhiḥ indram āyavaḥ

original: RV_1,131.03a vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ /
analyzed: vi tvā tatasre mithunāḥ avasyavaḥ vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣantaḥ indra niḥsṛjaḥ

original: RV_1,131.03d yad gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi /
analyzed: yat gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi

original: RV_1,131.03f āviṣ karikrad vṛṣaṇaṃ sacābhuvaṃ vajram indra sacābhuvam //
analyzed: āvis karikrat vṛṣaṇam sacābhuvam vajram indra sacābhuvam

original: RV_1,131.04a viduṣ ṭe asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puro yad indra śāradīr avātiraḥ sāsahāno avātiraḥ /
analyzed: viduḥ te asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puraḥ yat indra śāradīḥ avātiraḥ sāsahānaḥ avātiraḥ

original: RV_1,131.04d śāsas tam indra martyam ayajyuṃ śavasas pate /
analyzed: śāsaḥ tam indra martyam ayajyum śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_1,131.04f mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imā apo mandasāna imā apaḥ //
analyzed: mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imāḥ apaḥ mandasānaḥ imāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_1,131.05a ād it te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣann uśijo yad āvitha sakhīyato yad āvitha /
analyzed: āt id te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣan uśijaḥ yat āvitha sakhīyataḥ yat āvitha

original: RV_1,131.05d cakartha kāram ebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantave /
analyzed: cakartha kāram ebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantave

original: RV_1,131.05f te anyām-anyāṃ nadyaṃ saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata //
analyzed: te anyām anyām nadyam saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata

original: RV_1,131.06a uto no asyā uṣaso juṣeta hy arkasya bodhi haviṣo havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ /
analyzed: uta u naḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ juṣeta hi arkasya bodhi haviṣaḥ havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,131.06d yad indra hantave mṛdho vṛṣā vajriñ ciketasi /
analyzed: yat indra hantave mṛdhaḥ vṛṣā vajrim ciketasi

original: RV_1,131.06f ā me asya vedhaso navīyaso manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ //
analyzed: ā me asya vedhasaḥ navīyasaḥ manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ

original: RV_1,131.07a tvaṃ tam indra vāvṛdhāno asmayur amitrayantaṃ tuvijāta martyaṃ vajreṇa śūra martyam /
analyzed: tvam tam indra vāvṛdhānaḥ asmayuḥ amitrayantam tuvi jāta martyam vajreṇa śūra martyam

original: RV_1,131.07d jahi yo no aghāyati śṛṇuṣva suśravastamaḥ /
analyzed: jahi yaḥ naḥ aghāyati śṛṇuṣva su śravastamaḥ

original: RV_1,131.07f riṣṭaṃ na yāmann apa bhūtu durmatir viśvāpa bhūtu durmatiḥ //
analyzed: riṣṭam na yāman apa bhūtu durmatiḥ viśvā apa bhūtu durmatiḥ

original: RV_1,132.01a tvayā vayam maghavan pūrvye dhana indratvotāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ /
analyzed: tvayā vayam maghavan pūrvye dhane indra tva utāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ

original: RV_1,132.01d nediṣṭhe asminn ahany adhi vocā nu sunvate /
analyzed: nediṣṭhe asmin ahani adhi vocāḥ nu sunvate

original: RV_1,132.01f asmin yajñe vi cayemā bhare kṛtaṃ vājayanto bhare kṛtam //
analyzed: asmin yajñe vi cayema bhare kṛtam vājayantaḥ bhare kṛtam

original: RV_1,132.02a svarjeṣe bhara āprasya vakmany uṣarbudhaḥ svasminn añjasi krāṇasya svasminn añjasi /
analyzed: svar jeṣe bhare āprasya vakmani uṣarbudhaḥ svasmin añjasi krāṇasya svasmin añjasi

original: RV_1,132.02d ahann indro yathā vide śīrṣṇā-śīrṣṇopavācyaḥ /
analyzed: ahan indraḥ yathā vide śīrṣṇā a śīrṣṇā upavācyaḥ

original: RV_1,132.02f asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayo bhadrā bhadrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayaḥ bhadrāḥ bhadrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_1,132.03a tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanaṃ yasmin yajñe vāram akṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya vār asi kṣayam /
analyzed: tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanam yasmin yajñe vāram akṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya vār asi kṣayam

original: RV_1,132.03d vi tad vocer adha dvitāntaḥ paśyanti raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: vi tat voceḥ adha dvitā antar paśyanti raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_1,132.03f sa ghā vide anv indro gaveṣaṇo bandhukṣidbhyo gaveṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sa ghā vide anu indraḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ bandhu kṣidbhyaḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,132.04a nū itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyaṃ yad aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apa vrajam indra śikṣann apa vrajam /
analyzed: nu itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyam yat aṅgirobhyaḥ vṛṇoḥ apa vrajam indra śikṣan apa vrajam

original: RV_1,132.04d aibhyaḥ samānyā diśāsmabhyaṃ jeṣi yotsi ca /
analyzed: ā ebhyaḥ samānyā diśā asmabhyam jeṣi yotsi ca

original: RV_1,132.04f sunvadbhyo randhayā kaṃ cid avrataṃ hṛṇāyantaṃ cid avratam //
analyzed: sunvadbhyaḥ randhaya kam cit avratam hṛṇāyantam cit avratam

original: RV_1,132.05a saṃ yaj janān kratubhiḥ śūra īkṣayad dhane hite taruṣanta śravasyavaḥ pra yakṣanta śravasyavaḥ /
analyzed: sam yat janān kratubhiḥ śūraḥ īkṣayat dhane hite taruṣanta śravasyavaḥ pra yakṣanta śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_1,132.05d tasmā āyuḥ prajāvad id bādhe arcanty ojasā /
analyzed: tasmai āyuḥ prajāvat id bādhe arcanti ojasā

original: RV_1,132.05f indra okyaṃ didhiṣanta dhītayo devāṃ acchā na dhītayaḥ //
analyzed: indre okyam didhiṣanta dhītayaḥ devān acchā na dhītayaḥ

original: RV_1,132.06a yuvaṃ tam indrāparvatā puroyudhā yo naḥ pṛtanyād apa taṃ-tam id dhataṃ vajreṇa taṃ-tam id dhatam /
analyzed: yuvam tam indrāparvatā puroyudhā yaḥ naḥ pṛtanyāt apa taṃtam id hatam vajreṇa taṃtam id hatam

original: RV_1,132.06d dūre cattāya cchantsad gahanaṃ yad inakṣat /
analyzed: dūre cattāya chantsat gahanam yat inakṣat

original: RV_1,132.06f asmākaṃ śatrūn pari śūra viśvato darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvataḥ //
analyzed: asmākam śatrūn pari śūra viśvatas darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvatas

original: RV_1,133.01a ubhe punāmi rodasī ṛtena druho dahāmi sam mahīr anindrāḥ /
analyzed: ubhe punāmi rodasī ṛtena druhaḥ dahāmi sam mahīḥ an indrāḥ

original: RV_1,133.01c abhivlagya yatra hatā amitrā vailasthānam pari tṛḷhā aśeran //
analyzed: abhivlagya yatra hatāḥ amitrāḥ vailasthānam pari tṛḍhāḥ aśeran

original: RV_1,133.02a abhivlagyā cid adrivaḥ śīrṣā yātumatīnām /
analyzed: abhivlagya cit adrivas śīrṣā yātumatīnām

original: RV_1,133.02c chindhi vaṭūriṇā padā mahāvaṭūriṇā padā //
analyzed: chinddhi vaṭūriṇā padā mahā vaṭūriṇā padā

original: RV_1,133.03a avāsām maghavañ jahi śardho yātumatīnām /
analyzed: ava āsām maghavam jahi śardhaḥ yātumatīnām

original: RV_1,133.03c vailasthānake armake mahāvailasthe armake //
analyzed: vailasthānake armake mahāvailasthe armake

original: RV_1,133.04a yāsāṃ tisraḥ pañcāśato 'bhivlaṅgair apāvapaḥ /
analyzed: yāsām tisraḥ pañcāśataḥ bhivlaṅgaiḥ apāvapaḥ

original: RV_1,133.04c tat su te manāyati takat su te manāyati //
analyzed: tat su te manāyati takat su te manāyati

original: RV_1,133.05a piśaṅgabhṛṣṭim ambhṛṇam piśācim indra sam mṛṇa /
analyzed: piśaṅga bhṛṣṭim ambhṛṇam piśācim indra sam mṛṇa

original: RV_1,133.05c sarvaṃ rakṣo ni barhaya //
analyzed: sarvam rakṣaḥ ni barhaya

original: RV_1,133.06a avar maha indra dādṛhi śrudhī naḥ śuśoca hi dyauḥ kṣā na bhīṣāṃ adrivo ghṛṇān na bhīṣāṃ adrivaḥ /
analyzed: avas mahaḥ indra dādṛhi śrudhi naḥ śuśoca hi dyauḥ kṣā na adrivas ghṛṇāt na adrivas

original: RV_1,133.06d śuṣmintamo hi śuṣmibhir vadhair ugrebhir īyase /
analyzed: śuṣmintamaḥ hi śuṣmibhiḥ vadhaiḥ ugrebhiḥ īyase

original: RV_1,133.06f apūruṣaghno apratīta śūra satvabhis trisaptaiḥ śūra satvabhiḥ //
analyzed: a pūruṣa ghnaḥ apratīta śūra satvabhiḥ trisaptaiḥ śūra satvabhiḥ

original: RV_1,133.07a vanoti hi sunvan kṣayam parīṇasaḥ sunvāno hi ṣmā yajaty ava dviṣo devānām ava dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: vanoti hi sunvan kṣayam parīṇasaḥ sunvānaḥ hi sma yajati ava dviṣaḥ devānām ava dviṣaḥ

original: RV_1,133.07d sunvāna it siṣāsati sahasrā vājy avṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sunvānaḥ id siṣāsati sahasrā vājī a vṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,133.07f sunvānāyendro dadāty ābhuvaṃ rayiṃ dadāty ābhuvam //
analyzed: sunvānāya indraḥ dadāti ābhuvam rayim dadāti ābhuvam

original: RV_1,134.01a ā tvā juvo rārahāṇā abhi prayo vāyo vahantv iha pūrvapītaye somasya pūrvapītaye /
analyzed: ā tvā juvaḥ rārahāṇāḥ abhi prayaḥ vāyo vahantu iha pūrva pītaye somasya pūrva pītaye

original: RV_1,134.01d ūrdhvā te anu sūnṛtā manas tiṣṭhatu jānatī /
analyzed: ūrdhvā te anu sūnṛtā manaḥ tiṣṭhatu jānatī

original: RV_1,134.01f niyutvatā rathenā yāhi dāvane vāyo makhasya dāvane //
analyzed: niyutvatā rathena ā yāhi dāvane vāyo makhasya dāvane

original: RV_1,134.02a mandantu tvā mandino vāyav indavo 'smat krāṇāsaḥ sukṛtā abhidyavo gobhiḥ krāṇā abhidyavaḥ /
analyzed: mandantu tvā mandinaḥ vāyo indavaḥ smat krāṇāsaḥ su kṛtāḥ abhidyavaḥ gobhiḥ krāṇāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_1,134.02d yad dha krāṇā iradhyai dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ /
analyzed: yat ha krāṇāḥ iradhyai dakṣam sacante ūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,134.02f sadhrīcīnā niyuto dāvane dhiya upa bruvata īṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: sadhrīcīnāḥ niyutaḥ dāvane dhiyaḥ upa bruvate īm dhiyaḥ

original: RV_1,134.03a vāyur yuṅkte rohitā vāyur aruṇā vāyū rathe ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave /
analyzed: vāyuḥ yuṅkte rohitā vāyuḥ aruṇā vāyuḥ rathe ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave

original: RV_1,134.03d pra bodhayā purandhiṃ jāra ā sasatīm iva /
analyzed: pra bodhaya purandhim jāraḥ ā sasatīm iva

original: RV_1,134.03f pra cakṣaya rodasī vāsayoṣasaḥ śravase vāsayoṣasaḥ //
analyzed: pra cakṣaya rodasī vāsaya uṣasaḥ śravase vāsaya uṣasaḥ

original: RV_1,134.04a tubhyam uṣāsaḥ śucayaḥ parāvati bhadrā vastrā tanvate daṃsu raśmiṣu citrā navyeṣu raśmiṣu /
analyzed: tubhyam uṣāsaḥ śucayaḥ parāvati bhadrā vastrā tanvate daṃsu raśmiṣu citrā navyeṣu raśmiṣu

original: RV_1,134.04d tubhyaṃ dhenuḥ sabardughā viśvā vasūni dohate /
analyzed: tubhyam dhenuḥ sabardughā viśvā vasūni dohate

original: RV_1,134.04f ajanayo maruto vakṣaṇābhyo diva ā vakṣaṇābhyaḥ //
analyzed: ajanayaḥ marutaḥ vakṣaṇābhyaḥ divaḥ ā vakṣaṇābhyaḥ

original: RV_1,134.05a tubhyaṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayas turaṇyavo madeṣūgrā iṣaṇanta bhurvaṇy apām iṣanta bhurvaṇi /
analyzed: tubhyam śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ turaṇyavaḥ madeṣu ugrāḥ iṣaṇanta bhurvaṇi apām iṣanta bhurvaṇi

original: RV_1,134.05d tvāṃ tsārī dasamāno bhagam īṭṭe takvavīye /
analyzed: tvām tsārī dasamānaḥ bhagam īṭṭe takvavīye

original: RV_1,134.05f tvaṃ viśvasmād bhuvanāt pāsi dharmaṇāsuryāt pāsi dharmaṇā //
analyzed: tvam viśvasmāt bhuvanāt pāsi dharmaṇā asuryāt pāsi dharmaṇā

original: RV_1,134.06a tvaṃ no vāyav eṣām apūrvyaḥ somānām prathamaḥ pītim arhasi sutānām pītim arhasi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ vāyo eṣām apūrvyaḥ somānām prathamaḥ pītim arhasi sutānām pītim arhasi

original: RV_1,134.06d uto vihutmatīnāṃ viśāṃ vavarjuṣīṇām /
analyzed: uta u vihutmatīnām viśām vavarjuṣīṇām

original: RV_1,134.06f viśvā it te dhenavo duhra āśiraṃ ghṛtaṃ duhrata āśiram //
analyzed: viśvāḥ id te dhenavaḥ duhre āśiram ghṛtam duhrate āśiram

original: RV_1,135.01a stīrṇam barhir upa no yāhi vītaye sahasreṇa niyutā niyutvate śatinībhir niyutvate /
analyzed: stīrṇam barhiḥ upa naḥ yāhi vītaye sahasreṇa niyutā niyutvate śatinībhiḥ niyutvate

original: RV_1,135.01d tubhyaṃ hi pūrvapītaye devā devāya yemire /
analyzed: tubhyam hi pūrva pītaye devāḥ devāya yemire

original: RV_1,135.01f pra te sutāso madhumanto asthiran madāya kratve asthiran //
analyzed: pra te sutāsaḥ madhumantaḥ asthiran madāya kratve asthiran

original: RV_1,135.02a tubhyāyaṃ somaḥ paripūto adribhi spārhā vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati śukrā vasāno arṣati /
analyzed: tubhya ayam somaḥ paripūtaḥ adribhiḥ spārhā vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati śukrā vasānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_1,135.02d tavāyam bhāga āyuṣu somo deveṣu hūyate /
analyzed: tava ayam bhāgaḥ āyuṣu somaḥ deveṣu hūyate

original: RV_1,135.02f vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy asmayur juṣāṇo yāhy asmayuḥ //
analyzed: vaha vāyo niyutaḥ yāhi asmayuḥ juṣāṇaḥ yāhi asmayuḥ

original: RV_1,135.03a ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye /
analyzed: ā naḥ niyudbhiḥ śatinībhiḥ adhvaram sahasriṇībhiḥ upa yāhi vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye

original: RV_1,135.03d tavāyam bhāga ṛtviyaḥ saraśmiḥ sūrye sacā /
analyzed: tava ayam bhāgaḥ ṛtviyaḥ sa raśmiḥ sūrye sacā

original: RV_1,135.03f adhvaryubhir bharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata //
analyzed: adhvaryubhiḥ bharamāṇāḥ ayaṃsata vāyo śukrāḥ ayaṃsata

original: RV_1,135.04a ā vāṃ ratho niyutvān vakṣad avase 'bhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye /
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ niyutvān vakṣat avase bhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye

original: RV_1,135.04d pibatam madhvo andhasaḥ pūrvapeyaṃ hi vāṃ hitam /
analyzed: pibatam madhvaḥ andhasaḥ pūrvapeyam hi vām hitam

original: RV_1,135.04f vāyav ā candreṇa rādhasā gatam indraś ca rādhasā gatam //
analyzed: vāyo ā candreṇa rādhasā gatam indraḥ ca rādhasā gatam

original: RV_1,135.05a ā vāṃ dhiyo vavṛtyur adhvarāṃ upemam indum marmṛjanta vājinam āśum atyaṃ na vājinam /
analyzed: ā vām dhiyaḥ vavṛtyuḥ adhvarān upa imam indum marmṛjanta vājinam āśum atyam na vājinam

original: RV_1,135.05d teṣām pibatam asmayū ā no gantam ihotyā /
analyzed: teṣām pibatam asmayū ā naḥ gantam iha ūtyā

original: RV_1,135.05f indravāyū sutānām adribhir yuvam madāya vājadā yuvam //
analyzed: indra vāyū sutānām adribhiḥ yuvam madāya vāja dā yuvam

original: RV_1,135.06a ime vāṃ somā apsv ā sutā ihādhvaryubhir bharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata /
analyzed: ime vām somāḥ apsu ā sutāḥ iha adhvaryubhiḥ bharamāṇāḥ ayaṃsata vāyo śukrāḥ ayaṃsata

original: RV_1,135.06d ete vām abhy asṛkṣata tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ /
analyzed: ete vām abhī asṛkṣata tiras pavitram āśavaḥ

original: RV_1,135.06f yuvāyavo 'ti romāṇy avyayā somāso aty avyayā //
analyzed: yuvāyavaḥ ti romāṇi avyayā somāsaḥ ati avyayā

original: RV_1,135.07a ati vāyo sasato yāhi śaśvato yatra grāvā vadati tatra gacchataṃ gṛham indraś ca gacchatam /
analyzed: ati vāyo sasataḥ yāhi śaśvataḥ yatra grāvā vadati tatra gacchatam gṛham indraḥ ca gacchatam

original: RV_1,135.07d vi sūnṛtā dadṛśe rīyate ghṛtam ā pūrṇayā niyutā yātho adhvaram indraś ca yātho adhvaram //
analyzed: vi sūnṛtā dadṛśe rīyate ghṛtam ā pūrṇayā niyutā yāthaḥ adhvaram indraḥ ca yāthaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_1,135.08a atrāha tad vahethe madhva āhutiṃ yam aśvattham upatiṣṭhanta jāyavo 'sme te santu jāyavaḥ /
analyzed: atra aha tat vahethe madhvaḥ āhutim yam aśvattham upatiṣṭhanta jāyavaḥ sme te santu jāyavaḥ

original: RV_1,135.08d sākaṃ gāvaḥ suvate pacyate yavo na te vāya upa dasyanti dhenavo nāpa dasyanti dhenavaḥ //
analyzed: sākam gāvaḥ suvate pacyate yavaḥ na te vāyo upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ na apa dasyanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_1,135.09a ime ye te su vāyo bāhvojaso 'ntar nadī te patayanty ukṣaṇo mahi vrādhanta ukṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ime ye te su vāyo bāhu ojasaḥ ntar nadī te patayanti ukṣaṇaḥ mahi vrādhantaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,135.09d dhanvañ cid ye anāśavo jīrāś cid agiraukasaḥ /
analyzed: dhanvam cit ye anāśavaḥ jīrāḥ cit a giraukasaḥ

original: RV_1,135.09f sūryasyeva raśmayo durniyantavo hastayor durniyantavaḥ //
analyzed: sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ durniyantavaḥ hastayoḥ durniyantavaḥ

original: RV_1,136.01a pra su jyeṣṭhaṃ nicirābhyām bṛhan namo havyam matim bharatā mṛḷayadbhyāṃ svādiṣṭham mṛḷayadbhyām /
analyzed: pra su jyeṣṭham nicirābhyām bṛhat namaḥ havyam matim bharata mṛḍayadbhyām svādiṣṭham mṛḍayadbhyām

original: RV_1,136.01d tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī yajñe-yajña upastutā /
analyzed: tā samrājā ghṛta āsutī yajñeyajñe upastutā

original: RV_1,136.01f athainoḥ kṣatraṃ na kutaś canādhṛṣe devatvaṃ nū cid ādhṛṣe //
analyzed: atha enoḥ kṣatram na kutas cana ādhṛṣe deva tvam nu cit ādhṛṣe

original: RV_1,136.02a adarśi gātur urave varīyasī panthā ṛtasya sam ayaṃsta raśmibhiś cakṣur bhagasya raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: adarśi gātuḥ urave varīyasī panthāḥ ṛtasya sam ayaṃsta raśmibhiḥ cakṣuḥ bhagasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_1,136.02d dyukṣam mitrasya sādanam aryamṇo varuṇasya ca /
analyzed: dyukṣam mitrasya sādanam aryamṇaḥ varuṇasya ca

original: RV_1,136.02f athā dadhāte bṛhad ukthyaṃ vaya upastutyam bṛhad vayaḥ //
analyzed: athā dadhāte bṛhat ukthyam vayaḥ upastutyam bṛhat vayaḥ

original: RV_1,136.03a jyotiṣmatīm aditiṃ dhārayatkṣitiṃ svarvatīm ā sacete dive-dive jāgṛvāṃsā dive-dive /
analyzed: jyotiṣmatīm aditim dhārayat kṣitim svarvatīm ā sacete dive dive jāgṛvāṃsā dive dive

original: RV_1,136.03d jyotiṣmat kṣatram āśāte ādityā dānunas patī /
analyzed: jyotiṣmat kṣatram āśāte ādityā dānunas patī

original: RV_1,136.03f mitras tayor varuṇo yātayajjano 'ryamā yātayajjanaḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ tayoḥ varuṇaḥ yātayat janaḥ ryamā yātayat janaḥ

original: RV_1,136.04a ayam mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ somo bhūtv avapāneṣv ābhago devo deveṣv ābhagaḥ /
analyzed: ayam mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ somaḥ bhūtu avapāneṣu ābhagaḥ devaḥ deveṣu ābhagaḥ

original: RV_1,136.04d taṃ devāso juṣerata viśve adya sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: tam devāsaḥ juṣerata viśve adya sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_1,136.04f tathā rājānā karatho yad īmaha ṛtāvānā yad īmahe //
analyzed: tathā rājānā karathaḥ yat īmahe ṛtāvānā yat īmahe

original: RV_1,136.05a yo mitrāya varuṇāyāvidhaj jano 'narvāṇaṃ tam pari pāto aṃhaso dāśvāṃsam martam aṃhasaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya avidhat janaḥ narvāṇam tam pari pātaḥ aṃhasaḥ dāśvāṃsam martam aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_1,136.05d tam aryamābhi rakṣaty ṛjūyantam anu vratam /
analyzed: tam aryamā abhi rakṣati ṛjūyantam anu vratam

original: RV_1,136.05f ukthair ya enoḥ paribhūṣati vrataṃ stomair ābhūṣati vratam //
analyzed: ukthaiḥ yaḥ enoḥ paribhūṣati vratam stomaiḥ ābhūṣati vratam

original: RV_1,136.06a namo dive bṛhate rodasībhyām mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya mīḷhuṣe sumṛḷīkāya mīḷhuṣe /
analyzed: namaḥ dive bṛhate rodasībhyām mitrāya vocam varuṇāya mīḷhuṣe su mṛḷīkāya mīḷhuṣe

original: RV_1,136.06d indram agnim upa stuhi dyukṣam aryamaṇam bhagam /
analyzed: indram agnim upa stuhi dyukṣam aryamaṇam bhagam

original: RV_1,136.06f jyog jīvantaḥ prajayā sacemahi somasyotī sacemahi //
analyzed: jyok jīvantaḥ prajayā sacemahi somasya ūtī sacemahi

original: RV_1,136.07a ūtī devānāṃ vayam indravanto maṃsīmahi svayaśaso marudbhiḥ /
analyzed: ūtī devānām vayam indravantaḥ maṃsīmahi sva yaśasaḥ marudbhiḥ

original: RV_1,136.07c agnir mitro varuṇaḥ śarma yaṃsan tad aśyāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca //
analyzed: agniḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ śarma yaṃsan tat aśyāma maghavānaḥ vayam ca

original: RV_1,137.01a suṣumā yātam adribhir gośrītā matsarā ime somāso matsarā ime /
analyzed: suṣuma yātam adribhiḥ go śrītāḥ matsarāḥ ime somāsaḥ matsarāḥ ime

original: RV_1,137.01d ā rājānā divispṛśāsmatrā gantam upa naḥ /
analyzed: ā rājānā divispṛśā asmatrā gantam upa naḥ

original: RV_1,137.01f ime vām mitrāvaruṇā gavāśiraḥ somāḥ śukrā gavāśiraḥ //
analyzed: ime vām mitrāvaruṇā gavāśiraḥ somāḥ śukrāḥ gavāśiraḥ

original: RV_1,137.02a ima ā yātam indavaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ sutāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
analyzed: ime ā yātam indavaḥ somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ sutāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_1,137.02d uta vām uṣaso budhi sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: uta vām uṣasaḥ budhi sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_1,137.02f suto mitrāya varuṇāya pītaye cārur ṛtāya pītaye //
analyzed: sutaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya pītaye cāruḥ ṛtāya pītaye

original: RV_1,137.03a tāṃ vāṃ dhenuṃ na vāsarīm aṃśuṃ duhanty adribhiḥ somaṃ duhanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: tām vām dhenum na vāsarīm aṃśum duhanti adribhiḥ somam duhanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_1,137.03d asmatrā gantam upa no 'rvāñcā somapītaye /
analyzed: asmatrā gantam upa naḥ rvāñcā soma pītaye

original: RV_1,137.03f ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ soma ā pītaye sutaḥ //
analyzed: ayam vām mitrāvaruṇā nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ somaḥ ā pītaye sutaḥ

original: RV_1,138.01a pra-pra pūṣṇas tuvijātasya śasyate mahitvam asya tavaso na tandate stotram asya na tandate /
analyzed: pra pra pūṣṇaḥ tuvi jātasya śasyate mahi tvam asya tavasaḥ na tandate stotram asya na tandate

original: RV_1,138.01d arcāmi sumnayann aham antyūtim mayobhuvam /
analyzed: arcāmi sumnayan aham antyūtim mayobhuvam

original: RV_1,138.01f viśvasya yo mana āyuyuve makho deva āyuyuve makhaḥ //
analyzed: viśvasya yaḥ manaḥ āyuyuve makhaḥ devaḥ āyuyuve makhaḥ

original: RV_1,138.02a pra hi tvā pūṣann ajiraṃ na yāmani stomebhiḥ kṛṇva ṛṇavo yathā mṛdha uṣṭro na pīparo mṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: pra hi tvā pūṣan ajiram na yāmani stomebhiḥ kṛṇve ṛṇavaḥ yathā mṛdhaḥ uṣṭraḥ na pīparaḥ mṛdhaḥ

original: RV_1,138.02d huve yat tvā mayobhuvaṃ devaṃ sakhyāya martyaḥ /
analyzed: huve yat tvā mayobhuvam devam sakhyāya martyaḥ

original: RV_1,138.02f asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninas kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninas kṛdhi //
analyzed: asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninaḥ kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_1,138.03a yasya te pūṣan sakhye vipanyavaḥ kratvā cit santo 'vasā bubhujrira iti kratvā bubhujrire /
analyzed: yasya te pūṣan sakhye vipanyavaḥ kratvā cit santaḥ vasāḥ bubhujrire iti kratvā bubhujrire

original: RV_1,138.03d tām anu tvā navīyasīṃ niyutaṃ rāya īmahe /
analyzed: tām anu tvā navīyasīm niyutam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_1,138.03f aheḷamāna uruśaṃsa sarī bhava vāje-vāje sarī bhava //
analyzed: a heḍamānaḥ uru śaṃsa sarī bhava vājevāje sarī bhava

original: RV_1,138.04a asyā ū ṣu ṇa upa sātaye bhuvo 'heḷamāno rarivāṃ ajāśva śravasyatām ajāśva /
analyzed: asyāḥ u su naḥ upa sātaye bhuvaḥ heḍamānaḥ rarivān ajāśva śravasyatām ajāśva

original: RV_1,138.04d o ṣu tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhir dasma sādhubhiḥ /
analyzed: ā u su tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhiḥ dasma sādhubhiḥ

original: RV_1,138.04f nahi tvā pūṣann atimanya āghṛṇe na te sakhyam apahnuve //
analyzed: nahi tvā pūṣan atimanye āghṛṇe na te sakhyam apahnuve

original: RV_1,139.01a astu śrauṣaṭ puro agnīṃ dhiyā dadha ā nu tac chardho divyaṃ vṛṇīmaha indravāyū vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: astu śrauṣaṭ puras agnīm dhiyā dadhe ā nu tat śardhaḥ divyam vṛṇīmahe indra vāyū vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_1,139.01d yad dha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī /
analyzed: yat ha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī

original: RV_1,139.01f adha pra sū na upa yantu dhītayo devāṃ acchā na dhītayaḥ //
analyzed: adha pra su naḥ upa yantu dhītayaḥ devān acchā na dhītayaḥ

original: RV_1,139.02a yad dha tyan mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtād adhy ādadāthe anṛtaṃ svena manyunā dakṣasya svena manyunā /
analyzed: yat ha tyad mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāt adhi ādadāthe anṛtam svena manyunā dakṣasya svena manyunā

original: RV_1,139.02d yuvor itthādhi sadmasv apaśyāma hiraṇyayam /
analyzed: yuvoḥ itthā adhi sadmasu apaśyāma hiraṇyayam

original: RV_1,139.02f dhībhiś cana manasā svebhir akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhir akṣabhiḥ //
analyzed: dhībhiḥ cana manasā svebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ

original: RV_1,139.03a yuvāṃ stomebhir devayanto aśvināśrāvayanta iva ślokam āyavo yuvāṃ havyābhy āyavaḥ /
analyzed: yuvām stomebhiḥ devayantaḥ aśvinā aśrāvayanta iva ślokam āyavaḥ yuvām havyā abhi āyavaḥ

original: RV_1,139.03d yuvor viśvā adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaś ca viśvavedasā /
analyzed: yuvoḥ viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaḥ ca viśva vedasā

original: RV_1,139.03f pruṣāyante vām pavayo hiraṇyaye rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye //
analyzed: pruṣāyante vām pavayaḥ hiraṇyaye rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye

original: RV_1,139.04a aceti dasrā vy u nākam ṛṇvatho yuñjate vāṃ rathayujo diviṣṭiṣv adhvasmāno diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: aceti dasrā vi u nākam yuñjate vām ratha yujaḥ diviṣṭiṣu adhvasmānaḥ diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,139.04d adhi vāṃ sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye /
analyzed: adhi vām sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye

original: RV_1,139.04f patheva yantāv anuśāsatā rajo 'ñjasā śāsatā rajaḥ //
analyzed: pathā iva yantau anuśāsatā rajaḥ ñjasā śāsatā rajaḥ

original: RV_1,139.05a śacībhir naḥ śacīvasū divā naktaṃ daśasyatam /
analyzed: śacībhiḥ naḥ śacī vasū divā naktam daśasyatam

original: RV_1,139.05c mā vāṃ rātir upa dasat kadā canāsmad rātiḥ kadā cana //
analyzed: mā vām rātiḥ upa dasat kadā cana asmat rātiḥ kadā cana

original: RV_1,139.06a vṛṣann indra vṛṣapāṇāsa indava ime sutā adriṣutāsa udbhidas tubhyaṃ sutāsa udbhidaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣapāṇāsaḥ indavaḥ ime sutāḥ adriṣutāsaḥ udbhidaḥ tubhyam sutāsaḥ udbhidaḥ

original: RV_1,139.06d te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase /
analyzed: te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase

original: RV_1,139.06f gīrbhir girvāha stavamāna ā gahi sumṛḷīko na ā gahi //
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ gir vāha stavamānaḥ ā gahi su mṛḍīkaḥ naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_1,139.07a o ṣū ṇo agne śṛṇuhi tvam īḷito devebhyo bravasi yajñiyebhyo rājabhyo yajñiyebhyaḥ /
analyzed: ā u su naḥ agne śṛṇuhi tvam īḍitaḥ devebhyaḥ bravasi yajñiyebhyaḥ rājabhyaḥ yajñiyebhyaḥ

original: RV_1,139.07d yad dha tyām aṅgirobhyo dhenuṃ devā adattana /
analyzed: yat ha tyām aṅgirobhyaḥ dhenum devāḥ adattana

original: RV_1,139.07f vi tāṃ duhre aryamā kartarī sacāṃ eṣa tāṃ veda me sacā //
analyzed: vi tām duhre aryamā kartari sacā eṣa tām veda me sacā

original: RV_1,139.08a mo ṣu vo asmad abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mota jāriṣur asmat purota jāriṣuḥ /
analyzed: mā u su vaḥ asmat abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mā uta jāriṣuḥ asmat purā uta jāriṣuḥ

original: RV_1,139.08d yad vaś citraṃ yuge-yuge navyaṃ ghoṣād amartyam /
analyzed: yat vaḥ citram yuge yuge navyam ghoṣāt amartyam

original: RV_1,139.08f asmāsu tan maruto yac ca duṣṭaraṃ didhṛtā yac ca duṣṭaram //
analyzed: asmāsu tat marutaḥ yat ca duṣṭaram didhṛta yat ca duṣṭaram

original: RV_1,139.09a dadhyaṅ ha me januṣam pūrvo aṅgirāḥ priyamedhaḥ kaṇvo atrir manur vidus te me pūrve manur viduḥ /
analyzed: dadhyaṅ ha me januṣam pūrvaḥ aṅgirāḥ priyamedhaḥ kaṇvaḥ atriḥ manuḥ viduḥ te me pūrve manuḥ viduḥ

original: RV_1,139.09d teṣāṃ deveṣv āyatir asmākaṃ teṣu nābhayaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām deveṣu āyatiḥ asmākam teṣu nābhayaḥ

original: RV_1,139.09f teṣām padena mahy ā name girendrāgnī ā name girā //
analyzed: teṣām padena mahi ā name girā indra agnī ā name girā

original: RV_1,139.10a hotā yakṣad vanino vanta vāryam bṛhaspatir yajati vena ukṣabhiḥ puruvārebhir ukṣabhiḥ /
analyzed: hotā yakṣat vaninaḥ vanta vāryam bṛhaspatiḥ yajati venaḥ ukṣabhiḥ puru vārebhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ

original: RV_1,139.10d jagṛbhmā dūraādiśaṃ ślokam adrer adha tmanā /
analyzed: jagṛbhmā dūraādiśam ślokam adreḥ adha tmanā

original: RV_1,139.10f adhārayad ararindāni sukratuḥ purū sadmāni sukratuḥ //
analyzed: adhārayat ararindāni sukratuḥ purū sadmāni sukratuḥ

original: RV_1,139.11a ye devāso divy ekādaśa stha pṛthivyām adhy ekādaśa stha /
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ divi ekādaśa stha pṛthivyām adhi ekādaśa stha

original: RV_1,139.11c apsukṣito mahinaikādaśa stha te devāso yajñam imaṃ juṣadhvam //
analyzed: apsukṣitaḥ mahinā ekādaśa stha te devāsaḥ yajñam imam juṣadhvam

original: RV_1,140.01a vediṣade priyadhāmāya sudyute dhāsim iva pra bharā yonim agnaye /
analyzed: vediṣade priya dhāmāya su dyute dhāsim iva pra bhara yonim agnaye

original: RV_1,140.01c vastreṇeva vāsayā manmanā śuciṃ jyotīrathaṃ śukravarṇaṃ tamohanam //
analyzed: vastreṇa iva vāsaya manmanā śucim jyotīratham śukra varṇam tamaḥ hanam

original: RV_1,140.02a abhi dvijanmā trivṛd annam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe jagdham ī punaḥ /
analyzed: abhi dvi janmā trivṛt annam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe jagdham ī punar

original: RV_1,140.02c anyasyāsā jihvayā jenyo vṛṣā ny anyena vanino mṛṣṭa vāraṇaḥ //
analyzed: anyasya āsā jihvayā jenyaḥ vṛṣā ni anyena vaninaḥ mṛṣṭa vāraṇaḥ

original: RV_1,140.03a kṛṣṇaprutau vevije asya sakṣitā ubhā tarete abhi mātarā śiśum /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa prutau vevije asya sakṣitau ubhā tarete abhi mātarā śiśum

original: RV_1,140.03c prācājihvaṃ dhvasayantaṃ tṛṣucyutam ā sācyaṃ kupayaṃ vardhanam pituḥ //
analyzed: prācājihvam dhvasayantam tṛṣu cyutam ā sācyam kupayam vardhanam pituḥ

original: RV_1,140.04a mumukṣvo manave mānavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇasītāsa ū juvaḥ /
analyzed: mumukṣvaḥ manave mānavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇa sītāsaḥ u juvaḥ

original: RV_1,140.04c asamanā ajirāso raghuṣyado vātajūtā upa yujyanta āśavaḥ //
analyzed: asamanāḥ ajirāsaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ vāta jūtāḥ upa yujyante āśavaḥ

original: RV_1,140.05a ād asya te dhvasayanto vṛtherate kṛṣṇam abhvam mahi varpaḥ karikrataḥ /
analyzed: āt asya te dhvasayantaḥ vṛthā īrate kṛṣṇam abhvam mahi varpaḥ karikrataḥ

original: RV_1,140.05c yat sīm mahīm avanim prābhi marmṛśad abhiśvasan stanayann eti nānadat //
analyzed: yat sīm mahīm avanim pra abhi marmṛśat abhiśvasan stanayan eti nānadat

original: RV_1,140.06a bhūṣan na yo 'dhi babhrūṣu namnate vṛṣeva patnīr abhy eti roruvat /
analyzed: bhūṣan na yaḥ dhi babhrūṣu nannate vṛṣā iva patnīḥ abhī eti roruvat

original: RV_1,140.06c ojāyamānas tanvaś ca śumbhate bhīmo na śṛṅgā davidhāva durgṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: ojāyamānaḥ tanvaḥ ca śumbhate bhīmaḥ na śṛṅgā davidhāva durgṛbhiḥ

original: RV_1,140.07a sa saṃstiro viṣṭiraḥ saṃ gṛbhāyati jānann eva jānatīr nitya ā śaye /
analyzed: sa saṃstiraḥ viṣṭiraḥ sam gṛbhāyati jānan eva jānatīḥ nityaḥ ā śaye

original: RV_1,140.07c punar vardhante api yanti devyam anyad varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate sacā //
analyzed: punar vardhante api yanti devyam anyat varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate sacā

original: RV_1,140.08a tam agruvaḥ keśinīḥ saṃ hi rebhira ūrdhvās tasthur mamruṣīḥ prāyave punaḥ /
analyzed: tam agruvaḥ keśinīḥ sam hi rebhire ūrdhvāḥ tasthuḥ mamruṣīḥ prāyave punar

original: RV_1,140.08c tāsāṃ jarām pramuñcann eti nānadad asum paraṃ janayañ jīvam astṛtam //
analyzed: tāsām jarām pramuñcan eti nānadat asum param janayam jīvam astṛtam

original: RV_1,140.09a adhīvāsam pari mātū rihann aha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhir yāti vi jrayaḥ /
analyzed: adhīvāsam pari mātuḥ rihan aha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhiḥ yāti vi jrayaḥ

original: RV_1,140.09c vayo dadhat padvate rerihat sadānu śyenī sacate vartanīr aha //
analyzed: vayaḥ dadhat padvate rerihat sadā anu śyenī sacate vartanīḥ aha

original: RV_1,140.10a asmākam agne maghavatsu dīdihy adha śvasīvān vṛṣabho damūnāḥ /
analyzed: asmākam agne maghavatsu dīdihi adha śvasīvān vṛṣabhaḥ damūnāḥ

original: RV_1,140.10c avāsyā śiśumatīr adīder varmeva yutsu parijarbhurāṇaḥ //
analyzed: śiśumatīḥ adīdeḥ varmā iva yutsu parijarbhurāṇaḥ

original: RV_1,140.11a idam agne sudhitaṃ durdhitād adhi priyād u cin manmanaḥ preyo astu te /
analyzed: idam agne sudhitam durdhitāt adhi priyāt u cit manmanaḥ preyaḥ astu te

original: RV_1,140.11c yat te śukraṃ tanvo rocate śuci tenāsmabhyaṃ vanase ratnam ā tvam //
analyzed: yat te śukram tanvaḥ rocate śuci tena asmabhyam vanase ratnam ā tvam

original: RV_1,140.12a rathāya nāvam uta no gṛhāya nityāritrām padvatīṃ rāsy agne /
analyzed: rathāya nāvam uta naḥ gṛhāya nitya aritrām padvatīm rāsi agne

original: RV_1,140.12c asmākaṃ vīrāṃ uta no maghono janāṃś ca yā pārayāc charma yā ca //
analyzed: asmākam vīrān uta naḥ maghonaḥ janān ca yā pārayāt śarma yā ca

original: RV_1,140.13a abhī no agna uktham ij juguryā dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaś ca svagūrtāḥ /
analyzed: abhī naḥ agne uktham id juguryāḥ dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaḥ ca sva gūrtāḥ

original: RV_1,140.13c gavyaṃ yavyaṃ yanto dīrghāheṣaṃ varam aruṇyo varanta //
analyzed: gavyam yavyam yantaḥ dīrgha ahā iṣam varam aruṇyaḥ varanta

original: RV_1,141.01a baḷ itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśataṃ devasya bhargaḥ sahaso yato jani /
analyzed: baḷ itthā tat vapuṣe dhāyi darśatam devasya bhargaḥ sahasaḥ yatas jani

original: RV_1,141.01c yad īm upa hvarate sādhate matir ṛtasya dhenā anayanta sasrutaḥ //
analyzed: yat īm upa hvarate sādhate matiḥ ṛtasya dhenāḥ anayanta sasrutaḥ

original: RV_1,141.02a pṛkṣo vapuḥ pitumān nitya ā śaye dvitīyam ā saptaśivāsu mātṛṣu /
analyzed: pṛkṣaḥ vapuḥ pitumān nityaḥ ā śaye dvitīyam ā sapta śivāsu mātṛṣu

original: RV_1,141.02c tṛtīyam asya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatiṃ janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīyam asya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatim janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,141.03a nir yad īm budhnān mahiṣasya varpasa īśānāsaḥ śavasā kranta sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: niḥ yat īm budhnāt mahiṣasya varpasaḥ īśānāsaḥ śavasā kranta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_1,141.03c yad īm anu pradivo madhva ādhave guhā santam mātariśvā mathāyati //
analyzed: yat īm anu pradivaḥ madhvaḥ ādhave guhā santam mātariśvā mathāyati

original: RV_1,141.04a pra yat pituḥ paramān nīyate pary ā pṛkṣudho vīrudho daṃsu rohati /
analyzed: pra yat pituḥ paramāt nīyate pari ā pṛkṣudhaḥ vīrudhaḥ daṃsu rohati

original: RV_1,141.04c ubhā yad asya januṣaṃ yad invata ād id yaviṣṭho abhavad ghṛṇā śuciḥ //
analyzed: ubhā yat asya januṣam yat invataḥ āt id yaviṣṭhaḥ abhavat ghṛṇā śuciḥ

original: RV_1,141.05a ād in mātṝr āviśad yāsv ā śucir ahiṃsyamāna urviyā vi vāvṛdhe /
analyzed: āt id mātṝḥ āviśat yāsu ā śuciḥ a hiṃsyamānaḥ urviyā vi vāvṛdhe

original: RV_1,141.05c anu yat pūrvā aruhat sanājuvo ni navyasīṣv avarāsu dhāvate //
analyzed: anu yat pūrvāḥ aruhat sanājuvaḥ ni navyasīṣu avarāsu dhāvate

original: RV_1,141.06a ād id dhotāraṃ vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagam iva papṛcānāsa ṛñjate /
analyzed: āt id hotāram vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagam iva papṛcānāsaḥ ṛñjate

original: RV_1,141.06c devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭuto martaṃ śaṃsaṃ viśvadhā veti dhāyase //
analyzed: devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭutaḥ martam śaṃsam viśvadhā veti dhāyase

original: RV_1,141.07a vi yad asthād yajato vātacodito hvāro na vakvā jaraṇā anākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vi yat asthāt yajataḥ vāta coditaḥ hvāraḥ na vakvā jaraṇāḥ anākṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,141.07c tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇajaṃhasaḥ śucijanmano raja ā vyadhvanaḥ //
analyzed: tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇa jaṃhasaḥ śuci janmanaḥ rajaḥ ā vyadhvanaḥ

original: RV_1,141.08a ratho na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛto dyām aṅgebhir aruṣebhir īyate /
analyzed: rathaḥ na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛtaḥ dyām aṅgebhiḥ aruṣebhiḥ īyate

original: RV_1,141.08c ād asya te kṛṣṇāso dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasyeva tveṣathād īṣate vayaḥ //
analyzed: āt asya te kṛṣṇāsaḥ dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasya iva tveṣathāt īṣate vayaḥ

original: RV_1,141.09a tvayā hy agne varuṇo dhṛtavrato mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā hi agne varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ

original: RV_1,141.09c yat sīm anu kratunā viśvathā vibhur arān na nemiḥ paribhūr ajāyathāḥ //
analyzed: yat sīm anu kratunā viśvathā vibhuḥ arāt na nemiḥ paribhūḥ ajāyathāḥ

original: RV_1,141.10a tvam agne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnaṃ yaviṣṭha devatātim invasi /
analyzed: tvam agne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnam yaviṣṭha devatātim invasi

original: RV_1,141.10c taṃ tvā nu navyaṃ sahaso yuvan vayam bhagaṃ na kāre mahiratna dhīmahi //
analyzed: tam tvā nu navyam sahasaḥ yuvan vayam bhagam na kāre mahi ratna dhīmahi

original: RV_1,141.11a asme rayiṃ na svarthaṃ damūnasam bhagaṃ dakṣaṃ na papṛcāsi dharṇasim /
analyzed: asme rayim na su artham damūnasam bhagam dakṣam na papṛcāsi dharṇasim

original: RV_1,141.11c raśmīṃr iva yo yamati janmanī ubhe devānāṃ śaṃsam ṛta ā ca sukratuḥ //
analyzed: raśmīṃr iva yaḥ yamati janmanī ubhe devānām śaṃsam ṛte ā ca su kratuḥ

original: RV_1,141.12a uta naḥ sudyotmā jīrāśvo hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavac candrarathaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ sudyotmā jīra aśvaḥ hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavat candra rathaḥ

original: RV_1,141.12c sa no neṣan neṣatamair amūro 'gnir vāmaṃ suvitaṃ vasyo accha //
analyzed: sa naḥ neṣat neṣatamaiḥ amūraḥ gniḥ vāmam suvitam vasyaḥ accha

original: RV_1,141.13a astāvy agniḥ śimīvadbhir arkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataraṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: astāvi agniḥ śimīvadbhiḥ arkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataram dadhānaḥ

original: RV_1,141.13c amī ca ye maghavāno vayaṃ ca mihaṃ na sūro ati niṣ ṭatanyuḥ //
analyzed: amī ca ye maghavānaḥ vayam ca miham na sūraḥ ati niḥ tatanyuḥ

original: RV_1,142.01a samiddho agna ā vaha devāṃ adya yatasruce /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne ā vaha devān adya yata sruce

original: RV_1,142.01c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ sutasomāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam suta somāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,142.02a ghṛtavantam upa māsi madhumantaṃ tanūnapāt /
analyzed: ghṛtavantam upa māsi madhumantam tanūnapāt

original: RV_1,142.02c yajñaṃ viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ //
analyzed: yajñam viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ

original: RV_1,142.03a śuciḥ pāvako adbhuto madhvā yajñam mimikṣati /
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ adbhutaḥ madhvā yajñam mimikṣati

original: RV_1,142.03c narāśaṃsas trir ā divo devo deveṣu yajñiyaḥ //
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ tris ā divaḥ devaḥ deveṣu yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_1,142.04a īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam /
analyzed: īḍitaḥ agne ā vaha indram citram iha priyam

original: RV_1,142.04c iyaṃ hi tvā matir mamācchā sujihva vacyate //
analyzed: iyam hi tvā matiḥ mama acchā su jihva vacyate

original: RV_1,142.05a stṛṇānāso yatasruco barhir yajñe svadhvare /
analyzed: stṛṇānāsaḥ yata srucaḥ barhiḥ yajñe su adhvare

original: RV_1,142.05c vṛñje devavyacastamam indrāya śarma saprathaḥ //
analyzed: vṛñje deva vyacastamam indrāya śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_1,142.06a vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyo mahīḥ /
analyzed: vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_1,142.06c pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ //
analyzed: pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛhaḥ dvāraḥ devīḥ asaścataḥ

original: RV_1,142.07a ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā /
analyzed: ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā

original: RV_1,142.07c yahvī ṛtasya mātarā sīdatām barhir ā sumat //
analyzed: yahvī ṛtasya mātarā sīdatām barhiḥ ā sumat

original: RV_1,142.08a mandrajihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī /
analyzed: mandra jihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī

original: RV_1,142.08c yajñaṃ no yakṣatām imaṃ sidhram adya divispṛśam //
analyzed: yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam sidhram adya divispṛśam

original: RV_1,142.09a śucir deveṣv arpitā hotrā marutsu bhāratī /
analyzed: śuciḥ deveṣu arpitā hotrā marutsu bhāratī

original: RV_1,142.09c iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ //
analyzed: iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ

original: RV_1,142.10a tan nas turīpam adbhutam puru vāram puru tmanā /
analyzed: tat naḥ turīpam adbhutam puru vāram puru tmanā

original: RV_1,142.10c tvaṣṭā poṣāya vi ṣyatu rāye nābhā no asmayuḥ //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā poṣāya vi syatu rāye nābhā naḥ asmayuḥ

original: RV_1,142.11a avasṛjann upa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate /
analyzed: avasṛjan upa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate

original: RV_1,142.11c agnir havyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiraḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ havyā suṣūdati devaḥ deveṣu medhiraḥ

original: RV_1,142.12a pūṣaṇvate marutvate viśvadevāya vāyave /
analyzed: pūṣaṇvate marutvate viśvadevāya vāyave

original: RV_1,142.12c svāhā gāyatravepase havyam indrāya kartana //
analyzed: svāhā gāyatra vepase havyam indrāya kartana

original: RV_1,142.13a svāhākṛtāny ā gahy upa havyāni vītaye /
analyzed: svāhākṛtāni ā gahi upa havyāni vītaye

original: RV_1,142.13c indrā gahi śrudhī havaṃ tvāṃ havante adhvare //
analyzed: indra ā gahi śrudhi havam tvām havante adhvare

original: RV_1,143.01a pra tavyasīṃ navyasīṃ dhītim agnaye vāco matiṃ sahasaḥ sūnave bhare /
analyzed: pra tavyasīm navyasīm dhītim agnaye vācaḥ matim sahasaḥ sūnave bhare

original: RV_1,143.01c apāṃ napād yo vasubhiḥ saha priyo hotā pṛthivyāṃ ny asīdad ṛtviyaḥ //
analyzed: apām napāt yaḥ vasubhiḥ saha priyaḥ hotā pṛthivyām ni asīdat ṛtviyaḥ

original: RV_1,143.02a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomany āvir agnir abhavan mātariśvane /
analyzed: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani āvis agniḥ abhavat mātariśvane

original: RV_1,143.02c asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat //
analyzed: asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat

original: RV_1,143.03a asya tveṣā ajarā asya bhānavaḥ susaṃdṛśaḥ supratīkasya sudyutaḥ /
analyzed: asya tveṣāḥ ajarāḥ asya bhānavaḥ su saṃdṛśaḥ su pratīkasya su dyutaḥ

original: RV_1,143.03c bhātvakṣaso aty aktur na sindhavo 'gne rejante asasanto ajarāḥ //
analyzed: bhātu akṣasaḥ ati aktuḥ na sindhavaḥ gne rejante a sasantaḥ ajarāḥ

original: RV_1,143.04a yam erire bhṛgavo viśvavedasaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā bhuvanasya majmanā /
analyzed: yam erire bhṛgavaḥ viśva vedasam nābhā pṛthivyāḥ bhuvanasya majmanā

original: RV_1,143.04c agniṃ taṃ gīrbhir hinuhi sva ā dame ya eko vasvo varuṇo na rājati //
analyzed: agnim tam gīrbhiḥ hinuhi sve ā dame yaḥ ekaḥ vasvaḥ varuṇaḥ na rājati

original: RV_1,143.05a na yo varāya marutām iva svanaḥ seneva sṛṣṭā divyā yathāśaniḥ /
analyzed: na yaḥ varāya marutām iva svanaḥ senā iva sṛṣṭā divyā yathā aśaniḥ

original: RV_1,143.05c agnir jambhais tigitair atti bharvati yodho na śatrūn sa vanā ny ṛñjate //
analyzed: agniḥ jambhaiḥ tigitaiḥ atti bharvati yodhaḥ na śatrūn sa vanā ni ṛñjate

original: RV_1,143.06a kuvin no agnir ucathasya vīr asad vasuṣ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat /
analyzed: kuvid naḥ agniḥ ucathasya vīḥ asat vasuḥ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat

original: RV_1,143.06c codaḥ kuvit tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śucipratīkaṃ tam ayā dhiyā gṛṇe //
analyzed: codaḥ kuvid tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śuci pratīkam tam ayā dhiyā gṛṇe

original: RV_1,143.07a ghṛtapratīkaṃ va ṛtasya dhūrṣadam agnim mitraṃ na samidhāna ṛñjate /
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkam vaḥ ṛtasya dhūrṣadam agnim mitram na samidhānaḥ ṛñjate

original: RV_1,143.07c indhāno akro vidatheṣu dīdyac chukravarṇām ud u no yaṃsate dhiyam //
analyzed: indhānaḥ akraḥ vidatheṣu dīdyat śukra varṇām ud u naḥ yaṃsate dhiyam

original: RV_1,143.08a aprayucchann aprayucchadbhir agne śivebhir naḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ /
analyzed: aprayucchan aprayucchadbhiḥ agne śivebhiḥ naḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ

original: RV_1,143.08c adabdhebhir adṛpitebhir iṣṭe 'nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi no jāḥ //
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ a dṛpitebhiḥ iṣṭe nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi naḥ jāḥ

original: RV_1,144.01a eti pra hotā vratam asya māyayordhvāṃ dadhānaḥ śucipeśasaṃ dhiyam /
analyzed: eti pra hotā vratam asya māyayā ūrdhvām dadhānaḥ śuci peśasam dhiyam

original: RV_1,144.01c abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇāvṛto yā asya dhāma prathamaṃ ha niṃsate //
analyzed: abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇa āvṛtaḥ yāḥ asya dhāma prathamam ha niṃsate

original: RV_1,144.02a abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya dohanāḥ anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ

original: RV_1,144.02c apām upasthe vibhṛto yad āvasad adha svadhā adhayad yābhir īyate //
analyzed: apām upasthe vibhṛtaḥ yat āvasat adha svadhāḥ adhayat yābhiḥ īyate

original: RV_1,144.03a yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tad id vapuḥ samānam arthaṃ vitaritratā mithaḥ /
analyzed: yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tat id vapuḥ samānam artham vitaritratā mithas

original: RV_1,144.03c ād īm bhago na havyaḥ sam asmad ā voḷhur na raśmīn sam ayaṃsta sārathiḥ //
analyzed: āt īm bhagaḥ na havyaḥ sam asmat ā voḷhuḥ na raśmīn sam ayaṃsta sārathiḥ

original: RV_1,144.04a yam īṃ dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā /
analyzed: yam īm dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā

original: RV_1,144.04c divā na naktam palito yuvājani purū carann ajaro mānuṣā yugā //
analyzed: divā na naktam palitaḥ yuvā ajani purū caran ajaraḥ mānuṣā yugā

original: RV_1,144.05a tam īṃ hinvanti dhītayo daśa vriśo devam martāsa ūtaye havāmahe /
analyzed: tam īm hinvanti dhītayaḥ daśa vriśaḥ devam martāsaḥ ūtaye havāmahe

original: RV_1,144.05c dhanor adhi pravata ā sa ṛṇvaty abhivrajadbhir vayunā navādhita //
analyzed: dhanoḥ adhi pravataḥ ā saḥ ṛṇvati abhivrajadbhiḥ vayunā navā adhita

original: RV_1,144.06a tvaṃ hy agne divyasya rājasi tvam pārthivasya paśupā iva tmanā /
analyzed: tvam hi agne divyasya rājasi tvam pārthivasya paśu pāḥ iva tmanā

original: RV_1,144.06c enī ta ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhir āśāte //
analyzed: enī te ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhiḥ āśāte

original: RV_1,144.07a agne juṣasva prati harya tad vaco mandra svadhāva ṛtajāta sukrato /
analyzed: agne juṣasva prati harya tat vacaḥ mandra svadhāvas ṛta jāta su krato

original: RV_1,144.07c yo viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ asi darśato raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumāṃ iva kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ viśvatas pratyaṅ asi darśataḥ raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumān iva kṣayaḥ

original: RV_1,145.01a tam pṛcchatā sa jagāmā sa veda sa cikitvāṃ īyate sā nv īyate /
analyzed: tam pṛcchata sa jagāma sa veda sa cikitvān īyate sā nu īyate

original: RV_1,145.01c tasmin santi praśiṣas tasminn iṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: tasmin santi praśiṣaḥ tasmin iṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_1,145.02a tam it pṛcchanti na simo vi pṛcchati sveneva dhīro manasā yad agrabhīt /
analyzed: tam id pṛcchanti na simaḥ vi pṛcchati svena iva dhīraḥ manasā yat agrabhīt

original: RV_1,145.02c na mṛṣyate prathamaṃ nāparaṃ vaco 'sya kratvā sacate apradṛpitaḥ //
analyzed: na mṛṣyate prathamam na aparam vacaḥ sya kratvā sacate a pradṛpitaḥ

original: RV_1,145.03a tam id gacchanti juhvas tam arvatīr viśvāny ekaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me /
analyzed: tam id gacchanti juhvaḥ tam arvatīḥ viśvāni ekaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṃsi me

original: RV_1,145.03c purupraiṣas taturir yajñasādhano 'cchidrotiḥ śiśur ādatta saṃ rabhaḥ //
analyzed: puru praiṣaḥ taturiḥ yajña sādhano chidra ūtiḥ śiśuḥ ādatta sam rabhaḥ

original: RV_1,145.04a upasthāyaṃ carati yat samārata sadyo jātas tatsāra yujyebhiḥ /
analyzed: upasthāyam carati yat samārata sadyas jātaḥ tatsāra yujyebhiḥ

original: RV_1,145.04c abhi śvāntam mṛśate nāndye mude yad īṃ gacchanty uśatīr apiṣṭhitam //
analyzed: abhi śvāntam mṛśate nāndye mude yat īm gacchanti uśatīḥ apiṣṭhitam

original: RV_1,145.05a sa īm mṛgo apyo vanargur upa tvacy upamasyāṃ ni dhāyi /
analyzed: saḥ īm mṛgaḥ apyaḥ vanarguḥ upa tvaci upamasyām ni dhāyi

original: RV_1,145.05c vy abravīd vayunā martyebhyo 'gnir vidvāṃ ṛtacid dhi satyaḥ //
analyzed: vi abravīt vayunā martyebhyaḥ gniḥ vidvān ṛta cit hi satyaḥ

original: RV_1,146.01a trimūrdhānaṃ saptaraśmiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nūnam agnim pitror upasthe /
analyzed: tri mūrdhānam sapta raśmim gṛṇīṣe nūnam agnim pitroḥ upasthe

original: RV_1,146.01c niṣattam asya carato dhruvasya viśvā divo rocanāpaprivāṃsam //
analyzed: niṣattam asya carataḥ dhruvasya viśvā divaḥ rocanā āpaprivāṃsam

original: RV_1,146.02a ukṣā mahāṃ abhi vavakṣa ene ajaras tasthāv itaūtir ṛṣvaḥ /
analyzed: ukṣā mahān abhi vavakṣa ene ajaraḥ tasthau itaūtiḥ ṛṣvaḥ

original: RV_1,146.02c urvyāḥ pado ni dadhāti sānau rihanty ūdho aruṣāso asya //
analyzed: urvyāḥ padaḥ ni dadhāti sānau rihanti ūdhaḥ aruṣāsaḥ asya

original: RV_1,146.03a samānaṃ vatsam abhi saṃcarantī viṣvag dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke /
analyzed: samānam vatsam abhi saṃcarantī viṣvak dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke

original: RV_1,146.03c anapavṛjyāṃ adhvano mimāne viśvān ketāṃ adhi maho dadhāne //
analyzed: anapavṛjyām adhvanaḥ mimāne viśvān ketām adhi mahaḥ dadhāne

original: RV_1,146.04a dhīrāsaḥ padaṃ kavayo nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇā ajuryam /
analyzed: dhīrāsaḥ padam kavayaḥ nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇāḥ ajuryam

original: RV_1,146.04c siṣāsantaḥ pary apaśyanta sindhum āvir ebhyo abhavat sūryo nṝn //
analyzed: siṣāsantaḥ pari apaśyanta sindhum āvis ebhyaḥ abhavat sūryaḥ nṝn

original: RV_1,146.05a didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenya īḷenyo maho arbhāya jīvase /
analyzed: didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenyaḥ īḍenyaḥ mahaḥ arbhāya jīvase

original: RV_1,146.05c purutrā yad abhavat sūr ahaibhyo garbhebhyo maghavā viśvadarśataḥ //
analyzed: purutrā yat abhavat sūḥ aha ebhyaḥ garbhebhyaḥ maghavā viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_1,147.01a kathā te agne śucayanta āyor dadāśur vājebhir āśuṣāṇāḥ /
analyzed: kathā te agne śucayantaḥ āyoḥ dadāśuḥ vājebhiḥ āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_1,147.01c ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānā ṛtasya sāman raṇayanta devāḥ //
analyzed: ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānāḥ ṛtasya sāman raṇayanta devāḥ

original: RV_1,147.02a bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ /
analyzed: bodha me asya vacasaḥ yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvas

original: RV_1,147.02c pīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇāti vandārus te tanvaṃ vande agne //
analyzed: pīyati tvaḥ anu tvaḥ gṛṇāti vandāruḥ te tanvam vande agne

original: RV_1,147.03a ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan /
analyzed: ye pāyavaḥ māmateyam te agne paśyantaḥ andham duritāt arakṣan

original: RV_1,147.03c rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ //
analyzed: rarakṣa tān su kṛtaḥ viśva vedāḥ dipsantaḥ id ripavaḥ na aha debhuḥ

original: RV_1,147.04a yo no agne ararivāṃ aghāyur arātīvā marcayati dvayena /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agne a rarivān aghāyuḥ arātīvā marcayati dvayena

original: RV_1,147.04c mantro guruḥ punar astu so asmā anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvaṃ duruktaiḥ //
analyzed: mantraḥ guruḥ punar astu saḥ asmai anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvam duruktaiḥ

original: RV_1,147.05a uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān marto martam marcayati dvayena /
analyzed: uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān martaḥ martam marcayati dvayena

original: RV_1,147.05c ataḥ pāhi stavamāna stuvantam agne mākir no duritāya dhāyīḥ //
analyzed: atas pāhi stavamāna stuvantam agne mākir naḥ duritāya

original: RV_1,148.01a mathīd yad īṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam /
analyzed: mathīt yat īm viṣṭaḥ mātariśvā hotāram viśva apsum viśvadevyam

original: RV_1,148.01c ni yaṃ dadhur manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar ṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam //
analyzed: ni yam manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar na citram vapuṣe vibhāvam

original: RV_1,148.02a dadānam in na dadabhanta manmāgnir varūtham mama tasya cākan /
analyzed: dadānam id na dadabhanta manma agniḥ varūtham mama tasya cākan

original: RV_1,148.02c juṣanta viśvāny asya karmopastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ //
analyzed: juṣanta viśvāni asya karma upastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,148.03a nitye cin nu yaṃ sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhir dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: nitye cit nu yam sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhiḥ dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,148.03c pra sū nayanta gṛbhayanta iṣṭāv aśvāso na rathyo rārahāṇāḥ //
analyzed: pra su nayanta gṛbhayantaḥ iṣṭau aśvāsaḥ na rathyaḥ rārahāṇāḥ

original: RV_1,148.04a purūṇi dasmo ni riṇāti jambhair ād rocate vana ā vibhāvā /
analyzed: purūṇi dasmaḥ ni riṇāti jambhaiḥ āt rocate vane ā vibhāvā

original: RV_1,148.04c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir astur na śaryām asanām anu dyūn //
analyzed: āt asya vātaḥ anu vāti śociḥ astuḥ na śaryām asanām anu dyūn

original: RV_1,148.05a na yaṃ ripavo na riṣaṇyavo garbhe santaṃ reṣaṇā reṣayanti /
analyzed: na yam ripavaḥ na riṣaṇyavaḥ garbhe santam reṣaṇāḥ reṣayanti

original: RV_1,148.05c andhā apaśyā na dabhann abhikhyā nityāsa īm pretāro arakṣan //
analyzed: andhāḥ apaśyāḥ na dabhan abhikhyāḥ nityāsaḥ īm pretāraḥ arakṣan

original: RV_1,149.01a mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate patir dann ina inasya vasunaḥ pada ā /
analyzed: mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ eṣate patiḥ dan inaḥ inasya vasunaḥ pade ā

original: RV_1,149.01c upa dhrajantam adrayo vidhann it //
analyzed: upa dhrajantam adrayaḥ vidhan id

original: RV_1,149.02a sa yo vṛṣā narāṃ na rodasyoḥ śravobhir asti jīvapītasargaḥ /
analyzed: sa yaḥ vṛṣā narām na rodasyoḥ śravobhiḥ asti jīva pīta sargaḥ

original: RV_1,149.02c pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau //
analyzed: pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau

original: RV_1,149.03a ā yaḥ puraṃ nārmiṇīm adīded atyaḥ kavir nabhanyo nārvā /
analyzed: ā yaḥ puram nārmiṇīm adīdet atyaḥ kaviḥ nabhanyaḥ na arvā

original: RV_1,149.03c sūro na rurukvāñ chatātmā //
analyzed: sūraḥ na rurukvām śata ātmā

original: RV_1,149.04a abhi dvijanmā trī rocanāni viśvā rajāṃsi śuśucāno asthāt /
analyzed: abhi dvi janmā trī rocanāni viśvā rajāṃsi śuśucānaḥ asthāt

original: RV_1,149.04c hotā yajiṣṭho apāṃ sadhasthe //
analyzed: hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ apām sadhasthe

original: RV_1,149.05a ayaṃ sa hotā yo dvijanmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā /
analyzed: ayam sa hotā yaḥ dvi janmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā

original: RV_1,149.05c marto yo asmai sutuko dadāśa //
analyzed: martaḥ yaḥ asmai sutukaḥ dadāśa

original: RV_1,150.01a puru tvā dāśvān voce 'rir agne tava svid ā /
analyzed: puru tvā dāśvān voce riḥ agne tava svid ā

original: RV_1,150.01c todasyeva śaraṇa ā mahasya //
analyzed: todasya iva śaraṇe ā mahasya

original: RV_1,150.02a vy aninasya dhaninaḥ prahoṣe cid araruṣaḥ /
analyzed: vi aninasya dhaninaḥ prahoṣe cit a raruṣaḥ

original: RV_1,150.02c kadā cana prajigato adevayoḥ //
analyzed: kadā cana prajigataḥ a devayoḥ

original: RV_1,150.03a sa candro vipra martyo maho vrādhantamo divi /
analyzed: sa candraḥ vipra martyaḥ mahaḥ vrādhantamaḥ divi

original: RV_1,150.03c pra-pret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma //
analyzed: prapret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma

original: RV_1,151.01a mitraṃ na yaṃ śimyā goṣu gavyavaḥ svādhyo vidathe apsu jījanan /
analyzed: mitram na yam śimyāḥ goṣu gavyavaḥ su ādhyaḥ vidathe apsu jījanan

original: RV_1,151.01c arejetāṃ rodasī pājasā girā prati priyaṃ yajataṃ januṣām avaḥ //
analyzed: arejetām rodasī pājasā girā prati priyam yajatam januṣām avaḥ

original: RV_1,151.02a yad dha tyad vām purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāso na dadhire svābhuvaḥ /
analyzed: yat ha tyad vām purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāsaḥ na dadhire su ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,151.02c adha kratuṃ vidataṃ gātum arcata uta śrutaṃ vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ //
analyzed: adha kratum vidatam gātum arcataḥ uta śrutam vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ

original: RV_1,151.03a ā vām bhūṣan kṣitayo janma rodasyoḥ pravācyaṃ vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe /
analyzed: ā vām bhūṣan kṣitayaḥ janma rodasyoḥ pravācyam vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe

original: RV_1,151.03c yad īm ṛtāya bharatho yad arvate pra hotrayā śimyā vītho adhvaram //
analyzed: yat īm ṛtāya bharathaḥ yat arvate pra hotrayā śimyā vīthaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_1,151.04a pra sā kṣitir asura yā mahi priya ṛtāvānāv ṛtam ā ghoṣatho bṛhat /
analyzed: pra sā kṣitiḥ asura yā mahi priye ṛtāvānau ṛtam ā ghoṣathaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_1,151.04c yuvaṃ divo bṛhato dakṣam ābhuvaṃ gāṃ na dhury upa yuñjāthe apaḥ //
analyzed: yuvam divaḥ bṛhataḥ dakṣam ābhuvam gām na dhuri upa yuñjāthe apaḥ

original: RV_1,151.05a mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvatho 'reṇavas tuja ā sadman dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvathaḥ reṇavaḥ tujaḥ ā sadman dhenavaḥ

original: RV_1,151.05c svaranti tā uparatāti sūryam ā nimruca uṣasas takvavīr iva //
analyzed: svaranti tāḥ uparatāti sūryam ā nimrucaḥ uṣasaḥ takvavīḥ iva

original: RV_1,151.06a ā vām ṛtāya keśinīr anūṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātum arcathaḥ /
analyzed: ā vām ṛtāya keśinīḥ anūṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātum arcathaḥ

original: RV_1,151.06c ava tmanā sṛjatam pinvataṃ dhiyo yuvaṃ viprasya manmanām irajyathaḥ //
analyzed: ava tmanā sṛjatam pinvatam dhiyaḥ yuvam viprasya manmanām irajyathaḥ

original: RV_1,151.07a yo vāṃ yajñaiḥ śaśamāno ha dāśati kavir hotā yajati manmasādhanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñaiḥ śaśamānaḥ ha dāśati kaviḥ hotā yajati manma sādhanaḥ

original: RV_1,151.07c upāha taṃ gacchatho vītho adhvaram acchā giraḥ sumatiṃ gantam asmayū //
analyzed: upa aha tam gacchathaḥ vīthaḥ adhvaram acchā giraḥ sumatim gantam asmayū

original: RV_1,151.08a yuvāṃ yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhir añjata ṛtāvānā manaso na prayuktiṣu /
analyzed: yuvām yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhiḥ añjataḥ ṛtāvānā manasaḥ na prayuktiṣu

original: RV_1,151.08c bharanti vām manmanā saṃyatā giro 'dṛpyatā manasā revad āśāthe //
analyzed: bharanti vām manmanā saṃyatāḥ giraḥ dṛpyatā manasā revat āśāthe

original: RV_1,151.09a revad vayo dadhāthe revad āśāthe narā māyābhir itaūti māhinam /
analyzed: revat vayaḥ dadhāthe revat āśāthe narā māyābhiḥ itaūti māhinam

original: RV_1,151.09c na vāṃ dyāvo 'habhir nota sindhavo na devatvam paṇayo nānaśur magham //
analyzed: na vām dyāvaḥ habhiḥ na uta sindhavaḥ na deva tvam paṇayaḥ nā anaśuḥ magham

original: RV_1,152.01a yuvaṃ vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe yuvor acchidrā mantavo ha sargāḥ /
analyzed: yuvam vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe yuvoḥ acchidrāḥ mantavaḥ ha sargāḥ

original: RV_1,152.01c avātiratam anṛtāni viśva ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe //
analyzed: avātiratam anṛtāni viśve ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe

original: RV_1,152.02a etac cana tvo vi ciketad eṣāṃ satyo mantraḥ kaviśasta ṛghāvān /
analyzed: etat cana tvaḥ vi ciketat eṣām satyaḥ mantraḥ kavi śastaḥ ṛghāvān

original: RV_1,152.02c triraśriṃ hanti caturaśrir ugro devanido ha prathamā ajūryan //
analyzed: triraśrim hanti catur aśriḥ ugraḥ deva nidaḥ ha prathamāḥ ajūryan

original: RV_1,152.03a apād eti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kas tad vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa /
analyzed: a pād eti prathamā padvatīnām kaḥ tat vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa

original: RV_1,152.03c garbho bhāram bharaty ā cid asya ṛtam piparty anṛtaṃ ni tārīt //
analyzed: garbhaḥ bhāram bharati ā cit asya ṛtam piparti anṛtam ni tārīt

original: RV_1,152.04a prayantam it pari jāraṃ kanīnām paśyāmasi nopanipadyamānam /
analyzed: prayantam id pari jāram kanīnām paśyāmasi na upanipadyamānam

original: RV_1,152.04c anavapṛgṇā vitatā vasānam priyam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma //
analyzed: an avapṛgṇā vitatā vasānam priyam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma

original: RV_1,152.05a anaśvo jāto anabhīśur arvā kanikradat patayad ūrdhvasānuḥ /
analyzed: an aśvaḥ jātaḥ an abhīśuḥ arvā kanikradat patayat ūrdhva sānuḥ

original: RV_1,152.05c acittam brahma jujuṣur yuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇe gṛṇantaḥ //
analyzed: acittam brahma jujuṣuḥ yuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇe gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_1,152.06a ā dhenavo māmateyam avantīr brahmapriyam pīpayan sasminn ūdhan /
analyzed: ā dhenavaḥ māmateyam avantīḥ brahma priyam pīpayan sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_1,152.06c pitvo bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvān āsāvivāsann aditim uruṣyet //
analyzed: pitvaḥ bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvān āsā āvivāsan aditim uruṣyet

original: RV_1,152.07a ā vām mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ namasā devāv avasā vavṛtyām /
analyzed: ā vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ havya juṣṭim namasā devau avasā vavṛtyām

original: RV_1,152.07c asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu sahyā asmākaṃ vṛṣṭir divyā supārā //
analyzed: asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu sahyāḥ asmākam vṛṣṭiḥ divyā su pārā

original: RV_1,153.01a yajāmahe vām mahaḥ sajoṣā havyebhir mitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ /
analyzed: yajāmahe vām mahaḥ sajoṣāḥ havyebhiḥ mitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ

original: RV_1,153.01c ghṛtair ghṛtasnū adha yad vām asme adhvaryavo na dhītibhir bharanti //
analyzed: ghṛtaiḥ ghṛtasnū adha yat vām asme adhvaryavaḥ na dhītibhiḥ bharanti

original: RV_1,153.02a prastutir vāṃ dhāma na prayuktir ayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ /
analyzed: prastutiḥ vām dhāma na prayuktiḥ ayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ

original: RV_1,153.02c anakti yad vāṃ vidatheṣu hotā sumnaṃ vāṃ sūrir vṛṣaṇāv iyakṣan //
analyzed: anakti yat vām vidatheṣu hotā sumnam vām sūriḥ vṛṣaṇau iyakṣan

original: RV_1,153.03a pīpāya dhenur aditir ṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā havirde /
analyzed: pīpāya dhenuḥ aditiḥ ṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā haviḥ de

original: RV_1,153.03c hinoti yad vāṃ vidathe saparyan sa rātahavyo mānuṣo na hotā //
analyzed: hinoti yat vām vidathe saparyan sa rāta havyaḥ mānuṣaḥ na hotā

original: RV_1,153.04a uta vāṃ vikṣu madyāsv andho gāva āpaś ca pīpayanta devīḥ /
analyzed: uta vām vikṣu madyāsu andhaḥ gāvaḥ āpaḥ ca pīpayanta devīḥ

original: RV_1,153.04c uto no asya pūrvyaḥ patir dan vītam pātam payasa usriyāyāḥ //
analyzed: uta u naḥ asya pūrvyaḥ patiḥ vītam pātam payasaḥ usriyāyāḥ

original: RV_1,154.01a viṣṇor nu kaṃ vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ nu kam vīryāṇi pra vocam yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi

original: RV_1,154.01c yo askabhāyad uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇas tredhorugāyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ askabhāyat uttaram sadhastham vicakramāṇaḥ tredhā urugāyaḥ

original: RV_1,154.02a pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryeṇa mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: pra tat viṣṇuḥ stavate vīryeṇa mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_1,154.02c yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣv adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: yasya uruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣu adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,154.03a pra viṣṇave śūṣam etu manma girikṣita urugāyāya vṛṣṇe /
analyzed: pra viṣṇave śūṣam etu manma giri kṣite uru gāyāya vṛṣṇe

original: RV_1,154.03c ya idaṃ dīrgham prayataṃ sadhastham eko vimame tribhir it padebhiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ idam dīrgham prayatam sadhastham ekaḥ vimame tribhiḥ id padebhiḥ

original: RV_1,154.04a yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padāny akṣīyamāṇā svadhayā madanti /
analyzed: yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padāni a kṣīyamāṇā svadhayā madanti

original: RV_1,154.04c ya u tridhātu pṛthivīm uta dyām eko dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: yaḥ u tridhātu pṛthivīm uta dyām ekaḥ dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,154.05a tad asya priyam abhi pātho aśyāṃ naro yatra devayavo madanti /
analyzed: tat asya priyam abhi pāthaḥ aśyām naraḥ yatra devayavaḥ madanti

original: RV_1,154.05c urukramasya sa hi bandhur itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva utsaḥ //
analyzed: urukramasya sa hi bandhuḥ itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhvaḥ utsaḥ

original: RV_1,154.06a tā vāṃ vāstūny uśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūriśṛṅgā ayāsaḥ /
analyzed: tā vām vāstūni uśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvaḥ bhūri śṛṅgāḥ ayāsaḥ

original: RV_1,154.06c atrāha tad urugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramam padam ava bhāti bhūri //
analyzed: atra aha tat uru gāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramam padam ava bhāti bhūri

original: RV_1,155.01a pra vaḥ pāntam andhaso dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave cārcata /
analyzed: pra vaḥ pāntam andhasaḥ dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave ca arcata

original: RV_1,155.01c yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā mahas tasthatur arvateva sādhunā //
analyzed: yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā mahaḥ tasthatuḥ arvatā iva sādhunā

original: RV_1,155.02a tveṣam itthā samaraṇaṃ śimīvator indrāviṣṇū sutapā vām uruṣyati /
analyzed: tveṣam itthā samaraṇam śimīvatoḥ indrāviṣṇū suta pāḥ vām uruṣyati

original: RV_1,155.02c yā martyāya pratidhīyamānam it kṛśānor astur asanām uruṣyathaḥ //
analyzed: yā martyāya pratidhīyamānam id kṛśānoḥ astuḥ asanām uruṣyathaḥ

original: RV_1,155.03a tā īṃ vardhanti mahy asya pauṃsyaṃ ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje /
analyzed: tāḥ īm vardhanti mahi asya pauṃsyam ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje

original: RV_1,155.03c dadhāti putro 'varam param pitur nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ //
analyzed: dadhāti putraḥ varam param pituḥ nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ

original: RV_1,155.04a tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasīnasya trātur avṛkasya mīḷhuṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi inasya trātuḥ avṛkasya mīḷhuṣaḥ

original: RV_1,155.04c yaḥ pārthivāni tribhir id vigāmabhir uru kramiṣṭorugāyāya jīvase //
analyzed: yaḥ pārthivāni tribhiḥ id vigāmabhiḥ uru kramiṣṭa uru gāyāya jīvase

original: RV_1,155.05a dve id asya kramaṇe svardṛśo 'bhikhyāya martyo bhuraṇyati /
analyzed: dve id asya kramaṇe svar dṛśaḥ bhikhyāya martyaḥ bhuraṇyati

original: RV_1,155.05c tṛtīyam asya nakir ā dadharṣati vayaś cana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīyam asya nakir ā dadharṣati vayaḥ cana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ

original: RV_1,155.06a caturbhiḥ sākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiś cakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīṃr avīvipat /
analyzed: caturbhiḥ sākam navatim ca nāmabhiḥ cakram na vṛttam vyatīn avīvipat

original: RV_1,155.06c bṛhaccharīro vimimāna ṛkvabhir yuvākumāraḥ praty ety āhavam //
analyzed: bṛhat śarīraḥ vimimānaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ yuvā kumāraḥ prati eti āhavam

original: RV_1,156.01a bhavā mitro na śevyo ghṛtāsutir vibhūtadyumna evayā u saprathāḥ /
analyzed: bhavā mitraḥ na śevyaḥ ghṛta āsutiḥ vibhūta dyumnaḥ eva yāḥ u saprathāḥ

original: RV_1,156.01c adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cid ardhya stomo yajñaś ca rādhyo haviṣmatā //
analyzed: adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cit ardhyaḥ stomaḥ yajñaḥ ca rādhyaḥ haviṣmatā

original: RV_1,156.02a yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumajjānaye viṣṇave dadāśati /
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumat jānaye viṣṇave dadāśati

original: RV_1,156.02c yo jātam asya mahato mahi bravat sed u śravobhir yujyaṃ cid abhy asat //
analyzed: yaḥ jātam asya mahataḥ mahi bravat sa id u śravobhiḥ yujyam cit abhī asat

original: RV_1,156.03a tam u stotāraḥ pūrvyaṃ yathā vida ṛtasya garbhaṃ januṣā pipartana /
analyzed: tam u stotāraḥ pūrvyam yathā vidaḥ ṛtasya garbham januṣā pipartana

original: RV_1,156.03c āsya jānanto nāma cid vivaktana mahas te viṣṇo sumatim bhajāmahe //
analyzed: ā asya jānantaḥ nāma cit vivaktana mahaḥ te viṣṇo sumatim bhajāmahe

original: RV_1,156.04a tam asya rājā varuṇas tam aśvinā kratuṃ sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: tam asya rājā varuṇaḥ tam aśvinā kratum sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_1,156.04c dādhāra dakṣam uttamam aharvidaṃ vrajaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivāṃ aporṇute //
analyzed: dādhāra dakṣam uttamam ahar vidam vrajam ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivān aporṇute

original: RV_1,156.05a ā yo vivāya sacathāya daivya indrāya viṣṇuḥ sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ /
analyzed: ā yaḥ vivāya sacathāya daivyaḥ indrāya viṣṇuḥ su kṛte sukṛttaraḥ

original: RV_1,156.05c vedhā ajinvat triṣadhastha āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānam ābhajat //
analyzed: vedhāḥ ajinvat triṣadhasthaḥ āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānam ābhajat

original: RV_1,157.01a abodhy agnir jma ud eti sūryo vy uṣāś candrā mahy āvo arciṣā /
analyzed: abodhi agniḥ jmaḥ ud eti sūryaḥ vi uṣāḥ candrā mahi āvaḥ arciṣā

original: RV_1,157.01c āyukṣātām aśvinā yātave ratham prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak //
analyzed: āyukṣātām aśvinā yātave ratham prāsāvīt devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak

original: RV_1,157.02a yad yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇam aśvinā rathaṃ ghṛtena no madhunā kṣatram ukṣatam /
analyzed: yat yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇam aśvinā ratham ghṛtena naḥ madhunā kṣatram ukṣatam

original: RV_1,157.02c asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu jinvataṃ vayaṃ dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi //
analyzed: asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu jinvatam vayam dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi

original: RV_1,157.03a arvāṅ tricakro madhuvāhano ratho jīrāśvo aśvinor yātu suṣṭutaḥ /
analyzed: arvāṅ tri cakraḥ madhu vāhanaḥ rathaḥ jīra aśvaḥ aśvinoḥ yātu suṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_1,157.03c trivandhuro maghavā viśvasaubhagaḥ śaṃ na ā vakṣad dvipade catuṣpade //
analyzed: tri vandhuraḥ maghavā viśva saubhagaḥ śam naḥ ā vakṣat dvipade catuṣpade

original: RV_1,157.04a ā na ūrjaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvam madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam /
analyzed: ā naḥ ūrjam vahatam aśvinā yuvam madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam

original: RV_1,157.04c prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā //
analyzed: pra āyuḥ tāriṣṭam niḥ rapāṃsi mṛkṣatam sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā

original: RV_1,157.05a yuvaṃ ha garbhaṃ jagatīṣu dhattho yuvaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam ha garbham jagatīṣu dhatthaḥ yuvam viśveṣu bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_1,157.05c yuvam agniṃ ca vṛṣaṇāv apaś ca vanaspatīṃr aśvināv airayethām //
analyzed: yuvam agnim ca vṛṣaṇau apaḥ ca vanaspatīṃr aśvinau airayethām

original: RV_1,157.06a yuvaṃ ha stho bhiṣajā bheṣajebhir atho ha stho rathyā rāthyebhiḥ /
analyzed: yuvam ha sthaḥ bhiṣajā bheṣajebhiḥ atha u ha sthaḥ rathyā rāthyebhiḥ

original: RV_1,157.06c atho ha kṣatram adhi dhattha ugrā yo vāṃ haviṣmān manasā dadāśa //
analyzed: atha u ha kṣatram adhi dhatthaḥ ugrā yaḥ vām haviṣmān manasā dadāśa

original: RV_1,158.01a vasū rudrā purumantū vṛdhantā daśasyataṃ no vṛṣaṇāv abhiṣṭau /
analyzed: vasū rudrā puru mantū vṛdhantā daśasyatam naḥ vṛṣaṇau abhiṣṭau

original: RV_1,158.01c dasrā ha yad rekṇa aucathyo vām pra yat sasrāthe akavābhir ūtī //
analyzed: dasrā ha yat rekṇaḥ aucathyaḥ vām pra yat sasrāthe akavābhiḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,158.02a ko vāṃ dāśat sumataye cid asyai vasū yad dhethe namasā pade goḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ vām dāśat sumataye cit asyai vasū yat dhethe namasā pade goḥ

original: RV_1,158.02c jigṛtam asme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇeva manasā carantā //
analyzed: jigṛtam asme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇa iva manasā carantā

original: RV_1,158.03a yukto ha yad vāṃ taugryāya perur vi madhye arṇaso dhāyi pajraḥ /
analyzed: yuktaḥ ha yat vām taugryāya peruḥ vi madhye arṇasaḥ dhāyi pajraḥ

original: RV_1,158.03c upa vām avaḥ śaraṇaṃ gameyaṃ śūro nājma patayadbhir evaiḥ //
analyzed: upa vām avaḥ śaraṇam gameyam śūraḥ na ajma patayadbhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_1,158.04a upastutir aucathyam uruṣyen mā mām ime patatriṇī vi dugdhām /
analyzed: upastutiḥ aucathyam uruṣyet mā mām ime patatriṇī vi dugdhām

original: RV_1,158.04c mā mām edho daśatayaś cito dhāk pra yad vām baddhas tmani khādati kṣām //
analyzed: mā mām edhaḥ daśatayaḥ citaḥ dhāk pra yat vām baddhaḥ tmani khādati kṣām

original: RV_1,158.05a na mā garan nadyo mātṛtamā dāsā yad īṃ susamubdham avādhuḥ /
analyzed: na mā garan nadyaḥ mātṛtamāḥ dāsāḥ yat īm su samubdham avādhuḥ

original: RV_1,158.05c śiro yad asya traitano vitakṣat svayaṃ dāsa uro aṃsāv api gdha //
analyzed: śiraḥ yat asya traitanaḥ vitakṣat svayam dāsaḥ uraḥ aṃsau api

original: RV_1,158.06a dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuge /
analyzed: dīrghatamāḥ māmateyaḥ jujurvān daśame yuge

original: RV_1,158.06c apām arthaṃ yatīnām brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ //
analyzed: apām artham yatīnām brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ

original: RV_1,159.01a pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā /
analyzed: pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā

original: RV_1,159.01c devebhir ye devaputre sudaṃsasetthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ //
analyzed: devebhiḥ ye deva putre su daṃsasā itthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ

original: RV_1,159.02a uta manye pitur adruho mano mātur mahi svatavas tad dhavīmabhiḥ /
analyzed: uta manye pituḥ adruhaḥ manaḥ mātuḥ mahi sva tavaḥ tat havīmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,159.02c suretasā pitarā bhūma cakratur uru prajāyā amṛtaṃ varīmabhiḥ //
analyzed: su retasā pitarā bhūma cakratuḥ uru prajāyai amṛtam varīmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,159.03a te sūnavaḥ svapasaḥ sudaṃsaso mahī jajñur mātarā pūrvacittaye /
analyzed: te sūnavaḥ su apasaḥ su daṃsasaḥ mahī jajñuḥ mātarā pūrvacittaye

original: RV_1,159.03c sthātuś ca satyaṃ jagataś ca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padam advayāvinaḥ //
analyzed: sthātuḥ ca satyam jagataḥ ca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padam a dvayāvinaḥ

original: RV_1,159.04a te māyino mamire supracetaso jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā /
analyzed: te māyinaḥ mamire su pracetasaḥ jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā

original: RV_1,159.04c navyaṃ-navyaṃ tantum ā tanvate divi samudre antaḥ kavayaḥ sudītayaḥ //
analyzed: navyam navyam tantum ā tanvate divi samudre antar kavayaḥ su dītayaḥ

original: RV_1,159.05a tad rādho adya savitur vareṇyaṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave manāmahe /
analyzed: tat rādhaḥ adya savituḥ vareṇyam vayam devasya prasave manāmahe

original: RV_1,159.05c asmabhyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantaṃ śatagvinam //
analyzed: asmabhyam dyāvāpṛthivī su cetunā rayim dhattam vasumantam śatagvinam

original: RV_1,160.01a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuva ṛtāvarī rajaso dhārayatkavī /
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśva śambhuvaḥ ṛtāvarī rajasaḥ dhārayat kavī

original: RV_1,160.01c sujanmanī dhiṣaṇe antar īyate devo devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: su janmanī dhiṣaṇe antar īyate devaḥ devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ

original: RV_1,160.02a uruvyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ /
analyzed: uru vyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ

original: RV_1,160.02c sudhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīm abhi rūpair avāsayat //
analyzed: su dhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīm abhi rūpaiḥ avāsayat

original: RV_1,160.03a sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīro bhuvanāni māyayā /
analyzed: sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīraḥ bhuvanāni māyayā

original: RV_1,160.03c dhenuṃ ca pṛśniṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suretasaṃ viśvāhā śukram payo asya dukṣata //
analyzed: dhenum ca pṛśnim vṛṣabham su retasam viśvāhā śukram payaḥ asya dukṣata

original: RV_1,160.04a ayaṃ devānām apasām apastamo yo jajāna rodasī viśvaśambhuvā /
analyzed: ayam devānām apasām apastamaḥ yaḥ jajāna rodasī viśva śambhuvā

original: RV_1,160.04c vi yo mame rajasī sukratūyayājarebhi skambhanebhiḥ sam ānṛce //
analyzed: vi yaḥ mame rajasī sukratūyayā ajarebhiḥ skambhanebhiḥ sam ānṛce

original: RV_1,160.05a te no gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatraṃ dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsatho bṛhat /
analyzed: te naḥ gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatram dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsathaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_1,160.05c yenābhi kṛṣṭīs tatanāma viśvahā panāyyam ojo asme sam invatam //
analyzed: yena abhi kṛṣṭīḥ tatanāma viśvahā panāyyam ojaḥ asme sam invatam

original: RV_1,161.01a kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagan kim īyate dūtyaṃ kad yad ūcima /
analyzed: kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kim yaviṣṭhaḥ naḥ ājagan kim īyate dūtyam kad yat ūcima

original: RV_1,161.01c na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākulo 'gne bhrātar druṇa id bhūtim ūdima //
analyzed: na nindima camasam yaḥ mahā kulaḥ gne bhrātar druṇe id bhūtim ūdima

original: RV_1,161.02a ekaṃ camasaṃ caturaḥ kṛṇotana tad vo devā abruvan tad va āgamam /
analyzed: ekam camasam caturaḥ kṛṇotana tat vaḥ devāḥ abruvan tat vaḥ āgamam

original: RV_1,161.02c saudhanvanā yady evā kariṣyatha sākaṃ devair yajñiyāso bhaviṣyatha //
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ yadi evā kariṣyatha sākam devaiḥ yajñiyāsaḥ bhaviṣyatha

original: RV_1,161.03a agniṃ dūtam prati yad abravītanāśvaḥ kartvo ratha uteha kartvaḥ /
analyzed: agnim dūtam prati yat abravītana aśvaḥ kartvaḥ rathaḥ uta iha kartvaḥ

original: RV_1,161.03c dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātar anu vaḥ kṛtvy emasi //
analyzed: dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātar anu vaḥ kṛtvī emasi

original: RV_1,161.04a cakṛvāṃsa ṛbhavas tad apṛcchata kved abhūd yaḥ sya dūto na ājagan /
analyzed: cakṛvāṃsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat apṛcchata kva id abhūt yaḥ sya dūtaḥ naḥ ājagan

original: RV_1,161.04c yadāvākhyac camasāñ caturaḥ kṛtān ād it tvaṣṭā gnāsv antar ny ānaje //
analyzed: yadā avākhyat camasān caturaḥ kṛtān āt id tvaṣṭā gnāsu antar ni ānaje

original: RV_1,161.05a hanāmaināṃ iti tvaṣṭā yad abravīc camasaṃ ye devapānam anindiṣuḥ /
analyzed: hanāma enām iti tvaṣṭā yat abravīt camasam ye deva pānam anindiṣuḥ

original: RV_1,161.05c anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacāṃ anyair enān kanyā nāmabhi sparat //
analyzed: anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacā am anyaiḥ enān kanyā nāmabhiḥ sparat

original: RV_1,161.06a indro harī yuyuje aśvinā ratham bṛhaspatir viśvarūpām upājata /
analyzed: indraḥ harī yuyuje aśvinā ratham bṛhaspatiḥ viśvarūpām upājata

original: RV_1,161.06c ṛbhur vibhvā vājo devāṃ agacchata svapaso yajñiyam bhāgam aitana //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vibhvā vājaḥ devān agacchata su apasaḥ yajñiyam bhāgam aitana

original: RV_1,161.07a niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta dhītibhir yā jarantā yuvaśā tākṛṇotana /
analyzed: niḥ carmaṇaḥ gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ yā jarantā yuvaśā tā akṛṇotana

original: RV_1,161.07c saudhanvanā aśvād aśvam atakṣata yuktvā ratham upa devāṃ ayātana //
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ aśvāt aśvam atakṣata yuktvā ratham upa devān ayātana

original: RV_1,161.08a idam udakam pibatety abravītanedaṃ vā ghā pibatā muñjanejanam /
analyzed: idam udakam pibata iti abravītana idam vā gha pibata muñja nejanam

original: RV_1,161.08c saudhanvanā yadi tan neva haryatha tṛtīye ghā savane mādayādhvai //
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ yadi tat na iva haryatha tṛtīye ghā savane mādayādhvai

original: RV_1,161.09a āpo bhūyiṣṭhā ity eko abravīd agnir bhūyiṣṭha ity anyo abravīt /
analyzed: āpaḥ bhūyiṣṭhāḥ iti ekaḥ abravīt agniḥ bhūyiṣṭhaḥ iti anyaḥ abravīt

original: RV_1,161.09c vadharyantīm bahubhyaḥ praiko abravīd ṛtā vadantaś camasāṃ apiṃśata //
analyzed: vadharyantīm bahubhyaḥ pra ekaḥ abravīt ṛtā vadantaḥ camasān apiṃśata

original: RV_1,161.10a śroṇām eka udakaṃ gām avājati māṃsam ekaḥ piṃśati sūnayābhṛtam /
analyzed: śroṇām ekaḥ udakam gām avājati māṃsam ekaḥ piṃśati sūnayā ābhṛtam

original: RV_1,161.10c ā nimrucaḥ śakṛd eko apābharat kiṃ svit putrebhyaḥ pitarā upāvatuḥ //
analyzed: ā nimrucaḥ śakṛt ekaḥ apābharat kim svid putrebhyaḥ pitarau upāvatuḥ

original: RV_1,161.11a udvatsv asmā akṛṇotanā tṛṇaṃ nivatsv apaḥ svapasyayā naraḥ /
analyzed: udvatsu asmai akṛṇotana tṛṇam nivatsu apaḥ su apasyayā naraḥ

original: RV_1,161.11c agohyasya yad asastanā gṛhe tad adyedam ṛbhavo nānu gacchatha //
analyzed: agohyasya yat asastanā gṛhe tat adyā idam ṛbhavaḥ na anu gacchatha

original: RV_1,161.12a sammīlya yad bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svit tātyā pitarā va āsatuḥ /
analyzed: sammīlya yat bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svid tātyā pitarā vaḥ āsatuḥ

original: RV_1,161.12c aśapata yaḥ karasnaṃ va ādade yaḥ prābravīt pro tasmā abravītana //
