original: RV_1,185.03c tad rodasī janayataṃ jaritre dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: tat rodasī janayatam jaritre dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.04a atapyamāne avasāvantī anu ṣyāma rodasī devaputre /
analyzed: a tapyamāne avasā avantī anu syāma rodasī deva putre

original: RV_1,185.04c ubhe devānām ubhayebhir ahnāṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: ubhe devānām ubhayebhiḥ ahnām dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.05a saṃgacchamāne yuvatī samante svasārā jāmī pitror upasthe /
analyzed: saṃgacchamāne yuvatī samante svasārā jāmī pitroḥ upasthe

original: RV_1,185.05c abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhiṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhim dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.06a urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena huve devānām avasā janitrī /
analyzed: urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena huve devānām avasā janitrī

original: RV_1,185.06c dadhāte ye amṛtaṃ supratīke dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: dadhāte ye amṛtam su pratīke dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.07a urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin /
analyzed: urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin

original: RV_1,185.07c dadhāte ye subhage supratūrtī dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: dadhāte ye subhage su pratūrtī dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.08a devān vā yac cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ sakhāyaṃ vā sadam ij jāspatiṃ vā /
analyzed: devān vā yat cakṛma kad cit āgaḥ sakhāyam vā sadam id jāspatim vā

original: RV_1,185.08c iyaṃ dhīr bhūyā avayānam eṣāṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: iyam dhīḥ bhūyāḥ avayānam eṣām dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.09a ubhā śaṃsā naryā mām aviṣṭām ubhe mām ūtī avasā sacetām /
analyzed: ubhā śaṃsā naryā mām aviṣṭām ubhe mām ūtī avasā sacetām

original: RV_1,185.09c bhūri cid aryaḥ sudāstarāyeṣā madanta iṣayema devāḥ //
analyzed: bhūri cit aryaḥ sudāstarāya iṣā madantaḥ iṣayema devāḥ

original: RV_1,185.10a ṛtaṃ dive tad avocam pṛthivyā abhiśrāvāya prathamaṃ sumedhāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam dive tat avocam pṛthivyai abhiśrāvāya prathamam sumedhāḥ

original: RV_1,185.10c pātām avadyād duritād abhīke pitā mātā ca rakṣatām avobhiḥ //
analyzed: pātām avadyāt duritāt abhīke pitā mātā ca rakṣatām avobhiḥ

original: RV_1,185.11a idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī satyam astu pitar mātar yad ihopabruve vām /
analyzed: idam dyāvāpṛthivī satyam astu pitar mātar yat iha upabruve vām

original: RV_1,185.11c bhūtaṃ devānām avame avobhir vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: bhūtam devānām avame avobhiḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,186.01a ā na iḷābhir vidathe suśasti viśvānaraḥ savitā deva etu /
analyzed: ā naḥ iḷābhiḥ vidathe su śasti viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ etu

original: RV_1,186.01c api yathā yuvāno matsathā no viśvaṃ jagad abhipitve manīṣā //
analyzed: api yathā yuvānaḥ matsatha naḥ viśvam jagat abhipitve manīṣā

original: RV_1,186.02a ā no viśva āskrā gamantu devā mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśve āskrāḥ gamantu devāḥ mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_1,186.02c bhuvan yathā no viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karan suṣāhā vithuraṃ na śavaḥ //
analyzed: bhuvan yathā naḥ viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karan vithuram na śavaḥ

original: RV_1,186.03a preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'gniṃ śastibhis turvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: preṣṭham vaḥ atithim gṛṇīṣe gnim śastibhiḥ turvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_1,186.03c asad yathā no varuṇaḥ sukīrtir iṣaś ca parṣad arigūrtaḥ sūriḥ //
analyzed: asat yathā naḥ varuṇaḥ su kīrtiḥ iṣaḥ ca parṣat ari gūrtaḥ sūriḥ

original: RV_1,186.04a upa va eṣe namasā jigīṣoṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ /
analyzed: upa vaḥ eṣe namasā jigīṣā uṣāsānaktā su dughā iva dhenuḥ

original: RV_1,186.04c samāne ahan vimimāno arkaṃ viṣurūpe payasi sasminn ūdhan //
analyzed: samāne ahan vimimānaḥ arkam viṣurūpe payasi sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_1,186.05a uta no 'hir budhnyo mayas kaḥ śiśuṃ na pipyuṣīva veti sindhuḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ mayaḥ kaḥ śiśum na pipyuṣī iva veti sindhuḥ

original: RV_1,186.05c yena napātam apāṃ junāma manojuvo vṛṣaṇo yaṃ vahanti //
analyzed: yena napātam apām junāma manaḥ juvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yam vahanti

original: RV_1,186.06a uta na īṃ tvaṣṭā gantv acchā smat sūribhir abhipitve sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ īm tvaṣṭā gantu acchā smat sūribhiḥ abhipitve sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_1,186.06c ā vṛtrahendraś carṣaṇiprās tuviṣṭamo narāṃ na iha gamyāḥ //
analyzed: ā vṛtrahā indraḥ carṣaṇi prāḥ tuviṣṭamaḥ narām naḥ iha gamyāḥ

original: RV_1,186.07a uta na īm matayo 'śvayogāḥ śiśuṃ na gāvas taruṇaṃ rihanti /
analyzed: uta naḥ īm matayaḥ śvayogāḥ śiśum na gāvaḥ taruṇam rihanti

original: RV_1,186.07c tam īṃ giro janayo na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamaṃ narāṃ nasanta //
analyzed: tam īm giraḥ janayaḥ na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamam narām nasanta

original: RV_1,186.08a uta na īm maruto vṛddhasenāḥ smad rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu /
analyzed: uta naḥ īm marutaḥ vṛddha senāḥ smat rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu

original: RV_1,186.08c pṛṣadaśvāso 'vanayo na rathā riśādaso mitrayujo na devāḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣat aśvāsaḥ vanayaḥ na rathāḥ riśādasaḥ mitra yujaḥ na devāḥ

original: RV_1,186.09a pra nu yad eṣām mahinā cikitre pra yuñjate prayujas te suvṛkti /
analyzed: pra nu yat eṣām mahinā cikitre pra yuñjate prayujaḥ te suvṛkti

original: RV_1,186.09c adha yad eṣāṃ sudine na śarur viśvam eriṇam pruṣāyanta senāḥ //
analyzed: adha yat eṣām sudine na śaruḥ viśvam ā iriṇam pruṣāyanta senāḥ

original: RV_1,186.10a pro aśvināv avase kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇaṃ svatavaso hi santi /
analyzed: pra u aśvinau avase kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇam sva tavasaḥ hi santi

original: RV_1,186.10c adveṣo viṣṇur vāta ṛbhukṣā acchā sumnāya vavṛtīya devān //
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ viṣṇuḥ vātaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ acchā sumnāya vavṛtīya devān

original: RV_1,186.11a iyaṃ sā vo asme dīdhitir yajatrā apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyāḥ /
analyzed: iyam sā vaḥ asme dīdhitiḥ yajatrā apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyāḥ

original: RV_1,186.11c ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyur vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyuḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,187.01a pituṃ nu stoṣam maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm /
analyzed: pitum nu stoṣam mahaḥ dharmāṇam taviṣīm

original: RV_1,187.01c yasya trito vy ojasā vṛtraṃ viparvam ardayat //
analyzed: yasya tritaḥ vi ojasā vṛtram viparvam ardayat

original: RV_1,187.02a svādo pito madho pito vayaṃ tvā vavṛmahe /
analyzed: svādo pitaḥ madho pitaḥ vayam tvā vavṛmahe

original: RV_1,187.02c asmākam avitā bhava //
analyzed: asmākam avitā bhava

original: RV_1,187.03a upa naḥ pitav ā cara śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: upa naḥ pito ā cara śivaḥ śivābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,187.03c mayobhur adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā suśevo advayāḥ //
analyzed: mayobhuḥ adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā su śevaḥ advayāḥ

original: RV_1,187.04a tava tye pito rasā rajāṃsy anu viṣṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: tava tye pito rasāḥ rajāṃsi anu viṣṭhitāḥ

original: RV_1,187.04c divi vātā iva śritāḥ //
analyzed: divi vātāḥ iva śritāḥ

original: RV_1,187.05a tava tye pito dadatas tava svādiṣṭha te pito /
analyzed: tava tye pito dadataḥ tava svādiṣṭha te pito

original: RV_1,187.05c pra svādmāno rasānāṃ tuvigrīvā iverate //
analyzed: pra svādmānaḥ rasānām tuvi grīvāḥ iva īrate

original: RV_1,187.06a tve pito mahānāṃ devānām mano hitam /
analyzed: tve pito mahānām devānām manaḥ hitam

original: RV_1,187.06c akāri cāru ketunā tavāhim avasāvadhīt //
analyzed: akāri cāru ketunā tava ahim avasā avadhīt

original: RV_1,187.07a yad ado pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām /
analyzed: yat adaḥ pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām

original: RV_1,187.07c atrā cin no madho pito 'ram bhakṣāya gamyāḥ //
analyzed: atrā cit naḥ madho pito ram bhakṣāya gamyāḥ

original: RV_1,187.08a yad apām oṣadhīnām pariṃśam āriśāmahe /
analyzed: yat apām oṣadhīnām pariṃśam āriśāmahe

original: RV_1,187.08c vātāpe pīva id bhava //
analyzed: vāta āpe pīvaḥ id bhava

original: RV_1,187.09a yat te soma gavāśiro yavāśiro bhajāmahe /
analyzed: yat te soma gavāśiraḥ yava āśiraḥ bhajāmahe

original: RV_1,187.09c vātāpe pīva id bhava //
analyzed: vāta āpe pīvaḥ id bhava

original: RV_1,187.10a karambha oṣadhe bhava pīvo vṛkka udārathiḥ /
analyzed: karambhaḥ oṣadhe bhava pīvaḥ vṛkkaḥ udārathiḥ

original: RV_1,187.10c vātāpe pīva id bhava //
analyzed: vāta āpe pīvaḥ id bhava

original: RV_1,187.11a taṃ tvā vayam pito vacobhir gāvo na havyā suṣūdima /
analyzed: tam tvā vayam pito vacobhiḥ gāvaḥ na havyā suṣūdima

original: RV_1,187.11c devebhyas tvā sadhamādam asmabhyaṃ tvā sadhamādam //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tvā sadhamādam asmabhyam tvā sadhamādam

original: RV_1,188.01a samiddho adya rājasi devo devaiḥ sahasrajit /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya rājasi devaḥ devaiḥ sahasra jit

original: RV_1,188.01c dūto havyā kavir vaha //
analyzed: dūtaḥ havyā kaviḥ vaha

original: RV_1,188.02a tanūnapād ṛtaṃ yate madhvā yajñaḥ sam ajyate /
analyzed: tanūnapāt ṛtam yate madhvā yajñaḥ sam ajyate

original: RV_1,188.02c dadhat sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: dadhat sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_1,188.03a ājuhvāno na īḍyo devāṃ ā vakṣi yajñiyān /
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ naḥ īḍyaḥ devān ā vakṣi yajñiyān

original: RV_1,188.03c agne sahasrasā asi //
analyzed: agne sahasra sāḥ asi

original: RV_1,188.04a prācīnam barhir ojasā sahasravīram astṛṇan /
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ ojasā sahasra vīram astṛṇan

original: RV_1,188.04c yatrādityā virājatha //
analyzed: yatra ādityāḥ virājatha

original: RV_1,188.05a virāṭ samrāḍ vibhvīḥ prabhvīr bahvīś ca bhūyasīś ca yāḥ /
analyzed: virāj samrāj vibhvīḥ prabhvīḥ bahvīḥ ca bhūyasīḥ ca yāḥ

original: RV_1,188.05c duro ghṛtāny akṣaran //
analyzed: duraḥ ghṛtāni akṣaran

original: RV_1,188.06a surukme hi supeśasādhi śriyā virājataḥ /
analyzed: su rukme hi supeśasā adhi śriyā virājataḥ

original: RV_1,188.06c uṣāsāv eha sīdatām //
analyzed: uṣāḥ asau ā iha sīdatām

original: RV_1,188.07a prathamā hi suvācasā hotārā daivyā kavī /
analyzed: prathamā hi suvācasā hotārā daivyā kavī

original: RV_1,188.07c yajñaṃ no yakṣatām imam //
analyzed: yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam

original: RV_1,188.08a bhāratīḷe sarasvati yā vaḥ sarvā upabruve /
analyzed: bhārati iḍe sarasvati yāḥ vaḥ sarvāḥ upabruve

original: RV_1,188.08c tā naś codayata śriye //
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ codayata śriye

original: RV_1,188.09a tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ paśūn viśvān samānaje /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ paśūn viśvān samānaje

original: RV_1,188.09c teṣāṃ na sphātim ā yaja //
analyzed: teṣām na sphātim ā yaja

original: RV_1,188.10a upa tmanyā vanaspate pātho devebhyaḥ sṛja /
analyzed: upa tmanyā vanaspate pāthaḥ devebhyaḥ sṛja

original: RV_1,188.10c agnir havyāni siṣvadat //
analyzed: agniḥ havyāni siṣvadat

original: RV_1,188.11a purogā agnir devānāṃ gāyatreṇa sam ajyate /
analyzed: purogāḥ agniḥ devānām gāyatreṇa sam ajyate

original: RV_1,188.11c svāhākṛtīṣu rocate //
analyzed: svāhākṛtīṣu rocate

original: RV_1,189.01a agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
analyzed: agne naya su pathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān

original: RV_1,189.01c yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema //
analyzed: yuyodhi asmat juhurāṇam enaḥ bhūyiṣṭhām te namauktim vidhema

original: RV_1,189.02a agne tvam pārayā navyo asmān svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā /
analyzed: agne tvam pāraya navyaḥ asmān svastibhiḥ ati durgāṇi viśvā

original: RV_1,189.02c pūś ca pṛthvī bahulā na urvī bhavā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: pūḥ ca pṛthvī bahulā naḥ urvī bhava tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_1,189.03a agne tvam asmad yuyodhy amīvā anagnitrā abhy amanta kṛṣṭīḥ /
analyzed: agne tvam asmat yuyodhi amīvāḥ anagnitrāḥ abhī amanta kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_1,189.03c punar asmabhyaṃ suvitāya deva kṣāṃ viśvebhir amṛtebhir yajatra //
analyzed: punar asmabhyam suvitāya deva kṣām viśvebhiḥ amṛtebhiḥ yajatra

original: RV_1,189.04a pāhi no agne pāyubhir ajasrair uta priye sadana ā śuśukvān /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne pāyubhiḥ ajasraiḥ uta priye sadane ā śuśukvān

original: RV_1,189.04c mā te bhayaṃ jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha nūnaṃ vidan māparaṃ sahasvaḥ //
analyzed: mā te bhayam jaritāram yaviṣṭha nūnam vidat mā aparam sahasvas

original: RV_1,189.05a mā no agne 'va sṛjo aghāyāviṣyave ripave ducchunāyai /
analyzed: mā naḥ agne vaḥ sṛjaḥ aghāya aviṣyave ripave ducchunāyai

original: RV_1,189.05c mā datvate daśate mādate no mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ //
analyzed: mā datvate daśate mā adate na u mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ

original: RV_1,189.06a vi gha tvāvāṃ ṛtajāta yaṃsad gṛṇāno agne tanve varūtham /
analyzed: vi gha tvāvān ṛta jāta yaṃsat gṛṇānaḥ agne tanve varūtham

original: RV_1,189.06c viśvād ririkṣor uta vā ninitsor abhihrutām asi hi deva viṣpaṭ //
analyzed: viśvāt ririkṣoḥ uta vā ninitsoḥ abhihru tām asi hi deva viṣpaṭ

original: RV_1,189.07a tvaṃ tāṃ agna ubhayān vi vidvān veṣi prapitve manuṣo yajatra /
analyzed: tvam tām agne ubhayān vi vidvān veṣi prapitve manuṣaḥ yajatra

original: RV_1,189.07c abhipitve manave śāsyo bhūr marmṛjenya uśigbhir nākraḥ //
analyzed: abhipitve manave śāsyaḥ bhūḥ marmṛjenyaḥ uśigbhiḥ na akraḥ

original: RV_1,189.08a avocāma nivacanāny asmin mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau /
analyzed: avocāma nivacanāni asmin mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau

original: RV_1,189.08c vayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: vayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,190.01a anarvāṇaṃ vṛṣabham mandrajihvam bṛhaspatiṃ vardhayā navyam arkaiḥ /
analyzed: anarvāṇam vṛṣabham mandra jihvam bṛhaspatim vardhaya navyam arkaiḥ

original: RV_1,190.01c gāthānyaḥ suruco yasya devā āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ //
analyzed: gāthānyaḥ su rucaḥ yasya devāḥ āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ

original: RV_1,190.02a tam ṛtviyā upa vācaḥ sacante sargo na yo devayatām asarji /
analyzed: tam ṛtviyāḥ upa vācaḥ sacante sargaḥ na yaḥ devayatām asarji

original: RV_1,190.02c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hy añjo varāṃsi vibhvābhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi añjas varāṃsi vibhvā abhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā

original: RV_1,190.03a upastutiṃ namasa udyatiṃ ca ślokaṃ yaṃsat saviteva pra bāhū /
analyzed: upastutim namase udyatim ca ślokam yaṃsat savitā iva pra bāhū

original: RV_1,190.03c asya kratvāhanyo yo asti mṛgo na bhīmo arakṣasas tuviṣmān //
analyzed: asya kratvā ahanyaḥ yaḥ asti mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ arakṣasaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_1,190.04a asya śloko divīyate pṛthivyām atyo na yaṃsad yakṣabhṛd vicetāḥ /
analyzed: asya ślokaḥ divi īyate pṛthivyām atyaḥ na yaṃsat yakṣa bhṛt vicetāḥ

original: RV_1,190.04c mṛgāṇāṃ na hetayo yanti cemā bṛhaspater ahimāyāṃ abhi dyūn //
analyzed: mṛgāṇām na hetayaḥ yanti ca imāḥ bṛhaspateḥ ahi māyām abhi dyūn

original: RV_1,190.05a ye tvā devosrikam manyamānāḥ pāpā bhadram upajīvanti pajrāḥ /
analyzed: ye tvā deva usrikam manyamānāḥ pāpāḥ bhadram upajīvanti pajrāḥ

original: RV_1,190.05c na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmam bṛhaspate cayasa it piyārum //
analyzed: na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmam bṛhaspate cayase id piyārum

original: RV_1,190.06a supraituḥ sūyavaso na panthā durniyantuḥ pariprīto na mitraḥ /
analyzed: su praituḥ sū yavasaḥ na panthāḥ durniyantuḥ pariprītaḥ na mitraḥ

original: RV_1,190.06c anarvāṇo abhi ye cakṣate no 'pīvṛtā aporṇuvanto asthuḥ //
analyzed: anarvāṇaḥ abhi ye cakṣate na u pīvṛtāḥ aporṇuvantaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_1,190.07a saṃ yaṃ stubho 'vanayo na yanti samudraṃ na sravato rodhacakrāḥ /
analyzed: sam yam stubhaḥ vanayaḥ na yanti samudram na sravataḥ rodha cakrāḥ

original: RV_1,190.07c sa vidvāṃ ubhayaṃ caṣṭe antar bṛhaspatis tara āpaś ca gṛdhraḥ //
analyzed: sa vidvān ubhayam caṣṭe antar bṛhaspatiḥ taraḥ āpaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ

original: RV_1,190.08a evā mahas tuvijātas tuviṣmān bṛhaspatir vṛṣabho dhāyi devaḥ /
analyzed: eva mahaḥ tuvi jātaḥ tuviṣmān bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ dhāyi devaḥ

original: RV_1,190.08c sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu gomat vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,191.01a kaṅkato na kaṅkato 'tho satīnakaṅkataḥ /
analyzed: kaṅkataḥ na kaṅkataḥ satīna kaṅkataḥ

original: RV_1,191.01c dvāv iti pluṣī iti ny adṛṣṭā alipsata //
analyzed: dvau iti pluṣī iti ni adṛṣṭāḥ alipsata

original: RV_1,191.02a adṛṣṭān hanty āyaty atho hanti parāyatī /
analyzed: adṛṣṭān hanti āyatī atha u hanti parāyatī

original: RV_1,191.02c atho avaghnatī hanty atho pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī //
analyzed: atha u avaghnatī hanti atha u pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī

original: RV_1,191.03a śarāsaḥ kuśarāso darbhāsaḥ sairyā uta /
analyzed: śarāsaḥ kuśarāsaḥ darbhāsaḥ sairyāḥ uta

original: RV_1,191.03c mauñjā adṛṣṭā vairiṇāḥ sarve sākaṃ ny alipsata //
analyzed: mauñjāḥ adṛṣṭāḥ vairiṇāḥ sarve sākam ni alipsata

original: RV_1,191.04a ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata /
analyzed: ni gāvaḥ goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāsaḥ avikṣata

original: RV_1,191.04c ni ketavo janānāṃ ny adṛṣṭā alipsata //
analyzed: ni ketavaḥ janānām ni adṛṣṭāḥ alipsata

original: RV_1,191.05a eta u tye praty adṛśran pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva /
analyzed: ete u tye prati adṛśran pradoṣam taskarāḥ iva

original: RV_1,191.05c adṛṣṭā viśvadṛṣṭāḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana //
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ viśva dṛṣṭāḥ pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana

original: RV_1,191.06a dyaur vaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somo bhrātāditiḥ svasā /
analyzed: dyauḥ vaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somaḥ bhrātā aditiḥ svasā

original: RV_1,191.06c adṛṣṭā viśvadṛṣṭās tiṣṭhatelayatā su kam //
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ viśva dṛṣṭāḥ tiṣṭhata ilayata su kam

original: RV_1,191.07a ye aṃsyā ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkā ye prakaṅkatāḥ /
analyzed: ye aṃsyāḥ ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkāḥ ye prakaṅkatāḥ

original: RV_1,191.07c adṛṣṭāḥ kiṃ caneha vaḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata //
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ kim cana iha vaḥ sarve sākam ni jasyata

original: RV_1,191.08a ut purastāt sūrya eti viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā /
analyzed: ud purastāt sūryaḥ eti viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā

original: RV_1,191.08c adṛṣṭān sarvāñ jambhayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ //
analyzed: adṛṣṭān sarvām jambhayan sarvāḥ ca yātudhānyaḥ

original: RV_1,191.09a ud apaptad asau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan /
analyzed: ud apaptat asau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan

original: RV_1,191.09c ādityaḥ parvatebhyo viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā //
analyzed: ādityaḥ parvatebhyaḥ viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā

original: RV_1,191.10a sūrye viṣam ā sajāmi dṛtiṃ surāvato gṛhe /
analyzed: sūrye viṣam ā sajāmi dṛtim surāvataḥ gṛhe

original: RV_1,191.10c so cin nu na marāti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
analyzed: sā u cit nu na marāti na u vayam marāma āre asya yojanam hariṣṭhāḥ madhu tvā madhulā cakāra

original: RV_1,191.11a iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam /
analyzed: iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam

original: RV_1,191.11c so cin nu na marāti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
analyzed: sā u cit nu na marāti na u vayam marāma āre asya yojanam hariṣṭhāḥ madhu tvā madhulā cakāra

original: RV_1,191.12a triḥ sapta viṣpuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣyam akṣan /
analyzed: tris sapta viṣpuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣyam akṣan

original: RV_1,191.12c tāś cin nu na maranti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
analyzed: tāḥ cit nu na maranti na u vayam marāma āre asya yojanam hariṣṭhāḥ madhu tvā madhulā cakāra

original: RV_1,191.13a navānāṃ navatīnāṃ viṣasya ropuṣīṇām /
analyzed: navānām navatīnām viṣasya ropuṣīṇām

original: RV_1,191.13c sarvāsām agrabhaṃ nāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
analyzed: sarvāsām agrabham nāma āre asya yojanam hariṣṭhāḥ madhu tvā madhulā cakāra

original: RV_1,191.14a triḥ sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ /
analyzed: tris sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāraḥ agruvaḥ

original: RV_1,191.14c tās te viṣaṃ vi jabhrira udakaṃ kumbhinīr iva //
analyzed: tāḥ te viṣam vi jabhrire udakam kumbhinīḥ iva

original: RV_1,191.15a iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakas takam bhinadmy aśmanā /
analyzed: iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakaḥ takam bhinadmi aśmanā

original: RV_1,191.15c tato viṣam pra vāvṛte parācīr anu saṃvataḥ //
analyzed: tatas viṣam pra vāvṛte parācīḥ anu saṃvataḥ

original: RV_1,191.16a kuṣumbhakas tad abravīd gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ /
analyzed: kuṣumbhakaḥ tat abravīt gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ

original: RV_1,191.16c vṛścikasyārasaṃ viṣam arasaṃ vṛścika te viṣam //
analyzed: vṛścikasya arasam viṣam arasam vṛścika te viṣam

original: Ṛgveda 2
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_2,001.01a tvam agne dyubhis tvam āśuśukṣaṇis tvam adbhyas tvam aśmanas pari /
analyzed: tvam agne dyubhiḥ tvam āśuśukṣaṇiḥ tvam adbhyaḥ tvam aśmanaḥ pari

original: RV_2,001.01c tvaṃ vanebhyas tvam oṣadhībhyas tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ //
analyzed: tvam vanebhyaḥ tvam oṣadhībhyaḥ tvam nṛṇām nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ

original: RV_2,001.02a tavāgne hotraṃ tava potram ṛtviyaṃ tava neṣṭraṃ tvam agnid ṛtāyataḥ /
analyzed: tava agne hotram tava potram ṛtviyam tava neṣṭram tvam agnidh ṛta āyataḥ

original: RV_2,001.02c tava praśāstraṃ tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā cāsi gṛhapatiś ca no dame //
analyzed: tava praśāstram tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā ca asi gṛhapatiḥ ca naḥ dame

original: RV_2,001.03a tvam agna indro vṛṣabhaḥ satām asi tvaṃ viṣṇur urugāyo namasyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne indraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ satām asi tvam viṣṇuḥ uru gāyaḥ namasyaḥ

original: RV_2,001.03c tvam brahmā rayivid brahmaṇas pate tvaṃ vidhartaḥ sacase purandhyā //
analyzed: tvam brahmā rayi vid brahmaṇas pate tvam vidhartar sacase purandhyā

original: RV_2,001.04a tvam agne rājā varuṇo dhṛtavratas tvam mitro bhavasi dasma īḍyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne rājā varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ tvam mitraḥ bhavasi dasmaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_2,001.04c tvam aryamā satpatir yasya sambhujaṃ tvam aṃśo vidathe deva bhājayuḥ //
analyzed: tvam aryamā satpatiḥ yasya sambhujam tvam aṃśaḥ vidathe deva bhājayuḥ

original: RV_2,001.05a tvam agne tvaṣṭā vidhate suvīryaṃ tava gnāvo mitramahaḥ sajātyam /
analyzed: tvam agne tvaṣṭā vidhate su vīryam tava gnāvaḥ mitra mahas sajātyam

original: RV_2,001.05c tvam āśuhemā rariṣe svaśvyaṃ tvaṃ narāṃ śardho asi purūvasuḥ //
analyzed: tvam āśu hemā rariṣe su aśvyam tvam narām śardhaḥ asi purūvasuḥ

original: RV_2,001.06a tvam agne rudro asuro maho divas tvaṃ śardho mārutam pṛkṣa īśiṣe /
analyzed: tvam agne rudraḥ asuraḥ mahaḥ divaḥ tvam śardhaḥ mārutam pṛkṣaḥ īśiṣe

original: RV_2,001.06c tvaṃ vātair aruṇair yāsi śaṅgayas tvam pūṣā vidhataḥ pāsi nu tmanā //
analyzed: tvam vātaiḥ aruṇaiḥ yāsi śaṅgayaḥ tvam pūṣā vidhataḥ pāsi nu tmanā

original: RV_2,001.07a tvam agne draviṇodā araṅkṛte tvaṃ devaḥ savitā ratnadhā asi /
analyzed: tvam agne draviṇaḥ dāḥ araṅkṛte tvam devaḥ savitā ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_2,001.07c tvam bhago nṛpate vasva īśiṣe tvam pāyur dame yas te 'vidhat //
analyzed: tvam bhagaḥ nṛpate vasvaḥ īśiṣe tvam pāyuḥ dame yaḥ te vidhat

original: RV_2,001.08a tvām agne dama ā viśpatiṃ viśas tvāṃ rājānaṃ suvidatram ṛñjate /
analyzed: tvām agne dame ā viśpatim viśaḥ tvām rājānam suvidatram ṛñjate

original: RV_2,001.08c tvaṃ viśvāni svanīka patyase tvaṃ sahasrāṇi śatā daśa prati //
analyzed: tvam viśvāni su anīka patyase tvam sahasrāṇi śatā daśa prati

original: RV_2,001.09a tvām agne pitaram iṣṭibhir naras tvām bhrātrāya śamyā tanūrucam /
analyzed: tvām agne pitaram iṣṭibhiḥ naraḥ tvām bhrātrāya śamyā tanūrucam

original: RV_2,001.09c tvam putro bhavasi yas te 'vidhat tvaṃ sakhā suśevaḥ pāsy ādhṛṣaḥ //
analyzed: tvam putraḥ bhavasi yaḥ te vidhat tvam sakhā su śevaḥ pāsi ādhṛṣaḥ

original: RV_2,001.10a tvam agna ṛbhur āke namasyas tvaṃ vājasya kṣumato rāya īśiṣe /
analyzed: tvam agne ṛbhuḥ āke namasyaḥ tvam vājasya kṣumataḥ rāyaḥ īśiṣe

original: RV_2,001.10c tvaṃ vi bhāsy anu dakṣi dāvane tvaṃ viśikṣur asi yajñam ātaniḥ //
analyzed: tvam vi bhāsi anu dakṣi dāvane tvam viśikṣuḥ asi yajñam ātaniḥ

original: RV_2,001.11a tvam agne aditir deva dāśuṣe tvaṃ hotrā bhāratī vardhase girā /
analyzed: tvam agne aditiḥ deva dāśuṣe tvam hotrā bhāratī vardhase girā

original: RV_2,001.11c tvam iḷā śatahimāsi dakṣase tvaṃ vṛtrahā vasupate sarasvatī //
analyzed: tvam iḷā śata himā asi dakṣase tvam vṛtra hā vasu pate sarasvatī

original: RV_2,001.12a tvam agne subhṛta uttamaṃ vayas tava spārhe varṇa ā saṃdṛśi śriyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne su bhṛtaḥ uttamam vayaḥ tava spārhe varṇe ā saṃdṛśi śriyaḥ

original: RV_2,001.12c tvaṃ vājaḥ prataraṇo bṛhann asi tvaṃ rayir bahulo viśvatas pṛthuḥ //
analyzed: tvam vājaḥ prataraṇaḥ bṛhan asi tvam rayiḥ bahulaḥ viśvatas pṛthuḥ

original: RV_2,001.13a tvām agna ādityāsa āsyaṃ tvāṃ jihvāṃ śucayaś cakrire kave /
analyzed: tvām agne ādityāsaḥ āsyam tvām jihvām śucayaḥ cakrire kave

original: RV_2,001.13c tvāṃ rātiṣāco adhvareṣu saścire tve devā havir adanty āhutam //
analyzed: tvām rātiṣācaḥ adhvareṣu saścire tve devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam

original: RV_2,001.14a tve agne viśve amṛtāso adruha āsā devā havir adanty āhutam /
analyzed: tve agne viśve amṛtāsaḥ adruhaḥ āsā devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam

original: RV_2,001.14c tvayā martāsaḥ svadanta āsutiṃ tvaṃ garbho vīrudhāṃ jajñiṣe śuciḥ //
analyzed: tvayā martāsaḥ svadante āsutim tvam garbhaḥ vīrudhām jajñiṣe śuciḥ

original: RV_2,001.15a tvaṃ tān saṃ ca prati cāsi majmanāgne sujāta pra ca deva ricyase /
analyzed: tvam tān sam ca prati ca asi majmanā agne su jāta pra ca deva ricyase

original: RV_2,001.15c pṛkṣo yad atra mahinā vi te bhuvad anu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubhe //
analyzed: pṛkṣaḥ yat atra mahinā vi te bhuvat anu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubhe

original: RV_2,001.16a ye stotṛbhyo goagrām aśvapeśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: ye stotṛbhyaḥ go agrām aśva peśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ

original: RV_2,001.16c asmāñ ca tāṃś ca pra hi neṣi vasya ā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: asmām ca tān ca pra hi neṣi vasyaḥ ā bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,002.01a yajñena vardhata jātavedasam agniṃ yajadhvaṃ haviṣā tanā girā /
analyzed: yajñena vardhata jātavedasam agnim yajadhvam haviṣā tanā girā

original: RV_2,002.01c samidhānaṃ suprayasaṃ svarṇaraṃ dyukṣaṃ hotāraṃ vṛjaneṣu dhūrṣadam //
analyzed: samidhānam su prayasam svarṇaram dyukṣam hotāram vṛjaneṣu dhūrṣadam

original: RV_2,002.02a abhi tvā naktīr uṣaso vavāśire 'gne vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: abhi tvā naktīḥ uṣasaḥ vavāśire gne vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ

original: RV_2,002.02c diva ived aratir mānuṣā yugā kṣapo bhāsi puruvāra saṃyataḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ iva id aratiḥ mānuṣā yugā kṣapaḥ bhāsi puru vāra saṃyataḥ

original: RV_2,002.03a taṃ devā budhne rajasaḥ sudaṃsasaṃ divaspṛthivyor aratiṃ ny erire /
analyzed: tam devāḥ budhne rajasaḥ su daṃsasam divaspṛthivyoḥ aratim ni erire

original: RV_2,002.03c ratham iva vedyaṃ śukraśociṣam agnim mitraṃ na kṣitiṣu praśaṃsyam //
analyzed: ratham iva vedyam śukra śociṣam agnim mitram na kṣitiṣu praśaṃsyam

original: RV_2,002.04a tam ukṣamāṇaṃ rajasi sva ā dame candram iva surucaṃ hvāra ā dadhuḥ /
analyzed: tam ukṣamāṇam rajasi sve ā dame candram iva su rucam hvāre ā dadhuḥ

original: RV_2,002.04c pṛśnyāḥ pataraṃ citayantam akṣabhiḥ pātho na pāyuṃ janasī ubhe anu //
analyzed: pṛśnyāḥ pataram citayantam akṣabhiḥ pāthaḥ na pāyum janasī ubhe anu

original: RV_2,002.05a sa hotā viśvam pari bhūtv adhvaraṃ tam u havyair manuṣa ṛñjate girā /
analyzed: sa hotā viśvam pari bhūtu adhvaram tam u havyaiḥ manuṣe ṛñjate girā

original: RV_2,002.05c hiriśipro vṛdhasānāsu jarbhurad dyaur na stṛbhiś citayad rodasī anu //
analyzed: hiri śipraḥ vṛdhasānāsu jarbhurat dyauḥ na stṛbhiḥ citayat rodasī anu

original: RV_2,002.06a sa no revat samidhānaḥ svastaye saṃdadasvān rayim asmāsu dīdihi /
analyzed: sa naḥ revat samidhānaḥ svastaye saṃdadasvān rayim asmāsu dīdihi

original: RV_2,002.06c ā naḥ kṛṇuṣva suvitāya rodasī agne havyā manuṣo deva vītaye //
analyzed: ā naḥ kṛṇuṣva suvitāya rodasī agne havyā manuṣaḥ deva vītaye

original: RV_2,002.07a dā no agne bṛhato dāḥ sahasriṇo duro na vājaṃ śrutyā apā vṛdhi /
analyzed: dāḥ naḥ agne bṛhataḥ dāḥ sahasriṇaḥ duraḥ na vājam śrutyai apa ā vṛdhi

original: RV_2,002.07c prācī dyāvāpṛthivī brahmaṇā kṛdhi svar ṇa śukram uṣaso vi didyutaḥ //
analyzed: prācī dyāvāpṛthivī brahmaṇā kṛdhi svar na śukram uṣasaḥ vi didyutaḥ

original: RV_2,002.08a sa idhāna uṣaso rāmyā anu svar ṇa dīded aruṣeṇa bhānunā /
analyzed: saḥ idhānaḥ uṣasaḥ rāmyāḥ anu svar na dīdet aruṣeṇa bhānunā

original: RV_2,002.08c hotrābhir agnir manuṣaḥ svadhvaro rājā viśām atithiś cārur āyave //
analyzed: hotrābhiḥ agniḥ manuṣaḥ su adhvaraḥ rājā viśām atithiḥ cāruḥ āyave

original: RV_2,002.09a evā no agne amṛteṣu pūrvya dhīṣ pīpāya bṛhaddiveṣu mānuṣā /
analyzed: eva naḥ agne amṛteṣu pūrvya dhīḥ pīpāya bṛhaddiveṣu mānuṣā

original: RV_2,002.09c duhānā dhenur vṛjaneṣu kārave tmanā śatinam pururūpam iṣaṇi //
analyzed: duhānā dhenuḥ vṛjaneṣu kārave tmanā śatinam puru rūpam iṣaṇi

original: RV_2,002.10a vayam agne arvatā vā suvīryam brahmaṇā vā citayemā janāṃ ati /
analyzed: vayam agne arvatā vā su vīryam brahmaṇā vā citayema janān ati

original: RV_2,002.10c asmākaṃ dyumnam adhi pañca kṛṣṭiṣūccā svar ṇa śuśucīta duṣṭaram //
analyzed: asmākam dyumnam adhi pañca kṛṣṭiṣu uccā svar na śuśucīta duṣṭaram

original: RV_2,002.11a sa no bodhi sahasya praśaṃsyo yasmin sujātā iṣayanta sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi sahasya praśaṃsyaḥ yasmin sujātāḥ iṣayanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_2,002.11c yam agne yajñam upayanti vājino nitye toke dīdivāṃsaṃ sve dame //
analyzed: yam agne yajñam upayanti vājinaḥ nitye toke dīdivāṃsam sve dame

original: RV_2,002.12a ubhayāso jātavedaḥ syāma te stotāro agne sūrayaś ca śarmaṇi /
analyzed: ubhayāsaḥ jātavedaḥ syāma te stotāraḥ agne sūrayaḥ ca śarmaṇi

original: RV_2,002.12c vasvo rāyaḥ puruścandrasya bhūyasaḥ prajāvataḥ svapatyasya śagdhi naḥ //
analyzed: vasvaḥ rāyaḥ puru ścandrasya bhūyasaḥ prajāvataḥ su apatyasya śagdhi naḥ

original: RV_2,002.13a ye stotṛbhyo goagrām aśvapeśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: ye stotṛbhyaḥ go agrām aśva peśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ

original: RV_2,002.13c asmāñ ca tāṃś ca pra hi neṣi vasya ā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: asmām ca tān ca pra hi neṣi vasyaḥ ā bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,003.01a samiddho agnir nihitaḥ pṛthivyām pratyaṅ viśvāni bhuvanāny asthāt /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ nihitaḥ pṛthivyām pratyaṅ viśvāni bhuvanāni asthāt

original: RV_2,003.01c hotā pāvakaḥ pradivaḥ sumedhā devo devān yajatv agnir arhan //
analyzed: hotā pāvakaḥ pradivaḥ sumedhāḥ devaḥ devān yajatu agniḥ arhan

original: RV_2,003.02a narāśaṃsaḥ prati dhāmāny añjan tisro divaḥ prati mahnā svarciḥ /
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ prati dhāmāni añjan tisraḥ divaḥ prati mahnā su arciḥ

original: RV_2,003.02c ghṛtapruṣā manasā havyam undan mūrdhan yajñasya sam anaktu devān //
analyzed: ghṛta pruṣā manasā havyam undan mūrdhan yajñasya sam anaktu devān

original: RV_2,003.03a īḷito agne manasā no arhan devān yakṣi mānuṣāt pūrvo adya /
analyzed: īḍitaḥ agne manasā naḥ arhan devān yakṣi mānuṣāt pūrvaḥ adya

original: RV_2,003.03c sa ā vaha marutāṃ śardho acyutam indraṃ naro barhiṣadaṃ yajadhvam //
analyzed: saḥ ā vaha marutām śardhaḥ acyutam indram naraḥ barhiṣadam yajadhvam

original: RV_2,003.04a deva barhir vardhamānaṃ suvīraṃ stīrṇaṃ rāye subharaṃ vedy asyām /
analyzed: deva barhiḥ vardhamānam su vīram stīrṇam rāye subharam vedi asyām

original: RV_2,003.04c ghṛtenāktaṃ vasavaḥ sīdatedaṃ viśve devā ādityā yajñiyāsaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtena aktam vasavaḥ sīdata idam viśve devāḥ ādityāḥ yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_2,003.05a vi śrayantām urviyā hūyamānā dvāro devīḥ suprāyaṇā namobhiḥ /
analyzed: vi śrayantām urviyā hūyamānāḥ dvāraḥ devīḥ su prāyaṇāḥ namobhiḥ

original: RV_2,003.05c vyacasvatīr vi prathantām ajuryā varṇam punānā yaśasaṃ suvīram //
analyzed: vyacasvatīḥ vi prathantām ajuryāḥ varṇam punānāḥ yaśasam su vīram

original: RV_2,003.06a sādhv apāṃsi sanatā na ukṣite uṣāsānaktā vayyeva raṇvite /
analyzed: sādhu apāṃsi sanatā naḥ ukṣite uṣāsānaktā vayyā iva raṇvite

original: RV_2,003.06c tantuṃ tataṃ saṃvayantī samīcī yajñasya peśaḥ sudughe payasvatī //
analyzed: tantum tatam saṃvayantī samīcī yajñasya peśaḥ sudughe payasvatī

original: RV_2,003.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā viduṣṭara ṛju yakṣataḥ sam ṛcā vapuṣṭarā /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā viduṣṭarau ṛju yakṣataḥ sam ṛcā vapuṣṭarā

original: RV_2,003.07c devān yajantāv ṛtuthā sam añjato nābhā pṛthivyā adhi sānuṣu triṣu //
analyzed: devān yajantau ṛtuthā sam añjataḥ nābhā pṛthivyāḥ adhi sānuṣu triṣu

original: RV_2,003.08a sarasvatī sādhayantī dhiyaṃ na iḷā devī bhāratī viśvatūrtiḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatī sādhayantī dhiyam naḥ iḷā devī bhāratī viśvatūrtiḥ

original: RV_2,003.08c tisro devīḥ svadhayā barhir edam acchidram pāntu śaraṇaṃ niṣadya //
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ svadhayā barhiḥ ā idam acchidram pāntu śaraṇam niṣadya

original: RV_2,003.09a piśaṅgarūpaḥ subharo vayodhāḥ śruṣṭī vīro jāyate devakāmaḥ /
analyzed: piśaṅga rūpaḥ subharaḥ vayodhāḥ śruṣṭī vīraḥ jāyate deva kāmaḥ

original: RV_2,003.09c prajāṃ tvaṣṭā vi ṣyatu nābhim asme athā devānām apy etu pāthaḥ //
analyzed: prajām tvaṣṭā vi syatu nābhim asme athā devānām api etu pāthaḥ

original: RV_2,003.10a vanaspatir avasṛjann upa sthād agnir haviḥ sūdayāti pra dhībhiḥ /
analyzed: vanaspatiḥ avasṛjan upa sthāt agniḥ haviḥ sūdayāti pra dhībhiḥ

original: RV_2,003.10c tridhā samaktaṃ nayatu prajānan devebhyo daivyaḥ śamitopa havyam //
analyzed: tridhā samaktam nayatu prajānan devebhyaḥ daivyaḥ śamitā upa havyam

original: RV_2,003.11a ghṛtam mimikṣe ghṛtam asya yonir ghṛte śrito ghṛtam v asya dhāma /
analyzed: ghṛtam mimikṣe ghṛtam asya yoniḥ ghṛte śritaḥ ghṛtam u asya dhāma

original: RV_2,003.11c anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva svāhākṛtaṃ vṛṣabha vakṣi havyam //
analyzed: anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva svāhākṛtam vṛṣabha vakṣi havyam

original: RV_2,004.01a huve vaḥ sudyotmānaṃ suvṛktiṃ viśām agnim atithiṃ suprayasam /
analyzed: huve vaḥ sudyotmānam suvṛktim viśām agnim atithim su prayasam

original: RV_2,004.01c mitra iva yo didhiṣāyyo bhūd deva ādeve jane jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ iva yaḥ didhiṣāyyaḥ bhūt devaḥ ādeve jane jātavedāḥ

original: RV_2,004.02a imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe dvitādadhur bhṛgavo vikṣv āyoḥ /
analyzed: imam vidhantaḥ apām sadhasthe dvitā adadhuḥ bhṛgavaḥ vikṣu āyoḥ

original: RV_2,004.02c eṣa viśvāny abhy astu bhūmā devānām agnir aratir jīrāśvaḥ //
analyzed: eṣa viśvāni abhī astu bhūmā devānām agniḥ aratiḥ jīra aśvaḥ

original: RV_2,004.03a agniṃ devāso mānuṣīṣu vikṣu priyaṃ dhuḥ kṣeṣyanto na mitram /
analyzed: agnim devāsaḥ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu priyam dhuḥ kṣeṣyantaḥ na mitram

original: RV_2,004.03c sa dīdayad uśatīr ūrmyā ā dakṣāyyo yo dāsvate dama ā //
analyzed: sa dīdayat uśatīḥ ūrmyāḥ ā dakṣāyyaḥ yaḥ dāsvate dame ā

original: RV_2,004.04a asya raṇvā svasyeva puṣṭiḥ saṃdṛṣṭir asya hiyānasya dakṣoḥ /
analyzed: asya raṇvā svasya iva puṣṭiḥ saṃdṛṣṭiḥ asya hiyānasya dakṣoḥ

original: RV_2,004.04c vi yo bharibhrad oṣadhīṣu jihvām atyo na rathyo dodhavīti vārān //
analyzed: vi yaḥ bharibhrat oṣadhīṣu jihvām atyaḥ na rathyaḥ dodhavīti vārān

original: RV_2,004.05a ā yan me abhvaṃ vanadaḥ panantośigbhyo nāmimīta varṇam /
analyzed: ā yat me abhvam vanadaḥ pananta uśigbhyaḥ na āmimīta varṇam

original: RV_2,004.05c sa citreṇa cikite raṃsu bhāsā jujurvāṃ yo muhur ā yuvā bhūt //
analyzed: sa citreṇa cikite raṃsu bhāsā jujurvām yaḥ muhur ā yuvā bhūt

original: RV_2,004.06a ā yo vanā tātṛṣāṇo na bhāti vār ṇa pathā rathyeva svānīt /
analyzed: ā yaḥ vanā tātṛṣāṇaḥ na bhāti vār na pathā rathyā iva svānīt

original: RV_2,004.06c kṛṣṇādhvā tapū raṇvaś ciketa dyaur iva smayamāno nabhobhiḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa adhvā tapūḥ raṇvaḥ ciketa dyauḥ iva smayamānaḥ nabhobhiḥ

original: RV_2,004.07a sa yo vy asthād abhi dakṣad urvīm paśur naiti svayur agopāḥ /
analyzed: sa yaḥ vi asthāt abhi dakṣat urvīm paśuḥ na eti svayuḥ agopāḥ

original: RV_2,004.07c agniḥ śociṣmāṃ atasāny uṣṇan kṛṣṇavyathir asvadayan na bhūma //
analyzed: agniḥ śociṣmān atasāni uṣṇan kṛṣṇa vyathiḥ asvadayat na bhūma

original: RV_2,004.08a nū te pūrvasyāvaso adhītau tṛtīye vidathe manma śaṃsi /
analyzed: nu te pūrvasya avasaḥ adhītau tṛtīye vidathe manma śaṃsi

original: RV_2,004.08c asme agne saṃyadvīram bṛhantaṃ kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ svapatyaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
analyzed: asme agne saṃyat vīram bṛhantam kṣumantam vājam su apatyam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_2,004.09a tvayā yathā gṛtsamadāso agne guhā vanvanta uparāṃ abhi ṣyuḥ /
analyzed: tvayā yathā gṛtsamadāsaḥ agne guhā vanvantaḥ uparām abhi syuḥ

original: RV_2,004.09c suvīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ smat sūribhyo gṛṇate tad vayo dhāḥ //
analyzed: su vīrāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ smat sūribhyaḥ gṛṇate tat vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_2,005.01a hotājaniṣṭa cetanaḥ pitā pitṛbhya ūtaye /
analyzed: hotā ajaniṣṭa cetanaḥ pitā pitṛbhyaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_2,005.01c prayakṣañ jenyaṃ vasu śakema vājino yamam //
analyzed: prayakṣam jenyam vasu śakema vājinaḥ yamam

original: RV_2,005.02a ā yasmin sapta raśmayas tatā yajñasya netari /
analyzed: ā yasmin sapta raśmayaḥ tatāḥ yajñasya netari

original: RV_2,005.02c manuṣvad daivyam aṣṭamam potā viśvaṃ tad invati //
analyzed: manuṣvat daivyam aṣṭamam potā viśvam tat invati

original: RV_2,005.03a dadhanve vā yad īm anu vocad brahmāṇi ver u tat /
analyzed: dadhanve vā yat īm anu vocat brahmāṇi veḥ u tat

original: RV_2,005.03c pari viśvāni kāvyā nemiś cakram ivābhavat //
analyzed: pari viśvāni kāvyā nemiḥ cakram iva abhavat

original: RV_2,005.04a sākaṃ hi śucinā śuciḥ praśāstā kratunājani /
analyzed: sākam hi śucinā śuciḥ praśāstā kratunā ajani

original: RV_2,005.04c vidvāṃ asya vratā dhruvā vayā ivānu rohate //
analyzed: vidvān asya vratā dhruvā vayāḥ iva anu rohate

original: RV_2,005.05a tā asya varṇam āyuvo neṣṭuḥ sacanta dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya varṇam āyuvaḥ neṣṭuḥ sacanta dhenavaḥ

original: RV_2,005.05c kuvit tisṛbhya ā varaṃ svasāro yā idaṃ yayuḥ //
analyzed: kuvid tisṛbhyaḥ ā varam svasāraḥ yāḥ idam yayuḥ

original: RV_2,005.06a yadī mātur upa svasā ghṛtam bharanty asthita /
analyzed: yadī mātuḥ upa svasā ghṛtam bharantī asthita

original: RV_2,005.06c tāsām adhvaryur āgatau yavo vṛṣṭīva modate //
analyzed: tāsām adhvaryuḥ āgatau yavaḥ vṛṣṭī iva modate

original: RV_2,005.07a svaḥ svāya dhāyase kṛṇutām ṛtvig ṛtvijam /
analyzed: svaḥ svāya dhāyase kṛṇutām ṛtvij ṛtvijam

original: RV_2,005.07c stomaṃ yajñaṃ cād araṃ vanemā rarimā vayam //
analyzed: stomam yajñam ca āt aram vanema rarimā vayam

original: RV_2,005.08a yathā vidvāṃ araṃ karad viśvebhyo yajatebhyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vidvān aram karat viśvebhyaḥ yajatebhyaḥ

original: RV_2,005.08c ayam agne tve api yaṃ yajñaṃ cakṛmā vayam //
analyzed: ayam agne tve api yam yajñam cakṛma vayam

original: RV_2,006.01a imām me agne samidham imām upasadaṃ vaneḥ /
analyzed: imām me agne samidham imām upasadam vaneḥ

original: RV_2,006.01c imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ u su śrudhi giraḥ

original: RV_2,006.02a ayā te agne vidhemorjo napād aśvamiṣṭe /
analyzed: ayā te agne vidhema ūrjaḥ napāt aśvamiṣṭe

original: RV_2,006.02c enā sūktena sujāta //
analyzed: enā sūktena sujāta

original: RV_2,006.03a taṃ tvā gīrbhir girvaṇasaṃ draviṇasyuṃ draviṇodaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā gīrbhiḥ girvaṇasam draviṇasyum draviṇaḥ daḥ

original: RV_2,006.03c saparyema saparyavaḥ //
analyzed: saparyema saparyavaḥ

original: RV_2,006.04a sa bodhi sūrir maghavā vasupate vasudāvan /
analyzed: sa bodhi sūriḥ maghavā vasu pate vasu dāvan

original: RV_2,006.04c yuyodhy asmad dveṣāṃsi //
analyzed: yuyodhi asmat dveṣāṃsi

original: RV_2,006.05a sa no vṛṣṭiṃ divas pari sa no vājam anarvāṇam /
analyzed: sa naḥ vṛṣṭim divaḥ pari sa naḥ vājam anarvāṇam

original: RV_2,006.05c sa naḥ sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_2,006.06a īḷānāyāvasyave yaviṣṭha dūta no girā /
analyzed: īḍānāya avasyave yaviṣṭha dūta naḥ girā

original: RV_2,006.06c yajiṣṭha hotar ā gahi //
analyzed: yajiṣṭha hotar ā gahi

original: RV_2,006.07a antar hy agna īyase vidvāñ janmobhayā kave /
analyzed: antar hi agne īyase vidvām janma ubhayā kave

original: RV_2,006.07c dūto janyeva mitryaḥ //
analyzed: dūtaḥ janyā iva mitryaḥ

original: RV_2,006.08a sa vidvāṃ ā ca piprayo yakṣi cikitva ānuṣak /
analyzed: sa vidvān ā ca piprayaḥ yakṣi cikitvaḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_2,006.08c ā cāsmin satsi barhiṣi //
analyzed: ā ca asmin satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_2,007.01a śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratāgne dyumantam ā bhara /
analyzed: śreṣṭham yaviṣṭha bhārata agne dyumantam ā bhara

original: RV_2,007.01c vaso puruspṛhaṃ rayim //
analyzed: vaso puruspṛham rayim

original: RV_2,007.02a mā no arātir īśata devasya martyasya ca /
analyzed: mā naḥ arātiḥ īśata devasya martyasya ca

original: RV_2,007.02c parṣi tasyā uta dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: parṣi tasyāḥ uta dviṣaḥ

original: RV_2,007.03a viśvā uta tvayā vayaṃ dhārā udanyā iva /
analyzed: viśvāḥ uta tvayā vayam dhārāḥ udanyāḥ iva

original: RV_2,007.03c ati gāhemahi dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: ati gāhemahi dviṣaḥ

original: RV_2,007.04a śuciḥ pāvaka vandyo 'gne bṛhad vi rocase /
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvaka vandyaḥ gne bṛhat vi rocase

original: RV_2,007.04c tvaṃ ghṛtebhir āhutaḥ //
analyzed: tvam ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_2,007.05a tvaṃ no asi bhāratāgne vaśābhir ukṣabhiḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ asi bhārata agne vaśābhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ

original: RV_2,007.05c aṣṭāpadībhir āhutaḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭāpadībhiḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_2,007.06a drvannaḥ sarpirāsutiḥ pratno hotā vareṇyaḥ /
analyzed: dru annaḥ sarpiḥ āsutiḥ pratnaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_2,007.06c sahasas putro adbhutaḥ //
analyzed: sahasaḥ putraḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_2,008.01a vājayann iva nū rathān yogāṃ agner upa stuhi /
analyzed: vājayan iva nu rathān yogān agneḥ upa stuhi

original: RV_2,008.01c yaśastamasya mīḷhuṣaḥ //
analyzed: yaśastamasya mīḷhuṣaḥ

original: RV_2,008.02a yaḥ sunītho dadāśuṣe 'juryo jarayann arim /
analyzed: yaḥ su nīthaḥ dadāśuṣe juryaḥ jarayan arim

original: RV_2,008.02c cārupratīka āhutaḥ //
analyzed: cāru pratīkaḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_2,008.03a ya u śriyā dameṣv ā doṣoṣasi praśasyate /
analyzed: yaḥ u śriyā dameṣu ā doṣā uṣasi praśasyate

original: RV_2,008.03c yasya vrataṃ na mīyate //
analyzed: yasya vratam na mīyate

original: RV_2,008.04a ā yaḥ svar ṇa bhānunā citro vibhāty arciṣā /
analyzed: ā yaḥ svar na bhānunā citraḥ vibhāti arciṣā

original: RV_2,008.04c añjāno ajarair abhi //
analyzed: añjānaḥ ajaraiḥ abhi

original: RV_2,008.05a atrim anu svarājyam agnim ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ /
analyzed: atrim anu sva rājyam agnim ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_2,008.05c viśvā adhi śriyo dadhe //
analyzed: viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dadhe

original: RV_2,008.06a agner indrasya somasya devānām ūtibhir vayam /
analyzed: agneḥ indrasya somasya devānām ūtibhiḥ vayam

original: RV_2,008.06c ariṣyantaḥ sacemahy abhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ //
analyzed: a riṣyantaḥ sacemahi abhi syāma pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_2,009.01a ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānas tveṣo dīdivāṃ asadat sudakṣaḥ /
analyzed: ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānaḥ tveṣaḥ dīdivān asadat su dakṣaḥ

original: RV_2,009.01c adabdhavratapramatir vasiṣṭhaḥ sahasrambharaḥ śucijihvo agniḥ //
analyzed: adabdha vrata pramatiḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ sahasrambharaḥ śuci jihvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_2,009.02a tvaṃ dūtas tvam u naḥ paraspās tvaṃ vasya ā vṛṣabha praṇetā /
analyzed: tvam dūtaḥ tvam u naḥ paraspāḥ tvam vasyaḥ ā vṛṣabha praṇetā

original: RV_2,009.02c agne tokasya nas tane tanūnām aprayucchan dīdyad bodhi gopāḥ //
analyzed: agne tokasya naḥ tane tanūnām aprayucchan dīdyat bodhi gopāḥ

original: RV_2,009.03a vidhema te parame janmann agne vidhema stomair avare sadhasthe /
analyzed: vidhema te parame janman agne vidhema stomaiḥ avare sadhasthe

original: RV_2,009.03c yasmād yoner udārithā yaje tam pra tve havīṃṣi juhure samiddhe //
analyzed: yasmāt yoneḥ udāritha yaje tam pra tve havīṃṣi juhure samiddhe

original: RV_2,009.04a agne yajasva haviṣā yajīyāñ chruṣṭī deṣṇam abhi gṛṇīhi rādhaḥ /
analyzed: agne yajasva haviṣā yajīyān śruṣṭī deṣṇam abhi gṛṇīhi rādhaḥ

original: RV_2,009.04c tvaṃ hy asi rayipatī rayīṇāṃ tvaṃ śukrasya vacaso manotā //
analyzed: tvam hi asi rayi patiḥ rayīṇām tvam śukrasya vacasaḥ manotā

original: RV_2,009.05a ubhayaṃ te na kṣīyate vasavyaṃ dive-dive jāyamānasya dasma /
analyzed: ubhayam te na kṣīyate vasavyam dive dive jāyamānasya dasma

original: RV_2,009.05c kṛdhi kṣumantaṃ jaritāram agne kṛdhi patiṃ svapatyasya rāyaḥ //
analyzed: kṛdhi kṣumantam jaritāram agne kṛdhi patim su apatyasya rāyaḥ

original: RV_2,009.06a sainānīkena suvidatro asme yaṣṭā devāṃ āyajiṣṭhaḥ svasti /
analyzed: sainānīkena suvidatraḥ asme yaṣṭā devān āyajiṣṭhaḥ svasti

original: RV_2,009.06c adabdho gopā uta naḥ paraspā agne dyumad uta revad didīhi //
analyzed: adabdhaḥ gopāḥ uta naḥ paraspāḥ agne dyumat uta revat didīhi

original: RV_2,010.01a johūtro agniḥ prathamaḥ piteveḷas pade manuṣā yat samiddhaḥ /
analyzed: johūtraḥ agniḥ prathamaḥ pitā iva iḍaḥ pade manuṣā yat samiddhaḥ

original: RV_2,010.01c śriyaṃ vasāno amṛto vicetā marmṛjenyaḥ śravasyaḥ sa vājī //
analyzed: śriyam vasānaḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ marmṛjenyaḥ śravasyaḥ sa vājī

original: RV_2,010.02a śrūyā agniś citrabhānur havam me viśvābhir gīrbhir amṛto vicetāḥ /
analyzed: śrūyāḥ agniḥ citrabhānuḥ havam me viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ

original: RV_2,010.02c śyāvā rathaṃ vahato rohitā votāruṣāha cakre vibhṛtraḥ //
analyzed: śyāvā ratham vahataḥ rohitā cakre vibhṛtraḥ

original: RV_2,010.03a uttānāyām ajanayan suṣūtam bhuvad agniḥ purupeśāsu garbhaḥ /
analyzed: uttānāyām ajanayan suṣūtam bhuvat agniḥ puru peśāsu garbhaḥ

original: RV_2,010.03c śiriṇāyāṃ cid aktunā mahobhir aparīvṛto vasati pracetāḥ //
analyzed: śiriṇāyām cit aktunā mahobhiḥ aparīvṛtaḥ vasati pracetāḥ

original: RV_2,010.04a jigharmy agniṃ haviṣā ghṛtena pratikṣiyantam bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: jigharmi agnim haviṣā ghṛtena pratikṣiyantam bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_2,010.04c pṛthuṃ tiraścā vayasā bṛhantaṃ vyaciṣṭham annai rabhasaṃ dṛśānam //
analyzed: pṛthum tiraścā vayasā bṛhantam vyaciṣṭham annaiḥ rabhasam dṛśānam

original: RV_2,010.05a ā viśvataḥ pratyañcaṃ jigharmy arakṣasā manasā taj juṣeta /
analyzed: ā viśvatas pratyañcam jigharmi arakṣasā manasā tat juṣeta

original: RV_2,010.05c maryaśrī spṛhayadvarṇo agnir nābhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ //
analyzed: marya śrī spṛhayat varṇaḥ agniḥ na abhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ

original: RV_2,010.06a jñeyā bhāgaṃ sahasāno vareṇa tvādūtāso manuvad vadema /
analyzed: jñeyāḥ bhāgam sahasānaḥ vareṇa tvādūtāsaḥ manu vat vadema

original: RV_2,010.06c anūnam agniṃ juhvā vacasyā madhupṛcaṃ dhanasā johavīmi //
analyzed: anūnam agnim juhvā vacasyā madhu pṛcam dhana sāḥ johavīmi

original: RV_2,011.01a śrudhī havam indra mā riṣaṇyaḥ syāma te dāvane vasūnām /
analyzed: śrudhi havam indra mā riṣaṇyaḥ syāma te dāvane vasūnām

original: RV_2,011.01c imā hi tvām ūrjo vardhayanti vasūyavaḥ sindhavo na kṣarantaḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ hi tvām ūrjaḥ vardhayanti vasūyavaḥ sindhavaḥ na kṣarantaḥ

original: RV_2,011.02a sṛjo mahīr indra yā apinvaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: sṛjaḥ mahīḥ indra yāḥ apinvaḥ pariṣṭhitāḥ ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_2,011.02c amartyaṃ cid dāsam manyamānam avābhinad ukthair vāvṛdhānaḥ //
analyzed: amartyam cit dāsam manyamānam avābhinat ukthaiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_2,011.03a uktheṣv in nu śūra yeṣu cākan stomeṣv indra rudriyeṣu ca /
analyzed: uktheṣu id nu śūra yeṣu cākan stomeṣu indra rudriyeṣu ca

original: RV_2,011.03c tubhyed etā yāsu mandasānaḥ pra vāyave sisrate na śubhrāḥ //
analyzed: tubhya id etāḥ yāsu mandasānaḥ pra vāyave sisrate na śubhrāḥ

original: RV_2,011.04a śubhraṃ nu te śuṣmaṃ vardhayantaḥ śubhraṃ vajram bāhvor dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: śubhram nu te śuṣmam vardhayantaḥ śubhram vajram bāhvoḥ dadhānāḥ

original: RV_2,011.04c śubhras tvam indra vāvṛdhāno asme dāsīr viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ //
analyzed: śubhraḥ tvam indra vāvṛdhānaḥ asme dāsīḥ viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ

original: RV_2,011.05a guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsv apīvṛtam māyinaṃ kṣiyantam /
analyzed: guhā hitam guhyam gūḍham apsu apīvṛtam māyinam kṣiyantam

original: RV_2,011.05c uto apo dyāṃ tastabhvāṃsam ahann ahiṃ śūra vīryeṇa //
analyzed: uta u apaḥ dyām tastabhvāṃsam ahan ahim śūra vīryeṇa

original: RV_2,011.06a stavā nu ta indra pūrvyā mahāny uta stavāma nūtanā kṛtāni /
analyzed: stavā nu te indra pūrvyā mahāni uta stavāma nūtanā kṛtāni

original: RV_2,011.06c stavā vajram bāhvor uśantaṃ stavā harī sūryasya ketū //
analyzed: stavā vajram bāhvoḥ uśantam stavā harī sūryasya ketū

original: RV_2,011.07a harī nu ta indra vājayantā ghṛtaścutaṃ svāram asvārṣṭām /
analyzed: harī nu te indra vājayantā ghṛtaścutam svāram asvārṣṭām

original: RV_2,011.07c vi samanā bhūmir aprathiṣṭāraṃsta parvataś cit sariṣyan //
analyzed: vi samanā bhūmiḥ aprathiṣṭa araṃsta parvataḥ cit sariṣyan

original: RV_2,011.08a ni parvataḥ sādy aprayucchan sam mātṛbhir vāvaśāno akrān /
analyzed: ni parvataḥ sādi aprayucchan sam mātṛbhiḥ vāvaśānaḥ akrān

original: RV_2,011.08c dūre pāre vāṇīṃ vardhayanta indreṣitāṃ dhamanim paprathan ni //
analyzed: dūre pāre vāṇīm vardhayantaḥ indra iṣitām dhamanim paprathat ni

original: RV_2,011.09a indro mahāṃ sindhum āśayānam māyāvinaṃ vṛtram asphuran niḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ mahām sindhum āśayānam māyāvinam vṛtram asphurat niḥ

original: RV_2,011.09c arejetāṃ rodasī bhiyāne kanikradato vṛṣṇo asya vajrāt //
analyzed: arejetām rodasī bhiyāne kanikradataḥ vṛṣṇaḥ asya vajrāt

original: RV_2,011.10a aroravīd vṛṣṇo asya vajro 'mānuṣaṃ yan mānuṣo nijūrvāt /
analyzed: aroravīt vṛṣṇaḥ asya vajraḥ mānuṣam yat mānuṣaḥ nijūrvāt

original: RV_2,011.10c ni māyino dānavasya māyā apādayat papivān sutasya //
analyzed: ni māyinaḥ dānavasya māyāḥ apādayat papivān sutasya

original: RV_2,011.11a pibā-pibed indra śūra somam mandantu tvā mandinaḥ sutāsaḥ /
analyzed: piba a piba id indra śūra somam mandantu tvā mandinaḥ sutāsaḥ

original: RV_2,011.11c pṛṇantas te kukṣī vardhayantv itthā sutaḥ paura indram āva //
analyzed: pṛṇantaḥ te kukṣī vardhayantu itthā sutaḥ pauraḥ indram āva

original: RV_2,011.12a tve indrāpy abhūma viprā dhiyaṃ vanema ṛtayā sapantaḥ /
analyzed: tve indra api abhūma viprāḥ dhiyam vanema ṛtayā sapantaḥ

original: RV_2,011.12c avasyavo dhīmahi praśastiṃ sadyas te rāyo dāvane syāma //
analyzed: avasyavaḥ dhīmahi praśastim sadyas te rāyaḥ dāvane syāma

original: RV_2,011.13a syāma te ta indra ye ta ūtī avasyava ūrjaṃ vardhayantaḥ /
analyzed: syāma te te indra ye te ūtī avasyavaḥ ūrjam vardhayantaḥ

original: RV_2,011.13c śuṣmintamaṃ yaṃ cākanāma devāsme rayiṃ rāsi vīravantam //
analyzed: śuṣmintamam yam cākanāma deva asme rayim rāsi vīravantam

original: RV_2,011.14a rāsi kṣayaṃ rāsi mitram asme rāsi śardha indra mārutaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: rāsi kṣayam rāsi mitram asme rāsi śardhaḥ indra mārutam naḥ

original: RV_2,011.14c sajoṣaso ye ca mandasānāḥ pra vāyavaḥ pānty agraṇītim //
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ ye ca mandasānāḥ pra vāyavaḥ pānti agraṇītim

original: RV_2,011.15a vyantv in nu yeṣu mandasānas tṛpat somam pāhi drahyad indra /
analyzed: vyantu id nu yeṣu mandasānaḥ tṛpat somam pāhi drahyat indra

original: RV_2,011.15c asmān su pṛtsv ā tarutrāvardhayo dyām bṛhadbhir arkaiḥ //
analyzed: asmān su pṛtsu ā tarutra avardhayaḥ dyām bṛhadbhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_2,011.16a bṛhanta in nu ye te tarutrokthebhir vā sumnam āvivāsān /
analyzed: bṛhantaḥ id nu ye te tarutra ukthebhiḥ vā sumnam āvivāsān

original: RV_2,011.16c stṛṇānāso barhiḥ pastyāvat tvotā id indra vājam agman //
analyzed: stṛṇānāsaḥ barhiḥ pastyāvat tvotāḥ id indra vājam agman

original: RV_2,011.17a ugreṣv in nu śūra mandasānas trikadrukeṣu pāhi somam indra /
analyzed: ugreṣu id nu śūra mandasānaḥ trikadrukeṣu pāhi somam indra

original: RV_2,011.17c pradodhuvac chmaśruṣu prīṇāno yāhi haribhyāṃ sutasya pītim //
analyzed: pradodhuvat śmaśruṣu prīṇānaḥ yāhi haribhyām sutasya pītim

original: RV_2,011.18a dhiṣvā śavaḥ śūra yena vṛtram avābhinad dānum aurṇavābham /
analyzed: dhiṣvā śavaḥ śūra yena vṛtram avābhinat dānum aurṇavābham

original: RV_2,011.18c apāvṛṇor jyotir āryāya ni savyataḥ sādi dasyur indra //
analyzed: apāvṛṇoḥ jyotiḥ āryāya ni savyatas sādi dasyuḥ indra

original: RV_2,011.19a sanema ye ta ūtibhis taranto viśvā spṛdha āryeṇa dasyūn /
analyzed: sanema ye te ūtibhiḥ tarantaḥ viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ āryeṇa dasyūn

original: RV_2,011.19c asmabhyaṃ tat tvāṣṭraṃ viśvarūpam arandhayaḥ sākhyasya tritāya //
analyzed: asmabhyam tat tvāṣṭram viśva rūpam arandhayaḥ sākhyasya tritāya

original: RV_2,011.20a asya suvānasya mandinas tritasya ny arbudaṃ vāvṛdhāno astaḥ /
analyzed: asya suvānasya mandinaḥ tritasya ni arbudam vāvṛdhānaḥ astar

original: RV_2,011.20c avartayat sūryo na cakram bhinad valam indro aṅgirasvān //
analyzed: avartayat sūryaḥ na cakram bhinat valam indraḥ aṅgirasvān

original: RV_2,011.21a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
analyzed: nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_2,011.21c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,012.01a yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat /
analyzed: yaḥ jātaḥ eva prathamaḥ manasvān devaḥ devān kratunā paryabhūṣat

original: RV_2,012.01c yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yasya śuṣmāt rodasī abhyasetām nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.02a yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyathamānām adṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitāṃ aramṇāt /
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivīm vyathamānām adṛṃhat yaḥ parvatān prakupitām aramṇāt

original: RV_2,012.02c yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyām astabhnāt sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ antarikṣam vimame varīyaḥ yaḥ dyām astabhnāt sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.03a yo hatvāhim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gā udājad apadhā valasya /
analyzed: yaḥ hatvā ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yaḥ gāḥ udājat apadhā valasya

original: RV_2,012.03c yo aśmanor antar agniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ aśmanoḥ antar agnim jajāna saṃvṛj samatsu sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.04a yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇam adharaṃ guhākaḥ /
analyzed: yena imā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yaḥ dāsam varṇam adharam guhā akaḥ

original: RV_2,012.04c śvaghnīva yo jigīvāṃl lakṣam ādad aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: śvaghnī iva yaḥ jigīvān lakṣam ādat aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.05a yaṃ smā pṛcchanti kuha seti ghoram utem āhur naiṣo astīty enam /
analyzed: yam sma pṛcchanti kuha sa iti ghoram uta īm āhuḥ na eṣaḥ asti iti enam

original: RV_2,012.05c so aryaḥ puṣṭīr vija ivā mināti śrad asmai dhatta sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: saḥ aryaḥ puṣṭīḥ vijaḥ iva ā mināti śrath asmai dhatta sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.06a yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasya kīreḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ nādhamānasya kīreḥ

original: RV_2,012.06c yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yukta grāvṇaḥ yaḥ vitā su śipraḥ suta somasya sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.07a yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ /
analyzed: yasya aśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvaḥ yasya grāmāḥ yasya viśve rathāsaḥ

original: RV_2,012.07c yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ sūryam yaḥ uṣasam jajāna yaḥ apām netā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.08a yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare 'vara ubhayā amitrāḥ /
analyzed: yam krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare vare ubhayāḥ amitrāḥ

original: RV_2,012.08c samānaṃ cid ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: samānam cit ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.09a yasmān na ṛte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante /
analyzed: yasmāt na ṛte vijayante janāsaḥ yam yudhyamānāḥ avase havante

original: RV_2,012.09c yo viśvasya pratimānam babhūva yo acyutacyut sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasya pratimānam babhūva yaḥ a cyuta cyut sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.10a yaḥ śaśvato mahy eno dadhānān amanyamānāñ charvā jaghāna /
analyzed: yaḥ śaśvataḥ mahi enaḥ dadhānān a manyamānām śarvā jaghāna

original: RV_2,012.10c yaḥ śardhate nānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyor hantā sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ śardhate na anudadāti śṛdhyām yaḥ dasyoḥ hantā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.11a yaḥ śambaram parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃ śarady anvavindat /
analyzed: yaḥ śambaram parvateṣu kṣiyantam catvāriṃśyām śaradi anvavindat

original: RV_2,012.11c ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghāna dānum śayānam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.12a yaḥ saptaraśmir vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn /
analyzed: yaḥ sapta raśmiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn

original: RV_2,012.12c yo rauhiṇam asphurad vajrabāhur dyām ārohantaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ rauhiṇam asphurat vajra bāhuḥ dyām ārohantam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.13a dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāc cid asya parvatā bhayante /
analyzed: dyāvā cit asmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāt cit asya parvatāḥ bhayante

original: RV_2,012.13c yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhur yo vajrahastaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ soma pāḥ nicitaḥ vajra bāhuḥ yaḥ vajra hastaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.14a yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī /
analyzed: yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantam yaḥ śaṃsantam yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī

original: RV_2,012.14c yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //
analyzed: yasya brahma vardhanam yasya somaḥ yasya idam rādhaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_2,012.15a yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dardarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhraḥ ā cit vājam dardarṣi sa kila asi satyaḥ

original: RV_2,012.15c vayaṃ ta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
analyzed: vayam te indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema

original: RV_2,013.01a ṛtur janitrī tasyā apas pari makṣū jāta āviśad yāsu vardhate /
analyzed: ṛtuḥ janitrī tasyāḥ apaḥ pari makṣū jātaḥ āviśat yāsu vardhate

original: RV_2,013.01c tad āhanā abhavat pipyuṣī payo 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamaṃ tad ukthyam //
analyzed: tat āhanāḥ abhavat pipyuṣī payaḥ ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamam tat ukthyam

original: RV_2,013.02a sadhrīm ā yanti pari bibhratīḥ payo viśvapsnyāya pra bharanta bhojanam /
analyzed: sadhrīm ā yanti pari bibhratīḥ payaḥ viśvapsnyāya pra bharanta bhojanam

original: RV_2,013.02c samāno adhvā pravatām anuṣyade yas tākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: samānaḥ adhvā pravatām anuṣyade yaḥ tā akṛṇoḥ prathamam sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.03a anv eko vadati yad dadāti tad rūpā minan tadapā eka īyate /
analyzed: anu ekaḥ vadati yat dadāti tat rūpā minan tad apāḥ ekaḥ īyate

original: RV_2,013.03c viśvā ekasya vinudas titikṣate yas tākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāḥ ekasya vinudaḥ titikṣate yaḥ tā akṛṇoḥ prathamam sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.04a prajābhyaḥ puṣṭiṃ vibhajanta āsate rayim iva pṛṣṭham prabhavantam āyate /
analyzed: prajābhyaḥ puṣṭim vibhajantaḥ āsate rayim iva pṛṣṭham prabhavantam āyate

original: RV_2,013.04c asinvan daṃṣṭraiḥ pitur atti bhojanaṃ yas tākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: asinvan daṃṣṭraiḥ pituḥ atti bhojanam yaḥ tā akṛṇoḥ prathamam sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.05a adhākṛṇoḥ pṛthivīṃ saṃdṛśe dive yo dhautīnām ahihann āriṇak pathaḥ /
analyzed: adha akṛṇoḥ pṛthivīm saṃdṛśe dive yaḥ dhautīnām ahi han āriṇak pathaḥ

original: RV_2,013.05c taṃ tvā stomebhir udabhir na vājinaṃ devaṃ devā ajanan sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā stomebhiḥ udabhiḥ na vājinam devam devāḥ ajanan sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.06a yo bhojanaṃ ca dayase ca vardhanam ārdrād ā śuṣkam madhumad dudohitha /
analyzed: yaḥ bhojanam ca dayase ca vardhanam ārdrāt ā śuṣkam madhumat dudohitha

original: RV_2,013.06c sa śevadhiṃ ni dadhiṣe vivasvati viśvasyaika īśiṣe sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: sa śevadhim ni dadhiṣe vivasvati viśvasya ekaḥ īśiṣe sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.07a yaḥ puṣpiṇīś ca prasvaś ca dharmaṇādhi dāne vy avanīr adhārayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ puṣpiṇīḥ ca prasvaḥ ca dharmaṇā adhi dāne vi avanīḥ adhārayaḥ

original: RV_2,013.07c yaś cāsamā ajano didyuto diva urur ūrvāṃ abhitaḥ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ca asamāḥ ajanaḥ didyutaḥ divaḥ uruḥ ūrvām abhitas sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.08a yo nārmaraṃ sahavasuṃ nihantave pṛkṣāya ca dāsaveśāya cāvahaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ nārmaram sahavasum nihantave pṛkṣāya ca dāsaveśāya ca avahaḥ

original: RV_2,013.08c ūrjayantyā apariviṣṭam āsyam utaivādya purukṛt sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: ūrjayantyāḥ apariviṣṭam āsyam uta eva adya puru kṛt sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.09a śataṃ vā yasya daśa sākam ādya ekasya śruṣṭau yad dha codam āvitha /
analyzed: śatam vā yasya daśa sākam ādyaḥ ekasya śruṣṭau yat ha codam āvitha

original: RV_2,013.09c arajjau dasyūn sam unab dabhītaye suprāvyo abhavaḥ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: a rajjau dasyūn sam unap dabhītaye suprāvyaḥ abhavaḥ sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.10a viśved anu rodhanā asya pauṃsyaṃ dadur asmai dadhire kṛtnave dhanam /
analyzed: viśvā id anu rodhanā asya pauṃsyam daduḥ asmai dadhire kṛtnave dhanam

original: RV_2,013.10c ṣaḷ astabhnā viṣṭiraḥ pañca saṃdṛśaḥ pari paro abhavaḥ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaḍ astabhnāḥ viṣṭiraḥ pañca saṃdṛśaḥ pari paras abhavaḥ sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.11a supravācanaṃ tava vīra vīryaṃ yad ekena kratunā vindase vasu /
analyzed: su pravācanam tava vīra vīryam yat ekena kratunā vindase vasu

original: RV_2,013.11c jātūṣṭhirasya pra vayaḥ sahasvato yā cakartha sendra viśvāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: jātūṣṭhirasya pra vayaḥ sahasvataḥ yā cakartha sa indra viśvā asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.12a aramayaḥ sarapasas tarāya kaṃ turvītaye ca vayyāya ca srutim /
analyzed: aramayaḥ sarapasaḥ tarāya kam turvītaye ca vayyāya ca srutim

original: RV_2,013.12c nīcā santam ud anayaḥ parāvṛjam prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ śravayan sāsy ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: nīcā santam ud anayaḥ parāvṛjam pra andham śroṇam śravayan sa asi ukthyaḥ

original: RV_2,013.13a asmabhyaṃ tad vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam /
analyzed: asmabhyam tat vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam

original: RV_2,013.13c indra yac citraṃ śravasyā anu dyūn bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: indra yat citram śravasyāḥ anu dyūn bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,014.01a adhvaryavo bharatendrāya somam āmatrebhiḥ siñcatā madyam andhaḥ /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ bharata indrāya somam āmatrebhiḥ siñcata madyam andhaḥ

original: RV_2,014.01c kāmī hi vīraḥ sadam asya pītiṃ juhota vṛṣṇe tad id eṣa vaṣṭi //
analyzed: kāmī hi vīraḥ sadam asya pītim juhota vṛṣṇe tat id eṣa vaṣṭi

original: RV_2,014.02a adhvaryavo yo apo vavrivāṃsaṃ vṛtraṃ jaghānāśanyeva vṛkṣam /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ apaḥ vavrivāṃsam vṛtram jaghāna aśanyā iva vṛkṣam

original: RV_2,014.02c tasmā etam bharata tadvaśāyaṃ eṣa indro arhati pītim asya //
analyzed: tasmai etam bharata tad vaśāyam eṣaḥ indraḥ arhati pītim asya

original: RV_2,014.03a adhvaryavo yo dṛbhīkaṃ jaghāna yo gā udājad apa hi valaṃ vaḥ /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ dṛbhīkam jaghāna yaḥ gāḥ udājat apa hi valam vaḥ

original: RV_2,014.03c tasmā etam antarikṣe na vātam indraṃ somair orṇuta jūr na vastraiḥ //
analyzed: tasmai etam antarikṣe na vātam indram somaiḥ orṇuta jūḥ na vastraiḥ

original: RV_2,014.04a adhvaryavo ya uraṇaṃ jaghāna nava cakhvāṃsaṃ navatiṃ ca bāhūn /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ uraṇam jaghāna nava cakhvāṃsam navatim ca bāhūn

original: RV_2,014.04c yo arbudam ava nīcā babādhe tam indraṃ somasya bhṛthe hinota //
analyzed: yaḥ arbudam ava nīcā babādhe tam indram somasya bhṛthe hinota

original: RV_2,014.05a adhvaryavo yaḥ sv aśnaṃ jaghāna yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ yo vyaṃsam /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ su aśnam jaghāna yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣam yaḥ vyaṃsam

original: RV_2,014.05c yaḥ pipruṃ namuciṃ yo rudhikrāṃ tasmā indrāyāndhaso juhota //
analyzed: yaḥ piprum namucim yaḥ rudhikrām tasmai indrāya andhasaḥ juhota

original: RV_2,014.06a adhvaryavo yaḥ śataṃ śambarasya puro bibhedāśmaneva pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ śatam śambarasya puraḥ bibheda aśmanā iva pūrvīḥ

original: RV_2,014.06c yo varcinaḥ śatam indraḥ sahasram apāvapad bharatā somam asmai //
analyzed: yaḥ varcinaḥ śatam indraḥ sahasram apāvapat bharata somam asmai

original: RV_2,014.07a adhvaryavo yaḥ śatam ā sahasram bhūmyā upasthe 'vapaj jaghanvān /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ śatam ā sahasram bhūmyāḥ upasthe vapat jaghanvān

original: RV_2,014.07c kutsasyāyor atithigvasya vīrān ny āvṛṇag bharatā somam asmai //
analyzed: kutsasya āyoḥ atithigvasya vīrān ni āvṛṇak bharatā somam asmai

original: RV_2,014.08a adhvaryavo yan naraḥ kāmayādhve śruṣṭī vahanto naśathā tad indre /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yat naraḥ kāmayādhve śruṣṭī vahantaḥ naśatha tat indre

original: RV_2,014.08c gabhastipūtam bharata śrutāyendrāya somaṃ yajyavo juhota //
analyzed: gabhasti pūtam bharata śrutāya indrāya somam yajyavaḥ juhota

original: RV_2,014.09a adhvaryavaḥ kartanā śruṣṭim asmai vane nipūtaṃ vana un nayadhvam /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ kartana śruṣṭim asmai vane nipūtam vane ud nayadhvam

original: RV_2,014.09c juṣāṇo hastyam abhi vāvaśe va indrāya somam madiraṃ juhota //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ hastyam abhi vāvaśe vaḥ indrāya somam madiram juhota

original: RV_2,014.10a adhvaryavaḥ payasodhar yathā goḥ somebhir īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ payasodhar yathā goḥ somebhiḥ īm pṛṇata bhojam indram

original: RV_2,014.10c vedāham asya nibhṛtam ma etad ditsantam bhūyo yajataś ciketa //
analyzed: veda aham asya nibhṛtam me etat ditsantam bhūyas yajataḥ ciketa

original: RV_2,014.11a adhvaryavo yo divyasya vasvo yaḥ pārthivasya kṣamyasya rājā /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ divyasya vasvaḥ yaḥ pārthivasya kṣamyasya rājā

original: RV_2,014.11c tam ūrdaraṃ na pṛṇatā yavenendraṃ somebhis tad apo vo astu //
analyzed: tam ūrdaram na pṛṇatā yavena indram somebhiḥ tat apaḥ vaḥ astu

original: RV_2,014.12a asmabhyaṃ tad vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam /
analyzed: asmabhyam tat vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam

original: RV_2,014.12c indra yac citraṃ śravasyā anu dyūn bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: indra yat citram śravasyāḥ anu dyūn bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,015.01a pra ghā nv asya mahato mahāni satyā satyasya karaṇāni vocam /
analyzed: pra ghā nu asya mahataḥ mahāni satyā satyasya karaṇāni vocam

original: RV_2,015.01c trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasyāsya made ahim indro jaghāna //
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya asya made ahim indraḥ jaghāna

original: RV_2,015.02a avaṃśe dyām astabhāyad bṛhantam ā rodasī apṛṇad antarikṣam /
analyzed: avaṃśe dyām astabhāyat bṛhantam ā rodasī apṛṇat antarikṣam

original: RV_2,015.02c sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathac ca somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathat ca somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.03a sadmeva prāco vi mimāya mānair vajreṇa khāny atṛṇan nadīnām /
analyzed: sadma iva prācaḥ vi mimāya mānaiḥ vajreṇa khāni atṛṇat nadīnām

original: RV_2,015.03c vṛthāsṛjat pathibhir dīrghayāthaiḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: vṛthā sṛjat pathibhiḥ dīrghayāthaiḥ somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.04a sa pravoḷhṝn parigatyā dabhīter viśvam adhāg āyudham iddhe agnau /
analyzed: sa pravoḷhṝn parigatya dabhīteḥ viśvam adhāk āyudham iddhe agnau

original: RV_2,015.04c saṃ gobhir aśvair asṛjad rathebhiḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ asṛjat rathebhiḥ somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.05a sa īm mahīṃ dhunim etor aramṇāt so asnātṝn apārayat svasti /
analyzed: saḥ īm mahīm dhunim etoḥ aramṇāt saḥ asnātṝn apārayat svasti

original: RV_2,015.05c ta utsnāya rayim abhi pra tasthuḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: te utsnāya rayim abhi pra tasthuḥ somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.06a sodañcaṃ sindhum ariṇān mahitvā vajreṇāna uṣasaḥ sam pipeṣa /
analyzed: sā udañcam sindhum ariṇāt mahitvā vajreṇa anaḥ uṣasaḥ sam pipeṣa

original: RV_2,015.06c ajavaso javinībhir vivṛścan somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: ajavasaḥ javinībhiḥ vivṛścan somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.07a sa vidvāṃ apagohaṃ kanīnām āvir bhavann ud atiṣṭhat parāvṛk /
analyzed: sa vidvān apagoham kanīnām āvis bhavan ud atiṣṭhat parāvṛj

original: RV_2,015.07c prati śroṇa sthād vy anag acaṣṭa somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: prati śroṇa sthāt vi anak acaṣṭa somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.08a bhinad valam aṅgirobhir gṛṇāno vi parvatasya dṛṃhitāny airat /
analyzed: bhinat valam aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ vi parvatasya dṛṃhitāni airat

original: RV_2,015.08c riṇag rodhāṃsi kṛtrimāṇy eṣāṃ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: riṇak rodhāṃsi kṛtrimāṇi eṣām somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.09a svapnenābhyupyā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca jaghantha dasyum pra dabhītim āvaḥ /
analyzed: svapnena abhyupya cumurim dhunim ca jaghantha dasyum pra dabhītim āvaḥ

original: RV_2,015.09c rambhī cid atra vivide hiraṇyaṃ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
analyzed: rambhī cit atra vivide hiraṇyam somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra

original: RV_2,015.10a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
analyzed: nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_2,015.10c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,016.01a pra vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamāya suṣṭutim agnāv iva samidhāne havir bhare /
analyzed: pra vaḥ satām jyeṣṭhatamāya suṣṭutim agnau iva samidhāne haviḥ bhare

original: RV_2,016.01c indram ajuryaṃ jarayantam ukṣitaṃ sanād yuvānam avase havāmahe //
analyzed: indram ajuryam jarayantam ukṣitam sanāt yuvānam avase havāmahe

original: RV_2,016.02a yasmād indrād bṛhataḥ kiṃ canem ṛte viśvāny asmin sambhṛtādhi vīryā /
analyzed: yasmāt indrāt bṛhataḥ kim cana īm ṛte viśvāni asmin sambhṛtā adhi vīryā

original: RV_2,016.02c jaṭhare somaṃ tanvī saho maho haste vajram bharati śīrṣaṇi kratum //
analyzed: jaṭhare somam tanvī sahaḥ mahaḥ haste vajram bharati śīrṣaṇi kratum

original: RV_2,016.03a na kṣoṇībhyām paribhve ta indriyaṃ na samudraiḥ parvatair indra te rathaḥ /
analyzed: na kṣoṇībhyām paribhve te indriyam na samudraiḥ parvataiḥ indra te rathaḥ

original: RV_2,016.03c na te vajram anv aśnoti kaś cana yad āśubhiḥ patasi yojanā puru //
analyzed: na te vajram anu aśnoti kaḥ cana yat āśubhiḥ patasi yojanā puru

original: RV_2,016.04a viśve hy asmai yajatāya dhṛṣṇave kratum bharanti vṛṣabhāya saścate /
analyzed: viśve hi asmai yajatāya dhṛṣṇave kratum bharanti vṛṣabhāya saścate

original: RV_2,016.04c vṛṣā yajasva haviṣā viduṣṭaraḥ pibendra somaṃ vṛṣabheṇa bhānunā //
analyzed: vṛṣā yajasva haviṣā viduṣṭaraḥ piba indra somam vṛṣabheṇa bhānunā

original: RV_2,016.05a vṛṣṇaḥ kośaḥ pavate madhva ūrmir vṛṣabhānnāya vṛṣabhāya pātave /
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ kośaḥ pavate madhvaḥ ūrmiḥ vṛṣabha annāya vṛṣabhāya pātave

original: RV_2,016.05c vṛṣaṇādhvaryū vṛṣabhāso adrayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somaṃ vṛṣabhāya suṣvati //
analyzed: vṛṣaṇā adhvaryū vṛṣabhāsaḥ adrayaḥ vṛṣaṇam somam vṛṣabhāya

original: RV_2,016.06a vṛṣā te vajra uta te vṛṣā ratho vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣabhāṇy āyudhā /
analyzed: vṛṣā te vajraḥ uta te vṛṣā rathaḥ vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣabhāṇi āyudhā

original: RV_2,016.06c vṛṣṇo madasya vṛṣabha tvam īśiṣa indra somasya vṛṣabhasya tṛpṇuhi //
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ madasya vṛṣabha tvam īśiṣe indra somasya vṛṣabhasya tṛpṇuhi

original: RV_2,016.07a pra te nāvaṃ na samane vacasyuvam brahmaṇā yāmi savaneṣu dādhṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: pra te nāvam na samane vacasyuvam brahmaṇā yāmi savaneṣu dādhṛṣiḥ

original: RV_2,016.07c kuvin no asya vacaso nibodhiṣad indram utsaṃ na vasunaḥ sicāmahe //
analyzed: kuvid naḥ asya vacasaḥ nibodhiṣat indram utsam na vasunaḥ sicāmahe

original: RV_2,016.08a purā sambādhād abhy ā vavṛtsva no dhenur na vatsaṃ yavasasya pipyuṣī /
analyzed: purā sambādhāt abhī ā vavṛtsva naḥ dhenuḥ na vatsam yavasasya pipyuṣī

original: RV_2,016.08c sakṛt su te sumatibhiḥ śatakrato sam patnībhir na vṛṣaṇo nasīmahi //
analyzed: sakṛt su te sumatibhiḥ śatakrato sam patnībhiḥ na vṛṣaṇaḥ nasīmahi

original: RV_2,016.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
analyzed: nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_2,016.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,017.01a tad asmai navyam aṅgirasvad arcata śuṣmā yad asya pratnathodīrate /
analyzed: tat asmai navyam aṅgirasvat arcata śuṣmāḥ yat asya pratnathā udīrate

original: RV_2,017.01c viśvā yad gotrā sahasā parīvṛtā made somasya dṛṃhitāny airayat //
analyzed: viśvā yat gotrā sahasā parīvṛtā made somasya dṛṃhitāni airayat

original: RV_2,017.02a sa bhūtu yo ha prathamāya dhāyasa ojo mimāno mahimānam ātirat /
analyzed: sa bhūtu yaḥ ha prathamāya dhāyasaḥ ojaḥ mimānaḥ mahimānam ātirat

original: RV_2,017.02c śūro yo yutsu tanvam parivyata śīrṣaṇi dyām mahinā praty amuñcata //
analyzed: śūraḥ yaḥ yutsu tanvam parivyata śīrṣaṇi dyām mahinā prati amuñcata

original: RV_2,017.03a adhākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ vīryam mahad yad asyāgre brahmaṇā śuṣmam airayaḥ /
analyzed: adha akṛṇoḥ prathamam vīryam mahat yat asya agre brahmaṇā śuṣmam airayaḥ

original: RV_2,017.03c ratheṣṭhena haryaśvena vicyutāḥ pra jīrayaḥ sisrate sadhryak pṛthak //
analyzed: ratheṣṭhena hari aśvena vicyutāḥ pra jīrayaḥ sisrate sadhryak pṛthak

original: RV_2,017.04a adhā yo viśvā bhuvanābhi majmaneśānakṛt pravayā abhy avardhata /
analyzed: adhā yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā abhi majmanā īśāna kṛt pravayāḥ abhī avardhata

original: RV_2,017.04c ād rodasī jyotiṣā vahnir ātanot sīvyan tamāṃsi dudhitā sam avyayat //
analyzed: āt rodasī jyotiṣā vahniḥ ātanot sīvyan tamāṃsi dudhitā sam avyayat

original: RV_2,017.05a sa prācīnān parvatān dṛṃhad ojasādharācīnam akṛṇod apām apaḥ /
analyzed: sa prācīnān parvatān dṛṃhat ojasā adharācīnam akṛṇot apām apaḥ

original: RV_2,017.05c adhārayat pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyasam astabhnān māyayā dyām avasrasaḥ //
analyzed: adhārayat pṛthivīm viśva dhāyasam astabhnāt māyayā dyām avasrasaḥ

original: RV_2,017.06a sāsmā aram bāhubhyāṃ yam pitākṛṇod viśvasmād ā januṣo vedasas pari /
analyzed: sa asmai aram bāhubhyām yam pitā akṛṇot viśvasmāt ā januṣaḥ vedasaḥ pari

original: RV_2,017.06c yenā pṛthivyāṃ ni kriviṃ śayadhyai vajreṇa hatvy avṛṇak tuviṣvaṇiḥ //
analyzed: yenā pṛthivyām ni krivim śayadhyai vajreṇa hatvī avṛṇak tuviṣvaṇiḥ

original: RV_2,017.07a amājūr iva pitroḥ sacā satī samānād ā sadasas tvām iye bhagam /
analyzed: amājūḥ iva pitroḥ sacā satī samānāt ā sadasaḥ tvām iye bhagam

original: RV_2,017.07c kṛdhi praketam upa māsy ā bhara daddhi bhāgaṃ tanvo yena māmahaḥ //
analyzed: kṛdhi praketam upa māsi ā bhara daddhi bhāgam tanvaḥ yena māmahaḥ

original: RV_2,017.08a bhojaṃ tvām indra vayaṃ huvema dadiṣ ṭvam indrāpāṃsi vājān /
analyzed: bhojam tvām indra vayam huvema dadiḥ tvam indra apāṃsi vājān

original: RV_2,017.08c aviḍḍhīndra citrayā na ūtī kṛdhi vṛṣann indra vasyaso naḥ //
analyzed: aviḍḍhi indra citrayā naḥ ūtī kṛdhi vṛṣan indra vasyasaḥ naḥ

original: RV_2,017.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
analyzed: nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_2,017.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,018.01a prātā ratho navo yoji sasniś caturyugas trikaśaḥ saptaraśmiḥ /
analyzed: prātā rathaḥ navaḥ yoji sasniḥ catur yugaḥ trikaśaḥ sapta raśmiḥ

original: RV_2,018.01c daśāritro manuṣyaḥ svarṣāḥ sa iṣṭibhir matibhī raṃhyo bhūt //
analyzed: daśa aritraḥ manuṣyaḥ svarṣāḥ saḥ iṣṭibhiḥ matibhiḥ raṃhyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_2,018.02a sāsmā aram prathamaṃ sa dvitīyam uto tṛtīyam manuṣaḥ sa hotā /
analyzed: sa asmai aram prathamam sa dvitīyam uta u tṛtīyam manuṣaḥ sa hotā

original: RV_2,018.02c anyasyā garbham anya ū jananta so anyebhiḥ sacate jenyo vṛṣā //
analyzed: anyasyāḥ garbham anye u jananta saḥ anyebhiḥ sacate jenyaḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_2,018.03a harī nu kaṃ ratha indrasya yojam āyai sūktena vacasā navena /
analyzed: harī nu kam rathe indrasya yojam āyai sūktena vacasā navena

original: RV_2,018.03c mo ṣu tvām atra bahavo hi viprā ni rīraman yajamānāso anye //
analyzed: mā u su tvām atra bahavaḥ hi viprāḥ ni rīraman yajamānāsaḥ anye

original: RV_2,018.04a ā dvābhyāṃ haribhyām indra yāhy ā caturbhir ā ṣaḍbhir hūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: ā dvābhyām haribhyām indra yāhi ā caturbhiḥ ā ṣaḍbhiḥ hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_2,018.04c āṣṭābhir daśabhiḥ somapeyam ayaṃ sutaḥ sumakha mā mṛdhas kaḥ //
analyzed: ā aṣṭābhiḥ daśabhiḥ soma peyam ayam sutaḥ su makha mā mṛdhaḥ kaḥ

original: RV_2,018.05a ā viṃśatyā triṃśatā yāhy arvāṅ ā catvāriṃśatā haribhir yujānaḥ /
analyzed: ā viṃśatyā triṃśatā yāhi arvāṅ ā catvāriṃśatā haribhiḥ yujānaḥ

original: RV_2,018.05c ā pañcāśatā surathebhir indrā ṣaṣṭyā saptatyā somapeyam //
analyzed: ā pañcāśatā su rathebhiḥ indra ā ṣaṣṭyā saptatyā soma peyam

original: RV_2,018.06a āśītyā navatyā yāhy arvāṅ ā śatena haribhir uhyamānaḥ /
analyzed: ā aśītyā navatyā yāhi arvāṅ ā śatena haribhiḥ uhyamānaḥ

original: RV_2,018.06c ayaṃ hi te śunahotreṣu soma indra tvāyā pariṣikto madāya //
analyzed: ayam hi te śunahotreṣu somaḥ indra tvāyā pariṣiktaḥ madāya

original: RV_2,018.07a mama brahmendra yāhy acchā viśvā harī dhuri dhiṣvā rathasya /
analyzed: mama brahma indra yāhi acchā viśvā harī dhuri dhiṣvā rathasya

original: RV_2,018.07c purutrā hi vihavyo babhūthāsmiñ chūra savane mādayasva //
analyzed: purutrā hi vihavyaḥ babhūtha asmin śūra savane mādayasva

original: RV_2,018.08a na ma indreṇa sakhyaṃ vi yoṣad asmabhyam asya dakṣiṇā duhīta /
analyzed: na me indreṇa sakhyam vi yoṣat asmabhyam asya dakṣiṇā duhīta

original: RV_2,018.08c upa jyeṣṭhe varūthe gabhastau prāye-prāye jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma //
analyzed: upa jyeṣṭhe varūthe gabhastau prāye prāye jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma

original: RV_2,018.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
analyzed: nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_2,018.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,019.01a apāyy asyāndhaso madāya manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ /
analyzed: apāyi asya andhasaḥ madāya manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ

original: RV_2,019.01c yasminn indraḥ pradivi vāvṛdhāna oko dadhe brahmaṇyantaś ca naraḥ //
analyzed: yasmin indraḥ pradivi vāvṛdhānaḥ okaḥ dadhe brahmaṇyantaḥ ca naraḥ

original: RV_2,019.02a asya mandāno madhvo vajrahasto 'him indro arṇovṛtaṃ vi vṛścat /
analyzed: asya mandānaḥ madhvaḥ vajra hastaḥ him indraḥ arṇaḥ vṛtam vi vṛścat

original: RV_2,019.02c pra yad vayo na svasarāṇy acchā prayāṃsi ca nadīnāṃ cakramanta //
analyzed: pra yat vayaḥ na svasarāṇi acchā prayāṃsi ca nadīnām cakramanta

original: RV_2,019.03a sa māhina indro arṇo apām prairayad ahihācchā samudram /
analyzed: sa māhinaḥ indraḥ arṇaḥ apām prairayat ahi hā acchā samudram

original: RV_2,019.03c ajanayat sūryaṃ vidad gā aktunāhnāṃ vayunāni sādhat //
analyzed: ajanayat sūryam vidat gāḥ aktunā ahnām vayunāni sādhat

original: RV_2,019.04a so apratīni manave purūṇīndro dāśad dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram /
analyzed: saḥ apratīni manave purūṇi indraḥ dāśat dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram

original: RV_2,019.04c sadyo yo nṛbhyo atasāyyo bhūt paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau //
analyzed: sadyas yaḥ nṛbhyaḥ atasāyyaḥ bhūt paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau

original: RV_2,019.05a sa sunvata indraḥ sūryam ā devo riṇaṅ martyāya stavān /
analyzed: sa sunvate indraḥ sūryam ā devaḥ riṇak martyāya stavān

original: RV_2,019.05c ā yad rayiṃ guhadavadyam asmai bharad aṃśaṃ naitaśo daśasyan //
analyzed: ā yat rayim guhadavadyam asmai bharat aṃśam na etaśaḥ daśasyan

original: RV_2,019.06a sa randhayat sadivaḥ sārathaye śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ kuyavaṃ kutsāya /
analyzed: sa randhayat sadivas sārathaye śuṣṇam aśuṣam kuyavam kutsāya

original: RV_2,019.06c divodāsāya navatiṃ ca navendraḥ puro vy airac chambarasya //
analyzed: divodāsāya navatim ca nava indraḥ puraḥ vi airat śambarasya

original: RV_2,019.07a evā ta indrocatham ahema śravasyā na tmanā vājayantaḥ /
analyzed: eva te indra ucatham ahema śravasyā na tmanā vājayantaḥ

original: RV_2,019.07c aśyāma tat sāptam āśuṣāṇā nanamo vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ //
