original: RV_3,001.18a ni duroṇe amṛto martyānāṃ rājā sasāda vidathāni sādhan /
analyzed: ni duroṇe amṛtaḥ martyānām rājā sasāda vidathāni sādhan

original: RV_3,001.18c ghṛtapratīka urviyā vy adyaud agnir viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān //
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkaḥ urviyā vi adyaut agniḥ viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān

original: RV_3,001.19a ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan /
analyzed: ā naḥ gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhiḥ mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan

original: RV_3,001.19c asme rayim bahulaṃ saṃtarutraṃ suvācam bhāgaṃ yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ //
analyzed: asme rayim bahulam saṃtarutram su vācam bhāgam yaśasam kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_3,001.20a etā te agne janimā sanāni pra pūrvyāya nūtanāni vocam /
analyzed: etā te agne janimā sanāni pra pūrvyāya nūtanāni vocam

original: RV_3,001.20c mahānti vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā janmañ-janman nihito jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: mahānti vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtā imā janman janman nihitaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: RV_3,001.21a janmañ-janman nihito jātavedā viśvāmitrebhir idhyate ajasraḥ /
analyzed: janman janman nihitaḥ jātavedāḥ viśvāmitrebhiḥ idhyate ajasraḥ

original: RV_3,001.21c tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_3,001.22a imaṃ yajñaṃ sahasāvan tvaṃ no devatrā dhehi sukrato rarāṇaḥ /
analyzed: imam yajñam sahasāvan tvam naḥ devatrā dhehi su krato rarāṇaḥ

original: RV_3,001.22c pra yaṃsi hotar bṛhatīr iṣo no 'gne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva //
analyzed: pra yaṃsi hotar bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ naḥ gne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva

original: RV_3,001.23a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,001.23c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,002.01a vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe ghṛtaṃ na pūtam agnaye janāmasi /
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe ghṛtam na pūtam agnaye janāmasi

original: RV_3,002.01c dvitā hotāram manuṣaś ca vāghato dhiyā rathaṃ na kuliśaḥ sam ṛṇvati //
analyzed: dvitā hotāram manuṣaḥ ca vāghataḥ dhiyā ratham na kuliśaḥ sam ṛṇvati

original: RV_3,002.02a sa rocayaj januṣā rodasī ubhe sa mātror abhavat putra īḍyaḥ /
analyzed: sa rocayat januṣā rodasī ubhe sa mātroḥ abhavat putraḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_3,002.02c havyavāḷ agnir ajaraś canohito dūḷabho viśām atithir vibhāvasuḥ //
analyzed: havyavāṭ agniḥ ajaraḥ canohitaḥ dūḍabhaḥ viśām atithiḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: RV_3,002.03a kratvā dakṣasya taruṣo vidharmaṇi devāso agniṃ janayanta cittibhiḥ /
analyzed: kratvā dakṣasya taruṣaḥ vidharmaṇi devāsaḥ agnim janayanta cittibhiḥ

original: RV_3,002.03c rurucānam bhānunā jyotiṣā mahām atyaṃ na vājaṃ saniṣyann upa bruve //
analyzed: rurucānam bhānunā jyotiṣā mahām atyam na vājam saniṣyan upa bruve

original: RV_3,002.04a ā mandrasya saniṣyanto vareṇyaṃ vṛṇīmahe ahrayaṃ vājam ṛgmiyam /
analyzed: ā mandrasya saniṣyantaḥ vareṇyam vṛṇīmahe ahrayam vājam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_3,002.04c rātim bhṛgūṇām uśijaṃ kavikratum agniṃ rājantaṃ divyena śociṣā //
analyzed: rātim bhṛgūṇām uśijam kavi kratum agnim rājantam divyena śociṣā

original: RV_3,002.05a agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janā vājaśravasam iha vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: agnim sumnāya dadhire puras janāḥ vāja śravasam iha vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_3,002.05c yatasrucaḥ surucaṃ viśvadevyaṃ rudraṃ yajñānāṃ sādhadiṣṭim apasām //
analyzed: yata srucaḥ su rucam viśvadevyam rudram yajñānām sādhat iṣṭim apasām

original: RV_3,002.06a pāvakaśoce tava hi kṣayam pari hotar yajñeṣu vṛktabarhiṣo naraḥ /
analyzed: pāvaka śoce tava hi kṣayam pari hotar yajñeṣu vṛkta barhiṣaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_3,002.06c agne duva icchamānāsa āpyam upāsate draviṇaṃ dhehi tebhyaḥ //
analyzed: agne duvaḥ icchamānāsaḥ āpyam upāsate draviṇam dhehi tebhyaḥ

original: RV_3,002.07a ā rodasī apṛṇad ā svar mahaj jātaṃ yad enam apaso adhārayan /
analyzed: ā rodasī apṛṇat ā svar mahat jātam yat enam apasaḥ adhārayan

original: RV_3,002.07c so adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kavir atyo na vājasātaye canohitaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kaviḥ atyaḥ na vājasātaye canohitaḥ

original: RV_3,002.08a namasyata havyadātiṃ svadhvaraṃ duvasyata damyaṃ jātavedasam /
analyzed: namasyata havya dātim su adhvaram duvasyata damyam jātavedasam

original: RV_3,002.08c rathīr ṛtasya bṛhato vicarṣaṇir agnir devānām abhavat purohitaḥ //
analyzed: rathīḥ ṛtasya bṛhataḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ agniḥ devānām abhavat purohitaḥ

original: RV_3,002.09a tisro yahvasya samidhaḥ parijmano 'gner apunann uśijo amṛtyavaḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ yahvasya samidhaḥ parijmanaḥ gneḥ apunan uśijaḥ amṛtyavaḥ

original: RV_3,002.09c tāsām ekām adadhur martye bhujam u lokam u dve upa jāmim īyatuḥ //
analyzed: tāsām ekām adadhuḥ martye bhujam u lokam u dve upa jāmim īyatuḥ

original: RV_3,002.10a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīr iṣaḥ saṃ sīm akṛṇvan svadhitiṃ na tejase /
analyzed: viśām kavim viśpatim mānuṣīḥ iṣaḥ sam sīm akṛṇvan svadhitim na tejase

original: RV_3,002.10c sa udvato nivato yāti veviṣat sa garbham eṣu bhuvaneṣu dīdharat //
analyzed: saḥ udvataḥ nivataḥ yāti veviṣat sa garbham eṣu bhuvaneṣu dīdharat

original: RV_3,002.11a sa jinvate jaṭhareṣu prajajñivān vṛṣā citreṣu nānadan na siṃhaḥ /
analyzed: sa jinvate jaṭhareṣu prajajñivān vṛṣā citreṣu nānadan na siṃhaḥ

original: RV_3,002.11c vaiśvānaraḥ pṛthupājā amartyo vasu ratnā dayamāno vi dāśuṣe //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ pṛthu pājāḥ amartyaḥ vasu ratnā dayamānaḥ vi dāśuṣe

original: RV_3,002.12a vaiśvānaraḥ pratnathā nākam āruhad divas pṛṣṭham bhandamānaḥ sumanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ pratnathā nākam āruhat divaḥ pṛṣṭham bhandamānaḥ su manmabhiḥ

original: RV_3,002.12c sa pūrvavaj janayañ jantave dhanaṃ samānam ajmam pary eti jāgṛviḥ //
analyzed: sa pūrvavat janayam jantave dhanam samānam ajmam pari eti jāgṛviḥ

original: RV_3,002.13a ṛtāvānaṃ yajñiyaṃ vipram ukthyam ā yaṃ dadhe mātariśvā divi kṣayam /
analyzed: ṛtāvānam yajñiyam vipram ukthyam ā yam dadhe mātariśvā divi kṣayam

original: RV_3,002.13c taṃ citrayāmaṃ harikeśam īmahe sudītim agniṃ suvitāya navyase //
analyzed: tam citra yāmam hari keśam īmahe su dītim agnim suvitāya navyase

original: RV_3,002.14a śuciṃ na yāmann iṣiraṃ svardṛśaṃ ketuṃ divo rocanasthām uṣarbudham /
analyzed: śucim na yāman iṣiram svar dṛśam ketum divaḥ rocana sthām uṣarbudham

original: RV_3,002.14c agnim mūrdhānaṃ divo apratiṣkutaṃ tam īmahe namasā vājinam bṛhat //
analyzed: agnim mūrdhānam divaḥ apratiṣkutam tam īmahe namasā vājinam bṛhat

original: RV_3,002.15a mandraṃ hotāraṃ śucim advayāvinaṃ damūnasam ukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim /
analyzed: mandram hotāram śucim advayāvinam damūnasam ukthyam viśvacarṣaṇim

original: RV_3,002.15c rathaṃ na citraṃ vapuṣāya darśatam manurhitaṃ sadam id rāya īmahe //
analyzed: ratham na citram vapuṣāya darśatam manuḥ hitam sadam id rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_3,003.01a vaiśvānarāya pṛthupājase vipo ratnā vidhanta dharuṇeṣu gātave /
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya pṛthu pājase vipaḥ ratnā vidhanta dharuṇeṣu gātave

original: RV_3,003.01c agnir hi devāṃ amṛto duvasyaty athā dharmāṇi sanatā na dūduṣat //
analyzed: agniḥ hi devān amṛtaḥ duvasyati athā dharmāṇi sanatā na dūduṣat

original: RV_3,003.02a antar dūto rodasī dasma īyate hotā niṣatto manuṣaḥ purohitaḥ /
analyzed: antar dūtaḥ rodasī dasmaḥ īyate hotā niṣattaḥ manuṣaḥ purohitaḥ

original: RV_3,003.02c kṣayam bṛhantam pari bhūṣati dyubhir devebhir agnir iṣito dhiyāvasuḥ //
analyzed: kṣayam bṛhantam pari bhūṣati dyubhiḥ devebhiḥ agniḥ iṣitaḥ dhiyāvasuḥ

original: RV_3,003.03a ketuṃ yajñānāṃ vidathasya sādhanaṃ viprāso agnim mahayanta cittibhiḥ /
analyzed: ketum yajñānām vidathasya sādhanam viprāsaḥ agnim mahayanta cittibhiḥ

original: RV_3,003.03c apāṃsi yasminn adhi saṃdadhur giras tasmin sumnāni yajamāna ā cake //
analyzed: apāṃsi yasmin adhi saṃdadhuḥ giraḥ tasmin sumnāni yajamānaḥ ā cake

original: RV_3,003.04a pitā yajñānām asuro vipaścitāṃ vimānam agnir vayunaṃ ca vāghatām /
analyzed: pitā yajñānām asuraḥ vipaścitām vimānam agniḥ vayunam ca vāghatām

original: RV_3,003.04c ā viveśa rodasī bhūrivarpasā purupriyo bhandate dhāmabhiḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: ā viveśa rodasī bhūri varpasā puru priyaḥ bhandate dhāmabhiḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_3,003.05a candram agniṃ candrarathaṃ harivrataṃ vaiśvānaram apsuṣadaṃ svarvidam /
analyzed: candram agnim candra ratham hari vratam vaiśvānaram apsuṣadam svar vidam

original: RV_3,003.05c vigāhaṃ tūrṇiṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam bhūrṇiṃ devāsa iha suśriyaṃ dadhuḥ //
analyzed: vigāham tūrṇim taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam bhūrṇim devāsaḥ iha su śriyam dadhuḥ

original: RV_3,003.06a agnir devebhir manuṣaś ca jantubhis tanvāno yajñam purupeśasaṃ dhiyā /
analyzed: agniḥ devebhiḥ manuṣaḥ ca jantubhiḥ tanvānaḥ yajñam puru peśasam dhiyā

original: RV_3,003.06c rathīr antar īyate sādhadiṣṭibhir jīro damūnā abhiśasticātanaḥ //
analyzed: rathīḥ antar īyate sādhat iṣṭibhiḥ jīraḥ damūnāḥ abhiśasti cātanaḥ

original: RV_3,003.07a agne jarasva svapatya āyuny ūrjā pinvasva sam iṣo didīhi naḥ /
analyzed: agne jarasva su apatye āyuni ūrjā pinvasva sam iṣaḥ didīhi naḥ

original: RV_3,003.07c vayāṃsi jinva bṛhataś ca jāgṛva uśig devānām asi sukratur vipām //
analyzed: vayāṃsi jinva bṛhataḥ ca jāgṛvaḥ uśij devānām asi su kratuḥ vipām

original: RV_3,003.08a viśpatiṃ yahvam atithiṃ naraḥ sadā yantāraṃ dhīnām uśijaṃ ca vāghatām /
analyzed: viśpatim yahvam atithim naraḥ sadā yantāram dhīnām uśijam ca vāghatām

original: RV_3,003.08c adhvarāṇāṃ cetanaṃ jātavedasam pra śaṃsanti namasā jūtibhir vṛdhe //
analyzed: adhvarāṇām cetanam jātavedasam pra śaṃsanti namasā jūtibhiḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_3,003.09a vibhāvā devaḥ suraṇaḥ pari kṣitīr agnir babhūva śavasā sumadrathaḥ /
analyzed: vibhāvā devaḥ su raṇaḥ pari kṣitīḥ agniḥ babhūva śavasā sumat rathaḥ

original: RV_3,003.09c tasya vratāni bhūripoṣiṇo vayam upa bhūṣema dama ā suvṛktibhiḥ //
analyzed: tasya vratāni bhūri poṣiṇaḥ vayam upa bhūṣema dame ā suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_3,003.10a vaiśvānara tava dhāmāny ā cake yebhiḥ svarvid abhavo vicakṣaṇa /
analyzed: vaiśvānara tava dhāmāni ā cake yebhiḥ svar vid abhavaḥ vicakṣaṇa

original: RV_3,003.10c jāta āpṛṇo bhuvanāni rodasī agne tā viśvā paribhūr asi tmanā //
analyzed: jātaḥ āpṛṇaḥ bhuvanāni rodasī agne tā viśvā paribhūḥ asi tmanā

original: RV_3,003.11a vaiśvānarasya daṃsanābhyo bṛhad ariṇād ekaḥ svapasyayā kaviḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya daṃsanābhyaḥ bṛhat ariṇāt ekaḥ su apasyayā kaviḥ

original: RV_3,003.11c ubhā pitarā mahayann ajāyatāgnir dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā //
analyzed: ubhā pitarā mahayan ajāyata agniḥ dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retasā

original: RV_3,004.01a samit-samit sumanā bodhy asme śucā-śucā sumatiṃ rāsi vasvaḥ /
analyzed: samidh samidh sumanāḥ bodhi asme śucā a śucā sumatim rāsi vasvaḥ

original: RV_3,004.01c ā deva devān yajathāya vakṣi sakhā sakhīn sumanā yakṣy agne //
analyzed: ā deva devān yajathāya vakṣi sakhā sakhīn sumanāḥ yakṣi agne

original: RV_3,004.02a yaṃ devāsas trir ahann āyajante dive-dive varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ tris ahan āyajante dive dive varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_3,004.02c semaṃ yajñam madhumantaṃ kṛdhī nas tanūnapād ghṛtayoniṃ vidhantam //
analyzed: sā imam yajñam madhumantam kṛdhī naḥ tanūnapād ghṛta yonim vidhantam

original: RV_3,004.03a pra dīdhitir viśvavārā jigāti hotāram iḷaḥ prathamaṃ yajadhyai /
analyzed: pra dīdhitiḥ viśva vārā jigāti hotāram iḷaḥ prathamam yajadhyai

original: RV_3,004.03c acchā namobhir vṛṣabhaṃ vandadhyai sa devān yakṣad iṣito yajīyān //
analyzed: acchā namobhiḥ vṛṣabham vandadhyai sa devān yakṣat iṣitaḥ yajīyān

original: RV_3,004.04a ūrdhvo vāṃ gātur adhvare akāry ūrdhvā śocīṃṣi prasthitā rajāṃsi /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ vām gātuḥ adhvare akāri ūrdhvā śocīṃṣi prasthitā rajāṃsi

original: RV_3,004.04c divo vā nābhā ny asādi hotā stṛṇīmahi devavyacā vi barhiḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ vā nābhā ni asādi hotā stṛṇīmahi deva vyacāḥ vi barhiḥ

original: RV_3,004.05a sapta hotrāṇi manasā vṛṇānā invanto viśvam prati yann ṛtena /
analyzed: sapta hotrāṇi manasā vṛṇānāḥ invantaḥ viśvam prati yan ṛtena

original: RV_3,004.05c nṛpeśaso vidatheṣu pra jātā abhīmaṃ yajñaṃ vi caranta pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: nṛ peśasaḥ vidatheṣu pra jātāḥ abhi imam yajñam vi caranta pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,004.06a ā bhandamāne uṣasā upāke uta smayete tanvā virūpe /
analyzed: ā bhandamāne uṣasau upāke uta smayete tanvā virūpe

original: RV_3,004.06c yathā no mitro varuṇo jujoṣad indro marutvāṃ uta vā mahobhiḥ //
analyzed: yathā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ jujoṣat indraḥ marutvān uta vā mahobhiḥ

original: RV_3,004.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā ny ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā ni ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti

original: RV_3,004.07c ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛtam it ta āhur anu vrataṃ vratapā dīdhyānāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛtam id te āhuḥ anu vratam vrata pāḥ dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_3,004.08a ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ /
analyzed: ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣāḥ iḷā devaiḥ manuṣyebhiḥ agniḥ

original: RV_3,004.08c sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu //
analyzed: sarasvatī sārasvatebhiḥ arvāk tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam sadantu

original: RV_3,004.09a tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva /
analyzed: tat naḥ turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva

original: RV_3,004.09c yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ //
analyzed: yatas vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ su dakṣaḥ yukta grāvā jāyate deva kāmaḥ

original: RV_3,004.10a vanaspate 'va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti /
analyzed: vanaspate vaḥ sṛja upa devān agniḥ haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti

original: RV_3,004.10c sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda //
analyzed: sa id u hotā satyataraḥ yajāti yathā devānām janimāni veda

original: RV_3,004.11a ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ /
analyzed: ā yāhi agne samidhānaḥ arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham turebhiḥ

original: RV_3,004.11c barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
analyzed: barhiḥ naḥ āstām aditiḥ su putrā svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām

original: RV_3,005.01a praty agnir uṣasaś cekitāno 'bodhi vipraḥ padavīḥ kavīnām /
analyzed: prati agniḥ uṣasaḥ cekitānaḥ bodhi vipraḥ padavīḥ kavīnām

original: RV_3,005.01c pṛthupājā devayadbhiḥ samiddho 'pa dvārā tamaso vahnir āvaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthu pājāḥ devayadbhiḥ samiddhaḥ pa dvārā tamasaḥ vahniḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_3,005.02a pred v agnir vāvṛdhe stomebhir gīrbhi stotṝṇāṃ namasya ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: pra id u agniḥ vāvṛdhe stomebhiḥ gīrbhiḥ stotṝṇām namasyaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_3,005.02c pūrvīr ṛtasya saṃdṛśaś cakānaḥ saṃ dūto adyaud uṣaso viroke //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ ṛtasya saṃdṛśaḥ cakānaḥ sam dūtaḥ adyaut uṣasaḥ viroke

original: RV_3,005.03a adhāyy agnir mānuṣīṣu vikṣv apāṃ garbho mitra ṛtena sādhan /
analyzed: adhāyi agniḥ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu apām garbhaḥ mitraḥ ṛtena sādhan

original: RV_3,005.03c ā haryato yajataḥ sānv asthād abhūd u vipro havyo matīnām //
analyzed: ā haryataḥ yajataḥ sānū asthāt abhūt u vipraḥ havyaḥ matīnām

original: RV_3,005.04a mitro agnir bhavati yat samiddho mitro hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: mitraḥ agniḥ bhavati yat samiddhaḥ mitraḥ hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: RV_3,005.04c mitro adhvaryur iṣiro damūnā mitraḥ sindhūnām uta parvatānām //
analyzed: mitraḥ adhvaryuḥ iṣiraḥ damūnāḥ mitraḥ sindhūnām uta parvatānām

original: RV_3,005.05a pāti priyaṃ ripo agram padaṃ veḥ pāti yahvaś caraṇaṃ sūryasya /
analyzed: pāti priyam ripaḥ agram padam veḥ pāti yahvaḥ caraṇam sūryasya

original: RV_3,005.05c pāti nābhā saptaśīrṣāṇam agniḥ pāti devānām upamādam ṛṣvaḥ //
analyzed: pāti nābhā sapta śīrṣāṇam agniḥ pāti devānām upamādam ṛṣvaḥ

original: RV_3,005.06a ṛbhuś cakra īḍyaṃ cāru nāma viśvāni devo vayunāni vidvān /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ cakre īḍyam cāru nāma viśvāni devaḥ vayunāni vidvān

original: RV_3,005.06c sasasya carma ghṛtavat padaṃ ves tad id agnī rakṣaty aprayucchan //
analyzed: sasasya carma ghṛtavat padam veḥ tat id agniḥ rakṣati aprayucchan

original: RV_3,005.07a ā yonim agnir ghṛtavantam asthāt pṛthupragāṇam uśantam uśānaḥ /
analyzed: ā yonim agniḥ ghṛtavantam asthāt pṛthu pragāṇam uśantam uśānaḥ

original: RV_3,005.07c dīdyānaḥ śucir ṛṣvaḥ pāvakaḥ punaḥ-punar mātarā navyasī kaḥ //
analyzed: dīdyānaḥ śuciḥ ṛṣvaḥ pāvakaḥ punar punar mātarā navyasī kaḥ

original: RV_3,005.08a sadyo jāta oṣadhībhir vavakṣe yadī vardhanti prasvo ghṛtena /
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ oṣadhībhiḥ vavakṣe yadī vardhanti prasvaḥ ghṛtena

original: RV_3,005.08c āpa iva pravatā śumbhamānā uruṣyad agniḥ pitror upasthe //
analyzed: āpaḥ iva pravatā śumbhamānāḥ uruṣyat agniḥ pitroḥ upasthe

original: RV_3,005.09a ud u ṣṭutaḥ samidhā yahvo adyaud varṣman divo adhi nābhā pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: ud u stutaḥ samidhā yahvaḥ adyaut varṣman divaḥ adhi nābhā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_3,005.09c mitro agnir īḍyo mātariśvā dūto vakṣad yajathāya devān //
analyzed: mitraḥ agniḥ īḍyaḥ mātariśvā dūtaḥ vakṣat yajathāya devān

original: RV_3,005.10a ud astambhīt samidhā nākam ṛṣvo 'gnir bhavann uttamo rocanānām /
analyzed: ud astambhīt samidhā nākam ṛṣvaḥ gniḥ bhavan uttamaḥ rocanānām

original: RV_3,005.10c yadī bhṛgubhyaḥ pari mātariśvā guhā santaṃ havyavāhaṃ samīdhe //
analyzed: yadī bhṛgubhyaḥ pari mātariśvā guhā santam havyavāham samīdhe

original: RV_3,005.11a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,005.11c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,006.01a pra kāravo mananā vacyamānā devadrīcīṃ nayata devayantaḥ /
analyzed: pra kāravaḥ mananā vacyamānāḥ devadrīcīm nayata devayantaḥ

original: RV_3,006.01c dakṣiṇāvāḍ vājinī prācy eti havir bharanty agnaye ghṛtācī //
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvāṭ vājinī prācī eti haviḥ bharantī agnaye ghṛtācī

original: RV_3,006.02a ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamāna uta pra rikthā adha nu prayajyo /
analyzed: ā rodasī apṛṇāḥ jāyamānaḥ uta pra rikthāḥ adha nu prayajyo

original: RV_3,006.02c divaś cid agne mahinā pṛthivyā vacyantāṃ te vahnayaḥ saptajihvāḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ cit agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ vacyantām te vahnayaḥ sapta jihvāḥ

original: RV_3,006.03a dyauś ca tvā pṛthivī yajñiyāso ni hotāraṃ sādayante damāya /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca tvā pṛthivī yajñiyāsaḥ ni hotāram sādayante damāya

original: RV_3,006.03c yadī viśo mānuṣīr devayantīḥ prayasvatīr īḷate śukram arciḥ //
analyzed: yadi viśaḥ mānuṣīḥ devayantīḥ prayasvatīḥ īḍate śukram arciḥ

original: RV_3,006.04a mahān sadhasthe dhruva ā niṣatto 'ntar dyāvā māhine haryamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: mahān sadhasthe dhruvaḥ ā niṣattaḥ ntar dyāvā māhine haryamāṇaḥ

original: RV_3,006.04c āskre sapatnī ajare amṛkte sabardughe urugāyasya dhenū //
analyzed: āskre sapatnī ajare amṛkte sabardughe urugāyasya dhenū

original: RV_3,006.05a vratā te agne mahato mahāni tava kratvā rodasī ā tatantha /
analyzed: vratā te agne mahataḥ mahāni tava kratvā rodasī ā tatantha

original: RV_3,006.05c tvaṃ dūto abhavo jāyamānas tvaṃ netā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: tvam dūtaḥ abhavaḥ jāyamānaḥ tvam netā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_3,006.06a ṛtasya vā keśinā yogyābhir ghṛtasnuvā rohitā dhuri dhiṣva /
analyzed: ṛtasya vā keśinā yogyābhiḥ ghṛtasnuvā rohitā dhuri dhiṣva

original: RV_3,006.06c athā vaha devān deva viśvān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ //
analyzed: athā vaha devān deva viśvān su adhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_3,006.07a divaś cid ā te rucayanta rokā uṣo vibhātīr anu bhāsi pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ cit ā te rucayanta rokāḥ uṣaḥ vibhātīḥ anu bhāsi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,006.07c apo yad agna uśadhag vaneṣu hotur mandrasya panayanta devāḥ //
analyzed: apa u yat agne uśadhak vaneṣu hotuḥ mandrasya panayanta devāḥ

original: RV_3,006.08a urau vā ye antarikṣe madanti divo vā ye rocane santi devāḥ /
analyzed: urau vā ye antarikṣe madanti divaḥ vā ye rocane santi devāḥ

original: RV_3,006.08c ūmā vā ye suhavāso yajatrā āyemire rathyo agne aśvāḥ //
analyzed: ūmāḥ vā ye su havāsaḥ yajatrāḥ āyemire rathyaḥ agne aśvāḥ

original: RV_3,006.09a aibhir agne sarathaṃ yāhy arvāṅ nānārathaṃ vā vibhavo hy aśvāḥ /
analyzed: ā ebhiḥ agne sa ratham yāhi arvāṅ nānā ratham vā vibhavaḥ hi aśvāḥ

original: RV_3,006.09c patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva //
analyzed: patnīvataḥ triṃśatam trīn ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva

original: RV_3,006.10a sa hotā yasya rodasī cid urvī yajñaṃ-yajñam abhi vṛdhe gṛṇītaḥ /
analyzed: sa hotā yasya rodasī cit urvī yajñam yajñam abhi vṛdhe gṛṇītaḥ

original: RV_3,006.10c prācī adhvareva tasthatuḥ sumeke ṛtāvarī ṛtajātasya satye //
analyzed: prācī adhvarā iva tasthatuḥ sumeke ṛtāvarī ṛta jātasya satye

original: RV_3,006.11a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,006.11c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,007.01a pra ya āruḥ śitipṛṣṭhasya dhāser ā mātarā viviśuḥ sapta vāṇīḥ /
analyzed: pra ye āruḥ śiti pṛṣṭhasya dhāseḥ ā mātarā viviśuḥ sapta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_3,007.01c parikṣitā pitarā saṃ carete pra sarsrāte dīrgham āyuḥ prayakṣe //
analyzed: parikṣitā pitarā sam carete pra sarsrāte dīrgham āyuḥ prayakṣe

original: RV_3,007.02a divakṣaso dhenavo vṛṣṇo aśvā devīr ā tasthau madhumad vahantīḥ /
analyzed: divakṣasaḥ dhenavaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvāḥ devīḥ ā tasthau madhumat vahantīḥ

original: RV_3,007.02c ṛtasya tvā sadasi kṣemayantam pary ekā carati vartaniṃ gauḥ //
analyzed: ṛtasya tvā sadasi kṣemayantam pari ekā carati vartanim gauḥ

original: RV_3,007.03a ā sīm arohat suyamā bhavantīḥ patiś cikitvān rayivid rayīṇām /
analyzed: ā sīm arohat su yamāḥ bhavantīḥ patiḥ cikitvān rayi vid rayīṇām

original: RV_3,007.03c pra nīlapṛṣṭho atasasya dhāses tā avāsayat purudhapratīkaḥ //
analyzed: pra nīla pṛṣṭhaḥ atasasya dhāseḥ tāḥ avāsayat purudhā pratīkaḥ

original: RV_3,007.04a mahi tvāṣṭram ūrjayantīr ajuryaṃ stabhūyamānaṃ vahato vahanti /
analyzed: mahi tvāṣṭram ūrjayantīḥ ajuryam stabhūyamānam vahataḥ vahanti

original: RV_3,007.04c vy aṅgebhir didyutānaḥ sadhastha ekām iva rodasī ā viveśa //
analyzed: vi aṅgebhiḥ didyutānaḥ sadhasthe ekām iva rodasī ā viveśa

original: RV_3,007.05a jānanti vṛṣṇo aruṣasya śevam uta bradhnasya śāsane raṇanti /
analyzed: jānanti vṛṣṇaḥ aruṣasya śevam uta bradhnasya śāsane raṇanti

original: RV_3,007.05c divorucaḥ suruco rocamānā iḷā yeṣāṃ gaṇyā māhinā gīḥ //
analyzed: divorucaḥ su rucaḥ rocamānāḥ iḍā yeṣām gaṇyā māhinā gīḥ

original: RV_3,007.06a uto pitṛbhyām pravidānu ghoṣam maho mahadbhyām anayanta śūṣam /
analyzed: uta u pitṛbhyām pravidā anu ghoṣam mahaḥ mahadbhyām anayanta śūṣam

original: RV_3,007.06c ukṣā ha yatra pari dhānam aktor anu svaṃ dhāma jaritur vavakṣa //
analyzed: ukṣā ha yatra pari dhānam aktoḥ anu svam dhāma jarituḥ vavakṣa

original: RV_3,007.07a adhvaryubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sapta viprāḥ priyaṃ rakṣante nihitam padaṃ veḥ /
analyzed: adhvaryubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sapta viprāḥ priyam rakṣante nihitam padam veḥ

original: RV_3,007.07c prāñco madanty ukṣaṇo ajuryā devā devānām anu hi vratā guḥ //
analyzed: prāñcaḥ madanti ukṣaṇaḥ ajuryāḥ devāḥ devānām anu hi vratā guḥ

original: RV_3,007.08a daivyā hotārā prathamā ny ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā ni ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti

original: RV_3,007.08c ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛtam it ta āhur anu vrataṃ vratapā dīdhyānāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛtam id te āhuḥ anu vratam vrata pāḥ dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_3,007.09a vṛṣāyante mahe atyāya pūrvīr vṛṣṇe citrāya raśmayaḥ suyāmāḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣāyante mahe atyāya pūrvīḥ vṛṣṇe citrāya raśmayaḥ su yāmāḥ

original: RV_3,007.09c deva hotar mandrataraś cikitvān maho devān rodasī eha vakṣi //
analyzed: deva hotar mandrataraḥ cikitvān mahaḥ devān rodasī ā iha vakṣi

original: RV_3,007.10a pṛkṣaprayajo draviṇaḥ suvācaḥ suketava uṣaso revad ūṣuḥ /
analyzed: pṛkṣa prayajaḥ draviṇaḥ su vācaḥ su ketavaḥ uṣasaḥ revat ūṣuḥ

original: RV_3,007.10c uto cid agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ sam mahe daśasya //
analyzed: uta u cit agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ kṛtam cit enaḥ sam mahe daśasya

original: RV_3,007.11a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,007.11c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,008.01a añjanti tvām adhvare devayanto vanaspate madhunā daivyena /
analyzed: añjanti tvām adhvare devayantaḥ vanaspate madhunā daivyena

original: RV_3,008.01c yad ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā draviṇeha dhattād yad vā kṣayo mātur asyā upasthe //
analyzed: yat ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhāḥ draviṇā iha dhattāt yat vā kṣayaḥ mātuḥ asyāḥ upasthe

original: RV_3,008.02a samiddhasya śrayamāṇaḥ purastād brahma vanvāno ajaraṃ suvīram /
analyzed: samiddhasya śrayamāṇaḥ purastāt brahma vanvānaḥ ajaram su vīram

original: RV_3,008.02c āre asmad amatim bādhamāna uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya //
analyzed: āre asmat amatim bādhamānaḥ ud śrayasva mahate saubhagāya

original: RV_3,008.03a uc chrayasva vanaspate varṣman pṛthivyā adhi /
analyzed: ud śrayasva vanaspate varṣman pṛthivyāḥ adhi

original: RV_3,008.03c sumitī mīyamāno varco dhā yajñavāhase //
analyzed: su mitī mīyamānaḥ varcaḥ dhāḥ yajña vāhase

original: RV_3,008.04a yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ /
analyzed: yuvā su vāsāḥ parivītaḥ āgāt saḥ u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_3,008.04c taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya un nayanti svādhyo manasā devayantaḥ //
analyzed: tam dhīrāsaḥ kavayaḥ ud nayanti su ādhyaḥ manasā devayantaḥ

original: RV_3,008.05a jāto jāyate sudinatve ahnāṃ samarya ā vidathe vardhamānaḥ /
analyzed: jātaḥ jāyate su su dina dina tve ahnām samarye ā vidathe vardhamānaḥ

original: RV_3,008.05c punanti dhīrā apaso manīṣā devayā vipra ud iyarti vācam //
analyzed: punanti dhīrāḥ apasaḥ manīṣā deva yāḥ vipraḥ ud iyarti vācam

original: RV_3,008.06a yān vo naro devayanto nimimyur vanaspate svadhitir vā tatakṣa /
analyzed: yān vaḥ naraḥ devayantaḥ nimimyuḥ vanaspate svadhitiḥ vā tatakṣa

original: RV_3,008.06c te devāsaḥ svaravas tasthivāṃsaḥ prajāvad asme didhiṣantu ratnam //
analyzed: te devāsaḥ svaravaḥ tasthivāṃsaḥ prajāvat asme didhiṣantu ratnam

original: RV_3,008.07a ye vṛkṇāso adhi kṣami nimitāso yatasrucaḥ /
analyzed: ye vṛkṇāsaḥ adhi kṣami nimitāsaḥ yata srucaḥ

original: RV_3,008.07c te no vyantu vāryaṃ devatrā kṣetrasādhasaḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ vyantu vāryam devatrā kṣetrasādhasaḥ

original: RV_3,008.08a ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sunīthā dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī antarikṣam /
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ su nīthāḥ dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī antarikṣam

original: RV_3,008.08c sajoṣaso yajñam avantu devā ūrdhvaṃ kṛṇvantv adhvarasya ketum //
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ yajñam avantu devāḥ ūrdhvam kṛṇvantu adhvarasya ketum

original: RV_3,008.09a haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatānāḥ śukrā vasānāḥ svaravo na āguḥ /
analyzed: haṃsāḥ iva śreṇiśas yatānāḥ śukrā vasānāḥ svaravaḥ naḥ āguḥ

original: RV_3,008.09c unnīyamānāḥ kavibhiḥ purastād devā devānām api yanti pāthaḥ //
analyzed: unnīyamānāḥ kavibhiḥ purastāt devāḥ devānām api yanti pāthaḥ

original: RV_3,008.10a śṛṅgāṇīvec chṛṅgiṇāṃ saṃ dadṛśre caṣālavantaḥ svaravaḥ pṛthivyām /
analyzed: śṛṅgāṇi iva id śṛṅgiṇām sam dadṛśre caṣālavantaḥ svaravaḥ pṛthivyām

original: RV_3,008.10c vāghadbhir vā vihave śroṣamāṇā asmāṃ avantu pṛtanājyeṣu //
analyzed: vāghadbhiḥ vā vihave śroṣamāṇāḥ asmān avantu pṛtanājyeṣu

original: RV_3,008.11a vanaspate śatavalśo vi roha sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhema /
analyzed: vanaspate śata valśaḥ vi roha sahasra valśāḥ vi vayam

original: RV_3,008.11c yaṃ tvām ayaṃ svadhitis tejamānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāya //
analyzed: yam tvām ayam svadhitiḥ tejamānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāya

original: RV_3,009.01a sakhāyas tvā vavṛmahe devam martāsa ūtaye /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ tvā vavṛmahe devam martāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_3,009.01c apāṃ napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditiṃ supratūrtim anehasam //
analyzed: apām napātam subhagam su dīditim su pratūrtim anehasam

original: RV_3,009.02a kāyamāno vanā tvaṃ yan mātṝr ajagann apaḥ /
analyzed: kāyamānaḥ vanā tvam yat mātṝḥ ajagan apaḥ

original: RV_3,009.02c na tat te agne pramṛṣe nivartanaṃ yad dūre sann ihābhavaḥ //
analyzed: na tat te agne pramṛṣe nivartanam yat dūre san iha abhavaḥ

original: RV_3,009.03a ati tṛṣṭaṃ vavakṣithāthaiva sumanā asi /
analyzed: ati tṛṣṭam vavakṣitha atha eva su manāḥ asi

original: RV_3,009.03c pra-prānye yanti pary anya āsate yeṣāṃ sakhye asi śritaḥ //
analyzed: pra pra anye yanti pari anye āsate yeṣām sakhye asi śritaḥ

original: RV_3,009.04a īyivāṃsam ati sridhaḥ śaśvatīr ati saścataḥ /
analyzed: īyivāṃsam ati sridhaḥ śaśvatīḥ ati saścataḥ

original: RV_3,009.04c anv īm avindan nicirāso adruho 'psu siṃham iva śritam //
analyzed: anu īm avindan nicirāsaḥ adruhaḥ psu siṃham iva śritam

original: RV_3,009.05a sasṛvāṃsam iva tmanāgnim itthā tirohitam /
analyzed: sasṛvāṃsam iva tmanā agnim itthā tirohitam

original: RV_3,009.05c ainaṃ nayan mātariśvā parāvato devebhyo mathitam pari //
analyzed: ā enam nayat mātariśvā parāvataḥ devebhyaḥ mathitam pari

original: RV_3,009.06a taṃ tvā martā agṛbhṇata devebhyo havyavāhana /
analyzed: tam tvā martāḥ agṛbhṇata devebhyaḥ havya vāhana

original: RV_3,009.06c viśvān yad yajñāṃ abhipāsi mānuṣa tava kratvā yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: viśvān yat yajñān abhipāsi mānuṣa tava kratvā yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_3,009.07a tad bhadraṃ tava daṃsanā pākāya cic chadayati /
analyzed: tat bhadram tava daṃsanā pākāya cit chadayati

original: RV_3,009.07c tvāṃ yad agne paśavaḥ samāsate samiddham apiśarvare //
analyzed: tvām yat agne paśavaḥ samāsate samiddham apiśarvare

original: RV_3,009.08a ā juhotā svadhvaraṃ śīram pāvakaśociṣam /
analyzed: ā juhota su adhvaram śīram pāvaka śociṣam

original: RV_3,009.08c āśuṃ dūtam ajiram pratnam īḍyaṃ śruṣṭī devaṃ saparyata //
analyzed: āśum dūtam ajiram pratnam īḍyam śruṣṭī devam saparyata

original: RV_3,009.09a trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ triṃśac ca devā nava cāsaparyan /
analyzed: trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇi agnim triṃśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan

original: RV_3,009.09c aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
analyzed: aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ asmai āt id hotāram ni asādayanta

original: RV_3,010.01a tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ samrājam carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_3,010.01c devam martāsa indhate sam adhvare //
analyzed: devam martāsaḥ indhate sam adhvare

original: RV_3,010.02a tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijam agne hotāram īḷate /
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam agne hotāram īḍate

original: RV_3,010.02c gopā ṛtasya dīdihi sve dame //
analyzed: gopāḥ ṛtasya dīdihi sve dame

original: RV_3,010.03a sa ghā yas te dadāśati samidhā jātavedase /
analyzed: sa ghā yaḥ te dadāśati samidhā jātavedase

original: RV_3,010.03c so agne dhatte suvīryaṃ sa puṣyati //
analyzed: saḥ agne dhatte su vīryam sa puṣyati

original: RV_3,010.04a sa ketur adhvarāṇām agnir devebhir ā gamat /
analyzed: sa ketuḥ adhvarāṇām agniḥ devebhiḥ ā gamat

original: RV_3,010.04c añjānaḥ sapta hotṛbhir haviṣmate //
analyzed: añjānaḥ sapta hotṛbhiḥ haviṣmate

original: RV_3,010.05a pra hotre pūrvyaṃ vaco 'gnaye bharatā bṛhat /
analyzed: pra hotre pūrvyam vacaḥ gnaye bharata bṛhat

original: RV_3,010.05c vipāṃ jyotīṃṣi bibhrate na vedhase //
analyzed: vipām jyotīṃṣi bibhrate na vedhase

original: RV_3,010.06a agniṃ vardhantu no giro yato jāyata ukthyaḥ /
analyzed: agnim vardhantu naḥ giraḥ yatas jāyate ukthyaḥ

original: RV_3,010.06c mahe vājāya draviṇāya darśataḥ //
analyzed: mahe vājāya draviṇāya darśataḥ

original: RV_3,010.07a agne yajiṣṭho adhvare devān devayate yaja /
analyzed: agne yajiṣṭhaḥ adhvare devān devayate yaja

original: RV_3,010.07c hotā mandro vi rājasy ati sridhaḥ //
analyzed: hotā mandraḥ vi rājasi ati sridhaḥ

original: RV_3,010.08a sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi dyumad asme suvīryam /
analyzed: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi dyumat asme su vīryam

original: RV_3,010.08c bhavā stotṛbhyo antamaḥ svastaye //
analyzed: bhava stotṛbhyaḥ antamaḥ svastaye

original: RV_3,010.09a taṃ tvā viprā vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate /
analyzed: tam tvā viprāḥ vipanyavaḥ jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate

original: RV_3,010.09c havyavāham amartyaṃ sahovṛdham //
analyzed: havyavāham amartyam sahaḥ vṛdham

original: RV_3,011.01a agnir hotā purohito 'dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ hotā purohitaḥ dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_3,011.01c sa veda yajñam ānuṣak //
analyzed: sa veda yajñam ānuṣak

original: RV_3,011.02a sa havyavāḷ amartya uśig dūtaś canohitaḥ /
analyzed: sa havyavāṭ amartyaḥ uśij dūtaḥ canohitaḥ

original: RV_3,011.02c agnir dhiyā sam ṛṇvati //
analyzed: agniḥ dhiyā sam ṛṇvati

original: RV_3,011.03a agnir dhiyā sa cetati ketur yajñasya pūrvyaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ dhiyā sa cetati ketuḥ yajñasya pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_3,011.03c arthaṃ hy asya taraṇi //
analyzed: artham hi asya taraṇi

original: RV_3,011.04a agniṃ sūnuṃ sanaśrutaṃ sahaso jātavedasam /
analyzed: agnim sūnum sana śrutam sahasaḥ jātavedasam

original: RV_3,011.04c vahniṃ devā akṛṇvata //
analyzed: vahnim devāḥ akṛṇvata

original: RV_3,011.05a adābhyaḥ puraetā viśām agnir mānuṣīṇām /
analyzed: adābhyaḥ puraetā viśām agniḥ mānuṣīṇām

original: RV_3,011.05c tūrṇī rathaḥ sadā navaḥ //
analyzed: tūrṇiḥ rathaḥ sadā navaḥ

original: RV_3,011.06a sāhvān viśvā abhiyujaḥ kratur devānām amṛktaḥ /
analyzed: sāhvān viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ kratuḥ devānām amṛktaḥ

original: RV_3,011.06c agnis tuviśravastamaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ tuvi śravastamaḥ

original: RV_3,011.07a abhi prayāṃsi vāhasā dāśvāṃ aśnoti martyaḥ /
analyzed: abhi prayāṃsi vāhasā dāśvān aśnoti martyaḥ

original: RV_3,011.07c kṣayam pāvakaśociṣaḥ //
analyzed: kṣayam pāvaka śociṣaḥ

original: RV_3,011.08a pari viśvāni sudhitāgner aśyāma manmabhiḥ /
analyzed: pari viśvāni sudhitā agneḥ aśyāma manmabhiḥ

original: RV_3,011.08c viprāso jātavedasaḥ //
analyzed: viprāsaḥ jātavedasaḥ

original: RV_3,011.09a agne viśvāni vāryā vājeṣu saniṣāmahe /
analyzed: agne viśvāni vāryā vājeṣu saniṣāmahe

original: RV_3,011.09c tve devāsa erire //
analyzed: tve devāsaḥ erire

original: RV_3,012.01a indrāgnī ā gataṃ sutaṃ gīrbhir nabho vareṇyam /
analyzed: indra agnī ā gatam sutam gīrbhiḥ nabhaḥ vareṇyam

original: RV_3,012.01c asya pātaṃ dhiyeṣitā //
analyzed: asya pātam dhiyā iṣitā

original: RV_3,012.02a indrāgnī jarituḥ sacā yajño jigāti cetanaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī jarituḥ sacā yajñaḥ jigāti cetanaḥ

original: RV_3,012.02c ayā pātam imaṃ sutam //
analyzed: ayā pātam imam sutam

original: RV_3,012.03a indram agniṃ kavicchadā yajñasya jūtyā vṛṇe /
analyzed: indram agnim kavicchadā yajñasya jūtyā vṛṇe

original: RV_3,012.03c tā somasyeha tṛmpatām //
analyzed: tā somasya iha tṛmpatām

original: RV_3,012.04a tośā vṛtrahaṇā huve sajitvānāparājitā /
analyzed: tośa vṛtra haṇā huve sa jitvānā aparājitā

original: RV_3,012.04c indrāgnī vājasātamā //
analyzed: indra agnī vāja sātamā

original: RV_3,012.05a pra vām arcanty ukthino nīthāvido jaritāraḥ /
analyzed: pra vām arcanti ukthinaḥ nīthāvidaḥ jaritāraḥ

original: RV_3,012.05c indrāgnī iṣa ā vṛṇe //
analyzed: indra agnī iṣaḥ ā vṛṇe

original: RV_3,012.06a indrāgnī navatim puro dāsapatnīr adhūnutam /
analyzed: indra agnī navatim puraḥ dāsa patnīḥ adhūnutam

original: RV_3,012.06c sākam ekena karmaṇā //
analyzed: sākam ekena karmaṇā

original: RV_3,012.07a indrāgnī apasas pary upa pra yanti dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī apasas pari upa pra yanti dhītayaḥ

original: RV_3,012.07c ṛtasya pathyā anu //
analyzed: ṛtasya pathyāḥ anu

original: RV_3,012.08a indrāgnī taviṣāṇi vāṃ sadhasthāni prayāṃsi ca /
analyzed: indra agnī taviṣāṇi vām sadhasthāni prayāṃsi ca

original: RV_3,012.08c yuvor aptūryaṃ hitam //
analyzed: yuvoḥ aptūryam hitam

original: RV_3,012.09a indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ pari vājeṣu bhūṣathaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī rocanā divaḥ pari vājeṣu bhūṣathaḥ

original: RV_3,012.09c tad vāṃ ceti pra vīryam //
analyzed: tat vām ceti pra vīryam

original: RV_3,013.01a pra vo devāyāgnaye barhiṣṭham arcāsmai /
analyzed: pra vaḥ devāya agnaye barhiṣṭham arca asmai

original: RV_3,013.01c gamad devebhir ā sa no yajiṣṭho barhir ā sadat //
analyzed: gamat devebhiḥ ā sa naḥ yajiṣṭhaḥ barhiḥ ā sadat

original: RV_3,013.02a ṛtāvā yasya rodasī dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtāvā yasya rodasī dakṣam sacante ūtayaḥ

original: RV_3,013.02c haviṣmantas tam īḷate taṃ saniṣyanto 'vase //
analyzed: haviṣmantaḥ tam īḍate tam saniṣyantaḥ vase

original: RV_3,013.03a sa yantā vipra eṣāṃ sa yajñānām athā hi ṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa yantā vipraḥ eṣām sa yajñānām athā hi saḥ

original: RV_3,013.03c agniṃ taṃ vo duvasyata dātā yo vanitā magham //
analyzed: agnim tam vaḥ duvasyata dātā yaḥ vanitā magham

original: RV_3,013.04a sa naḥ śarmāṇi vītaye 'gnir yacchatu śantamā /
analyzed: sa naḥ śarmāṇi vītaye gniḥ yacchatu śantamā

original: RV_3,013.04c yato naḥ pruṣṇavad vasu divi kṣitibhyo apsv ā //
analyzed: yatas naḥ pruṣṇavat vasu divi kṣitibhyaḥ apsu ā

original: RV_3,013.05a dīdivāṃsam apūrvyaṃ vasvībhir asya dhītibhiḥ /
analyzed: dīdivāṃsam apūrvyam vasvībhiḥ asya dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_3,013.05c ṛkvāṇo agnim indhate hotāraṃ viśpatiṃ viśām //
analyzed: ṛkvāṇaḥ agnim indhate hotāram viśpatim viśām

original: RV_3,013.06a uta no brahmann aviṣa uktheṣu devahūtamaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ brahman aviṣaḥ uktheṣu deva hūtamaḥ

original: RV_3,013.06c śaṃ naḥ śocā marudvṛdho 'gne sahasrasātamaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ śoca marut vṛdhaḥ gne sahasra sātamaḥ

original: RV_3,013.07a nū no rāsva sahasravat tokavat puṣṭimad vasu /
analyzed: nu naḥ rāsva sahasravat tokavat puṣṭimat vasu

original: RV_3,013.07c dyumad agne suvīryaṃ varṣiṣṭham anupakṣitam //
analyzed: dyumat agne su vīryam varṣiṣṭham an upakṣitam

original: RV_3,014.01a ā hotā mandro vidathāny asthāt satyo yajvā kavitamaḥ sa vedhāḥ /
analyzed: ā hotā mandraḥ vidathāni asthāt satyaḥ yajvā kavitamaḥ sa vedhāḥ

original: RV_3,014.01c vidyudrathaḥ sahasas putro agniḥ śociṣkeśaḥ pṛthivyām pājo aśret //
analyzed: vidyut rathaḥ sahasas putraḥ agniḥ śociṣkeśaḥ pṛthivyām pājaḥ aśret

original: RV_3,014.02a ayāmi te namauktiṃ juṣasva ṛtāvas tubhyaṃ cetate sahasvaḥ /
analyzed: ayāmi te namauktim juṣasva ṛtāvaḥ tubhyam cetate sahasvas

original: RV_3,014.02c vidvāṃ ā vakṣi viduṣo ni ṣatsi madhya ā barhir ūtaye yajatra //
analyzed: vidvān ā vakṣi viduṣaḥ ni satsi madhye ā barhiḥ ūtaye yajatra

original: RV_3,014.03a dravatāṃ ta uṣasā vājayantī agne vātasya pathyābhir accha /
analyzed: dravatām te uṣasā vājayantī agne vātasya pathyābhiḥ accha

original: RV_3,014.03c yat sīm añjanti pūrvyaṃ havirbhir ā vandhureva tasthatur duroṇe //
analyzed: yat sīm añjanti pūrvyam havirbhiḥ ā vandhurā iva tasthatuḥ duroṇe

original: RV_3,014.04a mitraś ca tubhyaṃ varuṇaḥ sahasvo 'gne viśve marutaḥ sumnam arcan /
analyzed: mitraḥ ca tubhyam varuṇaḥ sahasvas gne viśve marutaḥ sumnam arcan

original: RV_3,014.04c yac chociṣā sahasas putra tiṣṭhā abhi kṣitīḥ prathayan sūryo nṝn //
analyzed: yat śociṣā sahasas putra tiṣṭhāḥ abhi kṣitīḥ prathayan sūryaḥ nṝn

original: RV_3,014.05a vayaṃ te adya rarimā hi kāmam uttānahastā namasopasadya /
analyzed: vayam te adya rarimā hi kāmam uttāna hastāḥ namasā upasadya

original: RV_3,014.05c yajiṣṭhena manasā yakṣi devān asredhatā manmanā vipro agne //
analyzed: yajiṣṭhena manasā yakṣi devān a sredhatā manmanā vipraḥ agne

original: RV_3,014.06a tvad dhi putra sahaso vi pūrvīr devasya yanty ūtayo vi vājāḥ /
analyzed: tvat hi putra sahasaḥ vi pūrvīḥ devasya yanti ūtayaḥ vi vājāḥ

original: RV_3,014.06c tvaṃ dehi sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ no 'drogheṇa vacasā satyam agne //
analyzed: tvam dehi sahasriṇam rayim naḥ drogheṇa vacasā satyam agne

original: RV_3,014.07a tubhyaṃ dakṣa kavikrato yānīmā deva martāso adhvare akarma /
analyzed: tubhyam dakṣa kavi krato yāni imā deva martāsaḥ adhvare akarma

original: RV_3,014.07c tvaṃ viśvasya surathasya bodhi sarvaṃ tad agne amṛta svadeha //
analyzed: tvam viśvasya su rathasya bodhi sarvam tat agne amṛta svada iha

original: RV_3,015.01a vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucāno bādhasva dviṣo rakṣaso amīvāḥ /
analyzed: vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucānaḥ bādhasva dviṣaḥ rakṣasaḥ amīvāḥ

original: RV_3,015.01c suśarmaṇo bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syām agner ahaṃ suhavasya praṇītau //
analyzed: su śarmaṇaḥ bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syām agneḥ aham su havasya praṇītau

original: RV_3,015.02a tvaṃ no asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau tvaṃ sūra udite bodhi gopāḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau tvam sūre udite bodhi gopāḥ

original: RV_3,015.02c janmeva nityaṃ tanayaṃ juṣasva stomam me agne tanvā sujāta //
analyzed: janma iva nityam tanayam juṣasva stomam me agne tanvā su jāta

original: RV_3,015.03a tvaṃ nṛcakṣā vṛṣabhānu pūrvīḥ kṛṣṇāsv agne aruṣo vi bhāhi /
analyzed: tvam nṛ cakṣāḥ vṛṣabha anu pūrvīḥ kṛṣṇāsu agne aruṣaḥ vi bhāhi

original: RV_3,015.03c vaso neṣi ca parṣi cāty aṃhaḥ kṛdhī no rāya uśijo yaviṣṭha //
analyzed: vaso neṣi ca parṣi ca ati aṃhaḥ kṛdhī naḥ rāyaḥ uśijaḥ yaviṣṭha

original: RV_3,015.04a aṣāḷho agne vṛṣabho didīhi puro viśvāḥ saubhagā saṃjigīvān /
analyzed: aṣāḷhaḥ agne vṛṣabhaḥ didīhi puraḥ viśvāḥ saubhaga ā saṃjigīvān

original: RV_3,015.04c yajñasya netā prathamasya pāyor jātavedo bṛhataḥ supraṇīte //
analyzed: yajñasya netā prathamasya pāyoḥ jātavedaḥ bṛhataḥ su praṇīte

original: RV_3,015.05a acchidrā śarma jaritaḥ purūṇi devāṃ acchā dīdyānaḥ sumedhāḥ /
analyzed: acchidrā śarma jaritar purūṇi devām acchā dīdyānaḥ sumedhāḥ

original: RV_3,015.05c ratho na sasnir abhi vakṣi vājam agne tvaṃ rodasī naḥ sumeke //
analyzed: rathaḥ na sasniḥ abhi vakṣi vājam agne tvam rodasī naḥ sumeke

original: RV_3,015.06a pra pīpaya vṛṣabha jinva vājān agne tvaṃ rodasī naḥ sudoghe /
analyzed: pra pīpaya vṛṣabha jinva vājān agne tvam rodasī naḥ su doghe

original: RV_3,015.06c devebhir deva surucā rucāno mā no martasya durmatiḥ pari ṣṭhāt //
analyzed: devebhiḥ deva su rucā rucānaḥ mā naḥ martasya durmatiḥ pari sthāt

original: RV_3,015.07a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,015.07c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,016.01a ayam agniḥ suvīryasyeśe mahaḥ saubhagasya /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ su vīryasya īśe mahaḥ saubhagasya

original: RV_3,016.01c rāya īśe svapatyasya gomata īśe vṛtrahathānām //
analyzed: rāyaḥ īśe su apatyasya gomataḥ īśe vṛtra hathānām

original: RV_3,016.02a imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatā vṛdhaṃ yasmin rāyaḥ śevṛdhāsaḥ /
analyzed: imam naraḥ marutaḥ saścata vṛdham yasmin rāyaḥ śevṛdhāsaḥ

original: RV_3,016.02c abhi ye santi pṛtanāsu dūḍhyo viśvāhā śatrum ādabhuḥ //
analyzed: abhi ye santi pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ viśvāhā śatrum ādabhuḥ

original: RV_3,016.03a sa tvaṃ no rāyaḥ śiśīhi mīḍhvo agne suvīryasya /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ rāyaḥ śiśīhi mīḍhvaḥ agne su vīryasya

original: RV_3,016.03c tuvidyumna varṣiṣṭhasya prajāvato 'namīvasya śuṣmiṇaḥ //
analyzed: tuvi dyumna varṣiṣṭhasya prajāvataḥ namīvasya śuṣmiṇaḥ

original: RV_3,016.04a cakrir yo viśvā bhuvanābhi sāsahiś cakrir deveṣv ā duvaḥ /
analyzed: cakriḥ yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā abhi sāsahiḥ cakriḥ deveṣu ā duvaḥ

original: RV_3,016.04c ā deveṣu yatata ā suvīrya ā śaṃsa uta nṛṇām //
analyzed: ā deveṣu yatate ā su vīrye ā śaṃse uta nṛṇām

original: RV_3,016.05a mā no agne 'mataye māvīratāyai rīradhaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ agne mataye mā a vīra tāyai rīradhaḥ

original: RV_3,016.05c māgotāyai sahasas putra mā nide 'pa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛdhi //
analyzed: mā a go tāyai sahasas putra mā nide pa dveṣāṃsi ā kṛdhi

original: RV_3,016.06a śagdhi vājasya subhaga prajāvato 'gne bṛhato adhvare /
analyzed: śagdhi vājasya subhaga prajāvataḥ gne bṛhataḥ adhvare

original: RV_3,016.06c saṃ rāyā bhūyasā sṛja mayobhunā tuvidyumna yaśasvatā //
analyzed: sam rāyā bhūyasā sṛja mayobhunā tuvi dyumna yaśasvatā

original: RV_3,017.01a samidhyamānaḥ prathamānu dharmā sam aktubhir ajyate viśvavāraḥ /
analyzed: samidhyamānaḥ prathamā anu dharmā sam aktubhiḥ ajyate viśva vāraḥ

original: RV_3,017.01c śociṣkeśo ghṛtanirṇik pāvakaḥ suyajño agnir yajathāya devān //
analyzed: śociṣkeśaḥ ghṛta nirṇij pāvakaḥ su yajñaḥ agniḥ yajathāya devān

original: RV_3,017.02a yathāyajo hotram agne pṛthivyā yathā divo jātavedaś cikitvān /
analyzed: yathā ayajaḥ hotram agne pṛthivyāḥ yathā divaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_3,017.02c evānena haviṣā yakṣi devān manuṣvad yajñam pra tiremam adya //
analyzed: eva anena haviṣā yakṣi devān manuṣvat yajñam pra tira imam adya

original: RV_3,017.03a trīṇy āyūṃṣi tava jātavedas tisra ājānīr uṣasas te agne /
analyzed: trīṇi āyūṃṣi tava jātavedaḥ tisraḥ ājānīḥ uṣasaḥ te agne

original: RV_3,017.03c tābhir devānām avo yakṣi vidvān athā bhava yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: tābhiḥ devānām avaḥ yakṣi vidvān athā bhava yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_3,017.04a agniṃ sudītiṃ sudṛśaṃ gṛṇanto namasyāmas tveḍyaṃ jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: agnim su dītim su dṛśam gṛṇantaḥ namasyāmaḥ tvā īḍyam jātavedaḥ

original: RV_3,017.04c tvāṃ dūtam aratiṃ havyavāhaṃ devā akṛṇvann amṛtasya nābhim //
analyzed: tvām dūtam aratim havyavāham devāḥ akṛṇvan amṛtasya nābhim

original: RV_3,017.05a yas tvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān dvitā ca sattā svadhayā ca śambhuḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tvat hotā pūrvaḥ agne yajīyān dvitā ca sattā svadhayā ca śambhuḥ

original: RV_3,017.05c tasyānu dharma pra yajā cikitvo 'tha no dhā adhvaraṃ devavītau //
analyzed: tasya anu dharma pra yaja ā cikitvaḥ tha naḥ dhāḥ adhvaram deva vītau

original: RV_3,018.01a bhavā no agne sumanā upetau sakheva sakhye pitareva sādhuḥ /
analyzed: bhava naḥ agne sumanāḥ upetau sakhā iva sakhye pitarā iva sādhuḥ

original: RV_3,018.01c purudruho hi kṣitayo janānām prati pratīcīr dahatād arātīḥ //
analyzed: puru druhaḥ hi kṣitayaḥ janānām prati pratīcīḥ dahatāt arātīḥ

original: RV_3,018.02a tapo ṣv agne antarāṃ amitrān tapā śaṃsam araruṣaḥ parasya /
analyzed: tapa u su agne antarān amitrān tapa śaṃsam a raruṣaḥ parasya

original: RV_3,018.02c tapo vaso cikitāno acittān vi te tiṣṭhantām ajarā ayāsaḥ //
analyzed: tapaḥ vaso cikitānaḥ acittān vi te tiṣṭhantām ajarāḥ ayāsaḥ

original: RV_3,018.03a idhmenāgna icchamāno ghṛtena juhomi havyaṃ tarase balāya /
analyzed: idhmena agne icchamānaḥ ghṛtena juhomi havyam tarase balāya

original: RV_3,018.03c yāvad īśe brahmaṇā vandamāna imāṃ dhiyaṃ śataseyāya devīm //
analyzed: yāvat īśe brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ imām dhiyam śata seyāya devīm

original: RV_3,018.04a uc chociṣā sahasas putra stuto bṛhad vayaḥ śaśamāneṣu dhehi /
analyzed: ud śociṣā sahasas putra stutaḥ bṛhat vayaḥ śaśamāneṣu dhehi

original: RV_3,018.04c revad agne viśvāmitreṣu śaṃ yor marmṛjmā te tanvam bhūri kṛtvaḥ //
analyzed: revat agne viśvāmitreṣu śam yos marmṛjma te tanvam bhūri kṛtvas

original: RV_3,018.05a kṛdhi ratnaṃ susanitar dhanānāṃ sa ghed agne bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ /
analyzed: kṛdhi ratnam su sanitar dhanānām sa gha id agne bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ

original: RV_3,018.05c stotur duroṇe subhagasya revat sṛprā karasnā dadhiṣe vapūṃṣi //
analyzed: stotuḥ duroṇe subhagasya revat sṛprā karasnā dadhiṣe vapūṃṣi

original: RV_3,019.01a agniṃ hotāram pra vṛṇe miyedhe gṛtsaṃ kaviṃ viśvavidam amūram /
analyzed: agnim hotāram pra vṛṇe miyedhe gṛtsam kavim viśva vidam amūram

original: RV_3,019.01c sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān rāye vājāya vanate maghāni //
analyzed: sa naḥ yakṣat devatātā yajīyān rāye vājāya vanate maghāni

original: RV_3,019.02a pra te agne haviṣmatīm iyarmy acchā sudyumnāṃ rātinīṃ ghṛtācīm /
analyzed: pra te agne haviṣmatīm iyarmi acchā su dyumnām rātinīm ghṛtācīm

original: RV_3,019.02c pradakṣiṇid devatātim urāṇaḥ saṃ rātibhir vasubhir yajñam aśret //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇit devatātim urāṇaḥ sam rātibhiḥ vasubhiḥ yajñam aśret

original: RV_3,019.03a sa tejīyasā manasā tvota uta śikṣa svapatyasya śikṣoḥ /
analyzed: sa tejīyasā manasā tvotaḥ uta śikṣa su apatyasya śikṣoḥ

original: RV_3,019.03c agne rāyo nṛtamasya prabhūtau bhūyāma te suṣṭutayaś ca vasvaḥ //
analyzed: agne rāyaḥ nṛtamasya prabhūtau bhūyāma te suṣṭutayaḥ ca vasvaḥ

original: RV_3,019.04a bhūrīṇi hi tve dadhire anīkāgne devasya yajyavo janāsaḥ /
analyzed: bhūrīṇi hi tve dadhire anīkā agne devasya yajyavaḥ janāsaḥ

original: RV_3,019.04c sa ā vaha devatātiṃ yaviṣṭha śardho yad adya divyaṃ yajāsi //
analyzed: saḥ ā vaha devatātim yaviṣṭha śardhaḥ yat adya divyam yajāsi

original: RV_3,019.05a yat tvā hotāram anajan miyedhe niṣādayanto yajathāya devāḥ /
analyzed: yat tvā hotāram anajat miyedhe niṣādayantaḥ yajathāya devāḥ

original: RV_3,019.05c sa tvaṃ no agne 'viteha bodhy adhi śravāṃsi dhehi nas tanūṣu //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ agne vitā iha bodhi adhi śravāṃsi dhehi naḥ tanūṣu

original: RV_3,020.01a agnim uṣasam aśvinā dadhikrāṃ vyuṣṭiṣu havate vahnir ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: agnim uṣasam aśvinā dadhikrām vyuṣṭiṣu havate vahniḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_3,020.01c sujyotiṣo naḥ śṛṇvantu devāḥ sajoṣaso adhvaraṃ vāvaśānāḥ //
analyzed: su jyotiṣaḥ naḥ śṛṇvantu devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ adhvaram vāvaśānāḥ

original: RV_3,020.02a agne trī te vājinā trī ṣadhasthā tisras te jihvā ṛtajāta pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: agne trī te vājinā trī sadhasthā tisraḥ te jihvāḥ ṛta jāta pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,020.02c tisra u te tanvo devavātās tābhir naḥ pāhi giro aprayucchan //
analyzed: tisraḥ u te tanvaḥ deva vātāḥ tābhiḥ naḥ pāhi giraḥ aprayucchan

original: RV_3,020.03a agne bhūrīṇi tava jātavedo deva svadhāvo 'mṛtasya nāma /
analyzed: agne bhūrīṇi tava jātavedaḥ deva svadhāvas mṛtasya nāma

original: RV_3,020.03c yāś ca māyā māyināṃ viśvaminva tve pūrvīḥ saṃdadhuḥ pṛṣṭabandho //
analyzed: yāḥ ca māyāḥ māyinām viśvaminva tve pūrvīḥ saṃdadhuḥ pṛṣṭa bandho

original: RV_3,020.04a agnir netā bhaga iva kṣitīnāṃ daivīnāṃ deva ṛtupā ṛtāvā /
analyzed: agniḥ netā bhagaḥ iva kṣitīnām daivīnām devaḥ ṛtu pāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_3,020.04c sa vṛtrahā sanayo viśvavedāḥ parṣad viśvāti duritā gṛṇantam //
analyzed: sa vṛtra hā sanayaḥ viśva vedāḥ parṣat viśvā ati duritā gṛṇantam

original: RV_3,020.05a dadhikrām agnim uṣasaṃ ca devīm bṛhaspatiṃ savitāraṃ ca devam /
analyzed: dadhikrām agnim uṣasam ca devīm bṛhaspatim savitāram ca devam

original: RV_3,020.05c aśvinā mitrāvaruṇā bhagaṃ ca vasūn rudrāṃ ādityāṃ iha huve //
analyzed: aśvinā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam ca vasūn rudrān ādityān iha huve

original: RV_3,021.01a imaṃ no yajñam amṛteṣu dhehīmā havyā jātavedo juṣasva /
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam amṛteṣu dhehi imā havyā jātavedaḥ juṣasva

original: RV_3,021.01c stokānām agne medaso ghṛtasya hotaḥ prāśāna prathamo niṣadya //
analyzed: stokānām agne medasaḥ ghṛtasya hotar prāśāna prathamaḥ niṣadya

original: RV_3,021.02a ghṛtavantaḥ pāvaka te stokā ścotanti medasaḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtavantaḥ pāvaka te stokā ścotanti medasaḥ

original: RV_3,021.02c svadharman devavītaye śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryam //
analyzed: svadharman deva vītaye śreṣṭham naḥ dhehi vāryam

original: RV_3,021.03a tubhyaṃ stokā ghṛtaścuto 'gne viprāya santya /
analyzed: tubhyam stokāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ gne viprāya santya

original: RV_3,021.03c ṛṣiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sam idhyase yajñasya prāvitā bhava //
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sam idhyase yajñasya prāvitā bhava

original: RV_3,021.04a tubhyaṃ ścotanty adhrigo śacīva stokāso agne medaso ghṛtasya /
analyzed: tubhyam ścotanti adhrigo śacīvas stokāsaḥ agne medasaḥ ghṛtasya

original: RV_3,021.04c kaviśasto bṛhatā bhānunāgā havyā juṣasva medhira //
analyzed: kavi śastaḥ bṛhatā bhānunā āgāḥ havyā juṣasva medhira

original: RV_3,021.05a ojiṣṭhaṃ te madhyato meda udbhṛtam pra te vayaṃ dadāmahe /
analyzed: ojiṣṭham te madhyataḥ medaḥ udbhṛtam pra te vayam dadāmahe

original: RV_3,021.05c ścotanti te vaso stokā adhi tvaci prati tān devaśo vihi //
analyzed: ścotanti te vaso stokāḥ adhi tvaci prati tān devaśas vihi

original: RV_3,022.01a ayaṃ so agnir yasmin somam indraḥ sutaṃ dadhe jaṭhare vāvaśānaḥ /
analyzed: ayam saḥ agniḥ yasmin somam indraḥ sutam dadhe jaṭhare vāvaśānaḥ

original: RV_3,022.01c sahasriṇaṃ vājam atyaṃ na saptiṃ sasavān san stūyase jātavedaḥ //
analyzed: sahasriṇam vājam atyam na saptim sasavān san stūyase jātavedaḥ

original: RV_3,022.02a agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yad oṣadhīṣv apsv ā yajatra /
analyzed: agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyām yat oṣadhīṣu apsu ā yajatra

original: RV_3,022.02c yenāntarikṣam urv ātatantha tveṣaḥ sa bhānur arṇavo nṛcakṣāḥ //
analyzed: yena antarikṣam uru ātatantha tveṣaḥ sa bhānuḥ arṇavaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_3,022.03a agne divo arṇam acchā jigāsy acchā devāṃ ūciṣe dhiṣṇyā ye /
analyzed: agne divaḥ arṇam acchā jigāsi acchā devān ūciṣe dhiṣṇyāḥ ye

original: RV_3,022.03c yā rocane parastāt sūryasya yāś cāvastād upatiṣṭhanta āpaḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ rocane parastāt sūryasya yāḥ ca avastāt upatiṣṭhante āpaḥ

original: RV_3,022.04a purīṣyāso agnayaḥ prāvaṇebhiḥ sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: purīṣyāsaḥ agnayaḥ prāvaṇebhiḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_3,022.04c juṣantāṃ yajñam adruho 'namīvā iṣo mahīḥ //
analyzed: juṣantām yajñam adruhaḥ namīvāḥ iṣaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_3,022.05a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,022.05c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,023.01a nirmathitaḥ sudhita ā sadhasthe yuvā kavir adhvarasya praṇetā /
analyzed: nirmathitaḥ sudhite ā sadhasthe yuvā kaviḥ adhvarasya praṇetā

original: RV_3,023.01c jūryatsv agnir ajaro vaneṣv atrā dadhe amṛtaṃ jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: jūryatsu agniḥ ajaraḥ vaneṣu atrā dadhe amṛtam jātavedāḥ

original: RV_3,023.02a amanthiṣṭām bhāratā revad agniṃ devaśravā devavātaḥ sudakṣam /
analyzed: amanthiṣṭām bhāratā revat agnim deva śravāḥ deva vātaḥ su dakṣam

original: RV_3,023.02c agne vi paśya bṛhatābhi rāyeṣāṃ no netā bhavatād anu dyūn //
analyzed: agne vi paśya bṛhatā abhi rāyā iṣām naḥ netā bhavatāt anu dyūn

original: RV_3,023.03a daśa kṣipaḥ pūrvyaṃ sīm ajījanan sujātam mātṛṣu priyam /
analyzed: daśa kṣipaḥ pūrvyam sīm ajījanan su jātam mātṛṣu priyam

original: RV_3,023.03c agniṃ stuhi daivavātaṃ devaśravo yo janānām asad vaśī //
analyzed: agnim stuhi daiva vātam deva śravaḥ yaḥ janānām asat vaśī

original: RV_3,023.04a ni tvā dadhe vara ā pṛthivyā iḷāyās pade sudinatve ahnām /
analyzed: ni tvā dadhe vare ā pṛthivyāḥ iḷāyāḥ pade su dina tve ahnām

original: RV_3,023.04c dṛṣadvatyām mānuṣa āpayāyāṃ sarasvatyāṃ revad agne didīhi //
analyzed: dṛṣadvatyām mānuṣe āpayāyām sarasvatyām revat agne didīhi

original: RV_3,023.05a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
analyzed: iḷām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha

original: RV_3,023.05c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
analyzed: syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_3,024.01a agne sahasva pṛtanā abhimātīr apāsya /
analyzed: agne sahasva pṛtanāḥ abhimātīḥ apāsya

original: RV_3,024.01c duṣṭaras tarann arātīr varco dhā yajñavāhase //
analyzed: duṣṭaraḥ taran arātīḥ varcaḥ dhāḥ yajña vāhase

original: RV_3,024.02a agna iḷā sam idhyase vītihotro amartyaḥ /
analyzed: agne iḷā sam idhyase vītihotraḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_3,024.02c juṣasva sū no adhvaram //
analyzed: juṣasva su u naḥ adhvaram

original: RV_3,024.03a agne dyumnena jāgṛve sahasaḥ sūnav āhuta /
analyzed: agne dyumnena jāgṛve sahasaḥ sūno āhuta

original: RV_3,024.03c edam barhiḥ sado mama //
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama

original: RV_3,024.04a agne viśvebhir agnibhir devebhir mahayā giraḥ /
analyzed: agne viśvebhiḥ agnibhiḥ devebhiḥ mahaya giraḥ

original: RV_3,024.04c yajñeṣu ya u cāyavaḥ //
analyzed: yajñeṣu ye u cāyavaḥ

original: RV_3,024.05a agne dā dāśuṣe rayiṃ vīravantam parīṇasam /
analyzed: agne dāḥ dāśuṣe rayim vīravantam parīṇasam

original: RV_3,024.05c śiśīhi naḥ sūnumataḥ //
analyzed: śiśīhi naḥ sūnumataḥ

original: RV_3,025.01a agne divaḥ sūnur asi pracetās tanā pṛthivyā uta viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: agne divaḥ sūnuḥ asi pracetāḥ tanā pṛthivyāḥ uta viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_3,025.01c ṛdhag devāṃ iha yajā cikitvaḥ //
analyzed: ṛdhak devān iha yaja ā cikitvaḥ

original: RV_3,025.02a agniḥ sanoti vīryāṇi vidvān sanoti vājam amṛtāya bhūṣan /
analyzed: agniḥ sanoti vīryāṇi vidvān sanoti vājam amṛtāya bhūṣan

original: RV_3,025.02c sa no devāṃ eha vahā purukṣo //
analyzed: sa naḥ devān ā iha vaha purukṣo

original: RV_3,025.03a agnir dyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanye ā bhāti devī amṛte amūraḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ dyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanye ā bhāti devī amṛte amūraḥ

original: RV_3,025.03c kṣayan vājaiḥ puruścandro namobhiḥ //
analyzed: kṣayan vājaiḥ puru ścandraḥ namobhiḥ

original: RV_3,025.04a agna indraś ca dāśuṣo duroṇe sutāvato yajñam ihopa yātam /
analyzed: agne indraḥ ca dāśuṣaḥ duroṇe sutāvataḥ yajñam iha upa yātam

original: RV_3,025.04c amardhantā somapeyāya devā //
analyzed: amardhantā soma peyāya devā

original: RV_3,025.05a agne apāṃ sam idhyase duroṇe nityaḥ sūno sahaso jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: agne apām sam idhyase duroṇe nityaḥ sūno sahasaḥ jātavedaḥ

original: RV_3,025.05c sadhasthāni mahayamāna ūtī //
analyzed: sadhasthāni mahayamānaḥ ūtī

original: RV_3,026.01a vaiśvānaram manasāgniṃ nicāyyā haviṣmanto anuṣatyaṃ svarvidam /
analyzed: vaiśvānaram manasā agnim nicāyyāḥ haviṣmantaḥ anuṣatyam svar vidam

original: RV_3,026.01c sudānuṃ devaṃ rathiraṃ vasūyavo gīrbhī raṇvaṃ kuśikāso havāmahe //
analyzed: sudānum devam rathiram vasūyavaḥ gīrbhiḥ raṇvam kuśikāsaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_3,026.02a taṃ śubhram agnim avase havāmahe vaiśvānaram mātariśvānam ukthyam /
analyzed: tam śubhram agnim avase havāmahe vaiśvānaram mātariśvānam ukthyam

original: RV_3,026.02c bṛhaspatim manuṣo devatātaye vipraṃ śrotāram atithiṃ raghuṣyadam //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim manuṣaḥ devatātaye vipram śrotāram atithim raghuṣyadam

original: RV_3,026.03a aśvo na krandañ janibhiḥ sam idhyate vaiśvānaraḥ kuśikebhir yuge-yuge /
analyzed: aśvaḥ na krandam janibhiḥ sam idhyate vaiśvānaraḥ kuśikebhiḥ yuge yuge

original: RV_3,026.03c sa no agniḥ suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ dadhātu ratnam amṛteṣu jāgṛviḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ agniḥ su vīryam su aśvyam dadhātu ratnam amṛteṣu jāgṛviḥ

original: RV_3,026.04a pra yantu vājās taviṣībhir agnayaḥ śubhe sammiślāḥ pṛṣatīr ayukṣata /
analyzed: pra yantu vājāḥ taviṣībhiḥ agnayaḥ śubhe sammiślāḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayukṣata

original: RV_3,026.04c bṛhadukṣo maruto viśvavedasaḥ pra vepayanti parvatāṃ adābhyāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhat ukṣaḥ marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ pra vepayanti parvatān adābhyāḥ

original: RV_3,026.05a agniśriyo maruto viśvakṛṣṭaya ā tveṣam ugram ava īmahe vayam /
analyzed: agni śriyaḥ marutaḥ viśvakṛṣṭayaḥ ā tveṣam ugram avaḥ īmahe vayam

original: RV_3,026.05c te svānino rudriyā varṣanirṇijaḥ siṃhā na heṣakratavaḥ sudānavaḥ //
analyzed: te svāninaḥ rudriyāḥ varṣa nirṇijaḥ siṃhāḥ na heṣa kratavaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: RV_3,026.06a vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhir agner bhāmam marutām oja īmahe /
analyzed: vrātam vrātam gaṇaṃgaṇam su śastibhiḥ agneḥ bhāmam marutām ojaḥ īmahe

original: RV_3,026.06c pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhaso gantāro yajñaṃ vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣat aśvāsaḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ gantāraḥ yajñam vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ

original: RV_3,026.07a agnir asmi janmanā jātavedā ghṛtam me cakṣur amṛtam ma āsan /
analyzed: agniḥ asmi janmanā jātavedāḥ ghṛtam me cakṣuḥ amṛtam me āsan

original: RV_3,026.07c arkas tridhātū rajaso vimāno 'jasro gharmo havir asmi nāma //
analyzed: arkaḥ tri dhātuḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ jasraḥ gharmaḥ haviḥ asmi nāma

original: RV_3,026.08a tribhiḥ pavitrair apupod dhy arkaṃ hṛdā matiṃ jyotir anu prajānan /
analyzed: tribhiḥ pavitraiḥ apupot hi arkam hṛdā matim jyotiḥ anu prajānan

original: RV_3,026.08c varṣiṣṭhaṃ ratnam akṛta svadhābhir ād id dyāvāpṛthivī pary apaśyat //
analyzed: varṣiṣṭham ratnam akṛta svadhābhiḥ āt id dyāvāpṛthivī pari apaśyat

original: RV_3,026.09a śatadhāram utsam akṣīyamāṇaṃ vipaścitam pitaraṃ vaktvānām /
analyzed: śata dhāram utsam a kṣīyamāṇam vipaścitam pitaram vaktvānām

original: RV_3,026.09c meḷim madantam pitror upasthe taṃ rodasī pipṛtaṃ satyavācam //
analyzed: meḷim madantam pitroḥ upasthe tam rodasī pipṛtam satya vācam

original: RV_3,027.01a pra vo vājā abhidyavo haviṣmanto ghṛtācyā /
analyzed: pra vaḥ vājāḥ abhidyavaḥ haviṣmantaḥ ghṛtācyā

original: RV_3,027.01c devāñ jigāti sumnayuḥ //
analyzed: devām jigāti sumnayuḥ

original: RV_3,027.02a īḷe agniṃ vipaścitaṃ girā yajñasya sādhanam /
analyzed: īḍe agnim vipaścitam girā yajñasya sādhanam

original: RV_3,027.02c śruṣṭīvānaṃ dhitāvānam //
analyzed: śruṣṭīvānam dhitāvānam

original: RV_3,027.03a agne śakema te vayaṃ yamaṃ devasya vājinaḥ /
analyzed: agne śakema te vayam yamam devasya vājinaḥ

original: RV_3,027.03c ati dveṣāṃsi tarema //
analyzed: ati dveṣāṃsi tarema

original: RV_3,027.04a samidhyamāno adhvare 'gniḥ pāvaka īḍyaḥ /
analyzed: samidhyamānaḥ adhvare gniḥ pāvakaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_3,027.04c śociṣkeśas tam īmahe //
analyzed: śociṣkeśaḥ tam īmahe

original: RV_3,027.05a pṛthupājā amartyo ghṛtanirṇik svāhutaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthu pājāḥ amartyaḥ ghṛta nirṇij su āhutaḥ

original: RV_3,027.05c agnir yajñasya havyavāṭ //
analyzed: agniḥ yajñasya havyavāṭ

original: RV_3,027.06a taṃ sabādho yatasruca itthā dhiyā yajñavantaḥ /
analyzed: tam sabādhaḥ yata srucaḥ itthā dhiyā yajñavantaḥ

original: RV_3,027.06c ā cakrur agnim ūtaye //
analyzed: ā cakruḥ agnim ūtaye

original: RV_3,027.07a hotā devo amartyaḥ purastād eti māyayā /
analyzed: hotā devaḥ amartyaḥ purastāt eti māyayā

original: RV_3,027.07c vidathāni pracodayan //
analyzed: vidathāni pracodayan

original: RV_3,027.08a vājī vājeṣu dhīyate 'dhvareṣu pra ṇīyate /
analyzed: vājī vājeṣu dhīyate dhvareṣu pra nīyate

original: RV_3,027.08c vipro yajñasya sādhanaḥ //
analyzed: vipraḥ yajñasya sādhanaḥ

original: RV_3,027.09a dhiyā cakre vareṇyo bhūtānāṃ garbham ā dadhe /
analyzed: dhiyā cakre vareṇyaḥ bhūtānām garbham ā dadhe

original: RV_3,027.09c dakṣasya pitaraṃ tanā //
analyzed: dakṣasya pitaram tanā

original: RV_3,027.10a ni tvā dadhe vareṇyaṃ dakṣasyeḷā sahaskṛta /
analyzed: ni tvā dadhe vareṇyam dakṣasya iḷā sahaskṛta

original: RV_3,027.10c agne sudītim uśijam //
analyzed: agne su dītim uśijam

original: RV_3,027.11a agniṃ yanturam apturam ṛtasya yoge vanuṣaḥ /
analyzed: agnim yanturam ap turam ṛtasya yoge

original: RV_3,027.11c viprā vājaiḥ sam indhate //
analyzed: viprāḥ vājaiḥ sam indhate

original: RV_3,027.12a ūrjo napātam adhvare dīdivāṃsam upa dyavi /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam adhvare dīdivāṃsam upa dyavi

original: RV_3,027.12c agnim īḷe kavikratum //
analyzed: agnim īḍe kavi kratum

original: RV_3,027.13a īḷenyo namasyas tiras tamāṃsi darśataḥ /
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ namasyaḥ tiras tamāṃsi darśataḥ

original: RV_3,027.13c sam agnir idhyate vṛṣā //
analyzed: sam agniḥ idhyate vṛṣā

original: RV_3,027.14a vṛṣo agniḥ sam idhyate 'śvo na devavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣaḥ agniḥ sam idhyate śvas na deva vāhanaḥ

original: RV_3,027.14c taṃ haviṣmanta īḷate //
analyzed: tam haviṣmantaḥ īḍate

original: RV_3,027.15a vṛṣaṇaṃ tvā vayaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇam tvā vayam vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi

original: RV_3,027.15c agne dīdyatam bṛhat //
analyzed: agne dīdyatam bṛhat

original: RV_3,028.01a agne juṣasva no haviḥ puroḷāśaṃ jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: agne juṣasva naḥ haviḥ puroḷāśam jātavedaḥ

original: RV_3,028.01c prātaḥsāve dhiyāvaso //
analyzed: prātaḥsāve dhiyāvaso

original: RV_3,028.02a puroḷā agne pacatas tubhyaṃ vā ghā pariṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: puroḷās agne pacataḥ tubhyam vā gha pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_3,028.02c taṃ juṣasva yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: tam juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_3,028.03a agne vīhi puroḷāśam āhutaṃ tiroahnyam /
analyzed: agne vīhi puroḍāśam āhutam tiroahnyam

original: RV_3,028.03c sahasaḥ sūnur asy adhvare hitaḥ //
analyzed: sahasaḥ sūnuḥ asi adhvare hitaḥ

original: RV_3,028.04a mādhyandine savane jātavedaḥ puroḷāśam iha kave juṣasva /
analyzed: mādhyandine savane jātavedaḥ puroḷāśam iha kave juṣasva

original: RV_3,028.04c agne yahvasya tava bhāgadheyaṃ na pra minanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ //
analyzed: agne yahvasya tava bhāgadheyam na pra minanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ

original: RV_3,028.05a agne tṛtīye savane hi kāniṣaḥ puroḷāśaṃ sahasaḥ sūnav āhutam /
analyzed: agne tṛtīye savane hi kāniṣaḥ puroḷāśam sahasaḥ sūno āhutam

original: RV_3,028.05c athā deveṣv adhvaraṃ vipanyayā dhā ratnavantam amṛteṣu jāgṛvim //
analyzed: athā deveṣu adhvaram vipanyayā dhāḥ ratnavantam amṛteṣu jāgṛvim

original: RV_3,028.06a agne vṛdhāna āhutim puroḷāśaṃ jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: agne vṛdhānaḥ āhutim puroḍāśam jātavedaḥ

original: RV_3,028.06c juṣasva tiroahnyam //
analyzed: juṣasva tiroahnyam

original: RV_3,029.01a astīdam adhimanthanam asti prajananaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: asti idam adhimanthanam asti prajananam kṛtam

original: RV_3,029.01c etāṃ viśpatnīm ā bharāgnim manthāma pūrvathā //
analyzed: etām viś patnīm ā bhara agnim manthāma pūrvathā

original: RV_3,029.02a araṇyor nihito jātavedā garbha iva sudhito garbhiṇīṣu /
analyzed: araṇyoḥ nihitaḥ jātavedāḥ garbhaḥ iva sudhitaḥ garbhiṇīṣu

original: RV_3,029.02c dive-diva īḍyo jāgṛvadbhir haviṣmadbhir manuṣyebhir agniḥ //
analyzed: dive dive īḍyaḥ jāgṛvadbhiḥ haviṣmadbhiḥ manuṣyebhiḥ agniḥ

original: RV_3,029.03a uttānāyām ava bharā cikitvān sadyaḥ pravītā vṛṣaṇaṃ jajāna /
analyzed: uttānāyām ava bhara cikitvān sadyas pravītā vṛṣaṇam jajāna

original: RV_3,029.03c aruṣastūpo ruśad asya pāja iḷāyās putro vayune 'janiṣṭa //
analyzed: aruṣa stūpaḥ ruśat asya pājaḥ iḷāyāḥ putraḥ vayune janiṣṭa

original: RV_3,029.04a iḷāyās tvā pade vayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā adhi /
analyzed: iḷāyāḥ tvā pade vayam nābhā pṛthivyāḥ adhi

original: RV_3,029.04c jātavedo ni dhīmahy agne havyāya voḷhave //
analyzed: jātavedaḥ ni dhīmahi agne havyāya voḷhave

original: RV_3,029.05a manthatā naraḥ kavim advayantam pracetasam amṛtaṃ supratīkam /
analyzed: manthata naraḥ kavim advayantam pracetasam amṛtam su pratīkam

original: RV_3,029.05c yajñasya ketum prathamam purastād agniṃ naro janayatā suśevam //
analyzed: yajñasya ketum prathamam purastāt agnim naraḥ janayata su śevam

original: RV_3,029.06a yadī manthanti bāhubhir vi rocate 'śvo na vājy aruṣo vaneṣv ā /
analyzed: yadī manthanti bāhubhiḥ vi rocate śvas na vājī aruṣaḥ vaneṣu ā

original: RV_3,029.06c citro na yāmann aśvinor anivṛtaḥ pari vṛṇakty aśmanas tṛṇā dahan //
analyzed: citraḥ na yāman aśvinoḥ anivṛtaḥ pari vṛṇakti aśmanaḥ tṛṇā dahan

original: RV_3,029.07a jāto agnī rocate cekitāno vājī vipraḥ kaviśastaḥ sudānuḥ /
analyzed: jātaḥ agniḥ rocate cekitānaḥ vājī vipraḥ kavi śastaḥ sudānuḥ

original: RV_3,029.07c yaṃ devāsa īḍyaṃ viśvavidaṃ havyavāham adadhur adhvareṣu //
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ īḍyam viśva vidam havyavāham adadhuḥ adhvareṣu

original: RV_3,029.08a sīda hotaḥ sva u loke cikitvān sādayā yajñaṃ sukṛtasya yonau /
analyzed: sīda hotar sve u loke cikitvān sādaya yajñam sukṛtasya yonau

original: RV_3,029.08c devāvīr devān haviṣā yajāsy agne bṛhad yajamāne vayo dhāḥ //
analyzed: devāvīḥ devān haviṣā yajāsi agne bṛhat yajamāne vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_3,029.09a kṛṇota dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sakhāyo 'sredhanta itana vājam accha /
analyzed: kṛṇota dhūmam vṛṣaṇam sakhāyo sredhantaḥ itana vājam accha

original: RV_3,029.09c ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devāso asahanta dasyūn //
analyzed: ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāh su vīraḥ yena devāsaḥ asahanta dasyūn

original: RV_3,029.10a ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ /
analyzed: ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ yatas jātaḥ arocathāḥ

original: RV_3,029.10c taṃ jānann agna ā sīdāthā no vardhayā giraḥ //
analyzed: tam jānan agne ā sīda atha ā naḥ vardhaya giraḥ

original: RV_3,029.11a tanūnapād ucyate garbha āsuro narāśaṃso bhavati yad vijāyate /
analyzed: tanūnapāt ucyate garbhaḥ āsuraḥ narāśaṃsaḥ bhavati yat vijāyate

original: RV_3,029.11c mātariśvā yad amimīta mātari vātasya sargo abhavat sarīmaṇi //
analyzed: mātariśvā yat amimīta mātari vātasya sargaḥ abhavat sarīmaṇi

original: RV_3,029.12a sunirmathā nirmathitaḥ sunidhā nihitaḥ kaviḥ /
analyzed: sunirmathā nirmathitaḥ sunidhā nihitaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_3,029.12c agne svadhvarā kṛṇu devān devayate yaja //
analyzed: agne su adhvarā kṛṇu devān devayate yaja

original: RV_3,029.13a ajījanann amṛtam martyāso 'sremāṇaṃ taraṇiṃ vīḷujambham /
analyzed: ajījanan amṛtam martyāsaḥ sremāṇam taraṇim vīḍu jambham

original: RV_3,029.13c daśa svasāro agruvaḥ samīcīḥ pumāṃsaṃ jātam abhi saṃ rabhante //
analyzed: daśa svasāraḥ agruvaḥ samīcīḥ pumāṃsam jātam abhi sam rabhante

original: RV_3,029.14a pra saptahotā sanakād arocata mātur upasthe yad aśocad ūdhani /
analyzed: pra saptahotā sanakāt arocata mātuḥ upasthe yat aśocat ūdhani

original: RV_3,029.14c na ni miṣati suraṇo dive-dive yad asurasya jaṭharād ajāyata //
analyzed: na ni miṣati suraṇaḥ dive dive yat asurasya jaṭharāt ajāyata

original: RV_3,029.15a amitrāyudho marutām iva prayāḥ prathamajā brahmaṇo viśvam id viduḥ /
analyzed: amitrāyudhaḥ marutām iva prayāḥ prathama jāḥ brahmaṇaḥ viśvam id viduḥ

original: RV_3,029.15c dyumnavad brahma kuśikāsa erira eka-eko dame agniṃ sam īdhire //
analyzed: dyumnavat brahma kuśikāsaḥ erire ekaikaḥ dame agnim sam īdhire

original: RV_3,029.16a yad adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotaś cikitvo 'vṛṇīmahīha /
analyzed: yat adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotar cikitvaḥ vṛṇīmahi iha

original: RV_3,029.16c dhruvam ayā dhruvam utāśamiṣṭhāḥ prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam //
analyzed: dhruvam ayāḥ dhruvam uta aśamiṣṭhāḥ prajānan vidvān upa yāhi somam

original: RV_3,030.01a icchanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ sunvanti somaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi /
analyzed: icchanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ sunvanti somam dadhati prayāṃsi

original: RV_3,030.01c titikṣante abhiśastiṃ janānām indra tvad ā kaś cana hi praketaḥ //
analyzed: titikṣante abhiśastim janānām indra tvat ā kaḥ cana hi praketaḥ

original: RV_3,030.02a na te dūre paramā cid rajāṃsy ā tu pra yāhi harivo haribhyām /
analyzed: na te dūre paramā cit rajāṃsi ā tu pra yāhi harivas haribhyām

original: RV_3,030.02c sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā yuktā grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau //
analyzed: sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtā imā yuktāḥ grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau

original: RV_3,030.03a indraḥ suśipro maghavā tarutro mahāvrātas tuvikūrmir ṛghāvān /
analyzed: indraḥ su śipraḥ maghavā tarutraḥ mahā vrātaḥ tuvikūrmiḥ ṛghāvān

original: RV_3,030.03c yad ugro dhā bādhito martyeṣu kva tyā te vṛṣabha vīryāṇi //
analyzed: yat ugraḥ dhāḥ bādhitaḥ martyeṣu kva tyā te vṛṣabha vīryāṇi

original: RV_3,030.04a tvaṃ hi ṣmā cyāvayann acyutāny eko vṛtrā carasi jighnamānaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi sma ā cyāvayan acyutāni ekaḥ vṛtrā carasi jighnamānaḥ

original: RV_3,030.04c tava dyāvāpṛthivī parvatāso 'nu vratāya nimiteva tasthuḥ //
analyzed: tava dyāvāpṛthivī parvatāsaḥ nu vratāya nimitā iva tasthuḥ

original: RV_3,030.05a utābhaye puruhūta śravobhir eko dṛḷham avado vṛtrahā san /
analyzed: uta abhaye puruhūta śravobhiḥ ekaḥ dṛḍham avadaḥ vṛtrahā san

original: RV_3,030.05c ime cid indra rodasī apāre yat saṃgṛbhṇā maghavan kāśir it te //
analyzed: ime cit indra rodasī apāre yat saṃgṛbhṇāḥ maghavan kāśiḥ id te

original: RV_3,030.06a pra sū ta indra pravatā haribhyām pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇann etu śatrūn /
analyzed: pra su u te indra pravatā haribhyām pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇan etu śatrūn

original: RV_3,030.06c jahi pratīco anūcaḥ parāco viśvaṃ satyaṃ kṛṇuhi viṣṭam astu //
analyzed: jahi pratīcaḥ anūcaḥ parācaḥ viśvam satyam kṛṇuhi viṣṭam astu

original: RV_3,030.07a yasmai dhāyur adadhā martyāyābhaktaṃ cid bhajate gehyaṃ saḥ /
analyzed: yasmai dhāyuḥ adadhāḥ martyāya a bhaktam cit bhajate gehyam saḥ

original: RV_3,030.07c bhadrā ta indra sumatir ghṛtācī sahasradānā puruhūta rātiḥ //
analyzed: bhadrā te indra sumatiḥ ghṛtācī sahasra dānā puruhūta rātiḥ

original: RV_3,030.08a sahadānum puruhūta kṣiyantam ahastam indra sam piṇak kuṇārum /
analyzed: saha dānum puruhūta kṣiyantam ahastam indra sam piṇak kuṇārum

original: RV_3,030.08c abhi vṛtraṃ vardhamānam piyārum apādam indra tavasā jaghantha //
analyzed: abhi vṛtram vardhamānam piyārum a pādam indra tavasā jaghantha

original: RV_3,030.09a ni sāmanām iṣirām indra bhūmim mahīm apārāṃ sadane sasattha /
analyzed: ni sāmanām iṣirām indra bhūmim mahīm apārām sadane sasattha

original: RV_3,030.09c astabhnād dyāṃ vṛṣabho antarikṣam arṣantv āpas tvayeha prasūtāḥ //
analyzed: astabhnāt dyām vṛṣabhaḥ antarikṣam arṣantu āpaḥ tvayā iha prasūtāḥ

original: RV_3,030.10a alātṛṇo vala indra vrajo goḥ purā hantor bhayamāno vy āra /
analyzed: alātṛṇaḥ valaḥ indra vrajaḥ goḥ purā hantoḥ bhayamānaḥ vi āra

original: RV_3,030.10c sugān patho akṛṇon niraje gāḥ prāvan vāṇīḥ puruhūtaṃ dhamantīḥ //
analyzed: su gān pathaḥ akṛṇot niraje gāḥ prāvan vāṇīḥ puruhūtam dhamantīḥ

original: RV_3,030.11a eko dve vasumatī samīcī indra ā paprau pṛthivīm uta dyām /
analyzed: ekaḥ dve vasumatī samīcī indraḥ ā paprau pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_3,030.11c utāntarikṣād abhi naḥ samīka iṣo rathīḥ sayujaḥ śūra vājān //
analyzed: uta antarikṣāt abhi naḥ samīke iṣaḥ rathīḥ sayujaḥ śūra vājān

original: RV_3,030.12a diśaḥ sūryo na mināti pradiṣṭā dive-dive haryaśvaprasūtāḥ /
analyzed: diśaḥ sūryaḥ na mināti pradiṣṭāḥ dive dive haryaśva prasūtāḥ

original: RV_3,030.12c saṃ yad ānaḷ adhvana ād id aśvair vimocanaṃ kṛṇute tat tv asya //
analyzed: sam yat ānaṭ adhvanaḥ āt id aśvaiḥ vimocanam kṛṇute tat tu asya

original: RV_3,030.13a didṛkṣanta uṣaso yāmann aktor vivasvatyā mahi citram anīkam /
analyzed: didṛkṣantaḥ uṣasaḥ yāman aktoḥ vivasvatyāḥ mahi citram anīkam

original: RV_3,030.13c viśve jānanti mahinā yad āgād indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi //
analyzed: viśve jānanti mahinā yat āgāt indrasya karma su kṛtā purūṇi

original: RV_3,030.14a mahi jyotir nihitaṃ vakṣaṇāsv āmā pakvaṃ carati bibhratī gauḥ /
analyzed: mahi jyotiḥ nihitam vakṣaṇāsu āmā pakvam carati bibhratī gauḥ

original: RV_3,030.14c viśvaṃ svādma sambhṛtam usriyāyāṃ yat sīm indro adadhād bhojanāya //
analyzed: viśvam svādma sambhṛtam usriyāyām yat sīm indraḥ adadhāt bhojanāya

original: RV_3,030.15a indra dṛhya yāmakośā abhūvan yajñāya śikṣa gṛṇate sakhibhyaḥ /
analyzed: indra dṛhya yāma kośāḥ abhūvan yajñāya śikṣa gṛṇate sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_3,030.15c durmāyavo durevā martyāso niṣaṅgiṇo ripavo hantvāsaḥ //
analyzed: durmāyavaḥ durevāḥ martyāsaḥ niṣaṅgiṇaḥ ripavaḥ hantvāsaḥ

original: RV_3,030.16a saṃ ghoṣaḥ śṛṇve 'vamair amitrair jahī ny eṣv aśaniṃ tapiṣṭhām /
analyzed: sam ghoṣaḥ śṛṇve vamaiḥ amitraiḥ jahi ni eṣu aśanim tapiṣṭhām

original: RV_3,030.16c vṛścem adhastād vi rujā sahasva jahi rakṣo maghavan randhayasva //
analyzed: vṛśca īm adhastāt vi ruja sahasva jahi rakṣaḥ maghavan randhayasva

original: RV_3,030.17a ud vṛha rakṣaḥ sahamūlam indra vṛścā madhyam praty agraṃ śṛṇīhi /
analyzed: ud vṛha rakṣaḥ saha mūlam indra vṛśca madhyam prati agram śṛṇīhi

original: RV_3,030.17c ā kīvataḥ salalūkaṃ cakartha brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetim asya //
analyzed: ā kīvataḥ salalūkam cakartha brahma dviṣe tapuṣim hetim asya

original: RV_3,030.18a svastaye vājibhiś ca praṇetaḥ saṃ yan mahīr iṣa āsatsi pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: svastaye vājibhiḥ ca praṇetar sam yat mahīḥ iṣaḥ āsatsi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,030.18c rāyo vantāro bṛhataḥ syāmāsme astu bhaga indra prajāvān //
analyzed: rāyaḥ vantāraḥ bṛhataḥ syāma asme astu bhagaḥ indra prajāvān

original: RV_3,030.19a ā no bhara bhagam indra dyumantaṃ ni te deṣṇasya dhīmahi prareke /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara bhagam indra dyumantam ni te deṣṇasya dhīmahi prareke

original: RV_3,030.19c ūrva iva paprathe kāmo asme tam ā pṛṇa vasupate vasūnām //
analyzed: ūrvaḥ iva paprathe kāmaḥ asme tam ā pṛṇa vasu pate vasūnām

original: RV_3,030.20a imaṃ kāmam mandayā gobhir aśvaiś candravatā rādhasā paprathaś ca /
analyzed: imam kāmam mandayā gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ candravatā rādhasā paprathaḥ ca

original: RV_3,030.20c svaryavo matibhis tubhyaṃ viprā indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāso akran //
analyzed: svaryavaḥ matibhiḥ tubhyam viprāḥ indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāsaḥ akran

original: RV_3,030.21a ā no gotrā dardṛhi gopate gāḥ sam asmabhyaṃ sanayo yantu vājāḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ gotrā dardṛhi gopate gāḥ sam asmabhyam sanayaḥ yantu vājāḥ

original: RV_3,030.21c divakṣā asi vṛṣabha satyaśuṣmo 'smabhyaṃ su maghavan bodhi godāḥ //
analyzed: divakṣāḥ asi vṛṣabha satya śuṣma u smabhyam su maghavan bodhi go dāḥ

original: RV_3,030.22a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,030.22c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,031.01a śāsad vahnir duhitur naptyaṃ gād vidvāṃ ṛtasya dīdhitiṃ saparyan /
analyzed: śāsat vahniḥ duhituḥ naptyam gāt vidvān ṛtasya dīdhitim saparyan

original: RV_3,031.01c pitā yatra duhituḥ sekam ṛñjan saṃ śagmyena manasā dadhanve //
analyzed: pitā yatra duhituḥ sekam ṛñjan sam śagmyena manasā dadhanve

original: RV_3,031.02a na jāmaye tānvo riktham āraik cakāra garbhaṃ sanitur nidhānam /
analyzed: na jāmaye tānvaḥ riktham āraik cakāra garbham sanituḥ nidhānam

original: RV_3,031.02c yadī mātaro janayanta vahnim anyaḥ kartā sukṛtor anya ṛndhan //
analyzed: yadī mātaraḥ janayanta vahnim anyaḥ kartā su kṛtoḥ anyaḥ ṛndhan

original: RV_3,031.03a agnir jajñe juhvā rejamāno mahas putrāṃ aruṣasya prayakṣe /
analyzed: agniḥ jajñe juhvā rejamānaḥ mahaḥ putrān aruṣasya prayakṣe

original: RV_3,031.03c mahān garbho mahy ā jātam eṣām mahī pravṛd dharyaśvasya yajñaiḥ //
analyzed: mahān garbhaḥ mahi ā jātam eṣām mahī pravṛdh haryaśvasya yajñaiḥ

original: RV_3,031.04a abhi jaitrīr asacanta spṛdhānam mahi jyotis tamaso nir ajānan /
analyzed: abhi jaitrīḥ asacanta spṛdhānam mahi jyotiḥ tamasaḥ niḥ ajānan

original: RV_3,031.04c taṃ jānatīḥ praty ud āyann uṣāsaḥ patir gavām abhavad eka indraḥ //
analyzed: tam jānatīḥ prati ud āyan uṣāsaḥ patiḥ gavām abhavat ekaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_3,031.05a vīḷau satīr abhi dhīrā atṛndan prācāhinvan manasā sapta viprāḥ /
analyzed: vīḍau satīḥ abhi dhīrāḥ atṛndan prācā ahinvan manasā sapta viprāḥ

original: RV_3,031.05c viśvām avindan pathyām ṛtasya prajānann it tā namasā viveśa //
analyzed: viśvām avindan pathyām ṛtasya prajānan id tāḥ namasā viveśa

original: RV_3,031.06a vidad yadī saramā rugṇam adrer mahi pāthaḥ pūrvyaṃ sadhryak kaḥ /
analyzed: vidat yadī saramā rugṇam adreḥ mahi pāthaḥ pūrvyam sadhryak kaḥ

original: RV_3,031.06c agraṃ nayat supady akṣarāṇām acchā ravam prathamā jānatī gāt //
analyzed: agram nayat su padī akṣarāṇām acchā ravam prathamā jānatī gāt

original: RV_3,031.07a agacchad u vipratamaḥ sakhīyann asūdayat sukṛte garbham adriḥ /
analyzed: agacchat u vipratamaḥ sakhīyan asūdayat su kṛte garbham adriḥ

original: RV_3,031.07c sasāna maryo yuvabhir makhasyann athābhavad aṅgirāḥ sadyo arcan //
analyzed: sasāna maryaḥ yuvabhiḥ makhasyan athā abhavat aṅgirāḥ sadyas arcan

original: RV_3,031.08a sataḥ-sataḥ pratimānam purobhūr viśvā veda janimā hanti śuṣṇam /
analyzed: sataḥ sataḥ pratimānam purobhūḥ viśvā veda janimā hanti śuṣṇam

original: RV_3,031.08c pra ṇo divaḥ padavīr gavyur arcan sakhā sakhīṃr amuñcan nir avadyāt //
analyzed: pra naḥ divaḥ padavīḥ gavyuḥ arcan sakhā sakhīṃr amuñcat niḥ avadyāt

original: RV_3,031.09a ni gavyatā manasā sedur arkaiḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum /
analyzed: ni gavyatā manasā seduḥ arkaiḥ kṛṇvānāsaḥ amṛta tvāya gātum

original: RV_3,031.09c idaṃ cin nu sadanam bhūry eṣāṃ yena māsāṃ asiṣāsann ṛtena //
analyzed: idam cit nu sadanam bhūri eṣām yena mā asām asiṣāsan ṛtena

original: RV_3,031.10a sampaśyamānā amadann abhi svam payaḥ pratnasya retaso dughānāḥ /
analyzed: sampaśyamānāḥ amadan abhi svam payaḥ pratnasya retasaḥ dughānāḥ

original: RV_3,031.10c vi rodasī atapad ghoṣa eṣāṃ jāte niṣṭhām adadhur goṣu vīrān //
analyzed: vi rodasī atapat ghoṣaḥ eṣām jāte niṣṭhām adadhuḥ goṣu vīrān

original: RV_3,031.11a sa jātebhir vṛtrahā sed u havyair ud usriyā asṛjad indro arkaiḥ /
analyzed: sa jātebhiḥ vṛtrahā sa id u havyaiḥ ud usriyāḥ asṛjat indraḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_3,031.11c urūcy asmai ghṛtavad bharantī madhu svādma duduhe jenyā gauḥ //
analyzed: urūcī asmai ghṛtavat bharantī madhu svādma duduhe jenyā gauḥ

original: RV_3,031.12a pitre cic cakruḥ sadanaṃ sam asmai mahi tviṣīmat sukṛto vi hi khyan /
