analyzed: pitre cit cakruḥ sadanam sam asmai mahi tviṣīmat su kṛtaḥ vi hi khyan

original: RV_3,031.12c viṣkabhnanta skambhanenā janitrī āsīnā ūrdhvaṃ rabhasaṃ vi minvan //
analyzed: viṣkabhnanta skambhanena ā janitrī āsīnāḥ ūrdhvam rabhasam vi minvan

original: RV_3,031.13a mahī yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnathe dhāt sadyovṛdhaṃ vibhvaṃ rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: mahī yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnathe dhāt sadyovṛdham vibhvam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_3,031.13c giro yasminn anavadyāḥ samīcīr viśvā indrāya taviṣīr anuttāḥ //
analyzed: giraḥ yasmin anavadyāḥ samīcīḥ viśvāḥ indrāya taviṣīḥ anuttāḥ

original: RV_3,031.14a mahy ā te sakhyaṃ vaśmi śaktīr ā vṛtraghne niyuto yanti pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: mahi ā te sakhyam vaśmi śaktīḥ ā vṛtra ghne niyutaḥ yanti pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,031.14c mahi stotram ava āganma sūrer asmākaṃ su maghavan bodhi gopāḥ //
analyzed: mahi stotram avaḥ āganma sūreḥ asmākam su maghavan bodhi gopāḥ

original: RV_3,031.15a mahi kṣetram puru ścandraṃ vividvān ād it sakhibhyaś carathaṃ sam airat /
analyzed: mahi kṣetram puru ścandram vividvān āt id sakhibhyaḥ caratham sam airat

original: RV_3,031.15c indro nṛbhir ajanad dīdyānaḥ sākaṃ sūryam uṣasaṃ gātum agnim //
analyzed: indraḥ nṛbhiḥ ajanat dīdyānaḥ sākam sūryam uṣasam gātum agnim

original: RV_3,031.16a apaś cid eṣa vibhvo damūnāḥ pra sadhrīcīr asṛjad viśvaścandrāḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ cit eṣa vibhvaḥ damūnāḥ pra sadhrīcīḥ asṛjat viśva ścandrāḥ

original: RV_3,031.16c madhvaḥ punānāḥ kavibhiḥ pavitrair dyubhir hinvanty aktubhir dhanutrīḥ //
analyzed: madhvaḥ punānāḥ kavibhiḥ pavitraiḥ dyubhiḥ hinvanti aktubhiḥ dhanutrīḥ

original: RV_3,031.17a anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī jihāte ubhe sūryasya maṃhanā yajatre /
analyzed: anu kṛṣṇe vasu dhitī jihāte ubhe sūryasya maṃhanā yajatre

original: RV_3,031.17c pari yat te mahimānaṃ vṛjadhyai sakhāya indra kāmyā ṛjipyāḥ //
analyzed: pari yat te mahimānam vṛjadhyai sakhāyaḥ indra kāmyāḥ ṛjipyāḥ

original: RV_3,031.18a patir bhava vṛtrahan sūnṛtānāṃ girāṃ viśvāyur vṛṣabho vayodhāḥ /
analyzed: patiḥ bhava vṛtrahan sūnṛtānām girām viśvāyuḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vayodhāḥ

original: RV_3,031.18c ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan //
analyzed: ā naḥ gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhiḥ mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan

original: RV_3,031.19a tam aṅgirasvan namasā saparyan navyaṃ kṛṇomi sanyase purājām /
analyzed: tam aṅgirasvat namasā saparyan navyam kṛṇomi sanyase purājām

original: RV_3,031.19c druho vi yāhi bahulā adevīḥ svaś ca no maghavan sātaye dhāḥ //
analyzed: druhaḥ vi yāhi bahulāḥ adevīḥ svar ca naḥ maghavan sātaye dhāḥ

original: RV_3,031.20a mihaḥ pāvakāḥ pratatā abhūvan svasti naḥ pipṛhi pāram āsām /
analyzed: mihaḥ pāvakāḥ pratatāḥ abhūvan svasti naḥ pipṛhi pāram āsām

original: RV_3,031.20c indra tvaṃ rathiraḥ pāhi no riṣo makṣū-makṣū kṛṇuhi gojito naḥ //
analyzed: indra tvam rathiraḥ pāhi naḥ riṣaḥ makṣūmakṣū kṛṇuhi go jitaḥ naḥ

original: RV_3,031.21a adediṣṭa vṛtrahā gopatir gā antaḥ kṛṣṇāṃ aruṣair dhāmabhir gāt /
analyzed: adediṣṭa vṛtrahā go patiḥ gāḥ antar kṛṣṇām aruṣaiḥ dhāmabhiḥ gāt

original: RV_3,031.21c pra sūnṛtā diśamāna ṛtena duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ //
analyzed: pra sūnṛtāḥ diśamānaḥ ṛtena duraḥ ca viśvāḥ avṛṇot apa svāḥ

original: RV_3,031.22a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,031.22c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,032.01a indra somaṃ somapate pibemam mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ cāru yat te /
analyzed: indra somam soma pate piba imam mādhyandinam savanam cāru yat te

original: RV_3,032.01c prapruthyā śipre maghavann ṛjīṣin vimucyā harī iha mādayasva //
analyzed: prapruthyā śipre maghavan ṛjīṣin vimucyā harī iha mādayasva

original: RV_3,032.02a gavāśiram manthinam indra śukram pibā somaṃ rarimā te madāya /
analyzed: gavāśiram manthinam indra śukram piba somam rarimā te madāya

original: RV_3,032.02c brahmakṛtā mārutenā gaṇena sajoṣā rudrais tṛpad ā vṛṣasva //
analyzed: brahma kṛtā mārutenā gaṇena sajoṣāḥ rudraiḥ tṛpat ā vṛṣasva

original: RV_3,032.03a ye te śuṣmaṃ ye taviṣīm avardhann arcanta indra marutas ta ojaḥ /
analyzed: ye te śuṣmam ye taviṣīm avardhan arcantaḥ indra marutaḥ te ojaḥ

original: RV_3,032.03c mādhyandine savane vajrahasta pibā rudrebhiḥ sagaṇaḥ suśipra //
analyzed: mādhyandine savane vajrahasta pibā rudrebhiḥ sa gaṇaḥ su śipra

original: RV_3,032.04a ta in nv asya madhumad vivipra indrasya śardho maruto ya āsan /
analyzed: te id nu asya madhumat vivipre indrasya śardhaḥ marutaḥ ye āsan

original: RV_3,032.04c yebhir vṛtrasyeṣito vivedāmarmaṇo manyamānasya marma //
analyzed: yebhiḥ vṛtrasya iṣitaḥ viveda amarmaṇaḥ manyamānasya marma

original: RV_3,032.05a manuṣvad indra savanaṃ juṣāṇaḥ pibā somaṃ śaśvate vīryāya /
analyzed: manuṣvat indra savanam juṣāṇaḥ piba somam śaśvate vīryāya

original: RV_3,032.05c sa ā vavṛtsva haryaśva yajñaiḥ saraṇyubhir apo arṇā sisarṣi //
analyzed: saḥ ā vavṛtsva hari aśva yajñaiḥ saraṇyubhiḥ apaḥ arṇā sisarṣi

original: RV_3,032.06a tvam apo yad dha vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ atyāṃ iva prāsṛjaḥ sartavājau /
analyzed: tvam apaḥ yat ha vṛtram jaghanvān atyān iva prāsṛjaḥ sartavājau

original: RV_3,032.06c śayānam indra caratā vadhena vavrivāṃsam pari devīr adevam //
analyzed: śayānam indra caratā vadhena vavrivāṃsam pari devīḥ adevam

original: RV_3,032.07a yajāma in namasā vṛddham indram bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ yuvānam /
analyzed: yajāmaḥ id namasā vṛddham indram bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaram yuvānam

original: RV_3,032.07c yasya priye mamatur yajñiyasya na rodasī mahimānam mamāte //
analyzed: yasya priye mamatuḥ yajñiyasya na rodasī mahimānam mamāte

original: RV_3,032.08a indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi vratāni devā na minanti viśve /
analyzed: indrasya karma su kṛtā purūṇi vratāni devāḥ na minanti viśve

original: RV_3,032.08c dādhāra yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ jajāna sūryam uṣasaṃ sudaṃsāḥ //
analyzed: dādhāra yaḥ pṛthivīm dyām uta imām jajāna sūryam uṣasam su daṃsāḥ

original: RV_3,032.09a adrogha satyaṃ tava tan mahitvaṃ sadyo yaj jāto apibo ha somam /
analyzed: adrogha satyam tava tat mahitvam sadyas yat jātaḥ apibaḥ ha somam

original: RV_3,032.09c na dyāva indra tavasas ta ojo nāhā na māsāḥ śarado varanta //
analyzed: na dyāvaḥ indra tavasaḥ te ojaḥ na ahā na māsāḥ śaradaḥ varanta

original: RV_3,032.10a tvaṃ sadyo apibo jāta indra madāya somam parame vyoman /
analyzed: tvam sadyas apibaḥ jātaḥ indra madāya somam parame vyoman

original: RV_3,032.10c yad dha dyāvāpṛthivī āviveśīr athābhavaḥ pūrvyaḥ kārudhāyāḥ //
analyzed: yat ha dyāvāpṛthivī āviveśīḥ atha abhavaḥ pūrvyaḥ kāru dhāyāḥ

original: RV_3,032.11a ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇa ojāyamānaṃ tuvijāta tavyān /
analyzed: ahan ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ ojāyamānam tuvi jāta tavyān

original: RV_3,032.11c na te mahitvam anu bhūd adha dyaur yad anyayā sphigyā kṣām avasthāḥ //
analyzed: na te mahitvam anu bhūt adha dyauḥ yat anyayā sphigyā kṣām avasthāḥ

original: RV_3,032.12a yajño hi ta indra vardhano bhūd uta priyaḥ sutasomo miyedhaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaḥ hi te indra vardhanaḥ bhūt uta priyaḥ suta somaḥ miyedhaḥ

original: RV_3,032.12c yajñena yajñam ava yajñiyaḥ san yajñas te vajram ahihatya āvat //
analyzed: yajñena yajñam ava yajñiyaḥ san yajñaḥ te vajram ahi hatye āvat

original: RV_3,032.13a yajñenendram avasā cakre arvāg ainaṃ sumnāya navyase vavṛtyām /
analyzed: yajñena indram avasā cakre arvāk ā enam sumnāya navyase vavṛtyām

original: RV_3,032.13c ya stomebhir vāvṛdhe pūrvyebhir yo madhyamebhir uta nūtanebhiḥ //
analyzed: ya stomebhiḥ vāvṛdhe pūrvyebhiḥ yaḥ madhyamebhiḥ uta nūtanebhiḥ

original: RV_3,032.14a viveṣa yan mā dhiṣaṇā jajāna stavai purā pāryād indram ahnaḥ /
analyzed: viveṣa yat mā dhiṣaṇā jajāna stavai purā pāryāt indram ahnaḥ

original: RV_3,032.14c aṃhaso yatra pīparad yathā no nāveva yāntam ubhaye havante //
analyzed: aṃhasaḥ yatra pīparat yathā naḥ nāvā iva yāntam ubhaye havante

original: RV_3,032.15a āpūrṇo asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sekteva kośaṃ sisice pibadhyai /
analyzed: āpūrṇaḥ asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sektā iva kośam sisice pibadhyai

original: RV_3,032.15c sam u priyā āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇid abhi somāsa indram //
analyzed: sam u priyāḥ āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇit abhi somāsaḥ indram

original: RV_3,032.16a na tvā gabhīraḥ puruhūta sindhur nādrayaḥ pari ṣanto varanta /
analyzed: na tvā gabhīraḥ puruhūta sindhuḥ na adrayaḥ pari santaḥ varanta

original: RV_3,032.16c itthā sakhibhya iṣito yad indrā dṛḷhaṃ cid arujo gavyam ūrvam //
analyzed: itthā sakhibhyaḥ iṣitaḥ yat indra ā dṛḍham cit arujaḥ gavyam ūrvam

original: RV_3,032.17a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,032.17c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,033.01a pra parvatānām uśatī upasthād aśve iva viṣite hāsamāne /
analyzed: pra parvatānām uśatī upasthāt aśve iva viṣite hāsamāne

original: RV_3,033.01c gāveva śubhre mātarā rihāṇe vipāṭ chutudrī payasā javete //
analyzed: gāvā iva śubhre mātarā rihāṇe vipāś śutudrī payasā javete

original: RV_3,033.02a indreṣite prasavam bhikṣamāṇe acchā samudraṃ rathyeva yāthaḥ /
analyzed: indra iṣite prasavam bhikṣamāṇe acchā samudram rathyā iva yāthaḥ

original: RV_3,033.02c samārāṇe ūrmibhiḥ pinvamāne anyā vām anyām apy eti śubhre //
analyzed: samārāṇe ūrmibhiḥ pinvamāne anyā vām anyām api eti śubhre

original: RV_3,033.03a acchā sindhum mātṛtamām ayāsaṃ vipāśam urvīṃ subhagām aganma /
analyzed: acchā sindhum mātṛtamām ayāsam vipāśam urvīm subhagām aganma

original: RV_3,033.03c vatsam iva mātarā saṃrihāṇe samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantī //
analyzed: vatsam iva mātarā saṃrihāṇe samānam yonim anu saṃcarantī

original: RV_3,033.04a enā vayam payasā pinvamānā anu yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ carantīḥ /
analyzed: enāḥ vayam payasā pinvamānāḥ anu yonim deva kṛtam carantīḥ

original: RV_3,033.04c na vartave prasavaḥ sargataktaḥ kiṃyur vipro nadyo johavīti //
analyzed: na vartave prasavaḥ sarga taktaḥ kiṃyuḥ vipraḥ nadyaḥ johavīti

original: RV_3,033.05a ramadhvam me vacase somyāya ṛtāvarīr upa muhūrtam evaiḥ /
analyzed: ramadhvam me vacase somyāya ṛtāvarīḥ upa muhūrtam evaiḥ

original: RV_3,033.05c pra sindhum acchā bṛhatī manīṣāvasyur ahve kuśikasya sūnuḥ //
analyzed: pra sindhum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā vasyuḥ ahve kuśikasya sūnuḥ

original: RV_3,033.06a indro asmāṃ aradad vajrabāhur apāhan vṛtram paridhiṃ nadīnām /
analyzed: indraḥ asmām aradat vajra bāhuḥ apāhan vṛtram paridhim nadīnām

original: RV_3,033.06c devo 'nayat savitā supāṇis tasya vayam prasave yāma urvīḥ //
analyzed: devaḥ nayat savitā su pāṇiḥ tasya vayam prasave yāmaḥ urvīḥ

original: RV_3,033.07a pravācyaṃ śaśvadhā vīryaṃ tad indrasya karma yad ahiṃ vivṛścat /
analyzed: pravācyam śaśvadhā vīryam tat indrasya karma yat ahim vivṛścat

original: RV_3,033.07c vi vajreṇa pariṣado jaghānāyann āpo 'yanam icchamānāḥ //
analyzed: vi vajreṇa pariṣadaḥ jaghāna āyan āpaḥ yanam icchamānāḥ

original: RV_3,033.08a etad vaco jaritar māpi mṛṣṭhā ā yat te ghoṣān uttarā yugāni /
analyzed: etat vacaḥ jaritar mā api mṛṣṭhāḥ ā yat te ghoṣān uttarā yugāni

original: RV_3,033.08c uktheṣu kāro prati no juṣasva mā no ni kaḥ puruṣatrā namas te //
analyzed: uktheṣu kāro prati naḥ juṣasva mā naḥ ni kaḥ puruṣatrā namaḥ te

original: RV_3,033.09a o ṣu svasāraḥ kārave śṛṇota yayau vo dūrād anasā rathena /
analyzed: ā u su svasāraḥ kārave śṛṇota yayau vaḥ dūrāt anasā rathena

original: RV_3,033.09c ni ṣū namadhvam bhavatā supārā adhoakṣāḥ sindhavaḥ srotyābhiḥ //
analyzed: ni su namadhvam bhavata su pārāḥ adhoakṣāḥ sindhavaḥ srotyābhiḥ

original: RV_3,033.10a ā te kāro śṛṇavāmā vacāṃsi yayātha dūrād anasā rathena /
analyzed: ā te kāro śṛṇavāmā vacāṃsi yayātha dūrāt anasā rathena

original: RV_3,033.10c ni te naṃsai pīpyāneva yoṣā maryāyeva kanyā śaśvacai te //
analyzed: ni te naṃsai pīpyānā iva yoṣā maryāyā iva kanyā śaśvacai te

original: RV_3,033.11a yad aṅga tvā bharatāḥ saṃtareyur gavyan grāma iṣita indrajūtaḥ /
analyzed: yat aṅga tvā bharatāḥ saṃtareyuḥ gavyan grāmaḥ iṣitaḥ indra jūtaḥ

original: RV_3,033.11c arṣād aha prasavaḥ sargatakta ā vo vṛṇe sumatiṃ yajñiyānām //
analyzed: arṣāt aha prasavaḥ sarga taktaḥ ā vaḥ vṛṇe sumatim yajñiyānām

original: RV_3,033.12a atāriṣur bharatā gavyavaḥ sam abhakta vipraḥ sumatiṃ nadīnām /
analyzed: atāriṣuḥ bharatāḥ gavyavaḥ sam abhakta vipraḥ sumatim nadīnām

original: RV_3,033.12c pra pinvadhvam iṣayantīḥ surādhā ā vakṣaṇāḥ pṛṇadhvaṃ yāta śībham //
analyzed: pra pinvadhvam iṣayantīḥ su rādhāḥ ā vakṣaṇāḥ pṛṇadhvam yāta śībham

original: RV_3,033.13a ud va ūrmiḥ śamyā hantv āpo yoktrāṇi muñcata /
analyzed: ud vaḥ ūrmiḥ śamyāḥ hantu āpaḥ yoktrāṇi muñcata

original: RV_3,033.13c māduṣkṛtau vyenasāghnyau śūnam āratām //
analyzed: mā a duṣkṛtau vyenasā aghnyau śūnam āratām

original: RV_3,034.01a indraḥ pūrbhid ātirad dāsam arkair vidadvasur dayamāno vi śatrūn /
analyzed: indraḥ pūrbhid ātirat dāsam arkaiḥ vidadvasuḥ dayamānaḥ vi śatrūn

original: RV_3,034.01c brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhāno bhūridātra āpṛṇad rodasī ubhe //
analyzed: brahma jūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhānaḥ bhūri dātraḥ āpṛṇat rodasī ubhe

original: RV_3,034.02a makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan /
analyzed: makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan

original: RV_3,034.02c indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇāṃ viśāṃ daivīnām uta pūrvayāvā //
analyzed: indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇām viśām daivīnām uta pūrva yāvā

original: RV_3,034.03a indro vṛtram avṛṇoc chardhanītiḥ pra māyinām aminād varpaṇītiḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtram avṛṇot śardha nītiḥ pra māyinām amināt varpaṇītiḥ

original: RV_3,034.03c ahan vyaṃsam uśadhag vaneṣv āvir dhenā akṛṇod rāmyāṇām //
analyzed: ahan vyaṃsam uśadhak vaneṣu āvis dhenāḥ akṛṇot rāmyāṇām

original: RV_3,034.04a indraḥ svarṣā janayann ahāni jigāyośigbhiḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ svarṣāḥ janayan ahāni jigāya uśigbhiḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ

original: RV_3,034.04c prārocayan manave ketum ahnām avindaj jyotir bṛhate raṇāya //
analyzed: prārocayat manave ketum ahnām avindat jyotiḥ bṛhate raṇāya

original: RV_3,034.05a indras tujo barhaṇā ā viveśa nṛvad dadhāno naryā purūṇi /
analyzed: indraḥ tujaḥ barhaṇāḥ ā viveśa nṛvat dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi

original: RV_3,034.05c acetayad dhiya imā jaritre premaṃ varṇam atirac chukram āsām //
analyzed: acetayat dhiyaḥ imāḥ jaritre pra imam varṇam atirat śukram āsām

original: RV_3,034.06a maho mahāni panayanty asyendrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi /
analyzed: mahaḥ mahāni panayanti asya indrasya karma su kṛtā purūṇi

original: RV_3,034.06c vṛjanena vṛjinān sam pipeṣa māyābhir dasyūṃr abhibhūtyojāḥ //
analyzed: vṛjanena vṛjinān sam pipeṣa māyābhiḥ dasyūṃr abhibhūti ojāḥ

original: RV_3,034.07a yudhendro mahnā varivaś cakāra devebhyaḥ satpatiś carṣaṇiprāḥ /
analyzed: yudhā indraḥ mahnā varivaḥ cakāra devebhyaḥ satpatiḥ carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_3,034.07c vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprā ukthebhiḥ kavayo gṛṇanti //
analyzed: vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprāḥ ukthebhiḥ kavayaḥ gṛṇanti

original: RV_3,034.08a satrāsāhaṃ vareṇyaṃ sahodāṃ sasavāṃsaṃ svar apaś ca devīḥ /
analyzed: satrāsāham vareṇyam sahaḥ dām sasavāṃsam svar apaḥ ca devīḥ

original: RV_3,034.08c sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām indram madanty anu dhīraṇāsaḥ //
analyzed: sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīm dyām uta imām indram madanti anu dhīraṇāsaḥ

original: RV_3,034.09a sasānātyāṃ uta sūryaṃ sasānendraḥ sasāna purubhojasaṃ gām /
analyzed: sasāna atyām uta sūryam sasāna indraḥ sasāna purubhojasam gām

original: RV_3,034.09c hiraṇyayam uta bhogaṃ sasāna hatvī dasyūn prāryaṃ varṇam āvat //
analyzed: hiraṇyayam uta bhogam sasāna hatvī dasyūn pra āryam varṇam āvat

original: RV_3,034.10a indra oṣadhīr asanod ahāni vanaspatīṃr asanod antarikṣam /
analyzed: indraḥ oṣadhīḥ asanot ahāni vanaspatīṃr asanot antarikṣam

original: RV_3,034.10c bibheda valaṃ nunude vivāco 'thābhavad damitābhikratūnām //
analyzed: bibheda valam nunude vivācaḥ thā abhavat damitā abhikratūnām

original: RV_3,034.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,034.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,035.01a tiṣṭhā harī ratha ā yujyamānā yāhi vāyur na niyuto no accha /
analyzed: tiṣṭha harī rathe ā yujyamānā yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ naḥ accha

original: RV_3,035.01c pibāsy andho abhisṛṣṭo asme indra svāhā rarimā te madāya //
analyzed: pibāsi andhaḥ abhisṛṣṭaḥ asme indra svāhā rarimā te madāya

original: RV_3,035.02a upājirā puruhūtāya saptī harī rathasya dhūrṣv ā yunajmi /
analyzed: upa ajirā puruhūtāya saptī harī rathasya dhūrṣu ā yunajmi

original: RV_3,035.02c dravad yathā sambhṛtaṃ viśvataś cid upemaṃ yajñam ā vahāta indram //
analyzed: dravat yathā sambhṛtam viśvatas cit upa imam yajñam ā vahātaḥ indram

original: RV_3,035.03a upo nayasva vṛṣaṇā tapuṣpotem ava tvaṃ vṛṣabha svadhāvaḥ /
analyzed: upa u nayasva vṛṣaṇā tapuṣpā uta īm ava tvam vṛṣabha svadhāvas

original: RV_3,035.03c grasetām aśvā vi muceha śoṇā dive-dive sadṛśīr addhi dhānāḥ //
analyzed: grasetām aśvā vi muca iha śoṇā dive dive sadṛśīḥ addhi dhānāḥ

original: RV_3,035.04a brahmaṇā te brahmayujā yunajmi harī sakhāyā sadhamāda āśū /
analyzed: brahmaṇā te brahma yujā yunajmi harī sakhāyā sadhamāde āśū

original: RV_3,035.04c sthiraṃ rathaṃ sukham indrādhitiṣṭhan prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam //
analyzed: sthiram ratham sukham indra adhitiṣṭhan prajānan vidvān upa yāhi somam

original: RV_3,035.05a mā te harī vṛṣaṇā vītapṛṣṭhā ni rīraman yajamānāso anye /
analyzed: mā te harī vṛṣaṇā vīta pṛṣṭhā ni rīraman yajamānāsaḥ anye

original: RV_3,035.05c atyāyāhi śaśvato vayaṃ te 'raṃ sutebhiḥ kṛṇavāma somaiḥ //
analyzed: ati āyāhi śaśvataḥ vayam te raṃ sutebhiḥ kṛṇavāma somaiḥ

original: RV_3,035.06a tavāyaṃ somas tvam ehy arvāṅ chaśvattamaṃ sumanā asya pāhi /
analyzed: tava ayam somaḥ tvam ehi arvāṅ chaśvattamam sumanāḥ asya pāhi

original: RV_3,035.06c asmin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadyā dadhiṣvemaṃ jaṭhara indum indra //
analyzed: asmin yajñe barhiṣi ā niṣadya ā dadhiṣva imam jaṭhare indum indra

original: RV_3,035.07a stīrṇaṃ te barhiḥ suta indra somaḥ kṛtā dhānā attave te haribhyām /
analyzed: stīrṇam te barhiḥ sutaḥ indra somaḥ kṛtāḥ dhānāḥ attave te haribhyām

original: RV_3,035.07c tadokase puruśākāya vṛṣṇe marutvate tubhyaṃ rātā havīṃṣi //
analyzed: tad okase puru śākāya vṛṣṇe marutvate tubhyam rātā havīṃṣi

original: RV_3,035.08a imaṃ naraḥ parvatās tubhyam āpaḥ sam indra gobhir madhumantam akran /
analyzed: imam naraḥ parvatāḥ tubhyam āpaḥ sam indra gobhiḥ madhumantam akran

original: RV_3,035.08c tasyāgatyā sumanā ṛṣva pāhi prajānan vidvān pathyā anu svāḥ //
analyzed: tasya āgatya sumanāḥ ṛṣva pāhi prajānan vidvān pathyāḥ anu svāḥ

original: RV_3,035.09a yāṃ ābhajo maruta indra some ye tvām avardhann abhavan gaṇas te /
analyzed: yām ābhajaḥ marutaḥ indra some ye tvām avardhan abhavan gaṇaḥ te

original: RV_3,035.09c tebhir etaṃ sajoṣā vāvaśāno 'gneḥ piba jihvayā somam indra //
analyzed: tebhiḥ etam sajoṣāḥ vāvaśānaḥ gneḥ piba jihvayā somam indra

original: RV_3,035.10a indra piba svadhayā cit sutasyāgner vā pāhi jihvayā yajatra /
analyzed: indra piba svadhayā cit sutasya agneḥ vā pāhi jihvayā yajatra

original: RV_3,035.10c adhvaryor vā prayataṃ śakra hastād dhotur vā yajñaṃ haviṣo juṣasva //
analyzed: adhvaryoḥ vā prayatam śakra hastāt hotuḥ vā yajñam haviṣaḥ juṣasva

original: RV_3,035.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,035.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,036.01a imām ū ṣu prabhṛtiṃ sātaye dhāḥ śaśvac-chaśvad ūtibhir yādamānaḥ /
analyzed: imām u su prabhṛtim sātaye dhāḥ śaśvat śaśvat ūtibhiḥ yādamānaḥ

original: RV_3,036.01c sute-sute vāvṛdhe vardhanebhir yaḥ karmabhir mahadbhiḥ suśruto bhūt //
analyzed: sute sute vāvṛdhe vardhanebhiḥ yaḥ karmabhiḥ mahadbhiḥ su śrutaḥ bhūt

original: RV_3,036.02a indrāya somāḥ pradivo vidānā ṛbhur yebhir vṛṣaparvā vihāyāḥ /
analyzed: indrāya somāḥ pradivaḥ vidānāḥ ṛbhuḥ yebhiḥ vṛṣa parvā vihāyāḥ

original: RV_3,036.02c prayamyamānān prati ṣū gṛbhāyendra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇaḥ //
analyzed: prayamyamānān prati su gṛbhāya indra piba vṛṣa dhūtasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_3,036.03a pibā vardhasva tava ghā sutāsa indra somāsaḥ prathamā uteme /
analyzed: pibā vardhasva tava gha sutāsaḥ indra somāsaḥ prathamāḥ uta ime

original: RV_3,036.03c yathāpibaḥ pūrvyāṃ indra somāṃ evā pāhi panyo adyā navīyān //
analyzed: yathā apibaḥ pūrvyān indra somān evā pāhi panyaḥ adyā navīyān

original: RV_3,036.04a mahāṃ amatro vṛjane virapśy ugraṃ śavaḥ patyate dhṛṣṇv ojaḥ /
analyzed: mahān amatraḥ vṛjane virapśī ugram śavaḥ patyate dhṛṣṇu ojaḥ

original: RV_3,036.04c nāha vivyāca pṛthivī canainaṃ yat somāso haryaśvam amandan //
analyzed: na aha vivyāca pṛthivī cana enam yat somāsaḥ haryaśvam amandan

original: RV_3,036.05a mahāṃ ugro vāvṛdhe vīryāya samācakre vṛṣabhaḥ kāvyena /
analyzed: mahān ugraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāya samācakre vṛṣabhaḥ kāvyena

original: RV_3,036.05c indro bhago vājadā asya gāvaḥ pra jāyante dakṣiṇā asya pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ bhagaḥ vāja dāḥ asya gāvaḥ pra jāyante dakṣiṇāḥ asya pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,036.06a pra yat sindhavaḥ prasavaṃ yathāyann āpaḥ samudraṃ rathyeva jagmuḥ /
analyzed: pra yat sindhavaḥ prasavam yathā āyan āpaḥ samudram rathyā iva jagmuḥ

original: RV_3,036.06c ataś cid indraḥ sadaso varīyān yad īṃ somaḥ pṛṇati dugdho aṃśuḥ //
analyzed: atas cit indraḥ sadasaḥ varīyān yat īm somaḥ pṛṇati dugdhaḥ aṃśuḥ

original: RV_3,036.07a samudreṇa sindhavo yādamānā indrāya somaṃ suṣutam bharantaḥ /
analyzed: samudreṇa sindhavaḥ yādamānāḥ indrāya somam suṣutam bharantaḥ

original: RV_3,036.07c aṃśuṃ duhanti hastino bharitrair madhvaḥ punanti dhārayā pavitraiḥ //
analyzed: aṃśum duhanti hastinaḥ bharitraiḥ madhvaḥ punanti dhārayā pavitraiḥ

original: RV_3,036.08a hradā iva kukṣayaḥ somadhānāḥ sam ī vivyāca savanā purūṇi /
analyzed: hradāḥ iva kukṣayaḥ soma dhānāḥ sam ī vivyāca savanā purūṇi

original: RV_3,036.08c annā yad indraḥ prathamā vy āśa vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ avṛṇīta somam //
analyzed: annā yat indraḥ prathamā vi āśa vṛtram jaghanvān avṛṇīta somam

original: RV_3,036.09a ā tū bhara mākir etat pari ṣṭhād vidmā hi tvā vasupatiṃ vasūnām /
analyzed: ā tū bhara mākir etat pari sthāt vidma hi tvā vasu patim vasūnām

original: RV_3,036.09c indra yat te māhinaṃ datram asty asmabhyaṃ tad dharyaśva pra yandhi //
analyzed: indra yat te māhinam datram asti asmabhyam tat haryaśva pra yandhi

original: RV_3,036.10a asme pra yandhi maghavann ṛjīṣinn indra rāyo viśvavārasya bhūreḥ /
analyzed: asme pra yandhi maghavan ṛjīṣin indra rāyaḥ viśva vārasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_3,036.10c asme śataṃ śarado jīvase dhā asme vīrāñ chaśvata indra śiprin //
analyzed: asme śatam śaradaḥ jīvase dhāḥ asme vīrām śaśvataḥ indra śiprin

original: RV_3,036.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,036.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,037.01a vārtrahatyāya śavase pṛtanāṣāhyāya ca /
analyzed: vārtrahatyāya śavase pṛtanāṣāhyāya ca

original: RV_3,037.01c indra tvā vartayāmasi //
analyzed: indra tvā vartayāmasi

original: RV_3,037.02a arvācīnaṃ su te mana uta cakṣuḥ śatakrato /
analyzed: arvācīnam su te manaḥ uta cakṣuḥ śatakrato

original: RV_3,037.02c indra kṛṇvantu vāghataḥ //
analyzed: indra kṛṇvantu vāghataḥ

original: RV_3,037.03a nāmāni te śatakrato viśvābhir gīrbhir īmahe /
analyzed: nāmāni te śatakrato viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_3,037.03c indrābhimātiṣāhye //
analyzed: indra abhimātiṣāhye

original: RV_3,037.04a puruṣṭutasya dhāmabhiḥ śatena mahayāmasi /
analyzed: puruṣṭutasya dhāmabhiḥ śatena mahayāmasi

original: RV_3,037.04c indrasya carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: indrasya carṣaṇī dhṛtaḥ

original: RV_3,037.05a indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave puruhūtam upa bruve /
analyzed: indram vṛtrāya hantave puruhūtam upa bruve

original: RV_3,037.05c bhareṣu vājasātaye //
analyzed: bhareṣu vājasātaye

original: RV_3,037.06a vājeṣu sāsahir bhava tvām īmahe śatakrato /
analyzed: vājeṣu sāsahiḥ bhava tvām īmahe śatakrato

original: RV_3,037.06c indra vṛtrāya hantave //
analyzed: indra vṛtrāya hantave

original: RV_3,037.07a dyumneṣu pṛtanājye pṛtsutūrṣu śravassu ca /
analyzed: dyumneṣu pṛtanājye pṛtsutūrṣu śravassu ca

original: RV_3,037.07c indra sākṣvābhimātiṣu //
analyzed: indra sākṣva abhimātiṣu

original: RV_3,037.08a śuṣmintamaṃ na ūtaye dyumninam pāhi jāgṛvim /
analyzed: śuṣmintamam naḥ ūtaye dyumninam pāhi jāgṛvim

original: RV_3,037.08c indra somaṃ śatakrato //
analyzed: indra somam śatakrato

original: RV_3,037.09a indriyāṇi śatakrato yā te janeṣu pañcasu /
analyzed: indriyāṇi śatakrato yā te janeṣu pañcasu

original: RV_3,037.09c indra tāni ta ā vṛṇe //
analyzed: indra tāni te ā vṛṇe

original: RV_3,037.10a agann indra śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ dadhiṣva duṣṭaram /
analyzed: agan indra śravaḥ bṛhat dyumnam dadhiṣva duṣṭaram

original: RV_3,037.10c ut te śuṣmaṃ tirāmasi //
analyzed: ud te śuṣmam tirāmasi

original: RV_3,037.11a arvāvato na ā gahy atho śakra parāvataḥ /
analyzed: arvāvataḥ naḥ ā gahi atha u śakra parāvataḥ

original: RV_3,037.11c u loko yas te adriva indreha tata ā gahi //
analyzed: u lokaḥ yaḥ te adrivas indra iha tatas ā gahi

original: RV_3,038.01a abhi taṣṭeva dīdhayā manīṣām atyo na vājī sudhuro jihānaḥ /
analyzed: abhi taṣṭā iva dīdhayāḥ manīṣām atyaḥ na vājī su dhuraḥ jihānaḥ

original: RV_3,038.01c abhi priyāṇi marmṛśat parāṇi kavīṃr icchāmi saṃdṛśe sumedhāḥ //
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi marmṛśat parāṇi kavīṃr icchāmi saṃdṛśe sumedhāḥ

original: RV_3,038.02a inota pṛccha janimā kavīnām manodhṛtaḥ sukṛtas takṣata dyām /
analyzed: inā uta pṛccha janimā kavīnām manodhṛtaḥ su kṛtaḥ takṣata dyām

original: RV_3,038.02c imā u te praṇyo vardhamānā manovātā adha nu dharmaṇi gman //
analyzed: imāḥ u te praṇyaḥ vardhamānāḥ manaḥ vātāḥ adha nu dharmaṇi gman

original: RV_3,038.03a ni ṣīm id atra guhyā dadhānā uta kṣatrāya rodasī sam añjan /
analyzed: ni sīm id atra guhyā dadhānāḥ uta kṣatrāya rodasī sam añjan

original: RV_3,038.03c sam mātrābhir mamire yemur urvī antar mahī samṛte dhāyase dhuḥ //
analyzed: sam mātrābhiḥ mamire yemuḥ urvī antar mahī samṛte dhāyase dhuḥ

original: RV_3,038.04a ātiṣṭhantam pari viśve abhūṣañ chriyo vasānaś carati svarociḥ /
analyzed: ātiṣṭhantam pari viśve abhūṣam chriyaḥ vasānaḥ carati sva rociḥ

original: RV_3,038.04c mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāmā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau //
analyzed: mahat tat vṛṣṇaḥ asurasya nāma ā viśva rūpaḥ amṛtāni tasthau

original: RV_3,038.05a asūta pūrvo vṛṣabho jyāyān imā asya śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: asūta pūrvaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ jyāyān imāḥ asya śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_3,038.05c divo napātā vidathasya dhībhiḥ kṣatraṃ rājānā pradivo dadhāthe //
analyzed: divaḥ napātā vidathasya dhībhiḥ kṣatram rājānā pradivaḥ dadhāthe

original: RV_3,038.06a trīṇi rājānā vidathe purūṇi pari viśvāni bhūṣathaḥ sadāṃsi /
analyzed: trīṇi rājānā vidathe purūṇi pari viśvāni bhūṣathaḥ sadāṃsi

original: RV_3,038.06c apaśyam atra manasā jaganvān vrate gandharvāṃ api vāyukeśān //
analyzed: apaśyam atra manasā jaganvān vrate gandharvān api vāyu keśān

original: RV_3,038.07a tad in nv asya vṛṣabhasya dhenor ā nāmabhir mamire sakmyaṃ goḥ /
analyzed: tat id nu asya vṛṣabhasya dhenoḥ ā nāmabhiḥ mamire sakmyam goḥ

original: RV_3,038.07c anyad-anyad asuryaṃ vasānā ni māyino mamire rūpam asmin //
analyzed: anyat anyat asuryam vasānāḥ ni māyinaḥ mamire rūpam asmin

original: RV_3,038.08a tad in nv asya savitur nakir me hiraṇyayīm amatiṃ yām aśiśret /
analyzed: tat id nu asya savituḥ nakir me hiraṇyayīm amatim yām aśiśret

original: RV_3,038.08c ā suṣṭutī rodasī viśvaminve apīva yoṣā janimāni vavre //
analyzed: ā suṣṭutī rodasī viśvaminve api iva yoṣā janimāni vavre

original: RV_3,038.09a yuvam pratnasya sādhatho maho yad daivī svastiḥ pari ṇaḥ syātam /
analyzed: yuvam pratnasya sādhathaḥ mahaḥ yat daivī svastiḥ pari naḥ syātam

original: RV_3,038.09c gopājihvasya tasthuṣo virūpā viśve paśyanti māyinaḥ kṛtāni //
analyzed: gopā jihvasya tasthuṣaḥ virūpāḥ viśve paśyanti māyinaḥ kṛtāni

original: RV_3,038.10a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,038.10c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,039.01a indram matir hṛda ā vacyamānācchā patiṃ stomataṣṭā jigāti /
analyzed: indram matiḥ hṛdaḥ ā vacyamānā acchā patim stoma taṣṭā jigāti

original: RV_3,039.01c yā jāgṛvir vidathe śasyamānendra yat te jāyate viddhi tasya //
analyzed: yā jāgṛviḥ vidathe śasyamānā indra yat te jāyate viddhi tasya

original: RV_3,039.02a divaś cid ā pūrvyā jāyamānā vi jāgṛvir vidathe śasyamānā /
analyzed: divaḥ cit ā pūrvyā jāyamānā vi jāgṛviḥ vidathe śasyamānā

original: RV_3,039.02c bhadrā vastrāṇy arjunā vasānā seyam asme sanajā pitryā dhīḥ //
analyzed: bhadrā vastrāṇi arjunā vasānā sā iyam asme sana jā pitryā dhīḥ

original: RV_3,039.03a yamā cid atra yamasūr asūta jihvāyā agram patad ā hy asthāt /
analyzed: yamā cit atra yama sūḥ asūta jihvāyāḥ agram patat ā hi asthāt

original: RV_3,039.03c vapūṃṣi jātā mithunā sacete tamohanā tapuṣo budhna etā //
analyzed: vapūṃṣi jātā mithunā sacete tamaḥ hanā tapuṣaḥ budhne etā

original: RV_3,039.04a nakir eṣāṃ ninditā martyeṣu ye asmākam pitaro goṣu yodhāḥ /
analyzed: nakir eṣām ninditā martyeṣu ye asmākam pitaraḥ goṣu yodhāḥ

original: RV_3,039.04c indra eṣāṃ dṛṃhitā māhināvān ud gotrāṇi sasṛje daṃsanāvān //
analyzed: indraḥ eṣām dṛṃhitā māhināvān ud gotrāṇi sasṛje daṃsanāvān

original: RV_3,039.05a sakhā ha yatra sakhibhir navagvair abhijñv ā satvabhir gā anugman /
analyzed: sakhā ha yatra sakhibhiḥ navagvaiḥ abhijñu ā satvabhiḥ gāḥ anugman

original: RV_3,039.05c satyaṃ tad indro daśabhir daśagvaiḥ sūryaṃ viveda tamasi kṣiyantam //
analyzed: satyam tat indraḥ daśabhiḥ daśagvaiḥ sūryam viveda tamasi kṣiyantam

original: RV_3,039.06a indro madhu sambhṛtam usriyāyām padvad viveda śaphavan name goḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ madhu sambhṛtam usriyāyām padvat viveda śaphavat name goḥ

original: RV_3,039.06c guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsu haste dadhe dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇāvān //
analyzed: guhā hitam guhyam gūḍham apsu haste dadhe dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇāvān

original: RV_3,039.07a jyotir vṛṇīta tamaso vijānann āre syāma duritād abhīke /
analyzed: jyotiḥ vṛṇīta tamasaḥ vijānan āre syāma duritāt abhīke

original: RV_3,039.07c imā giraḥ somapāḥ somavṛddha juṣasvendra purutamasya kāroḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ giraḥ soma pāḥ soma vṛddha juṣasva indra purutamasya kāroḥ

original: RV_3,039.08a jyotir yajñāya rodasī anu ṣyād āre syāma duritasya bhūreḥ /
analyzed: jyotiḥ yajñāya rodasī anu syāt āre syāma duritasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_3,039.08c bhūri cid dhi tujato martyasya supārāso vasavo barhaṇāvat //
analyzed: bhūri cit hi tujataḥ martyasya su pārāsaḥ vasavaḥ barhaṇāvat

original: RV_3,039.09a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,039.09c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,040.01a indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayaṃ sute some havāmahe /
analyzed: indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam sute some havāmahe

original: RV_3,040.01c sa pāhi madhvo andhasaḥ //
analyzed: sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_3,040.02a indra kratuvidaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ harya puruṣṭuta /
analyzed: indra kratu vidam sutam somam harya puruṣṭuta

original: RV_3,040.02c pibā vṛṣasva tātṛpim //
analyzed: pibā vṛṣasva tātṛpim

original: RV_3,040.03a indra pra ṇo dhitāvānaṃ yajñaṃ viśvebhir devebhiḥ /
analyzed: indra pra naḥ dhitāvānam yajñam viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ

original: RV_3,040.03c tira stavāna viśpate //
analyzed: tira stavāna viśpate

original: RV_3,040.04a indra somāḥ sutā ime tava pra yanti satpate /
analyzed: indra somāḥ sutāḥ ime tava pra yanti satpate

original: RV_3,040.04c kṣayaṃ candrāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: kṣayam candrāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_3,040.05a dadhiṣvā jaṭhare sutaṃ somam indra vareṇyam /
analyzed: dadhiṣva ā jaṭhare sutam somam indra vareṇyam

original: RV_3,040.05c tava dyukṣāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: tava dyu kṣāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_3,040.06a girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutam madhor dhārābhir ajyase /
analyzed: girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutam madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ ajyase

original: RV_3,040.06c indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ //
analyzed: indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ

original: RV_3,040.07a abhi dyumnāni vanina indraṃ sacante akṣitā /
analyzed: abhi dyumnāni vaninaḥ indram sacante akṣitā

original: RV_3,040.07c pītvī somasya vāvṛdhe //
analyzed: pītvī somasya vāvṛdhe

original: RV_3,040.08a arvāvato na ā gahi parāvataś ca vṛtrahan /
analyzed: arvāvataḥ naḥ ā gahi parāvataḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_3,040.08c imā juṣasva no giraḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ juṣasva naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_3,040.09a yad antarā parāvatam arvāvataṃ ca hūyase /
analyzed: yat antarā parāvatam arvāvatam ca hūyase

original: RV_3,040.09c indreha tata ā gahi //
analyzed: indra iha tatas ā gahi

original: RV_3,041.01a ā tū na indra madryag ghuvānaḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra madryak huvānaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_3,041.01c haribhyāṃ yāhy adrivaḥ //
analyzed: haribhyām yāhi adrivas

original: RV_3,041.02a satto hotā na ṛtviyas tistire barhir ānuṣak /
analyzed: sattaḥ hotā naḥ ṛtviyaḥ tistire barhiḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_3,041.02c ayujran prātar adrayaḥ //
analyzed: ayujran prātar adrayaḥ

original: RV_3,041.03a imā brahma brahmavāhaḥ kriyanta ā barhiḥ sīda /
analyzed: imā brahma brahma vāhaḥ kriyante ā barhiḥ sīda

original: RV_3,041.03c vīhi śūra puroḷāśam //
analyzed: vīhi śūra puroḷāśam

original: RV_3,041.04a rārandhi savaneṣu ṇa eṣu stomeṣu vṛtrahan /
analyzed: rārandhi savaneṣu naḥ eṣu stomeṣu vṛtrahan

original: RV_3,041.04c uktheṣv indra girvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: uktheṣu indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_3,041.05a matayaḥ somapām uruṃ rihanti śavasas patim /
analyzed: matayaḥ soma pām urum rihanti śavasaḥ patim

original: RV_3,041.05c indraṃ vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ //
analyzed: indram vatsam na mātaraḥ

original: RV_3,041.06a sa mandasvā hy andhaso rādhase tanvā mahe /
analyzed: sa mandasva hi andhasaḥ rādhase tanvā mahe

original: RV_3,041.06c na stotāraṃ nide karaḥ //
analyzed: na stotāram nide karaḥ

original: RV_3,041.07a vayam indra tvāyavo haviṣmanto jarāmahe /
analyzed: vayam indra tvāyavaḥ haviṣmantaḥ jarāmahe

original: RV_3,041.07c uta tvam asmayur vaso //
analyzed: uta tvam asmayuḥ vaso

original: RV_3,041.08a māre asmad vi mumuco haripriyārvāṅ yāhi /
analyzed: mā āre asmat vi mumucaḥ hari priya arvāṅ yāhi

original: RV_3,041.08c indra svadhāvo matsveha //
analyzed: indra svadhāvas matsva iha

original: RV_3,041.09a arvāñcaṃ tvā sukhe rathe vahatām indra keśinā /
analyzed: arvāñcam tvā sukhe rathe vahatām indra keśinā

original: RV_3,041.09c ghṛtasnū barhir āsade //
analyzed: ghṛtasnū barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_3,042.01a upa naḥ sutam ā gahi somam indra gavāśiram /
analyzed: upa naḥ sutam ā gahi somam indra gavāśiram

original: RV_3,042.01c haribhyāṃ yas te asmayuḥ //
analyzed: haribhyām yaḥ te asmayuḥ

original: RV_3,042.02a tam indra madam ā gahi barhiṣṭhāṃ grāvabhiḥ sutam /
analyzed: tam indra madam ā gahi grāvabhiḥ sutam

original: RV_3,042.02c kuvin nv asya tṛpṇavaḥ //
analyzed: kuvid nu asya tṛpṇavaḥ

original: RV_3,042.03a indram itthā giro mamācchāgur iṣitā itaḥ /
analyzed: indram itthā giraḥ mama acchā aguḥ iṣitāḥ itas

original: RV_3,042.03c āvṛte somapītaye //
analyzed: āvṛte soma pītaye

original: RV_3,042.04a indraṃ somasya pītaye stomair iha havāmahe /
analyzed: indram somasya pītaye stomaiḥ iha havāmahe

original: RV_3,042.04c ukthebhiḥ kuvid āgamat //
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ kuvid āgamat

original: RV_3,042.05a indra somāḥ sutā ime tān dadhiṣva śatakrato /
analyzed: indra somāḥ sutāḥ ime tān dadhiṣva śatakrato

original: RV_3,042.05c jaṭhare vājinīvaso //
analyzed: jaṭhare vājinīvaso

original: RV_3,042.06a vidmā hi tvā dhanañjayaṃ vājeṣu dadhṛṣaṃ kave /
analyzed: vidma hi tvā dhanañjayam vājeṣu dadhṛṣam kave

original: RV_3,042.06c adhā te sumnam īmahe //
analyzed: adhā te sumnam īmahe

original: RV_3,042.07a imam indra gavāśiraṃ yavāśiraṃ ca naḥ piba /
analyzed: imam indra gavāśiram yava āśiram ca naḥ piba

original: RV_3,042.07c āgatyā vṛṣabhiḥ sutam //
analyzed: āgatyā vṛṣabhiḥ sutam

original: RV_3,042.08a tubhyed indra sva okye somaṃ codāmi pītaye /
analyzed: tubhya id indra sve okye somam codāmi pītaye

original: RV_3,042.08c eṣa rārantu te hṛdi //
analyzed: eṣa rārantu te hṛdi

original: RV_3,042.09a tvāṃ sutasya pītaye pratnam indra havāmahe /
analyzed: tvām sutasya pītaye pratnam indra havāmahe

original: RV_3,042.09c kuśikāso avasyavaḥ //
analyzed: kuśikāsaḥ avasyavaḥ

original: RV_3,043.01a ā yāhy arvāṅ upa vandhureṣṭhās taved anu pradivaḥ somapeyam /
analyzed: ā yāhi arvāṅ upa vandhureṣṭhāḥ tava id anu pradivaḥ soma peyam

original: RV_3,043.01c priyā sakhāyā vi mucopa barhis tvām ime havyavāho havante //
analyzed: priyā sakhāyā vi muca upa barhiḥ tvām ime havyavāhaḥ havante

original: RV_3,043.02a ā yāhi pūrvīr ati carṣaṇīr āṃ arya āśiṣa upa no haribhyām /
analyzed: ā yāhi pūrvīḥ ati carṣaṇīḥ aryaḥ āśiṣaḥ upa naḥ haribhyām

original: RV_3,043.02c imā hi tvā mataya stomataṣṭā indra havante sakhyaṃ juṣāṇāḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ hi tvā matayaḥ stoma taṣṭāḥ indra havante sakhyam juṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_3,043.03a ā no yajñaṃ namovṛdhaṃ sajoṣā indra deva haribhir yāhi tūyam /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam namaḥ vṛdham sajoṣāḥ indra deva haribhiḥ yāhi tūyam

original: RV_3,043.03c ahaṃ hi tvā matibhir johavīmi ghṛtaprayāḥ sadhamāde madhūnām //
analyzed: aham hi tvā matibhiḥ johavīmi ghṛta prayāḥ sadhamāde madhūnām

original: RV_3,043.04a ā ca tvām etā vṛṣaṇā vahāto harī sakhāyā sudhurā svaṅgā /
analyzed: ā ca tvām etā vṛṣaṇā vahātaḥ harī sakhāyā su dhurā su aṅgā

original: RV_3,043.04c dhānāvad indraḥ savanaṃ juṣāṇaḥ sakhā sakhyuḥ śṛṇavad vandanāni //
analyzed: dhānāvat indraḥ savanam juṣāṇaḥ sakhā sakhyuḥ śṛṇavat vandanāni

original: RV_3,043.05a kuvin mā gopāṃ karase janasya kuvid rājānam maghavann ṛjīṣin /
analyzed: kuvid mā gopām karase janasya kuvid rājānam maghavan ṛjīṣin

original: RV_3,043.05c kuvin ma ṛṣim papivāṃsaṃ sutasya kuvin me vasvo amṛtasya śikṣāḥ //
analyzed: kuvid me ṛṣim papivāṃsam sutasya kuvid me vasvaḥ amṛtasya śikṣāḥ

original: RV_3,043.06a ā tvā bṛhanto harayo yujānā arvāg indra sadhamādo vahantu /
analyzed: ā tvā bṛhantaḥ harayaḥ yujānāḥ arvāk indra sadhamādaḥ vahantu

original: RV_3,043.06c pra ye dvitā diva ṛñjanty ātāḥ susammṛṣṭāso vṛṣabhasya mūrāḥ //
analyzed: pra ye dvitā divaḥ ṛñjanti ātāḥ su sammṛṣṭāsaḥ vṛṣabhasya mūrāḥ

original: RV_3,043.07a indra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇa ā yaṃ te śyena uśate jabhāra /
analyzed: indra piba vṛṣa dhūtasya vṛṣṇaḥ ā yam te śyenaḥ uśate jabhāra

original: RV_3,043.07c yasya made cyāvayasi pra kṛṣṭīr yasya made apa gotrā vavartha //
analyzed: yasya made cyāvayasi pra kṛṣṭīḥ yasya made apa gotrā vavartha

original: RV_3,043.08a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,043.08c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,044.01a ayaṃ te astu haryataḥ soma ā haribhiḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: ayam te astu haryataḥ somaḥ ā haribhiḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_3,044.01c juṣāṇa indra haribhir na ā gahy ā tiṣṭha haritaṃ ratham //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ indra haribhiḥ naḥ ā gahi ā tiṣṭha haritam ratham

original: RV_3,044.02a haryann uṣasam arcayaḥ sūryaṃ haryann arocayaḥ /
analyzed: haryan uṣasam arcayaḥ sūryam haryan arocayaḥ

original: RV_3,044.02c vidvāṃś cikitvān haryaśva vardhasa indra viśvā abhi śriyaḥ //
analyzed: vidvān cikitvān haryaśva vardhase indra viśvāḥ abhi śriyaḥ

original: RV_3,044.03a dyām indro haridhāyasam pṛthivīṃ harivarpasam /
analyzed: dyām indraḥ hari dhāyasam pṛthivīm hari varpasam

original: RV_3,044.03c adhārayad dharitor bhūri bhojanaṃ yayor antar hariś carat //
analyzed: adhārayat haritoḥ bhūri bhojanam yayoḥ antar hariḥ carat

original: RV_3,044.04a jajñāno harito vṛṣā viśvam ā bhāti rocanam /
analyzed: jajñānaḥ haritaḥ vṛṣā viśvam ā bhāti rocanam

original: RV_3,044.04c haryaśvo haritaṃ dhatta āyudham ā vajram bāhvor harim //
analyzed: hari aśvaḥ haritam dhatte āyudham ā vajram bāhvoḥ harim

original: RV_3,044.05a indro haryantam arjunaṃ vajraṃ śukrair abhīvṛtam /
analyzed: indraḥ haryantam arjunam vajram śukraiḥ abhīvṛtam

original: RV_3,044.05c apāvṛṇod dharibhir adribhiḥ sutam ud gā haribhir ājata //
analyzed: apāvṛṇot haribhiḥ adribhiḥ sutam ud gāḥ haribhiḥ ājata

original: RV_3,045.01a ā mandrair indra haribhir yāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
analyzed: ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ yāhi mayūra romabhiḥ

original: RV_3,045.01c mā tvā ke cin ni yaman viṃ na pāśino 'ti dhanveva tāṃ ihi //
analyzed: mā tvā ke cit ni yaman vim na pāśinaḥ ti dhanvā iva tām ihi

original: RV_3,045.02a vṛtrakhādo valaṃrujaḥ purāṃ darmo apām ajaḥ /
analyzed: vṛtra khādaḥ valaṃrujaḥ purām darmaḥ apām ajaḥ

original: RV_3,045.02c sthātā rathasya haryor abhisvara indro dṛḷhā cid ārujaḥ //
analyzed: sthātā rathasya haryoḥ abhisvaraḥ indraḥ dṛḷhā cit ārujaḥ

original: RV_3,045.03a gambhīrāṃ udadhīṃr iva kratum puṣyasi gā iva /
analyzed: gambhīrān udadhīṃr iva kratum puṣyasi gāḥ iva

original: RV_3,045.03c pra sugopā yavasaṃ dhenavo yathā hradaṃ kulyā ivāśata //
analyzed: pra su gopāḥ yavasam dhenavaḥ yathā hradam kulyāḥ iva āśata

original: RV_3,045.04a ā nas tujaṃ rayim bharāṃśaṃ na pratijānate /
analyzed: ā naḥ tujam rayim bhara aṃśam na pratijānate

original: RV_3,045.04c vṛkṣam pakvam phalam aṅkīva dhūnuhīndra sampāraṇaṃ vasu //
analyzed: vṛkṣam pakvam phalam aṅkī iva dhūnuhi indra sampāraṇam vasu

original: RV_3,045.05a svayur indra svarāḷ asi smaddiṣṭiḥ svayaśastaraḥ /
analyzed: svayuḥ indra svarāj asi smaddiṣṭiḥ sva yaśastaraḥ

original: RV_3,045.05c sa vāvṛdhāna ojasā puruṣṭuta bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ //
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhānaḥ ojasā puruṣṭuta bhava naḥ su śravastamaḥ

original: RV_3,046.01a yudhmasya te vṛṣabhasya svarāja ugrasya yūna sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ /
analyzed: yudhmasya te vṛṣabhasya svarājaḥ ugrasya yūna sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ

original: RV_3,046.01c ajūryato vajriṇo vīryāṇīndra śrutasya mahato mahāni //
analyzed: a jūryataḥ vajriṇaḥ vīryāṇi indra śrutasya mahataḥ mahāni

original: RV_3,046.02a mahāṃ asi mahiṣa vṛṣṇyebhir dhanaspṛd ugra sahamāno anyān /
analyzed: mahān asi mahiṣa vṛṣṇyebhiḥ dhana spṛt ugra sahamānaḥ anyān

original: RV_3,046.02c eko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā sa yodhayā ca kṣayayā ca janān //
analyzed: ekaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā sa yodhayā ca kṣayayā ca janān

original: RV_3,046.03a pra mātrābhī ririce rocamānaḥ pra devebhir viśvato apratītaḥ /
analyzed: pra mātrābhiḥ ririce rocamānaḥ pra devebhiḥ viśvatas apratītaḥ

original: RV_3,046.03c pra majmanā diva indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ proror maho antarikṣād ṛjīṣī //
analyzed: pra majmanā divaḥ indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ pra uroḥ mahaḥ antarikṣāt ṛjīṣī

original: RV_3,046.04a uruṃ gabhīraṃ januṣābhy ugraṃ viśvavyacasam avatam matīnām /
analyzed: urum gabhīram januṣā abhi ugram viśva vyacasam avatam matīnām

original: RV_3,046.04c indraṃ somāsaḥ pradivi sutāsaḥ samudraṃ na sravata ā viśanti //
analyzed: indram somāsaḥ pradivi sutāsaḥ samudram na sravataḥ ā viśanti

original: RV_3,046.05a yaṃ somam indra pṛthivīdyāvā garbhaṃ na mātā bibhṛtas tvāyā /
analyzed: yam somam indra pṛthivī dyāvā garbham na mātā bibhṛtaḥ tvāyā

original: RV_3,046.05c taṃ te hinvanti tam u te mṛjanty adhvaryavo vṛṣabha pātavā u //
analyzed: tam te hinvanti tam u te mṛjanti adhvaryavaḥ vṛṣabha pātavai u

original: RV_3,047.01a marutvāṃ indra vṛṣabho raṇāya pibā somam anuṣvadham madāya /
analyzed: indra vṛṣabhaḥ raṇāya piba somam anuṣvadham madāya

original: RV_3,047.01c ā siñcasva jaṭhare madhva ūrmiṃ tvaṃ rājāsi pradivaḥ sutānām //
analyzed: ā siñcasva jaṭhare madhvaḥ ūrmim tvam rājā asi pradivaḥ sutānām

original: RV_3,047.02a sajoṣā indra sagaṇo marudbhiḥ somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān /
analyzed: sajoṣāḥ indra sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān

original: RV_3,047.02c jahi śatrūṃr apa mṛdho nudasvāthābhayaṃ kṛṇuhi viśvato naḥ //
analyzed: jahi śatrūṃr apa mṛdhaḥ nudasva atha abhayam kṛṇuhi viśvatas naḥ

original: RV_3,047.03a uta ṛtubhir ṛtupāḥ pāhi somam indra devebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sutaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: uta ṛtubhiḥ ṛtu pāḥ pāhi somam indra devebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sutam naḥ

original: RV_3,047.03c yāṃ ābhajo maruto ye tvānv ahan vṛtram adadhus tubhyam ojaḥ //
analyzed: yām ābhajaḥ marutaḥ ye tvā anu ahan vṛtram adadhuḥ tubhyam ojaḥ

original: RV_3,047.04a ye tvāhihatye maghavann avardhan ye śāmbare harivo ye gaviṣṭau /
analyzed: ye tvā ahi hatye maghavan avardhan ye śāmbare harivas ye gaviṣṭau

original: RV_3,047.04c ye tvā nūnam anumadanti viprāḥ pibendra somaṃ sagaṇo marudbhiḥ //
analyzed: ye tvā nūnam anumadanti viprāḥ piba indra somam sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ

original: RV_3,047.05a marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vāvṛdhānam akavāriṃ divyaṃ śāsam indram /
analyzed: marutvantam vṛṣabham vāvṛdhānam a kavārim divyam śāsam indram

original: RV_3,047.05c viśvāsāham avase nūtanāyograṃ sahodām iha taṃ huvema //
analyzed: viśvāsāham avase nūtanāya ugram sahaḥ dām iha tam huvema

original: RV_3,048.01a sadyo ha jāto vṛṣabhaḥ kanīnaḥ prabhartum āvad andhasaḥ sutasya /
analyzed: sadyas ha jātaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kanīnaḥ prabhartum āvat andhasaḥ sutasya

original: RV_3,048.01c sādhoḥ piba pratikāmaṃ yathā te rasāśiraḥ prathamaṃ somyasya //
analyzed: sādhoḥ piba pratikāmam yathā te rasāśiraḥ prathamam somyasya

original: RV_3,048.02a yaj jāyathās tad ahar asya kāme 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam apibo giriṣṭhām /
analyzed: yat jāyathāḥ tat ahar asya kāme ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam apibaḥ giriṣṭhām

original: RV_3,048.02c taṃ te mātā pari yoṣā janitrī mahaḥ pitur dama āsiñcad agre //
analyzed: tam te mātā pari yoṣā janitrī mahaḥ pituḥ dame āsiñcat agre

original: RV_3,048.03a upasthāya mātaram annam aiṭṭa tigmam apaśyad abhi somam ūdhaḥ /
analyzed: upasthāya mātaram annam tigmam apaśyat abhi somam ūdhaḥ

original: RV_3,048.03c prayāvayann acarad gṛtso anyān mahāni cakre purudhapratīkaḥ //
analyzed: prayāvayan acarat gṛtsaḥ anyān mahāni cakre purudha pratīkaḥ

original: RV_3,048.04a ugras turāṣāḷ abhibhūtyojā yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ cakra eṣaḥ /
analyzed: ugraḥ turāṣāh abhibhūti ojāḥ yathāvaśam tanvam cakre eṣaḥ

original: RV_3,048.04c tvaṣṭāram indro januṣābhibhūyāmuṣyā somam apibac camūṣu //
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram indraḥ januṣā abhibhūya amuṣya ā somam apibat camūṣu

original: RV_3,048.05a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,048.05c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,049.01a śaṃsā mahām indraṃ yasmin viśvā ā kṛṣṭayaḥ somapāḥ kāmam avyan /
analyzed: śaṃsa mahām indram yasmin viśvāḥ ā kṛṣṭayaḥ soma pāḥ kāmam avyan

original: RV_3,049.01c yaṃ sukratuṃ dhiṣaṇe vibhvataṣṭaṃ ghanaṃ vṛtrāṇāṃ janayanta devāḥ //
analyzed: yam sukratum dhiṣaṇe vibhva taṣṭam ghanam vṛtrāṇām janayanta devāḥ

original: RV_3,049.02a yaṃ nu nakiḥ pṛtanāsu svarājaṃ dvitā tarati nṛtamaṃ hariṣṭhām /
analyzed: yam nu nakir pṛtanāsu sva rājam dvitā tarati nṛtamam hariṣṭhām

original: RV_3,049.02c inatamaḥ satvabhir yo ha śūṣaiḥ pṛthujrayā aminād āyur dasyoḥ //
analyzed: inatamaḥ satvabhiḥ yaḥ ha śūṣaiḥ pṛthujrayā amināt āyuḥ dasyoḥ

original: RV_3,049.03a sahāvā pṛtsu taraṇir nārvā vyānaśī rodasī mehanāvān /
analyzed: sahāvā pṛtsu taraṇiḥ na arvā vyānaśī rodasī mehanāvān

original: RV_3,049.03c bhago na kāre havyo matīnām piteva cāruḥ suhavo vayodhāḥ //
analyzed: bhagaḥ na kāre havyaḥ matīnām pitā iva cāruḥ su havaḥ vayodhāḥ

original: RV_3,049.04a dhartā divo rajasas pṛṣṭa ūrdhvo ratho na vāyur vasubhir niyutvān /
analyzed: dhartā divaḥ rajasaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ ūrdhvaḥ rathaḥ na vāyuḥ vasubhiḥ niyutvān

original: RV_3,049.04c kṣapāṃ vastā janitā sūryasya vibhaktā bhāgaṃ dhiṣaṇeva vājam //
analyzed: kṣapām vastā janitā sūryasya vibhaktā bhāgam dhiṣaṇā iva vājam

original: RV_3,049.05a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,049.05c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,050.01a indraḥ svāhā pibatu yasya soma āgatyā tumro vṛṣabho marutvān /
analyzed: indraḥ svāhā pibatu yasya somaḥ āgatyā tumraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ marutvān

original: RV_3,050.01c oruvyacāḥ pṛṇatām ebhir annair āsya havis tanvaḥ kāmam ṛdhyāḥ //
analyzed: ā uru vyacāḥ pṛṇatām ebhiḥ annaiḥ ā asya haviḥ tanvaḥ kāmam ṛdhyāḥ

original: RV_3,050.02a ā te saparyū javase yunajmi yayor anu pradivaḥ śruṣṭim āvaḥ /
analyzed: ā te saparyū javase yunajmi yayoḥ anu pradivaḥ śruṣṭim āvaḥ

original: RV_3,050.02c iha tvā dheyur harayaḥ suśipra pibā tv asya suṣutasya cāroḥ //
analyzed: iha tvā dheyuḥ harayaḥ su śipra pibā tu asya suṣutasya cāroḥ

original: RV_3,050.03a gobhir mimikṣuṃ dadhire supāram indraṃ jyaiṣṭhyāya dhāyase gṛṇānāḥ /
analyzed: gobhiḥ mimikṣum dadhire su pāram indram jyaiṣṭhyāya dhāyase gṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_3,050.03c mandānaḥ somam papivāṃ ṛjīṣin sam asmabhyam purudhā gā iṣaṇya //
analyzed: mandānaḥ somam papivān ṛjīṣin sam asmabhyam purudhā gāḥ iṣaṇya

original: RV_3,050.04a imaṃ kāmam mandayā gobhir aśvaiś candravatā rādhasā paprathaś ca /
analyzed: imam kāmam mandayā gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ candravatā rādhasā paprathaḥ ca

original: RV_3,050.04c svaryavo matibhis tubhyaṃ viprā indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāso akran //
analyzed: svaryavaḥ matibhiḥ tubhyam viprāḥ indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāsaḥ akran

original: RV_3,050.05a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_3,050.05c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_3,051.01a carṣaṇīdhṛtam maghavānam ukthyam indraṃ giro bṛhatīr abhy anūṣata /
analyzed: carṣaṇī dhṛtam maghavānam ukthyam indram giraḥ bṛhatīḥ abhī anūṣata

original: RV_3,051.01c vāvṛdhānam puruhūtaṃ suvṛktibhir amartyaṃ jaramāṇaṃ dive-dive //
analyzed: vāvṛdhānam puruhūtam suvṛktibhiḥ amartyam jaramāṇam dive dive

original: RV_3,051.02a śatakratum arṇavaṃ śākinaṃ naraṃ giro ma indram upa yanti viśvataḥ /
analyzed: śatakratum arṇavam śākinam naram giraḥ me indram upa yanti viśvatas

original: RV_3,051.02c vājasanim pūrbhidaṃ tūrṇim apturaṃ dhāmasācam abhiṣācaṃ svarvidam //
analyzed: vāja sanim pūḥ bhidam tūrṇim ap turam dhāmasācam abhiṣācam svar vidam

original: RV_3,051.03a ākare vasor jaritā panasyate 'nehasa stubha indro duvasyati /
analyzed: ākare vasoḥ jaritā panasyate na ihasaḥ stubhaḥ indraḥ duvasyati

original: RV_3,051.03c vivasvataḥ sadana ā hi pipriye satrāsāham abhimātihanaṃ stuhi //
analyzed: vivasvataḥ sadane ā hi pipriye satrāsāham abhimāti hanam stuhi

original: RV_3,051.04a nṛṇām u tvā nṛtamaṃ gīrbhir ukthair abhi pra vīram arcatā sabādhaḥ /
analyzed: nṛṇām u tvā nṛtamam gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ abhi pra vīram arcata sabādhaḥ

original: RV_3,051.04c saṃ sahase purumāyo jihīte namo asya pradiva eka īśe //
analyzed: sam sahase puru māyaḥ jihīte namaḥ asya pradivaḥ ekaḥ īśe

original: RV_3,051.05a pūrvīr asya niṣṣidho martyeṣu purū vasūni pṛthivī bibharti /
analyzed: pūrvīḥ asya niṣṣidhaḥ martyeṣu purū vasūni pṛthivī bibharti

original: RV_3,051.05c indrāya dyāva oṣadhīr utāpo rayiṃ rakṣanti jīrayo vanāni //
analyzed: indrāya dyāvaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta apaḥ rayim rakṣanti jīrayaḥ vanāni

original: RV_3,051.06a tubhyam brahmāṇi gira indra tubhyaṃ satrā dadhire harivo juṣasva /
analyzed: tubhyam brahmāṇi giraḥ indra tubhyam satrā dadhire harivas juṣasva

original: RV_3,051.06c bodhy āpir avaso nūtanasya sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyo vayo dhāḥ //
analyzed: bodhi āpiḥ avasaḥ nūtanasya sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_3,051.07a indra marutva iha pāhi somaṃ yathā śāryāte apibaḥ sutasya /
analyzed: indra marutvas iha pāhi somam yathā śāryāte apibaḥ sutasya

original: RV_3,051.07c tava praṇītī tava śūra śarmann ā vivāsanti kavayaḥ suyajñāḥ //
analyzed: tava praṇītī tava śūra śarman ā vivāsanti kavayaḥ su yajñāḥ

original: RV_3,051.08a sa vāvaśāna iha pāhi somam marudbhir indra sakhibhiḥ sutaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: sa vāvaśānaḥ iha pāhi somam marudbhiḥ indra sakhibhiḥ sutam naḥ

original: RV_3,051.08c jātaṃ yat tvā pari devā abhūṣan mahe bharāya puruhūta viśve //
analyzed: jātam yat tvā pari devāḥ abhūṣan mahe bharāya puruhūta viśve

original: RV_3,051.09a aptūrye maruta āpir eṣo 'mandann indram anu dātivārāḥ /
analyzed: aptūrye marutaḥ āpiḥ eṣaḥ mandan indram anu dāti vārāḥ

original: RV_3,051.09c tebhiḥ sākam pibatu vṛtrakhādaḥ sutaṃ somaṃ dāśuṣaḥ sve sadhasthe //
analyzed: tebhiḥ sākam pibatu vṛtra khādaḥ sutam somam dāśuṣaḥ sve sadhasthe

original: RV_3,051.10a idaṃ hy anv ojasā sutaṃ rādhānām pate /
analyzed: idam hi anu ojasā sutam rādhānām pate

original: RV_3,051.10c pibā tv asya girvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: pibā tu asya girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_3,051.11a yas te anu svadhām asat sute ni yaccha tanvam /
analyzed: yaḥ te anu svadhām asat sute ni yaccha tanvam

original: RV_3,051.11c sa tvā mamattu somyam //
analyzed: sa tvā mamattu somyam

original: RV_3,051.12a pra te aśnotu kukṣyoḥ prendra brahmaṇā śiraḥ /
analyzed: pra te aśnotu kukṣyoḥ pra indra brahmaṇā śiraḥ

original: RV_3,051.12c pra bāhū śūra rādhase //
analyzed: pra bāhū śūra rādhase

original: RV_3,052.01a dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam /
analyzed: dhānāvantam karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam

original: RV_3,052.01c indra prātar juṣasva naḥ //
analyzed: indra prātar juṣasva naḥ

original: RV_3,052.02a puroḷāśam pacatyaṃ juṣasvendrā gurasva ca /
analyzed: puroḷāśam pacatyam juṣasva indra ā gurasva ca

original: RV_3,052.02c tubhyaṃ havyāni sisrate //
analyzed: tubhyam havyāni sisrate

original: RV_3,052.03a puroḷāśaṃ ca no ghaso joṣayāse giraś ca naḥ /
analyzed: puroḷāśam ca naḥ ghasaḥ joṣayāse giraḥ ca naḥ

original: RV_3,052.03c vadhūyur iva yoṣaṇām //
analyzed: vadhūyuḥ iva yoṣaṇām

original: RV_3,052.04a puroḷāśaṃ sanaśruta prātaḥsāve juṣasva naḥ /
analyzed: puroḷāśam sana śruta prātaḥsāve juṣasva naḥ

original: RV_3,052.04c indra kratur hi te bṛhan //
analyzed: indra kratuḥ hi te bṛhan

original: RV_3,052.05a mādhyandinasya savanasya dhānāḥ puroḷāśam indra kṛṣveha cārum /
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya dhānāḥ puroḷāśam indra kṛṣva iha cārum

original: RV_3,052.05c pra yat stotā jaritā tūrṇyartho vṛṣāyamāṇa upa gīrbhir īṭṭe //
analyzed: pra yat stotā jaritā tūrṇi arthaḥ vṛṣāyamāṇaḥ upa gīrbhiḥ īṭṭe

original: RV_3,052.06a tṛtīye dhānāḥ savane puruṣṭuta puroḷāśam āhutam māmahasva naḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīye dhānāḥ savane puruṣṭuta puroḷāśam āhutam māmahasva naḥ

original: RV_3,052.06c ṛbhumantaṃ vājavantaṃ tvā kave prayasvanta upa śikṣema dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: ṛbhumantam vājavantam tvā kave prayasvantaḥ upa śikṣema dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_3,052.07a pūṣaṇvate te cakṛmā karambhaṃ harivate haryaśvāya dhānāḥ /
analyzed: pūṣaṇvate te cakṛma karambham harivate haryaśvāya dhānāḥ

original: RV_3,052.07c apūpam addhi sagaṇo marudbhiḥ somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān //
analyzed: apūpam addhi sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān

original: RV_3,052.08a prati dhānā bharata tūyam asmai puroḷāśaṃ vīratamāya nṛṇām /
analyzed: prati dhānāḥ bharata tūyam asmai puroḷāśam vīratamāya nṛṇām

original: RV_3,052.08c dive-dive sadṛśīr indra tubhyaṃ vardhantu tvā somapeyāya dhṛṣṇo //
analyzed: dive dive sadṛśīḥ indra tubhyam vardhantu tvā soma peyāya dhṛṣṇo

original: RV_3,053.01a indrāparvatā bṛhatā rathena vāmīr iṣa ā vahataṃ suvīrāḥ /
analyzed: indrāparvatā bṛhatā rathena vāmīḥ iṣaḥ ā vahatam su vīrāḥ

original: RV_3,053.01c vītaṃ havyāny adhvareṣu devā vardhethāṃ gīrbhir iḷayā madantā //
analyzed: vītam havyāni adhvareṣu devā vardhethām gīrbhiḥ iḷayā madantā

original: RV_3,053.02a tiṣṭhā su kam maghavan mā parā gāḥ somasya nu tvā suṣutasya yakṣi /
analyzed: tiṣṭhā su kam maghavan mā parā gāḥ somasya nu tvā suṣutasya yakṣi

original: RV_3,053.02c pitur na putraḥ sicam ā rabhe ta indra svādiṣṭhayā girā śacīvaḥ //
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ sicam ā rabhe te indra svādiṣṭhayā girā śacīvas

original: RV_3,053.03a śaṃsāvādhvaryo prati me gṛṇīhīndrāya vāhaḥ kṛṇavāva juṣṭam /
analyzed: śaṃsāva adhvaryo prati me gṛṇīhi indrāya vāhaḥ kṛṇavāva juṣṭam

original: RV_3,053.03c edam barhir yajamānasya sīdāthā ca bhūd uktham indrāya śastam //
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ yajamānasya sīda athā ca bhūt uktham indrāya śastam

original: RV_3,053.04a jāyed astam maghavan sed u yonis tad it tvā yuktā harayo vahantu /
analyzed: jāyā id astam maghavan sā id u yoniḥ tat id tvā yuktāḥ harayaḥ vahantu

original: RV_3,053.04c yadā kadā ca sunavāma somam agniṣ ṭvā dūto dhanvāty accha //
analyzed: yadā kadā ca sunavāma somam agniḥ tvā dūtaḥ dhanvāti accha

original: RV_3,053.05a parā yāhi maghavann ā ca yāhīndra bhrātar ubhayatrā te artham /
analyzed: parā yāhi maghavan ā ca yāhi indra bhrātar ubhayatrā te artham

original: RV_3,053.05c yatrā rathasya bṛhato nidhānaṃ vimocanaṃ vājino rāsabhasya //
analyzed: yatrā rathasya bṛhataḥ nidhānam vimocanam vājinaḥ rāsabhasya

original: RV_3,053.06a apāḥ somam astam indra pra yāhi kalyāṇīr jāyā suraṇaṃ gṛhe te /
analyzed: apāḥ somam astam indra pra yāhi kalyāṇīḥ jāyā suraṇam gṛhe te

original: RV_3,053.06c yatrā rathasya bṛhato nidhānaṃ vimocanaṃ vājino dakṣiṇāvat //
analyzed: yatrā rathasya bṛhataḥ nidhānam vimocanam vājinaḥ dakṣiṇāvat

original: RV_3,053.07a ime bhojā aṅgiraso virūpā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
analyzed: ime bhojāḥ aṅgirasaḥ virūpāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ

original: RV_3,053.07c viśvāmitrāya dadato maghāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: viśvāmitrāya dadataḥ maghāni sahasrasāve pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_3,053.08a rūpaṃ-rūpam maghavā bobhavīti māyāḥ kṛṇvānas tanvam pari svām /
analyzed: rūpam rūpam maghavā bobhavīti māyāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ tanvam pari svām

original: RV_3,053.08c trir yad divaḥ pari muhūrtam āgāt svair mantrair anṛtupā ṛtāvā //
analyzed: tris yat divaḥ pari muhūrtam āgāt svaiḥ mantraiḥ anṛtu pāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_3,053.09a mahāṃ ṛṣir devajā devajūto 'stabhnāt sindhum arṇavaṃ nṛcakṣāḥ /
analyzed: mahān ṛṣiḥ deva jāḥ deva jūtaḥ stabhnāt sindhum arṇavam nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_3,053.09c viśvāmitro yad avahat sudāsam apriyāyata kuśikebhir indraḥ //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ yat avahat sudāsam apriyāyata kuśikebhiḥ indraḥ

original: RV_3,053.10a haṃsā iva kṛṇutha ślokam adribhir madanto gīrbhir adhvare sute sacā /
analyzed: haṃsāḥ iva kṛṇutha ślokam adribhiḥ madantaḥ gīrbhiḥ adhvare sute sacā

original: RV_3,053.10c devebhir viprā ṛṣayo nṛcakṣaso vi pibadhvaṃ kuśikāḥ somyam madhu //
analyzed: devebhiḥ viprāḥ ṛṣayaḥ nṛ cakṣasaḥ vi pibadhvam kuśikāḥ somyam madhu

original: RV_3,053.11a upa preta kuśikāś cetayadhvam aśvaṃ rāye pra muñcatā sudāsaḥ /
analyzed: upa preta kuśikāḥ cetayadhvam aśvam rāye pra muñcata sudāsaḥ

original: RV_3,053.11c rājā vṛtraṃ jaṅghanat prāg apāg udag athā yajāte vara ā pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: rājā vṛtram jaṅghanat prāk apāk udak athā yajāte vare ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_3,053.12a ya ime rodasī ubhe aham indram atuṣṭavam /
analyzed: yaḥ ime rodasī ubhe aham indram atuṣṭavam

original: RV_3,053.12c viśvāmitrasya rakṣati brahmedam bhārataṃ janam //
analyzed: viśvāmitrasya rakṣati brahma idam bhāratam janam

original: RV_3,053.13a viśvāmitrā arāsata brahmendrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: viśvāmitrāḥ arāsata brahma indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_3,053.13c karad in naḥ surādhasaḥ //
analyzed: karat id naḥ su rādhasaḥ

original: RV_3,053.14a kiṃ te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāvo nāśiraṃ duhre na tapanti gharmam /
analyzed: kim te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāvaḥ na āśiram duhre na tapanti gharmam

original: RV_3,053.14c ā no bhara pramagandasya vedo naicāśākham maghavan randhayā naḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara pramagandasya vedaḥ naicāśākham maghavan randhaya naḥ

original: RV_3,053.15a sasarparīr amatim bādhamānā bṛhan mimāya jamadagnidattā /
analyzed: sasarparīḥ amatim bādhamānā bṛhat mimāya jamadagni dattā

original: RV_3,053.15c ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna śravo deveṣv amṛtam ajuryam //
analyzed: ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna śravaḥ deveṣu amṛtam ajuryam

original: RV_3,053.16a sasarparīr abharat tūyam ebhyo 'dhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: sasarparīḥ abharat tūyam ebhyaḥ dhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_3,053.16c sā pakṣyā navyam āyur dadhānā yām me palastijamadagnayo daduḥ //
analyzed: sā pakṣyā navyam āyuḥ dadhānā yām me palasti jamadagnayaḥ daduḥ

original: RV_3,053.17a sthirau gāvau bhavatāṃ vīḷur akṣo meṣā vi varhi mā yugaṃ vi śāri /
analyzed: sthirau gāvau bhavatām vīḍuḥ akṣaḥ mā iṣā vi varhi mā yugam vi śāri

original: RV_3,053.17c indraḥ pātalye dadatāṃ śarītor ariṣṭaneme abhi naḥ sacasva //
analyzed: indraḥ pātalye dadatām śarītoḥ ariṣṭa neme abhi naḥ sacasva

original: RV_3,053.18a balaṃ dhehi tanūṣu no balam indrānaḷutsu naḥ /
analyzed: balam dhehi tanūṣu naḥ balam indra anaḷutsu naḥ

original: RV_3,053.18c balaṃ tokāya tanayāya jīvase tvaṃ hi baladā asi //
analyzed: balam tokāya tanayāya jīvase tvam hi bala dāḥ asi

original: RV_3,053.19a abhi vyayasva khadirasya sāram ojo dhehi spandane śiṃśapāyām /
analyzed: abhi vyayasva khadirasya sāram ojaḥ dhehi spandane śiṃśapāyām

original: RV_3,053.19c akṣa vīḷo vīḷita vīḷayasva mā yāmād asmād ava jīhipo naḥ //
analyzed: akṣa vīḷo vīḍita vīḍayasva mā yāmāt asmāt ava jīhipaḥ naḥ

original: RV_3,053.20a ayam asmān vanaspatir mā ca hā mā ca rīriṣat /
analyzed: ayam asmān vanaspatiḥ mā ca hāḥ mā ca rīriṣat

original: RV_3,053.20c svasty ā gṛhebhya āvasā ā vimocanāt //
analyzed: svasti ā gṛhebhyaḥ āvasā ā vimocanāt

original: RV_3,053.21a indrotibhir bahulābhir no adya yācchreṣṭhābhir maghavañ chūra jinva /
analyzed: indra ūtibhiḥ bahulābhiḥ naḥ adya yācchreṣṭhābhiḥ maghavan śūra jinva

original: RV_3,053.21c yo no dveṣṭy adharaḥ sas padīṣṭa yam u dviṣmas tam u prāṇo jahātu //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi adharaḥ sas padīṣṭa yam u dviṣmaḥ tam u prāṇaḥ jahātu

original: RV_3,053.22a paraśuṃ cid vi tapati śimbalaṃ cid vi vṛścati /
analyzed: paraśum cit vi tapati śimbalam cit vi vṛścati

original: RV_3,053.22c ukhā cid indra yeṣantī prayastā phenam asyati //
analyzed: ukhā cit indra yeṣantī prayastā phenam asyati

original: RV_3,053.23a na sāyakasya cikite janāso lodhaṃ nayanti paśu manyamānāḥ /
analyzed: na sāyakasya cikite janāsaḥ lodham nayanti paśu manyamānāḥ

original: RV_3,053.23c nāvājinaṃ vājinā hāsayanti na gardabham puro aśvān nayanti //
analyzed: na a vājinam vājinā hāsayanti na gardabham puras aśvāt nayanti

original: RV_3,053.24a ima indra bharatasya putrā apapitvaṃ cikitur na prapitvam /
analyzed: ime indra bharatasya putrāḥ apapitvam cikituḥ na prapitvam

original: RV_3,053.24c hinvanty aśvam araṇaṃ na nityaṃ jyāvājam pari ṇayanty ājau //
analyzed: hinvanti aśvam araṇam na nityam jyā vājam pari nayanti ājau

original: RV_3,054.01a imam mahe vidathyāya śūṣaṃ śaśvat kṛtva īḍyāya pra jabhruḥ /
analyzed: imam mahe vidathyāya śūṣam śaśvat kṛtvas īḍyāya pra jabhruḥ

original: RV_3,054.01c śṛṇotu no damyebhir anīkaiḥ śṛṇotv agnir divyair ajasraḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇotu naḥ damyebhiḥ anīkaiḥ śṛṇotu agniḥ divyaiḥ ajasraḥ

original: RV_3,054.02a mahi mahe dive arcā pṛthivyai kāmo ma icchañ carati prajānan /
analyzed: mahi mahe dive arcā pṛthivyai kāmaḥ me iccham carati prajānan

original: RV_3,054.02c yayor ha stome vidatheṣu devāḥ saparyavo mādayante sacāyoḥ //
analyzed: yayoḥ ha stome vidatheṣu devāḥ saparyavaḥ mādayante sacā ayoḥ

original: RV_3,054.03a yuvor ṛtaṃ rodasī satyam astu mahe ṣu ṇaḥ suvitāya pra bhūtam /
analyzed: yuvoḥ ṛtam rodasī satyam astu mahe su naḥ suvitāya pra bhūtam

original: RV_3,054.03c idaṃ dive namo agne pṛthivyai saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam //
analyzed: idam dive namaḥ agne pṛthivyai saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam

original: RV_3,054.04a uto hi vām pūrvyā āvividra ṛtāvarī rodasī satyavācaḥ /
analyzed: uta u hi vām pūrvyāḥ āvividre ṛtāvarī rodasī satyavācaḥ

original: RV_3,054.04c naraś cid vāṃ samithe śūrasātau vavandire pṛthivi vevidānāḥ //
analyzed: naraḥ cit vām samithe śūrasātau vavandire pṛthivi vevidānāḥ

original: RV_3,054.05a ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocad devāṃ acchā pathyā kā sam eti /
analyzed: kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pra vocat devān acchā pathyā kā sam eti

original: RV_3,054.05c dadṛśra eṣām avamā sadāṃsi pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu //
analyzed: dadṛśre eṣām avamā sadāṃsi pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu

original: RV_3,054.06a kavir nṛcakṣā abhi ṣīm acaṣṭa ṛtasya yonā vighṛte madantī /
analyzed: kaviḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ abhi sīm acaṣṭa ṛtasya yonā vighṛte madantī

original: RV_3,054.06c nānā cakrāte sadanaṃ yathā veḥ samānena kratunā saṃvidāne //
analyzed: nānā cakrāte sadanam yathā veḥ samānena kratunā saṃvidāne

original: RV_3,054.07a samānyā viyute dūreante dhruve pade tasthatur jāgarūke /
analyzed: samānyā viyute dūreante dhruve pade tasthatuḥ jāgarūke

original: RV_3,054.07c uta svasārā yuvatī bhavantī ād u bruvāte mithunāni nāma //
analyzed: uta svasārā yuvatī bhavantī āt u bruvāte mithunāni nāma

original: RV_3,054.08a viśved ete janimā saṃ vivikto maho devān bibhratī na vyathete /
analyzed: viśvā id ete janimā sam viviktaḥ mahaḥ devān bibhratī na vyathete

original: RV_3,054.08c ejad dhruvam patyate viśvam ekaṃ carat patatri viṣuṇaṃ vi jātam //
analyzed: ejat dhruvam patyate viśvam ekam carat patatri viṣuṇam vi jātam

original: RV_3,054.09a sanā purāṇam adhy emy ārān mahaḥ pitur janitur jāmi tan naḥ /
analyzed: sanā purāṇam adhi emi ārāt mahaḥ pituḥ janituḥ jāmi tat naḥ

original: RV_3,054.09c devāso yatra panitāra evair urau pathi vyute tasthur antaḥ //
analyzed: devāsaḥ yatra panitāraḥ evaiḥ urau pathi vyute tasthuḥ antar

original: RV_3,054.10a imaṃ stomaṃ rodasī pra bravīmy ṛdūdarāḥ śṛṇavann agnijihvāḥ /
analyzed: imam stomam rodasī pra bravīmi ṛdūdarāḥ śṛṇavan agni jihvāḥ

original: RV_3,054.10c mitraḥ samrājo varuṇo yuvāna ādityāsaḥ kavayaḥ paprathānāḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ samrājaḥ varuṇaḥ yuvānaḥ ādityāsaḥ kavayaḥ paprathānāḥ

original: RV_3,054.11a hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā sujihvas trir ā divo vidathe patyamānaḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇiḥ savitā su jihvaḥ tris ā divaḥ vidathe patyamānaḥ

original: RV_3,054.11c deveṣu ca savitaḥ ślokam aśrer ād asmabhyam ā suva sarvatātim //
analyzed: deveṣu ca savitar ślokam aśreḥ āt asmabhyam ā suva sarvatātim

original: RV_3,054.12a sukṛt supāṇiḥ svavāṃ ṛtāvā devas tvaṣṭāvase tāni no dhāt /
analyzed: su kṛt su pāṇiḥ svavān ṛtāvā devaḥ tvaṣṭā avase tāni naḥ dhāt

original: RV_3,054.12c pūṣaṇvanta ṛbhavo mādayadhvam ūrdhvagrāvāṇo adhvaram ataṣṭa //
analyzed: pūṣaṇvantaḥ ṛbhavaḥ mādayadhvam ūrdhva grāvāṇaḥ adhvaram ataṣṭa

original: RV_3,054.13a vidyudrathā maruta ṛṣṭimanto divo maryā ṛtajātā ayāsaḥ /
analyzed: vidyut rathāḥ marutaḥ ṛṣṭimantaḥ divaḥ maryāḥ ṛta jātāḥ ayāsaḥ

original: RV_3,054.13c sarasvatī śṛṇavan yajñiyāso dhātā rayiṃ sahavīraṃ turāsaḥ //
analyzed: sarasvatī śṛṇavan yajñiyāsaḥ dhāta rayim saha vīram turāsaḥ

original: RV_3,054.14a viṣṇuṃ stomāsaḥ purudasmam arkā bhagasyeva kāriṇo yāmani gman /
analyzed: viṣṇum stomāsaḥ puru dasmam arkāḥ bhagasya iva kāriṇaḥ yāmani gman

original: RV_3,054.14c urukramaḥ kakuho yasya pūrvīr na mardhanti yuvatayo janitrīḥ //
analyzed: uru kramaḥ kakuhaḥ yasya pūrvīḥ na mardhanti yuvatayaḥ janitrīḥ

original: RV_3,054.15a indro viśvair vīryaiḥ patyamāna ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā /
analyzed: indraḥ viśvaiḥ vīryaiḥ patyamānaḥ ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā

original: RV_3,054.15c purandaro vṛtrahā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ saṃgṛbhyā na ā bharā bhūri paśvaḥ //
analyzed: purandaraḥ vṛtra hā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ saṃgṛbhyā naḥ ā bhara bhūri paśvaḥ

original: RV_3,054.16a nāsatyā me pitarā bandhupṛcchā sajātyam aśvinoś cāru nāma /
analyzed: nāsatyā me pitarā bandhu pṛcchā sajātyam aśvinoḥ cāru nāma

original: RV_3,054.16c yuvaṃ hi stho rayidau no rayīṇāṃ dātraṃ rakṣethe akavair adabdhā //
analyzed: yuvam hi sthaḥ rayi dau naḥ rayīṇām dātram rakṣethe akavaiḥ adabdhā

original: RV_3,054.17a mahat tad vaḥ kavayaś cāru nāma yad dha devā bhavatha viśva indre /
analyzed: mahat tat vaḥ kavayaḥ cāru nāma yat ha devāḥ bhavatha viśve indre

original: RV_3,054.17c sakha ṛbhubhiḥ puruhūta priyebhir imāṃ dhiyaṃ sātaye takṣatā naḥ //
analyzed: sakhaḥ ṛbhubhiḥ puruhūta priyebhiḥ imām dhiyam sātaye takṣata naḥ

original: RV_3,054.18a aryamā ṇo aditir yajñiyāso 'dabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni /
analyzed: aryamā naḥ aditiḥ yajñiyāsaḥ dabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni

original: RV_3,054.18c yuyota no anapatyāni gantoḥ prajāvān naḥ paśumāṃ astu gātuḥ //
analyzed: yuyota naḥ anapatyāni gantoḥ prajāvān naḥ paśumān astu gātuḥ

original: RV_3,054.19a devānāṃ dūtaḥ purudha prasūto 'nāgān no vocatu sarvatātā /
analyzed: devānām dūtaḥ purudha prasūtaḥ nāgān naḥ vocatu sarvatātā

original: RV_3,054.19c śṛṇotu naḥ pṛthivī dyaur utāpaḥ sūryo nakṣatrair urv antarikṣam //
analyzed: śṛṇotu naḥ pṛthivī dyauḥ uta āpaḥ sūryaḥ nakṣatraiḥ uru antarikṣam

original: RV_3,054.20a śṛṇvantu no vṛṣaṇaḥ parvatāso dhruvakṣemāsa iḷayā madantaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇvantu naḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ parvatāsaḥ dhruva kṣemāsaḥ iḷayā madantaḥ

original: RV_3,054.20c ādityair no aditiḥ śṛṇotu yacchantu no marutaḥ śarma bhadram //
analyzed: ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śṛṇotu yacchantu naḥ marutaḥ śarma bhadram

original: RV_3,054.21a sadā sugaḥ pitumāṃ astu panthā madhvā devā oṣadhīḥ sam pipṛkta /
analyzed: sadā su gaḥ pitumān astu panthāḥ madhvā devāḥ oṣadhīḥ sam pipṛkta

original: RV_3,054.21c bhago me agne sakhye na mṛdhyā ud rāyo aśyāṃ sadanam purukṣoḥ //
analyzed: bhagaḥ me agne sakhye na mṛdhyāḥ ud rāyaḥ aśyām sadanam purukṣoḥ

original: RV_3,054.22a svadasva havyā sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi /
analyzed: svadasva havyā sam iṣaḥ didīhi asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi

original: RV_3,054.22c viśvāṃ agne pṛtsu tāñ jeṣi śatrūn ahā viśvā sumanā dīdihī naḥ //
analyzed: viśvām agne pṛtsu tām jeṣi śatrūn ahā viśvā sumanāḥ dīdihi naḥ

original: RV_3,055.01a uṣasaḥ pūrvā adha yad vyūṣur mahad vi jajñe akṣaram pade goḥ /
analyzed: uṣasaḥ pūrvāḥ adha yat vyūṣuḥ mahat vi jajñe akṣaram pade goḥ

original: RV_3,055.01c vratā devānām upa nu prabhūṣan mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: vratā devānām upa nu prabhūṣan mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.02a mo ṣū ṇo atra juhuranta devā mā pūrve agne pitaraḥ padajñāḥ /
analyzed: mā u su naḥ atra juhuranta devāḥ mā pūrve agne pitaraḥ pada jñāḥ

original: RV_3,055.02c purāṇyoḥ sadmanoḥ ketur antar mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: purāṇyoḥ sadmanoḥ ketuḥ antar mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.03a vi me purutrā patayanti kāmāḥ śamy acchā dīdye pūrvyāṇi /
analyzed: vi me purutrā patayanti kāmāḥ śamī acchā dīdye pūrvyāṇi

original: RV_3,055.03c samiddhe agnāv ṛtam id vadema mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: samiddhe agnau ṛtam id vadema mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.04a samāno rājā vibhṛtaḥ purutrā śaye śayāsu prayuto vanānu /
analyzed: samānaḥ rājā vibhṛtaḥ purutrā śaye śayāsu prayutaḥ vanā anu

original: RV_3,055.04c anyā vatsam bharati kṣeti mātā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: anyā vatsam bharati kṣeti mātā mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.05a ākṣit pūrvāsv aparā anūrut sadyo jātāsu taruṇīṣv antaḥ /
analyzed: ākṣit pūrvāsu aparāḥ anūrudh sadyas jātāsu taruṇīṣu antar

original: RV_3,055.05c antarvatīḥ suvate apravītā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: antarvatīḥ suvate a pravītāḥ mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.06a śayuḥ parastād adha nu dvimātābandhanaś carati vatsa ekaḥ /
analyzed: śayuḥ parastāt adha nu dvi mātā bandhanaḥ carati vatsaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_3,055.06c mitrasya tā varuṇasya vratāni mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: mitrasya tā varuṇasya vratāni mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.07a dvimātā hotā vidatheṣu samrāḷ anv agraṃ carati kṣeti budhnaḥ /
analyzed: dvi mātā hotā vidatheṣu samrāj anu agram carati kṣeti budhnaḥ

original: RV_3,055.07c pra raṇyāni raṇyavāco bharante mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: pra raṇyāni raṇya vācaḥ bharante mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.08a śūrasyeva yudhyato antamasya pratīcīnaṃ dadṛśe viśvam āyat /
analyzed: śūrasya iva yudhyataḥ antamasya pratīcīnam dadṛśe viśvam āyat

original: RV_3,055.08c antar matiś carati niṣṣidhaṃ gor mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: antar matiḥ carati niṣṣidham goḥ mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.09a ni veveti palito dūta āsv antar mahāṃś carati rocanena /
analyzed: ni veveti palitaḥ dūtaḥ āsu antar mahān carati rocanena

original: RV_3,055.09c vapūṃṣi bibhrad abhi no vi caṣṭe mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: vapūṃṣi bibhrat abhi naḥ vi caṣṭe mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.10a viṣṇur gopāḥ paramam pāti pāthaḥ priyā dhāmāny amṛtā dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ paramam pāti pāthaḥ priyā dhāmāni amṛtā dadhānaḥ

original: RV_3,055.10c agniṣ ṭā viśvā bhuvanāni veda mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: agniḥ tā viśvā bhuvanāni veda mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.11a nānā cakrāte yamyā vapūṃṣi tayor anyad rocate kṛṣṇam anyat /
analyzed: nānā cakrāte yamyā vapūṃṣi tayoḥ anyat rocate kṛṣṇam anyat

original: RV_3,055.11c śyāvī ca yad aruṣī ca svasārau mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: śyāvī ca yat aruṣī ca svasārau mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.12a mātā ca yatra duhitā ca dhenū sabardughe dhāpayete samīcī /
analyzed: mātā ca yatra duhitā ca dhenū sabardughe dhāpayete samīcī

original: RV_3,055.12c ṛtasya te sadasīḷe antar mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: ṛtasya te sadasi īḍe antar mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.13a anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ /
analyzed: anyasyāḥ vatsam rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_3,055.13c ṛtasya sā payasāpinvateḷā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: ṛtasya sā payasā apinvata iḷā mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.14a padyā vaste pururūpā vapūṃṣy ūrdhvā tasthau tryaviṃ rerihāṇā /
analyzed: padyā vaste puru rūpā vapūṃṣi ūrdhvā tasthau tryavim rerihāṇā

original: RV_3,055.14c ṛtasya sadma vi carāmi vidvān mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: ṛtasya sadma vi carāmi vidvān mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.15a pade iva nihite dasme antas tayor anyad guhyam āvir anyat /
analyzed: pade iva nihite dasme antar tayoḥ anyat guhyam āvis anyat

original: RV_3,055.15c sadhrīcīnā pathyā sā viṣūcī mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: sadhrīcīnā pathyā sā viṣūcī mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.16a ā dhenavo dhunayantām aśiśvīḥ sabardughāḥ śaśayā apradugdhāḥ /
analyzed: ā dhenavaḥ dhunayantām aśiśvīḥ sabardughāḥ śaśayāḥ a pradugdhāḥ

original: RV_3,055.16c navyā-navyā yuvatayo bhavantīr mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: navyā anavyāḥ yuvatayaḥ bhavantīḥ mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.17a yad anyāsu vṛṣabho roravīti so anyasmin yūthe ni dadhāti retaḥ /
analyzed: yat anyāsu vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti saḥ anyasmin yūthe ni dadhāti retaḥ

original: RV_3,055.17c sa hi kṣapāvān sa bhagaḥ sa rājā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: sa hi kṣapāvān sa bhagaḥ sa rājā mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.18a vīrasya nu svaśvyaṃ janāsaḥ pra nu vocāma vidur asya devāḥ /
analyzed: vīrasya nu su aśvyam janāsaḥ pra nu vocāma viduḥ asya devāḥ

original: RV_3,055.18c ṣoḷhā yuktāḥ pañca-pañcā vahanti mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: ṣoḍhā yuktāḥ pañca pañcā vahanti mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.19a devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ pupoṣa prajāḥ purudhā jajāna /
analyzed: devaḥ tvaṣṭā savitā viśva rūpaḥ pupoṣa prajāḥ purudhā jajāna

original: RV_3,055.19c imā ca viśvā bhuvanāny asya mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni asya mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.20a mahī sam airac camvā samīcī ubhe te asya vasunā nyṛṣṭe /
analyzed: mahī sam airat camvā samīcī ubhe te asya vasunā nyṛṣṭe

original: RV_3,055.20c śṛṇve vīro vindamāno vasūni mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: śṛṇve vīraḥ vindamānaḥ vasūni mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.21a imāṃ ca naḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upa kṣeti hitamitro na rājā /
analyzed: imām ca naḥ pṛthivīm viśva dhāyai upa kṣeti hita mitraḥ na rājā

original: RV_3,055.21c puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: puraḥsadaḥ śarma sadaḥ na vīrāḥ mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,055.22a niṣṣidhvarīs ta oṣadhīr utāpo rayiṃ ta indra pṛthivī bibharti /
analyzed: niṣṣidhvarīḥ te oṣadhīḥ uta apaḥ rayim te indra pṛthivī bibharti

original: RV_3,055.22c sakhāyas te vāmabhājaḥ syāma mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ te vāma bhājaḥ syāma mahat devānām asura tvam ekam

original: RV_3,056.01a na tā minanti māyino na dhīrā vratā devānām prathamā dhruvāṇi /
analyzed: na tā minanti māyinaḥ na dhīrāḥ vratā devānām prathamā dhruvāṇi

original: RV_3,056.01c na rodasī adruhā vedyābhir na parvatā niname tasthivāṃsaḥ //
analyzed: na rodasī adruhā vedyābhiḥ na parvatāḥ niname tasthivāṃsaḥ

original: RV_3,056.02a ṣaḍ bhārāṃ eko acaran bibharty ṛtaṃ varṣiṣṭham upa gāva āguḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ bhārān ekaḥ a caran bibharti ṛtam varṣiṣṭham upa gāvaḥ āguḥ

original: RV_3,056.02c tisro mahīr uparās tasthur atyā guhā dve nihite darśy ekā //
analyzed: tisraḥ mahīḥ uparāḥ tasthuḥ atyāḥ guhā dve nihite darśi ekā

original: RV_3,056.03a tripājasyo vṛṣabho viśvarūpa uta tryudhā purudha prajāvān /
analyzed: tri pājasyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ viśva rūpaḥ uta tri udhā purudha prajāvān

original: RV_3,056.03c tryanīkaḥ patyate māhināvān sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām //
analyzed: tri anīkaḥ patyate māhināvān sa retaḥ dhāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām

original: RV_3,056.04a abhīka āsām padavīr abodhy ādityānām ahve cāru nāma /
analyzed: abhīke āsām padavīḥ abodhi ādityānām ahve cāru nāma

original: RV_3,056.04c āpaś cid asmā aramanta devīḥ pṛthag vrajantīḥ pari ṣīm avṛñjan //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asmai aramanta devīḥ pṛthak vrajantīḥ pari sīm avṛñjan

original: RV_3,056.05a trī ṣadhasthā sindhavas triḥ kavīnām uta trimātā vidatheṣu samrāṭ /
analyzed: trī sadhasthā sindhavaḥ tris kavīnām uta tri mātā vidatheṣu samrāj

original: RV_3,056.05c ṛtāvarīr yoṣaṇās tisro apyās trir ā divo vidathe patyamānāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtāvarīḥ yoṣaṇāḥ tisraḥ apyāḥ tris ā divaḥ vidathe patyamānāḥ

original: RV_3,056.06a trir ā divaḥ savitar vāryāṇi dive-diva ā suva trir no ahnaḥ /
analyzed: tris ā divaḥ savitar vāryāṇi dive dive ā suva tris naḥ ahnaḥ

original: RV_3,056.06c tridhātu rāya ā suvā vasūni bhaga trātar dhiṣaṇe sātaye dhāḥ //
analyzed: tri dhātu rāyaḥ ā suva ā vasūni bhaga trātar dhiṣaṇe sātaye dhāḥ

original: RV_3,056.07a trir ā divaḥ savitā soṣavīti rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī /
analyzed: tris ā divaḥ savitā soṣavīti rājānā mitrāvaruṇā su pāṇī

original: RV_3,056.07c āpaś cid asya rodasī cid urvī ratnam bhikṣanta savituḥ savāya //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asya rodasī cit urvī ratnam bhikṣanta savituḥ savāya

original: RV_3,056.08a trir uttamā dūṇaśā rocanāni trayo rājanty asurasya vīrāḥ /
analyzed: tris uttamā dūṇaśā rocanāni trayaḥ rājanti asurasya vīrāḥ

original: RV_3,056.08c ṛtāvāna iṣirā dūḷabhāsas trir ā divo vidathe santu devāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtāvānaḥ iṣirāḥ dūḍabhāsaḥ tris ā divaḥ vidathe santu devāḥ
