original: RV_3,057.01a pra me vivikvāṃ avidan manīṣāṃ dhenuṃ carantīm prayutām agopām /
analyzed: pra me vivikvām avidat manīṣām dhenum carantīm prayutām agopām

original: RV_3,057.01c sadyaś cid yā duduhe bhūri dhāser indras tad agniḥ panitāro asyāḥ //
analyzed: sadyas cit yā duduhe bhūri dhāseḥ indraḥ tat agniḥ panitāraḥ asyāḥ

original: RV_3,057.02a indraḥ su pūṣā vṛṣaṇā suhastā divo na prītāḥ śaśayaṃ duduhre /
analyzed: indraḥ su pūṣā vṛṣaṇā su hastā divaḥ na prītāḥ śaśayam duduhre

original: RV_3,057.02c viśve yad asyāṃ raṇayanta devāḥ pra vo 'tra vasavaḥ sumnam aśyām //
analyzed: viśve yat asyām raṇayanta devāḥ pra vaḥ tra vasavaḥ sumnam aśyām

original: RV_3,057.03a yā jāmayo vṛṣṇa icchanti śaktiṃ namasyantīr jānate garbham asmin /
analyzed: yāḥ jāmayaḥ vṛṣṇe icchanti śaktim namasyantīḥ jānate garbham asmin

original: RV_3,057.03c acchā putraṃ dhenavo vāvaśānā mahaś caranti bibhrataṃ vapūṃṣi //
analyzed: acchā putram dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ mahaḥ caranti bibhratam vapūṃṣi

original: RV_3,057.04a acchā vivakmi rodasī sumeke grāvṇo yujāno adhvare manīṣā /
analyzed: acchā vivakmi rodasī sumeke grāvṇaḥ yujānaḥ adhvare manīṣā

original: RV_3,057.04c imā u te manave bhūrivārā ūrdhvā bhavanti darśatā yajatrāḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ u te manave bhūri vārāḥ ūrdhvāḥ bhavanti darśatāḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_3,057.05a yā te jihvā madhumatī sumedhā agne deveṣūcyata urūcī /
analyzed: yā te jihvā madhumatī sumedhāḥ agne deveṣu ucyate urūcī

original: RV_3,057.05c tayeha viśvāṃ avase yajatrān ā sādaya pāyayā cā madhūni //
analyzed: tayā iha viśvān avase yajatrān ā sādaya pāyaya cā madhūni

original: RV_3,057.06a yā te agne parvatasyeva dhārāsaścantī pīpayad deva citrā /
analyzed: yā te agne parvatasya iva dhārāḥ aścantī pīpayat deva citrā

original: RV_3,057.06c tām asmabhyam pramatiṃ jātavedo vaso rāsva sumatiṃ viśvajanyām //
analyzed: tām asmabhyam pramatim jātavedaḥ vaso rāsva sumatim viśvajanyām

original: RV_3,058.01a dhenuḥ pratnasya kāmyaṃ duhānāntaḥ putraś carati dakṣiṇāyāḥ /
analyzed: dhenuḥ pratnasya kāmyam duhānā antar putraḥ carati dakṣiṇāyāḥ

original: RV_3,058.01c ā dyotaniṃ vahati śubhrayāmoṣasa stomo aśvināv ajīgaḥ //
analyzed: ā dyotanim vahati śubhra yāmā uṣasaḥ stomaḥ aśvinau ajīgaḥ

original: RV_3,058.02a suyug vahanti prati vām ṛtenordhvā bhavanti pitareva medhāḥ /
analyzed: su yuj vahanti prati vām ṛtena ūrdhvāḥ bhavanti pitarā iva medhāḥ

original: RV_3,058.02c jarethām asmad vi paṇer manīṣāṃ yuvor avaś cakṛmā yātam arvāk //
analyzed: jarethām asmat vi paṇeḥ manīṣām yuvoḥ avaḥ cakṛma yātam arvāk

original: RV_3,058.03a suyugbhir aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena dasrāv imaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokam adreḥ /
analyzed: su yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena dasrau imam śṛṇutam ślokam adreḥ

original: RV_3,058.03c kim aṅga vām praty avartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhur viprāso aśvinā purājāḥ //
analyzed: kim aṅga vām prati avartim gamiṣṭhā āhuḥ viprāsaḥ aśvinā purājāḥ

original: RV_3,058.04a ā manyethām ā gataṃ kac cid evair viśve janāso aśvinā havante /
analyzed: ā manyethām ā gatam kad cit evaiḥ viśve janāsaḥ aśvinā havante

original: RV_3,058.04c imā hi vāṃ goṛjīkā madhūni pra mitrāso na dadur usro agre //
analyzed: imā hi vām goṛjīkāḥ madhūni pra mitrāsaḥ na daduḥ usraḥ agre

original: RV_3,058.05a tiraḥ purū cid aśvinā rajāṃsy āṅgūṣo vām maghavānā janeṣu /
analyzed: tiras purū cit aśvinā rajāṃsi āṅgūṣaḥ vām maghavānā janeṣu

original: RV_3,058.05c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair dasrāv ime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām //
analyzed: ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ dasrau ime vām nidhayaḥ madhūnām

original: RV_3,058.06a purāṇam okaḥ sakhyaṃ śivaṃ vāṃ yuvor narā draviṇaṃ jahnāvyām /
analyzed: purāṇam okaḥ sakhyam śivam vām yuvoḥ narā draviṇam jahnāvyām

original: RV_3,058.06c punaḥ kṛṇvānāḥ sakhyā śivāni madhvā madema saha nū samānāḥ //
analyzed: punar kṛṇvānāḥ sakhyā śivāni madhvā madema saha nu samānāḥ

original: RV_3,058.07a aśvinā vāyunā yuvaṃ sudakṣā niyudbhiṣ ca sajoṣasā yuvānā /
analyzed: aśvinā vāyunā yuvam su dakṣā niyudbhiḥ ca sajoṣasā yuvānā

original: RV_3,058.07c nāsatyā tiroahnyaṃ juṣāṇā somam pibatam asridhā sudānū //
analyzed: nāsatyā tiroahnyam juṣāṇā somam pibatam asridhā sudānū

original: RV_3,058.08a aśvinā pari vām iṣaḥ purūcīr īyur gīrbhir yatamānā amṛdhrāḥ /
analyzed: aśvinā pari vām iṣaḥ purūcīḥ īyuḥ gīrbhiḥ yatamānāḥ amṛdhrāḥ

original: RV_3,058.08c ratho ha vām ṛtajā adrijūtaḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yāti sadyaḥ //
analyzed: rathaḥ ha vām ṛta jāḥ adri jūtaḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yāti sadyas

original: RV_3,058.09a aśvinā madhuṣuttamo yuvākuḥ somas tam pātam ā gataṃ duroṇe /
analyzed: aśvinā madhuṣuttamaḥ yuvākuḥ somaḥ tam pātam ā gatam duroṇe

original: RV_3,058.09c ratho ha vām bhūri varpaḥ karikrat sutāvato niṣkṛtam āgamiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: rathaḥ ha vām bhūri varpaḥ karikrat sutāvataḥ niṣkṛtam āgamiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_3,059.01a mitro janān yātayati bruvāṇo mitro dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām /
analyzed: mitraḥ janān yātayati bruvāṇaḥ mitraḥ dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_3,059.01c mitraḥ kṛṣṭīr animiṣābhi caṣṭe mitrāya havyaṃ ghṛtavaj juhota //
analyzed: mitraḥ kṛṣṭīḥ animiṣa abhi caṣṭe mitrāya havyam ghṛtavat juhota

original: RV_3,059.02a pra sa mitra marto astu prayasvān yas ta āditya śikṣati vratena /
analyzed: pra sa mitra martaḥ astu prayasvān yaḥ te āditya śikṣati vratena

original: RV_3,059.02c na hanyate na jīyate tvoto nainam aṃho aśnoty antito na dūrāt //
analyzed: na hanyate na jīyate tvotaḥ na enam aṃhaḥ aśnoti antitas na dūrāt

original: RV_3,059.03a anamīvāsa iḷayā madanto mitajñavo varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: anamīvāsaḥ iḷayā madantaḥ mitajñavaḥ variman ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_3,059.03c ādityasya vratam upakṣiyanto vayam mitrasya sumatau syāma //
analyzed: ādityasya vratam upakṣiyantaḥ vayam mitrasya sumatau syāma

original: RV_3,059.04a ayam mitro namasyaḥ suśevo rājā sukṣatro ajaniṣṭa vedhāḥ /
analyzed: ayam mitraḥ namasyaḥ su śevaḥ rājā su kṣatraḥ ajaniṣṭa vedhāḥ

original: RV_3,059.04c tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_3,059.05a mahāṃ ādityo namasopasadyo yātayajjano gṛṇate suśevaḥ /
analyzed: mahān ādityaḥ namasā upasadyaḥ yātayat janaḥ gṛṇate su śevaḥ

original: RV_3,059.05c tasmā etat panyatamāya juṣṭam agnau mitrāya havir ā juhota //
analyzed: tasmai etat panyatamāya juṣṭam agnau mitrāya haviḥ ā juhota

original: RV_3,059.06a mitrasya carṣaṇīdhṛto 'vo devasya sānasi /
analyzed: mitrasya carṣaṇī dhṛtaḥ vaḥ devasya sānasi

original: RV_3,059.06c dyumnaṃ citraśravastamam //
analyzed: dyumnam citraśravastamam

original: RV_3,059.07a abhi yo mahinā divam mitro babhūva saprathāḥ /
analyzed: abhi yaḥ mahinā divam mitraḥ babhūva saprathāḥ

original: RV_3,059.07c abhi śravobhiḥ pṛthivīm //
analyzed: abhi śravobhiḥ pṛthivīm

original: RV_3,059.08a mitrāya pañca yemire janā abhiṣṭiśavase /
analyzed: mitrāya pañca yemire janāḥ abhiṣṭi śavase

original: RV_3,059.08c sa devān viśvān bibharti //
analyzed: sa devān viśvān bibharti

original: RV_3,059.09a mitro deveṣv āyuṣu janāya vṛktabarhiṣe /
analyzed: mitraḥ deveṣu āyuṣu janāya vṛkta barhiṣe

original: RV_3,059.09c iṣa iṣṭavratā akaḥ //
analyzed: iṣaḥ iṣṭa vratāḥ akaḥ

original: RV_3,060.01a iheha vo manasā bandhutā nara uśijo jagmur abhi tāni vedasā /
analyzed: iha iha vaḥ manasā bandhu tā naraḥ uśijaḥ jagmuḥ abhi tāni vedasā

original: RV_3,060.01c yābhir māyābhiḥ pratijūtivarpasaḥ saudhanvanā yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśa //
analyzed: yābhiḥ māyābhiḥ pratijūti varpasaḥ saudhanvanāḥ yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśa

original: RV_3,060.02a yābhiḥ śacībhiś camasāṃ apiṃśata yayā dhiyā gām ariṇīta carmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ śacībhiḥ camasān apiṃśata yayā dhiyā gām ariṇīta carmaṇaḥ

original: RV_3,060.02c yena harī manasā niratakṣata tena devatvam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśa //
analyzed: yena harī manasā niratakṣata tena deva tvam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśa

original: RV_3,060.03a indrasya sakhyam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśur manor napāto apaso dadhanvire /
analyzed: indrasya sakhyam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśuḥ manoḥ napātaḥ apasaḥ dadhanvire

original: RV_3,060.03c saudhanvanāso amṛtatvam erire viṣṭvī śamībhiḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā //
analyzed: saudhanvanāsaḥ amṛta tvam erire viṣṭvī śamībhiḥ su kṛtaḥ su kṛtyayā

original: RV_3,060.04a indreṇa yātha sarathaṃ sute sacāṃ atho vaśānām bhavathā saha śriyā /
analyzed: indreṇa yātha sa ratham sute sacā am atha u vaśānām bhavathā saha śriyā

original: RV_3,060.04c na vaḥ pratimai sukṛtāni vāghataḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo vīryāṇi ca //
analyzed: na vaḥ pratimai su kṛtāni vāghataḥ saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ vīryāṇi ca

original: RV_3,060.05a indra ṛbhubhir vājavadbhiḥ samukṣitaṃ sutaṃ somam ā vṛṣasvā gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: indra ṛbhubhiḥ vājavadbhiḥ samukṣitam sutam somam ā vṛṣasva gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_3,060.05c dhiyeṣito maghavan dāśuṣo gṛhe saudhanvanebhiḥ saha matsvā nṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: dhiyā iṣitaḥ maghavan dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe saudhanvanebhiḥ saha matsva nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_3,060.06a indra ṛbhumān vājavān matsveha no 'smin savane śacyā puruṣṭuta /
analyzed: indra ṛbhumān vājavān matsva iha naḥ smin savane śacyā puruṣṭuta

original: RV_3,060.06c imāni tubhyaṃ svasarāṇi yemire vratā devānām manuṣaś ca dharmabhiḥ //
analyzed: imāni tubhyam svasarāṇi yemire vratā devānām manuṣaḥ ca dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_3,060.07a indra ṛbhubhir vājibhir vājayann iha stomaṃ jaritur upa yāhi yajñiyam /
analyzed: indra ṛbhubhiḥ vājibhiḥ vājayan iha stomam jarituḥ upa yāhi yajñiyam

original: RV_3,060.07c śataṃ ketebhir iṣirebhir āyave sahasraṇītho adhvarasya homani //
analyzed: śatam ketebhiḥ iṣirebhiḥ āyave sahasraṇīthaḥ adhvarasya homani

original: RV_3,061.01a uṣo vājena vājini pracetā stomaṃ juṣasva gṛṇato maghoni /
analyzed: uṣaḥ vājena vājini pracetāḥ stomam juṣasva gṛṇataḥ maghoni

original: RV_3,061.01c purāṇī devi yuvatiḥ purandhir anu vrataṃ carasi viśvavāre //
analyzed: purāṇī devi yuvatiḥ purandhiḥ anu vratam carasi viśva vāre

original: RV_3,061.02a uṣo devy amartyā vi bhāhi candrarathā sūnṛtā īrayantī /
analyzed: uṣaḥ devī amartyā vi bhāhi candra rathā sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī

original: RV_3,061.02c ā tvā vahantu suyamāso aśvā hiraṇyavarṇām pṛthupājaso ye //
analyzed: ā tvā vahantu su yamāsaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇya varṇām pṛthu pājasaḥ ye

original: RV_3,061.03a uṣaḥ pratīcī bhuvanāni viśvordhvā tiṣṭhasy amṛtasya ketuḥ /
analyzed: uṣaḥ pratīcī bhuvanāni viśvā ūrdhvā tiṣṭhasi amṛtasya ketuḥ

original: RV_3,061.03c samānam arthaṃ caraṇīyamānā cakram iva navyasy ā vavṛtsva //
analyzed: samānam artham caraṇīyamānā cakram iva navyasī ā vavṛtsva

original: RV_3,061.04a ava syūmeva cinvatī maghony uṣā yāti svasarasya patnī /
analyzed: ava syūma iva cinvatī maghonī uṣāḥ yāti svasarasya patnī

original: RV_3,061.04c svar janantī subhagā sudaṃsā āntād divaḥ papratha ā pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: svar janantī subhagā su daṃsāḥ ā antāt divaḥ paprathe ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_3,061.05a acchā vo devīm uṣasaṃ vibhātīm pra vo bharadhvaṃ namasā suvṛktim /
analyzed: acchā vaḥ devīm uṣasam vibhātīm pra vaḥ bharadhvam namasā suvṛktim

original: RV_3,061.05c ūrdhvam madhudhā divi pājo aśret pra rocanā ruruce raṇvasaṃdṛk //
analyzed: ūrdhvam madhu dhāḥ divi pājaḥ aśret pra rocanā ruruce raṇva saṃdṛś

original: RV_3,061.06a ṛtāvarī divo arkair abodhy ā revatī rodasī citram asthāt /
analyzed: ṛtāvarī divaḥ arkaiḥ abodhi ā revatī rodasī citram asthāt

original: RV_3,061.06c āyatīm agna uṣasaṃ vibhātīṃ vāmam eṣi draviṇam bhikṣamāṇaḥ //
analyzed: āyatīm agne uṣasam vibhātīm vāmam eṣi draviṇam bhikṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_3,061.07a ṛtasya budhna uṣasām iṣaṇyan vṛṣā mahī rodasī ā viveśa /
analyzed: ṛtasya budhne uṣasām iṣaṇyan vṛṣā mahī rodasī ā viveśa

original: RV_3,061.07c mahī mitrasya varuṇasya māyā candreva bhānuṃ vi dadhe purutrā //
analyzed: mahī mitrasya varuṇasya māyā candrā iva bhānum vi dadhe purutrā

original: RV_3,062.01a imā u vām bhṛmayo manyamānā yuvāvate na tujyā abhūvan /
analyzed: imāḥ u vām bhṛmayaḥ manyamānāḥ yuvāvate na tujyāḥ abhūvan

original: RV_3,062.01c kva tyad indrāvaruṇā yaśo vāṃ yena smā sinam bharathaḥ sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: kva tyad indrāvaruṇāḥ yaśaḥ vām yena smā sinam bharathaḥ sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_3,062.02a ayam u vām purutamo rayīyañ chaśvattamam avase johavīti /
analyzed: ayam u vām purutamaḥ rayīyam śaśvattamam avase johavīti

original: RV_3,062.02c sajoṣāv indrāvaruṇā marudbhir divā pṛthivyā śṛṇutaṃ havam me //
analyzed: sajoṣau indrāvaruṇāḥ marudbhiḥ divā pṛthivyā śṛṇutam havam me

original: RV_3,062.03a asme tad indrāvaruṇā vasu ṣyād asme rayir marutaḥ sarvavīraḥ /
analyzed: asme tat indrāvaruṇāḥ vasu syāt asme rayiḥ marutaḥ sarva vīraḥ

original: RV_3,062.03c asmān varūtrīḥ śaraṇair avantv asmān hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇābhiḥ //
analyzed: asmān varūtrīḥ śaraṇaiḥ avantu asmān hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇābhiḥ

original: RV_3,062.04a bṛhaspate juṣasva no havyāni viśvadevya /
analyzed: bṛhaspate juṣasva naḥ havyāni viśvadevya

original: RV_3,062.04c rāsva ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: rāsva ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_3,062.05a śucim arkair bṛhaspatim adhvareṣu namasyata /
analyzed: śucim arkaiḥ bṛhaspatim adhvareṣu namasyata

original: RV_3,062.05c anāmy oja ā cake //
analyzed: anāmi ojaḥ ā cake

original: RV_3,062.06a vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ viśvarūpam adābhyam /
analyzed: vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām viśva rūpam adābhyam

original: RV_3,062.06c bṛhaspatiṃ vareṇyam //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vareṇyam

original: RV_3,062.07a iyaṃ te pūṣann āghṛṇe suṣṭutir deva navyasī /
analyzed: iyam te pūṣan āghṛṇe suṣṭutiḥ deva navyasī

original: RV_3,062.07c asmābhis tubhyaṃ śasyate //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tubhyam śasyate

original: RV_3,062.08a tāṃ juṣasva giram mama vājayantīm avā dhiyam /
analyzed: tām juṣasva giram mama vājayantīm avā dhiyam

original: RV_3,062.08c vadhūyur iva yoṣaṇām //
analyzed: vadhūyuḥ iva yoṣaṇām

original: RV_3,062.09a yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati bhuvanā sam ca paśyati

original: RV_3,062.09c sa naḥ pūṣāvitā bhuvat //
analyzed: sa naḥ pūṣā avitā bhuvat

original: RV_3,062.10a tat savitur vareṇyam bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
analyzed: tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi

original: RV_3,062.10c dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt //
analyzed: dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayāt

original: RV_3,062.11a devasya savitur vayaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhyā /
analyzed: devasya savituḥ vayam vājayantaḥ purandhyā

original: RV_3,062.11c bhagasya rātim īmahe //
analyzed: bhagasya rātim īmahe

original: RV_3,062.12a devaṃ naraḥ savitāraṃ viprā yajñaiḥ suvṛktibhiḥ /
analyzed: devam naraḥ savitāram viprāḥ yajñaiḥ suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_3,062.12c namasyanti dhiyeṣitāḥ //
analyzed: namasyanti dhiyā iṣitāḥ

original: RV_3,062.13a somo jigāti gātuvid devānām eti niṣkṛtam /
analyzed: somaḥ jigāti gātu vid devānām eti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_3,062.13c ṛtasya yonim āsadam //
analyzed: ṛtasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_3,062.14a somo asmabhyaṃ dvipade catuṣpade ca paśave /
analyzed: somaḥ asmabhyam dvipade catuṣpade ca paśave

original: RV_3,062.14c anamīvā iṣas karat //
analyzed: anamīvāḥ iṣas karat

original: RV_3,062.15a asmākam āyur vardhayann abhimātīḥ sahamānaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam āyuḥ vardhayan abhimātīḥ sahamānaḥ

original: RV_3,062.15c somaḥ sadhastham āsadat //
analyzed: somaḥ sadhastham āsadat

original: RV_3,062.16a ā no mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam /
analyzed: ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam

original: RV_3,062.16c madhvā rajāṃsi sukratū //
analyzed: madhvā rajāṃsi su kratū

original: RV_3,062.17a uruśaṃsā namovṛdhā mahnā dakṣasya rājathaḥ /
analyzed: uru śaṃsā namaḥ vṛdhā mahnā dakṣasya rājathaḥ

original: RV_3,062.17c drāghiṣṭhābhiḥ śucivratā //
analyzed: drāghiṣṭhābhiḥ śuci vratā

original: RV_3,062.18a gṛṇānā jamadagninā yonāv ṛtasya sīdatam /
analyzed: gṛṇānā jamadagninā yonau ṛtasya sīdatam

original: RV_3,062.18c pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
analyzed: pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: Ṛgveda 4
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_4,001.01a tvāṃ hy agne sadam it samanyavo devāso devam aratiṃ nyerira iti kratvā nyerire /
analyzed: tvām hi agne sadam id samanyavaḥ devāsaḥ devam aratim nyerire iti kratvā nyerire

original: RV_4,001.01c amartyaṃ yajata martyeṣv ā devam ādevaṃ janata pracetasaṃ viśvam ādevaṃ janata pracetasam //
analyzed: amartyam yajata martyeṣu ā devam ā devam janata pracetasam viśvam ā devam janata pracetasam

original: RV_4,001.02a sa bhrātaraṃ varuṇam agna ā vavṛtsva devāṃ acchā sumatī yajñavanasaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ yajñavanasam /
analyzed: sa bhrātaram varuṇam agne ā vavṛtsva devān acchā sumatī yajña vanasam jyeṣṭham yajña vanasam

original: RV_4,001.02c ṛtāvānam ādityaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtaṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtam //
analyzed: ṛtāvānam ādityam carṣaṇī dhṛtam rājānam carṣaṇī dhṛtam

original: RV_4,001.03a sakhe sakhāyam abhy ā vavṛtsvāśuṃ na cakraṃ rathyeva raṃhyāsmabhyaṃ dasma raṃhyā /
analyzed: sakhe sakhāyam abhī ā vavṛtsva āśum na cakram rathyā iva raṃhyā asmabhyam dasma raṃhyā

original: RV_4,001.03c agne mṛḷīkaṃ varuṇe sacā vido marutsu viśvabhānuṣu /
analyzed: agne mṛḷīkam varuṇe sacā vidaḥ marutsu viśva bhānuṣu

original: RV_4,001.03d tokāya tuje śuśucāna śaṃ kṛdhy asmabhyaṃ dasma śaṃ kṛdhi //
analyzed: tokāya tuje śuśucāna śam kṛdhi asmabhyam dasma śam kṛdhi

original: RV_4,001.04a tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḷo 'va yāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍaḥ vaḥ yāsisīṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_4,001.04c yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pra mumugdhy asmat //
analyzed: yajiṣṭhaḥ vahnitamaḥ śośucānaḥ viśvā dveṣāṃsi pra mumugdhi asmat

original: RV_4,001.05a sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ agne vamaḥ bhava ūtī nediṣṭhaḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_4,001.05c ava yakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḷīkaṃ suhavo na edhi //
analyzed: ava yakṣva naḥ varuṇam rarāṇaḥ vīhi mṛḷīkam su havaḥ naḥ edhi

original: RV_4,001.06a asya śreṣṭhā subhagasya saṃdṛg devasya citratamā martyeṣu /
analyzed: asya śreṣṭhā subhagasya saṃdṛś devasya citratamā martyeṣu

original: RV_4,001.06c śuci ghṛtaṃ na taptam aghnyāyā spārhā devasya maṃhaneva dhenoḥ //
analyzed: śuci ghṛtam na taptam aghnyāyāḥ spārhā devasya maṃhanā iva dhenoḥ

original: RV_4,001.07a trir asya tā paramā santi satyā spārhā devasya janimāny agneḥ /
analyzed: tris asya tā paramā santi satyā spārhā devasya janimāni agneḥ

original: RV_4,001.07c anante antaḥ parivīta āgāc chuciḥ śukro aryo rorucānaḥ //
analyzed: anante antar parivītaḥ āgāt śuciḥ śukraḥ aryaḥ rorucānaḥ

original: RV_4,001.08a sa dūto viśved abhi vaṣṭi sadmā hotā hiraṇyaratho raṃsujihvaḥ /
analyzed: sa dūtaḥ viśvā id abhi vaṣṭi sadmā hotā hiraṇya rathaḥ raṃsu jihvaḥ

original: RV_4,001.08c rohidaśvo vapuṣyo vibhāvā sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatīva saṃsat //
analyzed: rohit aśvaḥ vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatī iva saṃsad

original: RV_4,001.09a sa cetayan manuṣo yajñabandhuḥ pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti /
analyzed: sa cetayat manuṣaḥ yajña bandhuḥ pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti

original: RV_4,001.09c sa kṣety asya duryāsu sādhan devo martasya sadhanitvam āpa //
analyzed: sa kṣeti asya duryāsu sādhan devaḥ martasya sa dhani tvam āpa

original: RV_4,001.10a sa tū no agnir nayatu prajānann acchā ratnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yad asya /
analyzed: sa tu naḥ agniḥ nayatu prajānan acchā ratnam deva bhaktam yat asya

original: RV_4,001.10c dhiyā yad viśve amṛtā akṛṇvan dyauṣ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan //
analyzed: dhiyā yat viśve amṛtāḥ akṛṇvan dyauḥ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan

original: RV_4,001.11a sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu maho budhne rajaso asya yonau /
analyzed: sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu mahaḥ budhne rajasaḥ asya yonau

original: RV_4,001.11b apād aśīrṣā guhamāno antāyoyuvāno vṛṣabhasya nīḷe //
analyzed: a pāt a śīrṣā guhamānaḥ anta ayoyuvānaḥ vṛṣabhasya nīḍe

original: RV_4,001.12a pra śardha ārta prathamaṃ vipanyāṃ ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīḷe /
analyzed: pra śardhaḥ ārta prathamam vipanyām ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīḍe

original: RV_4,001.12c spārho yuvā vapuṣyo vibhāvā sapta priyāso 'janayanta vṛṣṇe //
analyzed: spārhaḥ yuvā vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā sapta priyāsaḥ janayanta vṛṣṇe

original: RV_4,001.13a asmākam atra pitaro manuṣyā abhi pra sedur ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ /
analyzed: asmākam atra pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ abhi pra seduḥ ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_4,001.13c aśmavrajāḥ sudughā vavre antar ud usrā ājann uṣaso huvānāḥ //
analyzed: aśma vrajāḥ sudughāḥ vavre antar ud usrāḥ ājan uṣasaḥ huvānāḥ

original: RV_4,001.14a te marmṛjata dadṛvāṃso adriṃ tad eṣām anye abhito vi vocan /
analyzed: te marmṛjata dadṛvāṃsaḥ adrim tat eṣām anye abhitas vi vocan

original: RV_4,001.14c paśvayantrāso abhi kāram arcan vidanta jyotiś cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ //
analyzed: paśu ayantrāsaḥ abhi kāram arcan vidanta jyotiḥ cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ

original: RV_4,001.15a te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdhaṃ gā yemānam pari ṣantam adrim /
analyzed: te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdham gāḥ yemānam pari santam adrim

original: RV_4,001.15c dṛḷhaṃ naro vacasā daivyena vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ //
analyzed: dṛḍham naraḥ vacasā daivyena vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ

original: RV_4,001.16a te manvata prathamaṃ nāma dhenos triḥ sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi vindan /
analyzed: te manvata prathamam nāma dhenoḥ tris sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi vindan

original: RV_4,001.16c taj jānatīr abhy anūṣata vrā āvir bhuvad aruṇīr yaśasā goḥ //
analyzed: tat jānatīḥ abhī anūṣata vrāḥ āvis bhuvat aruṇīḥ yaśasā goḥ

original: RV_4,001.17a neśat tamo dudhitaṃ rocata dyaur ud devyā uṣaso bhānur arta /
analyzed: neśat tamaḥ dudhitam rocata dyauḥ ud devyāḥ uṣasaḥ bhānuḥ arta

original: RV_4,001.17c ā sūryo bṛhatas tiṣṭhad ajrāṃ ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan //
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ bṛhataḥ tiṣṭhat ajrān ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan

original: RV_4,001.18a ād it paścā bubudhānā vy akhyann ād id ratnaṃ dhārayanta dyubhaktam /
analyzed: āt id paścā bubudhānāḥ vi akhyan āt id ratnam dhārayanta dyu bhaktam

original: RV_4,001.18c viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devā mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu //
analyzed: viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devāḥ mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu

original: RV_4,001.19a acchā voceya śuśucānam agniṃ hotāraṃ viśvabharasaṃ yajiṣṭham /
analyzed: acchā voceya śuśucānam agnim hotāram viśva bharasam yajiṣṭham

original: RV_4,001.19c śucy ūdho atṛṇan na gavām andho na pūtam pariṣiktam aṃśoḥ //
analyzed: śuci ūdhaḥ atṛṇat na gavām andhaḥ na pūtam pariṣiktam aṃśoḥ

original: RV_4,001.20a viśveṣām aditir yajñiyānāṃ viśveṣām atithir mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: viśveṣām aditiḥ yajñiyānām viśveṣām atithiḥ mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_4,001.20c agnir devānām ava āvṛṇānaḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ devānām avaḥ āvṛṇānaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ bhavatu jātavedāḥ

original: RV_4,002.01a yo martyeṣv amṛta ṛtāvā devo deveṣv aratir nidhāyi /
analyzed: yaḥ martyeṣu amṛtaḥ ṛtāvā devaḥ deveṣu aratiḥ nidhāyi

original: RV_4,002.01c hotā yajiṣṭho mahnā śucadhyai havyair agnir manuṣa īrayadhyai //
analyzed: hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ mahnā śucadhyai havyaiḥ agniḥ manuṣaḥ īrayadhyai

original: RV_4,002.02a iha tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adya jāto jātāṃ ubhayāṃ antar agne /
analyzed: iha tvam sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya jātaḥ jātām ubhayān antar agne

original: RV_4,002.02c dūta īyase yuyujāna ṛṣva ṛjumuṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrāṃś ca //
analyzed: dūtaḥ īyase yuyujānaḥ ṛṣvaḥ ṛju muṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrān ca

original: RV_4,002.03a atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣṭhā /
analyzed: atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣṭhā

original: RV_4,002.03c antar īyase aruṣā yujāno yuṣmāṃś ca devān viśa ā ca martān //
analyzed: antar īyase aruṣā yujānaḥ yuṣmān ca devān viśaḥ ā ca martān

original: RV_4,002.04a aryamaṇaṃ varuṇam mitram eṣām indrāviṣṇū maruto aśvinota /
analyzed: aryamaṇam varuṇam mitram eṣām indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ aśvinā uta

original: RV_4,002.04c svaśvo agne surathaḥ surādhā ed u vaha suhaviṣe janāya //
analyzed: su aśvaḥ agne su rathaḥ su rādhāḥ ā id u vaha su haviṣe janāya

original: RV_4,002.05a gomāṃ agne 'vimāṃ aśvī yajño nṛvatsakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ /
analyzed: gomān agne vimān aśvī yajñaḥ nṛvat sakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ

original: RV_4,002.05c iḷāvāṃ eṣo asura prajāvān dīrgho rayiḥ pṛthubudhnaḥ sabhāvān //
analyzed: iḷāvān eṣaḥ asura prajāvān dīrghaḥ rayiḥ pṛthu budhnaḥ sabhāvān

original: RV_4,002.06a yas ta idhmaṃ jabharat siṣvidāno mūrdhānaṃ vā tatapate tvāyā /
analyzed: yaḥ te idhmam jabharat siṣvidānaḥ mūrdhānam vā tatapate tvāyā

original: RV_4,002.06c bhuvas tasya svatavāṃḥ pāyur agne viśvasmāt sīm aghāyata uruṣya //
analyzed: bhuvaḥ tasya svatavān pāyuḥ agne viśvasmāt sīm aghāyataḥ uruṣya

original: RV_4,002.07a yas te bharād anniyate cid annaṃ niśiṣan mandram atithim udīrat /
analyzed: yaḥ te bharāt anniyate cit annam niśiṣat mandram atithim udīrat

original: RV_4,002.07c ā devayur inadhate duroṇe tasmin rayir dhruvo astu dāsvān //
analyzed: ā devayuḥ inadhate duroṇe tasmin rayiḥ dhruvaḥ astu dāsvān

original: RV_4,002.08a yas tvā doṣā ya uṣasi praśaṃsāt priyaṃ vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā doṣā yaḥ uṣasi praśaṃsāt priyam vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān

original: RV_4,002.08c aśvo na sve dama ā hemyāvān tam aṃhasaḥ pīparo dāśvāṃsam //
analyzed: aśvaḥ na sve dame ā hemyāvān tam aṃhasaḥ pīparaḥ dāśvāṃsam

original: RV_4,002.09a yas tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśad duvas tve kṛṇavate yatasruk /
analyzed: yaḥ tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśat duvaḥ tve kṛṇavate yata sruc

original: RV_4,002.09c na sa rāyā śaśamāno vi yoṣan nainam aṃhaḥ pari varad aghāyoḥ //
analyzed: na sa rāyā śaśamānaḥ vi yoṣat na enam aṃhaḥ pari varat aghāyoḥ

original: RV_4,002.10a yasya tvam agne adhvaraṃ jujoṣo devo martasya sudhitaṃ rarāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tvam agne adhvaram jujoṣaḥ devaḥ martasya sudhitam rarāṇaḥ

original: RV_4,002.10c prīted asad dhotrā sā yaviṣṭhāsāma yasya vidhato vṛdhāsaḥ //
analyzed: prītā id asat hotrā sā yaviṣṭhā āsāma yasya vidhataḥ vṛdhāsaḥ

original: RV_4,002.11a cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān pṛṣṭheva vītā vṛjinā ca martān /
analyzed: cittim acittim cinavat vi vidvān pṛṣṭhā iva vītā vṛjinā ca martān

original: RV_4,002.11c rāye ca naḥ svapatyāya deva ditiṃ ca rāsvāditim uruṣya //
analyzed: rāye ca naḥ su apatyāya deva ditim ca rāsvā aditim uruṣya

original: RV_4,002.12a kaviṃ śaśāsuḥ kavayo 'dabdhā nidhārayanto duryāsv āyoḥ /
analyzed: kavim śaśāsuḥ kavayaḥ dabdhāḥ nidhārayantaḥ duryāsu āyoḥ

original: RV_4,002.12c atas tvaṃ dṛśyāṃ agna etān paḍbhiḥ paśyer adbhutāṃ arya evaiḥ //
analyzed: atas tvam dṛśyām agne etān paḍbhiḥ paśyeḥ adbhutām aryaḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_4,002.13a tvam agne vāghate supraṇītiḥ sutasomāya vidhate yaviṣṭha /
analyzed: tvam agne vāghate su praṇītiḥ suta somāya vidhate yaviṣṭha

original: RV_4,002.13c ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇiprāḥ //
analyzed: ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_4,002.14a adhā ha yad vayam agne tvāyā paḍbhir hastebhiś cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ /
analyzed: adhā ha yat vayam agne tvāyā paḍbhiḥ hastebhiḥ cakṛma tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_4,002.14c rathaṃ na kranto apasā bhurijor ṛtaṃ yemuḥ sudhya āśuṣāṇāḥ //
analyzed: ratham na krantaḥ apasā bhurijoḥ ṛtam yemuḥ sudhyaḥ āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_4,002.15a adhā mātur uṣasaḥ sapta viprā jāyemahi prathamā vedhaso nṝn /
analyzed: adhā mātuḥ uṣasaḥ sapta viprāḥ jāyemahi prathamāḥ vedhasaḥ nṝn

original: RV_4,002.15c divas putrā aṅgiraso bhavemādriṃ rujema dhaninaṃ śucantaḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ putrāḥ aṅgirasaḥ bhavema adrim rujema dhaninam śucantaḥ

original: RV_4,002.16a adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāso agna ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ /
analyzed: adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāsaḥ agne ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_4,002.16c śucīd ayan dīdhitim ukthaśāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindanto aruṇīr apa vran //
analyzed: śucī id ayan dīdhitim uktha śāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindantaḥ aruṇīḥ apa vran

original: RV_4,002.17a sukarmāṇaḥ suruco devayanto 'yo na devā janimā dhamantaḥ /
analyzed: su karmāṇaḥ su rucaḥ devayantaḥ yaḥ na devāḥ janimā dhamantaḥ

original: RV_4,002.17c śucanto agniṃ vavṛdhanta indram ūrvaṃ gavyam pariṣadanto agman //
analyzed: śucantaḥ agnim vavṛdhantaḥ indram ūrvam gavyam pariṣadantaḥ agman

original: RV_4,002.18a ā yūtheva kṣumati paśvo akhyad devānāṃ yaj janimānty ugra /
analyzed: ā yūthā iva kṣumati paśvaḥ akhyat devānām yat janimānti ugra

original: RV_4,002.18c martānāṃ cid urvaśīr akṛpran vṛdhe cid arya uparasyāyoḥ //
analyzed: martānām cit urvaśīḥ akṛpran vṛdhe cit aryaḥ uparasya āyoḥ

original: RV_4,002.19a akarma te svapaso abhūma ṛtam avasrann uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
analyzed: akarma te su apasaḥ abhūma ṛtam avasran uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_4,002.19c anūnam agnim purudhā suścandraṃ devasya marmṛjataś cāru cakṣuḥ //
analyzed: anūnam agnim purudhā su ścandram devasya marmṛjataḥ cāru cakṣuḥ

original: RV_4,002.20a etā te agna ucathāni vedho 'vocāma kavaye tā juṣasva /
analyzed: etā te agne ucathāni vedhaḥ vocāma kavaye tā juṣasva

original: RV_4,002.20c uc chocasva kṛṇuhi vasyaso no maho rāyaḥ puruvāra pra yandhi //
analyzed: ud śocasva kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ mahaḥ rāyaḥ puru vāra pra yandhi

original: RV_4,003.01a ā vo rājānam adhvarasya rudraṃ hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: ā vaḥ rājānam adhvarasya rudram hotāram satya yajam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_4,003.01c agnim purā tanayitnor acittād dhiraṇyarūpam avase kṛṇudhvam //
analyzed: agnim purā tanayitnoḥ acittāt hiraṇya rūpam avase kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_4,003.02a ayaṃ yoniś cakṛmā yaṃ vayaṃ te jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ /
analyzed: ayam yoniḥ cakṛma yam vayam te jāyā iva patye uśatī su vāsāḥ

original: RV_4,003.02c arvācīnaḥ parivīto ni ṣīdemā u te svapāka pratīcīḥ //
analyzed: arvācīnaḥ parivītaḥ ni sīda imāḥ u te svapāka pratīcīḥ

original: RV_4,003.03a āśṛṇvate adṛpitāya manma nṛcakṣase sumṛḷīkāya vedhaḥ /
analyzed: āśṛṇvate a dṛpitāya manma nṛ cakṣase su mṛḷīkāya vedhaḥ

original: RV_4,003.03c devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṃsa grāveva sotā madhuṣud yam īḷe //
analyzed: devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṃsa grāvā iva sotā madhuṣut yam īḍe

original: RV_4,003.04a tvaṃ cin naḥ śamyā agne asyā ṛtasya bodhy ṛtacit svādhīḥ /
analyzed: tvam cit naḥ śamyāḥ agne asyāḥ ṛtasya bodhi ṛta cit svādhīḥ

original: RV_4,003.04c kadā ta ukthā sadhamādyāni kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te //
analyzed: kadā te ukthā sadhamādyāni kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te

original: RV_4,003.05a kathā ha tad varuṇāya tvam agne kathā dive garhase kan na āgaḥ /
analyzed: kathā ha tat varuṇāya tvam agne kathā dive garhase kad naḥ āgaḥ

original: RV_4,003.05c kathā mitrāya mīḷhuṣe pṛthivyai bravaḥ kad aryamṇe kad bhagāya //
analyzed: kathā mitrāya mīḍhuṣe pṛthivyai bravaḥ kad aryamṇe kad bhagāya

original: RV_4,003.06a kad dhiṣṇyāsu vṛdhasāno agne kad vātāya pratavase śubhaṃye /
analyzed: kad dhiṣṇyāsu vṛdhasānaḥ agne kad vātāya pratavase śubhaṃye

original: RV_4,003.06c parijmane nāsatyāya kṣe bravaḥ kad agne rudrāya nṛghne //
analyzed: parijmane nāsatyāya kṣe bravaḥ kad agne rudrāya nṛ ghne

original: RV_4,003.07a kathā mahe puṣṭimbharāya pūṣṇe kad rudrāya sumakhāya havirde /
analyzed: kathā mahe puṣṭimbharāya pūṣṇe kad rudrāya su makhāya haviḥ de

original: RV_4,003.07c kad viṣṇava urugāyāya reto bravaḥ kad agne śarave bṛhatyai //
analyzed: kad viṣṇave urugāyāya retaḥ bravaḥ kad agne śarave bṛhatyai

original: RV_4,003.08a kathā śardhāya marutām ṛtāya kathā sūre bṛhate pṛcchyamānaḥ /
analyzed: kathā śardhāya marutām ṛtāya kathā sūre bṛhate pṛcchyamānaḥ

original: RV_4,003.08c prati bravo 'ditaye turāya sādhā divo jātavedaś cikitvān //
analyzed: prati bravaḥ ditaye turāya sādhā divaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_4,003.09a ṛtena ṛtaṃ niyatam īḷa ā gor āmā sacā madhumat pakvam agne /
analyzed: ṛtena ṛtam niyatam īḍe ā goḥ āmā sacā madhumat pakvam agne

original: RV_4,003.09c kṛṣṇā satī ruśatā dhāsinaiṣā jāmaryeṇa payasā pīpāya //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā satī ruśatā dhāsinā eṣā jāmaryeṇa payasā pīpāya

original: RV_4,003.10a ṛtena hi ṣmā vṛṣabhaś cid aktaḥ pumāṃ agniḥ payasā pṛṣṭhyena /
analyzed: ṛtena hi sma vṛṣabhaḥ cit aktaḥ pumān agniḥ payasā pṛṣṭhyena

original: RV_4,003.10c aspandamāno acarad vayodhā vṛṣā śukraṃ duduhe pṛśnir ūdhaḥ //
analyzed: a spandamānaḥ acarat vayodhāḥ vṛṣā śukram duduhe pṛśniḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_4,003.11a ṛtenādriṃ vy asan bhidantaḥ sam aṅgiraso navanta gobhiḥ /
analyzed: ṛtena adrim vi asan bhidantaḥ sam aṅgirasaḥ navanta gobhiḥ

original: RV_4,003.11c śunaṃ naraḥ pari ṣadann uṣāsam āviḥ svar abhavaj jāte agnau //
analyzed: śunam naraḥ pari ṣadan uṣāsam āvis svar abhavat jāte agnau

original: RV_4,003.12a ṛtena devīr amṛtā amṛktā arṇobhir āpo madhumadbhir agne /
analyzed: ṛtena devīḥ amṛtāḥ amṛktāḥ arṇobhiḥ āpaḥ madhumadbhiḥ agne

original: RV_4,003.12c vājī na sargeṣu prastubhānaḥ pra sadam it sravitave dadhanyuḥ //
analyzed: vājī na sargeṣu prastubhānaḥ pra sadam id sravitave dadhanyuḥ

original: RV_4,003.13a mā kasya yakṣaṃ sadam id dhuro gā mā veśasya praminato māpeḥ /
analyzed: mā kasya yakṣam sadam id dhuraḥ gāḥ mā veśasya praminataḥ mā āpeḥ

original: RV_4,003.13c mā bhrātur agne anṛjor ṛṇaṃ ver mā sakhyur dakṣaṃ ripor bhujema //
analyzed: mā bhrātuḥ agne anṛjoḥ ṛṇam veḥ mā sakhyuḥ dakṣam ripoḥ bhujema

original: RV_4,003.14a rakṣā ṇo agne tava rakṣaṇebhī rārakṣāṇaḥ sumakha prīṇānaḥ /
analyzed: rakṣa naḥ agne tava rakṣaṇebhiḥ rārakṣāṇaḥ su makha prīṇānaḥ

original: RV_4,003.14c prati ṣphura vi ruja vīḍv aṃho jahi rakṣo mahi cid vāvṛdhānam //
analyzed: prati sphura vi ruja vīḍu aṃhaḥ jahi rakṣaḥ mahi cit vāvṛdhānam

original: RV_4,003.15a ebhir bhava sumanā agne arkair imān spṛśa manmabhiḥ śūra vājān /
analyzed: ebhiḥ bhava sumanāḥ agne arkaiḥ imān spṛśa manmabhiḥ śūra vājān

original: RV_4,003.15c uta brahmāṇy aṅgiro juṣasva saṃ te śastir devavātā jareta //
analyzed: uta brahmāṇi aṅgiraḥ juṣasva sam te śastiḥ deva vātā jareta

original: RV_4,003.16a etā viśvā viduṣe tubhyaṃ vedho nīthāny agne niṇyā vacāṃsi /
analyzed: etā viśvā viduṣe tubhyam vedhaḥ nīthāni agne niṇyā vacāṃsi

original: RV_4,003.16c nivacanā kavaye kāvyāny aśaṃsiṣam matibhir vipra ukthaiḥ //
analyzed: nivacanā kavaye kāvyāni aśaṃsiṣam matibhiḥ vipraḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_4,004.01a kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīṃ yāhi rājevāmavāṃ ibhena /
analyzed: kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitim na pṛthvīm yāhi rājā iva amavān ibhena

original: RV_4,004.01c tṛṣvīm anu prasitiṃ drūṇāno 'stāsi vidhya rakṣasas tapiṣṭhaiḥ //
analyzed: tṛṣvīm anu prasitim drūṇānaḥ stāsi vidhya rakṣasaḥ tapiṣṭhaiḥ

original: RV_4,004.02a tava bhramāsa āśuyā patanty anu spṛśa dhṛṣatā śośucānaḥ /
analyzed: tava bhramāsaḥ āśuyā patanti anu spṛśa dhṛṣatā śośucānaḥ

original: RV_4,004.02c tapūṃṣy agne juhvā pataṅgān asaṃdito vi sṛja viṣvag ulkāḥ //
analyzed: tapūṃṣi agne juhvā pataṅgān a saṃditaḥ vi sṛja viṣvak ulkāḥ

original: RV_4,004.03a prati spaśo vi sṛja tūrṇitamo bhavā pāyur viśo asyā adabdhaḥ /
analyzed: prati spaśaḥ vi sṛja tūrṇitamaḥ bhava pāyuḥ viśaḥ asyāḥ adabdhaḥ

original: RV_4,004.03c yo no dūre aghaśaṃso yo anty agne mākiṣ ṭe vyathir ā dadharṣīt //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dūre agha śaṃsaḥ yaḥ anti agne mākir te vyathiḥ ā dadharṣīt

original: RV_4,004.04a ud agne tiṣṭha praty ā tanuṣva ny amitrāṃ oṣatāt tigmahete /
analyzed: ud agne tiṣṭha prati ā tanuṣva ni amitrān oṣatāt tigma hete

original: RV_4,004.04c yo no arātiṃ samidhāna cakre nīcā taṃ dhakṣy atasaṃ na śuṣkam //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ arātim samidhāna cakre nīcā tam dhakṣi atasam na śuṣkam

original: RV_4,004.05a ūrdhvo bhava prati vidhyādhy asmad āviṣ kṛṇuṣva daivyāny agne /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ bhava prati vidhya adhi asmat āviḥ kṛṇuṣva daivyāni agne

original: RV_4,004.05c ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnāṃ jāmim ajāmim pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn //
analyzed: ava sthirā tanuhi jāmim ajāmim pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn

original: RV_4,004.06a sa te jānāti sumatiṃ yaviṣṭha ya īvate brahmaṇe gātum airat /
analyzed: sa te jānāti sumatim yaviṣṭha yaḥ īvate brahmaṇe gātum airat

original: RV_4,004.06c viśvāny asmai sudināni rāyo dyumnāny aryo vi duro abhi dyaut //
analyzed: viśvāni asmai su dināni rāyaḥ dyumnāni aryaḥ vi duraḥ abhi dyaut

original: RV_4,004.07a sed agne astu subhagaḥ sudānur yas tvā nityena haviṣā ya ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: sa id agne astu subhagaḥ sudānuḥ yaḥ tvā nityena haviṣā yaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_4,004.07c piprīṣati sva āyuṣi duroṇe viśved asmai sudinā sāsad iṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: piprīṣati sve āyuṣi duroṇe viśvā id asmai su dinā sā asat iṣṭiḥ

original: RV_4,004.08a arcāmi te sumatiṃ ghoṣy arvāk saṃ te vāvātā jaratām iyaṃ gīḥ /
analyzed: arcāmi te sumatim ghoṣi arvāk sam te vāvātā jaratām iyam gīḥ

original: RV_4,004.08c svaśvās tvā surathā marjayemāsme kṣatrāṇi dhārayer anu dyūn //
analyzed: su aśvāḥ tvā su rathāḥ marjayema asme kṣatrāṇi dhārayeḥ anu dyūn

original: RV_4,004.09a iha tvā bhūry ā cared upa tman doṣāvastar dīdivāṃsam anu dyūn /
analyzed: iha tvā bhūri ā caret upa tman doṣā vastar dīdivāṃsam anu dyūn

original: RV_4,004.09c krīḷantas tvā sumanasaḥ sapemābhi dyumnā tasthivāṃso janānām //
analyzed: krīḍantaḥ tvā sumanasaḥ sapema abhi dyumnā tasthivāṃsaḥ janānām

original: RV_4,004.10a yas tvā svaśvaḥ suhiraṇyo agna upayāti vasumatā rathena /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā su aśvaḥ su hiraṇyaḥ agne upayāti vasumatā rathena

original: RV_4,004.10c tasya trātā bhavasi tasya sakhā yas ta ātithyam ānuṣag jujoṣat //
analyzed: tasya trātā bhavasi tasya sakhā yaḥ te ātithyam ānuṣak jujoṣat

original: RV_4,004.11a maho rujāmi bandhutā vacobhis tan mā pitur gotamād anv iyāya /
analyzed: mahaḥ rujāmi bandhu tā vacobhiḥ tat mā pituḥ gotamāt anu iyāya

original: RV_4,004.11c tvaṃ no asya vacasaś cikiddhi hotar yaviṣṭha sukrato damūnāḥ //
analyzed: tvam naḥ asya vacasaḥ cikiddhi hotar yaviṣṭha su krato damūnāḥ

original: RV_4,004.12a asvapnajas taraṇayaḥ suśevā atandrāso 'vṛkā aśramiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: a svapnajaḥ taraṇayaḥ su śevāḥ atandrāsaḥ vṛkāḥ aśramiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_4,004.12c te pāyavaḥ sadhryañco niṣadyāgne tava naḥ pāntv amūra //
analyzed: te pāyavaḥ sadhryañcaḥ niṣadya agne tava naḥ pāntu amūra

original: RV_4,004.13a ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan /
analyzed: ye pāyavaḥ māmateyam te agne paśyantaḥ andham duritāt arakṣan

original: RV_4,004.13c rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ //
analyzed: rarakṣa tān su kṛtaḥ viśva vedāḥ dipsantaḥ id ripavaḥ na aha debhuḥ

original: RV_4,004.14a tvayā vayaṃ sadhanyas tvotās tava praṇīty aśyāma vājān /
analyzed: tvayā vayam sadhanyaḥ tvotāḥ tava praṇītī aśyāma vājān

original: RV_4,004.14c ubhā śaṃsā sūdaya satyatāte 'nuṣṭhuyā kṛṇuhy ahrayāṇa //
analyzed: ubhā śaṃsā sūdaya satyatāte nuṣṭhuyā kṛṇuhi ahrayāṇa

original: RV_4,004.15a ayā te agne samidhā vidhema prati stomaṃ śasyamānaṃ gṛbhāya /
analyzed: ayā te agne samidhā vidhema prati stomam śasyamānam gṛbhāya

original: RV_4,004.15c dahāśaso rakṣasaḥ pāhy asmān druho nido mitramaho avadyāt //
analyzed: daha aśasaḥ rakṣasaḥ pāhi asmān druhaḥ nidaḥ mitra mahas avadyāt

original: RV_4,005.01a vaiśvānarāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ kathā dāśemāgnaye bṛhad bhāḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya mīḍhuṣe sajoṣāḥ kathā dāśema agnaye bṛhat bhās

original: RV_4,005.01c anūnena bṛhatā vakṣathenopa stabhāyad upamin na rodhaḥ //
analyzed: anūnena bṛhatā vakṣathena upa stabhāyat upamin na rodhaḥ

original: RV_4,005.02a mā nindata ya imām mahyaṃ rātiṃ devo dadau martyāya svadhāvān /
analyzed: mā nindata yaḥ imām mahyam rātim devaḥ dadau martyāya svadhāvān

original: RV_4,005.02c pākāya gṛtso amṛto vicetā vaiśvānaro nṛtamo yahvo agniḥ //
analyzed: pākāya gṛtsaḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ vaiśvānaraḥ nṛtamaḥ yahvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_4,005.03a sāma dvibarhā mahi tigmabhṛṣṭiḥ sahasraretā vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān /
analyzed: sāma dvibarhāḥ mahi tigma bhṛṣṭiḥ sahasra retāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_4,005.03c padaṃ na gor apagūḷhaṃ vividvān agnir mahyam pred u vocan manīṣām //
analyzed: padam na goḥ apagūḍham vividvān agniḥ mahyam pra id u vocat manīṣām

original: RV_4,005.04a pra tāṃ agnir babhasat tigmajambhas tapiṣṭhena śociṣā yaḥ surādhāḥ /
analyzed: pra tām agniḥ babhasat tigma jambhaḥ tapiṣṭhena śociṣā yaḥ su rādhāḥ

original: RV_4,005.04c pra ye minanti varuṇasya dhāma priyā mitrasya cetato dhruvāṇi //
analyzed: pra ye minanti varuṇasya dhāma priyā mitrasya cetataḥ dhruvāṇi

original: RV_4,005.05a abhrātaro na yoṣaṇo vyantaḥ patiripo na janayo durevāḥ /
analyzed: a bhrātaraḥ na yoṣaṇaḥ vyantaḥ pati ripaḥ na janayaḥ durevāḥ

original: RV_4,005.05c pāpāsaḥ santo anṛtā asatyā idam padam ajanatā gabhīram //
analyzed: pāpāsaḥ santaḥ anṛtāḥ asatyāḥ idam padam ajanatā gabhīram

original: RV_4,005.06a idam me agne kiyate pāvakāminate gurum bhāraṃ na manma /
analyzed: idam me agne kiyate pāva kāminate gurum bhāram na manma

original: RV_4,005.06c bṛhad dadhātha dhṛṣatā gabhīraṃ yahvam pṛṣṭham prayasā saptadhātu //
analyzed: bṛhat dadhātha dhṛṣatā gabhīram yahvam pṛṣṭham prayasā sapta dhātu

original: RV_4,005.07a tam in nv eva samanā samānam abhi kratvā punatī dhītir aśyāḥ /
analyzed: tam id nu eva samanā samānam abhi kratvā punatī dhītiḥ aśyāḥ

original: RV_4,005.07c sasasya carmann adhi cāru pṛśner agre rupa ārupitaṃ jabāru //
analyzed: sasasya carman adhi cāru pṛśneḥ agre rupaḥ ārupitam jabāru

original: RV_4,005.08a pravācyaṃ vacasaḥ kim me asya guhā hitam upa niṇig vadanti /
analyzed: pravācyam vacasaḥ kim me asya guhā hitam upa niṇih vadanti

original: RV_4,005.08c yad usriyāṇām apa vār iva vran pāti priyaṃ rupo agram padaṃ veḥ //
analyzed: yat usriyāṇām apa vār iva vran pāti priyam rupaḥ agram padam veḥ

original: RV_4,005.09a idam u tyan mahi mahām anīkaṃ yad usriyā sacata pūrvyaṃ gauḥ /
analyzed: idam u tyad mahi mahām anīkam yat usriyā sacata pūrvyam gauḥ

original: RV_4,005.09c ṛtasya pade adhi dīdyānaṃ guhā raghuṣyad raghuyad viveda //
analyzed: ṛtasya pade adhi dīdyānam guhā raghuṣyat raghuyat viveda

original: RV_4,005.10a adha dyutānaḥ pitroḥ sacāsāmanuta guhyaṃ cāru pṛśneḥ /
analyzed: adha dyutānaḥ pitroḥ sacā āsām anuta guhyam cāru pṛśneḥ

original: RV_4,005.10c mātuṣ pade parame anti ṣad gor vṛṣṇaḥ śociṣaḥ prayatasya jihvā //
analyzed: mātuṣ pade parame anti sat goḥ vṛṣṇaḥ śociṣaḥ prayatasya jihvā

original: RV_4,005.11a ṛtaṃ voce namasā pṛcchyamānas tavāśasā jātavedo yadīdam /
analyzed: ṛtam voce namasā pṛcchyamānaḥ tava āśasā jātavedaḥ yadi idam

original: RV_4,005.11c tvam asya kṣayasi yad dha viśvaṃ divi yad u draviṇaṃ yat pṛthivyām //
analyzed: tvam asya kṣayasi yat ha viśvam divi yat u draviṇam yat pṛthivyām

original: RV_4,005.12a kiṃ no asya draviṇaṃ kad dha ratnaṃ vi no voco jātavedaś cikitvān /
analyzed: kim naḥ asya draviṇam kad ha ratnam vi naḥ vocaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_4,005.12c guhādhvanaḥ paramaṃ yan no asya reku padaṃ na nidānā aganma //
analyzed: guhā adhvanaḥ paramam yat naḥ asya reku padam na nidānāḥ aganma

original: RV_4,005.13a kā maryādā vayunā kad dha vāmam acchā gamema raghavo na vājam /
analyzed: kā maryādā vayunā kad ha vāmam acchā gamema raghavaḥ na vājam

original: RV_4,005.13c kadā no devīr amṛtasya patnīḥ sūro varṇena tatanann uṣāsaḥ //
analyzed: kadā naḥ devīḥ amṛtasya patnīḥ sūraḥ varṇena tatanan uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_4,005.14a anireṇa vacasā phalgvena pratītyena kṛdhunātṛpāsaḥ /
analyzed: anireṇa vacasā phalgvena pratītyena kṛdhunā atṛpāsaḥ

original: RV_4,005.14c adhā te agne kim ihā vadanty anāyudhāsa āsatā sacantām //
analyzed: adhā te agne kim iha ā vadanti an āyudhāsaḥ āsata sacantām

original: RV_4,005.15a asya śriye samidhānasya vṛṣṇo vasor anīkaṃ dama ā ruroca /
analyzed: asya śriye samidhānasya vṛṣṇaḥ vasoḥ anīkam dame ā ruroca

original: RV_4,005.15c ruśad vasānaḥ sudṛśīkarūpaḥ kṣitir na rāyā puruvāro adyaut //
analyzed: ruśat vasānaḥ sudṛśīka rūpaḥ kṣitiḥ na rāyā puru vāraḥ adyaut

original: RV_4,006.01a ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇo adhvarasya hotar agne tiṣṭha devatātā yajīyān /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ u su naḥ adhvarasya hotar agne tiṣṭha devatātā yajīyān

original: RV_4,006.01c tvaṃ hi viśvam abhy asi manma pra vedhasaś cit tirasi manīṣām //
analyzed: tvam hi viśvam abhī asi manma pra vedhasaḥ cit tirasi manīṣām

original: RV_4,006.02a amūro hotā ny asādi vikṣv agnir mandro vidatheṣu pracetāḥ /
analyzed: amūraḥ hotā ni asādi vikṣu agniḥ mandraḥ vidatheṣu pracetāḥ

original: RV_4,006.02c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitevāśren meteva dhūmaṃ stabhāyad upa dyām //
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum savitā iva aśret metā iva dhūmam stabhāyat upa dyām

original: RV_4,006.03a yatā sujūrṇī rātinī ghṛtācī pradakṣiṇid devatātim urāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yatā su jūrṇī rātinī ghṛtācī pradakṣiṇit devatātim urāṇaḥ

original: RV_4,006.03c ud u svarur navajā nākraḥ paśvo anakti sudhitaḥ sumekaḥ //
analyzed: ud u svaruḥ nava jāḥ na akraḥ paśvaḥ anakti sudhitaḥ sumekaḥ

original: RV_4,006.04a stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnā ūrdhvo adhvaryur jujuṣāṇo asthāt /
analyzed: stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau ūrdhvaḥ adhvaryuḥ jujuṣāṇaḥ asthāt

original: RV_4,006.04c pary agniḥ paśupā na hotā triviṣṭy eti pradiva urāṇaḥ //
analyzed: pari agniḥ paśu pāḥ na hotā tri viṣṭī eti pradivaḥ urāṇaḥ

original: RV_4,006.05a pari tmanā mitadrur eti hotāgnir mandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā /
analyzed: pari tmanā mitadruḥ eti hotā agniḥ mandraḥ madhu vacāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_4,006.05c dravanty asya vājino na śokā bhayante viśvā bhuvanā yad abhrāṭ //
analyzed: dravanti asya vājinaḥ na śokāḥ bhayante viśvā bhuvanā yat abhrāṭ

original: RV_4,006.06a bhadrā te agne svanīka saṃdṛg ghorasya sato viṣuṇasya cāruḥ /
analyzed: bhadrā te agne su anīka saṃdṛś ghorasya sataḥ viṣuṇasya cāruḥ

original: RV_4,006.06c na yat te śocis tamasā varanta na dhvasmānas tanvī repa ā dhuḥ //
analyzed: na yat te śociḥ tamasā varanta na dhvasmānaḥ tanvī repaḥ ā dhuḥ

original: RV_4,006.07a na yasya sātur janitor avāri na mātarāpitarā nū cid iṣṭau /
analyzed: na yasya sātuḥ janitoḥ avāri na mātarā pitarā nu cit iṣṭau

original: RV_4,006.07c adhā mitro na sudhitaḥ pāvako 'gnir dīdāya mānuṣīṣu vikṣu //
analyzed: adhā mitraḥ na sudhitaḥ pāvakaḥ gniḥ dīdāya mānuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_4,006.08a dvir yam pañca jījanan saṃvasānāḥ svasāro agnim mānuṣīṣu vikṣu /
analyzed: dvis yam pañca jījanan saṃvasānāḥ svasāraḥ agnim mānuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_4,006.08c uṣarbudham atharyo na dantaṃ śukraṃ svāsam paraśuṃ na tigmam //
analyzed: uṣarbudham atharyaḥ na dantam śukram svāsam paraśum na tigmam

original: RV_4,006.09a tava tye agne harito ghṛtasnā rohitāsa ṛjvañcaḥ svañcaḥ /
analyzed: tava tye agne haritaḥ ghṛta snāḥ rohitāsaḥ ṛjvañcaḥ svañcaḥ

original: RV_4,006.09c aruṣāso vṛṣaṇa ṛjumuṣkā ā devatātim ahvanta dasmāḥ //
analyzed: aruṣāsaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ ṛju muṣkāḥ ā devatātim ahvanta dasmāḥ

original: RV_4,006.10a ye ha tye te sahamānā ayāsas tveṣāso agne arcayaś caranti /
analyzed: ye ha tye te sahamānāḥ ayāsaḥ tveṣāsaḥ agne arcayaḥ caranti

original: RV_4,006.10c śyenāso na duvasanāso arthaṃ tuviṣvaṇaso mārutaṃ na śardhaḥ //
analyzed: śyenāsaḥ na duvasanāsaḥ artham tuviṣvaṇasaḥ mārutam na śardhaḥ

original: RV_4,006.11a akāri brahma samidhāna tubhyaṃ śaṃsāty ukthaṃ yajate vy ū dhāḥ /
analyzed: akāri brahma samidhāna tubhyam śaṃsāti uktham yajate vi ū dhāḥ

original: RV_4,006.11c hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur namasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ //
analyzed: hotāram agnim manuṣaḥ ni ṣeduḥ namasyantaḥ uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ

original: RV_4,007.01a ayam iha prathamo dhāyi dhātṛbhir hotā yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam iha prathamaḥ dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ

original: RV_4,007.01c yam apnavāno bhṛgavo virurucur vaneṣu citraṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśe //
analyzed: yam apnavānaḥ bhṛgavaḥ virurucuḥ vaneṣu citram vibhvam viśeviśe

original: RV_4,007.02a agne kadā ta ānuṣag bhuvad devasya cetanam /
analyzed: agne kadā te ānuṣak bhuvat devasya cetanam

original: RV_4,007.02c adhā hi tvā jagṛbhrire martāso vikṣv īḍyam //
analyzed: adhā hi tvā jagṛbhrire martāsaḥ vikṣu īḍyam

original: RV_4,007.03a ṛtāvānaṃ vicetasam paśyanto dyām iva stṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: ṛtāvānam vicetasam paśyantaḥ dyām iva stṛbhiḥ

original: RV_4,007.03c viśveṣām adhvarāṇāṃ haskartāraṃ dame-dame //
analyzed: viśveṣām adhvarāṇām haskartāram damedame

original: RV_4,007.04a āśuṃ dūtaṃ vivasvato viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhi /
analyzed: āśum dūtam vivasvataḥ viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi

original: RV_4,007.04c ā jabhruḥ ketum āyavo bhṛgavāṇaṃ viśe-viśe //
analyzed: ā jabhruḥ ketum āyavaḥ bhṛgavāṇam viśeviśe

original: RV_4,007.05a tam īṃ hotāram ānuṣak cikitvāṃsaṃ ni ṣedire /
analyzed: tam īm hotāram ānuṣak cikitvāṃsam ni sedire

original: RV_4,007.05c raṇvam pāvakaśociṣaṃ yajiṣṭhaṃ sapta dhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: raṇvam pāvaka śociṣam yajiṣṭham sapta dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_4,007.06a taṃ śaśvatīṣu mātṛṣu vana ā vītam aśritam /
analyzed: tam śaśvatīṣu mātṛṣu vane ā vītam aśritam

original: RV_4,007.06c citraṃ santaṃ guhā hitaṃ suvedaṃ kūcidarthinam //
analyzed: citram santam guhā hitam su vedam kūcid arthinam

original: RV_4,007.07a sasasya yad viyutā sasminn ūdhann ṛtasya dhāman raṇayanta devāḥ /
analyzed: sasasya yat viyutā sasmin ūdhan ṛtasya dhāman raṇayanta devāḥ

original: RV_4,007.07c mahāṃ agnir namasā rātahavyo ver adhvarāya sadam id ṛtāvā //
analyzed: mahān agniḥ namasā rāta havyaḥ veḥ adhvarāya sadam id ṛtāvā

original: RV_4,007.08a ver adhvarasya dūtyāni vidvān ubhe antā rodasī saṃcikitvān /
analyzed: veḥ adhvarasya dūtyāni vidvān ubhe antar rodasī saṃcikitvān

original: RV_4,007.08c dūta īyase pradiva urāṇo viduṣṭaro diva ārodhanāni //
analyzed: dūtaḥ īyase pradivaḥ urāṇaḥ viduṣṭaraḥ divaḥ ārodhanāni

original: RV_4,007.09a kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśataḥ puro bhāś cariṣṇv arcir vapuṣām id ekam /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam te ema ruśataḥ puras bhās cariṣṇu arciḥ vapuṣām id ekam

original: RV_4,007.09c yad apravītā dadhate ha garbhaṃ sadyaś cij jāto bhavasīd u dūtaḥ //
analyzed: yat a pravītāḥ dadhate ha garbham sadyas cit jātaḥ bhavasi id u dūtaḥ

original: RV_4,007.10a sadyo jātasya dadṛśānam ojo yad asya vāto anuvāti śociḥ /
analyzed: sadyas jātasya dadṛśānam ojaḥ yat asya vātaḥ anuvāti śociḥ

original: RV_4,007.10c vṛṇakti tigmām ataseṣu jihvāṃ sthirā cid annā dayate vi jambhaiḥ //
analyzed: vṛṇakti tigmām ataseṣu jihvām sthirā cit annā dayate vi jambhaiḥ

original: RV_4,007.11a tṛṣu yad annā tṛṣuṇā vavakṣa tṛṣuṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇute yahvo agniḥ /
analyzed: tṛṣu yat annā tṛṣuṇā vavakṣa tṛṣum dūtam kṛṇute yahvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_4,007.11c vātasya meḷiṃ sacate nijūrvann āśuṃ na vājayate hinve arvā //
analyzed: vātasya mā iḷim sacate nijūrvan āśum na vājayate hinve arvā

original: RV_4,008.01a dūtaṃ vo viśvavedasaṃ havyavāham amartyam /
analyzed: dūtam vaḥ viśva vedasam havya vāham amartyam

original: RV_4,008.01c yajiṣṭham ṛñjase girā //
analyzed: yajiṣṭham ṛñjase girā

original: RV_4,008.02a sa hi vedā vasudhitim mahāṃ ārodhanaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi vedā vasu dhitim mahān ārodhanam divaḥ

original: RV_4,008.02c sa devāṃ eha vakṣati //
analyzed: sa devān ā iha vakṣati

original: RV_4,008.03a sa veda deva ānamaṃ devāṃ ṛtāyate dame /
analyzed: sa veda devaḥ ānamam devān ṛtāyate dame

original: RV_4,008.03c dāti priyāṇi cid vasu //
analyzed: dāti priyāṇi cit vasu

original: RV_4,008.04a sa hotā sed u dūtyaṃ cikitvāṃ antar īyate /
analyzed: sa hotā sa id u dūtyam cikitvān antar īyate

original: RV_4,008.04c vidvāṃ ārodhanaṃ divaḥ //
analyzed: vidvān ārodhanam divaḥ

original: RV_4,008.05a te syāma ye agnaye dadāśur havyadātibhiḥ /
analyzed: te syāma ye agnaye dadāśuḥ havya dātibhiḥ

original: RV_4,008.05c ya īm puṣyanta indhate //
analyzed: yaḥ īm puṣyantaḥ indhate

original: RV_4,008.06a te rāyā te suvīryaiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire /
analyzed: te rāyā te su vīryaiḥ sasavāṃsaḥ vi śṛṇvire

original: RV_4,008.06c ye agnā dadhire duvaḥ //
analyzed: ye agnā dadhire duvaḥ

original: RV_4,008.07a asme rāyo dive-dive saṃ carantu puruspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: asme rāyaḥ dive dive sam carantu puruspṛhaḥ

original: RV_4,008.07c asme vājāsa īratām //
analyzed: asme vājāsaḥ īratām

original: RV_4,008.08a sa vipraś carṣaṇīnāṃ śavasā mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: sa vipraḥ carṣaṇīnām śavasā mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_4,008.08c ati kṣipreva vidhyati //
analyzed: ati kṣipra iva vidhyati

original: RV_4,009.01a agne mṛḷa mahāṃ asi ya īm ā devayuṃ janam /
analyzed: agne mṛḍa mahān asi yaḥ īm ā devayum janam

original: RV_4,009.01c iyetha barhir āsadam //
analyzed: iyetha barhiḥ āsadam

original: RV_4,009.02a sa mānuṣīṣu dūḷabho vikṣu prāvīr amartyaḥ /
analyzed: sa mānuṣīṣu dūḍabhaḥ vikṣu prāvīḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_4,009.02c dūto viśveṣām bhuvat //
analyzed: dūtaḥ viśveṣām bhuvat

original: RV_4,009.03a sa sadma pari ṇīyate hotā mandro diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: sa sadma pari ṇīyate hotā mandraḥ diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_4,009.03c uta potā ni ṣīdati //
analyzed: uta potā ni sīdati

original: RV_4,009.04a uta gnā agnir adhvara uto gṛhapatir dame /
analyzed: uta gnāḥ agniḥ adhvare uta u gṛhapatiḥ dame

original: RV_4,009.04c uta brahmā ni ṣīdati //
analyzed: uta brahmā ni sīdati

original: RV_4,009.05a veṣi hy adhvarīyatām upavaktā janānām /
analyzed: veṣi hi adhvarīyatām upavaktā janānām

original: RV_4,009.05b havyā ca mānuṣāṇām //
analyzed: havyā ca mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_4,009.06a veṣīd v asya dūtyaṃ yasya jujoṣo adhvaram /
analyzed: veṣi id u asya dūtyam yasya jujoṣaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_4,009.06b havyam martasya voḷhave //
analyzed: havyam martasya voḷhave

original: RV_4,009.07a asmākaṃ joṣy adhvaram asmākaṃ yajñam aṅgiraḥ /
analyzed: asmākam joṣi adhvaram asmākam yajñam aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_4,009.07c asmākaṃ śṛṇudhī havam //
analyzed: asmākam śṛṇudhi havam

original: RV_4,009.08a pari te dūḷabho ratho 'smāṃ aśnotu viśvataḥ /
analyzed: pari te dūḍabhaḥ rathaḥ smām aśnotu viśvatas

original: RV_4,009.08c yena rakṣasi dāśuṣaḥ //
analyzed: yena rakṣasi dāśuṣaḥ

original: RV_4,010.01a agne tam adyāśvaṃ na stomaiḥ kratuṃ na bhadraṃ hṛdispṛśam /
analyzed: agne tam adya aśvam na stomaiḥ kratum na bhadram hṛdispṛśam

original: RV_4,010.01c ṛdhyāmā ta ohaiḥ //
analyzed: ṛdhyāma te ohaiḥ

original: RV_4,010.02a adhā hy agne krator bhadrasya dakṣasya sādhoḥ /
analyzed: adhā hi agne kratoḥ bhadrasya dakṣasya sādhoḥ

original: RV_4,010.02c rathīr ṛtasya bṛhato babhūtha //
analyzed: rathīḥ ṛtasya bṛhataḥ babhūtha

original: RV_4,010.03a ebhir no arkair bhavā no arvāṅ svar ṇa jyotiḥ /
analyzed: ebhiḥ naḥ arkaiḥ bhava naḥ arvāṅ svar na jyotiḥ

original: RV_4,010.03c agne viśvebhiḥ sumanā anīkaiḥ //
analyzed: agne viśvebhiḥ sumanāḥ anīkaiḥ

original: RV_4,010.04a ābhiṣ ṭe adya gīrbhir gṛṇanto 'gne dāśema /
analyzed: ābhiḥ te adya gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ gne dāśema

original: RV_4,010.04c pra te divo na stanayanti śuṣmāḥ //
analyzed: pra te divaḥ na stanayanti śuṣmāḥ

original: RV_4,010.05a tava svādiṣṭhāgne saṃdṛṣṭir idā cid ahna idā cid aktoḥ /
analyzed: tava svādiṣṭhā agne saṃdṛṣṭiḥ idā cit ahnaḥ idā cit aktoḥ

original: RV_4,010.05c śriye rukmo na rocata upāke //
analyzed: śriye rukmaḥ na rocate upāke

original: RV_4,010.06a ghṛtaṃ na pūtaṃ tanūr arepāḥ śuci hiraṇyam /
analyzed: ghṛtam na pūtam tanūḥ arepāḥ śuci hiraṇyam

original: RV_4,010.06c tat te rukmo na rocata svadhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tat te rukmaḥ na rocata svadhāvas

original: RV_4,010.07a kṛtaṃ cid dhi ṣmā sanemi dveṣo 'gna inoṣi martāt /
analyzed: kṛtam cit hi sma sanemi dveṣaḥ gne inoṣi martāt

original: RV_4,010.07c itthā yajamānād ṛtāvaḥ //
analyzed: itthā yajamānāt ṛtāvaḥ

original: RV_4,010.08a śivā naḥ sakhyā santu bhrātrāgne deveṣu yuṣme /
analyzed: śivā naḥ sakhyā santu bhrātrā agne deveṣu yuṣme

original: RV_4,010.08c sā no nābhiḥ sadane sasminn ūdhan //
analyzed: sā naḥ nābhiḥ sadane sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_4,011.01a bhadraṃ te agne sahasinn anīkam upāka ā rocate sūryasya /
analyzed: bhadram te agne sahasin anīkam upāke ā rocate sūryasya

original: RV_4,011.01c ruśad dṛśe dadṛśe naktayā cid arūkṣitaṃ dṛśa ā rūpe annam //
analyzed: ruśat dṛśe dadṛśe naktayā cit arūkṣitam dṛśe ā rūpe annam

original: RV_4,011.02a vi ṣāhy agne gṛṇate manīṣāṃ khaṃ vepasā tuvijāta stavānaḥ /
analyzed: vi sāhi agne gṛṇate manīṣām kham vepasā tuvi jāta stavānaḥ

original: RV_4,011.02c viśvebhir yad vāvanaḥ śukra devais tan no rāsva sumaho bhūri manma //
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ yat vāvanaḥ śukra devaiḥ tat naḥ rāsva su mahas bhūri manma

original: RV_4,011.03a tvad agne kāvyā tvan manīṣās tvad ukthā jāyante rādhyāni /
analyzed: tvat agne kāvyā tvat manīṣāḥ tvat ukthā jāyante rādhyāni

original: RV_4,011.03c tvad eti draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā itthādhiye dāśuṣe martyāya //
analyzed: tvat eti draviṇam vīra peśāḥ itthā dhiye dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_4,011.04a tvad vājī vājambharo vihāyā abhiṣṭikṛj jāyate satyaśuṣmaḥ /
analyzed: tvat vājī vājambharaḥ vihāyāḥ abhiṣṭi kṛt jāyate satya śuṣmaḥ

original: RV_4,011.04c tvad rayir devajūto mayobhus tvad āśur jūjuvāṃ agne arvā //
analyzed: tvat rayiḥ deva jūtaḥ mayobhuḥ tvat āśuḥ jūjuvān agne arvā

original: RV_4,011.05a tvām agne prathamaṃ devayanto devam martā amṛta mandrajihvam /
analyzed: tvām agne prathamam devayantaḥ devam martāḥ amṛta mandra jihvam

original: RV_4,011.05c dveṣoyutam ā vivāsanti dhībhir damūnasaṃ gṛhapatim amūram //
analyzed: dveṣaḥ yutam ā vivāsanti dhībhiḥ damūnasam gṛha patim amūram

original: RV_4,011.06a āre asmad amatim āre aṃha āre viśvāṃ durmatiṃ yan nipāsi /
analyzed: āre asmat amatim āre aṃhaḥ āre viśvām durmatim yat nipāsi

original: RV_4,011.06c doṣā śivaḥ sahasaḥ sūno agne yaṃ deva ā cit sacase svasti //
analyzed: doṣā śivaḥ sahasaḥ sūno agne yam devaḥ ā cit sacase svasti

original: RV_4,012.01a yas tvām agna inadhate yatasruk tris te annaṃ kṛṇavat sasminn ahan /
analyzed: yaḥ tvām agne inadhate yata sruc tris te annam kṛṇavat sasmin ahan

original: RV_4,012.01c sa su dyumnair abhy astu prasakṣat tava kratvā jātavedaś cikitvān //
analyzed: sa su dyumnaiḥ abhī astu prasakṣat tava kratvā jātavedaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_4,012.02a idhmaṃ yas te jabharac chaśramāṇo maho agne anīkam ā saparyan /
analyzed: idhmam yaḥ te jabharat śaśramāṇaḥ mahaḥ agne anīkam ā saparyan

original: RV_4,012.02c sa idhānaḥ prati doṣām uṣāsam puṣyan rayiṃ sacate ghnann amitrān //
analyzed: saḥ idhānaḥ prati doṣām uṣāsam puṣyan rayim sacate ghnan amitrān

original: RV_4,012.03a agnir īśe bṛhataḥ kṣatriyasyāgnir vājasya paramasya rāyaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ īśe bṛhataḥ kṣatriyasya agniḥ vājasya paramasya rāyaḥ

original: RV_4,012.03c dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate yaviṣṭho vy ānuṣaṅ martyāya svadhāvān //
analyzed: dadhāti ratnam vidhate yaviṣṭhaḥ vi ānuṣak martyāya svadhāvān

original: RV_4,012.04a yac cid dhi te puruṣatrā yaviṣṭhācittibhiś cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ /
analyzed: yat cit hi te puruṣatrā yaviṣṭha acittibhiḥ cakṛma kad cit āgaḥ

original: RV_4,012.04c kṛdhī ṣv asmāṃ aditer anāgān vy enāṃsi śiśratho viṣvag agne //
analyzed: kṛdhi su asmān aditeḥ anāgān vi enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ viṣvak agne

original: RV_4,012.05a mahaś cid agna enaso abhīka ūrvād devānām uta martyānām /
analyzed: mahaḥ cit agne enasaḥ abhīke ūrvāt devānām uta martyānām

original: RV_4,012.05c mā te sakhāyaḥ sadam id riṣāma yacchā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: mā te sakhāyaḥ sadam id riṣāma yaccha tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_4,012.06a yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ /
analyzed: yathā ha tyad vasavaḥ gauryam cit padi sitām amuñcata yajatrāḥ

original: RV_4,012.06c evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ //
analyzed: eva u su asmat muñcata vi aṃhaḥ pra tāri agne prataram naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_4,013.01a praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyad vibhātīnāṃ sumanā ratnadheyam /
analyzed: prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat vibhātīnām sumanāḥ ratna dheyam

original: RV_4,013.01c yātam aśvinā sukṛto duroṇam ut sūryo jyotiṣā deva eti //
analyzed: yātam aśvinā su kṛtaḥ duroṇam ud sūryaḥ jyotiṣā devaḥ eti

original: RV_4,013.02a ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred drapsaṃ davidhvad gaviṣo na satvā /
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum savitā devaḥ aśret drapsam davidhvat gaviṣaḥ na satvā

original: RV_4,013.02c anu vrataṃ varuṇo yanti mitro yat sūryaṃ divy ārohayanti //
analyzed: anu vratam varuṇaḥ yanti mitraḥ yat sūryam divi ārohayanti

original: RV_4,013.03a yaṃ sīm akṛṇvan tamase vipṛce dhruvakṣemā anavasyanto artham /
analyzed: yam sīm akṛṇvan tamase vipṛce dhruva kṣemāḥ an avasyantaḥ artham

original: RV_4,013.03c taṃ sūryaṃ haritaḥ sapta yahvī spaśaṃ viśvasya jagato vahanti //
analyzed: tam sūryam haritaḥ sapta yahvī spaśam viśvasya jagataḥ vahanti

original: RV_4,013.04a vahiṣṭhebhir viharan yāsi tantum avavyayann asitaṃ deva vasma /
analyzed: vahiṣṭhebhiḥ viharan yāsi tantum avavyayan asitam deva vasma

original: RV_4,013.04c davidhvato raśmayaḥ sūryasya carmevāvādhus tamo apsv antaḥ //
analyzed: davidhvataḥ raśmayaḥ sūryasya carma iva avādhuḥ tamaḥ apsu antar

original: RV_4,013.05a anāyato anibaddhaḥ kathāyaṃ nyaṅṅ uttāno 'va padyate na /
analyzed: an āyataḥ a nibaddhaḥ kathā ayam nyaṅ uttānaḥ padyate na

original: RV_4,013.05c kayā yāti svadhayā ko dadarśa diva skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam //
analyzed: kayā yāti svadhayā kaḥ dadarśa divaḥ skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam

original: RV_4,014.01a praty agnir uṣaso jātavedā akhyad devo rocamānā mahobhiḥ /
analyzed: prati agniḥ uṣasaḥ jātavedāḥ akhyat devaḥ rocamānāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_4,014.01c ā nāsatyorugāyā rathenemaṃ yajñam upa no yātam accha //
analyzed: ā nāsatyā uru gāyā rathena imam yajñam upa naḥ yātam accha

original: RV_4,014.02a ūrdhvaṃ ketuṃ savitā devo aśrej jyotir viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvan /
analyzed: ūrdhvam ketum savitā devaḥ aśret jyotiḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvan

original: RV_4,014.02c āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ vi sūryo raśmibhiś cekitānaḥ //
analyzed: āprāḥ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam vi sūryaḥ raśmibhiḥ cekitānaḥ

original: RV_4,014.03a āvahanty aruṇīr jyotiṣāgān mahī citrā raśmibhiś cekitānā /
analyzed: āvahantī aruṇīḥ jyotiṣā āgāt mahī citrā raśmibhiḥ cekitānā

original: RV_4,014.03c prabodhayantī suvitāya devy uṣā īyate suyujā rathena //
analyzed: prabodhayantī suvitāya devī uṣāḥ īyate su yujā rathena

original: RV_4,014.04a ā vāṃ vahiṣṭhā iha te vahantu rathā aśvāsa uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
analyzed: ā vām vahiṣṭhāḥ iha te vahantu rathāḥ aśvāsaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_4,014.04c ime hi vām madhupeyāya somā asmin yajñe vṛṣaṇā mādayethām //
analyzed: ime hi vām madhu peyāya somāḥ asmin yajñe vṛṣaṇā mādayethām

original: RV_4,014.05a anāyato anibaddhaḥ kathāyaṃ nyaṅṅ uttāno 'va padyate na /
analyzed: an āyataḥ a nibaddhaḥ kathā ayam nyaṅ uttānaḥ padyate na

original: RV_4,014.05c kayā yāti svadhayā ko dadarśa diva skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam //
analyzed: kayā yāti svadhayā kaḥ dadarśa divaḥ skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam

original: RV_4,015.01a agnir hotā no adhvare vājī san pari ṇīyate /
analyzed: agniḥ hotā naḥ adhvare vājī san pari ṇīyate

original: RV_4,015.01c devo deveṣu yajñiyaḥ //
analyzed: devaḥ deveṣu yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_4,015.02a pari triviṣṭy adhvaraṃ yāty agnī rathīr iva /
analyzed: pari tri viṣṭī adhvaram yāti agniḥ rathīḥ iva

original: RV_4,015.02c ā deveṣu prayo dadhat //
analyzed: ā deveṣu prayaḥ dadhat

original: RV_4,015.03a pari vājapatiḥ kavir agnir havyāny akramīt /
analyzed: pari vāja patiḥ kaviḥ agniḥ havyāni akramīt

original: RV_4,015.03c dadhad ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_4,015.04a ayaṃ yaḥ sṛñjaye puro daivavāte samidhyate /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ sṛñjaye puras daivavāte samidhyate

original: RV_4,015.04c dyumāṃ amitradambhanaḥ //
analyzed: dyumān amitra dambhanaḥ

original: RV_4,015.05a asya ghā vīra īvato 'gner īśīta martyaḥ /
analyzed: asya gha vīraḥ īvataḥ gneḥ īśīta martyaḥ

original: RV_4,015.05c tigmajambhasya mīḷhuṣaḥ //
analyzed: tigma jambhasya mīḷhuṣaḥ

original: RV_4,015.06a tam arvantaṃ na sānasim aruṣaṃ na divaḥ śiśum /
analyzed: tam arvantam na sānasim aruṣam na divaḥ śiśum

original: RV_4,015.06c marmṛjyante dive-dive //
analyzed: marmṛjyante dive dive

original: RV_4,015.07a bodhad yan mā haribhyāṃ kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ /
analyzed: bodhat yat mā haribhyām kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ

original: RV_4,015.07c acchā na hūta ud aram //
analyzed: acchā na hūtaḥ ud aram

original: RV_4,015.08a uta tyā yajatā harī kumārāt sāhadevyāt /
analyzed: uta tyā yajatā harī kumārāt sāhadevyāt

original: RV_4,015.08c prayatā sadya ā dade //
analyzed: prayatā sadyas ā dade

original: RV_4,015.09a eṣa vāṃ devāv aśvinā kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vām devau aśvinā kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ

original: RV_4,015.09c dīrghāyur astu somakaḥ //
analyzed: dīrgha āyuḥ astu somakaḥ

original: RV_4,015.10a taṃ yuvaṃ devāv aśvinā kumāraṃ sāhadevyam /
analyzed: tam yuvam devau aśvinā kumāram sāhadevyam

original: RV_4,015.10c dīrghāyuṣaṃ kṛṇotana //
analyzed: dīrgha āyuṣam kṛṇotana

original: RV_4,016.01a ā satyo yātu maghavāṃ ṛjīṣī dravantv asya haraya upa naḥ /
analyzed: ā satyaḥ yātu maghavān ṛjīṣī dravantu asya harayaḥ upa naḥ

original: RV_4,016.01c tasmā id andhaḥ suṣumā sudakṣam ihābhipitvaṃ karate gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: tasmai id andhaḥ suṣuma su dakṣam iha abhipitvam karate gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_4,016.02a ava sya śūrādhvano nānte 'smin no adya savane mandadhyai /
analyzed: ava sya śūra adhvanaḥ na ante smin naḥ adya savane mandadhyai

original: RV_4,016.02c śaṃsāty uktham uśaneva vedhāś cikituṣe asuryāya manma //
analyzed: śaṃsāti uktham uśanā iva vedhāḥ cikituṣe asuryāya manma

original: RV_4,016.03a kavir na niṇyaṃ vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekaṃ vipipāno arcāt /
analyzed: kaviḥ na niṇyam vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekam vipipānaḥ arcāt

original: RV_4,016.03c diva itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cic cakrur vayunā gṛṇantaḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cit cakruḥ vayunā gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_4,016.04a svar yad vedi sudṛśīkam arkair mahi jyotī rurucur yad dha vastoḥ /
analyzed: svar yat vedi sudṛśīkam arkaiḥ mahi jyotiḥ rurucuḥ yat ha vastoḥ

original: RV_4,016.04c andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaś cakāra nṛtamo abhiṣṭau //
analyzed: andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaḥ cakāra nṛtamaḥ abhiṣṭau

original: RV_4,016.05a vavakṣa indro amitam ṛjīṣy ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā /
analyzed: vavakṣa indraḥ amitam ṛjīṣī ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā

original: RV_4,016.05c ataś cid asya mahimā vi recy abhi yo viśvā bhuvanā babhūva //
analyzed: atas cit asya mahimā vi reci abhi yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā babhūva

original: RV_4,016.06a viśvāni śakro naryāṇi vidvān apo rireca sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ /
analyzed: viśvāni śakraḥ naryāṇi vidvān apaḥ rireca sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ

original: RV_4,016.06c aśmānaṃ cid ye bibhidur vacobhir vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ //
analyzed: aśmānam cit ye bibhiduḥ vacobhiḥ vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ

original: RV_4,016.07a apo vṛtraṃ vavrivāṃsam parāhan prāvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ vṛtram vavrivāṃsam parāhan prāvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ

original: RV_4,016.07c prārṇāṃsi samudriyāṇy ainoḥ patir bhavañ chavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo //
analyzed: pra arṇāṃsi samudriyāṇi ainoḥ patiḥ bhavam śavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo

original: RV_4,016.08a apo yad adrim puruhūta dardar āvir bhuvat saramā pūrvyaṃ te /
analyzed: apa u yat adrim puruhūta dardar āvis bhuvat saramā pūrvyam te

original: RV_4,016.08c sa no netā vājam ā darṣi bhūriṃ gotrā rujann aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ netā vājam ā darṣi bhūrim gotrā rujan aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_4,016.09a acchā kaviṃ nṛmaṇo gā abhiṣṭau svarṣātā maghavan nādhamānam /
analyzed: acchā kavim nṛmaṇaḥ gāḥ abhiṣṭau svarṣātā maghavan nādhamānam

original: RV_4,016.09c ūtibhis tam iṣaṇo dyumnahūtau ni māyāvān abrahmā dasyur arta //
analyzed: ūtibhiḥ tam iṣaṇaḥ dyumna hūtau ni māyāvān abrahmā dasyuḥ arta

original: RV_4,016.10a ā dasyughnā manasā yāhy astam bhuvat te kutsaḥ sakhye nikāmaḥ /
analyzed: ā dasyu ghnā manasā yāhi astam bhuvat te kutsaḥ sakhye nikāmaḥ

original: RV_4,016.10c sve yonau ni ṣadataṃ sarūpā vi vāṃ cikitsad ṛtacid dha nārī //
analyzed: sve yonau ni sadatam sarūpā vi vām cikitsat ṛta cit ha nārī

original: RV_4,016.11a yāsi kutsena saratham avasyus todo vātasya haryor īśānaḥ /
analyzed: yāsi kutsena sa ratham avasyuḥ todaḥ vātasya haryoḥ īśānaḥ

original: RV_4,016.11c ṛjrā vājaṃ na gadhyaṃ yuyūṣan kavir yad ahan pāryāya bhūṣāt //
analyzed: ṛjrā vājam na gadhyam yuyūṣan kaviḥ yat ahan pāryāya bhūṣāt

original: RV_4,016.12a kutsāya śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ ni barhīḥ prapitve ahnaḥ kuyavaṃ sahasrā /
analyzed: kutsāya śuṣṇam aśuṣam ni barhīḥ prapitve ahnaḥ kuyavam sahasrā

original: RV_4,016.12c sadyo dasyūn pra mṛṇa kutsyena pra sūraś cakraṃ vṛhatād abhīke //
analyzed: sadyas dasyūn pra mṛṇa kutsyena pra sūraḥ cakram vṛhatāt abhīke

original: RV_4,016.13a tvam piprum mṛgayaṃ śūśuvāṃsam ṛjiśvane vaidathināya randhīḥ /
analyzed: tvam piprum mṛgayam śūśuvāṃsam ṛjiśvane vaidathināya randhīḥ

original: RV_4,016.13c pañcāśat kṛṣṇā ni vapaḥ sahasrātkaṃ na puro jarimā vi dardaḥ //
analyzed: pañcāśat kṛṣṇāḥ ni vapaḥ sahasrā atkam na puraḥ jarimā vi dardar

original: RV_4,016.14a sūra upāke tanvaṃ dadhāno vi yat te cety amṛtasya varpaḥ /
analyzed: sūraḥ upāke tanvam dadhānaḥ vi yat te ceti amṛtasya varpaḥ

original: RV_4,016.14c mṛgo na hastī taviṣīm uṣāṇaḥ siṃho na bhīma āyudhāni bibhrat //
analyzed: mṛgaḥ na hastī taviṣīm uṣāṇaḥ siṃhaḥ na bhīmaḥ āyudhāni bibhrat

original: RV_4,016.15a indraṃ kāmā vasūyanto agman svarmīḷhe na savane cakānāḥ /
analyzed: indram kāmāḥ vasūyantaḥ agman svarmīḍhe na savane cakānāḥ

original: RV_4,016.15c śravasyavaḥ śaśamānāsa ukthair oko na raṇvā sudṛśīva puṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: śravasyavaḥ śaśamānāsaḥ ukthaiḥ okaḥ na raṇvā sudṛśī iva puṣṭiḥ

original: RV_4,016.16a tam id va indraṃ suhavaṃ huvema yas tā cakāra naryā purūṇi /
analyzed: tam id vaḥ indram su havam huvema yaḥ tā cakāra naryā purūṇi

original: RV_4,016.16c yo māvate jaritre gadhyaṃ cin makṣū vājam bharati spārharādhāḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ māvate jaritre gadhyam cit makṣū vājam bharati spārha rādhāḥ

original: RV_4,016.17a tigmā yad antar aśaniḥ patāti kasmiñ cic chūra muhuke janānām /
analyzed: tigmā yat antar aśaniḥ patāti kasmin cit śūra muhuke janānām

original: RV_4,016.17c ghorā yad arya samṛtir bhavāty adha smā nas tanvo bodhi gopāḥ //
analyzed: ghorā yat arya samṛtiḥ bhavāti adha smā naḥ tanvaḥ bodhi gopāḥ

original: RV_4,016.18a bhuvo 'vitā vāmadevasya dhīnām bhuvaḥ sakhāvṛko vājasātau /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ vitā vāmadevasya dhīnām bhuvaḥ sakhā avṛkaḥ vājasātau

original: RV_4,016.18c tvām anu pramatim ā jaganmoruśaṃso jaritre viśvadha syāḥ //
analyzed: tvām anu pramatim ā jaganma uru śaṃsaḥ jaritre viśvadha syāḥ

original: RV_4,016.19a ebhir nṛbhir indra tvāyubhiṣ ṭvā maghavadbhir maghavan viśva ājau /
analyzed: ebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ indra tvāyubhiḥ tvā maghavadbhiḥ maghavan viśvaḥ ājau

original: RV_4,016.19c dyāvo na dyumnair abhi santo aryaḥ kṣapo madema śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: dyāvaḥ na dyumnaiḥ abhi santaḥ aryaḥ kṣapaḥ madema śaradaḥ ca pūrvīḥ

original: RV_4,016.20a eved indrāya vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe brahmākarma bhṛgavo na ratham /
analyzed: eva id indrāya vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe brahma akarma bhṛgavaḥ na ratham

original: RV_4,016.20c nū cid yathā naḥ sakhyā viyoṣad asan na ugro 'vitā tanūpāḥ //
analyzed: nu cit yathā naḥ sakhyā viyoṣat asat naḥ ugraḥ vitā tanū pāḥ

original: RV_4,016.21a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,016.21c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,017.01a tvam mahāṃ indra tubhyaṃ ha kṣā anu kṣatram maṃhanā manyata dyauḥ /
analyzed: tvam mahān indra tubhyam ha kṣā anu kṣatram maṃhanā manyata dyauḥ

original: RV_4,017.01c tvaṃ vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghanvān sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānān //
analyzed: tvam vṛtram śavasā jaghanvān sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānān

original: RV_4,017.02a tava tviṣo janiman rejata dyau rejad bhūmir bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ /
analyzed: tava tviṣaḥ janiman rejata dyauḥ rejat bhūmiḥ bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ

original: RV_4,017.02c ṛghāyanta subhvaḥ parvatāsa ārdan dhanvāni sarayanta āpaḥ //
analyzed: ṛghāyanta su bhvaḥ parvatāsaḥ ārdan dhanvāni sarayantaḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_4,017.03a bhinad giriṃ śavasā vajram iṣṇann āviṣkṛṇvānaḥ sahasāna ojaḥ /
analyzed: bhinat girim śavasā vajram iṣṇan āviṣkṛṇvānaḥ sahasānaḥ ojaḥ

original: RV_4,017.03c vadhīd vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ sarann āpo javasā hatavṛṣṇīḥ //
analyzed: vadhīt vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ saran āpaḥ javasā hata vṛṣṇīḥ

original: RV_4,017.04a suvīras te janitā manyata dyaur indrasya kartā svapastamo bhūt /
analyzed: su vīraḥ te janitā manyata dyauḥ indrasya kartā su apastamaḥ bhūt

original: RV_4,017.04c ya īṃ jajāna svaryaṃ suvajram anapacyutaṃ sadaso na bhūma //
analyzed: yaḥ īm jajāna svaryam su vajram an apacyutam sadasaḥ na bhūma

original: RV_4,017.05a ya eka ic cyāvayati pra bhūmā rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūta indraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id cyāvayati pra bhūmā rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūtaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_4,017.05c satyam enam anu viśve madanti rātiṃ devasya gṛṇato maghonaḥ //
analyzed: satyam enam anu viśve madanti rātim devasya gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_4,017.06a satrā somā abhavann asya viśve satrā madāso bṛhato madiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: satrā somāḥ abhavan asya viśve satrā madāsaḥ bṛhataḥ madiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_4,017.06c satrābhavo vasupatir vasūnāṃ datre viśvā adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ //
analyzed: satrā bhavaḥ vasu patiḥ vasūnām datre viśvāḥ adhithāḥ indra kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_4,017.07a tvam adha prathamaṃ jāyamāno 'me viśvā adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ /
analyzed: tvam adha prathamam jāyamānaḥ me viśvāḥ adhithāḥ indra kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_4,017.07c tvam prati pravata āśayānam ahiṃ vajreṇa maghavan vi vṛścaḥ //
analyzed: tvam prati pravataḥ āśayānam ahim vajreṇa maghavan vi vṛścaḥ

original: RV_4,017.08a satrāhaṇaṃ dādhṛṣiṃ tumram indram mahām apāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suvajram /
analyzed: satrāhaṇam dādhṛṣim tumram indram mahām apāram vṛṣabham su vajram

original: RV_4,017.08c hantā yo vṛtraṃ sanitota vājaṃ dātā maghāni maghavā surādhāḥ //
analyzed: hantā yaḥ vṛtram sanitā uta vājam dātā maghāni maghavā su rādhāḥ

original: RV_4,017.09a ayaṃ vṛtaś cātayate samīcīr ya ājiṣu maghavā śṛṇva ekaḥ /
analyzed: ayam vṛtaḥ cātayate samīcīḥ yaḥ ājiṣu maghavā śṛṇve ekaḥ

original: RV_4,017.09c ayaṃ vājam bharati yaṃ sanoty asya priyāsaḥ sakhye syāma //
analyzed: ayam vājam bharati yam sanoti asya priyāsaḥ sakhye syāma

original: RV_4,017.10a ayaṃ śṛṇve adha jayann uta ghnann ayam uta pra kṛṇute yudhā gāḥ /
analyzed: ayam śṛṇve adha jayan uta ghnan ayam uta pra kṛṇute yudhā gāḥ

original: RV_4,017.10c yadā satyaṃ kṛṇute manyum indro viśvaṃ dṛḷham bhayata ejad asmāt //
analyzed: yadā satyam kṛṇute manyum indraḥ viśvam dṛḍham bhayate ejat asmāt

original: RV_4,017.11a sam indro gā ajayat saṃ hiraṇyā sam aśviyā maghavā yo ha pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: sam indraḥ gāḥ ajayat sam hiraṇyā sam aśviyā maghavā yaḥ ha pūrvīḥ

original: RV_4,017.11c ebhir nṛbhir nṛtamo asya śākai rāyo vibhaktā sambharaś ca vasvaḥ //
analyzed: ebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ nṛtamaḥ asya śākaiḥ rāyaḥ vibhaktā sambharaḥ ca vasvaḥ

original: RV_4,017.12a kiyat svid indro adhy eti mātuḥ kiyat pitur janitur yo jajāna /
analyzed: kiyat svid indraḥ adhi eti mātuḥ kiyat pituḥ janituḥ yaḥ jajāna

original: RV_4,017.12c yo asya śuṣmam muhukair iyarti vāto na jūta stanayadbhir abhraiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ asya śuṣmam muhukais iyarti vātaḥ na jūta stanayadbhiḥ abhraiḥ

original: RV_4,017.13a kṣiyantaṃ tvam akṣiyantaṃ kṛṇotīyarti reṇum maghavā samoham /
analyzed: kṣiyantam tvam a kṣiyantam kṛṇoti iyarti reṇum maghavā sa moham

original: RV_4,017.13c vibhañjanur aśanimāṃ iva dyaur uta stotāram maghavā vasau dhāt //
analyzed: vibhañjanuḥ aśanimān iva dyauḥ uta stotāram maghavā vasau dhāt

original: RV_4,017.14a ayaṃ cakram iṣaṇat sūryasya ny etaśaṃ rīramat sasṛmāṇam /
analyzed: ayam cakram iṣaṇat sūryasya ni etaśam rīramat sasṛmāṇam

original: RV_4,017.14b ā kṛṣṇa īṃ juhurāṇo jigharti tvaco budhne rajaso asya yonau //
analyzed: ā kṛṣṇaḥ īm juhurāṇaḥ jigharti tvacaḥ budhne rajasaḥ asya yonau

original: RV_4,017.15a asiknyāṃ yajamāno na hotā //
analyzed: asiknyām yajamānaḥ na hotā

original: RV_4,017.16a gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ /
analyzed: gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ

original: RV_4,017.16c janīyanto janidām akṣitotim ā cyāvayāmo 'vate na kośam //
analyzed: janīyantaḥ jani dām a kṣita ūtim ā cyāvayāmaḥ vate na kośam

original: RV_4,017.17a trātā no bodhi dadṛśāna āpir abhikhyātā marḍitā somyānām /
analyzed: trātā naḥ bodhi dadṛśānaḥ āpiḥ abhikhyātā marḍitā somyānām

original: RV_4,017.17c sakhā pitā pitṛtamaḥ pitṝṇāṃ kartem u lokam uśate vayodhāḥ //
analyzed: sakhā pitā pitṛtamaḥ pitṝṇām kartā īm u lokam uśate vayodhāḥ

original: RV_4,017.18a sakhīyatām avitā bodhi sakhā gṛṇāna indra stuvate vayo dhāḥ /
analyzed: sakhīyatām avitā bodhi sakhā gṛṇānaḥ indra stuvate vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_4,017.18c vayaṃ hy ā te cakṛmā sabādha ābhiḥ śamībhir mahayanta indra //
analyzed: vayam hi ā te cakṛma sabādhaḥ ābhiḥ śamībhiḥ mahayantaḥ indra

original: RV_4,017.19a stuta indro maghavā yad dha vṛtrā bhūrīṇy eko apratīni hanti /
analyzed: stutaḥ indraḥ maghavā yat ha vṛtrā bhūrīṇi ekaḥ apratīni hanti

original: RV_4,017.19c asya priyo jaritā yasya śarman nakir devā vārayante na martāḥ //
analyzed: asya priyaḥ jaritā yasya śarman nakir devāḥ vārayante na martāḥ

original: RV_4,017.20a evā na indro maghavā virapśī karat satyā carṣaṇīdhṛd anarvā /
analyzed: eva naḥ indraḥ maghavā virapśī karat satyā carṣaṇī dhṛt anarvā

original: RV_4,017.20c tvaṃ rājā januṣāṃ dhehy asme adhi śravo māhinaṃ yaj jaritre //
analyzed: tvam rājā januṣām dhehi asme adhi śravaḥ māhinam yat jaritre

original: RV_4,017.21a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,017.21c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,018.01a ayam panthā anuvittaḥ purāṇo yato devā udajāyanta viśve /
analyzed: ayam panthāḥ anuvittaḥ purāṇaḥ yatas devāḥ udajāyanta viśve

original: RV_4,018.01c ataś cid ā janiṣīṣṭa pravṛddho mā mātaram amuyā pattave kaḥ //
analyzed: atas cit ā janiṣīṣṭa pravṛddhaḥ mā mātaram amuyā pattave kaḥ

original: RV_4,018.02a nāham ato nir ayā durgahaitat tiraścatā pārśvān nir gamāṇi /
analyzed: na aham atas niḥ ayā durgahā etat tiraścatā pārśvāt niḥ gamāni

original: RV_4,018.02c bahūni me akṛtā kartvāni yudhyai tvena saṃ tvena pṛcchai //
analyzed: bahūni me a kṛtā kartvāni yudhyai tvena sam tvena pṛcchai

original: RV_4,018.03a parāyatīm mātaram anv acaṣṭa na nānu gāny anu nū gamāni /
analyzed: parāyatīm mātaram anu acaṣṭa na nā anu gāni anu nu gamāni

original: RV_4,018.03c tvaṣṭur gṛhe apibat somam indraḥ śatadhanyaṃ camvoḥ sutasya //
analyzed: tvaṣṭuḥ gṛhe apibat somam indraḥ śata dhanyam camvoḥ sutasya

original: RV_4,018.04a kiṃ sa ṛdhak kṛṇavad yaṃ sahasram māso jabhāra śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: kim saḥ ṛdhak kṛṇavat yam sahasram māsaḥ jabhāra śaradaḥ ca pūrvīḥ

original: RV_4,018.04c nahī nv asya pratimānam asty antar jāteṣūta ye janitvāḥ //
analyzed: nahi nu asya pratimānam asti antar jāteṣu uta ye janitvāḥ

original: RV_4,018.05a avadyam iva manyamānā guhākar indram mātā vīryeṇā nyṛṣṭam /
analyzed: avadyam iva manyamānā guhā akaḥ indram mātā vīryeṇa ā nyṛṣṭam

original: RV_4,018.05c athod asthāt svayam atkaṃ vasāna ā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ //
analyzed: atha ud asthāt svayam atkam vasānaḥ ā rodasī apṛṇāt jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_4,018.06a etā arṣanty alalābhavantīr ṛtāvarīr iva saṃkrośamānāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ arṣanti alalābhavantīḥ ṛtāvarīḥ iva saṃkrośamānāḥ

original: RV_4,018.06c etā vi pṛccha kim idam bhananti kam āpo adrim paridhiṃ rujanti //
analyzed: etāḥ vi pṛccha kim idam bhananti kam āpaḥ adrim paridhim rujanti

original: RV_4,018.07a kim u ṣvid asmai nivido bhanantendrasyāvadyaṃ didhiṣanta āpaḥ /
analyzed: kim u svid asmai nividaḥ bhananta indrasya avadyam didhiṣante āpaḥ

original: RV_4,018.07c mamaitān putro mahatā vadhena vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad vi sindhūn //
analyzed: mama etān putraḥ mahatā vadhena vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat vi sindhūn

original: RV_4,018.08a mamac cana tvā yuvatiḥ parāsa mamac cana tvā kuṣavā jagāra /
analyzed: mamat cana tvā yuvatiḥ parāsa mamat cana tvā kuṣavā jagāra

original: RV_4,018.08c mamac cid āpaḥ śiśave mamṛḍyur mamac cid indraḥ sahasod atiṣṭhat //
analyzed: mamat cit āpaḥ śiśave mamṛḍyuḥ mamat cit indraḥ sahasā ud atiṣṭhat

original: RV_4,018.09a mamac cana te maghavan vyaṃso nivividhvāṃ apa hanū jaghāna /
analyzed: mamat cana te maghavan vyaṃsaḥ nivividhvām apa hanū jaghāna

original: RV_4,018.09c adhā nividdha uttaro babhūvāñ chiro dāsasya sam piṇag vadhena //
analyzed: adhā nividdhaḥ uttaraḥ babhūvām śiraḥ dāsasya sam piṇak vadhena

original: RV_4,018.10a gṛṣṭiḥ sasūva sthaviraṃ tavāgām anādhṛṣyaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tumram indram /
analyzed: gṛṣṭiḥ sasūva sthaviram tavāgām anādhṛṣyam vṛṣabham tumram indram

original: RV_4,018.10c arīḷhaṃ vatsaṃ carathāya mātā svayaṃ gātuṃ tanva icchamānam //
