analyzed: a rīḍham vatsam carathāya mātā svayam gātum tanve icchamānam

original: RV_4,018.11a uta mātā mahiṣam anv avenad amī tvā jahati putra devāḥ /
analyzed: uta mātā mahiṣam anu avenat amī tvā jahati putra devāḥ

original: RV_4,018.11c athābravīd vṛtram indro haniṣyan sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva //
analyzed: athā bravīt vṛtram indraḥ haniṣyan sakhe viṣṇo vitaram vi kramasva

original: RV_4,018.12a kas te mātaraṃ vidhavām acakrac chayuṃ kas tvām ajighāṃsac carantam /
analyzed: kaḥ te mātaram vidhavām acakrat śayum kaḥ tvām ajighāṃsat carantam

original: RV_4,018.12c kas te devo adhi mārḍīka āsīd yat prākṣiṇāḥ pitaram pādagṛhya //
analyzed: kaḥ te devaḥ adhi mārḍīke āsīt yat prākṣiṇāḥ pitaram pādagṛhya

original: RV_4,018.13a avartyā śuna āntrāṇi pece na deveṣu vivide marḍitāram /
analyzed: avartyā śunaḥ āntrāṇi pece na deveṣu vivide marḍitāram

original: RV_4,018.13c apaśyaṃ jāyām amahīyamānām adhā me śyeno madhv ā jabhāra //
analyzed: apaśyam jāyām a mahīyamānām adhā me śyenaḥ madhu ā jabhāra

original: RV_4,019.01a evā tvām indra vajrinn atra viśve devāsaḥ suhavāsa ūmāḥ /
analyzed: eva tvām indra vajrin atra viśve devāsaḥ su havāsaḥ ūmāḥ

original: RV_4,019.01c mahām ubhe rodasī vṛddham ṛṣvaṃ nir ekam id vṛṇate vṛtrahatye //
analyzed: mahām ubhe rodasī vṛddham ṛṣvam niḥ ekam id vṛṇate vṛtra hatye

original: RV_4,019.02a avāsṛjanta jivrayo na devā bhuvaḥ samrāḷ indra satyayoniḥ /
analyzed: avāsṛjanta jivrayaḥ na devāḥ bhuvaḥ samrāj indra satya yoniḥ

original: RV_4,019.02c ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ pra vartanīr arado viśvadhenāḥ //
analyzed: ahan ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ pra vartanīḥ aradaḥ viśvadhenāḥ

original: RV_4,019.03a atṛpṇuvantaṃ viyatam abudhyam abudhyamānaṃ suṣupāṇam indra /
analyzed: a tṛpṇuvantam viyatam a budhyam a budhyamānam suṣupāṇam indra

original: RV_4,019.03c sapta prati pravata āśayānam ahiṃ vajreṇa vi riṇā aparvan //
analyzed: sapta prati pravataḥ āśayānam ahim vajreṇa vi riṇāḥ aparvan

original: RV_4,019.04a akṣodayac chavasā kṣāma budhnaṃ vār ṇa vātas taviṣībhir indraḥ /
analyzed: akṣodayat śavasā kṣāma budhnam vār na vātaḥ taviṣībhiḥ indraḥ

original: RV_4,019.04c dṛḷhāny aubhnād uśamāna ojo 'vābhinat kakubhaḥ parvatānām //
analyzed: dṛḍhāni aubhnāt uśamānaḥ ojaḥ vā abhinat kakubhaḥ parvatānām

original: RV_4,019.05a abhi pra dadrur janayo na garbhaṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sākam adrayaḥ /
analyzed: abhi pra dadruḥ janayaḥ na garbham rathāḥ iva pra yayuḥ sākam adrayaḥ

original: RV_4,019.05c atarpayo visṛta ubja ūrmīn tvaṃ vṛtāṃ ariṇā indra sindhūn //
analyzed: atarpayaḥ visṛte ubje ūrmīn tvam vṛtām ariṇāḥ indra sindhūn

original: RV_4,019.06a tvam mahīm avaniṃ viśvadhenāṃ turvītaye vayyāya kṣarantīm /
analyzed: tvam mahīm avanim viśvadhenām turvītaye vayyāya kṣarantīm

original: RV_4,019.06c aramayo namasaijad arṇaḥ sutaraṇāṃ akṛṇor indra sindhūn //
analyzed: aramayaḥ namasā ejat arṇaḥ su taraṇām akṛṇoḥ indra sindhūn

original: RV_4,019.07a prāgruvo nabhanvo na vakvā dhvasrā apinvad yuvatīr ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: prāgruvaḥ nabhanvaḥ na vakvāḥ dhvasrāḥ apinvat yuvatīḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_4,019.07c dhanvāny ajrāṃ apṛṇak tṛṣāṇāṃ adhog indra staryo daṃsupatnīḥ //
analyzed: dhanvāni ajrām apṛṇak tṛṣāṇām adhok indra staryaḥ daṃsu patnīḥ

original: RV_4,019.08a pūrvīr uṣasaḥ śaradaś ca gūrtā vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad vi sindhūn /
analyzed: pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ śaradaḥ ca gūrtāḥ vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat vi sindhūn

original: RV_4,019.08c pariṣṭhitā atṛṇad badbadhānāḥ sīrā indraḥ sravitave pṛthivyā //
analyzed: pariṣṭhitāḥ atṛṇat badbadhānāḥ sīrāḥ indraḥ sravitave pṛthivyā

original: RV_4,019.09a vamrībhiḥ putram agruvo adānaṃ niveśanād dhariva ā jabhartha /
analyzed: vamrībhiḥ putram agruvaḥ adānam niveśanāt harivas ā jabhartha

original: RV_4,019.09c vy andho akhyad ahim ādadāno nir bhūd ukhacchit sam aranta parva //
analyzed: vi andhaḥ akhyat ahim ādadānaḥ niḥ bhūt ukha chid sam aranta parva

original: RV_4,019.10a pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni viprāvidvāṃ āha viduṣe karāṃsi /
analyzed: pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vipra avidvān āha viduṣe karāṃsi

original: RV_4,019.10c yathā-yathā vṛṣṇyāni svagūrtāpāṃsi rājan naryāviveṣīḥ //
analyzed: yathā yathā vṛṣṇyāni sva gūrta apāṃsi rājan

original: RV_4,019.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,019.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,020.01a ā na indro dūrād ā na āsād abhiṣṭikṛd avase yāsad ugraḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ indraḥ dūrāt ā naḥ āsāt abhiṣṭi kṛt avase yāsat ugraḥ

original: RV_4,020.01c ojiṣṭhebhir nṛpatir vajrabāhuḥ saṃge samatsu turvaṇiḥ pṛtanyūn //
analyzed: ojiṣṭhebhiḥ nṛpatiḥ vajra bāhuḥ saṃge samatsu turvaṇiḥ pṛtanyūn

original: RV_4,020.02a ā na indro haribhir yātv acchārvācīno 'vase rādhase ca /
analyzed: ā naḥ indraḥ haribhiḥ yātu acchā arvācīnaḥ vase rādhase ca

original: RV_4,020.02c tiṣṭhāti vajrī maghavā virapśīmaṃ yajñam anu no vājasātau //
analyzed: tiṣṭhāti vajrī maghavā virapśī imam yajñam anu naḥ vājasātau

original: RV_4,020.03a imaṃ yajñaṃ tvam asmākam indra puro dadhat saniṣyasi kratuṃ naḥ /
analyzed: imam yajñam tvam asmākam indra puras dadhat saniṣyasi kratum naḥ

original: RV_4,020.03c śvaghnīva vajrin sanaye dhanānāṃ tvayā vayam arya ājiṃ jayema //
analyzed: śvaghnī iva vajrin sanaye dhanānām tvayā vayam aryaḥ ājim jayema

original: RV_4,020.04a uśann u ṣu ṇaḥ sumanā upāke somasya nu suṣutasya svadhāvaḥ /
analyzed: uśan u su naḥ sumanāḥ upāke somasya nu suṣutasya svadhāvas

original: RV_4,020.04c pā indra pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ sam andhasā mamadaḥ pṛṣṭhyena //
analyzed: pāḥ indra pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ sam andhasā mamadaḥ pṛṣṭhyena

original: RV_4,020.05a vi yo rarapśa ṛṣibhir navebhir vṛkṣo na pakvaḥ sṛṇyo na jetā /
analyzed: vi yaḥ rarapśe ṛṣibhiḥ navebhiḥ vṛkṣaḥ na pakvaḥ sṛṇyaḥ na jetā

original: RV_4,020.05c maryo na yoṣām abhi manyamāno 'cchā vivakmi puruhūtam indram //
analyzed: maryaḥ na yoṣām abhi manyamānā cha ā vivakmi puruhūtam indram

original: RV_4,020.06a girir na yaḥ svatavāṃ ṛṣva indraḥ sanād eva sahase jāta ugraḥ /
analyzed: giriḥ na yaḥ svatavān ṛṣvaḥ indraḥ sanāt eva sahase jātaḥ ugraḥ

original: RV_4,020.06c ādartā vajraṃ sthaviraṃ na bhīma udneva kośaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam //
analyzed: ādartā vajram sthaviram na bhīmaḥ udnā iva kośam vasunā nyṛṣṭam

original: RV_4,020.07a na yasya vartā januṣā nv asti na rādhasa āmarītā maghasya /
analyzed: na yasya vartā januṣā nu asti na rādhasaḥ āmarītā maghasya

original: RV_4,020.07c udvāvṛṣāṇas taviṣīva ugrāsmabhyaṃ daddhi puruhūta rāyaḥ //
analyzed: udvāvṛṣāṇaḥ taviṣīvas ugra asmabhyam daddhi puruhūta rāyaḥ

original: RV_4,020.08a īkṣe rāyaḥ kṣayasya carṣaṇīnām uta vrajam apavartāsi gonām /
analyzed: īkṣe rāyaḥ kṣayasya carṣaṇīnām uta vrajam apavartāsi gonām

original: RV_4,020.08c śikṣānaraḥ samitheṣu prahāvān vasvo rāśim abhinetāsi bhūrim //
analyzed: śikṣā naraḥ samitheṣu prahāvān vasvaḥ rāśim abhinetāsi bhūrim

original: RV_4,020.09a kayā tac chṛṇve śacyā śaciṣṭho yayā kṛṇoti muhu kā cid ṛṣvaḥ /
analyzed: kayā tat śṛṇve śacyā śaciṣṭhaḥ yayā kṛṇoti muhu kā cit ṛṣvaḥ

original: RV_4,020.09c puru dāśuṣe vicayiṣṭho aṃho 'thā dadhāti draviṇaṃ jaritre //
analyzed: puru dāśuṣe vicayiṣṭhaḥ aṃhaḥ thā dadhāti draviṇam jaritre

original: RV_4,020.10a mā no mardhīr ā bharā daddhi tan naḥ pra dāśuṣe dātave bhūri yat te /
analyzed: mā naḥ mardhīḥ ā bhara ā daddhi tat naḥ pra dāśuṣe dātave bhūri yat te

original: RV_4,020.10c navye deṣṇe śaste asmin ta ukthe pra bravāma vayam indra stuvantaḥ //
analyzed: navye deṣṇe śaste asmin te ukthe pra bravāma vayam indra stuvantaḥ

original: RV_4,020.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,020.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,021.01a ā yātv indro 'vasa upa na iha stutaḥ sadhamād astu śūraḥ /
analyzed: ā yātu indraḥ vase upa naḥ iha stutaḥ sadhamād astu śūraḥ

original: RV_4,021.01c vāvṛdhānas taviṣīr yasya pūrvīr dyaur na kṣatram abhibhūti puṣyāt //
analyzed: vāvṛdhānaḥ taviṣīḥ yasya pūrvīḥ dyauḥ na kṣatram abhibhūti puṣyāt

original: RV_4,021.02a tasyed iha stavatha vṛṣṇyāni tuvidyumnasya tuvirādhaso nṝn /
analyzed: tasya id iha stavatha vṛṣṇyāni tuvi dyumnasya tuvi rādhasaḥ nṝn

original: RV_4,021.02c yasya kratur vidathyo na samrāṭ sāhvān tarutro abhy asti kṛṣṭīḥ //
analyzed: yasya kratuḥ vidathyaḥ na samrāj sāhvān tarutraḥ abhī asti kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_4,021.03a ā yātv indro diva ā pṛthivyā makṣū samudrād uta vā purīṣāt /
analyzed: ā yātu indraḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ makṣū samudrāt uta vā purīṣāt

original: RV_4,021.03c svarṇarād avase no marutvān parāvato vā sadanād ṛtasya //
analyzed: svarṇarāt avase naḥ marutvān parāvataḥ vā sadanāt ṛtasya

original: RV_4,021.04a sthūrasya rāyo bṛhato ya īśe tam u ṣṭavāma vidatheṣv indram /
analyzed: sthūrasya rāyaḥ bṛhataḥ yaḥ īśe tam u stavāma vidatheṣu indram

original: RV_4,021.04c yo vāyunā jayati gomatīṣu pra dhṛṣṇuyā nayati vasyo accha //
analyzed: yaḥ vāyunā jayati gomatīṣu pra dhṛṣṇuyā nayati vasyaḥ accha

original: RV_4,021.05a upa yo namo namasi stabhāyann iyarti vācaṃ janayan yajadhyai /
analyzed: upa yaḥ namaḥ namasi stabhāyan iyarti vācam janayan yajadhyai

original: RV_4,021.05c ṛñjasānaḥ puruvāra ukthair endraṃ kṛṇvīta sadaneṣu hotā //
analyzed: ṛñjasānaḥ puru vāraḥ ukthaiḥ ā indram kṛṇvīta sadaneṣu hotā

original: RV_4,021.06a dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇyantaḥ saraṇyān sadanto adrim auśijasya gohe /
analyzed: dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇyantaḥ saraṇyān sadantaḥ adrim auśijasya gohe

original: RV_4,021.06c ā duroṣāḥ pāstyasya hotā yo no mahān saṃvaraṇeṣu vahniḥ //
analyzed: ā duroṣāḥ pāstyasya hotā yaḥ naḥ mahān saṃvaraṇeṣu vahniḥ

original: RV_4,021.07a satrā yad īm bhārvarasya vṛṣṇaḥ siṣakti śuṣma stuvate bharāya /
analyzed: satrā yat īm bhārvarasya vṛṣṇaḥ siṣakti śuṣma stuvate bharāya

original: RV_4,021.07c guhā yad īm auśijasya gohe pra yad dhiye prāyase madāya //
analyzed: guhā yat īm auśijasya gohe pra yat dhiye prāyase madāya

original: RV_4,021.08a vi yad varāṃsi parvatasya vṛṇve payobhir jinve apāṃ javāṃsi /
analyzed: vi yat varāṃsi parvatasya vṛṇve payobhiḥ jinve apām javāṃsi

original: RV_4,021.08c vidad gaurasya gavayasya gohe yadī vājāya sudhyo vahanti //
analyzed: vidat gaurasya gavayasya gohe yadī vājāya sudhyaḥ vahanti

original: RV_4,021.09a bhadrā te hastā sukṛtota pāṇī prayantārā stuvate rādha indra /
analyzed: bhadrā te hastā su kṛtā uta pāṇī prayantārā stuvate rādhaḥ indra

original: RV_4,021.09c kā te niṣattiḥ kim u no mamatsi kiṃ nod-ud u harṣase dātavā u //
analyzed: kā te niṣattiḥ kim u na u mamatsi kim na udud u harṣase dātavai u

original: RV_4,021.10a evā vasva indraḥ satyaḥ samrāḍ ḍhantā vṛtraṃ varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ /
analyzed: eva vasvaḥ indraḥ satyaḥ samrāj ḍhantā vṛtram varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ

original: RV_4,021.10c puruṣṭuta kratvā naḥ śagdhi rāyo bhakṣīya te 'vaso daivyasya //
analyzed: puruṣṭuta kratvā naḥ śagdhi rāyaḥ bhakṣīya te vaso daivyasya

original: RV_4,021.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,021.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,022.01a yan na indro jujuṣe yac ca vaṣṭi tan no mahān karati śuṣmy ā cit /
analyzed: yat naḥ indraḥ jujuṣe yat ca vaṣṭi tat naḥ mahān karati śuṣmī ā cit

original: RV_4,022.01c brahma stomam maghavā somam ukthā yo aśmānaṃ śavasā bibhrad eti //
analyzed: brahma stomam maghavā somam ukthā yaḥ aśmānam śavasā bibhrat eti

original: RV_4,022.02a vṛṣā vṛṣandhiṃ caturaśrim asyann ugro bāhubhyāṃ nṛtamaḥ śacīvān /
analyzed: vṛṣā vṛṣandhim catur aśrim asyan ugraḥ bāhubhyām nṛtamaḥ śacīvān

original: RV_4,022.02c śriye paruṣṇīm uṣamāṇa ūrṇāṃ yasyāḥ parvāṇi sakhyāya vivye //
analyzed: śriye paruṣṇīm uṣamāṇaḥ ūrṇām yasyāḥ parvāṇi sakhyāya vivye

original: RV_4,022.03a yo devo devatamo jāyamāno maho vājebhir mahadbhiś ca śuṣmaiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ devaḥ devatamaḥ jāyamānaḥ mahaḥ vājebhiḥ mahadbhiḥ ca śuṣmaiḥ

original: RV_4,022.03c dadhāno vajram bāhvor uśantaṃ dyām amena rejayat pra bhūma //
analyzed: dadhānaḥ vajram bāhvoḥ uśantam dyām amena rejayat pra bhūma

original: RV_4,022.04a viśvā rodhāṃsi pravataś ca pūrvīr dyaur ṛṣvāj janiman rejata kṣāḥ /
analyzed: viśvā rodhāṃsi pravataḥ ca pūrvīḥ dyauḥ ṛṣvāt janiman rejata kṣāḥ

original: RV_4,022.04c ā mātarā bharati śuṣmy ā gor nṛvat parijman nonuvanta vātāḥ //
analyzed: ā mātarā bharati śuṣmī ā goḥ nṛvat parijman nonuvanta vātāḥ

original: RV_4,022.05a tā tū ta indra mahato mahāni viśveṣv it savaneṣu pravācyā /
analyzed: tā tu te indra mahataḥ mahāni viśveṣu id savaneṣu pravācyā

original: RV_4,022.05c yac chūra dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā dadhṛṣvān ahiṃ vajreṇa śavasāviveṣīḥ //
analyzed: yat śūra dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā dadhṛṣvān ahim vajreṇa śavasā aviveṣīḥ

original: RV_4,022.06a tā tū te satyā tuvinṛmṇa viśvā pra dhenavaḥ sisrate vṛṣṇa ūdhnaḥ /
analyzed: tā tu te satyā tuvi nṛmṇa viśvā pra dhenavaḥ sisrate vṛṣṇaḥ ūdhnaḥ

original: RV_4,022.06c adhā ha tvad vṛṣamaṇo bhiyānāḥ pra sindhavo javasā cakramanta //
analyzed: adhā ha tvat vṛṣamaṇaḥ bhiyānāḥ pra sindhavaḥ javasā cakramanta

original: RV_4,022.07a atrāha te harivas tā u devīr avobhir indra stavanta svasāraḥ /
analyzed: atra aha te harivas tāḥ u devīḥ avobhiḥ indra stavanta svasāraḥ

original: RV_4,022.07c yat sīm anu pra muco badbadhānā dīrghām anu prasitiṃ syandayadhyai //
analyzed: yat sīm anu pra mucaḥ badbadhānāḥ dīrghām anu prasitim syanda yadhyai

original: RV_4,022.08a pipīḷe aṃśur madyo na sindhur ā tvā śamī śaśamānasya śaktiḥ /
analyzed: pipīḍe aṃśuḥ madyaḥ na sindhuḥ ā tvā śamī śaśamānasya śaktiḥ

original: RV_4,022.08c asmadryak chuśucānasya yamyā āśur na raśmiṃ tuvyojasaṃ goḥ //
analyzed: asmadryak śuśucānasya yamyāḥ āśuḥ na raśmim tuvi ojasam goḥ

original: RV_4,022.09a asme varṣiṣṭhā kṛṇuhi jyeṣṭhā nṛmṇāni satrā sahure sahāṃsi /
analyzed: asme varṣiṣṭhā kṛṇuhi jyeṣṭhā nṛmṇāni satrā sahure sahāṃsi

original: RV_4,022.09c asmabhyaṃ vṛtrā suhanāni randhi jahi vadhar vanuṣo martyasya //
analyzed: asmabhyam vṛtrā su hanāni randhi jahi vadhar vanuṣaḥ martyasya

original: RV_4,022.10a asmākam it su śṛṇuhi tvam indrāsmabhyaṃ citrāṃ upa māhi vājān /
analyzed: asmākam id su śṛṇuhi tvam indra asmabhyam citrān upa māhi vājān

original: RV_4,022.10c asmabhyaṃ viśvā iṣaṇaḥ purandhīr asmākaṃ su maghavan bodhi godāḥ //
analyzed: asmabhyam viśvāḥ iṣaṇaḥ purandhīḥ asmākam su maghavan bodhi go dāḥ

original: RV_4,022.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,022.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,023.01a kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotur yajñaṃ juṣāṇo abhi somam ūdhaḥ /
analyzed: kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotuḥ yajñam juṣāṇaḥ abhi somam ūdhaḥ

original: RV_4,023.01c pibann uśāno juṣamāṇo andho vavakṣa ṛṣvaḥ śucate dhanāya //
analyzed: piban uśānaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ andhaḥ vavakṣa ṛṣvaḥ śucate dhanāya

original: RV_4,023.02a ko asya vīraḥ sadhamādam āpa sam ānaṃśa sumatibhiḥ ko asya /
analyzed: kaḥ asya vīraḥ sadhamādam āpa sam ānaṃśa sumatibhiḥ kaḥ asya

original: RV_4,023.02c kad asya citraṃ cikite kad ūtī vṛdhe bhuvac chaśamānasya yajyoḥ //
analyzed: kad asya citram cikite kad ūtī vṛdhe bhuvat śaśamānasya yajyoḥ

original: RV_4,023.03a kathā śṛṇoti hūyamānam indraḥ kathā śṛṇvann avasām asya veda /
analyzed: kathā śṛṇoti hūyamānam indraḥ kathā śṛṇvan avasām asya veda

original: RV_4,023.03c kā asya pūrvīr upamātayo ha kathainam āhuḥ papuriṃ jaritre //
analyzed: kāḥ asya pūrvīḥ upamātayaḥ ha kathā enam āhuḥ papurim jaritre

original: RV_4,023.04a kathā sabādhaḥ śaśamāno asya naśad abhi draviṇaṃ dīdhyānaḥ /
analyzed: kathā sabādhaḥ śaśamānaḥ asya naśat abhi draviṇam dīdhyānaḥ

original: RV_4,023.04c devo bhuvan navedā ma ṛtānāṃ namo jagṛbhvāṃ abhi yaj jujoṣat //
analyzed: devaḥ bhuvat navedāḥ me ṛtānām namaḥ jagṛbhvām abhi yat jujoṣat

original: RV_4,023.05a kathā kad asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau devo martasya sakhyaṃ jujoṣa /
analyzed: kathā kad asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau devaḥ martasya sakhyam jujoṣa

original: RV_4,023.05c kathā kad asya sakhyaṃ sakhibhyo ye asmin kāmaṃ suyujaṃ tatasre //
analyzed: kathā kad asya sakhyam sakhibhyaḥ ye asmin kāmam su yujam tatasre

original: RV_4,023.06a kim ād amatraṃ sakhyaṃ sakhibhyaḥ kadā nu te bhrātram pra bravāma /
analyzed: kim āt amatram sakhyam sakhibhyaḥ kadā nu te bhrātram pra bravāma

original: RV_4,023.06c śriye sudṛśo vapur asya sargāḥ svar ṇa citratamam iṣa ā goḥ //
analyzed: śriye sudṛśaḥ vapuḥ asya sargāḥ svar na citratamam iṣaḥ ā goḥ

original: RV_4,023.07a druhaṃ jighāṃsan dhvarasam anindrāṃ tetikte tigmā tujase anīkā /
analyzed: druham jighāṃsan dhvarasam an indrām tetikte tigmā tujase anīkā

original: RV_4,023.07c ṛṇā cid yatra ṛṇayā na ugro dūre ajñātā uṣaso babādhe //
analyzed: ṛṇā cit yatra ṛṇayāḥ naḥ ugraḥ dūre ajñātāḥ uṣasaḥ babādhe

original: RV_4,023.08a ṛtasya hi śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīr ṛtasya dhītir vṛjināni hanti /
analyzed: ṛtasya hi śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ ṛtasya dhītiḥ vṛjināni hanti

original: RV_4,023.08c ṛtasya śloko badhirā tatarda karṇā budhānaḥ śucamāna āyoḥ //
analyzed: ṛtasya ślokaḥ badhirā tatarda karṇā budhānaḥ śucamānaḥ āyoḥ

original: RV_4,023.09a ṛtasya dṛḷhā dharuṇāni santi purūṇi candrā vapuṣe vapūṃṣi /
analyzed: ṛtasya dṛḍhā dharuṇāni santi purūṇi candrā vapuṣe vapūṃṣi

original: RV_4,023.09c ṛtena dīrgham iṣaṇanta pṛkṣa ṛtena gāva ṛtam ā viveśuḥ //
analyzed: ṛtena dīrgham iṣaṇanta pṛkṣaḥ ṛtena gāvaḥ ṛtam ā viveśuḥ

original: RV_4,023.10a ṛtaṃ yemāna ṛtam id vanoty ṛtasya śuṣmas turayā u gavyuḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam yemānaḥ ṛtam id vanoti ṛtasya śuṣmaḥ tura yāḥ u gavyuḥ

original: RV_4,023.10c ṛtāya pṛthvī bahule gabhīre ṛtāya dhenū parame duhāte //
analyzed: ṛtāya pṛthvī bahule gabhīre ṛtāya dhenū parame duhāte

original: RV_4,023.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,023.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,024.01a kā suṣṭutiḥ śavasaḥ sūnum indram arvācīnaṃ rādhasa ā vavartat /
analyzed: kā suṣṭutiḥ śavasaḥ sūnum indram arvācīnam rādhasaḥ ā vavartat

original: RV_4,024.01c dadir hi vīro gṛṇate vasūni sa gopatir niṣṣidhāṃ no janāsaḥ //
analyzed: dadiḥ hi vīraḥ gṛṇate vasūni sa go patiḥ niṣṣidhām naḥ janāsaḥ

original: RV_4,024.02a sa vṛtrahatye havyaḥ sa īḍyaḥ sa suṣṭuta indraḥ satyarādhāḥ /
analyzed: sa vṛtra hatye havyaḥ saḥ īḍyaḥ sa suṣṭutaḥ indraḥ satya rādhāḥ

original: RV_4,024.02c sa yāmann ā maghavā martyāya brahmaṇyate suṣvaye varivo dhāt //
analyzed: sa yāman ā maghavā martyāya brahmaṇyate suṣvaye varivaḥ dhāt

original: RV_4,024.03a tam in naro vi hvayante samīke ririkvāṃsas tanvaḥ kṛṇvata trām /
analyzed: tam id naraḥ vi hvayante samīke ririkvāṃsaḥ tanvaḥ kṛṇvata trām

original: RV_4,024.03c mitho yat tyāgam ubhayāso agman naras tokasya tanayasya sātau //
analyzed: mithas yat tyāgam ubhayāsaḥ agman naraḥ tokasya tanayasya sātau

original: RV_4,024.04a kratūyanti kṣitayo yoga ugrāśuṣāṇāso mitho arṇasātau /
analyzed: kratūyanti kṣitayaḥ yoge ugra āśuṣāṇāsaḥ mithas arṇa sātau

original: RV_4,024.04c saṃ yad viśo 'vavṛtranta yudhmā ād in nema indrayante abhīke //
analyzed: sam yat viśaḥ vavṛtranta yudhmāḥ āt id neme indrayante abhīke

original: RV_4,024.05a ād id dha nema indriyaṃ yajanta ād it paktiḥ puroḷāśaṃ riricyāt /
analyzed: āt id ha neme indriyam yajante āt id paktiḥ puroḷāśam riricyāt

original: RV_4,024.05c ād it somo vi papṛcyād asuṣvīn ād ij jujoṣa vṛṣabhaṃ yajadhyai //
analyzed: āt id somaḥ vi papṛcyāt a suṣvīn āt id jujoṣa vṛṣabham yajadhyai

original: RV_4,024.06a kṛṇoty asmai varivo ya itthendrāya somam uśate sunoti /
analyzed: kṛṇoti asmai varivaḥ yaḥ itthā indrāya somam uśate sunoti

original: RV_4,024.06c sadhrīcīnena manasāvivenan tam it sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute samatsu //
analyzed: sadhrīcīnena manasā a vivenan tam id sakhāyam kṛṇute samatsu

original: RV_4,024.07a ya indrāya sunavat somam adya pacāt paktīr uta bhṛjjāti dhānāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ indrāya sunavat somam adya pacāt paktīḥ uta bhṛjjāti dhānāḥ

original: RV_4,024.07c prati manāyor ucathāni haryan tasmin dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indraḥ //
analyzed: prati manāyoḥ ucathāni haryan tasmin dadhat vṛṣaṇam śuṣmam indraḥ

original: RV_4,024.08a yadā samaryaṃ vy aced ṛghāvā dīrghaṃ yad ājim abhy akhyad aryaḥ /
analyzed: yadā samaryam vi acet ṛghāvā dīrgham yat ājim abhī akhyat aryaḥ

original: RV_4,024.08c acikradad vṛṣaṇam patny acchā duroṇa ā niśitaṃ somasudbhiḥ //
analyzed: acikradat vṛṣaṇam patnī acchā duroṇe ā niśitam soma sudbhiḥ

original: RV_4,024.09a bhūyasā vasnam acarat kanīyo 'vikrīto akāniṣam punar yan /
analyzed: bhūyasā vasnam acarat kanīyaḥ vikrītaḥ akāniṣam punar yan

original: RV_4,024.09c sa bhūyasā kanīyo nārirecīd dīnā dakṣā vi duhanti pra vāṇam //
analyzed: sa bhūyasā kanīyaḥ nā arirecīt dīnāḥ dakṣāḥ vi duhanti pra vāṇam

original: RV_4,024.10a ka imaṃ daśabhir mamendraṃ krīṇāti dhenubhiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ imam daśabhiḥ mama indram krīṇāti dhenubhiḥ

original: RV_4,024.10c yadā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad athainam me punar dadat //
analyzed: yadā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat atha enam me punar dadat

original: RV_4,024.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
analyzed: nu stutaḥ indra nu gṛṇānaḥ iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ

original: RV_4,024.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: akāri te harivas brahma navyam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,025.01a ko adya naryo devakāma uśann indrasya sakhyaṃ jujoṣa /
analyzed: kaḥ adya naryaḥ deva kāmaḥ uśan indrasya sakhyam jujoṣa

original: RV_4,025.01c ko vā mahe 'vase pāryāya samiddhe agnau sutasoma īṭṭe //
analyzed: kaḥ vā mahe vase pāryāya samiddhe agnau suta somaḥ īṭṭe

original: RV_4,025.02a ko nānāma vacasā somyāya manāyur vā bhavati vasta usrāḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ nānāma vacasā somyāya manāyuḥ vā bhavati vaste usrāḥ

original: RV_4,025.02c ka indrasya yujyaṃ kaḥ sakhitvaṃ ko bhrātraṃ vaṣṭi kavaye ka ūtī //
analyzed: kaḥ indrasya yujyam kaḥ sakhi tvam kaḥ bhrātram vaṣṭi kavaye kaḥ ūtī

original: RV_4,025.03a ko devānām avo adyā vṛṇīte ka ādityāṃ aditiṃ jyotir īṭṭe /
analyzed: kaḥ devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīte kaḥ ādityām aditim jyotiḥ īṭṭe

original: RV_4,025.03c kasyāśvināv indro agniḥ sutasyāṃśoḥ pibanti manasāvivenam //
analyzed: kasya aśvinau indraḥ agniḥ sutasya aṃśoḥ pibanti manasā a vivenam

original: RV_4,025.04a tasmā agnir bhārataḥ śarma yaṃsaj jyok paśyāt sūryam uccarantam /
analyzed: tasmai agniḥ bhārataḥ śarma yaṃsat jyok paśyāt sūryam uccarantam

original: RV_4,025.04c ya indrāya sunavāmety āha nare naryāya nṛtamāya nṛṇām //
analyzed: yaḥ indrāya sunavāma iti āha nare naryāya nṛtamāya nṛṇām

original: RV_4,025.05a na taṃ jinanti bahavo na dabhrā urv asmā aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat /
analyzed: na tam jinanti bahavaḥ na dabhrāḥ uru asmai aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_4,025.05c priyaḥ sukṛt priya indre manāyuḥ priyaḥ suprāvīḥ priyo asya somī //
analyzed: priyaḥ su kṛt priyaḥ indre manāyuḥ priyaḥ su prāvīḥ priyaḥ asya somī

original: RV_4,025.06a suprāvyaḥ prāśuṣāḷ eṣa vīraḥ suṣveḥ paktiṃ kṛṇute kevalendraḥ /
analyzed: suprāvyaḥ prāśuṣāh eṣa vīraḥ suṣveḥ paktim kṛṇute kevala indraḥ

original: RV_4,025.06c nāsuṣver āpir na sakhā na jāmir duṣprāvyo 'vahanted avācaḥ //
analyzed: na a suṣveḥ āpiḥ na sakhā na jāmiḥ duṣprāvyaḥ vahanta id avācaḥ

original: RV_4,025.07a na revatā paṇinā sakhyam indro 'sunvatā sutapāḥ saṃ gṛṇīte /
analyzed: na revatā paṇinā sakhyam indraḥ sunvatā suta pāḥ sam gṛṇīte

original: RV_4,025.07c āsya vedaḥ khidati hanti nagnaṃ vi suṣvaye paktaye kevalo bhūt //
analyzed: ā asya vedaḥ khidati hanti nagnam vi suṣvaye paktaye kevalaḥ bhūt

original: RV_4,025.08a indram pare 'vare madhyamāsa indraṃ yānto 'vasitāsa indram /
analyzed: indram pare vare madhyamāsaḥ indram yāntaḥ vasitāsaḥ indram

original: RV_4,025.08c indraṃ kṣiyanta uta yudhyamānā indraṃ naro vājayanto havante //
analyzed: indram kṣiyantaḥ uta yudhyamānāḥ indram naraḥ vājayantaḥ havante

original: RV_4,026.01a aham manur abhavaṃ sūryaś cāhaṃ kakṣīvāṃ ṛṣir asmi vipraḥ /
analyzed: aham manuḥ abhavam sūryaḥ ca aham kakṣīvān ṛṣiḥ asmi vipraḥ

original: RV_4,026.01c ahaṃ kutsam ārjuneyaṃ ny ṛñje 'haṃ kavir uśanā paśyatā mā //
analyzed: aham kutsam ārjuneyam ni ṛñje ham kaviḥ uśanā paśyata mā

original: RV_4,026.02a aham bhūmim adadām āryāyāhaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ dāśuṣe martyāya /
analyzed: aham bhūmim adadām āryāya aham vṛṣṭim dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_4,026.02c aham apo anayaṃ vāvaśānā mama devāso anu ketam āyan //
analyzed: aham apaḥ anayam vāvaśānāḥ mama devāsaḥ anu ketam āyan

original: RV_4,026.03a aham puro mandasāno vy airaṃ nava sākaṃ navatīḥ śambarasya /
analyzed: aham puraḥ mandasānaḥ vi airam nava sākam navatīḥ śambarasya

original: RV_4,026.03c śatatamaṃ veśyaṃ sarvatātā divodāsam atithigvaṃ yad āvam //
analyzed: śatatamam veśyam sarvatātā divodāsam atithigvam yat āvam

original: RV_4,026.04a pra su ṣa vibhyo maruto vir astu pra śyenaḥ śyenebhya āśupatvā /
analyzed: pra su sa vibhyaḥ marutaḥ viḥ astu pra śyenaḥ śyenebhyaḥ āśu patvā

original: RV_4,026.04c acakrayā yat svadhayā suparṇo havyam bharan manave devajuṣṭam //
analyzed: acakrayā yat svadhayā suparṇaḥ havyam bharat manave deva juṣṭam

original: RV_4,026.05a bharad yadi vir ato vevijānaḥ pathoruṇā manojavā asarji /
analyzed: bharat yadi viḥ atas vevijānaḥ pathā uruṇā manaḥ javāḥ asarji

original: RV_4,026.05c tūyaṃ yayau madhunā somyenota śravo vivide śyeno atra //
analyzed: tūyam yayau madhunā somyena uta śravaḥ vivide śyenaḥ atra

original: RV_4,026.06a ṛjīpī śyeno dadamāno aṃśum parāvataḥ śakuno mandram madam /
analyzed: ṛjīpī śyenaḥ dadamānaḥ aṃśum parāvataḥ śakunaḥ mandram madam

original: RV_4,026.06c somam bharad dādṛhāṇo devāvān divo amuṣmād uttarād ādāya //
analyzed: somam bharat dādṛhāṇaḥ devāvān divaḥ amuṣmāt uttarāt ādāya

original: RV_4,026.07a ādāya śyeno abharat somaṃ sahasraṃ savāṃ ayutaṃ ca sākam /
analyzed: ādāya śyenaḥ abharat somam sahasram savām ayutam ca sākam

original: RV_4,026.07c atrā purandhir ajahād arātīr made somasya mūrā amūraḥ //
analyzed: atrā purandhiḥ ajahāt arātīḥ made somasya mūrāḥ a mūraḥ

original: RV_4,027.01a garbhe nu sann anv eṣām avedam ahaṃ devānāṃ janimāni viśvā /
analyzed: garbhe nu san anu eṣām avedam aham devānām janimāni viśvā

original: RV_4,027.01c śatam mā pura āyasīr arakṣann adha śyeno javasā nir adīyam //
analyzed: śatam mā puraḥ āyasīḥ arakṣan adha śyenaḥ javasā niḥ adīyam

original: RV_4,027.02a na ghā sa mām apa joṣaṃ jabhārābhīm āsa tvakṣasā vīryeṇa /
analyzed: na ghā sa mām apa joṣam jabhāra abhi īm āsa tvakṣasā vīryeṇa

original: RV_4,027.02c īrmā purandhir ajahād arātīr uta vātāṃ atarac chūśuvānaḥ //
analyzed: īrmā purandhiḥ ajahāt arātīḥ uta vātām atarat śūśuvānaḥ

original: RV_4,027.03a ava yac chyeno asvanīd adha dyor vi yad yadi vāta ūhuḥ purandhim /
analyzed: ava yat śyenaḥ asvanīt adha dyoḥ vi yat yadi vā atas ūhuḥ purandhim

original: RV_4,027.03c sṛjad yad asmā ava ha kṣipaj jyāṃ kṛśānur astā manasā bhuraṇyan //
analyzed: sṛjat yat asmai ava ha kṣipat jyām kṛśānuḥ astā manasā bhuraṇyan

original: RV_4,027.04a ṛjipya īm indrāvato na bhujyuṃ śyeno jabhāra bṛhato adhi ṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: ṛjipyaḥ īm indrāvataḥ na bhujyum śyenaḥ jabhāra bṛhataḥ adhi snoḥ

original: RV_4,027.04c antaḥ patat patatry asya parṇam adha yāmani prasitasya tad veḥ //
analyzed: antar patat patatri asya parṇam adha yāmani prasitasya tat veḥ

original: RV_4,027.05a adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktam āpipyānam maghavā śukram andhaḥ /
analyzed: adha śvetam kalaśam gobhiḥ aktam āpipyānam maghavā śukram andhaḥ

original: RV_4,027.05c adhvaryubhiḥ prayatam madhvo agram indro madāya prati dhat pibadhyai śūro madāya prati dhat pibadhyai //
analyzed: adhvaryubhiḥ prayatam madhvaḥ agram indraḥ madāya prati dhat pibadhyai śūraḥ madāya prati dhat pibadhyai

original: RV_4,028.01a tvā yujā tava tat soma sakhya indro apo manave sasrutas kaḥ /
analyzed: tvā yujā tava tat soma sakhye indraḥ apaḥ manave sasrutaḥ kaḥ

original: RV_4,028.01c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn apāvṛṇod apihiteva khāni //
analyzed: ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn apāvṛṇot apihitā iva khāni

original: RV_4,028.02a tvā yujā ni khidat sūryasyendraś cakraṃ sahasā sadya indo /
analyzed: tvā yujā ni khidat sūryasya indraḥ cakram sahasā sadyas indo

original: RV_4,028.02c adhi ṣṇunā bṛhatā vartamānam maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi //
analyzed: adhi snunā bṛhatā vartamānam mahaḥ druhaḥ apa viśva āyu dhāyi

original: RV_4,028.03a ahann indro adahad agnir indo purā dasyūn madhyandinād abhīke /
analyzed: ahan indraḥ adahat agniḥ indo purā dasyūn madhyandināt abhīke

original: RV_4,028.03c durge duroṇe kratvā na yātām purū sahasrā śarvā ni barhīt //
analyzed: durge duroṇe kratvā na yātām purū sahasrā śarvā ni barhīt

original: RV_4,028.04a viśvasmāt sīm adhamāṃ indra dasyūn viśo dāsīr akṛṇor apraśastāḥ /
analyzed: viśvasmāt sīm adhamān indra dasyūn viśaḥ dāsīḥ akṛṇoḥ apraśastāḥ

original: RV_4,028.04c abādhethām amṛṇataṃ ni śatrūn avindethām apacitiṃ vadhatraiḥ //
analyzed: abādhethām amṛṇatam ni śatrūn avindethām apacitim vadhatraiḥ

original: RV_4,028.05a evā satyam maghavānā yuvaṃ tad indraś ca somorvam aśvyaṃ goḥ /
analyzed: eva satyam maghavānā yuvam tat indraḥ ca soma ūrvam aśvyam goḥ

original: RV_4,028.05c ādardṛtam apihitāny aśnā riricathuḥ kṣāś cit tatṛdānā //
analyzed: ādardṛtam apihitāni aśnā riricathuḥ kṣāḥ cit tatṛdānā

original: RV_4,029.01a ā na stuta upa vājebhir ūtī indra yāhi haribhir mandasānaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ stutaḥ upa vājebhiḥ ūtī indra yāhi haribhiḥ mandasānaḥ

original: RV_4,029.01c tiraś cid aryaḥ savanā purūṇy āṅgūṣebhir gṛṇānaḥ satyarādhāḥ //
analyzed: tiras cit aryaḥ savanā purūṇi āṅgūṣebhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ satya rādhāḥ

original: RV_4,029.02a ā hi ṣmā yāti naryaś cikitvān hūyamānaḥ sotṛbhir upa yajñam /
analyzed: ā hi sma yāti naryaḥ cikitvān hūyamānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ upa yajñam

original: RV_4,029.02c svaśvo yo abhīrur manyamānaḥ suṣvāṇebhir madati saṃ ha vīraiḥ //
analyzed: su aśvaḥ yaḥ abhīruḥ manyamānaḥ suṣvāṇebhiḥ madati sam ha vīraiḥ

original: RV_4,029.03a śrāvayed asya karṇā vājayadhyai juṣṭām anu pra diśam mandayadhyai /
analyzed: śrāvayet asya karṇā vājayadhyai juṣṭām anu pra diśam mandayadhyai

original: RV_4,029.03c udvāvṛṣāṇo rādhase tuviṣmān karan na indraḥ sutīrthābhayaṃ ca //
analyzed: udvāvṛṣāṇaḥ rādhase tuviṣmān karat naḥ indraḥ su tīrthā abhayam ca

original: RV_4,029.04a acchā yo gantā nādhamānam ūtī itthā vipraṃ havamānaṃ gṛṇantam /
analyzed: acchā yaḥ gantā nādhamānam ūtī itthā vipram havamānam gṛṇantam

original: RV_4,029.04c upa tmani dadhāno dhury āśūn sahasrāṇi śatāni vajrabāhuḥ //
analyzed: upa tmani dadhānaḥ dhuri āśūn sahasrāṇi śatāni vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_4,029.05a tvotāso maghavann indra viprā vayaṃ te syāma sūrayo gṛṇantaḥ /
analyzed: tvotāsaḥ maghavan indra viprāḥ vayam te syāma sūrayaḥ gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_4,029.05c bhejānāso bṛhaddivasya rāya ākāyyasya dāvane purukṣoḥ //
analyzed: bhejānāsaḥ bṛhat divasya rāyaḥ ākāyyasya dāvane purukṣoḥ

original: RV_4,030.01a nakir indra tvad uttaro na jyāyāṃ asti vṛtrahan /
analyzed: nakir indra tvat uttaraḥ na jyāyām asti vṛtrahan

original: RV_4,030.01c nakir evā yathā tvam //
analyzed: nakir evā yathā tvam

original: RV_4,030.02a satrā te anu kṛṣṭayo viśvā cakreva vāvṛtuḥ /
analyzed: satrā te anu kṛṣṭayaḥ viśvā cakrā iva vāvṛtuḥ

original: RV_4,030.02c satrā mahāṃ asi śrutaḥ //
analyzed: satrā mahān asi śrutaḥ

original: RV_4,030.03a viśve caned anā tvā devāsa indra yuyudhuḥ /
analyzed: viśve cana id anā tvā devāsaḥ indra yuyudhuḥ

original: RV_4,030.03c yad ahā naktam ātiraḥ //
analyzed: yat ahā naktam ātiraḥ

original: RV_4,030.04a yatrota bādhitebhyaś cakraṃ kutsāya yudhyate /
analyzed: yatra uta bādhitebhyaḥ cakram kutsāya yudhyate

original: RV_4,030.04c muṣāya indra sūryam //
analyzed: muṣāya indra sūryam

original: RV_4,030.05a yatra devāṃ ṛghāyato viśvāṃ ayudhya eka it /
analyzed: yatra devān ṛghāyataḥ viśvān ayudhyaḥ ekaḥ id

original: RV_4,030.05c tvam indra vanūṃr ahan //
analyzed: tvam indra vanūn ahan

original: RV_4,030.06a yatrota martyāya kam ariṇā indra sūryam /
analyzed: yatra uta martyāya kam ariṇāḥ indra sūryam

original: RV_4,030.06c prāvaḥ śacībhir etaśam //
analyzed: prāvaḥ śacībhiḥ etaśam

original: RV_4,030.07a kim ād utāsi vṛtrahan maghavan manyumattamaḥ /
analyzed: kim āt uta asi vṛtrahan maghavan manyumattamaḥ

original: RV_4,030.07c atrāha dānum ātiraḥ //
analyzed: atra aha dānum ātiraḥ

original: RV_4,030.08a etad ghed uta vīryam indra cakartha pauṃsyam /
analyzed: etat gha id uta vīryam indra cakartha pauṃsyam

original: RV_4,030.08c striyaṃ yad durhaṇāyuvaṃ vadhīr duhitaraṃ divaḥ //
analyzed: striyam yat durhaṇāyuvam vadhīḥ duhitaram divaḥ

original: RV_4,030.09a divaś cid ghā duhitaram mahān mahīyamānām /
analyzed: divaḥ cit gha duhitaram mahān mahīyamānām

original: RV_4,030.09c uṣāsam indra sam piṇak //
analyzed: uṣāsam indra sam piṇak

original: RV_4,030.10a apoṣā anasaḥ sarat sampiṣṭād aha bibhyuṣī /
analyzed: apoṣā anasaḥ sarat sampiṣṭāt aha bibhyuṣī

original: RV_4,030.10c ni yat sīṃ śiśnathad vṛṣā //
analyzed: ni yat sīm śiśnathat vṛṣā

original: RV_4,030.11a etad asyā anaḥ śaye susampiṣṭaṃ vipāśy ā /
analyzed: etat asyāḥ anaḥ śaye su sampiṣṭam vipāśi ā

original: RV_4,030.11c sasāra sīm parāvataḥ //
analyzed: sasāra sīm parāvataḥ

original: RV_4,030.12a uta sindhuṃ vibālyaṃ vitasthānām adhi kṣami /
analyzed: uta sindhum vibālyam vitasthānām adhi kṣami

original: RV_4,030.12c pari ṣṭhā indra māyayā //
analyzed: pari stha indra māyayā

original: RV_4,030.13a uta śuṣṇasya dhṛṣṇuyā pra mṛkṣo abhi vedanam /
analyzed: uta śuṣṇasya dhṛṣṇuyā pra mṛkṣaḥ abhi vedanam

original: RV_4,030.13c puro yad asya sampiṇak //
analyzed: puraḥ yat asya sampiṇak

original: RV_4,030.14a uta dāsaṃ kaulitaram bṛhataḥ parvatād adhi /
analyzed: uta dāsam kaulitaram bṛhataḥ parvatāt adhi

original: RV_4,030.14c avāhann indra śambaram //
analyzed: avāhan indra śambaram

original: RV_4,030.15a uta dāsasya varcinaḥ sahasrāṇi śatāvadhīḥ /
analyzed: uta dāsasya varcinaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā avadhīḥ

original: RV_4,030.15c adhi pañca pradhīṃr iva //
analyzed: adhi pañca pradhīn iva

original: RV_4,030.16a uta tyam putram agruvaḥ parāvṛktaṃ śatakratuḥ /
analyzed: uta tyam putram agruvaḥ parāvṛktam śatakratuḥ

original: RV_4,030.16c uktheṣv indra ābhajat //
analyzed: uktheṣu indraḥ ābhajat

original: RV_4,030.17a uta tyā turvaśāyadū asnātārā śacīpatiḥ /
analyzed: uta tyā turvaśa yadū a snātārā śacīpatiḥ

original: RV_4,030.17c indro vidvāṃ apārayat //
analyzed: indraḥ vidvān apārayat

original: RV_4,030.18a uta tyā sadya āryā sarayor indra pārataḥ /
analyzed: uta tyā sadyas āryā sarayoḥ indra pāratas

original: RV_4,030.18c arṇācitrarathāvadhīḥ //
analyzed: arṇā citraratha avadhīḥ

original: RV_4,030.19a anu dvā jahitā nayo 'ndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca vṛtrahan /
analyzed: anu dvā jahitā nayaḥ ndham śroṇam ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_4,030.19c na tat te sumnam aṣṭave //
analyzed: na tat te sumnam aṣṭave

original: RV_4,030.20a śatam aśmanmayīnām purām indro vy āsyat /
analyzed: śatam aśmanmayīnām purām indraḥ vi āsyat

original: RV_4,030.20c divodāsāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: divodāsāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_4,030.21a asvāpayad dabhītaye sahasrā triṃśataṃ hathaiḥ /
analyzed: asvāpayat dabhītaye sahasrā triṃśatam hathaiḥ

original: RV_4,030.21c dāsānām indro māyayā //
analyzed: dāsānām indraḥ māyayā

original: RV_4,030.22a sa ghed utāsi vṛtrahan samāna indra gopatiḥ /
analyzed: sa gha id uta asi vṛtrahan samānaḥ indra go patiḥ

original: RV_4,030.22c yas tā viśvāni cicyuṣe //
analyzed: yaḥ tā viśvāni cicyuṣe

original: RV_4,030.23a uta nūnaṃ yad indriyaṃ kariṣyā indra pauṃsyam /
analyzed: uta nūnam yat indriyam kariṣyāḥ indra pauṃsyam

original: RV_4,030.23c adyā nakiṣ ṭad ā minat //
analyzed: adyā nakir tat ā minat

original: RV_4,030.24a vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ ta ādure devo dadātv aryamā /
analyzed: vāmam vāmam te ādure devaḥ dadātu aryamā

original: RV_4,030.24c vāmam pūṣā vāmam bhago vāmaṃ devaḥ karūḷatī //
analyzed: vāmam pūṣā vāmam bhagaḥ vāmam devaḥ karūḍatī

original: RV_4,031.01a kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā

original: RV_4,031.01c kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā //
analyzed: kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā

original: RV_4,031.02a kas tvā satyo madānām maṃhiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ matsat andhasaḥ

original: RV_4,031.02c dṛḷhā cid āruje vasu //
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit āruje vasu

original: RV_4,031.03a abhī ṣu ṇaḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām /
analyzed: abhī su naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām

original: RV_4,031.03c śatam bhavāsy ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: śatam bhavāsi ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_4,031.04a abhī na ā vavṛtsva cakraṃ na vṛttam arvataḥ /
analyzed: abhi naḥ ā vavṛtsva cakram na vṛttam arvataḥ

original: RV_4,031.04c niyudbhiś carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: niyudbhiḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_4,031.05a pravatā hi kratūnām ā hā padeva gacchasi /
analyzed: pravatā hi kratūnām ā ha padā iva gacchasi

original: RV_4,031.05c abhakṣi sūrye sacā //
analyzed: abhakṣi sūrye sacā

original: RV_4,031.06a saṃ yat ta indra manyavaḥ saṃ cakrāṇi dadhanvire /
analyzed: sam yat te indra manyavaḥ sam cakrāṇi dadhanvire

original: RV_4,031.06c adha tve adha sūrye //
analyzed: adha tve adha sūrye

original: RV_4,031.07a uta smā hi tvām āhur in maghavānaṃ śacīpate /
analyzed: uta smā hi tvām āhuḥ id maghavānam śacīpate

original: RV_4,031.07c dātāram avidīdhayum //
analyzed: dātāram avidīdhayum

original: RV_4,031.08a uta smā sadya it pari śaśamānāya sunvate /
analyzed: uta smā sadyas id pari śaśamānāya sunvate

original: RV_4,031.08c purū cin maṃhase vasu //
analyzed: purū cit maṃhase vasu

original: RV_4,031.09a nahi ṣmā te śataṃ cana rādho varanta āmuraḥ /
analyzed: nahi sma te śatam cana rādhaḥ varante āmuraḥ

original: RV_4,031.09c na cyautnāni kariṣyataḥ //
analyzed: na cyautnāni kariṣyataḥ

original: RV_4,031.10a asmāṃ avantu te śatam asmān sahasram ūtayaḥ /
analyzed: asmān avantu te śatam asmān sahasram ūtayaḥ

original: RV_4,031.10c asmān viśvā abhiṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: asmān viśvāḥ abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_4,031.11a asmāṃ ihā vṛṇīṣva sakhyāya svastaye /
analyzed: asmān iha ā vṛṇīṣva sakhyāya svastaye

original: RV_4,031.11c maho rāye divitmate //
analyzed: mahaḥ rāye divitmate

original: RV_4,031.12a asmāṃ aviḍḍhi viśvahendra rāyā parīṇasā /
analyzed: asmām aviḍḍhi viśvahā indra rāyā parīṇasā

original: RV_4,031.12c asmān viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: asmān viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_4,031.13a asmabhyaṃ tāṃ apā vṛdhi vrajāṃ asteva gomataḥ /
analyzed: asmabhyam tām apa ā vṛdhi vrajām astā iva gomataḥ

original: RV_4,031.13c navābhir indrotibhiḥ //
analyzed: navābhiḥ indra ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_4,031.14a asmākaṃ dhṛṣṇuyā ratho dyumāṃ indrānapacyutaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam dhṛṣṇuyā rathaḥ dyumān indra an apacyutaḥ

original: RV_4,031.14c gavyur aśvayur īyate //
analyzed: gavyuḥ aśvayuḥ īyate

original: RV_4,031.15a asmākam uttamaṃ kṛdhi śravo deveṣu sūrya /
analyzed: asmākam uttamam kṛdhi śravaḥ deveṣu sūrya

original: RV_4,031.15c varṣiṣṭhaṃ dyām ivopari //
analyzed: varṣiṣṭham dyām iva upari

original: RV_4,032.01a ā tū na indra vṛtrahann asmākam ardham ā gahi /
analyzed: ā tu naḥ indra vṛtrahan asmākam ardham ā gahi

original: RV_4,032.01c mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_4,032.02a bhṛmiś cid ghāsi tūtujir ā citra citriṇīṣv ā /
analyzed: bhṛmiḥ cit gha asi tūtujiḥ ā citra citriṇīṣu ā

original: RV_4,032.02c citraṃ kṛṇoṣy ūtaye //
analyzed: citram kṛṇoṣi ūtaye

original: RV_4,032.03a dabhrebhiś cic chaśīyāṃsaṃ haṃsi vrādhantam ojasā /
analyzed: dabhrebhiḥ cit śaśīyāṃsam haṃsi vrādhantam ojasā

original: RV_4,032.03c sakhibhir ye tve sacā //
analyzed: sakhibhiḥ ye tve sacā

original: RV_4,032.04a vayam indra tve sacā vayaṃ tvābhi nonumaḥ /
analyzed: vayam indra tve sacā vayam tvā abhi nonumaḥ

original: RV_4,032.04c asmāṃ-asmāṃ id ud ava //
analyzed: asmān asmān id ud ava

original: RV_4,032.05a sa naś citrābhir adrivo 'navadyābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ citrābhiḥ adrivas navadyābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_4,032.05c anādhṛṣṭābhir ā gahi //
analyzed: anādhṛṣṭābhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_4,032.06a bhūyāmo ṣu tvāvataḥ sakhāya indra gomataḥ /
analyzed: bhūyāma u su tvāvataḥ sakhāyaḥ indra gomataḥ

original: RV_4,032.06c yujo vājāya ghṛṣvaye //
analyzed: yujaḥ vājāya ghṛṣvaye

original: RV_4,032.07a tvaṃ hy eka īśiṣa indra vājasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi ekaḥ īśiṣe indra vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_4,032.07c sa no yandhi mahīm iṣam //
analyzed: sa naḥ yandhi mahīm iṣam

original: RV_4,032.08a na tvā varante anyathā yad ditsasi stuto magham /
analyzed: na tvā varante anyathā yat ditsasi stutaḥ magham

original: RV_4,032.08c stotṛbhya indra girvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: stotṛbhyaḥ indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_4,032.09a abhi tvā gotamā girānūṣata pra dāvane /
analyzed: abhi tvā gotamāḥ girā anūṣata pra dāvane

original: RV_4,032.09c indra vājāya ghṛṣvaye //
analyzed: indra vājāya ghṛṣvaye

original: RV_4,032.10a pra te vocāma vīryā yā mandasāna ārujaḥ /
analyzed: pra te vocāma vīryā yāḥ mandasānaḥ ārujaḥ

original: RV_4,032.10c puro dāsīr abhītya //
analyzed: puraḥ dāsīḥ abhītya

original: RV_4,032.11a tā te gṛṇanti vedhaso yāni cakartha pauṃsyā /
analyzed: tā te gṛṇanti vedhasaḥ yāni cakartha pauṃsyā

original: RV_4,032.11c suteṣv indra girvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: suteṣu indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_4,032.12a avīvṛdhanta gotamā indra tve stomavāhasaḥ /
analyzed: avīvṛdhanta gotamāḥ indra tve stoma vāhasaḥ

original: RV_4,032.12c aiṣu dhā vīravad yaśaḥ //
analyzed: ā eṣu dhāḥ vīravat yaśaḥ

original: RV_4,032.13a yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam /
analyzed: yat cit hi śaśvatām asi indra sādhāraṇaḥ tvam

original: RV_4,032.13c taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam havāmahe

original: RV_4,032.14a arvācīno vaso bhavāsme su matsvāndhasaḥ /
analyzed: arvācīnaḥ vaso bhava asme su matsva andhasaḥ

original: RV_4,032.14c somānām indra somapāḥ //
analyzed: somānām indra soma pāḥ

original: RV_4,032.15a asmākaṃ tvā matīnām ā stoma indra yacchatu /
analyzed: asmākam tvā matīnām ā stomaḥ indra yacchatu

original: RV_4,032.15c arvāg ā vartayā harī //
analyzed: arvāk ā vartaya harī

original: RV_4,032.16a puroḷāśaṃ ca no ghaso joṣayāse giraś ca naḥ /
analyzed: puroḷāśam ca naḥ ghasaḥ joṣayāse giraḥ ca naḥ

original: RV_4,032.16c vadhūyur iva yoṣaṇām //
analyzed: vadhūyuḥ iva yoṣaṇām

original: RV_4,032.17a sahasraṃ vyatīnāṃ yuktānām indram īmahe /
analyzed: sahasram vyatīnām yuktānām indram īmahe

original: RV_4,032.17c śataṃ somasya khāryaḥ //
analyzed: śatam somasya khāryaḥ

original: RV_4,032.18a sahasrā te śatā vayaṃ gavām ā cyāvayāmasi /
analyzed: sahasrā te śatā vayam gavām ā cyāvayāmasi

original: RV_4,032.18c asmatrā rādha etu te //
analyzed: asmatrā rādhaḥ etu te

original: RV_4,032.19a daśa te kalaśānāṃ hiraṇyānām adhīmahi /
analyzed: daśa te kalaśānām hiraṇyānām adhīmahi

original: RV_4,032.19c bhūridā asi vṛtrahan //
analyzed: bhūri dāḥ asi vṛtrahan

original: RV_4,032.20a bhūridā bhūri dehi no mā dabhram bhūry ā bhara /
analyzed: bhūri dāḥ bhūri dehi naḥ mā dabhram bhūri ā bhara

original: RV_4,032.20c bhūri ghed indra ditsasi //
analyzed: bhūri gha id indra ditsasi

original: RV_4,032.21a bhūridā hy asi śrutaḥ purutrā śūra vṛtrahan /
analyzed: bhūri dāḥ hi asi śrutaḥ purutrā śūra vṛtrahan

original: RV_4,032.21c ā no bhajasva rādhasi //
analyzed: ā naḥ bhajasva rādhasi

original: RV_4,032.22a pra te babhrū vicakṣaṇa śaṃsāmi goṣaṇo napāt /
analyzed: pra te babhrū vicakṣaṇa śaṃsāmi goṣaṇaḥ napāt

original: RV_4,032.22c mābhyāṃ gā anu śiśrathaḥ //
analyzed: mā ābhyām gāḥ anu śiśrathaḥ

original: RV_4,032.23a kanīnakeva vidradhe nave drupade arbhake /
analyzed: kanīnakā iva vidradhe nave drupade arbhake

original: RV_4,032.23c babhrū yāmeṣu śobhete //
analyzed: babhrū yāmeṣu śobhete

original: RV_4,032.24a aram ma usrayāmṇe 'ram anusrayāmṇe /
analyzed: aram me usra yāmṇe ram an usra yāmṇe

original: RV_4,032.24c babhrū yāmeṣv asridhā //
analyzed: babhrū yāmeṣu asridhā

original: RV_4,033.01a pra ṛbhubhyo dūtam iva vācam iṣya upastire śvaitarīṃ dhenum īḷe /
analyzed: pra ṛbhubhyaḥ dūtam iva vācam iṣye upastire śvaitarīm dhenum īḍe

original: RV_4,033.01c ye vātajūtās taraṇibhir evaiḥ pari dyāṃ sadyo apaso babhūvuḥ //
analyzed: ye vāta jūtāḥ taraṇibhiḥ evaiḥ pari dyām sadyas apasaḥ babhūvuḥ

original: RV_4,033.02a yadāram akrann ṛbhavaḥ pitṛbhyām pariviṣṭī veṣaṇā daṃsanābhiḥ /
analyzed: yadā aram akran ṛbhavaḥ pitṛbhyām pariviṣṭī veṣaṇā daṃsanābhiḥ

original: RV_4,033.02c ād id devānām upa sakhyam āyan dhīrāsaḥ puṣṭim avahan manāyai //
analyzed: āt id devānām upa sakhyam āyan dhīrāsaḥ puṣṭim avahan manāyai

original: RV_4,033.03a punar ye cakruḥ pitarā yuvānā sanā yūpeva jaraṇā śayānā /
analyzed: punar ye cakruḥ pitarā yuvānā sanā yūpā iva jaraṇā śayānā

original: RV_4,033.03c te vājo vibhvāṃ ṛbhur indravanto madhupsaraso no 'vantu yajñam //
analyzed: te vājaḥ vibhvā ṛbhuḥ indravantaḥ madhu psarasaḥ naḥ vantu yajñam

original: RV_4,033.04a yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavo gām arakṣan yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavo mā apiṃśan /
analyzed: yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavaḥ gām arakṣan yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavaḥ māḥ apiṃśan

original: RV_4,033.04c yat saṃvatsam abharan bhāso asyās tābhiḥ śamībhir amṛtatvam āśuḥ //
analyzed: yat saṃvatsam abharan bhāsaḥ asyāḥ tābhiḥ śamībhiḥ amṛta tvam āśuḥ

original: RV_4,033.05a jyeṣṭha āha camasā dvā kareti kanīyān trīn kṛṇavāmety āha /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ āha camasā dvā karā iti kanīyān trīn kṛṇavāma iti āha

original: RV_4,033.05c kaniṣṭha āha caturas kareti tvaṣṭa ṛbhavas tat panayad vaco vaḥ //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhaḥ āha caturaḥ kara iti tvaṣṭa ṛbhavaḥ tat panayat vacaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_4,033.06a satyam ūcur nara evā hi cakrur anu svadhām ṛbhavo jagmur etām /
analyzed: satyam ūcuḥ naraḥ evā hi cakruḥ anu svadhām ṛbhavaḥ jagmuḥ etām

original: RV_4,033.06c vibhrājamānāṃś camasāṃ ahevāvenat tvaṣṭā caturo dadṛśvān //
analyzed: vibhrājamānān camasān aha iva avenat tvaṣṭā caturaḥ dadṛśvān

original: RV_4,033.07a dvādaśa dyūn yad agohyasyātithye raṇann ṛbhavaḥ sasantaḥ /
analyzed: dvādaśa dyūn yat agohyasya ātithye raṇan ṛbhavaḥ sasantaḥ

original: RV_4,033.07c sukṣetrākṛṇvann anayanta sindhūn dhanvātiṣṭhann oṣadhīr nimnam āpaḥ //
analyzed: su kṣetrā akṛṇvan anayanta sindhūn dhanva atiṣṭhan oṣadhīḥ nimnam āpaḥ

original: RV_4,033.08a rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ nareṣṭhāṃ ye dhenuṃ viśvajuvaṃ viśvarūpām /
analyzed: ratham ye cakruḥ suvṛtam nareṣṭhām ye dhenum viśva juvam viśva rūpām

original: RV_4,033.08c ta ā takṣantv ṛbhavo rayiṃ naḥ svavasaḥ svapasaḥ suhastāḥ //
analyzed: te ā takṣantu ṛbhavaḥ rayim naḥ su avasaḥ su apasaḥ su hastāḥ

original: RV_4,033.09a apo hy eṣām ajuṣanta devā abhi kratvā manasā dīdhyānāḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ hi eṣām ajuṣanta devāḥ abhi kratvā manasā dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_4,033.09c vājo devānām abhavat sukarmendrasya ṛbhukṣā varuṇasya vibhvā //
analyzed: vājaḥ devānām abhavat sukarmā indrasya ṛbhukṣāḥ varuṇasya vibhvā

original: RV_4,033.10a ye harī medhayokthā madanta indrāya cakruḥ suyujā ye aśvā /
analyzed: ye harī medhayā ukthā madantaḥ indrāya cakruḥ su yujā ye aśvā

original: RV_4,033.10c te rāyas poṣaṃ draviṇāny asme dhatta ṛbhavaḥ kṣemayanto na mitram //
analyzed: te rāyaḥ poṣam draviṇāni asme dhatta ṛbhavaḥ kṣemayantaḥ na mitram

original: RV_4,033.11a idāhnaḥ pītim uta vo madaṃ dhur na ṛte śrāntasya sakhyāya devāḥ /
analyzed: idā ahnaḥ pītim uta vaḥ madam dhuḥ na ṛte śrāntasya sakhyāya devāḥ

original: RV_4,033.11c te nūnam asme ṛbhavo vasūni tṛtīye asmin savane dadhāta //
analyzed: te nūnam asme ṛbhavaḥ vasūni tṛtīye asmin savane dadhāta

original: RV_4,034.01a ṛbhur vibhvā vāja indro no acchemaṃ yajñaṃ ratnadheyopa yāta /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vibhvā vājaḥ indraḥ naḥ acchā imam yajñam ratna dheyā upa yāta

original: RV_4,034.01c idā hi vo dhiṣaṇā devy ahnām adhāt pītiṃ sam madā agmatā vaḥ //
analyzed: idā hi vaḥ dhiṣaṇā devī ahnām adhāt pītim sam madāḥ agmata vaḥ

original: RV_4,034.02a vidānāso janmano vājaratnā uta ṛtubhir ṛbhavo mādayadhvam /
analyzed: vidānāsaḥ janmanaḥ vāja ratnāḥ uta ṛtubhiḥ ṛbhavaḥ mādayadhvam

original: RV_4,034.02c saṃ vo madā agmata sam purandhiḥ suvīrām asme rayim erayadhvam //
analyzed: sam vaḥ madāḥ agmata sam purandhiḥ su vīrām asme rayim erayadhvam

original: RV_4,034.03a ayaṃ vo yajña ṛbhavo 'kāri yam ā manuṣvat pradivo dadhidhve /
analyzed: ayam vaḥ yajñaḥ ṛbhavaḥ kāri yam ā manuṣvat pradivaḥ dadhidhve

original: RV_4,034.03c pra vo 'cchā jujuṣāṇāso asthur abhūta viśve agriyota vājāḥ //
analyzed: pra vaḥ chā jujuṣāṇāsaḥ asthuḥ abhūta viśve agriyā uta vājāḥ

original: RV_4,034.04a abhūd u vo vidhate ratnadheyam idā naro dāśuṣe martyāya /
analyzed: abhūt u vaḥ vidhate ratna dheyam idā naraḥ dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_4,034.04c pibata vājā ṛbhavo dade vo mahi tṛtīyaṃ savanam madāya //
analyzed: pibata vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ dade vaḥ mahi tṛtīyam savanam madāya

original: RV_4,034.05a ā vājā yātopa na ṛbhukṣā maho naro draviṇaso gṛṇānāḥ /
analyzed: ā vājāḥ yātā upa naḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ mahaḥ naraḥ draviṇasaḥ gṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_4,034.05c ā vaḥ pītayo 'bhipitve ahnām imā astaṃ navasva iva gman //
analyzed: ā vaḥ pītayaḥ bhipitve ahnām imāḥ astam nava svaḥ iva gman

original: RV_4,034.06a ā napātaḥ śavaso yātanopemaṃ yajñaṃ namasā hūyamānāḥ /
analyzed: ā napātaḥ śavasaḥ yātana upa imam yajñam namasā hūyamānāḥ

original: RV_4,034.06c sajoṣasaḥ sūrayo yasya ca stha madhvaḥ pāta ratnadhā indravantaḥ //
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ sūrayaḥ yasya ca stha madhvaḥ pāta ratna dhāḥ indravantaḥ

original: RV_4,034.07a sajoṣā indra varuṇena somaṃ sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ /
analyzed: sajoṣāḥ indra varuṇena somam sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ

original: RV_4,034.07c agrepābhir ṛtupābhiḥ sajoṣā gnāspatnībhī ratnadhābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: agre pābhiḥ ṛtu pābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ gnāspatnībhiḥ ratna dhābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_4,034.08a sajoṣasa ādityair mādayadhvaṃ sajoṣasa ṛbhavaḥ parvatebhiḥ /
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ ādityaiḥ mādayadhvam sajoṣasaḥ ṛbhavaḥ parvatebhiḥ

original: RV_4,034.08c sajoṣaso daivyenā savitrā sajoṣasaḥ sindhubhī ratnadhebhiḥ //
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ daivyena savitrā sajoṣasaḥ sindhubhiḥ ratna dhebhiḥ

original: RV_4,034.09a ye aśvinā ye pitarā ya ūtī dhenuṃ tatakṣur ṛbhavo ye aśvā /
analyzed: ye aśvinā ye pitarā ye ūtī dhenum tatakṣuḥ ṛbhavaḥ ye aśvā

original: RV_4,034.09c ye aṃsatrā ya ṛdhag rodasī ye vibhvo naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ //
analyzed: ye aṃsatrā ye ṛdhak rodasī ye vibhvaḥ naraḥ su apatyāni cakruḥ

original: RV_4,034.10a ye gomantaṃ vājavantaṃ suvīraṃ rayiṃ dhattha vasumantam purukṣum /
analyzed: ye gomantam vājavantam su vīram rayim dhattha vasumantam purukṣum

original: RV_4,034.10c te agrepā ṛbhavo mandasānā asme dhatta ye ca rātiṃ gṛṇanti //
analyzed: te agre pāḥ ṛbhavaḥ mandasānāḥ asme dhatta ye ca rātim gṛṇanti

original: RV_4,034.11a nāpābhūta na vo 'tītṛṣāmāniḥśastā ṛbhavo yajñe asmin /
analyzed: na apābhūta na vaḥ tītṛṣāma a niḥśastāḥ ṛbhavaḥ yajñe asmin

original: RV_4,034.11c sam indreṇa madatha sam marudbhiḥ saṃ rājabhī ratnadheyāya devāḥ //
analyzed: sam indreṇa madatha sam marudbhiḥ sam rājabhiḥ ratna dheyāya devāḥ

original: RV_4,035.01a ihopa yāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo māpa bhūta /
analyzed: iha upa yāta śavasaḥ napātaḥ saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ mā apa bhūta

original: RV_4,035.01c asmin hi vaḥ savane ratnadheyaṃ gamantv indram anu vo madāsaḥ //
analyzed: asmin hi vaḥ savane ratna dheyam gamantu indram anu vaḥ madāsaḥ

original: RV_4,035.02a āgann ṛbhūṇām iha ratnadheyam abhūt somasya suṣutasya pītiḥ /
analyzed: āgan ṛbhūṇām iha ratna dheyam abhūt somasya suṣutasya pītiḥ

original: RV_4,035.02c sukṛtyayā yat svapasyayā caṃ ekaṃ vicakra camasaṃ caturdhā //
analyzed: su kṛtyayā yat su apasyayā cam ekam vicakra camasam caturdhā

original: RV_4,035.03a vy akṛṇota camasaṃ caturdhā sakhe vi śikṣety abravīta /
analyzed: vi akṛṇota camasam caturdhā sakhe vi śikṣa iti abravīta

original: RV_4,035.03c athaita vājā amṛtasya panthāṃ gaṇaṃ devānām ṛbhavaḥ suhastāḥ //
analyzed: atha eta vājāḥ amṛtasya panthām gaṇam devānām ṛbhavaḥ su hastāḥ

original: RV_4,035.04a kimmayaḥ svic camasa eṣa āsa yaṃ kāvyena caturo vicakra /
analyzed: kimmayaḥ svid camasaḥ eṣaḥ āsa yam kāvyena caturaḥ vicakra

original: RV_4,035.04c athā sunudhvaṃ savanam madāya pāta ṛbhavo madhunaḥ somyasya //
analyzed: athā sunudhvam savanam madāya pāta ṛbhavaḥ madhunaḥ somyasya

original: RV_4,035.05a śacyākarta pitarā yuvānā śacyākarta camasaṃ devapānam /
analyzed: śacyā akarta pitarā yuvānā śacyā akarta camasam deva pānam

original: RV_4,035.05c śacyā harī dhanutarāv ataṣṭendravāhāv ṛbhavo vājaratnāḥ //
analyzed: śacyā harī dhanutarau ataṣṭa indra vāhau ṛbhavaḥ vāja ratnāḥ

original: RV_4,035.06a yo vaḥ sunoty abhipitve ahnāṃ tīvraṃ vājāsaḥ savanam madāya /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ sunoti abhipitve ahnām tīvram vājāsaḥ savanam madāya

original: RV_4,035.06c tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarvavīram ā takṣata vṛṣaṇo mandasānāḥ //
analyzed: tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarva vīram ā takṣata vṛṣaṇaḥ mandasānāḥ

original: RV_4,035.07a prātaḥ sutam apibo haryaśva mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te /
analyzed: prātar sutam apibaḥ hari aśva mādhyandinam savanam kevalam te

original: RV_4,035.07c sam ṛbhubhiḥ pibasva ratnadhebhiḥ sakhīṃr yāṃ indra cakṛṣe sukṛtyā //
analyzed: sam ṛbhubhiḥ pibasva ratna dhebhiḥ sakhīn yām indra cakṛṣe su kṛtyā

original: RV_4,035.08a ye devāso abhavatā sukṛtyā śyenā ived adhi divi niṣeda /
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ abhavata su kṛtyā śyenāḥ iva id adhi divi niṣeda

original: RV_4,035.08c te ratnaṃ dhāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā abhavatāmṛtāsaḥ //
analyzed: te ratnam dhāta śavasaḥ napātaḥ saudhanvanāḥ abhavata amṛtāsaḥ

original: RV_4,035.09a yat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ ratnadheyam akṛṇudhvaṃ svapasyā suhastāḥ /
analyzed: yat tṛtīyam savanam ratna dheyam akṛṇudhvam su apasyā su hastāḥ

original: RV_4,035.09c tad ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktaṃ va etat sam madebhir indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam //
analyzed: tat ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktam vaḥ etat sam madebhiḥ indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam

original: RV_4,036.01a anaśvo jāto anabhīśur ukthyo rathas tricakraḥ pari vartate rajaḥ /
analyzed: an aśvaḥ jātaḥ an abhīśuḥ ukthyaḥ rathaḥ tri cakraḥ pari vartate rajaḥ

original: RV_4,036.01c mahat tad vo devyasya pravācanaṃ dyām ṛbhavaḥ pṛthivīṃ yac ca puṣyatha //
analyzed: mahat tat vaḥ devyasya pravācanam dyām ṛbhavaḥ pṛthivīm yat ca puṣyatha

original: RV_4,036.02a rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ sucetaso 'vihvarantam manasas pari dhyayā /
analyzed: ratham ye cakruḥ suvṛtam su cetasaḥ vihvarantam manasaḥ pari dhyayā

original: RV_4,036.02c tāṃ ū nv asya savanasya pītaya ā vo vājā ṛbhavo vedayāmasi //
analyzed: tām u nu asya savanasya pītaye ā vaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ vedayāmasi

original: RV_4,036.03a tad vo vājā ṛbhavaḥ supravācanaṃ deveṣu vibhvo abhavan mahitvanam /
analyzed: tat vaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ su pravācanam deveṣu vibhvaḥ abhavat mahitvanam

original: RV_4,036.03c jivrī yat santā pitarā sanājurā punar yuvānā carathāya takṣatha //
analyzed: jivrī yat santā pitarā sanā jurā punar yuvānā carathāya takṣatha

original: RV_4,036.04a ekaṃ vi cakra camasaṃ caturvayaṃ niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ /
analyzed: ekam vi cakra camasam caturvayam niḥ carmaṇaḥ gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_4,036.04c athā deveṣv amṛtatvam ānaśa śruṣṭī vājā ṛbhavas tad va ukthyam //
analyzed: athā deveṣu amṛta tvam ānaśa śruṣṭī vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat vaḥ ukthyam

original: RV_4,036.05a ṛbhuto rayiḥ prathamaśravastamo vājaśrutāso yam ajījanan naraḥ /
analyzed: ṛbhutaḥ rayiḥ prathama śravastamaḥ vāja śrutāsaḥ yam ajījanat naraḥ

original: RV_4,036.05c vibhvataṣṭo vidatheṣu pravācyo yaṃ devāso 'vathā sa vicarṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: vibhva taṣṭaḥ vidatheṣu pravācyaḥ yam devāsaḥ vathā sa vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_4,036.06a sa vājy arvā sa ṛṣir vacasyayā sa śūro astā pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ /
analyzed: sa vājī arvā saḥ ṛṣiḥ vacasyayā sa śūraḥ astā pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_4,036.06c sa rāyas poṣaṃ sa suvīryaṃ dadhe yaṃ vājo vibhvāṃ ṛbhavo yam āviṣuḥ //
analyzed: sa rāyaḥ poṣam sa su vīryam dadhe yam vājaḥ vibhvā ṛbhavaḥ yam āviṣuḥ

original: RV_4,036.07a śreṣṭhaṃ vaḥ peśo adhi dhāyi darśataṃ stomo vājā ṛbhavas taṃ jujuṣṭana /
analyzed: śreṣṭham vaḥ peśaḥ adhi dhāyi darśatam stomaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ tam jujuṣṭana

original: RV_4,036.07c dhīrāso hi ṣṭhā kavayo vipaścitas tān va enā brahmaṇā vedayāmasi //
analyzed: dhīrāsaḥ hi stha kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ tān vaḥ enā brahmaṇā vedayāmasi

original: RV_4,036.08a yūyam asmabhyaṃ dhiṣaṇābhyas pari vidvāṃso viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā /
analyzed: yūyam asmabhyam dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ pari vidvāṃsaḥ viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā

original: RV_4,036.08c dyumantaṃ vājaṃ vṛṣaśuṣmam uttamam ā no rayim ṛbhavas takṣatā vayaḥ //
analyzed: dyumantam vājam vṛṣa śuṣmam uttamam ā naḥ rayim ṛbhavaḥ takṣata vayaḥ

original: RV_4,036.09a iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇā iha śravo vīravat takṣatā naḥ /
analyzed: iha prajām iha rayim rarāṇāḥ iha śravaḥ vīravat takṣata naḥ

original: RV_4,036.09c yena vayaṃ citayemāty anyān taṃ vājaṃ citram ṛbhavo dadā naḥ //
analyzed: yena vayam citayema ati anyān tam vājam citram ṛbhavaḥ dada naḥ

original: RV_4,037.01a upa no vājā adhvaram ṛbhukṣā devā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ /
analyzed: upa naḥ vājāḥ adhvaram ṛbhukṣāḥ devāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: RV_4,037.01c yathā yajñam manuṣo vikṣv āsu dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣv ahnām //
analyzed: yathā yajñam manuṣaḥ vikṣu āsu dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣu ahnām

original: RV_4,037.02a te vo hṛde manase santu yajñā juṣṭāso adya ghṛtanirṇijo guḥ /
analyzed: te vaḥ hṛde manase santu yajñāḥ juṣṭāsaḥ adya ghṛta nirṇijaḥ guḥ

original: RV_4,037.02c pra vaḥ sutāso harayanta pūrṇāḥ kratve dakṣāya harṣayanta pītāḥ //
analyzed: pra vaḥ sutāsaḥ harayanta pūrṇāḥ kratve dakṣāya harṣayanta pītāḥ

original: RV_4,037.03a tryudāyaṃ devahitaṃ yathā va stomo vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo dade vaḥ /
analyzed: tri udāyam deva hitam yathā vaḥ stomaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ dade vaḥ

original: RV_4,037.03c juhve manuṣvad uparāsu vikṣu yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam //
analyzed: juhve manuṣvat uparāsu vikṣu yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam

original: RV_4,037.04a pīvoaśvāḥ śucadrathā hi bhūtāyaḥśiprā vājinaḥ suniṣkāḥ /
analyzed: pīvaḥ aśvāḥ śucat rathāḥ hi bhūta ayaḥ śiprāḥ vājinaḥ su niṣkāḥ

original: RV_4,037.04c indrasya sūno śavaso napāto 'nu vaś cety agriyam madāya //
analyzed: indrasya sūno śavasaḥ napātaḥ nu vaḥ ceti agriyam madāya

original: RV_4,037.05a ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇo rayiṃ vāje vājintamaṃ yujam /
analyzed: ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ rayim vāje vājintamam yujam

original: RV_4,037.05c indrasvantaṃ havāmahe sadāsātamam aśvinam //
analyzed: indrasvantam havāmahe sadā sātamam aśvinam

original: RV_4,037.06a sed ṛbhavo yam avatha yūyam indraś ca martyam /
analyzed: sa id ṛbhavaḥ yam avatha yūyam indraḥ ca martyam

original: RV_4,037.06c sa dhībhir astu sanitā medhasātā so arvatā //
analyzed: sa dhībhiḥ astu sanitā medha sātā saḥ arvatā

original: RV_4,037.07a vi no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pathaś citana yaṣṭave /
analyzed: vi naḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pathaḥ citana yaṣṭave

original: RV_4,037.07c asmabhyaṃ sūraya stutā viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi //
analyzed: asmabhyam sūrayaḥ stutāḥ viśvāḥ āśāḥ tarīṣaṇi

original: RV_4,037.08a taṃ no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇa indra nāsatyā rayim /
analyzed: tam naḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ indra nāsatyā rayim

original: RV_4,037.08c sam aśvaṃ carṣaṇibhya ā puru śasta maghattaye //
analyzed: sam aśvam carṣaṇibhyaḥ ā puru śasta maghattaye

original: RV_4,038.01a uto hi vāṃ dātrā santi pūrvā yā pūrubhyas trasadasyur nitośe /
analyzed: uta u hi vām dātrā santi pūrvā yā pūrubhyaḥ trasadasyuḥ nitośe

original: RV_4,038.01c kṣetrāsāṃ dadathur urvarāsāṃ ghanaṃ dasyubhyo abhibhūtim ugram //
analyzed: kṣetrāsām dadathuḥ urvarāsām ghanam dasyubhyaḥ abhibhūtim ugram

original: RV_4,038.02a uta vājinam puruniṣṣidhvānaṃ dadhikrām u dadathur viśvakṛṣṭim /
analyzed: uta vājinam puru niṣṣidhvānam dadhikrām u dadathuḥ viśvakṛṣṭim

original: RV_4,038.02c ṛjipyaṃ śyenam pruṣitapsum āśuṃ carkṛtyam aryo nṛpatiṃ na śūram //
analyzed: ṛjipyam śyenam pruṣitapsum āśum carkṛtyam aryaḥ nṛpatim na śūram

original: RV_4,038.03a yaṃ sīm anu pravateva dravantaṃ viśvaḥ pūrur madati harṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yam sīm anu pravatā iva dravantam viśvaḥ pūruḥ madati harṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_4,038.03c paḍbhir gṛdhyantam medhayuṃ na śūraṃ rathaturaṃ vātam iva dhrajantam //
analyzed: paḍbhiḥ gṛdhyantam medhayum na śūram ratha turam vātam iva dhrajantam

original: RV_4,038.04a yaḥ smārundhāno gadhyā samatsu sanutaraś carati goṣu gacchan /
analyzed: yaḥ sma ārundhānaḥ gadhyā samatsu sanutaraḥ carati goṣu gacchan

original: RV_4,038.04c āvirṛjīko vidathā nicikyat tiro aratim pary āpa āyoḥ //
analyzed: āvirṛjīkaḥ vidathā nicikyat tiras aratim pari āpaḥ āyoḥ

original: RV_4,038.05a uta smainaṃ vastramathiṃ na tāyum anu krośanti kṣitayo bhareṣu /
analyzed: uta smā enam vastramathim na tāyum anu krośanti kṣitayaḥ bhareṣu

original: RV_4,038.05c nīcāyamānaṃ jasuriṃ na śyenaṃ śravaś cācchā paśumac ca yūtham //
analyzed: nīcāyamānam jasurim na śyenam śravaḥ ca acchā paśumat ca yūtham

original: RV_4,038.06a uta smāsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan ni veveti śreṇibhī rathānām /
analyzed: uta smāsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan ni veveti śreṇibhiḥ rathānām

original: RV_4,038.06c srajaṃ kṛṇvāno janyo na śubhvā reṇuṃ rerihat kiraṇaṃ dadaśvān //
analyzed: srajam kṛṇvānaḥ janyaḥ na śubhvā reṇum rerihat kiraṇam dadaśvān

original: RV_4,038.07a uta sya vājī sahurir ṛtāvā śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye /
analyzed: uta sya vājī sahuriḥ ṛtāvā śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ tanvā samarye

original: RV_4,038.07c turaṃ yatīṣu turayann ṛjipyo 'dhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan //
analyzed: turam yatīṣu turayan ṛjipyaḥ dhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan

original: RV_4,038.08a uta smāsya tanyator iva dyor ṛghāyato abhiyujo bhayante /
analyzed: uta sma asya tanyatoḥ iva dyoḥ ṛghāyataḥ abhiyujaḥ bhayante

original: RV_4,038.08c yadā sahasram abhi ṣīm ayodhīd durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīma ṛñjan //
analyzed: yadā sahasram abhi sīm ayodhīt durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīmaḥ ṛñjan

original: RV_4,038.09a uta smāsya panayanti janā jūtiṃ kṛṣṭipro abhibhūtim āśoḥ /
analyzed: uta sma asya panayanti janāḥ jūtim kṛṣṭipraḥ abhibhūtim āśoḥ

original: RV_4,038.09c utainam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ parā dadhikrā asarat sahasraiḥ //
analyzed: uta enam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ parā dadhikrāḥ asarat sahasraiḥ

original: RV_4,038.10a ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna /
analyzed: ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna

original: RV_4,038.10c sahasrasāḥ śatasā vājy arvā pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṃsi //
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ śata sāḥ vājī arvā pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṃsi

original: RV_4,039.01a āśuṃ dadhikrāṃ tam u nu ṣṭavāma divas pṛthivyā uta carkirāma /
analyzed: āśum dadhikrām tam u nu stavāma divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ uta carkirāma

original: RV_4,039.01c ucchantīr mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantv ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan //
analyzed: ucchantīḥ mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan

original: RV_4,039.02a mahaś carkarmy arvataḥ kratuprā dadhikrāvṇaḥ puruvārasya vṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: mahaḥ carkarmi arvataḥ kratu prāḥ dadhikrāvṇaḥ puru vārasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_4,039.02c yam pūrubhyo dīdivāṃsaṃ nāgniṃ dadathur mitrāvaruṇā taturim //
analyzed: yam pūrubhyaḥ dīdivāṃsam nā agnim dadathuḥ mitrāvaruṇā taturim

original: RV_4,039.03a yo aśvasya dadhikrāvṇo akārīt samiddhe agnā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
analyzed: yaḥ aśvasya dadhikrāvṇaḥ akārīt samiddhe agnau uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_4,039.03c anāgasaṃ tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu sa mitreṇa varuṇenā sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: anāgasam tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu sa mitreṇa varuṇena sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_4,039.04a dadhikrāvṇa iṣa ūrjo maho yad amanmahi marutāṃ nāma bhadram /
analyzed: dadhikrāvṇaḥ iṣaḥ ūrjaḥ mahaḥ yat amanmahi marutām nāma bhadram

original: RV_4,039.04c svastaye varuṇam mitram agniṃ havāmaha indraṃ vajrabāhum //
analyzed: svastaye varuṇam mitram agnim havāmahe indram vajra bāhum

original: RV_4,039.05a indram ived ubhaye vi hvayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ /
analyzed: indram iva id ubhaye vi hvayante udīrāṇāḥ yajñam upaprayantaḥ

original: RV_4,039.05c dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya dadathur mitrāvaruṇā no aśvam //
analyzed: dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya dadathuḥ mitrāvaruṇā naḥ aśvam

original: RV_4,039.06a dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣaṃ jiṣṇor aśvasya vājinaḥ /
analyzed: dadhikrāvṇaḥ akāriṣam jiṣṇoḥ aśvasya vājinaḥ

original: RV_4,039.06c surabhi no mukhā karat pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat //
analyzed: surabhi naḥ mukhā karat pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: RV_4,040.01a dadhikrāvṇa id u nu carkirāma viśvā in mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu /
analyzed: dadhikrāvṇaḥ id u nu carkirāma viśvāḥ id mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu

original: RV_4,040.01c apām agner uṣasaḥ sūryasya bṛhaspater āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: apām agneḥ uṣasaḥ sūryasya bṛhaspateḥ āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ

original: RV_4,040.02a satvā bhariṣo gaviṣo duvanyasac chravasyād iṣa uṣasas turaṇyasat /
analyzed: satvā bhariṣaḥ gaviṣaḥ duvanyasad śravasyāt iṣaḥ uṣasaḥ turaṇyasad

original: RV_4,040.02c satyo dravo dravaraḥ pataṅgaro dadhikrāveṣam ūrjaṃ svar janat //
analyzed: satyaḥ dravaḥ dravaraḥ pataṅgaraḥ dadhikrāvā iṣam ūrjam svar janat

original: RV_4,040.03a uta smāsya dravatas turaṇyataḥ parṇaṃ na ver anu vāti pragardhinaḥ /
analyzed: uta sma asya dravataḥ turaṇyataḥ parṇam na veḥ anu vāti pragardhinaḥ

original: RV_4,040.03c śyenasyeva dhrajato aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ sahorjā taritrataḥ //
analyzed: śyenasya iva dhrajataḥ aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ saha ūrjā taritrataḥ

original: RV_4,040.04a uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyām baddho apikakṣa āsani /
analyzed: uta sya vājī kṣipaṇim turaṇyati grīvāyām baddhaḥ apikakṣe āsani

original: RV_4,040.04c kratuṃ dadhikrā anu saṃtavītvat pathām aṅkāṃsy anv āpanīphaṇat //
analyzed: kratum dadhikrāḥ anu saṃtavītvat pathām aṅkāṃsi anu āpanīphaṇat

original: RV_4,040.05a haṃsaḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir duroṇasat /
analyzed: haṃsaḥ śuci sad vasuḥ antarikṣa sad hotā vedi sad atithiḥ duroṇa sad

original: RV_4,040.05c nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtam //
analyzed: nṛṣad vara sad ṛta sad vyoma sad ap jāḥ go jāḥ ṛta jāḥ adri jāḥ ṛtam

original: RV_4,041.01a indrā ko vāṃ varuṇā sumnam āpa stomo haviṣmāṃ amṛto na hotā /
analyzed: indrā kaḥ vām varuṇā sumnam āpa stomaḥ haviṣmān amṛtaḥ na hotā

original: RV_4,041.01c yo vāṃ hṛdi kratumāṃ asmad uktaḥ pasparśad indrāvaruṇā namasvān //
analyzed: yaḥ vām hṛdi kratumān asmat uktaḥ pasparśat indrāvaruṇāḥ namasvān

original: RV_4,041.02a indrā ha yo varuṇā cakra āpī devau martaḥ sakhyāya prayasvān /
analyzed: indrā ha yaḥ varuṇā cakre āpī devau martaḥ sakhyāya prayasvān

original: RV_4,041.02c sa hanti vṛtrā samitheṣu śatrūn avobhir vā mahadbhiḥ sa pra śṛṇve //
analyzed: sa hanti vṛtrā samitheṣu śatrūn avobhiḥ vā mahadbhiḥ sa pra śṛṇve

original: RV_4,041.03a indrā ha ratnaṃ varuṇā dheṣṭhetthā nṛbhyaḥ śaśamānebhyas tā /
analyzed: indrā ha ratnam varuṇā dheṣṭhā itthā nṛbhyaḥ śaśamānebhyaḥ tā

original: RV_4,041.03c yadī sakhāyā sakhyāya somaiḥ sutebhiḥ suprayasā mādayaite //
analyzed: yadī sakhāyā sakhyāya somaiḥ sutebhiḥ su prayasā mādayaite

original: RV_4,041.04a indrā yuvaṃ varuṇā didyum asminn ojiṣṭham ugrā ni vadhiṣṭaṃ vajram /
analyzed: indrā yuvam varuṇā didyum asmin ojiṣṭham ugrā ni vadhiṣṭam vajram

original: RV_4,041.04c yo no durevo vṛkatir dabhītis tasmin mimāthām abhibhūty ojaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ durevaḥ vṛkatiḥ dabhītiḥ tasmin mimāthām abhibhūti ojaḥ

original: RV_4,041.05a indrā yuvaṃ varuṇā bhūtam asyā dhiyaḥ pretārā vṛṣabheva dhenoḥ /
analyzed: indrā yuvam varuṇā bhūtam asyāḥ dhiyaḥ pretārā vṛṣabhā iva dhenoḥ

original: RV_4,041.05c sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ //
analyzed: sā naḥ duhīyat yavasā iva gatvī sahasra dhārā payasā mahī gauḥ

original: RV_4,041.06a toke hite tanaya urvarāsu sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaś ca pauṃsye /
analyzed: toke hite tanaye urvarāsu sūraḥ dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaḥ ca pauṃsye

original: RV_4,041.06c indrā no atra varuṇā syātām avobhir dasmā paritakmyāyām //
analyzed: indrā naḥ atra varuṇā syātām avobhiḥ dasmā paritakmyāyām

original: RV_4,041.07a yuvām id dhy avase pūrvyāya pari prabhūtī gaviṣaḥ svāpī /
analyzed: yuvām id hi avase pūrvyāya pari prabhūtī gaviṣaḥ svāpī

original: RV_4,041.07c vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya priyāya śūrā maṃhiṣṭhā pitareva śambhū //
analyzed: vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya priyāya śūrā maṃhiṣṭhā pitarā iva śambhū

original: RV_4,041.08a tā vāṃ dhiyo 'vase vājayantīr ājiṃ na jagmur yuvayūḥ sudānū /
analyzed: tāḥ vām dhiyaḥ vase vājayantīḥ ājim na jagmuḥ yuvayūḥ sudānū

original: RV_4,041.08c śriye na gāva upa somam asthur indraṃ giro varuṇam me manīṣāḥ //
analyzed: śriye na gāvaḥ upa somam asthuḥ indram giraḥ varuṇam me manīṣāḥ

original: RV_4,041.09a imā indraṃ varuṇam me manīṣā agmann upa draviṇam icchamānāḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ indram varuṇam me manīṣāḥ agman upa draviṇam icchamānāḥ

original: RV_4,041.09c upem asthur joṣṭāra iva vasvo raghvīr iva śravaso bhikṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: upa īm asthuḥ joṣṭāraḥ iva vasvaḥ raghvīḥ iva śravasaḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_4,041.10a aśvyasya tmanā rathyasya puṣṭer nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma /
analyzed: aśvyasya tmanā rathyasya puṣṭeḥ nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_4,041.10c tā cakrāṇā ūtibhir navyasībhir asmatrā rāyo niyutaḥ sacantām //
analyzed: tā cakrāṇau ūtibhiḥ navyasībhiḥ asmatrā rāyaḥ niyutaḥ sacantām

original: RV_4,041.11a ā no bṛhantā bṛhatībhir ūtī indra yātaṃ varuṇa vājasātau /
analyzed: ā naḥ bṛhantā bṛhatībhiḥ ūtī indra yātam varuṇa vājasātau

original: RV_4,041.11c yad didyavaḥ pṛtanāsu prakrīḷān tasya vāṃ syāma sanitāra ājeḥ //
analyzed: yat didyavaḥ pṛtanāsu prakrīḍān tasya vām syāma sanitāraḥ ājeḥ

original: RV_4,042.01a mama dvitā rāṣṭraṃ kṣatriyasya viśvāyor viśve amṛtā yathā naḥ /
analyzed: mama dvitā rāṣṭram kṣatriyasya viśvāyoḥ viśve amṛtāḥ yathā naḥ

original: RV_4,042.01c kratuṃ sacante varuṇasya devā rājāmi kṛṣṭer upamasya vavreḥ //
analyzed: kratum sacante varuṇasya devāḥ rājāmi kṛṣṭeḥ upamasya vavreḥ

original: RV_4,042.02a ahaṃ rājā varuṇo mahyaṃ tāny asuryāṇi prathamā dhārayanta /
analyzed: aham rājā varuṇaḥ mahyam tāni asuryāṇi prathamā dhārayanta

original: RV_4,042.02c kratuṃ sacante varuṇasya devā rājāmi kṛṣṭer upamasya vavreḥ //
analyzed: kratum sacante varuṇasya devāḥ rājāmi kṛṣṭeḥ upamasya vavreḥ

original: RV_4,042.03a aham indro varuṇas te mahitvorvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke /
analyzed: aham indraḥ varuṇaḥ te mahitvā urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke

original: RV_4,042.03c tvaṣṭeva viśvā bhuvanāni vidvān sam airayaṃ rodasī dhārayaṃ ca //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā iva viśvā bhuvanāni vidvān sam airayam rodasī dhārayam ca

original: RV_4,042.04a aham apo apinvam ukṣamāṇā dhārayaṃ divaṃ sadana ṛtasya /
analyzed: aham apaḥ apinvam ukṣamāṇāḥ dhārayam divam sadane ṛtasya

original: RV_4,042.04c ṛtena putro aditer ṛtāvota tridhātu prathayad vi bhūma //
analyzed: ṛtena putraḥ aditeḥ ṛtāvā uta tri dhātu prathayat vi bhūma

original: RV_4,042.05a māṃ naraḥ svaśvā vājayanto māṃ vṛtāḥ samaraṇe havante /
analyzed: mām naraḥ su aśvāḥ vājayantaḥ mām vṛtāḥ samaraṇe havante

original: RV_4,042.05c kṛṇomy ājim maghavāham indra iyarmi reṇum abhibhūtyojāḥ //
analyzed: kṛṇomi ājim maghavā aham indraḥ iyarmi reṇum abhibhūti ojāḥ

original: RV_4,042.06a ahaṃ tā viśvā cakaraṃ nakir mā daivyaṃ saho varate apratītam /
analyzed: aham tā viśvā cakaram nakir mā daivyam sahaḥ varate apratītam

original: RV_4,042.06c yan mā somāso mamadan yad ukthobhe bhayete rajasī apāre //
analyzed: yat mā somāsaḥ mamadan yat ukthā ubhe bhayete rajasī apāre

original: RV_4,042.07a viduṣ ṭe viśvā bhuvanāni tasya tā pra bravīṣi varuṇāya vedhaḥ /
analyzed: viduḥ te viśvā bhuvanāni tasya tā pra bravīṣi varuṇāya vedhaḥ

original: RV_4,042.07c tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi śṛṇviṣe jaghanvān tvaṃ vṛtāṃ ariṇā indra sindhūn //
analyzed: tvam vṛtrāṇi śṛṇviṣe jaghanvān tvam vṛtām ariṇāḥ indra sindhūn

original: RV_4,042.08a asmākam atra pitaras ta āsan sapta ṛṣayo daurgahe badhyamāne /
analyzed: asmākam atra pitaraḥ te āsan sapta ṛṣayaḥ daurgahe badhyamāne

original: RV_4,042.08c ta āyajanta trasadasyum asyā indraṃ na vṛtraturam ardhadevam //
analyzed: te āyajanta trasadasyum asyāḥ indram na vṛtra turam ardha devam

original: RV_4,042.09a purukutsānī hi vām adāśad dhavyebhir indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ /
analyzed: purukutsānī hi vām adāśat havyebhiḥ indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ

original: RV_4,042.09c athā rājānaṃ trasadasyum asyā vṛtrahaṇaṃ dadathur ardhadevam //
analyzed: athā rājānam trasadasyum asyāḥ vṛtra haṇam dadathuḥ ardha devam

original: RV_4,042.10a rāyā vayaṃ sasavāṃso madema havyena devā yavasena gāvaḥ /
analyzed: rāyā vayam sasavāṃsaḥ madema havyena devāḥ yavasena gāvaḥ

original: RV_4,042.10c tāṃ dhenum indrāvaruṇā yuvaṃ no viśvāhā dhattam anapasphurantīm //
analyzed: tām dhenum indrāvaruṇāḥ yuvam naḥ viśvāhā dhattam an apasphurantīm

original: RV_4,043.01a ka u śravat katamo yajñiyānāṃ vandāru devaḥ katamo juṣāte /
analyzed: kaḥ u śravat katamaḥ yajñiyānām vandāru devaḥ katamaḥ juṣāte

original: RV_4,043.01c kasyemāṃ devīm amṛteṣu preṣṭhāṃ hṛdi śreṣāma suṣṭutiṃ suhavyām //
analyzed: kasya imām devīm amṛteṣu preṣṭhām hṛdi śreṣāma suṣṭutim su havyām

original: RV_4,043.02a ko mṛḷāti katama āgamiṣṭho devānām u katamaḥ śambhaviṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ mṛḍāti katamaḥ āgamiṣṭhaḥ devānām u katamaḥ śambhaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_4,043.02c rathaṃ kam āhur dravadaśvam āśuṃ yaṃ sūryasya duhitāvṛṇīta //
analyzed: ratham kam āhuḥ dravat aśvam āśum yam sūryasya duhitā avṛṇīta

original: RV_4,043.03a makṣū hi ṣmā gacchatha īvato dyūn indro na śaktim paritakmyāyām /
analyzed: makṣū hi sma gacchathaḥ īvataḥ dyūn indraḥ na śaktim paritakmyāyām

original: RV_4,043.03c diva ājātā divyā suparṇā kayā śacīnām bhavathaḥ śaciṣṭhā //
analyzed: divaḥ ājātā divyā suparṇā kayā śacīnām bhavathaḥ śaciṣṭhā

original: RV_4,043.04a kā vām bhūd upamātiḥ kayā na āśvinā gamatho hūyamānā /
analyzed: kā vām bhūt upamātiḥ kayā naḥ āśvinā gamathaḥ hūyamānā

original: RV_4,043.04c ko vām mahaś cit tyajaso abhīka uruṣyatam mādhvī dasrā na ūtī //
analyzed: kaḥ vām mahaḥ cit tyajasaḥ abhīke uruṣyatam mādhvī dasrā naḥ ūtī

original: RV_4,043.05a uru vāṃ rathaḥ pari nakṣati dyām ā yat samudrād abhi vartate vām /
analyzed: uru vām rathaḥ pari nakṣati dyām ā yat samudrāt abhi vartate vām

original: RV_4,043.05c madhvā mādhvī madhu vām pruṣāyan yat sīṃ vām pṛkṣo bhurajanta pakvāḥ //
analyzed: madhvā mādhvī madhu vām pruṣāyan yat sīm vām pṛkṣaḥ bhurajanta pakvāḥ

original: RV_4,043.06a sindhur ha vāṃ rasayā siñcad aśvān ghṛṇā vayo 'ruṣāsaḥ pari gman /
analyzed: sindhuḥ ha vām rasayā siñcat aśvān ghṛṇāḥ vayaḥ ruṣāsaḥ pari gman

original: RV_4,043.06c tad ū ṣu vām ajiraṃ ceti yānaṃ yena patī bhavathaḥ sūryāyāḥ //
analyzed: tat u su vām ajiram ceti yānam yena patī bhavathaḥ sūryāyāḥ

original: RV_4,043.07a iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā /
analyzed: iha iha yat vām samanā sā iyam asme sumatiḥ vāja ratnā

original: RV_4,043.07c uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik //
analyzed: uruṣyatam jaritāram yuvam ha śritaḥ kāmaḥ nāsatyā yuvadrik

original: RV_4,044.01a taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema pṛthujrayam aśvinā saṃgatiṃ goḥ /
analyzed: tam vām ratham vayam adya ā huvema pṛthujrayam aśvinā saṃgatim goḥ

original: RV_4,044.01c yaḥ sūryāṃ vahati vandhurāyur girvāhasam purutamaṃ vasūyum //
analyzed: yaḥ sūryām vahati vandhurāyuḥ gir vāhasam purutamam vasūyum

original: RV_4,044.02a yuvaṃ śriyam aśvinā devatā tāṃ divo napātā vanathaḥ śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: yuvam śriyam aśvinā devatā tām divaḥ napātā vanathaḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_4,044.02c yuvor vapur abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante vahanti yat kakuhāso rathe vām //
analyzed: yuvoḥ vapuḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante vahanti yat kakuhāsaḥ rathe vām

original: RV_4,044.03a ko vām adyā karate rātahavya ūtaye vā sutapeyāya vārkaiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ vām adyā karate rāta havyaḥ ūtaye vā suta peyāya vā arkaiḥ

original: RV_4,044.03c ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namo yemāno aśvinā vavartat //
analyzed: ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namaḥ yemānaḥ aśvinā vavartat

original: RV_4,044.04a hiraṇyayena purubhū rathenemaṃ yajñaṃ nāsatyopa yātam /
analyzed: hiraṇyayena puru bhū rathena imam yajñam nāsatyā upa yātam

original: RV_4,044.04c pibātha in madhunaḥ somyasya dadhatho ratnaṃ vidhate janāya //
analyzed: pibāthaḥ id madhunaḥ somyasya dadhathaḥ ratnam vidhate janāya

original: RV_4,044.05a ā no yātaṃ divo acchā pṛthivyā hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena /
analyzed: ā naḥ yātam divaḥ acchā pṛthivyāḥ hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena

original: RV_4,044.05c mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ saṃ yad dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām //
analyzed: mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ sam yat dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām

original: RV_4,044.06a nū no rayim puruvīram bṛhantaṃ dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣv asme /
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim puru vīram bṛhantam dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣu asme

original: RV_4,044.06c naro yad vām aśvinā stomam āvan sadhastutim ājamīḷhāso agman //
analyzed: naraḥ yat vām aśvinā stomam āvan sadhastutim ājamīḍhāsaḥ agman

original: RV_4,044.07a iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā /
analyzed: iha iha yat vām samanā sā iyam asme sumatiḥ vāja ratnā

original: RV_4,044.07c uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik //
analyzed: uruṣyatam jaritāram yuvam ha śritaḥ kāmaḥ nāsatyā yuvadrik

original: RV_4,045.01a eṣa sya bhānur ud iyarti yujyate rathaḥ parijmā divo asya sānavi /
analyzed: eṣa sya bhānuḥ ud iyarti yujyate rathaḥ parijmā divaḥ asya sānavi

original: RV_4,045.01c pṛkṣāso asmin mithunā adhi trayo dṛtis turīyo madhuno vi rapśate //
analyzed: pṛkṣāsaḥ asmin mithunāḥ adhi trayaḥ dṛtiḥ turīyaḥ madhunaḥ vi rapśate

original: RV_4,045.02a ud vām pṛkṣāso madhumanta īrate rathā aśvāsa uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: ud vām pṛkṣāsaḥ madhumantaḥ īrate rathāḥ aśvāsaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_4,045.02c aporṇuvantas tama ā parīvṛtaṃ svar ṇa śukraṃ tanvanta ā rajaḥ //
analyzed: aporṇuvantaḥ tamaḥ ā parīvṛtam svar na śukram tanvantaḥ ā rajaḥ

original: RV_4,045.03a madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhir uta priyam madhune yuñjāthāṃ ratham /
analyzed: madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhiḥ āsabhiḥ uta priyam madhune yuñjāthām ratham

original: RV_4,045.03c ā vartanim madhunā jinvathas patho dṛtiṃ vahethe madhumantam aśvinā //
analyzed: ā vartanim madhunā jinvathaḥ pathaḥ dṛtim vahethe madhumantam aśvinā

original: RV_4,045.04a haṃsāso ye vām madhumanto asridho hiraṇyaparṇā uhuva uṣarbudhaḥ /
analyzed: haṃsāsaḥ ye vām madhumantaḥ asridhaḥ hiraṇya parṇāḥ uhuve uṣarbudhaḥ

original: RV_4,045.04c udapruto mandino mandinispṛśo madhvo na makṣaḥ savanāni gacchathaḥ //
analyzed: uda prutaḥ mandinaḥ mandi nispṛśaḥ madhvaḥ na makṣaḥ savanāni gacchathaḥ

original: RV_4,045.05a svadhvarāso madhumanto agnaya usrā jarante prati vastor aśvinā /
analyzed: su adhvarāsaḥ madhumantaḥ agnayaḥ usrāḥ jarante prati vastoḥ aśvinā

original: RV_4,045.05c yan niktahastas taraṇir vicakṣaṇaḥ somaṃ suṣāva madhumantam adribhiḥ //
analyzed: yat nikta hastaḥ taraṇiḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ somam suṣāva madhumantam adribhiḥ

original: RV_4,045.06a ākenipāso ahabhir davidhvataḥ svar ṇa śukraṃ tanvanta ā rajaḥ /
analyzed: ākenipāsaḥ ahabhiḥ davidhvataḥ svar na śukram tanvantaḥ ā rajaḥ

original: RV_4,045.06c sūraś cid aśvān yuyujāna īyate viśvāṃ anu svadhayā cetathas pathaḥ //
analyzed: sūraḥ cit aśvān yuyujānaḥ īyate viśvān anu svadhayā cetathaḥ pathaḥ

original: RV_4,045.07a pra vām avocam aśvinā dhiyandhā rathaḥ svaśvo ajaro yo asti /
analyzed: pra vām avocam aśvinā dhiyandhāḥ rathaḥ su aśvaḥ ajaraḥ yaḥ asti

original: RV_4,045.07c yena sadyaḥ pari rajāṃsi yātho haviṣmantaṃ taraṇim bhojam accha //
analyzed: yena sadyas pari rajāṃsi yāthaḥ haviṣmantam taraṇim bhojam accha

original: RV_4,046.01a agram pibā madhūnāṃ sutaṃ vāyo diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: agram pibā madhūnām sutam vāyo diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_4,046.01c tvaṃ hi pūrvapā asi //
analyzed: tvam hi pūrva pāḥ asi

original: RV_4,046.02a śatenā no abhiṣṭibhir niyutvāṃ indrasārathiḥ /
analyzed: śatena ā naḥ abhiṣṭibhiḥ niyutvān indra sārathiḥ

original: RV_4,046.02c vāyo sutasya tṛmpatam //
