analyzed: vāyo sutasya tṛmpatam

original: RV_4,046.03a ā vāṃ sahasraṃ haraya indravāyū abhi prayaḥ /
analyzed: ā vām sahasram harayaḥ indra vāyū abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_4,046.03c vahantu somapītaye //
analyzed: vahantu soma pītaye

original: RV_4,046.04a rathaṃ hiraṇyavandhuram indravāyū svadhvaram /
analyzed: ratham hiraṇya vandhuram indra vāyū su adhvaram

original: RV_4,046.04c ā hi sthātho divispṛśam //
analyzed: ā hi sthāthaḥ divispṛśam

original: RV_4,046.05a rathena pṛthupājasā dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam /
analyzed: rathena pṛthu pājasā dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam

original: RV_4,046.05c indravāyū ihā gatam //
analyzed: indra vāyū iha ā gatam

original: RV_4,046.06a indravāyū ayaṃ sutas taṃ devebhiḥ sajoṣasā /
analyzed: indra vāyū ayam sutaḥ tam devebhiḥ sajoṣasā

original: RV_4,046.06c pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe //
analyzed: pibatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_4,046.07a iha prayāṇam astu vām indravāyū vimocanam /
analyzed: iha prayāṇam astu vām indra vāyū vimocanam

original: RV_4,046.07c iha vāṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: iha vām soma pītaye

original: RV_4,047.01a vāyo śukro ayāmi te madhvo agraṃ diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: vāyo śukraḥ ayāmi te madhvaḥ agram diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_4,047.01c ā yāhi somapītaye spārho deva niyutvatā //
analyzed: ā yāhi soma pītaye spārhaḥ deva niyutvatā

original: RV_4,047.02a indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ somānām pītim arhathaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ ca vāyo eṣām somānām pītim arhathaḥ

original: RV_4,047.02c yuvāṃ hi yantīndavo nimnam āpo na sadhryak //
analyzed: yuvām hi yanti indavaḥ nimnam āpaḥ na sadhryak

original: RV_4,047.03a vāyav indraś ca śuṣmiṇā sarathaṃ śavasas patī /
analyzed: vāyo indraḥ ca śuṣmiṇā sa ratham śavasaḥ patī

original: RV_4,047.03c niyutvantā na ūtaya ā yātaṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: niyutvantā naḥ ūtaye ā yātam soma pītaye

original: RV_4,047.04a yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā /
analyzed: yāḥ vām santi puruspṛhaḥ niyutaḥ dāśuṣe narā

original: RV_4,047.04c asme tā yajñavāhasendravāyū ni yacchatam //
analyzed: asme tā yajña vāhasā indra vāyū ni yacchatam

original: RV_4,048.01a vihi hotrā avītā vipo na rāyo aryaḥ /
analyzed: vihi hotrāḥ a vītāḥ vipaḥ na rāyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_4,048.01c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
analyzed: vāyo ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye

original: RV_4,048.02a niryuvāṇo aśastīr niyutvāṃ indrasārathiḥ /
analyzed: niryuvāṇaḥ aśastīḥ niyutvān indra sārathiḥ

original: RV_4,048.02c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
analyzed: vāyo ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye

original: RV_4,048.03a anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī yemāte viśvapeśasā /
analyzed: anu kṛṣṇe vasu dhitī yemāte viśva peśasā

original: RV_4,048.03c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
analyzed: vāyo ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye

original: RV_4,048.04a vahantu tvā manoyujo yuktāso navatir nava /
analyzed: vahantu tvā manaḥ yujaḥ yuktāsaḥ navatiḥ nava

original: RV_4,048.04c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
analyzed: vāyo ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye

original: RV_4,048.05a vāyo śataṃ harīṇāṃ yuvasva poṣyāṇām /
analyzed: vāyo śatam harīṇām yuvasva poṣyāṇām

original: RV_4,048.05c uta vā te sahasriṇo ratha ā yātu pājasā //
analyzed: uta vā te sahasriṇaḥ rathaḥ ā yātu pājasā

original: RV_4,049.01a idaṃ vām āsye haviḥ priyam indrābṛhaspatī /
analyzed: idam vām āsye haviḥ priyam indrābṛhaspatī

original: RV_4,049.01c uktham madaś ca śasyate //
analyzed: uktham madaḥ ca śasyate

original: RV_4,049.02a ayaṃ vām pari ṣicyate soma indrābṛhaspatī /
analyzed: ayam vām pari sicyate somaḥ indrābṛhaspatī

original: RV_4,049.02c cārur madāya pītaye //
analyzed: cāruḥ madāya pītaye

original: RV_4,049.03a ā na indrābṛhaspatī gṛham indraś ca gacchatam /
analyzed: ā naḥ indrābṛhaspatī gṛham indraḥ ca gacchatam

original: RV_4,049.03c somapā somapītaye //
analyzed: soma pā soma pītaye

original: RV_4,049.04a asme indrābṛhaspatī rayiṃ dhattaṃ śatagvinam /
analyzed: asme indrābṛhaspatī rayim dhattam śatagvinam

original: RV_4,049.04c aśvāvantaṃ sahasriṇam //
analyzed: aśvāvantam sahasriṇam

original: RV_4,049.05a indrābṛhaspatī vayaṃ sute gīrbhir havāmahe /
analyzed: indrābṛhaspatī vayam sute gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_4,049.05c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_4,049.06a somam indrābṛhaspatī pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe /
analyzed: somam indrābṛhaspatī pibatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_4,049.06c mādayethāṃ tadokasā //
analyzed: mādayethām tad okasā

original: RV_4,050.01a yas tastambha sahasā vi jmo antān bṛhaspatis triṣadhastho raveṇa /
analyzed: yaḥ tastambha sahasā vi jmaḥ antān bṛhaspatiḥ triṣadhasthaḥ raveṇa

original: RV_4,050.01c tam pratnāsa ṛṣayo dīdhyānāḥ puro viprā dadhire mandrajihvam //
analyzed: tam pratnāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dīdhyānāḥ puras viprāḥ dadhire mandra jihvam

original: RV_4,050.02a dhunetayaḥ supraketam madanto bṛhaspate abhi ye nas tatasre /
analyzed: dhunetayaḥ su praketam madantaḥ bṛhaspate abhi ye naḥ tatasre

original: RV_4,050.02c pṛṣantaṃ sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatād asya yonim //
analyzed: pṛṣantam sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatāt asya yonim

original: RV_4,050.03a bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvad ata ā ta ṛtaspṛśo ni ṣeduḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvat atas ā te ṛta spṛśaḥ ni seduḥ

original: RV_4,050.03c tubhyaṃ khātā avatā adridugdhā madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam //
analyzed: tubhyam khātāḥ avatāḥ adri dugdhāḥ madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitas virapśam

original: RV_4,050.04a bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ mahaḥ jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman

original: RV_4,050.04c saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi //
analyzed: sapta āsyaḥ tuvi jātaḥ raveṇa vi sapta raśmiḥ adhamat tamāṃsi

original: RV_4,050.05a sa suṣṭubhā sa ṛkvatā gaṇena valaṃ ruroja phaligaṃ raveṇa /
analyzed: sa suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena valam ruroja phaligam raveṇa

original: RV_4,050.05c bṛhaspatir usriyā havyasūdaḥ kanikradad vāvaśatīr ud ājat //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ usriyāḥ havyasūdaḥ kanikradat vāvaśatīḥ ud ājat

original: RV_4,050.06a evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ /
analyzed: eva pitre viśva devāya vṛṣṇe yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ

original: RV_4,050.06c bṛhaspate suprajā vīravanto vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: bṛhaspate su prajāḥ vīravantaḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_4,050.07a sa id rājā pratijanyāni viśvā śuṣmeṇa tasthāv abhi vīryeṇa /
analyzed: saḥ id rājā pratijanyāni viśvā śuṣmeṇa tasthau abhi vīryeṇa

original: RV_4,050.07c bṛhaspatiṃ yaḥ subhṛtam bibharti valgūyati vandate pūrvabhājam //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim yaḥ su bhṛtam bibharti valgūyati vandate pūrvabhājam

original: RV_4,050.08a sa it kṣeti sudhita okasi sve tasmā iḷā pinvate viśvadānīm /
analyzed: saḥ id kṣeti sudhite okasi sve tasmai iḷā pinvate viśvadānīm

original: RV_4,050.08c tasmai viśaḥ svayam evā namante yasmin brahmā rājani pūrva eti //
analyzed: tasmai viśaḥ svayam evā namante yasmin brahmā rājani pūrvaḥ eti

original: RV_4,050.09a apratīto jayati saṃ dhanāni pratijanyāny uta yā sajanyā /
analyzed: apratītaḥ jayati sam dhanāni pratijanyāni uta yā sajanyā

original: RV_4,050.09c avasyave yo varivaḥ kṛṇoti brahmaṇe rājā tam avanti devāḥ //
analyzed: avasyave yaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇoti brahmaṇe rājā tam avanti devāḥ

original: RV_4,050.10a indraś ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate 'smin yajñe mandasānā vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: indraḥ ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate smin yajñe mandasānā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_4,050.10c ā vāṃ viśantv indavaḥ svābhuvo 'sme rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchatam //
analyzed: ā vām viśantu indavaḥ su ābhuvaḥ sme rayim sarva vīram ni yacchatam

original: RV_4,050.11a bṛhaspata indra vardhataṃ naḥ sacā sā vāṃ sumatir bhūtv asme /
analyzed: bṛhaspate indra vardhatam naḥ sacā sā vām sumatiḥ bhūtu asme

original: RV_4,050.11c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ //
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam purandhīḥ jajastam aryaḥ vanuṣām arātīḥ

original: RV_4,051.01a idam u tyat purutamam purastāj jyotis tamaso vayunāvad asthāt /
analyzed: idam u tyad purutamam purastāt jyotiḥ tamasaḥ vayunāvat asthāt

original: RV_4,051.01c nūnaṃ divo duhitaro vibhātīr gātuṃ kṛṇavann uṣaso janāya //
analyzed: nūnam divaḥ duhitaraḥ vibhātīḥ gātum kṛṇavan uṣasaḥ janāya

original: RV_4,051.02a asthur u citrā uṣasaḥ purastān mitā iva svaravo 'dhvareṣu /
analyzed: asthuḥ u citrāḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt mitāḥ iva svaravaḥ dhvareṣu

original: RV_4,051.02c vy ū vrajasya tamaso dvārocchantīr avrañ chucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
analyzed: vi ū vrajasya tamasaḥ dvārā ucchantīḥ avram śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: RV_4,051.03a ucchantīr adya citayanta bhojān rādhodeyāyoṣaso maghonīḥ /
analyzed: ucchantīḥ adya citayanta bhojān rādhaḥ deyāya uṣasaḥ maghonīḥ

original: RV_4,051.03c acitre antaḥ paṇayaḥ sasantv abudhyamānās tamaso vimadhye //
analyzed: acitre antar paṇayaḥ sasantu a budhyamānāḥ tamasaḥ vimadhye

original: RV_4,051.04a kuvit sa devīḥ sanayo navo vā yāmo babhūyād uṣaso vo adya /
analyzed: kuvid sa devīḥ sanayaḥ navaḥ vā yāmaḥ babhūyāt uṣasaḥ vaḥ adya

original: RV_4,051.04c yenā navagve aṅgire daśagve saptāsye revatī revad ūṣa //
analyzed: yena navagve aṅgire daśagve sapta āsye revatī revat ūṣa

original: RV_4,051.05a yūyaṃ hi devīr ṛtayugbhir aśvaiḥ pariprayātha bhuvanāni sadyaḥ /
analyzed: yūyam hi devīḥ ṛta yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ pariprayātha bhuvanāni sadyas

original: RV_4,051.05c prabodhayantīr uṣasaḥ sasantaṃ dvipāc catuṣpāc carathāya jīvam //
analyzed: prabodhayantīḥ uṣasaḥ sasantam dvipād catuṣpād carathāya jīvam

original: RV_4,051.06a kva svid āsāṃ katamā purāṇī yayā vidhānā vidadhur ṛbhūṇām /
analyzed: kva svid āsām katamā purāṇī yayā vidhānā vidadhuḥ ṛbhūṇām

original: RV_4,051.06c śubhaṃ yac chubhrā uṣasaś caranti na vi jñāyante sadṛśīr ajuryāḥ //
analyzed: śubham yat śubhrāḥ uṣasaḥ caranti na vi jñāyante sadṛśīḥ ajuryāḥ

original: RV_4,051.07a tā ghā tā bhadrā uṣasaḥ purāsur abhiṣṭidyumnā ṛtajātasatyāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ gha tāḥ bhadrāḥ uṣasaḥ purā āsuḥ abhiṣṭi dyumnāḥ ṛta jāta satyāḥ

original: RV_4,051.07c yāsv ījānaḥ śaśamāna ukthai stuvañ chaṃsan draviṇaṃ sadya āpa //
analyzed: yāsu ījānaḥ śaśamānaḥ ukthaiḥ stuvam chaṃsan draviṇam sadyas āpa

original: RV_4,051.08a tā ā caranti samanā purastāt samānataḥ samanā paprathānāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ ā caranti samanā purastāt samānatas samanā paprathānāḥ

original: RV_4,051.08c ṛtasya devīḥ sadaso budhānā gavāṃ na sargā uṣaso jarante //
analyzed: ṛtasya devīḥ sadasaḥ budhānāḥ gavām na sargāḥ uṣasaḥ jarante

original: RV_4,051.09a tā in nv eva samanā samānīr amītavarṇā uṣasaś caranti /
analyzed: tāḥ id nu eva samanā samānīḥ amīta varṇāḥ uṣasaḥ caranti

original: RV_4,051.09c gūhantīr abhvam asitaṃ ruśadbhiḥ śukrās tanūbhiḥ śucayo rucānāḥ //
analyzed: gūhantīḥ abhvam asitam ruśadbhiḥ śukrāḥ tanūbhiḥ śucayaḥ rucānāḥ

original: RV_4,051.10a rayiṃ divo duhitaro vibhātīḥ prajāvantaṃ yacchatāsmāsu devīḥ /
analyzed: rayim divaḥ duhitaraḥ vibhātīḥ prajāvantam yacchata asmāsu devīḥ

original: RV_4,051.10c syonād ā vaḥ pratibudhyamānāḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
analyzed: syonāt ā vaḥ pratibudhyamānāḥ su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_4,051.11a tad vo divo duhitaro vibhātīr upa bruva uṣaso yajñaketuḥ /
analyzed: tat vaḥ divaḥ duhitaraḥ vibhātīḥ upa bruve uṣasaḥ yajña ketuḥ

original: RV_4,051.11c vayaṃ syāma yaśaso janeṣu tad dyauś ca dhattām pṛthivī ca devī //
analyzed: vayam syāma yaśasaḥ janeṣu tat dyauḥ ca dhattām pṛthivī ca devī

original: RV_4,052.01a prati ṣyā sūnarī janī vyucchantī pari svasuḥ /
analyzed: prati syā sūnarī janī vyucchantī pari svasuḥ

original: RV_4,052.01c divo adarśi duhitā //
analyzed: divaḥ adarśi duhitā

original: RV_4,052.02a aśveva citrāruṣī mātā gavām ṛtāvarī /
analyzed: aśvā iva citrā aruṣī mātā gavām ṛtāvarī

original: RV_4,052.02c sakhābhūd aśvinor uṣāḥ //
analyzed: sakhā abhūt aśvinoḥ uṣāḥ

original: RV_4,052.03a uta sakhāsy aśvinor uta mātā gavām asi /
analyzed: uta sakhā asi aśvinoḥ uta mātā gavām asi

original: RV_4,052.03c utoṣo vasva īśiṣe //
analyzed: uta uṣaḥ vasvaḥ īśiṣe

original: RV_4,052.04a yāvayaddveṣasaṃ tvā cikitvit sūnṛtāvari /
analyzed: yāvayat dveṣasam tvā cikitvit sūnṛtāvari

original: RV_4,052.04c prati stomair abhutsmahi //
analyzed: prati stomaiḥ abhutsmahi

original: RV_4,052.05a prati bhadrā adṛkṣata gavāṃ sargā na raśmayaḥ /
analyzed: prati bhadrāḥ adṛkṣata gavām sargāḥ na raśmayaḥ

original: RV_4,052.05c oṣā aprā uru jrayaḥ //
analyzed: oṣāḥ aprāḥ uru jrayaḥ

original: RV_4,052.06a āpapruṣī vibhāvari vy āvar jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
analyzed: āpapruṣī vibhāvari vi āvaḥ jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_4,052.06c uṣo anu svadhām ava //
analyzed: uṣaḥ anu svadhām ava

original: RV_4,052.07a ā dyāṃ tanoṣi raśmibhir āntarikṣam uru priyam /
analyzed: ā dyām tanoṣi raśmibhiḥ ā antarikṣam uru priyam

original: RV_4,052.07c uṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā //
analyzed: uṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_4,053.01a tad devasya savitur vāryam mahad vṛṇīmahe asurasya pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: tat devasya savituḥ vāryam mahat vṛṇīmahe asurasya pracetasaḥ

original: RV_4,053.01c chardir yena dāśuṣe yacchati tmanā tan no mahāṃ ud ayān devo aktubhiḥ //
analyzed: chardiḥ yena dāśuṣe yacchati tmanā tat naḥ mahān ud ayān devaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: RV_4,053.02a divo dhartā bhuvanasya prajāpatiḥ piśaṅgaṃ drāpim prati muñcate kaviḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ dhartā bhuvanasya prajāpatiḥ piśaṅgam drāpim prati muñcate kaviḥ

original: RV_4,053.02c vicakṣaṇaḥ prathayann āpṛṇann urv ajījanat savitā sumnam ukthyam //
analyzed: vicakṣaṇaḥ prathayan āpṛṇan uru ajījanat savitā sumnam ukthyam

original: RV_4,053.03a āprā rajāṃsi divyāni pārthivā ślokaṃ devaḥ kṛṇute svāya dharmaṇe /
analyzed: āprāḥ rajāṃsi divyāni pārthivā ślokam devaḥ kṛṇute svāya dharmaṇe

original: RV_4,053.03c pra bāhū asrāk savitā savīmani niveśayan prasuvann aktubhir jagat //
analyzed: pra bāhū asrāk savitā savīmani niveśayan prasuvan aktubhiḥ jagat

original: RV_4,053.04a adābhyo bhuvanāni pracākaśad vratāni devaḥ savitābhi rakṣate /
analyzed: adābhyaḥ bhuvanāni pracākaśat vratāni devaḥ savitā abhi rakṣate

original: RV_4,053.04c prāsrāg bāhū bhuvanasya prajābhyo dhṛtavrato maho ajmasya rājati //
analyzed: prāsrāk bāhū bhuvanasya prajābhyaḥ dhṛtavrataḥ mahaḥ ajmasya rājati

original: RV_4,053.05a trir antarikṣaṃ savitā mahitvanā trī rajāṃsi paribhus trīṇi rocanā /
analyzed: tris antarikṣam savitā mahitvanā trī rajāṃsi paribhuḥ trīṇi rocanā

original: RV_4,053.05c tisro divaḥ pṛthivīs tisra invati tribhir vratair abhi no rakṣati tmanā //
analyzed: tisraḥ divaḥ pṛthivīḥ tisraḥ invati tribhiḥ vrataiḥ abhi naḥ rakṣati tmanā

original: RV_4,053.06a bṛhatsumnaḥ prasavītā niveśano jagata sthātur ubhayasya yo vaśī /
analyzed: bṛhat sumnaḥ prasavītā niveśanaḥ jagataḥ sthātuḥ ubhayasya yaḥ vaśī

original: RV_4,053.06c sa no devaḥ savitā śarma yacchatv asme kṣayāya trivarūtham aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ devaḥ savitā śarma yacchatu asme kṣayāya tri varūtham aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_4,053.07a āgan deva ṛtubhir vardhatu kṣayaṃ dadhātu naḥ savitā suprajām iṣam /
analyzed: āgan devaḥ ṛtubhiḥ vardhatu kṣayam dadhātu naḥ savitā su prajām iṣam

original: RV_4,053.07c sa naḥ kṣapābhir ahabhiś ca jinvatu prajāvantaṃ rayim asme sam invatu //
analyzed: sa naḥ kṣapābhiḥ ahabhiḥ ca jinvatu prajāvantam rayim asme sam invatu

original: RV_4,054.01a abhūd devaḥ savitā vandyo nu na idānīm ahna upavācyo nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: abhūt devaḥ savitā vandyaḥ nu naḥ idānīm ahnaḥ upavācyaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_4,054.01c vi yo ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ no atra draviṇaṃ yathā dadhat //
analyzed: vi yaḥ ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ śreṣṭham naḥ atra draviṇam yathā dadhat

original: RV_4,054.02a devebhyo hi prathamaṃ yajñiyebhyo 'mṛtatvaṃ suvasi bhāgam uttamam /
analyzed: devebhyaḥ hi prathamam yajñiyebhyaḥ mṛta tvam suvasi bhāgam uttamam

original: RV_4,054.02c ād id dāmānaṃ savitar vy ūrṇuṣe 'nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ //
analyzed: āt id dāmānam savitar vi ūrṇuṣe nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ

original: RV_4,054.03a acittī yac cakṛmā daivye jane dīnair dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā /
analyzed: acittī yat cakṛma daivye jane dīnaiḥ dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā

original: RV_4,054.03c deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca tvaṃ no atra suvatād anāgasaḥ //
analyzed: deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca tvam naḥ atra suvatāt anāgasaḥ

original: RV_4,054.04a na pramiye savitur daivyasya tad yathā viśvam bhuvanaṃ dhārayiṣyati /
analyzed: na pramiye savituḥ daivyasya tat yathā viśvam bhuvanam dhārayiṣyati

original: RV_4,054.04c yat pṛthivyā varimann ā svaṅgurir varṣman divaḥ suvati satyam asya tat //
analyzed: yat pṛthivyāḥ variman ā su aṅguriḥ varṣman divaḥ suvati satyam asya tat

original: RV_4,054.05a indrajyeṣṭhān bṛhadbhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ kṣayāṃ ebhyaḥ suvasi pastyāvataḥ /
analyzed: indra jyeṣṭhān bṛhadbhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ kṣayām ebhyaḥ suvasi pastyāvataḥ

original: RV_4,054.05c yathā-yathā patayanto viyemira evaiva tasthuḥ savitaḥ savāya te //
analyzed: yathā yathā patayantaḥ viyemire eva eva tasthuḥ savitar savāya te

original: RV_4,054.06a ye te trir ahan savitaḥ savāso dive-dive saubhagam āsuvanti /
analyzed: ye te tris ahan savitar savāsaḥ dive dive saubhagam āsuvanti

original: RV_4,054.06c indro dyāvāpṛthivī sindhur adbhir ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat //
analyzed: indraḥ dyāvāpṛthivī sindhuḥ adbhiḥ ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_4,055.01a ko vas trātā vasavaḥ ko varūtā dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ naḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ trātā vasavaḥ kaḥ varūtā dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthām naḥ

original: RV_4,055.01c sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martāt ko vo 'dhvare varivo dhāti devāḥ //
analyzed: sahīyasaḥ varuṇa mitra martāt kaḥ vaḥ dhvare varivaḥ dhāti devāḥ

original: RV_4,055.02a pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇy arcān vi yad ucchān viyotāro amūrāḥ /
analyzed: pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇi arcān vi yat ucchān viyotāraḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_4,055.02c vidhātāro vi te dadhur ajasrā ṛtadhītayo rurucanta dasmāḥ //
analyzed: vidhātāraḥ vi te ajasrāḥ ṛta dhītayaḥ rurucanta dasmāḥ

original: RV_4,055.03a pra pastyām aditiṃ sindhum arkaiḥ svastim īḷe sakhyāya devīm /
analyzed: pra pastyām aditim sindhum arkaiḥ svastim īḍe sakhyāya devīm

original: RV_4,055.03c ubhe yathā no ahanī nipāta uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe //
analyzed: ubhe yathā naḥ ahanī nipātaḥ uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe

original: RV_4,055.04a vy aryamā varuṇaś ceti panthām iṣas patiḥ suvitaṃ gātum agniḥ /
analyzed: vi aryamā varuṇaḥ ceti panthām iṣaḥ patiḥ suvitam gātum agniḥ

original: RV_4,055.04c indrāviṣṇū nṛvad u ṣu stavānā śarma no yantam amavad varūtham //
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū nṛvat u su stavānā śarma naḥ yantam amavat varūtham

original: RV_4,055.05a ā parvatasya marutām avāṃsi devasya trātur avri bhagasya /
analyzed: ā parvatasya marutām avāṃsi devasya trātuḥ avri bhagasya

original: RV_4,055.05c pāt patir janyād aṃhaso no mitro mitriyād uta na uruṣyet //
analyzed: pāt patiḥ janyāt aṃhasaḥ naḥ mitraḥ mitriyāt uta naḥ uruṣyet

original: RV_4,055.06a nū rodasī ahinā budhnyena stuvīta devī apyebhir iṣṭaiḥ /
analyzed: nu rodasī ahinā budhnyena stuvīta devī apyebhiḥ iṣṭaiḥ

original: RV_4,055.06c samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavo gharmasvaraso nadyo apa vran //
analyzed: samudram na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ gharma svarasaḥ nadyaḥ apa vran

original: RV_4,055.07a devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayucchan /
analyzed: devaiḥ naḥ devī aditiḥ ni pātu devaḥ trātā trāyatām aprayucchan

original: RV_4,055.07c nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim arhāmasi pramiyaṃ sānv agneḥ //
analyzed: nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim arhāmasi pramiyam sānū agneḥ

original: RV_4,055.08a agnir īśe vasavyasyāgnir mahaḥ saubhagasya /
analyzed: agniḥ īśe vasavyasya agniḥ mahaḥ saubhagasya

original: RV_4,055.08c tāny asmabhyaṃ rāsate //
analyzed: tāni asmabhyam rāsate

original: RV_4,055.09a uṣo maghony ā vaha sūnṛte vāryā puru /
analyzed: uṣaḥ maghoni ā vaha sūnṛte vāryā puru

original: RV_4,055.09c asmabhyaṃ vājinīvati //
analyzed: asmabhyam vājinīvati

original: RV_4,055.10a tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: tat su naḥ savitā bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_4,055.10c indro no rādhasā gamat //
analyzed: indraḥ naḥ rādhasā gamat

original: RV_4,056.01a mahī dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭhe rucā bhavatāṃ śucayadbhir arkaiḥ /
analyzed: mahī dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭhe rucā bhavatām śocayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_4,056.01c yat sīṃ variṣṭhe bṛhatī viminvan ruvad dhokṣā paprathānebhir evaiḥ //
analyzed: yat sīm variṣṭhe bṛhatī viminvan ruvat dhokṣā paprathānebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_4,056.02a devī devebhir yajate yajatrair aminatī tasthatur ukṣamāṇe /
analyzed: devī devebhiḥ yajate yajatraiḥ a minatī tasthatuḥ ukṣamāṇe

original: RV_4,056.02c ṛtāvarī adruhā devaputre yajñasya netrī śucayadbhir arkaiḥ //
analyzed: ṛtāvarī adruhā deva putre yajñasya netrī śucayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_4,056.03a sa it svapā bhuvaneṣv āsa ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna /
analyzed: saḥ id su apāḥ bhuvaneṣu āsa yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna

original: RV_4,056.03c urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke avaṃśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat //
analyzed: urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke a vaṃśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat

original: RV_4,056.04a nū rodasī bṛhadbhir no varūthaiḥ patnīvadbhir iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: nu rodasī bṛhadbhiḥ naḥ varūthaiḥ patnīvadbhiḥ iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_4,056.04c urūcī viśve yajate ni pātaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
analyzed: urūcī viśve yajate ni pātam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_4,056.05a pra vām mahi dyavī abhy upastutim bharāmahe /
analyzed: pra vām mahi abhī upastutim bharāmahe

original: RV_4,056.05c śucī upa praśastaye //
analyzed: śucī upa praśastaye

original: RV_4,056.06a punāne tanvā mithaḥ svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ /
analyzed: punāne tanvā mithas svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ

original: RV_4,056.06c ūhyāthe sanād ṛtam //
analyzed: ūhyāthe sanāt ṛtam

original: RV_4,056.07a mahī mitrasya sādhathas tarantī pipratī ṛtam /
analyzed: mahī mitrasya sādhathaḥ tarantī pipratī ṛtam

original: RV_4,056.07c pari yajñaṃ ni ṣedathuḥ //
analyzed: pari yajñam ni sedathuḥ

original: RV_4,057.01a kṣetrasya patinā vayaṃ hiteneva jayāmasi /
analyzed: kṣetrasya patinā vayam hitena iva jayāmasi

original: RV_4,057.01c gām aśvam poṣayitnv ā sa no mṛḷātīdṛśe //
analyzed: gām aśvam poṣayitnu ā sa naḥ mṛḷāti īdṛśe

original: RV_4,057.02a kṣetrasya pate madhumantam ūrmiṃ dhenur iva payo asmāsu dhukṣva /
analyzed: kṣetrasya pate madhumantam ūrmim dhenuḥ iva payaḥ asmāsu dhukṣva

original: RV_4,057.02c madhuścutaṃ ghṛtam iva supūtam ṛtasya naḥ patayo mṛḷayantu //
analyzed: madhuścutam ghṛtam iva su pūtam ṛtasya naḥ patayaḥ mṛḍayantu

original: RV_4,057.03a madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāva āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam /
analyzed: madhumatīḥ oṣadhīḥ dyāvaḥ āpaḥ madhumat naḥ bhavatu antarikṣam

original: RV_4,057.03c kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema //
analyzed: kṣetrasya patiḥ madhumān naḥ astu a riṣyantaḥ anu enam carema

original: RV_4,057.04a śunaṃ vāhāḥ śunaṃ naraḥ śunaṃ kṛṣatu lāṅgalam /
analyzed: śunam vāhāḥ śunam naraḥ śunam kṛṣatu lāṅgalam

original: RV_4,057.04c śunaṃ varatrā badhyantāṃ śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya //
analyzed: śunam varatrāḥ badhyantām śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya

original: RV_4,057.05a śunāsīrāv imāṃ vācaṃ juṣethāṃ yad divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ /
analyzed: śunāsīrau imām vācam juṣethām yat divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ

original: RV_4,057.05c tenemām upa siñcatam //
analyzed: tena imām upa siñcatam

original: RV_4,057.06a arvācī subhage bhava sīte vandāmahe tvā /
analyzed: arvācī subhage bhava sīte vandāmahe tvā

original: RV_4,057.06c yathā naḥ subhagāsasi yathā naḥ suphalāsasi //
analyzed: yathā naḥ subhagā asasi yathā naḥ su phalā asasi

original: RV_4,057.07a indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣānu yacchatu /
analyzed: indraḥ sītām ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣā anu yacchatu

original: RV_4,057.07c sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām-uttarāṃ samām //
analyzed: sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām

original: RV_4,057.08a śunaṃ naḥ phālā vi kṛṣantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśā abhi yantu vāhaiḥ /
analyzed: śunam naḥ phālāḥ vi kṛṣantu bhūmim śunam kīnāśāḥ abhi yantu vāhaiḥ

original: RV_4,057.08c śunam parjanyo madhunā payobhiḥ śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam //
analyzed: śunam parjanyaḥ madhunā payobhiḥ śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam

original: RV_4,058.01a samudrād ūrmir madhumāṃ ud ārad upāṃśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaṭ /
analyzed: samudrāt ūrmiḥ madhumān ud ārat upāṃśunā sam amṛta tvam ānaṭ

original: RV_4,058.01c ghṛtasya nāma guhyaṃ yad asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtasya nāma guhyam yat asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_4,058.02a vayaṃ nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasyāsmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ /
analyzed: vayam nāma pra bravāma ghṛtasya asmin yajñe dhārayāma namobhiḥ

original: RV_4,058.02c upa brahmā śṛṇavac chasyamānaṃ catuḥśṛṅgo 'vamīd gaura etat //
analyzed: upa brahmā śṛṇavat śasyamānam catur śṛṅgaḥ vamīt gauraḥ etat

original: RV_4,058.03a catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya /
analyzed: catvāri śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya

original: RV_4,058.03c tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa //
analyzed: tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān ā viveśa

original: RV_4,058.04a tridhā hitam paṇibhir guhyamānaṃ gavi devāso ghṛtam anv avindan /
analyzed: tridhā hitam paṇibhiḥ guhyamānam gavi devāsaḥ ghṛtam anu avindan

original: RV_4,058.04c indra ekaṃ sūrya ekaṃ jajāna venād ekaṃ svadhayā niṣ ṭatakṣuḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ ekam sūryaḥ ekam jajāna venāt ekam svadhayā niḥ tatakṣuḥ

original: RV_4,058.05a etā arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāc chatavrajā ripuṇā nāvacakṣe /
analyzed: etāḥ arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāt śata vrajāḥ ripuṇā na avacakṣe

original: RV_4,058.05c ghṛtasya dhārā abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayo vetaso madhya āsām //
analyzed: ghṛtasya dhārāḥ abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayaḥ vetasaḥ madhye āsām

original: RV_4,058.06a samyak sravanti sarito na dhenā antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ /
analyzed: samyak sravanti saritaḥ na dhenāḥ antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ

original: RV_4,058.06c ete arṣanty ūrmayo ghṛtasya mṛgā iva kṣipaṇor īṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: ete arṣanti ūrmayaḥ ghṛtasya mṛgāḥ iva kṣipaṇoḥ īṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_4,058.07a sindhor iva prādhvane śūghanāso vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ /
analyzed: sindhoḥ iva prādhvane śūghanāsaḥ vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ

original: RV_4,058.07c ghṛtasya dhārā aruṣo na vājī kāṣṭhā bhindann ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtasya dhārāḥ aruṣaḥ na vājī kāṣṭhāḥ bhindan ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ

original: RV_4,058.08a abhi pravanta samaneva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāso agnim /
analyzed: abhi samanā iva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāsaḥ agnim

original: RV_4,058.08c ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidho nasanta tā juṣāṇo haryati jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidhaḥ nasanta tāḥ juṣāṇaḥ haryati jātavedāḥ

original: RV_4,058.09a kanyā iva vahatum etavā u añjy añjānā abhi cākaśīmi /
analyzed: kanyāḥ iva vahatum etavai u añjī añjānāḥ abhi cākaśīmi

original: RV_4,058.09c yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajño ghṛtasya dhārā abhi tat pavante //
analyzed: yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajñaḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ abhi tat pavante

original: RV_4,058.10a abhy arṣata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta /
analyzed: abhi arṣata suṣṭutim gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta

original: RV_4,058.10c imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavante //
analyzed: imam yajñam nayata devatāḥ naḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ madhumat pavante

original: RV_4,058.11a dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam antaḥ samudre hṛdy antar āyuṣi /
analyzed: dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam antar samudre hṛdi antar āyuṣi

original: RV_4,058.11c apām anīke samithe ya ābhṛtas tam aśyāma madhumantaṃ ta ūrmim //
analyzed: apām anīke samithe yaḥ ābhṛtaḥ tam aśyāma madhumantam te ūrmim

original: Ṛgveda 5
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_5,001.01a abodhy agniḥ samidhā janānām prati dhenum ivāyatīm uṣāsam /
analyzed: abodhi agniḥ samidhā janānām prati dhenum iva āyatīm uṣāsam

original: RV_5,001.01c yahvā iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam accha //
analyzed: yahvāḥ iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam accha

original: RV_5,001.02a abodhi hotā yajathāya devān ūrdhvo agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt /
analyzed: abodhi hotā yajathāya devān ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt

original: RV_5,001.02c samiddhasya ruśad adarśi pājo mahān devas tamaso nir amoci //
analyzed: samiddhasya ruśat adarśi pājaḥ mahān devaḥ tamasaḥ niḥ amoci

original: RV_5,001.03a yad īṃ gaṇasya raśanām ajīgaḥ śucir aṅkte śucibhir gobhir agniḥ /
analyzed: yat īm gaṇasya raśanām ajīgaḥ śuciḥ aṅkte śucibhiḥ gobhiḥ agniḥ

original: RV_5,001.03c ād dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayanty uttānām ūrdhvo adhayaj juhūbhiḥ //
analyzed: āt dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayantī uttānām ūrdhvaḥ adhayat juhūbhiḥ

original: RV_5,001.04a agnim acchā devayatām manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣīva sūrye saṃ caranti /
analyzed: agnim acchā devayatām manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣi iva sūrye sam caranti

original: RV_5,001.04c yad īṃ suvāte uṣasā virūpe śveto vājī jāyate agre ahnām //
analyzed: yat īm suvāte uṣasā virūpe śvetaḥ vājī jāyate agre ahnām

original: RV_5,001.05a janiṣṭa hi jenyo agre ahnāṃ hito hiteṣv aruṣo vaneṣu /
analyzed: janiṣṭa hi jenyaḥ agre ahnām hitaḥ hiteṣu aruṣaḥ vaneṣu

original: RV_5,001.05c dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhāno 'gnir hotā ni ṣasādā yajīyān //
analyzed: damedame sapta ratnā dadhānaḥ gniḥ hotā ni sasāda ā yajīyān

original: RV_5,001.06a agnir hotā ny asīdad yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhā u loke /
analyzed: agniḥ hotā ni asīdat yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhau u loke

original: RV_5,001.06c yuvā kaviḥ puruniṣṭha ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhya iddhaḥ //
analyzed: yuvā kaviḥ puru niṣṭhaḥ ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhye iddhaḥ

original: RV_5,001.07a pra ṇu tyaṃ vipram adhvareṣu sādhum agniṃ hotāram īḷate namobhiḥ /
analyzed: pra nu tyam vipram adhvareṣu sādhum agnim hotāram īḍate namobhiḥ

original: RV_5,001.07c ā yas tatāna rodasī ṛtena nityam mṛjanti vājinaṃ ghṛtena //
analyzed: ā yaḥ tatāna rodasī ṛtena nityam mṛjanti vājinam ghṛtena

original: RV_5,001.08a mārjālyo mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavipraśasto atithiḥ śivo naḥ /
analyzed: mārjālyaḥ mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavi praśastaḥ atithiḥ śivaḥ naḥ

original: RV_5,001.08c sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabhas tadojā viśvāṃ agne sahasā prāsy anyān //
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tad ojāḥ viśvān agne sahasā prāsi anyān

original: RV_5,001.09a pra sadyo agne aty eṣy anyān āvir yasmai cārutamo babhūtha /
analyzed: pra sadyas agne ati eṣi anyān āvis yasmai cārutamaḥ babhūtha

original: RV_5,001.09c īḷenyo vapuṣyo vibhāvā priyo viśām atithir mānuṣīṇām //
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā priyaḥ viśām atithiḥ mānuṣīṇām

original: RV_5,001.10a tubhyam bharanti kṣitayo yaviṣṭha balim agne antita ota dūrāt /
analyzed: tubhyam bharanti kṣitayaḥ yaviṣṭha balim agne antitas ā uta dūrāt

original: RV_5,001.10c ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatiṃ cikiddhi bṛhat te agne mahi śarma bhadram //
analyzed: ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatim cikiddhi bṛhat te agne mahi śarma bhadram

original: RV_5,001.11a ādya ratham bhānumo bhānumantam agne tiṣṭha yajatebhiḥ samantam /
analyzed: ā adya ratham bhānumas bhānumantam agne tiṣṭha yajatebhiḥ samantam

original: RV_5,001.11c vidvān pathīnām urv antarikṣam eha devān haviradyāya vakṣi //
analyzed: vidvān pathīnām uru antarikṣam ā iha devān haviḥ adyāya vakṣi

original: RV_5,001.12a avocāma kavaye medhyāya vaco vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe /
analyzed: avocāma kavaye medhyāya vacaḥ vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe

original: RV_5,001.12c gaviṣṭhiro namasā stomam agnau divīva rukmam uruvyañcam aśret //
analyzed: gaviṣṭhiraḥ namasā stomam agnau divi iva rukmam uruvyañcam aśret

original: RV_5,002.01a kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdhaṃ guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre /
analyzed: kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdham guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre

original: RV_5,002.01c anīkam asya na minaj janāsaḥ puraḥ paśyanti nihitam aratau //
analyzed: anīkam asya na minat janāsaḥ puras paśyanti nihitam aratau

original: RV_5,002.02a kam etaṃ tvaṃ yuvate kumāram peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna /
analyzed: kam etam tvam yuvate kumāram peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna

original: RV_5,002.02c pūrvīr hi garbhaḥ śarado vavardhāpaśyaṃ jātaṃ yad asūta mātā //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ hi garbhaḥ śaradaḥ vavardha apaśyam jātam yat asūta mātā

original: RV_5,002.03a hiraṇyadantaṃ śucivarṇam ārāt kṣetrād apaśyam āyudhā mimānam /
analyzed: hiraṇya dantam śuci varṇam ārāt kṣetrāt apaśyam āyudhā mimānam

original: RV_5,002.03c dadāno asmā amṛtaṃ vipṛkvat kim mām anindrāḥ kṛṇavann anukthāḥ //
analyzed: dadānaḥ asmai amṛtam vipṛkvat kim mām an indrāḥ kṛṇavan an ukthāḥ

original: RV_5,002.04a kṣetrād apaśyaṃ sanutaś carantaṃ sumad yūthaṃ na puru śobhamānam /
analyzed: kṣetrāt apaśyam sanutas carantam sumat yūtham na puru śobhamānam

original: RV_5,002.04c na tā agṛbhrann ajaniṣṭa hi ṣaḥ paliknīr id yuvatayo bhavanti //
analyzed: na tāḥ agṛbhran ajaniṣṭa hi saḥ paliknīḥ id yuvatayaḥ bhavanti

original: RV_5,002.05a ke me maryakaṃ vi yavanta gobhir na yeṣāṃ gopā araṇaś cid āsa /
analyzed: ke me maryakam vi yavanta gobhiḥ na yeṣām gopāḥ araṇaḥ cit āsa

original: RV_5,002.05c ya īṃ jagṛbhur ava te sṛjantv ājāti paśva upa naś cikitvān //
analyzed: ye īm jagṛbhuḥ ava te sṛjantu ājāti paśve upa naḥ cikitvān

original: RV_5,002.06a vasāṃ rājānaṃ vasatiṃ janānām arātayo ni dadhur martyeṣu /
analyzed: vasām rājānam vasatim janānām arātayaḥ ni dadhuḥ martyeṣu

original: RV_5,002.06c brahmāṇy atrer ava taṃ sṛjantu ninditāro nindyāso bhavantu //
analyzed: brahmāṇi atreḥ ava tam sṛjantu ninditāraḥ nindyāsaḥ bhavantu

original: RV_5,002.07a śunaś cic chepaṃ niditaṃ sahasrād yūpād amuñco aśamiṣṭa hi ṣaḥ /
analyzed: śunaḥ cit śepam niditam sahasrāt yūpāt amuñcaḥ aśamiṣṭa hi saḥ

original: RV_5,002.07c evāsmad agne vi mumugdhi pāśān hotaś cikitva iha tū niṣadya //
analyzed: eva asmat agne vi mumugdhi pāśān hotar cikitvaḥ iha tu niṣadya

original: RV_5,002.08a hṛṇīyamāno apa hi mad aiyeḥ pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca /
analyzed: hṛṇīyamānaḥ apa hi mat aiyeḥ pra me devānām vrata pāḥ uvāca

original: RV_5,002.08c indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām //
analyzed: indraḥ vidvān anu hi tvā cacakṣa tena aham agne anuśiṣṭaḥ āgām

original: RV_5,002.09a vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā /
analyzed: vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāti agniḥ āvis viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā

original: RV_5,002.09c prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe //
analyzed: pra adevīḥ māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe

original: RV_5,002.10a uta svānāso divi ṣantv agnes tigmāyudhā rakṣase hantavā u /
analyzed: uta svānāsaḥ divi ṣantu agneḥ tigma āyudhāḥ rakṣase hantavai u

original: RV_5,002.10c made cid asya pra rujanti bhāmā na varante paribādho adevīḥ //
analyzed: made cit asya pra rujanti bhāmāḥ na varante paribādhaḥ adevīḥ

original: RV_5,002.11a etaṃ te stomaṃ tuvijāta vipro rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam /
analyzed: etam te stomam tuvi jāta vipraḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣam

original: RV_5,002.11c yadīd agne prati tvaṃ deva haryāḥ svarvatīr apa enā jayema //
analyzed: yadi id agne prati tvam deva haryāḥ svarvatīḥ apaḥ enāḥ jayema

original: RV_5,002.12a tuvigrīvo vṛṣabho vāvṛdhāno 'śatrv aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ /
analyzed: tuvi grīvaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ śatru aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ

original: RV_5,002.12c itīmam agnim amṛtā avocan barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṃsad dhaviṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat //
analyzed: iti imam agnim amṛtāḥ avocan barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat haviṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_5,003.01a tvam agne varuṇo jāyase yat tvam mitro bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne varuṇaḥ jāyase yat tvam mitraḥ bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ

original: RV_5,003.01c tve viśve sahasas putra devās tvam indro dāśuṣe martyāya //
analyzed: tve viśve sahasas putra devāḥ tvam indraḥ dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_5,003.02a tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnāṃ nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi /
analyzed: tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnām nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi

original: RV_5,003.02c añjanti mitraṃ sudhitaṃ na gobhir yad dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi //
analyzed: añjanti mitram sudhitam na gobhiḥ yat dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi

original: RV_5,003.03a tava śriye maruto marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram /
analyzed: tava śriye marutaḥ marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram

original: RV_5,003.03c padaṃ yad viṣṇor upamaṃ nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyaṃ nāma gonām //
analyzed: padam yat viṣṇoḥ upamam nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyam nāma gonām

original: RV_5,003.04a tava śriyā sudṛśo deva devāḥ purū dadhānā amṛtaṃ sapanta /
analyzed: tava śriyā sudṛśaḥ deva devāḥ purū dadhānāḥ amṛtam sapanta

original: RV_5,003.04c hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur daśasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ //
analyzed: hotāram agnim manuṣaḥ ni ṣeduḥ daśasyantaḥ uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ

original: RV_5,003.05a na tvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān na kāvyaiḥ paro asti svadhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tvat hotā pūrvaḥ agne yajīyān na kāvyaiḥ paraḥ asti svadhāvas

original: RV_5,003.05c viśaś ca yasyā atithir bhavāsi sa yajñena vanavad deva martān //
analyzed: viśaḥ ca yasyāḥ atithiḥ bhavāsi sa yajñena vanavat deva martān

original: RV_5,003.06a vayam agne vanuyāma tvotā vasūyavo haviṣā budhyamānāḥ /
analyzed: vayam agne vanuyāma tvotāḥ vasūyavaḥ haviṣā budhyamānāḥ

original: RV_5,003.06c vayaṃ samarye vidatheṣv ahnāṃ vayaṃ rāyā sahasas putra martān //
analyzed: vayam samarye vidatheṣu ahnām vayam rāyā sahasas putra martān

original: RV_5,003.07a yo na āgo abhy eno bharāty adhīd agham aghaśaṃse dadhāta /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ āgaḥ abhī enaḥ bharāti adhi id agham agha śaṃse dadhāta

original: RV_5,003.07c jahī cikitvo abhiśastim etām agne yo no marcayati dvayena //
analyzed: jahi cikitvaḥ abhiśastim etām agne yaḥ naḥ marcayati dvayena

original: RV_5,003.08a tvām asyā vyuṣi deva pūrve dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta havyaiḥ /
analyzed: tvām asyāḥ vyuṣi deva pūrve dūtam kṛṇvānāḥ ayajanta havyaiḥ

original: RV_5,003.08c saṃsthe yad agna īyase rayīṇāṃ devo martair vasubhir idhyamānaḥ //
analyzed: saṃsthe yat agne īyase rayīṇām devaḥ martaiḥ vasubhiḥ idhyamānaḥ

original: RV_5,003.09a ava spṛdhi pitaraṃ yodhi vidvān putro yas te sahasaḥ sūna ūhe /
analyzed: ava spṛdhi pitaram yodhi vidvān putraḥ yaḥ te sahasaḥ sūno ūhe

original: RV_5,003.09c kadā cikitvo abhi cakṣase no 'gne kadāṃ ṛtacid yātayāse //
analyzed: kadā cikitvaḥ abhi cakṣase naḥ gne ṛta cit yātayāse

original: RV_5,003.10a bhūri nāma vandamāno dadhāti pitā vaso yadi taj joṣayāse /
analyzed: bhūri nāma vandamānaḥ dadhāti pitā vaso yadi tat joṣayāse

original: RV_5,003.10c kuvid devasya sahasā cakānaḥ sumnam agnir vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ //
analyzed: kuvid devasya sahasā cakānaḥ sumnam agniḥ vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_5,003.11a tvam aṅga jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha viśvāny agne duritāti parṣi /
analyzed: tvam aṅga jaritāram yaviṣṭha viśvāni agne duritā ati parṣi

original: RV_5,003.11c stenā adṛśran ripavo janāso 'jñātaketā vṛjinā abhūvan //
analyzed: stenāḥ adṛśran ripavaḥ janāsaḥ jñāta ketā vṛjināḥ abhūvan

original: RV_5,003.12a ime yāmāsas tvadrig abhūvan vasave vā tad id āgo avāci /
analyzed: ime yāmāsaḥ tvadrik abhūvan vasave vā tat id āgaḥ avāci

original: RV_5,003.12c nāhāyam agnir abhiśastaye no na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt //
analyzed: na aha ayam agniḥ abhiśastaye naḥ na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt

original: RV_5,004.01a tvām agne vasupatiṃ vasūnām abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan /
analyzed: tvām agne vasu patim vasūnām abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan

original: RV_5,004.01c tvayā vājaṃ vājayanto jayemābhi ṣyāma pṛtsutīr martyānām //
analyzed: tvayā vājam vājayantaḥ jayema abhi syāma pṛtsutīḥ martyānām

original: RV_5,004.02a havyavāḷ agnir ajaraḥ pitā no vibhur vibhāvā sudṛśīko asme /
analyzed: havyavāṭ agniḥ ajaraḥ pitā naḥ vibhuḥ vibhāvā su dṛśīkaḥ asme

original: RV_5,004.02c sugārhapatyāḥ sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi //
analyzed: su gārhapatyāḥ sam iṣaḥ didīhi asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi

original: RV_5,004.03a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīṇāṃ śucim pāvakaṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham agnim /
analyzed: viśām kavim viśpatim mānuṣīṇām śucim pāvakam ghṛta pṛṣṭham agnim

original: RV_5,004.03c ni hotāraṃ viśvavidaṃ dadhidhve sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi //
analyzed: ni hotāram viśva vidam dadhidhve sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi

original: RV_5,004.04a juṣasvāgna iḷayā sajoṣā yatamāno raśmibhiḥ sūryasya /
analyzed: juṣasva agne iḷayā sajoṣāḥ yatamānaḥ raśmibhiḥ sūryasya

original: RV_5,004.04c juṣasva naḥ samidhaṃ jātaveda ā ca devān haviradyāya vakṣi //
analyzed: juṣasva naḥ samidham jātavedaḥ ā ca devān haviḥ adyāya vakṣi

original: RV_5,004.05a juṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upa yāhi vidvān /
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ damūnāḥ atithiḥ duroṇe imam naḥ yajñam upa yāhi vidvān

original: RV_5,004.05c viśvā agne abhiyujo vihatyā śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni //
analyzed: viśvāḥ agne abhiyujaḥ vihatya ā śatrūyatām ā bhara bhojanāni

original: RV_5,004.06a vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva vayaḥ kṛṇvānas tanve svāyai /
analyzed: vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva vayaḥ kṛṇvānaḥ tanve svāyai

original: RV_5,004.06c piparṣi yat sahasas putra devānt so agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān //
analyzed: piparṣi yat sahasas putra devān saḥ agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān

original: RV_5,004.07a vayaṃ te agna ukthair vidhema vayaṃ havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadraśoce /
analyzed: vayam te agne ukthaiḥ vidhema vayam havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadra śoce

original: RV_5,004.07c asme rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ sam invāsme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi //
analyzed: asme rayim viśva vāram sam inva asme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi

original: RV_5,004.08a asmākam agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam /
analyzed: asmākam agne adhvaram juṣasva sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam

original: RV_5,004.08c vayaṃ deveṣu sukṛtaḥ syāma śarmaṇā nas trivarūthena pāhi //
analyzed: vayam deveṣu su kṛtaḥ syāma śarmaṇā naḥ tri varūthena pāhi

original: RV_5,004.09a viśvāni no durgahā jātavedaḥ sindhuṃ na nāvā duritāti parṣi /
analyzed: viśvāni naḥ durgahā jātavedaḥ sindhum na nāvā duritā ati parṣi

original: RV_5,004.09c agne atrivan namasā gṛṇāno 'smākam bodhy avitā tanūnām //
analyzed: agne atri vat namasā gṛṇānaḥ smākam bodhi avitā tanūnām

original: RV_5,004.10a yas tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamāno 'martyam martyo johavīmi /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamānaḥ martyam martyaḥ johavīmi

original: RV_5,004.10c jātavedo yaśo asmāsu dhehi prajābhir agne amṛtatvam aśyām //
analyzed: jātavedaḥ yaśaḥ asmāsu dhehi prajābhiḥ agne amṛta tvam aśyām

original: RV_5,004.11a yasmai tvaṃ sukṛte jātaveda u lokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam /
analyzed: yasmai tvam su kṛte jātavedaḥ u lokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam

original: RV_5,004.11c aśvinaṃ sa putriṇaṃ vīravantaṃ gomantaṃ rayiṃ naśate svasti //
analyzed: aśvinam sa putriṇam vīravantam gomantam rayim naśate svasti

original: RV_5,005.01a susamiddhāya śociṣe ghṛtaṃ tīvraṃ juhotana /
analyzed: su samiddhāya śociṣe ghṛtam tīvram juhotana

original: RV_5,005.01c agnaye jātavedase //
analyzed: agnaye jātavedase

original: RV_5,005.02a narāśaṃsaḥ suṣūdatīmaṃ yajñam adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ suṣūdati imam yajñam adābhyaḥ

original: RV_5,005.02c kavir hi madhuhastyaḥ //
analyzed: kaviḥ hi madhu hastyaḥ

original: RV_5,005.03a īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam /
analyzed: īḍitaḥ agne ā vaha indram citram iha priyam

original: RV_5,005.03c sukhai rathebhir ūtaye //
analyzed: sukhaiḥ rathebhiḥ ūtaye

original: RV_5,005.04a ūrṇamradā vi prathasvābhy arkā anūṣata /
analyzed: ūrṇamradāḥ vi prathasva abhi arkāḥ anūṣata

original: RV_5,005.04c bhavā naḥ śubhra sātaye //
analyzed: bhavā naḥ śubhra sātaye

original: RV_5,005.05a devīr dvāro vi śrayadhvaṃ suprāyaṇā na ūtaye /
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ vi śrayadhvam su prāyaṇāḥ naḥ ūtaye

original: RV_5,005.05c pra-pra yajñam pṛṇītana //
analyzed: pra pra yajñam pṛṇītana

original: RV_5,005.06a supratīke vayovṛdhā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā /
analyzed: su pratīke vayaḥ vṛdhā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā

original: RV_5,005.06c doṣām uṣāsam īmahe //
analyzed: doṣām uṣāsam īmahe

original: RV_5,005.07a vātasya patmann īḷitā daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ /
analyzed: vātasya patman īḍitā daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ

original: RV_5,005.07c imaṃ no yajñam ā gatam //
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam ā gatam

original: RV_5,005.08a iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ /
analyzed: iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisraḥ devīḥ mayobhuvaḥ

original: RV_5,005.08b barhiḥ sīdantv asridhaḥ //
analyzed: barhiḥ sīdantu asridhaḥ

original: RV_5,005.09a śivas tvaṣṭar ihā gahi vibhuḥ poṣa uta tmanā /
analyzed: śivaḥ tvaṣṭar iha ā gahi vibhuḥ poṣaḥ uta tmanā

original: RV_5,005.09c yajñe-yajñe na ud ava //
analyzed: yajñeyajñe naḥ ud ava

original: RV_5,005.10a yatra vettha vanaspate devānāṃ guhyā nāmāni /
analyzed: yatra vettha vanaspate devānām guhyā nāmāni

original: RV_5,005.10c tatra havyāni gāmaya //
analyzed: tatra havyāni gāmaya

original: RV_5,005.11a svāhāgnaye varuṇāya svāhendrāya marudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: svāhā agnaye varuṇāya svāhā indrāya marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_5,005.11c svāhā devebhyo haviḥ //
analyzed: svāhā devebhyaḥ haviḥ

original: RV_5,006.01a agniṃ tam manye yo vasur astaṃ yaṃ yanti dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: agnim tam manye yaḥ vasuḥ astam yam yanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_5,006.01c astam arvanta āśavo 'staṃ nityāso vājina iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: astam arvantaḥ āśavaḥ stam nityāsaḥ vājinaḥ iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.02a so agnir yo vasur gṛṇe saṃ yam āyanti dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ agniḥ yaḥ vasuḥ gṛṇe sam yam āyanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_5,006.02c sam arvanto raghudruvaḥ saṃ sujātāsaḥ sūraya iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: sam arvantaḥ raghudruvaḥ sam su jātāsaḥ sūrayaḥ iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.03a agnir hi vājinaṃ viśe dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ hi vājinam viśe dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_5,006.03c agnī rāye svābhuvaṃ sa prīto yāti vāryam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: agniḥ rāye su ābhuvam sa prītaḥ yāti vāryam iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.04a ā te agna idhīmahi dyumantaṃ devājaram /
analyzed: ā te agne idhīmahi dyumantam deva ajaram

original: RV_5,006.04c yad dha syā te panīyasī samid dīdayati dyavīṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: yat ha syā te panīyasī samidh dīdayati dyavi iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.05a ā te agna ṛcā haviḥ śukrasya śociṣas pate /
analyzed: ā te agne ṛcā haviḥ śukrasya śociṣaḥ pate

original: RV_5,006.05c suścandra dasma viśpate havyavāṭ tubhyaṃ hūyata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: su ścandra dasma viśpate havyavāṭ tubhyam hūyate iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.06a pro tye agnayo 'gniṣu viśvam puṣyanti vāryam /
analyzed: pra u tye agnayaḥ gniṣu viśvam puṣyanti vāryam

original: RV_5,006.06c te hinvire ta invire ta iṣaṇyanty ānuṣag iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: te hinvire te invire te iṣaṇyanti ānuṣak iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.07a tava tye agne arcayo mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ /
analyzed: tava tye agne arcayaḥ mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ

original: RV_5,006.07c ye patvabhiḥ śaphānāṃ vrajā bhuranta gonām iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: ye patvabhiḥ śaphānām vrajāḥ bhuranta gonām iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.08a navā no agna ā bhara stotṛbhyaḥ sukṣitīr iṣaḥ /
analyzed: navāḥ naḥ agne ā bhara stotṛbhyaḥ su kṣitīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_5,006.08c te syāma ya ānṛcus tvādūtāso dame-dama iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: te syāma ye ānṛcuḥ tvādūtāsaḥ damedame iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.09a ubhe suścandra sarpiṣo darvī śrīṇīṣa āsani /
analyzed: ubhe su ścandra sarpiṣaḥ darvī śrīṇīṣe āsani

original: RV_5,006.09c uto na ut pupūryā uktheṣu śavasas pata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: uta u naḥ ud pupūryāḥ uktheṣu śavasaḥ pate iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,006.10a evāṃ agnim ajuryamur gīrbhir yajñebhir ānuṣak /
analyzed: eva ām agnim gīrbhiḥ yajñebhiḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_5,006.10c dadhad asme suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: dadhat asme su vīryam uta tyad āśu aśvyam iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,007.01a sakhāyaḥ saṃ vaḥ samyañcam iṣaṃ stomaṃ cāgnaye /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ sam vaḥ samyañcam iṣam stomam ca agnaye

original: RV_5,007.01c varṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnām ūrjo naptre sahasvate //
analyzed: varṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnām ūrjaḥ naptre sahasvate

original: RV_5,007.02a kutrā cid yasya samṛtau raṇvā naro nṛṣadane /
analyzed: kutra cit yasya samṛtau raṇvāḥ naraḥ nṛṣadane

original: RV_5,007.02c arhantaś cid yam indhate saṃjanayanti jantavaḥ //
analyzed: arhantaḥ cit yam indhate saṃjanayanti jantavaḥ

original: RV_5,007.03a saṃ yad iṣo vanāmahe saṃ havyā mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: sam yat iṣaḥ vanāmahe sam havyā mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_5,007.03c uta dyumnasya śavasa ṛtasya raśmim ā dade //
analyzed: uta dyumnasya śavasaḥ ṛtasya raśmim ā dade

original: RV_5,007.04a sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā naktaṃ cid dūra ā sate /
analyzed: sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā naktam cit dūre ā sate

original: RV_5,007.04c pāvako yad vanaspatīn pra smā mināty ajaraḥ //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ yat vanaspatīn pra smā mināti ajaraḥ

original: RV_5,007.05a ava sma yasya veṣaṇe svedam pathiṣu juhvati /
analyzed: ava sma yasya veṣaṇe svedam pathiṣu juhvati

original: RV_5,007.05c abhīm aha svajenyam bhūmā pṛṣṭheva ruruhuḥ //
analyzed: abhi īm aha sva jenyam bhūmā pṛṣṭhā iva ruruhuḥ

original: RV_5,007.06a yam martyaḥ puruspṛhaṃ vidad viśvasya dhāyase /
analyzed: yam martyaḥ puruspṛham vidat viśvasya dhāyase

original: RV_5,007.06c pra svādanam pitūnām astatātiṃ cid āyave //
analyzed: pra svādanam pitūnām astatātim cit āyave

original: RV_5,007.07a sa hi ṣmā dhanvākṣitaṃ dātā na dāty ā paśuḥ /
analyzed: sa hi sma dhanva akṣitam dātā na dāti ā paśuḥ

original: RV_5,007.07c hiriśmaśruḥ śucidann ṛbhur anibhṛṣṭataviṣiḥ //
analyzed: hiri śmaśruḥ śucidan ṛbhuḥ a nibhṛṣṭa taviṣiḥ

original: RV_5,007.08a śuciḥ ṣma yasmā atrivat pra svadhitīva rīyate /
analyzed: śuciḥ ṣma yasmai atri vat pra svadhitī iva rīyate

original: RV_5,007.08c suṣūr asūta mātā krāṇā yad ānaśe bhagam //
analyzed: suṣūḥ asūta mātā krāṇā yat ānaśe bhagam

original: RV_5,007.09a ā yas te sarpirāsute 'gne śam asti dhāyase /
analyzed: ā yaḥ te sarpiḥ āsute gne śam asti dhāyase

original: RV_5,007.09c aiṣu dyumnam uta śrava ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ //
analyzed: ā eṣu dyumnam uta śravaḥ ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ

original: RV_5,007.10a iti cin manyum adhrijas tvādātam ā paśuṃ dade /
analyzed: iti cit manyum adhrijaḥ tvādātam ā paśum dade

original: RV_5,007.10c ād agne apṛṇato 'triḥ sāsahyād dasyūn iṣaḥ sāsahyān nṝn //
analyzed: āt agne apṛṇataḥ tris sāsahyāt dasyūn iṣaḥ sāsahyāt nṝn

original: RV_5,008.01a tvām agna ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire pratnam pratnāsa ūtaye sahaskṛta /
analyzed: tvām agne ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire pratnam pratnāsaḥ ūtaye sahaskṛta

original: RV_5,008.01c puruścandraṃ yajataṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ damūnasaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vareṇyam //
analyzed: puru ścandram yajatam viśva dhāyasam damūnasam gṛhapatim vareṇyam

original: RV_5,008.02a tvām agne atithim pūrvyaṃ viśaḥ śociṣkeśaṃ gṛhapatiṃ ni ṣedire /
analyzed: tvām agne atithim pūrvyam viśaḥ śociṣkeśam gṛhapatim ni sedire

original: RV_5,008.02c bṛhatketum pururūpaṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ suśarmāṇaṃ svavasaṃ jaradviṣam //
analyzed: bṛhat ketum puru rūpam dhana spṛtam su śarmāṇam su avasam jaradviṣam

original: RV_5,008.03a tvām agne mānuṣīr īḷate viśo hotrāvidaṃ viviciṃ ratnadhātamam /
analyzed: tvām agne mānuṣīḥ īḍate viśaḥ hotrā vidam vivicim ratna dhātamam

original: RV_5,008.03c guhā santaṃ subhaga viśvadarśataṃ tuviṣvaṇasaṃ suyajaṃ ghṛtaśriyam //
analyzed: guhā santam subhaga viśva darśatam tuviṣvaṇasam suyajam ghṛta śriyam

original: RV_5,008.04a tvām agne dharṇasiṃ viśvadhā vayaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanto namasopa sedima /
analyzed: tvām agne dharṇasim viśvadhā vayam gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ namasā upa sedima

original: RV_5,008.04c sa no juṣasva samidhāno aṅgiro devo martasya yaśasā sudītibhiḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ juṣasva samidhānaḥ aṅgiraḥ devaḥ martasya yaśasā su dītibhiḥ

original: RV_5,008.05a tvam agne pururūpo viśe-viśe vayo dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣṭuta /
analyzed: tvam agne puru rūpaḥ viśeviśe vayaḥ dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣṭuta

original: RV_5,008.05c purūṇy annā sahasā vi rājasi tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya nādhṛṣe //
analyzed: purūṇi annā sahasā vi rājasi tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya na ādhṛṣe

original: RV_5,008.06a tvām agne samidhānaṃ yaviṣṭhya devā dūtaṃ cakrire havyavāhanam /
analyzed: tvām agne samidhānam yaviṣṭhya devāḥ dūtam cakrire havya vāhanam

original: RV_5,008.06c urujrayasaṃ ghṛtayonim āhutaṃ tveṣaṃ cakṣur dadhire codayanmati //
analyzed: uru jrayasam ghṛta yonim āhutam tveṣam cakṣuḥ dadhire codayat mati

original: RV_5,008.07a tvām agne pradiva āhutaṃ ghṛtaiḥ sumnāyavaḥ suṣamidhā sam īdhire /
analyzed: tvām agne pradivaḥ āhutam ghṛtaiḥ sumnāyavaḥ su samidhā sam īdhire

original: RV_5,008.07c sa vāvṛdhāna oṣadhībhir ukṣito 'bhi jrayāṃsi pārthivā vi tiṣṭhase //
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhānaḥ oṣadhībhiḥ ukṣitaḥ bhi jrayāṃsi pārthivā vi tiṣṭhase

original: RV_5,009.01a tvām agne haviṣmanto devam martāsa īḷate /
analyzed: tvām agne haviṣmantaḥ devam martāsaḥ īḍate

original: RV_5,009.01c manye tvā jātavedasaṃ sa havyā vakṣy ānuṣak //
analyzed: manye tvā jātavedasam sa havyā vakṣi ānuṣak

original: RV_5,009.02a agnir hotā dāsvataḥ kṣayasya vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ hotā dāsvataḥ kṣayasya vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_5,009.02c saṃ yajñāsaś caranti yaṃ saṃ vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ //
analyzed: sam yajñāsaḥ caranti yam sam vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_5,009.03a uta sma yaṃ śiśuṃ yathā navaṃ janiṣṭāraṇī /
analyzed: uta sma yam śiśum yathā navam janiṣṭa araṇī

original: RV_5,009.03c dhartāram mānuṣīṇāṃ viśām agniṃ svadhvaram //
analyzed: dhartāram mānuṣīṇām viśām agnim su adhvaram

original: RV_5,009.04a uta sma durgṛbhīyase putro na hvāryāṇām /
analyzed: uta sma durgṛbhīyase putraḥ na hvāryāṇām

original: RV_5,009.04c purū yo dagdhāsi vanāgne paśur na yavase //
analyzed: purū yaḥ dagdhā asi vanā agne paśuḥ na yavase

original: RV_5,009.05a adha sma yasyārcayaḥ samyak saṃyanti dhūminaḥ /
analyzed: adha sma yasya arcayaḥ samyak saṃyanti dhūminaḥ

original: RV_5,009.05c yad īm aha trito divy upa dhmāteva dhamati śiśīte dhmātarī yathā //
analyzed: yat īm aha tritaḥ divi upa dhmātā iva dhamati śiśīte dhmātari yathā

original: RV_5,009.06a tavāham agna ūtibhir mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ /
analyzed: tava aham agne ūtibhiḥ mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ

original: RV_5,009.06c dveṣoyuto na duritā turyāma martyānām //
analyzed: dveṣoyutaḥ na duritā turyāma martyānām

original: RV_5,009.07a taṃ no agne abhī naro rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara /
analyzed: tam naḥ agne abhi naraḥ rayim sahasvas ā bhara

original: RV_5,009.07c sa kṣepayat sa poṣayad bhuvad vājasya sātaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
analyzed: sa kṣepayat sa poṣayat bhuvat vājasya sātaye uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_5,010.01a agna ojiṣṭham ā bhara dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo /
analyzed: agne ojiṣṭham ā bhara dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo

original: RV_5,010.01c pra no rāyā parīṇasā ratsi vājāya panthām //
analyzed: pra naḥ rāyā parīṇasā ratsi vājāya panthām

original: RV_5,010.02a tvaṃ no agne adbhuta kratvā dakṣasya maṃhanā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne adbhuta kratvā dakṣasya maṃhanā

original: RV_5,010.02c tve asuryam āruhat krāṇā mitro na yajñiyaḥ //
analyzed: tve asuryam āruhat krāṇā mitraḥ na yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_5,010.03a tvaṃ no agna eṣāṃ gayam puṣṭiṃ ca vardhaya /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne eṣām gayam puṣṭim ca vardhaya

original: RV_5,010.03c ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayo naro maghāny ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayaḥ naraḥ maghāni ānaśuḥ

original: RV_5,010.04a ye agne candra te giraḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ /
analyzed: ye agne candra te giraḥ śumbhanti aśva rādhasaḥ

original: RV_5,010.04c śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇo naro divaś cid yeṣām bṛhat sukīrtir bodhati tmanā //
analyzed: śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ naraḥ divaḥ cit yeṣām bṛhat su kīrtiḥ bodhati tmanā

original: RV_5,010.05a tava tye agne arcayo bhrājanto yanti dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: tava tye agne arcayaḥ bhrājantaḥ yanti dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_5,010.05c parijmāno na vidyutaḥ svāno ratho na vājayuḥ //
analyzed: parijmānaḥ na vidyutaḥ svānaḥ rathaḥ na vājayuḥ

original: RV_5,010.06a nū no agna ūtaye sabādhasaś ca rātaye /
analyzed: nu naḥ agne ūtaye sabādhasaḥ ca rātaye

original: RV_5,010.06c asmākāsaś ca sūrayo viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi //
analyzed: asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ viśvāḥ āśāḥ tarīṣaṇi

original: RV_5,010.07a tvaṃ no agne aṅgira stuta stavāna ā bhara /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne aṅgira stuta stavāna ā bhara

original: RV_5,010.07c hotar vibhvāsahaṃ rayiṃ stotṛbhya stavase ca na utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
analyzed: hotar vibhvāsaham rayim stotṛbhya stavase ca naḥ uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_5,011.01a janasya gopā ajaniṣṭa jāgṛvir agniḥ sudakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase /
analyzed: janasya gopāḥ ajaniṣṭa jāgṛviḥ agniḥ su dakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase

original: RV_5,011.01c ghṛtapratīko bṛhatā divispṛśā dyumad vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkaḥ bṛhatā divispṛśā dyumat vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ

original: RV_5,011.02a yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam agniṃ naras triṣadhasthe sam īdhire /
analyzed: yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam agnim naraḥ triṣadhasthe sam īdhire

original: RV_5,011.02c indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ sa barhiṣi sīdan ni hotā yajathāya sukratuḥ //
analyzed: indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham sa barhiṣi sīdat ni hotā yajathāya su kratuḥ

original: RV_5,011.03a asammṛṣṭo jāyase mātroḥ śucir mandraḥ kavir ud atiṣṭho vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: a sammṛṣṭaḥ jāyase mātroḥ śuciḥ mandraḥ kaviḥ ud atiṣṭhaḥ vivasvataḥ

original: RV_5,011.03c ghṛtena tvāvardhayann agna āhuta dhūmas te ketur abhavad divi śritaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtena tvā avardhayan agne āhuta dhūmaḥ te ketuḥ abhavat divi śritaḥ

original: RV_5,011.04a agnir no yajñam upa vetu sādhuyāgniṃ naro vi bharante gṛhe-gṛhe /
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ yajñam upa vetu sādhuyā agnim naraḥ vi bharante gṛhe gṛhe

original: RV_5,011.04c agnir dūto abhavad dhavyavāhano 'gniṃ vṛṇānā vṛṇate kavikratum //
analyzed: agniḥ dūtaḥ abhavat havya vāhanaḥ gnim vṛṇānāḥ vṛṇate kavi kratum

original: RV_5,011.05a tubhyedam agne madhumattamaṃ vacas tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śaṃ hṛde /
analyzed: tubhya idam agne madhumattamam vacaḥ tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śam hṛde

original: RV_5,011.05c tvāṃ giraḥ sindhum ivāvanīr mahīr ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca //
analyzed: tvām giraḥ sindhum iva avanīḥ mahīḥ ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca

original: RV_5,011.06a tvām agne aṅgiraso guhā hitam anv avindañ chiśriyāṇaṃ vane-vane /
analyzed: tvām agne aṅgirasaḥ guhā hitam anu avindam śiśriyāṇam vanevane

original: RV_5,011.06c sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ saho mahat tvām āhuḥ sahasas putram aṅgiraḥ //
analyzed: sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ sahaḥ mahat tvām āhuḥ sahasaḥ putram aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_5,012.01a prāgnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma /
analyzed: pra agnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma

original: RV_5,012.01c ghṛtaṃ na yajña āsye supūtaṃ giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm //
analyzed: ghṛtam na yajñe āsye su pūtam giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm

original: RV_5,012.02a ṛtaṃ cikitva ṛtam ic cikiddhy ṛtasya dhārā anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam cikitvaḥ ṛtam id cikiddhi ṛtasya dhārāḥ anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_5,012.02c nāhaṃ yātuṃ sahasā na dvayena ṛtaṃ sapāmy aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ //
analyzed: na aham yātum sahasā na dvayena ṛtam sapāmi aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_5,012.03a kayā no agna ṛtayann ṛtena bhuvo navedā ucathasya navyaḥ /
analyzed: kayā naḥ agne ṛtayan ṛtena bhuvaḥ navedāḥ ucathasya navyaḥ

original: RV_5,012.03c vedā me deva ṛtupā ṛtūnāṃ nāham patiṃ sanitur asya rāyaḥ //
analyzed: vedā me devaḥ ṛtu pāḥ ṛtūnām na aham patim sanituḥ asya rāyaḥ

original: RV_5,012.04a ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ /
analyzed: ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ

original: RV_5,012.04c ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti ka āsato vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ //
analyzed: ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti ke āsataḥ vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ

original: RV_5,012.05a sakhāyas te viṣuṇā agna ete śivāsaḥ santo aśivā abhūvan /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ te viṣuṇāḥ agne ete śivāsaḥ santaḥ aśivāḥ abhūvan

original: RV_5,012.05c adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhir ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ //
analyzed: adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhiḥ ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ

original: RV_5,012.06a yas te agne namasā yajñam īṭṭa ṛtaṃ sa pāty aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te agne namasā yajñam īṭṭe ṛtam sa pāti aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_5,012.06c tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthur ā sādhur etu prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthuḥ ā sādhuḥ etu prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ

original: RV_5,013.01a arcantas tvā havāmahe 'rcantaḥ sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: arcantaḥ tvā havāmahe rcantaḥ sam idhīmahi

original: RV_5,013.01c agne arcanta ūtaye //
analyzed: agne arcantaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_5,013.02a agne stomam manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ /
analyzed: agne stomam manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ

original: RV_5,013.02c devasya draviṇasyavaḥ //
analyzed: devasya draviṇasyavaḥ

original: RV_5,013.03a agnir juṣata no giro hotā yo mānuṣeṣv ā /
analyzed: agniḥ juṣata naḥ giraḥ hotā yaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā

original: RV_5,013.03c sa yakṣad daivyaṃ janam //
analyzed: sa yakṣat daivyam janam

original: RV_5,013.04a tvam agne saprathā asi juṣṭo hotā vareṇyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne saprathāḥ asi juṣṭaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_5,013.04c tvayā yajñaṃ vi tanvate //
analyzed: tvayā yajñam vi tanvate

original: RV_5,013.05a tvām agne vājasātamaṃ viprā vardhanti suṣṭutam /
analyzed: tvām agne vāja sātamam viprāḥ vardhanti suṣṭutam

original: RV_5,013.05c sa no rāsva suvīryam //
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsva su vīryam

original: RV_5,013.06a agne nemir arāṃ iva devāṃs tvam paribhūr asi /
analyzed: agne nemiḥ arām iva devān tvam paribhūḥ asi

original: RV_5,013.06c ā rādhaś citram ṛñjase //
analyzed: ā rādhaḥ citram ṛñjase

original: RV_5,014.01a agniṃ stomena bodhaya samidhāno amartyam /
analyzed: agnim stomena bodhaya samidhānaḥ amartyam

original: RV_5,014.01c havyā deveṣu no dadhat //
analyzed: havyā deveṣu naḥ dadhat

original: RV_5,014.02a tam adhvareṣv īḷate devam martā amartyam /
analyzed: tam adhvareṣu īḍate devam martāḥ amartyam

original: RV_5,014.02c yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane //
analyzed: yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane

original: RV_5,014.03a taṃ hi śaśvanta īḷate srucā devaṃ ghṛtaścutā /
analyzed: tam hi śaśvantaḥ īḍate srucā devam ghṛtaścutā

original: RV_5,014.03c agniṃ havyāya voḷhave //
analyzed: agnim havyāya voḷhave

original: RV_5,014.04a agnir jāto arocata ghnan dasyūñ jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ jātaḥ arocata ghnan dasyūm jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_5,014.04c avindad gā apaḥ svaḥ //
analyzed: avindat gāḥ apaḥ svar

original: RV_5,014.05a agnim īḷenyaṃ kaviṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ saparyata /
analyzed: agnim īḍenyam kavim ghṛta pṛṣṭham saparyata

original: RV_5,014.05c vetu me śṛṇavad dhavam //
analyzed: vetu me śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_5,014.06a agniṃ ghṛtena vāvṛdhu stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇim /
analyzed: agnim ghṛtena vāvṛdhuḥ stomebhiḥ viśvacarṣaṇim

original: RV_5,014.06c svādhībhir vacasyubhiḥ //
analyzed: su ādhībhiḥ vacasyubhiḥ

original: RV_5,015.01a pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya /
analyzed: pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya

original: RV_5,015.01c ghṛtaprasatto asuraḥ suśevo rāyo dhartā dharuṇo vasvo agniḥ //
analyzed: ghṛta prasattaḥ asuraḥ su śevaḥ rāyaḥ dhartā dharuṇaḥ vasvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_5,015.02a ṛtena ṛtaṃ dharuṇaṃ dhārayanta yajñasya śāke parame vyoman /
analyzed: ṛtena ṛtam dharuṇam dhārayanta yajñasya śāke parame vyoman

original: RV_5,015.02c divo dharman dharuṇe seduṣo nṝñ jātair ajātāṃ abhi ye nanakṣuḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ dharman dharuṇe seduṣaḥ nṝn jātaiḥ a jātām abhi ye nanakṣuḥ

original: RV_5,015.03a aṅhoyuvas tanvas tanvate vi vayo mahad duṣṭaram pūrvyāya /
analyzed: aṅhoyuvaḥ tanvaḥ tanvate vi vayaḥ mahat duṣṭaram pūrvyāya

original: RV_5,015.03c sa saṃvato navajātas tuturyāt siṅhaṃ na kruddham abhitaḥ pari ṣṭhuḥ //
analyzed: sa saṃvataḥ nava jātaḥ tuturyāt siṅham na kruddham abhitas pari sthuḥ

original: RV_5,015.04a māteva yad bharase paprathāno janaṃ-janaṃ dhāyase cakṣase ca /
analyzed: mātā iva yat bharase paprathānaḥ janaṃjanam dhāyase cakṣase ca

original: RV_5,015.04c vayo-vayo jarase yad dadhānaḥ pari tmanā viṣurūpo jigāsi //
analyzed: vayaḥ vayaḥ jarase yat dadhānaḥ pari tmanā viṣurūpaḥ jigāsi

original: RV_5,015.05a vājo nu te śavasas pātv antam uruṃ doghaṃ dharuṇaṃ deva rāyaḥ /
analyzed: vājaḥ nu te śavasaḥ pātu antam urum dogham dharuṇam deva rāyaḥ

original: RV_5,015.05c padaṃ na tāyur guhā dadhāno maho rāye citayann atrim aspaḥ //
analyzed: padam na tāyuḥ guhā dadhānaḥ mahaḥ rāye citayan atrim aspaḥ

original: RV_5,016.01a bṛhad vayo hi bhānave 'rcā devāyāgnaye /
analyzed: bṛhat vayaḥ hi bhānave rcā devāya agnaye

original: RV_5,016.01c yam mitraṃ na praśastibhir martāso dadhire puraḥ //
analyzed: yam mitram na praśastibhiḥ martāsaḥ dadhire puras

original: RV_5,016.02a sa hi dyubhir janānāṃ hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ /
analyzed: sa hi dyubhiḥ janānām hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ

original: RV_5,016.02c vi havyam agnir ānuṣag bhago na vāram ṛṇvati //
analyzed: vi havyam agniḥ ānuṣak bhagaḥ na vāram ṛṇvati

original: RV_5,016.03a asya stome maghonaḥ sakhye vṛddhaśociṣaḥ /
analyzed: asya stome maghonaḥ sakhye vṛddha śociṣaḥ

original: RV_5,016.03c viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ //
analyzed: viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ

original: RV_5,016.04a adhā hy agna eṣāṃ suvīryasya maṃhanā /
analyzed: adhā hi agne eṣām su vīryasya maṃhanā

original: RV_5,016.04c tam id yahvaṃ na rodasī pari śravo babhūvatuḥ //
analyzed: tam id yahvam na rodasī pari śravaḥ babhūvatuḥ

original: RV_5,016.05a nū na ehi vāryam agne gṛṇāna ā bhara /
analyzed: nu naḥ ehi vāryam agne gṛṇānaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,016.05c ye vayaṃ ye ca sūrayaḥ svasti dhāmahe sacotaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
analyzed: ye vayam ye ca sūrayaḥ svasti dhāmahe sacā uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_5,017.01a ā yajñair deva martya itthā tavyāṃsam ūtaye /
analyzed: ā yajñaiḥ deva martyaḥ itthā tavyāṃsam ūtaye

original: RV_5,017.01c agniṃ kṛte svadhvare pūrur īḷītāvase //
analyzed: agnim kṛte su adhvare pūruḥ īḍīta avase

original: RV_5,017.02a asya hi svayaśastara āsā vidharman manyase /
analyzed: asya hi sva yaśastaraḥ āsā vidharman manyase

original: RV_5,017.02c taṃ nākaṃ citraśociṣam mandram paro manīṣayā //
analyzed: tam nākam citra śociṣam mandram paras manīṣayā

original: RV_5,017.03a asya vāsā u arciṣā ya āyukta tujā girā /
analyzed: asya vā āsā u arciṣā yaḥ āyukta tujā girā

original: RV_5,017.03c divo na yasya retasā bṛhac chocanty arcayaḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ na yasya retasā bṛhat śocanti arcayaḥ

original: RV_5,017.04a asya kratvā vicetaso dasmasya vasu ratha ā /
analyzed: asya kratvā vicetasaḥ dasmasya vasu rathe ā

original: RV_5,017.04c adhā viśvāsu havyo 'gnir vikṣu pra śasyate //
analyzed: adhā viśvāsu havyaḥ gniḥ vikṣu pra śasyate

original: RV_5,017.05a nū na id dhi vāryam āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: nu naḥ id hi vāryam āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_5,017.05c ūrjo napād abhiṣṭaye pāhi śagdhi svastaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt abhiṣṭaye pāhi śagdhi svastaye uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_5,018.01a prātar agniḥ purupriyo viśa stavetātithiḥ /
analyzed: prātar agniḥ puru priyaḥ viśaḥ staveta atithiḥ

original: RV_5,018.01c viśvāni yo amartyo havyā marteṣu raṇyati //
analyzed: viśvāni yaḥ amartyaḥ havyā marteṣu raṇyati

original: RV_5,018.02a dvitāya mṛktavāhase svasya dakṣasya maṃhanā /
analyzed: dvitāya mṛktavāhase svasya dakṣasya maṃhanā

original: RV_5,018.02c induṃ sa dhatta ānuṣak stotā cit te amartya //
analyzed: indum sa dhatte ānuṣak stotā cit te amartya

original: RV_5,018.03a taṃ vo dīrghāyuśociṣaṃ girā huve maghonām /
analyzed: tam vaḥ dīrgha āyu śociṣam girā huve maghonām

original: RV_5,018.03c ariṣṭo yeṣāṃ ratho vy aśvadāvann īyate //
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ yeṣām rathaḥ vi aśva dāvan īyate

original: RV_5,018.04a citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitir āsann ukthā pānti ye /
analyzed: citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitiḥ āsan ukthā pānti ye

original: RV_5,018.04b stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare śravāṃsi dadhire pari //
analyzed: stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare śravāṃsi dadhire pari

original: RV_5,018.05a ye me pañcāśataṃ dadur aśvānāṃ sadhastuti /
analyzed: ye me pañcāśatam daduḥ aśvānām sadhastuti

original: RV_5,018.05b dyumad agne mahi śravo bṛhat kṛdhi maghonāṃ nṛvad amṛta nṛṇām //
analyzed: dyumat agne mahi śravaḥ bṛhat kṛdhi maghonām nṛvat amṛta nṛṇām

original: RV_5,019.01a abhy avasthāḥ pra jāyante pra vavrer vavriś ciketa /
analyzed: abhi avasthāḥ pra jāyante pra vavreḥ vavriḥ ciketa

original: RV_5,019.01c upasthe mātur vi caṣṭe //
analyzed: upasthe mātuḥ vi caṣṭe

original: RV_5,019.02a juhure vi citayanto 'nimiṣaṃ nṛmṇam pānti /
analyzed: juhure vi citayantaḥ nimiṣam nṛmṇam pānti

original: RV_5,019.02c ā dṛḷhām puraṃ viviśuḥ //
analyzed: ā dṛḷhām puram viviśuḥ

original: RV_5,019.03a ā śvaitreyasya jantavo dyumad vardhanta kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: ā śvaitreyasya jantavaḥ dyumat vardhanta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_5,019.03b niṣkagrīvo bṛhaduktha enā madhvā na vājayuḥ //
analyzed: niṣka grīvaḥ bṛhat ukthaḥ enā madhvā na vājayuḥ

original: RV_5,019.04a priyaṃ dugdhaṃ na kāmyam ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā /
analyzed: priyam dugdham na kāmyam ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā

original: RV_5,019.04c gharmo na vājajaṭharo 'dabdhaḥ śaśvato dabhaḥ //
analyzed: gharmaḥ na vāja jaṭharaḥ dabdhaḥ śaśvataḥ dabhaḥ

original: RV_5,019.05a krīḷan no raśma ā bhuvaḥ sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ /
analyzed: krīḍan naḥ raśmaḥ ā bhuvaḥ sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ

original: RV_5,019.05b tā asya san dhṛṣajo na tigmāḥ susaṃśitā vakṣyo vakṣaṇesthāḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ asya san dhṛṣajaḥ na tigmāḥ su saṃśitāḥ vakṣyaḥ vakṣaṇesthāḥ

original: RV_5,020.01a yam agne vājasātama tvaṃ cin manyase rayim /
analyzed: yam agne vāja sātama tvam cit manyase rayim

original: RV_5,020.01c taṃ no gīrbhiḥ śravāyyaṃ devatrā panayā yujam //
analyzed: tam naḥ gīrbhiḥ śravāyyam devatrā panaya yujam

original: RV_5,020.02a ye agne nerayanti te vṛddhā ugrasya śavasaḥ /
analyzed: ye agne na īrayanti te vṛddhāḥ ugrasya śavasaḥ

original: RV_5,020.02b apa dveṣo apa hvaro 'nyavratasya saścire //
analyzed: apa dveṣaḥ apa hvaraḥ nyavratasya saścire

original: RV_5,020.03a hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe 'gne dakṣasya sādhanam /
analyzed: hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe gne dakṣasya sādhanam

original: RV_5,020.03b yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ girā prayasvanto havāmahe //
analyzed: yajñeṣu pūrvyam girā prayasvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_5,020.04a itthā yathā ta ūtaye sahasāvan dive-dive /
analyzed: itthā yathā te ūtaye sahasāvan dive dive

original: RV_5,020.04b rāya ṛtāya sukrato gobhiḥ ṣyāma sadhamādo vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ //
analyzed: rāye ṛtāya su krato gobhiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ

original: RV_5,021.01a manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi manuṣvat sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi manuṣvat sam idhīmahi

original: RV_5,021.01c agne manuṣvad aṅgiro devān devayate yaja //
analyzed: agne manuṣvat aṅgiraḥ devān devayate yaja

original: RV_5,021.02a tvaṃ hi mānuṣe jane 'gne suprīta idhyase /
analyzed: tvam hi mānuṣe jane gne su prītaḥ idhyase

original: RV_5,021.02c srucas tvā yanty ānuṣak sujāta sarpirāsute //
analyzed: srucaḥ tvā yanti ānuṣak su jāta sarpiḥ āsute

original: RV_5,021.03a tvāṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata /
analyzed: tvām viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ dūtam akrata

original: RV_5,021.03b saparyantas tvā kave yajñeṣu devam īḷate //
analyzed: saparyantaḥ tvā kave yajñeṣu devam īḍate

original: RV_5,021.04a devaṃ vo devayajyayāgnim īḷīta martyaḥ /
analyzed: devam vaḥ deva yajyayā agnim īḍīta martyaḥ

original: RV_5,021.04b samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihy ṛtasya yonim āsadaḥ sasasya yonim āsadaḥ //
analyzed: samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihi ṛtasya yonim āsadaḥ sasasya yonim āsadaḥ

original: RV_5,022.01a pra viśvasāmann atrivad arcā pāvakaśociṣe /
analyzed: pra viśvasāman atri vat arca pāvaka śociṣe

original: RV_5,022.01c yo adhvareṣv īḍyo hotā mandratamo viśi //
analyzed: yaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ hotā mandratamaḥ viśi

original: RV_5,022.02a ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ dadhātā devam ṛtvijam /
analyzed: ni agnim jātavedasam dadhāta devam ṛtvijam

original: RV_5,022.02c pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ //
analyzed: pra yajñaḥ etu ānuṣak adyā deva vyacastamaḥ

original: RV_5,022.03a cikitvinmanasaṃ tvā devam martāsa ūtaye /
analyzed: cikitvinmanasam tvā devam martāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_5,022.03c vareṇyasya te 'vasa iyānāso amanmahi //
analyzed: vareṇyasya te vaso iyānāsaḥ amanmahi

original: RV_5,022.04a agne cikiddhy asya na idaṃ vacaḥ sahasya /
analyzed: agne cikiddhi asya naḥ idam vacaḥ sahasya

original: RV_5,022.04c taṃ tvā suśipra dampate stomair vardhanty atrayo gīrbhiḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā su śipra dampate stomaiḥ vardhanti atrayaḥ gīrbhiḥ śumbhanti atrayaḥ

original: RV_5,023.01a agne sahantam ā bhara dyumnasya prāsahā rayim /
analyzed: agne sahantam ā bhara dyumnasya prāsahā rayim

original: RV_5,023.01c viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhy āsā vājeṣu sāsahat //
analyzed: viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhī āsā vājeṣu sāsahat

original: RV_5,023.02a tam agne pṛtanāṣahaṃ rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara /
analyzed: tam agne pṛtanāṣaham rayim sahasva ā bhara

original: RV_5,023.02b tvaṃ hi satyo adbhuto dātā vājasya gomataḥ //
analyzed: tvam hi satyaḥ adbhutaḥ dātā vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_5,023.03a viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: viśve hi tvā sajoṣasaḥ janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_5,023.03c hotāraṃ sadmasu priyaṃ vyanti vāryā puru //
analyzed: hotāram sadmasu priyam vyanti vāryā puru

original: RV_5,023.04a sa hi ṣmā viśvacarṣaṇir abhimāti saho dadhe /
analyzed: sa hi sma viśvacarṣaṇiḥ abhimāti sahaḥ dadhe

original: RV_5,023.04b agna eṣu kṣayeṣv ā revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi //
analyzed: agne eṣu kṣayeṣu ā revat naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi

original: RV_5,024.01a agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhavā varūthyaḥ //
analyzed: agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ uta trātā śivaḥ bhava varūthyaḥ

original: RV_5,024.02a vasur agnir vasuśravā acchā nakṣi dyumattamaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
analyzed: vasuḥ agniḥ vasu śravāḥ acchā nakṣi dyumattamam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_5,024.03a sa no bodhi śrudhī havam uruṣyā ṇo aghāyataḥ samasmāt //
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi śrudhi havam uruṣyā naḥ aghāyataḥ samasmāt

original: RV_5,024.04a taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā śociṣṭha dīdivas sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_5,025.01a acchā vo agnim avase devaṃ gāsi sa no vasuḥ /
analyzed: acchā vaḥ agnim avase devam gāsi sa naḥ vasuḥ

original: RV_5,025.01c rāsat putra ṛṣūṇām ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: rāsat putraḥ ṛṣūṇām ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_5,025.02a sa hi satyo yam pūrve cid devāsaś cid yam īdhire /
analyzed: sa hi satyaḥ yam pūrve cit devāsaḥ cit yam īdhire

original: RV_5,025.02c hotāram mandrajihvam it sudītibhir vibhāvasum //
analyzed: hotāram mandra jihvam id su dītibhiḥ vibhāvasum

original: RV_5,025.03a sa no dhītī variṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā ca sumatyā /
analyzed: sa naḥ dhītī variṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā ca sumatyā

original: RV_5,025.03c agne rāyo didīhi naḥ suvṛktibhir vareṇya //
analyzed: agne rāyaḥ didīhi naḥ suvṛktibhiḥ vareṇya

original: RV_5,025.04a agnir deveṣu rājaty agnir marteṣv āviśan /
analyzed: agniḥ deveṣu rājati agniḥ marteṣu āviśan

original: RV_5,025.04c agnir no havyavāhano 'gniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata //
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ havya vāhanaḥ gnim dhībhiḥ saparyata

original: RV_5,025.05a agnis tuviśravastamaṃ tuvibrahmāṇam uttamam /
analyzed: agniḥ tuvi śravastamam tuvi brahmāṇam uttamam

original: RV_5,025.05c atūrtaṃ śrāvayatpatim putraṃ dadāti dāśuṣe //
analyzed: a tūrtam śrāvayat patim putram dadāti dāśuṣe

original: RV_5,025.06a agnir dadāti satpatiṃ sāsāha yo yudhā nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ dadāti sat patim sāsāha yaḥ yudhā nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_5,025.06c agnir atyaṃ raghuṣyadaṃ jetāram aparājitam //
analyzed: agniḥ atyam raghuṣyadam jetāram aparājitam

original: RV_5,025.07a yad vāhiṣṭhaṃ tad agnaye bṛhad arca vibhāvaso /
analyzed: yat vāhiṣṭham tat agnaye bṛhat arca vibhāvaso

original: RV_5,025.07c mahiṣīva tvad rayis tvad vājā ud īrate //
analyzed: mahiṣī iva tvat rayiḥ tvat vājāḥ ud īrate

original: RV_5,025.08a tava dyumanto arcayo grāvevocyate bṛhat /
analyzed: tava dyumantaḥ arcayaḥ grāvā iva ucyate bṛhat

original: RV_5,025.08c uto te tanyatur yathā svāno arta tmanā divaḥ //
analyzed: uta u te tanyatuḥ yathā svānaḥ arta tmanā divaḥ

original: RV_5,025.09a evāṃ agniṃ vasūyavaḥ sahasānaṃ vavandima /
analyzed: eva ān agnim vasūyavaḥ sahasānam vavandima

original: RV_5,025.09c sa no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ parṣan nāveva sukratuḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ parṣat nāvā iva su kratuḥ

original: RV_5,026.01a agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā /
analyzed: agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā

original: RV_5,026.01c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_5,026.02a taṃ tvā ghṛtasnav īmahe citrabhāno svardṛśam /
analyzed: tam tvā ghṛtasno īmahe citrabhāno svar dṛśam

original: RV_5,026.02c devāṃ ā vītaye vaha //
analyzed: devān ā vītaye vaha

original: RV_5,026.03a vītihotraṃ tvā kave dyumantaṃ sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: vītihotram tvā kave dyumantam sam idhīmahi

original: RV_5,026.03c agne bṛhantam adhvare //
analyzed: agne bṛhantam adhvare

original: RV_5,026.04a agne viśvebhir ā gahi devebhir havyadātaye /
analyzed: agne viśvebhiḥ ā gahi devebhiḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_5,026.04b hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_5,026.05a yajamānāya sunvata āgne suvīryaṃ vaha /
analyzed: yajamānāya sunvate ā agne su vīryam vaha

original: RV_5,026.05c devair ā satsi barhiṣi //
analyzed: devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_5,026.06a samidhānaḥ sahasrajid agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi /
analyzed: samidhānaḥ sahasra jit agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi

original: RV_5,026.06c devānāṃ dūta ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: devānām dūtaḥ ukthyaḥ

original: RV_5,026.07a ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ hotravāhaṃ yaviṣṭhyam /
analyzed: ni agnim jātavedasam hotra vāham yaviṣṭhyam

original: RV_5,026.07c dadhātā devam ṛtvijam //
analyzed: dadhāta devam ṛtvijam

original: RV_5,026.08a pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ /
analyzed: pra yajñaḥ etu ānuṣak adyā deva vyacastamaḥ

original: RV_5,026.08c stṛṇīta barhir āsade //
analyzed: stṛṇīta barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_5,026.09a edam maruto aśvinā mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā idam marutaḥ aśvinā mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ

original: RV_5,026.09c devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā //
analyzed: devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā

original: RV_5,027.01a anasvantā satpatir māmahe me gāvā cetiṣṭho asuro maghonaḥ /
analyzed: anasvantā satpatiḥ māmahe me gāvā cetiṣṭhaḥ asuraḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_5,027.01c traivṛṣṇo agne daśabhiḥ sahasrair vaiśvānara tryaruṇaś ciketa //
analyzed: traivṛṣṇaḥ agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vaiśvānara tri aruṇaḥ ciketa

original: RV_5,027.02a yo me śatā ca viṃśatiṃ ca gonāṃ harī ca yuktā sudhurā dadāti /
analyzed: yaḥ me śatā ca viṃśatim ca gonām harī ca yuktā su dhurā dadāti

original: RV_5,027.02c vaiśvānara suṣṭuto vāvṛdhāno 'gne yaccha tryaruṇāya śarma //
analyzed: vaiśvānara suṣṭutaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ gne yaccha tryaruṇāya śarma

original: RV_5,027.03a evā te agne sumatiṃ cakāno naviṣṭhāya navamaṃ trasadasyuḥ /
analyzed: eva te agne sumatim cakānaḥ naviṣṭhāya navamam trasadasyuḥ

original: RV_5,027.03c yo me giras tuvijātasya pūrvīr yuktenābhi tryaruṇo gṛṇāti //
analyzed: yaḥ me giraḥ tuvi jātasya pūrvīḥ yuktena abhi tri aruṇaḥ gṛṇāti

original: RV_5,027.04a yo ma iti pravocaty aśvamedhāya sūraye /
analyzed: yaḥ me iti pravocati aśvamedhāya sūraye

original: RV_5,027.04b dadad ṛcā saniṃ yate dadan medhām ṛtāyate //
analyzed: dadat ṛcā sanim yate dadat medhām ṛtāyate

original: RV_5,027.05a yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam uddharṣayanty ukṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam ud harṣayanti ukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_5,027.05c aśvamedhasya dānāḥ somā iva tryāśiraḥ //
analyzed: aśvamedhasya dānāḥ somāḥ iva tri āśiraḥ

original: RV_5,027.06a indrāgnī śatadāvny aśvamedhe suvīryam /
analyzed: indra agnī śatadāvni aśvamedhe su vīryam

original: RV_5,027.06c kṣatraṃ dhārayatam bṛhad divi sūryam ivājaram //
analyzed: kṣatram dhārayatam bṛhat divi sūryam iva ajaram

original: RV_5,028.01a samiddho agnir divi śocir aśret pratyaṅṅ uṣasam urviyā vi bhāti /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ divi śociḥ aśret pratyaṅ uṣasam urviyā vi bhāti

original: RV_5,028.01c eti prācī viśvavārā namobhir devāṃ īḷānā haviṣā ghṛtācī //
analyzed: eti prācī viśva vārā namobhiḥ devān īḍānā haviṣā ghṛtācī
