original: RV_5,028.02a samidhyamāno amṛtasya rājasi haviṣ kṛṇvantaṃ sacase svastaye /
analyzed: samidhyamānaḥ amṛtasya rājasi haviṣ kṛṇvantam sacase svastaye

original: RV_5,028.02c viśvaṃ sa dhatte draviṇaṃ yam invasy ātithyam agne ni ca dhatta it puraḥ //
analyzed: viśvam sa dhatte draviṇam yam invasi ātithyam agne ni ca dhatte id puras

original: RV_5,028.03a agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu /
analyzed: agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāni uttamāni santu

original: RV_5,028.03c saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi //
analyzed: sam jāspatyam suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭha mahāṃsi

original: RV_5,028.04a samiddhasya pramahaso 'gne vande tava śriyam /
analyzed: samiddhasya pramahasaḥ gne vande tava śriyam

original: RV_5,028.04c vṛṣabho dyumnavāṃ asi sam adhvareṣv idhyase //
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ dyumnavān asi sam adhvareṣu idhyase

original: RV_5,028.05a samiddho agna āhuta devān yakṣi svadhvara /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne āhuta devān yakṣi su adhvara

original: RV_5,028.05c tvaṃ hi havyavāḷ asi //
analyzed: tvam hi havyavāṭ asi

original: RV_5,028.06a ā juhotā duvasyatāgnim prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: ā juhota ā duvasyata agnim prayati adhvare

original: RV_5,028.06c vṛṇīdhvaṃ havyavāhanam //
analyzed: vṛṇīdhvam havyavāhanam

original: RV_5,029.01a try aryamā manuṣo devatātā trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta /
analyzed: trī aryamā manuṣaḥ devatātā trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta

original: RV_5,029.01c arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣās tvam eṣām ṛṣir indrāsi dhīraḥ //
analyzed: arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ tvam eṣām ṛṣiḥ indra asi dhīraḥ

original: RV_5,029.02a anu yad īm maruto mandasānam ārcann indram papivāṃsaṃ sutasya /
analyzed: anu yat īm marutaḥ mandasānam ārcan indram papivāṃsam sutasya

original: RV_5,029.02c ādatta vajram abhi yad ahiṃ hann apo yahvīr asṛjat sartavā u //
analyzed: ādatta vajram abhi yat ahim han apaḥ yahvīḥ asṛjat sartavai u

original: RV_5,029.03a uta brahmāṇo maruto me asyendraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ /
analyzed: uta brahmāṇaḥ marutaḥ me asya indraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ

original: RV_5,029.03c tad dhi havyam manuṣe gā avindad ahann ahim papivāṃ indro asya //
analyzed: tat hi havyam manuṣe gāḥ avindat ahan ahim papivān indraḥ asya

original: RV_5,029.04a ād rodasī vitaraṃ vi ṣkabhāyat saṃvivyānaś cid bhiyase mṛgaṃ kaḥ /
analyzed: āt rodasī vitaram vi skabhāyat saṃvivyānaḥ cit bhiyase mṛgam kaḥ

original: RV_5,029.04c jigartim indro apajargurāṇaḥ prati śvasantam ava dānavaṃ han //
analyzed: jigartim indraḥ apajargurāṇaḥ prati śvasantam ava dānavam han

original: RV_5,029.05a adha kratvā maghavan tubhyaṃ devā anu viśve adaduḥ somapeyam /
analyzed: adha kratvā maghavan tubhyam devāḥ anu viśve adaduḥ soma peyam

original: RV_5,029.05c yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ puraḥ satīr uparā etaśe kaḥ //
analyzed: yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ puras satīḥ uparāḥ etaśe kaḥ

original: RV_5,029.06a nava yad asya navatiṃ ca bhogān sākaṃ vajreṇa maghavā vivṛścat /
analyzed: nava yat asya navatim ca bhogān sākam vajreṇa maghavā vivṛścat

original: RV_5,029.06c arcantīndram marutaḥ sadhasthe traiṣṭubhena vacasā bādhata dyām //
analyzed: arcanti indram marutaḥ sadhasthe traiṣṭubhena vacasā bādhata dyām

original: RV_5,029.07a sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agnir asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni /
analyzed: sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agniḥ asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni

original: RV_5,029.07c trī sākam indro manuṣaḥ sarāṃsi sutam pibad vṛtrahatyāya somam //
analyzed: trī sākam indraḥ manuṣaḥ sarāṃsi sutam pibat vṛtra hatyāya somam

original: RV_5,029.08a trī yac chatā mahiṣāṇām agho mās trī sarāṃsi maghavā somyāpāḥ /
analyzed: trī yat śatā mahiṣāṇām aghaḥ māḥ trī sarāṃsi maghavā somyā apāḥ

original: RV_5,029.08c kāraṃ na viśve ahvanta devā bharam indrāya yad ahiṃ jaghāna //
analyzed: kāram na viśve ahvanta devāḥ bharam indrāya yat ahim jaghāna

original: RV_5,029.09a uśanā yat sahasyair ayātaṃ gṛham indra jūjuvānebhir aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: uśanā yat sahasyaiḥ ayātam gṛham indra jūjuvānebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_5,029.09c vanvāno atra sarathaṃ yayātha kutsena devair avanor ha śuṣṇam //
analyzed: vanvānaḥ atra sa ratham yayātha kutsena devaiḥ avanoḥ ha śuṣṇam

original: RV_5,029.10a prānyac cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya kutsāyānyad varivo yātave 'kaḥ /
analyzed: pra anyat cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya kutsāya anyat varivaḥ yātave kaḥ

original: RV_5,029.10c anāso dasyūṃr amṛṇo vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācaḥ //
analyzed: an āsaḥ dasyūṃr amṛṇaḥ vadhena ni duryoṇe āvṛṇak mṛdhra vācaḥ

original: RV_5,029.11a stomāsas tvā gaurivīter avardhann arandhayo vaidathināya piprum /
analyzed: stomāsaḥ tvā gaurivīteḥ avardhan arandhayaḥ vaidathināya piprum

original: RV_5,029.11c ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre pacan paktīr apibaḥ somam asya //
analyzed: ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre pacan paktīḥ apibaḥ somam asya

original: RV_5,029.12a navagvāsaḥ sutasomāsa indraṃ daśagvāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
analyzed: navagvāsaḥ suta somāsaḥ indram daśagvāsaḥ abhī arcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_5,029.12c gavyaṃ cid ūrvam apidhānavantaṃ taṃ cin naraḥ śaśamānā apa vran //
analyzed: gavyam cit ūrvam apidhānavantam tam cit naraḥ śaśamānāḥ apa vran

original: RV_5,029.13a katho nu te pari carāṇi vidvān vīryā maghavan yā cakartha /
analyzed: kathā u nu te pari carāṇi vidvān vīryā maghavan yā cakartha

original: RV_5,029.13c yā co nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha pred u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma //
analyzed: yā ca u nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha pra id u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma

original: RV_5,029.14a etā viśvā cakṛvāṃ indra bhūry aparīto januṣā vīryeṇa /
analyzed: etā viśvā cakṛvān indra bhūri aparītaḥ januṣā vīryeṇa

original: RV_5,029.14c yā cin nu vajrin kṛṇavo dadhṛṣvān na te vartā taviṣyā asti tasyāḥ //
analyzed: yā cit nu vajrin kṛṇavaḥ dadhṛṣvān na te vartā taviṣyāḥ asti tasyāḥ

original: RV_5,029.15a indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva yā te śaviṣṭha navyā akarma /
analyzed: indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva yā te śaviṣṭha navyā akarma

original: RV_5,029.15c vastreva bhadrā sukṛtā vasūyū rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam //
analyzed: vastrā iva bhadrā su kṛtā vasūyuḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣam

original: RV_5,030.01a kva sya vīraḥ ko apaśyad indraṃ sukharatham īyamānaṃ haribhyām /
analyzed: kva sya vīraḥ kaḥ apaśyat indram sukha ratham īyamānam haribhyām

original: RV_5,030.01c yo rāyā vajrī sutasomam icchan tad oko gantā puruhūta ūtī //
analyzed: yaḥ rāyā vajrī suta somam icchan tat okaḥ gantā puruhūtaḥ ūtī

original: RV_5,030.02a avācacakṣam padam asya sasvar ugraṃ nidhātur anv āyam icchan /
analyzed: avācacakṣam padam asya sasvar ugram nidhātuḥ anu āyam icchan

original: RV_5,030.02c apṛccham anyāṃ uta te ma āhur indraṃ naro bubudhānā aśema //
analyzed: apṛccham anyām uta te me āhuḥ indram naraḥ bubudhānāḥ aśema

original: RV_5,030.03a pra nu vayaṃ sute yā te kṛtānīndra bravāma yāni no jujoṣaḥ /
analyzed: pra nu vayam sute yā te kṛtāni indra bravāma yāni naḥ jujoṣaḥ

original: RV_5,030.03b vedad avidvāñ chṛṇavac ca vidvān vahate 'yam maghavā sarvasenaḥ //
analyzed: vedat a vidvān śṛṇavat ca vidvān vahate yam maghavā sarva senaḥ

original: RV_5,030.04a sthiram manaś cakṛṣe jāta indra veṣīd eko yudhaye bhūyasaś cit /
analyzed: sthiram manaḥ cakṛṣe jātaḥ indra veṣi id ekaḥ yudhaye bhūyasaḥ cit

original: RV_5,030.04b aśmānaṃ cic chavasā didyuto vi vido gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām //
analyzed: aśmānam cit śavasā didyutaḥ vi vidaḥ gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām

original: RV_5,030.05a paro yat tvam parama ājaniṣṭhāḥ parāvati śrutyaṃ nāma bibhrat /
analyzed: paras yat tvam paramaḥ ājaniṣṭhāḥ parāvati śrutyam nāma bibhrat

original: RV_5,030.05c ataś cid indrād abhayanta devā viśvā apo ajayad dāsapatnīḥ //
analyzed: atas cit indrāt abhayanta devāḥ viśvāḥ apaḥ ajayat dāsa patnīḥ

original: RV_5,030.06a tubhyed ete marutaḥ suśevā arcanty arkaṃ sunvanty andhaḥ /
analyzed: tubhya id ete marutaḥ su śevāḥ arcanti arkam sunvanti andhaḥ

original: RV_5,030.06c ahim ohānam apa āśayānam pra māyābhir māyinaṃ sakṣad indraḥ //
analyzed: ahim ohānam apaḥ āśayānam pra māyābhiḥ māyinam sakṣat indraḥ

original: RV_5,030.07a vi ṣū mṛdho januṣā dānam invann ahan gavā maghavan saṃcakānaḥ /
analyzed: vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ januṣā dānam invan ahan gavā maghavan saṃcakānaḥ

original: RV_5,030.07c atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiro yad avartayo manave gātum icchan //
analyzed: atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiraḥ yat avartayaḥ manave gātum icchan

original: RV_5,030.08a yujaṃ hi mām akṛthā ād id indra śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan /
analyzed: yujam hi mām akṛthāḥ āt id indra śiraḥ dāsasya namuceḥ mathāyan

original: RV_5,030.08c aśmānaṃ cit svaryaṃ vartamānam pra cakriyeva rodasī marudbhyaḥ //
analyzed: aśmānam cit svaryam vartamānam pra cakriyā iva rodasī marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_5,030.09a striyo hi dāsa āyudhāni cakre kim mā karann abalā asya senāḥ /
analyzed: striyaḥ hi dāsaḥ āyudhāni cakre kim mā karan abalāḥ asya senāḥ

original: RV_5,030.09c antar hy akhyad ubhe asya dhene athopa praid yudhaye dasyum indraḥ //
analyzed: antar hi akhyat ubhe asya dhene athā upa prait yudhaye dasyum indraḥ

original: RV_5,030.10a sam atra gāvo 'bhito 'navanteheha vatsair viyutā yad āsan /
analyzed: sam atra gāvaḥ bhitas navanta iha iha vatsaiḥ viyutāḥ yat āsan

original: RV_5,030.10c saṃ tā indro asṛjad asya śākair yad īṃ somāsaḥ suṣutā amandan //
analyzed: sam tāḥ indraḥ asṛjat asya śākaiḥ yat īm somāsaḥ suṣutāḥ amandan

original: RV_5,030.11a yad īṃ somā babhrudhūtā amandann aroravīd vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu /
analyzed: yat īm somāḥ babhru dhūtāḥ amandan aroravīt vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu

original: RV_5,030.11c purandaraḥ papivāṃ indro asya punar gavām adadād usriyāṇām //
analyzed: purandaraḥ papivān indraḥ asya punar gavām adadāt usriyāṇām

original: RV_5,030.12a bhadram idaṃ ruśamā agne akran gavāṃ catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā /
analyzed: bhadram idam ruśamāḥ agne akran gavām catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā

original: RV_5,030.12c ṛṇañcayasya prayatā maghāni praty agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām //
analyzed: ṛṇañcayasya prayatā maghāni prati agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām

original: RV_5,030.13a supeśasam māva sṛjanty astaṃ gavāṃ sahasrai ruśamāso agne /
analyzed: supeśasam mā ava sṛjanti astam gavām sahasraiḥ ruśamāsaḥ agne

original: RV_5,030.13c tīvrā indram amamanduḥ sutāso 'ktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyāḥ //
analyzed: tīvrāḥ indram amamanduḥ sutāsaḥ ktoḥ vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyāḥ

original: RV_5,030.14a aucchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yāṃ ṛṇañcaye rājani ruśamānām /
analyzed: aucchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yām ṛṇañcaye rājani ruśamānām

original: RV_5,030.14c atyo na vājī raghur ajyamāno babhruś catvāry asanat sahasrā //
analyzed: atyaḥ na vājī raghuḥ ajyamānaḥ babhruḥ catvāri asanat sahasrā

original: RV_5,030.15a catuḥsahasraṃ gavyasya paśvaḥ praty agrabhīṣma ruśameṣv agne /
analyzed: catur sahasram gavyasya paśvaḥ prati agrabhīṣma ruśameṣu agne

original: RV_5,030.15c gharmaś cit taptaḥ pravṛje ya āsīd ayasmayas tam v ādāma viprāḥ //
analyzed: gharmaḥ cit taptaḥ pravṛje yaḥ āsīt ayasmayaḥ tam u ādāma viprāḥ

original: RV_5,031.01a indro rathāya pravataṃ kṛṇoti yam adhyasthān maghavā vājayantam /
analyzed: indraḥ rathāya pravatam kṛṇoti yam adhyasthāt maghavā vājayantam

original: RV_5,031.01c yūtheva paśvo vy unoti gopā ariṣṭo yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan //
analyzed: yūthā iva paśvaḥ vi unoti gopāḥ ariṣṭaḥ yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan

original: RV_5,031.02a ā pra drava harivo mā vi venaḥ piśaṅgarāte abhi naḥ sacasva /
analyzed: ā pra drava harivas mā vi venaḥ piśaṅga rāte abhi naḥ sacasva

original: RV_5,031.02c nahi tvad indra vasyo anyad asty amenāṃś cij janivataś cakartha //
analyzed: nahi tvat indra vasyaḥ anyat asti amenān cit janivataḥ cakartha

original: RV_5,031.03a ud yat sahaḥ sahasa ājaniṣṭa dediṣṭa indra indriyāṇi viśvā /
analyzed: ud yat sahaḥ sahasaḥ ājaniṣṭa dediṣṭe indraḥ indriyāṇi viśvā

original: RV_5,031.03c prācodayat sudughā vavre antar vi jyotiṣā saṃvavṛtvat tamo 'vaḥ //
analyzed: prācodayat sudughāḥ vavre antar vi jyotiṣā saṃvavṛtvat tamaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_5,031.04a anavas te ratham aśvāya takṣan tvaṣṭā vajram puruhūta dyumantam /
analyzed: anavaḥ te ratham aśvāya takṣan tvaṣṭā vajram puruhūta dyumantam

original: RV_5,031.04c brahmāṇa indram mahayanto arkair avardhayann ahaye hantavā u //
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ indram mahayantaḥ arkaiḥ avardhayan ahaye hantavai u

original: RV_5,031.05a vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇo arkam arcān indra grāvāṇo aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇaḥ arkam arcān indra grāvāṇaḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_5,031.05c anaśvāso ye pavayo 'rathā indreṣitā abhy avartanta dasyūn //
analyzed: an aśvāsaḥ ye pavayaḥ rathāḥ indra iṣitāḥ abhī avartanta dasyūn

original: RV_5,031.06a pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha /
analyzed: pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha

original: RV_5,031.06c śaktīvo yad vibharā rodasī ubhe jayann apo manave dānucitrāḥ //
analyzed: śaktīvas yat vibharāḥ rodasī ubhe jayan apaḥ manave dānu citrāḥ

original: RV_5,031.07a tad in nu te karaṇaṃ dasma viprāhiṃ yad ghnann ojo atrāmimīthāḥ /
analyzed: tat id nu te karaṇam dasma vipra ahim yat ghnan ojaḥ atra āmimīthāḥ

original: RV_5,031.07c śuṣṇasya cit pari māyā agṛbhṇāḥ prapitvaṃ yann apa dasyūṃr asedhaḥ //
analyzed: śuṣṇasya cit pari māyāḥ agṛbhṇāḥ prapitvam yan apa dasyūṃr asedhaḥ

original: RV_5,031.08a tvam apo yadave turvaśāyāramayaḥ sudughāḥ pāra indra /
analyzed: tvam apaḥ yadave turvaśāya aramayaḥ su dughāḥ pāre indra

original: RV_5,031.08c ugram ayātam avaho ha kutsaṃ saṃ ha yad vām uśanāranta devāḥ //
analyzed: ugram ayātam avahaḥ ha kutsam sam ha yat vām uśanā aranta devāḥ

original: RV_5,031.09a indrākutsā vahamānā rathenā vām atyā api karṇe vahantu /
analyzed: indrākutsā vahamānā rathena ā vām atyāḥ api karṇe vahantu

original: RV_5,031.09c niḥ ṣīm adbhyo dhamatho niḥ ṣadhasthān maghono hṛdo varathas tamāṃsi //
analyzed: niḥ sīm adbhyaḥ dhamathaḥ niḥ sadhasthāt maghonaḥ hṛdaḥ varathaḥ tamāṃsi

original: RV_5,031.10a vātasya yuktān suyujaś cid aśvān kaviś cid eṣo ajagann avasyuḥ /
analyzed: vātasya yuktān su yujaḥ cit aśvān kaviḥ cit eṣaḥ ajagan avasyuḥ

original: RV_5,031.10c viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāya indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan //
analyzed: viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāyaḥ indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan

original: RV_5,031.11a sūraś cid ratham paritakmyāyām pūrvaṃ karad uparaṃ jūjuvāṃsam /
analyzed: sūraḥ cit ratham paritakmyāyām pūrvam karat uparam jūjuvāṃsam

original: RV_5,031.11c bharac cakram etaśaḥ saṃ riṇāti puro dadhat saniṣyati kratuṃ naḥ //
analyzed: bharat cakram etaśaḥ sam riṇāti puras dadhat saniṣyati kratum naḥ

original: RV_5,031.12a āyaṃ janā abhicakṣe jagāmendraḥ sakhāyaṃ sutasomam icchan /
analyzed: ā ayam janāḥ abhicakṣe jagāma indraḥ sakhāyam suta somam icchan

original: RV_5,031.12c vadan grāvāva vedim bhriyāte yasya jīram adhvaryavaś caranti //
analyzed: vadan grāvā ava vedim bhriyāte yasya jīram adhvaryavaḥ caranti

original: RV_5,031.13a ye cākananta cākananta nū te martā amṛta mo te aṃha āran /
analyzed: ye cākananta cākananta nu te martāḥ amṛta mā u te aṃhaḥ āran

original: RV_5,031.13c vāvandhi yajyūṃr uta teṣu dhehy ojo janeṣu yeṣu te syāma //
analyzed: vāvandhi yajyūṃr uta teṣu dhehi ojaḥ janeṣu yeṣu te syāma

original: RV_5,032.01a adardar utsam asṛjo vi khāni tvam arṇavān badbadhānāṃ aramṇāḥ /
analyzed: adardar utsam asṛjaḥ vi khāni tvam arṇavān badbadhānām aramṇāḥ

original: RV_5,032.01c mahāntam indra parvataṃ vi yad vaḥ sṛjo vi dhārā ava dānavaṃ han //
analyzed: mahāntam indra parvatam vi yat var sṛjaḥ vi dhārāḥ ava dānavam han

original: RV_5,032.02a tvam utsāṃ ṛtubhir badbadhānāṃ araṃha ūdhaḥ parvatasya vajrin /
analyzed: tvam utsām ṛtubhiḥ badbadhānām araṃhaḥ ūdhaḥ parvatasya vajrin

original: RV_5,032.02c ahiṃ cid ugra prayutaṃ śayānaṃ jaghanvāṃ indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ //
analyzed: ahim cit ugra prayutam śayānam jaghanvān indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ

original: RV_5,032.03a tyasya cin mahato nir mṛgasya vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhir indraḥ /
analyzed: tyasya cit mahataḥ niḥ mṛgasya vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhiḥ indraḥ

original: RV_5,032.03c ya eka id apratir manyamāna ād asmād anyo ajaniṣṭa tavyān //
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id apratiḥ manyamānaḥ āt asmāt anyaḥ ajaniṣṭa tavyān

original: RV_5,032.04a tyaṃ cid eṣāṃ svadhayā madantam miho napātaṃ suvṛdhaṃ tamogām /
analyzed: tyam cit eṣām svadhayā madantam mihaḥ napātam suvṛdham tamaḥ gām

original: RV_5,032.04c vṛṣaprabharmā dānavasya bhāmaṃ vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam //
analyzed: vṛṣa prabharmā dānavasya bhāmam vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam

original: RV_5,032.05a tyaṃ cid asya kratubhir niṣattam amarmaṇo vidad id asya marma /
analyzed: tyam cit asya kratubhiḥ niṣattam amarmaṇaḥ vidat id asya marma

original: RV_5,032.05c yad īṃ sukṣatra prabhṛtā madasya yuyutsantaṃ tamasi harmye dhāḥ //
analyzed: yat īm su kṣatra prabhṛtā madasya yuyutsantam tamasi harmye dhāḥ

original: RV_5,032.06a tyaṃ cid itthā katpayaṃ śayānam asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam /
analyzed: tyam cit itthā katpayam śayānam asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam

original: RV_5,032.06c taṃ cin mandāno vṛṣabhaḥ sutasyoccair indro apagūryā jaghāna //
analyzed: tam cit mandānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ sutasya uccais indraḥ apagūrya jaghāna

original: RV_5,032.07a ud yad indro mahate dānavāya vadhar yamiṣṭa saho apratītam /
analyzed: ud yat indraḥ mahate dānavāya vadhar yamiṣṭa sahaḥ apratītam

original: RV_5,032.07c yad īṃ vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha viśvasya jantor adhamaṃ cakāra //
analyzed: yat īm vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha viśvasya jantoḥ adhamam cakāra

original: RV_5,032.08a tyaṃ cid arṇam madhupaṃ śayānam asinvaṃ vavram mahy ādad ugraḥ /
analyzed: tyam cit arṇam madhupam śayānam asinvam vavram mahi ādat ugraḥ

original: RV_5,032.08c apādam atram mahatā vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācam //
analyzed: a pādam atram mahatā vadhena ni duryoṇe āvṛṇak mṛdhra vācam

original: RV_5,032.09a ko asya śuṣmaṃ taviṣīṃ varāta eko dhanā bharate apratītaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ asya śuṣmam taviṣīm varāte ekaḥ dhanā bharate apratītaḥ

original: RV_5,032.09c ime cid asya jrayaso nu devī indrasyaujaso bhiyasā jihāte //
analyzed: ime cit asya jrayasaḥ nu devī indrasya ojasaḥ bhiyasā jihāte

original: RV_5,032.10a ny asmai devī svadhitir jihīta indrāya gātur uśatīva yeme /
analyzed: ni asmai devī svadhitiḥ jihīte indrāya gātuḥ uśatī iva yeme

original: RV_5,032.10c saṃ yad ojo yuvate viśvam ābhir anu svadhāvne kṣitayo namanta //
analyzed: sam yat ojaḥ yuvate viśvam ābhiḥ anu svadhāvne kṣitayaḥ namanta

original: RV_5,032.11a ekaṃ nu tvā satpatim pāñcajanyaṃ jātaṃ śṛṇomi yaśasaṃ janeṣu /
analyzed: ekam nu tvā sat patim pāñcajanyam jātam śṛṇomi yaśasam janeṣu

original: RV_5,032.11c tam me jagṛbhra āśaso naviṣṭhaṃ doṣā vastor havamānāsa indram //
analyzed: tam me jagṛbhre āśasaḥ naviṣṭham doṣā vastoḥ havamānāsaḥ indram

original: RV_5,032.12a evā hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam maghā viprebhyo dadataṃ śṛṇomi /
analyzed: eva hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam maghā viprebhyaḥ dadatam śṛṇomi

original: RV_5,032.12c kiṃ te brahmāṇo gṛhate sakhāyo ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra //
analyzed: kim te brahmāṇaḥ sakhāyaḥ ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra

original: RV_5,033.01a mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṝn indrāyetthā tavase atavyān /
analyzed: mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṝn indrāya itthā tavase a tavyān

original: RV_5,033.01c yo asmai sumatiṃ vājasātau stuto jane samaryaś ciketa //
analyzed: yaḥ asmai sumatim vājasātau stutaḥ jane samaryaḥ ciketa

original: RV_5,033.02a sa tvaṃ na indra dhiyasāno arkair harīṇāṃ vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra dhiyasānaḥ arkaiḥ harīṇām vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ

original: RV_5,033.02c yā itthā maghavann anu joṣaṃ vakṣo abhi prāryaḥ sakṣi janān //
analyzed: yāḥ itthā maghavan anu joṣam vakṣaḥ abhi pra aryaḥ sakṣi janān

original: RV_5,033.03a na te ta indrābhy asmad ṛṣvāyuktāso abrahmatā yad asan /
analyzed: na te te indra abhi asmat ṛṣvāḥ a yuktāsaḥ a brahma tā yat asan

original: RV_5,033.03c tiṣṭhā ratham adhi taṃ vajrahastā raśmiṃ deva yamase svaśvaḥ //
analyzed: tiṣṭha ratham adhi tam vajra hasta ā raśmim deva yamase su aśvaḥ

original: RV_5,033.04a purū yat ta indra santy ukthā gave cakarthorvarāsu yudhyan /
analyzed: purū yat te indra santi ukthā gave cakartha urvarāsu yudhyan

original: RV_5,033.04c tatakṣe sūryāya cid okasi sve vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit //
analyzed: tatakṣe sūryāya cit okasi sve vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit

original: RV_5,033.05a vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca naraḥ śardho jajñānā yātāś ca rathāḥ /
analyzed: vayam te te indra ye ca naraḥ śardhaḥ jajñānāḥ yātāḥ ca rathāḥ

original: RV_5,033.05c āsmāñ jagamyād ahiśuṣma satvā bhago na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ //
analyzed: ā asmām jagamyāt ahi śuṣma satvā bhagaḥ na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ

original: RV_5,033.06a papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hy ojo nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamāno amartaḥ /
analyzed: papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hi ojaḥ nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamānaḥ amartaḥ

original: RV_5,033.06c sa na enīṃ vasavāno rayiṃ dāḥ prārya stuṣe tuvimaghasya dānam //
analyzed: sa naḥ enīm vasavānaḥ rayim dāḥ pra aryaḥ stuṣe tuvi maghasya dānam

original: RV_5,033.07a evā na indrotibhir ava pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn /
analyzed: eva naḥ indra ūtibhiḥ ava pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn

original: RV_5,033.07c uta tvacaṃ dadato vājasātau piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ //
analyzed: uta tvacam dadataḥ vājasātau piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ

original: RV_5,033.08a uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūres trasadasyor hiraṇino rarāṇāḥ /
analyzed: uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūreḥ trasadasyoḥ hiraṇinaḥ rarāṇāḥ

original: RV_5,033.08c vahantu mā daśa śyetāso asya gairikṣitasya kratubhir nu saśce //
analyzed: vahantu mā daśa śyetāsaḥ asya gairikṣitasya kratubhiḥ nu saśce

original: RV_5,033.09a uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ kratvāmaghāso vidathasya rātau /
analyzed: uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ kratvāmaghāsaḥ vidathasya rātau

original: RV_5,033.09c sahasrā me cyavatāno dadāna ānūkam aryo vapuṣe nārcat //
analyzed: sahasrā me cyavatānaḥ dadānaḥ ānūkam aryaḥ vapuṣe nā arcat

original: RV_5,033.10a uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣṭā lakṣmaṇyasya suruco yatānāḥ /
analyzed: uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣṭāḥ lakṣmaṇyasya su rucaḥ yatānāḥ

original: RV_5,033.10c mahnā rāyaḥ saṃvaraṇasya ṛṣer vrajaṃ na gāvaḥ prayatā api gman //
analyzed: mahnā rāyaḥ saṃvaraṇasya ṛṣeḥ vrajam na gāvaḥ prayatāḥ api gman

original: RV_5,034.01a ajātaśatrum ajarā svarvaty anu svadhāmitā dasmam īyate /
analyzed: ajāta śatrum ajarā svarvatī anu svadhā amitā dasmam īyate

original: RV_5,034.01c sunotana pacata brahmavāhase puruṣṭutāya prataraṃ dadhātana //
analyzed: sunotana pacata brahma vāhase puruṣṭutāya prataram dadhātana

original: RV_5,034.02a ā yaḥ somena jaṭharam apipratāmandata maghavā madhvo andhasaḥ /
analyzed: ā yaḥ somena jaṭharam apiprata amandata maghavā madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_5,034.02c yad īm mṛgāya hantave mahāvadhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭim uśanā vadhaṃ yamat //
analyzed: yat īm mṛgāya hantave mahā vadhaḥ sahasra bhṛṣṭim uśanāḥ vadham yamat

original: RV_5,034.03a yo asmai ghraṃsa uta vā ya ūdhani somaṃ sunoti bhavati dyumāṃ aha /
analyzed: yaḥ asmai ghraṃse uta vā yaḥ ūdhani somam sunoti bhavati dyumān aha

original: RV_5,034.03c apāpa śakras tatanuṣṭim ūhati tanūśubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ //
analyzed: apa apa śakraḥ tatanuṣṭim ūhati tanū śubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ

original: RV_5,034.04a yasyāvadhīt pitaraṃ yasya mātaraṃ yasya śakro bhrātaraṃ nāta īṣate /
analyzed: yasya avadhīt pitaram yasya mātaram yasya śakraḥ bhrātaram na atas īṣate

original: RV_5,034.04c vetīd v asya prayatā yataṅkaro na kilbiṣād īṣate vasva ākaraḥ //
analyzed: veti id u asya prayatā yataṅkaraḥ na kilbiṣāt īṣate vasvaḥ ākaraḥ

original: RV_5,034.05a na pañcabhir daśabhir vaṣṭy ārabhaṃ nāsunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana /
analyzed: na pañcabhiḥ daśabhiḥ vaṣṭi ārabham na a sunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana

original: RV_5,034.05c jināti ved amuyā hanti vā dhunir ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje //
analyzed: jināti vā id amuyā hanti vā dhuniḥ ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje

original: RV_5,034.06a vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajo 'sunvato viṣuṇaḥ sunvato vṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajaḥ sunvataḥ viṣuṇaḥ sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ

original: RV_5,034.06c indro viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇo yathāvaśaṃ nayati dāsam āryaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇaḥ yathāvaśam nayati dāsam āryaḥ

original: RV_5,034.07a sam īm paṇer ajati bhojanam muṣe vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaraṃ vasu /
analyzed: sam īm paṇeḥ ajati bhojanam muṣe vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaram vasu

original: RV_5,034.07c durge cana dhriyate viśva ā puru jano yo asya taviṣīm acukrudhat //
analyzed: durge cana dhriyate viśvaḥ ā puru janaḥ yaḥ asya taviṣīm acukrudhat

original: RV_5,034.08a saṃ yaj janau sudhanau viśvaśardhasāv aved indro maghavā goṣu śubhriṣu /
analyzed: sam yat janau su dhanau viśva śardhasau avet indraḥ maghavā goṣu śubhriṣu

original: RV_5,034.08c yujaṃ hy anyam akṛta pravepany ud īṃ gavyaṃ sṛjate satvabhir dhuniḥ //
analyzed: yujam hi anyam akṛta pravepanī ud īm gavyam sṛjate satvabhiḥ dhuniḥ

original: RV_5,034.09a sahasrasām āgniveśiṃ gṛṇīṣe śatrim agna upamāṃ ketum aryaḥ /
analyzed: sahasra sām āgniveśim gṛṇīṣe śatrim agne upamām ketum aryaḥ

original: RV_5,034.09c tasmā āpaḥ saṃyataḥ pīpayanta tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu //
analyzed: tasmai āpaḥ saṃyataḥ pīpayanta tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu

original: RV_5,035.01a yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vasa indra kratuṣ ṭam ā bhara /
analyzed: yaḥ te sādhiṣṭhaḥ vaso indra kratuḥ ṭam ā bhara

original: RV_5,035.01c asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sasniṃ vājeṣu duṣṭaram //
analyzed: asmabhyam carṣaṇī saham sasnim vājeṣu duṣṭaram

original: RV_5,035.02a yad indra te catasro yac chūra santi tisraḥ /
analyzed: yat indra te catasraḥ yat śūra santi tisraḥ

original: RV_5,035.02c yad vā pañca kṣitīnām avas tat su na ā bhara //
analyzed: yat vā pañca kṣitīnām avaḥ tat su naḥ ā bhara

original: RV_5,035.03a ā te 'vo vareṇyaṃ vṛṣantamasya hūmahe /
analyzed: ā te vaḥ vareṇyam vṛṣantamasya hūmahe

original: RV_5,035.03c vṛṣajūtir hi jajñiṣa ābhūbhir indra turvaṇiḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣa jūtiḥ hi jajñiṣe ābhūbhiḥ indra turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_5,035.04a vṛṣā hy asi rādhase jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā hi asi rādhase jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ

original: RV_5,035.04c svakṣatraṃ te dhṛṣan manaḥ satrāham indra pauṃsyam //
analyzed: svakṣatram te dhṛṣat manaḥ satrāham indra pauṃsyam

original: RV_5,035.05a tvaṃ tam indra martyam amitrayantam adrivaḥ /
analyzed: tvam tam indra martyam amitrayantam adrivas

original: RV_5,035.05c sarvarathā śatakrato ni yāhi śavasas pate //
analyzed: sarvarathā śatakrato ni yāhi śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_5,035.06a tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: tvām id vṛtra hantama janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_5,035.06c ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyaṃ havante vājasātaye //
analyzed: ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyam havante vājasātaye

original: RV_5,035.07a asmākam indra duṣṭaram puroyāvānam ājiṣu /
analyzed: asmākam indra duṣṭaram puras yāvānam ājiṣu

original: RV_5,035.07c sayāvānaṃ dhane-dhane vājayantam avā ratham //
analyzed: sa yāvānam dhanedhane vājayantam ava ratham

original: RV_5,035.08a asmākam indrehi no ratham avā purandhyā /
analyzed: asmākam indra ihi naḥ ratham ava purandhyā

original: RV_5,035.08c vayaṃ śaviṣṭha vāryaṃ divi śravo dadhīmahi divi stomam manāmahe //
analyzed: vayam śaviṣṭha vāryam divi śravaḥ dadhīmahi divi stomam manāmahe

original: RV_5,036.01a sa ā gamad indro yo vasūnāṃ ciketad dātuṃ dāmano rayīṇām /
analyzed: saḥ ā gamat indraḥ yaḥ vasūnām ciketat dātum dāmanaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_5,036.01c dhanvacaro na vaṃsagas tṛṣāṇaś cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṃśum //
analyzed: dhanva caraḥ na vaṃsagaḥ tṛṣāṇaḥ cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṃśum

original: RV_5,036.02a ā te hanū harivaḥ śūra śipre ruhat somo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhe /
analyzed: ā te hanū harivas śūra śipre ruhat somaḥ na parvatasya pṛṣṭhe

original: RV_5,036.02c anu tvā rājann arvato na hinvan gīrbhir madema puruhūta viśve //
analyzed: anu tvā rājan arvataḥ na hinvan gīrbhiḥ madema puruhūta viśve

original: RV_5,036.03a cakraṃ na vṛttam puruhūta vepate mano bhiyā me amater id adrivaḥ /
analyzed: cakram na vṛttam puruhūta vepate manaḥ bhiyā me amateḥ id adrivas

original: RV_5,036.03c rathād adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha kuvin nu stoṣan maghavan purūvasuḥ //
analyzed: rathāt adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha kuvid nu stoṣat maghavan purūvasuḥ

original: RV_5,036.04a eṣa grāveva jaritā ta indreyarti vācam bṛhad āśuṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa grāvā iva jaritā te indra iyarti vācam bṛhat āśuṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_5,036.04c pra savyena maghavan yaṃsi rāyaḥ pra dakṣiṇid dharivo mā vi venaḥ //
analyzed: pra savyena maghavan yaṃsi rāyaḥ pra dakṣiṇit harivas mā vi venaḥ

original: RV_5,036.05a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhatu dyaur vṛṣā vṛṣabhyāṃ vahase haribhyām /
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam vardhatu dyauḥ vṛṣā vṛṣabhyām vahase haribhyām

original: RV_5,036.05c sa no vṛṣā vṛṣarathaḥ suśipra vṛṣakrato vṛṣā vajrin bhare dhāḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ vṛṣā vṛṣa rathaḥ su śipra vṛṣa krato vṛṣā vajrin bhare dhāḥ

original: RV_5,036.06a yo rohitau vājinau vājinīvān tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānāv adiṣṭa /
analyzed: yaḥ rohitau vājinau vājinīvān tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānau adiṣṭa

original: RV_5,036.06c yūne sam asmai kṣitayo namantāṃ śrutarathāya maruto duvoyā //
analyzed: yūne sam asmai kṣitayaḥ namantām śruta rathāya marutaḥ duvoyā

original: RV_5,037.01a sam bhānunā yatate sūryasyājuhvāno ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ svañcāḥ /
analyzed: sam bhānunā yatate sūryasya ājuhvānaḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ svañcāḥ

original: RV_5,037.01c tasmā amṛdhrā uṣaso vy ucchān ya indrāya sunavāmety āha //
analyzed: tasmai amṛdhrāḥ uṣasaḥ vi ucchān yaḥ indrāya sunavāma iti āha

original: RV_5,037.02a samiddhāgnir vanavat stīrṇabarhir yuktagrāvā sutasomo jarāte /
analyzed: samiddha agniḥ vanavat stīrṇa barhiḥ yukta grāvā suta somaḥ jarāte

original: RV_5,037.02c grāvāṇo yasyeṣiraṃ vadanty ayad adhvaryur haviṣāva sindhum //
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ yasya iṣiram vadanti ayat adhvaryuḥ haviṣā ava sindhum

original: RV_5,037.03a vadhūr iyam patim icchanty eti ya īṃ vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām /
analyzed: vadhūḥ iyam patim icchantī eti yaḥ īm vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām

original: RV_5,037.03c āsya śravasyād ratha ā ca ghoṣāt purū sahasrā pari vartayāte //
analyzed: ā asya śravasyāt rathaḥ ā ca ghoṣāt purū sahasrā pari vartayāte

original: RV_5,037.04a na sa rājā vyathate yasminn indras tīvraṃ somam pibati gosakhāyam /
analyzed: na sa rājā vyathate yasmin indraḥ tīvram somam pibati go sakhāyam

original: RV_5,037.04c ā satvanair ajati hanti vṛtraṃ kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhago nāma puṣyan //
analyzed: ā satvanaiḥ ajati hanti vṛtram kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhagaḥ nāma puṣyan

original: RV_5,037.05a puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāty ubhe vṛtau saṃyatī saṃ jayāti /
analyzed: puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāti ubhe vṛtau saṃyatī sam jayāti

original: RV_5,037.05c priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāti ya indrāya sutasomo dadāśat //
analyzed: priyaḥ sūrye priyaḥ agnā bhavāti yaḥ indrāya suta somaḥ dadāśat

original: RV_5,038.01a uroṣ ṭa indra rādhaso vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato /
analyzed: uroḥ te indra rādhasaḥ vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato

original: RV_5,038.01c adhā no viśvacarṣaṇe dyumnā sukṣatra maṃhaya //
analyzed: adhā naḥ viśvacarṣaṇe dyumnā su kṣatra maṃhaya

original: RV_5,038.02a yad īm indra śravāyyam iṣaṃ śaviṣṭha dadhiṣe /
analyzed: yat īm indra śravāyyam iṣam śaviṣṭha dadhiṣe

original: RV_5,038.02c paprathe dīrghaśruttamaṃ hiraṇyavarṇa duṣṭaram //
analyzed: paprathe dīrghaśruttamam hiraṇya varṇa duṣṭaram

original: RV_5,038.03a śuṣmāso ye te adrivo mehanā ketasāpaḥ /
analyzed: śuṣmāsaḥ ye te adrivas mehanā ketasāpaḥ

original: RV_5,038.03c ubhā devāv abhiṣṭaye divaś ca gmaś ca rājathaḥ //
analyzed: ubhā devau abhiṣṭaye divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca rājathaḥ

original: RV_5,038.04a uto no asya kasya cid dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan /
analyzed: uta u naḥ asya kasya cit dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan

original: RV_5,038.04c asmabhyaṃ nṛmṇam ā bharāsmabhyaṃ nṛmaṇasyase //
analyzed: asmabhyam nṛmṇam ā bhara asmabhyam nṛmaṇasyase

original: RV_5,038.05a nū ta ābhir abhiṣṭibhis tava śarmañ chatakrato /
analyzed: nu te ābhiḥ abhiṣṭibhiḥ tava śarmam śatakrato

original: RV_5,038.05c indra syāma sugopāḥ śūra syāma sugopāḥ //
analyzed: indra syāma su gopāḥ śūra syāma su gopāḥ

original: RV_5,039.01a yad indra citra mehanāsti tvādātam adrivaḥ /
analyzed: yat indra citra mehanā asti tvādātam adrivas

original: RV_5,039.01c rādhas tan no vidadvasa ubhayāhasty ā bhara //
analyzed: rādhaḥ tat naḥ vidadvaso ubhayāhasti ā bhara

original: RV_5,039.02a yan manyase vareṇyam indra dyukṣaṃ tad ā bhara /
analyzed: yat manyase vareṇyam indra dyukṣam tat ā bhara

original: RV_5,039.02c vidyāma tasya te vayam akūpārasya dāvane //
analyzed: vidyāma tasya te vayam akūpārasya dāvane

original: RV_5,039.03a yat te ditsu prarādhyam mano asti śrutam bṛhat /
analyzed: yat te ditsu prarādhyam manaḥ asti śrutam bṛhat

original: RV_5,039.03c tena dṛḷhā cid adriva ā vājaṃ darṣi sātaye //
analyzed: tena dṛḍhā cit adrivas ā vājam darṣi sātaye

original: RV_5,039.04a maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vo maghonāṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham vaḥ maghonām rājānam carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_5,039.04c indram upa praśastaye pūrvībhir jujuṣe giraḥ //
analyzed: indram upa praśastaye pūrvībhiḥ jujuṣe giraḥ

original: RV_5,039.05a asmā it kāvyaṃ vaca uktham indrāya śaṃsyam /
analyzed: asmai id kāvyam vacaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsyam

original: RV_5,039.05c tasmā u brahmavāhase giro vardhanty atrayo giraḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmai u brahma vāhase giraḥ vardhanti atrayaḥ giraḥ śumbhanti atrayaḥ

original: RV_5,040.01a ā yāhy adribhiḥ sutaṃ somaṃ somapate piba /
analyzed: ā yāhi adribhiḥ sutam somam soma pate piba

original: RV_5,040.01c vṛṣann indra vṛṣabhir vṛtrahantama //
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_5,040.02a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā madaḥ vṛṣā somaḥ ayam sutaḥ

original: RV_5,040.02c vṛṣann indra vṛṣabhir vṛtrahantama //
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_5,040.03a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam huve vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_5,040.03c vṛṣann indra vṛṣabhir vṛtrahantama //
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_5,040.04a ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhas turāṣāṭ chuṣmī rājā vṛtrahā somapāvā /
analyzed: ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ turāṣāh śuṣmī rājā vṛtra hā soma pāvā

original: RV_5,040.04c yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsad arvāṅ mādhyandine savane matsad indraḥ //
analyzed: yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsat arvāṅ mādhyandine savane matsat indraḥ

original: RV_5,040.05a yat tvā sūrya svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ /
analyzed: yat tvā sūrya svarbhānuḥ tamasā vidhyat āsuraḥ

original: RV_5,040.05c akṣetravid yathā mugdho bhuvanāny adīdhayuḥ //
analyzed: a kṣetra vid yathā mugdhaḥ bhuvanāni adīdhayuḥ

original: RV_5,040.06a svarbhānor adha yad indra māyā avo divo vartamānā avāhan /
analyzed: svarbhānoḥ adha yat indra māyāḥ avas divaḥ vartamānāḥ avāhan

original: RV_5,040.06c gūḷhaṃ sūryaṃ tamasāpavratena turīyeṇa brahmaṇāvindad atriḥ //
analyzed: gūḍham sūryam tamasā apavratena turīyeṇa brahmaṇā avindat atriḥ

original: RV_5,040.07a mā mām imaṃ tava santam atra irasyā drugdho bhiyasā ni gārīt /
analyzed: mā mām imam tava santam atra irasyā drugdhaḥ bhiyasā ni gārīt

original: RV_5,040.07c tvam mitro asi satyarādhās tau mehāvataṃ varuṇaś ca rājā //
analyzed: tvam mitraḥ asi satya rādhāḥ tau mā iha āvatam varuṇaḥ ca rājā

original: RV_5,040.08a grāvṇo brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan kīriṇā devān namasopaśikṣan /
analyzed: grāvṇaḥ brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan kīriṇā devān namasā upaśikṣan

original: RV_5,040.08c atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣur ādhāt svarbhānor apa māyā aghukṣat //
analyzed: atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣuḥ ādhāt svarbhānoḥ apa māyāḥ aghukṣat

original: RV_5,040.09a yaṃ vai sūryaṃ svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ /
analyzed: yam vai sūryam svarbhānuḥ tamasā vidhyat āsuraḥ

original: RV_5,040.09c atrayas tam anv avindan nahy anye aśaknuvan //
analyzed: atrayaḥ tam anu avindan nahi anye aśaknuvan

original: RV_5,041.01a ko nu vām mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāyan divo vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de /
analyzed: kaḥ nu vām mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāyan divaḥ vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de

original: RV_5,041.01c ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthāṃ no yajñāyate vā paśuṣo na vājān //
analyzed: ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthām naḥ yajñāyate vā paśu sas na vājān

original: RV_5,041.02a te no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā maruto juṣanta /
analyzed: te naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā āyuḥ indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ marutaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_5,041.02c namobhir vā ye dadhate suvṛktiṃ stomaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: namobhiḥ vā ye dadhate suvṛktim stomam rudrāya mīḍhuṣe sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_5,041.03a ā vāṃ yeṣṭhāśvinā huvadhyai vātasya patman rathyasya puṣṭau /
analyzed: ā vām yeṣṭha aśvinā huvadhyai vātasya patman rathyasya puṣṭau

original: RV_5,041.03c uta vā divo asurāya manma prāndhāṃsīva yajyave bharadhvam //
analyzed: uta vā divaḥ asurāya manma pra andhāṃsi iva yajyave bharadhvam

original: RV_5,041.04a pra sakṣaṇo divyaḥ kaṇvahotā trito divaḥ sajoṣā vāto agniḥ /
analyzed: pra sakṣaṇaḥ divyaḥ kaṇva hotā tritaḥ divaḥ sajoṣāḥ vātaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_5,041.04c pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśvabhojā ājiṃ na jagmur āśvaśvatamāḥ //
analyzed: pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśva bhojāḥ ājim na jagmuḥ āśvaśvatamāḥ

original: RV_5,041.05a pra vo rayiṃ yuktāśvam bharadhvaṃ rāya eṣe 'vase dadhīta dhīḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ rayim yukta aśvam bharadhvam rāyaḥ eṣe vase dadhīta dhīḥ

original: RV_5,041.05c suśeva evair auśijasya hotā ye va evā marutas turāṇām //
analyzed: su śevaḥ evaiḥ auśijasya hotā ye vaḥ evā marutaḥ turāṇām

original: RV_5,041.06a pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujaṃ kṛṇudhvam pra devaṃ vipram panitāram arkaiḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ vāyum ratha yujam kṛṇudhvam pra devam vipram panitāram arkaiḥ

original: RV_5,041.06c iṣudhyava ṛtasāpaḥ purandhīr vasvīr no atra patnīr ā dhiye dhuḥ //
analyzed: iṣudhyavaḥ ṛtasāpaḥ purandhīḥ vasvīḥ naḥ atra patnīḥ ā dhiye dhuḥ

original: RV_5,041.07a upa va eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ pra yahvī divaś citayadbhir arkaiḥ /
analyzed: upa vaḥ eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ pra yahvī divaḥ citayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_5,041.07c uṣāsānaktā viduṣīva viśvam ā hā vahato martyāya yajñam //
analyzed: uṣāsānaktā viduṣī iva viśvam ā hā vahataḥ martyāya yajñam

original: RV_5,041.08a abhi vo arce poṣyāvato nṝn vāstoṣ patiṃ tvaṣṭāraṃ rarāṇaḥ /
analyzed: abhi vaḥ arce poṣyāvataḥ nṝn vāstoḥ patim tvaṣṭāram rarāṇaḥ

original: RV_5,041.08c dhanyā sajoṣā dhiṣaṇā namobhir vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāya eṣe //
analyzed: dhanyā sajoṣāḥ dhiṣaṇā namobhiḥ vanaspatīṃr oṣadhīḥ rāyaḥ eṣe

original: RV_5,041.09a tuje nas tane parvatāḥ santu svaitavo ye vasavo na vīrāḥ /
analyzed: tuje naḥ tane parvatāḥ santu svaitavaḥ ye vasavaḥ na vīrāḥ

original: RV_5,041.09c panita āptyo yajataḥ sadā no vardhān naḥ śaṃsaṃ naryo abhiṣṭau //
analyzed: panitaḥ āptyaḥ yajataḥ sadā naḥ vardhāt naḥ śaṃsam naryaḥ abhiṣṭau

original: RV_5,041.10a vṛṣṇo astoṣi bhūmyasya garbhaṃ trito napātam apāṃ suvṛkti /
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ astoṣi bhūmyasya garbham tritaḥ napātam apām suvṛkti

original: RV_5,041.10c gṛṇīte agnir etarī na śūṣaiḥ śociṣkeśo ni riṇāti vanā //
analyzed: gṛṇīte agniḥ etarī na śūṣaiḥ śociṣkeśaḥ ni riṇāti vanā

original: RV_5,041.11a kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma kad rāye cikituṣe bhagāya /
analyzed: kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma kad rāye cikituṣe bhagāya

original: RV_5,041.11c āpa oṣadhīr uta no 'vantu dyaur vanā girayo vṛkṣakeśāḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta naḥ vantu dyauḥ vanā girayaḥ vṛkṣa keśāḥ

original: RV_5,041.12a śṛṇotu na ūrjām patir giraḥ sa nabhas tarīyāṃ iṣiraḥ parijmā /
analyzed: śṛṇotu naḥ ūrjām patiḥ giraḥ sa nabhaḥ tarīyān iṣiraḥ parijmā

original: RV_5,041.12c śṛṇvantv āpaḥ puro na śubhrāḥ pari sruco babṛhāṇasyādreḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇvantu āpaḥ puras na śubhrāḥ pari srucaḥ babṛhāṇasya adreḥ

original: RV_5,041.13a vidā cin nu mahānto ye va evā bravāma dasmā vāryaṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: vidā cit nu mahāntaḥ ye vaḥ evāḥ bravāma dasmāḥ vāryam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_5,041.13c vayaś cana subhva āva yanti kṣubhā martam anuyataṃ vadhasnaiḥ //
analyzed: vayaḥ cana su bhvaḥ āva yanti kṣubhā martam anuyatam vadhasnaiḥ

original: RV_5,041.14a ā daivyāni pārthivāni janmāpaś cācchā sumakhāya vocam /
analyzed: ā daivyāni pārthivāni janmā apaḥ ca acchā su makhāya vocam

original: RV_5,041.14c vardhantāṃ dyāvo giraś candrāgrā udā vardhantām abhiṣātā arṇāḥ //
analyzed: vardhantām dyāvaḥ giraḥ candra agrāḥ udāḥ vardhantām abhiṣātāḥ arṇāḥ

original: RV_5,041.15a pade-pade me jarimā ni dhāyi varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiś ca /
analyzed: pade pade me jarimā ni dhāyi varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiḥ ca

original: RV_5,041.15c siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ smat sūribhir ṛjuhasta ṛjuvaniḥ //
analyzed: siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ smat sūribhiḥ ṛju hastaḥ ṛju vaniḥ

original: RV_5,041.16a kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn evayā maruto acchoktau praśravaso maruto acchoktau /
analyzed: kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn eva yāḥ marutaḥ acchoktau praśravasaḥ marutaḥ acchoktau

original: RV_5,041.16c mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhād asmākam bhūd upamātivaniḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ riṣe dhāt asmākam bhūt upamāti vaniḥ

original: RV_5,041.17a iti cin nu prajāyai paśumatyai devāso vanate martyo va ā devāso vanate martyo vaḥ /
analyzed: iti cit nu prajāyai paśumatyai devāsaḥ vanate martyaḥ vaḥ ā devāsaḥ vanate martyaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_5,041.17c atrā śivāṃ tanvo dhāsim asyā jarāṃ cin me nirṛtir jagrasīta //
analyzed: atrā śivām tanvaḥ dhāsim asyāḥ jarām cit me nirṛtiḥ jagrasīta

original: RV_5,041.18a tāṃ vo devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ /
analyzed: tām vaḥ devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ

original: RV_5,041.18c sā naḥ sudānur mṛḷayantī devī prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ //
analyzed: sā naḥ sudānuḥ mṛḍayantī devī prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ

original: RV_5,041.19a abhi na iḷā yūthasya mātā sman nadībhir urvaśī vā gṛṇātu /
analyzed: abhi naḥ iḷā yūthasya mātā smat nadībhiḥ urvaśī vā gṛṇātu

original: RV_5,041.19c urvaśī vā bṛhaddivā gṛṇānābhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasyāyoḥ //
analyzed: urvaśī vā bṛhat divā gṛṇānā abhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasya āyoḥ

original: RV_5,041.20a siṣaktu na ūrjavyasya puṣṭeḥ //
analyzed: siṣaktu naḥ ūrjavyasya puṣṭeḥ

original: RV_5,042.01a pra śantamā varuṇaṃ dīdhitī gīr mitram bhagam aditiṃ nūnam aśyāḥ /
analyzed: pra śantamā varuṇam dīdhitī gīḥ mitram bhagam aditim nūnam aśyāḥ

original: RV_5,042.01c pṛṣadyoniḥ pañcahotā śṛṇotv atūrtapanthā asuro mayobhuḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣat yoniḥ pañca hotā śṛṇotu a tūrta panthāḥ asuraḥ mayobhuḥ

original: RV_5,042.02a prati me stomam aditir jagṛbhyāt sūnuṃ na mātā hṛdyaṃ suśevam /
analyzed: prati me stomam aditiḥ jagṛbhyāt sūnum na mātā hṛdyam su śevam

original: RV_5,042.02c brahma priyaṃ devahitaṃ yad asty aham mitre varuṇe yan mayobhu //
analyzed: brahma priyam deva hitam yat asti aham mitre varuṇe yat mayobhu

original: RV_5,042.03a ud īraya kavitamaṃ kavīnām unattainam abhi madhvā ghṛtena /
analyzed: ud īraya kavitamam kavīnām unatta enam abhi madhvā ghṛtena

original: RV_5,042.03c sa no vasūni prayatā hitāni candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti //
analyzed: sa naḥ vasūni prayatā hitāni candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti

original: RV_5,042.04a sam indra ṇo manasā neṣi gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivaḥ saṃ svasti /
analyzed: sam indra naḥ manasā neṣi gobhiḥ sam sūribhiḥ harivas sam svasti

original: RV_5,042.04c sam brahmaṇā devahitaṃ yad asti saṃ devānāṃ sumatyā yajñiyānām //
analyzed: sam brahmaṇā deva hitam yat asti sam devānām sumatyā yajñiyānām

original: RV_5,042.05a devo bhagaḥ savitā rāyo aṃśa indro vṛtrasya saṃjito dhanānām /
analyzed: devaḥ bhagaḥ savitā rāyaḥ aṃśaḥ indraḥ vṛtrasya saṃjitaḥ dhanānām

original: RV_5,042.05c ṛbhukṣā vāja uta vā purandhir avantu no amṛtāsas turāsaḥ //
analyzed: ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ uta vā purandhiḥ avantu naḥ amṛtāsaḥ turāsaḥ

original: RV_5,042.06a marutvato apratītasya jiṣṇor ajūryataḥ pra bravāmā kṛtāni /
analyzed: marutvataḥ apratītasya jiṣṇoḥ a jūryataḥ pra bravāma kṛtāni

original: RV_5,042.06c na te pūrve maghavan nāparāso na vīryaṃ nūtanaḥ kaś canāpa //
analyzed: na te pūrve maghavan na aparāsaḥ na vīryam nūtanaḥ kaḥ cana āpa

original: RV_5,042.07a upa stuhi prathamaṃ ratnadheyam bṛhaspatiṃ sanitāraṃ dhanānām /
analyzed: upa stuhi prathamam ratna dheyam bṛhaspatim sanitāram dhanānām

original: RV_5,042.07c yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhaḥ purūvasur āgamaj johuvānam //
analyzed: yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhaḥ purūvasuḥ āgamat johuvānam

original: RV_5,042.08a tavotibhiḥ sacamānā ariṣṭā bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ suvīrāḥ /
analyzed: tava ūtibhiḥ sacamānāḥ ariṣṭāḥ bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_5,042.08c ye aśvadā uta vā santi godā ye vastradāḥ subhagās teṣu rāyaḥ //
analyzed: ye aśva dāḥ uta vā santi go dāḥ ye vastra dāḥ subhagāḥ teṣu rāyaḥ

original: RV_5,042.09a visarmāṇaṃ kṛṇuhi vittam eṣāṃ ye bhuñjate apṛṇanto na ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: visarmāṇam kṛṇuhi vittam eṣām ye bhuñjate apṛṇantaḥ naḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_5,042.09c apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān brahmadviṣaḥ sūryād yāvayasva //
analyzed: apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān brahma dviṣaḥ sūryāt yāvayasva

original: RV_5,042.10a ya ohate rakṣaso devavītāv acakrebhis tam maruto ni yāta /
analyzed: yaḥ ohate rakṣasaḥ deva vītau acakrebhiḥ tam marutaḥ ni yāta

original: RV_5,042.10c yo vaḥ śamīṃ śaśamānasya nindāt tucchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śamīm śaśamānasya nindāt tucchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ

original: RV_5,042.11a tam u ṣṭuhi yaḥ sviṣuḥ sudhanvā yo viśvasya kṣayati bheṣajasya /
analyzed: tam u stuhi yaḥ su iṣuḥ su dhanvā yaḥ viśvasya kṣayati bheṣajasya

original: RV_5,042.11c yakṣvā mahe saumanasāya rudraṃ namobhir devam asuraṃ duvasya //
analyzed: yakṣva mahe saumanasāya rudram namobhiḥ devam asuram duvasya

original: RV_5,042.12a damūnaso apaso ye suhastā vṛṣṇaḥ patnīr nadyo vibhvataṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: damūnasaḥ apasaḥ ye su hastāḥ vṛṣṇaḥ patnīḥ nadyaḥ vibhva taṣṭāḥ

original: RV_5,042.12c sarasvatī bṛhaddivota rākā daśasyantīr varivasyantu śubhrāḥ //
analyzed: sarasvatī bṛhat divā uta rākā daśasyantīḥ varivasyantu śubhrāḥ

original: RV_5,042.13a pra sū mahe suśaraṇāya medhāṃ giram bhare navyasīṃ jāyamānām /
analyzed: pra su mahe su śaraṇāya medhām giram bhare navyasīm jāyamānām

original: RV_5,042.13c ya āhanā duhitur vakṣaṇāsu rūpā mināno akṛṇod idaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ āhanāḥ duhituḥ vakṣaṇāsu rūpā minānaḥ akṛṇot idam naḥ

original: RV_5,042.14a pra suṣṭuti stanayantaṃ ruvantam iḷas patiṃ jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ /
analyzed: pra suṣṭuti stanayantam ruvantam iḷaḥ patim jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ

original: RV_5,042.14c yo abdimāṃ udanimāṃ iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ abdimān udanimān iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_5,042.15a eṣa stomo mārutaṃ śardho acchā rudrasya sūnūṃr yuvanyūṃr ud aśyāḥ /
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ mārutam śardhaḥ acchā rudrasya sūnūn yuvanyūn ud aśyāḥ

original: RV_5,042.15c kāmo rāye havate mā svasty upa stuhi pṛṣadaśvāṃ ayāsaḥ //
analyzed: kāmaḥ rāye havate mā svasti upa stuhi pṛṣat aśvān ayāsaḥ

original: RV_5,042.16a praiṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāye aśyāḥ /
analyzed: pra eṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣam vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ rāye aśyāḥ

original: RV_5,042.16c devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt //
analyzed: devodevaḥ su havaḥ bhūtu mahyam mā naḥ mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt

original: RV_5,042.17a urau devā anibādhe syāma //
analyzed: urau devāḥ anibādhe syāma

original: RV_5,042.18a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_5,042.18c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_5,043.01a ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇyarthā amardhantīr upa no yantu madhvā /
analyzed: ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇi arthāḥ a mardhantīḥ upa naḥ yantu madhvā

original: RV_5,043.01c maho rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipro mayobhuvo jaritā johavīti //
analyzed: mahaḥ rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipraḥ mayobhuvaḥ jaritā johavīti

original: RV_5,043.02a ā suṣṭutī namasā vartayadhyai dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre /
analyzed: ā suṣṭutī namasā vartayadhyai dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre

original: RV_5,043.02c pitā mātā madhuvacāḥ suhastā bhare-bhare no yaśasāv aviṣṭām //
analyzed: pitā mātā madhu vacāḥ su hastā bharebhare naḥ yaśasau aviṣṭām

original: RV_5,043.03a adhvaryavaś cakṛvāṃso madhūni pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ cakṛvāṃsaḥ madhūni pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram

original: RV_5,043.03c hoteva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhy asya deva madhvo rarimā te madāya //
analyzed: hotā iva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhi asya deva madhvaḥ rarimā te madāya

original: RV_5,043.04a daśa kṣipo yuñjate bāhū adriṃ somasya yā śamitārā suhastā /
analyzed: daśa kṣipaḥ yuñjate bāhū adrim somasya yā śamitārā su hastā

original: RV_5,043.04c madhvo rasaṃ sugabhastir giriṣṭhāṃ caniścadad duduhe śukram aṃśuḥ //
analyzed: madhvaḥ rasam su gabhastiḥ giriṣṭhām caniścadat duduhe śukram aṃśuḥ

original: RV_5,043.05a asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya /
analyzed: asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya

original: RV_5,043.05c harī rathe sudhurā yoge arvāg indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ //
analyzed: harī rathe su dhurā yoge arvāk indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_5,043.06a ā no mahīm aramatiṃ sajoṣā gnāṃ devīṃ namasā rātahavyām /
analyzed: ā naḥ mahīm aramatim sajoṣāḥ gnām devīm namasā rāta havyām

original: RV_5,043.06c madhor madāya bṛhatīm ṛtajñām āgne vaha pathibhir devayānaiḥ //
analyzed: madhoḥ madāya bṛhatīm ṛta jñām ā agne vaha pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: RV_5,043.07a añjanti yam prathayanto na viprā vapāvantaṃ nāgninā tapantaḥ /
analyzed: añjanti yam prathayantaḥ na viprāḥ vapāvantam na agninā tapantaḥ

original: RV_5,043.07c pitur na putra upasi preṣṭha ā gharmo agnim ṛtayann asādi //
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ upasi preṣṭhaḥ ā gharmaḥ agnim ṛtayan asādi

original: RV_5,043.08a acchā mahī bṛhatī śantamā gīr dūto na gantv aśvinā huvadhyai /
analyzed: acchā mahī bṛhatī śantamā gīḥ dūtaḥ na gantu aśvinā huvadhyai

original: RV_5,043.08c mayobhuvā sarathā yātam arvāg gantaṃ nidhiṃ dhuram āṇir na nābhim //
analyzed: mayobhuvā sa rathā yātam arvāk gantam nidhim dhuram āṇiḥ na nābhim

original: RV_5,043.09a pra tavyaso namauktiṃ turasyāham pūṣṇa uta vāyor adikṣi /
analyzed: pra tavyasaḥ namauktim turasya aham pūṣṇaḥ uta vāyoḥ adikṣi

original: RV_5,043.09c yā rādhasā coditārā matīnāṃ yā vājasya draviṇodā uta tman //
analyzed: yā rādhasā coditārā matīnām yā vājasya draviṇaḥ dā uta tman

original: RV_5,043.10a ā nāmabhir maruto vakṣi viśvān ā rūpebhir jātavedo huvānaḥ /
analyzed: ā nāmabhiḥ marutaḥ vakṣi viśvān ā rūpebhiḥ jātavedaḥ huvānaḥ

original: RV_5,043.10c yajñaṃ giro jarituḥ suṣṭutiṃ ca viśve ganta maruto viśva ūtī //
analyzed: yajñam giraḥ jarituḥ suṣṭutim ca viśve ganta marutaḥ viśve ūtī

original: RV_5,043.11a ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ā sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam /
analyzed: ā naḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ parvatāt ā sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam

original: RV_5,043.11c havaṃ devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī śagmāṃ no vācam uśatī śṛṇotu //
analyzed: havam devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī śagmām naḥ vācam uśatī śṛṇotu

original: RV_5,043.12a ā vedhasaṃ nīlapṛṣṭham bṛhantam bṛhaspatiṃ sadane sādayadhvam /
analyzed: ā vedhasam nīla pṛṣṭham bṛhantam bṛhaspatim sadane sādayadhvam

original: RV_5,043.12c sādadyoniṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsaṃ hiraṇyavarṇam aruṣaṃ sapema //
analyzed: sādadyonim dame ā dīdivāṃsam hiraṇya varṇam aruṣam sapema

original: RV_5,043.13a ā dharṇasir bṛhaddivo rarāṇo viśvebhir gantv omabhir huvānaḥ /
analyzed: ā dharṇasiḥ bṛhat divaḥ rarāṇaḥ viśvebhiḥ gantu omabhiḥ huvānaḥ

original: RV_5,043.13c gnā vasāna oṣadhīr amṛdhras tridhātuśṛṅgo vṛṣabho vayodhāḥ //
analyzed: gnāḥ vasānaḥ oṣadhīḥ amṛdhraḥ tri dhātu śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vayodhāḥ

original: RV_5,043.14a mātuṣ pade parame śukra āyor vipanyavo rāspirāso agman /
analyzed: mātuṣ pade parame śukre āyoḥ vipanyavaḥ rāspirāsaḥ agman

original: RV_5,043.14c suśevyaṃ namasā rātahavyāḥ śiśum mṛjanty āyavo na vāse //
analyzed: su śevyam namasā rāta havyāḥ śiśum mṛjanti āyavaḥ na vāse

original: RV_5,043.15a bṛhad vayo bṛhate tubhyam agne dhiyājuro mithunāsaḥ sacanta /
analyzed: bṛhat vayaḥ bṛhate tubhyam agne dhiyā juraḥ mithunāsaḥ sacanta

original: RV_5,043.15c devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt //
analyzed: devodevaḥ su havaḥ bhūtu mahyam mā naḥ mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt

original: RV_5,043.16a urau devā anibādhe syāma //
analyzed: urau devāḥ anibādhe syāma

original: RV_5,043.17a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_5,043.17c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_5,044.01a tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathemathā jyeṣṭhatātim barhiṣadaṃ svarvidam /
analyzed: tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathā imathā jyeṣṭhatātim barhiṣadam svar vidam

original: RV_5,044.01c pratīcīnaṃ vṛjanaṃ dohase girāśuṃ jayantam anu yāsu vardhase //
analyzed: pratīcīnam vṛjanam dohase girā āśum jayantam anu yāsu vardhase

original: RV_5,044.02a śriye sudṛśīr uparasya yāḥ svar virocamānaḥ kakubhām acodate /
analyzed: śriye su dṛśīḥ uparasya yāḥ svar virocamānaḥ kakubhām a codate

original: RV_5,044.02c sugopā asi na dabhāya sukrato paro māyābhir ṛta āsa nāma te //
analyzed: su gopāḥ asi na dabhāya sukrato paras māyābhiḥ ṛte āsa nāma te

original: RV_5,044.03a atyaṃ haviḥ sacate sac ca dhātu cāriṣṭagātuḥ sa hotā sahobhariḥ /
analyzed: atyam haviḥ sacate sat ca dhātu ca ariṣṭa gātuḥ sa hotā sahaḥ bhariḥ

original: RV_5,044.03c prasarsrāṇo anu barhir vṛṣā śiśur madhye yuvājaro visruhā hitaḥ //
analyzed: prasarsrāṇaḥ anu barhiḥ vṛṣā śiśuḥ madhye yuvā ajaraḥ visruhā hitaḥ

original: RV_5,044.04a pra va ete suyujo yāmann iṣṭaye nīcīr amuṣmai yamya ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ ete su yujaḥ yāman iṣṭaye nīcīḥ amuṣmai yamyaḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_5,044.04c suyantubhiḥ sarvaśāsair abhīśubhiḥ krivir nāmāni pravaṇe muṣāyati //
analyzed: suyantubhiḥ sarva śāsaiḥ abhīśubhiḥ kriviḥ nāmāni pravaṇe muṣāyati

original: RV_5,044.05a saṃjarbhurāṇas tarubhiḥ sutegṛbhaṃ vayākinaṃ cittagarbhāsu susvaruḥ /
analyzed: saṃjarbhurāṇaḥ tarubhiḥ sutegṛbham vayākinam citta garbhāsu susvaruḥ

original: RV_5,044.05c dhāravākeṣv ṛjugātha śobhase vardhasva patnīr abhi jīvo adhvare //
analyzed: dhāravākeṣu ṛju gātha śobhase vardhasva patnīḥ abhi jīvaḥ adhvare

original: RV_5,044.06a yādṛg eva dadṛśe tādṛg ucyate saṃ chāyayā dadhire sidhrayāpsv ā /
analyzed: yādṛś eva dadṛśe tādṛś ucyate sam chāyayā dadhire sidhrayā apsu ā

original: RV_5,044.06c mahīm asmabhyam uruṣām uru jrayo bṛhat suvīram anapacyutaṃ sahaḥ //
analyzed: mahīm asmabhyam uru sām uru jrayaḥ bṛhat su vīram an apacyutam sahaḥ

original: RV_5,044.07a vety agrur janivān vā ati spṛdhaḥ samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ kaviḥ /
analyzed: veti agruḥ janivān vai ati spṛdhaḥ samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_5,044.07c ghraṃsaṃ rakṣantam pari viśvato gayam asmākaṃ śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ //
analyzed: ghraṃsam rakṣantam pari viśvatas gayam asmākam śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ

original: RV_5,044.08a jyāyāṃsam asya yatunasya ketuna ṛṣisvaraṃ carati yāsu nāma te /
analyzed: jyāyāṃsam asya yatunasya ketuna ṛṣi svaram carati yāsu nāma te

original: RV_5,044.08c yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidad ya u svayaṃ vahate so araṃ karat //
analyzed: yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidat yaḥ u svayam vahate saḥ aram karat

original: RV_5,044.09a samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā na riṣyati savanaṃ yasminn āyatā /
analyzed: samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā na riṣyati savanam yasmin āyatā

original: RV_5,044.09c atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate yatrā matir vidyate pūtabandhanī //
analyzed: atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate yatrā matiḥ vidyate pūta bandhanī

original: RV_5,044.10a sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhir evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ /
analyzed: sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhiḥ evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ

original: RV_5,044.10c avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ śaviṣṭhaṃ vājaṃ viduṣā cid ardhyam //
analyzed: avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ śaviṣṭham vājam viduṣā cit ardhyam

original: RV_5,044.11a śyena āsām aditiḥ kakṣyo mado viśvavārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ /
analyzed: śyenaḥ āsām aditiḥ kakṣyaḥ madaḥ viśva vārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ

original: RV_5,044.11c sam anyam-anyam arthayanty etave vidur viṣāṇam paripānam anti te //
analyzed: sam anyam anyam arthayanti etave viduḥ viṣāṇam paripānam anti te

original: RV_5,044.12a sadāpṛṇo yajato vi dviṣo vadhīd bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavit taryo vaḥ sacā /
analyzed: sadāpṛṇaḥ yajataḥ vi dviṣaḥ vadhīt bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavid taryaḥ vaḥ sacā

original: RV_5,044.12c ubhā sa varā praty eti bhāti ca yad īṃ gaṇam bhajate suprayāvabhiḥ //
analyzed: ubhā sa varā prati eti bhāti ca yat īm gaṇam bhajate su prayāvabhiḥ

original: RV_5,044.13a sutambharo yajamānasya satpatir viśvāsām ūdhaḥ sa dhiyām udañcanaḥ /
analyzed: sutambharaḥ yajamānasya sat patiḥ viśvāsām ūdhaḥ sa dhiyām

original: RV_5,044.13c bharad dhenū rasavac chiśriye payo 'nubruvāṇo adhy eti na svapan //
analyzed: bharat dhenuḥ rasavat śiśriye payaḥ nubruvāṇaḥ adhi eti na svapan

original: RV_5,044.14a yo jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante yo jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti /
analyzed: yaḥ jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante yaḥ jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti

original: RV_5,044.14c yo jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ jāgāra tam ayam somaḥ āha tava aham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ

original: RV_5,044.15a agnir jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante 'gnir jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti /
analyzed: agniḥ jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante gniḥ jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti

original: RV_5,044.15c agnir jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ jāgāra tam ayam somaḥ āha tava aham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ

original: RV_5,045.01a vidā divo viṣyann adrim ukthair āyatyā uṣaso arcino guḥ /
analyzed: vidā divaḥ viṣyan adrim ukthaiḥ āyatyāḥ uṣasaḥ arcinaḥ guḥ

original: RV_5,045.01c apāvṛta vrajinīr ut svar gād vi duro mānuṣīr deva āvaḥ //
analyzed: apāvṛta vrajinīḥ ud svar gāt vi duraḥ mānuṣīḥ devaḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_5,045.02a vi sūryo amatiṃ na śriyaṃ sād orvād gavām mātā jānatī gāt /
analyzed: vi sūryaḥ amatim na śriyam sāt ā ūrvāt gavām mātā jānatī gāt

original: RV_5,045.02c dhanvarṇaso nadyaḥ khādoarṇā sthūṇeva sumitā dṛṃhata dyauḥ //
analyzed: dhanu arṇasaḥ nadyaḥ khādoarṇā sthūṇā iva su mitā dṛṃhata dyauḥ

original: RV_5,045.03a asmā ukthāya parvatasya garbho mahīnāṃ januṣe pūrvyāya /
analyzed: asmai ukthāya parvatasya garbhaḥ mahīnām januṣe pūrvyāya

original: RV_5,045.03c vi parvato jihīta sādhata dyaur āvivāsanto dasayanta bhūma //
analyzed: vi parvataḥ jihīta sādhata dyauḥ āvivāsantaḥ dasayanta bhūma

original: RV_5,045.04a sūktebhir vo vacobhir devajuṣṭair indrā nv agnī avase huvadhyai /
analyzed: sūktebhiḥ vaḥ vacobhiḥ deva juṣṭaiḥ indrā nu agnī avase huvadhyai

original: RV_5,045.04c ukthebhir hi ṣmā kavayaḥ suyajñā āvivāsanto maruto yajanti //
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ hi sma kavayaḥ su yajñāḥ āvivāsantaḥ marutaḥ yajanti

original: RV_5,045.05a eto nv adya sudhyo bhavāma pra ducchunā minavāmā varīyaḥ /
analyzed: nu adya sudhyaḥ bhavāma pra ducchunāḥ minavāma varīyaḥ

original: RV_5,045.05c āre dveṣāṃsi sanutar dadhāmāyāma prāñco yajamānam accha //
analyzed: āre dveṣāṃsi sanutar dadhāma āyāma prāñcaḥ yajamānam accha

original: RV_5,045.06a etā dhiyaṃ kṛṇavāmā sakhāyo 'pa yā mātāṃ ṛṇuta vrajaṃ goḥ /
analyzed: etā dhiyam kṛṇavāmā sakhāyo pa yā mātā ṛṇuta vrajam goḥ

original: RV_5,045.06c yayā manur viśiśipraṃ jigāya yayā vaṇig vaṅkur āpā purīṣam //
analyzed: yayā manuḥ viśiśipram jigāya yayā vaṇij vaṅkuḥ āpa purīṣam

original: RV_5,045.07a anūnod atra hastayato adrir ārcan yena daśa māso navagvāḥ /
analyzed: anūnot atra hasta yataḥ adriḥ ārcan yena daśa māsaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_5,045.07c ṛtaṃ yatī saramā gā avindad viśvāni satyāṅgirāś cakāra //
analyzed: ṛtam yatī saramā gāḥ avindat viśvāni satyā aṅgirāḥ cakāra

original: RV_5,045.08a viśve asyā vyuṣi māhināyāḥ saṃ yad gobhir aṅgiraso navanta /
analyzed: viśve asyāḥ vyuṣi māhināyāḥ sam yat gobhiḥ aṅgirasaḥ navanta

original: RV_5,045.08c utsa āsām parame sadhastha ṛtasya pathā saramā vidad gāḥ //
analyzed: utsaḥ āsām parame sadhasthe ṛtasya pathā saramā vidat gāḥ

original: RV_5,045.09a ā sūryo yātu saptāśvaḥ kṣetraṃ yad asyorviyā dīrghayāthe /
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ yātu sapta aśvaḥ kṣetram yat asya urviyā dīrgha yāthe

original: RV_5,045.09c raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayad andho acchā yuvā kavir dīdayad goṣu gacchan //
analyzed: raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayat andhaḥ acchā yuvā kaviḥ dīdayat goṣu gacchan

original: RV_5,045.10a ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇo 'yukta yad dharito vītapṛṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ aruhat śukram arṇaḥ yukta yat haritaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_5,045.10c udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrā āśṛṇvatīr āpo arvāg atiṣṭhan //
analyzed: udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrāḥ āśṛṇvatīḥ āpaḥ arvāk atiṣṭhan

original: RV_5,045.11a dhiyaṃ vo apsu dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ yayātaran daśa māso navagvāḥ /
analyzed: dhiyam vaḥ apsu dadhiṣe svarṣām yayā ataran daśa māsaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_5,045.11c ayā dhiyā syāma devagopā ayā dhiyā tuturyāmāty aṃhaḥ //
analyzed: ayā dhiyā syāma deva gopāḥ ayā dhiyā tuturyāma ati aṃhaḥ

original: RV_5,046.01a hayo na vidvāṃ ayuji svayaṃ dhuri tāṃ vahāmi prataraṇīm avasyuvam /
analyzed: hayaḥ na vidvān ayuji svayam dhuri tām vahāmi prataraṇīm avasyuvam

original: RV_5,046.01c nāsyā vaśmi vimucaṃ nāvṛtam punar vidvān pathaḥ puraeta ṛju neṣati //
analyzed: na asyāḥ vaśmi vimucam na āvṛtam punar vidvān pathaḥ puraetā ṛju neṣati

original: RV_5,046.02a agna indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta mārutota viṣṇo /
analyzed: agne indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta māruta uta viṣṇo

original: RV_5,046.02c ubhā nāsatyā rudro adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta //
analyzed: ubhā nāsatyā rudraḥ adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta

original: RV_5,046.03a indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāditiṃ svaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām marutaḥ parvatāṃ apaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī mitrāvaruṇā aditim svar pṛthivīm dyām marutaḥ parvatān apaḥ

original: RV_5,046.03c huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim bhagaṃ nu śaṃsaṃ savitāram ūtaye //
analyzed: huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim bhagam nu śaṃsam savitāram ūtaye

original: RV_5,046.04a uta no viṣṇur uta vāto asridho draviṇodā uta somo mayas karat /
analyzed: uta naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta vātaḥ asridhaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ uta somaḥ mayaḥ karat

original: RV_5,046.04c uta ṛbhava uta rāye no aśvinota tvaṣṭota vibhvānu maṃsate //
analyzed: uta ṛbhavaḥ uta rāye naḥ aśvinā uta tvaṣṭā uta vibhvā anu maṃsate

original: RV_5,046.05a uta tyan no mārutaṃ śardha ā gamad divikṣayaṃ yajatam barhir āsade /
analyzed: uta tyad naḥ mārutam śardhaḥ ā gamat divikṣayam yajatam barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_5,046.05c bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣota no yamad varūthyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣā uta naḥ yamat varūthyam varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_5,046.06a uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ suśastayaḥ sudītayo nadyas trāmaṇe bhuvan /
analyzed: uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ su śastayaḥ su dītayaḥ nadyaḥ trāmaṇe bhuvan

original: RV_5,046.06c bhago vibhaktā śavasāvasā gamad uruvyacā aditiḥ śrotu me havam //
analyzed: bhagaḥ vibhaktā śavasā avasā gamat uru vyacāḥ aditiḥ śrotu me havam

original: RV_5,046.07a devānām patnīr uśatīr avantu naḥ prāvantu nas tujaye vājasātaye /
analyzed: devānām patnīḥ uśatīḥ avantu naḥ prāvantu naḥ tujaye vājasātaye

original: RV_5,046.07c yāḥ pārthivāso yā apām api vrate tā no devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yacchata //
analyzed: yāḥ pārthivāsaḥ yāḥ apām api vrate tāḥ naḥ devīḥ su havāḥ śarma yacchata

original: RV_5,046.08a uta gnā vyantu devapatnīr indrāṇy agnāyy aśvinī rāṭ /
analyzed: uta gnāḥ vyantu deva patnīḥ indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāj

original: RV_5,046.08c ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīr ya ṛtur janīnām //
analyzed: ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīḥ yaḥ ṛtuḥ janīnām

original: RV_5,047.01a prayuñjatī diva eti bruvāṇā mahī mātā duhitur bodhayantī /
analyzed: prayuñjatī divaḥ eti bruvāṇā mahī mātā duhituḥ bodhayantī

original: RV_5,047.01c āvivāsantī yuvatir manīṣā pitṛbhya ā sadane johuvānā //
analyzed: āvivāsantī yuvatiḥ manīṣā pitṛbhyaḥ ā sadane johuvānā

original: RV_5,047.02a ajirāsas tadapa īyamānā ātasthivāṃso amṛtasya nābhim /
analyzed: ajirāsaḥ tad apaḥ īyamānāḥ ātasthivāṃsaḥ amṛtasya nābhim

original: RV_5,047.02c anantāsa uravo viśvataḥ sīm pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ //
analyzed: anantāsaḥ uravaḥ viśvatas sīm pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ

original: RV_5,047.03a ukṣā samudro aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pitur ā viveśa /
analyzed: ukṣā samudraḥ aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pituḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_5,047.03c madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśnir aśmā vi cakrame rajasas pāty antau //
analyzed: madhye divaḥ nihitaḥ pṛśniḥ aśmā vi cakrame rajasaḥ pāti antau

original: RV_5,047.04a catvāra īm bibhrati kṣemayanto daśa garbhaṃ carase dhāpayante /
analyzed: catvāraḥ īm bibhrati kṣemayantaḥ daśa garbham carase dhāpayante

original: RV_5,047.04c tridhātavaḥ paramā asya gāvo divaś caranti pari sadyo antān //
analyzed: tri dhātavaḥ paramāḥ asya gāvaḥ divaḥ caranti pari sadyas antān

original: RV_5,047.05a idaṃ vapur nivacanaṃ janāsaś caranti yan nadyas tasthur āpaḥ /
analyzed: idam vapuḥ nivacanam janāsaḥ caranti yat nadyaḥ tasthuḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_5,047.05c dve yad īm bibhṛto mātur anye iheha jāte yamyā sabandhū //
analyzed: dve yat īm bibhṛtaḥ mātuḥ anye iha iha jāte yamyā sabandhū

original: RV_5,047.06a vi tanvate dhiyo asmā apāṃsi vastrā putrāya mātaro vayanti /
analyzed: vi tanvate dhiyaḥ asmai apāṃsi vastrā putrāya mātaraḥ vayanti

original: RV_5,047.06c upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇo modamānā divas pathā vadhvo yanty accha //
analyzed: upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇaḥ modamānāḥ divaḥ pathā vadhvaḥ yanti accha

original: RV_5,047.07a tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam /
analyzed: tat astu mitrāvaruṇā tat agne śam yos asmabhyam idam astu śastam

original: RV_5,047.07c aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya //
analyzed: aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhām namaḥ dive bṛhate sādanāya

original: RV_5,048.01a kad u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe svakṣatrāya svayaśase mahe vayam /
analyzed: kad u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe svakṣatrāya sva yaśase mahe vayam

original: RV_5,048.01c āmenyasya rajaso yad abhra āṃ apo vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī //
analyzed: āmenyasya rajasaḥ yat abhre ām apaḥ vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī

original: RV_5,048.02a tā atnata vayunaṃ vīravakṣaṇaṃ samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ atnata vayunam vīra vakṣaṇam samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ

original: RV_5,048.02c apo apācīr aparā apejate pra pūrvābhis tirate devayur janaḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ apācīḥ aparāḥ apejate pra pūrvābhiḥ tirate devayuḥ janaḥ

original: RV_5,048.03a ā grāvabhir ahanyebhir aktubhir variṣṭhaṃ vajram ā jigharti māyini /
analyzed: ā grāvabhiḥ ahanyebhiḥ aktubhiḥ variṣṭham vajram ā jigharti māyini

original: RV_5,048.03c śataṃ vā yasya pracaran sve dame saṃvartayanto vi ca vartayann ahā //
analyzed: śatam vā yasya pracaran sve dame saṃvartayantaḥ vi ca vartayan ahā

original: RV_5,048.04a tām asya rītim paraśor iva praty anīkam akhyam bhuje asya varpasaḥ /
analyzed: tām asya rītim paraśoḥ iva prati anīkam akhyam bhuje asya varpasaḥ

original: RV_5,048.04c sacā yadi pitumantam iva kṣayaṃ ratnaṃ dadhāti bharahūtaye viśe //
analyzed: sacā yadi pitumantam iva kṣayam ratnam dadhāti bhara hūtaye viśe

original: RV_5,048.05a sa jihvayā caturanīka ṛñjate cāru vasāno varuṇo yatann arim /
analyzed: sa jihvayā catur anīkaḥ ṛñjate cāru vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ yatan arim

original: RV_5,048.05c na tasya vidma puruṣatvatā vayaṃ yato bhagaḥ savitā dāti vāryam //
analyzed: na tasya vidma puruṣatva tā vayam yatas bhagaḥ savitā dāti vāryam

original: RV_5,049.01a devaṃ vo adya savitāram eṣe bhagaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ /
analyzed: devam vaḥ adya savitāram eṣe bhagam ca ratnam vibhajantam āyoḥ

original: RV_5,049.01c ā vāṃ narā purubhujā vavṛtyāṃ dive-dive cid aśvinā sakhīyan //
analyzed: ā vām narā puru bhujā vavṛtyām dive dive cit aśvinā sakhīyan

original: RV_5,049.02a prati prayāṇam asurasya vidvān sūktair devaṃ savitāraṃ duvasya /
analyzed: prati prayāṇam asurasya vidvān sūktaiḥ devam savitāram duvasya

original: RV_5,049.02c upa bruvīta namasā vijānañ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ //
analyzed: upa bruvīta namasā vijānam jyeṣṭham ca ratnam vibhajantam āyoḥ

original: RV_5,049.03a adatrayā dayate vāryāṇi pūṣā bhago aditir vasta usraḥ /
analyzed: adatrayā dayate vāryāṇi pūṣā bhagaḥ aditiḥ vaste usraḥ

original: RV_5,049.03c indro viṣṇur varuṇo mitro agnir ahāni bhadrā janayanta dasmāḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ viṣṇuḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ ahāni bhadrā janayanta dasmāḥ

original: RV_5,049.04a tan no anarvā savitā varūthaṃ tat sindhava iṣayanto anu gman /
analyzed: tat naḥ anarvā savitā varūtham tat sindhavaḥ iṣayantaḥ anu gman

original: RV_5,049.04c upa yad voce adhvarasya hotā rāyaḥ syāma patayo vājaratnāḥ //
analyzed: upa yat voce adhvarasya hotā rāyaḥ syāma patayaḥ vāja ratnāḥ

original: RV_5,049.05a pra ye vasubhya īvad ā namo dur ye mitre varuṇe sūktavācaḥ /
analyzed: pra ye vasubhyaḥ īvat ā namaḥ duḥ ye mitre varuṇe sūkta vācaḥ

original: RV_5,049.05c avaitv abhvaṃ kṛṇutā varīyo divaspṛthivyor avasā madema //
analyzed: avaitu abhvam kṛṇuta varīyaḥ divaspṛthivyoḥ avasā madema

original: RV_5,050.01a viśvo devasya netur marto vurīta sakhyam /
analyzed: viśvaḥ devasya netuḥ martaḥ vurīta sakhyam

original: RV_5,050.01c viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ vṛṇīta puṣyase //
analyzed: viśvaḥ rāyaḥ iṣudhyati dyumnam vṛṇīta puṣyase

original: RV_5,050.02a te te deva netar ye cemāṃ anuśase /
analyzed: te te deva netar ye ca imām anuśase

original: RV_5,050.02c te rāyā te hy āpṛce sacemahi sacathyaiḥ //
analyzed: te rāyā te hi āpṛce sacemahi sacathyaiḥ

original: RV_5,050.03a ato na ā nṝn atithīn ataḥ patnīr daśasyata /
analyzed: atas naḥ ā nṝn atithīn atas patnīḥ daśasyata

original: RV_5,050.03c āre viśvam patheṣṭhāṃ dviṣo yuyotu yūyuviḥ //
analyzed: āre viśvam patheṣṭhām dviṣaḥ yuyotu yūyuviḥ

original: RV_5,050.04a yatra vahnir abhihito dudravad droṇyaḥ paśuḥ /
analyzed: yatra vahniḥ abhihitaḥ dudravat droṇyaḥ paśuḥ

original: RV_5,050.04c nṛmaṇā vīrapastyo 'rṇā dhīreva sanitā //
analyzed: nṛmaṇāḥ vīra pastyoḥ rṇā dhīrā iva sanitā

original: RV_5,050.05a eṣa te deva netā rathaspatiḥ śaṃ rayiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa te deva netā rathaspatiḥ śam rayiḥ

original: RV_5,050.05c śaṃ rāye śaṃ svastaya iṣastuto manāmahe devastuto manāmahe //
analyzed: śam rāye śam svastaye iṣa stutaḥ manāmahe deva stutaḥ manāmahe

original: RV_5,051.01a agne sutasya pītaye viśvair ūmebhir ā gahi /
analyzed: agne sutasya pītaye viśvaiḥ ūmebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_5,051.01c devebhir havyadātaye //
analyzed: devebhiḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_5,051.02a ṛtadhītaya ā gata satyadharmāṇo adhvaram /
analyzed: ṛta dhītayaḥ ā gata satya dharmāṇaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_5,051.02c agneḥ pibata jihvayā //
analyzed: agneḥ pibata jihvayā

original: RV_5,051.03a viprebhir vipra santya prātaryāvabhir ā gahi /
analyzed: viprebhiḥ vipra santya prātaryāvabhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_5,051.03c devebhiḥ somapītaye //
analyzed: devebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_5,051.04a ayaṃ somaś camū suto 'matre pari ṣicyate /
analyzed: ayam somaḥ camū sutaḥ matre pari sicyate

original: RV_5,051.04c priya indrāya vāyave //
analyzed: priyaḥ indrāya vāyave

original: RV_5,051.05a vāyav ā yāhi vītaye juṣāṇo havyadātaye /
analyzed: vāyo ā yāhi vītaye juṣāṇaḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_5,051.05c pibā sutasyāndhaso abhi prayaḥ //
analyzed: pibā sutasya andhasaḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_5,051.06a indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ sutānām pītim arhathaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ ca vāyo eṣām sutānām pītim arhathaḥ

original: RV_5,051.06c tāñ juṣethām arepasāv abhi prayaḥ //
analyzed: tām juṣethām arepasau abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_5,051.07a sutā indrāya vāyave somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
analyzed: sutāḥ indrāya vāyave somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_5,051.07c nimnaṃ na yanti sindhavo 'bhi prayaḥ //
analyzed: nimnam na yanti sindhavaḥ bhi prayaḥ

original: RV_5,051.08a sajūr viśvebhir devebhir aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ /
analyzed: sajūs viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūs

original: RV_5,051.08c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa //
analyzed: ā yāhi agne atri vat sute raṇa

original: RV_5,051.09a sajūr mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ sajūḥ somena viṣṇunā /
analyzed: sajūs mitrāvaruṇābhyām sajūs somena viṣṇunā

original: RV_5,051.09c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa //
analyzed: ā yāhi agne atri vat sute raṇa

original: RV_5,051.10a sajūr ādityair vasubhiḥ sajūr indreṇa vāyunā /
analyzed: sajūs ādityaiḥ vasubhiḥ sajūs indreṇa vāyunā

original: RV_5,051.10c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa //
analyzed: ā yāhi agne atri vat sute raṇa

original: RV_5,051.11a svasti no mimītām aśvinā bhagaḥ svasti devy aditir anarvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: svasti naḥ mimītām aśvinā bhagaḥ svasti devī aditiḥ anarvaṇaḥ

original: RV_5,051.11c svasti pūṣā asuro dadhātu naḥ svasti dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā //
analyzed: svasti pūṣā asuraḥ dadhātu naḥ svasti dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā

original: RV_5,051.12a svastaye vāyum upa bravāmahai somaṃ svasti bhuvanasya yas patiḥ /
analyzed: svastaye vāyum upa bravāmahai somam svasti bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_5,051.12c bṛhaspatiṃ sarvagaṇaṃ svastaye svastaya ādityāso bhavantu naḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim sarva gaṇam svastaye svastaye ādityāsaḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: RV_5,051.13a viśve devā no adyā svastaye vaiśvānaro vasur agniḥ svastaye /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ naḥ adya svastaye vaiśvānaraḥ vasuḥ agniḥ svastaye

original: RV_5,051.13c devā avantv ṛbhavaḥ svastaye svasti no rudraḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ avantu ṛbhavaḥ svastaye svasti naḥ rudraḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_5,051.14a svasti mitrāvaruṇā svasti pathye revati /
analyzed: svasti mitrāvaruṇā svasti pathye revati

original: RV_5,051.14c svasti na indraś cāgniś ca svasti no adite kṛdhi //
analyzed: svasti naḥ indraḥ ca agniḥ ca svasti naḥ adite kṛdhi

original: RV_5,051.15a svasti panthām anu carema sūryācandramasāv iva /
analyzed: svasti panthām anu carema sūryācandramasau iva

original: RV_5,051.15c punar dadatāghnatā jānatā saṃ gamemahi //
analyzed: punar dadatā a ghnatā jānatā sam gamemahi

original: RV_5,052.01a pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyārcā marudbhir ṛkvabhiḥ /
analyzed: pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyā arca marudbhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_5,052.01c ye adrogham anuṣvadhaṃ śravo madanti yajñiyāḥ //
analyzed: ye adrogham anuṣvadham śravaḥ madanti yajñiyāḥ

original: RV_5,052.02a te hi sthirasya śavasaḥ sakhāyaḥ santi dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: te hi sthirasya śavasaḥ sakhāyaḥ santi dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_5,052.02c te yāmann ā dhṛṣadvinas tmanā pānti śaśvataḥ //
analyzed: te yāman ā dhṛṣadvinaḥ tmanā pānti śaśvataḥ

original: RV_5,052.03a te syandrāso nokṣaṇo 'ti ṣkandanti śarvarīḥ /
analyzed: te syandrāsaḥ na ukṣaṇaḥ ti skandanti śarvarīḥ

original: RV_5,052.03c marutām adhā maho divi kṣamā ca manmahe //
analyzed: marutām adhā mahaḥ divi kṣamā ca manmahe

original: RV_5,052.04a marutsu vo dadhīmahi stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: marutsu vaḥ dadhīmahi stomam yajñam ca dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_5,052.04c viśve ye mānuṣā yugā pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ //
analyzed: viśve ye mānuṣā yugā pānti martyam riṣaḥ

original: RV_5,052.05a arhanto ye sudānavo naro asāmiśavasaḥ /
analyzed: arhantaḥ ye sudānavaḥ naraḥ asāmi śavasaḥ

original: RV_5,052.05c pra yajñaṃ yajñiyebhyo divo arcā marudbhyaḥ //
analyzed: pra yajñam yajñiyebhyaḥ divaḥ arca marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_5,052.06a ā rukmair ā yudhā nara ṛṣvā ṛṣṭīr asṛkṣata /
analyzed: ā rukmaiḥ ā yudhā naraḥ ṛṣvāḥ ṛṣṭīḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_5,052.06c anv enāṃ aha vidyuto maruto jajjhatīr iva bhānur arta tmanā divaḥ //
analyzed: anu enām aha vidyutaḥ marutaḥ jajjhatīḥ iva bhānuḥ arta tmanā divaḥ

original: RV_5,052.07a ye vāvṛdhanta pārthivā ya urāv antarikṣa ā /
analyzed: ye vāvṛdhanta pārthivāḥ ye urau antarikṣe ā

original: RV_5,052.07c vṛjane vā nadīnāṃ sadhasthe vā maho divaḥ //
analyzed: vṛjane vā nadīnām sadhasthe vā mahaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_5,052.08a śardho mārutam uc chaṃsa satyaśavasam ṛbhvasam /
analyzed: śardhaḥ mārutam ud śaṃsa satya śavasam ṛbhvasam

original: RV_5,052.08c uta sma te śubhe naraḥ pra syandrā yujata tmanā //
analyzed: uta sma te śubhe naraḥ pra syandrā yujata tmanā

original: RV_5,052.09a uta sma te paruṣṇyām ūrṇā vasata śundhyavaḥ /
analyzed: uta sma te paruṣṇyām ūrṇāḥ vasata śundhyavaḥ

original: RV_5,052.09c uta pavyā rathānām adrim bhindanty ojasā //
analyzed: uta pavyā rathānām adrim bhindanti ojasā

original: RV_5,052.10a āpathayo vipathayo 'ntaspathā anupathāḥ /
analyzed: āpathayaḥ vipathayaḥ ntaspathāḥ anupathāḥ

original: RV_5,052.10c etebhir mahyaṃ nāmabhir yajñaṃ viṣṭāra ohate //
analyzed: etebhiḥ mahyam nāmabhiḥ yajñam viṣṭāre ohate

original: RV_5,052.11a adhā naro ny ohate 'dhā niyuta ohate /
analyzed: adhā naraḥ ni ohate dhāḥ niyutaḥ ohate

original: RV_5,052.11c adhā pārāvatā iti citrā rūpāṇi darśyā //
analyzed: adhā pārāvatāḥ iti citrā rūpāṇi darśyā

original: RV_5,052.12a chandastubhaḥ kubhanyava utsam ā kīriṇo nṛtuḥ /
analyzed: chanda stubhaḥ kubhanyavaḥ utsam ā kīriṇaḥ nṛtuḥ

original: RV_5,052.12c te me ke cin na tāyava ūmā āsan dṛśi tviṣe //
analyzed: te me ke cit na tāyavaḥ ūmāḥ āsan dṛśi tviṣe

original: RV_5,052.13a ya ṛṣvā ṛṣṭividyutaḥ kavayaḥ santi vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: ye ṛṣvāḥ ṛṣṭi vidyutaḥ kavayaḥ santi vedhasaḥ

original: RV_5,052.13c tam ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ namasyā ramayā girā //
analyzed: tam ṛṣe mārutam gaṇam namasya ramaya girā

original: RV_5,052.14a accha ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ dānā mitraṃ na yoṣaṇā /
analyzed: accha ṛṣe mārutam gaṇam dānā mitram na yoṣaṇā

original: RV_5,052.14c divo vā dhṛṣṇava ojasā stutā dhībhir iṣaṇyata //
analyzed: divaḥ vā dhṛṣṇavaḥ ojasā stutāḥ dhībhiḥ iṣaṇyata

original: RV_5,052.15a nū manvāna eṣāṃ devāṃ acchā na vakṣaṇā /
analyzed: nu manvānaḥ eṣām devān acchā na vakṣaṇā

original: RV_5,052.15c dānā saceta sūribhir yāmaśrutebhir añjibhiḥ //
analyzed: dānā saceta sūribhiḥ yāma śrutebhiḥ añjibhiḥ

original: RV_5,052.16a pra ye me bandhveṣe gāṃ vocanta sūrayaḥ pṛśniṃ vocanta mātaram /
analyzed: pra ye me bandhu eṣe gām vocanta sūrayaḥ pṛśnim vocanta mātaram

original: RV_5,052.16c adhā pitaram iṣmiṇaṃ rudraṃ vocanta śikvasaḥ //
analyzed: adhā pitaram iṣmiṇam rudram vocanta śikvasaḥ

original: RV_5,052.17a sapta me sapta śākina ekam-ekā śatā daduḥ /
analyzed: sapta me sapta śākinaḥ ekam ekā śatā daduḥ

original: RV_5,052.17c yamunāyām adhi śrutam ud rādho gavyam mṛje ni rādho aśvyam mṛje //
analyzed: yamunāyām adhi śrutam ud rādhaḥ gavyam mṛje ni rādhaḥ aśvyam mṛje

original: RV_5,053.01a ko veda jānam eṣāṃ ko vā purā sumneṣv āsa marutām /
analyzed: kaḥ veda jānam eṣām kaḥ vā purā sumneṣu āsa marutām

original: RV_5,053.01c yad yuyujre kilāsyaḥ //
analyzed: yat yuyujre kilāsyaḥ

original: RV_5,053.02a aitān ratheṣu tasthuṣaḥ kaḥ śuśrāva kathā yayuḥ /
analyzed: ā etān ratheṣu tasthuṣaḥ kaḥ śuśrāva kathā yayuḥ

original: RV_5,053.02c kasmai sasruḥ sudāse anv āpaya iḷābhir vṛṣṭayaḥ saha //
analyzed: kasmai sasruḥ sudāse anu āpayaḥ iḷābhiḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ saha

original: RV_5,053.03a te ma āhur ya āyayur upa dyubhir vibhir made /
analyzed: te me āhuḥ ye āyayuḥ upa dyubhiḥ vibhiḥ made

original: RV_5,053.03c naro maryā arepasa imān paśyann iti ṣṭuhi //
analyzed: naraḥ maryāḥ arepasaḥ imān paśyan iti stuhi

original: RV_5,053.04a ye añjiṣu ye vāśīṣu svabhānavaḥ srakṣu rukmeṣu khādiṣu /
analyzed: ye añjiṣu ye vāśīṣu sva bhānavaḥ srakṣu rukmeṣu khādiṣu

original: RV_5,053.04c śrāyā ratheṣu dhanvasu //
analyzed: śrāyāḥ ratheṣu dhanvasu

original: RV_5,053.05a yuṣmākaṃ smā rathāṃ anu mude dadhe maruto jīradānavaḥ /
analyzed: yuṣmākam smā rathān anu mude dadhe marutaḥ jīra dānavaḥ

original: RV_5,053.05c vṛṣṭī dyāvo yatīr iva //
analyzed: vṛṣṭī dyāvaḥ yatīḥ iva

original: RV_5,053.06a ā yaṃ naraḥ sudānavo dadāśuṣe divaḥ kośam acucyavuḥ /
analyzed: ā yam naraḥ sudānavaḥ dadāśuṣe divaḥ kośam acucyavuḥ

original: RV_5,053.06c vi parjanyaṃ sṛjanti rodasī anu dhanvanā yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: vi parjanyam sṛjanti rodasī anu dhanvanā yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_5,053.07a tatṛdānāḥ sindhavaḥ kṣodasā rajaḥ pra sasrur dhenavo yathā /
analyzed: tatṛdānāḥ sindhavaḥ kṣodasā rajaḥ pra sasruḥ dhenavaḥ yathā

original: RV_5,053.07c syannā aśvā ivādhvano vimocane vi yad vartanta enyaḥ //
analyzed: syannāḥ aśvāḥ iva adhvanaḥ vimocane vi yat vartante enyaḥ

original: RV_5,053.08a ā yāta maruto diva āntarikṣād amād uta /
analyzed: ā yāta marutaḥ divaḥ āntarikṣāt amāt uta
