original: RV_5,053.08c māva sthāta parāvataḥ //
analyzed: mā ava sthāta parāvataḥ

original: RV_5,053.09a mā vo rasānitabhā kubhā krumur mā vaḥ sindhur ni rīramat /
analyzed: mā vaḥ rasā anitabhā kubhā krumuḥ mā vaḥ sindhuḥ ni rīramat

original: RV_5,053.09c mā vaḥ pari ṣṭhāt sarayuḥ purīṣiṇy asme it sumnam astu vaḥ //
analyzed: mā vaḥ pari sthāt sarayuḥ purīṣiṇī asme id sumnam astu vaḥ

original: RV_5,053.10a taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ rathānāṃ tveṣaṃ gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām /
analyzed: tam vaḥ śardham rathānām tveṣam gaṇam mārutam navyasīnām

original: RV_5,053.10c anu pra yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: anu pra yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_5,053.11a śardhaṃ-śardhaṃ va eṣāṃ vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhiḥ /
analyzed: śardham śardham vaḥ eṣām vrātam vrātam gaṇam gaṇam su śastibhiḥ

original: RV_5,053.11c anu krāmema dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: anu krāmema dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_5,053.12a kasmā adya sujātāya rātahavyāya pra yayuḥ /
analyzed: kasmai adya sujātāya rāta havyāya pra yayuḥ

original: RV_5,053.12c enā yāmena marutaḥ //
analyzed: enā yāmena marutaḥ

original: RV_5,053.13a yena tokāya tanayāya dhānyam bījaṃ vahadhve akṣitam /
analyzed: yena tokāya tanayāya dhānyam bījam vahadhve akṣitam

original: RV_5,053.13c asmabhyaṃ tad dhattana yad va īmahe rādho viśvāyu saubhagam //
analyzed: asmabhyam tat dhattana yat vaḥ īmahe rādhaḥ viśvāyu saubhagam

original: RV_5,053.14a atīyāma nidas tiraḥ svastibhir hitvāvadyam arātīḥ /
analyzed: atīyāma nidaḥ tiras svastibhiḥ hitvā avadyam arātīḥ

original: RV_5,053.14c vṛṣṭvī śaṃ yor āpa usri bheṣajaṃ syāma marutaḥ saha //
analyzed: vṛṣṭvī śam yoḥ āpaḥ usri bheṣajam syāma marutaḥ saha

original: RV_5,053.15a sudevaḥ samahāsati suvīro naro marutaḥ sa martyaḥ /
analyzed: su devaḥ samaha asati su vīraḥ naraḥ marutaḥ sa martyaḥ

original: RV_5,053.15c yaṃ trāyadhve syāma te //
analyzed: yam trāyadhve syāma te

original: RV_5,053.16a stuhi bhojān stuvato asya yāmani raṇan gāvo na yavase /
analyzed: stuhi bhojān stuvataḥ asya yāmani raṇan gāvaḥ na yavase

original: RV_5,053.16c yataḥ pūrvāṃ iva sakhīṃr anu hvaya girā gṛṇīhi kāminaḥ //
analyzed: yatas pūrvān iva sakhīṃr anu hvaya girā gṛṇīhi kāminaḥ

original: RV_5,054.01a pra śardhāya mārutāya svabhānava imāṃ vācam anajā parvatacyute /
analyzed: pra śardhāya mārutāya sva bhānave imām vācam anajā parvata cyute

original: RV_5,054.01c gharmastubhe diva ā pṛṣṭhayajvane dyumnaśravase mahi nṛmṇam arcata //
analyzed: gharma stubhe divaḥ ā pṛṣṭhayajvane dyumna śravase mahi nṛmṇam arcata

original: RV_5,054.02a pra vo marutas taviṣā udanyavo vayovṛdho aśvayujaḥ parijrayaḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ marutaḥ taviṣāḥ udanyavaḥ vayaḥ vṛdhaḥ aśva yujaḥ parijrayaḥ

original: RV_5,054.02c saṃ vidyutā dadhati vāśati tritaḥ svaranty āpo 'vanā parijrayaḥ //
analyzed: sam vidyutā dadhati vāśati tritaḥ svaranti āpaḥ vanā parijrayaḥ

original: RV_5,054.03a vidyunmahaso naro aśmadidyavo vātatviṣo marutaḥ parvatacyutaḥ /
analyzed: vidyut mahasaḥ naraḥ aśma didyavaḥ vāta tviṣaḥ marutaḥ parvata cyutaḥ

original: RV_5,054.03c abdayā cin muhur ā hrādunīvṛta stanayadamā rabhasā udojasaḥ //
analyzed: abdayā cit muhur ā hrādunīvṛta stanaya damāḥ rabhasāḥ udojasaḥ

original: RV_5,054.04a vy aktūn rudrā vy ahāni śikvaso vy antarikṣaṃ vi rajāṃsi dhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: vi aktūn rudrāḥ vi ahāni śikvasaḥ vi antarikṣam vi rajāṃsi dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_5,054.04c vi yad ajrāṃ ajatha nāva īṃ yathā vi durgāṇi maruto nāha riṣyatha //
analyzed: vi yat ajrām ajatha nāvaḥ īm yathā vi durgāṇi marutaḥ na aha riṣyatha

original: RV_5,054.05a tad vīryaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ tatāna sūryo na yojanam /
analyzed: tat vīryam vaḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam dīrgham tatāna sūryaḥ na yojanam

original: RV_5,054.05c etā na yāme agṛbhītaśociṣo 'naśvadāṃ yan ny ayātanā girim //
analyzed: etāḥ na yāme a gṛbhīta śociṣaḥ naśva dām yat ni ayātana girim

original: RV_5,054.06a abhrāji śardho maruto yad arṇasam moṣathā vṛkṣaṃ kapaneva vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: abhrāji śardhaḥ marutaḥ yat arṇasam moṣatha vṛkṣam kapanā iva vedhasaḥ

original: RV_5,054.06c adha smā no aramatiṃ sajoṣasaś cakṣur iva yantam anu neṣathā sugam //
analyzed: adha smā naḥ aramatim sajoṣasaḥ cakṣuḥ iva yantam anu neṣathāḥ sugam

original: RV_5,054.07a na sa jīyate maruto na hanyate na sredhati na vyathate na riṣyati /
analyzed: na sa jīyate marutaḥ na hanyate na sredhati na vyathate na riṣyati

original: RV_5,054.07c nāsya rāya upa dasyanti notaya ṛṣiṃ vā yaṃ rājānaṃ vā suṣūdatha //
analyzed: na asya rāyaḥ upa dasyanti na ūtayaḥ ṛṣim vā yam rājānam vā suṣūdatha

original: RV_5,054.08a niyutvanto grāmajito yathā naro 'ryamaṇo na marutaḥ kabandhinaḥ /
analyzed: niyutvantaḥ grāma jitaḥ yathā naraḥ ryamaṇaḥ na marutaḥ kabandhinaḥ

original: RV_5,054.08c pinvanty utsaṃ yad ināso asvaran vy undanti pṛthivīm madhvo andhasā //
analyzed: pinvanti utsam yat ināsaḥ asvaran vi undanti pṛthivīm madhvaḥ andhasā

original: RV_5,054.09a pravatvatīyam pṛthivī marudbhyaḥ pravatvatī dyaur bhavati prayadbhyaḥ /
analyzed: pravatvatī iyam pṛthivī marudbhyaḥ pravatvatī dyauḥ bhavati prayadbhyaḥ

original: RV_5,054.09c pravatvatīḥ pathyā antarikṣyāḥ pravatvantaḥ parvatā jīradānavaḥ //
analyzed: pravatvatīḥ pathyāḥ antarikṣyāḥ pravatvantaḥ parvatāḥ jīra dānavaḥ

original: RV_5,054.10a yan marutaḥ sabharasaḥ svarṇaraḥ sūrya udite madathā divo naraḥ /
analyzed: yat marutaḥ sabharasaḥ svarṇaraḥ sūrye udite madatha divaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_5,054.10c na vo 'śvāḥ śrathayantāha sisrataḥ sadyo asyādhvanaḥ pāram aśnutha //
analyzed: na vaḥ śvās śrathayantā aha sisrataḥ sadyas asya adhvanaḥ pāram aśnutha

original: RV_5,054.11a aṃseṣu va ṛṣṭayaḥ patsu khādayo vakṣassu rukmā maruto rathe śubhaḥ /
analyzed: aṃseṣu vaḥ ṛṣṭayaḥ patsu kha ādayaḥ vakṣassu rukmāḥ marutaḥ rathe śubhaḥ

original: RV_5,054.11c agnibhrājaso vidyuto gabhastyoḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣasu vitatā hiraṇyayīḥ //
analyzed: agni bhrājasaḥ vidyutaḥ gabhastyoḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣasu vitatāḥ hiraṇyayīḥ

original: RV_5,054.12a taṃ nākam aryo agṛbhītaśociṣaṃ ruśat pippalam maruto vi dhūnutha /
analyzed: tam nākam aryaḥ a gṛbhīta śociṣam ruśat pippalam marutaḥ vi dhūnutha

original: RV_5,054.12c sam acyanta vṛjanātitviṣanta yat svaranti ghoṣaṃ vitatam ṛtāyavaḥ //
analyzed: sam acyanta vṛjanā atitviṣanta yat svaranti ghoṣam vitatam ṛtāyavaḥ

original: RV_5,054.13a yuṣmādattasya maruto vicetaso rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ /
analyzed: yuṣmādattasya marutaḥ vicetasaḥ rāyaḥ syāma rathyaḥ vayasvataḥ

original: RV_5,054.13c na yo yucchati tiṣyo yathā divo 'sme rāranta marutaḥ sahasriṇam //
analyzed: na yaḥ yucchati tiṣyaḥ yathā divaḥ sme rāranta marutaḥ sahasriṇam

original: RV_5,054.14a yūyaṃ rayim maruta spārhavīraṃ yūyam ṛṣim avatha sāmavipram /
analyzed: yūyam rayim marutaḥ spārha vīram yūyam ṛṣim avatha sāma vipram

original: RV_5,054.14c yūyam arvantam bharatāya vājaṃ yūyaṃ dhattha rājānaṃ śruṣṭimantam //
analyzed: yūyam arvantam bharatāya vājam yūyam dhattha rājānam śruṣṭimantam

original: RV_5,054.15a tad vo yāmi draviṇaṃ sadyaūtayo yenā svar ṇa tatanāma nṝṃr abhi /
analyzed: tat vaḥ yāmi draviṇam sadyaūtayaḥ yena svar na tatanāma nṝn abhi

original: RV_5,054.15c idaṃ su me maruto haryatā vaco yasya tarema tarasā śataṃ himāḥ //
analyzed: idam su me marutaḥ haryata vacaḥ yasya tarema tarasā śatam himāḥ

original: RV_5,055.01a prayajyavo maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayo bṛhad vayo dadhire rukmavakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: prayajyavaḥ marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ bṛhat vayaḥ dadhire rukma vakṣasaḥ

original: RV_5,055.01c īyante aśvaiḥ suyamebhir āśubhiḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: īyante aśvaiḥ su yamebhiḥ āśubhiḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.02a svayaṃ dadhidhve taviṣīṃ yathā vida bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi rājatha /
analyzed: svayam dadhidhve taviṣīm yathā vida bṛhat mahāntaḥ urviyā vi rājatha

original: RV_5,055.02c utāntarikṣam mamire vy ojasā śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: uta antarikṣam mamire vi ojasā śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.03a sākaṃ jātāḥ subhvaḥ sākam ukṣitāḥ śriye cid ā prataraṃ vāvṛdhur naraḥ /
analyzed: sākam jātāḥ su bhvaḥ sākam ukṣitāḥ śriye cit ā prataram vāvṛdhuḥ naraḥ

original: RV_5,055.03c virokiṇaḥ sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: virokiṇaḥ sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.04a ābhūṣeṇyaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ didṛkṣeṇyaṃ sūryasyeva cakṣaṇam /
analyzed: ābhūṣeṇyam vaḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam didṛkṣeṇyam sūryasya iva cakṣaṇam

original: RV_5,055.04c uto asmāṃ amṛtatve dadhātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: uta u asmām amṛta tve dadhātana śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.05a ud īrayathā marutaḥ samudrato yūyaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ varṣayathā purīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ud īrayatha marutaḥ samudrataḥ yūyam vṛṣṭim varṣayatha purīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_5,055.05c na vo dasrā upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: na vaḥ dasrāḥ upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.06a yad aśvān dhūrṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvaṃ hiraṇyayān praty atkāṃ amugdhvam /
analyzed: yat aśvān dhūrṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam hiraṇyayān prati atkām amugdhvam

original: RV_5,055.06c viśvā it spṛdho maruto vy asyatha śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: viśvāḥ id spṛdhaḥ marutaḥ vi asyatha śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.07a na parvatā na nadyo varanta vo yatrācidhvam maruto gacchathed u tat /
analyzed: na parvatāḥ na nadyaḥ varanta vaḥ yatra acidhvam marutaḥ gacchatha id u tat

original: RV_5,055.07c uta dyāvāpṛthivī yāthanā pari śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: uta dyāvāpṛthivī yāthana pari śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.08a yat pūrvyam maruto yac ca nūtanaṃ yad udyate vasavo yac ca śasyate /
analyzed: yat pūrvyam marutaḥ yat ca nūtanam yat udyate vasavaḥ yat ca śasyate

original: RV_5,055.08c viśvasya tasya bhavathā navedasaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: viśvasya tasya bhavatha navedasaḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.09a mṛḷata no maruto mā vadhiṣṭanāsmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yantana /
analyzed: mṛḍata naḥ marutaḥ mā vadhiṣṭana asmabhyam śarma bahulam vi yantana

original: RV_5,055.09c adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
analyzed: adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gātana śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_5,055.10a yūyam asmān nayata vasyo acchā nir aṃhatibhyo maruto gṛṇānāḥ /
analyzed: yūyam asmān nayata vasyaḥ acchā niḥ aṃhatibhyaḥ marutaḥ gṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_5,055.10c juṣadhvaṃ no havyadātiṃ yajatrā vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: juṣadhvam naḥ havya dātim yajatrāḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_5,056.01a agne śardhantam ā gaṇam piṣṭaṃ rukmebhir añjibhiḥ /
analyzed: agne śardhantam ā gaṇam piṣṭam rukmebhiḥ añjibhiḥ

original: RV_5,056.01c viśo adya marutām ava hvaye divaś cid rocanād adhi //
analyzed: viśaḥ adya marutām ava hvaye divaḥ cit rocanāt adhi

original: RV_5,056.02a yathā cin manyase hṛdā tad in me jagmur āśasaḥ /
analyzed: yathā cit manyase hṛdā tat id me jagmuḥ āśasaḥ

original: RV_5,056.02c ye te nediṣṭhaṃ havanāny āgaman tān vardha bhīmasaṃdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: ye te nediṣṭham havanāni āgaman tān vardha bhīma saṃdṛśaḥ

original: RV_5,056.03a mīḷhuṣmatīva pṛthivī parāhatā madanty ety asmad ā /
analyzed: mīḷhuṣmatī iva pṛthivī parāhatā madantī eti asmat ā

original: RV_5,056.03c ṛkṣo na vo marutaḥ śimīvāṃ amo dudhro gaur iva bhīmayuḥ //
analyzed: ṛkṣaḥ na vaḥ marutaḥ śimīvān amaḥ dudhraḥ gauḥ iva bhīmayuḥ

original: RV_5,056.04a ni ye riṇanty ojasā vṛthā gāvo na durdhuraḥ /
analyzed: ni ye riṇanti ojasā vṛthā gāvaḥ na durdhuraḥ

original: RV_5,056.04c aśmānaṃ cit svaryam parvataṃ girim pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: aśmānam cit svaryam parvatam girim pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_5,056.05a ut tiṣṭha nūnam eṣāṃ stomaiḥ samukṣitānām /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha nūnam eṣām stomaiḥ samukṣitānām

original: RV_5,056.05c marutām purutamam apūrvyaṃ gavāṃ sargam iva hvaye //
analyzed: marutām purutamam apūrvyam gavām sargam iva hvaye

original: RV_5,056.06a yuṅgdhvaṃ hy aruṣī rathe yuṅgdhvaṃ ratheṣu rohitaḥ /
analyzed: yuṅgdhvam hi aruṣī rathe yuṅgdhvam ratheṣu rohitaḥ

original: RV_5,056.06c yuṅgdhvaṃ harī ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave //
analyzed: yuṅgdhvam harī ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave

original: RV_5,056.07a uta sya vājy aruṣas tuviṣvaṇir iha sma dhāyi darśataḥ /
analyzed: uta sya vājī aruṣaḥ tuviṣvaṇiḥ iha sma dhāyi darśataḥ

original: RV_5,056.07c mā vo yāmeṣu marutaś ciraṃ karat pra taṃ ratheṣu codata //
analyzed: mā vaḥ yāmeṣu marutaḥ ciram karat pra tam ratheṣu codata

original: RV_5,056.08a rathaṃ nu mārutaṃ vayaṃ śravasyum ā huvāmahe /
analyzed: ratham nu mārutam vayam śravasyum ā huvāmahe

original: RV_5,056.08c ā yasmin tasthau suraṇāni bibhratī sacā marutsu rodasī //
analyzed: ā yasmin tasthau suraṇāni bibhratī sacā marutsu rodasī

original: RV_5,056.09a taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ ratheśubhaṃ tveṣam panasyum ā huve /
analyzed: tam vaḥ śardham ratheśubham tveṣam panasyum ā huve

original: RV_5,056.09c yasmin sujātā subhagā mahīyate sacā marutsu mīḷhuṣī //
analyzed: yasmin sujātā subhagā mahīyate sacā marutsu mīḍhuṣī

original: RV_5,057.01a ā rudrāsa indravantaḥ sajoṣaso hiraṇyarathāḥ suvitāya gantana /
analyzed: ā rudrāsaḥ indravantaḥ sajoṣasaḥ hiraṇya rathāḥ suvitāya gantana

original: RV_5,057.01c iyaṃ vo asmat prati haryate matis tṛṣṇaje na diva utsā udanyave //
analyzed: iyam vaḥ asmat prati haryate matiḥ tṛṣṇaje na divaḥ utsāḥ udanyave

original: RV_5,057.02a vāśīmanta ṛṣṭimanto manīṣiṇaḥ sudhanvāna iṣumanto niṣaṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: vāśīmantaḥ ṛṣṭimantaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ su dhanvānaḥ iṣumantaḥ niṣaṅgiṇaḥ

original: RV_5,057.02c svaśvā stha surathāḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ svāyudhā maruto yāthanā śubham //
analyzed: su aśvāḥ stha su rathāḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ su āyudhāḥ marutaḥ yāthana śubham

original: RV_5,057.03a dhūnutha dyām parvatān dāśuṣe vasu ni vo vanā jihate yāmano bhiyā /
analyzed: dhūnutha dyām parvatān dāśuṣe vasu ni vaḥ vanā jihate yāmanaḥ bhiyā

original: RV_5,057.03c kopayatha pṛthivīm pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhe yad ugrāḥ pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam //
analyzed: kopayatha pṛthivīm pṛśni mātaraḥ śubhe yat ugrāḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam

original: RV_5,057.04a vātatviṣo maruto varṣanirṇijo yamā iva susadṛśaḥ supeśasaḥ /
analyzed: vāta tviṣaḥ marutaḥ varṣa nirṇijaḥ yamāḥ iva su sadṛśaḥ supeśasaḥ

original: RV_5,057.04c piśaṅgāśvā aruṇāśvā arepasaḥ pratvakṣaso mahinā dyaur ivoravaḥ //
analyzed: piśaṅga aśvāḥ aruṇa aśvāḥ arepasaḥ pratvakṣasaḥ mahinā dyauḥ iva uravaḥ

original: RV_5,057.05a purudrapsā añjimantaḥ sudānavas tveṣasaṃdṛśo anavabhrarādhasaḥ /
analyzed: puru drapsāḥ añjimantaḥ sudānavaḥ tveṣa saṃdṛśaḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ

original: RV_5,057.05c sujātāso januṣā rukmavakṣaso divo arkā amṛtaṃ nāma bhejire //
analyzed: su jātāsaḥ januṣā rukma vakṣasaḥ divaḥ arkāḥ amṛtam nāma bhejire

original: RV_5,057.06a ṛṣṭayo vo maruto aṃsayor adhi saha ojo bāhvor vo balaṃ hitam /
analyzed: ṛṣṭayaḥ vaḥ marutaḥ aṃsayoḥ adhi sahaḥ ojaḥ bāhvoḥ vaḥ balam hitam

original: RV_5,057.06c nṛmṇā śīrṣasv āyudhā ratheṣu vo viśvā vaḥ śrīr adhi tanūṣu pipiśe //
analyzed: nṛmṇā śīrṣasu āyudhā ratheṣu vaḥ viśvā vaḥ śrīḥ adhi tanūṣu pipiśe

original: RV_5,057.07a gomad aśvāvad rathavat suvīraṃ candravad rādho maruto dadā naḥ /
analyzed: gomat aśvāvat rathavat su vīram candravat rādhaḥ marutaḥ dada naḥ

original: RV_5,057.07c praśastiṃ naḥ kṛṇuta rudriyāso bhakṣīya vo 'vaso daivyasya //
analyzed: praśastim naḥ kṛṇuta rudriyāsaḥ bhakṣīya vaḥ vaso daivyasya

original: RV_5,057.08a haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: haye naraḥ marutaḥ mṛḍata naḥ tuvīmaghāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_5,057.08c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: satya śrutaḥ kavayaḥ yuvānaḥ bṛhat girayaḥ bṛhat ukṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_5,058.01a tam u nūnaṃ taviṣīmantam eṣāṃ stuṣe gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām /
analyzed: tam u nūnam taviṣīmantam eṣām stuṣe gaṇam mārutam navyasīnām

original: RV_5,058.01c ya āśvaśvā amavad vahanta uteśire amṛtasya svarājaḥ //
analyzed: ye āśu aśvāḥ amavat vahante uta īśire amṛtasya svarājaḥ

original: RV_5,058.02a tveṣaṃ gaṇaṃ tavasaṃ khādihastaṃ dhunivratam māyinaṃ dātivāram /
analyzed: tveṣam gaṇam tavasam khādi hastam dhuni vratam māyinam dāti vāram

original: RV_5,058.02c mayobhuvo ye amitā mahitvā vandasva vipra tuvirādhaso nṝn //
analyzed: mayobhuvaḥ ye amitāḥ mahitvā vandasva vipra tuvi rādhasaḥ nṝn

original: RV_5,058.03a ā vo yantūdavāhāso adya vṛṣṭiṃ ye viśve maruto junanti /
analyzed: ā vaḥ yantu uda vāhāsaḥ adya vṛṣṭim ye viśve marutaḥ junanti

original: RV_5,058.03c ayaṃ yo agnir marutaḥ samiddha etaṃ juṣadhvaṃ kavayo yuvānaḥ //
analyzed: ayam yaḥ agniḥ marutaḥ samiddhaḥ etam juṣadhvam kavayaḥ yuvānaḥ

original: RV_5,058.04a yūyaṃ rājānam iryaṃ janāya vibhvataṣṭaṃ janayathā yajatrāḥ /
analyzed: yūyam rājānam iryam janāya vibhva taṣṭam janayatha yajatrāḥ

original: RV_5,058.04c yuṣmad eti muṣṭihā bāhujūto yuṣmat sadaśvo marutaḥ suvīraḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmat eti muṣṭi hā bāhu jūtaḥ yuṣmat sat aśvaḥ marutaḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_5,058.05a arā ived acaramā aheva pra-pra jāyante akavā mahobhiḥ /
analyzed: arāḥ iva id a caramāḥ aha iva pra pra jāyante akavāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_5,058.05c pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ //
analyzed: pṛśneḥ putrāḥ upamāsaḥ rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ

original: RV_5,058.06a yat prāyāsiṣṭa pṛṣatībhir aśvair vīḷupavibhir maruto rathebhiḥ /
analyzed: yat prāyāsiṣṭa pṛṣatībhiḥ aśvaiḥ vīḍu pavibhiḥ marutaḥ rathebhiḥ

original: RV_5,058.06c kṣodanta āpo riṇate vanāny avosriyo vṛṣabhaḥ krandatu dyauḥ //
analyzed: kṣodante āpaḥ riṇate vanāni ava usriyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ krandatu dyauḥ

original: RV_5,058.07a prathiṣṭa yāman pṛthivī cid eṣām bharteva garbhaṃ svam ic chavo dhuḥ /
analyzed: prathiṣṭa yāman pṛthivī cit eṣām bhartā iva garbham svam id śavaḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_5,058.07c vātān hy aśvān dhury āyuyujre varṣaṃ svedaṃ cakrire rudriyāsaḥ //
analyzed: vātān hi aśvān dhuri āyuyujre varṣam svedam cakrire rudriyāsaḥ

original: RV_5,058.08a haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: haye naraḥ marutaḥ mṛḍata naḥ tuvīmaghāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_5,058.08c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: satya śrutaḥ kavayaḥ yuvānaḥ bṛhat girayaḥ bṛhat ukṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_5,059.01a pra va spaḷ akran suvitāya dāvane 'rcā dive pra pṛthivyā ṛtam bhare /
analyzed: pra vaḥ spaḷ akran suvitāya dāvane rcā dive pra pṛthivyai ṛtam bhare

original: RV_5,059.01c ukṣante aśvān taruṣanta ā rajo 'nu svam bhānuṃ śrathayante arṇavaiḥ //
analyzed: ukṣante aśvān ā rajaḥ nu svam bhānum śrathayante arṇavaiḥ

original: RV_5,059.02a amād eṣām bhiyasā bhūmir ejati naur na pūrṇā kṣarati vyathir yatī /
analyzed: amāt eṣām bhiyasā bhūmiḥ ejati nauḥ na pūrṇā kṣarati vyathiḥ yatī

original: RV_5,059.02c dūredṛśo ye citayanta emabhir antar mahe vidathe yetire naraḥ //
analyzed: dūredṛśaḥ ye citayante emabhiḥ antar mahe vidathe yetire naraḥ

original: RV_5,059.03a gavām iva śriyase śṛṅgam uttamaṃ sūryo na cakṣū rajaso visarjane /
analyzed: gavām iva śriyase śṛṅgam uttamam sūryaḥ na cakṣuḥ rajasaḥ visarjane

original: RV_5,059.03c atyā iva subhvaś cārava sthana maryā iva śriyase cetathā naraḥ //
analyzed: atyāḥ iva su bhvaḥ cāravaḥ sthana maryāḥ iva śriyase cetathā naraḥ

original: RV_5,059.04a ko vo mahānti mahatām ud aśnavat kas kāvyā marutaḥ ko ha pauṃsyā /
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ mahānti mahatām ud aśnavat kaḥ kāvyā marutaḥ kaḥ ha pauṃsyā

original: RV_5,059.04c yūyaṃ ha bhūmiṃ kiraṇaṃ na rejatha pra yad bharadhve suvitāya dāvane //
analyzed: yūyam ha bhūmim kiraṇam na rejatha pra yat bharadhve suvitāya dāvane

original: RV_5,059.05a aśvā ived aruṣāsaḥ sabandhavaḥ śūrā iva prayudhaḥ prota yuyudhuḥ /
analyzed: aśvāḥ iva id aruṣāsaḥ sabandhavaḥ śūrāḥ iva prayudhaḥ pra uta yuyudhuḥ

original: RV_5,059.05c maryā iva suvṛdho vāvṛdhur naraḥ sūryasya cakṣuḥ pra minanti vṛṣṭibhiḥ //
analyzed: maryāḥ iva suvṛdhaḥ vāvṛdhuḥ naraḥ sūryasya cakṣuḥ pra minanti vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_5,059.06a te ajyeṣṭhā akaniṣṭhāsa udbhido 'madhyamāso mahasā vi vāvṛdhuḥ /
analyzed: te a jyeṣṭhāḥ a kaniṣṭhāsaḥ udbhidaḥ madhyamāsaḥ mahasā vi vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_5,059.06c sujātāso januṣā pṛśnimātaro divo maryā ā no acchā jigātana //
analyzed: su jātāsaḥ januṣā pṛśni mātaraḥ divaḥ maryāḥ ā naḥ acchā jigātana

original: RV_5,059.07a vayo na ye śreṇīḥ paptur ojasāntān divo bṛhataḥ sānunas pari /
analyzed: vayaḥ na ye śreṇīḥ paptuḥ ojasā antān divaḥ bṛhataḥ sānunaḥ pari

original: RV_5,059.07c aśvāsa eṣām ubhaye yathā viduḥ pra parvatasya nabhanūṃr acucyavuḥ //
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ eṣām ubhaye yathā viduḥ pra parvatasya nabhanūn acucyavuḥ

original: RV_5,059.08a mimātu dyaur aditir vītaye naḥ saṃ dānucitrā uṣaso yatantām /
analyzed: mimātu dyauḥ aditiḥ vītaye naḥ sam dānu citrāḥ uṣasaḥ yatantām

original: RV_5,059.08c ācucyavur divyaṃ kośam eta ṛṣe rudrasya maruto gṛṇānāḥ //
analyzed: ācucyavuḥ divyam kośam ete ṛṣe rudrasya marutaḥ gṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_5,060.01a īḷe agniṃ svavasaṃ namobhir iha prasatto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: īḍe agnim su avasam namobhiḥ iha prasattaḥ vi cayat kṛtam naḥ

original: RV_5,060.01c rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇin marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām //
analyzed: rathaiḥ iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇit marutām stomam ṛdhyām

original: RV_5,060.02a ā ye tasthuḥ pṛṣatīṣu śrutāsu sukheṣu rudrā maruto ratheṣu /
analyzed: ā ye tasthuḥ pṛṣatīṣu śrutāsu sukheṣu rudrāḥ marutaḥ ratheṣu

original: RV_5,060.02c vanā cid ugrā jihate ni vo bhiyā pṛthivī cid rejate parvataś cit //
analyzed: vanā cit ugrā jihate ni vaḥ bhiyā pṛthivī cit rejate parvataḥ cit

original: RV_5,060.03a parvataś cin mahi vṛddho bibhāya divaś cit sānu rejata svane vaḥ /
analyzed: parvataḥ cit mahi vṛddhaḥ bibhāya divaḥ cit sānu rejata svane vaḥ

original: RV_5,060.03c yat krīḷatha maruta ṛṣṭimanta āpa iva sadhryañco dhavadhve //
analyzed: yat krīḍatha marutaḥ ṛṣṭimantaḥ āpaḥ iva sadhryañcaḥ dhavadhve

original: RV_5,060.04a varā ived raivatāso hiraṇyair abhi svadhābhis tanvaḥ pipiśre /
analyzed: varāḥ iva id raivatāsaḥ hiraṇyaiḥ abhi svadhābhiḥ tanvaḥ pipiśre

original: RV_5,060.04c śriye śreyāṃsas tavaso ratheṣu satrā mahāṃsi cakrire tanūṣu //
analyzed: śriye śreyāṃsaḥ tavasaḥ ratheṣu satrā mahāṃsi cakrire tanūṣu

original: RV_5,060.05a ajyeṣṭhāso akaniṣṭhāsa ete sam bhrātaro vāvṛdhuḥ saubhagāya /
analyzed: a jyeṣṭhāsaḥ a kaniṣṭhāsaḥ ete sam bhrātaraḥ vāvṛdhuḥ saubhagāya

original: RV_5,060.05c yuvā pitā svapā rudra eṣāṃ sudughā pṛśniḥ sudinā marudbhyaḥ //
analyzed: yuvā pitā su apāḥ rudraḥ eṣām su dughā pṛśniḥ su dinā marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_5,060.06a yad uttame maruto madhyame vā yad vāvame subhagāso divi ṣṭha /
analyzed: yat uttame marutaḥ madhyame vā yat vā avame subhagāsaḥ divi ṣṭha

original: RV_5,060.06c ato no rudrā uta vā nv asyāgne vittād dhaviṣo yad yajāma //
analyzed: atas naḥ rudrāḥ uta vā nu asya agne vittāt haviṣaḥ yat yajāma

original: RV_5,060.07a agniś ca yan maruto viśvavedaso divo vahadhva uttarād adhi ṣṇubhiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ ca yat marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ divaḥ vahadhve uttarāt adhi snubhiḥ

original: RV_5,060.07c te mandasānā dhunayo riśādaso vāmaṃ dhatta yajamānāya sunvate //
analyzed: te mandasānāḥ dhunayaḥ riśādasaḥ vāmam dhatta yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_5,060.08a agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhir ṛkvabhiḥ somam piba mandasāno gaṇaśribhiḥ /
analyzed: agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ somam piba mandasānaḥ gaṇa śribhiḥ

original: RV_5,060.08c pāvakebhir viśvaminvebhir āyubhir vaiśvānara pradivā ketunā sajūḥ //
analyzed: pāvakebhiḥ viśvaminvebhiḥ āyubhiḥ vaiśvānara pradivā ketunā sajūs

original: RV_5,061.01a ke ṣṭhā naraḥ śreṣṭhatamā ya eka-eka āyaya /
analyzed: ke stha naraḥ śreṣṭhatamāḥ ye eka ekaḥ āyaya

original: RV_5,061.01c paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ //
analyzed: paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ

original: RV_5,061.02a kva vo 'śvāḥ kvābhīśavaḥ kathaṃ śeka kathā yaya /
analyzed: kva vaḥ śvās kva abhīśavaḥ katham śeka kathā yaya

original: RV_5,061.02c pṛṣṭhe sado nasor yamaḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe sadaḥ nasoḥ yamaḥ

original: RV_5,061.03a jaghane coda eṣāṃ vi sakthāni naro yamuḥ /
analyzed: jaghane codaḥ eṣām vi sakthāni naraḥ yamuḥ

original: RV_5,061.03c putrakṛthe na janayaḥ //
analyzed: putrakṛthe na janayaḥ

original: RV_5,061.04a parā vīrāsa etana maryāso bhadrajānayaḥ /
analyzed: parā vīrāsaḥ etana maryāsaḥ bhadra jānayaḥ

original: RV_5,061.04c agnitapo yathāsatha //
analyzed: agnitapaḥ yathā asatha

original: RV_5,061.05a sanat sāśvyam paśum uta gavyaṃ śatāvayam /
analyzed: sanat sā aśvyam paśum uta gavyam śatāvayam

original: RV_5,061.05c śyāvāśvastutāya yā dor vīrāyopabarbṛhat //
analyzed: śyāvāśva stutāya yā doḥ vīrāya upabarbṛhat

original: RV_5,061.06a uta tvā strī śaśīyasī puṃso bhavati vasyasī /
analyzed: uta tvā strī śaśīyasī puṃsaḥ bhavati vasyasī

original: RV_5,061.06c adevatrād arādhasaḥ //
analyzed: adevatrāt arādhasaḥ

original: RV_5,061.07a vi yā jānāti jasuriṃ vi tṛṣyantaṃ vi kāminam /
analyzed: vi yā jānāti jasurim vi tṛṣyantam vi kāminam

original: RV_5,061.07c devatrā kṛṇute manaḥ //
analyzed: devatrā kṛṇute manaḥ

original: RV_5,061.08a uta ghā nemo astutaḥ pumāṃ iti bruve paṇiḥ /
analyzed: uta ghā nemaḥ a stutaḥ pumān iti bruve paṇiḥ

original: RV_5,061.08c sa vairadeya it samaḥ //
analyzed: sa vaira deye id samaḥ

original: RV_5,061.09a uta me 'rapad yuvatir mamanduṣī prati śyāvāya vartanim /
analyzed: uta me rapat yuvatiḥ mamanduṣī prati śyāvāya vartanim

original: RV_5,061.09c vi rohitā purumīḷhāya yematur viprāya dīrghayaśase //
analyzed: vi rohitā purumīḷhāya yematuḥ viprāya dīrgha yaśase

original: RV_5,061.10a yo me dhenūnāṃ śataṃ vaidadaśvir yathā dadat /
analyzed: yaḥ me dhenūnām śatam vaidadaśviḥ yathā dadat

original: RV_5,061.10c taranta iva maṃhanā //
analyzed: tarantaḥ iva maṃhanā

original: RV_5,061.11a ya īṃ vahanta āśubhiḥ pibanto madiram madhu /
analyzed: ye īm vahante āśubhiḥ pibantaḥ madiram madhu

original: RV_5,061.11c atra śravāṃsi dadhire //
analyzed: atra śravāṃsi dadhire

original: RV_5,061.12a yeṣāṃ śriyādhi rodasī vibhrājante ratheṣv ā /
analyzed: yeṣām śriyā adhi rodasī vibhrājante ratheṣu ā

original: RV_5,061.12c divi rukma ivopari //
analyzed: divi rukmaḥ iva upari

original: RV_5,061.13a yuvā sa māruto gaṇas tveṣaratho anedyaḥ /
analyzed: yuvā sa mārutaḥ gaṇaḥ tveṣa rathaḥ anedyaḥ

original: RV_5,061.13c śubhaṃyāvāpratiṣkutaḥ //
analyzed: śubhaṃyāvā apratiṣkutaḥ

original: RV_5,061.14a ko veda nūnam eṣāṃ yatrā madanti dhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ veda nūnam eṣām yatrā madanti dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_5,061.14c ṛtajātā arepasaḥ //
analyzed: ṛta jātāḥ arepasaḥ

original: RV_5,061.15a yūyam martaṃ vipanyavaḥ praṇetāra itthā dhiyā /
analyzed: yūyam martam vipanyavaḥ praṇetāraḥ itthā dhiyā

original: RV_5,061.15c śrotāro yāmahūtiṣu //
analyzed: śrotāraḥ yāma hūtiṣu

original: RV_5,061.16a te no vasūni kāmyā puruścandrā riśādasaḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ vasūni kāmyā puru ścandrā riśādasaḥ

original: RV_5,061.16c ā yajñiyāso vavṛttana //
analyzed: ā yajñiyāsaḥ vavṛttana

original: RV_5,061.17a etam me stomam ūrmye dārbhyāya parā vaha /
analyzed: etam me stomam ūrmye dārbhyāya parā vaha

original: RV_5,061.17c giro devi rathīr iva //
analyzed: giraḥ devi rathīḥ iva

original: RV_5,061.18a uta me vocatād iti sutasome rathavītau /
analyzed: uta me vocatāt iti suta some rathavītau

original: RV_5,061.18c na kāmo apa veti me //
analyzed: na kāmaḥ apa veti me

original: RV_5,061.19a eṣa kṣeti rathavītir maghavā gomatīr anu /
analyzed: eṣa kṣeti rathavītiḥ maghavā gomatīḥ anu

original: RV_5,061.19c parvateṣv apaśritaḥ //
analyzed: parvateṣu apaśritaḥ

original: RV_5,062.01a ṛtena ṛtam apihitaṃ dhruvaṃ vāṃ sūryasya yatra vimucanty aśvān /
analyzed: ṛtena ṛtam apihitam dhruvam vām sūryasya yatra vimucanti aśvān

original: RV_5,062.01c daśa śatā saha tasthus tad ekaṃ devānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vapuṣām apaśyam //
analyzed: daśa śatā saha tasthuḥ tat ekam devānām śreṣṭham vapuṣām apaśyam

original: RV_5,062.02a tat su vām mitrāvaruṇā mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīr ahabhir duduhre /
analyzed: tat su vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīḥ ahabhiḥ duduhre

original: RV_5,062.02c viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenā anu vām ekaḥ pavir ā vavarta //
analyzed: viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenāḥ anu vām ekaḥ paviḥ ā vavarta

original: RV_5,062.03a adhārayatam pṛthivīm uta dyām mitrarājānā varuṇā mahobhiḥ /
analyzed: adhārayatam pṛthivīm uta dyām mitra rājānā varuṇā mahobhiḥ

original: RV_5,062.03c vardhayatam oṣadhīḥ pinvataṃ gā ava vṛṣṭiṃ sṛjataṃ jīradānū //
analyzed: vardhayatam oṣadhīḥ pinvatam gāḥ ava vṛṣṭim sṛjatam jīra dānū

original: RV_5,062.04a ā vām aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahantu yataraśmaya upa yantv arvāk /
analyzed: ā vām aśvāsaḥ su yujaḥ vahantu yata raśmayaḥ upa yantu arvāk

original: RV_5,062.04c ghṛtasya nirṇig anu vartate vām upa sindhavaḥ pradivi kṣaranti //
analyzed: ghṛtasya nirṇij anu vartate vām upa sindhavaḥ pradivi kṣaranti

original: RV_5,062.05a anu śrutām amatiṃ vardhad urvīm barhir iva yajuṣā rakṣamāṇā /
analyzed: anu śrutām amatim vardhat urvīm barhiḥ iva yajuṣā rakṣamāṇā

original: RV_5,062.05c namasvantā dhṛtadakṣādhi garte mitrāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ //
analyzed: namasvantā dhṛtadakṣā adhi garte mitrā āsāthe varuṇā iḷāsu antar

original: RV_5,062.06a akravihastā sukṛte paraspā yaṃ trāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ /
analyzed: a kravi hastā su kṛte paraspā yam trāsāthe varuṇā iḷāsu antar

original: RV_5,062.06c rājānā kṣatram ahṛṇīyamānā sahasrasthūṇam bibhṛthaḥ saha dvau //
analyzed: rājānā kṣatram a hṛṇīyamānā sahasra sthūṇam bibhṛthaḥ saha dvau

original: RV_5,062.07a hiraṇyanirṇig ayo asya sthūṇā vi bhrājate divy aśvājanīva /
analyzed: hiraṇya nirṇij ayaḥ asya sthūṇā vi bhrājate divi aśvājanī iva

original: RV_5,062.07c bhadre kṣetre nimitā tilvile vā sanema madhvo adhigartyasya //
analyzed: bhadre kṣetre nimitā tilvile vā sanema madhvaḥ adhigartyasya

original: RV_5,062.08a hiraṇyarūpam uṣaso vyuṣṭāv ayasthūṇam uditā sūryasya /
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpam uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau aya sthūṇam uditā sūryasya

original: RV_5,062.08c ā rohatho varuṇa mitra gartam ataś cakṣāthe aditiṃ ditiṃ ca //
analyzed: ā rohathaḥ varuṇa mitra gartam atas cakṣāthe aditim ditim ca

original: RV_5,062.09a yad baṃhiṣṭhaṃ nātividhe sudānū acchidraṃ śarma bhuvanasya gopā /
analyzed: yat baṃhiṣṭham na atividhe sudānū acchidram śarma bhuvanasya gopā

original: RV_5,062.09c tena no mitrāvaruṇāv aviṣṭaṃ siṣāsanto jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma //
analyzed: tena naḥ mitrāvaruṇau aviṣṭam siṣāsantaḥ jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma

original: RV_5,063.01a ṛtasya gopāv adhi tiṣṭhatho rathaṃ satyadharmāṇā parame vyomani /
analyzed: ṛtasya gopau adhi tiṣṭhathaḥ ratham satya dharmāṇā parame vyomani

original: RV_5,063.01c yam atra mitrāvaruṇāvatho yuvaṃ tasmai vṛṣṭir madhumat pinvate divaḥ //
analyzed: yam atra mitrāvaruṇau avathaḥ yuvam tasmai vṛṣṭiḥ madhumat pinvate divaḥ

original: RV_5,063.02a samrājāv asya bhuvanasya rājatho mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svardṛśā /
analyzed: samrājau asya bhuvanasya rājathaḥ mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svar dṛśā

original: RV_5,063.02c vṛṣṭiṃ vāṃ rādho amṛtatvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vi caranti tanyavaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṭim vām rādhaḥ amṛta tvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vi caranti tanyavaḥ

original: RV_5,063.03a samrājā ugrā vṛṣabhā divas patī pṛthivyā mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī /
analyzed: samrājau ugrā vṛṣabhā divaḥ patī pṛthivyāḥ mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī

original: RV_5,063.03c citrebhir abhrair upa tiṣṭhatho ravaṃ dyāṃ varṣayatho asurasya māyayā //
analyzed: citrebhiḥ abhraiḥ upa tiṣṭhathaḥ ravam dyām varṣayathaḥ asurasya māyayā

original: RV_5,063.04a māyā vām mitrāvaruṇā divi śritā sūryo jyotiś carati citram āyudham /
analyzed: māyā vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ divi śritā sūryaḥ jyotiḥ carati citram āyudham

original: RV_5,063.04c tam abhreṇa vṛṣṭyā gūhatho divi parjanya drapsā madhumanta īrate //
analyzed: tam abhreṇa vṛṣṭyā gūhathaḥ divi parjanya drapsāḥ madhumantaḥ īrate

original: RV_5,063.05a rathaṃ yuñjate marutaḥ śubhe sukhaṃ śūro na mitrāvaruṇā gaviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: ratham yuñjate marutaḥ śubhe sukham śūraḥ na mitrāvaruṇā gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_5,063.05c rajāṃsi citrā vi caranti tanyavo divaḥ samrājā payasā na ukṣatam //
analyzed: rajāṃsi citrāḥ vi caranti tanyavaḥ divaḥ samrājā payasā naḥ ukṣatam

original: RV_5,063.06a vācaṃ su mitrāvaruṇāv irāvatīm parjanyaś citrāṃ vadati tviṣīmatīm /
analyzed: vācam su mitrāvaruṇau irāvatīm parjanyaḥ citrām vadati tviṣīmatīm

original: RV_5,063.06c abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyāṃ varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam //
analyzed: abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyām varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam

original: RV_5,063.07a dharmaṇā mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā vratā rakṣethe asurasya māyayā /
analyzed: dharmaṇā mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā vratā rakṣethe asurasya māyayā

original: RV_5,063.07c ṛtena viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājathaḥ sūryam ā dhattho divi citryaṃ ratham //
analyzed: ṛtena viśvam bhuvanam vi rājathaḥ sūryam ā dhatthaḥ divi citryam ratham

original: RV_5,064.01a varuṇaṃ vo riśādasam ṛcā mitraṃ havāmahe /
analyzed: varuṇam vaḥ riśādasam ṛcā mitram havāmahe

original: RV_5,064.01c pari vrajeva bāhvor jaganvāṃsā svarṇaram //
analyzed: pari vrajā iva bāhvoḥ jaganvāṃsā svarṇaram

original: RV_5,064.02a tā bāhavā sucetunā pra yantam asmā arcate /
analyzed: tā bāhavā sucetunā pra yantam asmai arcate

original: RV_5,064.02c śevaṃ hi jāryaṃ vāṃ viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve //
analyzed: śevam hi jāryam vām viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve

original: RV_5,064.03a yan nūnam aśyāṃ gatim mitrasya yāyām pathā /
analyzed: yat nūnam aśyām gatim mitrasya yāyām pathā

original: RV_5,064.03c asya priyasya śarmaṇy ahiṃsānasya saścire //
analyzed: asya priyasya śarmaṇi a hiṃsānasya saścire

original: RV_5,064.04a yuvābhyām mitrāvaruṇopamaṃ dheyām ṛcā /
analyzed: yuvābhyām mitrāvaruṇā upamam dheyām ṛcā

original: RV_5,064.04c yad dha kṣaye maghonāṃ stotṝṇāṃ ca spūrdhase //
analyzed: yat ha kṣaye maghonām stotṝṇām ca spūrdhase

original: RV_5,064.05a ā no mitra sudītibhir varuṇaś ca sadhastha ā /
analyzed: ā naḥ mitra su dītibhiḥ varuṇaḥ ca sadhasthe ā

original: RV_5,064.05c sve kṣaye maghonāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca vṛdhase //
analyzed: sve kṣaye maghonām sakhīnām ca vṛdhase

original: RV_5,064.06a yuvaṃ no yeṣu varuṇa kṣatram bṛhac ca bibhṛthaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam naḥ yeṣu varuṇa kṣatram bṛhat ca bibhṛthaḥ

original: RV_5,064.06c uru ṇo vājasātaye kṛtaṃ rāye svastaye //
analyzed: uru naḥ vājasātaye kṛtam rāye svastaye

original: RV_5,064.07a ucchantyām me yajatā devakṣatre ruśadgavi /
analyzed: ucchantyām me yajatā devakṣatre ruśadgavi

original: RV_5,064.07c sutaṃ somaṃ na hastibhir ā paḍbhir dhāvataṃ narā bibhratāv arcanānasam //
analyzed: sutam somam na hastibhiḥ ā paḍbhiḥ dhāvatam narā bibhratau arcanānasam

original: RV_5,065.01a yaś ciketa sa sukratur devatrā sa bravītu naḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ciketa sa su kratuḥ devatrā sa bravītu naḥ

original: RV_5,065.01c varuṇo yasya darśato mitro vā vanate giraḥ //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ yasya darśataḥ mitraḥ vā vanate giraḥ

original: RV_5,065.02a tā hi śreṣṭhavarcasā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā /
analyzed: tā hi śreṣṭha varcasā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā

original: RV_5,065.02c tā satpatī ṛtāvṛdha ṛtāvānā jane-jane //
analyzed: tā sat patī ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtāvānā janejane

original: RV_5,065.03a tā vām iyāno 'vase pūrvā upa bruve sacā /
analyzed: tā vām iyānaḥ vase pūrvau upa bruve sacā

original: RV_5,065.03c svaśvāsaḥ su cetunā vājāṃ abhi pra dāvane //
analyzed: su aśvāsaḥ su cetunā vājām abhi pra dāvane

original: RV_5,065.04a mitro aṃhoś cid ād uru kṣayāya gātuṃ vanate /
analyzed: mitraḥ aṃhoḥ cit āt uru kṣayāya gātum vanate

original: RV_5,065.04c mitrasya hi pratūrvataḥ sumatir asti vidhataḥ //
analyzed: mitrasya hi pratūrvataḥ sumatiḥ asti vidhataḥ

original: RV_5,065.05a vayam mitrasyāvasi syāma saprathastame /
analyzed: vayam mitrasya avasi syāma saprathastame

original: RV_5,065.05c anehasas tvotayaḥ satrā varuṇaśeṣasaḥ //
analyzed: anehasaḥ tvotayaḥ satrā varuṇa śeṣasaḥ

original: RV_5,065.06a yuvam mitremaṃ janaṃ yatathaḥ saṃ ca nayathaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam mitrā imam janam yatathaḥ sam ca nayathaḥ

original: RV_5,065.06c mā maghonaḥ pari khyatam mo asmākam ṛṣīṇāṃ gopīthe na uruṣyatam //
analyzed: mā maghonaḥ pari khyatam mā u asmākam ṛṣīṇām gopīthe naḥ uruṣyatam

original: RV_5,066.01a ā cikitāna sukratū devau marta riśādasā /
analyzed: ā cikitāna su kratū devau marta riśādasā

original: RV_5,066.01c varuṇāya ṛtapeśase dadhīta prayase mahe //
analyzed: varuṇāya ṛta peśase dadhīta prayase mahe

original: RV_5,066.02a tā hi kṣatram avihrutaṃ samyag asuryam āśāte /
analyzed: tā hi kṣatram a vihrutam samyak asuryam āśāte

original: RV_5,066.02c adha vrateva mānuṣaṃ svar ṇa dhāyi darśatam //
analyzed: adha vratā iva mānuṣam svar na dhāyi darśatam

original: RV_5,066.03a tā vām eṣe rathānām urvīṃ gavyūtim eṣām /
analyzed: tā vām rathānām urvīm gavyūtim eṣām

original: RV_5,066.03c rātahavyasya suṣṭutiṃ dadhṛk stomair manāmahe //
analyzed: rāta havyasya suṣṭutim dadhṛṣ stomaiḥ manāmahe

original: RV_5,066.04a adhā hi kāvyā yuvaṃ dakṣasya pūrbhir adbhutā /
analyzed: adhā hi kāvyā yuvam dakṣasya pūrbhiḥ adbhutā

original: RV_5,066.04c ni ketunā janānāṃ cikethe pūtadakṣasā //
analyzed: ni ketunā janānām cikethe pūta dakṣasā

original: RV_5,066.05a tad ṛtam pṛthivi bṛhac chravaeṣa ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: tat ṛtam pṛthivi bṛhat śravaḥ eṣaḥ ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_5,066.05c jrayasānāv aram pṛthv ati kṣaranti yāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: jrayasānau aram pṛthu ati kṣaranti yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_5,066.06a ā yad vām īyacakṣasā mitra vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: ā yat vām mitra vayam ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_5,066.06c vyaciṣṭhe bahupāyye yatemahi svarājye //
analyzed: vyaciṣṭhe bahu pāyye yatemahi sva rājye

original: RV_5,067.01a baḷ itthā deva niṣkṛtam ādityā yajatam bṛhat /
analyzed: baḷ itthā deva niṣkṛtam ādityā yajatam bṛhat

original: RV_5,067.01c varuṇa mitrāryaman varṣiṣṭhaṃ kṣatram āśāthe //
analyzed: varuṇa mitra aryaman varṣiṣṭham kṣatram āśāthe

original: RV_5,067.02a ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇa mitra sadathaḥ /
analyzed: ā yat yonim hiraṇyayam varuṇa mitra sadathaḥ

original: RV_5,067.02c dhartārā carṣaṇīnāṃ yantaṃ sumnaṃ riśādasā //
analyzed: dhartārā carṣaṇīnām yantam sumnam riśādasā

original: RV_5,067.03a viśve hi viśvavedaso varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: viśve hi viśva vedasaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_5,067.03c vratā padeva saścire pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ //
analyzed: vratā padā iva saścire pānti martyam riṣaḥ

original: RV_5,067.04a te hi satyā ṛtaspṛśa ṛtāvāno jane-jane /
analyzed: te hi satyāḥ ṛta spṛśaḥ ṛtāvānaḥ janejane

original: RV_5,067.04c sunīthāsaḥ sudānavo 'ṃhoś cid urucakrayaḥ //
analyzed: su nīthāsaḥ sudānavaḥ ṃhoḥ cit uru cakrayaḥ

original: RV_5,067.05a ko nu vām mitrāstuto varuṇo vā tanūnām /
analyzed: kaḥ nu vām mitrāstutaḥ varuṇaḥ vā tanūnām

original: RV_5,067.05c tat su vām eṣate matir atribhya eṣate matiḥ //
analyzed: tat su vām eṣate matiḥ atribhyaḥ eṣate matiḥ

original: RV_5,068.01a pra vo mitrāya gāyata varuṇāya vipā girā /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mitrāya gāyata varuṇāya vipā girā

original: RV_5,068.01c mahikṣatrāv ṛtam bṛhat //
analyzed: mahi kṣatrau ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_5,068.02a samrājā yā ghṛtayonī mitraś cobhā varuṇaś ca /
analyzed: samrājā yā ghṛta yonī mitraḥ ca ubhā varuṇaḥ ca

original: RV_5,068.02c devā deveṣu praśastā //
analyzed: devā deveṣu praśastā

original: RV_5,068.03a tā naḥ śaktam pārthivasya maho rāyo divyasya /
analyzed: tā naḥ śaktam pārthivasya mahaḥ rāyaḥ divyasya

original: RV_5,068.03c mahi vāṃ kṣatraṃ deveṣu //
analyzed: mahi vām kṣatram deveṣu

original: RV_5,068.04a ṛtam ṛtena sapanteṣiraṃ dakṣam āśāte /
analyzed: ṛtam ṛtena sapantā iṣiram dakṣam āśāte

original: RV_5,068.04c adruhā devau vardhete //
analyzed: adruhā devau vardhete

original: RV_5,068.05a vṛṣṭidyāvā rītyāpeṣas patī dānumatyāḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣṭi dyāvā rīti apā iṣaḥ patī dānumatyāḥ

original: RV_5,068.05c bṛhantaṃ gartam āśāte //
analyzed: bṛhantam gartam āśāte

original: RV_5,069.01a trī rocanā varuṇa trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi mitra dhārayatho rajāṃsi /
analyzed: trī rocanā varuṇa trīn uta dyūn trīṇi mitra dhārayathaḥ rajāṃsi

original: RV_5,069.01c vāvṛdhānāv amatiṃ kṣatriyasyānu vrataṃ rakṣamāṇāv ajuryam //
analyzed: vāvṛdhānau amatim kṣatriyasya anu vratam rakṣamāṇau ajuryam

original: RV_5,069.02a irāvatīr varuṇa dhenavo vām madhumad vāṃ sindhavo mitra duhre /
analyzed: irāvatīḥ varuṇa dhenavaḥ vām madhumat vām sindhavaḥ mitra duhre

original: RV_5,069.02c trayas tasthur vṛṣabhāsas tisṛṇāṃ dhiṣaṇānāṃ retodhā vi dyumantaḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ tasthuḥ vṛṣabhāsaḥ tisṛṇām dhiṣaṇānām retaḥ dhāḥ vi dyumantaḥ

original: RV_5,069.03a prātar devīm aditiṃ johavīmi madhyandina uditā sūryasya /
analyzed: prātar devīm aditim johavīmi madhyandine uditā sūryasya

original: RV_5,069.03c rāye mitrāvaruṇā sarvatāteḷe tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: rāye mitrāvaruṇā sarvatātā īḍe tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_5,069.04a yā dhartārā rajaso rocanasyotādityā divyā pārthivasya /
analyzed: yā dhartārā rajasaḥ rocanasya uta ādityā divyā pārthivasya

original: RV_5,069.04c na vāṃ devā amṛtā ā minanti vratāni mitrāvaruṇā dhruvāṇi //
analyzed: na vām devāḥ amṛtāḥ ā minanti vratāni mitrāvaruṇā dhruvāṇi

original: RV_5,070.01a purūruṇā cid dhy asty avo nūnaṃ vāṃ varuṇa /
analyzed: purūruṇā cit hi asti avaḥ nūnam vām varuṇa

original: RV_5,070.01c mitra vaṃsi vāṃ sumatim //
analyzed: mitra vaṃsi vām sumatim

original: RV_5,070.02a tā vāṃ samyag adruhvāṇeṣam aśyāma dhāyase /
analyzed: tā vām samyak adruhvāṇā iṣam aśyāma dhāyase

original: RV_5,070.02c vayaṃ te rudrā syāma //
analyzed: vayam te rudrā syāma

original: RV_5,070.03a pātaṃ no rudrā pāyubhir uta trāyethāṃ sutrātrā /
analyzed: pātam naḥ rudrā pāyubhiḥ uta trāyethām su trātrā

original: RV_5,070.03c turyāma dasyūn tanūbhiḥ //
analyzed: turyāma dasyūn tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_5,070.04a mā kasyādbhutakratū yakṣam bhujemā tanūbhiḥ /
analyzed: mā kasya adbhuta kratū yakṣam bhujema tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_5,070.04c mā śeṣasā mā tanasā //
analyzed: mā śeṣasā mā tanasā

original: RV_5,071.01a ā no gantaṃ riśādasā varuṇa mitra barhaṇā /
analyzed: ā naḥ gantam riśādasā varuṇa mitra barhaṇā

original: RV_5,071.01c upemaṃ cārum adhvaram //
analyzed: upa imam cārum adhvaram

original: RV_5,071.02a viśvasya hi pracetasā varuṇa mitra rājathaḥ /
analyzed: viśvasya hi pracetasā varuṇa mitra rājathaḥ

original: RV_5,071.02c īśānā pipyataṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: īśānā pipyatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_5,071.03a upa naḥ sutam ā gataṃ varuṇa mitra dāśuṣaḥ /
analyzed: upa naḥ sutam ā gatam varuṇa mitra dāśuṣaḥ

original: RV_5,071.03c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_5,072.01a ā mitre varuṇe vayaṃ gīrbhir juhumo atrivat /
analyzed: ā mitre varuṇe vayam gīrbhiḥ juhumaḥ atri vat

original: RV_5,072.01c ni barhiṣi sadataṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi sadatam soma pītaye

original: RV_5,072.02a vratena stho dhruvakṣemā dharmaṇā yātayajjanā /
analyzed: vratena sthaḥ dhruva kṣemā dharmaṇā yātayat janā

original: RV_5,072.02c ni barhiṣi sadataṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi sadatam soma pītaye

original: RV_5,072.03a mitraś ca no varuṇaś ca juṣetāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye /
analyzed: mitraḥ ca naḥ varuṇaḥ ca juṣetām yajñam iṣṭaye

original: RV_5,072.03c ni barhiṣi sadatāṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi sadatām soma pītaye

original: RV_5,073.01a yad adya sthaḥ parāvati yad arvāvaty aśvinā /
analyzed: yat adya sthaḥ parāvati yat arvāvati aśvinā

original: RV_5,073.01c yad vā purū purubhujā yad antarikṣa ā gatam //
analyzed: yat vā purū puru bhujā yat antarikṣe ā gatam

original: RV_5,073.02a iha tyā purubhūtamā purū daṃsāṃsi bibhratā /
analyzed: iha tyā puru bhūtamā purū daṃsāṃsi bibhratā

original: RV_5,073.02c varasyā yāmy adhrigū huve tuviṣṭamā bhuje //
analyzed: varasyā yāmi adhrigū huve tuviṣṭamā bhuje

original: RV_5,073.03a īrmānyad vapuṣe vapuś cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ /
analyzed: īrmānyat vapuṣe vapuḥ cakram rathasya yemathuḥ

original: RV_5,073.03c pary anyā nāhuṣā yugā mahnā rajāṃsi dīyathaḥ //
analyzed: pari anyā nāhuṣā yugā mahnā rajāṃsi dīyathaḥ

original: RV_5,073.04a tad ū ṣu vām enā kṛtaṃ viśvā yad vām anu ṣṭave /
analyzed: tat u su vām enā kṛtam viśvā yat vām anu stave

original: RV_5,073.04c nānā jātāv arepasā sam asme bandhum eyathuḥ //
analyzed: nānā jātau arepasā sam asme bandhum eyathuḥ

original: RV_5,073.05a ā yad vāṃ sūryā rathaṃ tiṣṭhad raghuṣyadaṃ sadā /
analyzed: ā yat vām sūryā ratham tiṣṭhat raghuṣyadam sadā

original: RV_5,073.05c pari vām aruṣā vayo ghṛṇā varanta ātapaḥ //
analyzed: pari vām aruṣāḥ vayaḥ ghṛṇāḥ varante ātapaḥ

original: RV_5,073.06a yuvor atriś ciketati narā sumnena cetasā /
analyzed: yuvoḥ atriḥ ciketati narā sumnena cetasā

original: RV_5,073.06c gharmaṃ yad vām arepasaṃ nāsatyāsnā bhuraṇyati //
analyzed: gharmam yat vām arepasam nāsatya asnā bhuraṇyati

original: RV_5,073.07a ugro vāṃ kakuho yayiḥ śṛṇve yāmeṣu saṃtaniḥ /
analyzed: ugraḥ vām kakuhaḥ yayiḥ śṛṇve yāmeṣu saṃtaniḥ

original: RV_5,073.07c yad vāṃ daṃsobhir aśvinātrir narāvavartati //
analyzed: yat vām daṃsobhiḥ aśvinā atriḥ narā avavartati

original: RV_5,073.08a madhva ū ṣu madhūyuvā rudrā siṣakti pipyuṣī /
analyzed: madhvaḥ u su madhūyuvā rudrā siṣakti pipyuṣī

original: RV_5,073.08c yat samudrāti parṣathaḥ pakvāḥ pṛkṣo bharanta vām //
analyzed: yat samudra ati parṣathaḥ pakvāḥ pṛkṣaḥ bharanta vām

original: RV_5,073.09a satyam id vā u aśvinā yuvām āhur mayobhuvā /
analyzed: satyam id vai u aśvinā yuvām āhuḥ mayobhuvā

original: RV_5,073.09c tā yāman yāmahūtamā yāmann ā mṛḷayattamā //
analyzed: tā yāman yāmahūtamā yāman ā mṛḍayattamā

original: RV_5,073.10a imā brahmāṇi vardhanāśvibhyāṃ santu śantamā /
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi vardhana aśvibhyām santu śantamā

original: RV_5,073.10c yā takṣāma rathāṃ ivāvocāma bṛhan namaḥ //
analyzed: yā takṣāma rathān iva avocāma bṛhat namaḥ

original: RV_5,074.01a kūṣṭho devāv aśvinādyā divo manāvasū /
analyzed: devau aśvinā adyā divaḥ manāvasū

original: RV_5,074.01c tac chravatho vṛṣaṇvasū atrir vām ā vivāsati //
analyzed: tat śravathaḥ vṛṣaṇvasū atriḥ vām ā vivāsati

original: RV_5,074.02a kuha tyā kuha nu śrutā divi devā nāsatyā /
analyzed: kuha tyā kuha nu śrutā divi devā nāsatyā

original: RV_5,074.02c kasminn ā yatatho jane ko vāṃ nadīnāṃ sacā //
analyzed: kasmin ā yatathaḥ jane kaḥ vām nadīnām sacā

original: RV_5,074.03a kaṃ yāthaḥ kaṃ ha gacchathaḥ kam acchā yuñjāthe ratham /
analyzed: kam yāthaḥ kam ha gacchathaḥ kam acchā yuñjāthe ratham

original: RV_5,074.03c kasya brahmāṇi raṇyatho vayaṃ vām uśmasīṣṭaye //
analyzed: kasya brahmāṇi raṇyathaḥ vayam vām uśmasi iṣṭaye

original: RV_5,074.04a pauraṃ cid dhy udaprutam paura paurāya jinvathaḥ /
analyzed: pauram cit hi uda prutam paura paurāya jinvathaḥ

original: RV_5,074.04c yad īṃ gṛbhītatātaye siṃham iva druhas pade //
analyzed: yat īm gṛbhītatātaye siṃham iva druhaḥ pade

original: RV_5,074.05a pra cyavānāj jujuruṣo vavrim atkaṃ na muñcathaḥ /
analyzed: pra cyavānāt jujuruṣaḥ vavrim atkam na muñcathaḥ

original: RV_5,074.05c yuvā yadī kṛthaḥ punar ā kāmam ṛṇve vadhvaḥ //
analyzed: yuvā yadī kṛthaḥ punar ā kāmam ṛṇve vadhvaḥ

original: RV_5,074.06a asti hi vām iha stotā smasi vāṃ saṃdṛśi śriye /
analyzed: asti hi vām iha stotā smasi vām saṃdṛśi śriye

original: RV_5,074.06c nū śrutam ma ā gatam avobhir vājinīvasū //
analyzed: nu śrutam me ā gatam avobhiḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_5,074.07a ko vām adya purūṇām ā vavne martyānām /
analyzed: kaḥ vām adya purūṇām ā vavne martyānām

original: RV_5,074.07c ko vipro vipravāhasā ko yajñair vājinīvasū //
analyzed: kaḥ vipraḥ vipra vāhasā kaḥ yajñaiḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_5,074.08a ā vāṃ ratho rathānāṃ yeṣṭho yātv aśvinā /
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ rathānām yeṣṭhaḥ yātu aśvinā

original: RV_5,074.08c purū cid asmayus tira āṅgūṣo martyeṣv ā //
analyzed: purū cit asmayuḥ tiras āṅgūṣaḥ martyeṣu ā

original: RV_5,074.09a śam ū ṣu vām madhūyuvāsmākam astu carkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: śam u su vām madhūyuvā asmākam astu carkṛtiḥ

original: RV_5,074.09c arvācīnā vicetasā vibhiḥ śyeneva dīyatam //
analyzed: arvācīnā vicetasā vibhiḥ śyenā iva dīyatam

original: RV_5,074.10a aśvinā yad dha karhi cic chuśrūyātam imaṃ havam /
analyzed: aśvinā yat ha karhi cit śuśrūyātam imam havam

original: RV_5,074.10c vasvīr ū ṣu vām bhujaḥ pṛñcanti su vām pṛcaḥ //
analyzed: vasvīḥ u su vām bhujaḥ pṛñcanti su vām pṛcaḥ

original: RV_5,075.01a prati priyatamaṃ rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vasuvāhanam /
analyzed: prati priyatamam ratham vṛṣaṇam vasu vāhanam

original: RV_5,075.01c stotā vām aśvināv ṛṣi stomena prati bhūṣati mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: stotā vām aśvinau ṛṣiḥ stomena prati bhūṣati mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.02a atyāyātam aśvinā tiro viśvā ahaṃ sanā /
analyzed: atyāyātam aśvinā tiras viśvāḥ aham

original: RV_5,075.02c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī suṣumnā sindhuvāhasā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: dasrā hiraṇya vartanī suṣumnā sindhu vāhasā mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.03a ā no ratnāni bibhratāv aśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam /
analyzed: ā naḥ ratnāni bibhratau aśvinā gacchatam yuvam

original: RV_5,075.03c rudrā hiraṇyavartanī juṣāṇā vājinīvasū mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: rudrā hiraṇya vartanī juṣāṇā vājinīvasū mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.04a suṣṭubho vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū rathe vāṇīcy āhitā /
analyzed: suṣṭubhaḥ vām vṛṣaṇvasū rathe vāṇīcī āhitā

original: RV_5,075.04c uta vāṃ kakuho mṛgaḥ pṛkṣaḥ kṛṇoti vāpuṣo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: uta vām kakuhaḥ mṛgaḥ pṛkṣaḥ kṛṇoti vāpuṣaḥ mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.05a bodhinmanasā rathyeṣirā havanaśrutā /
analyzed: bodhinmanasā rathyā iṣirā havana śrutā

original: RV_5,075.05c vibhiś cyavānam aśvinā ni yātho advayāvinam mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: vibhiḥ cyavānam aśvinā ni yāthaḥ a dvayāvinam mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.06a ā vāṃ narā manoyujo 'śvāsaḥ pruṣitapsavaḥ /
analyzed: ā vām narā manaḥ yujaḥ śvāsaḥ pruṣitapsavaḥ

original: RV_5,075.06c vayo vahantu pītaye saha sumnebhir aśvinā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: vayaḥ vahantu pītaye saha sumnebhiḥ aśvinā mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.07a aśvināv eha gacchataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam /
analyzed: aśvinau ā iha gacchatam nāsatyā mā vi venatam

original: RV_5,075.07c tiraś cid aryayā pari vartir yātam adābhyā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: tiras cit aryayā pari vartiḥ yātam adābhyā mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.08a asmin yajñe adābhyā jaritāraṃ śubhas patī /
analyzed: asmin yajñe adābhyā jaritāram śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_5,075.08c avasyum aśvinā yuvaṃ gṛṇantam upa bhūṣatho mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: avasyum aśvinā yuvam gṛṇantam upa bhūṣathaḥ mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,075.09a abhūd uṣā ruśatpaśur āgnir adhāyy ṛtviyaḥ /
analyzed: abhūt uṣāḥ ruśat paśuḥ ā agniḥ adhāyi ṛtviyaḥ

original: RV_5,075.09c ayoji vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ratho dasrāv amartyo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: ayoji vām vṛṣaṇvasū rathaḥ dasrau amartyaḥ mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_5,076.01a ā bhāty agnir uṣasām anīkam ud viprāṇāṃ devayā vāco asthuḥ /
analyzed: ā bhāti agniḥ uṣasām anīkam ud viprāṇām deva yāḥ vācaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_5,076.01c arvāñcā nūnaṃ rathyeha yātam pīpivāṃsam aśvinā gharmam accha //
analyzed: arvāñcā nūnam rathyā iha yātam pīpivāṃsam aśvinā gharmam accha

original: RV_5,076.02a na saṃskṛtam pra mimīto gamiṣṭhānti nūnam aśvinopastuteha /
analyzed: na saṃskṛtam pra mimītaḥ gamiṣṭhā anti nūnam aśvinā upastutā iha

original: RV_5,076.02c divābhipitve 'vasāgamiṣṭhā praty avartiṃ dāśuṣe śambhaviṣṭhā //
analyzed: divā abhipitve vasa āgamiṣṭhā prati avartim dāśuṣe śambhaviṣṭhā

original: RV_5,076.03a utā yātaṃ saṃgave prātar ahno madhyandina uditā sūryasya /
analyzed: uta ā yātam saṃgave prātar ahnaḥ madhyandine uditā sūryasya

original: RV_5,076.03c divā naktam avasā śantamena nedānīm pītir aśvinā tatāna //
analyzed: divā naktam avasā śantamena nā idānīm pītiḥ aśvinā tatāna

original: RV_5,076.04a idaṃ hi vām pradivi sthānam oka ime gṛhā aśvinedaṃ duroṇam /
analyzed: idam hi vām pradivi sthānam okaḥ ime gṛhāḥ aśvinā idam duroṇam

original: RV_5,076.04c ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ādbhyo yātam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā //
analyzed: ā naḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ parvatāt ā adbhyaḥ yātam iṣam ūrjam vahantā

original: RV_5,076.05a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_5,076.05c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_5,077.01a prātaryāvāṇā prathamā yajadhvam purā gṛdhrād araruṣaḥ pibātaḥ /
analyzed: prātaryāvāṇā prathamā yajadhvam purā gṛdhrāt a raruṣaḥ pibātaḥ

original: RV_5,077.01c prātar hi yajñam aśvinā dadhāte pra śaṃsanti kavayaḥ pūrvabhājaḥ //
analyzed: prātar hi yajñam aśvinā dadhāte pra śaṃsanti kavayaḥ pūrvabhājaḥ

original: RV_5,077.02a prātar yajadhvam aśvinā hinota na sāyam asti devayā ajuṣṭam /
analyzed: prātar yajadhvam aśvinā hinota na sāyam asti deva yāḥ a juṣṭam

original: RV_5,077.02c utānyo asmad yajate vi cāvaḥ pūrvaḥ-pūrvo yajamāno vanīyān //
analyzed: uta anyaḥ asmat yajate vi ca avaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ yajamānaḥ vanīyān

original: RV_5,077.03a hiraṇyatvaṅ madhuvarṇo ghṛtasnuḥ pṛkṣo vahann ā ratho vartate vām /
analyzed: hiraṇya tvac madhu varṇaḥ ghṛta snuḥ pṛkṣaḥ vahan ā rathaḥ vartate vām

original: RV_5,077.03c manojavā aśvinā vātaraṃhā yenātiyātho duritāni viśvā //
analyzed: manaḥ javāḥ aśvinā vāta raṃhāḥ yena atiyāthaḥ duritāni viśvā

original: RV_5,077.04a yo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nāsatyābhyāṃ viveṣa caniṣṭham pitvo rarate vibhāge /
analyzed: yaḥ bhūyiṣṭham nāsatyābhyām viveṣa caniṣṭham pitvaḥ rarate vibhāge

original: RV_5,077.04c sa tokam asya pīparac chamībhir anūrdhvabhāsaḥ sadam it tuturyāt //
analyzed: sa tokam asya pīparat śamībhiḥ an ūrdhva bhāsaḥ sadam id tuturyāt

original: RV_5,077.05a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_5,077.05c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_5,078.01a aśvināv eha gacchataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam /
analyzed: aśvinau ā iha gacchatam nāsatyā mā vi venatam

original: RV_5,078.01c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa //
analyzed: haṃsau iva patatam ā sutām upa

original: RV_5,078.02a aśvinā hariṇāv iva gaurāv ivānu yavasam /
analyzed: aśvinā hariṇau iva gaurau iva anu yavasam

original: RV_5,078.02c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa //
analyzed: haṃsau iva patatam ā sutām upa

original: RV_5,078.03a aśvinā vājinīvasū juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye /
analyzed: aśvinā vājinīvasū juṣethām yajñam iṣṭaye

original: RV_5,078.03c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa //
analyzed: haṃsau iva patatam ā sutām upa

original: RV_5,078.04a atrir yad vām avarohann ṛbīsam ajohavīn nādhamāneva yoṣā /
analyzed: atriḥ yat vām avarohan ṛbīsam ajohavīt nādhamānā iva yoṣā

original: RV_5,078.04c śyenasya cij javasā nūtanenāgacchatam aśvinā śantamena //
analyzed: śyenasya cit javasā nūtanena agacchatam aśvinā śantamena

original: RV_5,078.05a vi jihīṣva vanaspate yoniḥ sūṣyantyā iva /
analyzed: vi jihīṣva vanaspate yoniḥ sūṣyantyāḥ iva

original: RV_5,078.05c śrutam me aśvinā havaṃ saptavadhriṃ ca muñcatam //
analyzed: śrutam me aśvinā havam saptavadhrim ca muñcatam

original: RV_5,078.06a bhītāya nādhamānāya ṛṣaye saptavadhraye /
analyzed: bhītāya nādhamānāya ṛṣaye saptavadhraye

original: RV_5,078.06c māyābhir aśvinā yuvaṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃ ca vi cācathaḥ //
analyzed: māyābhiḥ aśvinā yuvam vṛkṣam sam ca vi ca acathaḥ

original: RV_5,078.07a yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīṃ samiṅgayati sarvataḥ /
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīm samiṅgayati sarvatas

original: RV_5,078.07c evā te garbha ejatu niraitu daśamāsyaḥ //
analyzed: eva te garbhaḥ ejatu niraitu daśamāsyaḥ

original: RV_5,078.08a yathā vāto yathā vanaṃ yathā samudra ejati /
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ yathā vanam yathā samudraḥ ejati

original: RV_5,078.08c evā tvaṃ daśamāsya sahāvehi jarāyuṇā //
analyzed: eva tvam daśamāsya saha avehi jarāyuṇā

original: RV_5,078.09a daśa māsāñ chaśayānaḥ kumāro adhi mātari /
analyzed: daśa māsām śaśayānaḥ kumāraḥ adhi mātari

original: RV_5,078.09c niraitu jīvo akṣato jīvo jīvantyā adhi //
analyzed: niraitu jīvaḥ a kṣataḥ jīvaḥ jīvantyāḥ adhi

original: RV_5,079.01a mahe no adya bodhayoṣo rāye divitmatī /
analyzed: mahe naḥ adya bodhaya uṣaḥ rāye divitmatī

original: RV_5,079.01c yathā cin no abodhayaḥ satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: yathā cit naḥ abodhayaḥ satyaśravasi vāyye su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.02a yā sunīthe śaucadrathe vy auccho duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: yā sunīthe śaucadrathe vi aucchaḥ duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_5,079.02c sā vy uccha sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: sā vi uccha sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.03a sā no adyābharadvasur vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: sā naḥ adyā ābharat vasuḥ vi uccha duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_5,079.03c yo vy aucchaḥ sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: yaḥ vi aucchaḥ sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.04a abhi ye tvā vibhāvari stomair gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ /
analyzed: abhi ye tvā vibhāvari stomaiḥ gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_5,079.04c maghair maghoni suśriyo dāmanvantaḥ surātayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: maghaiḥ maghoni su śriyaḥ dāmanvantaḥ su rātayaḥ su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.05a yac cid dhi te gaṇā ime chadayanti maghattaye /
analyzed: yat cit hi te gaṇāḥ ime chadayanti maghattaye

original: RV_5,079.05c pari cid vaṣṭayo dadhur dadato rādho ahrayaṃ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: pari cit vaṣṭayaḥ dadataḥ rādhaḥ ahrayam su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.06a aiṣu dhā vīravad yaśa uṣo maghoni sūriṣu /
analyzed: ā eṣu dhāḥ vīravat yaśaḥ uṣaḥ maghoni sūriṣu

original: RV_5,079.06c ye no rādhāṃsy ahrayā maghavāno arāsata sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: ye naḥ rādhāṃsi ahrayā maghavānaḥ arāsata su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.07a tebhyo dyumnam bṛhad yaśa uṣo maghony ā vaha /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dyumnam bṛhat yaśaḥ uṣaḥ maghoni ā vaha

original: RV_5,079.07c ye no rādhāṃsy aśvyā gavyā bhajanta sūrayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: ye naḥ rādhāṃsi aśvyā gavyā bhajanta sūrayaḥ su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.08a uta no gomatīr iṣa ā vahā duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ ā vaha duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_5,079.08c sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ śukraiḥ śocadbhir arcibhiḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ śukraiḥ śocadbhiḥ arcibhiḥ su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.09a vy ucchā duhitar divo mā ciraṃ tanuthā apaḥ /
analyzed: vi uccha duhitar divaḥ mā ciram tanuthāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_5,079.09c net tvā stenaṃ yathā ripuṃ tapāti sūro arciṣā sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: na id tvā stenam yathā ripum tapāti sūraḥ arciṣā su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,079.10a etāvad ved uṣas tvam bhūyo vā dātum arhasi /
analyzed: etāvat vā id uṣaḥ tvam bhūyas vā dātum arhasi

original: RV_5,079.10c yā stotṛbhyo vibhāvary ucchantī na pramīyase sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
analyzed: yā stotṛbhyaḥ vibhāvarī ucchantī na pramīyase su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_5,080.01a dyutadyāmānam bṛhatīm ṛtena ṛtāvarīm aruṇapsuṃ vibhātīm /
analyzed: dyutat yāmānam bṛhatīm ṛtena ṛtāvarīm aruṇapsum vibhātīm

original: RV_5,080.01c devīm uṣasaṃ svar āvahantīm prati viprāso matibhir jarante //
analyzed: devīm uṣasam svar āvahantīm prati viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ jarante

original: RV_5,080.02a eṣā janaṃ darśatā bodhayantī sugān pathaḥ kṛṇvatī yāty agre /
analyzed: eṣā janam darśatā bodhayantī su gān pathaḥ kṛṇvatī yāti agre

original: RV_5,080.02c bṛhadrathā bṛhatī viśvaminvoṣā jyotir yacchaty agre ahnām //
analyzed: bṛhat rathā bṛhatī viśvaminvā uṣāḥ jyotiḥ yacchati agre ahnām

original: RV_5,080.03a eṣā gobhir aruṇebhir yujānāsredhantī rayim aprāyu cakre /
analyzed: eṣā gobhiḥ aruṇebhiḥ yujānā a sredhantī rayim aprāyu cakre

original: RV_5,080.03c patho radantī suvitāya devī puruṣṭutā viśvavārā vi bhāti //
analyzed: pathaḥ radantī suvitāya devī puruṣṭutā viśva vārā vi bhāti

original: RV_5,080.04a eṣā vyenī bhavati dvibarhā āviṣkṛṇvānā tanvam purastāt /
analyzed: eṣā vyenī bhavati dvibarhāḥ āviṣkṛṇvānā tanvam purastāt

original: RV_5,080.04c ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti //
analyzed: ṛtasya panthām anu eti sādhu prajānatī iva na diśaḥ mināti

original: RV_5,080.05a eṣā śubhrā na tanvo vidānordhveva snātī dṛśaye no asthāt /
analyzed: eṣā śubhrā na tanvaḥ vidānā ūrdhvā iva snātī dṛśaye naḥ asthāt

original: RV_5,080.05c apa dveṣo bādhamānā tamāṃsy uṣā divo duhitā jyotiṣāgāt //
analyzed: apa dveṣaḥ bādhamānā tamāṃsi uṣāḥ divaḥ duhitā jyotiṣā āgāt

original: RV_5,080.06a eṣā pratīcī duhitā divo nṝn yoṣeva bhadrā ni riṇīte apsaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā pratīcī duhitā divaḥ nṝn yoṣā iva bhadrā ni riṇīte apsaḥ

original: RV_5,080.06c vyūrṇvatī dāśuṣe vāryāṇi punar jyotir yuvatiḥ pūrvathākaḥ //
analyzed: vyūrṇvatī dāśuṣe vāryāṇi punar jyotiḥ yuvatiḥ pūrvathā akaḥ

original: RV_5,081.01a yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: yuñjate manaḥ uta yuñjate dhiyaḥ viprāḥ viprasya bṛhataḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: RV_5,081.01c vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvid eka in mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ //
analyzed: vi hotrā dadhe vayunā vid ekaḥ id mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ

original: RV_5,081.02a viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīd bhadraṃ dvipade catuṣpade /
analyzed: viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīt bhadram dvipade catuṣpade

original: RV_5,081.02c vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu prayāṇam uṣaso vi rājati //
analyzed: vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyaḥ nu prayāṇam uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_5,081.03a yasya prayāṇam anv anya id yayur devā devasya mahimānam ojasā /
analyzed: yasya prayāṇam anu anye id yayuḥ devāḥ devasya mahimānam ojasā

original: RV_5,081.03c yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśo rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā //
analyzed: yaḥ pārthivāni vimame saḥ etaśaḥ rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā

original: RV_5,081.04a uta yāsi savitas trīṇi rocanota sūryasya raśmibhiḥ sam ucyasi /
analyzed: uta yāsi savitar trīṇi rocanā uta sūryasya raśmibhiḥ sam ucyasi

original: RV_5,081.04c uta rātrīm ubhayataḥ parīyasa uta mitro bhavasi deva dharmabhiḥ //
analyzed: uta rātrīm ubhayatas parīyase uta mitraḥ bhavasi deva dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_5,081.05a uteśiṣe prasavasya tvam eka id uta pūṣā bhavasi deva yāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: uta īśiṣe prasavasya tvam ekaḥ id uta pūṣā bhavasi deva yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_5,081.05c utedaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājasi śyāvāśvas te savita stomam ānaśe //
analyzed: uta idam viśvam bhuvanam vi rājasi śyāvāśvaḥ te savitaḥ stomam ānaśe

original: RV_5,082.01a tat savitur vṛṇīmahe vayaṃ devasya bhojanam /
analyzed: tat savituḥ vṛṇīmahe vayam devasya bhojanam

original: RV_5,082.01c śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadhātamaṃ turam bhagasya dhīmahi //
analyzed: śreṣṭham sarva dhātamam turam bhagasya dhīmahi

original: RV_5,082.02a asya hi svayaśastaraṃ savituḥ kac cana priyam /
analyzed: asya hi sva yaśastaram savituḥ kad cana priyam

original: RV_5,082.02c na minanti svarājyam //
analyzed: na minanti sva rājyam

original: RV_5,082.03a sa hi ratnāni dāśuṣe suvāti savitā bhagaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi ratnāni dāśuṣe suvāti savitā bhagaḥ

original: RV_5,082.03c tam bhāgaṃ citram īmahe //
analyzed: tam bhāgam citram īmahe

original: RV_5,082.04a adyā no deva savitaḥ prajāvat sāvīḥ saubhagam /
analyzed: adyā naḥ deva savitar prajāvat sāvīḥ saubhagam

original: RV_5,082.04c parā duṣṣvapnyaṃ suva //
analyzed: parā duṣṣvapnyam suva

original: RV_5,082.05a viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva /
analyzed: viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva

original: RV_5,082.05c yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva //
analyzed: yat bhadram tat naḥ ā suva

original: RV_5,082.06a anāgaso aditaye devasya savituḥ save /
analyzed: anāgasaḥ aditaye devasya savituḥ save

original: RV_5,082.06c viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi //
analyzed: viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_5,082.07a ā viśvadevaṃ satpatiṃ sūktair adyā vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā viśva devam sat patim sūktaiḥ adya vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_5,082.07c satyasavaṃ savitāram //
analyzed: satya savam savitāram

original: RV_5,082.08a ya ime ubhe ahanī pura ety aprayucchan /
analyzed: yaḥ ime ubhe ahanī puras eti aprayucchan

original: RV_5,082.08c svādhīr devaḥ savitā //
analyzed: svādhīḥ devaḥ savitā

original: RV_5,082.09a ya imā viśvā jātāny āśrāvayati ślokena /
analyzed: yaḥ imā viśvā jātāni āśrāvayati ślokena

original: RV_5,082.09c pra ca suvāti savitā //
analyzed: pra ca suvāti savitā

original: RV_5,083.01a acchā vada tavasaṃ gīrbhir ābhi stuhi parjanyaṃ namasā vivāsa /
analyzed: acchā vada tavasam gīrbhiḥ ābhiḥ stuhi parjanyam namasā vivāsa

original: RV_5,083.01c kanikradad vṛṣabho jīradānū reto dadhāty oṣadhīṣu garbham //
analyzed: kanikradat vṛṣabhaḥ jīra dānuḥ retaḥ dadhāti oṣadhīṣu garbham

original: RV_5,083.02a vi vṛkṣān hanty uta hanti rakṣaso viśvam bibhāya bhuvanam mahāvadhāt /
analyzed: vi vṛkṣān hanti uta hanti rakṣasaḥ viśvam bibhāya bhuvanam mahā vadhāt

original: RV_5,083.02c utānāgā īṣate vṛṣṇyāvato yat parjanya stanayan hanti duṣkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: uta anāgāḥ īṣate vṛṣṇyāvataḥ yat parjanyaḥ stanayan hanti duṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_5,083.03a rathīva kaśayāśvāṃ abhikṣipann āvir dūtān kṛṇute varṣyāṃ aha /
analyzed: rathī iva kaśayā aśvām abhikṣipan āvis dūtān kṛṇute varṣyām aha

original: RV_5,083.03c dūrāt siṃhasya stanathā ud īrate yat parjanyaḥ kṛṇute varṣyaṃ nabhaḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt siṃhasya stanathau ud īrate yat parjanyaḥ kṛṇute varṣyam nabhaḥ

original: RV_5,083.04a pra vātā vānti patayanti vidyuta ud oṣadhīr jihate pinvate svaḥ /
analyzed: pra vātāḥ vānti patayanti vidyutaḥ ud oṣadhīḥ jihate pinvate svar

original: RV_5,083.04c irā viśvasmai bhuvanāya jāyate yat parjanyaḥ pṛthivīṃ retasāvati //
analyzed: irā viśvasmai bhuvanāya jāyate yat parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm retasā avati

original: RV_5,083.05a yasya vrate pṛthivī nannamīti yasya vrate śaphavaj jarbhurīti /
analyzed: yasya vrate pṛthivī nannamīti yasya vrate śaphavat jarbhurīti

original: RV_5,083.05c yasya vrata oṣadhīr viśvarūpāḥ sa naḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha //
analyzed: yasya vrate oṣadhīḥ viśva rūpāḥ sa naḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha

original: RV_5,083.06a divo no vṛṣṭim maruto rarīdhvam pra pinvata vṛṣṇo aśvasya dhārāḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam pra pinvata vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya dhārāḥ

original: RV_5,083.06c arvāṅ etena stanayitnunehy apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ //
analyzed: arvāṅ etena stanayitnunā ihi apaḥ niṣiñcan asuraḥ pitā naḥ

original: RV_5,083.07a abhi kranda stanaya garbham ā dhā udanvatā pari dīyā rathena /
analyzed: abhi kranda stanaya garbham ā dhāḥ udanvatā pari dīya rathena

original: RV_5,083.07c dṛtiṃ su karṣa viṣitaṃ nyañcaṃ samā bhavantūdvato nipādāḥ //
analyzed: dṛtim su karṣa viṣitam nyañcam samāḥ bhavantu udvataḥ nipādāḥ

original: RV_5,083.08a mahāntaṃ kośam ud acā ni ṣiñca syandantāṃ kulyā viṣitāḥ purastāt /
analyzed: mahāntam kośam ud aca ni siñca syandantām kulyāḥ viṣitāḥ purastāt

original: RV_5,083.08c ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī vy undhi suprapāṇam bhavatv aghnyābhyaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī vi undhi su prapāṇam bhavatu aghnyābhyaḥ

original: RV_5,083.09a yat parjanya kanikradat stanayan haṃsi duṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yat parjanya kanikradat stanayan haṃsi duṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_5,083.09c pratīdaṃ viśvam modate yat kiṃ ca pṛthivyām adhi //
analyzed: prati idam viśvam modate yat kim ca pṛthivyām adhi

original: RV_5,083.10a avarṣīr varṣam ud u ṣū gṛbhāyākar dhanvāny atyetavā u /
analyzed: avarṣīḥ varṣam ud u su gṛbhāya akaḥ dhanvāni atyetavai u

original: RV_5,083.10c ajījana oṣadhīr bhojanāya kam uta prajābhyo 'vido manīṣām //
analyzed: ajījanaḥ oṣadhīḥ bhojanāya kam uta prajābhyaḥ vidaḥ manīṣām

original: RV_5,084.01a baḷ itthā parvatānāṃ khidram bibharṣi pṛthivi /
analyzed: baḷ itthā parvatānām khidram bibharṣi pṛthivi

original: RV_5,084.01c pra yā bhūmim pravatvati mahnā jinoṣi mahini //
analyzed: pra yā bhūmim pravatvati mahnā jinoṣi mahini

original: RV_5,084.02a stomāsas tvā vicāriṇi prati ṣṭobhanty aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: stomāsaḥ tvā vicāriṇi prati stobhanti aktubhiḥ

original: RV_5,084.02c pra yā vājaṃ na heṣantam perum asyasy arjuni //
analyzed: pra yā vājam na heṣantam perum asyasi arjuni

original: RV_5,084.03a dṛḷhā cid yā vanaspatīn kṣmayā dardharṣy ojasā /
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit yā vanaspatīn kṣmayā dardharṣi ojasā

original: RV_5,084.03c yat te abhrasya vidyuto divo varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: yat te abhrasya vidyutaḥ divaḥ varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_5,085.01a pra samrāje bṛhad arcā gabhīram brahma priyaṃ varuṇāya śrutāya /
analyzed: pra samrāje bṛhat arcā gabhīram brahma priyam varuṇāya śrutāya

original: RV_5,085.01c vi yo jaghāna śamiteva carmopastire pṛthivīṃ sūryāya //
analyzed: vi yaḥ jaghāna śamitā iva carma upastire pṛthivīm sūryāya

original: RV_5,085.02a vaneṣu vy antarikṣaṃ tatāna vājam arvatsu paya usriyāsu /
analyzed: vaneṣu vi antarikṣam tatāna vājam arvatsu payaḥ usriyāsu

original: RV_5,085.02c hṛtsu kratuṃ varuṇo apsv agniṃ divi sūryam adadhāt somam adrau //
analyzed: hṛtsu kratum varuṇaḥ apsu agnim divi sūryam adadhāt somam adrau

original: RV_5,085.03a nīcīnabāraṃ varuṇaḥ kavandham pra sasarja rodasī antarikṣam /
analyzed: nīcīna bāram varuṇaḥ kabandham pra sasarja rodasī antarikṣam

original: RV_5,085.03c tena viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā yavaṃ na vṛṣṭir vy unatti bhūma //
analyzed: tena viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā yavam na vṛṣṭiḥ vi unatti bhūma

original: RV_5,085.04a unatti bhūmim pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yadā dugdhaṃ varuṇo vaṣṭy ād it /
analyzed: unatti bhūmim pṛthivīm uta dyām yadā dugdham varuṇaḥ vaṣṭi āt id

original: RV_5,085.04c sam abhreṇa vasata parvatāsas taviṣīyantaḥ śrathayanta vīrāḥ //
analyzed: sam abhreṇa vasata parvatāsaḥ taviṣīyantaḥ śrathayanta vīrāḥ

original: RV_5,085.05a imām ū ṣv āsurasya śrutasya mahīm māyāṃ varuṇasya pra vocam /
analyzed: imām u su āsurasya śrutasya mahīm māyām varuṇasya pra vocam

original: RV_5,085.05c māneneva tasthivāṃ antarikṣe vi yo mame pṛthivīṃ sūryeṇa //
analyzed: mānena iva tasthivān antarikṣe vi yaḥ mame pṛthivīm sūryeṇa

original: RV_5,085.06a imām ū nu kavitamasya māyām mahīṃ devasya nakir ā dadharṣa /
analyzed: imām u nu kavitamasya māyām mahīm devasya nakir ā dadharṣa

original: RV_5,085.06c ekaṃ yad udnā na pṛṇanty enīr āsiñcantīr avanayaḥ samudram //
analyzed: ekam yat udnā na pṛṇanti enīḥ āsiñcantīḥ avanayaḥ samudram

original: RV_5,085.07a aryamyaṃ varuṇa mitryaṃ vā sakhāyaṃ vā sadam id bhrātaraṃ vā /
analyzed: aryamyam varuṇa mitryam vā sakhāyam vā sadam id bhrātaram vā

original: RV_5,085.07c veśaṃ vā nityaṃ varuṇāraṇaṃ vā yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā śiśrathas tat //
analyzed: veśam vā nityam varuṇa araṇam vā yat sīm āgaḥ cakṛma śiśrathaḥ tat

original: RV_5,085.08a kitavāso yad riripur na dīvi yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na vidma /
analyzed: kitavāsaḥ yat riripuḥ na dīvi yat vā gha satyam uta yat na vidma

original: RV_5,085.08c sarvā tā vi ṣya śithireva devādhā te syāma varuṇa priyāsaḥ //
analyzed: sarvā tā vi sya śithirā iva deva adha te syāma varuṇa priyāsaḥ

original: RV_5,086.01a indrāgnī yam avatha ubhā vājeṣu martyam /
analyzed: indra agnī yam avatha ubhā vājeṣu martyam

original: RV_5,086.01c dṛḷhā cit sa pra bhedati dyumnā vāṇīr iva tritaḥ //
analyzed: dṛḷhā cit sa pra bhedati dyumnā vāṇīḥ iva tritaḥ

original: RV_5,086.02a yā pṛtanāsu duṣṭarā yā vājeṣu śravāyyā /
analyzed: yā pṛtanāsu duṣṭarā yā vājeṣu śravāyyā

original: RV_5,086.02c yā pañca carṣaṇīr abhīndrāgnī tā havāmahe //
analyzed: yā pañca carṣaṇīḥ abhi indra agnī tā havāmahe

original: RV_5,086.03a tayor id amavac chavas tigmā didyun maghonoḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ id amavat śavaḥ tigmā didyut maghonoḥ

original: RV_5,086.03c prati druṇā gabhastyor gavāṃ vṛtraghna eṣate //
analyzed: prati druṇā gabhastyoḥ gavām vṛtra ghne eṣate

original: RV_5,086.04a tā vām eṣe rathānām indrāgnī havāmahe /
analyzed: tā vām eṣe rathānām indra agnī havāmahe

original: RV_5,086.04c patī turasya rādhaso vidvāṃsā girvaṇastamā //
analyzed: patī turasya rādhasaḥ vidvāṃsā girvaṇastamā

original: RV_5,086.05a tā vṛdhantāv anu dyūn martāya devāv adabhā /
analyzed: tā vṛdhantau anu dyūn martāya devau adabhā

original: RV_5,086.05c arhantā cit puro dadhe 'ṃśeva devāv arvate //
analyzed: arhantā cit puras dadhe ṃśā iva devau arvate

original: RV_5,086.06a evendrāgnibhyām ahāvi havyaṃ śūṣyaṃ ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adribhiḥ /
analyzed: eva indra agnibhyām ahāvi havyam śūṣyam ghṛtam na pūtam adribhiḥ

original: RV_5,086.06c tā sūriṣu śravo bṛhad rayiṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam iṣaṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam //
analyzed: tā sūriṣu śravaḥ bṛhat rayim gṛṇatsu didhṛtam iṣam gṛṇatsu didhṛtam

original: RV_5,087.01a pra vo mahe matayo yantu viṣṇave marutvate girijā evayāmarut /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe matayaḥ yantu viṣṇave marutvate giri jāḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.01c pra śardhāya prayajyave sukhādaye tavase bhandadiṣṭaye dhunivratāya śavase //
analyzed: pra śardhāya prayajyave su khādaye tavase bhandat iṣṭaye dhuni vratāya śavase

original: RV_5,087.02a pra ye jātā mahinā ye ca nu svayam pra vidmanā bruvata evayāmarut /
analyzed: pra ye jātāḥ mahinā ye ca nu svayam pra vidmanā bruvate eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.02c kratvā tad vo maruto nādhṛṣe śavo dānā mahnā tad eṣām adhṛṣṭāso nādrayaḥ //
analyzed: kratvā tat vaḥ marutaḥ na ādhṛṣe śavaḥ dānā mahnā tat eṣām adhṛṣṭāsaḥ na adrayaḥ

original: RV_5,087.03a pra ye divo bṛhataḥ śṛṇvire girā suśukvānaḥ subhva evayāmarut /
analyzed: pra ye divaḥ bṛhataḥ śṛṇvire girā su śukvānaḥ su bhvaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.03c na yeṣām irī sadhastha īṣṭa āṃ agnayo na svavidyutaḥ pra syandrāso dhunīnām //
analyzed: na yeṣām sadhasthe īṣṭe ām agnayaḥ na sva vidyutaḥ pra syandrāsaḥ dhunīnām

original: RV_5,087.04a sa cakrame mahato nir urukramaḥ samānasmāt sadasa evayāmarut /
analyzed: sa cakrame mahataḥ niḥ uru kramaḥ samānasmāt sadasaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.04c yadāyukta tmanā svād adhi ṣṇubhir viṣpardhaso vimahaso jigāti śevṛdho nṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: yadā ayukta tmanā svāt adhi snubhiḥ viṣpardhasaḥ vimahasaḥ jigāti śevṛdhaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_5,087.05a svano na vo 'mavān rejayad vṛṣā tveṣo yayis taviṣa evayāmarut /
analyzed: svanaḥ na vaḥ mavān rejayat vṛṣā tveṣaḥ yayiḥ taviṣaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.05c yenā sahanta ṛñjata svarociṣa sthāraśmāno hiraṇyayāḥ svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ //
analyzed: yena sahantaḥ ṛñjata sva rociṣaḥ sthā raśmānaḥ hiraṇyayāḥ su āyudhāsaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ

original: RV_5,087.06a apāro vo mahimā vṛddhaśavasas tveṣaṃ śavo 'vatv evayāmarut /
analyzed: apāraḥ vaḥ mahimā vṛddha śavasaḥ tveṣam śavaḥ vatu eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.06c sthātāro hi prasitau saṃdṛśi sthana te na uruṣyatā nidaḥ śuśukvāṃso nāgnayaḥ //
analyzed: sthātāraḥ hi prasitau saṃdṛśi sthana te naḥ uruṣyata nidaḥ śuśukvāṃsaḥ nā agnayaḥ

original: RV_5,087.07a te rudrāsaḥ sumakhā agnayo yathā tuvidyumnā avantv evayāmarut /
analyzed: te rudrāsaḥ su makhāḥ agnayaḥ yathā tuvi dyumnāḥ avantu eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.07c dīrgham pṛthu paprathe sadma pārthivaṃ yeṣām ajmeṣv ā mahaḥ śardhāṃsy adbhutainasām //
analyzed: dīrgham pṛthu paprathe sadma pārthivam yeṣām ajmeṣu ā mahaḥ śardhāṃsi adbhuta enasām

original: RV_5,087.08a adveṣo no maruto gātum etana śrotā havaṃ jaritur evayāmarut /
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ naḥ marutaḥ gātum etana śrota havam jarituḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.08c viṣṇor mahaḥ samanyavo yuyotana smad rathyo na daṃsanāpa dveṣāṃsi sanutaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ mahaḥ samanyavaḥ yuyotana smat rathyaḥ na daṃsanā apa dveṣāṃsi sanutar

original: RV_5,087.09a gantā no yajñaṃ yajñiyāḥ suśami śrotā havam arakṣa evayāmarut /
analyzed: ganta naḥ yajñam yajñiyāḥ suśami śrota havam arakṣaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_5,087.09c jyeṣṭhāso na parvatāso vyomani yūyaṃ tasya pracetasaḥ syāta durdhartavo nidaḥ //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāsaḥ na parvatāsaḥ vyomani yūyam tasya pracetasaḥ syāta durdhartavaḥ nidaḥ

original: Ṛgveda 6
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_6,001.01a tvaṃ hy agne prathamo manotāsyā dhiyo abhavo dasma hotā /
analyzed: tvam hi agne prathamaḥ manotā asyāḥ dhiyaḥ abhavaḥ dasma hotā

original: RV_6,001.01c tvaṃ sīṃ vṛṣann akṛṇor duṣṭarītu saho viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai //
analyzed: tvam sīm vṛṣan akṛṇoḥ duṣṭarītu sahaḥ viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai

original: RV_6,001.02a adhā hotā ny asīdo yajīyān iḷas pada iṣayann īḍyaḥ san /
analyzed: adhā hotā ni asīdaḥ yajīyān iḷaḥ pade iṣayan īḍyaḥ san

original: RV_6,001.02c taṃ tvā naraḥ prathamaṃ devayanto maho rāye citayanto anu gman //
analyzed: tam tvā naraḥ prathamam devayantaḥ mahaḥ rāye citayantaḥ anu gman

original: RV_6,001.03a vṛteva yantam bahubhir vasavyais tve rayiṃ jāgṛvāṃso anu gman /
analyzed: vṛtā iva yantam bahubhiḥ vasavyaiḥ tve rayim jāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman

original: RV_6,001.03c ruśantam agniṃ darśatam bṛhantaṃ vapāvantaṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam //
analyzed: ruśantam agnim darśatam bṛhantam vapāvantam viśvahā dīdivāṃsam

original: RV_6,001.04a padaṃ devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śrava āpann amṛktam /
analyzed: padam devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śravaḥ āpan amṛktam

original: RV_6,001.04c nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyāṃ te raṇayanta saṃdṛṣṭau //
analyzed: nāmāni cit dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyām te raṇayanta saṃdṛṣṭau

original: RV_6,001.05a tvāṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tvāṃ rāya ubhayāso janānām /
analyzed: tvām vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyām tvām rāyaḥ ubhayāsaḥ janānām

original: RV_6,001.05c tvaṃ trātā taraṇe cetyo bhūḥ pitā mātā sadam in mānuṣāṇām //
analyzed: tvam trātā taraṇe cetyaḥ bhūḥ pitā mātā sadam id mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_6,001.06a saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyo vikṣv agnir hotā mandro ni ṣasādā yajīyān /
analyzed: saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyaḥ vikṣu agniḥ hotā mandraḥ ni sasāda ā yajīyān

original: RV_6,001.06c taṃ tvā vayaṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsam upa jñubādho namasā sadema //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam dame ā dīdivāṃsam upa jñubādhaḥ namasā sadema

original: RV_6,001.07a taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudhyo navyam agne sumnāyava īmahe devayantaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā vayam sudhyaḥ navyam agne sumnāyavaḥ īmahe devayantaḥ

original: RV_6,001.07c tvaṃ viśo anayo dīdyāno divo agne bṛhatā rocanena //
analyzed: tvam viśaḥ anayaḥ dīdyānaḥ divaḥ agne bṛhatā rocanena

original: RV_6,001.08a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatiṃ śaśvatīnāṃ nitośanaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: viśām kavim viśpatim śaśvatīnām nitośanam vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_6,001.08c pretīṣaṇim iṣayantam pāvakaṃ rājantam agniṃ yajataṃ rayīṇām //
analyzed: pretīṣaṇim iṣayantam pāvakam rājantam agnim yajatam rayīṇām

original: RV_6,001.09a so agna īje śaśame ca marto yas ta ānaṭ samidhā havyadātim /
analyzed: saḥ agne īje śaśame ca martaḥ yaḥ te ānaṭ samidhā havya dātim

original: RV_6,001.09c ya āhutim pari vedā namobhir viśvet sa vāmā dadhate tvotaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ āhutim pari veda namobhiḥ viśvā id sa vāmā dadhate tvotaḥ

original: RV_6,001.10a asmā u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhir agne samidhota havyaiḥ /
analyzed: asmai u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhiḥ agne samidhā uta havyaiḥ

original: RV_6,001.10c vedī sūno sahaso gīrbhir ukthair ā te bhadrāyāṃ sumatau yatema //
analyzed: vedī sūno sahasaḥ gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ ā te bhadrāyām sumatau yatema

original: RV_6,001.11a ā yas tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiś ca śravasyas tarutraḥ /
analyzed: ā yaḥ tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiḥ ca śravasyaḥ tarutraḥ

original: RV_6,001.11c bṛhadbhir vājai sthavirebhir asme revadbhir agne vitaraṃ vi bhāhi //
analyzed: bṛhadbhiḥ vājaiḥ sthavirebhiḥ asme revadbhiḥ agne vitaram vi bhāhi

original: RV_6,001.12a nṛvad vaso sadam id dhehy asme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ /
analyzed: nṛvat vaso sadam id dhehi asme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ

original: RV_6,001.12c pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr āre-aghā asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ bṛhatīḥ āreaghāḥ asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu

original: RV_6,001.13a purūṇy agne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasutā te aśyām /
analyzed: purūṇi agne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasu tā te aśyām

original: RV_6,001.13c purūṇi hi tve puruvāra santy agne vasu vidhate rājani tve //
analyzed: purūṇi hi tve puru vāra santi agne vasu vidhate rājani tve

original: RV_6,002.01a tvaṃ hi kṣaitavad yaśo 'gne mitro na patyase /
analyzed: tvam hi kṣaitavat yaśaḥ gne mitraḥ na patyase

original: RV_6,002.01c tvaṃ vicarṣaṇe śravo vaso puṣṭiṃ na puṣyasi //
