analyzed: tvam vicarṣaṇe śravaḥ vaso puṣṭim na puṣyasi

original: RV_6,002.02a tvāṃ hi ṣmā carṣaṇayo yajñebhir gīrbhir īḷate /
analyzed: tvām hi sma carṣaṇayaḥ yajñebhiḥ gīrbhiḥ īḍate

original: RV_6,002.02c tvāṃ vājī yāty avṛko rajastūr viśvacarṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: tvām vājī yāti a vṛkaḥ rajastūr viśvacarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_6,002.03a sajoṣas tvā divo naro yajñasya ketum indhate /
analyzed: sajoṣaḥ tvā divaḥ naraḥ yajñasya ketum indhate

original: RV_6,002.03c yad dha sya mānuṣo janaḥ sumnāyur juhve adhvare //
analyzed: yat ha sya mānuṣaḥ janaḥ sumnāyuḥ juhve adhvare

original: RV_6,002.04a ṛdhad yas te sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate /
analyzed: ṛdhat yaḥ te sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate

original: RV_6,002.04c ūtī ṣa bṛhato divo dviṣo aṃho na tarati //
analyzed: ūtī sa bṛhataḥ divaḥ dviṣaḥ aṃhaḥ na tarati

original: RV_6,002.05a samidhā yas ta āhutiṃ niśitim martyo naśat /
analyzed: samidhā yaḥ te āhutim niśitim martyaḥ naśat

original: RV_6,002.05c vayāvantaṃ sa puṣyati kṣayam agne śatāyuṣam //
analyzed: vayāvantam sa puṣyati kṣayam agne śata āyuṣam

original: RV_6,002.06a tveṣas te dhūma ṛṇvati divi ṣañ chukra ātataḥ /
analyzed: tveṣaḥ te dhūmaḥ ṛṇvati divi sam śukraḥ ātataḥ

original: RV_6,002.06c sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase //
analyzed: sūraḥ na hi dyutā tvam kṛpā pāvaka rocase

original: RV_6,002.07a adhā hi vikṣv īḍyo 'si priyo no atithiḥ /
analyzed: adhā hi vikṣu īḍyaḥ si priyaḥ naḥ atithiḥ

original: RV_6,002.07c raṇvaḥ purīva jūryaḥ sūnur na trayayāyyaḥ //
analyzed: raṇvaḥ puri iva jūryaḥ sūnuḥ na trayayāyyaḥ

original: RV_6,002.08a kratvā hi droṇe ajyase 'gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ /
analyzed: kratvā hi droṇe ajyase gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ

original: RV_6,002.08c parijmeva svadhā gayo 'tyo na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ //
analyzed: parijmā iva svadhā gaya u tyaḥ na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ

original: RV_6,002.09a tvaṃ tyā cid acyutāgne paśur na yavase /
analyzed: tvam tyā cit acyutā agne paśuḥ na yavase

original: RV_6,002.09c dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ //
analyzed: dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ

original: RV_6,002.10a veṣi hy adhvarīyatām agne hotā dame viśām /
analyzed: veṣi hi adhvarīyatām agne hotā dame viśām

original: RV_6,002.10c samṛdho viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyam aṅgiraḥ //
analyzed: samṛdhaḥ viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyam aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_6,002.11a acchā no mitramaho deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: acchā naḥ mitra mahas deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatim rodasyoḥ

original: RV_6,002.11c vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema //
analyzed: vīhi svastim su kṣitim divaḥ nṝn dviṣaḥ aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tava avasā tarema

original: RV_6,003.01a agne sa kṣeṣad ṛtapā ṛtejā uru jyotir naśate devayuṣ ṭe /
analyzed: agne sa kṣeṣat ṛta pāḥ ṛta jāḥ uru jyotiḥ naśate devayuḥ te

original: RV_6,003.01c yaṃ tvam mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣā deva pāsi tyajasā martam aṃhaḥ //
analyzed: yam tvam mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ deva pāsi tyajasā martam aṃhaḥ

original: RV_6,003.02a īje yajñebhiḥ śaśame śamībhir ṛdhadvārāyāgnaye dadāśa /
analyzed: īje yajñebhiḥ śaśame śamībhiḥ ṛdha dvārāya agnaye dadāśa

original: RV_6,003.02c evā cana taṃ yaśasām ajuṣṭir nāṃho martaṃ naśate na pradṛptiḥ //
analyzed: evā cana tam yaśasām ajuṣṭiḥ na aṃhaḥ martam naśate na pradṛptiḥ

original: RV_6,003.03a sūro na yasya dṛśatir arepā bhīmā yad eti śucatas ta ā dhīḥ /
analyzed: sūraḥ na yasya dṛśatiḥ arepāḥ bhīmā yat eti śucataḥ te ā dhīḥ

original: RV_6,003.03c heṣasvataḥ śurudho nāyam aktoḥ kutrā cid raṇvo vasatir vanejāḥ //
analyzed: heṣasvataḥ śurudhaḥ na ayam aktoḥ kutrā cit raṇvaḥ vasatiḥ vanejāḥ

original: RV_6,003.04a tigmaṃ cid ema mahi varpo asya bhasad aśvo na yamasāna āsā /
analyzed: tigmam cit ema mahi varpaḥ asya bhasad aśvaḥ na yamasānaḥ āsā

original: RV_6,003.04c vijehamānaḥ paraśur na jihvāṃ dravir na drāvayati dāru dhakṣat //
analyzed: vijehamānaḥ paraśuḥ na jihvām draviḥ na drāvayati dāru dhakṣat

original: RV_6,003.05a sa id asteva prati dhād asiṣyañ chiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām /
analyzed: saḥ id astā iva prati dhāt asiṣyam śiśīta tejaḥ yasaḥ na dhārām

original: RV_6,003.05c citradhrajatir aratir yo aktor ver na druṣadvā raghupatmajaṃhāḥ //
analyzed: citra dhrajatiḥ aratiḥ yaḥ aktoḥ veḥ na druṣadvāḥ raghu patma jaṃhāḥ

original: RV_6,003.06a sa īṃ rebho na prati vasta usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitramahāḥ /
analyzed: saḥ īm rebhaḥ na prati vaste usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitra mahāḥ

original: RV_6,003.06c naktaṃ ya īm aruṣo yo divā nṝn amartyo aruṣo yo divā nṝn //
analyzed: naktam yaḥ īm aruṣaḥ yaḥ divā nṝn amartyaḥ aruṣaḥ yaḥ divā nṝn

original: RV_6,003.07a divo na yasya vidhato navīnod vṛṣā rukṣa oṣadhīṣu nūnot /
analyzed: divaḥ na yasya vidhataḥ navīnot vṛṣā rukṣaḥ oṣadhīṣu nūnot

original: RV_6,003.07c ghṛṇā na yo dhrajasā patmanā yann ā rodasī vasunā daṃ supatnī //
analyzed: ghṛṇā na yaḥ dhrajasā patmanā yan ā rodasī vasunā dam su patnī

original: RV_6,003.08a dhāyobhir vā yo yujyebhir arkair vidyun na davidyot svebhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ /
analyzed: dhāyobhiḥ vā yaḥ yujyebhiḥ arkaiḥ vidyut na davidyot svebhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ

original: RV_6,003.08c śardho vā yo marutāṃ tatakṣa ṛbhur na tveṣo rabhasāno adyaut //
analyzed: śardhaḥ vā yaḥ marutām tatakṣa ṛbhuḥ na tveṣaḥ rabhasānaḥ adyaut

original: RV_6,004.01a yathā hotar manuṣo devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajāsi /
analyzed: yathā hotar manuṣaḥ devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahasaḥ yajāsi

original: RV_6,004.01c evā no adya samanā samānān uśann agna uśato yakṣi devān //
analyzed: eva naḥ adya samanā samānān uśan agne uśataḥ yakṣi devān

original: RV_6,004.02a sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇir na vastor agnir vandāru vedyaś cano dhāt /
analyzed: sa naḥ vibhāvā cakṣaṇiḥ na vastoḥ agniḥ vandāru vedyaḥ canaḥ dhāt

original: RV_6,004.02c viśvāyur yo amṛto martyeṣūṣarbhud bhūd atithir jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: viśvāyuḥ yaḥ amṛtaḥ martyeṣu uṣarbudh bhūt atithiḥ jātavedāḥ

original: RV_6,004.03a dyāvo na yasya panayanty abhvam bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryo na śukraḥ /
analyzed: dyāvaḥ na yasya panayanti abhvam bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryaḥ na śukraḥ

original: RV_6,004.03c vi ya inoty ajaraḥ pāvako 'śnasya cic chiśnathat pūrvyāṇi //
analyzed: vi yaḥ inoti ajaraḥ pāvakaḥ śnasya cit śiśnathat pūrvyāṇi

original: RV_6,004.04a vadmā hi sūno asy admasadvā cakre agnir januṣājmānnam /
analyzed: vadmā hi sūno asi adma sadvā cakre agniḥ januṣā ajma annam

original: RV_6,004.04c sa tvaṃ na ūrjasana ūrjaṃ dhā rājeva jer avṛke kṣeṣy antaḥ //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ ūrja sane ūrjam dhāḥ rājā iva jeḥ avṛke kṣeṣi antar

original: RV_6,004.05a nitikti yo vāraṇam annam atti vāyur na rāṣṭry aty ety aktūn /
analyzed: nitikti yaḥ vā araṇam annam atti vāyuḥ na rāṣṭrī ati eti aktūn

original: RV_6,004.05c turyāma yas ta ādiśām arātīr atyo na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut //
analyzed: turyāma yaḥ te ādiśām arātīḥ atyaḥ na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut

original: RV_6,004.06a ā sūryo na bhānumadbhir arkair agne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā /
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ na bhānumadbhiḥ arkaiḥ agne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā

original: RV_6,004.06c citro nayat pari tamāṃsy aktaḥ śociṣā patmann auśijo na dīyan //
analyzed: citraḥ nayat pari tamāṃsi aktaḥ śociṣā patman auśijaḥ na dīyan

original: RV_6,004.07a tvāṃ hi mandratamam arkaśokair vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣy agne /
analyzed: tvām hi mandratamam arka śokaiḥ vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣi agne

original: RV_6,004.07c indraṃ na tvā śavasā devatā vāyum pṛṇanti rādhasā nṛtamāḥ //
analyzed: indram na tvā śavasā devatāḥ vāyum pṛṇanti rādhasā nṛtamāḥ

original: RV_6,004.08a nū no agne 'vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣy aṃhaḥ /
analyzed: nu naḥ agne vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣi aṃhaḥ

original: RV_6,004.08c tā sūribhyo gṛṇate rāsi sumnam madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: tā sūribhyaḥ gṛṇate rāsi sumnam madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,005.01a huve vaḥ sūnuṃ sahaso yuvānam adroghavācam matibhir yaviṣṭham /
analyzed: huve vaḥ sūnum sahasaḥ yuvānam adrogha vācam matibhiḥ yaviṣṭham

original: RV_6,005.01c ya invati draviṇāni pracetā viśvavārāṇi puruvāro adhruk //
analyzed: yaḥ invati draviṇāni pracetāḥ viśva vārāṇi puru vāraḥ adruh

original: RV_6,005.02a tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotar doṣā vastor erire yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotar doṣā vastoḥ erire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_6,005.02c kṣāmeva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin saṃ saubhagāni dadhire pāvake //
analyzed: kṣāma iva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin sam saubhagāni dadhire pāvake

original: RV_6,005.03a tvaṃ vikṣu pradivaḥ sīda āsu kratvā rathīr abhavo vāryāṇām /
analyzed: tvam vikṣu pradivaḥ sīdaḥ āsu kratvā rathīḥ abhavaḥ vāryāṇām

original: RV_6,005.03c ata inoṣi vidhate cikitvo vy ānuṣag jātavedo vasūni //
analyzed: atas inoṣi vidhate cikitvaḥ vi ānuṣak jātavedaḥ vasūni

original: RV_6,005.04a yo naḥ sanutyo abhidāsad agne yo antaro mitramaho vanuṣyāt /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ sanutyaḥ abhidāsat agne yaḥ antaraḥ mitra mahas vanuṣyāt

original: RV_6,005.04c tam ajarebhir vṛṣabhis tava svais tapā tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān //
analyzed: tam ajarebhiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ tava svaiḥ tapa tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān

original: RV_6,005.05a yas te yajñena samidhā ya ukthair arkebhiḥ sūno sahaso dadāśat /
analyzed: yaḥ te yajñena samidhā yaḥ ukthaiḥ arkebhiḥ sūno sahasaḥ dadāśat

original: RV_6,005.05c sa martyeṣv amṛta pracetā rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti //
analyzed: sa martyeṣu amṛta pracetāḥ rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti

original: RV_6,005.06a sa tat kṛdhīṣitas tūyam agne spṛdho bādhasva sahasā sahasvān /
analyzed: sa tat kṛdhi iṣitaḥ tūyam agne spṛdhaḥ bādhasva sahasā sahasvān

original: RV_6,005.06c yac chasyase dyubhir akto vacobhis taj juṣasva jaritur ghoṣi manma //
analyzed: yat śasyase dyubhiḥ aktaḥ vacobhiḥ tat juṣasva jarituḥ ghoṣi manma

original: RV_6,005.07a aśyāma taṃ kāmam agne tavotī aśyāma rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīram /
analyzed: aśyāma tam kāmam agne tava ūtī aśyāma rayim rayivas su vīram

original: RV_6,005.07c aśyāma vājam abhi vājayanto 'śyāma dyumnam ajarājaraṃ te //
analyzed: aśyāma vājam abhi vājayantaḥ śyāma dyumnam ajara ajaram te

original: RV_6,006.01a pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnum acchā yajñena gātum ava icchamānaḥ /
analyzed: pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnum acchā yajñena gātum avaḥ icchamānaḥ

original: RV_6,006.01c vṛścadvanaṃ kṛṣṇayāmaṃ ruśantaṃ vītī hotāraṃ divyaṃ jigāti //
analyzed: vṛścat vanam kṛṣṇa yāmam ruśantam vītī hotāram divyam jigāti

original: RV_6,006.02a sa śvitānas tanyatū rocanasthā ajarebhir nānadadbhir yaviṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: sa śvitānaḥ tanyatuḥ rocana sthāḥ ajarebhiḥ nānadadbhiḥ yaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_6,006.02c yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūny agnir anuyāti bharvan //
analyzed: yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūni agniḥ anuyāti bharvan

original: RV_6,006.03a vi te viṣvag vātajūtāso agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaś caranti /
analyzed: vi te viṣvak vāta jūtāsaḥ agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaḥ caranti

original: RV_6,006.03c tuvimrakṣāso divyā navagvā vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ //
analyzed: tuvi mrakṣāsaḥ divyāḥ navagvāḥ vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ

original: RV_6,006.04a ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmaḥ kṣāṃ vapanti viṣitāso aśvāḥ /
analyzed: ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmas kṣām vapanti viṣitāsaḥ aśvāḥ

original: RV_6,006.04c adha bhramas ta urviyā vi bhāti yātayamāno adhi sānu pṛśneḥ //
analyzed: adha bhramaḥ te urviyā vi bhāti yātayamānaḥ adhi sānu pṛśneḥ

original: RV_6,006.05a adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇo goṣuyudho nāśaniḥ sṛjānā /
analyzed: adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇaḥ goṣuyudhaḥ na aśaniḥ sṛjānā

original: RV_6,006.05c śūrasyeva prasitiḥ kṣātir agner durvartur bhīmo dayate vanāni //
analyzed: śūrasya iva prasitiḥ kṣātiḥ agneḥ durvartuḥ bhīmaḥ dayate vanāni

original: RV_6,006.06a ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahas todasya dhṛṣatā tatantha /
analyzed: ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahaḥ todasya dhṛṣatā tatantha

original: RV_6,006.06c sa bādhasvāpa bhayā sahobhi spṛdho vanuṣyan vanuṣo ni jūrva //
analyzed: sa bādhasva apa bhayā sahobhi spṛdhaḥ vanuṣyan vanuṣaḥ ni jūrva

original: RV_6,006.07a sa citra citraṃ citayantam asme citrakṣatra citratamaṃ vayodhām /
analyzed: sa citra citram citayantam asme citra kṣatra citratamam vayaḥ dhām

original: RV_6,006.07c candraṃ rayim puruvīram bṛhantaṃ candra candrābhir gṛṇate yuvasva //
analyzed: candram rayim puru vīram bṛhantam candra candrābhiḥ gṛṇate yuvasva

original: RV_6,007.01a mūrdhānaṃ divo aratim pṛthivyā vaiśvānaram ṛta ā jātam agnim /
analyzed: mūrdhānam divaḥ aratim pṛthivyāḥ vaiśvānaram ṛte ā jātam agnim

original: RV_6,007.01c kaviṃ samrājam atithiṃ janānām āsann ā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ //
analyzed: kavim samrājam atithim janānām āsan ā pātram janayanta devāḥ

original: RV_6,007.02a nābhiṃ yajñānāṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām mahām āhāvam abhi saṃ navanta /
analyzed: nābhim yajñānām sadanam rayīṇām mahām āhāvam abhi sam navanta

original: RV_6,007.02c vaiśvānaraṃ rathyam adhvarāṇāṃ yajñasya ketuṃ janayanta devāḥ //
analyzed: vaiśvānaram rathyam adhvarāṇām yajñasya ketum janayanta devāḥ

original: RV_6,007.03a tvad vipro jāyate vājy agne tvad vīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
analyzed: tvat vipraḥ jāyate vājī agne tvat vīrāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: RV_6,007.03c vaiśvānara tvam asmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi //
analyzed: vaiśvānara tvam asmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi

original: RV_6,007.04a tvāṃ viśve amṛta jāyamānaṃ śiśuṃ na devā abhi saṃ navante /
analyzed: tvām viśve amṛta jāyamānam śiśum na devāḥ abhi sam navante

original: RV_6,007.04c tava kratubhir amṛtatvam āyan vaiśvānara yat pitror adīdeḥ //
analyzed: tava kratubhiḥ amṛta tvam āyan vaiśvānara yat pitroḥ adīdeḥ

original: RV_6,007.05a vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahāny agne nakir ā dadharṣa /
analyzed: vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahāni agne nakir ā dadharṣa

original: RV_6,007.05c yaj jāyamānaḥ pitror upasthe 'vindaḥ ketuṃ vayuneṣv ahnām //
analyzed: yat jāyamānaḥ pitroḥ upasthe vindaḥ ketum vayuneṣu ahnām

original: RV_6,007.06a vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divo amṛtasya ketunā /
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divaḥ amṛtasya ketunā

original: RV_6,007.06c tasyed u viśvā bhuvanādhi mūrdhani vayā iva ruruhuḥ sapta visruhaḥ //
analyzed: tasya id u viśvā bhuvanā adhi mūrdhani vayāḥ iva ruruhuḥ sapta visruhaḥ

original: RV_6,007.07a vi yo rajāṃsy amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro vi divo rocanā kaviḥ /
analyzed: vi yaḥ rajāṃsi amimīta sukratuḥ vaiśvānaraḥ vi divaḥ rocanā kaviḥ

original: RV_6,007.07c pari yo viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe 'dabdho gopā amṛtasya rakṣitā //
analyzed: pari yaḥ viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe dabdhaḥ gopāḥ amṛtasya rakṣitā

original: RV_6,008.01a pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇo aruṣasya nū sahaḥ pra nu vocaṃ vidathā jātavedasaḥ /
analyzed: pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ aruṣasya nu sahaḥ pra nu vocam vidathā jātavedasaḥ

original: RV_6,008.01c vaiśvānarāya matir navyasī śuciḥ soma iva pavate cārur agnaye //
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya matiḥ navyasī śuciḥ somaḥ iva pavate cāruḥ agnaye

original: RV_6,008.02a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratāny agnir vratapā arakṣata /
analyzed: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratāni agniḥ vrata pāḥ arakṣata

original: RV_6,008.02c vy antarikṣam amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro mahinā nākam aspṛśat //
analyzed: vi antarikṣam amimīta sukratuḥ vaiśvānaraḥ mahinā nākam aspṛśat

original: RV_6,008.03a vy astabhnād rodasī mitro adbhuto 'ntarvāvad akṛṇoj jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
analyzed: vi astabhnāt rodasī mitraḥ adbhutaḥ ntarvāvat akṛṇot jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_6,008.03c vi carmaṇīva dhiṣaṇe avartayad vaiśvānaro viśvam adhatta vṛṣṇyam //
analyzed: vi carmaṇī iva dhiṣaṇe avartayat vaiśvānaraḥ viśvam adhatta vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_6,008.04a apām upasthe mahiṣā agṛbhṇata viśo rājānam upa tasthur ṛgmiyam /
analyzed: apām upasthe mahiṣāḥ agṛbhṇata viśaḥ rājānam upa tasthuḥ ṛgmiyam

original: RV_6,008.04c ā dūto agnim abharad vivasvato vaiśvānaram mātariśvā parāvataḥ //
analyzed: ā dūtaḥ agnim abharat vivasvataḥ vaiśvānaram mātariśvā parāvataḥ

original: RV_6,008.05a yuge-yuge vidathyaṃ gṛṇadbhyo 'gne rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehi navyasīm /
analyzed: yuge yuge vidathyam gṛṇadbhyaḥ gne rayim yaśasam dhehi navyasīm

original: RV_6,008.05c pavyeva rājann aghaśaṃsam ajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninaṃ na tejasā //
analyzed: pavyā iva rājan agha śaṃsam ajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninam na tejasā

original: RV_6,008.06a asmākam agne maghavatsu dhārayānāmi kṣatram ajaraṃ suvīryam /
analyzed: asmākam agne maghavatsu dhāraya anāmi kṣatram ajaram su vīryam

original: RV_6,008.06c vayaṃ jayema śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vaiśvānara vājam agne tavotibhiḥ //
analyzed: vayam jayema śatinam sahasriṇam vaiśvānara vājam agne tava ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_6,008.07a adabdhebhis tava gopābhir iṣṭe 'smākam pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn /
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ tava gopābhiḥ iṣṭe smākam pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn

original: RV_6,008.07c rakṣā ca no daduṣāṃ śardho agne vaiśvānara pra ca tārī stavānaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣā ca naḥ daduṣām śardhaḥ agne vaiśvānara pra ca tārī stavānaḥ

original: RV_6,009.01a ahaś ca kṛṣṇam ahar arjunaṃ ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ /
analyzed: ahar ca kṛṣṇam ahar arjunam ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ

original: RV_6,009.01c vaiśvānaro jāyamāno na rājāvātiraj jyotiṣāgnis tamāṃsi //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ jāyamānaḥ na rājā avātirat jyotiṣā agniḥ tamāṃsi

original: RV_6,009.02a nāhaṃ tantuṃ na vi jānāmy otuṃ na yaṃ vayanti samare 'tamānāḥ /
analyzed: na aham tantum na vi jānāmi otum na yam vayanti samare tamānāḥ

original: RV_6,009.02c kasya svit putra iha vaktvāni paro vadāty avareṇa pitrā //
analyzed: kasya svid putraḥ iha vaktvāni paraḥ vadāti avareṇa pitrā

original: RV_6,009.03a sa it tantuṃ sa vi jānāty otuṃ sa vaktvāny ṛtuthā vadāti /
analyzed: saḥ id tantum sa vi jānāti otum sa vaktvāni ṛtuthā vadāti

original: RV_6,009.03c ya īṃ ciketad amṛtasya gopā avaś caran paro anyena paśyan //
analyzed: yaḥ īm ciketat amṛtasya gopāḥ avas caran paras anyena paśyan

original: RV_6,009.04a ayaṃ hotā prathamaḥ paśyatemam idaṃ jyotir amṛtam martyeṣu /
analyzed: ayam hotā prathamaḥ paśyata imam idam jyotiḥ amṛtam martyeṣu

original: RV_6,009.04c ayaṃ sa jajñe dhruva ā niṣatto 'martyas tanvā vardhamānaḥ //
analyzed: ayam sa jajñe dhruvaḥ ā niṣattaḥ martyaḥ tanvā vardhamānaḥ

original: RV_6,009.05a dhruvaṃ jyotir nihitaṃ dṛśaye kam mano javiṣṭham patayatsv antaḥ /
analyzed: dhruvam jyotiḥ nihitam dṛśaye kam manaḥ javiṣṭham patayatsu antar

original: RV_6,009.05c viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ saketā ekaṃ kratum abhi vi yanti sādhu //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ sa ketāḥ ekam kratum abhi vi yanti sādhu

original: RV_6,009.06a vi me karṇā patayato vi cakṣur vīdaṃ jyotir hṛdaya āhitaṃ yat /
analyzed: vi me karṇā patayataḥ vi cakṣuḥ vi idam jyotiḥ hṛdaye āhitam yat

original: RV_6,009.06c vi me manaś carati dūraādhīḥ kiṃ svid vakṣyāmi kim u nū maniṣye //
analyzed: vi me manaḥ carati dūra ādhīḥ kim svid vakṣyāmi kim u nu maniṣye

original: RV_6,009.07a viśve devā anamasyan bhiyānās tvām agne tamasi tasthivāṃsam /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anamasyan bhiyānāḥ tvām agne tamasi tasthivāṃsam

original: RV_6,009.07c vaiśvānaro 'vatūtaye no 'martyo 'vatūtaye naḥ //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ vatu ūtaye naḥ martyaḥ vatu ūtaye naḥ

original: RV_6,010.01a puro vo mandraṃ divyaṃ suvṛktim prayati yajñe agnim adhvare dadhidhvam /
analyzed: puras vaḥ mandram divyam suvṛktim prayati yajñe agnim adhvare dadhidhvam

original: RV_6,010.01c pura ukthebhiḥ sa hi no vibhāvā svadhvarā karati jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: puras ukthebhiḥ sa hi naḥ vibhāvā su adhvarā karati jātavedāḥ

original: RV_6,010.02a tam u dyumaḥ purvaṇīka hotar agne agnibhir manuṣa idhānaḥ /
analyzed: tam u dyumas purvaṇīka hotar agne agnibhiḥ manuṣe idhānaḥ

original: RV_6,010.02c stomaṃ yam asmai mamateva śūṣaṃ ghṛtaṃ na śuci matayaḥ pavante //
analyzed: stomam yam asmai śūṣam ghṛtam na śuci matayaḥ pavante

original: RV_6,010.03a pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yo agnaye dadāśa vipra ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yaḥ agnaye dadāśa vipraḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_6,010.03c citrābhis tam ūtibhiś citraśocir vrajasya sātā gomato dadhāti //
analyzed: citrābhiḥ tam ūtibhiḥ citra śociḥ vrajasya sātā gomataḥ dadhāti

original: RV_6,010.04a ā yaḥ paprau jāyamāna urvī dūredṛśā bhāsā kṛṣṇādhvā /
analyzed: ā yaḥ paprau jāyamānaḥ urvī dūredṛśā bhāsā kṛṣṇa adhvā

original: RV_6,010.04c adha bahu cit tama ūrmyāyās tiraḥ śociṣā dadṛśe pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: adha bahu cit tamaḥ ūrmyāyāḥ tiras śociṣā dadṛśe pāvakaḥ

original: RV_6,010.05a nū naś citram puruvājābhir ūtī agne rayim maghavadbhyaś ca dhehi /
analyzed: nu naḥ citram puru vājābhiḥ ūtī agne rayim maghavadbhyaḥ ca dhehi

original: RV_6,010.05c ye rādhasā śravasā cāty anyān suvīryebhiś cābhi santi janān //
analyzed: ye rādhasā śravasā ca ati anyān su vīryebhiḥ ca abhi santi janān

original: RV_6,010.06a imaṃ yajñaṃ cano dhā agna uśan yaṃ ta āsāno juhute haviṣmān /
analyzed: imam yajñam canaḥ dhāḥ agne uśan yam te āsānaḥ juhute haviṣmān

original: RV_6,010.06c bharadvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvṛktim avīr vājasya gadhyasya sātau //
analyzed: bharadvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvṛktim avīḥ vājasya gadhyasya sātau

original: RV_6,010.07a vi dveṣāṃsīnuhi vardhayeḷām madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: vi vardhaya iḷām madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,011.01a yajasva hotar iṣito yajīyān agne bādho marutāṃ na prayukti /
analyzed: yajasva hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān agne bādhaḥ marutām na prayukti

original: RV_6,011.01c ā no mitrāvaruṇā nāsatyā dyāvā hotrāya pṛthivī vavṛtyāḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā nāsatyā dyāvā hotrāya pṛthivī vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_6,011.02a tvaṃ hotā mandratamo no adhrug antar devo vidathā martyeṣu /
analyzed: tvam hotā mandratamaḥ naḥ adhruk antar devaḥ vidathā martyeṣu

original: RV_6,011.02c pāvakayā juhvā vahnir āsāgne yajasva tanvaṃ tava svām //
analyzed: pāvakayā juhvā vahniḥ āsā agne yajasva tanvam tava svām

original: RV_6,011.03a dhanyā cid dhi tve dhiṣaṇā vaṣṭi pra devāñ janma gṛṇate yajadhyai /
analyzed: dhanyā cit hi tve dhiṣaṇā vaṣṭi pra devām janma gṛṇate yajadhyai

original: RV_6,011.03c vepiṣṭho aṅgirasāṃ yad dha vipro madhu cchando bhanati rebha iṣṭau //
analyzed: vepiṣṭhaḥ aṅgirasām yat ha vipraḥ madhu chandaḥ bhanati rebhaḥ iṣṭau

original: RV_6,011.04a adidyutat sv apāko vibhāvāgne yajasva rodasī urūcī /
analyzed: adidyutat su apākaḥ vibhāvā agne yajasva rodasī urūcī

original: RV_6,011.04c āyuṃ na yaṃ namasā rātahavyā añjanti suprayasam pañca janāḥ //
analyzed: āyum na yam namasā rāta havyāḥ añjanti su prayasam pañca janāḥ

original: RV_6,011.05a vṛñje ha yan namasā barhir agnāv ayāmi srug ghṛtavatī suvṛktiḥ /
analyzed: vṛñje ha yat namasā barhiḥ agnau ayāmi sruc ghṛtavatī suvṛktiḥ

original: RV_6,011.05c amyakṣi sadma sadane pṛthivyā aśrāyi yajñaḥ sūrye na cakṣuḥ //
analyzed: amyakṣi sadma sadane pṛthivyāḥ aśrāyi yajñaḥ sūrye na cakṣuḥ

original: RV_6,011.06a daśasyā naḥ purvaṇīka hotar devebhir agne agnibhir idhānaḥ /
analyzed: daśasya naḥ purvaṇīka hotar devebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ idhānaḥ

original: RV_6,011.06c rāyaḥ sūno sahaso vāvasānā ati srasema vṛjanaṃ nāṃhaḥ //
analyzed: rāyaḥ sūno sahasaḥ vāvasānāḥ ati srasema vṛjanam nā aṃhaḥ

original: RV_6,012.01a madhye hotā duroṇe barhiṣo rāḷ agnis todasya rodasī yajadhyai /
analyzed: madhye hotā duroṇe barhiṣaḥ rāj agniḥ todasya rodasī yajadhyai

original: RV_6,012.01c ayaṃ sa sūnuḥ sahasa ṛtāvā dūrāt sūryo na śociṣā tatāna //
analyzed: ayam sa sūnuḥ sahasaḥ ṛtāvā dūrāt sūryaḥ na śociṣā tatāna

original: RV_6,012.02a ā yasmin tve sv apāke yajatra yakṣad rājan sarvatāteva nu dyauḥ /
analyzed: ā yasmin tve su apāke yajatra yakṣat rājan sarvatātā iva nu dyauḥ

original: RV_6,012.02c triṣadhasthas tataruṣo na jaṃho havyā maghāni mānuṣā yajadhyai //
analyzed: triṣadhasthaḥ tataruṣaḥ na jaṃhaḥ havyā maghāni mānuṣā yajadhyai

original: RV_6,012.03a tejiṣṭhā yasyāratir vanerāṭ todo adhvan na vṛdhasāno adyaut /
analyzed: tejiṣṭhā yasya aratiḥ vanerāj todaḥ adhvan na vṛdhasānaḥ adyaut

original: RV_6,012.03c adrogho na dravitā cetati tmann amartyo 'vartra oṣadhīṣu //
analyzed: adroghaḥ na dravitā cetati tman amartyaḥ vartre oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_6,012.04a sāsmākebhir etarī na śūṣair agni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: sā asmākebhiḥ etarī na śūṣaiḥ agni stave dame ā jātavedāḥ

original: RV_6,012.04c drvanno vanvan kratvā nārvosraḥ piteva jārayāyi yajñaiḥ //
analyzed: dru annaḥ vanvan kratvā na arva usraḥ pitā iva jārayāyi yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,012.05a adha smāsya panayanti bhāso vṛthā yat takṣad anuyāti pṛthvīm /
analyzed: adha sma asya panayanti bhāsaḥ vṛthā yat takṣat anuyāti pṛthvīm

original: RV_6,012.05c sadyo yaḥ syandro viṣito dhavīyān ṛṇo na tāyur ati dhanvā rāṭ //
analyzed: sadyas yaḥ syandraḥ viṣitaḥ dhavīyān ṛṇaḥ na tāyuḥ ati dhanvā rāj

original: RV_6,012.06a sa tvaṃ no arvan nidāyā viśvebhir agne agnibhir idhānaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ arvan nidāyāḥ viśvebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ idhānaḥ

original: RV_6,012.06c veṣi rāyo vi yāsi ducchunā madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: veṣi rāyaḥ vi yāsi ducchunāḥ madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,013.01a tvad viśvā subhaga saubhagāny agne vi yanti vanino na vayāḥ /
analyzed: tvat viśvā subhaga saubhagāni agne vi yanti vaninaḥ na vayāḥ

original: RV_6,013.01c śruṣṭī rayir vājo vṛtratūrye divo vṛṣṭir īḍyo rītir apām //
analyzed: śruṣṭiḥ rayiḥ vājaḥ vṛtratūrye divaḥ vṛṣṭiḥ īḍyaḥ rītiḥ apām

original: RV_6,013.02a tvam bhago na ā hi ratnam iṣe parijmeva kṣayasi dasmavarcāḥ /
analyzed: tvam bhagaḥ naḥ ā hi ratnam iṣe parijmā iva kṣayasi dasma varcāḥ

original: RV_6,013.02c agne mitro na bṛhata ṛtasyāsi kṣattā vāmasya deva bhūreḥ //
analyzed: agne mitraḥ na bṛhataḥ ṛtasya asi kṣattā vāmasya deva bhūreḥ

original: RV_6,013.03a sa satpatiḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram agne vipro vi paṇer bharti vājam /
analyzed: sa sat patiḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram agne vipraḥ vi paṇeḥ bharti vājam

original: RV_6,013.03c yaṃ tvam praceta ṛtajāta rāyā sajoṣā naptrāpāṃ hinoṣi //
analyzed: yam tvam pracetaḥ ṛta jāta rāyā sajoṣāḥ naptrā apām hinoṣi

original: RV_6,013.04a yas te sūno sahaso gīrbhir ukthair yajñair marto niśitiṃ vedyānaṭ /
analyzed: yaḥ te sūno sahasaḥ gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ yajñaiḥ martaḥ niśitim vedyā ānaṭ

original: RV_6,013.04c viśvaṃ sa deva prati vāram agne dhatte dhānyam patyate vasavyaiḥ //
analyzed: viśvam sa deva prati vāram agne dhatte dhānyam patyate vasavyaiḥ

original: RV_6,013.05a tā nṛbhya ā sauśravasā suvīrāgne sūno sahasaḥ puṣyase dhāḥ /
analyzed: tā nṛbhyaḥ ā sauśravasā su vīrā agne sūno sahasaḥ puṣyase dhāḥ

original: RV_6,013.05c kṛṇoṣi yac chavasā bhūri paśvo vayo vṛkāyāraye jasuraye //
analyzed: kṛṇoṣi yat śavasā bhūri paśvaḥ vayaḥ vṛkāya araye jasuraye

original: RV_6,013.06a vadmā sūno sahaso no vihāyā agne tokaṃ tanayaṃ vāji no dāḥ /
analyzed: vadmā sūno sahasaḥ naḥ vihāyāḥ agne tokam tanayam vāji naḥ dāḥ

original: RV_6,013.06c viśvābhir gīrbhir abhi pūrtim aśyām madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ abhi pūrtim aśyām madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,014.01a agnā yo martyo duvo dhiyaṃ jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ /
analyzed: agnā yaḥ martyaḥ duvaḥ dhiyam jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_6,014.01c bhasan nu ṣa pra pūrvya iṣaṃ vurītāvase //
analyzed: bhasan nu sa pra pūrvyaḥ iṣam vurīta avase

original: RV_6,014.02a agnir id dhi pracetā agnir vedhastama ṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ id hi pracetāḥ agniḥ vedhastamaḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_6,014.02c agniṃ hotāram īḷate yajñeṣu manuṣo viśaḥ //
analyzed: agnim hotāram īḍate yajñeṣu manuṣaḥ viśaḥ

original: RV_6,014.03a nānā hy agne 'vase spardhante rāyo aryaḥ /
analyzed: nānā hi agne vase spardhante rāyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_6,014.03c tūrvanto dasyum āyavo vrataiḥ sīkṣanto avratam //
analyzed: tūrvantaḥ dasyum āyavaḥ vrataiḥ sīkṣantaḥ avratam

original: RV_6,014.04a agnir apsām ṛtīṣahaṃ vīraṃ dadāti satpatim /
analyzed: agniḥ ap sām ṛtīṣaham vīram dadāti sat patim

original: RV_6,014.04c yasya trasanti śavasaḥ saṃcakṣi śatravo bhiyā //
analyzed: yasya trasanti śavasaḥ saṃcakṣi śatravaḥ bhiyā

original: RV_6,014.05a agnir hi vidmanā nido devo martam uruṣyati /
analyzed: agniḥ hi vidmanā nidaḥ devaḥ martam uruṣyati

original: RV_6,014.05c sahāvā yasyāvṛto rayir vājeṣv avṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sahāvā yasya a vṛtaḥ rayiḥ vājeṣu a vṛtaḥ

original: RV_6,014.06a acchā no mitramaho deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: acchā naḥ mitra mahas deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatim rodasyoḥ

original: RV_6,014.06c vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema //
analyzed: vīhi svastim su kṣitim divaḥ nṝn dviṣaḥ aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tava avasā tarema

original: RV_6,015.01a imam ū ṣu vo atithim uṣarbudhaṃ viśvāsāṃ viśām patim ṛñjase girā /
analyzed: imam u su vaḥ atithim uṣarbudham viśvāsām viśām patim ṛñjase girā

original: RV_6,015.01c vetīd divo januṣā kac cid ā śucir jyok cid atti garbho yad acyutam //
analyzed: veti id divaḥ januṣā kad cit ā śuciḥ jyok cit atti garbhaḥ yat acyutam

original: RV_6,015.02a mitraṃ na yaṃ sudhitam bhṛgavo dadhur vanaspatāv īḍyam ūrdhvaśociṣam /
analyzed: mitram na yam sudhitam bhṛgavaḥ vanaspatau īḍyam ūrdhva śociṣam

original: RV_6,015.02c sa tvaṃ suprīto vītahavye adbhuta praśastibhir mahayase dive-dive //
analyzed: sa tvam su prītaḥ vītahavye adbhuta praśastibhiḥ mahayase dive dive

original: RV_6,015.03a sa tvaṃ dakṣasyāvṛko vṛdho bhūr aryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam dakṣasya avṛkaḥ vṛdhaḥ bhūḥ aryaḥ parasya antarasya taruṣaḥ

original: RV_6,015.03c rāyaḥ sūno sahaso martyeṣv ā chardir yaccha vītahavyāya sapratho bharadvājāya saprathaḥ //
analyzed: rāyaḥ sūno sahasaḥ martyeṣu ā chardiḥ yaccha vītahavyāya saprathaḥ bharadvājāya saprathaḥ

original: RV_6,015.04a dyutānaṃ vo atithiṃ svarṇaram agniṃ hotāram manuṣaḥ svadhvaram /
analyzed: dyutānam vaḥ atithim svarṇaram agnim hotāram manuṣaḥ su adhvaram

original: RV_6,015.04c vipraṃ na dyukṣavacasaṃ suvṛktibhir havyavāham aratiṃ devam ṛñjase //
analyzed: vipram na dyukṣa vacasam suvṛktibhiḥ havyavāham aratim devam ṛñjase

original: RV_6,015.05a pāvakayā yaś citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruca uṣaso na bhānunā /
analyzed: pāvakayā yaḥ citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruce uṣasaḥ na bhānunā

original: RV_6,015.05c tūrvan na yāmann etaśasya nū raṇa ā yo ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇo ajaraḥ //
analyzed: tūrvan na yāman etaśasya nu raṇe ā yaḥ ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇaḥ ajaraḥ

original: RV_6,015.06a agnim-agniṃ vaḥ samidhā duvasyata priyam-priyaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣaṇi /
analyzed: agnim agnim vaḥ samidhā duvasyata priyam priyam vaḥ atithim gṛṇīṣaṇi

original: RV_6,015.06c upa vo gīrbhir amṛtaṃ vivāsata devo deveṣu vanate hi vāryaṃ devo deveṣu vanate hi no duvaḥ //
analyzed: upa vaḥ gīrbhiḥ amṛtam vivāsata devaḥ deveṣu vanate hi vāryam devaḥ deveṣu vanate hi naḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_6,015.07a samiddham agniṃ samidhā girā gṛṇe śucim pāvakam puro adhvare dhruvam /
analyzed: samiddham agnim samidhā girā gṛṇe śucim pāvakam puras adhvare dhruvam

original: RV_6,015.07c vipraṃ hotāram puruvāram adruhaṃ kaviṃ sumnair īmahe jātavedasam //
analyzed: vipram hotāram puru vāram adruham kavim sumnaiḥ īmahe jātavedasam

original: RV_6,015.08a tvāṃ dūtam agne amṛtaṃ yuge-yuge havyavāhaṃ dadhire pāyum īḍyam /
analyzed: tvām dūtam agne amṛtam yuge yuge havyavāham dadhire pāyum īḍyam

original: RV_6,015.08c devāsaś ca martāsaś ca jāgṛviṃ vibhuṃ viśpatiṃ namasā ni ṣedire //
analyzed: devāsaḥ ca martāsaḥ ca jāgṛvim vibhum viśpatim namasā ni sedire

original: RV_6,015.09a vibhūṣann agna ubhayāṃ anu vratā dūto devānāṃ rajasī sam īyase /
analyzed: vibhūṣan agne ubhayān anu vratā dūtaḥ devānām rajasī sam īyase

original: RV_6,015.09c yat te dhītiṃ sumatim āvṛṇīmahe 'dha smā nas trivarūthaḥ śivo bhava //
analyzed: yat te dhītim sumatim āvṛṇīmahe sma naḥ tri varūthaḥ śivaḥ bhava

original: RV_6,015.10a taṃ supratīkaṃ sudṛśaṃ svañcam avidvāṃso viduṣṭaraṃ sapema /
analyzed: tam su pratīkam sudṛśam svañcam avidvāṃsaḥ viduṣṭaram sapema

original: RV_6,015.10c sa yakṣad viśvā vayunāni vidvān pra havyam agnir amṛteṣu vocat //
analyzed: sa yakṣat viśvā vayunāni vidvān pra havyam agniḥ amṛteṣu vocat

original: RV_6,015.11a tam agne pāsy uta tam piparṣi yas ta ānaṭ kavaye śūra dhītim /
analyzed: tam agne pāsi uta tam piparṣi yaḥ te ānaṭ kavaye śūra dhītim

original: RV_6,015.11c yajñasya vā niśitiṃ voditiṃ vā tam it pṛṇakṣi śavasota rāyā //
analyzed: yajñasya vā niśitim vā uditim vā tam id pṛṇakṣi śavasā uta rāyā

original: RV_6,015.12a tvam agne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvann avadyāt /
analyzed: tvam agne vanuṣyataḥ ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvan avadyāt

original: RV_6,015.12c saṃ tvā dhvasmanvad abhy etu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī //
analyzed: sam tvā dhvasmanvat abhī etu pāthaḥ sam rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī

original: RV_6,015.13a agnir hotā gṛhapatiḥ sa rājā viśvā veda janimā jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ sa rājā viśvā veda janimā jātavedāḥ

original: RV_6,015.13c devānām uta yo martyānāṃ yajiṣṭhaḥ sa pra yajatām ṛtāvā //
analyzed: devānām uta yaḥ martyānām yajiṣṭhaḥ sa pra yajatām ṛtāvā

original: RV_6,015.14a agne yad adya viśo adhvarasya hotaḥ pāvakaśoce veṣ ṭvaṃ hi yajvā /
analyzed: agne yat adya viśaḥ adhvarasya hotar pāvaka śoce veḥ tvam hi yajvā

original: RV_6,015.14c ṛtā yajāsi mahinā vi yad bhūr havyā vaha yaviṣṭha yā te adya //
analyzed: ṛtā yajāsi mahinā vi yat bhūḥ havyā vaha yaviṣṭha yā te adya

original: RV_6,015.15a abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyo ni tvā dadhīta rodasī yajadhyai /
analyzed: abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyaḥ ni tvā dadhīta rodasī yajadhyai

original: RV_6,015.15c avā no maghavan vājasātāv agne viśvāni duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema //
analyzed: avāḥ naḥ maghavan vājasātau agne viśvāni duritā tarema tā tarema tava avasā tarema

original: RV_6,015.16a agne viśvebhiḥ svanīka devair ūrṇāvantam prathamaḥ sīda yonim /
analyzed: agne viśvebhiḥ su anīka devaiḥ ūrṇāvantam prathamaḥ sīda yonim

original: RV_6,015.16c kulāyinaṃ ghṛtavantaṃ savitre yajñaṃ naya yajamānāya sādhu //
analyzed: kulāyinam ghṛtavantam savitre yajñam naya yajamānāya sādhu

original: RV_6,015.17a imam u tyam atharvavad agnim manthanti vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: imam u tyam atharva vat agnim manthanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_6,015.17c yam aṅkūyantam ānayann amūraṃ śyāvyābhyaḥ //
analyzed: yam aṅkūyantam ānayan amūram śyāvyābhyaḥ

original: RV_6,015.18a janiṣvā devavītaye sarvatātā svastaye /
analyzed: janiṣva deva vītaye sarvatātā svastaye

original: RV_6,015.18c ā devān vakṣy amṛtāṃ ṛtāvṛdho yajñaṃ deveṣu pispṛśaḥ //
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi amṛtān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ yajñam deveṣu pispṛśaḥ

original: RV_6,015.19a vayam u tvā gṛhapate janānām agne akarma samidhā bṛhantam /
analyzed: vayam u tvā gṛhapate janānām agne akarma samidhā bṛhantam

original: RV_6,015.19c asthūri no gārhapatyāni santu tigmena nas tejasā saṃ śiśādhi //
analyzed: asthūri naḥ gārhapatyāni santu tigmena naḥ tejasā sam śiśādhi

original: RV_6,016.01a tvam agne yajñānāṃ hotā viśveṣāṃ hitaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne yajñānām hotā viśveṣām hitaḥ

original: RV_6,016.01c devebhir mānuṣe jane //
analyzed: devebhiḥ mānuṣe jane

original: RV_6,016.02a sa no mandrābhir adhvare jihvābhir yajā mahaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ mandrābhiḥ adhvare jihvābhiḥ yaja mahaḥ

original: RV_6,016.02c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_6,016.03a vetthā hi vedho adhvanaḥ pathaś ca devāñjasā /
analyzed: vettha hi vedhaḥ adhvanaḥ pathaḥ ca deva añjasā

original: RV_6,016.03c agne yajñeṣu sukrato //
analyzed: agne yajñeṣu sukrato

original: RV_6,016.04a tvām īḷe adha dvitā bharato vājibhiḥ śunam /
analyzed: tvām īḍe adha dvitā bharataḥ vājibhiḥ śunam

original: RV_6,016.04c īje yajñeṣu yajñiyam //
analyzed: īje yajñeṣu yajñiyam

original: RV_6,016.05a tvam imā vāryā puru divodāsāya sunvate /
analyzed: tvam imā vāryā puru divodāsāya sunvate

original: RV_6,016.05c bharadvājāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: bharadvājāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_6,016.06a tvaṃ dūto amartya ā vahā daivyaṃ janam /
analyzed: tvam dūtaḥ amartyaḥ ā vaha daivyam janam

original: RV_6,016.06c śṛṇvan viprasya suṣṭutim //
analyzed: śṛṇvan viprasya suṣṭutim

original: RV_6,016.07a tvām agne svādhyo martāso devavītaye /
analyzed: tvām agne su ādhyaḥ martāsaḥ deva vītaye

original: RV_6,016.07c yajñeṣu devam īḷate //
analyzed: yajñeṣu devam īḍate

original: RV_6,016.08a tava pra yakṣi saṃdṛśam uta kratuṃ sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: tava pra yakṣi saṃdṛśam uta kratum sudānavaḥ

original: RV_6,016.08c viśve juṣanta kāminaḥ //
analyzed: viśve juṣanta kāminaḥ

original: RV_6,016.09a tvaṃ hotā manurhito vahnir āsā viduṣṭaraḥ /
analyzed: tvam hotā manuḥ hitaḥ vahniḥ āsā viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_6,016.09c agne yakṣi divo viśaḥ //
analyzed: agne yakṣi divaḥ viśaḥ

original: RV_6,016.10a agna ā yāhi vītaye gṛṇāno havyadātaye /
analyzed: agne ā yāhi vītaye gṛṇānaḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_6,016.10c ni hotā satsi barhiṣi //
analyzed: ni hotā satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_6,016.11a taṃ tvā samidbhir aṅgiro ghṛtena vardhayāmasi /
analyzed: tam tvā samidbhiḥ aṅgiraḥ ghṛtena vardhayāmasi

original: RV_6,016.11c bṛhac chocā yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: bṛhat śoca yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_6,016.12a sa naḥ pṛthu śravāyyam acchā deva vivāsasi /
analyzed: sa naḥ pṛthu śravāyyam acchā deva vivāsasi

original: RV_6,016.12c bṛhad agne suvīryam //
analyzed: bṛhat agne su vīryam

original: RV_6,016.13a tvām agne puṣkarād adhy atharvā nir amanthata /
analyzed: tvām agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā niḥ amanthata

original: RV_6,016.13c mūrdhno viśvasya vāghataḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhnaḥ viśvasya vāghataḥ

original: RV_6,016.14a tam u tvā dadhyaṅṅ ṛṣiḥ putra īdhe atharvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tam u tvā dadhyaṅ ṛṣiḥ putraḥ īdhe atharvaṇaḥ

original: RV_6,016.14c vṛtrahaṇam purandaram //
analyzed: vṛtra haṇam purandaram

original: RV_6,016.15a tam u tvā pāthyo vṛṣā sam īdhe dasyuhantamam /
analyzed: tam u tvā pāthyaḥ vṛṣā sam īdhe dasyu hantamam

original: RV_6,016.15c dhanañjayaṃ raṇe-raṇe //
analyzed: dhanañjayam raṇeraṇe

original: RV_6,016.16a ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi te 'gna itthetarā giraḥ /
analyzed: ehi u su bravāṇi te gne itthā itarāḥ giraḥ

original: RV_6,016.16c ebhir vardhāsa indubhiḥ //
analyzed: ebhiḥ vardhāse indubhiḥ

original: RV_6,016.17a yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram /
analyzed: yatra kva ca te manaḥ dakṣam dadhase uttaram

original: RV_6,016.17c tatrā sadaḥ kṛṇavase //
analyzed: tatra sadaḥ kṛṇavase

original: RV_6,016.18a nahi te pūrtam akṣipad bhuvan nemānāṃ vaso /
analyzed: nahi te pūrtam akṣipat bhuvat nemānām vaso

original: RV_6,016.18c athā duvo vanavase //
analyzed: athā duvaḥ vanavase

original: RV_6,016.19a āgnir agāmi bhārato vṛtrahā purucetanaḥ /
analyzed: ā agniḥ agāmi bhārataḥ vṛtra hā puru cetanaḥ

original: RV_6,016.19c divodāsasya satpatiḥ //
analyzed: divodāsasya satpatiḥ

original: RV_6,016.20a sa hi viśvāti pārthivā rayiṃ dāśan mahitvanā /
analyzed: sa hi viśvā ati pārthivā rayim dāśat mahitvanā

original: RV_6,016.20c vanvann avāto astṛtaḥ //
analyzed: vanvan a vātaḥ a stṛtaḥ

original: RV_6,016.21a sa pratnavan navīyasāgne dyumnena saṃyatā /
analyzed: sa pratna vat navīyasā agne dyumnena saṃyatā

original: RV_6,016.21c bṛhat tatantha bhānunā //
analyzed: bṛhat tatantha bhānunā

original: RV_6,016.22a pra vaḥ sakhāyo agnaye stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: pra vaḥ sakhāyaḥ agnaye stomam yajñam ca dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_6,016.22c arca gāya ca vedhase //
analyzed: arca gāya ca vedhase

original: RV_6,016.23a sa hi yo mānuṣā yugā sīdad dhotā kavikratuḥ /
analyzed: sa hi yaḥ mānuṣā yugā sīdat hotā kavi kratuḥ

original: RV_6,016.23c dūtaś ca havyavāhanaḥ //
analyzed: dūtaḥ ca havyavāhanaḥ

original: RV_6,016.24a tā rājānā śucivratādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam /
analyzed: tā rājānā śuci vratā ādityān mārutam gaṇam

original: RV_6,016.24c vaso yakṣīha rodasī //
analyzed: vaso yakṣi iha rodasī

original: RV_6,016.25a vasvī te agne saṃdṛṣṭir iṣayate martyāya /
analyzed: vasvī te agne saṃdṛṣṭiḥ iṣayate martyāya

original: RV_6,016.25c ūrjo napād amṛtasya //
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt amṛtasya

original: RV_6,016.26a kratvā dā astu śreṣṭho 'dya tvā vanvan surekṇāḥ /
analyzed: kratvā dāḥ astu śreṣṭhaḥ dya tvā vanvan surekṇāḥ

original: RV_6,016.26c marta ānāśa suvṛktim //
analyzed: martaḥ ānāśa suvṛktim

original: RV_6,016.27a te te agne tvotā iṣayanto viśvam āyuḥ /
analyzed: te te agne tvotāḥ iṣayantaḥ viśvam āyuḥ

original: RV_6,016.27c taranto aryo arātīr vanvanto aryo arātīḥ //
analyzed: tarantaḥ aryaḥ arātīḥ vanvantaḥ aryaḥ arātīḥ

original: RV_6,016.28a agnis tigmena śociṣā yāsad viśvaṃ ny atriṇam /
analyzed: agniḥ tigmena śociṣā yāsat viśvam ni atriṇam

original: RV_6,016.28c agnir no vanate rayim //
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ vanate rayim

original: RV_6,016.29a suvīraṃ rayim ā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: su vīram rayim ā bhara jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_6,016.29c jahi rakṣāṃsi sukrato //
analyzed: jahi rakṣāṃsi su krato

original: RV_6,016.30a tvaṃ naḥ pāhy aṃhaso jātavedo aghāyataḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ jātavedaḥ aghāyataḥ

original: RV_6,016.30c rakṣā ṇo brahmaṇas kave //
analyzed: rakṣa naḥ brahmaṇaḥ kave

original: RV_6,016.31a yo no agne dureva ā marto vadhāya dāśati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agne durevaḥ ā martaḥ vadhāya dāśati

original: RV_6,016.31c tasmān naḥ pāhy aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_6,016.32a tvaṃ taṃ deva jihvayā pari bādhasva duṣkṛtam /
analyzed: tvam tam deva jihvayā pari bādhasva duṣkṛtam

original: RV_6,016.32c marto yo no jighāṃsati //
analyzed: martaḥ yaḥ naḥ jighāṃsati

original: RV_6,016.33a bharadvājāya saprathaḥ śarma yaccha sahantya /
analyzed: bharadvājāya saprathaḥ śarma yaccha sahantya

original: RV_6,016.33c agne vareṇyaṃ vasu //
analyzed: agne vareṇyam vasu

original: RV_6,016.34a agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur vipanyayā /
analyzed: agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat draviṇasyuḥ vipanyayā

original: RV_6,016.34c samiddhaḥ śukra āhutaḥ //
analyzed: samiddhaḥ śukraḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_6,016.35a garbhe mātuḥ pituṣ pitā vididyutāno akṣare /
analyzed: garbhe mātuḥ pituḥ pitā vididyutānaḥ akṣare

original: RV_6,016.35c sīdann ṛtasya yonim ā //
analyzed: sīdan ṛtasya yonim ā

original: RV_6,016.36a brahma prajāvad ā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: brahma prajāvat ā bhara jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_6,016.36c agne yad dīdayad divi //
analyzed: agne yat dīdayat divi

original: RV_6,016.37a upa tvā raṇvasaṃdṛśam prayasvantaḥ sahaskṛta /
analyzed: upa tvā raṇva saṃdṛśam prayasvantaḥ sahaskṛta

original: RV_6,016.37c agne sasṛjmahe giraḥ //
analyzed: agne sasṛjmahe giraḥ

original: RV_6,016.38a upa cchāyām iva ghṛṇer aganma śarma te vayam /
analyzed: upa chāyām iva ghṛṇeḥ aganma śarma te vayam

original: RV_6,016.38c agne hiraṇyasaṃdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: agne hiraṇya saṃdṛśaḥ

original: RV_6,016.39a ya ugra iva śaryahā tigmaśṛṅgo na vaṃsagaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ugraḥ iva śaryahā tigma śṛṅgaḥ na vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_6,016.39c agne puro rurojitha //
analyzed: agne puraḥ rurojitha

original: RV_6,016.40a ā yaṃ haste na khādinaṃ śiśuṃ jātaṃ na bibhrati /
analyzed: ā yam haste na khādinam śiśum jātam na bibhrati

original: RV_6,016.40c viśām agniṃ svadhvaram //
analyzed: viśām agnim su adhvaram

original: RV_6,016.41a pra devaṃ devavītaye bharatā vasuvittamam /
analyzed: pra devam deva vītaye bharata vasu vittamam

original: RV_6,016.41c ā sve yonau ni ṣīdatu //
analyzed: ā sve yonau ni sīdatu

original: RV_6,016.42a ā jātaṃ jātavedasi priyaṃ śiśītātithim /
analyzed: ā jātam jātavedasi priyam śiśīta atithim

original: RV_6,016.42c syona ā gṛhapatim //
analyzed: syone ā gṛhapatim

original: RV_6,016.43a agne yukṣvā hi ye tavāśvāso deva sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: agne yukṣvā hi ye tava āśvāsaḥ deva sādhavaḥ

original: RV_6,016.43c araṃ vahanti manyave //
analyzed: aram vahanti manyave

original: RV_6,016.44a acchā no yāhy ā vahābhi prayāṃsi vītaye /
analyzed: acchā naḥ yāhi ā vaha abhi prayāṃsi vītaye

original: RV_6,016.44c ā devān somapītaye //
analyzed: ā devān soma pītaye

original: RV_6,016.45a ud agne bhārata dyumad ajasreṇa davidyutat /
analyzed: ud agne bhārata dyumat ajasreṇa davidyutat

original: RV_6,016.45c śocā vi bhāhy ajara //
analyzed: vi bhāhi ajara

original: RV_6,016.46a vītī yo devam marto duvasyed agnim īḷītādhvare haviṣmān /
analyzed: vītī yaḥ devam martaḥ duvasyet agnim īḍīta adhvare haviṣmān

original: RV_6,016.46c hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyor uttānahasto namasā vivāset //
analyzed: hotāram satya yajam rodasyoḥ uttāna hastaḥ namasā vivāset

original: RV_6,016.47a ā te agna ṛcā havir hṛdā taṣṭam bharāmasi /
analyzed: ā te agne ṛcā haviḥ hṛdā taṣṭam bharāmasi

original: RV_6,016.47c te te bhavantūkṣaṇa ṛṣabhāso vaśā uta //
analyzed: te te bhavantu ukṣaṇaḥ ṛṣabhāsaḥ vaśāḥ uta

original: RV_6,016.48a agniṃ devāso agriyam indhate vṛtrahantamam /
analyzed: agnim devāsaḥ agriyam indhate vṛtra hantamam

original: RV_6,016.48c yenā vasūny ābhṛtā tṛḷhā rakṣāṃsi vājinā //
analyzed: yena vasūni ābhṛtā tṛḷhā rakṣāṃsi vājinā

original: RV_6,017.01a pibā somam abhi yam ugra tarda ūrvaṃ gavyam mahi gṛṇāna indra /
analyzed: pibā somam abhi yam ugra tardaḥ ūrvam gavyam mahi gṛṇānaḥ indra

original: RV_6,017.01c vi yo dhṛṣṇo vadhiṣo vajrahasta viśvā vṛtram amitriyā śavobhiḥ //
analyzed: vi yaḥ dhṛṣṇo vadhiṣaḥ vajrahasta viśvā vṛtram amitriyā śavobhiḥ

original: RV_6,017.02a sa īm pāhi ya ṛjīṣī tarutro yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabho yo matīnām /
analyzed: saḥ īm pāhi yaḥ ṛjīṣī tarutraḥ yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ matīnām

original: RV_6,017.02c yo gotrabhid vajrabhṛd yo hariṣṭhāḥ sa indra citrāṃ abhi tṛndhi vājān //
analyzed: yaḥ gotrabhid vajrabhṛt yaḥ hariṣṭhāḥ saḥ indra citrān abhi tṛndhi vājān

original: RV_6,017.03a evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasvota gīrbhiḥ /
analyzed: evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasva uta gīrbhiḥ

original: RV_6,017.03c āviḥ sūryaṃ kṛṇuhi pīpihīṣo jahi śatrūṃr abhi gā indra tṛndhi //
analyzed: āvis sūryam kṛṇuhi pīpihi iṣaḥ jahi śatrūṃr abhi gāḥ indra tṛndhi

original: RV_6,017.04a te tvā madā bṛhad indra svadhāva ime pītā ukṣayanta dyumantam /
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ bṛhat indra svadhāvas ime pītāḥ ukṣayanta dyumantam

original: RV_6,017.04c mahām anūnaṃ tavasaṃ vibhūtim matsarāso jarhṛṣanta prasāham //
analyzed: mahām anūnam tavasam vibhūtim matsarāsaḥ jarhṛṣanta prasāham

original: RV_6,017.05a yebhiḥ sūryam uṣasam mandasāno 'vāsayo 'pa dṛḷhāni dardrat /
analyzed: yebhiḥ sūryam uṣasam mandasānaḥ vāsaya u pa dṛḷhāni dardrat

original: RV_6,017.05c mahām adrim pari gā indra santaṃ nutthā acyutaṃ sadasas pari svāt //
analyzed: mahām adrim pari gāḥ indra santam nutthāḥ acyutam sadasaḥ pari svāt

original: RV_6,017.06a tava kratvā tava tad daṃsanābhir āmāsu pakvaṃ śacyā ni dīdhaḥ /
analyzed: tava kratvā tava tat daṃsanābhiḥ āmāsu pakvam śacyā ni

original: RV_6,017.06c aurṇor dura usriyābhyo vi dṛḷhod ūrvād gā asṛjo aṅgirasvān //
analyzed: aurṇoḥ duraḥ usriyābhyaḥ vi dṛḍhā ud ūrvāt gāḥ asṛjaḥ aṅgirasvān

original: RV_6,017.07a paprātha kṣām mahi daṃso vy urvīm upa dyām ṛṣvo bṛhad indra stabhāyaḥ /
analyzed: paprātha kṣām mahi daṃsaḥ vi urvīm upa dyām ṛṣvaḥ bṛhat indra stabhāyaḥ

original: RV_6,017.07c adhārayo rodasī devaputre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya //
analyzed: adhārayaḥ rodasī deva putre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya

original: RV_6,017.08a adha tvā viśve pura indra devā ekaṃ tavasaṃ dadhire bharāya /
analyzed: adha tvā viśve puras indra devāḥ ekam tavasam dadhire bharāya

original: RV_6,017.08c adevo yad abhy auhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇata indram atra //
analyzed: adevaḥ yat abhī auhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇate indram atra

original: RV_6,017.09a adha dyauś cit te apa sā nu vajrād dvitānamad bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ /
analyzed: adha dyauḥ cit te apa sā nu vajrāt dvitā anamat bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ

original: RV_6,017.09c ahiṃ yad indro abhy ohasānaṃ ni cid viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna //
analyzed: ahim yat indraḥ abhī ohasānam ni cit viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna

original: RV_6,017.10a adha tvaṣṭā te maha ugra vajraṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ vavṛtac chatāśrim /
analyzed: adha tvaṣṭā te mahaḥ ugra vajram sahasra bhṛṣṭim vavṛtat śata aśrim

original: RV_6,017.10c nikāmam aramaṇasaṃ yena navantam ahiṃ sam piṇag ṛjīṣin //
analyzed: nikāmam aramaṇasam yena navantam ahim sam piṇak ṛjīṣin

original: RV_6,017.11a vardhān yaṃ viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacac chatam mahiṣāṃ indra tubhyam /
analyzed: vardhān yam viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacat śatam mahiṣān indra tubhyam

original: RV_6,017.11c pūṣā viṣṇus trīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtrahaṇam madiram aṃśum asmai //
analyzed: pūṣā viṣṇuḥ trīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtra haṇam madiram aṃśum asmai

original: RV_6,017.12a ā kṣodo mahi vṛtaṃ nadīnām pariṣṭhitam asṛja ūrmim apām /
analyzed: ā kṣodaḥ mahi vṛtam nadīnām pariṣṭhitam asṛjaḥ ūrmim apām

original: RV_6,017.12c tāsām anu pravata indra panthām prārdayo nīcīr apasaḥ samudram //
analyzed: tāsām anu pravataḥ indra panthām prārdayaḥ nīcīḥ apasaḥ samudram

original: RV_6,017.13a evā tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsam indram mahām ugram ajuryaṃ sahodām /
analyzed: eva tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsam indram mahām ugram ajuryam sahaḥ dām

original: RV_6,017.13c suvīraṃ tvā svāyudhaṃ suvajram ā brahma navyam avase vavṛtyāt //
analyzed: su vīram tvā su āyudham su vajram ā brahma navyam avase vavṛtyāt

original: RV_6,017.14a sa no vājāya śravasa iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumata indra viprān /
analyzed: sa naḥ vājāya śravase iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumataḥ indra viprān

original: RV_6,017.14c bharadvāje nṛvata indra sūrīn divi ca smaidhi pārye na indra //
analyzed: bharadvāje nṛvataḥ indra sūrīn divi ca smā edhi pārye naḥ indra

original: RV_6,017.15a ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: ayā vājam deva hitam sanema madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,018.01a tam u ṣṭuhi yo abhibhūtyojā vanvann avātaḥ puruhūta indraḥ /
analyzed: tam u stuhi yaḥ abhibhūti ojāḥ vanvan a vātaḥ puruhūtaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_6,018.01c aṣāḷham ugraṃ sahamānam ābhir gīrbhir vardha vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: aṣāḷham ugram sahamānam ābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ vardha vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_6,018.02a sa yudhmaḥ satvā khajakṛt samadvā tuvimrakṣo nadanumāṃ ṛjīṣī /
analyzed: sa yudhmaḥ satvā khaja kṛt samadvā tuvi mrakṣaḥ nadanumān ṛjīṣī

original: RV_6,018.02c bṛhadreṇuś cyavano mānuṣīṇām ekaḥ kṛṣṭīnām abhavat sahāvā //
analyzed: bṛhat reṇuḥ cyavanaḥ mānuṣīṇām ekaḥ kṛṣṭīnām abhavat sahāvā

original: RV_6,018.03a tvaṃ ha nu tyad adamāyo dasyūṃr ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr avanor āryāya /
analyzed: tvam ha nu tyad adamāyaḥ dasyūṃr ekaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ avanoḥ āryāya

original: RV_6,018.03c asti svin nu vīryaṃ tat ta indra na svid asti tad ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ //
analyzed: asti svid nu vīryam tat te indra na svid asti tat ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ

original: RV_6,018.04a sad id dhi te tuvijātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turatas turasya /
analyzed: sat id hi te tuvi jātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turataḥ turasya

original: RV_6,018.04c ugram ugrasya tavasas tavīyo 'radhrasya radhraturo babhūva //
analyzed: ugram ugrasya tavasaḥ tavīyaḥ radhrasya radhraturaḥ babhūva

original: RV_6,018.05a tan naḥ pratnaṃ sakhyam astu yuṣme itthā vadadbhir valam aṅgirobhiḥ /
analyzed: tat naḥ pratnam sakhyam astu yuṣme itthā vadadbhiḥ valam aṅgirobhiḥ

original: RV_6,018.05c hann acyutacyud dasmeṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puro vi duro asya viśvāḥ //
analyzed: han acyuta cyut dasma iṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puraḥ vi duraḥ asya viśvāḥ

original: RV_6,018.06a sa hi dhībhir havyo asty ugra īśānakṛn mahati vṛtratūrye /
analyzed: sa hi dhībhiḥ havyaḥ asti ugraḥ īśāna kṛt mahati vṛtratūrye

original: RV_6,018.06c sa tokasātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyo abhavat samatsu //
analyzed: sa toka sātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyaḥ abhavat samatsu

original: RV_6,018.07a sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇām amartyena nāmnāti pra sarsre /
analyzed: sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇām amartyena nāmnā ati pra sarsre

original: RV_6,018.07c sa dyumnena sa śavasota rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ //
analyzed: sa dyumnena sa śavasā uta rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ

original: RV_6,018.08a sa yo na muhe na mithū jano bhūt sumantunāmā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca /
analyzed: sa yaḥ na muhe na mithū bhūt sumantu nāmā cumurim dhunim ca

original: RV_6,018.08c vṛṇak pipruṃ śambaraṃ śuṣṇam indraḥ purāṃ cyautnāya śayathāya nū cit //
analyzed: vṛṇak piprum śambaram śuṣṇam indraḥ purām cyautnāya śayathāya nu cit

original: RV_6,018.09a udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtrahatyāya ratham indra tiṣṭha /
analyzed: udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtra hatyāya ratham indra tiṣṭha

original: RV_6,018.09c dhiṣva vajraṃ hasta ā dakṣiṇatrābhi pra manda purudatra māyāḥ //
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram haste ā dakṣiṇatrā abhi pra manda puru datra māyāḥ

original: RV_6,018.10a agnir na śuṣkaṃ vanam indra hetī rakṣo ni dhakṣy aśanir na bhīmā /
analyzed: agniḥ na śuṣkam vanam indra hetī rakṣaḥ ni dhakṣi aśaniḥ na bhīmā

original: RV_6,018.10c gambhīraya ṛṣvayā yo rurojādhvānayad duritā dambhayac ca //
analyzed: ṛṣvayā yaḥ ruroja adhvānayat duritā dambhayat ca

original: RV_6,018.11a ā sahasram pathibhir indra rāyā tuvidyumna tuvivājebhir arvāk /
analyzed: ā sahasram pathibhiḥ indra rāyā tuvi dyumna tuvi vājebhiḥ arvāk

original: RV_6,018.11c yāhi sūno sahaso yasya nū cid adeva īśe puruhūta yotoḥ //
analyzed: yāhi sūno sahasaḥ yasya nu cit a devaḥ īśe puruhūta yotoḥ

original: RV_6,018.12a pra tuvidyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣver divo rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: pra tuvi dyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ divaḥ rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_6,018.12c nāsya śatrur na pratimānam asti na pratiṣṭhiḥ purumāyasya sahyoḥ //
analyzed: na asya śatruḥ na pratimānam asti na pratiṣṭhiḥ puru māyasya sahyoḥ

original: RV_6,018.13a pra tat te adyā karaṇaṃ kṛtam bhūt kutsaṃ yad āyum atithigvam asmai /
analyzed: pra tat te adyā karaṇam kṛtam bhūt kutsam yat āyum atithigvam asmai

original: RV_6,018.13c purū sahasrā ni śiśā abhi kṣām ut tūrvayāṇaṃ dhṛṣatā ninetha //
analyzed: purū sahasrā ni śiśāḥ abhi kṣām ud tūrvayāṇam dhṛṣatā ninetha

original: RV_6,018.14a anu tvāhighne adha deva devā madan viśve kavitamaṃ kavīnām /
analyzed: anu tvā ahi ghne adha deva devāḥ madan viśve kavitamam kavīnām

original: RV_6,018.14c karo yatra varivo bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: karaḥ yatra varivaḥ bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_6,018.15a anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat ta ojo 'martyā jihata indra devāḥ /
analyzed: anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat te ojaḥ martyāḥ jihate indra devāḥ

original: RV_6,018.15c kṛṣvā kṛtno akṛtaṃ yat te asty ukthaṃ navīyo janayasva yajñaiḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣva kṛtno a kṛtam yat te asti uktham navīyaḥ janayasva yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,019.01a mahāṃ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā uta dvibarhā aminaḥ sahobhiḥ /
analyzed: mahān indraḥ nṛ vat ā carṣaṇi prāḥ uta dvibarhāḥ aminaḥ sahobhiḥ

original: RV_6,019.01c asmadryag vāvṛdhe vīryāyoruḥ pṛthuḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhir bhūt //
analyzed: asmadryak vāvṛdhe vīryāya uruḥ pṛthuḥ su kṛtaḥ kartṛbhiḥ bhūt

original: RV_6,019.02a indram eva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhād bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ yuvānam /
analyzed: indram eva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhāt bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaram yuvānam

original: RV_6,019.02c aṣāḷhena śavasā śūśuvāṃsaṃ sadyaś cid yo vāvṛdhe asāmi //
analyzed: a ṣāḍhena śavasā śūśuvāṃsam sadyas cit yaḥ vāvṛdhe asāmi

original: RV_6,019.03a pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi /
analyzed: pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi

original: RV_6,019.03c yūtheva paśvaḥ paśupā damūnā asmāṃ indrābhy ā vavṛtsvājau //
analyzed: yūthā iva paśvaḥ paśu pāḥ damūnāḥ asmān indra abhi ā vavṛtsva ājau

original: RV_6,019.04a taṃ va indraṃ catinam asya śākair iha nūnaṃ vājayanto huvema /
analyzed: tam vaḥ indram catinam asya śākaiḥ iha nūnam vājayantaḥ huvema

original: RV_6,019.04c yathā cit pūrve jaritāra āsur anedyā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: yathā cit pūrve jaritāraḥ āsuḥ anedyāḥ anavadyāḥ ariṣṭāḥ

original: RV_6,019.05a dhṛtavrato dhanadāḥ somavṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtavrataḥ dhana dāḥ soma vṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ

original: RV_6,019.05c saṃ jagmire pathyā rāyo asmin samudre na sindhavo yādamānāḥ //
analyzed: sam jagmire pathyāḥ rāyaḥ asmin samudre na sindhavaḥ yādamānāḥ

original: RV_6,019.06a śaviṣṭhaṃ na ā bhara śūra śava ojiṣṭham ojo abhibhūta ugram /
analyzed: śaviṣṭham naḥ ā bhara śūra śavaḥ ojiṣṭham ojaḥ abhibhūte ugram

original: RV_6,019.06c viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇām asmabhyaṃ dā harivo mādayadhyai //
analyzed: viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇām asmabhyam dāḥ harivas mādayadhyai

original: RV_6,019.07a yas te madaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amṛdhra indra taṃ na ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam /
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ pṛtanāṣāh amṛdhraḥ indra tam naḥ ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam

original: RV_6,019.07c yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsas tvotāḥ //
analyzed: yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsaḥ tvotāḥ

original: RV_6,019.08a ā no bhara vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indra dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara vṛṣaṇam śuṣmam indra dhana spṛtam śūśuvāṃsam su dakṣam

original: RV_6,019.08c yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tavotibhir uta jāmīṃr ajāmīn //
analyzed: yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tava ūtibhiḥ uta jāmīn ajāmīn

original: RV_6,019.09a ā te śuṣmo vṛṣabha etu paścād ottarād adharād ā purastāt /
analyzed: ā te śuṣmaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ etu paścāt ā uttarāt adharāt ā purastāt

original: RV_6,019.09c ā viśvato abhi sam etv arvāṅ indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme //
analyzed: ā viśvatas abhi sam etu arvāṅ indra dyumnam svarvat dhehi asme

original: RV_6,019.10a nṛvat ta indra nṛtamābhir ūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmaṃ śromatebhiḥ /
analyzed: nṛvat te indra nṛtamābhiḥ ūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmam śromatebhiḥ

original: RV_6,019.10c īkṣe hi vasva ubhayasya rājan dhā ratnam mahi sthūram bṛhantam //
analyzed: īkṣe hi vasvaḥ ubhayasya rājan dhāḥ ratnam mahi sthūram bṛhantam

original: RV_6,019.11a marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vāvṛdhānam akavāriṃ divyaṃ śāsam indram /
analyzed: marutvantam vṛṣabham vāvṛdhānam a kavārim divyam śāsam indram

original: RV_6,019.11c viśvāsāham avase nūtanāyograṃ sahodām iha taṃ huvema //
analyzed: viśvāsāham avase nūtanāya ugram sahaḥ dām iha tam huvema

original: RV_6,019.12a janaṃ vajrin mahi cin manyamānam ebhyo nṛbhyo randhayā yeṣv asmi /
analyzed: janam vajrin mahi cit manyamānam ebhyaḥ nṛbhyaḥ randhaya yeṣu asmi

original: RV_6,019.12c adhā hi tvā pṛthivyāṃ śūrasātau havāmahe tanaye goṣv apsu //
analyzed: adhā hi tvā pṛthivyām śūrasātau havāmahe tanaye goṣu apsu

original: RV_6,019.13a vayaṃ ta ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ-śatror uttara it syāma /
analyzed: vayam te ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ śatroḥ uttare id syāma

original: RV_6,019.13c ghnanto vṛtrāṇy ubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatā tvotāḥ //
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi ubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatā tvotāḥ

original: RV_6,020.01a dyaur na ya indrābhi bhūmāryas tasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān /
analyzed: dyauḥ na yaḥ indra abhi bhūmā āryaḥ tasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān

original: RV_6,020.01c taṃ naḥ sahasrabharam urvarāsāṃ daddhi sūno sahaso vṛtraturam //
analyzed: tam naḥ sahasra bharam urvarā sām daddhi sūno sahasaḥ vṛtra turam

original: RV_6,020.02a divo na tubhyam anv indra satrāsuryaṃ devebhir dhāyi viśvam /
analyzed: divaḥ na tubhyam anu indra satrā asuryam devebhiḥ dhāyi viśvam

original: RV_6,020.02c ahiṃ yad vṛtram apo vavrivāṃsaṃ hann ṛjīṣin viṣṇunā sacānaḥ //
analyzed: ahim yat vṛtram apaḥ vavrivāṃsam han ṛjīṣin viṣṇunā sacānaḥ

original: RV_6,020.03a tūrvann ojīyān tavasas tavīyān kṛtabrahmendro vṛddhamahāḥ /
analyzed: tūrvan ojīyān tavasaḥ tavīyān kṛta brahmā indraḥ vṛddha mahāḥ

original: RV_6,020.03c rājābhavan madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsāṃ yat purāṃ dartnum āvat //
analyzed: rājā abhavat madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsām yat purām dartnum āvat

original: RV_6,020.04a śatair apadran paṇaya indrātra daśoṇaye kavaye 'rkasātau /
analyzed: śataiḥ apadran paṇayaḥ indra atra daśoṇaye kavaye rka sātau

original: RV_6,020.04c vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasyāśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvo nārirecīt kiṃ cana pra //
analyzed: vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasya aśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvaḥ na arirecīt kim cana pra

original: RV_6,020.05a maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: mahaḥ druhaḥ apa viśva āyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ

original: RV_6,020.05c uru ṣa sarathaṃ sārathaye kar indraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau //
analyzed: uru sa sa ratham sārathaye kaḥ indraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau

original: RV_6,020.06a pra śyeno na madiram aṃśum asmai śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan /
analyzed: pra śyenaḥ na madiram aṃśum asmai śiraḥ dāsasya namuceḥ mathāyan

original: RV_6,020.06c prāvan namīṃ sāpyaṃ sasantam pṛṇag rāyā sam iṣā saṃ svasti //
analyzed: prāvat namīm sāpyam sasantam pṛṇak rāyā sam iṣā sam svasti

original: RV_6,020.07a vi pipror ahimāyasya dṛḷhāḥ puro vajriñ chavasā na dardaḥ /
analyzed: vi piproḥ ahi māyasya dṛḍhāḥ puraḥ vajrim śavasā na dardar

original: RV_6,020.07c sudāman tad rekṇo apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātraṃ dāśuṣe dāḥ //
analyzed: su dāman tat rekṇaḥ apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātram dāśuṣe dāḥ

original: RV_6,020.08a sa vetasuṃ daśamāyaṃ daśoṇiṃ tūtujim indraḥ svabhiṣṭisumnaḥ /
analyzed: sa vetasum daśa māyam daśoṇim tūtujim indraḥ su abhiṣṭi sumnaḥ

original: RV_6,020.08c ā tugraṃ śaśvad ibhaṃ dyotanāya mātur na sīm upa sṛjā iyadhyai //
analyzed: ā tugram śaśvat ibham dyotanāya mātuḥ na sīm upa sṛjai iyadhyai

original: RV_6,020.09a sa īṃ spṛdho vanate apratīto bibhrad vajraṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ gabhastau /
analyzed: saḥ īm spṛdhaḥ vanate apratītaḥ bibhrat vajram vṛtra haṇam gabhastau

original: RV_6,020.09c tiṣṭhad dharī adhy asteva garte vacoyujā vahata indram ṛṣvam //
analyzed: tiṣṭhat harī adhi astā iva garte vacaḥ yujā vahataḥ indram ṛṣvam

original: RV_6,020.10a sanema te 'vasā navya indra pra pūrava stavanta enā yajñaiḥ /
analyzed: sanema te vasā navyaḥ indra pra pūravaḥ stavante enā yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,020.10c sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīr dard dhan dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan //
analyzed: sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīḥ dart han dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan

original: RV_6,020.11a tvaṃ vṛdha indra pūrvyo bhūr varivasyann uśane kāvyāya /
analyzed: tvam vṛdhaḥ indra pūrvyaḥ bhūḥ varivasyan uśane kāvyāya

original: RV_6,020.11c parā navavāstvam anudeyam mahe pitre dadātha svaṃ napātam //
analyzed: parā navavāstvam anudeyam mahe pitre dada atha svam napātam

original: RV_6,020.12a tvaṃ dhunir indra dhunimatīr ṛṇor apaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ /
analyzed: tvam dhuniḥ indra dhunimatīḥ ṛṇoḥ apaḥ sīrāḥ na sravantīḥ

original: RV_6,020.12c pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti //
analyzed: pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pāraya turvaśam yadum svasti

original: RV_6,020.13a tava ha tyad indra viśvam ājau sasto dhunīcumurī yā ha siṣvap /
analyzed: tava ha tyad indra viśvam ājau sastaḥ dhunī cumurī yā ha siṣvap

original: RV_6,020.13c dīdayad it tubhyaṃ somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītir idhmabhṛtiḥ pakthy arkaiḥ //
analyzed: dīdayat id tubhyam somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītiḥ idhma bhṛtiḥ pakthī arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,021.01a imā u tvā purutamasya kāror havyaṃ vīra havyā havante /
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā purutamasya kāroḥ havyam vīra havyā havante

original: RV_6,021.01c dhiyo ratheṣṭhām ajaraṃ navīyo rayir vibhūtir īyate vacasyā //
analyzed: dhiyaḥ ratheṣṭhām ajaram navīyaḥ rayiḥ vibhūtiḥ īyate vacasyā

original: RV_6,021.02a tam u stuṣa indraṃ yo vidāno girvāhasaṃ gīrbhir yajñavṛddham /
analyzed: tam u stuṣe indram yaḥ vidānaḥ gir vāhasam gīrbhiḥ yajña vṛddham

original: RV_6,021.02c yasya divam ati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ purumāyasya ririce mahitvam //
analyzed: yasya divam ati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ puru māyasya ririce mahi tvam

original: RV_6,021.03a sa it tamo 'vayunaṃ tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavac cakāra /
analyzed: saḥ id tamaḥ vayunam tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavat cakāra

original: RV_6,021.03c kadā te martā amṛtasya dhāmeyakṣanto na minanti svadhāvaḥ //
analyzed: kadā te martāḥ amṛtasya dhāma iyakṣantaḥ na minanti svadhāvas

original: RV_6,021.04a yas tā cakāra sa kuha svid indraḥ kam ā janaṃ carati kāsu vikṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ tā cakāra sa kuha svid indraḥ kam ā janam carati kāsu vikṣu

original: RV_6,021.04c kas te yajño manase śaṃ varāya ko arka indra katamaḥ sa hotā //
analyzed: kaḥ te yajñaḥ manase śam varāya kaḥ arkaḥ indra katamaḥ sa hotā

original: RV_6,021.05a idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsa āsuḥ purukṛt sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsaḥ āsuḥ puru kṛt sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_6,021.05c ye madhyamāsa uta nūtanāsa utāvamasya puruhūta bodhi //
analyzed: ye madhyamāsaḥ uta nūtanāsaḥ uta avamasya puruhūta bodhi

original: RV_6,021.06a tam pṛcchanto 'varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā ta indra śrutyānu yemuḥ /
analyzed: tam pṛcchantaḥ varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā te indra śrutyā anu yemuḥ

original: RV_6,021.06c arcāmasi vīra brahmavāho yād eva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam //
analyzed: arcāmasi vīra brahma vāhaḥ yāt eva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam

original: RV_6,021.07a abhi tvā pājo rakṣaso vi tasthe mahi jajñānam abhi tat su tiṣṭha /
analyzed: abhi tvā pājaḥ rakṣasaḥ vi tasthe mahi jajñānam abhi tat su tiṣṭha

original: RV_6,021.07c tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apa tā nudasva //
analyzed: tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apa tāḥ nudasva

original: RV_6,021.08a sa tu śrudhīndra nūtanasya brahmaṇyato vīra kārudhāyaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu śrudhi indra nūtanasya brahmaṇyataḥ vīra kāru dhāyaḥ

original: RV_6,021.08c tvaṃ hy āpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇāṃ śaśvad babhūtha suhava eṣṭau //
analyzed: tvam hi āpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇām śaśvat babhūtha su havaḥ eṣṭau

original: RV_6,021.09a protaye varuṇam mitram indram marutaḥ kṛṣvāvase no adya /
analyzed: protaye varuṇam mitram indram marutaḥ kṛṣva avase naḥ adya

original: RV_6,021.09c pra pūṣaṇaṃ viṣṇum agnim purandhiṃ savitāram oṣadhīḥ parvatāṃś ca //
analyzed: pra pūṣaṇam viṣṇum agnim purandhim savitāram oṣadhīḥ parvatān ca

original: RV_6,021.10a ima u tvā puruśāka prayajyo jaritāro abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
analyzed: ime u tvā puru śāka prayajyo jaritāraḥ abhī arcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,021.10c śrudhī havam ā huvato huvāno na tvāvāṃ anyo amṛta tvad asti //
analyzed: śrudhi havam ā huvataḥ huvānaḥ na tvāvām anyaḥ amṛta tvat asti

original: RV_6,021.11a nū ma ā vācam upa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajatraiḥ /
analyzed: nu me ā vācam upa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahasaḥ yajatraiḥ

original: RV_6,021.11c ye agnijihvā ṛtasāpa āsur ye manuṃ cakrur uparaṃ dasāya //
analyzed: ye agni jihvāḥ ṛtasāpaḥ āsuḥ ye manum cakruḥ uparam dasāya

original: RV_6,021.12a sa no bodhi puraetā sugeṣūta durgeṣu pathikṛd vidānaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi puraetā sugeṣu uta durgeṣu pathikṛt vidānaḥ

original: RV_6,021.12c ye aśramāsa uravo vahiṣṭhās tebhir na indrābhi vakṣi vājam //
analyzed: ye aśramāsaḥ uravaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ tebhiḥ naḥ indra abhi vakṣi vājam

original: RV_6,022.01a ya eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām indraṃ taṃ gīrbhir abhy arca ābhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id havyaḥ carṣaṇīnām indram tam gīrbhiḥ abhī arce ābhiḥ

original: RV_6,022.01c yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān //
analyzed: yaḥ patyate vṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā puru māyaḥ sahasvān

original: RV_6,022.02a tam u naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi vājayantaḥ /
analyzed: tam u naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ navagvāḥ sapta viprāsaḥ abhi vājayantaḥ

original: RV_6,022.02c nakṣaddābhaṃ taturim parvateṣṭhām adroghavācam matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham //
analyzed: nakṣat dābham taturim parvateṣṭhām adrogha vācam matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham

original: RV_6,022.03a tam īmaha indram asya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ /
analyzed: tam īmahe indram asya rāyaḥ puru vīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ

original: RV_6,022.03c yo askṛdhoyur ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivo mādayadhyai //
analyzed: yaḥ askṛdhoyuḥ ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivas mādayadhyai

original: RV_6,022.04a tan no vi voco yadi te purā cij jaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnam indra /
analyzed: tat naḥ vi vocaḥ yadi te purā cit jaritāraḥ ānaśuḥ sumnam indra

original: RV_6,022.04c kas te bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso 'suraghnaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ te bhāgaḥ kim vayaḥ dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso sura ghnaḥ

original: RV_6,022.05a tam pṛcchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhām indraṃ vepī vakvarī yasya nū gīḥ /
analyzed: tam pṛcchantī vajrahastam ratheṣṭhām indram vepī vakvarī yasya nu gīḥ

original: RV_6,022.05c tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram accha //
analyzed: tuvi grābham tuvikūrmim rabhaḥ dām gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram accha

original: RV_6,022.06a ayā ha tyam māyayā vāvṛdhānam manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena /
analyzed: ayā ha tyam māyayā vāvṛdhānam manaḥ juvā svatavaḥ parvatena

original: RV_6,022.06c acyutā cid vīḷitā svojo rujo vi dṛḷhā dhṛṣatā virapśin //
analyzed: acyutā cit vīḍitā su ojaḥ rujaḥ vi dṛḍhā dhṛṣatā virapśin

original: RV_6,022.07a taṃ vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnam pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai /
analyzed: tam vaḥ dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnam pratna vat paritaṃsayadhyai

original: RV_6,022.07c sa no vakṣad animānaḥ suvahmendro viśvāny ati durgahāṇi //
analyzed: sa naḥ vakṣat animānaḥ suvahmā indraḥ viśvāni ati durgahāṇi

original: RV_6,022.08a ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā /
analyzed: ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayaḥ ntarikṣā

original: RV_6,022.08c tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣām apaś ca //
analyzed: tapa vṛṣan viśvatas śociṣā tān brahma dviṣe śocaya kṣām apaḥ ca

original: RV_6,022.09a bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatas tveṣasaṃdṛk /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagataḥ tveṣa saṃdṛś

original: RV_6,022.09c dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ //
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram dakṣiṇe indra haste viśvāḥ ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ

original: RV_6,022.10a ā saṃyatam indra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām /
analyzed: ā saṃyatam indra naḥ svastim śatru tūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām

original: RV_6,022.10c yayā dāsāny āryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi //
analyzed: yayā dāsāni āryāṇi vṛtrā karaḥ vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi

original: RV_6,022.11a sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhir ā gahi prayajyo /
analyzed: sa naḥ niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedhaḥ viśva vārābhiḥ ā gahi prayajyo

original: RV_6,022.11c na yā adevo varate na deva ābhir yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik //
analyzed: na yāḥ adevaḥ varate na devaḥ ābhiḥ yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik

original: RV_6,023.01a suta it tvaṃ nimiśla indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamāna ukthe /
analyzed: sute id tvam nimiślaḥ indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamāne ukthe

original: RV_6,023.01c yad vā yuktābhyām maghavan haribhyām bibhrad vajram bāhvor indra yāsi //
analyzed: yat vā yuktābhyām maghavan haribhyām bibhrat vajram bāhvoḥ indra yāsi

original: RV_6,023.02a yad vā divi pārye suṣvim indra vṛtrahatye 'vasi śūrasātau /
analyzed: yat vā divi pārye suṣvim indra vṛtra hatye vasi śūrasātau

original: RV_6,023.02c yad vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣo abibhyad arandhayaḥ śardhata indra dasyūn //
analyzed: yat vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣaḥ a bibhyat arandhayaḥ śardhataḥ indra dasyūn

original: RV_6,023.03a pātā sutam indro astu somam praṇenīr ugro jaritāram ūtī /
analyzed: pātā sutam indraḥ astu somam praṇenīḥ ugraḥ jaritāram ūtī

original: RV_6,023.03c kartā vīrāya suṣvaya u lokaṃ dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit //
analyzed: kartā vīrāya suṣvaye u lokam dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit

original: RV_6,023.04a ganteyānti savanā haribhyām babhrir vajram papiḥ somaṃ dadir gāḥ /
analyzed: gantā iyānti savanā haribhyām babhriḥ vajram papiḥ somam dadiḥ gāḥ

original: RV_6,023.04c kartā vīraṃ naryaṃ sarvavīraṃ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata stomavāhāḥ //
analyzed: kartā vīram naryam sarva vīram śrotā havam gṛṇataḥ stoma vāhāḥ

original: RV_6,023.05a asmai vayaṃ yad vāvāna tad viviṣma indrāya yo naḥ pradivo apas kaḥ /
analyzed: asmai vayam yat vāvāna tat viviṣmaḥ indrāya yaḥ naḥ pradivaḥ apaḥ kaḥ

original: RV_6,023.05c sute some stumasi śaṃsad ukthendrāya brahma vardhanaṃ yathāsat //
analyzed: sute some stumasi śaṃsat ukthā indrāya brahma vardhanam yathā asat

original: RV_6,023.06a brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat ta indra matibhir viviṣmaḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat te indra matibhiḥ viviṣmaḥ

original: RV_6,023.06c sute some sutapāḥ śantamāni rāṇḍyā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ //
analyzed: sute some suta pāḥ śantamāni rāṇḍyā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,023.07a sa no bodhi puroḷāśaṃ rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somaṃ goṛjīkam indra /
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi puroḷāśam rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somam goṛjīkam indra

original: RV_6,023.07c edam barhir yajamānasya sīdoruṃ kṛdhi tvāyata u lokam //
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ yajamānasya sīda urum kṛdhi tvāyataḥ u lokam

original: RV_6,023.08a sa mandasvā hy anu joṣam ugra pra tvā yajñāsa ime aśnuvantu /
analyzed: sa mandasva hi anu joṣam ugra pra tvā yajñāsaḥ ime aśnuvantu

original: RV_6,023.08c preme havāsaḥ puruhūtam asme ā tveyaṃ dhīr avasa indra yamyāḥ //
analyzed: pra ime havāsaḥ puruhūtam asme ā tvā iyam dhīḥ avase indra yamyāḥ

original: RV_6,023.09a taṃ vaḥ sakhāyaḥ saṃ yathā suteṣu somebhir īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram /
analyzed: tam vaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam yathā suteṣu somebhiḥ īm pṛṇata bhojam indram

original: RV_6,023.09c kuvit tasmā asati no bharāya na suṣvim indro 'vase mṛdhāti //
analyzed: kuvid tasmai asati naḥ bharāya na suṣvim indraḥ vase mṛdhāti

original: RV_6,023.10a eved indraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣayad in maghonaḥ /
analyzed: eva id indraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣayat id maghonaḥ

original: RV_6,023.10c asad yathā jaritra uta sūrir indro rāyo viśvavārasya dātā //
analyzed: asat yathā jaritre uta sūriḥ indraḥ rāyaḥ viśva vārasya dātā

original: RV_6,024.01a vṛṣā mada indre śloka ukthā sacā someṣu sutapā ṛjīṣī /
analyzed: vṛṣā made indre śloke ukthā sacā someṣu suta pāḥ ṛjīṣī

original: RV_6,024.01c arcatryo maghavā nṛbhya ukthair dyukṣo rājā girām akṣitotiḥ //
analyzed: arcatryaḥ maghavā nṛbhyaḥ ukthaiḥ dyukṣaḥ rājā girām a kṣita ūtiḥ

original: RV_6,024.02a taturir vīro naryo vicetāḥ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata urvyūtiḥ /
analyzed: taturiḥ vīraḥ naryaḥ vicetāḥ śrotā havam gṛṇate urvyūtiḥ

original: RV_6,024.02c vasuḥ śaṃso narāṃ kārudhāyā vājī stuto vidathe dāti vājam //
analyzed: vasuḥ śaṃsaḥ narām kāru dhāyāḥ vājī stutaḥ vidathe dāti vājam

original: RV_6,024.03a akṣo na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: akṣaḥ na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ

original: RV_6,024.03c vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayā vy ūtayo ruruhur indra pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayāḥ vi ūtayaḥ ruruhuḥ indra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_6,024.04a śacīvatas te puruśāka śākā gavām iva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ /
analyzed: śacīvataḥ te puru śāka śākāḥ gavām iva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ

original: RV_6,024.04c vatsānāṃ na tantayas ta indra dāmanvanto adāmānaḥ sudāman //
analyzed: vatsānām na tantayaḥ te indra dāmanvantaḥ a dāmānaḥ su dāman

original: RV_6,024.05a anyad adya karvaram anyad u śvo 'sac ca san muhur ācakrir indraḥ /
analyzed: anyat adya karvaram anyat u śvas sat ca sat muhur ācakriḥ indraḥ

original: RV_6,024.05c mitro no atra varuṇaś ca pūṣāryo vaśasya paryetāsti //
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ atra varuṇaḥ ca pūṣā aryaḥ vaśasya paryetā asti

original: RV_6,024.06a vi tvad āpo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhād ukthebhir indrānayanta yajñaiḥ /
analyzed: vi tvat āpaḥ na parvatasya pṛṣṭhāt ukthebhiḥ indra anayanta yajñaiḥ

original: RV_6,024.06c taṃ tvābhiḥ suṣṭutibhir vājayanta ājiṃ na jagmur girvāho aśvāḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā ābhiḥ suṣṭutibhiḥ vājayantaḥ ājim na jagmuḥ gir vāhaḥ aśvāḥ

original: RV_6,024.07a na yaṃ jaranti śarado na māsā na dyāva indram avakarśayanti /
analyzed: na yam jaranti śaradaḥ na māsāḥ na dyāvaḥ indram avakarśayanti

original: RV_6,024.07c vṛddhasya cid vardhatām asya tanū stomebhir ukthaiś ca śasyamānā //
analyzed: vṛddhasya cit vardhatām asya tanū stomebhiḥ ukthaiḥ ca śasyamānā

original: RV_6,024.08a na vīḷave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyujūtāya stavān /
analyzed: na vīḍave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyu jūtāya stavān

original: RV_6,024.08c ajrā indrasya girayaś cid ṛṣvā gambhīre cid bhavati gādham asmai //
analyzed: ajrāḥ indrasya girayaḥ cit ṛṣvāḥ gambhīre cit bhavati gādham asmai

original: RV_6,024.09a gambhīreṇa na uruṇāmatrin preṣo yandhi sutapāvan vājān /
analyzed: gambhīreṇa naḥ uruṇā amatrin pra iṣaḥ yandhi suta pāvan vājān

original: RV_6,024.09c sthā ū ṣu ūrdhva ūtī ariṣaṇyann aktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām //
analyzed: sthāḥ u su ūrdhvaḥ ūtī a riṣaṇyan aktoḥ vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām

original: RV_6,024.10a sacasva nāyam avase abhīka ito vā tam indra pāhi riṣaḥ /
analyzed: sacasva nāyam avase abhīke itas vā tam indra pāhi riṣaḥ

original: RV_6,024.10c amā cainam araṇye pāhi riṣo madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: amā ca enam araṇye pāhi riṣaḥ madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_6,025.01a yā ta ūtir avamā yā paramā yā madhyamendra śuṣminn asti /
analyzed: yā te ūtiḥ avamā yā paramā yā madhyamā indra śuṣmin asti

original: RV_6,025.01c tābhir ū ṣu vṛtrahatye 'vīr na ebhiś ca vājair mahān na ugra //
analyzed: tābhiḥ u su vṛtra hatye vīḥ naḥ ebhiḥ ca vājaiḥ mahān naḥ ugra

original: RV_6,025.02a ābhi spṛdho mithatīr ariṣaṇyann amitrasya vyathayā manyum indra /
analyzed: ābhiḥ spṛdhaḥ mithatīḥ a riṣaṇyan amitrasya vyathaya manyum indra

original: RV_6,025.02c ābhir viśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīr āryāya viśo 'va tārīr dāsīḥ //
analyzed: ābhiḥ viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ viṣūcīḥ āryāya viśaḥ vaḥ tārīḥ dāsīḥ

original: RV_6,025.03a indra jāmaya uta ye 'jāmayo 'rvācīnāso vanuṣo yuyujre /
analyzed: indra jāmayaḥ uta ye jāmayaḥ rvācīnāsaḥ vanuṣaḥ yuyujre

original: RV_6,025.03c tvam eṣāṃ vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhī parācaḥ //
analyzed: tvam eṣām vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhi parācaḥ

original: RV_6,025.04a śūro vā śūraṃ vanate śarīrais tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite /
analyzed: śūraḥ vā śūram vanate śarīraiḥ tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite

original: RV_6,025.04c toke vā goṣu tanaye yad apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite //
analyzed: toke vā goṣu tanaye yat apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite

original: RV_6,025.05a nahi tvā śūro na turo na dhṛṣṇur na tvā yodho manyamāno yuyodha /
analyzed: nahi tvā śūraḥ na turaḥ na dhṛṣṇuḥ na tvā yodhaḥ manyamānaḥ yuyodha

original: RV_6,025.05c indra nakiṣ ṭvā praty asty eṣāṃ viśvā jātāny abhy asi tāni //
analyzed: indra nakir tvā prati asti eṣām viśvā jātāni abhī asi tāni

original: RV_6,025.06a sa patyata ubhayor nṛmṇam ayor yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante /
analyzed: sa patyate ubhayoḥ nṛmṇam ayoḥ yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante

original: RV_6,025.06c vṛtre vā maho nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite //
analyzed: vṛtre vā mahaḥ nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite

original: RV_6,025.07a adha smā te carṣaṇayo yad ejān indra trātota bhavā varūtā /
analyzed: adha smā te carṣaṇayaḥ yat ejān indra trātā uta bhava varūtā

original: RV_6,025.07c asmākāso ye nṛtamāso arya indra sūrayo dadhire puro naḥ //
analyzed: asmākāsaḥ ye nṛtamāsaḥ aryaḥ indra sūrayaḥ dadhire puras naḥ

original: RV_6,025.08a anu te dāyi maha indriyāya satrā te viśvam anu vṛtrahatye /
analyzed: anu te dāyi mahe indriyāya satrā te viśvam anu vṛtra hatye

original: RV_6,025.08c anu kṣatram anu saho yajatrendra devebhir anu te nṛṣahye //
analyzed: anu kṣatram anu sahaḥ yajatra indra devebhiḥ anu te nṛṣahye

original: RV_6,025.09a evā na spṛdhaḥ sam ajā samatsv indra rārandhi mithatīr adevīḥ /
analyzed: eva naḥ spṛdhaḥ sam aja samatsu indra rārandhi mithatīḥ adevīḥ

original: RV_6,025.09c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto bharadvājā uta ta indra nūnam //
analyzed: vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ bharadvājāḥ uta te indra nūnam

original: RV_6,026.01a śrudhī na indra hvayāmasi tvā maho vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ /
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ indra hvayāmasi tvā mahaḥ vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_6,026.01c saṃ yad viśo 'yanta śūrasātā ugraṃ no 'vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ //
analyzed: sam yat viśaḥ yanta śūra sātau ugram naḥ vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ

original: RV_6,026.02a tvāṃ vājī havate vājineyo maho vājasya gadhyasya sātau /
analyzed: tvām vājī havate vājineyaḥ mahaḥ vājasya gadhyasya sātau

original: RV_6,026.02c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ tarutraṃ tvāṃ caṣṭe muṣṭihā goṣu yudhyan //
analyzed: tvām vṛtreṣu indra sat patim tarutram tvām caṣṭe muṣṭi hā goṣu yudhyan

original: RV_6,026.03a tvaṃ kaviṃ codayo 'rkasātau tvaṃ kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ dāśuṣe vark /
analyzed: tvam kavim codayaḥ rka sātau tvam kutsāya śuṣṇam dāśuṣe vark

original: RV_6,026.03c tvaṃ śiro amarmaṇaḥ parāhann atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan //
analyzed: tvam śiraḥ amarmaṇaḥ parāhan atithigvāya śaṃsyam kariṣyan

original: RV_6,026.04a tvaṃ ratham pra bharo yodham ṛṣvam āvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
analyzed: tvam ratham pra bharaḥ yodham ṛṣvam āvaḥ yudhyantam vṛṣabham daśadyum

original: RV_6,026.04c tvaṃ tugraṃ vetasave sacāhan tvaṃ tujiṃ gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ //
analyzed: tvam tugram vetasave sacā ahan tvam tujim gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ

original: RV_6,026.05a tvaṃ tad uktham indra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yac chatā sahasrā śūra darṣi /
