analyzed: imā havyā juṣanta naḥ

original: RV_6,052.12a imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ hotar vayunaśo yaja /
analyzed: imam naḥ agne adhvaram hotar vayunaśas yaja

original: RV_6,052.12c cikitvān daivyaṃ janam //
analyzed: cikitvān daivyam janam

original: RV_6,052.13a viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ havam me ye antarikṣe ya upa dyavi ṣṭha /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ śṛṇuta imam havam me ye antarikṣe yaḥ upa dyavi ṣṭha

original: RV_6,052.13c ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam //
analyzed: ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam

original: RV_6,052.14a viśve devā mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyā ubhe rodasī apāṃ napāc ca manma /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyāḥ ubhe rodasī apām napāt ca manma

original: RV_6,052.14c mā vo vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocaṃ sumneṣv id vo antamā madema //
analyzed: mā vaḥ vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocam sumneṣu id vaḥ antamāḥ madema

original: RV_6,052.15a ye ke ca jmā mahino ahimāyā divo jajñire apāṃ sadhasthe /
analyzed: ye ke ca jmā mahinaḥ ahi māyāḥ divaḥ jajñire apām sadhasthe

original: RV_6,052.15c te asmabhyam iṣaye viśvam āyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantu devāḥ //
analyzed: te asmabhyam iṣaye viśvam āyuḥ kṣapaḥ usrāḥ varivasyantu devāḥ

original: RV_6,052.16a agnīparjanyāv avataṃ dhiyam me 'smin have suhavā suṣṭutiṃ naḥ /
analyzed: agnīparjanyau avatam dhiyam me smin have su havā suṣṭutim naḥ

original: RV_6,052.16c iḷām anyo janayad garbham anyaḥ prajāvatīr iṣa ā dhattam asme //
analyzed: iḷām anyaḥ janayat garbham anyaḥ prajāvatīḥ iṣaḥ ā dhattam asme

original: RV_6,052.17a stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau sūktena mahā namasā vivāse /
analyzed: stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau su uktena mahā namasā vivāse

original: RV_6,052.17c asmin no adya vidathe yajatrā viśve devā haviṣi mādayadhvam //
analyzed: asmin naḥ adya vidathe yajatrāḥ viśve devāḥ haviṣi mādayadhvam

original: RV_6,053.01a vayam u tvā pathas pate rathaṃ na vājasātaye /
analyzed: vayam u tvā pathaḥ pate ratham na vājasātaye

original: RV_6,053.01c dhiye pūṣann ayujmahi //
analyzed: dhiye pūṣan ayujmahi

original: RV_6,053.02a abhi no naryaṃ vasu vīram prayatadakṣiṇam /
analyzed: abhi naḥ naryam vasu vīram prayata dakṣiṇam

original: RV_6,053.02c vāmaṃ gṛhapatiṃ naya //
analyzed: vāmam gṛhapatim naya

original: RV_6,053.03a aditsantaṃ cid āghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya /
analyzed: a ditsantam cit āghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya

original: RV_6,053.03c paṇeś cid vi mradā manaḥ //
analyzed: paṇeḥ cit vi mrada manaḥ

original: RV_6,053.04a vi patho vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdho jahi /
analyzed: vi pathaḥ vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdhaḥ jahi

original: RV_6,053.04c sādhantām ugra no dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: sādhantām ugra naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_6,053.05a pari tṛndhi paṇīnām ārayā hṛdayā kave /
analyzed: pari tṛndhi paṇīnām ārayā hṛdayā kave

original: RV_6,053.05c athem asmabhyaṃ randhaya //
analyzed: atha īm asmabhyam randhaya

original: RV_6,053.06a vi pūṣann ārayā tuda paṇer iccha hṛdi priyam /
analyzed: vi pūṣan ārayā tuda paṇeḥ iccha hṛdi priyam

original: RV_6,053.06c athem asmabhyaṃ randhaya //
analyzed: atha īm asmabhyam randhaya

original: RV_6,053.07a ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnāṃ hṛdayā kave /
analyzed: ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnām hṛdayā kave

original: RV_6,053.07c athem asmabhyaṃ randhaya //
analyzed: atha īm asmabhyam randhaya

original: RV_6,053.08a yām pūṣan brahmacodanīm ārām bibharṣy āghṛṇe /
analyzed: yām pūṣan brahma codanīm ārām bibharṣi āghṛṇe

original: RV_6,053.08c tayā samasya hṛdayam ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu //
analyzed: tayā samasya hṛdayam ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu

original: RV_6,053.09a yā te aṣṭrā goopaśāghṛṇe paśusādhanī /
analyzed: yā te aṣṭrā goopaśā aghṛṇe paśu sādhanī

original: RV_6,053.09c tasyās te sumnam īmahe //
analyzed: tasyāḥ te sumnam īmahe

original: RV_6,053.10a uta no goṣaṇiṃ dhiyam aśvasāṃ vājasām uta /
analyzed: uta naḥ goṣaṇim dhiyam aśva sām vāja sām uta

original: RV_6,053.10c nṛvat kṛṇuhi vītaye //
analyzed: nṛvat kṛṇuhi vītaye

original: RV_6,054.01a sam pūṣan viduṣā naya yo añjasānuśāsati /
analyzed: sam pūṣan viduṣā naya yaḥ añjasā anuśāsati

original: RV_6,054.01c ya evedam iti bravat //
analyzed: yaḥ eva idam iti bravat

original: RV_6,054.02a sam u pūṣṇā gamemahi yo gṛhāṃ abhiśāsati /
analyzed: sam u pūṣṇā gamemahi yaḥ gṛhān abhiśāsati

original: RV_6,054.02c ima eveti ca bravat //
analyzed: ime eva iti ca bravat

original: RV_6,054.03a pūṣṇaś cakraṃ na riṣyati na kośo 'va padyate /
analyzed: pūṣṇaḥ cakram na riṣyati na kośaḥ padyate

original: RV_6,054.03c no asya vyathate paviḥ //
analyzed: na u asya vyathate paviḥ

original: RV_6,054.04a yo asmai haviṣāvidhan na tam pūṣāpi mṛṣyate /
analyzed: yaḥ asmai haviṣā avidhat na tam pūṣā api mṛṣyate

original: RV_6,054.04c prathamo vindate vasu //
analyzed: prathamaḥ vindate vasu

original: RV_6,054.05a pūṣā gā anv etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatv arvataḥ /
analyzed: pūṣā gāḥ anu etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatu arvataḥ

original: RV_6,054.05c pūṣā vājaṃ sanotu naḥ //
analyzed: pūṣā vājam sanotu naḥ

original: RV_6,054.06a pūṣann anu pra gā ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ /
analyzed: pūṣan anu pra gāḥ ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ

original: RV_6,054.06c asmākaṃ stuvatām uta //
analyzed: asmākam stuvatām uta

original: RV_6,054.07a mākir neśan mākīṃ riṣan mākīṃ saṃ śāri kevaṭe /
analyzed: mākir neśat mākīm riṣat mākīm sam śāri kevaṭe

original: RV_6,054.07c athāriṣṭābhir ā gahi //
analyzed: atha ariṣṭābhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_6,054.08a śṛṇvantam pūṣaṇaṃ vayam iryam anaṣṭavedasam /
analyzed: śṛṇvantam pūṣaṇam vayam iryam a naṣṭa vedasam

original: RV_6,054.08c īśānaṃ rāya īmahe //
analyzed: īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_6,054.09a pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana /
analyzed: pūṣan tava vrate vayam na riṣyema kadā cana

original: RV_6,054.09c stotāras ta iha smasi //
analyzed: stotāraḥ te iha smasi

original: RV_6,054.10a pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: pari pūṣā parastāt hastam dadhātu dakṣiṇam

original: RV_6,054.10c punar no naṣṭam ājatu //
analyzed: punar naḥ naṣṭam ājatu

original: RV_6,055.01a ehi vāṃ vimuco napād āghṛṇe saṃ sacāvahai /
analyzed: ehi vām vimucaḥ napāt āghṛṇe sam sacāvahai

original: RV_6,055.01c rathīr ṛtasya no bhava //
analyzed: rathīḥ ṛtasya naḥ bhava

original: RV_6,055.02a rathītamaṃ kapardinam īśānaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: rathītamam kapardinam īśānam rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_6,055.02c rāyaḥ sakhāyam īmahe //
analyzed: rāyaḥ sakhāyam īmahe

original: RV_6,055.03a rāyo dhārāsy āghṛṇe vaso rāśir ajāśva /
analyzed: rāyaḥ dhārā asi āghṛṇe vasoḥ rāśiḥ ajāśva

original: RV_6,055.03c dhīvato-dhīvataḥ sakhā //
analyzed: dhīvataḥ dhīvataḥ sakhā

original: RV_6,055.04a pūṣaṇaṃ nv ajāśvam upa stoṣāma vājinam /
analyzed: pūṣaṇam nu ajāśvam upa stoṣāma vājinam

original: RV_6,055.04c svasur yo jāra ucyate //
analyzed: svasuḥ yaḥ jāraḥ ucyate

original: RV_6,055.05a mātur didhiṣum abravaṃ svasur jāraḥ śṛṇotu naḥ /
analyzed: mātuḥ didhiṣum abravam svasuḥ jāraḥ śṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_6,055.05c bhrātendrasya sakhā mama //
analyzed: bhrātā indrasya sakhā mama

original: RV_6,055.06a ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ rathe niśṛmbhās te janaśriyam /
analyzed: ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇam rathe niśṛmbhāḥ te jana śriyam

original: RV_6,055.06c devaṃ vahantu bibhrataḥ //
analyzed: devam vahantu bibhrataḥ

original: RV_6,056.01a ya enam ādideśati karambhād iti pūṣaṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ enam ādideśati karambhāt iti pūṣaṇam

original: RV_6,056.01c na tena deva ādiśe //
analyzed: na tena devaḥ ādiśe

original: RV_6,056.02a uta ghā sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatir yujā /
analyzed: uta ghā sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatiḥ yujā

original: RV_6,056.02c indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate //
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_6,056.03a utādaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraś cakraṃ hiraṇyayam /
analyzed: uta adaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraḥ cakram hiraṇyayam

original: RV_6,056.03c ny airayad rathītamaḥ //
analyzed: ni airayat rathītamaḥ

original: RV_6,056.04a yad adya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumaḥ /
analyzed: yat adya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumas

original: RV_6,056.04c tat su no manma sādhaya //
analyzed: tat su naḥ manma sādhaya

original: RV_6,056.05a imaṃ ca no gaveṣaṇaṃ sātaye sīṣadho gaṇam /
analyzed: imam ca naḥ gaveṣaṇam sātaye sīṣadhaḥ gaṇam

original: RV_6,056.05c ārāt pūṣann asi śrutaḥ //
analyzed: ārāt pūṣan asi śrutaḥ

original: RV_6,056.06a ā te svastim īmaha āreaghām upāvasum /
analyzed: ā te svastim īmahe āreaghām upāvasum

original: RV_6,056.06c adyā ca sarvatātaye śvaś ca sarvatātaye //
analyzed: adyā ca sarvatātaye śvas ca sarvatātaye

original: RV_6,057.01a indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayaṃ sakhyāya svastaye /
analyzed: indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayam sakhyāya svastaye

original: RV_6,057.01c huvema vājasātaye //
analyzed: huvema vājasātaye

original: RV_6,057.02a somam anya upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam /
analyzed: somam anyaḥ upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam

original: RV_6,057.02c karambham anya icchati //
analyzed: karambham anyaḥ icchati

original: RV_6,057.03a ajā anyasya vahnayo harī anyasya sambhṛtā /
analyzed: ajāḥ anyasya vahnayaḥ harī anyasya sambhṛtā

original: RV_6,057.03c tābhyāṃ vṛtrāṇi jighnate //
analyzed: tābhyām vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_6,057.04a yad indro anayad rito mahīr apo vṛṣantamaḥ /
analyzed: yat indraḥ anayat ritaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vṛṣantamaḥ

original: RV_6,057.04c tatra pūṣābhavat sacā //
analyzed: tatra pūṣā abhavat sacā

original: RV_6,057.05a tām pūṣṇaḥ sumatiṃ vayaṃ vṛkṣasya pra vayām iva /
analyzed: tām pūṣṇaḥ sumatim vayam vṛkṣasya pra vayām iva

original: RV_6,057.05c indrasya cā rabhāmahe //
analyzed: indrasya ca ā rabhāmahe

original: RV_6,057.06a ut pūṣaṇaṃ yuvāmahe 'bhīśūṃr iva sārathiḥ /
analyzed: ud pūṣaṇam yuvāmahe bhīśūn iva sārathiḥ

original: RV_6,057.06c mahyā indraṃ svastaye //
analyzed: mahyai indram svastaye

original: RV_6,058.01a śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaur ivāsi /
analyzed: śukram te anyat yajatam te anyat viṣurūpe ahanī dyauḥ iva asi

original: RV_6,058.01c viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣann iha rātir astu //
analyzed: viśvāḥ hi māyāḥ avasi svadhāvas bhadrā te pūṣan iha rātiḥ astu

original: RV_6,058.02a ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyañjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ /
analyzed: aja aśvaḥ paśu pāḥ vāja pastyaḥ dhiyañjinvaḥ bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ

original: RV_6,058.02c aṣṭrām pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇo bhuvanā deva īyate //
analyzed: aṣṭrām pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇaḥ bhuvanā devaḥ īyate

original: RV_6,058.03a yās te pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīr antarikṣe caranti /
analyzed: yāḥ te pūṣan nāvaḥ antar samudre hiraṇyayīḥ antarikṣe caranti

original: RV_6,058.03c tābhir yāsi dūtyāṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛta śrava icchamānaḥ //
analyzed: tābhiḥ yāsi dūtyām sūryasya kāmena kṛta śravaḥ icchamānaḥ

original: RV_6,058.04a pūṣā subandhur diva ā pṛthivyā iḷas patir maghavā dasmavarcāḥ /
analyzed: pūṣā su bandhuḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ iḷaḥ patiḥ maghavā dasma varcāḥ

original: RV_6,058.04c yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam //
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtam tavasam svañcam

original: RV_6,059.01a pra nu vocā suteṣu vāṃ vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ /
analyzed: pra nu vocā suteṣu vām vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ

original: RV_6,059.01c hatāso vām pitaro devaśatrava indrāgnī jīvatho yuvam //
analyzed: hatāsaḥ vām pitaraḥ deva śatravaḥ indra agnī jīvathaḥ yuvam

original: RV_6,059.02a baḷ itthā mahimā vām indrāgnī paniṣṭha ā /
analyzed: baḷ itthā mahimā vām indra agnī paniṣṭhaḥ ā

original: RV_6,059.02c samāno vāṃ janitā bhrātarā yuvaṃ yamāv ihehamātarā //
analyzed: samānaḥ vām janitā bhrātarā yuvam yamau iha iha mātarā

original: RV_6,059.03a okivāṃsā sute sacāṃ aśvā saptī ivādane /
analyzed: okivāṃsā sute sacā am aśvā saptī iva adane

original: RV_6,059.03c indrā nv agnī avaseha vajriṇā vayaṃ devā havāmahe //
analyzed: indrā nu agnī avasā iha vajriṇā vayam devā havāmahe

original: RV_6,059.04a ya indrāgnī suteṣu vāṃ stavat teṣv ṛtāvṛdhā /
analyzed: yaḥ indra agnī suteṣu vām stavat teṣu ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_6,059.04c joṣavākaṃ vadataḥ pajrahoṣiṇā na devā bhasathaś cana //
analyzed: joṣavākam vadataḥ pajrahoṣiṇā na devā bhasathaḥ cana

original: RV_6,059.05a indrāgnī ko asya vāṃ devau martaś ciketati /
analyzed: indra agnī kaḥ asya vām devau martaḥ ciketati

original: RV_6,059.05c viṣūco aśvān yuyujāna īyata ekaḥ samāna ā rathe //
analyzed: viṣūcaḥ aśvān yuyujānaḥ īyate ekaḥ samānaḥ ā rathe

original: RV_6,059.06a indrāgnī apād iyam pūrvāgāt padvatībhyaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī apāt iyam pūrvā āgāt padvatībhyaḥ

original: RV_6,059.06c hitvī śiro jihvayā vāvadac carat triṃśat padā ny akramīt //
analyzed: hitvī śiraḥ jihvayā vāvadat carat triṃśat padā ni akramīt

original: RV_6,059.07a indrāgnī ā hi tanvate naro dhanvāni bāhvoḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī ā hi tanvate naraḥ dhanvāni bāhvoḥ

original: RV_6,059.07c mā no asmin mahādhane parā varktaṃ gaviṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: mā naḥ asmin mahādhane parā varktam gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_6,059.08a indrāgnī tapanti māghā aryo arātayaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī tapanti mā aghāḥ aryaḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_6,059.08c apa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛtaṃ yuyutaṃ sūryād adhi //
analyzed: apa dveṣāṃsi ā kṛtam yuyutam sūryāt adhi

original: RV_6,059.09a indrāgnī yuvor api vasu divyāni pārthivā /
analyzed: indra agnī yuvoḥ api vasu divyāni pārthivā

original: RV_6,059.09c ā na iha pra yacchataṃ rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam //
analyzed: ā naḥ iha pra yacchatam rayim viśvāyu poṣasam

original: RV_6,059.10a indrāgnī ukthavāhasā stomebhir havanaśrutā /
analyzed: indra agnī uktha vāhasā stomebhiḥ havana śrutā

original: RV_6,059.10c viśvābhir gīrbhir ā gatam asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ ā gatam asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_6,060.01a śnathad vṛtram uta sanoti vājam indrā yo agnī sahurī saparyāt /
analyzed: śnathat vṛtram uta sanoti vājam indrā yaḥ agnī sahurī saparyāt

original: RV_6,060.01c irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā //
analyzed: irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā

original: RV_6,060.02a tā yodhiṣṭam abhi gā indra nūnam apaḥ svar uṣaso agna ūḷhāḥ /
analyzed: tā yodhiṣṭam abhi gāḥ indra nūnam apaḥ svar uṣasaḥ agne ūḍhāḥ

original: RV_6,060.02c diśaḥ svar uṣasa indra citrā apo gā agne yuvase niyutvān //
analyzed: diśaḥ svar uṣasaḥ indra citrāḥ apaḥ gāḥ agne yuvase niyutvān

original: RV_6,060.03a ā vṛtrahaṇā vṛtrahabhiḥ śuṣmair indra yātaṃ namobhir agne arvāk /
analyzed: ā vṛtra haṇā vṛtra habhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ indra yātam namobhiḥ agne arvāk

original: RV_6,060.03c yuvaṃ rādhobhir akavebhir indrāgne asme bhavatam uttamebhiḥ //
analyzed: yuvam rādhobhiḥ akavebhiḥ indra agne asme bhavatam uttamebhiḥ

original: RV_6,060.04a tā huve yayor idam papne viśvam purā kṛtam /
analyzed: tā huve yayoḥ idam papne viśvam purā kṛtam

original: RV_6,060.04c indrāgnī na mardhataḥ //
analyzed: indra agnī na mardhataḥ

original: RV_6,060.05a ugrā vighaninā mṛdha indrāgnī havāmahe /
analyzed: ugrā vighaninā mṛdhaḥ indra agnī havāmahe

original: RV_6,060.05c tā no mṛḷāta īdṛśe //
analyzed: tā naḥ mṛḷātaḥ īdṛśe

original: RV_6,060.06a hato vṛtrāṇy āryā hato dāsāni satpatī /
analyzed: hataḥ vṛtrāṇi āryā hataḥ dāsāni sat patī

original: RV_6,060.06c hato viśvā apa dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: hataḥ viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_6,060.07a indrāgnī yuvām ime 'bhi stomā anūṣata /
analyzed: indra agnī yuvām ime bhiḥ stomāḥ anūṣata

original: RV_6,060.07c pibataṃ śambhuvā sutam //
analyzed: pibatam śambhuvā sutam

original: RV_6,060.08a yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā /
analyzed: yāḥ vām santi puruspṛhaḥ niyutaḥ dāśuṣe narā

original: RV_6,060.08c indrāgnī tābhir ā gatam //
analyzed: indra agnī tābhiḥ ā gatam

original: RV_6,060.09a tābhir ā gacchataṃ naropedaṃ savanaṃ sutam /
analyzed: tābhiḥ ā gacchatam narā upa idam savanam sutam

original: RV_6,060.09c indrāgnī somapītaye //
analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

original: RV_6,060.10a tam īḷiṣva yo arciṣā vanā viśvā pariṣvajat /
analyzed: tam īḍiṣva yaḥ arciṣā vanā viśvā pariṣvajat

original: RV_6,060.10c kṛṣṇā kṛṇoti jihvayā //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā kṛṇoti jihvayā

original: RV_6,060.11a ya iddha āvivāsati sumnam indrasya martyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ iddhe āvivāsati sumnam indrasya martyaḥ

original: RV_6,060.11c dyumnāya sutarā apaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnāya su tarāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_6,060.12a tā no vājavatīr iṣa āśūn pipṛtam arvataḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ vājavatīḥ iṣaḥ āśūn pipṛtam arvataḥ

original: RV_6,060.12c indram agniṃ ca voḷhave //
analyzed: indram agnim ca voḷhave

original: RV_6,060.13a ubhā vām indrāgnī āhuvadhyā ubhā rādhasaḥ saha mādayadhyai /
analyzed: ubhā vām indra agnī āhuvadhyai ubhā rādhasaḥ saha mādayadhyai

original: RV_6,060.13c ubhā dātārāv iṣāṃ rayīṇām ubhā vājasya sātaye huve vām //
analyzed: ubhā dātārau iṣām rayīṇām ubhā vājasya sātaye huve vām

original: RV_6,060.14a ā no gavyebhir aśvyair vasavyair upa gacchatam /
analyzed: ā naḥ gavyebhiḥ aśvyaiḥ vasavyaiḥ upa gacchatam

original: RV_6,060.14c sakhāyau devau sakhyāya śambhuvendrāgnī tā havāmahe //
analyzed: sakhāyau devau sakhyāya śambhuvā indra agnī tā havāmahe

original: RV_6,060.15a indrāgnī śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yajamānasya sunvataḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī śṛṇutam havam yajamānasya sunvataḥ

original: RV_6,060.15c vītaṃ havyāny ā gatam pibataṃ somyam madhu //
analyzed: vītam havyāni ā gatam pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_6,061.01a iyam adadād rabhasam ṛṇacyutaṃ divodāsaṃ vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe /
analyzed: iyam adadāt rabhasam ṛṇa cyutam divodāsam vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_6,061.01c yā śaśvantam ācakhādāvasam paṇiṃ tā te dātrāṇi taviṣā sarasvati //
analyzed: yā śaśvantam ācakhāda avasam paṇim tā te dātrāṇi taviṣā sarasvati

original: RV_6,061.02a iyaṃ śuṣmebhir bisakhā ivārujat sānu girīṇāṃ taviṣebhir ūrmibhiḥ /
analyzed: iyam śuṣmebhiḥ bisakhā iva arujat sānu girīṇām taviṣebhiḥ ūrmibhiḥ

original: RV_6,061.02c pārāvataghnīm avase suvṛktibhiḥ sarasvatīm ā vivāsema dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: pārāvata ghnīm avase suvṛktibhiḥ sarasvatīm ā vivāsema dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_6,061.03a sarasvati devanido ni barhaya prajāṃ viśvasya bṛsayasya māyinaḥ /
analyzed: sarasvati deva nidaḥ ni barhaya prajām viśvasya bṛsayasya māyinaḥ

original: RV_6,061.03c uta kṣitibhyo 'vanīr avindo viṣam ebhyo asravo vājinīvati //
analyzed: uta kṣitibhyaḥ vanīḥ avindaḥ viṣam ebhyaḥ asravaḥ vājinīvati

original: RV_6,061.04a pra ṇo devī sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī /
analyzed: pra naḥ devī sarasvatī vājebhiḥ vājinīvatī

original: RV_6,061.04c dhīnām avitry avatu //
analyzed: dhīnām avitrī avatu

original: RV_6,061.05a yas tvā devi sarasvaty upabrūte dhane hite /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā devi sarasvati upabrūte dhane hite

original: RV_6,061.05c indraṃ na vṛtratūrye //
analyzed: indram na vṛtratūrye

original: RV_6,061.06a tvaṃ devi sarasvaty avā vājeṣu vājini /
analyzed: tvam devi sarasvati avāḥ vājeṣu vājini

original: RV_6,061.06c radā pūṣeva naḥ sanim //
analyzed: rada pūṣā iva naḥ sanim

original: RV_6,061.07a uta syā naḥ sarasvatī ghorā hiraṇyavartaniḥ /
analyzed: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī ghorā hiraṇya vartaniḥ

original: RV_6,061.07c vṛtraghnī vaṣṭi suṣṭutim //
analyzed: vṛtra ghnī vaṣṭi suṣṭutim

original: RV_6,061.08a yasyā ananto ahrutas tveṣaś cariṣṇur arṇavaḥ /
analyzed: yasyāḥ anantaḥ ahrutaḥ tveṣaḥ cariṣṇuḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_6,061.08c amaś carati roruvat //
analyzed: amaḥ carati roruvat

original: RV_6,061.09a sā no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ svasṝr anyā ṛtāvarī /
analyzed: sā naḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ svasṝḥ anyāḥ ṛtāvarī

original: RV_6,061.09c atann aheva sūryaḥ //
analyzed: atan ahā iva sūryaḥ

original: RV_6,061.10a uta naḥ priyā priyāsu saptasvasā sujuṣṭā /
analyzed: uta naḥ priyā priyāsu sapta svasā su juṣṭā

original: RV_6,061.10c sarasvatī stomyā bhūt //
analyzed: sarasvatī stomyā bhūt

original: RV_6,061.11a āpapruṣī pārthivāny uru rajo antarikṣam /
analyzed: āpapruṣī pārthivāni uru rajaḥ antarikṣam

original: RV_6,061.11c sarasvatī nidas pātu //
analyzed: sarasvatī nidaḥ pātu

original: RV_6,061.12a triṣadhasthā saptadhātuḥ pañca jātā vardhayantī /
analyzed: triṣadhasthā sapta dhātuḥ pañca jātā vardhayantī

original: RV_6,061.12c vāje-vāje havyā bhūt //
analyzed: vājevāje havyā bhūt

original: RV_6,061.13a pra yā mahimnā mahināsu cekite dyumnebhir anyā apasām apastamā /
analyzed: pra yā mahimnā mahināsu cekite dyumnebhiḥ anyāḥ apasām apastamā

original: RV_6,061.13c ratha iva bṛhatī vibhvane kṛtopastutyā cikituṣā sarasvatī //
analyzed: rathaḥ iva bṛhatī vibhvane kṛtā upastutyā cikituṣā sarasvatī

original: RV_6,061.14a sarasvaty abhi no neṣi vasyo māpa spharīḥ payasā mā na ā dhak /
analyzed: sarasvati abhi naḥ neṣi vasyaḥ mā apa spharīḥ payasā mā naḥ ā dhak

original: RV_6,061.14c juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇy araṇāni ganma //
analyzed: juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇi araṇāni ganma

original: RV_6,062.01a stuṣe narā divo asya prasantāśvinā huve jaramāṇo arkaiḥ /
analyzed: stuṣe narā divaḥ asya prasantā aśvinā huve jaramāṇaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,062.01c yā sadya usrā vyuṣi jmo antān yuyūṣataḥ pary urū varāṃsi //
analyzed: yā sadyas usrā vyuṣi jmaḥ antān yuyūṣataḥ pari urū varāṃsi

original: RV_6,062.02a tā yajñam ā śucibhiś cakramāṇā rathasya bhānuṃ rurucū rajobhiḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ yajñam ā śucibhiḥ cakramāṇāḥ rathasya bhānum rurucuḥ rajobhiḥ

original: RV_6,062.02c purū varāṃsy amitā mimānāpo dhanvāny ati yātho ajrān //
analyzed: purū varāṃsi amitā mimānā apaḥ dhanvāni ati yāthaḥ ajrān

original: RV_6,062.03a tā ha tyad vartir yad aradhram ugretthā dhiya ūhathuḥ śaśvad aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: tā ha tyad vartiḥ yat aradhram ugrā itthā dhiyaḥ ūhathuḥ śaśvat aśvaiḥ

original: RV_6,062.03c manojavebhir iṣiraiḥ śayadhyai pari vyathir dāśuṣo martyasya //
analyzed: manaḥ javebhiḥ iṣiraiḥ śayadhyai pari vyathiḥ dāśuṣaḥ martyasya

original: RV_6,062.04a tā navyaso jaramāṇasya manmopa bhūṣato yuyujānasaptī /
analyzed: tā navyasaḥ jaramāṇasya manma upa bhūṣataḥ yuyujāna saptī

original: RV_6,062.04c śubham pṛkṣam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā hotā yakṣat pratno adhrug yuvānā //
analyzed: śubham pṛkṣam iṣam ūrjam vahantā hotā yakṣat pratnaḥ adruh yuvānā

original: RV_6,062.05a tā valgū dasrā puruśākatamā pratnā navyasā vacasā vivāse /
analyzed: tā valgū dasrā puruśākatamā pratnā navyasā vacasā vivāse

original: RV_6,062.05c yā śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhā babhūvatur gṛṇate citrarātī //
analyzed: yā śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhā babhūvatuḥ gṛṇate citra rātī

original: RV_6,062.06a tā bhujyuṃ vibhir adbhyaḥ samudrāt tugrasya sūnum ūhathū rajobhiḥ /
analyzed: tā bhujyum vibhiḥ adbhyaḥ samudrāt tugrasya sūnum ūhathuḥ rajobhiḥ

original: RV_6,062.06c areṇubhir yojanebhir bhujantā patatribhir arṇaso nir upasthāt //
analyzed: areṇubhiḥ yojanebhiḥ bhujantā patatribhiḥ arṇasaḥ niḥ upasthāt

original: RV_6,062.07a vi jayuṣā rathyā yātam adriṃ śrutaṃ havaṃ vṛṣaṇā vadhrimatyāḥ /
analyzed: vi jayuṣā rathyā yātam adrim śrutam havam vṛṣaṇā vadhrimatyāḥ

original: RV_6,062.07c daśasyantā śayave pipyathur gām iti cyavānā sumatim bhuraṇyū //
analyzed: daśasyantā śayave pipyathuḥ gām iti cyavānā sumatim bhuraṇyū

original: RV_6,062.08a yad rodasī pradivo asti bhūmā heḷo devānām uta martyatrā /
analyzed: yat rodasī pradivaḥ asti bhūmā heḍaḥ devānām uta martyatrā

original: RV_6,062.08c tad ādityā vasavo rudriyāso rakṣoyuje tapur aghaṃ dadhāta //
analyzed: tat ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudriyāsaḥ rakṣaḥ yuje tapuḥ agham dadhāta

original: RV_6,062.09a ya īṃ rājānāv ṛtuthā vidadhad rajaso mitro varuṇaś ciketat /
analyzed: yaḥ īm rājānau ṛtuthā vidadhat rajasaḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ ciketat

original: RV_6,062.09c gambhīrāya rakṣase hetim asya droghāya cid vacasa ānavāya //
analyzed: gambhīrāya rakṣase hetim asya droghāya cit vacase ānavāya

original: RV_6,062.10a antaraiś cakrais tanayāya vartir dyumatā yātaṃ nṛvatā rathena /
analyzed: antaraiḥ cakraiḥ tanayāya vartiḥ dyumatā yātam nṛvatā rathena

original: RV_6,062.10c sanutyena tyajasā martyasya vanuṣyatām api śīrṣā vavṛktam //
analyzed: sa nutyena tyajasā martyasya vanuṣyatām api śīrṣā vavṛktam

original: RV_6,062.11a ā paramābhir uta madhyamābhir niyudbhir yātam avamābhir arvāk /
analyzed: ā paramābhiḥ uta madhyamābhiḥ niyudbhiḥ yātam avamābhiḥ arvāk

original: RV_6,062.11c dṛḷhasya cid gomato vi vrajasya duro vartaṃ gṛṇate citrarātī //
analyzed: dṛḷhasya cit gomataḥ vi vrajasya duraḥ vartam gṛṇate citra rātī

original: RV_6,063.01a kva tyā valgū puruhūtādya dūto na stomo 'vidan namasvān /
analyzed: kva tyā valgū puru hūtā adya dūtaḥ na stomaḥ vidat namasvān

original: RV_6,063.01c ā yo arvāṅ nāsatyā vavarta preṣṭhā hy asatho asya manman //
analyzed: ā yaḥ arvāk nāsatyā vavarta preṣṭhā hi asathaḥ asya manman

original: RV_6,063.02a aram me gantaṃ havanāyāsmai gṛṇānā yathā pibātho andhaḥ /
analyzed: aram me gantam havanāya asmai gṛṇānā yathā pibāthaḥ andhaḥ

original: RV_6,063.02c pari ha tyad vartir yātho riṣo na yat paro nāntaras tuturyāt //
analyzed: pari ha tyad vartiḥ yāthaḥ riṣaḥ na yat paraḥ na antaraḥ tuturyāt

original: RV_6,063.03a akāri vām andhaso varīmann astāri barhiḥ suprāyaṇatamam /
analyzed: akāri vām andhasaḥ varīman astāri barhiḥ suprāyaṇatamam

original: RV_6,063.03c uttānahasto yuvayur vavandā vāṃ nakṣanto adraya āñjan //
analyzed: uttāna hastaḥ yuvayuḥ vavanda vām nakṣantaḥ adrayaḥ āñjan

original: RV_6,063.04a ūrdhvo vām agnir adhvareṣv asthāt pra rātir eti jūrṇinī ghṛtācī /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ vām agniḥ adhvareṣu asthāt pra rātiḥ eti jūrṇinī ghṛtācī

original: RV_6,063.04c pra hotā gūrtamanā urāṇo 'yukta yo nāsatyā havīman //
analyzed: pra hotā gūrta manāḥ urāṇaḥ yukta yaḥ nāsatyā havīman

original: RV_6,063.05a adhi śriye duhitā sūryasya rathaṃ tasthau purubhujā śatotim /
analyzed: adhi śriye duhitā sūryasya ratham tasthau puru bhujā śata ūtim

original: RV_6,063.05c pra māyābhir māyinā bhūtam atra narā nṛtū janiman yajñiyānām //
analyzed: pra māyābhiḥ māyinā bhūtam atra narā nṛtū janiman yajñiyānām

original: RV_6,063.06a yuvaṃ śrībhir darśatābhir ābhiḥ śubhe puṣṭim ūhathuḥ sūryāyāḥ /
analyzed: yuvam śrībhiḥ darśatābhiḥ ābhiḥ śubhe puṣṭim ūhathuḥ sūryāyāḥ

original: RV_6,063.06c pra vāṃ vayo vapuṣe 'nu paptan nakṣad vāṇī suṣṭutā dhiṣṇyā vām //
analyzed: pra vām vayaḥ vapuṣe nu paptan nakṣat vāṇī suṣṭutā dhiṣṇyā vām

original: RV_6,063.07a ā vāṃ vayo 'śvāso vahiṣṭhā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahantu /
analyzed: ā vām vayaḥ śvāsaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ abhi prayaḥ nāsatyā vahantu

original: RV_6,063.07c pra vāṃ ratho manojavā asarjīṣaḥ pṛkṣa iṣidho anu pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: pra vām rathaḥ manaḥ javāḥ asarji iṣaḥ pṛkṣaḥ iṣidhaḥ anu pūrvīḥ

original: RV_6,063.08a puru hi vām purubhujā deṣṇaṃ dhenuṃ na iṣam pinvatam asakrām /
analyzed: puru hi vām puru bhujā deṣṇam dhenum naḥ iṣam pinvatam asakrām

original: RV_6,063.08c stutaś ca vām mādhvī suṣṭutiś ca rasāś ca ye vām anu rātim agman //
analyzed: stutaḥ ca vām mādhvī suṣṭutiḥ ca rasāḥ ca ye vām anu rātim agman

original: RV_6,063.09a uta ma ṛjre purayasya raghvī sumīḷhe śatam peruke ca pakvā /
analyzed: uta me ṛjre purayasya raghvī sumīḷhe śatam peruke ca pakvā

original: RV_6,063.09c śāṇḍo dād dhiraṇinaḥ smaddiṣṭīn daśa vaśāso abhiṣāca ṛṣvān //
analyzed: śāṇḍaḥ dāt hiraṇinaḥ smaddiṣṭīn daśa vaśāsaḥ abhiṣācaḥ ṛṣvān

original: RV_6,063.10a saṃ vāṃ śatā nāsatyā sahasrāśvānām purupanthā gire dāt /
analyzed: sam vām śatā nāsatyā sahasrā aśvānām purupanthāḥ gire dāt

original: RV_6,063.10c bharadvājāya vīra nū gire dād dhatā rakṣāṃsi purudaṃsasā syuḥ //
analyzed: bharadvājāya vīra nu gire dāt hatā rakṣāṃsi puru daṃsasā syuḥ

original: RV_6,063.11a ā vāṃ sumne variman sūribhiḥ ṣyām //
analyzed: ā vām sumne variman sūribhiḥ syām

original: RV_6,064.01a ud u śriya uṣaso rocamānā asthur apāṃ normayo ruśantaḥ /
analyzed: ud u śriyaḥ uṣasaḥ rocamānāḥ asthuḥ apām na ūrmayaḥ ruśantaḥ

original: RV_6,064.01c kṛṇoti viśvā supathā sugāny abhūd u vasvī dakṣiṇā maghonī //
analyzed: kṛṇoti viśvā su pathā sugāni abhūt u vasvī dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_6,064.02a bhadrā dadṛkṣa urviyā vi bhāsy ut te śocir bhānavo dyām apaptan /
analyzed: bhadrā dadṛkṣe urviyā vi bhāsi ud te śociḥ bhānavaḥ dyām apaptan

original: RV_6,064.02c āvir vakṣaḥ kṛṇuṣe śumbhamānoṣo devi rocamānā mahobhiḥ //
analyzed: āvis vakṣaḥ kṛṇuṣe śumbhamānā uṣaḥ devi rocamānā mahobhiḥ

original: RV_6,064.03a vahanti sīm aruṇāso ruśanto gāvaḥ subhagām urviyā prathānām /
analyzed: vahanti sīm aruṇāsaḥ ruśantaḥ gāvaḥ subhagām urviyā prathānām

original: RV_6,064.03c apejate śūro asteva śatrūn bādhate tamo ajiro na voḷhā //
analyzed: apejate śūraḥ astā iva śatrūn bādhate tamaḥ ajiraḥ na voḷhā

original: RV_6,064.04a sugota te supathā parvateṣv avāte apas tarasi svabhāno /
analyzed: sugā uta te supathā parvateṣu avāte apaḥ tarasi sva bhāno

original: RV_6,064.04c sā na ā vaha pṛthuyāmann ṛṣve rayiṃ divo duhitar iṣayadhyai //
analyzed: sā naḥ ā vaha pṛthu yāman ṛṣve rayim divaḥ duhitar iṣayadhyai

original: RV_6,064.05a sā vaha yokṣabhir avātoṣo varaṃ vahasi joṣam anu /
analyzed: sā vaha yā ukṣabhiḥ avātā uṣaḥ varam vahasi joṣam anu

original: RV_6,064.05c tvaṃ divo duhitar yā ha devī pūrvahūtau maṃhanā darśatā bhūḥ //
analyzed: tvam divaḥ duhitar yā ha devī pūrva hūtau maṃhanā darśatā bhūḥ

original: RV_6,064.06a ut te vayaś cid vasater apaptan naraś ca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau /
analyzed: ud te vayaḥ cit vasateḥ apaptan naraḥ ca ye pitu bhājaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_6,064.06c amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya //
analyzed: amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣaḥ devi dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_6,065.01a eṣā syā no duhitā divojāḥ kṣitīr ucchantī mānuṣīr ajīgaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā syā naḥ duhitā divaḥ jāḥ kṣitīḥ ucchantī mānuṣīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_6,065.01c yā bhānunā ruśatā rāmyāsv ajñāyi tiras tamasaś cid aktūn //
analyzed: yā bhānunā ruśatā rāmyāsu ajñāyi tiras tamasaḥ cit aktūn

original: RV_6,065.02a vi tad yayur aruṇayugbhir aśvaiś citram bhānty uṣasaś candrarathāḥ /
analyzed: vi tat yayuḥ aruṇa yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ citram bhānti uṣasaḥ candra rathāḥ

original: RV_6,065.02c agraṃ yajñasya bṛhato nayantīr vi tā bādhante tama ūrmyāyāḥ //
analyzed: agram yajñasya bṛhataḥ nayantīḥ vi tāḥ bādhante tamaḥ ūrmyāyāḥ

original: RV_6,065.03a śravo vājam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantīr ni dāśuṣa uṣaso martyāya /
analyzed: śravaḥ vājam iṣam ūrjam vahantīḥ ni dāśuṣe uṣasaḥ martyāya

original: RV_6,065.03c maghonīr vīravat patyamānā avo dhāta vidhate ratnam adya //
analyzed: maghonīḥ vīravat patyamānāḥ avaḥ dhāta vidhate ratnam adya

original: RV_6,065.04a idā hi vo vidhate ratnam astīdā vīrāya dāśuṣa uṣāsaḥ /
analyzed: idā hi vaḥ vidhate ratnam asti idā vīrāya dāśuṣe uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_6,065.04c idā viprāya jarate yad ukthā ni ṣma māvate vahathā purā cit //
analyzed: idā viprāya jarate yat ukthā ni sma māvate vahathā purā cit

original: RV_6,065.05a idā hi ta uṣo adrisāno gotrā gavām aṅgiraso gṛṇanti /
analyzed: idā hi te uṣaḥ adri sāno gotrā gavām aṅgirasaḥ gṛṇanti

original: RV_6,065.05c vy arkeṇa bibhidur brahmaṇā ca satyā nṛṇām abhavad devahūtiḥ //
analyzed: vi arkeṇa bibhiduḥ brahmaṇā ca satyā nṛṇām abhavat deva hūtiḥ

original: RV_6,065.06a ucchā divo duhitaḥ pratnavan no bharadvājavad vidhate maghoni /
analyzed: uccha divaḥ duhitaḥ pratna vat naḥ bharadvājavat vidhate maghoni

original: RV_6,065.06c suvīraṃ rayiṃ gṛṇate rirīhy urugāyam adhi dhehi śravo naḥ //
analyzed: su vīram rayim gṛṇate rirīhi uru gāyam adhi dhehi śravaḥ naḥ

original: RV_6,066.01a vapur nu tac cikituṣe cid astu samānaṃ nāma dhenu patyamānam /
analyzed: vapuḥ nu tat cikituṣe cit astu samānam nāma dhenu patyamānam

original: RV_6,066.01c marteṣv anyad dohase pīpāya sakṛc chukraṃ duduhe pṛśnir ūdhaḥ //
analyzed: marteṣu anyat dohase pīpāya sakṛt śukram duduhe pṛśniḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_6,066.02a ye agnayo na śośucann idhānā dvir yat trir maruto vāvṛdhanta /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ na śośucan idhānāḥ dvis yat tris marutaḥ vāvṛdhanta

original: RV_6,066.02c areṇavo hiraṇyayāsa eṣāṃ sākaṃ nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiś ca bhūvan //
analyzed: areṇavaḥ hiraṇyayāsaḥ eṣām sākam nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiḥ ca bhūvan

original: RV_6,066.03a rudrasya ye mīḷhuṣaḥ santi putrā yāṃś co nu dādhṛvir bharadhyai /
analyzed: rudrasya ye mīḍhuṣaḥ santi putrāḥ yān ca u nu dādhṛviḥ bharadhyai

original: RV_6,066.03c vide hi mātā maho mahī ṣā set pṛśniḥ subhve garbham ādhāt //
analyzed: vide hi mātā mahaḥ mahī sā sā id pṛśniḥ su bhve garbham ādhāt

original: RV_6,066.04a na ya īṣante januṣo 'yā nv antaḥ santo 'vadyāni punānāḥ /
analyzed: na ye īṣante januṣaḥ yāḥ nu antar santaḥ vadyāni punānāḥ

original: RV_6,066.04c nir yad duhre śucayo 'nu joṣam anu śriyā tanvam ukṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: niḥ yat duhre śucayaḥ nu joṣam anu śriyā tanvam ukṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_6,066.05a makṣū na yeṣu dohase cid ayā ā nāma dhṛṣṇu mārutaṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: makṣū na yeṣu dohase cit ayā ā nāma dhṛṣṇu mārutam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_6,066.05c na ye staunā ayāso mahnā nū cit sudānur ava yāsad ugrān //
analyzed: na ye staunāḥ ayāsaḥ mahnā nu cit sudānuḥ ava yāsat ugrān

original: RV_6,066.06a ta id ugrāḥ śavasā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇā ubhe yujanta rodasī sumeke /
analyzed: te id ugrāḥ śavasā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇāḥ ubhe yujanta rodasī sumeke

original: RV_6,066.06c adha smaiṣu rodasī svaśocir āmavatsu tasthau na rokaḥ //
analyzed: adha sma eṣu rodasī sva śociḥ tasthau na rokaḥ

original: RV_6,066.07a aneno vo maruto yāmo astv anaśvaś cid yam ajaty arathīḥ /
analyzed: an enaḥ vaḥ marutaḥ yāmaḥ astu an aśvaḥ cit yam ajati a rathīḥ

original: RV_6,066.07c anavaso anabhīśū rajastūr vi rodasī pathyā yāti sādhan //
analyzed: an avasaḥ an abhīśuḥ rajastūr vi rodasī pathyāḥ yāti sādhan

original: RV_6,066.08a nāsya vartā na tarutā nv asti maruto yam avatha vājasātau /
analyzed: na asya vartā na tarutā nu asti marutaḥ yam avatha vājasātau

original: RV_6,066.08c toke vā goṣu tanaye yam apsu sa vrajaṃ dartā pārye adha dyoḥ //
analyzed: toke vā goṣu tanaye yam apsu sa vrajam dartā pārye adha dyoḥ

original: RV_6,066.09a pra citram arkaṃ gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam /
analyzed: pra citram arkam gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam

original: RV_6,066.09c ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ //
analyzed: ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ

original: RV_6,066.10a tviṣīmanto adhvarasyeva didyut tṛṣucyavaso juhvo nāgneḥ /
analyzed: tviṣīmantaḥ adhvarasya iva didyut tṛṣucyavasaḥ juhvaḥ nā agneḥ

original: RV_6,066.10c arcatrayo dhunayo na vīrā bhrājajjanmāno maruto adhṛṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: arcatrayaḥ dhunayaḥ na vīrāḥ bhrājat janmānaḥ marutaḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_6,066.11a taṃ vṛdhantam mārutam bhrājadṛṣṭiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā vivāse /
analyzed: tam vṛdhantam mārutam bhrājat ṛṣṭim rudrasya sūnum havasā vivāse

original: RV_6,066.11c divaḥ śardhāya śucayo manīṣā girayo nāpa ugrā aspṛdhran //
analyzed: divaḥ śardhāya śucayaḥ manīṣāḥ girayaḥ na apaḥ ugrāḥ aspṛdhran

original: RV_6,067.01a viśveṣāṃ vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamā gīrbhir mitrāvaruṇā vāvṛdhadhyai /
analyzed: viśveṣām vaḥ satām jyeṣṭhatamāḥ gīrbhiḥ mitrāvaruṇāḥ vāvṛdhadhyai

original: RV_6,067.01c saṃ yā raśmeva yamatur yamiṣṭhā dvā janāṃ asamā bāhubhiḥ svaiḥ //
analyzed: sam yā raśmā iva yamatuḥ yamiṣṭhā dvā janān asamā bāhubhiḥ svaiḥ

original: RV_6,067.02a iyam mad vām pra stṛṇīte manīṣopa priyā namasā barhir accha /
analyzed: iyam mat vām pra stṛṇīte manīṣā upa priyā namasā barhiḥ accha

original: RV_6,067.02c yantaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv adhṛṣṭaṃ chardir yad vāṃ varūthyaṃ sudānū //
analyzed: yantam naḥ mitrāvaruṇau adhṛṣṭam chardiḥ yat vām varūthyam sudānū

original: RV_6,067.03a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā suśasty upa priyā namasā hūyamānā /
analyzed: ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā su śasti upa priyā namasā hūyamānā

original: RV_6,067.03c saṃ yāv apnastho apaseva janāñ chrudhīyataś cid yatatho mahitvā //
analyzed: sam yau apnasthaḥ apasā iva janām śrudhīyataḥ cit yatathaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_6,067.04a aśvā na yā vājinā pūtabandhū ṛtā yad garbham aditir bharadhyai /
analyzed: aśvā na yā vājinā pūta bandhū ṛtā yat garbham aditiḥ bharadhyai

original: RV_6,067.04c pra yā mahi mahāntā jāyamānā ghorā martāya ripave ni dīdhaḥ //
analyzed: pra yā mahi mahāntā jāyamānā ghorā martāya ripave ni dīdhaḥ

original: RV_6,067.05a viśve yad vām maṃhanā mandamānāḥ kṣatraṃ devāso adadhuḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: viśve yat vām maṃhanā mandamānāḥ kṣatram devāsaḥ adadhuḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_6,067.05c pari yad bhūtho rodasī cid urvī santi spaśo adabdhāso amūrāḥ //
analyzed: pari yat bhūthaḥ rodasī cit urvī santi spaśaḥ adabdhāsaḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_6,067.06a tā hi kṣatraṃ dhārayethe anu dyūn dṛṃhethe sānum upamād iva dyoḥ /
analyzed: tā hi kṣatram dhārayethe anu dyūn dṛṃhethe sānum upamāt iva dyoḥ

original: RV_6,067.06c dṛḷho nakṣatra uta viśvadevo bhūmim ātān dyāṃ dhāsināyoḥ //
analyzed: dṛḷhaḥ nakṣatraḥ uta viśvadevaḥ bhūmim ātān dyām dhāsinā ayoḥ

original: RV_6,067.07a tā vigraṃ dhaithe jaṭharam pṛṇadhyā ā yat sadma sabhṛtayaḥ pṛṇanti /
analyzed: tā vigram dhaithe jaṭharam pṛṇadhyai ā yat sadma sabhṛtayaḥ pṛṇanti

original: RV_6,067.07c na mṛṣyante yuvatayo 'vātā vi yat payo viśvajinvā bharante //
analyzed: na mṛṣyante yuvatayaḥ vātāḥ vi yat payaḥ viśva jinvāḥ bharante

original: RV_6,067.08a tā jihvayā sadam edaṃ sumedhā ā yad vāṃ satyo aratir ṛte bhūt /
analyzed: tā jihvayā sadam ā idam sumedhāḥ ā yat vām satyaḥ aratiḥ ṛte bhūt

original: RV_6,067.08c tad vām mahitvaṃ ghṛtānnāv astu yuvaṃ dāśuṣe vi cayiṣṭam aṃhaḥ //
analyzed: tat vām mahitvam ghṛta annau astu yuvam dāśuṣe vi cayiṣṭam aṃhaḥ

original: RV_6,067.09a pra yad vām mitrāvaruṇā spūrdhan priyā dhāma yuvadhitā minanti /
analyzed: pra yat vām mitrāvaruṇā spūrdhan priyā dhāma yuvadhitā minanti

original: RV_6,067.09c na ye devāsa ohasā na martā ayajñasāco apyo na putrāḥ //
analyzed: na ye devāsaḥ ohasā na martāḥ ayajñasācaḥ apyaḥ na putrāḥ

original: RV_6,067.10a vi yad vācaṃ kīstāso bharante śaṃsanti ke cin nivido manānāḥ /
analyzed: vi yat vācam kīstāsaḥ bharante śaṃsanti ke cit nividaḥ manānāḥ

original: RV_6,067.10c ād vām bravāma satyāny ukthā nakir devebhir yatatho mahitvā //
analyzed: āt vām bravāma satyāni ukthā nakir devebhiḥ yatathaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_6,067.11a avor itthā vāṃ chardiṣo abhiṣṭau yuvor mitrāvaruṇāv askṛdhoyu /
analyzed: avoḥ itthā vām chardiṣaḥ abhiṣṭau yuvoḥ mitrāvaruṇau

original: RV_6,067.11c anu yad gāva sphurān ṛjipyaṃ dhṛṣṇuṃ yad raṇe vṛṣaṇaṃ yunajan //
analyzed: anu yat gāvaḥ sphurān ṛjipyam dhṛṣṇum yat raṇe vṛṣaṇam yunajan

original: RV_6,068.01a śruṣṭī vāṃ yajña udyataḥ sajoṣā manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣo yajadhyai /
analyzed: śruṣṭī vām yajñaḥ udyataḥ sajoṣāḥ manuṣvat vṛkta barhiṣaḥ yajadhyai

original: RV_6,068.01c ā ya indrāvaruṇāv iṣe adya mahe sumnāya maha āvavartat //
analyzed: ā yaḥ indrāvaruṇau iṣe adya mahe sumnāya mahe āvavartat

original: RV_6,068.02a tā hi śreṣṭhā devatātā tujā śūrāṇāṃ śaviṣṭhā tā hi bhūtam /
analyzed: tā hi śreṣṭhā devatātā tujā śūrāṇām śaviṣṭhā tā hi bhūtam

original: RV_6,068.02c maghonām maṃhiṣṭhā tuviśuṣma ṛtena vṛtraturā sarvasenā //
analyzed: maghonām maṃhiṣṭhā tuvi śuṣmaḥ ṛtena vṛtra turā sarva senā

original: RV_6,068.03a tā gṛṇīhi namasyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ sumnebhir indrāvaruṇā cakānā /
analyzed: tā gṛṇīhi namasyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ sumnebhiḥ indrāvaruṇā cakānā

original: RV_6,068.03c vajreṇānyaḥ śavasā hanti vṛtraṃ siṣakty anyo vṛjaneṣu vipraḥ //
analyzed: vajreṇa anyaḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram siṣakti anyaḥ vṛjaneṣu vipraḥ

original: RV_6,068.04a gnāś ca yan naraś ca vāvṛdhanta viśve devāso narāṃ svagūrtāḥ /
analyzed: gnāḥ ca yat naraḥ ca vāvṛdhanta viśve devāsaḥ narām sva gūrtāḥ

original: RV_6,068.04c praibhya indrāvaruṇā mahitvā dyauś ca pṛthivi bhūtam urvī //
analyzed: pra ebhyaḥ indrāvaruṇā mahitvā dyauḥ ca pṛthivi bhūtam urvī

original: RV_6,068.05a sa it sudānuḥ svavāṃ ṛtāvendrā yo vāṃ varuṇa dāśati tman /
analyzed: saḥ id sudānuḥ svavān ṛtāvā indrā yaḥ vām varuṇa dāśati tman

original: RV_6,068.05c iṣā sa dviṣas tared dāsvān vaṃsad rayiṃ rayivataś ca janān //
analyzed: iṣā sa dviṣaḥ taret dāsvān vaṃsat rayim rayivataḥ ca janān

original: RV_6,068.06a yaṃ yuvaṃ dāśvadhvarāya devā rayiṃ dhattho vasumantam purukṣum /
analyzed: yam yuvam dāśu adhvarāya devā rayim dhatthaḥ vasumantam purukṣum

original: RV_6,068.06c asme sa indrāvaruṇāv api ṣyāt pra yo bhanakti vanuṣām aśastīḥ //
analyzed: asme saḥ indrāvaruṇau api syāt pra yaḥ bhanakti vanuṣām aśastīḥ

original: RV_6,068.07a uta naḥ sutrātro devagopāḥ sūribhya indrāvaruṇā rayiḥ ṣyāt /
analyzed: uta naḥ su trātraḥ deva gopāḥ sūribhyaḥ indrāvaruṇā rayiḥ syāt

original: RV_6,068.07c yeṣāṃ śuṣmaḥ pṛtanāsu sāhvān pra sadyo dyumnā tirate taturiḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām śuṣmaḥ pṛtanāsu sāhvān pra sadyas dyumnā tirate taturiḥ

original: RV_6,068.08a nū na indrāvaruṇā gṛṇānā pṛṅktaṃ rayiṃ sauśravasāya devā /
analyzed: nu naḥ indrāvaruṇā gṛṇānā pṛṅktam rayim sauśravasāya devā

original: RV_6,068.08c itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śardho 'po na nāvā duritā tarema //
analyzed: itthā gṛṇantaḥ mahinasya śardho paḥ na nāvā duritā tarema

original: RV_6,068.09a pra samrāje bṛhate manma nu priyam arca devāya varuṇāya saprathaḥ /
analyzed: pra samrāje bṛhate manma nu priyam arca devāya varuṇāya saprathaḥ

original: RV_6,068.09c ayaṃ ya urvī mahinā mahivrataḥ kratvā vibhāty ajaro na śociṣā //
analyzed: ayam yaḥ urvī mahinā mahi vrataḥ kratvā vibhāti ajaraḥ na śociṣā

original: RV_6,068.10a indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ somam pibatam madyaṃ dhṛtavratā /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā suta pau imam sutam somam pibatam madyam dhṛtavratā

original: RV_6,068.10c yuvo ratho adhvaraṃ devavītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye //
analyzed: yuvoḥ rathaḥ adhvaram deva vītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye

original: RV_6,068.11a indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇāḥ madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām

original: RV_6,068.11c idaṃ vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam asme āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām //
analyzed: idam vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam asme āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayethām

original: RV_6,069.01a saṃ vāṃ karmaṇā sam iṣā hinomīndrāviṣṇū apasas pāre asya /
analyzed: sam vām karmaṇā sam iṣā hinomi indrāviṣṇū apasaḥ pāre asya

original: RV_6,069.01c juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam ariṣṭair naḥ pathibhiḥ pārayantā //
analyzed: juṣethām yajñam draviṇam ca dhattam ariṣṭaiḥ naḥ pathibhiḥ pārayantā

original: RV_6,069.02a yā viśvāsāṃ janitārā matīnām indrāviṣṇū kalaśā somadhānā /
analyzed: yā viśvāsām janitārā matīnām indrāviṣṇū kalaśā soma dhānā

original: RV_6,069.02c pra vāṃ giraḥ śasyamānā avantu pra stomāso gīyamānāso arkaiḥ //
analyzed: pra vām giraḥ śasyamānāḥ avantu pra stomāsaḥ gīyamānāsaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,069.03a indrāviṣṇū madapatī madānām ā somaṃ yātaṃ draviṇo dadhānā /
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū mada patī madānām ā somam yātam draviṇaḥ dadhānā

original: RV_6,069.03c saṃ vām añjantv aktubhir matīnāṃ saṃ stomāsaḥ śasyamānāsa ukthaiḥ //
analyzed: sam vām añjantu aktubhiḥ matīnām sam stomāsaḥ śasyamānāsaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_6,069.04a ā vām aśvāso abhimātiṣāha indrāviṣṇū sadhamādo vahantu /
analyzed: ā vām aśvāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ indrāviṣṇū sadhamādaḥ vahantu

original: RV_6,069.04c juṣethāṃ viśvā havanā matīnām upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ giro me //
analyzed: juṣethām viśvā havanā matīnām upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutam giraḥ me

original: RV_6,069.05a indrāviṣṇū tat panayāyyaṃ vāṃ somasya mada uru cakramāthe /
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū tat panayāyyam vām somasya made uru cakramāthe

original: RV_6,069.05c akṛṇutam antarikṣaṃ varīyo 'prathataṃ jīvase no rajāṃsi //
analyzed: akṛṇutam antarikṣam varīyaḥ prathatam jīvase naḥ rajāṃsi

original: RV_6,069.06a indrāviṣṇū haviṣā vāvṛdhānāgrādvānā namasā rātahavyā /
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū haviṣā vāvṛdhānā agrādvānā namasā rāta havyā

original: RV_6,069.06c ghṛtāsutī draviṇaṃ dhattam asme samudra sthaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhānaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛta āsutī draviṇam dhattam asme samudraḥ sthaḥ kalaśaḥ soma dhānaḥ

original: RV_6,069.07a indrāviṣṇū pibatam madhvo asya somasya dasrā jaṭharam pṛṇethām /
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū pibatam madhvaḥ asya somasya dasrā jaṭharam pṛṇethām

original: RV_6,069.07c ā vām andhāṃsi madirāṇy agmann upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ havam me //
analyzed: ā vām andhāṃsi madirāṇi agman upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutam havam me

original: RV_6,069.08a ubhā jigyathur na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraś canainoḥ /
analyzed: ubhā jigyathuḥ na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraḥ cana enoḥ

original: RV_6,069.08c indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tad airayethām //
analyzed: indraḥ ca viṣṇo yat apaspṛdhethām tredhā sahasram vi tat airayethām

original: RV_6,070.01a ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyorvī pṛthvī madhudughe supeśasā /
analyzed: ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyā urvī pṛthvī madhu dughe supeśasā

original: RV_6,070.01c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūriretasā //
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūri retasā

original: RV_6,070.02a asaścantī bhūridhāre payasvatī ghṛtaṃ duhāte sukṛte śucivrate /
analyzed: a saścantī bhūri dhāre payasvatī ghṛtam duhāte sukṛte śuci vrate

original: RV_6,070.02c rājantī asya bhuvanasya rodasī asme retaḥ siñcataṃ yan manurhitam //
analyzed: rājantī asya bhuvanasya rodasī asme retaḥ siñcatam yat manuḥ hitam

original: RV_6,070.03a yo vām ṛjave kramaṇāya rodasī marto dadāśa dhiṣaṇe sa sādhati /
analyzed: yaḥ vām ṛjave kramaṇāya rodasī martaḥ dadāśa dhiṣaṇe sa sādhati

original: RV_6,070.03c pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pari yuvoḥ siktā viṣurūpāṇi savratā //
analyzed: pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ pari yuvoḥ siktā viṣurūpāṇi savratā

original: RV_6,070.04a ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī abhīvṛte ghṛtaśriyā ghṛtapṛcā ghṛtāvṛdhā /
analyzed: ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī abhīvṛte ghṛta śriyā ghṛta pṛcā ghṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_6,070.04c urvī pṛthvī hotṛvūrye purohite te id viprā īḷate sumnam iṣṭaye //
analyzed: urvī pṛthvī hotṛ vūrye purohite te id viprāḥ īḍate sumnam iṣṭaye

original: RV_6,070.05a madhu no dyāvāpṛthivī mimikṣatām madhuścutā madhudughe madhuvrate /
analyzed: madhu naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī mimikṣatām madhuścutā madhu dughe madhu vrate

original: RV_6,070.05c dadhāne yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca devatā mahi śravo vājam asme suvīryam //
analyzed: dadhāne yajñam draviṇam ca devatā mahi śravaḥ vājam asme su vīryam

original: RV_6,070.06a ūrjaṃ no dyauś ca pṛthivī ca pinvatām pitā mātā viśvavidā sudaṃsasā /
analyzed: ūrjam naḥ dyauḥ ca pṛthivī ca pinvatām pitā mātā viśva vidā su daṃsasā

original: RV_6,070.06c saṃrarāṇe rodasī viśvaśambhuvā saniṃ vājaṃ rayim asme sam invatām //
analyzed: saṃrarāṇe rodasī viśva śambhuvā sanim vājam rayim asme sam invatām

original: RV_6,071.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayā bāhū ayaṃsta savanāya sukratuḥ /
analyzed: ud u sya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayā bāhū ayaṃsta savanāya su kratuḥ

original: RV_6,071.01c ghṛtena pāṇī abhi pruṣṇute makho yuvā sudakṣo rajaso vidharmaṇi //
analyzed: ghṛtena pāṇī abhi pruṣṇute makhaḥ yuvā su dakṣaḥ rajasaḥ vidharmaṇi

original: RV_6,071.02a devasya vayaṃ savituḥ savīmani śreṣṭhe syāma vasunaś ca dāvane /
analyzed: devasya vayam savituḥ savīmani śreṣṭhe syāma vasunaḥ ca dāvane

original: RV_6,071.02c yo viśvasya dvipado yaś catuṣpado niveśane prasave cāsi bhūmanaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasya dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ niveśane prasave ca asi bhūmanaḥ

original: RV_6,071.03a adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvaṃ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayam /
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ savitar pāyubhiḥ tvam śivebhiḥ adya pari pāhi naḥ gayam

original: RV_6,071.03c hiraṇyajihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata //
analyzed: hiraṇya jihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣa mākir naḥ agha śaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_6,071.04a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā damūnā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ pratidoṣam asthāt /
analyzed: ud u sya devaḥ savitā damūnāḥ hiraṇya pāṇiḥ pratidoṣam asthāt

original: RV_6,071.04c ayohanur yajato mandrajihva ā dāśuṣe suvati bhūri vāmam //
analyzed: ayaḥ hanuḥ yajataḥ mandra jihvaḥ ā dāśuṣe suvati bhūri vāmam

original: RV_6,071.05a ud ū ayāṃ upavakteva bāhū hiraṇyayā savitā supratīkā /
analyzed: ud u ayām upavaktā iva bāhū hiraṇyayā savitā su pratīkā

original: RV_6,071.05c divo rohāṃsy aruhat pṛthivyā arīramat patayat kac cid abhvam //
analyzed: divaḥ rohāṃsi aruhat pṛthivyāḥ arīramat patayat kad cit abhvam

original: RV_6,071.06a vāmam adya savitar vāmam u śvo dive-dive vāmam asmabhyaṃ sāvīḥ /
analyzed: vāmam adya savitar vāmam u śvas dive dive vāmam asmabhyam sāvīḥ

original: RV_6,071.06c vāmasya hi kṣayasya deva bhūrer ayā dhiyā vāmabhājaḥ syāma //
analyzed: vāmasya hi kṣayasya deva bhūreḥ ayā dhiyā vāma bhājaḥ syāma

original: RV_6,072.01a indrāsomā mahi tad vām mahitvaṃ yuvam mahāni prathamāni cakrathuḥ /
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ mahi tat vām mahi tvam yuvam mahāni prathamāni cakrathuḥ

original: RV_6,072.01c yuvaṃ sūryaṃ vividathur yuvaṃ svar viśvā tamāṃsy ahataṃ nidaś ca //
analyzed: yuvam sūryam vividathuḥ yuvam svar viśvā tamāṃsi ahatam nidaḥ ca

original: RV_6,072.02a indrāsomā vāsayatha uṣāsam ut sūryaṃ nayatho jyotiṣā saha /
analyzed: indrāsomā vāsayathaḥ uṣāsam ud sūryam nayathaḥ jyotiṣā saha

original: RV_6,072.02c upa dyāṃ skambhathu skambhanenāprathatam pṛthivīm mātaraṃ vi //
analyzed: upa dyām skambhathu skambhanena aprathatam pṛthivīm mātaram vi

original: RV_6,072.03a indrāsomāv ahim apaḥ pariṣṭhāṃ hatho vṛtram anu vāṃ dyaur amanyata /
analyzed: indrāsomau ahim apaḥ pariṣṭhām hathaḥ vṛtram anu vām dyauḥ amanyata

original: RV_6,072.03c prārṇāṃsy airayataṃ nadīnām ā samudrāṇi paprathuḥ purūṇi //
analyzed: pra arṇāṃsi airayatam nadīnām ā samudrāṇi paprathuḥ purūṇi

original: RV_6,072.04a indrāsomā pakvam āmāsv antar ni gavām id dadhathur vakṣaṇāsu /
analyzed: indrāsomā pakvam āmāsu antar ni gavām id dadhathuḥ vakṣaṇāsu

original: RV_6,072.04c jagṛbhathur anapinaddham āsu ruśac citrāsu jagatīṣv antaḥ //
analyzed: jagṛbhathuḥ an apinaddham āsu ruśat citrāsu jagatīṣu antar

original: RV_6,072.05a indrāsomā yuvam aṅga tarutram apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthe /
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ yuvam aṅga tarutram apatyasācam śrutyam rarāthe

original: RV_6,072.05c yuvaṃ śuṣmaṃ naryaṃ carṣaṇibhyaḥ saṃ vivyathuḥ pṛtanāṣāham ugrā //
analyzed: yuvam śuṣmam naryam carṣaṇibhyaḥ sam vivyathuḥ pṛtanāṣāham ugrā

original: RV_6,073.01a yo adribhit prathamajā ṛtāvā bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso haviṣmān /
analyzed: yaḥ adri bhid prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ haviṣmān

original: RV_6,073.01c dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā na ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti //
analyzed: dvibarhajmā prāgharmasad pitā naḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: RV_6,073.02a janāya cid ya īvata u lokam bṛhaspatir devahūtau cakāra /
analyzed: janāya cit yaḥ īvate u lokam bṛhaspatiḥ deva hūtau cakāra

original: RV_6,073.02c ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puro dardarīti jayañ chatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan //
analyzed: ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puraḥ dardarīti jayam śatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan

original: RV_6,073.03a bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayad vasūni maho vrajān gomato deva eṣaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayat vasūni mahaḥ vrajān gomataḥ devaḥ eṣaḥ

original: RV_6,073.03c apaḥ siṣāsan svar apratīto bṛhaspatir hanty amitram arkaiḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ siṣāsan svar apratītaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ hanti amitram arkaiḥ

original: RV_6,074.01a somārudrā dhārayethām asuryam pra vām iṣṭayo 'ram aśnuvantu /
analyzed: somārudrā dhārayethām asuryam pra vām iṣṭayaḥ ram aśnuvantu

original: RV_6,074.01c dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhānā śaṃ no bhūtaṃ dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: damedame sapta ratnā dadhānā śam naḥ bhūtam dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_6,074.02a somārudrā vi vṛhataṃ viṣūcīm amīvā yā no gayam āviveśa /
analyzed: somārudrā vi vṛhatam viṣūcīm amīvā yā naḥ gayam āviveśa

original: RV_6,074.02c āre bādhethāṃ nirṛtim parācair asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu //
analyzed: āre bādhethām nirṛtim parācais asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu

original: RV_6,074.03a somārudrā yuvam etāny asme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam /
analyzed: somārudrā yuvam etāni asme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam

original: RV_6,074.03c ava syatam muñcataṃ yan no asti tanūṣu baddhaṃ kṛtam eno asmat //
analyzed: ava syatam muñcatam yat naḥ asti tanūṣu baddham kṛtam enaḥ asmat

original: RV_6,074.04a tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāv iha su mṛḷataṃ naḥ /
analyzed: tigma āyudhau tigma hetī su śevau somārudrau iha su mṛḍatam naḥ

original: RV_6,074.04c pra no muñcataṃ varuṇasya pāśād gopāyataṃ naḥ sumanasyamānā //
analyzed: pra naḥ muñcatam varuṇasya pāśāt gopāyatam naḥ sumanasyamānā

original: RV_6,075.01a jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadām upasthe /
analyzed: jīmūtasya iva bhavati pratīkam yat varmī yāti samadām upasthe

original: RV_6,075.01c anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvaṃ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu //
analyzed: an āviddhayā tanvā jaya tvam sa tvā varmaṇaḥ mahimā pipartu

original: RV_6,075.02a dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema /
analyzed: dhanvanā gāḥ dhanvanā ājim jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samadaḥ jayema

original: RV_6,075.02c dhanuḥ śatror apakāmaṃ kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśo jayema //
analyzed: dhanuḥ śatroḥ apakāmam kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ jayema

original: RV_6,075.03a vakṣyantīved ā ganīganti karṇam priyaṃ sakhāyam pariṣasvajānā /
analyzed: vakṣyantī iva id ā ganīganti karṇam priyam sakhāyam pariṣasvajānā

original: RV_6,075.03c yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvañ jyā iyaṃ samane pārayantī //
analyzed: yoṣā iva śiṅkte vitatā adhi dhanvam jyā iyam samane pārayantī

original: RV_6,075.04a te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putram bibhṛtām upasthe /
analyzed: te ācarantī samanā iva yoṣā mātā iva putram bibhṛtām upasthe

original: RV_6,075.04c apa śatrūn vidhyatāṃ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantī amitrān //
analyzed: apa śatrūn vidhyatām saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantī amitrān

original: RV_6,075.05a bahvīnām pitā bahur asya putraś ciścā kṛṇoti samanāvagatya /
analyzed: bahvīnām pitā bahuḥ asya putraḥ kṛṇoti samanā avagatya

original: RV_6,075.05c iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāś ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ //
analyzed: iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāḥ ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddhaḥ jayati prasūtaḥ

original: RV_6,075.06a rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatra-yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ /
analyzed: rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puras yatra yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ

original: RV_6,075.06c abhīśūnām mahimānam panāyata manaḥ paścād anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ //
analyzed: abhīśūnām mahimānam panāyata manaḥ paścāt anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ

original: RV_6,075.07a tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ /
analyzed: tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣa pāṇayaḥ śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ

original: RV_6,075.07c avakrāmantaḥ prapadair amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūṃr anapavyayantaḥ //
analyzed: avakrāmantaḥ prapadaiḥ amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūṃr an apavyayantaḥ

original: RV_6,075.08a rathavāhanaṃ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma /
analyzed: rathavāhanam haviḥ asya nāma yatra āyudham nihitam asya varma

original: RV_6,075.08c tatrā ratham upa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ //
analyzed: tatra ratham upa śagmam sadema viśvāhā vayam sumanasyamānāḥ

original: RV_6,075.09a svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ /
analyzed: svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaraḥ vayaḥ dhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvantaḥ gabhīrāḥ

original: RV_6,075.09c citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ //
analyzed: citra senāḥ iṣu balāḥ amṛdhrāḥ satovīrāḥ uravaḥ vrāta sāhāḥ

original: RV_6,075.10a brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā

original: RV_6,075.10c pūṣā naḥ pātu duritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata //
analyzed: pūṣā naḥ pātu duritāt ṛtāvṛdhaḥ rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_6,075.11a suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā /
analyzed: suparṇam vaste mṛgaḥ asyāḥ dantaḥ gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā

original: RV_6,075.11c yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tatrāsmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yaṃsan //
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ sam ca vi ca dravanti tatra asmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yaṃsan

original: RV_6,075.12a ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi no 'śmā bhavatu nas tanūḥ /
analyzed: ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi naḥ śmā bhavatu naḥ tanūḥ

original: RV_6,075.12c somo adhi bravītu no 'ditiḥ śarma yacchatu //
analyzed: somaḥ adhi bravītu naḥ ditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_6,075.13a ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanāṃ upa jighnate /
analyzed: ā jaṅghanti sānū eṣām jaghanām upa jighnate

original: RV_6,075.13c aśvājani pracetaso 'śvān samatsu codaya //
analyzed: aśvājani pracetasaḥ śvān samatsu codaya

original: RV_6,075.14a ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetim paribādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ pari eti bāhum jyāyāḥ hetim paribādhamānaḥ

original: RV_6,075.14c hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsam pari pātu viśvataḥ //
analyzed: hastaghnaḥ viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsam pari pātu viśvatas

original: RV_6,075.15a ālāktā yā ruruśīrṣṇy atho yasyā ayo mukham /
analyzed: ālāktā yā ruru śīrṣṇī atho yasyāḥ ayaḥ mukham

original: RV_6,075.15c idam parjanyaretasa iṣvai devyai bṛhan namaḥ //
analyzed: idam parjanya retase iṣvai devyai bṛhat namaḥ

original: RV_6,075.16a avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasaṃśite /
analyzed: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite

original: RV_6,075.16c gacchāmitrān pra padyasva māmīṣāṃ kaṃ canoc chiṣaḥ //
analyzed: gaccha amitrān pra padyasva mā amīṣām kam cana ud śiṣaḥ

original: RV_6,075.17a yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva /
analyzed: yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārāḥ viśikhāḥ iva

original: RV_6,075.17c tatrā no brahmaṇas patir aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu //
analyzed: tatra naḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu

original: RV_6,075.18a marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somas tvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām /
analyzed: marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somaḥ tvā rājā amṛtena anu vastām

original: RV_6,075.18c uror varīyo varuṇas te kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu //
analyzed: uroḥ varīyaḥ varuṇaḥ te kṛṇotu jayantam tvā anu devāḥ madantu

original: RV_6,075.19a yo naḥ svo araṇo yaś ca niṣṭyo jighāṃsati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ svaḥ araṇaḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ jighāṃsati

original: RV_6,075.19c devās taṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram //
analyzed: devāḥ tam sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mama antaram

original: Ṛgveda 7
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_7,001.01a agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir araṇyor hastacyutī janayanta praśastam /
analyzed: agnim naraḥ dīdhitibhiḥ araṇyoḥ hasta cyutī janayanta praśastam

original: RV_7,001.01c dūredṛśaṃ gṛhapatim atharyum //
analyzed: dūredṛśam gṛhapatim atharyum

original: RV_7,001.02a tam agnim aste vasavo ny ṛṇvan supraticakṣam avase kutaś cit /
analyzed: tam agnim aste vasavaḥ ni ṛṇvan supraticakṣam avase kutas cit

original: RV_7,001.02c dakṣāyyo yo dama āsa nityaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣāyyaḥ yaḥ dame āsa nityaḥ

original: RV_7,001.03a preddho agne dīdihi puro no 'jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha /
analyzed: preddhaḥ agne dīdihi puras naḥ jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha

original: RV_7,001.03c tvāṃ śaśvanta upa yanti vājāḥ //
analyzed: tvām śaśvantaḥ upa yanti vājāḥ

original: RV_7,001.04a pra te agnayo 'gnibhyo varaṃ niḥ suvīrāsaḥ śośucanta dyumantaḥ /
analyzed: pra te agnayaḥ gnibhyaḥ varam niḥ su vīrāsaḥ śośucanta dyumantaḥ

original: RV_7,001.04c yatrā naraḥ samāsate sujātāḥ //
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ samāsate sujātāḥ

original: RV_7,001.05a dā no agne dhiyā rayiṃ suvīraṃ svapatyaṃ sahasya praśastam /
analyzed: dāḥ naḥ agne dhiyā rayim su vīram su apatyam sahasya praśastam

original: RV_7,001.05c na yaṃ yāvā tarati yātumāvān //
analyzed: na yam yāvā tarati yātumāvān

original: RV_7,001.06a upa yam eti yuvatiḥ sudakṣaṃ doṣā vastor haviṣmatī ghṛtācī /
analyzed: upa yam eti yuvatiḥ su dakṣam doṣā vastoḥ haviṣmatī ghṛtācī

original: RV_7,001.06c upa svainam aramatir vasūyuḥ //
analyzed: upa svā enam aramatiḥ vasūyuḥ

original: RV_7,001.07a viśvā agne 'pa dahārātīr yebhis tapobhir adaho jarūtham /
analyzed: viśvāḥ agne pa daha arātīḥ yebhiḥ tapobhiḥ adahaḥ jarūtham

original: RV_7,001.07c pra nisvaraṃ cātayasvāmīvām //
analyzed: pra nisvaram cātayasva amīvām

original: RV_7,001.08a ā yas te agna idhate anīkaṃ vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivaḥ pāvaka /
analyzed: ā yaḥ te agne idhate anīkam vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivas pāvaka

original: RV_7,001.08c uto na ebhi stavathair iha syāḥ //
analyzed: uta u naḥ ebhiḥ stavathaiḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_7,001.09a vi ye te agne bhejire anīkam martā naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā /
analyzed: vi ye te agne bhejire anīkam martāḥ naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā

original: RV_7,001.09c uto na ebhiḥ sumanā iha syāḥ //
analyzed: uta u naḥ ebhiḥ sumanāḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_7,001.10a ime naro vṛtrahatyeṣu śūrā viśvā adevīr abhi santu māyāḥ /
analyzed: ime naraḥ vṛtra hatyeṣu śūrāḥ viśvāḥ adevīḥ abhi santu māyāḥ

original: RV_7,001.10c ye me dhiyam panayanta praśastām //
analyzed: ye me dhiyam panayanta praśastām

original: RV_7,001.11a mā śūne agne ni ṣadāma nṛṇām māśeṣaso 'vīratā pari tvā /
analyzed: mā śūne agne ni sadāma nṛṇām mā a śeṣasaḥ vīra tā pari tvā

original: RV_7,001.11c prajāvatīṣu duryāsu durya //
analyzed: prajāvatīṣu duryāsu durya

original: RV_7,001.12a yam aśvī nityam upayāti yajñam prajāvantaṃ svapatyaṃ kṣayaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: yam aśvī nityam upayāti yajñam prajāvantam su apatyam kṣayam naḥ

original: RV_7,001.12c svajanmanā śeṣasā vāvṛdhānam //
analyzed: sva janmanā śeṣasā vāvṛdhānam

original: RV_7,001.13a pāhi no agne rakṣaso ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrter araruṣo aghāyoḥ /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne rakṣasaḥ ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrteḥ a raruṣaḥ aghāyoḥ

original: RV_7,001.13c tvā yujā pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyām //
analyzed: tvā yujā pṛtanāyūn abhi syām

original: RV_7,001.14a sed agnir agnīṃr aty astv anyān yatra vājī tanayo vīḷupāṇiḥ /
analyzed: sa id agniḥ agnīn ati astu anyān yatra vājī tanayaḥ vīḍu pāṇiḥ

original: RV_7,001.14c sahasrapāthā akṣarā sameti //
analyzed: sahasra pāthāḥ akṣarā sameti

original: RV_7,001.15a sed agnir yo vanuṣyato nipāti sameddhāram aṃhasa uruṣyāt /
analyzed: sa id agniḥ yaḥ vanuṣyataḥ nipāti sameddhāram aṃhasaḥ uruṣyāt

original: RV_7,001.15c sujātāsaḥ pari caranti vīrāḥ //
analyzed: sujātāsaḥ pari caranti vīrāḥ

original: RV_7,001.16a ayaṃ so agnir āhutaḥ purutrā yam īśānaḥ sam id indhe haviṣmān /
analyzed: ayam saḥ agniḥ āhutaḥ purutrā yam īśānaḥ sam id indhe haviṣmān

original: RV_7,001.16c pari yam ety adhvareṣu hotā //
analyzed: pari yam eti adhvareṣu hotā

original: RV_7,001.17a tve agna āhavanāni bhūrīśānāsa ā juhuyāma nityā /
analyzed: tve agne āhavanāni bhūrī īśānāsaḥ ā juhuyāma nityā

original: RV_7,001.17c ubhā kṛṇvanto vahatū miyedhe //
analyzed: ubhā kṛṇvantaḥ vahatū miyedhe

original: RV_7,001.18a imo agne vītatamāni havyājasro vakṣi devatātim accha /
analyzed: imaḥ u agne vītatamāni havyā ajasraḥ vakṣi devatātim accha

original: RV_7,001.18c prati na īṃ surabhīṇi vyantu //
analyzed: prati naḥ īm surabhīṇi vyantu

original: RV_7,001.19a mā no agne 'vīrate parā dā durvāsase 'mataye mā no asyai /
analyzed: mā naḥ agne vīra te parā dāḥ durvāsase mataye mā naḥ asyai

original: RV_7,001.19c mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣasa ṛtāvo mā no dame mā vana ā juhūrthāḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣase ṛtāvaḥ mā naḥ dame mā vane ā juhūrthāḥ

original: RV_7,001.20a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ /
analyzed: nu me brahmāṇi agne ud śaśādhi tvam deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ

original: RV_7,001.20c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: rātau syāma ubhayāsaḥ ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,001.21a tvam agne suhavo raṇvasaṃdṛk sudītī sūno sahaso didīhi /
analyzed: tvam agne su havaḥ raṇva saṃdṛś su dītī sūno sahasaḥ didīhi

original: RV_7,001.21c mā tve sacā tanaye nitya ā dhaṅ mā vīro asman naryo vi dāsīt //
analyzed: mā tve sacā tanaye nitye ā dhak mā vīraḥ asmat naryaḥ vi dāsīt

original: RV_7,001.22a mā no agne durbhṛtaye sacaiṣu deveddheṣv agniṣu pra vocaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ agne durbhṛtaye sacā eṣu deva iddheṣu agniṣu pra vocaḥ

original: RV_7,001.22c mā te asmān durmatayo bhṛmāc cid devasya sūno sahaso naśanta //
analyzed: mā te asmān durmatayaḥ bhṛmāt cit devasya sūno sahasaḥ naśanta

original: RV_7,001.23a sa marto agne svanīka revān amartye ya ājuhoti havyam /
analyzed: sa martaḥ agne su anīka revān amartye yaḥ ājuhoti havyam

original: RV_7,001.23c sa devatā vasuvaniṃ dadhāti yaṃ sūrir arthī pṛcchamāna eti //
analyzed: sa devatā vasu vanim dadhāti yam sūriḥ arthī pṛcchamānaḥ eti

original: RV_7,001.24a maho no agne suvitasya vidvān rayiṃ sūribhya ā vahā bṛhantam /
analyzed: mahaḥ naḥ agne suvitasya vidvān rayim sūribhyaḥ ā vaha bṛhantam

original: RV_7,001.24c yena vayaṃ sahasāvan mademāvikṣitāsa āyuṣā suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: yena vayam sahasāvat madema a vikṣitāsaḥ āyuṣā su vīrāḥ

original: RV_7,001.25a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ /
analyzed: nu me brahmāṇi agne ud śaśādhi tvam deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ

original: RV_7,001.25c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: rātau syāma ubhayāsaḥ ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,002.01a juṣasva naḥ samidham agne adya śocā bṛhad yajataṃ dhūmam ṛṇvan /
analyzed: juṣasva naḥ samidham agne adya śoca bṛhat yajatam dhūmam ṛṇvan

original: RV_7,002.01c upa spṛśa divyaṃ sānu stūpaiḥ saṃ raśmibhis tatanaḥ sūryasya //
analyzed: upa spṛśa divyam sānu stūpaiḥ sam raśmibhiḥ tatanaḥ sūryasya

original: RV_7,002.02a narāśaṃsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ /
analyzed: narāśaṃsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ

original: RV_7,002.02c ye sukratavaḥ śucayo dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devā ubhayāni havyā //
analyzed: ye su kratavaḥ śucayaḥ dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devāḥ ubhayāni havyā

original: RV_7,002.03a īḷenyaṃ vo asuraṃ sudakṣam antar dūtaṃ rodasī satyavācam /
analyzed: īḍenyam vaḥ asuram su dakṣam antar dūtam rodasī satya vācam

original: RV_7,002.03c manuṣvad agnim manunā samiddhaṃ sam adhvarāya sadam in mahema //
analyzed: manuṣvat agnim manunā samiddham sam adhvarāya sadam id mahema

original: RV_7,002.04a saparyavo bharamāṇā abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhir agnau /
analyzed: saparyavaḥ bharamāṇāḥ abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhiḥ agnau

original: RV_7,002.04c ājuhvānā ghṛtapṛṣṭham pṛṣadvad adhvaryavo haviṣā marjayadhvam //
analyzed: ājuhvānāḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭham pṛṣadvat adhvaryavaḥ haviṣā marjayadhvam

original: RV_7,002.05a svādhyo vi duro devayanto 'śiśrayū rathayur devatātā /
analyzed: su ādhyaḥ vi duraḥ devayantaḥ śiśrayuḥ rathayuḥ devatātā

original: RV_7,002.05c pūrvī śiśuṃ na mātarā rihāṇe sam agruvo na samaneṣv añjan //
analyzed: pūrvī śiśum na mātarā rihāṇe sam agruvaḥ na samaneṣu añjan

original: RV_7,002.06a uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī na uṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ /
analyzed: uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī naḥ uṣāsānaktā sudughā iva dhenuḥ

original: RV_7,002.06c barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām //
analyzed: barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām

original: RV_7,002.07a viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vāṃ jātavedasā yajadhyai /
analyzed: viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vām jātavedasā yajadhyai

original: RV_7,002.07c ūrdhvaṃ no adhvaraṃ kṛtaṃ haveṣu tā deveṣu vanatho vāryāṇi //
analyzed: ūrdhvam naḥ adhvaram kṛtam haveṣu tā deveṣu vanathaḥ vāryāṇi

original: RV_7,002.08a ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ /
analyzed: ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣāḥ iḷā devaiḥ manuṣyebhiḥ agniḥ

original: RV_7,002.08c sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu //
analyzed: sarasvatī sārasvatebhiḥ arvāk tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam sadantu

original: RV_7,002.09a tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva /
analyzed: tat naḥ turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva

original: RV_7,002.09c yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ //
analyzed: yatas vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ su dakṣaḥ yukta grāvā jāyate deva kāmaḥ

original: RV_7,002.10a vanaspate 'va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti /
analyzed: vanaspate vaḥ sṛja upa devān agniḥ haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti

original: RV_7,002.10c sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda //
analyzed: sa id u hotā satyataraḥ yajāti yathā devānām janimāni veda

original: RV_7,002.11a ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ /
analyzed: ā yāhi agne samidhānaḥ arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham turebhiḥ

original: RV_7,002.11c barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
analyzed: barhiḥ naḥ āstām aditiḥ su putrā svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām

original: RV_7,003.01a agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣā yajiṣṭhaṃ dūtam adhvare kṛṇudhvam /
analyzed: agnim vaḥ devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ yajiṣṭham dūtam adhvare kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_7,003.01c yo martyeṣu nidhruvir ṛtāvā tapurmūrdhā ghṛtānnaḥ pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ martyeṣu nidhruviḥ ṛtāvā tapuḥ mūrdhā ghṛta annaḥ pāvakaḥ

original: RV_7,003.02a prothad aśvo na yavase 'viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇād vy asthāt /
analyzed: prothat aśvaḥ na yavase viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇāt vi asthāt

original: RV_7,003.02c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir adha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇam asti //
analyzed: āt asya vātaḥ anu vāti śociḥ adha sma te vrajanam kṛṣṇam asti

original: RV_7,003.03a ud yasya te navajātasya vṛṣṇo 'gne caranty ajarā idhānāḥ /
analyzed: ud yasya te nava jātasya vṛṣṇaḥ gne caranti ajarāḥ idhānāḥ

original: RV_7,003.03c acchā dyām aruṣo dhūma eti saṃ dūto agna īyase hi devān //
analyzed: acchā dyām aruṣaḥ dhūmaḥ eti sam dūtaḥ agne īyase hi devān

original: RV_7,003.04a vi yasya te pṛthivyām pājo aśret tṛṣu yad annā samavṛkta jambhaiḥ /
analyzed: vi yasya te pṛthivyām pājaḥ aśret tṛṣu yat annā samavṛkta jambhaiḥ

original: RV_7,003.04c seneva sṛṣṭā prasitiṣ ṭa eti yavaṃ na dasma juhvā vivekṣi //
analyzed: senā iva sṛṣṭā prasitiḥ te eti yavam na dasma juhvā vivekṣi

original: RV_7,003.05a tam id doṣā tam uṣasi yaviṣṭham agnim atyaṃ na marjayanta naraḥ /
analyzed: tam id doṣā tam uṣasi yaviṣṭham agnim atyam na marjayanta naraḥ

original: RV_7,003.05c niśiśānā atithim asya yonau dīdāya śocir āhutasya vṛṣṇaḥ //
analyzed: niśiśānāḥ atithim asya yonau dīdāya śociḥ āhutasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_7,003.06a susaṃdṛk te svanīka pratīkaṃ vi yad rukmo na rocasa upāke /
analyzed: su saṃdṛś te su anīka pratīkam vi yat rukmaḥ na rocase upāke

original: RV_7,003.06c divo na te tanyatur eti śuṣmaś citro na sūraḥ prati cakṣi bhānum //
analyzed: divaḥ na te tanyatuḥ eti śuṣmaḥ citraḥ na sūraḥ prati cakṣi bhānum

original: RV_7,003.07a yathā vaḥ svāhāgnaye dāśema parīḷābhir ghṛtavadbhiś ca havyaiḥ /
analyzed: yathā vaḥ svāhā agnaye dāśema parīḍābhiḥ ghṛtavadbhiḥ ca havyaiḥ

original: RV_7,003.07c tebhir no agne amitair mahobhiḥ śatam pūrbhir āyasībhir ni pāhi //
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ agne amitaiḥ mahobhiḥ śatam pūrbhiḥ āyasībhiḥ ni pāhi

original: RV_7,003.08a yā vā te santi dāśuṣe adhṛṣṭā giro vā yābhir nṛvatīr uruṣyāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ vā te santi dāśuṣe adhṛṣṭāḥ giraḥ vā yābhiḥ nṛvatīḥ uruṣyāḥ

original: RV_7,003.08c tābhir naḥ sūno sahaso ni pāhi smat sūrīñ jaritṝñ jātavedaḥ //
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ sūno sahasaḥ ni pāhi smat sūrīm jaritṝm jātavedaḥ

original: RV_7,003.09a nir yat pūteva svadhitiḥ śucir gāt svayā kṛpā tanvā rocamānaḥ /
analyzed: niḥ yat pūtā iva svadhitiḥ śuciḥ gāt svayā kṛpā tanvā rocamānaḥ

original: RV_7,003.09c ā yo mātror uśenyo janiṣṭa devayajyāya sukratuḥ pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: ā yaḥ mātroḥ uśenyaḥ janiṣṭa deva yajyāya su kratuḥ pāvakaḥ

original: RV_7,003.10a etā no agne saubhagā didīhy api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema /
analyzed: etā naḥ agne saubhagā didīhi api kratum su cetasam vatema

original: RV_7,003.10c viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: viśvā stotṛbhyaḥ gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,004.01a pra vaḥ śukrāya bhānave bharadhvaṃ havyam matiṃ cāgnaye supūtam /
analyzed: pra vaḥ śukrāya bhānave bharadhvam havyam matim ca agnaye su pūtam

original: RV_7,004.01c yo daivyāni mānuṣā janūṃṣy antar viśvāni vidmanā jigāti //
analyzed: yaḥ daivyāni mānuṣā janūṃṣi antar viśvāni vidmanā jigāti

original: RV_7,004.02a sa gṛtso agnis taruṇaś cid astu yato yaviṣṭho ajaniṣṭa mātuḥ /
analyzed: sa gṛtsaḥ agniḥ taruṇaḥ cit astu yatas yaviṣṭhaḥ ajaniṣṭa mātuḥ

original: RV_7,004.02c saṃ yo vanā yuvate śucidan bhūri cid annā sam id atti sadyaḥ //
analyzed: sam yaḥ vanā yuvate śucidan bhūri cit annā sam id atti sadyas

original: RV_7,004.03a asya devasya saṃsady anīke yam martāsaḥ śyetaṃ jagṛbhre /
analyzed: asya devasya saṃsadi anīke yam martāsaḥ śyetam jagṛbhre

original: RV_7,004.03c ni yo gṛbham pauruṣeyīm uvoca durokam agnir āyave śuśoca //
analyzed: ni yaḥ gṛbham pauruṣeyīm uvoca durokam agniḥ āyave śuśoca

original: RV_7,004.04a ayaṃ kavir akaviṣu pracetā marteṣv agnir amṛto ni dhāyi /
analyzed: ayam kaviḥ akaviṣu pracetāḥ marteṣu agniḥ amṛtaḥ ni dhāyi

original: RV_7,004.04c sa mā no atra juhuraḥ sahasvaḥ sadā tve sumanasaḥ syāma //
analyzed: sa mā naḥ atra juhuraḥ sahasvas sadā tve sumanasaḥ syāma

original: RV_7,004.05a ā yo yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ sasāda kratvā hy agnir amṛtāṃ atārīt /
analyzed: ā yaḥ yonim deva kṛtam sasāda kratvā hi agniḥ amṛtām atārīt

original: RV_7,004.05c tam oṣadhīś ca vaninaś ca garbham bhūmiś ca viśvadhāyasam bibharti //
analyzed: tam oṣadhīḥ ca vaninaḥ ca garbham bhūmiḥ ca viśva dhāyasam bibharti

original: RV_7,004.06a īśe hy agnir amṛtasya bhūrer īśe rāyaḥ suvīryasya dātoḥ /
analyzed: īśe hi agniḥ amṛtasya bhūreḥ īśe rāyaḥ su vīryasya dātoḥ

original: RV_7,004.06c mā tvā vayaṃ sahasāvann avīrā māpsavaḥ pari ṣadāma māduvaḥ //
analyzed: mā tvā vayam sahasāvan avīrāḥ mā apsavaḥ pari sadāma mā a duvaḥ

original: RV_7,004.07a pariṣadyaṃ hy araṇasya rekṇo nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma /
analyzed: pariṣadyam hi araṇasya rekṇaḥ nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_7,004.07c na śeṣo agne anyajātam asty acetānasya mā patho vi dukṣaḥ //
analyzed: na śeṣaḥ agne anya jātam asti acetānasya mā pathaḥ vi dukṣaḥ

original: RV_7,004.08a nahi grabhāyāraṇaḥ suśevo 'nyodaryo manasā mantavā u /
analyzed: nahi grabhāya araṇaḥ su śevaḥ nyodaryaḥ manasā mantavai u

original: RV_7,004.08c adhā cid okaḥ punar it sa ety ā no vājy abhīṣāḷ etu navyaḥ //
analyzed: adhā cit okaḥ punar id saḥ eti ā naḥ vājī abhīṣāh etu navyaḥ

original: RV_7,004.09a tvam agne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvann avadyāt /
analyzed: tvam agne vanuṣyataḥ ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvan avadyāt

original: RV_7,004.09c saṃ tvā dhvasmanvad abhy etu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī //
analyzed: sam tvā dhvasmanvat abhī etu pāthaḥ sam rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī

original: RV_7,004.10a etā no agne saubhagā didīhy api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema /
analyzed: etā naḥ agne saubhagā didīhi api kratum su cetasam vatema

original: RV_7,004.10c viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: viśvā stotṛbhyaḥ gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,005.01a prāgnaye tavase bharadhvaṃ giraṃ divo arataye pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: pra agnaye tavase bharadhvam giram divaḥ arataye pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_7,005.01c yo viśveṣām amṛtānām upasthe vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhe jāgṛvadbhiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ viśveṣām amṛtānām upasthe vaiśvānaraḥ vāvṛdhe jāgṛvadbhiḥ

original: RV_7,005.02a pṛṣṭo divi dhāyy agniḥ pṛthivyāṃ netā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām /
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ divi dhāyi agniḥ pṛthivyām netā sindhūnām vṛṣabhaḥ stiyānām

original: RV_7,005.02c sa mānuṣīr abhi viśo vi bhāti vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhāno vareṇa //
analyzed: sa mānuṣīḥ abhi viśaḥ vi bhāti vaiśvānaraḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ vareṇa

original: RV_7,005.03a tvad bhiyā viśa āyann asiknīr asamanā jahatīr bhojanāni /
analyzed: tvat bhiyā viśaḥ āyan asiknīḥ asamanāḥ jahatīḥ bhojanāni

original: RV_7,005.03c vaiśvānara pūrave śośucānaḥ puro yad agne darayann adīdeḥ //
analyzed: vaiśvānara pūrave śośucānaḥ puraḥ yat agne darayan adīdeḥ

original: RV_7,005.04a tava tridhātu pṛthivī uta dyaur vaiśvānara vratam agne sacanta /
analyzed: tava tri dhātu pṛthivī uta dyauḥ vaiśvānara vratam agne sacanta

original: RV_7,005.04c tvam bhāsā rodasī ā tatanthājasreṇa śociṣā śośucānaḥ //
analyzed: tvam bhāsā rodasī ā tatantha ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucānaḥ

original: RV_7,005.05a tvām agne harito vāvaśānā giraḥ sacante dhunayo ghṛtācīḥ /
analyzed: tvām agne haritaḥ vāvaśānāḥ giraḥ sacante dhunayaḥ ghṛtācīḥ

original: RV_7,005.05c patiṃ kṛṣṭīnāṃ rathyaṃ rayīṇāṃ vaiśvānaram uṣasāṃ ketum ahnām //
analyzed: patim kṛṣṭīnām rathyam rayīṇām vaiśvānaram uṣasām ketum ahnām

original: RV_7,005.06a tve asuryaṃ vasavo ny ṛṇvan kratuṃ hi te mitramaho juṣanta /
analyzed: tve asuryam vasavaḥ ni ṛṇvan kratum hi te mitra mahas juṣanta

original: RV_7,005.06c tvaṃ dasyūṃr okaso agna āja uru jyotir janayann āryāya //
analyzed: tvam dasyūṃr okasaḥ agne ājaḥ uru jyotiḥ janayan āryāya

original: RV_7,005.07a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyoman vāyur na pāthaḥ pari pāsi sadyaḥ /
analyzed: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyoman vāyuḥ na pāthaḥ pari pāsi sadyas

original: RV_7,005.07c tvam bhuvanā janayann abhi krann apatyāya jātavedo daśasyan //
analyzed: tvam bhuvanā janayan abhi kran apatyāya jātavedaḥ daśasyan

original: RV_7,005.08a tām agne asme iṣam erayasva vaiśvānara dyumatīṃ jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: tām agne asme iṣam erayasva vaiśvānara dyumatīm jātavedaḥ

original: RV_7,005.08c yayā rādhaḥ pinvasi viśvavāra pṛthu śravo dāśuṣe martyāya //
analyzed: yayā rādhaḥ pinvasi viśva vāra pṛthu śravaḥ dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_7,005.09a taṃ no agne maghavadbhyaḥ purukṣuṃ rayiṃ ni vājaṃ śrutyaṃ yuvasva /
analyzed: tam naḥ agne maghavadbhyaḥ purukṣum rayim ni vājam śrutyam yuvasva

original: RV_7,005.09c vaiśvānara mahi naḥ śarma yaccha rudrebhir agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: vaiśvānara mahi naḥ śarma yaccha rudrebhiḥ agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_7,006.01a pra samrājo asurasya praśastim puṃsaḥ kṛṣṭīnām anumādyasya /
analyzed: pra samrājaḥ asurasya praśastim puṃsaḥ kṛṣṭīnām anumādyasya

original: RV_7,006.01c indrasyeva pra tavasas kṛtāni vande dāruṃ vandamāno vivakmi //
analyzed: indrasya iva pra tavasaḥ kṛtāni vande dārum vandamānaḥ vivakmi

original: RV_7,006.02a kaviṃ ketuṃ dhāsim bhānum adrer hinvanti śaṃ rājyaṃ rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: kavim ketum dhāsim bhānum adreḥ hinvanti śam rājyam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_7,006.02c purandarasya gīrbhir ā vivāse 'gner vratāni pūrvyā mahāni //
analyzed: purandarasya gīrbhiḥ ā vivāse gneḥ vratāni pūrvyā mahāni

original: RV_7,006.03a ny akratūn grathino mṛdhravācaḥ paṇīṃr aśraddhāṃ avṛdhāṃ ayajñān /
analyzed: ni akratūn grathinaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ paṇīṃr aśraddhām a vṛdhām a yajñān

original: RV_7,006.03c pra-pra tān dasyūṃr agnir vivāya pūrvaś cakārāparāṃ ayajyūn //
analyzed: pra pra tān dasyūṃr agniḥ vivāya pūrvaḥ cakāra aparān a yajyūn

original: RV_7,006.04a yo apācīne tamasi madantīḥ prācīś cakāra nṛtamaḥ śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ apācīne tamasi madantīḥ prācīḥ cakāra nṛtamaḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_7,006.04c tam īśānaṃ vasvo agniṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nānataṃ damayantam pṛtanyūn //
analyzed: tam īśānam vasvaḥ agnim gṛṇīṣe nānatam damayantam pṛtanyūn

original: RV_7,006.05a yo dehyo anamayad vadhasnair yo aryapatnīr uṣasaś cakāra /
analyzed: yaḥ dehyaḥ anamayat vadhasnaiḥ yaḥ arya patnīḥ uṣasaḥ cakāra

original: RV_7,006.05c sa nirudhyā nahuṣo yahvo agnir viśaś cakre balihṛtaḥ sahobhiḥ //
analyzed: sa nirudhya nahuṣaḥ yahvaḥ agniḥ viśaḥ cakre bali hṛtaḥ sahobhiḥ

original: RV_7,006.06a yasya śarmann upa viśve janāsa evais tasthuḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: yasya śarman upa viśve janāsaḥ evaiḥ tasthuḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_7,006.06c vaiśvānaro varam ā rodasyor āgniḥ sasāda pitror upastham //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ varam ā rodasyoḥ agniḥ sasāda pitroḥ upastham

original: RV_7,006.07a ā devo dade budhnyā vasūni vaiśvānara uditā sūryasya /
analyzed: ā devaḥ dade budhnyā vasūni vaiśvānaraḥ uditā sūryasya

original: RV_7,006.07c ā samudrād avarād ā parasmād āgnir dade diva ā pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: ā samudrāt avarāt ā parasmāt agniḥ dade divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_7,007.01a pra vo devaṃ cit sahasānam agnim aśvaṃ na vājinaṃ hiṣe namobhiḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ devam cit sahasānam agnim aśvam na vājinam hiṣe namobhiḥ

original: RV_7,007.01c bhavā no dūto adhvarasya vidvān tmanā deveṣu vivide mitadruḥ //
analyzed: bhava naḥ dūtaḥ adhvarasya vidvān tmanā deveṣu vivide mitadruḥ

original: RV_7,007.02a ā yāhy agne pathyā anu svā mandro devānāṃ sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā yāhi agne pathyā anu svā mandraḥ devānām sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_7,007.02c ā sānu śuṣmair nadayan pṛthivyā jambhebhir viśvam uśadhag vanāni //
analyzed: ā sānu śuṣmaiḥ nadayan pṛthivyāḥ jambhebhiḥ viśvam uśadhak vanāni

original: RV_7,007.03a prācīno yajñaḥ sudhitaṃ hi barhiḥ prīṇīte agnir īḷito na hotā /
analyzed: prācīnaḥ yajñaḥ sudhitam hi barhiḥ prīṇīte agniḥ īḍitaḥ na hotā

original: RV_7,007.03c ā mātarā viśvavāre huvāno yato yaviṣṭha jajñiṣe suśevaḥ //
analyzed: ā mātarā viśva vāre huvānaḥ yatas yaviṣṭha jajñiṣe su śevaḥ
