original: RV_7,007.04a sadyo adhvare rathiraṃ jananta mānuṣāso vicetaso ya eṣām /
analyzed: sadyas adhvare rathiram jananta mānuṣāsaḥ vicetasaḥ yaḥ eṣām

original: RV_7,007.04c viśām adhāyi viśpatir duroṇe 'gnir mandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā //
analyzed: viśām adhāyi viśpatiḥ duroṇe gniḥ mandraḥ madhu vacāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_7,007.05a asādi vṛto vahnir ājaganvān agnir brahmā nṛṣadane vidhartā /
analyzed: asādi vṛtaḥ vahniḥ ājaganvān agniḥ brahmā nṛṣadane vidhartā

original: RV_7,007.05c dyauś ca yam pṛthivī vāvṛdhāte ā yaṃ hotā yajati viśvavāram //
analyzed: dyauḥ ca yam pṛthivī vāvṛdhāte ā yam hotā yajati viśva vāram

original: RV_7,007.06a ete dyumnebhir viśvam ātiranta mantraṃ ye vāraṃ naryā atakṣan /
analyzed: ete dyumnebhiḥ viśvam ātiranta mantram ye vāram naryāḥ atakṣan

original: RV_7,007.06c pra ye viśas tiranta śroṣamāṇā ā ye me asya dīdhayann ṛtasya //
analyzed: pra ye viśaḥ tiranta śroṣamāṇāḥ ā ye me asya dīdhayan ṛtasya

original: RV_7,007.07a nū tvām agna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām /
analyzed: nu tvām agne īmahe vasiṣṭhāḥ īśānam sūno sahasaḥ vasūnām

original: RV_7,007.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ ānaṭ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,008.01a indhe rājā sam aryo namobhir yasya pratīkam āhutaṃ ghṛtena /
analyzed: indhe rājā sam aryaḥ namobhiḥ yasya pratīkam āhutam ghṛtena

original: RV_7,008.01c naro havyebhir īḷate sabādha āgnir agra uṣasām aśoci //
analyzed: naraḥ havyebhiḥ īḍate sabādhaḥ ā agniḥ agre uṣasām aśoci

original: RV_7,008.02a ayam u ṣya sumahāṃ avedi hotā mandro manuṣo yahvo agniḥ /
analyzed: ayam u sya su mahān avedi hotā mandraḥ manuṣaḥ yahvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_7,008.02c vi bhā akaḥ sasṛjānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ kṛṣṇapavir oṣadhībhir vavakṣe //
analyzed: vi bhās akaḥ sasṛjānaḥ pṛthivyām kṛṣṇa paviḥ oṣadhībhiḥ vavakṣe

original: RV_7,008.03a kayā no agne vi vasaḥ suvṛktiṃ kām u svadhām ṛṇavaḥ śasyamānaḥ /
analyzed: kayā naḥ agne vi vasaḥ suvṛktim kām u svadhām ṛṇavaḥ śasyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,008.03c kadā bhavema patayaḥ sudatra rāyo vantāro duṣṭarasya sādhoḥ //
analyzed: kadā bhavema patayaḥ su datra rāyaḥ vantāraḥ duṣṭarasya sādhoḥ

original: RV_7,008.04a pra-prāyam agnir bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryo na rocate bṛhad bhāḥ /
analyzed: pra pra ayam agniḥ bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryaḥ na rocate bṛhat bhās

original: RV_7,008.04c abhi yaḥ pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthau dyutāno daivyo atithiḥ śuśoca //
analyzed: abhi yaḥ pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthau dyutānaḥ daivyaḥ atithiḥ śuśoca

original: RV_7,008.05a asann it tve āhavanāni bhūri bhuvo viśvebhiḥ sumanā anīkaiḥ /
analyzed: asan id tve āhavanāni bhūri bhuvaḥ viśvebhiḥ sumanāḥ anīkaiḥ

original: RV_7,008.05c stutaś cid agne śṛṇviṣe gṛṇānaḥ svayaṃ vardhasva tanvaṃ sujāta //
analyzed: stutaḥ cit agne śṛṇviṣe gṛṇānaḥ svayam vardhasva tanvam su jāta

original: RV_7,008.06a idaṃ vacaḥ śatasāḥ saṃsahasram ud agnaye janiṣīṣṭa dvibarhāḥ /
analyzed: idam vacaḥ śata sāḥ saṃsahasram ud agnaye janiṣīṣṭa dvibarhāḥ

original: RV_7,008.06c śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavāti dyumad amīvacātanaṃ rakṣohā //
analyzed: śam yat stotṛbhyaḥ āpaye bhavāti dyumat amīva cātanam rakṣaḥ hā

original: RV_7,008.07a nū tvām agna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām /
analyzed: nu tvām agne īmahe vasiṣṭhāḥ īśānam sūno sahasaḥ vasūnām

original: RV_7,008.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ ānaṭ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,009.01a abodhi jāra uṣasām upasthād dhotā mandraḥ kavitamaḥ pāvakaḥ /
analyzed: abodhi jāraḥ uṣasām upasthāt hotā mandraḥ kavitamaḥ pāvakaḥ

original: RV_7,009.01c dadhāti ketum ubhayasya jantor havyā deveṣu draviṇaṃ sukṛtsu //
analyzed: dadhāti ketum ubhayasya jantoḥ havyā deveṣu draviṇam sukṛtsu

original: RV_7,009.02a sa sukratur yo vi duraḥ paṇīnām punāno arkam purubhojasaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: sa su kratuḥ yaḥ vi duraḥ paṇīnām punānaḥ arkam puru bhojasam naḥ

original: RV_7,009.02c hotā mandro viśāṃ damūnās tiras tamo dadṛśe rāmyāṇām //
analyzed: hotā mandraḥ viśām damūnāḥ tiras tamaḥ dadṛśe rāmyāṇām

original: RV_7,009.03a amūraḥ kavir aditir vivasvān susaṃsan mitro atithiḥ śivo naḥ /
analyzed: amūraḥ kaviḥ aditiḥ vivasvān su saṃsad mitraḥ atithiḥ śivaḥ naḥ

original: RV_7,009.03c citrabhānur uṣasām bhāty agre 'pāṃ garbhaḥ prasva ā viveśa //
analyzed: citra bhānuḥ uṣasām bhāti agre pām garbhaḥ prasvaḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_7,009.04a īḷenyo vo manuṣo yugeṣu samanagā aśucaj jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ vaḥ manuṣaḥ yugeṣu samana gāḥ aśucat jātavedāḥ

original: RV_7,009.04c susaṃdṛśā bhānunā yo vibhāti prati gāvaḥ samidhānam budhanta //
analyzed: su saṃdṛśā bhānunā yaḥ vibhāti prati gāvaḥ samidhānam budhanta

original: RV_7,009.05a agne yāhi dūtyam mā riṣaṇyo devāṃ acchā brahmakṛtā gaṇena /
analyzed: agne yāhi dūtyam mā riṣaṇyaḥ devān acchā brahma kṛtā gaṇena

original: RV_7,009.05c sarasvatīm maruto aśvināpo yakṣi devān ratnadheyāya viśvān //
analyzed: sarasvatīm marutaḥ aśvinā apaḥ yakṣi devān ratna dheyāya viśvān

original: RV_7,009.06a tvām agne samidhāno vasiṣṭho jarūthaṃ han yakṣi rāye purandhim /
analyzed: tvām agne samidhānaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ jarūtham han yakṣi rāye purandhim

original: RV_7,009.06c puruṇīthā jātavedo jarasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: puruṇīthā jātavedaḥ jarasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,010.01a uṣo na jāraḥ pṛthu pājo aśred davidyutad dīdyac chośucānaḥ /
analyzed: uṣaḥ na jāraḥ pṛthu pājaḥ aśret davidyutat dīdyat śośucānaḥ

original: RV_7,010.01c vṛṣā hariḥ śucir ā bhāti bhāsā dhiyo hinvāna uśatīr ajīgaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā hariḥ śuciḥ ā bhāti bhāsā dhiyaḥ hinvānaḥ uśatīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_7,010.02a svar ṇa vastor uṣasām aroci yajñaṃ tanvānā uśijo na manma /
analyzed: svar na vastoḥ uṣasām aroci yajñam tanvānāḥ uśijaḥ na manma

original: RV_7,010.02c agnir janmāni deva ā vi vidvān dravad dūto devayāvā vaniṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ janmāni devaḥ ā vi vidvān dravat dūtaḥ deva yāvā vaniṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,010.03a acchā giro matayo devayantīr agniṃ yanti draviṇam bhikṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: acchā giraḥ matayaḥ devayantīḥ agnim yanti draviṇam bhikṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_7,010.03c susaṃdṛśaṃ supratīkaṃ svañcaṃ havyavāham aratim mānuṣāṇām //
analyzed: su saṃdṛśam su pratīkam svañcam havyavāham aratim mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_7,010.04a indraṃ no agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣā rudraṃ rudrebhir ā vahā bṛhantam /
analyzed: indram naḥ agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ rudram rudrebhiḥ ā vaha bṛhantam

original: RV_7,010.04c ādityebhir aditiṃ viśvajanyām bṛhaspatim ṛkvabhir viśvavāram //
analyzed: ādityebhiḥ aditim viśvajanyām bṛhaspatim ṛkvabhiḥ viśva vāram

original: RV_7,010.05a mandraṃ hotāram uśijo yaviṣṭham agniṃ viśa īḷate adhvareṣu /
analyzed: mandram hotāram uśijaḥ yaviṣṭham agnim viśaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu

original: RV_7,010.05c sa hi kṣapāvāṃ abhavad rayīṇām atandro dūto yajathāya devān //
analyzed: sa hi kṣapāvān abhavat rayīṇām atandraḥ dūtaḥ yajathāya devān

original: RV_7,011.01a mahāṃ asy adhvarasya praketo na ṛte tvad amṛtā mādayante /
analyzed: mahān asi adhvarasya praketaḥ na ṛte tvat amṛtāḥ mādayante

original: RV_7,011.01c ā viśvebhiḥ sarathaṃ yāhi devair ny agne hotā prathamaḥ sadeha //
analyzed: ā viśvebhiḥ sa ratham yāhi devaiḥ ni agne hotā prathamaḥ sadā iha

original: RV_7,011.02a tvām īḷate ajiraṃ dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ sadam in mānuṣāsaḥ /
analyzed: tvām īḍate ajiram dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ sadam id mānuṣāsaḥ

original: RV_7,011.02c yasya devair āsado barhir agne 'hāny asmai sudinā bhavanti //
analyzed: yasya devaiḥ āsadaḥ barhiḥ agne hāni asmai su dināḥ bhavanti

original: RV_7,011.03a triś cid aktoḥ pra cikitur vasūni tve antar dāśuṣe martyāya /
analyzed: tris cit aktoḥ pra cikituḥ vasūni tve antar dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_7,011.03c manuṣvad agna iha yakṣi devān bhavā no dūto abhiśastipāvā //
analyzed: manuṣvat agne iha yakṣi devān bhava naḥ dūtaḥ abhiśasti pāvā

original: RV_7,011.04a agnir īśe bṛhato adhvarasyāgnir viśvasya haviṣaḥ kṛtasya /
analyzed: agniḥ īśe bṛhataḥ adhvarasya agniḥ viśvasya haviṣaḥ kṛtasya

original: RV_7,011.04c kratuṃ hy asya vasavo juṣantāthā devā dadhire havyavāham //
analyzed: kratum hi asya vasavaḥ juṣanta athā devāḥ dadhire havyavāham

original: RV_7,011.05a āgne vaha haviradyāya devān indrajyeṣṭhāsa iha mādayantām /
analyzed: ā agne vaha haviḥ adyāya devān indra jyeṣṭhāsaḥ iha mādayantām

original: RV_7,011.05c imaṃ yajñaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: imam yajñam divi deveṣu dhehi yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,012.01a aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭhaṃ yo dīdāya samiddhaḥ sve duroṇe /
analyzed: aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭham yaḥ dīdāya samiddhaḥ sve duroṇe

original: RV_7,012.01c citrabhānuṃ rodasī antar urvī svāhutaṃ viśvataḥ pratyañcam //
analyzed: citra bhānum rodasī antar urvī su āhutam viśvatas pratyañcam

original: RV_7,012.02a sa mahnā viśvā duritāni sāhvān agni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: sa mahnā viśvā duritāni sāhvān agni stave dame ā jātavedāḥ

original: RV_7,012.02c sa no rakṣiṣad duritād avadyād asmān gṛṇata uta no maghonaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣiṣat duritāt avadyāt asmān gṛṇataḥ uta naḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_7,012.03a tvaṃ varuṇa uta mitro agne tvāṃ vardhanti matibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: tvam varuṇaḥ uta mitraḥ agne tvām vardhanti matibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,012.03c tve vasu suṣaṇanāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: tve vasu suṣaṇanāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,013.01a prāgnaye viśvaśuce dhiyandhe 'suraghne manma dhītim bharadhvam /
analyzed: pra agnaye viśva śuce dhiyandhe sura ghne manma dhītim bharadhvam

original: RV_7,013.01c bhare havir na barhiṣi prīṇāno vaiśvānarāya yataye matīnām //
analyzed: bhare haviḥ na barhiṣi prīṇānaḥ vaiśvānarāya yataye matīnām

original: RV_7,013.02a tvam agne śociṣā śośucāna ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamānaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne śociṣā śośucānaḥ ā rodasī apṛṇāḥ jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,013.02c tvaṃ devāṃ abhiśaster amuñco vaiśvānara jātavedo mahitvā //
analyzed: tvam devān abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ vaiśvānara jātavedaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_7,013.03a jāto yad agne bhuvanā vy akhyaḥ paśūn na gopā iryaḥ parijmā /
analyzed: jātaḥ yat agne bhuvanā vi akhyaḥ paśūn na gopāḥ iryaḥ parijmā

original: RV_7,013.03c vaiśvānara brahmaṇe vinda gātuṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vaiśvānara brahmaṇe vinda gātum yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,014.01a samidhā jātavedase devāya devahūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: samidhā jātavedase devāya deva hūtibhiḥ

original: RV_7,014.01c havirbhiḥ śukraśociṣe namasvino vayaṃ dāśemāgnaye //
analyzed: havirbhiḥ śukra śociṣe namasvinaḥ vayam dāśema agnaye

original: RV_7,014.02a vayaṃ te agne samidhā vidhema vayaṃ dāśema suṣṭutī yajatra /
analyzed: vayam te agne samidhā vidhema vayam dāśema suṣṭutī yajatra

original: RV_7,014.02c vayaṃ ghṛtenādhvarasya hotar vayaṃ deva haviṣā bhadraśoce //
analyzed: vayam ghṛtena adhvarasya hotar vayam deva haviṣā bhadra śoce

original: RV_7,014.03a ā no devebhir upa devahūtim agne yāhi vaṣaṭkṛtiṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ devebhiḥ upa deva hūtim agne yāhi vaṣaṭkṛtim juṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_7,014.03c tubhyaṃ devāya dāśataḥ syāma yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: tubhyam devāya dāśataḥ syāma yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,015.01a upasadyāya mīḷhuṣa āsye juhutā haviḥ /
analyzed: upasadyāya mīḍhuṣe āsye juhuta haviḥ

original: RV_7,015.01c yo no nediṣṭham āpyam //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ nediṣṭham āpyam

original: RV_7,015.02a yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi niṣasāda dame-dame /
analyzed: yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīḥ abhi niṣasāda damedame

original: RV_7,015.02c kavir gṛhapatir yuvā //
analyzed: kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā

original: RV_7,015.03a sa no vedo amātyam agnī rakṣatu viśvataḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ vedaḥ amātyam agniḥ rakṣatu viśvatas

original: RV_7,015.03c utāsmān pātv aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: uta asmān pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_7,015.04a navaṃ nu stomam agnaye divaḥ śyenāya jījanam /
analyzed: navam nu stomam agnaye divaḥ śyenāya jījanam

original: RV_7,015.04c vasvaḥ kuvid vanāti naḥ //
analyzed: vasvaḥ kuvid vanāti naḥ

original: RV_7,015.05a spārhā yasya śriyo dṛśe rayir vīravato yathā /
analyzed: spārhāḥ yasya śriyaḥ dṛśe rayiḥ vīravataḥ yathā

original: RV_7,015.05c agre yajñasya śocataḥ //
analyzed: agre yajñasya śocataḥ

original: RV_7,015.06a semāṃ vetu vaṣaṭkṛtim agnir juṣata no giraḥ /
analyzed: sā imām vetu vaṣaṭkṛtim agniḥ juṣata naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_7,015.06c yajiṣṭho havyavāhanaḥ //
analyzed: yajiṣṭhaḥ havyavāhanaḥ

original: RV_7,015.07a ni tvā nakṣya viśpate dyumantaṃ deva dhīmahi /
analyzed: ni tvā nakṣya viśpate dyumantam deva dhīmahi

original: RV_7,015.07c suvīram agna āhuta //
analyzed: su vīram agne āhuta

original: RV_7,015.08a kṣapa usraś ca dīdihi svagnayas tvayā vayam /
analyzed: kṣapaḥ usraḥ ca dīdihi su agnayaḥ tvayā vayam

original: RV_7,015.08c suvīras tvam asmayuḥ //
analyzed: su vīraḥ tvam asmayuḥ

original: RV_7,015.09a upa tvā sātaye naro viprāso yanti dhītibhiḥ /
analyzed: upa tvā sātaye naraḥ viprāsaḥ yanti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_7,015.09c upākṣarā sahasriṇī //
analyzed: upa akṣarā sahasriṇī

original: RV_7,015.10a agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukra śociḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_7,015.10c śuciḥ pāvaka īḍyaḥ //
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_7,015.11a sa no rādhāṃsy ā bhareśānaḥ sahaso yaho /
analyzed: sa naḥ rādhāṃsi ā bhara īśānaḥ sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_7,015.11c bhagaś ca dātu vāryam //
analyzed: bhagaḥ ca dātu vāryam

original: RV_7,015.12a tvam agne vīravad yaśo devaś ca savitā bhagaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne vīravat yaśaḥ devaḥ ca savitā bhagaḥ

original: RV_7,015.12c ditiś ca dāti vāryam //
analyzed: ditiḥ ca dāti vāryam

original: RV_7,015.13a agne rakṣā ṇo aṃhasaḥ prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ /
analyzed: agne rakṣa naḥ aṃhasaḥ prati sma deva rīṣataḥ

original: RV_7,015.13c tapiṣṭhair ajaro daha //
analyzed: tapiṣṭhaiḥ ajaraḥ daha

original: RV_7,015.14a adhā mahī na āyasy anādhṛṣṭo nṛpītaye /
analyzed: adhā mahī naḥ āyasī anādhṛṣṭaḥ nṛ pītaye

original: RV_7,015.14c pūr bhavā śatabhujiḥ //
analyzed: pūḥ bhava śata bhujiḥ

original: RV_7,015.15a tvaṃ naḥ pāhy aṃhaso doṣāvastar aghāyataḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ doṣāvastar aghāyataḥ

original: RV_7,015.15c divā naktam adābhya //
analyzed: divā naktam adābhya

original: RV_7,016.01a enā vo agniṃ namasorjo napātam ā huve /
analyzed: enā vaḥ agnim namasā ūrjaḥ napātam ā huve

original: RV_7,016.01c priyaṃ cetiṣṭham aratiṃ svadhvaraṃ viśvasya dūtam amṛtam //
analyzed: priyam cetiṣṭham aratim su adhvaram viśvasya dūtam amṛtam

original: RV_7,016.02a sa yojate aruṣā viśvabhojasā sa dudravat svāhutaḥ /
analyzed: sa yojate aruṣā viśva bhojasā sa dudravat su āhutaḥ

original: RV_7,016.02c subrahmā yajñaḥ suśamī vasūnāṃ devaṃ rādho janānām //
analyzed: su brahmā yajñaḥ suśamī vasūnām devam rādhaḥ janānām

original: RV_7,016.03a ud asya śocir asthād ājuhvānasya mīḷhuṣaḥ /
analyzed: ud asya śociḥ asthāt ājuhvānasya mīḍhuṣaḥ

original: RV_7,016.03c ud dhūmāso aruṣāso divispṛśaḥ sam agnim indhate naraḥ //
analyzed: ud dhūmāsaḥ aruṣāsaḥ divispṛśaḥ sam agnim indhate naraḥ

original: RV_7,016.04a taṃ tvā dūtaṃ kṛṇmahe yaśastamaṃ devāṃ ā vītaye vaha /
analyzed: tam tvā dūtam kṛṇmahe yaśastamam devān ā vītaye vaha

original: RV_7,016.04c viśvā sūno sahaso martabhojanā rāsva tad yat tvemahe //
analyzed: viśvā sūno sahasaḥ marta bhojanā rāsva tat yat tvā īmahe

original: RV_7,016.05a tvam agne gṛhapatis tvaṃ hotā no adhvare /
analyzed: tvam agne gṛhapatiḥ tvam hotā naḥ adhvare

original: RV_7,016.05c tvam potā viśvavāra pracetā yakṣi veṣi ca vāryam //
analyzed: tvam potā viśva vāra pracetāḥ yakṣi veṣi ca vāryam

original: RV_7,016.06a kṛdhi ratnaṃ yajamānāya sukrato tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi /
analyzed: kṛdhi ratnam yajamānāya su krato tvam hi ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_7,016.06c ā na ṛte śiśīhi viśvam ṛtvijaṃ suśaṃso yaś ca dakṣate //
analyzed: ā naḥ ṛte śiśīhi viśvam ṛtvijam su śaṃsaḥ yaḥ ca dakṣate

original: RV_7,016.07a tve agne svāhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tve agne su āhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ

original: RV_7,016.07c yantāro ye maghavāno janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām //
analyzed: yantāraḥ ye maghavānaḥ janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām

original: RV_7,016.08a yeṣām iḷā ghṛtahastā duroṇa āṃ api prātā niṣīdati /
analyzed: yeṣām iḷā ghṛta hastā duroṇe ām api prātā niṣīdati

original: RV_7,016.08c tāṃs trāyasva sahasya druho nido yacchā naḥ śarma dīrghaśrut //
analyzed: tān trāyasva sahasya druhaḥ nidaḥ yaccha naḥ śarma dīrgha śrut

original: RV_7,016.09a sa mandrayā ca jihvayā vahnir āsā viduṣṭaraḥ /
analyzed: sa mandrayā ca jihvayā vahniḥ āsā viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_7,016.09c agne rayim maghavadbhyo na ā vaha havyadātiṃ ca sūdaya //
analyzed: agne rayim maghavadbhyaḥ naḥ ā vaha havya dātim ca sūdaya

original: RV_7,016.10a ye rādhāṃsi dadaty aśvyā maghā kāmena śravaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: ye rādhāṃsi dadati aśvyā maghā kāmena śravasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_7,016.10c tāṃ aṃhasaḥ pipṛhi partṛbhiṣ ṭvaṃ śatam pūrbhir yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: tām aṃhasaḥ pipṛhi partṛbhiḥ tvam śatam pūrbhiḥ yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_7,016.11a devo vo draviṇodāḥ pūrṇāṃ vivaṣṭy āsicam /
analyzed: devaḥ vaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ pūrṇām vivaṣṭi āsicam

original: RV_7,016.11c ud vā siñcadhvam upa vā pṛṇadhvam ād id vo deva ohate //
analyzed: ud vā siñcadhvam upa vā pṛṇadhvam āt id vaḥ devaḥ ohate

original: RV_7,016.12a taṃ hotāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ vahniṃ devā akṛṇvata /
analyzed: tam hotāram adhvarasya pracetasam vahnim devāḥ akṛṇvata

original: RV_7,016.12c dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate suvīryam agnir janāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: dadhāti ratnam vidhate su vīryam agniḥ janāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_7,017.01 agne bhava suṣamidhā samiddha uta barhir urviyā vi stṛṇītām //
analyzed: agne bhava suṣamidhā samiddhaḥ uta barhiḥ urviyā vi stṛṇītām

original: RV_7,017.02 uta dvāra uśatīr vi śrayantām uta devāṃ uśata ā vaheha //
analyzed: uta dvāraḥ uśatīḥ vi śrayantām uta devān uśataḥ ā vaha iha

original: RV_7,017.03 agne vīhi haviṣā yakṣi devān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ //
analyzed: agne vīhi haviṣā yakṣi devān su adhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_7,017.04 svadhvarā karati jātavedā yakṣad devāṃ amṛtān piprayac ca //
analyzed: su adhvarā karati jātavedāḥ yakṣat devān amṛtān piprayat ca

original: RV_7,017.05 vaṃsva viśvā vāryāṇi pracetaḥ satyā bhavantv āśiṣo no adya //
analyzed: vaṃsva viśvā vāryāṇi pracetaḥ satyāḥ bhavantu āśiṣaḥ naḥ adya

original: RV_7,017.06 tvām u te dadhire havyavāhaṃ devāso agna ūrja ā napātam //
analyzed: tvām u te dadhire havyavāham devāsaḥ agne ūrjaḥ ā napātam

original: RV_7,017.07 te te devāya dāśataḥ syāma maho no ratnā vi dadha iyānaḥ //
analyzed: te te devāya dāśataḥ syāma mahaḥ naḥ ratnā vi dadhe iyānaḥ

original: RV_7,018.01a tve ha yat pitaraś cin na indra viśvā vāmā jaritāro asanvan /
analyzed: tve ha yat pitaraḥ cit naḥ indra viśvā vāmā jaritāraḥ asanvan

original: RV_7,018.01c tve gāvaḥ sudughās tve hy aśvās tvaṃ vasu devayate vaniṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: tve gāvaḥ su dughāḥ tve hi aśvāḥ tvam vasu devayate vaniṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,018.02a rājeva hi janibhiḥ kṣeṣy evāva dyubhir abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san /
analyzed: rājā iva hi janibhiḥ kṣeṣi eva ava dyubhiḥ abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san

original: RV_7,018.02c piśā giro maghavan gobhir aśvais tvāyataḥ śiśīhi rāye asmān //
analyzed: piśa giraḥ maghavan gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ tvāyataḥ śiśīhi rāye asmān

original: RV_7,018.03a imā u tvā paspṛdhānāso atra mandrā giro devayantīr upa sthuḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā paspṛdhānāsaḥ atra mandrāḥ giraḥ devayantīḥ upa sthuḥ

original: RV_7,018.03c arvācī te pathyā rāya etu syāma te sumatāv indra śarman //
analyzed: arvācī te pathyā rāyaḥ etu syāma te sumatau indra śarman

original: RV_7,018.04a dhenuṃ na tvā sūyavase dudukṣann upa brahmāṇi sasṛje vasiṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: dhenum na tvā sūyavase dudukṣan upa brahmāṇi sasṛje vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,018.04c tvām in me gopatiṃ viśva āhā na indraḥ sumatiṃ gantv accha //
analyzed: tvām id me gopatim viśve āha ā naḥ indraḥ sumatim gantu accha

original: RV_7,018.05a arṇāṃsi cit paprathānā sudāsa indro gādhāny akṛṇot supārā /
analyzed: arṇāṃsi cit paprathānā sudāse indraḥ gādhāni akṛṇot su pārā

original: RV_7,018.05c śardhantaṃ śimyum ucathasya navyaḥ śāpaṃ sindhūnām akṛṇod aśastīḥ //
analyzed: śardhantam śimyum ucathasya navyaḥ śāpam sindhūnām akṛṇot aśastīḥ

original: RV_7,018.06a puroḷā it turvaśo yakṣur āsīd rāye matsyāso niśitā apīva /
analyzed: puroḷās id turvaśaḥ yakṣuḥ āsīt rāye matsyāsaḥ niśitāḥ api iva

original: RV_7,018.06c śruṣṭiṃ cakrur bhṛgavo druhyavaś ca sakhā sakhāyam atarad viṣūcoḥ //
analyzed: śruṣṭim cakruḥ bhṛgavaḥ druhyavaḥ ca sakhā sakhāyam atarat viṣūcoḥ

original: RV_7,018.07a ā pakthāso bhalānaso bhanantālināso viṣāṇinaḥ śivāsaḥ /
analyzed: ā pakthāsaḥ bhalānasaḥ viṣāṇinaḥ śivāsaḥ

original: RV_7,018.07c ā yo 'nayat sadhamā āryasya gavyā tṛtsubhyo ajagan yudhā nṝn //
analyzed: ā yaḥ nayat sadhamāḥ āryasya gavyā tṛtsubhyaḥ ajagan yudhā nṝn

original: RV_7,018.08a durādhyo aditiṃ srevayanto 'cetaso vi jagṛbhre paruṣṇīm /
analyzed: durādhyaḥ aditim srevayantaḥ cetasaḥ vi jagṛbhre paruṣṇīm

original: RV_7,018.08c mahnāvivyak pṛthivīm patyamānaḥ paśuṣ kavir aśayac cāyamānaḥ //
analyzed: mahnā avivyak pṛthivīm patyamānaḥ paśuḥ kaviḥ aśayat cāyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,018.09a īyur arthaṃ na nyartham paruṣṇīm āśuś caned abhipitvaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: īyuḥ artham na nyartham paruṣṇīm āśuḥ cana id abhipitvam jagāma

original: RV_7,018.09c sudāsa indraḥ sutukāṃ amitrān arandhayan mānuṣe vadhrivācaḥ //
analyzed: sudāse indraḥ sutukām amitrān arandhayat mānuṣe vadhri vācaḥ

original: RV_7,018.10a īyur gāvo na yavasād agopā yathākṛtam abhi mitraṃ citāsaḥ /
analyzed: īyuḥ gāvaḥ na yavasāt agopāḥ yathākṛtam abhi mitram citāsaḥ

original: RV_7,018.10c pṛśnigāvaḥ pṛśninipreṣitāsaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakrur niyuto rantayaś ca //
analyzed: pṛśni gāvaḥ pṛśni nipreṣitāsaḥ śruṣṭim cakruḥ niyutaḥ rantayaḥ ca

original: RV_7,018.11a ekaṃ ca yo viṃśatiṃ ca śravasyā vaikarṇayor janān rājā ny astaḥ /
analyzed: ekam ca yaḥ viṃśatim ca śravasyā vaikarṇayoḥ janān rājā ni astaḥ

original: RV_7,018.11c dasmo na sadman ni śiśāti barhiḥ śūraḥ sargam akṛṇod indra eṣām //
analyzed: dasmaḥ na sadman ni śiśāti barhiḥ śūraḥ sargam akṛṇot indraḥ eṣām

original: RV_7,018.12a adha śrutaṃ kavaṣaṃ vṛddham apsv anu druhyuṃ ni vṛṇag vajrabāhuḥ /
analyzed: adha śrutam kavaṣam vṛddham apsu anu druhyum ni vṛṇak vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_7,018.12c vṛṇānā atra sakhyāya sakhyaṃ tvāyanto ye amadann anu tvā //
analyzed: vṛṇānāḥ atra sakhyāya sakhyam tvāyantaḥ ye amadan anu tvā

original: RV_7,018.13a vi sadyo viśvā dṛṃhitāny eṣām indraḥ puraḥ sahasā sapta dardaḥ /
analyzed: vi sadyas viśvā dṛṃhitāni eṣām indraḥ puraḥ sahasā sapta dardar

original: RV_7,018.13c vy ānavasya tṛtsave gayam bhāg jeṣma pūruṃ vidathe mṛdhravācam //
analyzed: vi ānavasya tṛtsave gayam bhāk jeṣma pūrum vidathe mṛdhra vācam

original: RV_7,018.14a ni gavyavo 'navo druhyavaś ca ṣaṣṭiḥ śatā suṣupuḥ ṣaṭ sahasrā /
analyzed: ni gavyavaḥ navaḥ druhyavaḥ ca ṣaṣṭiḥ śatā suṣupuḥ ṣaḍ sahasrā

original: RV_7,018.14c ṣaṣṭir vīrāso adhi ṣaḍ duvoyu viśved indrasya vīryā kṛtāni //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ vīrāsaḥ adhi ṣaṣ duvoyu viśvā id indrasya vīryā kṛtāni

original: RV_7,018.15a indreṇaite tṛtsavo veviṣāṇā āpo na sṛṣṭā adhavanta nīcīḥ /
analyzed: indreṇa ete tṛtsavaḥ veviṣāṇāḥ āpaḥ na sṛṣṭāḥ adhavanta nīcīḥ

original: RV_7,018.15c durmitrāsaḥ prakalavin mimānā jahur viśvāni bhojanā sudāse //
analyzed: durmitrāsaḥ prakala vid mimānāḥ jahuḥ viśvāni bhojanā sudāse

original: RV_7,018.16a ardhaṃ vīrasya śṛtapām anindram parā śardhantaṃ nunude abhi kṣām /
analyzed: ardham vīrasya śṛta pām an indram parā śardhantam nunude abhi kṣām

original: RV_7,018.16c indro manyum manyumyo mimāya bheje patho vartanim patyamānaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ manyum manyumyaḥ mimāya bheje pathaḥ vartanim patyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,018.17a ādhreṇa cit tad v ekaṃ cakāra siṃhyaṃ cit petvenā jaghāna /
analyzed: ādhreṇa cit tat u ekam cakāra siṃhyam cit petvena ā jaghāna

original: RV_7,018.17c ava sraktīr veśyāvṛścad indraḥ prāyacchad viśvā bhojanā sudāse //
analyzed: ava sraktīḥ veśyā avṛścat indraḥ prāyacchat viśvā bhojanā sudāse

original: RV_7,018.18a śaśvanto hi śatravo rāradhuṣ ṭe bhedasya cic chardhato vinda randhim /
analyzed: śaśvantaḥ hi śatravaḥ rāradhuḥ ṭe bhedasya cit śardhataḥ vinda randhim

original: RV_7,018.18c martāṃ ena stuvato yaḥ kṛṇoti tigmaṃ tasmin ni jahi vajram indra //
analyzed: martān enā stuvataḥ yaḥ kṛṇoti tigmam tasmin ni jahi vajram indra

original: RV_7,018.19a āvad indraṃ yamunā tṛtsavaś ca prātra bhedaṃ sarvatātā muṣāyat /
analyzed: āvat indram yamunā tṛtsavaḥ ca pra atra bhedam sarvatātā muṣāyat

original: RV_7,018.19c ajāsaś ca śigravo yakṣavaś ca baliṃ śīrṣāṇi jabhrur aśvyāni //
analyzed: ajāsaḥ ca śigravaḥ yakṣavaḥ ca balim śīrṣāṇi jabhruḥ aśvyāni

original: RV_7,018.20a na ta indra sumatayo na rāyaḥ saṃcakṣe pūrvā uṣaso na nūtnāḥ /
analyzed: na te indra sumatayaḥ na rāyaḥ saṃcakṣe pūrvāḥ uṣasaḥ na nūtnāḥ

original: RV_7,018.20c devakaṃ cin mānyamānaṃ jaghanthāva tmanā bṛhataḥ śambaram bhet //
analyzed: devakam cit mānyamānam jaghanthāva tmanā bṛhataḥ śambaram bhet

original: RV_7,018.21a pra ye gṛhād amamadus tvāyā parāśaraḥ śatayātur vasiṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: pra ye gṛhāt amamaduḥ tvāyā parāśaraḥ śata yātuḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,018.21c na te bhojasya sakhyam mṛṣantādhā sūribhyaḥ sudinā vy ucchān //
analyzed: na te bhojasya sakhyam mṛṣanta adhā sūribhyaḥ su dinā vi ucchān

original: RV_7,018.22a dve naptur devavataḥ śate gor dvā rathā vadhūmantā sudāsaḥ /
analyzed: dve naptuḥ devavataḥ śate goḥ dvā rathā vadhūmantā sudāsaḥ

original: RV_7,018.22c arhann agne paijavanasya dānaṃ hoteva sadma pary emi rebhan //
analyzed: arhan agne paijavanasya dānam hotā iva sadma pari emi rebhan

original: RV_7,018.23a catvāro mā paijavanasya dānāḥ smaddiṣṭayaḥ kṛśanino nireke /
analyzed: catvāraḥ mā paijavanasya dānāḥ smad diṣṭayaḥ kṛśaninaḥ nireke

original: RV_7,018.23c ṛjrāso mā pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ sudāsas tokaṃ tokāya śravase vahanti //
analyzed: ṛjrāsaḥ mā pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ sudāsaḥ tokam tokāya śravase vahanti

original: RV_7,018.24a yasya śravo rodasī antar urvī śīrṣṇe-śīrṣṇe vibabhājā vibhaktā /
analyzed: yasya śravaḥ rodasī antar urvī śīrṣṇe śīrṣṇe vibabhājā vibhaktā

original: RV_7,018.24c sapted indraṃ na sravato gṛṇanti ni yudhyāmadhim aśiśād abhīke //
analyzed: sapta id indram na sravataḥ gṛṇanti ni yudhyāmadhim aśiśāt abhīke

original: RV_7,018.25a imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatānu divodāsaṃ na pitaraṃ sudāsaḥ /
analyzed: imam naraḥ marutaḥ saścata anu divodāsam na pitaram sudāsaḥ

original: RV_7,018.25c aviṣṭanā paijavanasya ketaṃ dūṇāśaṃ kṣatram ajaraṃ duvoyu //
analyzed: aviṣṭanā paijavanasya ketam dūṇāśam kṣatram ajaram duvoyu

original: RV_7,019.01a yas tigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho na bhīma ekaḥ kṛṣṭīś cyāvayati pra viśvāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ cyāvayati pra viśvāḥ

original: RV_7,019.01c yaḥ śaśvato adāśuṣo gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ śaśvataḥ a dāśuṣaḥ gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ

original: RV_7,019.02a tvaṃ ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ tanvā samarye

original: RV_7,019.02c dāsaṃ yac chuṣṇaṃ kuyavaṃ ny asmā arandhaya ārjuneyāya śikṣan //
analyzed: dāsam yat śuṣṇam kuyavam ni asmai arandhayaḥ ārjuneyāya śikṣan

original: RV_7,019.03a tvaṃ dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyam prāvo viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sudāsam /
analyzed: tvam dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyam prāvaḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ sudāsam

original: RV_7,019.03c pra paurukutsiṃ trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetrasātā vṛtrahatyeṣu pūrum //
analyzed: pra paurukutsim trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetra sātā vṛtra hatyeṣu pūrum

original: RV_7,019.04a tvaṃ nṛbhir nṛmaṇo devavītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi /
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ nṛmaṇaḥ deva vītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi

original: RV_7,019.04c tvaṃ ni dasyuṃ cumuriṃ dhuniṃ cāsvāpayo dabhītaye suhantu //
analyzed: tvam ni dasyum cumurim dhunim ca asvāpayaḥ dabhītaye su hantu

original: RV_7,019.05a tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puro navatiṃ ca sadyaḥ /
analyzed: tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puras navatim ca sadyas

original: RV_7,019.05c niveśane śatatamāviveṣīr ahañ ca vṛtraṃ namucim utāhan //
analyzed: niveśane śatatama aviveṣīḥ aham ca vṛtram namucim uta ahan

original: RV_7,019.06a sanā tā ta indra bhojanāni rātahavyāya dāśuṣe sudāse /
analyzed: sanā tā te indra bhojanāni rāta havyāya dāśuṣe sudāse

original: RV_7,019.06c vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam //
analyzed: vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam

original: RV_7,019.07a mā te asyāṃ sahasāvan pariṣṭāv aghāya bhūma harivaḥ parādai /
analyzed: mā te asyām sahasāvan pariṣṭau aghāya bhūma harivas parādai

original: RV_7,019.07c trāyasva no 'vṛkebhir varūthais tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma //
analyzed: trāyasva naḥ vṛkebhiḥ varūthaiḥ tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma

original: RV_7,019.08a priyāsa it te maghavann abhiṣṭau naro madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: priyāsaḥ id te maghavan abhiṣṭau naraḥ madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_7,019.08c ni turvaśaṃ ni yādvaṃ śiśīhy atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan //
analyzed: ni turvaśam ni yādvam śiśīhi atithigvāya śaṃsyam kariṣyan

original: RV_7,019.09a sadyaś cin nu te maghavann abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanty ukthaśāsa ukthā /
analyzed: sadyas cit nu te maghavan abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanti uktha śāsaḥ ukthā

original: RV_7,019.09c ye te havebhir vi paṇīṃr adāśann asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai //
analyzed: ye te havebhiḥ vi paṇīṃr adāśan asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai

original: RV_7,019.10a ete stomā narāṃ nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañco dadato maghāni /
analyzed: ete stomāḥ narām nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañcaḥ dadataḥ maghāni

original: RV_7,019.10c teṣām indra vṛtrahatye śivo bhūḥ sakhā ca śūro 'vitā ca nṛṇām //
analyzed: teṣām indra vṛtra hatye śivaḥ bhūḥ sakhā ca śūraḥ vitā ca nṛṇām

original: RV_7,019.11a nū indra śūra stavamāna ūtī brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhasva /
analyzed: nu indra śūra stavamānaḥ ūtī brahma jūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhasva

original: RV_7,019.11c upa no vājān mimīhy upa stīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: upa naḥ vājān mimīhi upa stīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,020.01a ugro jajñe vīryāya svadhāvāñ cakrir apo naryo yat kariṣyan /
analyzed: ugraḥ jajñe vīryāya svadhāvān cakriḥ apaḥ naryaḥ yat kariṣyan

original: RV_7,020.01c jagmir yuvā nṛṣadanam avobhis trātā na indra enaso mahaś cit //
analyzed: jagmiḥ yuvā nṛṣadanam avobhiḥ trātā naḥ indraḥ enasaḥ mahaḥ cit

original: RV_7,020.02a hantā vṛtram indraḥ śūśuvānaḥ prāvīn nu vīro jaritāram ūtī /
analyzed: hantā vṛtram indraḥ śūśuvānaḥ prāvīt nu vīraḥ jaritāram ūtī

original: RV_7,020.02c kartā sudāse aha vā u lokaṃ dātā vasu muhur ā dāśuṣe bhūt //
analyzed: kartā sudāse aha vai u lokam dātā vasu muhur ā dāśuṣe bhūt

original: RV_7,020.03a yudhmo anarvā khajakṛt samadvā śūraḥ satrāṣāḍ januṣem aṣāḷhaḥ /
analyzed: yudhmaḥ anarvā khaja kṛt samadvā śūraḥ satrāṣāh januṣā īm aṣāḷhaḥ

original: RV_7,020.03c vy āsa indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā adhā viśvaṃ śatrūyantaṃ jaghāna //
analyzed: vi āsa indraḥ pṛtanāḥ su ojāḥ adhā viśvam śatrūyantam jaghāna

original: RV_7,020.04a ubhe cid indra rodasī mahitvā paprātha taviṣībhis tuviṣmaḥ /
analyzed: ubhe cit indra rodasī mahitvā paprātha taviṣībhiḥ tuviṣmas

original: RV_7,020.04c ni vajram indro harivān mimikṣan sam andhasā madeṣu vā uvoca //
analyzed: ni vajram indraḥ harivān mimikṣan sam andhasā madeṣu vai uvoca

original: RV_7,020.05a vṛṣā jajāna vṛṣaṇaṃ raṇāya tam u cin nārī naryaṃ sasūva /
analyzed: vṛṣā jajāna vṛṣaṇam raṇāya tam u cit nārī naryam sasūva

original: RV_7,020.05c pra yaḥ senānīr adha nṛbhyo astīnaḥ satvā gaveṣaṇaḥ sa dhṛṣṇuḥ //
analyzed: pra yaḥ senā nīḥ adha nṛbhyaḥ astīnaḥ satvā gaveṣaṇaḥ sa dhṛṣṇuḥ

original: RV_7,020.06a nū cit sa bhreṣate jano na reṣan mano yo asya ghoram āvivāsāt /
analyzed: nu cit sa bhreṣate janaḥ na reṣat manaḥ yaḥ asya ghoram āvivāsāt

original: RV_7,020.06c yajñair ya indre dadhate duvāṃsi kṣayat sa rāya ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ //
analyzed: yajñaiḥ yaḥ indre dadhate duvāṃsi kṣayat sa rāyaḥ ṛta pāḥ ṛtejāḥ

original: RV_7,020.07a yad indra pūrvo aparāya śikṣann ayaj jyāyān kanīyaso deṣṇam /
analyzed: yat indra pūrvaḥ aparāya śikṣan ayat jyāyān kanīyasaḥ deṣṇam

original: RV_7,020.07c amṛta it pary āsīta dūram ā citra citryam bharā rayiṃ naḥ //
analyzed: amṛte id pari āsīta dūram ā citra citryam bhara rayim naḥ

original: RV_7,020.08a yas ta indra priyo jano dadāśad asan nireke adrivaḥ sakhā te /
analyzed: yaḥ te indra priyaḥ janaḥ dadāśat asat nireke adrivas sakhā te

original: RV_7,020.08c vayaṃ te asyāṃ sumatau caniṣṭhāḥ syāma varūthe aghnato nṛpītau //
analyzed: vayam te asyām sumatau caniṣṭhāḥ syāma varūthe a ghnataḥ nṛ pītau

original: RV_7,020.09a eṣa stomo acikradad vṛṣā ta uta stāmur maghavann akrapiṣṭa /
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ acikradat vṛṣā te uta stāmuḥ maghavan akrapiṣṭa

original: RV_7,020.09c rāyas kāmo jaritāraṃ ta āgan tvam aṅga śakra vasva ā śako naḥ //
analyzed: rāyaḥ kāmaḥ jaritāram te āgan tvam aṅga śakra vasvaḥ ā śakaḥ naḥ

original: RV_7,020.10a sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhās tmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti /
analyzed: sa naḥ indra tvayatāyai iṣe dhāḥ tmanā ca ye maghavānaḥ junanti

original: RV_7,020.10c vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vasvī su te jaritre astu śaktiḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,021.01a asāvi devaṃ goṛjīkam andho ny asminn indro januṣem uvoca /
analyzed: asāvi devam goṛjīkam andhaḥ ni asmin indraḥ januṣā īm uvoca

original: RV_7,021.01c bodhāmasi tvā haryaśva yajñair bodhā na stomam andhaso madeṣu //
analyzed: bodhāmasi tvā hari aśva yajñaiḥ bodha naḥ stomam andhasaḥ madeṣu

original: RV_7,021.02a pra yanti yajñaṃ vipayanti barhiḥ somamādo vidathe dudhravācaḥ /
analyzed: pra yanti yajñam vipayanti barhiḥ somamādaḥ vidathe dudhra vācaḥ

original: RV_7,021.02c ny u bhriyante yaśaso gṛbhād ā dūraupabdo vṛṣaṇo nṛṣācaḥ //
analyzed: ni u bhriyante yaśasaḥ gṛbhāt ā dūraupabdaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ nṛṣācaḥ

original: RV_7,021.03a tvam indra sravitavā apas kaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: tvam indra sravitavai apaḥ kaḥ pariṣṭhitāḥ ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_7,021.03c tvad vāvakre rathyo na dhenā rejante viśvā kṛtrimāṇi bhīṣā //
analyzed: tvat vāvakre rathyaḥ na dhenāḥ rejante viśvā kṛtrimāṇi bhīṣā

original: RV_7,021.04a bhīmo viveṣāyudhebhir eṣām apāṃsi viśvā naryāṇi vidvān /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ viveṣa āyudhebhiḥ eṣām apāṃsi viśvā naryāṇi vidvān

original: RV_7,021.04c indraḥ puro jarhṛṣāṇo vi dūdhod vi vajrahasto mahinā jaghāna //
analyzed: indraḥ puraḥ jarhṛṣāṇaḥ vi dūdhot vi vajra hastaḥ mahinā jaghāna

original: RV_7,021.05a na yātava indra jūjuvur no na vandanā śaviṣṭha vedyābhiḥ /
analyzed: na yātavaḥ indra jūjuvuḥ naḥ na vandanā śaviṣṭha vedyābhiḥ

original: RV_7,021.05c sa śardhad aryo viṣuṇasya jantor mā śiśnadevā api gur ṛtaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: sa śardhat aryaḥ viṣuṇasya jantoḥ mā śiśna devāḥ api guḥ ṛtam naḥ

original: RV_7,021.06a abhi kratvendra bhūr adha jman na te vivyaṅ mahimānaṃ rajāṃsi /
analyzed: abhi kratvā indra bhūḥ adha jman na te vivyak mahimānam rajāṃsi

original: RV_7,021.06c svenā hi vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghantha na śatrur antaṃ vividad yudhā te //
analyzed: svena hi vṛtram śavasā jaghantha na śatruḥ antam vividat yudhā te

original: RV_7,021.07a devāś cit te asuryāya pūrve 'nu kṣatrāya mamire sahāṃsi /
analyzed: devāḥ cit te asuryāya pūrve nu kṣatrāya mamire sahāṃsi

original: RV_7,021.07c indro maghāni dayate viṣahyendraṃ vājasya johuvanta sātau //
analyzed: indraḥ maghāni dayate viṣahya indram vājasya johuvanta sātau

original: RV_7,021.08a kīriś cid dhi tvām avase juhāveśānam indra saubhagasya bhūreḥ /
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvām avase juhāva īśānam indra saubhagasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_7,021.08c avo babhūtha śatamūte asme abhikṣattus tvāvato varūtā //
analyzed: avas babhūtha śatamūte asme abhikṣattuḥ tvāvataḥ varūtā

original: RV_7,021.09a sakhāyas ta indra viśvaha syāma namovṛdhāso mahinā tarutra /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ te indra viśvaha syāma namaḥ vṛdhāsaḥ mahinā tarutra

original: RV_7,021.09c vanvantu smā te 'vasā samīke 'bhītim aryo vanuṣāṃ śavāṃsi //
analyzed: vanvantu smā te vasā samīke bhītim aryaḥ vanuṣām śavāṃsi

original: RV_7,021.10a sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhās tmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti /
analyzed: sa naḥ indra tvayatāyai iṣe dhāḥ tmanā ca ye maghavānaḥ junanti

original: RV_7,021.10c vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vasvī su te jaritre astu śaktiḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,022.01a pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yaṃ te suṣāva haryaśvādriḥ /
analyzed: pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yam te suṣāva haryaśva adriḥ

original: RV_7,022.01c sotur bāhubhyāṃ suyato nārvā //
analyzed: sotuḥ bāhubhyām su yataḥ na arvā

original: RV_7,022.02a yas te mado yujyaś cārur asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi /
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ yujyaḥ cāruḥ asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi

original: RV_7,022.02c sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu //
analyzed: sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu

original: RV_7,022.03a bodhā su me maghavan vācam emāṃ yāṃ te vasiṣṭho arcati praśastim /
analyzed: bodha su me maghavan vācam ā imām yām te vasiṣṭhaḥ arcati praśastim

original: RV_7,022.03c imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva //
analyzed: imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva

original: RV_7,022.04a śrudhī havaṃ vipipānasyādrer bodhā viprasyārcato manīṣām /
analyzed: śrudhi havam vipipānasya adreḥ bodha viprasya arcataḥ manīṣām

original: RV_7,022.04c kṛṣvā duvāṃsy antamā sacemā //
analyzed: kṛṣva duvāṃsi antamā sacā imā

original: RV_7,022.05a na te giro api mṛṣye turasya na suṣṭutim asuryasya vidvān /
analyzed: na te giraḥ api mṛṣye turasya na suṣṭutim asuryasya vidvān

original: RV_7,022.05c sadā te nāma svayaśo vivakmi //
analyzed: sadā te nāma sva yaśaḥ vivakmi

original: RV_7,022.06a bhūri hi te savanā mānuṣeṣu bhūri manīṣī havate tvām it /
analyzed: bhūri hi te savanā mānuṣeṣu bhūri manīṣī havate tvām id

original: RV_7,022.06c māre asman maghavañ jyok kaḥ //
analyzed: mā āre asmat maghavan jyok kaḥ

original: RV_7,022.07a tubhyed imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi /
analyzed: tubhya id imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi

original: RV_7,022.07c tvaṃ nṛbhir havyo viśvadhāsi //
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ havyaḥ viśvadha asi

original: RV_7,022.08a nū cin nu te manyamānasya dasmod aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra /
analyzed: nu cit nu te manyamānasya dasma ud aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra

original: RV_7,022.08c na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ //
analyzed: na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ

original: RV_7,022.09a ye ca pūrva ṛṣayo ye ca nūtnā indra brahmāṇi janayanta viprāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca pūrve ṛṣayaḥ ye ca nūtnāḥ indra brahmāṇi janayanta viprāḥ

original: RV_7,022.09c asme te santu sakhyā śivāni yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: asme te santu sakhyā śivāni yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,023.01a ud u brahmāṇy airata śravasyendraṃ samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha /
analyzed: ud u brahmāṇi airata śravasyā indram samarye mahaya vasiṣṭha

original: RV_7,023.01c ā yo viśvāni śavasā tatānopaśrotā ma īvato vacāṃsi //
analyzed: ā yaḥ viśvāni śavasā tatāna upaśrotā me īvataḥ vacāṃsi

original: RV_7,023.02a ayāmi ghoṣa indra devajāmir irajyanta yac churudho vivāci /
analyzed: ayāmi ghoṣaḥ indra deva jāmiḥ irajyanta yat śurudhaḥ vivāci

original: RV_7,023.02c nahi svam āyuś cikite janeṣu tānīd aṃhāṃsy ati parṣy asmān //
analyzed: nahi svam āyuḥ cikite janeṣu tāni id aṃhāṃsi ati parṣi asmān

original: RV_7,023.03a yuje rathaṃ gaveṣaṇaṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ /
analyzed: yuje ratham gaveṣaṇam haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ

original: RV_7,023.03c vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvendro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghanvān //
analyzed: vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvā indraḥ vṛtrāṇi apratī jaghanvān

original: RV_7,023.04a āpaś cit pipyu staryo na gāvo nakṣann ṛtaṃ jaritāras ta indra /
analyzed: āpaḥ cit pipyuḥ staryaḥ na gāvaḥ nakṣan ṛtam jaritāraḥ te indra

original: RV_7,023.04c yāhi vāyur na niyuto no acchā tvaṃ hi dhībhir dayase vi vājān //
analyzed: yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ naḥ acchā tvam hi dhībhiḥ dayase vi vājān

original: RV_7,023.05a te tvā madā indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇaṃ tuvirādhasaṃ jaritre /
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇam tuvi rādhasam jaritre

original: RV_7,023.05c eko devatrā dayase hi martān asmiñ chūra savane mādayasva //
analyzed: ekaḥ devatrā dayase hi martān asmin śūra savane mādayasva

original: RV_7,023.06a eved indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhuṃ vasiṣṭhāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
analyzed: eva id indram vṛṣaṇam vajra bāhum vasiṣṭhāsaḥ abhī arcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_7,023.06c sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu gomat yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,024.01a yoniṣ ṭa indra sadane akāri tam ā nṛbhiḥ puruhūta pra yāhi /
analyzed: yoniḥ te indra sadane akāri tam ā nṛbhiḥ puruhūta pra yāhi

original: RV_7,024.01c aso yathā no 'vitā vṛdhe ca dado vasūni mamadaś ca somaiḥ //
analyzed: asaḥ yathā naḥ vitā vṛdhe ca dadaḥ vasūni mamadaḥ ca somaiḥ

original: RV_7,024.02a gṛbhītaṃ te mana indra dvibarhāḥ sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni /
analyzed: gṛbhītam te manaḥ indra dvibarhāḥ sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni

original: RV_7,024.02c visṛṣṭadhenā bharate suvṛktir iyam indraṃ johuvatī manīṣā //
analyzed: visṛṣṭa dhenāḥ bharate suvṛktiḥ iyam indram johuvatī manīṣā

original: RV_7,024.03a ā no diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣinn idam barhiḥ somapeyāya yāhi /
analyzed: ā naḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ ṛjīṣin idam barhiḥ soma peyāya yāhi

original: RV_7,024.03c vahantu tvā harayo madryañcam āṅgūṣam acchā tavasam madāya //
analyzed: vahantu tvā harayaḥ madryañcam āṅgūṣam acchā tavasam madāya

original: RV_7,024.04a ā no viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sajoṣā brahma juṣāṇo haryaśva yāhi /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ brahma juṣāṇaḥ haryaśva yāhi

original: RV_7,024.04c varīvṛjat sthavirebhiḥ suśiprāsme dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indra //
analyzed: varīvṛjat sthavirebhiḥ su śiprā asme dadhat vṛṣaṇam śuṣmam indra

original: RV_7,024.05a eṣa stomo maha ugrāya vāhe dhurīvātyo na vājayann adhāyi /
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ mahe ugrāya vāhe dhuri iva atyaḥ na vājayan adhāyi

original: RV_7,024.05c indra tvāyam arka īṭṭe vasūnāṃ divīva dyām adhi naḥ śromataṃ dhāḥ //
analyzed: indra tvā ayam arkaḥ īṭṭe vasūnām divi iva dyām adhi naḥ śromatam dhāḥ

original: RV_7,024.06a evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma /
analyzed: eva naḥ indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīm sumatim vevidāma

original: RV_7,024.06c iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ su vīrām yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,025.01a ā te maha indroty ugra samanyavo yat samaranta senāḥ /
analyzed: ā te mahaḥ indra ūtī ugra samanyavaḥ yat samaranta senāḥ

original: RV_7,025.01c patāti didyun naryasya bāhvor mā te mano viṣvadryag vi cārīt //
analyzed: patāti didyut naryasya bāhvoḥ mā te manaḥ viṣvadryak vi cārīt

original: RV_7,025.02a ni durga indra śnathihy amitrāṃ abhi ye no martāso amanti /
analyzed: ni durge indra śnathihi amitrān abhi ye naḥ martāsaḥ amanti

original: RV_7,025.02c āre taṃ śaṃsaṃ kṛṇuhi ninitsor ā no bhara sambharaṇaṃ vasūnām //
analyzed: āre tam śaṃsam kṛṇuhi ninitsoḥ ā naḥ bhara sambharaṇam vasūnām

original: RV_7,025.03a śataṃ te śiprinn ūtayaḥ sudāse sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta rātir astu /
analyzed: śatam te śiprin ūtayaḥ sudāse sahasram śaṃsāḥ uta rātiḥ astu

original: RV_7,025.03c jahi vadhar vanuṣo martyasyāsme dyumnam adhi ratnaṃ ca dhehi //
analyzed: jahi vadhar vanuṣaḥ martyasya asme dyumnam adhi ratnam ca dhehi

original: RV_7,025.04a tvāvato hīndra kratve asmi tvāvato 'vituḥ śūra rātau /
analyzed: tvāvataḥ hi indra kratve asmi tvāvataḥ vituḥ śūra rātau

original: RV_7,025.04c viśved ahāni taviṣīva ugraṃ okaḥ kṛṇuṣva harivo na mardhīḥ //
analyzed: viśvā id ahāni taviṣīvas ugram okaḥ kṛṇuṣva harivas na mardhīḥ

original: RV_7,025.05a kutsā ete haryaśvāya śūṣam indre saho devajūtam iyānāḥ /
analyzed: kutsāḥ ete haryaśvāya śūṣam indre sahaḥ deva jūtam iyānāḥ

original: RV_7,025.05c satrā kṛdhi suhanā śūra vṛtrā vayaṃ tarutrāḥ sanuyāma vājam //
analyzed: satrā kṛdhi su hanā śūra vṛtrā vayam tarutrāḥ sanuyāma vājam

original: RV_7,025.06a evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma /
analyzed: eva naḥ indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīm sumatim vevidāma

original: RV_7,025.06c iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ su vīrām yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,026.01a na soma indram asuto mamāda nābrahmāṇo maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ /
analyzed: na somaḥ indram a sutaḥ mamāda na abrahmāṇaḥ maghavānam sutāsaḥ

original: RV_7,026.01c tasmā ukthaṃ janaye yaj jujoṣan nṛvan navīyaḥ śṛṇavad yathā naḥ //
analyzed: tasmai uktham janaye yat jujoṣat nṛvat navīyaḥ śṛṇavat yathā naḥ

original: RV_7,026.02a uktha-ukthe soma indram mamāda nīthe-nīthe maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ /
analyzed: uktha aukthe somaḥ indram mamāda nīthenīthe maghavānam sutāsaḥ

original: RV_7,026.02c yad īṃ sabādhaḥ pitaraṃ na putrāḥ samānadakṣā avase havante //
analyzed: yat īm sabādhaḥ pitaram na putrāḥ samāna dakṣāḥ avase havante

original: RV_7,026.03a cakāra tā kṛṇavan nūnam anyā yāni bruvanti vedhasaḥ suteṣu /
analyzed: cakāra tā kṛṇavat nūnam anyā yāni bruvanti vedhasaḥ suteṣu

original: RV_7,026.03c janīr iva patir ekaḥ samāno ni māmṛje pura indraḥ su sarvāḥ //
analyzed: janīḥ iva patiḥ ekaḥ samānaḥ ni māmṛje puraḥ indraḥ su sarvāḥ

original: RV_7,026.04a evā tam āhur uta śṛṇva indra eko vibhaktā taraṇir maghānām /
analyzed: eva tam āhuḥ uta śṛṇve indraḥ ekaḥ vibhaktā taraṇiḥ maghānām

original: RV_7,026.04c mithastura ūtayo yasya pūrvīr asme bhadrāṇi saścata priyāṇi //
analyzed: mithasturaḥ ūtayaḥ yasya pūrvīḥ asme bhadrāṇi saścata priyāṇi

original: RV_7,026.05a evā vasiṣṭha indram ūtaye nṝn kṛṣṭīnāṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sute gṛṇāti /
analyzed: eva vasiṣṭhaḥ indram ūtaye nṝn kṛṣṭīnām vṛṣabham sute gṛṇāti

original: RV_7,026.05c sahasriṇa upa no māhi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sahasriṇaḥ upa naḥ māhi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,027.01a indraṃ naro nemadhitā havante yat pāryā yunajate dhiyas tāḥ /
analyzed: indram naraḥ nemadhitā havante yat pāryā yunajate dhiyaḥ tāḥ

original: RV_7,027.01c śūro nṛṣātā śavasaś cakāna ā gomati vraje bhajā tvaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: śūraḥ nṛṣātā śavasaḥ cakānaḥ ā gomati vraje bhaja tvam naḥ

original: RV_7,027.02a ya indra śuṣmo maghavan te asti śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ puruhūta nṛbhyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ indra śuṣmaḥ maghavan te asti śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ puruhūta nṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_7,027.02c tvaṃ hi dṛḷhā maghavan vicetā apā vṛdhi parivṛtaṃ na rādhaḥ //
analyzed: tvam hi dṛḍhā maghavan vicetāḥ apa ā vṛdhi parivṛtam na rādhaḥ

original: RV_7,027.03a indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti /
analyzed: indraḥ rājā jagataḥ carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpam yat asti

original: RV_7,027.03c tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk //
analyzed: tatas dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codat rādhaḥ upastutaḥ cit arvāk

original: RV_7,027.04a nū cin na indro maghavā sahūtī dāno vājaṃ ni yamate na ūtī /
analyzed: nu cit naḥ indraḥ maghavā sahūtī dānaḥ vājam ni yamate naḥ ūtī

original: RV_7,027.04c anūnā yasya dakṣiṇā pīpāya vāmaṃ nṛbhyo abhivītā sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: anūnā yasya dakṣiṇā pīpāya vāmam nṛbhyaḥ abhivītā sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_7,027.05a nū indra rāye varivas kṛdhī na ā te mano vavṛtyāma maghāya /
analyzed: nu indra rāye varivaḥ kṛdhī naḥ ā te manaḥ vavṛtyāma maghāya

original: RV_7,027.05c gomad aśvāvad rathavad vyanto yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: gomat aśvāvat rathavat vyantaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,028.01a brahmā ṇa indropa yāhi vidvān arvāñcas te harayaḥ santu yuktāḥ /
analyzed: brahmā naḥ indra upa yāhi vidvān arvāñcaḥ te harayaḥ santu yuktāḥ

original: RV_7,028.01c viśve cid dhi tvā vihavanta martā asmākam ic chṛṇuhi viśvaminva //
analyzed: viśve cit hi tvā vihavanta martāḥ asmākam id śṛṇuhi viśvaminva

original: RV_7,028.02a havaṃ ta indra mahimā vy ānaḍ brahma yat pāsi śavasinn ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: havam te indra mahimā vi ānaṭ brahma yat pāsi śavasin ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_7,028.02c ā yad vajraṃ dadhiṣe hasta ugra ghoraḥ san kratvā janiṣṭhā aṣāḷhaḥ //
analyzed: ā yat vajram dadhiṣe haste ugra ghoraḥ san kratvā janiṣṭhāḥ aṣāḷhaḥ

original: RV_7,028.03a tava praṇītīndra johuvānān saṃ yan nṝn na rodasī ninetha /
analyzed: tava praṇītī indra johuvānān sam yat nṝn na rodasī ninetha

original: RV_7,028.03c mahe kṣatrāya śavase hi jajñe 'tūtujiṃ cit tūtujir aśiśnat //
analyzed: mahe kṣatrāya śavase hi jajñe tūtujim cit tūtujiḥ aśiśnat

original: RV_7,028.04a ebhir na indrāhabhir daśasya durmitrāso hi kṣitayaḥ pavante /
analyzed: ebhiḥ naḥ indra ahabhiḥ daśasya durmitrāsaḥ hi kṣitayaḥ pavante

original: RV_7,028.04c prati yac caṣṭe anṛtam anenā ava dvitā varuṇo māyī naḥ sāt //
analyzed: prati yat caṣṭe anṛtam anenāḥ ava dvitā varuṇaḥ māyī naḥ sāt

original: RV_7,028.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan naḥ /
analyzed: vocema id indram maghavānam enam mahaḥ rāyaḥ rādhasaḥ yat dadan naḥ

original: RV_7,028.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ arcataḥ brahmakṛtim aviṣṭhaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,029.01a ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunva ā tu pra yāhi harivas tadokāḥ /
analyzed: ayam somaḥ indra tubhyam sunve ā tu pra yāhi harivas tad okāḥ

original: RV_7,029.01c pibā tv asya suṣutasya cāror dado maghāni maghavann iyānaḥ //
analyzed: pibā tu asya suṣutasya cāroḥ dadaḥ maghāni maghavan iyānaḥ

original: RV_7,029.02a brahman vīra brahmakṛtiṃ juṣāṇo 'rvācīno haribhir yāhi tūyam /
analyzed: brahman vīra brahmakṛtim juṣāṇaḥ rvācīnaḥ haribhiḥ yāhi tūyam

original: RV_7,029.02c asminn ū ṣu savane mādayasvopa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā naḥ //
analyzed: asmin u su savane mādayasva upa brahmāṇi śṛṇavaḥ imā naḥ

original: RV_7,029.03a kā te asty araṅkṛtiḥ sūktaiḥ kadā nūnaṃ te maghavan dāśema /
analyzed: kā te asti araṅkṛtiḥ sūktaiḥ kadā nūnam te maghavan dāśema

original: RV_7,029.03c viśvā matīr ā tatane tvāyādhā ma indra śṛṇavo havemā //
analyzed: viśvāḥ matīḥ ā tatane tvāyā adhā me indra śṛṇavaḥ havā imā

original: RV_7,029.04a uto ghā te puruṣyā id āsan yeṣām pūrveṣām aśṛṇor ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: uta u gha te puruṣyāḥ id āsan yeṣām pūrveṣām aśṛṇoḥ ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_7,029.04c adhāhaṃ tvā maghavañ johavīmi tvaṃ na indrāsi pramatiḥ piteva //
analyzed: adha aham tvā maghavam johavīmi tvam naḥ indra asi pramatiḥ pitā iva

original: RV_7,029.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan naḥ /
analyzed: vocema id indram maghavānam enam mahaḥ rāyaḥ rādhasaḥ yat dadan naḥ

original: RV_7,029.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ arcataḥ brahmakṛtim aviṣṭhaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,030.01a ā no deva śavasā yāhi śuṣmin bhavā vṛdha indra rāyo asya /
analyzed: ā naḥ deva śavasā yāhi śuṣmin bhava vṛdhaḥ indra rāyaḥ asya

original: RV_7,030.01c mahe nṛmṇāya nṛpate suvajra mahi kṣatrāya pauṃsyāya śūra //
analyzed: mahe nṛmṇāya nṛpate su vajra mahi kṣatrāya pauṃsyāya śūra

original: RV_7,030.02a havanta u tvā havyaṃ vivāci tanūṣu śūrāḥ sūryasya sātau /
analyzed: havante u tvā havyam vivāci tanūṣu śūrāḥ sūryasya sātau

original: RV_7,030.02c tvaṃ viśveṣu senyo janeṣu tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi randhayā suhantu //
analyzed: tvam viśveṣu senyaḥ janeṣu tvam vṛtrāṇi randhaya su hantu

original: RV_7,030.03a ahā yad indra sudinā vyucchān dadho yat ketum upamaṃ samatsu /
analyzed: ahā yat indra sudinā vyucchān dadhaḥ yat ketum upamam samatsu

original: RV_7,030.03c ny agniḥ sīdad asuro na hotā huvāno atra subhagāya devān //
analyzed: ni agniḥ sīdat asuraḥ na hotā huvānaḥ atra subhagāya devān

original: RV_7,030.04a vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca deva stavanta śūra dadato maghāni /
analyzed: vayam te te indra ye ca deva stavanta śūra dadataḥ maghāni

original: RV_7,030.04c yacchā sūribhya upamaṃ varūthaṃ svābhuvo jaraṇām aśnavanta //
analyzed: yaccha sūribhyaḥ upamam varūtham su ābhuvaḥ jaraṇām aśnavanta

original: RV_7,030.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan naḥ /
analyzed: vocema id indram maghavānam enam mahaḥ rāyaḥ rādhasaḥ yat dadan naḥ

original: RV_7,030.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ arcataḥ brahmakṛtim aviṣṭhaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,031.01a pra va indrāya mādanaṃ haryaśvāya gāyata /
analyzed: pra vaḥ indrāya mādanam haryaśvāya gāyata

original: RV_7,031.01c sakhāyaḥ somapāvne //
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ soma pāvne

original: RV_7,031.02a śaṃsed ukthaṃ sudānava uta dyukṣaṃ yathā naraḥ /
analyzed: śaṃset uktham sudānavaḥ uta dyukṣam yathā naraḥ

original: RV_7,031.02c cakṛmā satyarādhase //
analyzed: cakṛma satya rādhase

original: RV_7,031.03a tvaṃ na indra vājayus tvaṃ gavyuḥ śatakrato /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra vājayuḥ tvam gavyuḥ śatakrato

original: RV_7,031.03c tvaṃ hiraṇyayur vaso //
analyzed: tvam hiraṇyayuḥ vaso

original: RV_7,031.04a vayam indra tvāyavo 'bhi pra ṇonumo vṛṣan /
analyzed: vayam indra tvāyavaḥ bhi pra nonumaḥ vṛṣan

original: RV_7,031.04c viddhī tv asya no vaso //
analyzed: viddhi tu asya naḥ vaso

original: RV_7,031.05a mā no nide ca vaktave 'ryo randhīr arāvṇe /
analyzed: mā naḥ nide ca vaktave ryaḥ randhīḥ arāvṇe

original: RV_7,031.05c tve api kratur mama //
analyzed: tve api kratuḥ mama

original: RV_7,031.06a tvaṃ varmāsi saprathaḥ puroyodhaś ca vṛtrahan /
analyzed: tvam varmā asi saprathaḥ puras yodhaḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_7,031.06c tvayā prati bruve yujā //
analyzed: tvayā prati bruve yujā

original: RV_7,031.07a mahāṃ utāsi yasya te 'nu svadhāvarī sahaḥ /
analyzed: mahān uta asi yasya te nu svadhāvarī sahaḥ

original: RV_7,031.07c mamnāte indra rodasī //
analyzed: mamnāte indra rodasī

original: RV_7,031.08a taṃ tvā marutvatī pari bhuvad vāṇī sayāvarī /
analyzed: tam tvā marutvatī pari bhuvat vāṇī sa yāvarī

original: RV_7,031.08c nakṣamāṇā saha dyubhiḥ //
analyzed: nakṣamāṇā saha dyubhiḥ

original: RV_7,031.09a ūrdhvāsas tvānv indavo bhuvan dasmam upa dyavi /
analyzed: ūrdhvāsaḥ tvā anu indavaḥ bhuvan dasmam upa dyavi

original: RV_7,031.09c saṃ te namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: sam te namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_7,031.10a pra vo mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatiṃ kṛṇudhvam /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatim kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_7,031.10c viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra carā carṣaṇiprāḥ //
analyzed: viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra cara carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_7,031.11a uruvyacase mahine suvṛktim indrāya brahma janayanta viprāḥ /
analyzed: uru vyacase mahine suvṛktim indrāya brahma janayanta viprāḥ

original: RV_7,031.11c tasya vratāni na minanti dhīrāḥ //
analyzed: tasya vratāni na minanti dhīrāḥ

original: RV_7,031.12a indraṃ vāṇīr anuttamanyum eva satrā rājānaṃ dadhire sahadhyai /
analyzed: indram vāṇīḥ anutta manyum eva satrā rājānam dadhire sahadhyai

original: RV_7,031.12c haryaśvāya barhayā sam āpīn //
analyzed: haryaśvāya barhayā sam āpīn

original: RV_7,032.01a mo ṣu tvā vāghataś canāre asman ni rīraman /
analyzed: mā u su tvā vāghataḥ cana āre asmat ni rīraman

original: RV_7,032.01c ārāttāc cit sadhamādaṃ na ā gahīha vā sann upa śrudhi //
analyzed: ārāttāt cit sadhamādam naḥ ā gahi iha vā san upa śrudhi

original: RV_7,032.02a ime hi te brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā madhau na makṣa āsate /
analyzed: ime hi te brahma kṛtaḥ sute sacā madhau na makṣaḥ āsate

original: RV_7,032.02c indre kāmaṃ jaritāro vasūyavo rathe na pādam ā dadhuḥ //
analyzed: indre kāmam jaritāraḥ vasūyavaḥ rathe na pādam ā

original: RV_7,032.03 rāyaskāmo vajrahastaṃ sudakṣiṇam putro na pitaraṃ huve //
analyzed: rāyaskāmaḥ vajra hastam su dakṣiṇam putraḥ na pitaram huve

original: RV_7,032.04a ima indrāya sunvire somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
analyzed: ime indrāya sunvire somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_7,032.04c tāṃ ā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyāṃ yāhy oka ā //
analyzed: tām ā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyām yāhi okaḥ ā

original: RV_7,032.05a śravac chrutkarṇa īyate vasūnāṃ nū cin no mardhiṣad giraḥ /
analyzed: śravat śrutkarṇaḥ īyate vasūnām nu cit naḥ mardhiṣat giraḥ

original: RV_7,032.05c sadyaś cid yaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā dadan nakir ditsantam ā minat //
analyzed: sadyas cit yaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā dadat nakir ditsantam ā minat

original: RV_7,032.06a sa vīro apratiṣkuta indreṇa śūśuve nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: sa vīraḥ apratiṣkutaḥ indreṇa śūśuve nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_7,032.06c yas te gabhīrā savanāni vṛtrahan sunoty ā ca dhāvati //
analyzed: yaḥ te gabhīrā savanāni vṛtrahan sunoti ā ca dhāvati

original: RV_7,032.07a bhavā varūtham maghavan maghonāṃ yat samajāsi śardhataḥ /
analyzed: bhava varūtham maghavan maghonām yat samajāsi śardhataḥ

original: RV_7,032.07c vi tvāhatasya vedanam bhajemahy ā dūṇāśo bharā gayam //
analyzed: vi tvā ahatasya vedanam bhajemahi ā dūṇāśaḥ bhara gayam

original: RV_7,032.08a sunotā somapāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: sunota soma pāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_7,032.08c pacatā paktīr avase kṛṇudhvam it pṛṇann it pṛṇate mayaḥ //
analyzed: pacata paktīḥ avase kṛṇudhvam id pṛṇan id pṛṇate mayaḥ

original: RV_7,032.09a mā sredhata somino dakṣatā mahe kṛṇudhvaṃ rāya ātuje /
analyzed: mā sredhata sominaḥ dakṣata mahe kṛṇudhvam rāyaḥ ātuje

original: RV_7,032.09c taraṇir ij jayati kṣeti puṣyati na devāsaḥ kavatnave //
analyzed: taraṇiḥ id jayati kṣeti puṣyati na devāsaḥ kavatnave

original: RV_7,032.10a nakiḥ sudāso ratham pary āsa na rīramat /
analyzed: nakir sudāsaḥ ratham pari āsa na rīramat

original: RV_7,032.10c indro yasyāvitā yasya maruto gamat sa gomati vraje //
analyzed: indraḥ yasya avitā yasya marutaḥ gamat sa gomati vraje

original: RV_7,032.11a gamad vājaṃ vājayann indra martyo yasya tvam avitā bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: gamat vājam vājayan indra martyaḥ yasya tvam avitā bhuvaḥ

original: RV_7,032.11c asmākam bodhy avitā rathānām asmākaṃ śūra nṛṇām //
analyzed: asmākam bodhi avitā rathānām asmākam śūra nṛṇām

original: RV_7,032.12a ud in nv asya ricyate 'ṃśo dhanaṃ na jigyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: ud id nu asya ricyate ṃśaḥ dhanam na jigyuṣaḥ

original: RV_7,032.12c ya indro harivān na dabhanti taṃ ripo dakṣaṃ dadhāti somini //
analyzed: yaḥ indraḥ harivān na dabhanti tam ripaḥ dakṣam dadhāti somini

original: RV_7,032.13a mantram akharvaṃ sudhitaṃ supeśasaṃ dadhāta yajñiyeṣv ā /
analyzed: mantram akharvam sudhitam supeśasam dadhāta yajñiyeṣu ā

original: RV_7,032.13c pūrvīś cana prasitayas taranti taṃ ya indre karmaṇā bhuvat //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ cana prasitayaḥ taranti tam yaḥ indre karmaṇā bhuvat

original: RV_7,032.14a kas tam indra tvāvasum ā martyo dadharṣati /
analyzed: kaḥ tam indra tvāvasum ā martyaḥ dadharṣati

original: RV_7,032.14c śraddhā it te maghavan pārye divi vājī vājaṃ siṣāsati //
analyzed: śraddhā id te maghavan pārye divi vājī vājam siṣāsati

original: RV_7,032.15a maghonaḥ sma vṛtrahatyeṣu codaya ye dadati priyā vasu /
analyzed: maghonaḥ sma vṛtra hatyeṣu codaya ye dadati priyā vasu

original: RV_7,032.15c tava praṇītī haryaśva sūribhir viśvā tarema duritā //
analyzed: tava praṇītī haryaśva sūribhiḥ viśvā tarema duritā

original: RV_7,032.16a taved indrāvamaṃ vasu tvam puṣyasi madhyamam /
analyzed: tava id indra avamam vasu tvam puṣyasi madhyamam

original: RV_7,032.16c satrā viśvasya paramasya rājasi nakiṣ ṭvā goṣu vṛṇvate //
analyzed: satrā viśvasya paramasya rājasi nakir tvā goṣu vṛṇvate

original: RV_7,032.17a tvaṃ viśvasya dhanadā asi śruto ya īm bhavanty ājayaḥ /
analyzed: tvam viśvasya dhana dāḥ asi śrutaḥ ye īm bhavanti ājayaḥ

original: RV_7,032.17c tavāyaṃ viśvaḥ puruhūta pārthivo 'vasyur nāma bhikṣate //
analyzed: tava ayam viśvaḥ puruhūta pārthivaḥ vasyuḥ nāma bhikṣate

original: RV_7,032.18a yad indra yāvatas tvam etāvad aham īśīya /
analyzed: yat indra yāvataḥ tvam etāvat aham īśīya

original: RV_7,032.18c stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya //
analyzed: stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya

original: RV_7,032.19a śikṣeyam in mahayate dive-dive rāya ā kuhacidvide /
analyzed: śikṣeyam id mahayate dive dive rāyaḥ ā kuhacid vide

original: RV_7,032.19c nahi tvad anyan maghavan na āpyaṃ vasyo asti pitā cana //
analyzed: nahi tvat anyat maghavan naḥ āpyam vasyaḥ asti pitā cana

original: RV_7,032.20a taraṇir it siṣāsati vājam purandhyā yujā /
analyzed: taraṇiḥ id siṣāsati vājam purandhyā yujā

original: RV_7,032.20c ā va indram puruhūtaṃ name girā nemiṃ taṣṭeva sudrvam //
analyzed: ā vaḥ indram puru hūtam name girā nemim taṣṭā iva su drvam

original: RV_7,032.21a na duṣṭutī martyo vindate vasu na sredhantaṃ rayir naśat /
analyzed: na duṣṭutī martyaḥ vindate vasu na sredhantam rayiḥ naśat

original: RV_7,032.21c suśaktir in maghavan tubhyam māvate deṣṇaṃ yat pārye divi //
analyzed: su śaktiḥ id maghavan tubhyam māvate deṣṇam yat pārye divi

original: RV_7,032.22a abhi tvā śūra nonumo 'dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ dugdhāḥ iva dhenavaḥ

original: RV_7,032.22c īśānam asya jagataḥ svardṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ //
analyzed: īśānam asya jagataḥ svar dṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ

original: RV_7,032.23a na tvāvāṃ anyo divyo na pārthivo na jāto na janiṣyate /
analyzed: na tvāvām anyaḥ divyaḥ na pārthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate

original: RV_7,032.23c aśvāyanto maghavann indra vājino gavyantas tvā havāmahe //
analyzed: aśvāyantaḥ maghavan indra vājinaḥ gavyantaḥ tvā havāmahe

original: RV_7,032.24a abhī ṣatas tad ā bharendra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ /
analyzed: abhi sataḥ tat ā bhara indra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ

original: RV_7,032.24c purūvasur hi maghavan sanād asi bhare-bhare ca havyaḥ //
analyzed: purūvasuḥ hi maghavan sanāt asi bharebhare ca havyaḥ

original: RV_7,032.25a parā ṇudasva maghavann amitrān suvedā no vasū kṛdhi /
analyzed: parā nudasva maghavan amitrān su vedā naḥ vasū kṛdhi

original: RV_7,032.25c asmākam bodhy avitā mahādhane bhavā vṛdhaḥ sakhīnām //
analyzed: asmākam bodhi avitā mahādhane bhavā vṛdhaḥ sakhīnām

original: RV_7,032.26a indra kratuṃ na ā bhara pitā putrebhyo yathā /
analyzed: indra kratum naḥ ā bhara pitā putrebhyaḥ yathā

original: RV_7,032.26c śikṣā ṇo asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvā jyotir aśīmahi //
analyzed: śikṣa naḥ asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśīmahi

original: RV_7,032.27a mā no ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso ava kramuḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyaḥ mā aśivāsaḥ ava kramuḥ

original: RV_7,032.27c tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāmasi //
analyzed: tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīḥ apa u ti śūra tarāmasi

original: RV_7,033.01a śvityañco mā dakṣiṇataskapardā dhiyañjinvāso abhi hi pramanduḥ /
analyzed: śvityañcaḥ mā dakṣiṇa taskapardāḥ dhiyañjinvāsaḥ abhi hi pramanduḥ

original: RV_7,033.01c uttiṣṭhan voce pari barhiṣo nṝn na me dūrād avitave vasiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: uttiṣṭhan voce pari barhiṣaḥ nṝn na me dūrāt avitave vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,033.02a dūrād indram anayann ā sutena tiro vaiśantam ati pāntam ugram /
analyzed: dūrāt indram anayan ā sutena tiras vaiśantam ati pāntam ugram

original: RV_7,033.02c pāśadyumnasya vāyatasya somāt sutād indro 'vṛṇītā vasiṣṭhān //
analyzed: pāśa dyumnasya vāyatasya somāt sutāt indraḥ vṛṇīta ā vasiṣṭhān

original: RV_7,033.03a even nu kaṃ sindhum ebhis tatāreven nu kam bhedam ebhir jaghāna /
analyzed: eva id nu kam sindhum ebhiḥ tatāra iva id nu kam bhedam ebhiḥ jaghāna

original: RV_7,033.03c even nu kaṃ dāśarājñe sudāsam prāvad indro brahmaṇā vo vasiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: eva id nu kam dāśarājñe sudāsam prāvat indraḥ brahmaṇā vaḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,033.04a juṣṭī naro brahmaṇā vaḥ pitṝṇām akṣam avyayaṃ na kilā riṣātha /
analyzed: juṣṭī naraḥ brahmaṇā vaḥ pitṝṇām akṣam avyayam na kila riṣātha

original: RV_7,033.04c yac chakvarīṣu bṛhatā raveṇendre śuṣmam adadhātā vasiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: yat śakvarīṣu bṛhatā raveṇa indre śuṣmam adadhāta vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,033.05a ud dyām ivet tṛṣṇajo nāthitāso 'dīdhayur dāśarājñe vṛtāsaḥ /
analyzed: ud dyām iva id tṛṣṇajaḥ nāthitāsaḥ dīdhayuḥ dāśarājñe vṛtāsaḥ

original: RV_7,033.05c vasiṣṭhasya stuvata indro aśrod uruṃ tṛtsubhyo akṛṇod u lokam //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya stuvataḥ indraḥ aśrot urum tṛtsubhyaḥ akṛṇot u lokam

original: RV_7,033.06a daṇḍā ived goajanāsa āsan paricchinnā bharatā arbhakāsaḥ /
analyzed: daṇḍāḥ iva id go ajanāsaḥ āsan paricchinnāḥ bharatāḥ arbhakāsaḥ

original: RV_7,033.06c abhavac ca puraetā vasiṣṭha ād it tṛtsūnāṃ viśo aprathanta //
analyzed: abhavat ca puraetā vasiṣṭhaḥ āt id tṛtsūnām viśaḥ aprathanta

original: RV_7,033.07a trayaḥ kṛṇvanti bhuvaneṣu retas tisraḥ prajā āryā jyotiragrāḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ kṛṇvanti bhuvaneṣu retaḥ tisraḥ prajāḥ āryāḥ jyotiḥ agrāḥ

original: RV_7,033.07c trayo gharmāsa uṣasaṃ sacante sarvāṃ it tāṃ anu vidur vasiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ gharmāsaḥ uṣasam sacante sarvām id tām anu viduḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,033.08a sūryasyeva vakṣatho jyotir eṣāṃ samudrasyeva mahimā gabhīraḥ /
analyzed: sūryasya iva vakṣathaḥ jyotiḥ eṣām samudrasya iva mahimā gabhīraḥ

original: RV_7,033.08c vātasyeva prajavo nānyena stomo vasiṣṭhā anvetave vaḥ //
analyzed: vātasya iva prajavaḥ na anyena stomaḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ anvetave vaḥ

original: RV_7,033.09a ta in niṇyaṃ hṛdayasya praketaiḥ sahasravalśam abhi saṃ caranti /
analyzed: te id niṇyam hṛdayasya praketaiḥ sahasra valśam abhi sam caranti

original: RV_7,033.09c yamena tatam paridhiṃ vayanto 'psarasa upa sedur vasiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: yamena tatam paridhim vayantaḥ psarasaḥ upa seduḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,033.10a vidyuto jyotiḥ pari saṃjihānam mitrāvaruṇā yad apaśyatāṃ tvā /
analyzed: vidyutaḥ jyotiḥ pari saṃjihānam mitrāvaruṇā yat apaśyatām tvā

original: RV_7,033.10c tat te janmotaikaṃ vasiṣṭhāgastyo yat tvā viśa ājabhāra //
analyzed: tat te janma uta ekam vasiṣṭha agastyaḥ yat tvā viśaḥ ājabhāra

original: RV_7,033.11a utāsi maitrāvaruṇo vasiṣṭhorvaśyā brahman manaso 'dhi jātaḥ /
analyzed: uta asi maitrāvaruṇaḥ vasiṣṭha urvaśyā brahman manasaḥ dhi jātaḥ

original: RV_7,033.11c drapsaṃ skannam brahmaṇā daivyena viśve devāḥ puṣkare tvādadanta //
analyzed: drapsam skannam brahmaṇā daivyena viśve devāḥ puṣkare tvā adadanta

original: RV_7,033.12a sa praketa ubhayasya pravidvān sahasradāna uta vā sadānaḥ /
analyzed: sa praketaḥ ubhayasya pravidvān sahasra dānaḥ uta vā sadānaḥ

original: RV_7,033.12c yamena tatam paridhiṃ vayiṣyann apsarasaḥ pari jajñe vasiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: yamena tatam paridhim vayiṣyan apsarasaḥ pari jajñe vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,033.13a satre ha jātāv iṣitā namobhiḥ kumbhe retaḥ siṣicatuḥ samānam /
analyzed: satre ha jātau iṣitā namobhiḥ kumbhe retaḥ siṣicatuḥ samānam

original: RV_7,033.13c tato ha māna ud iyāya madhyāt tato jātam ṛṣim āhur vasiṣṭham //
analyzed: tatas ha mānaḥ ud iyāya madhyāt tatas jātam ṛṣim āhuḥ vasiṣṭham

original: RV_7,033.14a ukthabhṛtaṃ sāmabhṛtam bibharti grāvāṇam bibhrat pra vadāty agre /
analyzed: uktha bhṛtam sāma bhṛtam bibharti grāvāṇam bibhrat pra vadāti agre

original: RV_7,033.14c upainam ādhvaṃ sumanasyamānā ā vo gacchāti pratṛdo vasiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: upa enam ādhvam sumanasyamānāḥ ā vaḥ gacchāti pratṛdaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,034.01 pra śukraitu devī manīṣā asmat sutaṣṭo ratho na vājī //
analyzed: pra śukrā etu devī manīṣā asmat su taṣṭaḥ rathaḥ na vājī

original: RV_7,034.02 viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitraṃ śṛṇvanty āpo adha kṣarantīḥ //
analyzed: viduḥ pṛthivyāḥ divaḥ janitram śṛṇvanti āpaḥ adha kṣarantīḥ

original: RV_7,034.03 āpaś cid asmai pinvanta pṛthvīr vṛtreṣu śūrā maṃsanta ugrāḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asmai pinvanta pṛthvīḥ vṛtreṣu śūrāḥ maṃsante ugrāḥ

original: RV_7,034.04 ā dhūrṣv asmai dadhātāśvān indro na vajrī hiraṇyabāhuḥ //
analyzed: ā dhūrṣu asmai dadhāta aśvān indraḥ na vajrī hiraṇya bāhuḥ

original: RV_7,034.05 abhi pra sthātāheva yajñaṃ yāteva patman tmanā hinota //
analyzed: abhi pra sthāta ahā iva yajñam yāta iva patman tmanā hinota

original: RV_7,034.06 tmanā samatsu hinota yajñaṃ dadhāta ketuṃ janāya vīram //
analyzed: tmanā samatsu hinota yajñam dadhāta ketum janāya vīram

original: RV_7,034.07 ud asya śuṣmād bhānur nārta bibharti bhāram pṛthivī na bhūma //
analyzed: ud asya śuṣmāt bhānuḥ na ārta bibharti bhāram pṛthivī na bhūma

original: RV_7,034.08 hvayāmi devāṃ ayātur agne sādhann ṛtena dhiyaṃ dadhāmi //
analyzed: hvayāmi devān ayātuḥ agne sādhan ṛtena dhiyam dadhāmi

original: RV_7,034.09 abhi vo devīṃ dhiyaṃ dadhidhvam pra vo devatrā vācaṃ kṛṇudhvam //
analyzed: abhi vaḥ devīm dhiyam dadhidhvam pra vaḥ devatrā vācam kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_7,034.10 ā caṣṭa āsām pātho nadīnāṃ varuṇa ugraḥ sahasracakṣāḥ //
analyzed: ā caṣṭe āsām pāthaḥ nadīnām varuṇaḥ ugraḥ sahasra cakṣāḥ

original: RV_7,034.11 rājā rāṣṭrānām peśo nadīnām anuttam asmai kṣatraṃ viśvāyu //
analyzed: rājā rāṣṭrānām peśaḥ nadīnām anuttam asmai kṣatram viśvāyu

original: RV_7,034.12 aviṣṭo asmān viśvāsu vikṣv adyuṃ kṛṇota śaṃsaṃ ninitsoḥ //
analyzed: aviṣṭaḥ asmān viśvāsu vikṣu adyum kṛṇota śaṃsam ninitsoḥ

original: RV_7,034.13 vy etu didyud dviṣām aśevā yuyota viṣvag rapas tanūnām //
analyzed: vi etu didyut dviṣām aśevā yuyota viṣvak rapaḥ tanūnām

original: RV_7,034.14 avīn no agnir havyān namobhiḥ preṣṭho asmā adhāyi stomaḥ //
analyzed: avīt naḥ agniḥ havyāt namobhiḥ preṣṭhaḥ asmai adhāyi stomaḥ

original: RV_7,034.15 sajūr devebhir apāṃ napātaṃ sakhāyaṃ kṛdhvaṃ śivo no astu //
analyzed: sajūs devebhiḥ apām napātam sakhāyam kṛdhvam śivaḥ naḥ astu

original: RV_7,034.16 abjām ukthair ahiṃ gṛṇīṣe budhne nadīnāṃ rajassu ṣīdan //
analyzed: ap jām ukthaiḥ ahim gṛṇīṣe budhne nadīnām rajassu sīdan

original: RV_7,034.17 mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhān mā yajño asya sridhad ṛtāyoḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ riṣe dhāt mā yajñaḥ asya sridhat ṛtāyoḥ

original: RV_7,034.18 uta na eṣu nṛṣu śravo dhuḥ pra rāye yantu śardhanto aryaḥ //
analyzed: uta naḥ eṣu nṛṣu śravaḥ dhuḥ pra rāye yantu śardhantaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_7,034.19 tapanti śatruṃ svar ṇa bhūmā mahāsenāso amebhir eṣām //
analyzed: tapanti śatrum svar na bhūmā mahā senāsaḥ amebhiḥ eṣām

original: RV_7,034.20 ā yan naḥ patnīr gamanty acchā tvaṣṭā supāṇir dadhātu vīrān //
analyzed: ā yat naḥ patnīḥ gamanti acchā tvaṣṭā su pāṇiḥ dadhātu vīrān

original: RV_7,034.21 prati na stomaṃ tvaṣṭā juṣeta syād asme aramatir vasūyuḥ //
analyzed: prati naḥ stomam tvaṣṭā juṣeta syāt asme aramatiḥ vasūyuḥ

original: RV_7,034.22a tā no rāsan rātiṣāco vasūny ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu /
analyzed: tā naḥ rāsan rātiṣācaḥ vasūni ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu

original: RV_7,034.22c varūtrībhiḥ suśaraṇo no astu tvaṣṭā sudatro vi dadhātu rāyaḥ //
analyzed: varūtrībhiḥ su śaraṇaḥ naḥ astu tvaṣṭā su datraḥ vi dadhātu rāyaḥ

original: RV_7,034.23a tan no rāyaḥ parvatās tan na āpas tad rātiṣāca oṣadhīr uta dyauḥ /
analyzed: tat naḥ rāyaḥ parvatāḥ tat naḥ āpaḥ tat rātiṣācaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta dyauḥ

original: RV_7,034.23c vanaspatibhiḥ pṛthivī sajoṣā ubhe rodasī pari pāsato naḥ //
analyzed: vanaspatibhiḥ pṛthivī sajoṣāḥ ubhe rodasī pari pāsataḥ naḥ

original: RV_7,034.24a anu tad urvī rodasī jihātām anu dyukṣo varuṇa indrasakhā /
analyzed: anu tat urvī rodasī jihātām anu dyukṣaḥ varuṇaḥ indra sakhā

original: RV_7,034.24c anu viśve maruto ye sahāso rāyaḥ syāma dharuṇaṃ dhiyadhyai //
analyzed: anu viśve marutaḥ ye sahāsaḥ rāyaḥ syāma dharuṇam

original: RV_7,034.25a tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir āpa oṣadhīr vanino juṣanta /
analyzed: tat naḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_7,034.25c śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,035.01a śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā /
analyzed: śam naḥ indra agnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śam naḥ indrāvaruṇā rāta havyā

original: RV_7,035.01c śam indrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau //
analyzed: śam indrāsomā suvitāya śam yos śam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau

original: RV_7,035.02a śaṃ no bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ purandhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃsaḥ astu śam naḥ purandhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ

original: RV_7,035.02c śaṃ naḥ satyasya suyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu //
analyzed: śam naḥ satyasya su yamasya śaṃsaḥ śam naḥ aryamā puru jātaḥ astu

original: RV_7,035.03a śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ dhātā śam u dhartā naḥ astu śam naḥ urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_7,035.03c śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu //
analyzed: śam rodasī bṛhatī śam naḥ adriḥ śam naḥ devānām su havāni santu

original: RV_7,035.04a śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā śam /
analyzed: śam naḥ agniḥ jyotiḥ anīkaḥ astu śam naḥ mitrāvaruṇau aśvinā śam

original: RV_7,035.04c śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ su kṛtām sukṛtāni santu śam naḥ iṣiraḥ abhi vātu vātaḥ

original: RV_7,035.05a śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu /
analyzed: śam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva hūtau śam antarikṣam dṛśaye naḥ astu

original: RV_7,035.05c śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasas patir astu jiṣṇuḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ rajasaḥ patiḥ astu jiṣṇuḥ

original: RV_7,035.06a śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ suśaṃsaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ indraḥ vasubhiḥ devaḥ astu śam ādityebhiḥ varuṇaḥ su śaṃsaḥ

original: RV_7,035.06c śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu //
analyzed: śam naḥ rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ jalāṣaḥ śam naḥ tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ iha śṛṇotu

original: RV_7,035.07a śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ somaḥ bhavatu brahma śam naḥ śam naḥ grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ

original: RV_7,035.07c śaṃ naḥ svarūṇām mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ svarūṇām mitayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ prasvaḥ śam u astu vediḥ

original: RV_7,035.08a śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ naś catasraḥ pradiśo bhavantu /
analyzed: śam naḥ sūryaḥ uru cakṣāḥ ud etu śam naḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ bhavantu

original: RV_7,035.08c śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ parvatāḥ dhruvayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santu āpaḥ

original: RV_7,035.09a śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ aditiḥ bhavatu vratebhiḥ śam naḥ bhavantu marutaḥ su arkāḥ

original: RV_7,035.09c śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā naḥ astu śam naḥ bhavitram śam u astu vāyuḥ

original: RV_7,035.10a śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavantu uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_7,035.10c śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir astu śambhuḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ parjanyaḥ bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śam naḥ kṣetrasya patiḥ astu śambhuḥ

original: RV_7,035.11a śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir astu /
analyzed: śam naḥ devāḥ viśva devāḥ bhavantu śam sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ astu

original: RV_7,035.11c śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ //
analyzed: śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śam naḥ divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śam naḥ apyāḥ

original: RV_7,035.12a śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ satyasya patayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ

original: RV_7,035.12c śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavantu pitaro haveṣu //
analyzed: śam naḥ ṛbhavaḥ su kṛtaḥ su hastāḥ śam naḥ bhavantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: RV_7,035.13a śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śaṃ no 'hir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ ajaḥ eka pād devaḥ astu śam naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ śam samudraḥ

original: RV_7,035.13c śaṃ no apāṃ napāt perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛśnir bhavatu devagopā //
analyzed: śam naḥ apām napāt peruḥ astu śam naḥ pṛśniḥ bhavatu deva gopā

original: RV_7,035.14a ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantedam brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ juṣanta idam brahma kriyamāṇam navīyaḥ

original: RV_7,035.14c śṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇvantu naḥ divyāḥ pārthivāsaḥ go jātāḥ uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_7,035.15a ye devānāṃ yajñiyā yajñiyānām manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: ye devānām yajñiyāḥ yajñiyānām manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_7,035.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,036.01a pra brahmaitu sadanād ṛtasya vi raśmibhiḥ sasṛje sūryo gāḥ /
analyzed: pra brahmā etu sadanāt ṛtasya vi raśmibhiḥ sasṛje sūryaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_7,036.01c vi sānunā pṛthivī sasra urvī pṛthu pratīkam adhy edhe agniḥ //
analyzed: vi sānunā pṛthivī sasre urvī pṛthu pratīkam adhi edhe agniḥ

original: RV_7,036.02a imāṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktim iṣaṃ na kṛṇve asurā navīyaḥ /
analyzed: imām vām mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktim iṣam na kṛṇve asurāḥ navīyaḥ

original: RV_7,036.02c ino vām anyaḥ padavīr adabdho janaṃ ca mitro yatati bruvāṇaḥ //
analyzed: inaḥ vām anyaḥ padavīḥ adabdhaḥ janam ca mitraḥ yatati bruvāṇaḥ

original: RV_7,036.03a ā vātasya dhrajato ranta ityā apīpayanta dhenavo na sūdāḥ /
analyzed: ā vātasya dhrajataḥ rante ityāḥ apīpayanta dhenavaḥ na sūdāḥ

original: RV_7,036.03c maho divaḥ sadane jāyamāno 'cikradad vṛṣabhaḥ sasminn ūdhan //
analyzed: mahaḥ divaḥ sadane jāyamānaḥ cikradat vṛṣabhaḥ sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_7,036.04a girā ya etā yunajad dharī ta indra priyā surathā śūra dhāyū /
analyzed: girā yaḥ etā yunajat harī te indra priyā su rathā śūra dhāyū

original: RV_7,036.04c pra yo manyuṃ ririkṣato mināty ā sukratum aryamaṇaṃ vavṛtyām //
analyzed: pra yaḥ manyum ririkṣataḥ mināti ā sukratum aryamaṇam vavṛtyām

original: RV_7,036.05a yajante asya sakhyaṃ vayaś ca namasvinaḥ sva ṛtasya dhāman /
analyzed: yajante asya sakhyam vayaḥ ca namasvinaḥ sve ṛtasya dhāman

original: RV_7,036.05c vi pṛkṣo bābadhe nṛbhi stavāna idaṃ namo rudrāya preṣṭham //
analyzed: vi pṛkṣaḥ bābadhe nṛbhiḥ stavānaḥ idam namaḥ rudrāya preṣṭham

original: RV_7,036.06a ā yat sākaṃ yaśaso vāvaśānāḥ sarasvatī saptathī sindhumātā /
analyzed: ā yat sākam yaśasaḥ vāvaśānāḥ sarasvatī saptathī sindhu mātā

original: RV_7,036.06c yāḥ suṣvayanta sudughāḥ sudhārā abhi svena payasā pīpyānāḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ su dughāḥ su dhārāḥ abhi svena payasā pīpyānāḥ

original: RV_7,036.07a uta tye no maruto mandasānā dhiyaṃ tokaṃ ca vājino 'vantu /
analyzed: uta tye naḥ marutaḥ mandasānāḥ dhiyam tokam ca vājinaḥ vantu

original: RV_7,036.07c mā naḥ pari khyad akṣarā caranty avīvṛdhan yujyaṃ te rayiṃ naḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ pari khyat akṣarā carantī avīvṛdhan yujyam te rayim naḥ

original: RV_7,036.08a pra vo mahīm aramatiṃ kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇaṃ vidathyaṃ na vīram /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahīm aramatim kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇam vidathyam na vīram

original: RV_7,036.08c bhagaṃ dhiyo 'vitāraṃ no asyāḥ sātau vājaṃ rātiṣācam purandhim //
analyzed: bhagam dhiyaḥ vitāram naḥ asyāḥ sātau vājam rātiṣācam purandhim

original: RV_7,036.09a acchāyaṃ vo marutaḥ śloka etv acchā viṣṇuṃ niṣiktapām avobhiḥ /
analyzed: acchā ayam vaḥ marutaḥ ślokaḥ etu acchā viṣṇum niṣikta pām avobhiḥ

original: RV_7,036.09c uta prajāyai gṛṇate vayo dhur yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: uta prajāyai gṛṇate vayaḥ dhuḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,037.01a ā vo vāhiṣṭho vahatu stavadhyai ratho vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktaḥ /
analyzed: ā vaḥ vāhiṣṭhaḥ vahatu stavadhyai rathaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ amṛktaḥ

original: RV_7,037.01c abhi tripṛṣṭhaiḥ savaneṣu somair made suśiprā mahabhiḥ pṛṇadhvam //
analyzed: abhi tri pṛṣṭhaiḥ savaneṣu somaiḥ made su śiprāḥ mahabhiḥ pṛṇadhvam

original: RV_7,037.02a yūyaṃ ha ratnam maghavatsu dhattha svardṛśa ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktam /
analyzed: yūyam ha ratnam maghavatsu dhattha svar dṛśaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ amṛktam

original: RV_7,037.02c saṃ yajñeṣu svadhāvantaḥ pibadhvaṃ vi no rādhāṃsi matibhir dayadhvam //
analyzed: sam yajñeṣu svadhāvantaḥ pibadhvam vi naḥ rādhāṃsi matibhiḥ dayadhvam
