original: RV_7,037.03a uvocitha hi maghavan deṣṇam maho arbhasya vasuno vibhāge /
analyzed: uvocitha hi maghavan deṣṇam mahaḥ arbhasya vasunaḥ vibhāge

original: RV_7,037.03c ubhā te pūrṇā vasunā gabhastī na sūnṛtā ni yamate vasavyā //
analyzed: ubhā te pūrṇā vasunā gabhastī na sūnṛtā ni yamate vasavyā

original: RV_7,037.04a tvam indra svayaśā ṛbhukṣā vājo na sādhur astam eṣy ṛkvā /
analyzed: tvam indra sva yaśāḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ na sādhuḥ astam eṣi ṛkvā

original: RV_7,037.04c vayaṃ nu te dāśvāṃsaḥ syāma brahma kṛṇvanto harivo vasiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: vayam nu te dāśvāṃsaḥ syāma brahma kṛṇvantaḥ harivas vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,037.05a sanitāsi pravato dāśuṣe cid yābhir viveṣo haryaśva dhībhiḥ /
analyzed: sanitāsi pravataḥ dāśuṣe cit yābhiḥ viveṣaḥ haryaśva dhībhiḥ

original: RV_7,037.05c vavanmā nu te yujyābhir ūtī kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyeḥ //
analyzed: vavanma nu te yujyābhiḥ ūtī kadā naḥ indra rāyaḥ ā daśasyeḥ

original: RV_7,037.06a vāsayasīva vedhasas tvaṃ naḥ kadā na indra vacaso bubodhaḥ /
analyzed: vāsayasi iva vedhasaḥ tvam naḥ kadā naḥ indra vacasaḥ bubodhaḥ

original: RV_7,037.06c astaṃ tātyā dhiyā rayiṃ suvīram pṛkṣo no arvā ny uhīta vājī //
analyzed: astam tātyā dhiyā rayim su vīram pṛkṣaḥ naḥ arvā ni uhīta vājī

original: RV_7,037.07a abhi yaṃ devī nirṛtiś cid īśe nakṣanta indraṃ śaradaḥ supṛkṣaḥ /
analyzed: abhi yam devī nirṛtiḥ cit īśe nakṣante indram śaradaḥ su pṛkṣaḥ

original: RV_7,037.07c upa tribandhur jaradaṣṭim ety asvaveśaṃ yaṃ kṛṇavanta martāḥ //
analyzed: upa tribandhuḥ jaradaṣṭim eti a sva veśam yam kṛṇavanta martāḥ

original: RV_7,037.08a ā no rādhāṃsi savita stavadhyā ā rāyo yantu parvatasya rātau /
analyzed: ā naḥ rādhāṃsi savitaḥ stavadhyai ā rāyaḥ yantu parvatasya rātau

original: RV_7,037.08c sadā no divyaḥ pāyuḥ siṣaktu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sadā naḥ divyaḥ pāyuḥ siṣaktu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,038.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā yayāma hiraṇyayīm amatiṃ yām aśiśret /
analyzed: ud u sya devaḥ savitā yayāma hiraṇyayīm amatim yām aśiśret

original: RV_7,038.01c nūnam bhago havyo mānuṣebhir vi yo ratnā purūvasur dadhāti //
analyzed: nūnam bhagaḥ havyaḥ mānuṣebhiḥ vi yaḥ ratnā purūvasuḥ dadhāti

original: RV_7,038.02a ud u tiṣṭha savitaḥ śrudhy asya hiraṇyapāṇe prabhṛtāv ṛtasya /
analyzed: ud u tiṣṭha savitar śrudhi asya hiraṇya pāṇe prabhṛtau ṛtasya

original: RV_7,038.02c vy urvīm pṛthvīm amatiṃ sṛjāna ā nṛbhyo martabhojanaṃ suvānaḥ //
analyzed: vi urvīm pṛthvīm amatim sṛjānaḥ ā nṛbhyaḥ marta bhojanam suvānaḥ

original: RV_7,038.03a api ṣṭutaḥ savitā devo astu yam ā cid viśve vasavo gṛṇanti /
analyzed: api stutaḥ savitā devaḥ astu yam ā cit viśve vasavaḥ gṛṇanti

original: RV_7,038.03c sa na stomān namasyaś cano dhād viśvebhiḥ pātu pāyubhir ni sūrīn //
analyzed: sa naḥ stomān namasyaḥ canaḥ dhāt viśvebhiḥ pātu pāyubhiḥ ni sūrīn

original: RV_7,038.04a abhi yaṃ devy aditir gṛṇāti savaṃ devasya savitur juṣāṇā /
analyzed: abhi yam devī aditiḥ gṛṇāti savam devasya savituḥ juṣāṇā

original: RV_7,038.04c abhi samrājo varuṇo gṛṇanty abhi mitrāso aryamā sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: abhi samrājaḥ varuṇaḥ gṛṇanti abhi mitrāsaḥ aryamā sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_7,038.05a abhi ye mitho vanuṣaḥ sapante rātiṃ divo rātiṣācaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: abhi ye mithas vanuṣaḥ sapante rātim divaḥ rātiṣācaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_7,038.05c ahir budhnya uta naḥ śṛṇotu varūtry ekadhenubhir ni pātu //
analyzed: ahiḥ budhnyaḥ uta naḥ śṛṇotu varūtrī ekadhenubhiḥ ni pātu

original: RV_7,038.06a anu tan no jāspatir maṃsīṣṭa ratnaṃ devasya savitur iyānaḥ /
analyzed: anu tat naḥ jāspatiḥ maṃsīṣṭa ratnam devasya savituḥ iyānaḥ

original: RV_7,038.06c bhagam ugro 'vase johavīti bhagam anugro adha yāti ratnam //
analyzed: bhagam ugraḥ vase johavīti bhagam anugraḥ adha yāti ratnam

original: RV_7,038.07a śaṃ no bhavantu vājino haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ svarkāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhavantu vājinaḥ haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ su arkāḥ

original: RV_7,038.07c jambhayanto 'hiṃ vṛkaṃ rakṣāṃsi sanemy asmad yuyavann amīvāḥ //
analyzed: jambhayantaḥ him vṛkam rakṣāṃsi sanemi asmat yuyavan amīvāḥ

original: RV_7,038.08a vāje-vāje 'vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: vājevāje vata vājinaḥ naḥ dhaneṣu viprāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_7,038.08c asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ //
analyzed: asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvam tṛptāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: RV_7,039.01a ūrdhvo agniḥ sumatiṃ vasvo aśret pratīcī jūrṇir devatātim eti /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ sumatim vasvaḥ aśret pratīcī jūrṇiḥ devatātim eti

original: RV_7,039.01c bhejāte adrī rathyeva panthām ṛtaṃ hotā na iṣito yajāti //
analyzed: bhejāte adrī rathyā iva panthām ṛtam hotā naḥ iṣitaḥ yajāti

original: RV_7,039.02a pra vāvṛje suprayā barhir eṣām ā viśpatīva bīriṭa iyāte /
analyzed: pra vāvṛje su prayāḥ barhiḥ eṣām ā viśpatī iva bīriṭe iyāte

original: RV_7,039.02c viśām aktor uṣasaḥ pūrvahūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān //
analyzed: viśām aktoḥ uṣasaḥ pūrva hūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān

original: RV_7,039.03a jmayā atra vasavo ranta devā urāv antarikṣe marjayanta śubhrāḥ /
analyzed: jma yāḥ atra vasavaḥ ranta devāḥ urau antarikṣe marjayanta śubhrāḥ

original: RV_7,039.03c arvāk patha urujrayaḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ śrotā dūtasya jagmuṣo no asya //
analyzed: arvāk pathaḥ uru jrayaḥ kṛṇudhvam śrota dūtasya jagmuṣaḥ naḥ asya

original: RV_7,039.04a te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmāḥ sadhasthaṃ viśve abhi santi devāḥ /
analyzed: te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsaḥ ūmāḥ sadhastham viśve abhi santi devāḥ

original: RV_7,039.04c tāṃ adhvara uśato yakṣy agne śruṣṭī bhagaṃ nāsatyā purandhim //
analyzed: tām adhvare uśataḥ yakṣi agne śruṣṭī bhagam nāsatyā purandhim

original: RV_7,039.05a āgne giro diva ā pṛthivyā mitraṃ vaha varuṇam indram agnim /
analyzed: ā agne giraḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ mitram vaha varuṇam indram agnim

original: RV_7,039.05c āryamaṇam aditiṃ viṣṇum eṣāṃ sarasvatī maruto mādayantām //
analyzed: ā aryamaṇam aditim viṣṇum eṣām sarasvatī marutaḥ mādayantām

original: RV_7,039.06a rare havyam matibhir yajñiyānāṃ nakṣat kāmam martyānām asinvan /
analyzed: rare havyam matibhiḥ yajñiyānām nakṣat kāmam martyānām asinvan

original: RV_7,039.06c dhātā rayim avidasyaṃ sadāsāṃ sakṣīmahi yujyebhir nu devaiḥ //
analyzed: dhāta rayim avidasyam sadāsām sakṣīmahi yujyebhiḥ nu devaiḥ

original: RV_7,039.07a nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
analyzed: nu rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhaiḥ ṛtāvānaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_7,039.07c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: yacchantu candrāḥ upamam naḥ arkam yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,040.01a o śruṣṭir vidathyā sam etu prati stomaṃ dadhīmahi turāṇām /
analyzed: ā u śruṣṭiḥ vidathyā sam etu prati stomam dadhīmahi turāṇām

original: RV_7,040.01c yad adya devaḥ savitā suvāti syāmāsya ratnino vibhāge //
analyzed: yat adya devaḥ savitā suvāti syāma asya ratninaḥ vibhāge

original: RV_7,040.02a mitras tan no varuṇo rodasī ca dyubhaktam indro aryamā dadātu /
analyzed: mitraḥ tat naḥ varuṇaḥ rodasī ca dyu bhaktam indraḥ aryamā dadātu

original: RV_7,040.02c dideṣṭu devy aditī rekṇo vāyuś ca yan niyuvaite bhagaś ca //
analyzed: dideṣṭu devī aditiḥ rekṇaḥ vāyuḥ ca yat niyuvaite bhagaḥ ca

original: RV_7,040.03a sed ugro astu marutaḥ sa śuṣmī yam martyam pṛṣadaśvā avātha /
analyzed: sa id ugraḥ astu marutaḥ sa śuṣmī yam martyam pṛṣat aśvāḥ avātha

original: RV_7,040.03c utem agniḥ sarasvatī junanti na tasya rāyaḥ paryetāsti //
analyzed: uta īm agniḥ sarasvatī junanti na tasya rāyaḥ paryetā asti

original: RV_7,040.04a ayaṃ hi netā varuṇa ṛtasya mitro rājāno aryamāpo dhuḥ /
analyzed: ayam hi netā varuṇaḥ ṛtasya mitraḥ rājānaḥ aryamā apaḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_7,040.04c suhavā devy aditir anarvā te no aṃho ati parṣann ariṣṭān //
analyzed: su havā devī aditiḥ anarvā te naḥ aṃhaḥ ati parṣan ariṣṭān

original: RV_7,040.05a asya devasya mīḷhuṣo vayā viṣṇor eṣasya prabhṛthe havirbhiḥ /
analyzed: asya devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ vayāḥ viṣṇoḥ eṣasya prabhṛthe havirbhiḥ

original: RV_7,040.05c vide hi rudro rudriyam mahitvaṃ yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat //
analyzed: vide hi rudraḥ rudriyam mahi tvam yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinau irāvat

original: RV_7,040.06a mātra pūṣann āghṛṇa irasyo varūtrī yad rātiṣācaś ca rāsan /
analyzed: mā atra pūṣan āghṛṇe irasyaḥ varūtrī yat rātiṣācaḥ ca rāsan

original: RV_7,040.06c mayobhuvo no arvanto ni pāntu vṛṣṭim parijmā vāto dadātu //
analyzed: mayobhuvaḥ naḥ arvantaḥ ni pāntu vṛṣṭim parijmā vātaḥ dadātu

original: RV_7,040.07a nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
analyzed: nu rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhaiḥ ṛtāvānaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_7,040.07c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: yacchantu candrāḥ upamam naḥ arkam yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,041.01a prātar agnim prātar indraṃ havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā /
analyzed: prātar agnim prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā

original: RV_7,041.01c prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ huvema //
analyzed: prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim prātar somam uta rudram huvema

original: RV_7,041.02a prātarjitam bhagam ugraṃ huvema vayam putram aditer yo vidhartā /
analyzed: prātar jitam bhagam ugram huvema vayam putram aditeḥ yaḥ vidhartā

original: RV_7,041.02c ādhraś cid yam manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yam bhagam bhakṣīty āha //
analyzed: ādhraḥ cit yam manyamānaḥ turaḥ cit rājā cit yam bhagam bhakṣi iti āha

original: RV_7,041.03a bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan naḥ /
analyzed: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satya rādhaḥ bhaga imām dhiyam ud ava dadan naḥ

original: RV_7,041.03c bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma //
analyzed: bhaga pra naḥ janaya gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ bhaga pra nṛbhiḥ nṛvantaḥ syāma

original: RV_7,041.04a utedānīm bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām /
analyzed: uta idānīm bhagavantaḥ syāma uta prapitve uta madhye ahnām

original: RV_7,041.04c utoditā maghavan sūryasya vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma //
analyzed: uta uditā maghavan sūryasya vayam devānām sumatau syāma

original: RV_7,041.05a bhaga eva bhagavāṃ astu devās tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma /
analyzed: bhagaḥ eva bhagavān astu devāḥ tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma

original: RV_7,041.05c taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha //
analyzed: tam tvā bhaga sarvaḥ id johavīti sa naḥ bhaga puraetā bhava iha

original: RV_7,041.06a sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya /
analyzed: sam adhvarāya uṣasaḥ namanta dadhikrāvā iva śucaye padāya

original: RV_7,041.06c arvācīnaṃ vasuvidam bhagaṃ no ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu //
analyzed: arvācīnam vasu vidam bhagam naḥ ratham iva aśvāḥ vājinaḥ ā vahantu

original: RV_7,041.07a aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ /
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ

original: RV_7,041.07c ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,042.01a pra brahmāṇo aṅgiraso nakṣanta pra krandanur nabhanyasya vetu /
analyzed: pra brahmāṇaḥ aṅgirasaḥ nakṣanta pra krandanuḥ nabhanyasya vetu

original: RV_7,042.01c pra dhenava udapruto navanta yujyātām adrī adhvarasya peśaḥ //
analyzed: pra dhenavaḥ uda prutaḥ navanta yujyātām adrī adhvarasya peśaḥ

original: RV_7,042.02a sugas te agne sanavitto adhvā yukṣvā sute harito rohitaś ca /
analyzed: sugaḥ te agne sanavittaḥ adhvā yukṣva sute haritaḥ rohitaḥ ca

original: RV_7,042.02c ye vā sadmann aruṣā vīravāho huve devānāṃ janimāni sattaḥ //
analyzed: ye vā sadman aruṣā vīra vāhaḥ huve devānām janimāni sattaḥ

original: RV_7,042.03a sam u vo yajñam mahayan namobhiḥ pra hotā mandro ririca upāke /
analyzed: sam u vaḥ yajñam mahayan namobhiḥ pra hotā mandraḥ ririce upāke

original: RV_7,042.03c yajasva su purvaṇīka devān ā yajñiyām aramatiṃ vavṛtyāḥ //
analyzed: yajasva su purvaṇīka devān ā yajñiyām aramatim vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_7,042.04a yadā vīrasya revato duroṇe syonaśīr atithir āciketat /
analyzed: yadā vīrasya revataḥ duroṇe syonaśīḥ atithiḥ āciketat

original: RV_7,042.04c suprīto agniḥ sudhito dama ā sa viśe dāti vāryam iyatyai //
analyzed: su prītaḥ agniḥ sudhitaḥ dame ā sa viśe dāti vāryam iyatyai

original: RV_7,042.05a imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva marutsv indre yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ /
analyzed: imam naḥ agne adhvaram juṣasva marutsu indre yaśasam kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_7,042.05c ā naktā barhiḥ sadatām uṣāsośantā mitrāvaruṇā yajeha //
analyzed: ā naktā barhiḥ sadatām uṣāsā uśantā mitrāvaruṇā yaja iha

original: RV_7,042.06a evāgniṃ sahasyaṃ vasiṣṭho rāyaskāmo viśvapsnyasya staut /
analyzed: eva agnim sahasyam vasiṣṭhaḥ rāyaskāmaḥ viśvapsnyasya staut

original: RV_7,042.06c iṣaṃ rayim paprathad vājam asme yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣam rayim paprathat vājam asme yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,043.01a pra vo yajñeṣu devayanto arcan dyāvā namobhiḥ pṛthivī iṣadhyai /
analyzed: pra vaḥ yajñeṣu devayantaḥ arcan dyāvā namobhiḥ pṛthivī iṣadhyai

original: RV_7,043.01c yeṣām brahmāṇy asamāni viprā viṣvag viyanti vanino na śākhāḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām brahmāṇi asamāni viprāḥ viṣvak viyanti vaninaḥ na śākhāḥ

original: RV_7,043.02a pra yajña etu hetvo na saptir ud yacchadhvaṃ samanaso ghṛtācīḥ /
analyzed: pra yajñaḥ etu hetvaḥ na saptiḥ ud yacchadhvam samanasaḥ ghṛtācīḥ

original: RV_7,043.02c stṛṇīta barhir adhvarāya sādhūrdhvā śocīṃṣi devayūny asthuḥ //
analyzed: stṛṇīta barhiḥ adhvarāya sādhu ūrdhvā śocīṃṣi devayūni asthuḥ

original: RV_7,043.03a ā putrāso na mātaraṃ vibhṛtrāḥ sānau devāso barhiṣaḥ sadantu /
analyzed: ā putrāsaḥ na mātaram vibhṛtrāḥ sānau devāsaḥ barhiṣaḥ sadantu

original: RV_7,043.03c ā viśvācī vidathyām anaktv agne mā no devatātā mṛdhas kaḥ //
analyzed: ā viśvācī vidathyām anaktu agne mā naḥ devatātā mṛdhaḥ kaḥ

original: RV_7,043.04a te sīṣapanta joṣam ā yajatrā ṛtasya dhārāḥ sudughā duhānāḥ /
analyzed: te sīṣapanta joṣam ā yajatrāḥ ṛtasya dhārāḥ sudughāḥ duhānāḥ

original: RV_7,043.04c jyeṣṭhaṃ vo adya maha ā vasūnām ā gantana samanaso yati ṣṭha //
analyzed: jyeṣṭham vaḥ adya mahaḥ ā vasūnām ā gantana samanasaḥ yati stha

original: RV_7,043.05a evā no agne vikṣv ā daśasya tvayā vayaṃ sahasāvann āskrāḥ /
analyzed: eva naḥ agne vikṣu ā daśasya tvayā vayam sahasāvan āskrāḥ

original: RV_7,043.05c rāyā yujā sadhamādo ariṣṭā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: rāyā yujā sadhamādaḥ ariṣṭāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,044.01a dadhikrāṃ vaḥ prathamam aśvinoṣasam agniṃ samiddham bhagam ūtaye huve /
analyzed: dadhikrām vaḥ prathamam aśvinā uṣasam agnim samiddham bhagam ūtaye huve

original: RV_7,044.01c indraṃ viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ //
analyzed: indram viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svar

original: RV_7,044.02a dadhikrām u namasā bodhayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ /
analyzed: dadhikrām u namasā bodhayantaḥ udīrāṇāḥ yajñam upaprayantaḥ

original: RV_7,044.02c iḷāṃ devīm barhiṣi sādayanto 'śvinā viprā suhavā huvema //
analyzed: iḷām devīm barhiṣi sādayantaḥ śvinā viprā su havāḥ huvema

original: RV_7,044.03a dadhikrāvāṇam bubudhāno agnim upa bruva uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām /
analyzed: dadhikrāvāṇam bubudhānaḥ agnim upa bruve uṣasam sūryam gām

original: RV_7,044.03c bradhnam māṃścator varuṇasya babhruṃ te viśvāsmad duritā yāvayantu //
analyzed: bradhnam māṃścatoḥ varuṇasya babhrum te viśvā asmat duritā yāvayantu

original: RV_7,044.04a dadhikrāvā prathamo vājy arvāgre rathānām bhavati prajānan /
analyzed: dadhikrāvā prathamaḥ vājī arvā agre rathānām bhavati prajānan

original: RV_7,044.04c saṃvidāna uṣasā sūryeṇādityebhir vasubhir aṅgirobhiḥ //
analyzed: saṃvidānaḥ uṣasā sūryeṇa ādityebhiḥ vasubhiḥ aṅgirobhiḥ

original: RV_7,044.05a ā no dadhikrāḥ pathyām anaktv ṛtasya panthām anvetavā u /
analyzed: ā naḥ dadhikrāḥ pathyām anaktu ṛtasya panthām anvetavai u

original: RV_7,044.05c śṛṇotu no daivyaṃ śardho agniḥ śṛṇvantu viśve mahiṣā amūrāḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇotu naḥ daivyam śardhaḥ agniḥ śṛṇvantu viśve mahiṣāḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_7,045.01a ā devo yātu savitā suratno 'ntarikṣaprā vahamāno aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: ā devaḥ yātu savitā su ratnaḥ ntarikṣa prāḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_7,045.01c haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi niveśayañ ca prasuvañ ca bhūma //
analyzed: haste dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi niveśayam ca prasuvam ca bhūma

original: RV_7,045.02a ud asya bāhū śithirā bṛhantā hiraṇyayā divo antāṃ anaṣṭām /
analyzed: ud asya bāhū śithirā bṛhantā hiraṇyayā divaḥ antām anaṣṭām

original: RV_7,045.02c nūnaṃ so asya mahimā paniṣṭa sūraś cid asmā anu dād apasyām //
analyzed: nūnam saḥ asya mahimā paniṣṭa sūraḥ cit asmai anu dāt apasyām

original: RV_7,045.03a sa ghā no devaḥ savitā sahāvā sāviṣad vasupatir vasūni /
analyzed: sa gha naḥ devaḥ savitā sahāvā sāviṣat vasu patiḥ vasūni

original: RV_7,045.03c viśrayamāṇo amatim urūcīm martabhojanam adha rāsate naḥ //
analyzed: viśrayamāṇaḥ amatim urūcīm marta bhojanam adha rāsate naḥ

original: RV_7,045.04a imā giraḥ savitāraṃ sujihvam pūrṇagabhastim īḷate supāṇim /
analyzed: imāḥ giraḥ savitāram su jihvam pūrṇa gabhastim īḍate su pāṇim

original: RV_7,045.04c citraṃ vayo bṛhad asme dadhātu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: citram vayaḥ bṛhat asme dadhātu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,046.01a imā rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ kṣipreṣave devāya svadhāvne /
analyzed: imāḥ rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ kṣipreṣave devāya svadhāvne

original: RV_7,046.01c aṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase tigmāyudhāya bharatā śṛṇotu naḥ //
analyzed: aṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase tigma āyudhāya bharatā śṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_7,046.02a sa hi kṣayeṇa kṣamyasya janmanaḥ sāmrājyena divyasya cetati /
analyzed: sa hi kṣayeṇa kṣamyasya janmanaḥ sāmrājyena divyasya cetati

original: RV_7,046.02c avann avantīr upa no duraś carānamīvo rudra jāsu no bhava //
analyzed: avan avantīḥ upa naḥ duraḥ cara anamīvaḥ rudra jāsu naḥ bhava

original: RV_7,046.03a yā te didyud avasṛṣṭā divas pari kṣmayā carati pari sā vṛṇaktu naḥ /
analyzed: yā te didyut avasṛṣṭā divaḥ pari kṣmayā carati pari sā vṛṇaktu naḥ

original: RV_7,046.03c sahasraṃ te svapivāta bheṣajā mā nas tokeṣu tanayeṣu rīriṣaḥ //
analyzed: sahasram te svapivāta bheṣajā mā naḥ tokeṣu tanayeṣu rīriṣaḥ

original: RV_7,046.04a mā no vadhī rudra mā parā dā mā te bhūma prasitau hīḷitasya /
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ rudra mā parā dāḥ mā te bhūma prasitau hīḷitasya

original: RV_7,046.04c ā no bhaja barhiṣi jīvaśaṃse yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ bhaja barhiṣi jīva śaṃse yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,047.01a āpo yaṃ vaḥ prathamaṃ devayanta indrapānam ūrmim akṛṇvateḷaḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ yam vaḥ prathamam devayantaḥ indra pānam ūrmim akṛṇvata iḷaḥ

original: RV_7,047.01c taṃ vo vayaṃ śucim aripram adya ghṛtapruṣam madhumantaṃ vanema //
analyzed: tam vaḥ vayam śucim aripram adya ghṛta pruṣam madhumantam vanema

original: RV_7,047.02a tam ūrmim āpo madhumattamaṃ vo 'pāṃ napād avatv āśuhemā /
analyzed: tam ūrmim āpaḥ madhumattamam vaḥ pām napāt avatu āśu hemā

original: RV_7,047.02c yasminn indro vasubhir mādayāte tam aśyāma devayanto vo adya //
analyzed: yasmin indraḥ vasubhiḥ mādayāte tam aśyāma devayantaḥ vaḥ adya

original: RV_7,047.03a śatapavitrāḥ svadhayā madantīr devīr devānām api yanti pāthaḥ /
analyzed: śata pavitrāḥ svadhayā madantīḥ devīḥ devānām api yanti pāthaḥ

original: RV_7,047.03c tā indrasya na minanti vratāni sindhubhyo havyaṃ ghṛtavaj juhota //
analyzed: tāḥ indrasya na minanti vratāni sindhubhyaḥ havyam ghṛtavat juhota

original: RV_7,047.04a yāḥ sūryo raśmibhir ātatāna yābhya indro aradad gātum ūrmim /
analyzed: yāḥ sūryaḥ raśmibhiḥ ātatāna yābhyaḥ indraḥ aradat gātum ūrmim

original: RV_7,047.04c te sindhavo varivo dhātanā no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: te sindhavaḥ varivaḥ dhātana naḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,048.01a ṛbhukṣaṇo vājā mādayadhvam asme naro maghavānaḥ sutasya /
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ vājāḥ mādayadhvam asme naraḥ maghavānaḥ sutasya

original: RV_7,048.01c ā vo 'rvācaḥ kratavo na yātāṃ vibhvo rathaṃ naryaṃ vartayantu //
analyzed: ā vaḥ rvācaḥ kratavaḥ na yātām vibhvaḥ ratham naryam vartayantu

original: RV_7,048.02a ṛbhur ṛbhubhir abhi vaḥ syāma vibhvo vibhubhiḥ śavasā śavāṃsi /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ ṛbhubhiḥ abhi vaḥ syāma vibhvaḥ vibhubhiḥ śavasā śavāṃsi

original: RV_7,048.02c vājo asmāṃ avatu vājasātāv indreṇa yujā taruṣema vṛtram //
analyzed: vājaḥ asmām avatu vājasātau indreṇa yujā taruṣema vṛtram

original: RV_7,048.03a te cid dhi pūrvīr abhi santi śāsā viśvāṃ arya uparatāti vanvan /
analyzed: te cit hi pūrvīḥ abhi santi śāsā viśvān aryaḥ uparatāti vanvan

original: RV_7,048.03c indro vibhvāṃ ṛbhukṣā vājo aryaḥ śatror mithatyā kṛṇavan vi nṛmṇam //
analyzed: indraḥ vibhvā ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ aryaḥ śatroḥ mithatyā kṛṇavan vi nṛmṇam

original: RV_7,048.04a nū devāso varivaḥ kartanā no bhūta no viśve 'vase sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: nu devāsaḥ varivaḥ kartana naḥ bhūta naḥ viśve vase sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_7,048.04c sam asme iṣaṃ vasavo dadīran yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sam asme iṣam vasavaḥ dadīran yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,049.01a samudrajyeṣṭhāḥ salilasya madhyāt punānā yanty aniviśamānāḥ /
analyzed: samudra jyeṣṭhāḥ salilasya madhyāt punānāḥ yanti a niviśamānāḥ

original: RV_7,049.01c indro yā vajrī vṛṣabho rarāda tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
analyzed: indraḥ yāḥ vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ rarāda tāḥ āpaḥ devīḥ iha mām avantu

original: RV_7,049.02a yā āpo divyā uta vā sravanti khanitrimā uta vā yāḥ svayañjāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ āpaḥ divyāḥ uta vā sravanti khanitrimāḥ uta vā yāḥ svayañjāḥ

original: RV_7,049.02c samudrārthā yāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakās tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
analyzed: samudra arthāḥ yāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ tāḥ āpaḥ devīḥ iha mām avantu

original: RV_7,049.03a yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhye satyānṛte avapaśyañ janānām /
analyzed: yāsām rājā varuṇaḥ yāti madhye satya anṛte avapaśyam janānām

original: RV_7,049.03c madhuścutaḥ śucayo yāḥ pāvakās tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
analyzed: madhuścutaḥ śucayaḥ yāḥ pāvakāḥ tāḥ āpaḥ devīḥ iha mām avantu

original: RV_7,049.04a yāsu rājā varuṇo yāsu somo viśve devā yāsūrjam madanti /
analyzed: yāsu rājā varuṇaḥ yāsu somaḥ viśve devāḥ yāsu ūrjam madanti

original: RV_7,049.04c vaiśvānaro yāsv agniḥ praviṣṭas tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ yāsu agniḥ praviṣṭaḥ tāḥ āpaḥ devīḥ iha mām avantu

original: RV_7,050.01a ā mām mitrāvaruṇeha rakṣataṃ kulāyayad viśvayan mā na ā gan /
analyzed: ā mām mitrāvaruṇā iha rakṣatam kulāyayat viśvayat mā naḥ ā gan

original: RV_7,050.01c ajakāvaṃ durdṛśīkaṃ tiro dadhe mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ //
analyzed: ajakāvam durdṛśīkam tiras dadhe mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ

original: RV_7,050.02a yad vijāman paruṣi vandanam bhuvad aṣṭhīvantau pari kulphau ca dehat /
analyzed: yat vijāman paruṣi vandanam bhuvat aṣṭhīvantau pari kulphau ca dehat

original: RV_7,050.02c agniṣ ṭac chocann apa bādhatām ito mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ tat śocan apa bādhatām itas mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ

original: RV_7,050.03a yac chalmalau bhavati yan nadīṣu yad oṣadhībhyaḥ pari jāyate viṣam /
analyzed: yat śalmalau bhavati yat nadīṣu yat oṣadhībhyaḥ pari jāyate viṣam

original: RV_7,050.03c viśve devā nir itas tat suvantu mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ niḥ itas tat suvantu mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ

original: RV_7,050.04a yāḥ pravato nivata udvata udanvatīr anudakāś ca yāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ pravataḥ nivataḥ udvataḥ udanvatīḥ anudakāḥ ca yāḥ

original: RV_7,050.04c tā asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ śivā devīr aśipadā bhavantu sarvā nadyo aśimidā bhavantu //
analyzed: tāḥ asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ śivāḥ devīḥ a śipadāḥ bhavantu sarvāḥ nadyaḥ a śimidāḥ bhavantu

original: RV_7,051.01a ādityānām avasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śantamena /
analyzed: ādityānām avasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śantamena

original: RV_7,051.01c anāgāstve adititve turāsa imaṃ yajñaṃ dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: anāgāstve aditi tve turāsaḥ imam yajñam dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_7,051.02a ādityāso aditir mādayantām mitro aryamā varuṇo rajiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ aditiḥ mādayantām mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ rajiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,051.02c asmākaṃ santu bhuvanasya gopāḥ pibantu somam avase no adya //
analyzed: asmākam santu bhuvanasya gopāḥ pibantu somam avase naḥ adya

original: RV_7,051.03a ādityā viśve marutaś ca viśve devāś ca viśva ṛbhavaś ca viśve /
analyzed: ādityāḥ viśve marutaḥ ca viśve devāḥ ca viśve ṛbhavaḥ ca viśve

original: RV_7,051.03c indro agnir aśvinā tuṣṭuvānā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ agniḥ aśvinā tuṣṭuvānāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,052.01a ādityāso aditayaḥ syāma pūr devatrā vasavo martyatrā /
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ aditayaḥ syāma pūḥ devatrā vasavaḥ martyatrā

original: RV_7,052.01c sanema mitrāvaruṇā sananto bhavema dyāvāpṛthivī bhavantaḥ //
analyzed: sanema mitrāvaruṇā sanantaḥ bhavema dyāvāpṛthivī bhavantaḥ

original: RV_7,052.02a mitras tan no varuṇo māmahanta śarma tokāya tanayāya gopāḥ /
analyzed: mitraḥ tat naḥ varuṇaḥ māmahanta śarma tokāya tanayāya gopāḥ

original: RV_7,052.02c mā vo bhujemānyajātam eno mā tat karma vasavo yac cayadhve //
analyzed: mā vaḥ bhujema anya jātam enaḥ mā tat karma vasavaḥ yat cayadhve

original: RV_7,052.03a turaṇyavo 'ṅgiraso nakṣanta ratnaṃ devasya savitur iyānāḥ /
analyzed: turaṇyavaḥ ṅgirasaḥ nakṣanta ratnam devasya savituḥ iyānāḥ

original: RV_7,052.03c pitā ca tan no mahān yajatro viśve devāḥ samanaso juṣanta //
analyzed: pitā ca tat naḥ mahān yajatraḥ viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_7,053.01a pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī namobhiḥ sabādha īḷe bṛhatī yajatre /
analyzed: pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī namobhiḥ sabādhas īḍe bṛhatī yajatre

original: RV_7,053.01c te cid dhi pūrve kavayo gṛṇantaḥ puro mahī dadhire devaputre //
analyzed: te cit hi pūrve kavayaḥ gṛṇantaḥ puras mahī dadhire deva putre

original: RV_7,053.02a pra pūrvaje pitarā navyasībhir gīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sadane ṛtasya /
analyzed: pra pūrva je pitarā navyasībhiḥ gīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvam sadane ṛtasya

original: RV_7,053.02c ā no dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātam mahi vāṃ varūtham //
analyzed: ā naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātam mahi vām varūtham

original: RV_7,053.03a uto hi vāṃ ratnadheyāni santi purūṇi dyāvāpṛthivī sudāse /
analyzed: uta u hi vām ratna dheyāni santi purūṇi dyāvāpṛthivī sudāse

original: RV_7,053.03c asme dhattaṃ yad asad askṛdhoyu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: asme dhattam yat asat yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,054.01a vāstoṣ pate prati jānīhy asmān svāveśo anamīvo bhavā naḥ /
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate prati jānīhi asmān su āveśaḥ anamīvaḥ bhava naḥ

original: RV_7,054.01c yat tvemahe prati tan no juṣasva śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: yat tvā īmahe prati tat naḥ juṣasva śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_7,054.02a vāstoṣ pate prataraṇo na edhi gayasphāno gobhir aśvebhir indo /
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate prataraṇaḥ naḥ edhi gaya sphānaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ indo

original: RV_7,054.02c ajarāsas te sakhye syāma piteva putrān prati no juṣasva //
analyzed: ajarāsaḥ te sakhye syāma pitā iva putrān prati naḥ juṣasva

original: RV_7,054.03a vāstoṣ pate śagmayā saṃsadā te sakṣīmahi raṇvayā gātumatyā /
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate śagmayā saṃsadā te sakṣīmahi raṇvayā gātumatyā

original: RV_7,054.03c pāhi kṣema uta yoge varaṃ no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: pāhi kṣeme uta yoge varam naḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,055.01a amīvahā vāstoṣ pate viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan /
analyzed: amīva hā vāstoḥ pate viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan

original: RV_7,055.01c sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ //
analyzed: sakhā su śevaḥ edhi naḥ

original: RV_7,055.02a yad arjuna sārameya dataḥ piśaṅga yacchase /
analyzed: yat arjuna sārameya dataḥ piśaṅga yacchase

original: RV_7,055.02c vīva bhrājanta ṛṣṭaya upa srakveṣu bapsato ni ṣu svapa //
analyzed: vi iva bhrājante ṛṣṭayaḥ upa srakveṣu bapsataḥ ni su svapa

original: RV_7,055.03a stenaṃ rāya sārameya taskaraṃ vā punaḥsara /
analyzed: stenam rāya sārameya taskaram vā punaḥsara

original: RV_7,055.03c stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni ṣu svapa //
analyzed: stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni su svapa

original: RV_7,055.04a tvaṃ sūkarasya dardṛhi tava dardartu sūkaraḥ /
analyzed: tvam sūkarasya dardṛhi tava dardartu sūkaraḥ

original: RV_7,055.04c stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni ṣu svapa //
analyzed: stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni su svapa

original: RV_7,055.05a sastu mātā sastu pitā sastu śvā sastu viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: sastu mātā sastu pitā sastu śvā sastu viśpatiḥ

original: RV_7,055.05c sasantu sarve jñātayaḥ sastv ayam abhito janaḥ //
analyzed: sasantu sarve jñātayaḥ sastu ayam abhitas janaḥ

original: RV_7,055.06a ya āste yaś ca carati yaś ca paśyati no janaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ āste yaḥ ca carati yaḥ ca paśyati naḥ janaḥ

original: RV_7,055.06c teṣāṃ saṃ hanmo akṣāṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā //
analyzed: teṣām sam hanmaḥ akṣāṇi yathā idam harmyam tathā

original: RV_7,055.07a sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrād udācarat /
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ samudrāt udācarat

original: RV_7,055.07c tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janān svāpayāmasi //
analyzed: tena sahasyena vayam ni janān svāpayāmasi

original: RV_7,055.08a proṣṭheśayā vahyeśayā nārīr yās talpaśīvarīḥ /
analyzed: proṣṭheśayāḥ vahyeśayāḥ nārīḥ yāḥ talpa śīvarīḥ

original: RV_7,055.08c striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhās tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi //
analyzed: striyaḥ yāḥ puṇya gandhāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi

original: RV_7,056.01a ka īṃ vyaktā naraḥ sanīḷā rudrasya maryā adha svaśvāḥ //
analyzed: ke īm vyaktāḥ naraḥ sanīḍāḥ rudrasya maryāḥ adha su aśvāḥ

original: RV_7,056.02a nakir hy eṣāṃ janūṃṣi veda te aṅga vidre mitho janitram //
analyzed: nakir hi eṣām janūṃṣi veda te aṅga vidre mithas janitram

original: RV_7,056.03a abhi svapūbhir mitho vapanta vātasvanasaḥ śyenā aspṛdhran //
analyzed: abhi svapūbhiḥ mithas vapanta vāta svanasaḥ śyenāḥ aspṛdhran

original: RV_7,056.04a etāni dhīro niṇyā ciketa pṛśnir yad ūdho mahī jabhāra //
analyzed: etāni dhīraḥ niṇyā ciketa pṛśniḥ yat ūdhaḥ mahī jabhāra

original: RV_7,056.05a sā viṭ suvīrā marudbhir astu sanāt sahantī puṣyantī nṛmṇam //
analyzed: sā viś su vīrā marudbhiḥ astu sanāt sahantī puṣyantī nṛmṇam

original: RV_7,056.06a yāmaṃ yeṣṭhāḥ śubhā śobhiṣṭhāḥ śriyā sammiślā ojobhir ugrāḥ //
analyzed: yāmam yeṣṭhāḥ śubhā śobhiṣṭhāḥ śriyā sammiślāḥ ojobhiḥ ugrāḥ

original: RV_7,056.07a ugraṃ va oja sthirā śavāṃsy adhā marudbhir gaṇas tuviṣmān //
analyzed: ugram vaḥ ojaḥ sthirā śavāṃsi adhā marudbhiḥ gaṇaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_7,056.08a śubhro vaḥ śuṣmaḥ krudhmī manāṃsi dhunir munir iva śardhasya dhṛṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: śubhraḥ vaḥ śuṣmaḥ krudhmī manāṃsi dhuniḥ muniḥ iva śardhasya dhṛṣṇoḥ

original: RV_7,056.09a sanemy asmad yuyota didyum mā vo durmatir iha praṇaṅ naḥ //
analyzed: sanemi asmat yuyota didyum mā vaḥ durmatiḥ iha praṇak naḥ

original: RV_7,056.10a priyā vo nāma huve turāṇām ā yat tṛpan maruto vāvaśānāḥ //
analyzed: priyā vaḥ nāma huve turāṇām ā yat tṛpat marutaḥ vāvaśānāḥ

original: RV_7,056.11a svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ suniṣkā uta svayaṃ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ //
analyzed: su āyudhāsaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ su niṣkāḥ uta svayam tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_7,056.12a śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomy adhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ /
analyzed: śucī vaḥ havyā marutaḥ śucīnām śucim hinomi adhvaram śucibhyaḥ

original: RV_7,056.12c ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañ chucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpaḥ āyam śuci janmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: RV_7,056.13a aṃseṣv ā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣassu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ /
analyzed: aṃseṣu ā marutaḥ khādayaḥ vaḥ vakṣassu rukmāḥ upaśiśriyāṇāḥ

original: RV_7,056.13c vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhām āyudhair yacchamānāḥ //
analyzed: vi vidyutaḥ na vṛṣṭibhiḥ rucānāḥ anu svadhām āyudhaiḥ yacchamānāḥ

original: RV_7,056.14a pra budhnyā va īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavas tiradhvam /
analyzed: pra budhnyā vaḥ īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavaḥ tiradhvam

original: RV_7,056.14c sahasriyaṃ damyam bhāgam etaṃ gṛhamedhīyam maruto juṣadhvam //
analyzed: sahasriyam damyam bhāgam etam gṛhamedhīyam marutaḥ juṣadhvam

original: RV_7,056.15a yadi stutasya maruto adhīthetthā viprasya vājino havīman /
analyzed: yadi stutasya marutaḥ adhītha itthā viprasya vājinaḥ havīman

original: RV_7,056.15c makṣū rāyaḥ suvīryasya dāta nū cid yam anya ādabhad arāvā //
analyzed: makṣū rāyaḥ su vīryasya dāta nu cit yam anyaḥ ādabhat arāvā

original: RV_7,056.16a atyāso na ye marutaḥ svañco yakṣadṛśo na śubhayanta maryāḥ /
analyzed: atyāsaḥ na ye marutaḥ svañcaḥ yakṣa dṛśaḥ na śubhayanta maryāḥ

original: RV_7,056.16c te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavo na śubhrā vatsāso na prakrīḷinaḥ payodhāḥ //
analyzed: te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavaḥ na śubhrāḥ vatsāsaḥ na prakrīḍinaḥ payodhāḥ

original: RV_7,056.17a daśasyanto no maruto mṛḷantu varivasyanto rodasī sumeke /
analyzed: daśasyantaḥ naḥ marutaḥ mṛḍantu varivasyantaḥ rodasī sumeke

original: RV_7,056.17c āre gohā nṛhā vadho vo astu sumnebhir asme vasavo namadhvam //
analyzed: āre go hā nṛ hā vadhaḥ vaḥ astu sumnebhiḥ asme vasavaḥ namadhvam

original: RV_7,056.18a ā vo hotā johavīti sattaḥ satrācīṃ rātim maruto gṛṇānaḥ /
analyzed: ā vaḥ hotā johavīti sattaḥ satrācīm rātim marutaḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_7,056.18c ya īvato vṛṣaṇo asti gopāḥ so advayāvī havate va ukthaiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ īvataḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ asti gopāḥ saḥ advayāvī havate vaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_7,056.19a ime turam maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasa ā namanti /
analyzed: ime turam marutaḥ rāmayanti ime sahaḥ sahasaḥ ā namanti

original: RV_7,056.19c ime śaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato ni pānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti //
analyzed: ime śaṃsam vanuṣyataḥ ni pānti guru dveṣaḥ a raruṣe dadhanti

original: RV_7,056.20a ime radhraṃ cin maruto junanti bhṛmiṃ cid yathā vasavo juṣanta /
analyzed: ime radhram cit marutaḥ junanti bhṛmim cit yathā vasavaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_7,056.20c apa bādhadhvaṃ vṛṣaṇas tamāṃsi dhatta viśvaṃ tanayaṃ tokam asme //
analyzed: apa bādhadhvam vṛṣaṇaḥ tamāṃsi dhatta viśvam tanayam tokam asme

original: RV_7,056.21a mā vo dātrān maruto nir arāma mā paścād daghma rathyo vibhāge /
analyzed: mā vaḥ dātrāt marutaḥ niḥ arāma mā paścāt daghma rathyaḥ vibhāge

original: RV_7,056.21c ā na spārhe bhajatanā vasavye yad īṃ sujātaṃ vṛṣaṇo vo asti //
analyzed: ā naḥ spārhe bhajatana vasavye yat īm su jātam vṛṣaṇaḥ vaḥ asti

original: RV_7,056.22a saṃ yad dhananta manyubhir janāsaḥ śūrā yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu /
analyzed: sam yat hananta manyubhiḥ janāsaḥ śūrāḥ yahvīṣu oṣadhīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_7,056.22c adha smā no maruto rudriyāsas trātāro bhūta pṛtanāsv aryaḥ //
analyzed: adha smā naḥ marutaḥ rudriyāsaḥ trātāraḥ bhūta pṛtanāsu aryaḥ

original: RV_7,056.23a bhūri cakra marutaḥ pitryāṇy ukthāni yā vaḥ śasyante purā cit /
analyzed: bhūri cakra marutaḥ pitryāṇi ukthāni yā vaḥ śasyante purā cit

original: RV_7,056.23c marudbhir ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā marudbhir it sanitā vājam arvā //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā marudbhiḥ id sanitā vājam arvā

original: RV_7,056.24a asme vīro marutaḥ śuṣmy astu janānāṃ yo asuro vidhartā /
analyzed: asme vīraḥ marutaḥ śuṣmī astu janānām yaḥ asuraḥ vidhartā

original: RV_7,056.24c apo yena sukṣitaye taremādha svam oko abhi vaḥ syāma //
analyzed: apaḥ yena su kṣitaye tarema adha svam okaḥ abhi vaḥ syāma

original: RV_7,056.25a tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir āpa oṣadhīr vanino juṣanta /
analyzed: tat naḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_7,056.25c śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,057.01a madhvo vo nāma mārutaṃ yajatrāḥ pra yajñeṣu śavasā madanti /
analyzed: madhvaḥ vaḥ nāma mārutam yajatrāḥ pra yajñeṣu śavasā madanti

original: RV_7,057.01c ye rejayanti rodasī cid urvī pinvanty utsaṃ yad ayāsur ugrāḥ //
analyzed: ye rejayanti rodasī cit urvī pinvanti utsam yat ayāsuḥ ugrāḥ

original: RV_7,057.02a nicetāro hi maruto gṛṇantam praṇetāro yajamānasya manma /
analyzed: nicetāraḥ hi marutaḥ gṛṇantam praṇetāraḥ yajamānasya manma

original: RV_7,057.02c asmākam adya vidatheṣu barhir ā vītaye sadata pipriyāṇāḥ //
analyzed: asmākam adya vidatheṣu barhiḥ ā vītaye sadata pipriyāṇāḥ

original: RV_7,057.03a naitāvad anye maruto yatheme bhrājante rukmair āyudhais tanūbhiḥ /
analyzed: na etāvat anye marutaḥ yathā ime bhrājante rukmaiḥ āyudhaiḥ tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_7,057.03c ā rodasī viśvapiśaḥ piśānāḥ samānam añjy añjate śubhe kam //
analyzed: ā rodasī viśva piśaḥ piśānāḥ samānam añji añjate śubhe kam

original: RV_7,057.04a ṛdhak sā vo maruto didyud astu yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma /
analyzed: ṛdhak sā vaḥ marutaḥ didyut astu yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma

original: RV_7,057.04c mā vas tasyām api bhūmā yajatrā asme vo astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā //
analyzed: mā vaḥ tasyām api bhūma yajatrāḥ asme vaḥ astu sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā

original: RV_7,057.05a kṛte cid atra maruto raṇantānavadyāsaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ /
analyzed: kṛte cit atra marutaḥ raṇanta anavadyāsaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: RV_7,057.05c pra ṇo 'vata sumatibhir yajatrāḥ pra vājebhis tirata puṣyase naḥ //
analyzed: pra naḥ vata sumatibhiḥ yajatrāḥ pra vājebhiḥ tirata puṣyase naḥ

original: RV_7,057.06a uta stutāso maruto vyantu viśvebhir nāmabhir naro havīṃṣi /
analyzed: uta stutāsaḥ marutaḥ vyantu viśvebhiḥ nāmabhiḥ naraḥ havīṃṣi

original: RV_7,057.06c dadāta no amṛtasya prajāyai jigṛta rāyaḥ sūnṛtā maghāni //
analyzed: dadāta naḥ amṛtasya prajāyai jigṛta rāyaḥ sūnṛtāḥ maghāni

original: RV_7,057.07a ā stutāso maruto viśva ūtī acchā sūrīn sarvatātā jigāta /
analyzed: ā stutāsaḥ marutaḥ viśve ūtī acchā sūrīn sarvatātā jigāta

original: RV_7,057.07c ye nas tmanā śatino vardhayanti yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ye naḥ tmanā śatinaḥ vardhayanti yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,058.01a pra sākamukṣe arcatā gaṇāya yo daivyasya dhāmnas tuviṣmān /
analyzed: pra sākamukṣe arcata gaṇāya yaḥ daivyasya dhāmnaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_7,058.01c uta kṣodanti rodasī mahitvā nakṣante nākaṃ nirṛter avaṃśāt //
analyzed: uta kṣodanti rodasī mahitvā nakṣante nākam nirṛteḥ avaṃśāt

original: RV_7,058.02a janūś cid vo marutas tveṣyeṇa bhīmāsas tuvimanyavo 'yāsaḥ /
analyzed: janūḥ cit vaḥ marutaḥ tveṣyeṇa bhīmāsaḥ tuvi manyavaḥ yāsaḥ

original: RV_7,058.02c pra ye mahobhir ojasota santi viśvo vo yāman bhayate svardṛk //
analyzed: pra ye mahobhiḥ ojasā uta santi viśvaḥ vaḥ yāman bhayate svar dṛś

original: RV_7,058.03a bṛhad vayo maghavadbhyo dadhāta jujoṣann in marutaḥ suṣṭutiṃ naḥ /
analyzed: bṛhat vayaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dadhāta jujoṣan id marutaḥ suṣṭutim naḥ

original: RV_7,058.03c gato nādhvā vi tirāti jantum pra ṇa spārhābhir ūtibhis tireta //
analyzed: gataḥ na adhvā vi tirāti jantum pra naḥ spārhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ tireta

original: RV_7,058.04a yuṣmoto vipro marutaḥ śatasvī yuṣmoto arvā sahuriḥ sahasrī /
analyzed: yuṣmotaḥ vipraḥ marutaḥ śatasvī yuṣmotaḥ arvā sahuriḥ sahasrī

original: RV_7,058.04c yuṣmotaḥ samrāḷ uta hanti vṛtram pra tad vo astu dhūtayo deṣṇam //
analyzed: yuṣmotaḥ samrāj uta hanti vṛtram pra tat vaḥ astu dhūtayaḥ deṣṇam

original: RV_7,058.05a tāṃ ā rudrasya mīḷhuṣo vivāse kuvin naṃsante marutaḥ punar naḥ /
analyzed: tām ā rudrasya mīḍhuṣaḥ vivāse kuvid naṃsante marutaḥ punar naḥ

original: RV_7,058.05c yat sasvartā jihīḷire yad āvir ava tad ena īmahe turāṇām //
analyzed: yat sasvartā jihīḍire yat āvis ava tat enaḥ īmahe turāṇām

original: RV_7,058.06a pra sā vāci suṣṭutir maghonām idaṃ sūktam maruto juṣanta /
analyzed: pra sā vāci suṣṭutiḥ maghonām idam sūktam marutaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_7,058.06c ārāc cid dveṣo vṛṣaṇo yuyota yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ārāt cit dveṣaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yuyota yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,059.01a yaṃ trāyadhva idam-idaṃ devāso yaṃ ca nayatha /
analyzed: yam trāyadhve idam idam devāsaḥ yam ca nayatha

original: RV_7,059.01c tasmā agne varuṇa mitrāryaman marutaḥ śarma yacchata //
analyzed: tasmai agne varuṇa mitra aryaman marutaḥ śarma yacchata

original: RV_7,059.02a yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priya ījānas tarati dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: yuṣmākam devāḥ avasā ahani priye ījānaḥ tarati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_7,059.02c pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīr iṣo yo vo varāya dāśati //
analyzed: pra sa kṣayam tirate vi mahīḥ iṣaḥ yaḥ vaḥ varāya dāśati

original: RV_7,059.03a nahi vaś caramaṃ cana vasiṣṭhaḥ parimaṃsate /
analyzed: nahi vaḥ caramam cana vasiṣṭhaḥ parimaṃsate

original: RV_7,059.03c asmākam adya marutaḥ sute sacā viśve pibata kāminaḥ //
analyzed: asmākam adya marutaḥ sute sacā viśve pibata kāminaḥ

original: RV_7,059.04a nahi va ūtiḥ pṛtanāsu mardhati yasmā arādhvaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: nahi vaḥ ūtiḥ pṛtanāsu mardhati yasmai arādhvam naraḥ

original: RV_7,059.04c abhi va āvart sumatir navīyasī tūyaṃ yāta pipīṣavaḥ //
analyzed: abhi vaḥ āvart sumatiḥ navīyasī tūyam yāta pipīṣavaḥ

original: RV_7,059.05a o ṣu ghṛṣvirādhaso yātanāndhāṃsi pītaye /
analyzed: ā u su ghṛṣvi rādhasaḥ yātana andhāṃsi pītaye

original: RV_7,059.05c imā vo havyā maruto rare hi kam mo ṣv anyatra gantana //
analyzed: imā vaḥ havyā marutaḥ rare hi kam mā u su anyatra gantana

original: RV_7,059.06a ā ca no barhiḥ sadatāvitā ca na spārhāṇi dātave vasu /
analyzed: ā ca naḥ barhiḥ ca naḥ spārhāṇi dātave vasu

original: RV_7,059.06c asredhanto marutaḥ somye madhau svāheha mādayādhvai //
analyzed: a sredhantaḥ marutaḥ somye madhau svāhā iha mādayādhvai

original: RV_7,059.07a sasvaś cid dhi tanvaḥ śumbhamānā ā haṃsāso nīlapṛṣṭhā apaptan /
analyzed: sasvar cit hi tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ ā haṃsāsaḥ nīla pṛṣṭhāḥ apaptan

original: RV_7,059.07c viśvaṃ śardho abhito mā ni ṣeda naro na raṇvāḥ savane madantaḥ //
analyzed: viśvam śardhaḥ abhitas mā ni seda naraḥ na raṇvāḥ savane madantaḥ

original: RV_7,059.08a yo no maruto abhi durhṛṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ marutaḥ abhi durhṛṇāyuḥ tiras cittāni vasavaḥ jighāṃsati

original: RV_7,059.08c druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanā hantanā tam //
analyzed: druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanā hantana tam

original: RV_7,059.09a sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana /
analyzed: sāṃtapanāḥ idam haviḥ marutaḥ tat jujuṣṭana

original: RV_7,059.09c yuṣmākotī riśādasaḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākā ūtiḥ riśādasaḥ

original: RV_7,059.10a gṛhamedhāsa ā gata maruto māpa bhūtana /
analyzed: gṛha medhāsaḥ ā gata marutaḥ mā apa bhūtana

original: RV_7,059.10c yuṣmākotī sudānavaḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākā ūtī sudānavaḥ

original: RV_7,059.11a iheha vaḥ svatavasaḥ kavayaḥ sūryatvacaḥ /
analyzed: iha iha vaḥ svatavasaḥ kavayaḥ sūrya tvacaḥ

original: RV_7,059.11c yajñam maruta ā vṛṇe //
analyzed: yajñam marutaḥ ā vṛṇe

original: RV_7,059.12a tryambakaṃ yajāmahe sugandhim puṣṭivardhanam /
analyzed: tryambakam yajāmahe sugandhim puṣṭi vardhanam

original: RV_7,059.12c urvārukam iva bandhanān mṛtyor mukṣīya māmṛtāt //
analyzed: urvārukam iva bandhanāt mṛtyoḥ mukṣīya mā amṛtāt

original: RV_7,060.01a yad adya sūrya bravo 'nāgā udyan mitrāya varuṇāya satyam /
analyzed: yat adya sūrya bravaḥ nāgāḥ udyan mitrāya varuṇāya satyam

original: RV_7,060.01c vayaṃ devatrādite syāma tava priyāso aryaman gṛṇantaḥ //
analyzed: vayam devatrā adite syāma tava priyāsaḥ aryaman gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_7,060.02a eṣa sya mitrāvaruṇā nṛcakṣā ubhe ud eti sūryo abhi jman /
analyzed: eṣa sya mitrāvaruṇā nṛ cakṣāḥ ubhe ud eti sūryaḥ abhi jman

original: RV_7,060.02c viśvasya sthātur jagataś ca gopā ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan //
analyzed: viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ ca gopāḥ ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan

original: RV_7,060.03a ayukta sapta haritaḥ sadhasthād yā īṃ vahanti sūryaṃ ghṛtācīḥ /
analyzed: ayukta sapta haritaḥ sadhasthāt yāḥ īm vahanti sūryam ghṛtācīḥ

original: RV_7,060.03c dhāmāni mitrāvaruṇā yuvākuḥ saṃ yo yūtheva janimāni caṣṭe //
analyzed: dhāmāni mitrāvaruṇā yuvākuḥ sam yaḥ yūthā iva janimāni caṣṭe

original: RV_7,060.04a ud vām pṛkṣāso madhumanto asthur ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇaḥ /
analyzed: ud vām pṛkṣāsaḥ madhumantaḥ asthuḥ ā sūryaḥ aruhat śukram arṇaḥ

original: RV_7,060.04c yasmā ādityā adhvano radanti mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: yasmai ādityāḥ adhvanaḥ radanti mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_7,060.05a ime cetāro anṛtasya bhūrer mitro aryamā varuṇo hi santi /
analyzed: ime cetāraḥ anṛtasya bhūreḥ mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ hi santi

original: RV_7,060.05c ima ṛtasya vāvṛdhur duroṇe śagmāsaḥ putrā aditer adabdhāḥ //
analyzed: ime ṛtasya vāvṛdhuḥ duroṇe śagmāsaḥ putrāḥ aditeḥ adabdhāḥ

original: RV_7,060.06a ime mitro varuṇo dūḷabhāso 'cetasaṃ cic citayanti dakṣaiḥ /
analyzed: ime mitraḥ varuṇaḥ dūḍabhāsaḥ cetasam cit citayanti dakṣaiḥ

original: RV_7,060.06c api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatantas tiraś cid aṃhaḥ supathā nayanti //
analyzed: api kratum su cetasam vatantaḥ tiras cit aṃhaḥ su pathā nayanti

original: RV_7,060.07a ime divo animiṣā pṛthivyāś cikitvāṃso acetasaṃ nayanti /
analyzed: ime divaḥ animiṣāḥ pṛthivyāḥ cikitvāṃsaḥ acetasam nayanti

original: RV_7,060.07c pravrāje cin nadyo gādham asti pāraṃ no asya viṣpitasya parṣan //
analyzed: pravrāje cit nadyaḥ gādham asti pāram naḥ asya viṣpitasya parṣan

original: RV_7,060.08a yad gopāvad aditiḥ śarma bhadram mitro yacchanti varuṇaḥ sudāse /
analyzed: yat gopāvat aditiḥ śarma bhadram mitraḥ yacchanti varuṇaḥ sudāse

original: RV_7,060.08c tasminn ā tokaṃ tanayaṃ dadhānā mā karma devaheḷanaṃ turāsaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin ā tokam tanayam dadhānāḥ mā karma deva heḍanam turāsaḥ

original: RV_7,060.09a ava vediṃ hotrābhir yajeta ripaḥ kāś cid varuṇadhrutaḥ saḥ /
analyzed: ava vedim hotrābhiḥ yajeta ripaḥ kāḥ cit varuṇadhrutaḥ saḥ

original: RV_7,060.09c pari dveṣobhir aryamā vṛṇaktūruṃ sudāse vṛṣaṇā u lokam //
analyzed: pari dveṣobhiḥ aryamā vṛṇaktu urum sudāse vṛṣaṇau u lokam

original: RV_7,060.10a sasvaś cid dhi samṛtis tveṣy eṣām apīcyena sahasā sahante /
analyzed: sasvar cit hi samṛtiḥ tveṣī eṣām apīcyena sahasā sahante

original: RV_7,060.10c yuṣmad bhiyā vṛṣaṇo rejamānā dakṣasya cin mahinā mṛḷatā naḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmat bhiyā vṛṣaṇaḥ rejamānāḥ dakṣasya cit mahinā mṛḍata naḥ

original: RV_7,060.11a yo brahmaṇe sumatim āyajāte vājasya sātau paramasya rāyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ brahmaṇe sumatim āyajāte vājasya sātau paramasya rāyaḥ

original: RV_7,060.11c sīkṣanta manyum maghavāno arya uru kṣayāya cakrire sudhātu //
analyzed: sīkṣanta manyum maghavānaḥ aryaḥ uru kṣayāya cakrire su dhātu

original: RV_7,060.12a iyaṃ deva purohitir yuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāv akāri /
analyzed: iyam deva purohitiḥ yuvabhyām yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇau akāri

original: RV_7,060.12c viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: viśvāni durgā pipṛtam tiras naḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,061.01a ud vāṃ cakṣur varuṇa supratīkaṃ devayor eti sūryas tatanvān /
analyzed: ud vām cakṣuḥ varuṇa su pratīkam devayoḥ eti sūryaḥ tatanvān

original: RV_7,061.01c abhi yo viśvā bhuvanāni caṣṭe sa manyum martyeṣv ā ciketa //
analyzed: abhi yaḥ viśvā bhuvanāni caṣṭe sa manyum martyeṣu ā ciketa

original: RV_7,061.02a pra vāṃ sa mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvā vipro manmāni dīrghaśrud iyarti /
analyzed: pra vām sa mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāvā vipraḥ manmāni dīrgha śrut iyarti

original: RV_7,061.02c yasya brahmāṇi sukratū avātha ā yat kratvā na śaradaḥ pṛṇaithe //
analyzed: yasya brahmāṇi su kratū avātha ā yat kratvā na śaradaḥ pṛṇaithe

original: RV_7,061.03a proror mitrāvaruṇā pṛthivyāḥ pra diva ṛṣvād bṛhataḥ sudānū /
analyzed: pra uroḥ mitrāvaruṇā pṛthivyāḥ pra divaḥ ṛṣvāt bṛhataḥ sudānū

original: RV_7,061.03c spaśo dadhāthe oṣadhīṣu vikṣv ṛdhag yato animiṣaṃ rakṣamāṇā //
analyzed: spaśaḥ dadhāthe oṣadhīṣu vikṣu ṛdhak yataḥ animiṣam rakṣamāṇā

original: RV_7,061.04a śaṃsā mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma śuṣmo rodasī badbadhe mahitvā /
analyzed: śaṃsā mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma śuṣmaḥ rodasī badbadhe mahitvā

original: RV_7,061.04c ayan māsā ayajvanām avīrāḥ pra yajñamanmā vṛjanaṃ tirāte //
analyzed: ayan māsāḥ ayajvanām avīrāḥ pra yajña manmā vṛjanam tirāte

original: RV_7,061.05a amūrā viśvā vṛṣaṇāv imā vāṃ na yāsu citraṃ dadṛśe na yakṣam /
analyzed: amūrā viśvā vṛṣaṇau imāḥ vām na yāsu citram dadṛśe na yakṣam

original: RV_7,061.05c druhaḥ sacante anṛtā janānāṃ na vāṃ niṇyāny acite abhūvan //
analyzed: druhaḥ sacante anṛtāḥ janānām na vām niṇyāni a cite abhūvan

original: RV_7,061.06a sam u vāṃ yajñam mahayaṃ namobhir huve vām mitrāvaruṇā sabādhaḥ /
analyzed: sam u vām yajñam mahayam namobhiḥ huve vām mitrāvaruṇā sabādhas

original: RV_7,061.06c pra vām manmāny ṛcase navāni kṛtāni brahma jujuṣann imāni //
analyzed: pra vām manmāni ṛcase navāni kṛtāni brahma jujuṣan imāni

original: RV_7,061.07a iyaṃ deva purohitir yuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāv akāri /
analyzed: iyam deva purohitiḥ yuvabhyām yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇau akāri

original: RV_7,061.07c viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: viśvāni durgā pipṛtam tiras naḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,062.01a ut sūryo bṛhad arcīṃṣy aśret puru viśvā janima mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: ud sūryaḥ bṛhat arcīṃṣi aśret puru viśvā janima mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_7,062.01c samo divā dadṛśe rocamānaḥ kratvā kṛtaḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhir bhūt //
analyzed: samaḥ divā dadṛśe rocamānaḥ kratvā kṛtaḥ su kṛtaḥ kartṛbhiḥ bhūt

original: RV_7,062.02a sa sūrya prati puro na ud gā ebhi stomebhir etaśebhir evaiḥ /
analyzed: sa sūrya prati puras naḥ ud gāḥ ebhiḥ stomebhiḥ etaśebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_7,062.02c pra no mitrāya varuṇāya voco 'nāgaso aryamṇe agnaye ca //
analyzed: pra naḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vocaḥ nāgasaḥ aryamṇe agnaye ca

original: RV_7,062.03a vi naḥ sahasraṃ śurudho radantv ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
analyzed: vi naḥ sahasram śurudhaḥ radantu ṛtāvānaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_7,062.03c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkam ā naḥ kāmam pūpurantu stavānāḥ //
analyzed: yacchantu candrāḥ upamam naḥ arkam ā naḥ kāmam pūpurantu stavānāḥ

original: RV_7,062.04a dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ no ye vāṃ jajñuḥ sujanimāna ṛṣve /
analyzed: dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthām naḥ ye vām jajñuḥ su janimānaḥ ṛṣve

original: RV_7,062.04c mā heḷe bhūma varuṇasya vāyor mā mitrasya priyatamasya nṛṇām //
analyzed: mā heḍe bhūma varuṇasya vāyoḥ mā mitrasya priyatamasya nṛṇām

original: RV_7,062.05a pra bāhavā sisṛtaṃ jīvase na ā no gavyūtim ukṣataṃ ghṛtena /
analyzed: pra bāhavā sisṛtam jīvase naḥ ā naḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam ghṛtena

original: RV_7,062.05c ā no jane śravayataṃ yuvānā śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havemā //
analyzed: ā naḥ jane śravayatam yuvānā śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havā imā

original: RV_7,062.06a nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nas tmane tokāya varivo dadhantu /
analyzed: nu mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā naḥ tmane tokāya varivaḥ dadhantu

original: RV_7,062.06c sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sugā naḥ viśvā su pathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,063.01a ud v eti subhago viśvacakṣāḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sūryo mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: ud u eti subhagaḥ viśva cakṣāḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sūryaḥ mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_7,063.01c cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasya devaś carmeva yaḥ samavivyak tamāṃsi //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya devaḥ carma iva yaḥ samavivyak tamāṃsi

original: RV_7,063.02a ud v eti prasavītā janānām mahān ketur arṇavaḥ sūryasya /
analyzed: ud u eti prasavītā janānām mahān ketuḥ arṇavaḥ sūryasya

original: RV_7,063.02c samānaṃ cakram paryāvivṛtsan yad etaśo vahati dhūrṣu yuktaḥ //
analyzed: samānam cakram paryāvivṛtsan yat etaśaḥ vahati dhūrṣu yuktaḥ

original: RV_7,063.03a vibhrājamāna uṣasām upasthād rebhair ud ety anumadyamānaḥ /
analyzed: vibhrājamānaḥ uṣasām upasthāt rebhaiḥ ud eti anumadyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,063.03c eṣa me devaḥ savitā cacchanda yaḥ samānaṃ na pramināti dhāma //
analyzed: eṣa me devaḥ savitā cacchanda yaḥ samānam na pramināti dhāma

original: RV_7,063.04a divo rukma urucakṣā ud eti dūrearthas taraṇir bhrājamānaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ rukmaḥ uru cakṣāḥ ud eti dūrearthaḥ taraṇiḥ bhrājamānaḥ

original: RV_7,063.04c nūnaṃ janāḥ sūryeṇa prasūtā ayann arthāni kṛṇavann apāṃsi //
analyzed: nūnam janāḥ sūryeṇa prasūtāḥ ayan arthāni kṛṇavan apāṃsi

original: RV_7,063.05a yatrā cakrur amṛtā gātum asmai śyeno na dīyann anv eti pāthaḥ /
analyzed: yatra cakruḥ amṛtāḥ gātum asmai śyenaḥ na dīyan anu eti pāthaḥ

original: RV_7,063.05c prati vāṃ sūra udite vidhema namobhir mitrāvaruṇota havyaiḥ //
analyzed: prati vām sūre udite vidhema namobhiḥ mitrāvaruṇā uta havyaiḥ

original: RV_7,063.06a nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nas tmane tokāya varivo dadhantu /
analyzed: nu mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā naḥ tmane tokāya varivaḥ dadhantu

original: RV_7,063.06c sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sugā naḥ viśvā su pathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,064.01a divi kṣayantā rajasaḥ pṛthivyām pra vāṃ ghṛtasya nirṇijo dadīran /
analyzed: divi kṣayantā rajasaḥ pṛthivyām pra vām ghṛtasya nirṇijaḥ dadīran

original: RV_7,064.01c havyaṃ no mitro aryamā sujāto rājā sukṣatro varuṇo juṣanta //
analyzed: havyam naḥ mitraḥ aryamā su jātaḥ rājā su kṣatraḥ varuṇaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_7,064.02a ā rājānā maha ṛtasya gopā sindhupatī kṣatriyā yātam arvāk /
analyzed: ā rājānā mahaḥ ṛtasya gopā sindhu patī kṣatriyā yātam arvāk

original: RV_7,064.02c iḷāṃ no mitrāvaruṇota vṛṣṭim ava diva invataṃ jīradānū //
analyzed: iḍām naḥ mitrāvaruṇā uta vṛṣṭim ava divaḥ invatam jīra dānū

original: RV_7,064.03a mitras tan no varuṇo devo aryaḥ pra sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhir nayantu /
analyzed: mitraḥ tat naḥ varuṇaḥ devaḥ aryaḥ pra sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhiḥ nayantu

original: RV_7,064.03c bravad yathā na ād ariḥ sudāsa iṣā madema saha devagopāḥ //
analyzed: bravat yathā naḥ āt ariḥ sudāse iṣā madema saha deva gopāḥ

original: RV_7,064.04a yo vāṃ gartam manasā takṣad etam ūrdhvāṃ dhītiṃ kṛṇavad dhārayac ca /
analyzed: yaḥ vām gartam manasā takṣat etam ūrdhvām dhītim kṛṇavat dhārayat ca

original: RV_7,064.04c ukṣethām mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtena tā rājānā sukṣitīs tarpayethām //
analyzed: ukṣethām mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtena tāḥ rājānā su kṣitīḥ tarpayethām

original: RV_7,064.05a eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi /
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ varuṇa mitra tubhyam somaḥ śukraḥ na vāyave yāmi

original: RV_7,064.05c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam purandhīḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,065.01a prati vāṃ sūra udite sūktair mitraṃ huve varuṇam pūtadakṣam /
analyzed: prati vām sūre udite sūktaiḥ mitram huve varuṇam pūta dakṣam

original: RV_7,065.01c yayor asuryam akṣitaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ viśvasya yāmann ācitā jigatnu //
analyzed: yayoḥ asuryam akṣitam jyeṣṭham viśvasya yāman ācitā jigatnu

original: RV_7,065.02a tā hi devānām asurā tāv aryā tā naḥ kṣitīḥ karatam ūrjayantīḥ /
analyzed: tā hi devānām asurā tau aryā tā naḥ kṣitīḥ karatam ūrjayantīḥ

original: RV_7,065.02c aśyāma mitrāvaruṇā vayaṃ vāṃ dyāvā ca yatra pīpayann ahā ca //
analyzed: aśyāma mitrāvaruṇā vayam vām dyāvā ca yatra pīpayan ahā ca

original: RV_7,065.03a tā bhūripāśāv anṛtasya setū duratyetū ripave martyāya /
analyzed: tā bhūri pāśau anṛtasya setū duratyetū ripave martyāya

original: RV_7,065.03c ṛtasya mitrāvaruṇā pathā vām apo na nāvā duritā tarema //
analyzed: ṛtasya mitrāvaruṇā pathā vām apaḥ na nāvā duritā tarema

original: RV_7,065.04a ā no mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam iḷābhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā havya juṣṭim ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam iḷābhiḥ

original: RV_7,065.04c prati vām atra varam ā janāya pṛṇītam udno divyasya cāroḥ //
analyzed: prati vām atra varam ā janāya pṛṇītam udnaḥ divyasya cāroḥ

original: RV_7,065.05a eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi /
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ varuṇa mitra tubhyam somaḥ śukraḥ na vāyave yāmi

original: RV_7,065.05c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam purandhīḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,066.01a pra mitrayor varuṇayo stomo na etu śūṣyaḥ /
analyzed: pra mitrayoḥ varuṇayoḥ stomaḥ naḥ etu śūṣyaḥ

original: RV_7,066.01c namasvān tuvijātayoḥ //
analyzed: namasvān tuvi jātayoḥ

original: RV_7,066.02a yā dhārayanta devāḥ sudakṣā dakṣapitarā /
analyzed: yā dhārayanta devāḥ su dakṣā dakṣa pitarā

original: RV_7,066.02c asuryāya pramahasā //
analyzed: asuryāya pramahasā

original: RV_7,066.03a tā na stipā tanūpā varuṇa jaritṝṇām /
analyzed: tā naḥ stipā tanū pā varuṇa jaritṝṇām

original: RV_7,066.03c mitra sādhayataṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: mitra sādhayatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_7,066.04a yad adya sūra udite 'nāgā mitro aryamā /
analyzed: yat adya sūre udite nāgāḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_7,066.04c suvāti savitā bhagaḥ //
analyzed: suvāti savitā bhagaḥ

original: RV_7,066.05a suprāvīr astu sa kṣayaḥ pra nu yāman sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: su prāvīḥ astu sa kṣayaḥ pra nu yāman sudānavaḥ

original: RV_7,066.05c ye no aṃho 'tipiprati //
analyzed: ye naḥ aṃhaḥ tipiprati

original: RV_7,066.06a uta svarājo aditir adabdhasya vratasya ye /
analyzed: uta sva rājaḥ aditiḥ adabdhasya vratasya ye

original: RV_7,066.06c maho rājāna īśate //
analyzed: mahaḥ rājānaḥ īśate

original: RV_7,066.07a prati vāṃ sūra udite mitraṃ gṛṇīṣe varuṇam /
analyzed: prati vām sūre udite mitram gṛṇīṣe varuṇam

original: RV_7,066.07c aryamaṇaṃ riśādasam //
analyzed: aryamaṇam riśādasam

original: RV_7,066.08a rāyā hiraṇyayā matir iyam avṛkāya śavase /
analyzed: rāyā hiraṇyayā matiḥ iyam avṛkāya śavase

original: RV_7,066.08c iyaṃ viprā medhasātaye //
analyzed: iyam viprā medha sātaye

original: RV_7,066.09a te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha /
analyzed: te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha

original: RV_7,066.09c iṣaṃ svaś ca dhīmahi //
analyzed: iṣam svar ca dhīmahi

original: RV_7,066.10a bahavaḥ sūracakṣaso 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: bahavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ gni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_7,066.10c trīṇi ye yemur vidathāni dhītibhir viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: trīṇi ye yemuḥ vidathāni dhītibhiḥ viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ

original: RV_7,066.11a vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam ād ahar yajñam aktuṃ cād ṛcam /
analyzed: vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam āt ahar yajñam aktum ca āt ṛcam

original: RV_7,066.11c anāpyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā kṣatraṃ rājāna āśata //
analyzed: an āpyam varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā kṣatram rājānaḥ āśata

original: RV_7,066.12a tad vo adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūra udite /
analyzed: tat vaḥ adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūre udite

original: RV_7,066.12c yad ohate varuṇo mitro aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ //
analyzed: yat ohate varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ

original: RV_7,066.13a ṛtāvāna ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdho ghorāso anṛtadviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtāvānaḥ ṛta jātāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ghorāsaḥ anṛta dviṣaḥ

original: RV_7,066.13c teṣāṃ vaḥ sumne succhardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām vaḥ sumne su chardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_7,066.14a ud u tyad darśataṃ vapur diva eti pratihvare /
analyzed: ud u tyad darśatam vapuḥ divaḥ eti pratihvare

original: RV_7,066.14c yad īm āśur vahati deva etaśo viśvasmai cakṣase aram //
analyzed: yat īm āśuḥ vahati devaḥ etaśaḥ viśvasmai cakṣase aram

original: RV_7,066.15a śīrṣṇaḥ-śīrṣṇo jagatas tasthuṣas patiṃ samayā viśvam ā rajaḥ /
analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ śīrṣṇaḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣas patim samayā viśvam ā rajaḥ

original: RV_7,066.15c sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryaṃ vahanti harito rathe //
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryam vahanti haritaḥ rathe

original: RV_7,066.16a tac cakṣur devahitaṃ śukram uccarat /
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ deva hitam śukram uccarat

original: RV_7,066.16b paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam //
analyzed: paśyema śaradaḥ śatam jīvema śaradaḥ śatam

original: RV_7,066.17a kāvyebhir adābhyā yātaṃ varuṇa dyumat /
analyzed: kāvyebhiḥ adābhyā yātam varuṇa dyumat

original: RV_7,066.17c mitraś ca somapītaye //
analyzed: mitraḥ ca soma pītaye

original: RV_7,066.18a divo dhāmabhir varuṇa mitraś cā yātam adruhā /
analyzed: divaḥ dhāmabhiḥ varuṇa mitraḥ ca ā yātam adruhā

original: RV_7,066.18c pibataṃ somam ātujī //
analyzed: pibatam somam ātujī

original: RV_7,066.19a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇāv āhutiṃ narā /
analyzed: ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇau āhutim narā

original: RV_7,066.19c pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
analyzed: pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_7,067.01a prati vāṃ rathaṃ nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena /
analyzed: prati vām ratham nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena

original: RV_7,067.01c yo vāṃ dūto na dhiṣṇyāv ajīgar acchā sūnur na pitarā vivakmi //
analyzed: yaḥ vām dūtaḥ na dhiṣṇyau ajīgar acchā sūnuḥ na pitarā vivakmi

original: RV_7,067.02a aśocy agniḥ samidhāno asme upo adṛśran tamasaś cid antāḥ /
analyzed: aśoci agniḥ samidhānaḥ asme upa u adṛśran tamasaḥ cit antāḥ

original: RV_7,067.02c aceti ketur uṣasaḥ purastāc chriye divo duhitur jāyamānaḥ //
analyzed: aceti ketuḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt śriye divaḥ duhituḥ jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,067.03a abhi vāṃ nūnam aśvinā suhotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyā vivakvān /
analyzed: abhi vām nūnam aśvinā su hotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyāḥ vivakvān

original: RV_7,067.03c pūrvībhir yātam pathyābhir arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena //
analyzed: pūrvībhiḥ yātam pathyābhiḥ arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena

original: RV_7,067.04a avor vāṃ nūnam aśvinā yuvākur huve yad vāṃ sute mādhvī vasūyuḥ /
analyzed: vām nūnam aśvinā yuvākuḥ huve yat vām sute mādhvī vasūyuḥ

original: RV_7,067.04c ā vāṃ vahantu sthavirāso aśvāḥ pibātho asme suṣutā madhūni //
analyzed: ā vām vahantu sthavirāsaḥ aśvāḥ pibāthaḥ asme suṣutā madhūni

original: RV_7,067.05a prācīm u devāśvinā dhiyam me 'mṛdhrāṃ sātaye kṛtaṃ vasūyum /
analyzed: prācīm u devā aśvinā dhiyam me mṛdhrām sātaye kṛtam vasūyum

original: RV_7,067.05c viśvā aviṣṭaṃ vāja ā purandhīs tā naḥ śaktaṃ śacīpatī śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: viśvāḥ aviṣṭam vāje ā purandhīḥ tāḥ naḥ śaktam śacīpatī śacībhiḥ

original: RV_7,067.06a aviṣṭaṃ dhīṣv aśvinā na āsu prajāvad reto ahrayaṃ no astu /
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhīṣu aśvinā naḥ āsu prajāvat retaḥ ahrayam naḥ astu

original: RV_7,067.06c ā vāṃ toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema //
analyzed: ā vām toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ su ratnāsaḥ deva vītim gamema

original: RV_7,067.07a eṣa sya vām pūrvagatveva sakhye nidhir hito mādhvī rāto asme /
analyzed: eṣa sya vām pūrva gatvā iva sakhye nidhiḥ hitaḥ mādhvī rātaḥ asme

original: RV_7,067.07c aheḷatā manasā yātam arvāg aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu //
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā yātam arvāk aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_7,067.08a ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vāṃ sapta sravato ratho gāt /
analyzed: ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vām sapta sravataḥ rathaḥ gāt

original: RV_7,067.08c na vāyanti subhvo devayuktā ye vāṃ dhūrṣu taraṇayo vahanti //
analyzed: na vāyanti su bhvaḥ deva yuktāḥ ye vām dhūrṣu taraṇayaḥ vahanti

original: RV_7,067.09a asaścatā maghavadbhyo hi bhūtaṃ ye rāyā maghadeyaṃ junanti /
analyzed: asaścatā maghavadbhyaḥ hi bhūtam ye rāyā magha deyam junanti

original: RV_7,067.09c pra ye bandhuṃ sūnṛtābhis tirante gavyā pṛñcanto aśvyā maghāni //
analyzed: pra ye bandhum sūnṛtābhiḥ tirante gavyā pṛñcantaḥ aśvyā maghāni

original: RV_7,067.10a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat /
analyzed: nu me havam ā śṛṇutam yuvānā yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinau irāvat

original: RV_7,067.10c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dhattam ratnāni jaratam ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,068.01a ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā svaśvā giro dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ /
analyzed: ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā su aśvā giraḥ dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ

original: RV_7,068.01c havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītam naḥ

original: RV_7,068.02a pra vām andhāṃsi madyāny asthur araṃ gantaṃ haviṣo vītaye me /
analyzed: pra vām andhāṃsi madyāni asthuḥ aram gantam haviṣaḥ vītaye me

original: RV_7,068.02c tiro aryo havanāni śrutaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: tiras aryaḥ havanāni śrutam naḥ

original: RV_7,068.03a pra vāṃ ratho manojavā iyarti tiro rajāṃsy aśvinā śatotiḥ /
analyzed: pra vām rathaḥ manaḥ javāḥ iyarti tiras rajāṃsi aśvinā śata ūtiḥ

original: RV_7,068.03c asmabhyaṃ sūryāvasū iyānaḥ //
analyzed: asmabhyam sūryāvasū iyānaḥ

original: RV_7,068.04a ayaṃ ha yad vāṃ devayā u adrir ūrdhvo vivakti somasud yuvabhyām /
analyzed: ayam ha yat vām deva yāḥ u adriḥ ūrdhvaḥ vivakti soma sut yuvabhyām

original: RV_7,068.04c ā valgū vipro vavṛtīta havyaiḥ //
analyzed: ā valgū vipraḥ havyaiḥ

original: RV_7,068.05a citraṃ ha yad vām bhojanaṃ nv asti ny atraye mahiṣvantaṃ yuyotam /
analyzed: citram ha yat vām bhojanam nu asti ni atraye mahiṣvantam yuyotam

original: RV_7,068.05c yo vām omānaṃ dadhate priyaḥ san //
analyzed: yaḥ vām omānam dadhate priyaḥ san

original: RV_7,068.06a uta tyad vāṃ jurate aśvinā bhūc cyavānāya pratītyaṃ havirde /
analyzed: uta tyad vām jurate aśvinā bhūt cyavānāya pratītyam haviḥ de

original: RV_7,068.06c adhi yad varpa itaūti dhatthaḥ //
analyzed: adhi yat varpaḥ itaūti dhatthaḥ

original: RV_7,068.07a uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyo madhye jahur durevāsaḥ samudre /
analyzed: uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyaḥ madhye jahuḥ durevāsaḥ samudre

original: RV_7,068.07c nir īm parṣad arāvā yo yuvākuḥ //
analyzed: niḥ īm parṣat arāvā yaḥ yuvākuḥ

original: RV_7,068.08a vṛkāya cij jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutaṃ śayave hūyamānā /
analyzed: vṛkāya cit jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutam śayave hūyamānā

original: RV_7,068.08c yāv aghnyām apinvatam apo na staryaṃ cic chakty aśvinā śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: yau aghnyām apinvatam apaḥ naḥ staryam cit śaktī aśvinā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_7,068.09a eṣa sya kārur jarate sūktair agre budhāna uṣasāṃ sumanmā /
analyzed: eṣa sya kāruḥ jarate sūktaiḥ agre budhānaḥ uṣasām su manmā

original: RV_7,068.09c iṣā taṃ vardhad aghnyā payobhir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣā tam vardhat aghnyā payobhiḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,069.01a ā vāṃ ratho rodasī badbadhāno hiraṇyayo vṛṣabhir yātv aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ rodasī badbadhānaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ vṛṣabhiḥ yātu aśvaiḥ

original: RV_7,069.01c ghṛtavartaniḥ pavibhī rucāna iṣāṃ voḷhā nṛpatir vājinīvān //
analyzed: ghṛta vartaniḥ pavibhiḥ rucānaḥ iṣām voḷhā nṛpatiḥ vājinīvān

original: RV_7,069.02a sa paprathāno abhi pañca bhūmā trivandhuro manasā yātu yuktaḥ /
analyzed: sa paprathānaḥ abhi pañca bhūmā tri vandhuraḥ manasā yātu yuktaḥ

original: RV_7,069.02c viśo yena gacchatho devayantīḥ kutrā cid yāmam aśvinā dadhānā //
analyzed: viśaḥ yena gacchathaḥ devayantīḥ kutra cit yāmam aśvinā dadhānā

original: RV_7,069.03a svaśvā yaśasā yātam arvāg dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ /
analyzed: su aśvā yaśasā yātam arvāk dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ

original: RV_7,069.03c vi vāṃ ratho vadhvā yādamāno 'ntān divo bādhate vartanibhyām //
analyzed: vi vām rathaḥ vadhvā yādamānaḥ ntān divaḥ bādhate vartanibhyām

original: RV_7,069.04a yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣāvṛṇīta sūro duhitā paritakmyāyām /
analyzed: yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣā vṛṇīta sūraḥ duhitā paritakmyāyām

original: RV_7,069.04c yad devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vāṃ vayo gāt //
analyzed: yat devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vām vayaḥ gāt

original: RV_7,069.05a yo ha sya vāṃ rathirā vasta usrā ratho yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ha sya vām rathirā usrā rathaḥ yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ

original: RV_7,069.05c tena naḥ śaṃ yor uṣaso vyuṣṭau ny aśvinā vahataṃ yajñe asmin //
analyzed: tena naḥ śam yoḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau ni aśvinā vahatam yajñe asmin

original: RV_7,069.06a narā gaureva vidyutaṃ tṛṣāṇāsmākam adya savanopa yātam /
analyzed: narā gaurā iva vidyutam tṛṣāṇā asmākam adya savanā upa yātam

original: RV_7,069.06c purutrā hi vām matibhir havante mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ //
analyzed: purutrā hi vām matibhiḥ havante mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ

original: RV_7,069.07a yuvam bhujyum avaviddhaṃ samudra ud ūhathur arṇaso asridhānaiḥ /
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum avaviddham samudre ud ūhathuḥ arṇasaḥ a sridhānaiḥ

original: RV_7,069.07c patatribhir aśramair avyathibhir daṃsanābhir aśvinā pārayantā //
analyzed: patatribhiḥ aśramaiḥ avyathibhiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ aśvinā pārayantā

original: RV_7,069.08a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat /
analyzed: nu me havam ā śṛṇutam yuvānā yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinau irāvat

original: RV_7,069.08c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dhattam ratnāni jaratam ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,070.01a ā viśvavārāśvinā gataṃ naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām pṛthivyām /
analyzed: ā viśva vārā aśvinā gatam naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām pṛthivyām

original: RV_7,070.01c aśvo na vājī śunapṛṣṭho asthād ā yat sedathur dhruvase na yonim //
analyzed: aśvaḥ na vājī śuna pṛṣṭhaḥ asthāt ā yat sedathuḥ dhruvase na yonim

original: RV_7,070.02a siṣakti sā vāṃ sumatiś caniṣṭhātāpi gharmo manuṣo duroṇe /
analyzed: siṣakti sā vām sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā atāpi gharmaḥ manuṣaḥ duroṇe

original: RV_7,070.02c yo vāṃ samudrān saritaḥ piparty etagvā cin na suyujā yujānaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vām samudrān saritaḥ piparti etagvā cit na su yujā yujānaḥ

original: RV_7,070.03a yāni sthānāny aśvinā dadhāthe divo yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu /
analyzed: yāni sthānāni aśvinā dadhāthe divaḥ yahvīṣu oṣadhīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_7,070.03c ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadanteṣaṃ janāya dāśuṣe vahantā //
analyzed: ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadantā iṣam janāya dāśuṣe vahantā

original: RV_7,070.04a caniṣṭaṃ devā oṣadhīṣv apsu yad yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: caniṣṭam devau oṣadhīṣu apsu yat yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_7,070.04c purūṇi ratnā dadhatau ny asme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathur yugāni //
analyzed: purūṇi ratnā dadhatau ni asme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathuḥ yugāni

original: RV_7,070.05a śuśruvāṃsā cid aśvinā purūṇy abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: śuśruvāṃsā cit aśvinā purūṇi abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_7,070.05c prati pra yātaṃ varam ā janāyāsme vām astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā //
analyzed: prati pra yātam varam ā janāya asme vām astu sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā

original: RV_7,070.06a yo vāṃ yajño nāsatyā haviṣmān kṛtabrahmā samaryo bhavāti /
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñaḥ nāsatyāḥ haviṣmān kṛta brahmā samaryaḥ bhavāti

original: RV_7,070.06c upa pra yātaṃ varam ā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇy ṛcyante yuvabhyām //
analyzed: upa pra yātam varam ā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇi ṛcyante yuvabhyām

original: RV_7,070.07a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,070.07c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi yuvayūni agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,071.01a apa svasur uṣaso nag jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīr aruṣāya panthām /
analyzed: apa svasuḥ uṣasaḥ nak jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīḥ aruṣāya panthām

original: RV_7,071.01c aśvāmaghā gomaghā vāṃ huvema divā naktaṃ śarum asmad yuyotam //
analyzed: aśvāmaghā go maghā vām huvema divā naktam śarum asmat yuyotam

original: RV_7,071.02a upāyātaṃ dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā /
analyzed: upāyātam dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā

original: RV_7,071.02c yuyutam asmad anirām amīvāṃ divā naktam mādhvī trāsīthāṃ naḥ //
analyzed: yuyutam asmat anirām amīvām divā naktam mādhvī trāsīthām naḥ

original: RV_7,071.03a ā vāṃ ratham avamasyāṃ vyuṣṭau sumnāyavo vṛṣaṇo vartayantu /
analyzed: ā vām ratham avamasyām vyuṣṭau sumnāyavaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vartayantu

original: RV_7,071.03c syūmagabhastim ṛtayugbhir aśvair āśvinā vasumantaṃ vahethām //
analyzed: syūma gabhastim ṛta yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ āśvinā vasumantam vahethām

original: RV_7,071.04a yo vāṃ ratho nṛpatī asti voḷhā trivandhuro vasumāṃ usrayāmā /
analyzed: yaḥ vām rathaḥ nṛpatī asti voḍhā tri vandhuraḥ vasumān usra yāmā

original: RV_7,071.04c ā na enā nāsatyopa yātam abhi yad vāṃ viśvapsnyo jigāti //
analyzed: ā naḥ enā nāsatyā upa yātam abhi yat vām viśvapsnyaḥ jigāti

original: RV_7,071.05a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ jaraso 'mumuktaṃ ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam /
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam jarasaḥ mumuktam ni pedavaḥ ūhathuḥ āśum aśvam

original: RV_7,071.05c nir aṃhasas tamasa spartam atriṃ ni jāhuṣaṃ śithire dhātam antaḥ //
analyzed: niḥ aṃhasaḥ tamasaḥ spartam atrim ni jāhuṣam śithire dhātam antar

original: RV_7,071.06a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,071.06c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi yuvayūni agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,072.01a ā gomatā nāsatyā rathenāśvāvatā puruścandreṇa yātam /
analyzed: ā gomatā nāsatyā rathena aśvāvatā puru ścandreṇa yātam

original: RV_7,072.01c abhi vāṃ viśvā niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā //
analyzed: abhi vām viśvāḥ niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā

original: RV_7,072.02a ā no devebhir upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena /
analyzed: ā naḥ devebhiḥ upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena

original: RV_7,072.02c yuvor hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samāno bandhur uta tasya vittam //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samānaḥ bandhuḥ uta tasya vittam

original: RV_7,072.03a ud u stomāso aśvinor abudhrañ jāmi brahmāṇy uṣasaś ca devīḥ /
analyzed: ud u stomāsaḥ aśvinoḥ abudhram jāmi brahmāṇi uṣasaḥ ca devīḥ

original: RV_7,072.03c āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyeme acchā vipro nāsatyā vivakti //
analyzed: āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyā ime acchā vipraḥ nāsatyā vivakti

original: RV_7,072.04a vi ced ucchanty aśvinā uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravo bharante /
analyzed: vi ced ucchanti aśvinau uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravaḥ bharante

original: RV_7,072.04c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred bṛhad agnayaḥ samidhā jarante //
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum savitā devaḥ aśret bṛhat agnayaḥ samidhā jarante

original: RV_7,072.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt /
analyzed: ā paścātāt nāsatyā purastāt āśvinā yātam adharāt udaktāt

original: RV_7,072.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ā viśvatas pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,073.01a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati stomaṃ devayanto dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya prati stomam devayantaḥ dadhānāḥ

original: RV_7,073.01c purudaṃsā purutamā purājāmartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ //
analyzed: purudaṃsā purutamā purājā amartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ

original: RV_7,073.02a ny u priyo manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yo yajate vandate ca /
analyzed: ni u priyaḥ manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yaḥ yajate vandate ca

original: RV_7,073.02c aśnītam madhvo aśvinā upāka ā vāṃ voce vidatheṣu prayasvān //
analyzed: aśnītam madhvaḥ aśvinau upāke ā vām voce vidatheṣu prayasvān

original: RV_7,073.03a ahema yajñam pathām urāṇā imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: ahema yajñam pathām urāṇāḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,073.03c śruṣṭīveva preṣito vām abodhi prati stomair jaramāṇo vasiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: śruṣṭīvā iva preṣitaḥ vām abodhi prati stomaiḥ jaramāṇaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,073.04a upa tyā vahnī gamato viśaṃ no rakṣohaṇā sambhṛtā vīḷupāṇī /
analyzed: upa tyā vahnī gamataḥ viśam naḥ rakṣaḥ haṇā sambhṛtā vīḍu pāṇī

original: RV_7,073.04c sam andhāṃsy agmata matsarāṇi mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gataṃ śivena //
analyzed: sam andhāṃsi agmata matsarāṇi mā naḥ mardhiṣṭam ā gatam śivena

original: RV_7,073.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt /
analyzed: ā paścātāt nāsatyā purastāt āśvinā yātam adharāt udaktāt

original: RV_7,073.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ā viśvatas pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,074.01a imā u vāṃ diviṣṭaya usrā havante aśvinā /
analyzed: imāḥ u vām diviṣṭayaḥ usrā havante aśvinā

original: RV_7,074.01c ayaṃ vām ahve 'vase śacīvasū viśaṃ-viśaṃ hi gacchathaḥ //
analyzed: ayam vām ahve vase śacī vasū viśam viśam hi gacchathaḥ

original: RV_7,074.02a yuvaṃ citraṃ dadathur bhojanaṃ narā codethāṃ sūnṛtāvate /
analyzed: yuvam citram dadathuḥ bhojanam narā codethām sūnṛtāvate

original: RV_7,074.02c arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu //
analyzed: arvāk ratham samanasā ni yacchatam pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_7,074.03a ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā /
analyzed: ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_7,074.03c dugdham payo vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gatam //
analyzed: dugdham payaḥ vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā naḥ mardhiṣṭam ā gatam

original: RV_7,074.04a aśvāso ye vām upa dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ yuvāṃ dīyanti bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ ye vām upa dāśuṣaḥ gṛham yuvām dīyanti bibhrataḥ

original: RV_7,074.04c makṣūyubhir narā hayebhir aśvinā devā yātam asmayū //
analyzed: makṣūyubhiḥ narā hayebhiḥ aśvinā devā yātam asmayū

original: RV_7,074.05a adhā ha yanto aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: adhā ha yantaḥ aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_7,074.05c tā yaṃsato maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ yaśaś chardir asmabhyaṃ nāsatyā //
analyzed: tā yaṃsataḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dhruvam yaśaḥ chardiḥ asmabhyam nāsatyā

original: RV_7,074.06a pra ye yayur avṛkāso rathā iva nṛpātāro janānām /
analyzed: pra ye yayuḥ avṛkāsaḥ rathāḥ iva nṛ pātāraḥ janānām

original: RV_7,074.06c uta svena śavasā śūśuvur nara uta kṣiyanti sukṣitim //
analyzed: uta svena śavasā śūśuvuḥ naraḥ uta kṣiyanti su kṣitim

original: RV_7,075.01a vy uṣā āvo divijā ṛtenāviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt /
analyzed: vi uṣāḥ āvaḥ divijāḥ ṛtena āviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt

original: RV_7,075.01c apa druhas tama āvar ajuṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyā ajīgaḥ //
analyzed: apa druhaḥ tamaḥ āvaḥ ajuṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyāḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_7,075.02a mahe no adya suvitāya bodhy uṣo mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi /
analyzed: mahe naḥ adya suvitāya bodhi uṣaḥ mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi

original: RV_7,075.02c citraṃ rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehy asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum //
analyzed: citram rayim yaśasam dhehi asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum

original: RV_7,075.03a ete tye bhānavo darśatāyāś citrā uṣaso amṛtāsa āguḥ /
analyzed: ete tye bhānavaḥ darśatāyāḥ citrāḥ uṣasaḥ amṛtāsaḥ āguḥ

original: RV_7,075.03c janayanto daivyāni vratāny āpṛṇanto antarikṣā vy asthuḥ //
analyzed: janayantaḥ daivyāni vratāni āpṛṇantaḥ antarikṣā vi asthuḥ

original: RV_7,075.04a eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyo jigāti /
analyzed: eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyas jigāti

original: RV_7,075.04c abhipaśyantī vayunā janānāṃ divo duhitā bhuvanasya patnī //
analyzed: abhipaśyantī vayunā janānām divaḥ duhitā bhuvanasya patnī

original: RV_7,075.05a vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāya īśe vasūnām /
analyzed: vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāyaḥ īśe vasūnām

original: RV_7,075.05c ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghony uṣā ucchati vahnibhir gṛṇānā //
analyzed: ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghonī uṣāḥ ucchati vahnibhiḥ gṛṇānā

original: RV_7,075.06a prati dyutānām aruṣāso aśvāś citrā adṛśrann uṣasaṃ vahantaḥ /
analyzed: prati dyutānām aruṣāsaḥ aśvāḥ citrāḥ adṛśran uṣasam vahantaḥ

original: RV_7,075.06c yāti śubhrā viśvapiśā rathena dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate janāya //
analyzed: yāti śubhrā viśva piśā rathena dadhāti ratnam vidhate janāya

original: RV_7,075.07a satyā satyebhir mahatī mahadbhir devī devebhir yajatā yajatraiḥ /
analyzed: satyā satyebhiḥ mahatī mahadbhiḥ devī devebhiḥ yajatā yajatraiḥ

original: RV_7,075.07c rujad dṛḷhāni dadad usriyāṇām prati gāva uṣasaṃ vāvaśanta //
analyzed: rujat dṛḷhāni dadat usriyāṇām prati gāvaḥ uṣasam vāvaśanta

original: RV_7,075.08a nū no gomad vīravad dhehi ratnam uṣo aśvāvat purubhojo asme /
analyzed: nu naḥ gomat vīravat dhehi ratnam uṣaḥ aśvāvat puru bhojaḥ asme

original: RV_7,075.08c mā no barhiḥ puruṣatā nide kar yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ barhiḥ puruṣa tā nide kaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,076.01a ud u jyotir amṛtaṃ viśvajanyaṃ viśvānaraḥ savitā devo aśret /
analyzed: ud u jyotiḥ amṛtam viśvajanyam viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ aśret

original: RV_7,076.01c kratvā devānām ajaniṣṭa cakṣur āvir akar bhuvanaṃ viśvam uṣāḥ //
