original: RV_8,002.24c vājaṃ stotṛbhyo gomantam //
analyzed: vājam stotṛbhyaḥ gomantam

original: RV_8,002.25a panyam-panyam it sotāra ā dhāvata madyāya /
analyzed: panyampanyam id sotāraḥ ā dhāvata madyāya

original: RV_8,002.25c somaṃ vīrāya śūrāya //
analyzed: somam vīrāya śūrāya

original: RV_8,002.26a pātā vṛtrahā sutam ā ghā gaman nāre asmat /
analyzed: pātā vṛtrahā sutam ā ghā gamat nā āre asmat

original: RV_8,002.26c ni yamate śatamūtiḥ //
analyzed: ni yamate śatamūtiḥ

original: RV_8,002.27a eha harī brahmayujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam /
analyzed: ā iha harī brahma yujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam

original: RV_8,002.27c gīrbhiḥ śrutaṃ girvaṇasam //
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ śrutam girvaṇasam

original: RV_8,002.28a svādavaḥ somā ā yāhi śrītāḥ somā ā yāhi /
analyzed: svādavaḥ somāḥ ā yāhi śrītāḥ somāḥ ā yāhi

original: RV_8,002.28c śiprinn ṛṣīvaḥ śacīvo nāyam acchā sadhamādam //
analyzed: śiprin ṛṣīvas śacīvas na ayam acchā sadhamādam

original: RV_8,002.29a stutaś ca yās tvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya /
analyzed: stutaḥ ca yāḥ tvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya

original: RV_8,002.29c indra kāriṇaṃ vṛdhantaḥ //
analyzed: indra kāriṇam vṛdhantaḥ

original: RV_8,002.30a giraś ca yās te girvāha ukthā ca tubhyaṃ tāni /
analyzed: giraḥ ca yāḥ te gir vāhaḥ ukthā ca tubhyam tāni

original: RV_8,002.30c satrā dadhire śavāṃsi //
analyzed: satrā dadhire śavāṃsi

original: RV_8,002.31a eved eṣa tuvikūrmir vājāṃ eko vajrahastaḥ /
analyzed: eva id eṣa tuvikūrmiḥ vājām ekaḥ vajra hastaḥ

original: RV_8,002.31c sanād amṛkto dayate //
analyzed: sanāt amṛktaḥ dayate

original: RV_8,002.32a hantā vṛtraṃ dakṣiṇenendraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ /
analyzed: hantā vṛtram dakṣiṇena indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_8,002.32c mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_8,002.33a yasmin viśvāś carṣaṇaya uta cyautnā jrayāṃsi ca /
analyzed: yasmin viśvāḥ carṣaṇayaḥ uta cyautnā jrayāṃsi ca

original: RV_8,002.33c anu ghen mandī maghonaḥ //
analyzed: anu gha id mandī maghonaḥ

original: RV_8,002.34a eṣa etāni cakārendro viśvā yo 'ti śṛṇve /
analyzed: eṣaḥ etāni cakāra indraḥ viśvā yaḥ ti śṛṇve

original: RV_8,002.34c vājadāvā maghonām //
analyzed: vāja dāvā maghonām

original: RV_8,002.35a prabhartā rathaṃ gavyantam apākāc cid yam avati /
analyzed: prabhartā ratham gavyantam apākāt cit yam avati

original: RV_8,002.35c ino vasu sa hi voḷhā //
analyzed: inaḥ vasu sa hi voḷhā

original: RV_8,002.36a sanitā vipro arvadbhir hantā vṛtraṃ nṛbhiḥ śūraḥ /
analyzed: sanitā vipraḥ arvadbhiḥ hantā vṛtram nṛbhiḥ śūraḥ

original: RV_8,002.36c satyo 'vitā vidhantam //
analyzed: satyaḥ vitā vidhantam

original: RV_8,002.37a yajadhvainam priyamedhā indraṃ satrācā manasā /
analyzed: yajadhva enam priyamedhāḥ indram satrācā manasā

original: RV_8,002.37c yo bhūt somaiḥ satyamadvā //
analyzed: yaḥ bhūt somaiḥ satyamadvā

original: RV_8,002.38a gāthaśravasaṃ satpatiṃ śravaskāmam purutmānam /
analyzed: gātha śravasam sat patim śravaskāmam purutmānam

original: RV_8,002.38c kaṇvāso gāta vājinam //
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ gāta vājinam

original: RV_8,002.39a ya ṛte cid gās padebhyo dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛte cit gāḥ padebhyaḥ dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān

original: RV_8,002.39c ye asmin kāmam aśriyan //
analyzed: ye asmin kāmam aśriyan

original: RV_8,002.40a itthā dhīvantam adrivaḥ kāṇvam medhyātithim /
analyzed: itthā dhīvantam adrivas kāṇvam medhyātithim

original: RV_8,002.40c meṣo bhūto 'bhi yann ayaḥ //
analyzed: meṣaḥ bhūtaḥ bhi yan ayaḥ

original: RV_8,002.41a śikṣā vibhindo asmai catvāry ayutā dadat /
analyzed: śikṣa vibhindo asmai catvāri ayutā dadat

original: RV_8,002.41c aṣṭā paraḥ sahasrā //
analyzed: aṣṭā paras sahasrā

original: RV_8,002.42a uta su tye payovṛdhā mākī raṇasya naptyā /
analyzed: uta su tye payaḥ vṛdhā mākī raṇasya naptyā

original: RV_8,002.42c janitvanāya māmahe //
analyzed: janitvanāya māmahe

original: RV_8,003.01a pibā sutasya rasino matsvā na indra gomataḥ /
analyzed: pibā sutasya rasinaḥ matsva naḥ indra gomataḥ

original: RV_8,003.01c āpir no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe 'smāṃ avantu te dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: āpiḥ naḥ bodhi sadhamādyaḥ vṛdhe smām avantu te dhiyaḥ

original: RV_8,003.02a bhūyāma te sumatau vājino vayam mā na star abhimātaye /
analyzed: bhūyāma te sumatau vājinaḥ vayam mā naḥ star abhimātaye

original: RV_8,003.02c asmāñ citrābhir avatād abhiṣṭibhir ā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya //
analyzed: asmām citrābhiḥ avatāt abhiṣṭibhiḥ ā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya

original: RV_8,003.03a imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama /
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā purūvaso giraḥ vardhantu yāḥ mama

original: RV_8,003.03c pāvakavarṇāḥ śucayo vipaścito 'bhi stomair anūṣata //
analyzed: pāvaka varṇāḥ śucayaḥ vipaścitaḥ bhiḥ stomaiḥ anūṣata

original: RV_8,003.04a ayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudra iva paprathe /
analyzed: ayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudraḥ iva paprathe

original: RV_8,003.04c satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛṇe śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye //
analyzed: satyaḥ saḥ asya mahimā gṛṇe śavaḥ yajñeṣu viprarājye

original: RV_8,003.05a indram id devatātaya indram prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: indram id devatātaye indram prayati adhvare

original: RV_8,003.05c indraṃ samīke vanino havāmaha indraṃ dhanasya sātaye //
analyzed: indram samīke vaninaḥ havāmahe indram dhanasya sātaye

original: RV_8,003.06a indro mahnā rodasī paprathac chava indraḥ sūryam arocayat /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā rodasī paprathat śavaḥ indraḥ sūryam arocayat

original: RV_8,003.06c indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemira indre suvānāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemire indre suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,003.07a abhi tvā pūrvapītaya indra stomebhir āyavaḥ /
analyzed: abhi tvā pūrva pītaye indra stomebhiḥ āyavaḥ

original: RV_8,003.07c samīcīnāsa ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrā gṛṇanta pūrvyam //
analyzed: samīcīnāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrāḥ gṛṇanta pūrvyam

original: RV_8,003.08a asyed indro vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo made sutasya viṣṇavi /
analyzed: asya id indraḥ vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ made sutasya viṣṇavi

original: RV_8,003.08c adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavo 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā //
analyzed: adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavaḥ nu stuvanti pūrvathā

original: RV_8,003.09a tat tvā yāmi suvīryaṃ tad brahma pūrvacittaye /
analyzed: tat tvā yāmi su vīryam tat brahma pūrvacittaye

original: RV_8,003.09c yenā yatibhyo bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha //
analyzed: yena yatibhyaḥ bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha

original: RV_8,003.10a yenā samudram asṛjo mahīr apas tad indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ /
analyzed: yena samudram asṛjaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ tat indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ

original: RV_8,003.10c sadyaḥ so asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yaṃ kṣoṇīr anucakrade //
analyzed: sadyas saḥ asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yam kṣoṇīḥ anucakrade

original: RV_8,003.11a śagdhī na indra yat tvā rayiṃ yāmi suvīryam /
analyzed: śagdhi naḥ indra yat tvā rayim yāmi su vīryam

original: RV_8,003.11c śagdhi vājāya prathamaṃ siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya pūrvya //
analyzed: śagdhi vājāya prathamam siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya pūrvya

original: RV_8,003.12a śagdhī no asya yad dha pauram āvitha dhiya indra siṣāsataḥ /
analyzed: śagdhi naḥ asya yat ha pauram āvitha dhiyaḥ indra siṣāsataḥ

original: RV_8,003.12c śagdhi yathā ruśamaṃ śyāvakaṃ kṛpam indra prāvaḥ svarṇaram //
analyzed: śagdhi yathā ruśamam śyāvakam kṛpam indra prāvaḥ svarṇaram

original: RV_8,003.13a kan navyo atasīnāṃ turo gṛṇīta martyaḥ /
analyzed: kad navyaḥ atasīnām turaḥ gṛṇīta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,003.13c nahī nv asya mahimānam indriyaṃ svar gṛṇanta ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: nahi nu asya mahimānam indriyam svar gṛṇantaḥ ānaśuḥ

original: RV_8,003.14a kad u stuvanta ṛtayanta devata ṛṣiḥ ko vipra ohate /
analyzed: kad u stuvantaḥ ṛtayanta devataḥ ṛṣiḥ kaḥ vipraḥ ohate

original: RV_8,003.14c kadā havam maghavann indra sunvataḥ kad u stuvata ā gamaḥ //
analyzed: kadā havam maghavan indra sunvataḥ kad u stuvate ā gamaḥ

original: RV_8,003.15a ud u tye madhumattamā gira stomāsa īrate /
analyzed: ud u tye madhumattamāḥ giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate

original: RV_8,003.15c satrājito dhanasā akṣitotayo vājayanto rathā iva //
analyzed: satrājitaḥ dhana sāḥ akṣita ūtayaḥ vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva

original: RV_8,003.16a kaṇvā iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryā iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryāḥ iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_8,003.16c indraṃ stomebhir mahayanta āyavaḥ priyamedhāso asvaran //
analyzed: indram stomebhiḥ mahayantaḥ āyavaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ asvaran

original: RV_8,003.17a yukṣvā hi vṛtrahantama harī indra parāvataḥ /
analyzed: yukṣvā hi vṛtra hantama harī indra parāvataḥ

original: RV_8,003.17c arvācīno maghavan somapītaya ugra ṛṣvebhir ā gahi //
analyzed: arvācīnaḥ maghavan soma pītaye ugraḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,003.18a ime hi te kāravo vāvaśur dhiyā viprāso medhasātaye /
analyzed: ime hi te kāravaḥ vāvaśuḥ dhiyā viprāsaḥ medha sātaye

original: RV_8,003.18c sa tvaṃ no maghavann indra girvaṇo veno na śṛṇudhī havam //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ venaḥ na śṛṇudhi havam

original: RV_8,003.19a nir indra bṛhatībhyo vṛtraṃ dhanubhyo asphuraḥ /
analyzed: niḥ indra bṛhatībhyaḥ vṛtram dhanubhyaḥ asphuraḥ

original: RV_8,003.19c nir arbudasya mṛgayasya māyino niḥ parvatasya gā ājaḥ //
analyzed: niḥ arbudasya mṛgayasya māyinaḥ niḥ parvatasya gāḥ ājaḥ

original: RV_8,003.20a nir agnayo rurucur nir u sūryo niḥ soma indriyo rasaḥ /
analyzed: niḥ agnayaḥ rurucuḥ niḥ u sūryaḥ niḥ somaḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ

original: RV_8,003.20c nir antarikṣād adhamo mahām ahiṃ kṛṣe tad indra pauṃsyam //
analyzed: niḥ antarikṣāt adhamaḥ mahām ahim kṛṣe tat indra pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,003.21a yam me dur indro marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yam me duḥ indraḥ marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ

original: RV_8,003.21c viśveṣāṃ tmanā śobhiṣṭham upeva divi dhāvamānam //
analyzed: viśveṣām tmanā śobhiṣṭham upa iva divi dhāvamānam

original: RV_8,003.22a rohitam me pākasthāmā sudhuraṃ kakṣyaprām /
analyzed: rohitam me pākasthāmā su dhuram kakṣya prām

original: RV_8,003.22c adād rāyo vibodhanam //
analyzed: adāt rāyaḥ vibodhanam

original: RV_8,003.23a yasmā anye daśa prati dhuraṃ vahanti vahnayaḥ /
analyzed: yasmai anye daśa prati dhuram vahanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_8,003.23c astaṃ vayo na tugryam //
analyzed: astam vayaḥ na tugryam

original: RV_8,003.24a ātmā pitus tanūr vāsa ojodā abhyañjanam /
analyzed: ātmā pituḥ tanūḥ vāsaḥ ojaḥ dāḥ abhyañjanam

original: RV_8,003.24c turīyam id rohitasya pākasthāmānam bhojaṃ dātāram abravam //
analyzed: turīyam id rohitasya pākasthāmānam bhojam dātāram abravam

original: RV_8,004.01a yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: yat indra prāk apāk udak nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_8,004.01c simā purū nṛṣūto asy ānave 'si praśardha turvaśe //
analyzed: sima purū nṛṣūtaḥ asi ānave si praśardha turvaśe

original: RV_8,004.02a yad vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpa indra mādayase sacā /
analyzed: yat vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpe indra mādayase sacā

original: RV_8,004.02c kaṇvāsas tvā brahmabhi stomavāhasa indrā yacchanty ā gahi //
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ tvā brahmabhiḥ stoma vāhasaḥ indrāḥ yacchanti ā gahi

original: RV_8,004.03a yathā gauro apā kṛtaṃ tṛṣyann ety averiṇam /
analyzed: yathā gauraḥ apā kṛtam tṛṣyan eti ava iriṇam

original: RV_8,004.03c āpitve naḥ prapitve tūyam ā gahi kaṇveṣu su sacā piba //
analyzed: āpitve naḥ prapitve tūyam ā gahi kaṇveṣu su sacā piba

original: RV_8,004.04a mandantu tvā maghavann indrendavo rādhodeyāya sunvate /
analyzed: mandantu tvā maghavan indra indavaḥ rādhaḥ deyāya sunvate

original: RV_8,004.04c āmuṣyā somam apibaś camū sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tad dadhiṣe sahaḥ //
analyzed: āmuṣya somam apibaḥ camū sutam jyeṣṭham tat dadhiṣe sahaḥ

original: RV_8,004.05a pra cakre sahasā saho babhañja manyum ojasā /
analyzed: pra cakre sahasā sahaḥ babhañja manyum ojasā

original: RV_8,004.05c viśve ta indra pṛtanāyavo yaho ni vṛkṣā iva yemire //
analyzed: viśve te indra pṛtanāyavaḥ yaho ni vṛkṣāḥ iva yemire

original: RV_8,004.06a sahasreṇeva sacate yavīyudhā yas ta ānaḷ upastutim /
analyzed: sahasreṇa iva sacate yavīyudhā yaḥ te ānaṭ upastutim

original: RV_8,004.06c putram prāvargaṃ kṛṇute suvīrye dāśnoti namauktibhiḥ //
analyzed: putram prāvargam kṛṇute su vīrye dāśnoti namauktibhiḥ

original: RV_8,004.07a mā bhema mā śramiṣmograsya sakhye tava /
analyzed: mā bhema mā śramiṣma ugrasya sakhye tava

original: RV_8,004.07c mahat te vṛṣṇo abhicakṣyaṃ kṛtam paśyema turvaśaṃ yadum //
analyzed: mahat te vṛṣṇaḥ abhicakṣyam kṛtam paśyema turvaśam yadum

original: RV_8,004.08a savyām anu sphigyaṃ vāvase vṛṣā na dāno asya roṣati /
analyzed: savyām anu sphigyam vāvase vṛṣā na dānaḥ asya roṣati

original: RV_8,004.08c madhvā sampṛktāḥ sāragheṇa dhenavas tūyam ehi dravā piba //
analyzed: madhvā sampṛktāḥ sāragheṇa dhenavaḥ tūyam ehi drava piba

original: RV_8,004.09a aśvī rathī surūpa id gomāṃ id indra te sakhā /
analyzed: aśvī rathī surūpaḥ id gomān id indra te sakhā

original: RV_8,004.09c śvātrabhājā vayasā sacate sadā candro yāti sabhām upa //
analyzed: śvātra bhājā vayasā sacate sadā candraḥ yāti sabhām upa

original: RV_8,004.10a ṛśyo na tṛṣyann avapānam ā gahi pibā somaṃ vaśāṃ anu /
analyzed: ṛśyaḥ na tṛṣyan avapānam ā gahi pibā somam vaśām anu

original: RV_8,004.10c nimeghamāno maghavan dive-diva ojiṣṭhaṃ dadhiṣe sahaḥ //
analyzed: nimeghamānaḥ maghavan dive dive ojiṣṭham dadhiṣe sahaḥ

original: RV_8,004.11a adhvaryo drāvayā tvaṃ somam indraḥ pipāsati /
analyzed: adhvaryo drāvaya tvam somam indraḥ pipāsati

original: RV_8,004.11c upa nūnaṃ yuyuje vṛṣaṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā //
analyzed: upa nūnam yuyuje vṛṣaṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā

original: RV_8,004.12a svayaṃ cit sa manyate dāśurir jano yatrā somasya tṛmpasi /
analyzed: svayam cit sa manyate dāśuriḥ janaḥ yatra somasya tṛmpasi

original: RV_8,004.12c idaṃ te annaṃ yujyaṃ samukṣitaṃ tasyehi pra dravā piba //
analyzed: idam te annam yujyam samukṣitam tasya ihi pra drava piba

original: RV_8,004.13a ratheṣṭhāyādhvaryavaḥ somam indrāya sotana /
analyzed: ratheṣṭhāya adhvaryavaḥ somam indrāya sotana

original: RV_8,004.13c adhi bradhnasyādrayo vi cakṣate sunvanto dāśvadhvaram //
analyzed: adhi bradhnasya adrayaḥ vi cakṣate sunvantaḥ dāśu adhvaram

original: RV_8,004.14a upa bradhnaṃ vāvātā vṛṣaṇā harī indram apasu vakṣataḥ /
analyzed: upa bradhnam vāvātā vṛṣaṇā harī indram apasu vakṣataḥ

original: RV_8,004.14c arvāñcaṃ tvā saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa //
analyzed: arvāñcam tvā saptayaḥ dhvara śriyaḥ vahantu savanā id upa

original: RV_8,004.15a pra pūṣaṇaṃ vṛṇīmahe yujyāya purūvasum /
analyzed: pra pūṣaṇam vṛṇīmahe yujyāya purūvasum

original: RV_8,004.15c sa śakra śikṣa puruhūta no dhiyā tuje rāye vimocana //
analyzed: sa śakra śikṣa puru hūta naḥ dhiyā tuje rāye vimocana

original: RV_8,004.16a saṃ naḥ śiśīhi bhurijor iva kṣuraṃ rāsva rāyo vimocana /
analyzed: sam naḥ śiśīhi bhurijoḥ iva kṣuram rāsva rāyaḥ vimocana

original: RV_8,004.16c tve tan naḥ suvedam usriyaṃ vasu yaṃ tvaṃ hinoṣi martyam //
analyzed: tve tat naḥ su vedam usriyam vasu yam tvam hinoṣi martyam

original: RV_8,004.17a vemi tvā pūṣann ṛñjase vemi stotava āghṛṇe /
analyzed: vemi tvā pūṣan ṛñjase vemi stotave āghṛṇe

original: RV_8,004.17c na tasya vemy araṇaṃ hi tad vaso stuṣe pajrāya sāmne //
analyzed: na tasya vemi araṇam hi tat vaso stuṣe pajrāya sāmne

original: RV_8,004.18a parā gāvo yavasaṃ kac cid āghṛṇe nityaṃ rekṇo amartya /
analyzed: parā gāvaḥ yavasam kad cit āghṛṇe nityam rekṇaḥ amartya

original: RV_8,004.18c asmākam pūṣann avitā śivo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye //
analyzed: asmākam pūṣan avitā śivaḥ bhava maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vāja sātaye

original: RV_8,004.19a sthūraṃ rādhaḥ śatāśvaṃ kuruṅgasya diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: sthūram rādhaḥ śata aśvam kuruṅgasya diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_8,004.19c rājñas tveṣasya subhagasya rātiṣu turvaśeṣv amanmahi //
analyzed: rājñaḥ tveṣasya subhagasya rātiṣu turvaśeṣu amanmahi

original: RV_8,004.20a dhībhiḥ sātāni kāṇvasya vājinaḥ priyamedhair abhidyubhiḥ /
analyzed: dhībhiḥ sātāni kāṇvasya vājinaḥ priyamedhaiḥ abhidyubhiḥ

original: RV_8,004.20c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrānu nirmajām aje nir yūthāni gavām ṛṣiḥ //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā anu nirmajām aje niḥ yūthāni gavām ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_8,004.21a vṛkṣāś cin me abhipitve arāraṇuḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣāḥ cit me abhipitve arāraṇuḥ

original: RV_8,004.21c gām bhajanta mehanāśvam bhajanta mehanā //
analyzed: gām bhajanta mehanā aśvam bhajanta mehanā

original: RV_8,005.01a dūrād iheva yat saty aruṇapsur aśiśvitat /
analyzed: dūrāt iha iva yat satī aruṇapsuḥ aśiśvitat

original: RV_8,005.01c vi bhānuṃ viśvadhātanat //
analyzed: vi bhānum viśvadhā atanat

original: RV_8,005.02a nṛvad dasrā manoyujā rathena pṛthupājasā /
analyzed: nṛvat dasrā manaḥ yujā rathena pṛthu pājasā

original: RV_8,005.02c sacethe aśvinoṣasam //
analyzed: sacethe aśvinā uṣasam

original: RV_8,005.03a yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū prati stomā adṛkṣata /
analyzed: yuvābhyām vājinīvasū prati stomāḥ adṛkṣata

original: RV_8,005.03c vācaṃ dūto yathohiṣe //
analyzed: vācam dūtaḥ yathā ūhiṣe

original: RV_8,005.04a purupriyā ṇa ūtaye purumandrā purūvasū /
analyzed: puru priyā naḥ ūtaye puru mandrā purūvasū

original: RV_8,005.04c stuṣe kaṇvāso aśvinā //
analyzed: stuṣe kaṇvāsaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.05a maṃhiṣṭhā vājasātameṣayantā śubhas patī /
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhā vāja sātamā iṣayantā śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_8,005.05c gantārā dāśuṣo gṛham //
analyzed: gantārā dāśuṣaḥ gṛham

original: RV_8,005.06a tā sudevāya dāśuṣe sumedhām avitāriṇīm /
analyzed: tā su devāya dāśuṣe su medhām a vitāriṇīm

original: RV_8,005.06c ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam //
analyzed: ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam

original: RV_8,005.07a ā na stomam upa dravat tūyaṃ śyenebhir āśubhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ stomam upa dravat tūyam śyenebhiḥ āśubhiḥ

original: RV_8,005.07c yātam aśvebhir aśvinā //
analyzed: yātam aśvebhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.08a yebhis tisraḥ parāvato divo viśvāni rocanā /
analyzed: yebhiḥ tisraḥ parāvataḥ divaḥ viśvāni rocanā

original: RV_8,005.08c trīṃr aktūn paridīyathaḥ //
analyzed: trīn aktūn paridīyathaḥ

original: RV_8,005.09a uta no gomatīr iṣa uta sātīr aharvidā /
analyzed: uta naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ uta sātīḥ ahar vidā

original: RV_8,005.09c vi pathaḥ sātaye sitam //
analyzed: vi pathaḥ sātaye sitam

original: RV_8,005.10a ā no gomantam aśvinā suvīraṃ surathaṃ rayim /
analyzed: ā naḥ gomantam aśvinā su vīram su ratham rayim

original: RV_8,005.10c voḷham aśvāvatīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: voḍham aśvāvatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_8,005.11a vāvṛdhānā śubhas patī dasrā hiraṇyavartanī /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānā śubhaḥ patī dasrā hiraṇya vartanī

original: RV_8,005.11c pibataṃ somyam madhu //
analyzed: pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_8,005.12a asmabhyaṃ vājinīvasū maghavadbhyaś ca saprathaḥ /
analyzed: asmabhyam vājinīvasū maghavadbhyaḥ ca saprathaḥ

original: RV_8,005.12c chardir yantam adābhyam //
analyzed: chardiḥ yantam adābhyam

original: RV_8,005.13a ni ṣu brahma janānāṃ yāviṣṭaṃ tūyam ā gatam /
analyzed: ni su brahma janānām yā āviṣṭam tūyam ā gatam

original: RV_8,005.13c mo ṣv anyāṃ upāratam //
analyzed: mā u su anyām upa aratam

original: RV_8,005.14a asya pibatam aśvinā yuvam madasya cāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: asya pibatam aśvinā yuvam madasya cāruṇaḥ

original: RV_8,005.14c madhvo rātasya dhiṣṇyā //
analyzed: madhvaḥ rātasya dhiṣṇyā

original: RV_8,005.15a asme ā vahataṃ rayiṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam /
analyzed: asme ā vahatam rayim śatavantam sahasriṇam

original: RV_8,005.15c purukṣuṃ viśvadhāyasam //
analyzed: purukṣum viśva dhāyasam

original: RV_8,005.16a purutrā cid dhi vāṃ narā vihvayante manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: purutrā cit hi vām narāḥ vihvayante manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_8,005.16c vāghadbhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: vāghadbhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_8,005.17a janāso vṛktabarhiṣo haviṣmanto araṅkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ haviṣmantaḥ araṅkṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,005.17c yuvāṃ havante aśvinā //
analyzed: yuvām havante aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.18a asmākam adya vām ayaṃ stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam adya vām ayam stomaḥ vāhiṣṭhaḥ antamaḥ

original: RV_8,005.18c yuvābhyām bhūtv aśvinā //
analyzed: yuvābhyām bhūtu aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.19a yo ha vām madhuno dṛtir āhito rathacarṣaṇe /
analyzed: yaḥ ha vām madhunaḥ dṛtiḥ āhitaḥ rathacarṣaṇe

original: RV_8,005.19c tataḥ pibatam aśvinā //
analyzed: tatas pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.20a tena no vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śaṃ gave /
analyzed: tena naḥ vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śam gave

original: RV_8,005.20c vahatam pīvarīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: vahatam pīvarīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_8,005.21a uta no divyā iṣa uta sindhūṃr aharvidā /
analyzed: uta naḥ divyāḥ iṣaḥ uta sindhūṃr ahar vidā

original: RV_8,005.21c apa dvāreva varṣathaḥ //
analyzed: apa dvārā iva varṣathaḥ

original: RV_8,005.22a kadā vāṃ taugryo vidhat samudre jahito narā /
analyzed: kadā vām taugryaḥ vidhat samudre jahitaḥ narā

original: RV_8,005.22c yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt //
analyzed: yat vām rathaḥ vibhiḥ patāt

original: RV_8,005.23a yuvaṃ kaṇvāya nāsatyā ṛpiriptāya harmye /
analyzed: yuvam kaṇvāya nāsatyāḥ harmye

original: RV_8,005.23c śaśvad ūtīr daśasyathaḥ //
analyzed: śaśvat ūtīḥ daśasyathaḥ

original: RV_8,005.24a tābhir ā yātam ūtibhir navyasībhiḥ suśastibhiḥ /
analyzed: tābhiḥ ā yātam ūtibhiḥ navyasībhiḥ su śastibhiḥ

original: RV_8,005.24c yad vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū huve //
analyzed: yat vām vṛṣaṇvasū huve

original: RV_8,005.25a yathā cit kaṇvam āvatam priyamedham upastutam /
analyzed: yathā cit kaṇvam āvatam priyamedham upastutam

original: RV_8,005.25c atriṃ śiñjāram aśvinā //
analyzed: atrim śiñjāram aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.26a yathota kṛtvye dhane 'ṃśuṃ goṣv agastyam /
analyzed: yathā uta kṛtvye dhane ṃśum goṣu agastyam

original: RV_8,005.26c yathā vājeṣu sobharim //
analyzed: yathā vājeṣu sobharim

original: RV_8,005.27a etāvad vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ato vā bhūyo aśvinā /
analyzed: etāvat vām vṛṣaṇvasū atas vā bhūyaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.27c gṛṇantaḥ sumnam īmahe //
analyzed: gṛṇantaḥ sumnam īmahe

original: RV_8,005.28a rathaṃ hiraṇyavandhuraṃ hiraṇyābhīśum aśvinā /
analyzed: ratham hiraṇya vandhuram hiraṇya abhīśum aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.28c ā hi sthātho divispṛśam //
analyzed: ā hi sthāthaḥ divispṛśam

original: RV_8,005.29a hiraṇyayī vāṃ rabhir īṣā akṣo hiraṇyayaḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇyayī vām rabhiḥ īṣāḥ akṣaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_8,005.29c ubhā cakrā hiraṇyayā //
analyzed: ubhā cakrā hiraṇyayā

original: RV_8,005.30a tena no vājinīvasū parāvataś cid ā gatam /
analyzed: tena naḥ vājinīvasū parāvataḥ cit ā gatam

original: RV_8,005.30c upemāṃ suṣṭutim mama //
analyzed: upa imām suṣṭutim mama

original: RV_8,005.31a ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīr aśnantāv aśvinā /
analyzed: ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīḥ aśnantau aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.31c iṣo dāsīr amartyā //
analyzed: iṣaḥ dāsīḥ amartyā

original: RV_8,005.32a ā no dyumnair ā śravobhir ā rāyā yātam aśvinā /
analyzed: ā naḥ dyumnaiḥ ā śravobhiḥ ā rāyā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,005.32c puruścandrā nāsatyā //
analyzed: puru ścandrā nāsatyā

original: RV_8,005.33a eha vām pruṣitapsavo vayo vahantu parṇinaḥ /
analyzed: ā iha vām pruṣitapsavaḥ vayaḥ vahantu parṇinaḥ

original: RV_8,005.33c acchā svadhvaraṃ janam //
analyzed: acchā su adhvaram janam

original: RV_8,005.34a rathaṃ vām anugāyasaṃ ya iṣā vartate saha /
analyzed: ratham vām anugāyasam yaḥ iṣā vartate saha

original: RV_8,005.34c na cakram abhi bādhate //
analyzed: na cakram abhi bādhate

original: RV_8,005.35a hiraṇyayena rathena dravatpāṇibhir aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇyayena rathena dravat pāṇibhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_8,005.35c dhījavanā nāsatyā //
analyzed: dhī javanā nāsatyā

original: RV_8,005.36a yuvam mṛgaṃ jāgṛvāṃsaṃ svadatho vā vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: yuvam mṛgam jāgṛvāṃsam svadathaḥ vā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,005.36c tā naḥ pṛṅktam iṣā rayim //
analyzed: tā naḥ pṛṅktam iṣā rayim

original: RV_8,005.37a tā me aśvinā sanīnāṃ vidyātaṃ navānām /
analyzed: tā me aśvinā sanīnām vidyātam navānām

original: RV_8,005.37c yathā cic caidyaḥ kaśuḥ śatam uṣṭrānāṃ dadat sahasrā daśa gonām //
analyzed: yathā cit caidyaḥ kaśuḥ śatam uṣṭrānām dadat sahasrā daśa gonām

original: RV_8,005.38a yo me hiraṇyasaṃdṛśo daśa rājño amaṃhata /
analyzed: yaḥ me hiraṇya saṃdṛśaḥ daśa rājñaḥ amaṃhata

original: RV_8,005.38c adhaspadā ic caidyasya kṛṣṭayaś carmamnā abhito janāḥ //
analyzed: adhaspadāḥ id caidyasya kṛṣṭayaḥ carmamnāḥ abhitas janāḥ

original: RV_8,005.39a mākir enā pathā gād yeneme yanti cedayaḥ /
analyzed: mākir enā pathā gāt yena ime yanti cedayaḥ

original: RV_8,005.39c anyo net sūrir ohate bhūridāvattaro janaḥ //
analyzed: anyaḥ na id sūriḥ ohate bhūri dāvattaraḥ janaḥ

original: RV_8,006.01a mahāṃ indro ya ojasā parjanyo vṛṣṭimāṃ iva /
analyzed: mahān indraḥ yaḥ ojasā parjanyaḥ vṛṣṭimān iva

original: RV_8,006.01c stomair vatsasya vāvṛdhe //
analyzed: stomaiḥ vatsasya vāvṛdhe

original: RV_8,006.02a prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yad bharanta vahnayaḥ /
analyzed: prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yat bharanta vahnayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.02c viprā ṛtasya vāhasā //
analyzed: viprāḥ ṛtasya vāhasā

original: RV_8,006.03a kaṇvā indraṃ yad akrata stomair yajñasya sādhanam /
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ indram yat akrata stomaiḥ yajñasya sādhanam

original: RV_8,006.03c jāmi bruvata āyudham //
analyzed: jāmi bruvate āyudham

original: RV_8,006.04a sam asya manyave viśo viśvā namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: sam asya manyave viśaḥ viśvāḥ namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.04c samudrāyeva sindhavaḥ //
analyzed: samudrāya iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_8,006.05a ojas tad asya titviṣa ubhe yat samavartayat /
analyzed: ojaḥ tat asya titviṣe ubhe yat samavartayat

original: RV_8,006.05c indraś carmeva rodasī //
analyzed: indraḥ carma iva rodasī

original: RV_8,006.06a vi cid vṛtrasya dodhato vajreṇa śataparvaṇā /
analyzed: vi cit vṛtrasya dodhataḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: RV_8,006.06c śiro bibheda vṛṣṇinā //
analyzed: śiraḥ bibheda vṛṣṇinā

original: RV_8,006.07a imā abhi pra ṇonumo vipām agreṣu dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ vipām agreṣu dhītayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.07c agneḥ śocir na didyutaḥ //
analyzed: agneḥ śociḥ na didyutaḥ

original: RV_8,006.08a guhā satīr upa tmanā pra yac chocanta dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: guhā satīḥ upa tmanā pra yat śocanta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.08c kaṇvā ṛtasya dhārayā //
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā

original: RV_8,006.09a pra tam indra naśīmahi rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
analyzed: pra tam indra naśīmahi rayim gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_8,006.09c pra brahma pūrvacittaye //
analyzed: pra brahma pūrvacittaye

original: RV_8,006.10a aham id dhi pituṣ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha /
analyzed: aham id hi pituḥ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha

original: RV_8,006.10c ahaṃ sūrya ivājani //
analyzed: aham sūrye iva ajani

original: RV_8,006.11a aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇvavat /
analyzed: aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇva vat

original: RV_8,006.11c yenendraḥ śuṣmam id dadhe //
analyzed: yena indraḥ śuṣmam id dadhe

original: RV_8,006.12a ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvur ṛṣayo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ /
analyzed: ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvuḥ ṛṣayaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: RV_8,006.12c mamed vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ //
analyzed: mama id vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_8,006.13a yad asya manyur adhvanīd vi vṛtram parvaśo rujan /
analyzed: yat asya manyuḥ adhvanīt vi vṛtram parvaśas rujan

original: RV_8,006.13c apaḥ samudram airayat //
analyzed: apaḥ samudram airayat

original: RV_8,006.14a ni śuṣṇa indra dharṇasiṃ vajraṃ jaghantha dasyavi /
analyzed: ni śuṣṇe indra dharṇasim vajram jaghantha dasyavi

original: RV_8,006.14c vṛṣā hy ugra śṛṇviṣe //
analyzed: vṛṣā hi ugra śṛṇviṣe

original: RV_8,006.15a na dyāva indram ojasā nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam /
analyzed: na dyāvaḥ indram ojasā na antarikṣāṇi vajriṇam

original: RV_8,006.15c na vivyacanta bhūmayaḥ //
analyzed: na vivyacanta bhūmayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.16a yas ta indra mahīr apa stabhūyamāna āśayat /
analyzed: yaḥ te indra mahīḥ apaḥ stabhūyamānaḥ āśayat

original: RV_8,006.16c ni tam padyāsu śiśnathaḥ //
analyzed: ni tam padyāsu śiśnathaḥ

original: RV_8,006.17a ya ime rodasī mahī samīcī samajagrabhīt /
analyzed: yaḥ ime rodasī mahī samīcī samajagrabhīt

original: RV_8,006.17c tamobhir indra taṃ guhaḥ //
analyzed: tamobhiḥ indra tam guhaḥ

original: RV_8,006.18a ya indra yatayas tvā bhṛgavo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ /
analyzed: ye indra yatayaḥ tvā bhṛgavaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: RV_8,006.18c mamed ugra śrudhī havam //
analyzed: mama id ugra śrudhi havam

original: RV_8,006.19a imās ta indra pṛśnayo ghṛtaṃ duhata āśiram /
analyzed: imāḥ te indra pṛśnayaḥ ghṛtam duhate āśiram

original: RV_8,006.19c enām ṛtasya pipyuṣīḥ //
analyzed: enām ṛtasya pipyuṣīḥ

original: RV_8,006.20a yā indra prasvas tvāsā garbham acakriran /
analyzed: yāḥ indra prasvaḥ tvāsā garbham acakriran

original: RV_8,006.20c pari dharmeva sūryam //
analyzed: pari dharmā iva sūryam

original: RV_8,006.21a tvām ic chavasas pate kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ /
analyzed: tvām id śavasaḥ pate kaṇvāḥ ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_8,006.21c tvāṃ sutāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: tvām sutāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,006.22a taved indra praṇītiṣūta praśastir adrivaḥ /
analyzed: tava id indra praṇītiṣu uta praśastiḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,006.22c yajño vitantasāyyaḥ //
analyzed: yajñaḥ vitantasāyyaḥ

original: RV_8,006.23a ā na indra mahīm iṣam puraṃ na darṣi gomatīm /
analyzed: ā naḥ indra mahīm iṣam puram na darṣi gomatīm

original: RV_8,006.23c uta prajāṃ suvīryam //
analyzed: uta prajām su vīryam

original: RV_8,006.24a uta tyad āśvaśvyaṃ yad indra nāhuṣīṣv ā /
analyzed: uta tyad āśu aśvyam yat indra nāhuṣīṣu ā

original: RV_8,006.24c agre vikṣu pradīdayat //
analyzed: agre vikṣu pradīdayat

original: RV_8,006.25a abhi vrajaṃ na tatniṣe sūra upākacakṣasam /
analyzed: abhi vrajam na tatniṣe sūraḥ upāka cakṣasam

original: RV_8,006.25c yad indra mṛḷayāsi naḥ //
analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_8,006.26a yad aṅga taviṣīyasa indra prarājasi kṣitīḥ /
analyzed: yat aṅga taviṣīyase indra prarājasi kṣitīḥ

original: RV_8,006.26c mahāṃ apāra ojasā //
analyzed: mahān apāraḥ ojasā

original: RV_8,006.27a taṃ tvā haviṣmatīr viśa upa bruvata ūtaye /
analyzed: tam tvā haviṣmatīḥ viśaḥ upa bruvate ūtaye

original: RV_8,006.27c urujrayasam indubhiḥ //
analyzed: uru jrayasam indubhiḥ

original: RV_8,006.28a upahvare girīṇāṃ saṃgathe ca nadīnām /
analyzed: upahvare girīṇām saṃgathe ca nadīnām

original: RV_8,006.28c dhiyā vipro ajāyata //
analyzed: dhiyā vipraḥ ajāyata

original: RV_8,006.29a ataḥ samudram udvataś cikitvāṃ ava paśyati /
analyzed: atas samudram udvataḥ cikitvān ava paśyati

original: RV_8,006.29c yato vipāna ejati //
analyzed: yatas vipānaḥ ejati

original: RV_8,006.30a ād it pratnasya retaso jyotiṣ paśyanti vāsaram /
analyzed: āt id pratnasya retasaḥ jyotiḥ paśyanti vāsaram

original: RV_8,006.30c paro yad idhyate divā //
analyzed: paras yat idhyate divā

original: RV_8,006.31a kaṇvāsa indra te matiṃ viśve vardhanti pauṃsyam /
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ indra te matim viśve vardhanti pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,006.31c uto śaviṣṭha vṛṣṇyam //
analyzed: uta u śaviṣṭha vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_8,006.32a imām ma indra suṣṭutiṃ juṣasva pra su mām ava /
analyzed: imām me indra suṣṭutim juṣasva pra su mām ava

original: RV_8,006.32c uta pra vardhayā matim //
analyzed: uta pra vardhaya matim

original: RV_8,006.33a uta brahmaṇyā vayaṃ tubhyam pravṛddha vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: uta brahmaṇyāḥ vayam tubhyam pravṛddha vajrivas

original: RV_8,006.33c viprā atakṣma jīvase //
analyzed: viprāḥ atakṣma jīvase

original: RV_8,006.34a abhi kaṇvā anūṣatāpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
analyzed: abhi kaṇvāḥ anūṣata apaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_8,006.34c indraṃ vananvatī matiḥ //
analyzed: indram vananvatī matiḥ

original: RV_8,006.35a indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_8,006.35c anuttamanyum ajaram //
analyzed: anutta manyum ajaram

original: RV_8,006.36a ā no yāhi parāvato haribhyāṃ haryatābhyām /
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi parāvataḥ haribhyām haryatābhyām

original: RV_8,006.36c imam indra sutam piba //
analyzed: imam indra sutam piba

original: RV_8,006.37a tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: tvām id vṛtra hantama janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,006.37c havante vājasātaye //
analyzed: havante vājasātaye

original: RV_8,006.38a anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakraṃ na varty etaśam /
analyzed: anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakram na varti etaśam

original: RV_8,006.38c anu suvānāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: anu suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,006.39a mandasvā su svarṇara utendra śaryaṇāvati /
analyzed: mandasva su svarṇare uta indra śaryaṇāvati

original: RV_8,006.39c matsvā vivasvato matī //
analyzed: matsva vivasvataḥ matī

original: RV_8,006.40a vāvṛdhāna upa dyavi vṛṣā vajry aroravīt /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānaḥ upa dyavi vṛṣā vajrī aroravīt

original: RV_8,006.40c vṛtrahā somapātamaḥ //
analyzed: vṛtra hā soma pātamaḥ

original: RV_8,006.41a ṛṣir hi pūrvajā asy eka īśāna ojasā /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ hi pūrva jāḥ asi ekaḥ īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_8,006.41c indra coṣkūyase vasu //
analyzed: indra coṣkūyase vasu

original: RV_8,006.42a asmākaṃ tvā sutāṃ upa vītapṛṣṭhā abhi prayaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam tvā sutām upa vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.42c śataṃ vahantu harayaḥ //
analyzed: śatam vahantu harayaḥ

original: RV_8,006.43a imāṃ su pūrvyāṃ dhiyam madhor ghṛtasya pipyuṣīm /
analyzed: imām su pūrvyām dhiyam madhoḥ ghṛtasya pipyuṣīm

original: RV_8,006.43c kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ //
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_8,006.44a indram id vimahīnām medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ /
analyzed: indram id vimahīnām medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,006.44c indraṃ saniṣyur ūtaye //
analyzed: indram saniṣyuḥ ūtaye

original: RV_8,006.45a arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī /
analyzed: arvāñcam tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedha stutā harī

original: RV_8,006.45c somapeyāya vakṣataḥ //
analyzed: soma peyāya vakṣataḥ

original: RV_8,006.46a śatam ahaṃ tirindire sahasram parśāv ā dade /
analyzed: śatam aham tirindire sahasram parśau ā dade

original: RV_8,006.46c rādhāṃsi yādvānām //
analyzed: rādhāṃsi yādvānām

original: RV_8,006.47a trīṇi śatāny arvatāṃ sahasrā daśa gonām /
analyzed: trīṇi śatāni arvatām sahasrā daśa gonām

original: RV_8,006.47c daduṣ pajrāya sāmne //
analyzed: daduḥ pajrāya sāmne

original: RV_8,006.48a ud ānaṭ kakuho divam uṣṭrāñ caturyujo dadat /
analyzed: ud ānaṭ kakuhaḥ divam uṣṭrām catur yujaḥ dadat

original: RV_8,006.48c śravasā yādvaṃ janam //
analyzed: śravasā yādvam janam

original: RV_8,007.01a pra yad vas triṣṭubham iṣam maruto vipro akṣarat /
analyzed: pra yat vaḥ triṣṭubham iṣam marutaḥ vipraḥ akṣarat

original: RV_8,007.01c vi parvateṣu rājatha //
analyzed: vi parvateṣu rājatha

original: RV_8,007.02a yad aṅga taviṣīyavo yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam /
analyzed: yat aṅga taviṣīyavaḥ yāmam śubhrāḥ acidhvam

original: RV_8,007.02c ni parvatā ahāsata //
analyzed: ni parvatāḥ ahāsata

original: RV_8,007.03a ud īrayanta vāyubhir vāśrāsaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ /
analyzed: ud īrayanta vāyubhiḥ vāśrāsaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_8,007.03c dhukṣanta pipyuṣīm iṣam //
analyzed: dhukṣanta pipyuṣīm iṣam

original: RV_8,007.04a vapanti maruto miham pra vepayanti parvatān /
analyzed: vapanti marutaḥ miham pra vepayanti parvatān

original: RV_8,007.04c yad yāmaṃ yānti vāyubhiḥ //
analyzed: yat yāmam yānti vāyubhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.05a ni yad yāmāya vo girir ni sindhavo vidharmaṇe /
analyzed: ni yat yāmāya vaḥ giriḥ ni sindhavaḥ vidharmaṇe

original: RV_8,007.05c mahe śuṣmāya yemire //
analyzed: mahe śuṣmāya yemire

original: RV_8,007.06a yuṣmāṃ u naktam ūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe /
analyzed: yuṣmān u naktam ūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe

original: RV_8,007.06c yuṣmān prayaty adhvare //
analyzed: yuṣmān prayati adhvare

original: RV_8,007.07a ud u tye aruṇapsavaś citrā yāmebhir īrate /
analyzed: ud u tye aruṇapsavaḥ citrāḥ yāmebhiḥ īrate

original: RV_8,007.07c vāśrā adhi ṣṇunā divaḥ //
analyzed: vāśrāḥ adhi snunā divaḥ

original: RV_8,007.08a sṛjanti raśmim ojasā panthāṃ sūryāya yātave /
analyzed: sṛjanti raśmim ojasā panthām sūryāya yātave

original: RV_8,007.08c te bhānubhir vi tasthire //
analyzed: te bhānubhiḥ vi tasthire

original: RV_8,007.09a imām me maruto giram imaṃ stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: imām me marutaḥ giram imam stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,007.09c imam me vanatā havam //
analyzed: imam me vanata havam

original: RV_8,007.10a trīṇi sarāṃsi pṛśnayo duduhre vajriṇe madhu /
analyzed: trīṇi sarāṃsi pṛśnayaḥ duduhre vajriṇe madhu

original: RV_8,007.10c utsaṃ kavandham udriṇam //
analyzed: utsam kabandham udriṇam

original: RV_8,007.11a maruto yad dha vo divaḥ sumnāyanto havāmahe /
analyzed: marutaḥ yat ha vaḥ divaḥ sumnāyantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,007.11c ā tū na upa gantana //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ upa gantana

original: RV_8,007.12a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavo rudrā ṛbhukṣaṇo dame /
analyzed: yūyam hi stha sudānavaḥ rudrāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ dame

original: RV_8,007.12c uta pracetaso made //
analyzed: uta pracetasaḥ made

original: RV_8,007.13a ā no rayim madacyutam purukṣuṃ viśvadhāyasam /
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim mada cyutam purukṣum viśva dhāyasam

original: RV_8,007.13c iyartā maruto divaḥ //
analyzed: iyarta marutaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_8,007.14a adhīva yad girīṇāṃ yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam /
analyzed: adhi iva yat girīṇām yāmam śubhrāḥ acidhvam

original: RV_8,007.14c suvānair mandadhva indubhiḥ //
analyzed: suvānaiḥ mandadhve indubhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.15a etāvataś cid eṣāṃ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ /
analyzed: etāvataḥ cit eṣām sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,007.15c adābhyasya manmabhiḥ //
analyzed: adābhyasya manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.16a ye drapsā iva rodasī dhamanty anu vṛṣṭibhiḥ /
analyzed: ye drapsāḥ iva rodasī dhamanti anu vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.16c utsaṃ duhanto akṣitam //
analyzed: utsam duhantaḥ akṣitam

original: RV_8,007.17a ud u svānebhir īrata ud rathair ud u vāyubhiḥ /
analyzed: ud u svānebhiḥ īrate ud rathaiḥ ud u vāyubhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.17c ut stomaiḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ //
analyzed: ud stomaiḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_8,007.18a yenāva turvaśaṃ yaduṃ yena kaṇvaṃ dhanaspṛtam /
analyzed: yena ava turvaśam yadum yena kaṇvam dhana spṛtam

original: RV_8,007.18c rāye su tasya dhīmahi //
analyzed: rāye su tasya dhīmahi

original: RV_8,007.19a imā u vaḥ sudānavo ghṛtaṃ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ u vaḥ sudānavaḥ ghṛtam na pipyuṣīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_8,007.19c vardhān kāṇvasya manmabhiḥ //
analyzed: vardhān kāṇvasya manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.20a kva nūnaṃ sudānavo madathā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: kva nūnam sudānavaḥ madatha vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,007.20c brahmā ko vaḥ saparyati //
analyzed: brahmā kaḥ vaḥ saparyati

original: RV_8,007.21a nahi ṣma yad dha vaḥ purā stomebhir vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: nahi sma yat ha vaḥ purā stomebhiḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,007.21c śardhāṃ ṛtasya jinvatha //
analyzed: śardhām ṛtasya jinvatha

original: RV_8,007.22a sam u tye mahatīr apaḥ saṃ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam /
analyzed: sam u tye mahatīḥ apaḥ sam kṣoṇī sam u sūryam

original: RV_8,007.22c saṃ vajram parvaśo dadhuḥ //
analyzed: sam vajram parvaśas

original: RV_8,007.23a vi vṛtram parvaśo yayur vi parvatāṃ arājinaḥ /
analyzed: vi vṛtram parvaśas yayuḥ vi parvatān a rājinaḥ

original: RV_8,007.23c cakrāṇā vṛṣṇi pauṃsyam //
analyzed: cakrāṇāḥ vṛṣṇi pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,007.24a anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmam āvann uta kratum /
analyzed: anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmam āvan uta kratum

original: RV_8,007.24c anv indraṃ vṛtratūrye //
analyzed: anu indram vṛtratūrye

original: RV_8,007.25a vidyuddhastā abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ /
analyzed: vidyut hastāḥ abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ

original: RV_8,007.25c śubhrā vy añjata śriye //
analyzed: śubhrāḥ vi añjata śriye

original: RV_8,007.26a uśanā yat parāvata ukṣṇo randhram ayātana /
analyzed: uśanā yat parāvataḥ ukṣṇaḥ randhram ayātana

original: RV_8,007.26c dyaur na cakradad bhiyā //
analyzed: dyauḥ na cakradat bhiyā

original: RV_8,007.27a ā no makhasya dāvane 'śvair hiraṇyapāṇibhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ makhasya dāvane śvaiḥ hiraṇya pāṇibhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.27c devāsa upa gantana //
analyzed: devāsaḥ upa gantana

original: RV_8,007.28a yad eṣām pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ /
analyzed: yat eṣām pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭiḥ vahati rohitaḥ

original: RV_8,007.28c yānti śubhrā riṇann apaḥ //
analyzed: yānti śubhrāḥ riṇan apaḥ

original: RV_8,007.29a suṣome śaryaṇāvaty ārjīke pastyāvati /
analyzed: su some śaryaṇāvati ārjīke pastyāvati

original: RV_8,007.29c yayur nicakrayā naraḥ //
analyzed: yayuḥ nicakrayā naraḥ

original: RV_8,007.30a kadā gacchātha maruta itthā vipraṃ havamānam /
analyzed: kadā gacchātha marutaḥ itthā vipram havamānam

original: RV_8,007.30c mārḍīkebhir nādhamānam //
analyzed: mārḍīkebhiḥ nādhamānam

original: RV_8,007.31a kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyo yad indram ajahātana /
analyzed: kad ha nūnam kadhapriyaḥ yat indram ajahātana

original: RV_8,007.31c ko vaḥ sakhitva ohate //
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ sakhi tve ohate

original: RV_8,007.32a saho ṣu ṇo vajrahastaiḥ kaṇvāso agnim marudbhiḥ /
analyzed: saha u su naḥ vajra hastaiḥ kaṇvāsaḥ agnim marudbhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.32c stuṣe hiraṇyavāśībhiḥ //
analyzed: stuṣe hiraṇya vāśībhiḥ

original: RV_8,007.33a o ṣu vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūn ā navyase suvitāya /
analyzed: ā u su vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūn ā navyase suvitāya

original: RV_8,007.33c vavṛtyāṃ citravājān //
analyzed: vavṛtyām citra vājān

original: RV_8,007.34a girayaś cin ni jihate parśānāso manyamānāḥ /
analyzed: girayaḥ cit ni jihate parśānāsaḥ manyamānāḥ

original: RV_8,007.34c parvatāś cin ni yemire //
analyzed: parvatāḥ cit ni yemire

original: RV_8,007.35a ākṣṇayāvāno vahanty antarikṣeṇa patataḥ /
analyzed: ā akṣṇayāvānaḥ vahanti antarikṣeṇa patataḥ

original: RV_8,007.35c dhātāra stuvate vayaḥ //
analyzed: dhātāraḥ stuvate vayaḥ

original: RV_8,007.36a agnir hi jāni pūrvyaś chando na sūro arciṣā /
analyzed: agniḥ hi jāni pūrvyaḥ chandaḥ na sūraḥ arciṣā

original: RV_8,007.36c te bhānubhir vi tasthire //
analyzed: te bhānubhiḥ vi tasthire

original: RV_8,008.01a ā no viśvābhir ūtibhir aśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gacchatam yuvam

original: RV_8,008.01c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī pibataṃ somyam madhu //
analyzed: dasrā hiraṇya vartanī pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_8,008.02a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinā rathena sūryatvacā /
analyzed: ā nūnam yātam aśvinā rathena sūrya tvacā

original: RV_8,008.02c bhujī hiraṇyapeśasā kavī gambhīracetasā //
analyzed: bhujī hiraṇya peśasā kavī gambhīra cetasā

original: RV_8,008.03a ā yātaṃ nahuṣas pary āntarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ /
analyzed: ā yātam nahuṣaḥ pari āntarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_8,008.03c pibātho aśvinā madhu kaṇvānāṃ savane sutam //
analyzed: pibāthaḥ aśvinā madhu kaṇvānām savane sutam

original: RV_8,008.04a ā no yātaṃ divas pary āntarikṣād adhapriyā /
analyzed: ā naḥ yātam divaḥ pari ā antarikṣāt adhapriyā

original: RV_8,008.04c putraḥ kaṇvasya vām iha suṣāva somyam madhu //
analyzed: putraḥ kaṇvasya vām iha suṣāva somyam madhu

original: RV_8,008.05a ā no yātam upaśruty aśvinā somapītaye /
analyzed: ā naḥ yātam upaśrutī aśvinā soma pītaye

original: RV_8,008.05c svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhir narā //
analyzed: svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhiḥ narā

original: RV_8,008.06a yac cid dhi vām pura ṛṣayo juhūre 'vase narā /
analyzed: yat cit hi vām puras ṛṣayaḥ juhūre vase narā

original: RV_8,008.06c ā yātam aśvinā gatam upemāṃ suṣṭutim mama //
analyzed: ā yātam aśvinā gatam upa imām suṣṭutim mama

original: RV_8,008.07a divaś cid rocanād adhy ā no gantaṃ svarvidā /
analyzed: divaḥ cit rocanāt adhi ā naḥ gantam svar vidā

original: RV_8,008.07c dhībhir vatsapracetasā stomebhir havanaśrutā //
analyzed: dhībhiḥ vatsa pracetasā stomebhiḥ havana śrutā

original: RV_8,008.08a kim anye pary āsate 'smat stomebhir aśvinā /
analyzed: kim anye pari āsate smat stomebhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,008.08c putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat //
analyzed: putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣiḥ gīrbhiḥ vatsaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: RV_8,008.09a ā vāṃ vipra ihāvase 'hvat stomebhir aśvinā /
analyzed: ā vām vipraḥ iha avase hvat stomebhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,008.09c ariprā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam mayobhuvā //
analyzed: ariprā vṛtra hantamā tā naḥ bhūtam mayobhuvā

original: RV_8,008.10a ā yad vāṃ yoṣaṇā ratham atiṣṭhad vājinīvasū /
analyzed: ā yat vām yoṣaṇā ratham atiṣṭhat vājinīvasū

original: RV_8,008.10c viśvāny aśvinā yuvam pra dhītāny agacchatam //
analyzed: viśvāni aśvinā yuvam pra dhītāni agacchatam

original: RV_8,008.11a ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
analyzed: atas sahasra nirṇijā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,008.11c vatso vām madhumad vaco 'śaṃsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: vatsaḥ vām madhumat vacaḥ śaṃsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_8,008.12a purumandrā purūvasū manotarā rayīṇām /
analyzed: puru mandrā purūvasū manotarā rayīṇām

original: RV_8,008.12c stomam me aśvināv imam abhi vahnī anūṣātām //
analyzed: stomam me aśvinau imam abhi vahnī anūṣātām

original: RV_8,008.13a ā no viśvāny aśvinā dhattaṃ rādhāṃsy ahrayā /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvāni aśvinā dhattam rādhāṃsi ahrayā

original: RV_8,008.13c kṛtaṃ na ṛtviyāvato mā no rīradhataṃ nide //
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ ṛtviyāvataḥ mā naḥ rīradhatam nide

original: RV_8,008.14a yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhy ambare /
analyzed: yat nāsatyā parāvati yat vā sthaḥ adhi ambare

original: RV_8,008.14c ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: atas sahasra nirṇijā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,008.15a yo vāṃ nāsatyāv ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat /
analyzed: yaḥ vām nāsatyau ṛṣiḥ gīrbhiḥ vatsaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: RV_8,008.15c tasmai sahasranirṇijam iṣaṃ dhattaṃ ghṛtaścutam //
analyzed: tasmai sahasra nirṇijam iṣam dhattam ghṛtaścutam

original: RV_8,008.16a prāsmā ūrjaṃ ghṛtaścutam aśvinā yacchataṃ yuvam /
analyzed: pra asmai ūrjam ghṛtaścutam aśvinā yacchatam yuvam

original: RV_8,008.16c yo vāṃ sumnāya tuṣṭavad vasūyād dānunas patī //
analyzed: yaḥ vām sumnāya tuṣṭavat vasūyāt dānunaḥ patī

original: RV_8,008.17a ā no gantaṃ riśādasemaṃ stomam purubhujā /
analyzed: ā naḥ gantam riśādasā imam stomam puru bhujā

original: RV_8,008.17c kṛtaṃ naḥ suśriyo naremā dātam abhiṣṭaye //
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ su śriyaḥ narā imā dātam abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,008.18a ā vāṃ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata /
analyzed: ā vām viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ priyamedhāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_8,008.18c rājantāv adhvarāṇām aśvinā yāmahūtiṣu //
analyzed: rājantau adhvarāṇām aśvinā yāma hūtiṣu

original: RV_8,008.19a ā no gantam mayobhuvāśvinā śambhuvā yuvam /
analyzed: ā naḥ gantam mayobhuvā aśvinā śambhuvā yuvam

original: RV_8,008.19c yo vāṃ vipanyū dhītibhir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat //
analyzed: yaḥ vām vipanyū dhītibhiḥ gīrbhiḥ vatsaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: RV_8,008.20a yābhiḥ kaṇvam medhātithiṃ yābhir vaśaṃ daśavrajam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvam medhātithim yābhiḥ vaśam daśavrajam

original: RV_8,008.20c yābhir gośaryam āvataṃ tābhir no 'vataṃ narā //
analyzed: yābhiḥ gośaryam āvatam tābhiḥ naḥ vatam narā

original: RV_8,008.21a yābhir narā trasadasyum āvataṃ kṛtvye dhane /
analyzed: yābhiḥ narā trasadasyum āvatam kṛtvye dhane

original: RV_8,008.21c tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ aśvinā prāvataṃ vājasātaye //
analyzed: tābhiḥ su asmān aśvinā prāvatam vājasātaye

original: RV_8,008.22a pra vāṃ stomāḥ suvṛktayo giro vardhantv aśvinā /
analyzed: pra vām stomāḥ suvṛktayaḥ giraḥ vardhantu aśvinā

original: RV_8,008.22c purutrā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam puruspṛhā //
analyzed: purutrā vṛtra hantamā tā naḥ bhūtam puruspṛhā

original: RV_8,008.23a trīṇi padāny aśvinor āviḥ sānti guhā paraḥ /
analyzed: trīṇi padāni aśvinoḥ āvis sānti guhā paras

original: RV_8,008.23c kavī ṛtasya patmabhir arvāg jīvebhyas pari //
analyzed: kavī ṛtasya patmabhiḥ arvāk jīvebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_8,009.01a ā nūnam aśvinā yuvaṃ vatsasya gantam avase /
analyzed: ā nūnam aśvinā yuvam vatsasya gantam avase

original: RV_8,009.01c prāsmai yacchatam avṛkam pṛthu cchardir yuyutaṃ yā arātayaḥ //
analyzed: pra asmai yacchatam avṛkam pṛthu chardiḥ yuyutam yāḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_8,009.02a yad antarikṣe yad divi yat pañca mānuṣāṃ anu /
analyzed: yat antarikṣe yat divi yat pañca mānuṣām anu

original: RV_8,009.02c nṛmṇaṃ tad dhattam aśvinā //
analyzed: nṛmṇam tat dhattam aśvinā

original: RV_8,009.03a ye vāṃ daṃsāṃsy aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ /
analyzed: ye vām daṃsāṃsi aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ

original: RV_8,009.03c evet kāṇvasya bodhatam //
analyzed: eva id kāṇvasya bodhatam

original: RV_8,009.04a ayaṃ vāṃ gharmo aśvinā stomena pari ṣicyate /
analyzed: ayam vām gharmaḥ aśvinā stomena pari sicyate

original: RV_8,009.04c ayaṃ somo madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtraṃ ciketathaḥ //
analyzed: ayam somaḥ madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtram ciketathaḥ

original: RV_8,009.05a yad apsu yad vanaspatau yad oṣadhīṣu purudaṃsasā kṛtam /
analyzed: yat apsu yat vanaspatau yat oṣadhīṣu puru daṃsasā kṛtam

original: RV_8,009.05c tena māviṣṭam aśvinā //
analyzed: tena mā aviṣṭam aśvinā

original: RV_8,009.06a yan nāsatyā bhuraṇyatho yad vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ /
analyzed: yat nāsatyā bhuraṇyathaḥ yat vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ

original: RV_8,009.06c ayaṃ vāṃ vatso matibhir na vindhate haviṣmantaṃ hi gacchathaḥ //
analyzed: ayam vām vatsaḥ matibhiḥ na vindhate haviṣmantam hi gacchathaḥ

original: RV_8,009.07a ā nūnam aśvinor ṛṣi stomaṃ ciketa vāmayā /
analyzed: ā nūnam aśvinoḥ ṛṣiḥ stomam ciketa vāmayā

original: RV_8,009.07c ā somam madhumattamaṃ gharmaṃ siñcād atharvaṇi //
analyzed: ā somam madhumattamam gharmam siñcāt atharvaṇi

original: RV_8,009.08a ā nūnaṃ raghuvartaniṃ rathaṃ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā /
analyzed: ā nūnam raghu vartanim ratham tiṣṭhāthaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,009.08c ā vāṃ stomā ime mama nabho na cucyavīrata //
analyzed: ā vām stomāḥ ime mama nabhaḥ na cucyavīrata

original: RV_8,009.09a yad adya vāṃ nāsatyokthair ācucyuvīmahi /
analyzed: yat adya vām nāsatya ukthaiḥ ācucyuvīmahi

original: RV_8,009.09c yad vā vāṇībhir aśvinevet kāṇvasya bodhatam //
analyzed: yat vā vāṇībhiḥ aśvinā iva id kāṇvasya bodhatam

original: RV_8,009.10a yad vāṃ kakṣīvāṃ uta yad vyaśva ṛṣir yad vāṃ dīrghatamā juhāva /
analyzed: yat vām kakṣīvān uta yat vyaśvaḥ ṛṣiḥ yat vām dīrghatamāḥ juhāva

original: RV_8,009.10c pṛthī yad vāṃ vainyaḥ sādaneṣv eved ato aśvinā cetayethām //
analyzed: pṛthī yat vām vainyaḥ sādaneṣu eva id atas aśvinā cetayethām

original: RV_8,009.11a yātaṃ chardiṣpā uta naḥ paraspā bhūtaṃ jagatpā uta nas tanūpā /
analyzed: yātam chardiṣpau uta naḥ paraspā bhūtam jagat pau uta naḥ tanū pā

original: RV_8,009.11c vartis tokāya tanayāya yātam //
analyzed: vartiḥ tokāya tanayāya yātam

original: RV_8,009.12a yad indreṇa sarathaṃ yātho aśvinā yad vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ samokasā /
analyzed: yat indreṇa sa ratham yāthaḥ aśvinā yat vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ samokasā

original: RV_8,009.12c yad ādityebhir ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yad vā viṣṇor vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ //
analyzed: yat ādityebhiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yat vā viṣṇoḥ vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ

original: RV_8,009.13a yad adyāśvināv ahaṃ huveya vājasātaye /
analyzed: yat adya aśvinau aham huveya vājasātaye

original: RV_8,009.13c yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahas tac chreṣṭham aśvinor avaḥ //
analyzed: yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahaḥ tat śreṣṭham aśvinoḥ avaḥ

original: RV_8,009.14a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinemā havyāni vāṃ hitā /
analyzed: ā nūnam yātam aśvinā imā havyāni vām hitā

original: RV_8,009.14c ime somāso adhi turvaśe yadāv ime kaṇveṣu vām atha //
analyzed: ime somāsaḥ adhi turvaśe yadau ime kaṇveṣu vām atha

original: RV_8,009.15a yan nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam /
analyzed: yat nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam

original: RV_8,009.15c tena nūnaṃ vimadāya pracetasā chardir vatsāya yacchatam //
analyzed: tena nūnam vimadāya pracetasā chardiḥ vatsāya yacchatam

original: RV_8,009.16a abhutsy u pra devyā sākaṃ vācāham aśvinoḥ /
analyzed: abhutsi u pra devyā sākam vācā aham aśvinoḥ

original: RV_8,009.16c vy āvar devy ā matiṃ vi rātim martyebhyaḥ //
analyzed: vi āvaḥ devi ā matim vi rātim martyebhyaḥ

original: RV_8,009.17a pra bodhayoṣo aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi /
analyzed: pra bodhaya uṣaḥ aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi

original: RV_8,009.17c pra yajñahotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravo bṛhat //
analyzed: pra yajña hotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_8,009.18a yad uṣo yāsi bhānunā saṃ sūryeṇa rocase /
analyzed: yat uṣaḥ yāsi bhānunā sam sūryeṇa rocase

original: RV_8,009.18c ā hāyam aśvino ratho vartir yāti nṛpāyyam //
analyzed: ā ha ayam aśvinoḥ rathaḥ vartiḥ yāti nṛ pāyyam

original: RV_8,009.19a yad āpītāso aṃśavo gāvo na duhra ūdhabhiḥ /
analyzed: yat āpītāsaḥ aṃśavaḥ gāvaḥ na duhre ūdhabhiḥ

original: RV_8,009.19c yad vā vāṇīr anūṣata pra devayanto aśvinā //
analyzed: yat vā vāṇīḥ anūṣata pra devayantaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,009.20a pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe /
analyzed: pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe

original: RV_8,009.20c pra dakṣāya pracetasā //
analyzed: pra dakṣāya pracetasā

original: RV_8,009.21a yan nūnaṃ dhībhir aśvinā pitur yonā niṣīdathaḥ /
analyzed: yat nūnam dhībhiḥ aśvinā pituḥ yonā niṣīdathaḥ

original: RV_8,009.21c yad vā sumnebhir ukthyā //
analyzed: yat vā sumnebhiḥ ukthyā

original: RV_8,010.01a yat stho dīrghaprasadmani yad vādo rocane divaḥ /
analyzed: yat sthaḥ dīrghaprasadmani yat vā adaḥ rocane divaḥ

original: RV_8,010.01c yad vā samudre adhy ākṛte gṛhe 'ta ā yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: yat vā samudre adhi ākṛte gṛhe te ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,010.02a yad vā yajñam manave sammimikṣathur evet kāṇvasya bodhatam /
analyzed: yat vā yajñam manave sammimikṣathuḥ eva id kāṇvasya bodhatam

original: RV_8,010.02c bṛhaspatiṃ viśvān devāṃ ahaṃ huva indrāviṣṇū aśvināv āśuheṣasā //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim viśvān devān aham huve indrāviṣṇū aśvinau āśu heṣasā

original: RV_8,010.03a tyā nv aśvinā huve sudaṃsasā gṛbhe kṛtā /
analyzed: tyā nu aśvinā huve su daṃsasā gṛbhe kṛtā

original: RV_8,010.03c yayor asti pra ṇaḥ sakhyaṃ deveṣv adhy āpyam //
analyzed: yayoḥ asti pra naḥ sakhyam deveṣu adhi āpyam

original: RV_8,010.04a yayor adhi pra yajñā asūre santi sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: yayoḥ adhi pra yajñāḥ asūre santi sūrayaḥ

original: RV_8,010.04c tā yajñasyādhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhir yā pibataḥ somyam madhu //
analyzed: tā yajñasya adhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhiḥ yā pibataḥ somyam madhu

original: RV_8,010.05a yad adyāśvināv apāg yat prāk stho vājinīvasū /
analyzed: yat adya aśvinau apāk yat prāk sthaḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_8,010.05c yad druhyavy anavi turvaśe yadau huve vām atha mā gatam //
analyzed: yat druhyavi anavi turvaśe yadau huve vām atha mā gatam

original: RV_8,010.06a yad antarikṣe patathaḥ purubhujā yad veme rodasī anu /
analyzed: yat antarikṣe patathaḥ puru bhujā yat vā ime rodasī anu

original: RV_8,010.06c yad vā svadhābhir adhitiṣṭhatho ratham ata ā yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: yat vā svadhābhiḥ adhitiṣṭhathaḥ ratham atas ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,011.01a tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā /
analyzed: tvam agne vrata pāḥ asi devaḥ ā martyeṣu ā

original: RV_8,011.01c tvaṃ yajñeṣv īḍyaḥ //
analyzed: tvam yajñeṣu īḍyaḥ

original: RV_8,011.02a tvam asi praśasyo vidatheṣu sahantya /
analyzed: tvam asi praśasyaḥ vidatheṣu sahantya

original: RV_8,011.02c agne rathīr adhvarāṇām //
analyzed: agne rathīḥ adhvarāṇām

original: RV_8,011.03a sa tvam asmad apa dviṣo yuyodhi jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam asmat apa dviṣaḥ yuyodhi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_8,011.03c adevīr agne arātīḥ //
analyzed: adevīḥ agne arātīḥ

original: RV_8,011.04a anti cit santam aha yajñam martasya ripoḥ /
analyzed: anti cit santam aha yajñam martasya ripoḥ

original: RV_8,011.04c nopa veṣi jātavedaḥ //
analyzed: na upa veṣi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_8,011.05a martā amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe /
analyzed: martāḥ amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe

original: RV_8,011.05c viprāso jātavedasaḥ //
analyzed: viprāsaḥ jātavedasaḥ

original: RV_8,011.06a vipraṃ viprāso 'vase devam martāsa ūtaye /
analyzed: vipram viprāsaḥ vase devam martāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_8,011.06c agniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe //
analyzed: agnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,011.07a ā te vatso mano yamat paramāc cit sadhasthāt /
analyzed: ā te vatsaḥ manaḥ yamat paramāt cit sadhasthāt

original: RV_8,011.07c agne tvāṅkāmayā girā //
analyzed: agne tvāṅkāmayā girā

original: RV_8,011.08a purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ /
analyzed: purutrā hi sadṛś asi viśaḥ viśvāḥ anu prabhuḥ

original: RV_8,011.08c samatsu tvā havāmahe //
analyzed: samatsu tvā havāmahe

original: RV_8,011.09a samatsv agnim avase vājayanto havāmahe /
analyzed: samatsu agnim avase vājayantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,011.09c vājeṣu citrarādhasam //
analyzed: vājeṣu citra rādhasam

original: RV_8,011.10a pratno hi kam īḍyo adhvareṣu sanāc ca hotā navyaś ca satsi /
analyzed: pratnaḥ hi kam īḍyaḥ adhvareṣu sanāt ca hotā navyaḥ ca satsi

original: RV_8,011.10c svāṃ cāgne tanvam piprayasvāsmabhyaṃ ca saubhagam ā yajasva //
analyzed: svām ca agne tanvam piprayasva asmabhyam ca saubhagam ā yajasva

original: RV_8,012.01a ya indra somapātamo madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati /
analyzed: yaḥ indra soma pātamaḥ madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati

original: RV_8,012.01c yenā haṃsi ny atriṇaṃ tam īmahe //
analyzed: yena haṃsi ni atriṇam tam īmahe

original: RV_8,012.02a yenā daśagvam adhriguṃ vepayantaṃ svarṇaram /
analyzed: yena daśagvam adhrigum vepayantam svarṇaram

original: RV_8,012.02c yenā samudram āvithā tam īmahe //
analyzed: yena samudram āvitha tam īmahe

original: RV_8,012.03a yena sindhum mahīr apo rathāṃ iva pracodayaḥ /
analyzed: yena sindhum mahīḥ apaḥ rathān iva pracodayaḥ

original: RV_8,012.03c panthām ṛtasya yātave tam īmahe //
analyzed: panthām ṛtasya yātave tam īmahe

original: RV_8,012.04a imaṃ stomam abhiṣṭaye ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adrivaḥ /
analyzed: imam stomam abhiṣṭaye ghṛtam na pūtam adrivas

original: RV_8,012.04c yenā nu sadya ojasā vavakṣitha //
analyzed: yena nu sadyas ojasā vavakṣitha

original: RV_8,012.05a imaṃ juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudra iva pinvate /
analyzed: imam juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudraḥ iva pinvate

original: RV_8,012.05c indra viśvābhir ūtibhir vavakṣitha //
analyzed: indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ vavakṣitha

original: RV_8,012.06a yo no devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe

original: RV_8,012.06c divo na vṛṣṭim prathayan vavakṣitha //
analyzed: divaḥ na vṛṣṭim prathayan vavakṣitha

original: RV_8,012.07a vavakṣur asya ketavo uta vajro gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: vavakṣuḥ asya ketavaḥ uta vajraḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_8,012.07c yat sūryo na rodasī avardhayat //
analyzed: yat sūryaḥ na rodasī avardhayat

original: RV_8,012.08a yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasram mahiṣāṃ aghaḥ /
analyzed: yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasram mahiṣān aghaḥ

original: RV_8,012.08c ād it ta indriyam mahi pra vāvṛdhe //
analyzed: āt id te indriyam mahi pra vāvṛdhe

original: RV_8,012.09a indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhir ny arśasānam oṣati /
analyzed: indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ ni arśasānam oṣati

original: RV_8,012.09c agnir vaneva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe //
analyzed: agniḥ vanā iva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe

original: RV_8,012.10a iyaṃ ta ṛtviyāvatī dhītir eti navīyasī /
analyzed: iyam te ṛtviyāvatī dhītiḥ eti navīyasī

original: RV_8,012.10c saparyantī purupriyā mimīta it //
analyzed: saparyantī puru priyā mimīte id

original: RV_8,012.11a garbho yajñasya devayuḥ kratum punīta ānuṣak /
analyzed: garbhaḥ yajñasya devayuḥ kratum punīte ānuṣak

original: RV_8,012.11c stomair indrasya vāvṛdhe mimīta it //
analyzed: stomaiḥ indrasya vāvṛdhe mimīte id

original: RV_8,012.12a sanir mitrasya papratha indraḥ somasya pītaye /
analyzed: saniḥ mitrasya paprathe indraḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,012.12c prācī vāśīva sunvate mimīta it //
analyzed: prācī vāśī iva sunvate mimīte id

original: RV_8,012.13a yaṃ viprā ukthavāhaso 'bhipramandur āyavaḥ /
analyzed: yam viprāḥ uktha vāhasaḥ bhipramanduḥ āyavaḥ

original: RV_8,012.13c ghṛtaṃ na pipya āsany ṛtasya yat //
analyzed: ghṛtam na pipye āsani ṛtasya yat

original: RV_8,012.14a uta svarāje aditi stomam indrāya jījanat /
analyzed: uta sva rāje aditiḥ stomam indrāya jījanat

original: RV_8,012.14c purupraśastam ūtaya ṛtasya yat //
analyzed: puru praśastam ūtaye ṛtasya yat

original: RV_8,012.15a abhi vahnaya ūtaye 'nūṣata praśastaye /
analyzed: abhi vahnayaḥ ūtaye nūṣata praśastaye

original: RV_8,012.15c na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat //
analyzed: na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat

original: RV_8,012.16a yat somam indra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye /
analyzed: yat somam indra viṣṇavi yat vā gha trite āptye

original: RV_8,012.16c yad vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ //
analyzed: yat vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ

original: RV_8,012.17a yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase /
analyzed: yat vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase

original: RV_8,012.17c asmākam it sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ //
analyzed: asmākam id sute raṇa sam indubhiḥ

original: RV_8,012.18a yad vāsi sunvato vṛdho yajamānasya satpate /
analyzed: yat vā asi sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ yajamānasya satpate

original: RV_8,012.18c ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ //
analyzed: ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ

original: RV_8,012.19a devaṃ-devaṃ vo 'vasa indram-indraṃ gṛṇīṣaṇi /
analyzed: devam devam vaḥ vase indram indram gṛṇīṣaṇi

original: RV_8,012.19c adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vy ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vi ānaśuḥ

original: RV_8,012.20a yajñebhir yajñavāhasaṃ somebhiḥ somapātamam /
analyzed: yajñebhiḥ yajña vāhasam somebhiḥ soma pātamam

original: RV_8,012.20c hotrābhir indraṃ vāvṛdhur vy ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: hotrābhiḥ indram vāvṛdhuḥ vi ānaśuḥ

original: RV_8,012.21a mahīr asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ /
analyzed: mahīḥ asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīḥ uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_8,012.21c viśvā vasūni dāśuṣe vy ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: viśvā vasūni dāśuṣe vi ānaśuḥ

original: RV_8,012.22a indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave devāso dadhire puraḥ /
analyzed: indram vṛtrāya hantave devāsaḥ dadhire puras

original: RV_8,012.22c indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣatā sam ojase //
analyzed: indram vāṇīḥ anūṣata sam ojase

original: RV_8,012.23a mahāntam mahinā vayaṃ stomebhir havanaśrutam /
analyzed: mahāntam mahinā vayam stomebhiḥ havana śrutam

original: RV_8,012.23c arkair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ sam ojase //
analyzed: arkaiḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ sam ojase

original: RV_8,012.24a na yaṃ vivikto rodasī nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam /
analyzed: na yam viviktaḥ rodasī na antarikṣāṇi vajriṇam

original: RV_8,012.24c amād id asya titviṣe sam ojasaḥ //
analyzed: amāt id asya titviṣe sam ojasaḥ

original: RV_8,012.25a yad indra pṛtanājye devās tvā dadhire puraḥ /
analyzed: yat indra pṛtanājye devāḥ tvā dadhire puras

original: RV_8,012.25c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ //
analyzed: āt id te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ

original: RV_8,012.26a yadā vṛtraṃ nadīvṛtaṃ śavasā vajrinn avadhīḥ /
analyzed: yadā vṛtram nadīvṛtam śavasā vajrin avadhīḥ

original: RV_8,012.26c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ //
analyzed: āt id te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ

original: RV_8,012.27a yadā te viṣṇur ojasā trīṇi padā vicakrame /
analyzed: yadā te viṣṇuḥ ojasā trīṇi padā vicakrame

original: RV_8,012.27c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ //
analyzed: āt id te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ

original: RV_8,012.28a yadā te haryatā harī vāvṛdhāte dive-dive /
analyzed: yadā te haryatā harī vāvṛdhāte dive dive

original: RV_8,012.28c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
analyzed: āt id te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire

original: RV_8,012.29a yadā te mārutīr viśas tubhyam indra niyemire /
analyzed: yadā te mārutīḥ viśaḥ tubhyam indra niyemire

original: RV_8,012.29c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
analyzed: āt id te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire

original: RV_8,012.30a yadā sūryam amuṃ divi śukraṃ jyotir adhārayaḥ /
analyzed: yadā sūryam amum divi śukram jyotiḥ adhārayaḥ

original: RV_8,012.30c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
analyzed: āt id te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire

original: RV_8,012.31a imāṃ ta indra suṣṭutiṃ vipra iyarti dhītibhiḥ /
analyzed: imām te indra suṣṭutim vipraḥ iyarti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_8,012.31c jāmim padeva pipratīm prādhvare //
analyzed: jāmim padā iva pipratīm pra adhvare

original: RV_8,012.32a yad asya dhāmani priye samīcīnāso asvaran /
analyzed: yat asya dhāmani priye samīcīnāsaḥ asvaran

original: RV_8,012.32c nābhā yajñasya dohanā prādhvare //
analyzed: nābhā yajñasya dohanā pra adhvare

original: RV_8,012.33a suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ sugavyam indra daddhi naḥ /
analyzed: su vīryam su aśvyam su gavyam indra daddhi naḥ

original: RV_8,012.33c hoteva pūrvacittaye prādhvare //
analyzed: hotā iva pūrvacittaye pra adhvare

original: RV_8,013.01a indraḥ suteṣu someṣu kratum punīta ukthyam /
analyzed: indraḥ suteṣu someṣu kratum punīte ukthyam

original: RV_8,013.01c vide vṛdhasya dakṣaso mahān hi ṣaḥ //
analyzed: vide vṛdhasya dakṣasaḥ mahān hi saḥ

original: RV_8,013.02a sa prathame vyomani devānāṃ sadane vṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: sa prathame vyomani devānām sadane vṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,013.02c supāraḥ suśravastamaḥ sam apsujit //
analyzed: su pāraḥ su śravastamaḥ sam apsujit

original: RV_8,013.03a tam ahve vājasātaya indram bharāya śuṣmiṇam /
analyzed: tam ahve vājasātaye indram bharāya śuṣmiṇam

original: RV_8,013.03c bhavā naḥ sumne antamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe //
analyzed: bhavā naḥ sumne antamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe

original: RV_8,013.04a iyaṃ ta indra girvaṇo rātiḥ kṣarati sunvataḥ /
analyzed: iyam te indra girvaṇaḥ rātiḥ kṣarati sunvataḥ

original: RV_8,013.04c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi //
analyzed: mandānaḥ asya barhiṣaḥ vi rājasi

original: RV_8,013.05a nūnaṃ tad indra daddhi no yat tvā sunvanta īmahe /
analyzed: nūnam tat indra daddhi naḥ yat tvā sunvantaḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,013.05c rayiṃ naś citram ā bharā svarvidam //
analyzed: rayim naḥ citram ā bhara svar vidam

original: RV_8,013.06a stotā yat te vicarṣaṇir atipraśardhayad giraḥ /
analyzed: stotā yat te vicarṣaṇiḥ atipraśardhayat giraḥ

original: RV_8,013.06c vayā ivānu rohate juṣanta yat //
analyzed: vayāḥ iva anu rohate juṣanta yat

original: RV_8,013.07a pratnavaj janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhī jaritur havam /
analyzed: pratna vat janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhi jarituḥ havam

original: RV_8,013.07c made-made vavakṣithā sukṛtvane //
analyzed: mademade vavakṣitha su kṛtvane

original: RV_8,013.08a krīḷanty asya sūnṛtā āpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
analyzed: krīḍanti asya sūnṛtāḥ āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_8,013.08c ayā dhiyā ya ucyate patir divaḥ //
analyzed: ayā dhiyā yaḥ ucyate patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_8,013.09a uto patir ya ucyate kṛṣṭīnām eka id vaśī /
analyzed: uta u patiḥ yaḥ ucyate kṛṣṭīnām ekaḥ id vaśī

original: RV_8,013.09c namovṛdhair avasyubhiḥ sute raṇa //
analyzed: namaḥ vṛdhaiḥ avasyubhiḥ sute raṇa

original: RV_8,013.10a stuhi śrutaṃ vipaścitaṃ harī yasya prasakṣiṇā /
analyzed: stuhi śrutam vipaścitam harī yasya prasakṣiṇā

original: RV_8,013.10c gantārā dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ namasvinaḥ //
analyzed: gantārā dāśuṣaḥ gṛham namasvinaḥ

original: RV_8,013.11a tūtujāno mahemate 'śvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ /
analyzed: tūtujānaḥ mahemate śvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.11c ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śam id dhi te //
analyzed: ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śam id hi te

original: RV_8,013.12a indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayiṃ gṛṇatsu dhāraya /
analyzed: indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayim gṛṇatsu dhāraya

original: RV_8,013.12c śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanam //
analyzed: śravaḥ sūribhyaḥ amṛtam vasutvanam

original: RV_8,013.13a have tvā sūra udite have madhyandine divaḥ /
analyzed: have tvā sūre udite have madhyandine divaḥ

original: RV_8,013.13c juṣāṇa indra saptibhir na ā gahi //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ indra saptibhiḥ naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,013.14a ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsvā sutasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsva sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,013.14c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ yathā vide //
analyzed: tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam yathā vide

original: RV_8,013.15a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan /
analyzed: yat śakra asi parāvati yat arvāvati vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,013.15c yad vā samudre andhaso 'vited asi //
analyzed: yat vā samudre andhasaḥ vitā id asi

original: RV_8,013.16a indraṃ vardhantu no gira indraṃ sutāsa indavaḥ /
analyzed: indram vardhantu naḥ giraḥ indram sutāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,013.16c indre haviṣmatīr viśo arāṇiṣuḥ //
analyzed: indre haviṣmatīḥ viśaḥ arāṇiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,013.17a tam id viprā avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: tam id viprāḥ avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.17c indraṃ kṣoṇīr avardhayan vayā iva //
analyzed: indram kṣoṇīḥ avardhayan vayāḥ iva

original: RV_8,013.18a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata /
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata

original: RV_8,013.18c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ sadāvṛdham //
analyzed: tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ sadāvṛdham

original: RV_8,013.19a stotā yat te anuvrata ukthāny ṛtuthā dadhe /
analyzed: stotā yat te anuvrataḥ ukthāni ṛtuthā dadhe

original: RV_8,013.19c śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate so adbhutaḥ //
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ ucyate saḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_8,013.20a tad id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu /
analyzed: tat id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu

original: RV_8,013.20c mano yatrā vi tad dadhur vicetasaḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ yatrā vi tat vicetasaḥ

original: RV_8,013.21a yadi me sakhyam āvara imasya pāhy andhasaḥ /
analyzed: yadi me sakhyam āvaraḥ imasya pāhi andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,013.21c yena viśvā ati dviṣo atārima //
analyzed: yena viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ atārima

original: RV_8,013.22a kadā ta indra girvaṇa stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ /
analyzed: kadā te indra girvaṇaḥ stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ

original: RV_8,013.22c kadā no gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ //
analyzed: kadā naḥ gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ

original: RV_8,013.23a uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahato ratham /
analyzed: uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahataḥ ratham

original: RV_8,013.23c ajuryasya madintamaṃ yam īmahe //
analyzed: ajuryasya madintamam yam īmahe

original: RV_8,013.24a tam īmahe puruṣṭutaṃ yahvam pratnābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: tam īmahe puruṣṭutam yahvam pratnābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.24c ni barhiṣi priye sadad adha dvitā //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi priye sadat adha dvitā

original: RV_8,013.25a vardhasvā su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: vardhasva su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.25c dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam avā ca naḥ //
analyzed: dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam ava ca naḥ

original: RV_8,013.26a indra tvam avited asītthā stuvato adrivaḥ /
analyzed: indra tvam avitā id asi itthā stuvataḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,013.26c ṛtād iyarmi te dhiyam manoyujam //
analyzed: ṛtāt iyarmi te dhiyam manaḥ yujam

original: RV_8,013.27a iha tyā sadhamādyā yujānaḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: iha tyā sadhamādyā yujānaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,013.27c harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara //
analyzed: harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara

original: RV_8,013.28a abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam /
analyzed: abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam

original: RV_8,013.28c uto marutvatīr viśo abhi prayaḥ //
analyzed: uta u marutvatīḥ viśaḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_8,013.29a imā asya pratūrtayaḥ padaṃ juṣanta yad divi /
analyzed: imāḥ asya pratūrtayaḥ padam juṣanta yat divi

original: RV_8,013.29c nābhā yajñasya saṃ dadhur yathā vide //
analyzed: nābhā yajñasya sam dadhuḥ yathā vide

original: RV_8,013.30a ayaṃ dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: ayam dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayati adhvare

original: RV_8,013.30c mimīte yajñam ānuṣag vicakṣya //
analyzed: mimīte yajñam ānuṣak vicakṣya

original: RV_8,013.31a vṛṣāyam indra te ratha uto te vṛṣaṇā harī /
analyzed: vṛṣā ayam indra te rathaḥ uta u te vṛṣaṇā harī

original: RV_8,013.31c vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā tvam śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_8,013.32a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā madaḥ vṛṣā somaḥ ayam sutaḥ

original: RV_8,013.32c vṛṣā yajño yam invasi vṛṣā havaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā yajñaḥ yam invasi vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_8,013.33a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam huve vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.33c vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutiṃ vṛṣā havaḥ //
analyzed: vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutim vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_8,014.01a yad indrāhaṃ yathā tvam īśīya vasva eka it /
analyzed: yat indra aham yathā tvam īśīya vasvaḥ ekaḥ id

original: RV_8,014.01c stotā me goṣakhā syāt //
analyzed: stotā me go sakhā syāt

original: RV_8,014.02a śikṣeyam asmai ditseyaṃ śacīpate manīṣiṇe /
analyzed: śikṣeyam asmai ditseyam śacīpate manīṣiṇe

original: RV_8,014.02c yad ahaṃ gopatiḥ syām //
analyzed: yat aham gopatiḥ syām

original: RV_8,014.03a dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate /
analyzed: dhenuḥ te indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_8,014.03c gām aśvam pipyuṣī duhe //
analyzed: gām aśvam pipyuṣī duhe

original: RV_8,014.04a na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ /
analyzed: na te vartā asti rādhasaḥ indra devaḥ na martyaḥ

original: RV_8,014.04c yad ditsasi stuto magham //
analyzed: yat ditsasi stutaḥ magham

original: RV_8,014.05a yajña indram avardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vy avartayat /
analyzed: yajñaḥ indram avardhayat yat bhūmim vi avartayat

original: RV_8,014.05c cakrāṇa opaśaṃ divi //
analyzed: cakrāṇaḥ opaśam divi

original: RV_8,014.06a vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānasya te vayam viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ

original: RV_8,014.06c ūtim indrā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: ūtim indra vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,014.07a vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā /
analyzed: vi antarikṣam atirat made somasya rocanā

original: RV_8,014.07c indro yad abhinad valam //
analyzed: indraḥ yat abhinat valam

original: RV_8,014.08a ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ /
analyzed: ud gāḥ ājat aṅgirobhyaḥ āvis kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ

original: RV_8,014.08c arvāñcaṃ nunude valam //
analyzed: arvāñcam nunude valam

original: RV_8,014.09a indreṇa rocanā divo dṛḷhāni dṛṃhitāni ca /
analyzed: indreṇa rocanā divaḥ dṛḍhāni dṛṃhitāni ca

original: RV_8,014.09c sthirāṇi na parāṇude //
analyzed: sthirāṇi na parāṇude

original: RV_8,014.10a apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate /
analyzed: apām ūrmiḥ madan iva stomaḥ indra ajirāyate

original: RV_8,014.10c vi te madā arājiṣuḥ //
analyzed: vi te madāḥ arājiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,014.11a tvaṃ hi stomavardhana indrāsy ukthavardhanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi stoma vardhanaḥ indra asi uktha vardhanaḥ

original: RV_8,014.11c stotṝṇām uta bhadrakṛt //
analyzed: stotṝṇām uta bhadra kṛt

original: RV_8,014.12a indram it keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ /
analyzed: indram id keśinā harī soma peyāya vakṣataḥ

original: RV_8,014.12c upa yajñaṃ surādhasam //
analyzed: upa yajñam su rādhasam

original: RV_8,014.13a apām phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ /
analyzed: apām phenena namuceḥ śiraḥ indra ud avartayaḥ

original: RV_8,014.13c viśvā yad ajaya spṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāḥ yat ajayaḥ spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,014.14a māyābhir utsisṛpsata indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ /
analyzed: māyābhiḥ utsisṛpsataḥ indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ

original: RV_8,014.14c ava dasyūṃr adhūnuthāḥ //
analyzed: ava dasyūṃr adhūnuthāḥ

original: RV_8,014.15a asunvām indra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vy anāśayaḥ /
analyzed: asunvām indra saṃsadam viṣūcīm vi anāśayaḥ

original: RV_8,014.15c somapā uttaro bhavan //
analyzed: soma pāḥ uttaraḥ bhavan

original: RV_8,015.01a tam v abhi pra gāyata puruhūtam puruṣṭutam /
analyzed: tam u abhi pra gāyata puru hūtam puruṣṭutam

original: RV_8,015.01c indraṃ gīrbhis taviṣam ā vivāsata //
analyzed: indram gīrbhiḥ taviṣam ā vivāsata

original: RV_8,015.02a yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī /
analyzed: yasya dvibarhasaḥ bṛhat sahaḥ dādhāra rodasī

original: RV_8,015.02c girīṃr ajrāṃ apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā //
analyzed: girīṃr ajrān apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā

original: RV_8,015.03a sa rājasi puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase /
analyzed: sa rājasi puruṣṭutam ekaḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnase

original: RV_8,015.03c indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave //
analyzed: indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave

original: RV_8,015.04a taṃ te madaṃ gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim /
analyzed: tam te madam gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim

original: RV_8,015.04c u lokakṛtnum adrivo hariśriyam //
analyzed: u loka kṛtnum adrivas hari śriyam

original: RV_8,015.05a yena jyotīṃṣy āyave manave ca viveditha /
analyzed: yena jyotīṃṣi āyave manave ca viveditha

original: RV_8,015.05c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi //
analyzed: mandānaḥ asya barhiṣaḥ vi rājasi

original: RV_8,015.06a tad adyā cit ta ukthino 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā /
analyzed: tat adyā cit te ukthinaḥ nu stuvanti pūrvathā

original: RV_8,015.06c vṛṣapatnīr apo jayā dive-dive //
analyzed: vṛṣa patnīḥ apaḥ jaya dive dive

original: RV_8,015.07a tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum /
analyzed: tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum

original: RV_8,015.07c vajraṃ śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam //
analyzed: vajram śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam

original: RV_8,015.08a tava dyaur indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ /
analyzed: tava dyauḥ indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ

original: RV_8,015.08c tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaś ca hinvire //
analyzed: tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaḥ ca hinvire

original: RV_8,015.09a tvāṃ viṣṇur bṛhan kṣayo mitro gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ /
analyzed: tvām viṣṇuḥ bṛhan kṣayaḥ mitraḥ gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ

original: RV_8,015.09c tvāṃ śardho madaty anu mārutam //
analyzed: tvām śardhaḥ madati anu mārutam

original: RV_8,015.10a tvaṃ vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭha indra jajñiṣe /
analyzed: tvam vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ indra jajñiṣe

original: RV_8,015.10c satrā viśvā svapatyāni dadhiṣe //
analyzed: satrā viśvā su apatyāni dadhiṣe

original: RV_8,015.11a satrā tvam puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi tośase /
analyzed: satrā tvam puruṣṭutam ekaḥ vṛtrāṇi tośase

original: RV_8,015.11c nānya indrāt karaṇam bhūya invati //
analyzed: na anyaḥ indrāt karaṇam bhūyaḥ invati

original: RV_8,015.12a yad indra manmaśas tvā nānā havanta ūtaye /
analyzed: yat indra manmaśas tvā nānā havante ūtaye

original: RV_8,015.12c asmākebhir nṛbhir atrā svar jaya //
analyzed: asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ atra svar jaya

original: RV_8,015.13a araṃ kṣayāya no mahe viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan /
analyzed: aram kṣayāya naḥ mahe viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan

original: RV_8,015.13c indraṃ jaitrāya harṣayā śacīpatim //
analyzed: indram jaitrāya harṣaya śacīpatim

original: RV_8,016.01a pra samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām indraṃ stotā navyaṃ gīrbhiḥ /
analyzed: pra samrājam carṣaṇīnām indram stota navyam gīrbhiḥ

original: RV_8,016.01c naraṃ nṛṣāham maṃhiṣṭham //
analyzed: naram nṛṣāham maṃhiṣṭham

original: RV_8,016.02a yasminn ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā /
analyzed: yasmin ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā

original: RV_8,016.02c apām avo na samudre //
analyzed: apām avaḥ na samudre

original: RV_8,016.03a taṃ suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭharājam bhare kṛtnum /
analyzed: tam suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭha rājam bhare kṛtnum

original: RV_8,016.03c maho vājinaṃ sanibhyaḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ vājinam sanibhyaḥ

original: RV_8,016.04a yasyānūnā gabhīrā madā uravas tarutrāḥ /
analyzed: yasya anūnāḥ gabhīrāḥ madāḥ uravaḥ tarutrāḥ

original: RV_8,016.04c harṣumantaḥ śūrasātau //
analyzed: harṣumantaḥ śūrasātau

original: RV_8,016.05a tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣv adhivākāya havante /
analyzed: tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣu adhivākāya havante

original: RV_8,016.05c yeṣām indras te jayanti //
analyzed: yeṣām indraḥ te jayanti

original: RV_8,016.06a tam ic cyautnair āryanti taṃ kṛtebhiś carṣaṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tam id cyautnaiḥ āryanti tam kṛtebhiḥ carṣaṇayaḥ

original: RV_8,016.06c eṣa indro varivaskṛt //
analyzed: eṣaḥ indraḥ varivaskṛt

original: RV_8,016.07a indro brahmendra ṛṣir indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ brahmā indraḥ ṛṣiḥ indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_8,016.07c mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_8,016.08a sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ /
analyzed: sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ

original: RV_8,016.08c ekaś cit sann abhibhūtiḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ cit san abhibhūtiḥ

original: RV_8,016.09a tam arkebhis taṃ sāmabhis taṃ gāyatraiś carṣaṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tam arkebhiḥ tam sāmabhiḥ tam gāyatraiḥ carṣaṇayaḥ

original: RV_8,016.09c indraṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ //
analyzed: indram vardhanti kṣitayaḥ

original: RV_8,016.10a praṇetāraṃ vasyo acchā kartāraṃ jyotiḥ samatsu /
analyzed: praṇetāram vasyaḥ acchā kartāram jyotiḥ samatsu

original: RV_8,016.10c sāsahvāṃsaṃ yudhāmitrān //
analyzed: sāsahvāṃsam yudhā amitrān
