original: RV_8,033.07c ayaṃ yaḥ puro vibhinatty ojasā mandānaḥ śipry andhasaḥ //
analyzed: ayam yaḥ puras vibhinatti ojasā mandānaḥ śiprī andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,033.08a dānā mṛgo na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe /
analyzed: dānā mṛgaḥ na vāraṇaḥ purutrā caratham dadhe

original: RV_8,033.08c nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamad ā sute gamo mahāṃś carasy ojasā //
analyzed: nakir tvā ni yamat ā sute gamaḥ mahān carasi ojasā

original: RV_8,033.09a ya ugraḥ sann aniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ugraḥ san a niṣṭṛta sthiraḥ raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,033.09c yadi stotur maghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣaty ā gamat //
analyzed: yadi stotuḥ maghavā śṛṇavat havam na indraḥ yoṣati ā gamat

original: RV_8,033.10a satyam itthā vṛṣed asi vṛṣajūtir no 'vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: satyam itthā vṛṣā id asi vṛṣa jūtiḥ naḥ vṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,033.10c vṛṣā hy ugra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣo arvāvati śrutaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā hi ugra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣaḥ arvāvati śrutaḥ

original: RV_8,033.11a vṛṣaṇas te abhīśavo vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇaḥ te abhīśavaḥ vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī

original: RV_8,033.11c vṛṣā ratho maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato //
analyzed: vṛṣā rathaḥ maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvam śatakrato

original: RV_8,033.12a vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣann ṛjīpinn ā bhara /
analyzed: vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣan ṛjīpin ā bhara

original: RV_8,033.12c vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇaṃ nadīṣv ā tubhyaṃ sthātar harīṇām //
analyzed: vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇam nadīṣu ā tubhyam sthātar harīṇām

original: RV_8,033.13a endra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam /
analyzed: ā indra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam

original: RV_8,033.13c nāyam acchā maghavā śṛṇavad giro brahmokthā ca sukratuḥ //
analyzed: na ayam acchā maghavā śṛṇavat giraḥ brahma ukthā ca su kratuḥ

original: RV_8,033.14a vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhām ā harayo rathayujaḥ /
analyzed: vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhām ā harayaḥ ratha yujaḥ

original: RV_8,033.14c tiraś cid aryaṃ savanāni vṛtrahann anyeṣāṃ yā śatakrato //
analyzed: tiras cit aryam savanāni vṛtrahan anyeṣām yā śatakrato

original: RV_8,033.15a asmākam adyāntamaṃ stomaṃ dhiṣva mahāmaha /
analyzed: asmākam adya antamam stomam dhiṣva mahā maha

original: RV_8,033.15c asmākaṃ te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ //
analyzed: asmākam te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa soma pāḥ

original: RV_8,033.16a nahi ṣas tava no mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati /
analyzed: nahi saḥ tava na u mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati

original: RV_8,033.16c yo asmān vīra ānayat //
analyzed: yaḥ asmān vīraḥ ānayat

original: RV_8,033.17a indraś cid ghā tad abravīt striyā aśāsyam manaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ cit gha tat abravīt striyāḥ a śāsyam manaḥ

original: RV_8,033.17c uto aha kratuṃ raghum //
analyzed: uta u aha kratum raghum

original: RV_8,033.18a saptī cid ghā madacyutā mithunā vahato ratham /
analyzed: saptī cit gha mada cyutā mithunā vahataḥ ratham

original: RV_8,033.18c eved dhūr vṛṣṇa uttarā //
analyzed: eva id dhūḥ vṛṣṇaḥ uttarā

original: RV_8,033.19a adhaḥ paśyasva mopari saṃtarām pādakau hara /
analyzed: adhas paśyasva mā upari saṃtarām pādakau hara

original: RV_8,033.19c mā te kaśaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha //
analyzed: mā te kaśaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha

original: RV_8,034.01a endra yāhi haribhir upa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim /
analyzed: ā indra yāhi haribhiḥ upa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim

original: RV_8,034.01c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.02a ā tvā grāvā vadann iha somī ghoṣeṇa yacchatu /
analyzed: ā tvā grāvā vadan iha somī ghoṣeṇa yacchatu

original: RV_8,034.02c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.03a atrā vi nemir eṣām urāṃ na dhūnute vṛkaḥ /
analyzed: atrā vi nemiḥ eṣām urām na dhūnute vṛkaḥ

original: RV_8,034.03c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.04a ā tvā kaṇvā ihāvase havante vājasātaye /
analyzed: ā tvā kaṇvāḥ iha avase havante vājasātaye

original: RV_8,034.04c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.05a dadhāmi te sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe na pūrvapāyyam /
analyzed: dadhāmi te sutānām vṛṣṇe na pūrva pāyyam

original: RV_8,034.05c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.06a smatpurandhir na ā gahi viśvatodhīr na ūtaye /
analyzed: smat purandhiḥ naḥ ā gahi viśvatas dhīḥ naḥ ūtaye

original: RV_8,034.06c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.07a ā no yāhi mahemate sahasrote śatāmagha /
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi mahemate sahasra ūte śatāmagha

original: RV_8,034.07c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.08a ā tvā hotā manurhito devatrā vakṣad īḍyaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā hotā manuḥ hitaḥ devatrā vakṣat īḍyaḥ

original: RV_8,034.08c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.09a ā tvā madacyutā harī śyenam pakṣeva vakṣataḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā mada cyutā harī śyenam pakṣā iva vakṣataḥ

original: RV_8,034.09c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.10a ā yāhy arya ā pari svāhā somasya pītaye /
analyzed: ā yāhi aryaḥ ā pari svāhā somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,034.10c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.11a ā no yāhy upaśruty uktheṣu raṇayā iha /
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi upaśrutī uktheṣu raṇaya iha

original: RV_8,034.11c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.12a sarūpair ā su no gahi sambhṛtaiḥ sambhṛtāśvaḥ /
analyzed: sa rūpaiḥ ā su naḥ gahi sambhṛtaiḥ sambhṛta aśvaḥ

original: RV_8,034.12c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.13a ā yāhi parvatebhyaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapaḥ /
analyzed: ā yāhi parvatebhyaḥ samudrasya adhi viṣṭapaḥ

original: RV_8,034.13c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.14a ā no gavyāny aśvyā sahasrā śūra dardṛhi /
analyzed: ā naḥ gavyāni aśvyā sahasrā śūra dardṛhi

original: RV_8,034.14c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.15a ā naḥ sahasraśo bharāyutāni śatāni ca /
analyzed: ā naḥ sahasraśas bhara ayutāni śatāni ca

original: RV_8,034.15c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_8,034.16a ā yad indraś ca dadvahe sahasraṃ vasurociṣaḥ /
analyzed: ā yat indraḥ ca dadvahe sahasram vasurociṣaḥ

original: RV_8,034.16c ojiṣṭham aśvyam paśum //
analyzed: ojiṣṭham aśvyam paśum

original: RV_8,034.17a ya ṛjrā vātaraṃhaso 'ruṣāso raghuṣyadaḥ /
analyzed: ye ṛjrāḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ ruṣāsaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ

original: RV_8,034.17c bhrājante sūryā iva //
analyzed: bhrājante sūryāḥ iva

original: RV_8,034.18a pārāvatasya rātiṣu dravaccakreṣv āśuṣu /
analyzed: pārāvatasya rātiṣu dravat cakreṣu āśuṣu

original: RV_8,034.18c tiṣṭhaṃ vanasya madhya ā //
analyzed: tiṣṭham vanasya madhye ā

original: RV_8,035.01a agninendreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunādityai rudrair vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā /
analyzed: agninā indreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunā ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_8,035.01c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.02a viśvābhir dhībhir bhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyādribhiḥ sacābhuvā /
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ dhībhiḥ bhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyā adribhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_8,035.02c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.03a viśvair devais tribhir ekādaśair ihādbhir marudbhir bhṛgubhiḥ sacābhuvā /
analyzed: viśvaiḥ devaiḥ tribhiḥ ekādaśaiḥ iha adbhiḥ marudbhiḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_8,035.03c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.04a juṣethāṃ yajñam bodhataṃ havasya me viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam /
analyzed: juṣethām yajñam bodhatam havasya me viśvā iha devau savanā ava gacchatam

original: RV_8,035.04c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca iṣam naḥ voḷham aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.05a stomaṃ juṣethāṃ yuvaśeva kanyanāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam /
analyzed: stomam juṣethām yuvaśā iva kanyanām viśvā iha devau savanā ava gacchatam

original: RV_8,035.05c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca iṣam naḥ voḷham aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.06a giro juṣethām adhvaraṃ juṣethāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam /
analyzed: giraḥ juṣethām adhvaram juṣethām viśvā iha devau savanā ava gacchatam

original: RV_8,035.06c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca iṣam naḥ voḷham aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.07a hāridraveva patatho vaned upa somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ /
analyzed: hāridravā iva patathaḥ vanā id upa somam sutam mahiṣā iva ava gacchathaḥ

original: RV_8,035.07c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tris vartiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.08a haṃsāv iva patatho adhvagāv iva somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ /
analyzed: haṃsau iva patathaḥ adhvagau iva somam sutam mahiṣā iva ava gacchathaḥ

original: RV_8,035.08c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tris vartiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.09a śyenāv iva patatho havyadātaye somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ /
analyzed: śyenau iva patathaḥ havya dātaye somam sutam mahiṣā iva ava gacchathaḥ

original: RV_8,035.09c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tris vartiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.10a pibataṃ ca tṛpṇutaṃ cā ca gacchatam prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam /
analyzed: pibatam ca tṛpṇutam ca ā ca gacchatam prajām ca dhattam draviṇam ca dhattam

original: RV_8,035.10c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ūrjam naḥ dhattam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.11a jayataṃ ca pra stutaṃ ca pra cāvatam prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam /
analyzed: jayatam ca pra stutam ca pra ca avatam prajām ca dhattam draviṇam ca dhattam

original: RV_8,035.11c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ūrjam naḥ dhattam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.12a hataṃ ca śatrūn yatataṃ ca mitriṇaḥ prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam /
analyzed: hatam ca śatrūn yatatam ca mitriṇaḥ prajām ca dhattam draviṇam ca dhattam

original: RV_8,035.12c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ūrjam naḥ dhattam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.13a mitrāvaruṇavantā uta dharmavantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam /
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇavantau uta dharmavantā marutvantā jarituḥ gacchathaḥ havam

original: RV_8,035.13c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ādityaiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.14a aṅgirasvantā uta viṣṇuvantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam /
analyzed: aṅgirasvantau uta viṣṇuvantā marutvantā jarituḥ gacchathaḥ havam

original: RV_8,035.14c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ādityaiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.15a ṛbhumantā vṛṣaṇā vājavantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam /
analyzed: ṛbhumantā vṛṣaṇā vājavantā marutvantā jarituḥ gacchathaḥ havam

original: RV_8,035.15c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ādityaiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.16a brahma jinvatam uta jinvataṃ dhiyo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ /
analyzed: brahma jinvatam uta jinvatam dhiyaḥ hatam rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ

original: RV_8,035.16c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam sunvataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.17a kṣatraṃ jinvatam uta jinvataṃ nṝn hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ /
analyzed: kṣatram jinvatam uta jinvatam nṝn hatam rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ

original: RV_8,035.17c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam sunvataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.18a dhenūr jinvatam uta jinvataṃ viśo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ /
analyzed: dhenūḥ jinvatam uta jinvatam viśaḥ hatam rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ

original: RV_8,035.18c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam sunvataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,035.19a atrer iva śṛṇutam pūrvyastutiṃ śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā /
analyzed: atreḥ iva śṛṇutam pūrvya stutim śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ mada cyutā

original: RV_8,035.19c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca aśvinā tiroahnyam

original: RV_8,035.20a sargāṃ iva sṛjataṃ suṣṭutīr upa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā /
analyzed: sargān iva sṛjatam suṣṭutīḥ upa śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ mada cyutā

original: RV_8,035.20c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca aśvinā tiroahnyam

original: RV_8,035.21a raśmīṃr iva yacchatam adhvarāṃ upa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā /
analyzed: raśmīṃr iva yacchatam adhvarān upa śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ mada cyutā

original: RV_8,035.21c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam //
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca aśvinā tiroahnyam

original: RV_8,035.22a arvāg rathaṃ ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu /
analyzed: arvāk ratham ni yacchatam pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_8,035.22c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyuḥ vām aham huve dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,035.23a namovāke prasthite adhvare narā vivakṣaṇasya pītaye /
analyzed: namovāke prasthite adhvare narā vivakṣaṇasya pītaye

original: RV_8,035.23c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyuḥ vām aham huve dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,035.24a svāhākṛtasya tṛmpataṃ sutasya devāv andhasaḥ /
analyzed: svāhākṛtasya tṛmpatam sutasya devau andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,035.24c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyuḥ vām aham huve dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,036.01a avitāsi sunvato vṛktabarhiṣaḥ pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: avitāsi sunvataḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ pibā somam madāya kam śatakrato

original: RV_8,036.01c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
analyzed: yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ uru jrayaḥ sam apsujit marutvān indra satpate

original: RV_8,036.02a prāva stotāram maghavann ava tvām pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: prāva stotāram maghavan ava tvām pibā somam madāya kam śatakrato

original: RV_8,036.02c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
analyzed: yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ uru jrayaḥ sam apsujit marutvān indra satpate

original: RV_8,036.03a ūrjā devāṃ avasy ojasā tvām pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: ūrjā devām avasi ojasā tvām pibā somam madāya kam śatakrato

original: RV_8,036.03c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
analyzed: yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ uru jrayaḥ sam apsujit marutvān indra satpate

original: RV_8,036.04a janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: janitā divaḥ janitā pṛthivyāḥ pibā somam madāya kam śatakrato

original: RV_8,036.04c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
analyzed: yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ uru jrayaḥ sam apsujit marutvān indra satpate

original: RV_8,036.05a janitāśvānāṃ janitā gavām asi pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: janitā aśvānām janitā gavām asi pibā somam madāya kam śatakrato

original: RV_8,036.05c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
analyzed: yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ uru jrayaḥ sam apsujit marutvān indra satpate

original: RV_8,036.06a atrīṇāṃ stomam adrivo mahas kṛdhi pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: atrīṇām stomam adrivas mahaḥ kṛdhi pibā somam madāya kam śatakrato

original: RV_8,036.06c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
analyzed: yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ uru jrayaḥ sam apsujit marutvān indra satpate

original: RV_8,036.07a śyāvāśvasya sunvatas tathā śṛṇu yathāśṛṇor atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ tathā śṛṇu yathā aśṛṇoḥ atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ

original: RV_8,036.07c pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam eka in nṛṣāhya indra brahmāṇi vardhayan //
analyzed: pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam ekaḥ id nṛṣāhye indra brahmāṇi vardhayan

original: RV_8,037.01a predam brahma vṛtratūryeṣv āvitha pra sunvataḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: pra idam brahma vṛtratūryeṣu āvitha pra sunvataḥ śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,037.01d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahan anedya pibā somasya vajrivas

original: RV_8,037.02a sehāna ugra pṛtanā abhi druhaḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: sehānaḥ ugra pṛtanāḥ abhi druhaḥ śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,037.02d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahan anedya pibā somasya vajrivas

original: RV_8,037.03a ekarāḷ asya bhuvanasya rājasi śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: eka rāj asya bhuvanasya rājasi śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,037.03d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahan anedya pibā somasya vajrivas

original: RV_8,037.04a sasthāvānā yavayasi tvam eka ic chacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: sasthāvānā yavayasi tvam ekaḥ id śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,037.04d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahan anedya pibā somasya vajrivas

original: RV_8,037.05a kṣemasya ca prayujaś ca tvam īśiṣe śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: kṣemasya ca prayujaḥ ca tvam īśiṣe śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,037.05d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahan anedya pibā somasya vajrivas

original: RV_8,037.06a kṣatrāya tvam avasi na tvam āvitha śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: kṣatrāya tvam avasi na tvam āvitha śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,037.06d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahan anedya pibā somasya vajrivas

original: RV_8,037.07a śyāvāśvasya rebhatas tathā śṛṇu yathāśṛṇor atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: śyāvāśvasya rebhataḥ tathā śṛṇu yathā aśṛṇoḥ atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ

original: RV_8,037.07c pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam eka in nṛṣāhya indra kṣatrāṇi vardhayan //
analyzed: pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam ekaḥ id nṛṣāhye indra kṣatrāṇi vardhayan

original: RV_8,038.01a yajñasya hi stha ṛtvijā sasnī vājeṣu karmasu /
analyzed: yajñasya hi sthaḥ ṛtvijā sasnī vājeṣu karmasu

original: RV_8,038.01c indrāgnī tasya bodhatam //
analyzed: indra agnī tasya bodhatam

original: RV_8,038.02a tośāsā rathayāvānā vṛtrahaṇāparājitā /
analyzed: tośasā ratha yāvānā vṛtra haṇā aparājitā

original: RV_8,038.02c indrāgnī tasya bodhatam //
analyzed: indra agnī tasya bodhatam

original: RV_8,038.03a idaṃ vām madiram madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ /
analyzed: idam vām madiram madhu adhukṣan adribhiḥ naraḥ

original: RV_8,038.03c indrāgnī tasya bodhatam //
analyzed: indra agnī tasya bodhatam

original: RV_8,038.04a juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye sutaṃ somaṃ sadhastutī /
analyzed: juṣethām yajñam iṣṭaye sutam somam sadhastutī

original: RV_8,038.04c indrāgnī ā gataṃ narā //
analyzed: indra agnī ā gatam narā

original: RV_8,038.05a imā juṣethāṃ savanā yebhir havyāny ūhathuḥ /
analyzed: imā juṣethām savanā yebhiḥ havyāni ūhathuḥ

original: RV_8,038.05c indrāgnī ā gataṃ narā //
analyzed: indra agnī ā gatam narā

original: RV_8,038.06a imāṃ gāyatravartaniṃ juṣethāṃ suṣṭutim mama /
analyzed: imām gāyatra vartanim juṣethām suṣṭutim mama

original: RV_8,038.06c indrāgnī ā gataṃ narā //
analyzed: indra agnī ā gatam narā

original: RV_8,038.07a prātaryāvabhir ā gataṃ devebhir jenyāvasū /
analyzed: prātaryāvabhiḥ ā gatam devebhiḥ jenyāvasū

original: RV_8,038.07c indrāgnī somapītaye //
analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

original: RV_8,038.08a śyāvāśvasya sunvato 'trīṇāṃ śṛṇutaṃ havam /
analyzed: śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ trīṇām śṛṇutam havam

original: RV_8,038.08c indrāgnī somapītaye //
analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

original: RV_8,038.09a evā vām ahva ūtaye yathāhuvanta medhirāḥ /
analyzed: eva vām ahve ūtaye yathā ahuvanta medhirāḥ

original: RV_8,038.09c indrāgnī somapītaye //
analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

original: RV_8,038.10a āhaṃ sarasvatīvator indrāgnyor avo vṛṇe /
analyzed: ā aham sarasvatīvatoḥ indra agnyoḥ avaḥ vṛṇe

original: RV_8,038.10c yābhyāṃ gāyatram ṛcyate //
analyzed: yābhyām gāyatram ṛcyate

original: RV_8,039.01a agnim astoṣy ṛgmiyam agnim īḷā yajadhyai /
analyzed: agnim astoṣi ṛgmiyam agnim īḍā yajadhyai

original: RV_8,039.01c agnir devāṃ anaktu na ubhe hi vidathe kavir antaś carati dūtyaṃ nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: agniḥ devān anaktu naḥ ubhe hi vidathe kaviḥ antar carati dūtyam nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.02a ny agne navyasā vacas tanūṣu śaṃsam eṣām /
analyzed: ni agne navyasā vacaḥ tanūṣu śaṃsam eṣām

original: RV_8,039.02c ny arātī rarāvṇāṃ viśvā aryo arātīr ito yucchantv āmuro nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: ni arātīḥ viśvāḥ aryaḥ arātīḥ itas yucchantu āmuraḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.03a agne manmāni tubhyaṃ kaṃ ghṛtaṃ na juhva āsani /
analyzed: agne manmāni tubhyam kam ghṛtam na juhve āsani

original: RV_8,039.03c sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvaṃ hy asi pūrvyaḥ śivo dūto vivasvato nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvam hi asi pūrvyaḥ śivaḥ dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.04a tat-tad agnir vayo dadhe yathā-yathā kṛpaṇyati /
analyzed: tat tat agniḥ vayaḥ dadhe yathā yathā kṛpaṇyati

original: RV_8,039.04c ūrjāhutir vasūnāṃ śaṃ ca yoś ca mayo dadhe viśvasyai devahūtyai nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: ūrjā āhutiḥ vasūnām śam ca yoḥ ca mayaḥ dadhe viśvasyai deva hūtyai nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.05a sa ciketa sahīyasāgniś citreṇa karmaṇā /
analyzed: sa ciketa sahīyasā agniḥ citreṇa karmaṇā

original: RV_8,039.05c sa hotā śaśvatīnāṃ dakṣiṇābhir abhīvṛta inoti ca pratīvyaṃ nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa hotā śaśvatīnām dakṣiṇābhiḥ abhīvṛtaḥ inoti ca pratīvyam nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.06a agnir jātā devānām agnir veda martānām apīcyam /
analyzed: agniḥ jātā devānām agniḥ veda martānām apīcyam

original: RV_8,039.06c agniḥ sa draviṇodā agnir dvārā vy ūrṇute svāhuto navīyasā nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: agniḥ sa draviṇaḥ dāḥ agniḥ dvārā vi ūrṇute su āhutaḥ navīyasā nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.07a agnir deveṣu saṃvasuḥ sa vikṣu yajñiyāsv ā /
analyzed: agniḥ deveṣu saṃvasuḥ sa vikṣu yajñiyāsu ā

original: RV_8,039.07c sa mudā kāvyā puru viśvam bhūmeva puṣyati devo deveṣu yajñiyo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa mudā kāvyā puru viśvam bhūma iva puṣyati devaḥ deveṣu yajñiyaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.08a yo agniḥ saptamānuṣaḥ śrito viśveṣu sindhuṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ sapta mānuṣaḥ śritaḥ viśveṣu sindhuṣu

original: RV_8,039.08c tam āganma tripastyam mandhātur dasyuhantamam agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: tam āganma tri pastyam mandhātuḥ dasyu hantamam agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.09a agnis trīṇi tridhātūny ā kṣeti vidathā kaviḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ trīṇi tri dhātūni ā kṣeti vidathā kaviḥ

original: RV_8,039.09c sa trīṃr ekādaśāṃ iha yakṣac ca piprayac ca no vipro dūtaḥ pariṣkṛto nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa trīn ekādaśān iha yakṣat ca piprayat ca naḥ vipraḥ dūtaḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,039.10a tvaṃ no agna āyuṣu tvaṃ deveṣu pūrvya vasva eka irajyasi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne āyuṣu tvam deveṣu pūrvya vasvaḥ ekaḥ irajyasi

original: RV_8,039.10d tvām āpaḥ parisrutaḥ pari yanti svasetavo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: tvām āpaḥ parisrutaḥ pari yanti sva setavaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.01a indrāgnī yuvaṃ su naḥ sahantā dāsatho rayim /
analyzed: indra agnī yuvam su naḥ sahantā dāsathaḥ rayim

original: RV_8,040.01c yena dṛḷhā samatsv ā vīḷu cit sāhiṣīmahy agnir vaneva vāta in nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: yena dṛḍhā samatsu ā vīḍu cit sāhiṣīmahi agniḥ vanā iva vāte id nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.02a nahi vāṃ vavrayāmahe 'thendram id yajāmahe śaviṣṭhaṃ nṛṇāṃ naram /
analyzed: nahi vām thā indram id yajāmahe śaviṣṭham nṛṇām naram

original: RV_8,040.02d sa naḥ kadā cid arvatā gamad ā vājasātaye gamad ā medhasātaye nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa naḥ kadā cit arvatā gamat ā vāja sātaye gamat ā medha sātaye nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.03a tā hi madhyam bharāṇām indrāgnī adhikṣitaḥ /
analyzed: tā hi madhyam bharāṇām indra agnī adhikṣitaḥ

original: RV_8,040.03c tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛcchyamānā sakhīyate saṃ dhītam aśnutaṃ narā nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛcchyamānā sakhīyate sam dhītam aśnutam narā nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.04a abhy arca nabhākavad indrāgnī yajasā girā /
analyzed: abhī arca nabhāka vat indra agnī yajasā girā

original: RV_8,040.04c yayor viśvam idaṃ jagad iyaṃ dyauḥ pṛthivī mahy upasthe bibhṛto vasu nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: yayoḥ viśvam idam jagat iyam dyauḥ pṛthivī mahī upasthe bibhṛtaḥ vasu nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.05a pra brahmāṇi nabhākavad indrāgnibhyām irajyata /
analyzed: pra brahmāṇi nabhāka vat indra agnibhyām irajyata

original: RV_8,040.05c yā saptabudhnam arṇavaṃ jihmabāram aporṇuta indra īśāna ojasā nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: yā sapta budhnam arṇavam jihma bāram aporṇutaḥ indraḥ īśānaḥ ojasā nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.06a api vṛśca purāṇavad vratater iva guṣpitam ojo dāsasya dambhaya /
analyzed: api vṛśca purāṇa vat vratateḥ iva guṣpitam ojaḥ dāsasya dambhaya

original: RV_8,040.06d vayaṃ tad asya sambhṛtaṃ vasv indreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: vayam tat asya sambhṛtam vasu indreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.07a yad indrāgnī janā ime vihvayante tanā girā /
analyzed: yat indra agnī janāḥ ime vihvayante tanā girā

original: RV_8,040.07c asmākebhir nṛbhir vayaṃ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyato nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ vayam sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.08a yā nu śvetāv avo diva uccarāta upa dyubhiḥ /
analyzed: yā nu śvetau avas divaḥ uccarātaḥ upa dyubhiḥ

original: RV_8,040.08c indrāgnyor anu vratam uhānā yanti sindhavo yān sīm bandhād amuñcatāṃ nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: indra agnyoḥ anu vratam uhānāḥ yanti sindhavaḥ yān sīm bandhāt amuñcatām nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.09a pūrvīṣ ṭa indropamātayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ sūno hinvasya harivaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvīḥ te indra upamātayaḥ pūrvīḥ uta praśastayaḥ sūno hinvasya harivas

original: RV_8,040.09d vasvo vīrasyāpṛco yā nu sādhanta no dhiyo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: vasvaḥ vīrasya āpṛcaḥ yāḥ nu sādhanta naḥ dhiyaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.10a taṃ śiśītā suvṛktibhis tveṣaṃ satvānam ṛgmiyam /
analyzed: tam śiśīta suvṛktibhiḥ tveṣam satvānam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_8,040.10c uto nu cid ya ojasā śuṣṇasyāṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarvatīr apo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: uta u nu cit yaḥ ojasā śuṣṇasya aṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarvatīḥ apaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.11a taṃ śiśītā svadhvaraṃ satyaṃ satvānam ṛtviyam /
analyzed: tam śiśīta su adhvaram satyam satvānam ṛtviyam

original: RV_8,040.11c uto nu cid ya ohata āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedaty ajaiḥ svarvatīr apo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: uta u nu cit yaḥ ohate āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedati ajaiḥ svarvatīḥ apaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,040.12a evendrāgnibhyām pitṛvan navīyo mandhātṛvad aṅgirasvad avāci /
analyzed: eva indra agnibhyām pitṛ vat navīyaḥ mandhātṛ vat aṅgirasvat avāci

original: RV_8,040.12c tridhātunā śarmaṇā pātam asmān vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: tri dhātunā śarmaṇā pātam asmān vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_8,041.01a asmā ū ṣu prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyo 'rcā viduṣṭarebhyaḥ /
analyzed: asmai u su prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ rca viduṣṭarebhyaḥ

original: RV_8,041.01d yo dhītā mānuṣāṇām paśvo gā iva rakṣati nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: yaḥ dhītā mānuṣāṇām paśvaḥ gāḥ iva rakṣati nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.02a tam ū ṣu samanā girā pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ /
analyzed: tam u su samanā girā pitṝṇām ca manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,041.02c nābhākasya praśastibhir yaḥ sindhūnām upodaye saptasvasā sa madhyamo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: nābhākasya praśastibhiḥ yaḥ sindhūnām upodaye sapta svasā sa madhyamaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.03a sa kṣapaḥ pari ṣasvaje ny usro māyayā dadhe sa viśvam pari darśataḥ /
analyzed: sa kṣapaḥ pari sasvaje ni usraḥ māyayā dadhe sa viśvam pari darśataḥ

original: RV_8,041.03d tasya venīr anu vratam uṣas tisro avardhayan nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: tasya venīḥ anu vratam uṣaḥ tisraḥ avardhayan nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.04a yaḥ kakubho nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyām adhi darśataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kakubhaḥ nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyām adhi darśataḥ

original: RV_8,041.04c sa mātā pūrvyam padaṃ tad varuṇasya saptyaṃ sa hi gopā iveryo nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa mātā pūrvyam padam tat varuṇasya saptyam sa hi gopāḥ iva iryaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.05a yo dhartā bhuvanānāṃ ya usrāṇām apīcyā veda nāmāni guhyā /
analyzed: yaḥ dhartā bhuvanānām yaḥ usrāṇām apīcyā veda nāmāni guhyā

original: RV_8,041.05d sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpaṃ dyaur iva puṣyati nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpam dyauḥ iva puṣyati nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.06a yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhir iva śritā /
analyzed: yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhiḥ iva śritā

original: RV_8,041.06c tritaṃ jūtī saparyata vraje gāvo na saṃyuje yuje aśvāṃ ayukṣata nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: tritam jūtī saparyata vraje gāvaḥ na saṃyuje yuje aśvān ayukṣata nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.07a ya āsv atka āśaye viśvā jātāny eṣām /
analyzed: yaḥ āsu atkaḥ āśaye viśvā jātāni eṣām

original: RV_8,041.07c pari dhāmāni marmṛśad varuṇasya puro gaye viśve devā anu vrataṃ nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: pari dhāmāni marmṛśat varuṇasya puras gaye viśve devāḥ anu vratam nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.08a sa samudro apīcyas turo dyām iva rohati ni yad āsu yajur dadhe /
analyzed: sa samudraḥ apīcyaḥ turaḥ dyām iva rohati ni yat āsu yajuḥ dadhe

original: RV_8,041.08d sa māyā arcinā padāstṛṇān nākam āruhan nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa māyāḥ arcinā padā astṛṇāt nākam āruhat nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.09a yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisro bhūmīr adhikṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisraḥ bhūmīḥ adhikṣitaḥ

original: RV_8,041.09c trir uttarāṇi papratur varuṇasya dhruvaṃ sadaḥ sa saptānām irajyati nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: tris uttarāṇi papratuḥ varuṇasya dhruvam sadaḥ sa saptānām irajyati nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,041.10a yaḥ śvetāṃ adhinirṇijaś cakre kṛṣṇāṃ anu vratā /
analyzed: yaḥ śvetām adhinirṇijaḥ cakre kṛṣṇām anu vratā

original: RV_8,041.10c sa dhāma pūrvyam mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajo na dyām adhārayan nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: sa dhāma pūrvyam mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajaḥ na dyām adhārayat nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,042.01a astabhnād dyām asuro viśvavedā amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: astabhnāt dyām asuraḥ viśva vedāḥ amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_8,042.01c āsīdad viśvā bhuvanāni samrāḍ viśvet tāni varuṇasya vratāni //
analyzed: āsīdat viśvā bhuvanāni samrāj viśvā id tāni varuṇasya vratāni

original: RV_8,042.02a evā vandasva varuṇam bṛhantaṃ namasyā dhīram amṛtasya gopām /
analyzed: eva vandasva varuṇam bṛhantam namasya dhīram amṛtasya gopām

original: RV_8,042.02c sa naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsat pātaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe //
analyzed: sa naḥ śarma tri varūtham vi yaṃsat pātam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe

original: RV_8,042.03a imāṃ dhiyaṃ śikṣamāṇasya deva kratuṃ dakṣaṃ varuṇa saṃ śiśādhi /
analyzed: imām dhiyam śikṣamāṇasya deva kratum dakṣam varuṇa sam śiśādhi

original: RV_8,042.03c yayāti viśvā duritā tarema sutarmāṇam adhi nāvaṃ ruhema //
analyzed: yayā ati viśvā duritā tarema su tarmāṇam adhi nāvam ruhema

original: RV_8,042.04a ā vāṃ grāvāṇo aśvinā dhībhir viprā acucyavuḥ /
analyzed: ā vām grāvāṇaḥ aśvinā dhībhiḥ viprāḥ acucyavuḥ

original: RV_8,042.04c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: nāsatyā soma pītaye nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,042.05a yathā vām atrir aśvinā gīrbhir vipro ajohavīt /
analyzed: yathā vām atriḥ aśvinā gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ ajohavīt

original: RV_8,042.05c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: nāsatyā soma pītaye nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,042.06a evā vām ahva ūtaye yathāhuvanta medhirāḥ /
analyzed: eva vām ahve ūtaye yathā ahuvanta medhirāḥ

original: RV_8,042.06c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same //
analyzed: nāsatyā soma pītaye nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_8,043.01a ime viprasya vedhaso 'gner astṛtayajvanaḥ /
analyzed: ime viprasya vedhasaḥ gneḥ astṛta yajvanaḥ

original: RV_8,043.01c gira stomāsa īrate //
analyzed: giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate

original: RV_8,043.02a asmai te pratiharyate jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: asmai te pratiharyate jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_8,043.02c agne janāmi suṣṭutim //
analyzed: agne janāmi suṣṭutim

original: RV_8,043.03a ārokā iva ghed aha tigmā agne tava tviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ārokāḥ iva gha id aha tigmāḥ agne tava tviṣaḥ

original: RV_8,043.03c dadbhir vanāni bapsati //
analyzed: dadbhiḥ vanāni bapsati

original: RV_8,043.04a harayo dhūmaketavo vātajūtā upa dyavi /
analyzed: harayaḥ dhūma ketavaḥ vāta jūtāḥ upa dyavi

original: RV_8,043.04c yatante vṛthag agnayaḥ //
analyzed: yatante vṛthak agnayaḥ

original: RV_8,043.05a ete tye vṛthag agnaya iddhāsaḥ sam adṛkṣata /
analyzed: ete tye vṛthak agnayaḥ iddhāsaḥ sam adṛkṣata

original: RV_8,043.05c uṣasām iva ketavaḥ //
analyzed: uṣasām iva ketavaḥ

original: RV_8,043.06a kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi patsutaḥ prayāṇe jātavedasaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi patsutas prayāṇe jātavedasaḥ

original: RV_8,043.06c agnir yad rodhati kṣami //
analyzed: agniḥ yat rodhati kṣami

original: RV_8,043.07a dhāsiṃ kṛṇvāna oṣadhīr bapsad agnir na vāyati /
analyzed: dhāsim kṛṇvānaḥ oṣadhīḥ bapsat agniḥ na vāyati

original: RV_8,043.07c punar yan taruṇīr api //
analyzed: punar yan taruṇīḥ api

original: RV_8,043.08a jihvābhir aha nannamad arciṣā jañjaṇābhavan /
analyzed: jihvābhiḥ aha nannamat arciṣā jañjaṇābhavan

original: RV_8,043.08c agnir vaneṣu rocate //
analyzed: agniḥ vaneṣu rocate

original: RV_8,043.09a apsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava sauṣadhīr anu rudhyase /
analyzed: apsu agne sadhiḥ tava sa oṣadhīḥ anu rudhyase

original: RV_8,043.09c garbhe sañ jāyase punaḥ //
analyzed: garbhe sam jāyase punar

original: RV_8,043.10a ud agne tava tad ghṛtād arcī rocata āhutam /
analyzed: ud agne tava tat ghṛtāt arciḥ rocate āhutam

original: RV_8,043.10c niṃsānaṃ juhvo mukhe //
analyzed: niṃsānam juhvaḥ mukhe

original: RV_8,043.11a ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase /
analyzed: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase

original: RV_8,043.11c stomair vidhemāgnaye //
analyzed: stomaiḥ vidhema agnaye

original: RV_8,043.12a uta tvā namasā vayaṃ hotar vareṇyakrato /
analyzed: uta tvā namasā vayam hotar vareṇya krato

original: RV_8,043.12c agne samidbhir īmahe //
analyzed: agne samidbhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,043.13a uta tvā bhṛguvac chuce manuṣvad agna āhuta /
analyzed: uta tvā bhṛgu vat śuce manuṣvat agne āhuta

original: RV_8,043.13c aṅgirasvad dhavāmahe //
analyzed: aṅgirasvat havāmahe

original: RV_8,043.14a tvaṃ hy agne agninā vipro vipreṇa san satā /
analyzed: tvam hi agne agninā vipraḥ vipreṇa san satā

original: RV_8,043.14c sakhā sakhyā samidhyase //
analyzed: sakhā sakhyā samidhyase

original: RV_8,043.15a sa tvaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe rayiṃ dehi sahasriṇam /
analyzed: sa tvam viprāya dāśuṣe rayim dehi sahasriṇam

original: RV_8,043.15c agne vīravatīm iṣam //
analyzed: agne vīravatīm iṣam

original: RV_8,043.16a agne bhrātaḥ sahaskṛta rohidaśva śucivrata /
analyzed: agne bhrātar sahaskṛta rohit aśva śuci vrata

original: RV_8,043.16c imaṃ stomaṃ juṣasva me //
analyzed: imam stomam juṣasva me

original: RV_8,043.17a uta tvāgne mama stuto vāśrāya pratiharyate /
analyzed: uta tvā agne mama stutaḥ vāśrāya pratiharyate

original: RV_8,043.17c goṣṭhaṃ gāva ivāśata //
analyzed: goṣṭham gāvaḥ iva āśata

original: RV_8,043.18a tubhyaṃ tā aṅgirastama viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: tubhyam tāḥ aṅgirastama viśvāḥ su kṣitayaḥ pṛthak

original: RV_8,043.18c agne kāmāya yemire //
analyzed: agne kāmāya yemire

original: RV_8,043.19a agniṃ dhībhir manīṣiṇo medhirāso vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: agnim dhībhiḥ manīṣiṇaḥ medhirāsaḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: RV_8,043.19c admasadyāya hinvire //
analyzed: admasadyāya hinvire

original: RV_8,043.20a taṃ tvām ajmeṣu vājinaṃ tanvānā agne adhvaram /
analyzed: tam tvām ajmeṣu vājinam tanvānāḥ agne adhvaram

original: RV_8,043.20c vahniṃ hotāram īḷate //
analyzed: vahnim hotāram īḍate

original: RV_8,043.21a purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ /
analyzed: purutrā hi sadṛś asi viśaḥ viśvāḥ anu prabhuḥ

original: RV_8,043.21c samatsu tvā havāmahe //
analyzed: samatsu tvā havāmahe

original: RV_8,043.22a tam īḷiṣva ya āhuto 'gnir vibhrājate ghṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: tam īḍiṣva yaḥ āhutaḥ gniḥ vibhrājate ghṛtaiḥ

original: RV_8,043.22c imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam //
analyzed: imam naḥ śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_8,043.23a taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śṛṇvantaṃ jātavedasam /
analyzed: tam tvā vayam havāmahe śṛṇvantam jātavedasam

original: RV_8,043.23c agne ghnantam apa dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: agne ghnantam apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_8,043.24a viśāṃ rājānam adbhutam adhyakṣaṃ dharmaṇām imam /
analyzed: viśām rājānam adbhutam adhyakṣam dharmaṇām imam

original: RV_8,043.24c agnim īḷe sa u śravat //
analyzed: agnim īḍe saḥ u śravat

original: RV_8,043.25a agniṃ viśvāyuvepasam maryaṃ na vājinaṃ hitam /
analyzed: agnim viśvāyu vepasam maryam na vājinam hitam

original: RV_8,043.25c saptiṃ na vājayāmasi //
analyzed: saptim na vājayāmasi

original: RV_8,043.26a ghnan mṛdhrāṇy apa dviṣo dahan rakṣāṃsi viśvahā /
analyzed: ghnan mṛdhrāṇi apa dviṣaḥ dahan rakṣāṃsi viśvahā

original: RV_8,043.26c agne tigmena dīdihi //
analyzed: agne tigmena dīdihi

original: RV_8,043.27a yaṃ tvā janāsa indhate manuṣvad aṅgirastama /
analyzed: yam tvā janāsaḥ indhate manuṣvat aṅgirastama

original: RV_8,043.27c agne sa bodhi me vacaḥ //
analyzed: agne sa bodhi me vacaḥ

original: RV_8,043.28a yad agne divijā asy apsujā vā sahaskṛta /
analyzed: yat agne divijāḥ asi apsujāḥ vā sahaskṛta

original: RV_8,043.28c taṃ tvā gīrbhir havāmahe //
analyzed: tam tvā gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,043.29a tubhyaṃ ghet te janā ime viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: tubhyam gha id te janāḥ ime viśvāḥ su kṣitayaḥ pṛthak

original: RV_8,043.29c dhāsiṃ hinvanty attave //
analyzed: dhāsim hinvanti attave

original: RV_8,043.30a te ghed agne svādhyo 'hā viśvā nṛcakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: te gha id agne su ādhyaḥ hāḥ viśvāḥ nṛ cakṣasaḥ

original: RV_8,043.30c tarantaḥ syāma durgahā //
analyzed: tarantaḥ syāma durgahā

original: RV_8,043.31a agnim mandram purupriyaṃ śīram pāvakaśociṣam /
analyzed: agnim mandram puru priyam śīram pāvaka śociṣam

original: RV_8,043.31c hṛdbhir mandrebhir īmahe //
analyzed: hṛdbhiḥ mandrebhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,043.32a sa tvam agne vibhāvasuḥ sṛjan sūryo na raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam agne vibhāvasuḥ sṛjan sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_8,043.32c śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase //
analyzed: śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase

original: RV_8,043.33a tat te sahasva īmahe dātraṃ yan nopadasyati /
analyzed: tat te sahasvas īmahe dātram yat na upadasyati

original: RV_8,043.33c tvad agne vāryaṃ vasu //
analyzed: tvat agne vāryam vasu

original: RV_8,044.01a samidhāgniṃ duvasyata ghṛtair bodhayatātithim /
analyzed: samidhā agnim duvasyata ghṛtaiḥ bodhayata atithim

original: RV_8,044.01c āsmin havyā juhotana //
analyzed: ā asmin havyā juhotana

original: RV_8,044.02a agne stomaṃ juṣasva me vardhasvānena manmanā /
analyzed: agne stomam juṣasva me vardhasva anena manmanā

original: RV_8,044.02c prati sūktāni harya naḥ //
analyzed: prati sūktāni harya naḥ

original: RV_8,044.03a agniṃ dūtam puro dadhe havyavāham upa bruve /
analyzed: agnim dūtam puras dadhe havyavāham upa bruve

original: RV_8,044.03c devāṃ ā sādayād iha //
analyzed: devān ā sādayāt iha

original: RV_8,044.04a ut te bṛhanto arcayaḥ samidhānasya dīdivaḥ /
analyzed: ud te bṛhantaḥ arcayaḥ samidhānasya dīdivas

original: RV_8,044.04c agne śukrāsa īrate //
analyzed: agne śukrāsaḥ īrate

original: RV_8,044.05a upa tvā juhvo mama ghṛtācīr yantu haryata /
analyzed: upa tvā juhvaḥ mama ghṛtācīḥ yantu haryata

original: RV_8,044.05c agne havyā juṣasva naḥ //
analyzed: agne havyā juṣasva naḥ

original: RV_8,044.06a mandraṃ hotāram ṛtvijaṃ citrabhānuṃ vibhāvasum /
analyzed: mandram hotāram ṛtvijam citra bhānum vibhāvasum

original: RV_8,044.06c agnim īḷe sa u śravat //
analyzed: agnim īḍe saḥ u śravat

original: RV_8,044.07a pratnaṃ hotāram īḍyaṃ juṣṭam agniṃ kavikratum /
analyzed: pratnam hotāram īḍyam juṣṭam agnim kavi kratum

original: RV_8,044.07c adhvarāṇām abhiśriyam //
analyzed: adhvarāṇām abhiśriyam

original: RV_8,044.08a juṣāṇo aṅgirastamemā havyāny ānuṣak /
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ aṅgirastamā imā havyāni ānuṣak

original: RV_8,044.08c agne yajñaṃ naya ṛtuthā //
analyzed: agne yajñam naya ṛtuthā

original: RV_8,044.09a samidhāna u santya śukraśoca ihā vaha /
analyzed: samidhānaḥ u santya śukra śoce iha ā vaha

original: RV_8,044.09c cikitvān daivyaṃ janam //
analyzed: cikitvān daivyam janam

original: RV_8,044.10a vipraṃ hotāram adruhaṃ dhūmaketuṃ vibhāvasum /
analyzed: vipram hotāram adruham dhūma ketum vibhāvasum

original: RV_8,044.10c yajñānāṃ ketum īmahe //
analyzed: yajñānām ketum īmahe

original: RV_8,044.11a agne ni pāhi nas tvam prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ /
analyzed: agne ni pāhi naḥ tvam prati sma deva rīṣataḥ

original: RV_8,044.11c bhindhi dveṣaḥ sahaskṛta //
analyzed: bhindhi dveṣaḥ sahaskṛta

original: RV_8,044.12a agniḥ pratnena manmanā śumbhānas tanvaṃ svām /
analyzed: agniḥ pratnena manmanā śumbhānaḥ tanvam svām

original: RV_8,044.12c kavir vipreṇa vāvṛdhe //
analyzed: kaviḥ vipreṇa vāvṛdhe

original: RV_8,044.13a ūrjo napātam ā huve 'gnim pāvakaśociṣam /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam ā huve gnim pāvaka śociṣam

original: RV_8,044.13c asmin yajñe svadhvare //
analyzed: asmin yajñe su adhvare

original: RV_8,044.14a sa no mitramahas tvam agne śukreṇa śociṣā /
analyzed: sa naḥ mitra mahas tvam agne śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_8,044.14c devair ā satsi barhiṣi //
analyzed: devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_8,044.15a yo agniṃ tanvo dame devam martaḥ saparyati /
analyzed: yaḥ agnim tanvaḥ dame devam martaḥ saparyati

original: RV_8,044.15c tasmā id dīdayad vasu //
analyzed: tasmai id dīdayat vasu

original: RV_8,044.16a agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam /
analyzed: agniḥ mūrdhā divaḥ kakud patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ ayam

original: RV_8,044.16c apāṃ retāṃsi jinvati //
analyzed: apām retāṃsi jinvati

original: RV_8,044.17a ud agne śucayas tava śukrā bhrājanta īrate /
analyzed: ud agne śucayaḥ tava śukrāḥ bhrājantaḥ īrate

original: RV_8,044.17c tava jyotīṃṣy arcayaḥ //
analyzed: tava jyotīṃṣi arcayaḥ

original: RV_8,044.18a īśiṣe vāryasya hi dātrasyāgne svarpatiḥ /
analyzed: īśiṣe vāryasya hi dātrasya agne svarpatiḥ

original: RV_8,044.18c stotā syāṃ tava śarmaṇi //
analyzed: stotā syām tava śarmaṇi

original: RV_8,044.19a tvām agne manīṣiṇas tvāṃ hinvanti cittibhiḥ /
analyzed: tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ tvām hinvanti cittibhiḥ

original: RV_8,044.19c tvāṃ vardhantu no giraḥ //
analyzed: tvām vardhantu naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,044.20a adabdhasya svadhāvato dūtasya rebhataḥ sadā /
analyzed: adabdhasya svadhāvataḥ dūtasya rebhataḥ sadā

original: RV_8,044.20c agneḥ sakhyaṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: agneḥ sakhyam vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,044.21a agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ śucir vipraḥ śuciḥ kaviḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ śuci vratatamaḥ śuciḥ vipraḥ śuciḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_8,044.21c śucī rocata āhutaḥ //
analyzed: śuciḥ rocate āhutaḥ

original: RV_8,044.22a uta tvā dhītayo mama giro vardhantu viśvahā /
analyzed: uta tvā dhītayaḥ mama giraḥ vardhantu viśvahā

original: RV_8,044.22c agne sakhyasya bodhi naḥ //
analyzed: agne sakhyasya bodhi naḥ

original: RV_8,044.23a yad agne syām ahaṃ tvaṃ tvaṃ vā ghā syā aham /
analyzed: yat agne syām aham tvam tvam vā gha syāḥ aham

original: RV_8,044.23c syuṣ ṭe satyā ihāśiṣaḥ //
analyzed: syuḥ te satyāḥ iha āśiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,044.24a vasur vasupatir hi kam asy agne vibhāvasuḥ /
analyzed: vasuḥ vasu patiḥ hi kam asi agne vibhāvasuḥ

original: RV_8,044.24c syāma te sumatāv api //
analyzed: syāma te sumatau api

original: RV_8,044.25a agne dhṛtavratāya te samudrāyeva sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: agne dhṛta vratāya te samudrāya iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_8,044.25c giro vāśrāsa īrate //
analyzed: giraḥ vāśrāsaḥ īrate

original: RV_8,044.26a yuvānaṃ viśpatiṃ kaviṃ viśvādam puruvepasam /
analyzed: yuvānam viśpatim kavim viśva adam puru vepasam

original: RV_8,044.26c agniṃ śumbhāmi manmabhiḥ //
analyzed: agnim śumbhāmi manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,044.27a yajñānāṃ rathye vayaṃ tigmajambhāya vīḷave /
analyzed: yajñānām rathye vayam tigma jambhāya vīḍave

original: RV_8,044.27c stomair iṣemāgnaye //
analyzed: stomaiḥ iṣema agnaye

original: RV_8,044.28a ayam agne tve api jaritā bhūtu santya /
analyzed: ayam agne tve api jaritā bhūtu santya

original: RV_8,044.28c tasmai pāvaka mṛḷaya //
analyzed: tasmai pāvaka mṛḍaya

original: RV_8,044.29a dhīro hy asy admasad vipro na jāgṛviḥ sadā /
analyzed: dhīraḥ hi asi adma sad vipraḥ na jāgṛviḥ sadā

original: RV_8,044.29c agne dīdayasi dyavi //
analyzed: agne dīdayasi dyavi

original: RV_8,044.30a purāgne duritebhyaḥ purā mṛdhrebhyaḥ kave /
analyzed: purā agne duritebhyaḥ purā mṛdhrebhyaḥ kave

original: RV_8,044.30c pra ṇa āyur vaso tira //
analyzed: pra naḥ āyuḥ vaso tira

original: RV_8,045.01a ā ghā ye agnim indhate stṛṇanti barhir ānuṣak /
analyzed: ā gha ye agnim indhate stṛṇanti barhiḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_8,045.01c yeṣām indro yuvā sakhā //
analyzed: yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā

original: RV_8,045.02a bṛhann id idhma eṣām bhūri śastam pṛthuḥ svaruḥ /
analyzed: bṛhan id idhmaḥ eṣām bhūri śastam pṛthuḥ svaruḥ

original: RV_8,045.02c yeṣām indro yuvā sakhā //
analyzed: yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā

original: RV_8,045.03a ayuddha id yudhā vṛtaṃ śūra ājati satvabhiḥ /
analyzed: a yuddhaḥ id yudhā vṛtam śūraḥ ājati satvabhiḥ

original: RV_8,045.03c yeṣām indro yuvā sakhā //
analyzed: yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā

original: RV_8,045.04a ā bundaṃ vṛtrahā dade jātaḥ pṛcchad vi mātaram /
analyzed: ā bundam vṛtrahā dade jātaḥ pṛcchat vi mātaram

original: RV_8,045.04c ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire //
analyzed: ke ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire

original: RV_8,045.05a prati tvā śavasī vadad girāv apso na yodhiṣat /
analyzed: prati tvā śavasī vadat girau apsaḥ na yodhiṣat

original: RV_8,045.05c yas te śatrutvam ācake //
analyzed: yaḥ te śatru tvam ācake

original: RV_8,045.06a uta tvam maghavañ chṛṇu yas te vaṣṭi vavakṣi tat /
analyzed: uta tvam maghavan śṛṇu yaḥ te vaṣṭi vavakṣi tat

original: RV_8,045.06c yad vīḷayāsi vīḷu tat //
analyzed: yat vīḍayāsi vīḷu tat

original: RV_8,045.07a yad ājiṃ yāty ājikṛd indraḥ svaśvayur upa /
analyzed: yat ājim yāti āji kṛt indraḥ su aśvayuḥ upa

original: RV_8,045.07c rathītamo rathīnām //
analyzed: rathītamaḥ rathīnām

original: RV_8,045.08a vi ṣu viśvā abhiyujo vajrin viṣvag yathā vṛha /
analyzed: vi su viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ vajrin viṣvak yathā vṛha

original: RV_8,045.08c bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ //
analyzed: bhavā naḥ su śravastamaḥ

original: RV_8,045.09a asmākaṃ su ratham pura indraḥ kṛṇotu sātaye /
analyzed: asmākam su ratham puras indraḥ kṛṇotu sātaye

original: RV_8,045.09c na yaṃ dhūrvanti dhūrtayaḥ //
analyzed: na yam dhūrvanti dhūrtayaḥ

original: RV_8,045.10a vṛjyāma te pari dviṣo 'raṃ te śakra dāvane /
analyzed: vṛjyāma te pari dviṣaḥ ram te śakra dāvane

original: RV_8,045.10c gamemed indra gomataḥ //
analyzed: gamema id indra gomataḥ

original: RV_8,045.11a śanaiś cid yanto adrivo 'śvāvantaḥ śatagvinaḥ /
analyzed: śanais cit yantaḥ adrivas śvāvantaḥ śatagvinaḥ

original: RV_8,045.11c vivakṣaṇā anehasaḥ //
analyzed: vivakṣaṇāḥ anehasaḥ

original: RV_8,045.12a ūrdhvā hi te dive-dive sahasrā sūnṛtā śatā /
analyzed: ūrdhvā hi te dive dive sahasrā sūnṛtā śatā

original: RV_8,045.12c jaritṛbhyo vimaṃhate //
analyzed: jaritṛbhyaḥ vimaṃhate

original: RV_8,045.13a vidmā hi tvā dhanañjayam indra dṛḷhā cid ārujam /
analyzed: vidma hi tvā dhanañjayam indra dṛḷhā cit ārujam

original: RV_8,045.13c ādāriṇaṃ yathā gayam //
analyzed: ādāriṇam yathā gayam

original: RV_8,045.14a kakuhaṃ cit tvā kave mandantu dhṛṣṇav indavaḥ /
analyzed: kakuham cit tvā kave mandantu dhṛṣṇo indavaḥ

original: RV_8,045.14c ā tvā paṇiṃ yad īmahe //
analyzed: ā tvā paṇim yat īmahe

original: RV_8,045.15a yas te revāṃ adāśuriḥ pramamarṣa maghattaye /
analyzed: yaḥ te revān adāśuriḥ pramamarṣa maghattaye

original: RV_8,045.15c tasya no veda ā bhara //
analyzed: tasya naḥ vedaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_8,045.16a ima u tvā vi cakṣate sakhāya indra sominaḥ /
analyzed: ime u tvā vi cakṣate sakhāyaḥ indra sominaḥ

original: RV_8,045.16c puṣṭāvanto yathā paśum //
analyzed: puṣṭāvantaḥ yathā paśum

original: RV_8,045.17a uta tvābadhiraṃ vayaṃ śrutkarṇaṃ santam ūtaye /
analyzed: uta tvā abadhiram vayam śrut karṇam santam ūtaye

original: RV_8,045.17c dūrād iha havāmahe //
analyzed: dūrāt iha havāmahe

original: RV_8,045.18a yac chuśrūyā imaṃ havaṃ durmarṣaṃ cakriyā uta /
analyzed: yat śuśrūyāḥ imam havam durmarṣam cakriyāḥ uta

original: RV_8,045.18c bhaver āpir no antamaḥ //
analyzed: bhaveḥ āpiḥ naḥ antamaḥ

original: RV_8,045.19a yac cid dhi te api vyathir jaganvāṃso amanmahi /
analyzed: yat cit hi te api vyathiḥ jaganvāṃsaḥ amanmahi

original: RV_8,045.19c godā id indra bodhi naḥ //
analyzed: go dāḥ id indra bodhi naḥ

original: RV_8,045.20a ā tvā rambhaṃ na jivrayo rarabhmā śavasas pate /
analyzed: ā tvā rambham na jivrayaḥ rarabhma śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_8,045.20c uśmasi tvā sadhastha ā //
analyzed: uśmasi tvā sadhasthe ā

original: RV_8,045.21a stotram indrāya gāyata purunṛmṇāya satvane /
analyzed: stotram indrāya gāyata puru nṛmṇāya satvane

original: RV_8,045.21c nakir yaṃ vṛṇvate yudhi //
analyzed: nakir yam vṛṇvate yudhi

original: RV_8,045.22a abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sute sutaṃ sṛjāmi pītaye /
analyzed: abhi tvā vṛṣabha sute sutam sṛjāmi pītaye

original: RV_8,045.22c tṛmpā vy aśnuhī madam //
analyzed: tṛmpa vi aśnuhi madam

original: RV_8,045.23a mā tvā mūrā aviṣyavo mopahasvāna ā dabhan /
analyzed: mā tvā mūrāḥ aviṣyavaḥ mā upahasvānaḥ ā dabhan

original: RV_8,045.23c mākīm brahmadviṣo vanaḥ //
analyzed: mākīm brahma dviṣaḥ vanaḥ

original: RV_8,045.24a iha tvā goparīṇasā mahe mandantu rādhase /
analyzed: iha tvā go parīṇasā mahe mandantu rādhase

original: RV_8,045.24c saro gauro yathā piba //
analyzed: saraḥ gauraḥ yathā piba

original: RV_8,045.25a yā vṛtrahā parāvati sanā navā ca cucyuve /
analyzed: yā vṛtrahā parāvati sanā navā ca cucyuve

original: RV_8,045.25c tā saṃsatsu pra vocata //
analyzed: tā saṃsatsu pra vocata

original: RV_8,045.26a apibat kadruvaḥ sutam indraḥ sahasrabāhve /
analyzed: apibat kadruvaḥ sutam indraḥ sahasra bāhve

original: RV_8,045.26c atrādediṣṭa pauṃsyam //
analyzed: atra adediṣṭa pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,045.27a satyaṃ tat turvaśe yadau vidāno ahnavāyyam /
analyzed: satyam tat turvaśe yadau vidānaḥ ahnavāyyam

original: RV_8,045.27c vy ānaṭ turvaṇe śami //
analyzed: vi ānaṭ turvaṇe śami

original: RV_8,045.28a taraṇiṃ vo janānāṃ tradaṃ vājasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: taraṇim vaḥ janānām tradam vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,045.28c samānam u pra śaṃsiṣam //
analyzed: samānam u pra śaṃsiṣam

original: RV_8,045.29a ṛbhukṣaṇaṃ na vartava uktheṣu tugryāvṛdham /
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇam na vartave uktheṣu tugryāvṛdham

original: RV_8,045.29c indraṃ some sacā sute //
analyzed: indram some sacā sute

original: RV_8,045.30a yaḥ kṛntad id vi yonyaṃ triśokāya girim pṛthum /
analyzed: yaḥ kṛntat id vi yonyam triśokāya girim pṛthum

original: RV_8,045.30c gobhyo gātuṃ niretave //
analyzed: gobhyaḥ gātum niretave

original: RV_8,045.31a yad dadhiṣe manasyasi mandānaḥ pred iyakṣasi /
analyzed: yat dadhiṣe manasyasi mandānaḥ pra id iyakṣasi

original: RV_8,045.31c mā tat kar indra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: mā tat kaḥ indra mṛḍaya

original: RV_8,045.32a dabhraṃ cid dhi tvāvataḥ kṛtaṃ śṛṇve adhi kṣami /
analyzed: dabhram cit hi tvāvataḥ kṛtam śṛṇve adhi kṣami

original: RV_8,045.32c jigātv indra te manaḥ //
analyzed: jigātu indra te manaḥ

original: RV_8,045.33a taved u tāḥ sukīrtayo 'sann uta praśastayaḥ /
analyzed: tava id u tāḥ su kīrtayaḥ san uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_8,045.33c yad indra mṛḷayāsi naḥ //
analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_8,045.34a mā na ekasminn āgasi mā dvayor uta triṣu /
analyzed: mā naḥ ekasmin āgasi mā dvayoḥ uta triṣu

original: RV_8,045.34c vadhīr mā śūra bhūriṣu //
analyzed: vadhīḥ mā śūra bhūriṣu

original: RV_8,045.35a bibhayā hi tvāvata ugrād abhiprabhaṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: bibhayāḥ hi tvāvataḥ ugrāt abhiprabhaṅgiṇaḥ

original: RV_8,045.35c dasmād aham ṛtīṣahaḥ //
analyzed: dasmāt aham ṛtīṣahaḥ

original: RV_8,045.36a mā sakhyuḥ śūnam ā vide mā putrasya prabhūvaso /
analyzed: mā sakhyuḥ śūnam ā vide mā putrasya prabhūvaso

original: RV_8,045.36c āvṛtvad bhūtu te manaḥ //
analyzed: āvṛtvat bhūtu te manaḥ

original: RV_8,045.37a ko nu maryā amithitaḥ sakhā sakhāyam abravīt /
analyzed: kaḥ nu maryāḥ a mithitaḥ sakhā sakhāyam abravīt

original: RV_8,045.37c jahā ko asmad īṣate //
analyzed: jaha kaḥ asmat īṣate

original: RV_8,045.38a evāre vṛṣabhā sute 'sinvan bhūry āvayaḥ /
analyzed: eva are vṛṣabha sute sinvan bhūri āvayaḥ

original: RV_8,045.38c śvaghnīva nivatā caran //
analyzed: śvaghnī iva nivatā caran

original: RV_8,045.39a ā ta etā vacoyujā harī gṛbhṇe sumadrathā /
analyzed: ā te etā vacaḥ yujā harī gṛbhṇe sumat rathā

original: RV_8,045.39c yad īm brahmabhya id dadaḥ //
analyzed: yat īm brahmabhyaḥ id dadaḥ

original: RV_8,045.40a bhindhi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ pari bādho jahī mṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: bhindhi viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ pari bādhaḥ jahi mṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,045.40c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara //
analyzed: vasu spārham tat ā bhara

original: RV_8,045.41a yad vīḷāv indra yat sthire yat parśāne parābhṛtam /
analyzed: yat vīḍau indra yat sthire yat parśāne parābhṛtam

original: RV_8,045.41c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara //
analyzed: vasu spārham tat ā bhara

original: RV_8,045.42a yasya te viśvamānuṣo bhūrer dattasya vedati /
analyzed: yasya te viśva mānuṣaḥ bhūreḥ dattasya vedati

original: RV_8,045.42c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara //
analyzed: vasu spārham tat ā bhara

original: RV_8,046.01a tvāvataḥ purūvaso vayam indra praṇetaḥ /
analyzed: tvāvataḥ purūvaso vayam indra praṇetar

original: RV_8,046.01c smasi sthātar harīṇām //
analyzed: smasi sthātar harīṇām

original: RV_8,046.02a tvāṃ hi satyam adrivo vidma dātāram iṣām /
analyzed: tvām hi satyam adrivas vidma dātāram iṣām

original: RV_8,046.02c vidma dātāraṃ rayīṇām //
analyzed: vidma dātāram rayīṇām

original: RV_8,046.03a ā yasya te mahimānaṃ śatamūte śatakrato /
analyzed: ā yasya te mahimānam śatamūte śatakrato

original: RV_8,046.03c gīrbhir gṛṇanti kāravaḥ //
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ gṛṇanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_8,046.04a sunītho ghā sa martyo yam maruto yam aryamā /
analyzed: su nīthaḥ gha sa martyaḥ yam marutaḥ yam aryamā

original: RV_8,046.04c mitraḥ pānty adruhaḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ pānti adruhaḥ

original: RV_8,046.05a dadhāno gomad aśvavat suvīryam ādityajūta edhate /
analyzed: dadhānaḥ gomat aśvavat su vīryam āditya jūtaḥ edhate

original: RV_8,046.05c sadā rāyā puruspṛhā //
analyzed: sadā rāyā puruspṛhā

original: RV_8,046.06a tam indraṃ dānam īmahe śavasānam abhīrvam /
analyzed: tam indram dānam īmahe śavasānam abhīrvam

original: RV_8,046.06c īśānaṃ rāya īmahe //
analyzed: īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,046.07a tasmin hi santy ūtayo viśvā abhīravaḥ sacā /
analyzed: tasmin hi santi ūtayaḥ viśvāḥ abhīravaḥ sacā

original: RV_8,046.07c tam ā vahantu saptayaḥ purūvasum madāya harayaḥ sutam //
analyzed: tam ā vahantu saptayaḥ purūvasum madāya harayaḥ sutam

original: RV_8,046.08a yas te mado vareṇyo ya indra vṛtrahantamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ vareṇyaḥ yaḥ indra vṛtra hantamaḥ

original: RV_8,046.08c ya ādadiḥ svar nṛbhir yaḥ pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ādadiḥ svar nṛbhiḥ yaḥ pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_8,046.09a yo duṣṭaro viśvavāra śravāyyo vājeṣv asti tarutā /
analyzed: yaḥ duṣṭaraḥ viśva vāra śravāyyaḥ vājeṣu asti tarutā

original: RV_8,046.09c sa naḥ śaviṣṭha savanā vaso gahi gamema gomati vraje //
analyzed: sa naḥ śaviṣṭha savanā vaso gahi gamema gomati vraje

original: RV_8,046.10a gavyo ṣu ṇo yathā purāśvayota rathayā /
analyzed: gavyā u su naḥ yathā purā aśvayā uta rathayā

original: RV_8,046.10c varivasya mahāmaha //
analyzed: varivasya mahā maha

original: RV_8,046.11a nahi te śūra rādhaso 'ntaṃ vindāmi satrā /
analyzed: nahi te śūra rādhasaḥ ntam vindāmi satrā

original: RV_8,046.11c daśasyā no maghavan nū cid adrivo dhiyo vājebhir āvitha //
analyzed: daśasya naḥ maghavan nu cit adrivas dhiyaḥ vājebhiḥ āvitha

original: RV_8,046.12a ya ṛṣvaḥ śrāvayatsakhā viśvet sa veda janimā puruṣṭutaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛṣvaḥ śrāvayat sakhā viśvā id sa veda janimā puruṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_8,046.12c taṃ viśve mānuṣā yugendraṃ havante taviṣaṃ yatasrucaḥ //
analyzed: tam viśve mānuṣā yugā indram havante taviṣam yata srucaḥ

original: RV_8,046.13a sa no vājeṣv avitā purūvasuḥ purasthātā maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat //
analyzed: sa naḥ vājeṣu avitā purūvasuḥ pura sthātā maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat

original: RV_8,046.14a abhi vo vīram andhaso madeṣu gāya girā mahā vicetasam /
analyzed: abhi vaḥ vīram andhasaḥ madeṣu gāya girā mahā vicetasam

original: RV_8,046.14c indraṃ nāma śrutyaṃ śākinaṃ vaco yathā //
analyzed: indram nāma śrutyam śākinam vacaḥ yathā

original: RV_8,046.15a dadī rekṇas tanve dadir vasu dadir vājeṣu puruhūta vājinam /
analyzed: dadiḥ rekṇaḥ tanve dadiḥ vasu dadiḥ vājeṣu puruhūta vājinam

original: RV_8,046.15c nūnam atha //
analyzed: nūnam atha

original: RV_8,046.16a viśveṣām irajyantaṃ vasūnāṃ sāsahvāṃsaṃ cid asya varpasaḥ /
analyzed: viśveṣām irajyantam vasūnām sāsahvāṃsam cit asya varpasaḥ

original: RV_8,046.16c kṛpayato nūnam aty atha //
analyzed: kṛpayataḥ nūnam ati atha

original: RV_8,046.17a mahaḥ su vo aram iṣe stavāmahe mīḷhuṣe araṅgamāya jagmaye /
analyzed: mahaḥ su vaḥ aram iṣe stavāmahe mīḍhuṣe araṅgamāya jagmaye

original: RV_8,046.17c yajñebhir gīrbhir viśvamanuṣām marutām iyakṣasi gāye tvā namasā girā //
analyzed: yajñebhiḥ gīrbhiḥ viśva manuṣām marutām iyakṣasi gāye tvā namasā girā

original: RV_8,046.18a ye pātayante ajmabhir girīṇāṃ snubhir eṣām /
analyzed: ye pātayante ajmabhiḥ girīṇām snubhiḥ eṣām

original: RV_8,046.18c yajñam mahiṣvaṇīnāṃ sumnaṃ tuviṣvaṇīnām prādhvare //
analyzed: yajñam mahiṣvaṇīnām sumnam tuviṣvaṇīnām pra adhvare

original: RV_8,046.19a prabhaṅgaṃ durmatīnām indra śaviṣṭhā bhara /
analyzed: prabhaṅgam durmatīnām indra śaviṣṭha ā bhara

original: RV_8,046.19c rayim asmabhyaṃ yujyaṃ codayanmate jyeṣṭhaṃ codayanmate //
analyzed: rayim asmabhyam yujyam codayat mate jyeṣṭham codayat mate

original: RV_8,046.20a sanitaḥ susanitar ugra citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta /
analyzed: sanitar su sanitar ugra citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta

original: RV_8,046.20c prāsahā samrāṭ sahuriṃ sahantam bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam //
analyzed: prāsahā samrāj sahurim sahantam bhujyum vājeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_8,046.21a ā sa etu ya īvad āṃ adevaḥ pūrtam ādade /
analyzed: ā saḥ etu yaḥ īvat ām adevaḥ pūrtam ādade

original: RV_8,046.21c yathā cid vaśo aśvyaḥ pṛthuśravasi kānīte 'syā vyuṣy ādade //
analyzed: yathā cit vaśaḥ aśvyaḥ pṛthuśravasi kānīte syāḥ vyuṣi ādade

original: RV_8,046.22a ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāśvyasyāyutāsanam uṣṭrānāṃ viṃśatiṃ śatā /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā aśvyasya ayuta āsanam uṣṭrānām viṃśatim śatā

original: RV_8,046.22c daśa śyāvīnāṃ śatā daśa tryaruṣīṇāṃ daśa gavāṃ sahasrā //
analyzed: daśa śyāvīnām śatā daśa tri aruṣīṇām daśa gavām sahasrā

original: RV_8,046.23a daśa śyāvā ṛdhadrayo vītavārāsa āśavaḥ /
analyzed: daśa śyāvāḥ ṛdhadrayaḥ vīta vārāsaḥ āśavaḥ

original: RV_8,046.23c mathrā nemiṃ ni vāvṛtuḥ //
analyzed: mathrāḥ nemim ni vāvṛtuḥ

original: RV_8,046.24a dānāsaḥ pṛthuśravasaḥ kānītasya surādhasaḥ /
analyzed: dānāsaḥ pṛthuśravasaḥ kānītasya surādhasaḥ

original: RV_8,046.24c rathaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ dadan maṃhiṣṭhaḥ sūrir abhūd varṣiṣṭham akṛta śravaḥ //
analyzed: ratham hiraṇyayam dadan maṃhiṣṭhaḥ sūriḥ abhūt varṣiṣṭham akṛta śravaḥ

original: RV_8,046.25a ā no vāyo mahe tane yāhi makhāya pājase /
analyzed: ā naḥ vāyo mahe tane yāhi makhāya pājase

original: RV_8,046.25c vayaṃ hi te cakṛmā bhūri dāvane sadyaś cin mahi dāvane //
analyzed: vayam hi te cakṛma bhūri dāvane sadyas cit mahi dāvane

original: RV_8,046.26a yo aśvebhir vahate vasta usrās triḥ sapta saptatīnām /
analyzed: yaḥ aśvebhiḥ vahate usrāḥ tris sapta saptatīnām

original: RV_8,046.26c ebhiḥ somebhiḥ somasudbhiḥ somapā dānāya śukrapūtapāḥ //
analyzed: ebhiḥ somebhiḥ soma sudbhiḥ soma pāḥ dānāya śukra pūta pāḥ

original: RV_8,046.27a yo ma imaṃ cid u tmanāmandac citraṃ dāvane /
analyzed: yaḥ me imam cit u tmanā amandat citram dāvane

original: RV_8,046.27c araṭve akṣe nahuṣe sukṛtvani sukṛttarāya sukratuḥ //
analyzed: araṭve akṣe nahuṣe su kṛtvani sukṛttarāya su kratuḥ

original: RV_8,046.28a ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāḷ uta vāyo ghṛtasnāḥ /
analyzed: ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāj uta vāyo ghṛta snāḥ

original: RV_8,046.28c aśveṣitaṃ rajeṣitaṃ śuneṣitam prājma tad idaṃ nu tat //
analyzed: aśva iṣitam raja iṣitam śunā iṣitam pra ajma tat idam nu tat

original: RV_8,046.29a adha priyam iṣirāya ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāsanam /
analyzed: adha priyam iṣirāya ṣaṣṭim sahasra āsanam

original: RV_8,046.29c aśvānām in na vṛṣṇām //
analyzed: aśvānām id na vṛṣṇām

original: RV_8,046.30a gāvo na yūtham upa yanti vadhraya upa mā yanti vadhrayaḥ //
analyzed: gāvaḥ na yūtham upa yanti vadhrayaḥ upa mā yanti vadhrayaḥ

original: RV_8,046.31a adha yac cārathe gaṇe śatam uṣṭrāṃ acikradat /
analyzed: adha yat cārathe gaṇe śatam acikradat

original: RV_8,046.31c adha śvitneṣu viṃśatiṃ śatā //
analyzed: adha śvitneṣu viṃśatim śatā

original: RV_8,046.32a śataṃ dāse balbūthe vipras tarukṣa ā dade /
analyzed: śatam dāse balbūthe vipraḥ tarukṣe ā dade

original: RV_8,046.32c te te vāyav ime janā madantīndragopā madanti devagopāḥ //
analyzed: te te vāyo ime janāḥ madanti indra gopāḥ madanti deva gopāḥ

original: RV_8,046.33a adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī pratīcī vaśam aśvyam /
analyzed: adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī pratīcī vaśam aśvyam

original: RV_8,046.33c adhirukmā vi nīyate //
analyzed: adhirukmā vi nīyate

original: RV_8,047.01a mahi vo mahatām avo varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe /
analyzed: mahi vaḥ mahatām avaḥ varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,047.01c yam ādityā abhi druho rakṣathā nem aghaṃ naśad anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: yam ādityāḥ abhi druhaḥ rakṣatha na īm agham naśat anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.02a vidā devā aghānām ādityāso apākṛtim /
analyzed: vida devāḥ aghānām ādityāsaḥ apākṛtim

original: RV_8,047.02c pakṣā vayo yathopari vy asme śarma yacchatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: pakṣā vayaḥ yathā upari vi asme śarma yacchata anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.03a vy asme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayo na yantana /
analyzed: vi asme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayaḥ na yantana

original: RV_8,047.03c viśvāni viśvavedaso varūthyā manāmahe 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāni viśva vedasaḥ varūthyā manāmahe nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.04a yasmā arāsata kṣayaṃ jīvātuṃ ca pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: yasmai arāsata kṣayam jīvātum ca pracetasaḥ

original: RV_8,047.04c manor viśvasya ghed ima ādityā rāya īśate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: manoḥ viśvasya gha id ime ādityāḥ rāyaḥ īśate nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.05a pari ṇo vṛṇajann aghā durgāṇi rathyo yathā /
analyzed: pari naḥ vṛṇajan aghā durgāṇi rathyaḥ yathā

original: RV_8,047.05c syāmed indrasya śarmaṇy ādityānām utāvasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: syāma id indrasya śarmaṇi ādityānām uta avasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.06a parihvṛted anā jano yuṣmādattasya vāyati /
analyzed: parihvṛtā id anā janaḥ yuṣmādattasya vāyati

original: RV_8,047.06c devā adabhram āśa vo yam ādityā ahetanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ adabhram āśa vaḥ yam ādityāḥ ahetana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.07a na taṃ tigmaṃ cana tyajo na drāsad abhi taṃ guru /
analyzed: na tam tigmam cana tyajaḥ na drāsat abhi tam guru

original: RV_8,047.07c yasmā u śarma sapratha ādityāso arādhvam anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: yasmai u śarma saprathaḥ ādityāsaḥ arādhvam anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.08a yuṣme devā api ṣmasi yudhyanta iva varmasu /
analyzed: yuṣme devāḥ api smasi yudhyantaḥ iva varmasu

original: RV_8,047.08c yūyam maho na enaso yūyam arbhād uruṣyatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: yūyam mahaḥ naḥ enasaḥ yūyam arbhāt uruṣyata anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.09a aditir na uruṣyatv aditiḥ śarma yacchatu /
analyzed: aditiḥ naḥ uruṣyatu aditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_8,047.09c mātā mitrasya revato 'ryamṇo varuṇasya cānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: mātā mitrasya revataḥ ryamṇaḥ varuṇasya ca anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.10a yad devāḥ śarma śaraṇaṃ yad bhadraṃ yad anāturam /
analyzed: yat devāḥ śarma śaraṇam yat bhadram yat anāturam

original: RV_8,047.10c tridhātu yad varūthyaṃ tad asmāsu vi yantanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: tri dhātu yat varūthyam tat asmāsu vi yantana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.11a ādityā ava hi khyatādhi kūlād iva spaśaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ ava hi khyata adhi kūlāt iva spaśaḥ

original: RV_8,047.11c sutīrtham arvato yathānu no neṣathā sugam anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: su tīrtham arvataḥ yathā anu naḥ neṣatha sugam anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.12a neha bhadraṃ rakṣasvine nāvayai nopayā uta /
analyzed: na iha bhadram rakṣasvine na avayai na upayai uta

original: RV_8,047.12c gave ca bhadraṃ dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: gave ca bhadram dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.13a yad āvir yad apīcyaṃ devāso asti duṣkṛtam /
analyzed: yat āvis yat apīcyam devāsaḥ asti duṣkṛtam

original: RV_8,047.13c trite tad viśvam āptya āre asmad dadhātanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: trite tat viśvam āptye āre asmat dadhātana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.14a yac ca goṣu duṣṣvapnyaṃ yac cāsme duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: yat ca goṣu duṣṣvapnyam yat ca asme duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_8,047.14c tritāya tad vibhāvary āptyāya parā vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: tritāya tat vibhāvari āptyāya parā vaha anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.15a niṣkaṃ vā ghā kṛṇavate srajaṃ vā duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: niṣkam vā gha kṛṇavate srajam vā duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_8,047.15c trite duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye pari dadmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: trite duṣṣvapnyam sarvam āptye pari dadmasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.16a tadannāya tadapase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe /
analyzed: tad annāya tad apase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe

original: RV_8,047.16c tritāya ca dvitāya coṣo duṣṣvapnyaṃ vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: tritāya ca dvitāya ca uṣaḥ duṣṣvapnyam vaha anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.17a yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatha ṛṇaṃ saṃnayāmasi /
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam saṃnayāmasi

original: RV_8,047.17c evā duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye saṃ nayāmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: eva duṣṣvapnyam sarvam āptye sam nayāmasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.18a ajaiṣmādyāsanāma cābhūmānāgaso vayam /
analyzed: ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam

original: RV_8,047.18c uṣo yasmād duṣṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa tad ucchatv anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: uṣaḥ yasmāt duṣṣvapnyāt abhaiṣma apa tat ucchatu anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,048.01a svādor abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyo varivovittarasya /
analyzed: svādoḥ abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyaḥ varivaḥ vittarasya

original: RV_8,048.01c viśve yaṃ devā uta martyāso madhu bruvanto abhi saṃcaranti //
analyzed: viśve yam devāḥ uta martyāsaḥ madhu bruvantaḥ abhi saṃcaranti

original: RV_8,048.02a antaś ca prāgā aditir bhavāsy avayātā haraso daivyasya /
analyzed: antar ca prāgāḥ aditiḥ bhavāsi avayātā harasaḥ daivyasya

original: RV_8,048.02c indav indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭīva dhuram anu rāya ṛdhyāḥ //
analyzed: indo indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭī iva dhuram anu rāyaḥ ṛdhyāḥ

original: RV_8,048.03a apāma somam amṛtā abhūmāganma jyotir avidāma devān /
analyzed: apāma somam amṛtāḥ abhūma aganma jyotiḥ avidāma devān

original: RV_8,048.03c kiṃ nūnam asmān kṛṇavad arātiḥ kim u dhūrtir amṛta martyasya //
analyzed: kim nūnam asmān kṛṇavat arātiḥ kim u dhūrtiḥ amṛta martyasya

original: RV_8,048.04a śaṃ no bhava hṛda ā pīta indo piteva soma sūnave suśevaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhava hṛde ā pītaḥ indo pitā iva soma sūnave su śevaḥ

original: RV_8,048.04c sakheva sakhya uruśaṃsa dhīraḥ pra ṇa āyur jīvase soma tārīḥ //
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye uru śaṃsa dhīraḥ pra naḥ āyuḥ jīvase soma tārīḥ

original: RV_8,048.05a ime mā pītā yaśasa uruṣyavo rathaṃ na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu /
analyzed: ime mā pītāḥ yaśasaḥ uruṣyavaḥ ratham na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu

original: RV_8,048.05c te mā rakṣantu visrasaś caritrād uta mā srāmād yavayantv indavaḥ //
analyzed: te mā rakṣantu visrasaḥ caritrāt uta mā srāmāt yavayantu indavaḥ

original: RV_8,048.06a agniṃ na mā mathitaṃ saṃ didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyaso naḥ /
analyzed: agnim na mā mathitam sam didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ

original: RV_8,048.06c athā hi te mada ā soma manye revāṃ iva pra carā puṣṭim accha //
analyzed: athā hi te made ā soma manye revān iva pra cara puṣṭim accha

original: RV_8,048.07a iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasyeva rāyaḥ /
analyzed: iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasya iva rāyaḥ

original: RV_8,048.07c soma rājan pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tārīr ahānīva sūryo vāsarāṇi //
analyzed: soma rājan pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tārīḥ ahāni iva sūryaḥ vāsarāṇi

original: RV_8,048.08a soma rājan mṛḷayā naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyās tasya viddhi /
analyzed: soma rājan mṛḍaya naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyāḥ tasya viddhi

original: RV_8,048.08c alarti dakṣa uta manyur indo mā no aryo anukāmam parā dāḥ //
analyzed: alarti dakṣaḥ uta manyuḥ indo mā naḥ aryaḥ anukāmam parā dāḥ

original: RV_8,048.09a tvaṃ hi nas tanvaḥ soma gopā gātre-gātre niṣasatthā nṛcakṣāḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ tanvaḥ soma gopāḥ gātre gātre niṣasattha nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_8,048.09c yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa no mṛḷa suṣakhā deva vasyaḥ //
analyzed: yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa naḥ mṛḍa su sakhā deva vasyaḥ

original: RV_8,048.10a ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yo mā na riṣyed dharyaśva pītaḥ /
analyzed: ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yaḥ mā na riṣyet hari aśva pītaḥ

original: RV_8,048.10c ayaṃ yaḥ somo ny adhāyy asme tasmā indram pratiram emy āyuḥ //
analyzed: ayam yaḥ somaḥ ni adhāyi asme tasmai indram pratiram emi āyuḥ

original: RV_8,048.11a apa tyā asthur anirā amīvā nir atrasan tamiṣīcīr abhaiṣuḥ /
analyzed: apa tyāḥ asthuḥ anirāḥ amīvāḥ niḥ atrasan tamiṣīcīḥ abhaiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,048.11c ā somo asmāṃ aruhad vihāyā aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: ā somaḥ asmān aruhat vihāyāḥ aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ

original: RV_8,048.12a yo na induḥ pitaro hṛtsu pīto 'martyo martyāṃ āviveśa /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ induḥ pitaraḥ hṛtsu pītaḥ martyaḥ martyān āviveśa

original: RV_8,048.12c tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma //
analyzed: tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma

original: RV_8,048.13a tvaṃ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha /
analyzed: tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha

original: RV_8,048.13c tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: tasmai te indo haviṣā vidhema vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_8,048.14a trātāro devā adhi vocatā no mā no nidrā īśata mota jalpiḥ /
analyzed: trātāraḥ devāḥ adhi vocata naḥ mā naḥ nidrā īśata mā uta jalpiḥ

original: RV_8,048.14c vayaṃ somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
analyzed: vayam somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema

original: RV_8,048.15a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato vayodhās tvaṃ svarvid ā viśā nṛcakṣāḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas vayaḥ dhāḥ tvam svar vid ā viśa nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_8,048.15c tvaṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātād uta vā purastāt //
analyzed: tvam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātāt uta vā purastāt

original: RV_8,049.01a abhi pra vaḥ surādhasam indram arca yathā vide /
analyzed: abhi pra vaḥ su rādhasam indram arca yathā vide

original: RV_8,049.01c yo jaritṛbhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati //
analyzed: yaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇa iva śikṣati

original: RV_8,049.02a śatānīkeva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: śata anīkā iva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,049.02c girer iva pra rasā asya pinvire datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ //
analyzed: gireḥ iva pra rasāḥ asya pinvire datrāṇi puru bhojasaḥ

original: RV_8,049.03a ā tvā sutāsa indavo madā ya indra girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā sutāsaḥ indavaḥ madāḥ ye indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,049.03c āpo na vajrinn anv okyaṃ saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase //
analyzed: āpaḥ na vajrin anu okyam saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase

original: RV_8,049.04a anehasam prataraṇaṃ vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ svādiṣṭham īm piba /
analyzed: anehasam prataraṇam vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ svādiṣṭham īm piba

original: RV_8,049.04c ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudreva tmanā dhṛṣat //
analyzed: ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudrā iva tmanā dhṛṣat

original: RV_8,049.05a ā na stomam upa dravad dhiyāno aśvo na sotṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ stomam upa dravat dhiyānaḥ aśvaḥ na sotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_8,049.05c yaṃ te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenava indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ //
analyzed: yam te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenavaḥ indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,049.06a ugraṃ na vīraṃ namasopa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum /
analyzed: ugram na vīram namasā upa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum

original: RV_8,049.06c udrīva vajrinn avato na siñcate kṣarantīndra dhītayaḥ //
analyzed: udrī iva vajrin avataḥ na siñcate kṣaranti indra dhītayaḥ

original: RV_8,049.07a yad dha nūnaṃ yad vā yajñe yad vā pṛthivyām adhi /
analyzed: yat ha nūnam yat vā yajñe yat vā pṛthivyām adhi

original: RV_8,049.07c ato no yajñam āśubhir mahemata ugra ugrebhir ā gahi //
analyzed: atas naḥ yajñam āśubhiḥ mahemate ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,049.08a ajirāso harayo ye ta āśavo vātā iva prasakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ajirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te āśavaḥ vātāḥ iva prasakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_8,049.08c yebhir apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhir viśvaṃ svar dṛśe //
analyzed: yebhiḥ apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhiḥ viśvam svar dṛśe

original: RV_8,049.09a etāvatas ta īmaha indra sumnasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: etāvataḥ te īmahe indra sumnasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,049.09c yathā prāvo maghavan medhyātithiṃ yathā nīpātithiṃ dhane //
analyzed: yathā prāvaḥ maghavan medhyātithim yathā nīpātithim dhane

original: RV_8,049.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje /
analyzed: yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje

original: RV_8,049.10c yathā gośarye asanor ṛjiśvanīndra gomad dhiraṇyavat //
analyzed: yathā gośarye asanoḥ ṛjiśvani indra gomat hiraṇyavat

original: RV_8,050.01a pra su śrutaṃ surādhasam arcā śakram abhiṣṭaye /
analyzed: pra su śrutam su rādhasam arca śakram abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,050.01c yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate //
analyzed: yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyam vasu sahasreṇa iva maṃhate

original: RV_8,050.02a śatānīkā hetayo asya duṣṭarā indrasya samiṣo mahīḥ /
analyzed: śata anīkāḥ hetayaḥ asya duṣṭarāḥ indrasya samiṣaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_8,050.02c girir na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yad īṃ sutā amandiṣuḥ //
analyzed: giriḥ na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yat īm sutāḥ amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,050.03a yad īṃ sutāsa indavo 'bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ /
analyzed: yat īm sutāsaḥ indavaḥ bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,050.03c āpo na dhāyi savanam ma ā vaso dughā ivopa dāśuṣe //
analyzed: āpaḥ na dhāyi savanam me ā vaso dughāḥ iva upa dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,050.04a anehasaṃ vo havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: anehasam vaḥ havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ

original: RV_8,050.04c ā tvā vaso havamānāsa indava upa stotreṣu dadhire //
analyzed: ā tvā vaso havamānāsaḥ indavaḥ upa stotreṣu dadhire

original: RV_8,050.05a ā naḥ some svadhvara iyāno atyo na tośate /
analyzed: ā naḥ some su adhvare iyānaḥ atyaḥ na tośate

original: RV_8,050.05c yaṃ te svadāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam //
analyzed: yam te sva dāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam

original: RV_8,050.06a pra vīram ugraṃ viviciṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ vibhūtiṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: pra vīram ugram vivicim dhana spṛtam vibhūtim rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_8,050.06c udrīva vajrinn avato vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe //
analyzed: udrī iva vajrin avataḥ vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,050.07a yad dha nūnam parāvati yad vā pṛthivyāṃ divi /
analyzed: yat ha nūnam parāvati yat vā pṛthivyām divi

original: RV_8,050.07c yujāna indra haribhir mahemata ṛṣva ṛṣvebhir ā gahi //
analyzed: yujānaḥ indra haribhiḥ mahemate ṛṣvaḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,050.08a rathirāso harayo ye te asridha ojo vātasya piprati /
analyzed: rathirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te asridhaḥ ojaḥ vātasya piprati

original: RV_8,050.08c yebhir ni dasyum manuṣo nighoṣayo yebhiḥ svaḥ parīyase //
analyzed: yebhiḥ ni dasyum manuṣaḥ nighoṣayaḥ yebhiḥ svar parīyase

original: RV_8,050.09a etāvatas te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ /
analyzed: etāvataḥ te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ

original: RV_8,050.09c yathā prāva etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśaṃ daśavraje //
analyzed: yathā prāvaḥ etaśam kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśam daśavraje

original: RV_8,050.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrghanīthe damūnasi /
analyzed: yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrgha nīthe damūnasi
