original: RV_8,077.01a jajñāno nu śatakratur vi pṛcchad iti mātaram /
analyzed: jajñānaḥ nu śatakratuḥ vi pṛcchat iti mātaram

original: RV_8,077.01c ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire //
analyzed: ke ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire

original: RV_8,077.02a ād īṃ śavasy abravīd aurṇavābham ahīśuvam /
analyzed: āt īm śavasi abravīt aurṇavābham ahīśuvam

original: RV_8,077.02c te putra santu niṣṭuraḥ //
analyzed: te putra santu niṣṭuraḥ

original: RV_8,077.03a sam it tān vṛtrahākhidat khe arāṃ iva khedayā /
analyzed: sam id tān vṛtrahā akhidat khe arān iva khedayā

original: RV_8,077.03c pravṛddho dasyuhābhavat //
analyzed: pravṛddhaḥ dasyu hā abhavat

original: RV_8,077.04a ekayā pratidhāpibat sākaṃ sarāṃsi triṃśatam /
analyzed: ekayā pratidhāpibat sākam sarāṃsi triṃśatam

original: RV_8,077.04c indraḥ somasya kāṇukā //
analyzed: indraḥ somasya kāṇukā

original: RV_8,077.05a abhi gandharvam atṛṇad abudhneṣu rajassv ā /
analyzed: abhi gandharvam atṛṇat abudhneṣu rajassu ā

original: RV_8,077.05c indro brahmabhya id vṛdhe //
analyzed: indraḥ brahmabhyaḥ id vṛdhe

original: RV_8,077.06a nir āvidhyad giribhya ā dhārayat pakvam odanam /
analyzed: niḥ āvidhyat giribhyaḥ ā dhārayat pakvam odanam

original: RV_8,077.06c indro bundaṃ svātatam //
analyzed: indraḥ bundam su ātatam

original: RV_8,077.07a śatabradhna iṣus tava sahasraparṇa eka it /
analyzed: śata bradhnaḥ iṣuḥ tava sahasra parṇaḥ ekaḥ id

original: RV_8,077.07c yam indra cakṛṣe yujam //
analyzed: yam indra cakṛṣe yujam

original: RV_8,077.08a tena stotṛbhya ā bhara nṛbhyo nāribhyo attave /
analyzed: tena stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara nṛbhyaḥ nāribhyaḥ attave

original: RV_8,077.08c sadyo jāta ṛbhuṣṭhira //
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ ṛbhuṣṭhira

original: RV_8,077.09a etā cyautnāni te kṛtā varṣiṣṭhāni parīṇasā /
analyzed: etā cyautnāni te kṛtā varṣiṣṭhāni parīṇasā

original: RV_8,077.09c hṛdā vīḍv adhārayaḥ //
analyzed: hṛdā vīḍu adhārayaḥ

original: RV_8,077.10a viśvet tā viṣṇur ābharad urukramas tveṣitaḥ /
analyzed: viśvā id tā viṣṇuḥ ābharat uru kramaḥ tveṣitaḥ

original: RV_8,077.10c śatam mahiṣān kṣīrapākam odanaṃ varāham indra emuṣam //
analyzed: śatam mahiṣān kṣīra pākam odanam varāham indraḥ emuṣam

original: RV_8,077.11a tuvikṣaṃ te sukṛtaṃ sūmayaṃ dhanuḥ sādhur bundo hiraṇyayaḥ /
analyzed: tuvikṣam te su kṛtam sūmayam dhanuḥ sādhuḥ bundaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_8,077.11c ubhā te bāhū raṇyā susaṃskṛta ṛdūpe cid ṛdūvṛdhā //
analyzed: ubhā te bāhū raṇyā su saṃskṛte ṛdūpe cit ṛdūvṛdhā

original: RV_8,078.01a puroḷāśaṃ no andhasa indra sahasram ā bhara /
analyzed: puroḷāśam naḥ andhasaḥ indra sahasram ā bhara

original: RV_8,078.01c śatā ca śūra gonām //
analyzed: śatā ca śūra gonām

original: RV_8,078.02a ā no bhara vyañjanaṃ gām aśvam abhyañjanam /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara vyañjanam gām aśvam abhyañjanam

original: RV_8,078.02c sacā manā hiraṇyayā //
analyzed: sacā manā hiraṇyayā

original: RV_8,078.03a uta naḥ karṇaśobhanā purūṇi dhṛṣṇav ā bhara /
analyzed: uta naḥ karṇa śobhanā purūṇi dhṛṣṇo ā bhara

original: RV_8,078.03c tvaṃ hi śṛṇviṣe vaso //
analyzed: tvam hi śṛṇviṣe vaso

original: RV_8,078.04a nakīṃ vṛdhīka indra te na suṣā na sudā uta /
analyzed: nakīm vṛdhīkaḥ indra te na su sāḥ na su dāḥ uta

original: RV_8,078.04c nānyas tvac chūra vāghataḥ //
analyzed: na anyaḥ tvat śūra vāghataḥ

original: RV_8,078.05a nakīm indro nikartave na śakraḥ pariśaktave /
analyzed: nakīm indraḥ nikartave na śakraḥ pariśaktave

original: RV_8,078.05c viśvaṃ śṛṇoti paśyati //
analyzed: viśvam śṛṇoti paśyati

original: RV_8,078.06a sa manyum martyānām adabdho ni cikīṣate /
analyzed: sa manyum martyānām adabdhaḥ ni cikīṣate

original: RV_8,078.06c purā nidaś cikīṣate //
analyzed: purā nidaḥ cikīṣate

original: RV_8,078.07a kratva it pūrṇam udaraṃ turasyāsti vidhataḥ /
analyzed: kratvaḥ id pūrṇam udaram turasya asti vidhataḥ

original: RV_8,078.07c vṛtraghnaḥ somapāvnaḥ //
analyzed: vṛtra ghnaḥ soma pāvnaḥ

original: RV_8,078.08a tve vasūni saṃgatā viśvā ca soma saubhagā /
analyzed: tve vasūni saṃgatā viśvā ca soma saubhagā

original: RV_8,078.08c sudātv aparihvṛtā //
analyzed: su dātu aparihvṛtā

original: RV_8,078.09a tvām id yavayur mama kāmo gavyur hiraṇyayuḥ /
analyzed: tvām id yavayuḥ mama kāmaḥ gavyuḥ hiraṇyayuḥ

original: RV_8,078.09c tvām aśvayur eṣate //
analyzed: tvām aśvayuḥ eṣate

original: RV_8,078.10a taved indrāham āśasā haste dātraṃ canā dade /
analyzed: tava id indra aham āśasā haste dātram cana ā dade

original: RV_8,078.10c dinasya vā maghavan sambhṛtasya vā pūrdhi yavasya kāśinā //
analyzed: dinasya vā maghavan sambhṛtasya vā pūrdhi yavasya kāśinā

original: RV_8,079.01a ayaṃ kṛtnur agṛbhīto viśvajid udbhid it somaḥ /
analyzed: ayam kṛtnuḥ a gṛbhītaḥ viśva jit udbhid id somaḥ

original: RV_8,079.01c ṛṣir vipraḥ kāvyena //
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ kāvyena

original: RV_8,079.02a abhy ūrṇoti yan nagnam bhiṣakti viśvaṃ yat turam /
analyzed: abhi ūrṇoti yat nagnam viśvam yat turam

original: RV_8,079.02c prem andhaḥ khyan niḥ śroṇo bhūt //
analyzed: pra īm andhaḥ khyat niḥ śroṇaḥ bhūt

original: RV_8,079.03a tvaṃ soma tanūkṛdbhyo dveṣobhyo 'nyakṛtebhyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam soma tanū kṛdbhyaḥ dveṣobhyaḥ nya kṛtebhyaḥ

original: RV_8,079.03c uru yantāsi varūtham //
analyzed: uru yantāsi varūtham

original: RV_8,079.04a tvaṃ cittī tava dakṣair diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣin /
analyzed: tvam cittī tava dakṣaiḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ ṛjīṣin

original: RV_8,079.04c yāvīr aghasya cid dveṣaḥ //
analyzed: yāvīḥ aghasya cit dveṣaḥ

original: RV_8,079.05a arthino yanti ced arthaṃ gacchān id daduṣo rātim /
analyzed: arthinaḥ yanti ced artham gacchān id daduṣaḥ rātim

original: RV_8,079.05c vavṛjyus tṛṣyataḥ kāmam //
analyzed: vavṛjyuḥ tṛṣyataḥ kāmam

original: RV_8,079.06a vidad yat pūrvyaṃ naṣṭam ud īm ṛtāyum īrayat /
analyzed: vidat yat pūrvyam naṣṭam ud īm ṛtāyum īrayat

original: RV_8,079.06c prem āyus tārīd atīrṇam //
analyzed: pra īm āyuḥ tārīt a tīrṇam

original: RV_8,079.07a suśevo no mṛḷayākur adṛptakratur avātaḥ /
analyzed: su śevaḥ naḥ mṛḍayākuḥ adṛpta kratuḥ a vātaḥ

original: RV_8,079.07c bhavā naḥ soma śaṃ hṛde //
analyzed: bhava naḥ soma śam hṛde

original: RV_8,079.08a mā naḥ soma saṃ vīvijo mā vi bībhiṣathā rājan /
analyzed: mā naḥ soma sam vīvijaḥ mā vi bībhiṣathāḥ rājan

original: RV_8,079.08c mā no hārdi tviṣā vadhīḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ hārdi tviṣā vadhīḥ

original: RV_8,079.09a ava yat sve sadhasthe devānāṃ durmatīr īkṣe /
analyzed: ava yat sve sadhasthe devānām durmatīḥ īkṣe

original: RV_8,079.09c rājann apa dviṣaḥ sedha mīḍhvo apa sridhaḥ sedha //
analyzed: rājan apa dviṣaḥ sedha mīḍhvaḥ apa sridhaḥ sedha

original: RV_8,080.01a nahy anyam baḷākaram marḍitāraṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: nahi anyam baḷākaram marḍitāram śatakrato

original: RV_8,080.01c tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra mṛḍaya

original: RV_8,080.02a yo naḥ śaśvat purāvithāmṛdhro vājasātaye /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ śaśvat purāvitha a mṛdhraḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_8,080.02c sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra mṛḍaya

original: RV_8,080.03a kim aṅga radhracodanaḥ sunvānasyāvited asi /
analyzed: kim aṅga radhra codanaḥ sunvānasya avitā id asi

original: RV_8,080.03c kuvit sv indra ṇaḥ śakaḥ //
analyzed: kuvid su indra naḥ śakaḥ

original: RV_8,080.04a indra pra ṇo ratham ava paścāc cit santam adrivaḥ /
analyzed: indra pra naḥ ratham ava paścāt cit santam adrivas

original: RV_8,080.04c purastād enam me kṛdhi //
analyzed: purastāt enam me kṛdhi

original: RV_8,080.05a hanto nu kim āsase prathamaṃ no rathaṃ kṛdhi /
analyzed: hanta u nu kim āsase prathamam naḥ ratham kṛdhi

original: RV_8,080.05c upamaṃ vājayu śravaḥ //
analyzed: upamam vājayu śravaḥ

original: RV_8,080.06a avā no vājayuṃ rathaṃ sukaraṃ te kim it pari /
analyzed: ava naḥ vājayum ratham sukaram te kim id pari

original: RV_8,080.06c asmān su jigyuṣas kṛdhi //
analyzed: asmān su jigyuṣaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_8,080.07a indra dṛhyasva pūr asi bhadrā ta eti niṣkṛtam /
analyzed: indra dṛhyasva pūḥ asi bhadrā te eti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_8,080.07c iyaṃ dhīr ṛtviyāvatī //
analyzed: iyam dhīḥ ṛtviyāvatī

original: RV_8,080.08a mā sīm avadya ā bhāg urvī kāṣṭhā hitaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: mā sīm avadyaḥ ā bhāk urvī kāṣṭhā hitam dhanam

original: RV_8,080.08c apāvṛktā aratnayaḥ //
analyzed: apāvṛktāḥ aratnayaḥ

original: RV_8,080.09a turīyaṃ nāma yajñiyaṃ yadā karas tad uśmasi /
analyzed: turīyam nāma yajñiyam yadā karaḥ tat uśmasi

original: RV_8,080.09c ād it patir na ohase //
analyzed: āt id patiḥ naḥ ohase

original: RV_8,080.10a avīvṛdhad vo amṛtā amandīd ekadyūr devā uta yāś ca devīḥ /
analyzed: avīvṛdhat vaḥ amṛtāḥ amandīt ekadyūḥ devāḥ uta yāḥ ca devīḥ

original: RV_8,080.10c tasmā u rādhaḥ kṛṇuta praśastam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: tasmai u rādhaḥ kṛṇuta praśastam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_8,081.01a ā tū na indra kṣumantaṃ citraṃ grābhaṃ saṃ gṛbhāya /
analyzed: ā tu naḥ indra kṣumantam citram grābham sam gṛbhāya

original: RV_8,081.01c mahāhastī dakṣiṇena //
analyzed: mahā hastī dakṣiṇena

original: RV_8,081.02a vidmā hi tvā tuvikūrmiṃ tuvideṣṇaṃ tuvīmagham /
analyzed: vidma hi tvā tuvikūrmim tuvi deṣṇam tuvīmagham

original: RV_8,081.02c tuvimātram avobhiḥ //
analyzed: tuvimātram avobhiḥ

original: RV_8,081.03a nahi tvā śūra devā na martāso ditsantam /
analyzed: nahi tvā śūra devāḥ na martāsaḥ ditsantam

original: RV_8,081.03c bhīmaṃ na gāṃ vārayante //
analyzed: bhīmam na gām vārayante

original: RV_8,081.04a eto nv indraṃ stavāmeśānaṃ vasvaḥ svarājam /
analyzed: eta u nu indram stavāma īśānam vasvaḥ sva rājam

original: RV_8,081.04c na rādhasā mardhiṣan naḥ //
analyzed: na rādhasā mardhiṣat naḥ

original: RV_8,081.05a pra stoṣad upa gāsiṣac chravat sāma gīyamānam /
analyzed: pra stoṣat upa gāsiṣat śravat sāma gīyamānam

original: RV_8,081.05c abhi rādhasā jugurat //
analyzed: abhi rādhasā jugurat

original: RV_8,081.06a ā no bhara dakṣiṇenābhi savyena pra mṛśa /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara dakṣiṇena abhi savyena pra mṛśa

original: RV_8,081.06c indra mā no vasor nir bhāk //
analyzed: indra mā naḥ vasoḥ niḥ bhāk

original: RV_8,081.07a upa kramasvā bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo janānām /
analyzed: upa kramasva ā bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo janānām

original: RV_8,081.07c adāśūṣṭarasya vedaḥ //
analyzed: a dāśūṣṭarasya vedaḥ

original: RV_8,081.08a indra ya u nu te asti vājo viprebhiḥ sanitvaḥ /
analyzed: indra yaḥ u nu te asti vājaḥ viprebhiḥ sanitvaḥ

original: RV_8,081.08c asmābhiḥ su taṃ sanuhi //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ su tam sanuhi

original: RV_8,081.09a sadyojuvas te vājā asmabhyaṃ viśvaścandrāḥ /
analyzed: sadyas juvaḥ te vājāḥ asmabhyam viśva ścandrāḥ

original: RV_8,081.09c vaśaiś ca makṣū jarante //
analyzed: vaśaiḥ ca makṣū jarante

original: RV_8,082.01a ā pra drava parāvato 'rvāvataś ca vṛtrahan /
analyzed: ā pra drava parāvataḥ rvāvataḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,082.01c madhvaḥ prati prabharmaṇi //
analyzed: madhvaḥ prati prabharmaṇi

original: RV_8,082.02a tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahi sutāso mādayiṣṇavaḥ /
analyzed: tīvrāḥ somāsaḥ ā gahi sutāsaḥ mādayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_8,082.02c pibā dadhṛg yathociṣe //
analyzed: pibā dadhṛṣ yathā ūciṣe

original: RV_8,082.03a iṣā mandasvād u te 'raṃ varāya manyave /
analyzed: iṣā mandasva āt u te raṃ varāya manyave

original: RV_8,082.03c bhuvat ta indra śaṃ hṛde //
analyzed: bhuvat te indra śam hṛde

original: RV_8,082.04a ā tv aśatrav ā gahi ny ukthāni ca hūyase /
analyzed: ā tu a śatro ā gahi ni ukthāni ca hūyase

original: RV_8,082.04c upame rocane divaḥ //
analyzed: upame rocane divaḥ

original: RV_8,082.05a tubhyāyam adribhiḥ suto gobhiḥ śrīto madāya kam /
analyzed: tubhya ayam adribhiḥ sutaḥ gobhiḥ śrītaḥ madāya kam

original: RV_8,082.05c pra soma indra hūyate //
analyzed: pra somaḥ indra hūyate

original: RV_8,082.06a indra śrudhi su me havam asme sutasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: indra śrudhi su me havam asme sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,082.06c vi pītiṃ tṛptim aśnuhi //
analyzed: vi pītim tṛptim aśnuhi

original: RV_8,082.07a ya indra camaseṣv ā somaś camūṣu te sutaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ indra camaseṣu ā somaḥ camūṣu te sutaḥ

original: RV_8,082.07c pibed asya tvam īśiṣe //
analyzed: piba id asya tvam īśiṣe

original: RV_8,082.08a yo apsu candramā iva somaś camūṣu dadṛśe /
analyzed: yaḥ apsu candramāḥ iva somaḥ camūṣu dadṛśe

original: RV_8,082.08c pibed asya tvam īśiṣe //
analyzed: piba id asya tvam īśiṣe

original: RV_8,082.09a yaṃ te śyenaḥ padābharat tiro rajāṃsy aspṛtam /
analyzed: yam te śyenaḥ padā abharat tiras rajāṃsi a spṛtam

original: RV_8,082.09c pibed asya tvam īśiṣe //
analyzed: piba id asya tvam īśiṣe

original: RV_8,083.01a devānām id avo mahat tad ā vṛṇīmahe vayam /
analyzed: devānām id avaḥ mahat tat ā vṛṇīmahe vayam

original: RV_8,083.01c vṛṣṇām asmabhyam ūtaye //
analyzed: vṛṣṇām asmabhyam ūtaye

original: RV_8,083.02a te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_8,083.02c vṛdhāsaś ca pracetasaḥ //
analyzed: vṛdhāsaḥ ca pracetasaḥ

original: RV_8,083.03a ati no viṣpitā puru naubhir apo na parṣatha /
analyzed: ati naḥ viṣpitā puru naubhiḥ apaḥ na parṣatha

original: RV_8,083.03c yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ //
analyzed: yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ

original: RV_8,083.04a vāmaṃ no astv aryaman vāmaṃ varuṇa śaṃsyam /
analyzed: vāmam naḥ astu aryaman vāmam varuṇa śaṃsyam

original: RV_8,083.04c vāmaṃ hy āvṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: vāmam hi āvṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,083.05a vāmasya hi pracetasa īśānāśo riśādasaḥ /
analyzed: vāmasya hi pracetasaḥ īśāna āśaḥ riśādasaḥ

original: RV_8,083.05c nem ādityā aghasya yat //
analyzed: na īm ādityāḥ aghasya yat

original: RV_8,083.06a vayam id vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyanto yānto adhvann ā /
analyzed: vayam id vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyantaḥ yāntaḥ adhvan ā

original: RV_8,083.06c devā vṛdhāya hūmahe //
analyzed: devāḥ vṛdhāya hūmahe

original: RV_8,083.07a adhi na indraiṣāṃ viṣṇo sajātyānām /
analyzed: adhi naḥ indra eṣām viṣṇo sajātyānām

original: RV_8,083.07c itā maruto aśvinā //
analyzed: ita marutaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,083.08a pra bhrātṛtvaṃ sudānavo 'dha dvitā samānyā /
analyzed: pra bhrātṛ tvam sudānavaḥ dha dvitā samānyā

original: RV_8,083.08c mātur garbhe bharāmahe //
analyzed: mātuḥ garbhe bharāmahe

original: RV_8,083.09a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ /
analyzed: yūyam hi stha sudānavaḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_8,083.09c adhā cid va uta bruve //
analyzed: adhā cit vaḥ uta bruve

original: RV_8,084.01a preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ stuṣe mitram iva priyam /
analyzed: preṣṭham vaḥ atithim stuṣe mitram iva priyam

original: RV_8,084.01c agniṃ rathaṃ na vedyam //
analyzed: agnim ratham na vedyam

original: RV_8,084.02a kavim iva pracetasaṃ yaṃ devāso adha dvitā /
analyzed: kavim iva pracetasam yam devāsaḥ adha dvitā

original: RV_8,084.02c ni martyeṣv ādadhuḥ //
analyzed: ni martyeṣu ādadhuḥ

original: RV_8,084.03a tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣo nṝṃḥ pāhi śṛṇudhī giraḥ /
analyzed: tvam yaviṣṭha dāśuṣaḥ nṝn pāhi śṛṇudhi giraḥ

original: RV_8,084.03c rakṣā tokam uta tmanā //
analyzed: rakṣā tokam uta tmanā

original: RV_8,084.04a kayā te agne aṅgira ūrjo napād upastutim /
analyzed: kayā te agne aṅgiraḥ ūrjaḥ napāt upastutim

original: RV_8,084.04c varāya deva manyave //
analyzed: varāya deva manyave

original: RV_8,084.05a dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahaso yaho /
analyzed: dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_8,084.05c kad u voca idaṃ namaḥ //
analyzed: kad u voce idam namaḥ

original: RV_8,084.06a adhā tvaṃ hi nas karo viśvā asmabhyaṃ sukṣitīḥ /
analyzed: adhā tvam hi naḥ karaḥ viśvāḥ asmabhyam su kṣitīḥ

original: RV_8,084.06c vājadraviṇaso giraḥ //
analyzed: vāja draviṇasaḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,084.07a kasya nūnam parīṇaso dhiyo jinvasi dampate /
analyzed: kasya nūnam parīṇasaḥ dhiyaḥ jinvasi dampate

original: RV_8,084.07c goṣātā yasya te giraḥ //
analyzed: goṣātā yasya te giraḥ

original: RV_8,084.08a tam marjayanta sukratum puroyāvānam ājiṣu /
analyzed: tam marjayanta sukratum puras yāvānam ājiṣu

original: RV_8,084.08c sveṣu kṣayeṣu vājinam //
analyzed: sveṣu kṣayeṣu vājinam

original: RV_8,084.09a kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhir nakir yaṃ ghnanti hanti yaḥ /
analyzed: kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhiḥ nakir yam ghnanti hanti yaḥ

original: RV_8,084.09c agne suvīra edhate //
analyzed: agne su vīraḥ edhate

original: RV_8,085.01a ā me havaṃ nāsatyāśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam /
analyzed: ā me havam nāsatyā aśvinā gacchatam yuvam

original: RV_8,085.01c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.02a imam me stomam aśvinemam me śṛṇutaṃ havam /
analyzed: imam me stomam aśvinā imam me śṛṇutam havam

original: RV_8,085.02c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.03a ayaṃ vāṃ kṛṣṇo aśvinā havate vājinīvasū /
analyzed: ayam vām kṛṣṇaḥ aśvinā havate vājinīvasū

original: RV_8,085.03c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.04a śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havaṃ kṛṣṇasya stuvato narā /
analyzed: śṛṇutam jarituḥ havam kṛṣṇasya stuvataḥ narā

original: RV_8,085.04c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.05a chardir yantam adābhyaṃ viprāya stuvate narā /
analyzed: chardiḥ yantam adābhyam viprāya stuvate narā

original: RV_8,085.05c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.06a gacchataṃ dāśuṣo gṛham itthā stuvato aśvinā /
analyzed: gacchatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛham itthā stuvataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,085.06c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.07a yuñjāthāṃ rāsabhaṃ rathe vīḍvaṅge vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: yuñjāthām rāsabham rathe vīḍu aṅge vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,085.07c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.08a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
analyzed: tri vandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_8,085.08c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,085.09a nū me giro nāsatyāśvinā prāvataṃ yuvam /
analyzed: nu me giraḥ nāsatyā aśvinā prāvatam yuvam

original: RV_8,085.09c madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,086.01a ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvobhā dakṣasya vacaso babhūvathuḥ /
analyzed: ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvā ubhā dakṣasya vacasaḥ babhūvathuḥ

original: RV_8,086.01c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
analyzed: tā vām viśvakaḥ havate tanū kṛthe mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_8,086.02a kathā nūnaṃ vāṃ vimanā upa stavad yuvaṃ dhiyaṃ dadathur vasyaiṣṭaye /
analyzed: kathā nūnam vām vimanāḥ upa stavat yuvam dhiyam dadathuḥ vasyaiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,086.02c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
analyzed: tā vām viśvakaḥ havate tanū kṛthe mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_8,086.03a yuvaṃ hi ṣmā purubhujemam edhatuṃ viṣṇāpve dadathur vasyaiṣṭaye /
analyzed: yuvam hi sma puru bhujā imam edhatum viṣṇāpve dadathuḥ vasyaiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,086.03c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
analyzed: tā vām viśvakaḥ havate tanū kṛthe mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_8,086.04a uta tyaṃ vīraṃ dhanasām ṛjīṣiṇaṃ dūre cit santam avase havāmahe /
analyzed: uta tyam vīram dhana sām ṛjīṣiṇam dūre cit santam avase havāmahe

original: RV_8,086.04c yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pitur yathā mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
analyzed: yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pituḥ yathā mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_8,086.05a ṛtena devaḥ savitā śamāyata ṛtasya śṛṅgam urviyā vi paprathe /
analyzed: ṛtena devaḥ savitā śamāyate ṛtasya śṛṅgam urviyā vi paprathe

original: RV_8,086.05c ṛtaṃ sāsāha mahi cit pṛtanyato mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
analyzed: ṛtam sāsāha mahi cit pṛtanyataḥ mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_8,087.01a dyumnī vāṃ stomo aśvinā krivir na seka ā gatam /
analyzed: dyumnī vām stomaḥ aśvinā kriviḥ na seke ā gatam

original: RV_8,087.01c madhvaḥ sutasya sa divi priyo narā pātaṃ gaurāv iveriṇe //
analyzed: madhvaḥ sutasya sa divi priyaḥ narā pātam gaurau iva iriṇe

original: RV_8,087.02a pibataṃ gharmam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā /
analyzed: pibatam gharmam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdatam narā

original: RV_8,087.02c tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā ni pātaṃ vedasā vayaḥ //
analyzed: tā mandasānā manuṣaḥ duroṇe ā ni pātam vedasā vayaḥ

original: RV_8,087.03a ā vāṃ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata /
analyzed: ā vām viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ priyamedhāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_8,087.03c tā vartir yātam upa vṛktabarhiṣo juṣṭaṃ yajñaṃ diviṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: tā vartiḥ yātam upa vṛkta barhiṣaḥ juṣṭam yajñam diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_8,087.04a pibataṃ somam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ sumat /
analyzed: pibatam somam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdatam sumat

original: RV_8,087.04c tā vāvṛdhānā upa suṣṭutiṃ divo gantaṃ gaurāv iveriṇam //
analyzed: tā vāvṛdhānau upa suṣṭutim divaḥ gantam gaurau iva iriṇam

original: RV_8,087.05a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvināśvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ /
analyzed: ā nūnam yātam aśvinā aśvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ

original: RV_8,087.05c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
analyzed: dasrā hiraṇya vartanī śubhaḥ patī pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_8,087.06a vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmahe vipanyavo viprāso vājasātaye /
analyzed: vayam hi vām havāmahe vipanyavaḥ viprāsaḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_8,087.06c tā valgū dasrā purudaṃsasā dhiyāśvinā śruṣṭy ā gatam //
analyzed: tā valgū dasrā puru daṃsasā dhiyā aśvinā śruṣṭī ā gatam

original: RV_8,088.01a taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhasaḥ /
analyzed: tam vaḥ dasmam ṛtīṣaham vasoḥ mandānam andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,088.01c abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhir navāmahe //
analyzed: abhi vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ indram gīrbhiḥ navāmahe

original: RV_8,088.02a dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtaṃ giriṃ na purubhojasam /
analyzed: dyukṣam sudānum taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam girim na puru bhojasam

original: RV_8,088.02c kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe //
analyzed: kṣumantam vājam śatinam sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe

original: RV_8,088.03a na tvā bṛhanto adrayo varanta indra vīḷavaḥ /
analyzed: na tvā bṛhantaḥ adrayaḥ varante indra vīḍavaḥ

original: RV_8,088.03c yad ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakiṣ ṭad ā mināti te //
analyzed: yat ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakir tat ā mināti te

original: RV_8,088.04a yoddhāsi kratvā śavasota daṃsanā viśvā jātābhi majmanā /
analyzed: yoddhā asi kratvā śavasā uta daṃsanā viśvā jātā abhi majmanā

original: RV_8,088.04c ā tvāyam arka ūtaye vavartati yaṃ gotamā ajījanan //
analyzed: ā tvā ayam arkaḥ ūtaye vavartati yam gotamāḥ ajījanan

original: RV_8,088.05a pra hi ririkṣa ojasā divo antebhyas pari /
analyzed: pra hi ririkṣe ojasā divaḥ antebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_8,088.05c na tvā vivyāca raja indra pārthivam anu svadhāṃ vavakṣitha //
analyzed: na tvā vivyāca rajaḥ indra pārthivam anu svadhām vavakṣitha

original: RV_8,088.06a nakiḥ pariṣṭir maghavan maghasya te yad dāśuṣe daśasyasi /
analyzed: nakir pariṣṭiḥ maghavan maghasya te yat dāśuṣe daśasyasi

original: RV_8,088.06c asmākam bodhy ucathasya coditā maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye //
analyzed: asmākam bodhi ucathasya coditā maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vāja sātaye

original: RV_8,089.01a bṛhad indrāya gāyata maruto vṛtrahantamam /
analyzed: bṛhat indrāya gāyata marutaḥ vṛtra hantamam

original: RV_8,089.01c yena jyotir ajanayann ṛtāvṛdho devaṃ devāya jāgṛvi //
analyzed: yena jyotiḥ ajanayan ṛtāvṛdhaḥ devam devāya jāgṛvi

original: RV_8,089.02a apādhamad abhiśastīr aśastihāthendro dyumny ābhavat /
analyzed: apādhamat abhiśastīḥ aśasti hā atha indraḥ dyumnī ābhavat

original: RV_8,089.02c devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhadbhāno marudgaṇa //
analyzed: devāḥ te indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhat bhāno marut gaṇa

original: RV_8,089.03a pra va indrāya bṛhate maruto brahmārcata /
analyzed: pra vaḥ indrāya bṛhate marutaḥ brahma arcata

original: RV_8,089.03c vṛtraṃ hanati vṛtrahā śatakratur vajreṇa śataparvaṇā //
analyzed: vṛtram hanati vṛtrahā śatakratuḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: RV_8,089.04a abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣanmanaḥ śravaś cit te asad bṛhat /
analyzed: abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣat manaḥ śravaḥ cit te asat bṛhat

original: RV_8,089.04c arṣantv āpo javasā vi mātaro hano vṛtraṃ jayā svaḥ //
analyzed: arṣantu āpaḥ javasā vi mātaraḥ hanaḥ vṛtram jaya svar

original: RV_8,089.05a yaj jāyathā apūrvya maghavan vṛtrahatyāya /
analyzed: yat jāyathāḥ apūrvya maghavan vṛtra hatyāya

original: RV_8,089.05c tat pṛthivīm aprathayas tad astabhnā uta dyām //
analyzed: tat pṛthivīm aprathayaḥ tat astabhnāḥ uta dyām

original: RV_8,089.06a tat te yajño ajāyata tad arka uta haskṛtiḥ /
analyzed: tat te yajñaḥ ajāyata tat arkaḥ uta haskṛtiḥ

original: RV_8,089.06c tad viśvam abhibhūr asi yaj jātaṃ yac ca jantvam //
analyzed: tat viśvam abhibhūḥ asi yat jātam yat ca jantvam

original: RV_8,089.07a āmāsu pakvam airaya ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi /
analyzed: āmāsu pakvam airayaḥ ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi

original: RV_8,089.07c gharmaṃ na sāman tapatā suvṛktibhir juṣṭaṃ girvaṇase bṛhat //
analyzed: gharmam na sāman tapata suvṛktibhiḥ juṣṭam girvaṇase bṛhat

original: RV_8,090.01a ā no viśvāsu havya indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvāsu havyaḥ indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu

original: RV_8,090.01c upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyā ṛcīṣamaḥ //
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyāḥ ṛcīṣamaḥ

original: RV_8,090.02a tvaṃ dātā prathamo rādhasām asy asi satya īśānakṛt /
analyzed: tvam dātā prathamaḥ rādhasām asi asi satyaḥ īśāna kṛt

original: RV_8,090.02c tuvidyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavaso mahaḥ //
analyzed: tuvi dyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_8,090.03a brahmā ta indra girvaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā /
analyzed: brahmā te indra girvaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā

original: RV_8,090.03c imā juṣasva haryaśva yojanendra yā te amanmahi //
analyzed: imā juṣasva haryaśva yojanā indra yā te amanmahi

original: RV_8,090.04a tvaṃ hi satyo maghavann anānato vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase /
analyzed: tvam hi satyaḥ maghavan an ānataḥ vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase

original: RV_8,090.04c sa tvaṃ śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe 'rvāñcaṃ rayim ā kṛdhi //
analyzed: sa tvam śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe rvāñcam rayim ā kṛdhi

original: RV_8,090.05a tvam indra yaśā asy ṛjīṣī śavasas pate /
analyzed: tvam indra yaśāḥ asi ṛjīṣī śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_8,090.05c tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi haṃsy apratīny eka id anuttā carṣaṇīdhṛtā //
analyzed: tvam vṛtrāṇi haṃsi apratīni ekaḥ id anuttā carṣaṇī dhṛtā

original: RV_8,090.06a tam u tvā nūnam asura pracetasaṃ rādho bhāgam ivemahe /
analyzed: tam u tvā nūnam asura pracetasam rādhaḥ bhāgam iva īmahe

original: RV_8,090.06c mahīva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā ta indra pra te sumnā no aśnavan //
analyzed: mahī iva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā te indra pra te sumnā naḥ aśnavan

original: RV_8,091.01a kanyā vār avāyatī somam api srutāvidat /
analyzed: kanyā vār avāyatī somam api srutā avidat

original: RV_8,091.01c astam bharanty abravīd indrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā //
analyzed: astam bharantī abravīt indrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā

original: RV_8,091.02a asau ya eṣi vīrako gṛhaṃ-gṛhaṃ vicākaśad /
analyzed: asau yaḥ eṣi vīrakaḥ gṛhaṃgṛham vicākaśat

original: RV_8,091.02c imaṃ jambhasutam piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam //
analyzed: imam jambha sutam piba dhānāvantam karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam

original: RV_8,091.03a ā cana tvā cikitsāmo 'dhi cana tvā nemasi /
analyzed: ā cana tvā cikitsāmaḥ dhi cana tvā na imasi

original: RV_8,091.03c śanair iva śanakair ivendrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: śanais iva śanakais iva indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_8,091.04a kuvic chakat kuvit karat kuvin no vasyasas karat /
analyzed: kuvid śakat kuvid karat kuvid naḥ vasyasaḥ karat

original: RV_8,091.04c kuvit patidviṣo yatīr indreṇa saṃgamāmahai //
analyzed: kuvid pati dviṣaḥ yatīḥ indreṇa saṃgamāmahai

original: RV_8,091.05a imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tānīndra vi rohaya /
analyzed: imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tāni indra vi rohaya

original: RV_8,091.05c śiras tatasyorvarām ād idam ma upodare //
analyzed: śiraḥ tatasya urvarām āt idam me upa udare

original: RV_8,091.06a asau ca yā na urvarād imāṃ tanvam mama /
analyzed: asau ca yā naḥ urvarā āt imām tanvam mama

original: RV_8,091.06c atho tatasya yac chiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi //
analyzed: atha u tatasya yat śiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi

original: RV_8,091.07a khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato /
analyzed: khe rathasya khe nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato

original: RV_8,091.07c apālām indra triṣ pūtvy akṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam //
analyzed: apālām indra tris pūtvī akṛṇoḥ sūrya tvacam

original: RV_8,092.01a pāntam ā vo andhasa indram abhi pra gāyata /
analyzed: pāntam ā vaḥ andhasaḥ indram abhi pra gāyata

original: RV_8,092.01c viśvāsāhaṃ śatakratum maṃhiṣṭhaṃ carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: viśvāsāham śatakratum maṃhiṣṭham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_8,092.02a puruhūtam puruṣṭutaṃ gāthānyaṃ sanaśrutam /
analyzed: puruhūtam puruṣṭutam gāthānyam sana śrutam

original: RV_8,092.02c indra iti bravītana //
analyzed: indraḥ iti bravītana

original: RV_8,092.03a indra in no mahānāṃ dātā vājānāṃ nṛtuḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ id naḥ mahānām dātā vājānām nṛtuḥ

original: RV_8,092.03c mahāṃ abhijñv ā yamat //
analyzed: mahān abhijñu ā yamat

original: RV_8,092.04a apād u śipry andhasaḥ sudakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: apāt u śiprī andhasaḥ su dakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_8,092.04c indor indro yavāśiraḥ //
analyzed: indoḥ indraḥ yava āśiraḥ

original: RV_8,092.05a tam v abhi prārcatendraṃ somasya pītaye /
analyzed: tam u abhi prārcata indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,092.05c tad id dhy asya vardhanam //
analyzed: tat id hi asya vardhanam

original: RV_8,092.06a asya pītvā madānāṃ devo devasyaujasā /
analyzed: asya pītvā madānām devaḥ devasya ojasā

original: RV_8,092.06c viśvābhi bhuvanā bhuvat //
analyzed: viśvā abhi bhuvanā bhuvat

original: RV_8,092.07a tyam u vaḥ satrāsāhaṃ viśvāsu gīrṣv āyatam /
analyzed: tyam u vaḥ satrāsāham viśvāsu gīrṣu āyatam

original: RV_8,092.07c ā cyāvayasy ūtaye //
analyzed: ā cyāvayasi ūtaye

original: RV_8,092.08a yudhmaṃ santam anarvāṇaṃ somapām anapacyutam /
analyzed: yudhmam santam anarvāṇam soma pām an apacyutam

original: RV_8,092.08c naram avāryakratum //
analyzed: naram a vārya kratum

original: RV_8,092.09a śikṣā ṇa indra rāya ā puru vidvāṃ ṛcīṣama /
analyzed: śikṣa naḥ indra rāyaḥ ā puru vidvān ṛcīṣama

original: RV_8,092.09c avā naḥ pārye dhane //
analyzed: avā naḥ pārye dhane

original: RV_8,092.10a ataś cid indra ṇa upā yāhi śatavājayā /
analyzed: atas cit indra naḥ upa ā yāhi śata vājayā

original: RV_8,092.10c iṣā sahasravājayā //
analyzed: iṣā sahasra vājayā

original: RV_8,092.11a ayāma dhīvato dhiyo 'rvadbhiḥ śakra godare /
analyzed: ayāma dhīvataḥ dhiyaḥ rvadbhiḥ śakra godare

original: RV_8,092.11c jayema pṛtsu vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: jayema pṛtsu vajrivas

original: RV_8,092.12a vayam u tvā śatakrato gāvo na yavaseṣv ā /
analyzed: vayam u tvā śatakrato gāvaḥ na yavaseṣu ā

original: RV_8,092.12c uktheṣu raṇayāmasi //
analyzed: uktheṣu raṇayāmasi

original: RV_8,092.13a viśvā hi martyatvanānukāmā śatakrato /
analyzed: viśvā hi martyatvanā anukāmā śatakrato

original: RV_8,092.13c aganma vajrinn āśasaḥ //
analyzed: aganma vajrin āśasaḥ

original: RV_8,092.14a tve su putra śavaso 'vṛtran kāmakātayaḥ /
analyzed: tve su putra śavasaḥ vṛtran kāma kātayaḥ

original: RV_8,092.14c na tvām indrāti ricyate //
analyzed: na tvām indra ati ricyate

original: RV_8,092.15a sa no vṛṣan saniṣṭhayā saṃ ghorayā dravitnvā /
analyzed: sa naḥ vṛṣan saniṣṭhayā sam ghorayā dravitnvā

original: RV_8,092.15c dhiyāviḍḍhi purandhyā //
analyzed: dhiyā aviḍḍhi purandhyā

original: RV_8,092.16a yas te nūnaṃ śatakratav indra dyumnitamo madaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te nūnam śatakrato indra dyumnitamaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_8,092.16c tena nūnam made madeḥ //
analyzed: tena nūnam made madeḥ

original: RV_8,092.17a yas te citraśravastamo ya indra vṛtrahantamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te citra śravastamaḥ yaḥ indra vṛtra hantamaḥ

original: RV_8,092.17c ya ojodātamo madaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ojaḥ dātamaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_8,092.18a vidmā hi yas te adrivas tvādattaḥ satya somapāḥ /
analyzed: vidma hi yaḥ te adrivas tvādattaḥ satya soma pāḥ

original: RV_8,092.18c viśvāsu dasma kṛṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: viśvāsu dasma kṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_8,092.19a indrāya madvane sutam pari ṣṭobhantu no giraḥ /
analyzed: indrāya madvane sutam pari stobhantu naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,092.19c arkam arcantu kāravaḥ //
analyzed: arkam arcantu kāravaḥ

original: RV_8,092.20a yasmin viśvā adhi śriyo raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ

original: RV_8,092.20c indraṃ sute havāmahe //
analyzed: indram sute havāmahe

original: RV_8,092.21a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata /
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata

original: RV_8,092.21c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ //
analyzed: tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,092.22a ā tvā viśantv indavaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā viśantu indavaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_8,092.22c na tvām indrāti ricyate //
analyzed: na tvām indra ati ricyate

original: RV_8,092.23a vivyaktha mahinā vṛṣan bhakṣaṃ somasya jāgṛve /
analyzed: vivyaktha mahinā vṛṣan bhakṣam somasya jāgṛve

original: RV_8,092.23c ya indra jaṭhareṣu te //
analyzed: yaḥ indra jaṭhareṣu te

original: RV_8,092.24a araṃ ta indra kukṣaye somo bhavatu vṛtrahan /
analyzed: aram te indra kukṣaye somaḥ bhavatu vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,092.24c araṃ dhāmabhya indavaḥ //
analyzed: aram dhāmabhyaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,092.25a aram aśvāya gāyati śrutakakṣo araṃ gave /
analyzed: aram aśvāya gāyati śrutakakṣaḥ aram gave

original: RV_8,092.25c aram indrasya dhāmne //
analyzed: aram indrasya dhāmne

original: RV_8,092.26a araṃ hi ṣma suteṣu ṇaḥ someṣv indra bhūṣasi /
analyzed: aram hi sma suteṣu naḥ someṣu indra bhūṣasi

original: RV_8,092.26c araṃ te śakra dāvane //
analyzed: aram te śakra dāvane

original: RV_8,092.27a parākāttāc cid adrivas tvāṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ /
analyzed: parākāttāt cit adrivas tvām nakṣanta naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,092.27c araṃ gamāma te vayam //
analyzed: aram gamāma te vayam

original: RV_8,092.28a evā hy asi vīrayur evā śūra uta sthiraḥ /
analyzed: eva hi asi vīrayuḥ eva śūraḥ uta sthiraḥ

original: RV_8,092.28c evā te rādhyam manaḥ //
analyzed: eva te rādhyam manaḥ

original: RV_8,092.29a evā rātis tuvīmagha viśvebhir dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: eva rātiḥ tuvīmagha viśvebhiḥ dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ

original: RV_8,092.29c adhā cid indra me sacā //
analyzed: adha cit indra me sacā

original: RV_8,092.30a mo ṣu brahmeva tandrayur bhuvo vājānām pate /
analyzed: mā u su brahmā iva tandrayuḥ bhuvaḥ vājānām pate

original: RV_8,092.30c matsvā sutasya gomataḥ //
analyzed: matsva sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,092.31a mā na indrābhy ādiśaḥ sūro aktuṣv ā yaman /
analyzed: mā naḥ indra abhi ādiśaḥ sūraḥ aktuṣu ā yaman

original: RV_8,092.31c tvā yujā vanema tat //
analyzed: tvā yujā vanema tat

original: RV_8,092.32a tvayed indra yujā vayam prati bruvīmahi spṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā id indra yujā vayam prati bruvīmahi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,092.32c tvam asmākaṃ tava smasi //
analyzed: tvam asmākam tava smasi

original: RV_8,092.33a tvām id dhi tvāyavo 'nunonuvataś carān /
analyzed: tvām id hi tvāyavaḥ nunonuvataḥ carān

original: RV_8,092.33c sakhāya indra kāravaḥ //
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ indra kāravaḥ

original: RV_8,093.01a ud ghed abhi śrutāmaghaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ naryāpasam /
analyzed: ud gha id abhi śrutāmagham vṛṣabham narya apasam

original: RV_8,093.01c astāram eṣi sūrya //
analyzed: astāram eṣi sūrya

original: RV_8,093.02a nava yo navatim puro bibheda bāhvojasā /
analyzed: nava yaḥ navatim puraḥ bibheda bāhu ojasā

original: RV_8,093.02c ahiṃ ca vṛtrahāvadhīt //
analyzed: ahim ca vṛtrahā avadhīt

original: RV_8,093.03a sa na indraḥ śivaḥ sakhāśvāvad gomad yavamat /
analyzed: sa naḥ indraḥ śivaḥ sakhā aśvāvat gomat yavamat

original: RV_8,093.03c urudhāreva dohate //
analyzed: uru dhārā iva dohate

original: RV_8,093.04a yad adya kac ca vṛtrahann udagā abhi sūrya /
analyzed: yat adya kad ca vṛtrahan udagāḥ abhi sūrya

original: RV_8,093.04c sarvaṃ tad indra te vaśe //
analyzed: sarvam tat indra te vaśe

original: RV_8,093.05a yad vā pravṛddha satpate na marā iti manyase /
analyzed: yat vā pravṛddha satpate na marai iti manyase

original: RV_8,093.05c uto tat satyam it tava //
analyzed: uta u tat satyam id tava

original: RV_8,093.06a ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire /
analyzed: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire

original: RV_8,093.06c sarvāṃs tāṃ indra gacchasi //
analyzed: sarvān tām indra gacchasi

original: RV_8,093.07a tam indraṃ vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave /
analyzed: tam indram vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave

original: RV_8,093.07c sa vṛṣā vṛṣabho bhuvat //
analyzed: sa vṛṣā vṛṣabhaḥ bhuvat

original: RV_8,093.08a indraḥ sa dāmane kṛta ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ sa dāmane kṛtaḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ

original: RV_8,093.08c dyumnī ślokī sa somyaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnī ślokī sa somyaḥ

original: RV_8,093.09a girā vajro na sambhṛtaḥ sabalo anapacyutaḥ /
analyzed: girā vajraḥ na sambhṛtaḥ sa balaḥ an apacyutaḥ

original: RV_8,093.09c vavakṣa ṛṣvo astṛtaḥ //
analyzed: vavakṣa ṛṣvaḥ astṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,093.10a durge cin naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi gṛṇāna indra girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: durge cit naḥ sugam kṛdhi gṛṇāna indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,093.10c tvaṃ ca maghavan vaśaḥ //
analyzed: tvam ca maghavan vaśaḥ

original: RV_8,093.11a yasya te nū cid ādiśaṃ na minanti svarājyam /
analyzed: yasya te nu cit ādiśam na minanti sva rājyam

original: RV_8,093.11c na devo nādhrigur janaḥ //
analyzed: na devaḥ na adhriguḥ janaḥ

original: RV_8,093.12a adhā te apratiṣkutaṃ devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ /
analyzed: adhā te apratiṣkutam devī śuṣmam saparyataḥ

original: RV_8,093.12c ubhe suśipra rodasī //
analyzed: ubhe su śipra rodasī

original: RV_8,093.13a tvam etad adhārayaḥ kṛṣṇāsu rohiṇīṣu ca /
analyzed: tvam etat adhārayaḥ kṛṣṇāsu rohiṇīṣu ca

original: RV_8,093.13c paruṣṇīṣu ruśat payaḥ //
analyzed: paruṣṇīṣu ruśat payaḥ

original: RV_8,093.14a vi yad aher adha tviṣo viśve devāso akramuḥ /
analyzed: vi yat aheḥ adha tviṣaḥ viśve devāsaḥ akramuḥ

original: RV_8,093.14c vidan mṛgasya tāṃ amaḥ //
analyzed: vidat mṛgasya tām amaḥ

original: RV_8,093.15a ād u me nivaro bhuvad vṛtrahādiṣṭa pauṃsyam /
analyzed: āt u me nivaraḥ bhuvat vṛtrahā adiṣṭa pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,093.15c ajātaśatrur astṛtaḥ //
analyzed: a jāta śatruḥ a stṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,093.16a śrutaṃ vo vṛtrahantamam pra śardhaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: śrutam vaḥ vṛtra hantamam pra śardham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_8,093.16c ā śuṣe rādhase mahe //
analyzed: ā śuṣe rādhase mahe

original: RV_8,093.17a ayā dhiyā ca gavyayā puruṇāman puruṣṭuta /
analyzed: ayā dhiyā ca gavyayā puruṇāman puruṣṭuta

original: RV_8,093.17c yat some-soma ābhavaḥ //
analyzed: yat somesome ābhavaḥ

original: RV_8,093.18a bodhinmanā id astu no vṛtrahā bhūryāsutiḥ /
analyzed: bodhinmanāḥ id astu naḥ vṛtrahā bhūri āsutiḥ

original: RV_8,093.18c śṛṇotu śakra āśiṣam //
analyzed: śṛṇotu śakraḥ āśiṣam

original: RV_8,093.19a kayā tvaṃ na ūtyābhi pra mandase vṛṣan /
analyzed: kayā tvam naḥ ūtyā abhi pra mandase vṛṣan

original: RV_8,093.19c kayā stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: kayā stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_8,093.20a kasya vṛṣā sute sacā niyutvān vṛṣabho raṇat /
analyzed: kasya vṛṣā sute sacā niyutvān vṛṣabhaḥ raṇat

original: RV_8,093.20c vṛtrahā somapītaye //
analyzed: vṛtrahā soma pītaye

original: RV_8,093.21a abhī ṣu ṇas tvaṃ rayim mandasānaḥ sahasriṇam /
analyzed: abhi su naḥ tvam rayim mandasānaḥ sahasriṇam

original: RV_8,093.21c prayantā bodhi dāśuṣe //
analyzed: prayantā bodhi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,093.22a patnīvantaḥ sutā ima uśanto yanti vītaye /
analyzed: patnīvantaḥ sutāḥ ime uśantaḥ yanti vītaye

original: RV_8,093.22c apāṃ jagmir nicumpuṇaḥ //
analyzed: apām jagmiḥ nicumpuṇaḥ

original: RV_8,093.23a iṣṭā hotrā asṛkṣatendraṃ vṛdhāso adhvare /
analyzed: iṣṭāḥ hotrāḥ asṛkṣata indram vṛdhāsaḥ adhvare

original: RV_8,093.23c acchāvabhṛtham ojasā //
analyzed: acchā avabhṛtham ojasā

original: RV_8,093.24a iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇyakeśyā /
analyzed: iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇya keśyā

original: RV_8,093.24c voḷhām abhi prayo hitam //
analyzed: voḍhām abhi prayaḥ hitam

original: RV_8,093.25a tubhyaṃ somāḥ sutā ime stīrṇam barhir vibhāvaso /
analyzed: tubhyam somāḥ sutāḥ ime stīrṇam barhiḥ vibhāvaso

original: RV_8,093.25c stotṛbhya indram ā vaha //
analyzed: stotṛbhyaḥ indram ā vaha

original: RV_8,093.26a ā te dakṣaṃ vi rocanā dadhad ratnā vi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: ā te dakṣam vi rocanā dadhat ratnā vi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,093.26c stotṛbhya indram arcata //
analyzed: stotṛbhyaḥ indram arcata

original: RV_8,093.27a ā te dadhāmīndriyam ukthā viśvā śatakrato /
analyzed: ā te dadhāmi indriyam ukthā viśvā śatakrato

original: RV_8,093.27c stotṛbhya indra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: stotṛbhyaḥ indra mṛḍaya

original: RV_8,093.28a bhadram-bhadraṃ na ā bhareṣam ūrjaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: bhadram bhadram naḥ ā bhara iṣam ūrjam śatakrato

original: RV_8,093.28c yad indra mṛḷayāsi naḥ //
analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_8,093.29a sa no viśvāny ā bhara suvitāni śatakrato /
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāni ā bhara suvitāni śatakrato

original: RV_8,093.29c yad indra mṛḷayāsi naḥ //
analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_8,093.30a tvām id vṛtrahantama sutāvanto havāmahe /
analyzed: tvām id vṛtra hantama sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,093.30c yad indra mṛḷayāsi naḥ //
analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_8,093.31a upa no haribhiḥ sutaṃ yāhi madānām pate /
analyzed: upa naḥ haribhiḥ sutam yāhi madānām pate

original: RV_8,093.31c upa no haribhiḥ sutam //
analyzed: upa naḥ haribhiḥ sutam

original: RV_8,093.32a dvitā yo vṛtrahantamo vida indraḥ śatakratuḥ /
analyzed: dvitā yaḥ vṛtra hantamaḥ vide indraḥ śatakratuḥ

original: RV_8,093.32c upa no haribhiḥ sutam //
analyzed: upa naḥ haribhiḥ sutam

original: RV_8,093.33a tvaṃ hi vṛtrahann eṣām pātā somānām asi /
analyzed: tvam hi vṛtrahan eṣām pātā somānām asi

original: RV_8,093.33c upa no haribhiḥ sutam //
analyzed: upa naḥ haribhiḥ sutam

original: RV_8,093.34a indra iṣe dadātu na ṛbhukṣaṇam ṛbhuṃ rayim /
analyzed: indraḥ iṣe dadātu naḥ ṛbhukṣaṇam ṛbhum rayim

original: RV_8,093.34c vājī dadātu vājinam //
analyzed: vājī dadātu vājinam

original: RV_8,094.01a gaur dhayati marutāṃ śravasyur mātā maghonām /
analyzed: gauḥ dhayati marutām śravasyuḥ mātā maghonām

original: RV_8,094.01c yuktā vahnī rathānām //
analyzed: yuktā vahniḥ rathānām

original: RV_8,094.02a yasyā devā upasthe vratā viśve dhārayante /
analyzed: yasyāḥ devāḥ upasthe vratā viśve dhārayante

original: RV_8,094.02c sūryāmāsā dṛśe kam //
analyzed: sūryāmāsā dṛśe kam

original: RV_8,094.03a tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ /
analyzed: tat su naḥ viśve aryaḥ ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_8,094.03c marutaḥ somapītaye //
analyzed: marutaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,094.04a asti somo ayaṃ sutaḥ pibanty asya marutaḥ /
analyzed: asti somaḥ ayam sutaḥ pibanti asya marutaḥ

original: RV_8,094.04c uta svarājo aśvinā //
analyzed: uta svarājaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,094.05a pibanti mitro aryamā tanā pūtasya varuṇaḥ /
analyzed: pibanti mitraḥ aryamā tanā pūtasya varuṇaḥ

original: RV_8,094.05c triṣadhasthasya jāvataḥ //
analyzed: triṣadhasthasya jāvataḥ

original: RV_8,094.06a uto nv asya joṣam āṃ indraḥ sutasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: uta u nu asya joṣam ām indraḥ sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,094.06c prātar hoteva matsati //
analyzed: prātar hotā iva matsati

original: RV_8,094.07a kad atviṣanta sūrayas tira āpa iva sridhaḥ /
analyzed: kad atviṣanta sūrayaḥ tiras āpaḥ iva sridhaḥ

original: RV_8,094.07c arṣanti pūtadakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: arṣanti pūta dakṣasaḥ

original: RV_8,094.08a kad vo adya mahānāṃ devānām avo vṛṇe /
analyzed: kad vaḥ adya mahānām devānām avaḥ vṛṇe

original: RV_8,094.08c tmanā ca dasmavarcasām //
analyzed: tmanā ca dasma varcasām

original: RV_8,094.09a ā ye viśvā pārthivāni paprathan rocanā divaḥ /
analyzed: ā ye viśvā pārthivāni paprathan rocanā divaḥ

original: RV_8,094.09c marutaḥ somapītaye //
analyzed: marutaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,094.10a tyān nu pūtadakṣaso divo vo maruto huve /
analyzed: tyān nu pūta dakṣasaḥ divaḥ vaḥ marutaḥ huve

original: RV_8,094.10c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,094.11a tyān nu ye vi rodasī tastabhur maruto huve /
analyzed: tyān nu ye vi rodasī tastabhuḥ marutaḥ huve

original: RV_8,094.11c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,094.12a tyaṃ nu mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ giriṣṭhāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ huve /
analyzed: tyam nu mārutam gaṇam giriṣṭhām vṛṣaṇam huve

original: RV_8,094.12c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,095.01a ā tvā giro rathīr ivāsthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā giraḥ rathīḥ iva asthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,095.01c abhi tvā sam anūṣatendra vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ //
analyzed: abhi tvā sam anūṣata indra vatsam na mātaraḥ

original: RV_8,095.02a ā tvā śukrā acucyavuḥ sutāsa indra girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā śukrāḥ acucyavuḥ sutāsaḥ indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,095.02c pibā tv asyāndhasa indra viśvāsu te hitam //
analyzed: pibā tu asya andhasaḥ indra viśvāsu te hitam

original: RV_8,095.03a pibā somam madāya kam indra śyenābhṛtaṃ sutam /
analyzed: pibā somam madāya kam indra śyena ābhṛtam sutam

original: RV_8,095.03c tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām patī rājā viśām asi //
analyzed: tvam hi śaśvatīnām patiḥ rājā viśām asi

original: RV_8,095.04a śrudhī havaṃ tiraścyā indra yas tvā saparyati /
analyzed: śrudhi havam tiraścyāḥ indra yaḥ tvā saparyati

original: RV_8,095.04c suvīryasya gomato rāyas pūrdhi mahāṃ asi //
analyzed: su vīryasya gomataḥ rāyaḥ pūrdhi mahān asi

original: RV_8,095.05a indra yas te navīyasīṃ giram mandrām ajījanat /
analyzed: indra yaḥ te navīyasīm giram mandrām ajījanat

original: RV_8,095.05c cikitvinmanasaṃ dhiyam pratnām ṛtasya pipyuṣīm //
analyzed: cikitvit manasam dhiyam pratnām ṛtasya pipyuṣīm

original: RV_8,095.06a tam u ṣṭavāma yaṃ gira indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ /
analyzed: tam u stavāma yam giraḥ indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_8,095.06c purūṇy asya pauṃsyā siṣāsanto vanāmahe //
analyzed: purūṇi asya pauṃsyā siṣāsantaḥ vanāmahe

original: RV_8,095.07a eto nv indraṃ stavāma śuddhaṃ śuddhena sāmnā /
analyzed: eta u nu indram stavāma śuddham śuddhena sāmnā

original: RV_8,095.07c śuddhair ukthair vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ śuddha āśīrvān mamattu //
analyzed: śuddhaiḥ ukthaiḥ vāvṛdhvāṃsam śuddhaḥ āśīrvān mamattu

original: RV_8,095.08a indra śuddho na ā gahi śuddhaḥ śuddhābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: indra śuddhaḥ naḥ ā gahi śuddhaḥ śuddhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,095.08c śuddho rayiṃ ni dhāraya śuddho mamaddhi somyaḥ //
analyzed: śuddhaḥ rayim ni dhāraya śuddhaḥ mamaddhi somyaḥ

original: RV_8,095.09a indra śuddho hi no rayiṃ śuddho ratnāni dāśuṣe /
analyzed: indra śuddhaḥ hi naḥ rayim śuddhaḥ ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,095.09c śuddho vṛtrāṇi jighnase śuddho vājaṃ siṣāsasi //
analyzed: śuddhaḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnase śuddhaḥ vājam siṣāsasi

original: RV_8,096.01a asmā uṣāsa ātiranta yāmam indrāya naktam ūrmyāḥ suvācaḥ /
analyzed: asmai uṣāsaḥ ātiranta yāmam indrāya naktam ūrmyāḥ su vācaḥ

original: RV_8,096.01c asmā āpo mātaraḥ sapta tasthur nṛbhyas tarāya sindhavaḥ supārāḥ //
analyzed: asmai āpaḥ mātaraḥ sapta tasthuḥ nṛbhyaḥ tarāya sindhavaḥ su pārāḥ

original: RV_8,096.02a atividdhā vithureṇā cid astrā triḥ sapta sānu saṃhitā girīṇām /
analyzed: atividdhā vithureṇa cit astrā tris sapta sānu saṃhitā girīṇām

original: RV_8,096.02c na tad devo na martyas tuturyād yāni pravṛddho vṛṣabhaś cakāra //
analyzed: na tat devaḥ na martyaḥ tuturyāt yāni pravṛddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ cakāra

original: RV_8,096.03a indrasya vajra āyaso nimiśla indrasya bāhvor bhūyiṣṭham ojaḥ /
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ āyasaḥ nimiślaḥ indrasya bāhvoḥ bhūyiṣṭham ojaḥ

original: RV_8,096.03c śīrṣann indrasya kratavo nireka āsann eṣanta śrutyā upāke //
analyzed: śīrṣan indrasya kratavaḥ nireke āsan śrutyai upāke

original: RV_8,096.04a manye tvā yajñiyaṃ yajñiyānām manye tvā cyavanam acyutānām /
analyzed: manye tvā yajñiyam yajñiyānām manye tvā cyavanam a cyutānām

original: RV_8,096.04c manye tvā satvanām indra ketum manye tvā vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: manye tvā satvanām indra ketum manye tvā vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_8,096.05a ā yad vajram bāhvor indra dhatse madacyutam ahaye hantavā u /
analyzed: ā yat vajram bāhvoḥ indra dhatse mada cyutam ahaye hantavai u

original: RV_8,096.05c pra parvatā anavanta pra gāvaḥ pra brahmāṇo abhinakṣanta indram //
analyzed: pra parvatāḥ anavanta pra gāvaḥ pra brahmāṇaḥ abhinakṣantaḥ indram

original: RV_8,096.06a tam u ṣṭavāma ya imā jajāna viśvā jātāny avarāṇy asmāt /
analyzed: tam u stavāma yaḥ imā jajāna viśvā jātāni avarāṇi asmāt

original: RV_8,096.06c indreṇa mitraṃ didhiṣema gīrbhir upo namobhir vṛṣabhaṃ viśema //
analyzed: indreṇa mitram didhiṣema gīrbhiḥ upa u namobhiḥ vṛṣabham viśema

original: RV_8,096.07a vṛtrasya tvā śvasathād īṣamāṇā viśve devā ajahur ye sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: vṛtrasya tvā śvasathāt īṣamāṇāḥ viśve devāḥ ajahuḥ ye sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_8,096.07c marudbhir indra sakhyaṃ te astv athemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāsi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ indra sakhyam te astu atha imāḥ viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayāsi

original: RV_8,096.08a triḥ ṣaṣṭis tvā maruto vāvṛdhānā usrā iva rāśayo yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tris ṣaṣṭiḥ tvā marutaḥ vāvṛdhānāḥ usrāḥ iva rāśayaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_8,096.08c upa tvemaḥ kṛdhi no bhāgadheyaṃ śuṣmaṃ ta enā haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: upa tvā imaḥ kṛdhi naḥ bhāgadheyam śuṣmam te enā haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_8,096.09a tigmam āyudham marutām anīkaṃ kas ta indra prati vajraṃ dadharṣa /
analyzed: tigmam āyudham marutām anīkam kaḥ te indra prati vajram dadharṣa

original: RV_8,096.09c anāyudhāso asurā adevāś cakreṇa tāṃ apa vapa ṛjīṣin //
analyzed: an āyudhāsaḥ asurāḥ a devāḥ cakreṇa tām apa vapa ṛjīṣin

original: RV_8,096.10a maha ugrāya tavase suvṛktim preraya śivatamāya paśvaḥ /
analyzed: mahe ugrāya tavase suvṛktim preraya śivatamāya paśvaḥ

original: RV_8,096.10c girvāhase gira indrāya pūrvīr dhehi tanve kuvid aṅga vedat //
analyzed: gir vāhase giraḥ indrāya pūrvīḥ dhehi tanve kuvid aṅga vedat

original: RV_8,096.11a ukthavāhase vibhve manīṣāṃ druṇā na pāram īrayā nadīnām /
analyzed: uktha vāhase vibhve manīṣām druṇā na pāram īraya nadīnām

original: RV_8,096.11c ni spṛśa dhiyā tanvi śrutasya juṣṭatarasya kuvid aṅga vedat //
analyzed: ni spṛśa dhiyā tanvi śrutasya juṣṭatarasya kuvid aṅga vedat

original: RV_8,096.12a tad viviḍḍhi yat ta indro jujoṣat stuhi suṣṭutiṃ namasā vivāsa /
analyzed: tat viviḍḍhi yat te indraḥ jujoṣat stuhi suṣṭutim namasā vivāsa

original: RV_8,096.12c upa bhūṣa jaritar mā ruvaṇyaḥ śrāvayā vācaṃ kuvid aṅga vedat //
analyzed: upa bhūṣa jaritar mā ruvaṇyaḥ śrāvaya vācam kuvid aṅga vedat

original: RV_8,096.13a ava drapso aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhad iyānaḥ kṛṣṇo daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ /
analyzed: ava drapsaḥ aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhat iyānaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ

original: RV_8,096.13c āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīr nṛmaṇā adhatta //
analyzed: āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīḥ nṛmaṇāḥ adhatta

original: RV_8,096.14a drapsam apaśyaṃ viṣuṇe carantam upahvare nadyo aṃśumatyāḥ /
analyzed: drapsam apaśyam viṣuṇe carantam upahvare nadyaḥ aṃśumatyāḥ

original: RV_8,096.14c nabho na kṛṣṇam avatasthivāṃsam iṣyāmi vo vṛṣaṇo yudhyatājau //
analyzed: nabhaḥ na kṛṣṇam avatasthivāṃsam iṣyāmi vaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yudhyata ājau

original: RV_8,096.15a adha drapso aṃśumatyā upasthe 'dhārayat tanvaṃ titviṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: adha drapsaḥ aṃśumatyāḥ upasthe dhārayat tanvam titviṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_8,096.15c viśo adevīr abhy ācarantīr bṛhaspatinā yujendraḥ sasāhe //
analyzed: viśaḥ adevīḥ abhī ācarantīḥ bṛhaspatinā yujā indraḥ sasāhe

original: RV_8,096.16a tvaṃ ha tyat saptabhyo jāyamāno 'śatrubhyo abhavaḥ śatrur indra /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad saptabhyaḥ jāyamānaḥ śatrubhyaḥ abhavaḥ śatruḥ indra

original: RV_8,096.16c gūḷhe dyāvāpṛthivī anv avindo vibhumadbhyo bhuvanebhyo raṇaṃ dhāḥ //
analyzed: gūḷhe dyāvāpṛthivī anu avindaḥ vibhumadbhyaḥ bhuvanebhyaḥ raṇam dhāḥ

original: RV_8,096.17a tvaṃ ha tyad apratimānam ojo vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣito jaghantha /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad a pratimānam ojaḥ vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣitaḥ jaghantha

original: RV_8,096.17c tvaṃ śuṣṇasyāvātiro vadhatrais tvaṃ gā indra śacyed avindaḥ //
analyzed: tvam śuṣṇasya avātiraḥ vadhatraiḥ tvam gāḥ indra śacyā id avindaḥ

original: RV_8,096.18a tvaṃ ha tyad vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnāṃ ghano vṛtrāṇāṃ taviṣo babhūtha /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām ghanaḥ vṛtrāṇām taviṣaḥ babhūtha

original: RV_8,096.18c tvaṃ sindhūṃr asṛjas tastabhānān tvam apo ajayo dāsapatnīḥ //
analyzed: tvam sindhūṃr asṛjaḥ tastabhānān tvam apaḥ ajayaḥ dāsa patnīḥ

original: RV_8,096.19a sa sukratū raṇitā yaḥ suteṣv anuttamanyur yo aheva revān /
analyzed: sa su kratuḥ raṇitā yaḥ suteṣu anutta manyuḥ yaḥ ahā iva revān

original: RV_8,096.19c ya eka in nary apāṃsi kartā sa vṛtrahā pratīd anyam āhuḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id nari apāṃsi kartā sa vṛtrahā prati id anyam āhuḥ

original: RV_8,096.20a sa vṛtrahendraś carṣaṇīdhṛt taṃ suṣṭutyā havyaṃ huvema /
analyzed: sa vṛtrahā indraḥ carṣaṇī dhṛt tam suṣṭutyā havyam huvema

original: RV_8,096.20c sa prāvitā maghavā no 'dhivaktā sa vājasya śravasyasya dātā //
analyzed: sa prāvitā maghavā naḥ dhivaktā sa vājasya śravasyasya dātā

original: RV_8,096.21a sa vṛtrahendra ṛbhukṣāḥ sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūva /
analyzed: sa vṛtrahā indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ sadyas jajñānaḥ havyaḥ babhūva

original: RV_8,096.21c kṛṇvann apāṃsi naryā purūṇi somo na pīto havyaḥ sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṇvan apāṃsi naryā purūṇi somaḥ na pītaḥ havyaḥ sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_8,097.01a yā indra bhuja ābharaḥ svarvāṃ asurebhyaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ indra bhujaḥ ābharaḥ svarvān asurebhyaḥ

original: RV_8,097.01c stotāram in maghavann asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ //
analyzed: stotāram id maghavan asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,097.02a yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvaṃ gām bhāgam avyayam /
analyzed: yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvam gām bhāgam avyayam

original: RV_8,097.02c yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin taṃ dhehi mā paṇau //
analyzed: yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin tam dhehi mā paṇau

original: RV_8,097.03a ya indra sasty avrato 'nuṣvāpam adevayuḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ indra sasti avrataḥ nuṣvāpam adevayuḥ

original: RV_8,097.03c svaiḥ ṣa evair mumurat poṣyaṃ rayiṃ sanutar dhehi taṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: svaiḥ saḥ evaiḥ mumurat poṣyam rayim sanutar dhehi tam tatas

original: RV_8,097.04a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan /
analyzed: yat śakra asi parāvati yat arvāvati vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,097.04c atas tvā gīrbhir dyugad indra keśibhiḥ sutāvāṃ ā vivāsati //
analyzed: atas tvā gīrbhiḥ dyugad indra keśibhiḥ sutāvān ā vivāsati

original: RV_8,097.05a yad vāsi rocane divaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi /
analyzed: yat vā asi rocane divaḥ samudrasya adhi viṣṭapi

original: RV_8,097.05c yat pārthive sadane vṛtrahantama yad antarikṣa ā gahi //
analyzed: yat pārthive sadane vṛtra hantama yat antarikṣe ā gahi

original: RV_8,097.06a sa naḥ someṣu somapāḥ suteṣu śavasas pate /
analyzed: sa naḥ someṣu soma pāḥ suteṣu śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_8,097.06c mādayasva rādhasā sūnṛtāvatendra rāyā parīṇasā //
analyzed: mādayasva rādhasā sūnṛtāvatā indra rāyā parīṇasā

original: RV_8,097.07a mā na indra parā vṛṇag bhavā naḥ sadhamādyaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ indra parā vṛṇak bhava naḥ sadhamādyaḥ

original: RV_8,097.07c tvaṃ na ūtī tvam in na āpyam mā na indra parā vṛṇak //
analyzed: tvam naḥ ūtī tvam id naḥ āpyam mā naḥ indra parā vṛṇak

original: RV_8,097.08a asme indra sacā sute ni ṣadā pītaye madhu /
analyzed: asme indra sacā sute ni sada pītaye madhu

original: RV_8,097.08c kṛdhī jaritre maghavann avo mahad asme indra sacā sute //
analyzed: kṛdhi jaritre maghavan avaḥ mahat asme indra sacā sute

original: RV_8,097.09a na tvā devāsa āśata na martyāso adrivaḥ /
analyzed: na tvā devāsaḥ āśata na martyāsaḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,097.09c viśvā jātāni śavasābhibhūr asi na tvā devāsa āśata //
analyzed: viśvā jātāni śavasā abhibhūḥ asi na tvā devāsaḥ āśata

original: RV_8,097.10a viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhibhūtaraṃ naraṃ sajūs tatakṣur indraṃ jajanuś ca rājase /
analyzed: viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ abhibhūtaram naram sajūs tatakṣuḥ indram jajanuḥ ca rājase

original: RV_8,097.10c kratvā variṣṭhaṃ vara āmurim utogram ojiṣṭhaṃ tavasaṃ tarasvinam //
analyzed: kratvā variṣṭham vare āmurim uta ugram ojiṣṭham tavasam tarasvinam

original: RV_8,097.11a sam īṃ rebhāso asvarann indraṃ somasya pītaye /
analyzed: sam īm rebhāsaḥ asvaran indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,097.11c svarpatiṃ yad īṃ vṛdhe dhṛtavrato hy ojasā sam ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: svarpatim yat īm vṛdhe dhṛtavrataḥ hi ojasā sam ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,097.12a nemiṃ namanti cakṣasā meṣaṃ viprā abhisvarā /
analyzed: nemim namanti cakṣasā meṣam viprāḥ abhisvarā

original: RV_8,097.12c sudītayo vo adruho 'pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ //
analyzed: su dītayaḥ vaḥ adruhaḥ pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_8,097.13a tam indraṃ johavīmi maghavānam ugraṃ satrā dadhānam apratiṣkutaṃ śavāṃsi /
analyzed: tam indram johavīmi maghavānam ugram satrā dadhānam apratiṣkutam śavāṃsi

original: RV_8,097.13c maṃhiṣṭho gīrbhir ā ca yajñiyo vavartad rāye no viśvā supathā kṛṇotu vajrī //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhaḥ gīrbhiḥ ā ca yajñiyaḥ vavartat rāye naḥ viśvā su pathā kṛṇotu vajrī

original: RV_8,097.14a tvam pura indra cikid enā vy ojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai /
analyzed: tvam puras indra cikit enā vi ojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai

original: RV_8,097.14c tvad viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā //
analyzed: tvat viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā

original: RV_8,097.15a tan ma ṛtam indra śūra citra pātv apo na vajrin duritāti parṣi bhūri /
analyzed: tat me ṛtam indra śūra citra pātu apaḥ na vajrin duritā ati parṣi bhūri

original: RV_8,097.15c kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyer viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan //
analyzed: kadā naḥ indra rāyaḥ ā daśasyeḥ viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan

original: RV_8,098.01a indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat /
analyzed: indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat

original: RV_8,098.01c dharmakṛte vipaścite panasyave //
analyzed: dharma kṛte vipaścite panasyave

original: RV_8,098.02a tvam indrābhibhūr asi tvaṃ sūryam arocayaḥ /
analyzed: tvam indra abhibhūḥ asi tvam sūryam arocayaḥ

original: RV_8,098.02c viśvakarmā viśvadevo mahāṃ asi //
analyzed: viśvakarmā viśva devaḥ mahān asi

original: RV_8,098.03a vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: vibhrājam jyotiṣā svar agacchaḥ rocanam divaḥ

original: RV_8,098.03c devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire //
analyzed: devāḥ te indra sakhyāya yemire

original: RV_8,098.04a endra no gadhi priyaḥ satrājid agohyaḥ /
analyzed: ā indra naḥ gadhi priyaḥ satrājit agohyaḥ

original: RV_8,098.04c girir na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patir divaḥ //
analyzed: giriḥ na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_8,098.05a abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī /
analyzed: abhi hi satya soma pāḥ ubhe babhūtha rodasī

original: RV_8,098.05c indrāsi sunvato vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ //
analyzed: indra asi sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_8,098.06a tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi /
analyzed: tvam hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi

original: RV_8,098.06c hantā dasyor manor vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ //
analyzed: hantā dasyoḥ manoḥ vṛdhaḥ patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_8,098.07a adhā hīndra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe /
analyzed: adhā hi indra girvaṇaḥ upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe

original: RV_8,098.07c udeva yanta udabhiḥ //
analyzed: udā iva yantaḥ udabhiḥ

original: RV_8,098.08a vār ṇa tvā yavyābhir vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi /
analyzed: vār na tvā yavyābhiḥ vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi

original: RV_8,098.08c vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ cid adrivo dive-dive //
analyzed: vāvṛdhvāṃsam cit adrivas dive dive

original: RV_8,098.09a yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge /
analyzed: yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayā urau rathe uru yuge

original: RV_8,098.09c indravāhā vacoyujā //
analyzed: indra vāhā vacaḥ yujā

original: RV_8,098.10a tvaṃ na indrā bharaṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra ā bhara ojaḥ nṛmṇam śatakrato vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_8,098.10c ā vīram pṛtanāṣaham //
analyzed: ā vīram pṛtanāṣaham

original: RV_8,098.11a tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha /
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha

original: RV_8,098.11c adhā te sumnam īmahe //
analyzed: adhā te sumnam īmahe

original: RV_8,098.12a tvāṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato /
analyzed: tvām śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato

original: RV_8,098.12c sa no rāsva suvīryam //
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsva su vīryam

original: RV_8,099.01a tvām idā hyo naro 'pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tvām idā hyas naraḥ pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_8,099.01c sa indra stomavāhasām iha śrudhy upa svasaram ā gahi //
analyzed: saḥ indra stoma vāhasām iha śrudhi upa svasaram ā gahi

original: RV_8,099.02a matsvā suśipra harivas tad īmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: matsva su śipra harivas tat īmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_8,099.02c tava śravāṃsy upamāny ukthyā suteṣv indra girvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tava śravāṃsi upamāni ukthyā suteṣu indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,099.03a śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśved indrasya bhakṣata /
analyzed: śrāyantaḥ iva sūryam viśvā id indrasya bhakṣata

original: RV_8,099.03c vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima //
analyzed: vasūni jāte janamāne ojasā prati bhāgam na dīdhima

original: RV_8,099.04a anarśarātiṃ vasudām upa stuhi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ /
analyzed: anarśarātim vasu dām upa stuhi bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,099.04c so asya kāmaṃ vidhato na roṣati mano dānāya codayan //
analyzed: saḥ asya kāmam vidhataḥ na roṣati manaḥ dānāya codayan

original: RV_8,099.05a tvam indra pratūrtiṣv abhi viśvā asi spṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: tvam indra pratūrtiṣu abhi viśvāḥ asi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,099.05c aśastihā janitā viśvatūr asi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ //
analyzed: aśasti hā janitā viśvatūr asi tvam tūrya taruṣyataḥ

original: RV_8,099.06a anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā /
analyzed: anu te śuṣmam turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśum na mātarā

original: RV_8,099.06c viśvās te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yad indra tūrvasi //
analyzed: viśvāḥ te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtram yat indra tūrvasi

original: RV_8,099.07a ita ūtī vo ajaram prahetāram aprahitam /
analyzed: itas ūtī vaḥ ajaram prahetāram a prahitam

original: RV_8,099.07c āśuṃ jetāraṃ hetāraṃ rathītamam atūrtaṃ tugryāvṛdham //
analyzed: āśum jetāram hetāram rathītamam a tūrtam tugryāvṛdham

original: RV_8,099.08a iṣkartāram aniṣkṛtaṃ sahaskṛtaṃ śatamūtiṃ śatakratum /
analyzed: iṣkartāram a niṣkṛtam sahaskṛtam śatamūtim śatakratum

original: RV_8,099.08c samānam indram avase havāmahe vasavānaṃ vasūjuvam //
analyzed: samānam indram avase havāmahe vasavānam vasūjuvam

original: RV_8,100.01a ayaṃ ta emi tanvā purastād viśve devā abhi mā yanti paścāt /
analyzed: ayam te emi tanvā purastāt viśve devāḥ abhi mā yanti paścāt

original: RV_8,100.01c yadā mahyaṃ dīdharo bhāgam indrād in mayā kṛṇavo vīryāṇi //
analyzed: yadā mahyam dīdharaḥ bhāgam indra āt id mayā kṛṇavaḥ vīryāṇi

original: RV_8,100.02a dadhāmi te madhuno bhakṣam agre hitas te bhāgaḥ suto astu somaḥ /
analyzed: dadhāmi te madhunaḥ bhakṣam agre hitaḥ te bhāgaḥ sutaḥ astu somaḥ

original: RV_8,100.02c asaś ca tvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sakhā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri //
analyzed: asaḥ ca tvam dakṣiṇatas sakhā me dhāḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri

original: RV_8,100.03a pra su stomam bharata vājayanta indrāya satyaṃ yadi satyam asti /
analyzed: pra su stomam bharata vājayantaḥ indrāya satyam yadi satyam asti

original: RV_8,100.03c nendro astīti nema u tva āha ka īṃ dadarśa kam abhi ṣṭavāma //
analyzed: na indraḥ asti iti nemaḥ u tve āha kaḥ īm dadarśa kam abhi stavāma

original: RV_8,100.04a ayam asmi jaritaḥ paśya meha viśvā jātāny abhy asmi mahnā /
analyzed: ayam asmi jaritar paśya mā iha viśvā jātāni abhī asmi mahnā

original: RV_8,100.04c ṛtasya mā pradiśo vardhayanty ādardiro bhuvanā dardarīmi //
analyzed: ṛtasya mā pradiśaḥ vardhayanti ādardiraḥ bhuvanā dardarīmi

original: RV_8,100.05a ā yan mā venā aruhann ṛtasyaṃ ekam āsīnaṃ haryatasya pṛṣṭhe /
analyzed: ā yat mā venāḥ ṛtasya ekam āsīnam haryatasya pṛṣṭhe

original: RV_8,100.05c manaś cin me hṛda ā praty avocad acikradañ chiśumantaḥ sakhāyaḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ cit me hṛde ā prati avocat acikradam śiśumantaḥ sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_8,100.06a viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavann indra sunvate /
analyzed: viśvā id tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavan indra sunvate

original: RV_8,100.06c pārāvataṃ yat purusambhṛtaṃ vasv apāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya ṛṣibandhave //
analyzed: pārāvatam yat puru sambhṛtam vasu apāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya ṛṣi bandhave

original: RV_8,100.07a pra nūnaṃ dhāvatā pṛthaṅ neha yo vo avāvarīt /
analyzed: pra nūnam dhāvata pṛthak na iha yaḥ vaḥ avāvarīt

original: RV_8,100.07c ni ṣīṃ vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajram indro apīpatat //
analyzed: ni sīm vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajram indraḥ apīpatat

original: RV_8,100.08a manojavā ayamāna āyasīm atarat puram /
analyzed: manaḥ javāḥ ayamānaḥ āyasīm atarat puram

original: RV_8,100.08c divaṃ suparṇo gatvāya somaṃ vajriṇa ābharat //
analyzed: divam suparṇaḥ gatvāya somam vajriṇe ābharat

original: RV_8,100.09a samudre antaḥ śayata udnā vajro abhīvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: samudre antar śayate udnā vajraḥ abhīvṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,100.09c bharanty asmai saṃyataḥ puraḥprasravaṇā balim //
analyzed: bharanti asmai saṃyataḥ puras prasravaṇāḥ balim

original: RV_8,100.10a yad vāg vadanty avicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānāṃ niṣasāda mandrā /
analyzed: yat vāc vadantī a vicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānām niṣasāda mandrā

original: RV_8,100.10c catasra ūrjaṃ duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramaṃ jagāma //
analyzed: catasraḥ ūrjam duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramam jagāma

original: RV_8,100.11a devīṃ vācam ajanayanta devās tāṃ viśvarūpāḥ paśavo vadanti /
analyzed: devīm vācam ajanayanta devāḥ tām viśva rūpāḥ paśavaḥ vadanti

original: RV_8,100.11c sā no mandreṣam ūrjaṃ duhānā dhenur vāg asmān upa suṣṭutaitu //
analyzed: sā naḥ mandrā iṣam ūrjam duhānā dhenuḥ vāc asmān upa suṣṭutā etu

original: RV_8,100.12a sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva dyaur dehi lokaṃ vajrāya viṣkabhe /
analyzed: sakhe viṣṇo vitaram vi kramasva dyauḥ dehi lokam vajrāya viṣkabhe

original: RV_8,100.12c hanāva vṛtraṃ riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: hanāva vṛtram riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_8,101.01a ṛdhag itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye /
analyzed: ṛdhak itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye

original: RV_8,101.01c yo nūnam mitrāvaruṇāv abhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye //
analyzed: yaḥ nūnam mitrāvaruṇau abhiṣṭaye ācakre havya dātaye

original: RV_8,101.02a varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā /
analyzed: varṣiṣṭha kṣatrau uru cakṣasā narā rājānā dīrgha śruttamā

original: RV_8,101.02c tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_8,101.03a pra yo vām mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat /
analyzed: pra yaḥ vām mitrāvaruṇā ajiraḥ dūtaḥ adravat

original: RV_8,101.03c ayaḥśīrṣā maderaghuḥ //
analyzed: ayaḥ śīrṣā maderaghuḥ

original: RV_8,101.04a na yaḥ sampṛcche na punar havītave na saṃvādāya ramate /
analyzed: na yaḥ sampṛcche na punar havītave na saṃvādāya ramate

original: RV_8,101.04c tasmān no adya samṛter uruṣyatam bāhubhyāṃ na uruṣyatam //
analyzed: tasmāt naḥ adya samṛteḥ uruṣyatam bāhubhyām naḥ uruṣyatam

original: RV_8,101.05a pra mitrāya prāryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso /
analyzed: pra mitrāya pra aryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso

original: RV_8,101.05c varūthyaṃ varuṇe chandyaṃ vaca stotraṃ rājasu gāyata //
analyzed: varūthyam varuṇe chandyam vacaḥ stotram rājasu gāyata

original: RV_8,101.06a te hinvire aruṇaṃ jenyaṃ vasv ekam putraṃ tisṝṇām /
analyzed: te hinvire aruṇam jenyam vasu ekam putram tisṝṇām

original: RV_8,101.06c te dhāmāny amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate //
analyzed: te dhāmāni amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate

original: RV_8,101.07a ā me vacāṃsy udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā /
analyzed: ā me vacāṃsi udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā

original: RV_8,101.07c ubhā yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye //
analyzed: ubhā yātam nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye

original: RV_8,101.08a rātiṃ yad vām arakṣasaṃ havāmahe yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū /
analyzed: rātim yat vām arakṣasam havāmahe yuvābhyām vājinīvasū

original: RV_8,101.08c prācīṃ hotrām pratirantāv itaṃ narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā //
analyzed: prācīm hotrām pratirantau itam narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā

original: RV_8,101.09a ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam divispṛśam vāyo yāhi su manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,101.09c antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yaṃ śukro ayāmi te //
analyzed: antar pavitre upari śrīṇānaḥ yam śukraḥ ayāmi te

original: RV_8,101.10a vety adhvaryuḥ pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye /
analyzed: veti adhvaryuḥ pathibhiḥ rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye

original: RV_8,101.10c adhā niyutva ubhayasya naḥ piba śuciṃ somaṃ gavāśiram //
analyzed: adha niyutvas ubhayasya naḥ piba śucim somam gavāśiram

original: RV_8,101.11a baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḷ āditya mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: baṭ mahān asi sūrya baṭ āditya mahān asi

original: RV_8,101.11c mahas te sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahāṃ asi //
analyzed: mahaḥ te sataḥ mahimā panasyate ddhā deva mahān asi

original: RV_8,101.12a baṭ sūrya śravasā mahāṃ asi satrā deva mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: baṭ sūrya śravasā mahān asi satrā deva mahān asi

original: RV_8,101.12c mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotir adābhyam //
analyzed: mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohitaḥ vibhu jyotiḥ adābhyam

original: RV_8,101.13a iyaṃ yā nīcy arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā /
analyzed: iyam yā nīcī arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā

original: RV_8,101.13c citreva praty adarśy āyaty antar daśasu bāhuṣu //
analyzed: citrā iva prati adarśi āyatī antar daśasu bāhuṣu

original: RV_8,101.14a prajā ha tisro atyāyam īyur ny anyā arkam abhito viviśre /
analyzed: prajāḥ ha tisraḥ atyāyam īyuḥ ni anyāḥ arkam abhitas viviśre

original: RV_8,101.14c bṛhad dha tasthau bhuvaneṣv antaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa //
analyzed: bṛhat ha tasthau bhuvaneṣu antar pavamānaḥ haritaḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_8,101.15a mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: mātā rudrāṇām duhitā vasūnām svasā ādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_8,101.15c pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditiṃ vadhiṣṭa //
analyzed: pra nu vocam cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditim vadhiṣṭa

original: RV_8,101.16a vacovidaṃ vācam udīrayantīṃ viśvābhir dhībhir upatiṣṭhamānām /
analyzed: vacaḥ vidam vācam udīrayantīm viśvābhiḥ dhībhiḥ upatiṣṭhamānām

original: RV_8,101.16c devīṃ devebhyaḥ pary eyuṣīṃ gām ā māvṛkta martyo dabhracetāḥ //
analyzed: devīm devebhyaḥ pari eyuṣīm gām ā mā avṛkta martyaḥ dabhra cetāḥ

original: RV_8,102.01a tvam agne bṛhad vayo dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe /
analyzed: tvam agne bṛhat vayaḥ dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,102.01c kavir gṛhapatir yuvā //
analyzed: kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā

original: RV_8,102.02a sa na īḷānayā saha devāṃ agne duvasyuvā /
analyzed: sa naḥ īḍānayā saha devān agne duvasyuvā

original: RV_8,102.02c cikid vibhānav ā vaha //
analyzed: cikit vibhāno ā vaha

original: RV_8,102.03a tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya /
analyzed: tvayā ha svid yujā vayam codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_8,102.03c abhi ṣmo vājasātaye //
analyzed: abhi smaḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_8,102.04a aurvabhṛguvac chucim apnavānavad ā huve /
analyzed: aurva bhṛgu vat śucim apnavāna vat ā huve

original: RV_8,102.04c agniṃ samudravāsasam //
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_8,102.05a huve vātasvanaṃ kavim parjanyakrandyaṃ sahaḥ /
analyzed: huve vāta svanam kavim parjanya krandyam sahaḥ

original: RV_8,102.05c agniṃ samudravāsasam //
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_8,102.06a ā savaṃ savitur yathā bhagasyeva bhujiṃ huve /
analyzed: ā savam savituḥ yathā bhagasya iva bhujim huve

original: RV_8,102.06c agniṃ samudravāsasam //
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_8,102.07a agniṃ vo vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam /
analyzed: agnim vaḥ vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam

original: RV_8,102.07c acchā naptre sahasvate //
analyzed: acchā naptre sahasvate

original: RV_8,102.08a ayaṃ yathā na ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpeva takṣyā /
analyzed: ayam yathā naḥ ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpā iva takṣyā

original: RV_8,102.08c asya kratvā yaśasvataḥ //
analyzed: asya kratvā yaśasvataḥ

original: RV_8,102.09a ayaṃ viśvā abhi śriyo 'gnir deveṣu patyate /
analyzed: ayam viśvāḥ abhi śriyaḥ gniḥ deveṣu patyate

original: RV_8,102.09c ā vājair upa no gamat //
analyzed: ā vājaiḥ upa naḥ gamat

original: RV_8,102.10a viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇāṃ yaśastamam /
analyzed: viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇām yaśastamam

original: RV_8,102.10c agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam //
analyzed: agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_8,102.11a śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ jyeṣṭho yo dameṣv ā /
analyzed: śīram pāvaka śociṣam jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ dameṣu ā

original: RV_8,102.11c dīdāya dīrghaśruttamaḥ //
analyzed: dīdāya dīrghaśruttamaḥ

original: RV_8,102.12a tam arvantaṃ na sānasiṃ gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam /
analyzed: tam arvantam na sānasim gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam

original: RV_8,102.12c mitraṃ na yātayajjanam //
analyzed: mitram na yātayat janam

original: RV_8,102.13a upa tvā jāmayo giro dediśatīr haviṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: upa tvā jāmayaḥ giraḥ dediśatīḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,102.13c vāyor anīke asthiran //
analyzed: vāyoḥ anīke asthiran

original: RV_8,102.14a yasya tridhātv avṛtam barhis tasthāv asaṃdinam /
analyzed: yasya tri dhātu a vṛtam barhiḥ tasthau a saṃdinam

original: RV_8,102.14c āpaś cin ni dadhā padam //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit ni dadha padam

original: RV_8,102.15a padaṃ devasya mīḷhuṣo 'nādhṛṣṭābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: padam devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ na adhṛṣṭābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,102.15c bhadrā sūrya ivopadṛk //
analyzed: bhadrā sūryaḥ iva upadṛś

original: RV_8,102.16a agne ghṛtasya dhītibhis tepāno deva śociṣā /
analyzed: agne ghṛtasya dhītibhiḥ tepānaḥ deva śociṣā

original: RV_8,102.16c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_8,102.17a taṃ tvājananta mātaraḥ kaviṃ devāso aṅgiraḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā ajananta mātaraḥ kavim devāsaḥ aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_8,102.17c havyavāham amartyam //
analyzed: havya vāham amartyam

original: RV_8,102.18a pracetasaṃ tvā kave 'gne dūtaṃ vareṇyam /
analyzed: pracetasam tvā kave gne dūtam vareṇyam

original: RV_8,102.18c havyavāhaṃ ni ṣedire //
analyzed: havyavāham ni sedire

original: RV_8,102.19a nahi me asty aghnyā na svadhitir vananvati /
analyzed: nahi me asti aghnyā na svadhitiḥ vananvati

original: RV_8,102.19c athaitādṛg bharāmi te //
analyzed: atha etādṛś bharāmi te

original: RV_8,102.20a yad agne kāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi /
analyzed: yat agne kāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi

original: RV_8,102.20c tā juṣasva yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: tā juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_8,102.21a yad atty upajihvikā yad vamro atisarpati /
analyzed: yat atti upajihvikā yat vamraḥ atisarpati

original: RV_8,102.21c sarvaṃ tad astu te ghṛtam //
analyzed: sarvam tat astu te ghṛtam

original: RV_8,102.22a agnim indhāno manasā dhiyaṃ saceta martyaḥ /
analyzed: agnim indhānaḥ manasā dhiyam saceta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,102.22c agnim īdhe vivasvabhiḥ //
analyzed: agnim īdhe vivasvabhiḥ

original: RV_8,103.01a adarśi gātuvittamo yasmin vratāny ādadhuḥ /
analyzed: adarśi gātu vittamaḥ yasmin vratāni ādadhuḥ

original: RV_8,103.01c upo ṣu jātam āryasya vardhanam agniṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ //
analyzed: upa u su jātam āryasya vardhanam agnim nakṣanta naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,103.02a pra daivodāso agnir devāṃ acchā na majmanā /
analyzed: pra daivodāsaḥ agniḥ devān acchā na majmanā

original: RV_8,103.02c anu mātaram pṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi //
analyzed: anu mātaram pṛthivīm vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi

original: RV_8,103.03a yasmād rejanta kṛṣṭayaś carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt rejanta kṛṣṭayaḥ carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ

original: RV_8,103.03c sahasrasām medhasātāv iva tmanāgniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata //
analyzed: sahasra sām medha sātau iva tmanā agnim dhībhiḥ saparyata

original: RV_8,103.04a pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yas te vaso dāśat /
analyzed: pra yam rāye ninīṣasi martaḥ yaḥ te vaso dāśat

original: RV_8,103.04c sa vīraṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam //
analyzed: sa vīram dhatte agne uktha śaṃsinam tmanā sahasra poṣiṇam

original: RV_8,103.05a sa dṛḷhe cid abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ /
analyzed: sa dṛḷhe cit abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_8,103.05c tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi //
analyzed: tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_8,103.06a yo viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandro janānām /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandraḥ janānām

original: RV_8,103.06c madhor na pātrā prathamāny asmai pra stomā yanty agnaye //
analyzed: madhoḥ na pātrā prathamāni asmai pra stomāḥ yanti agnaye

original: RV_8,103.07a aśvaṃ na gīrbhī rathyaṃ sudānavo marmṛjyante devayavaḥ /
analyzed: aśvam na gīrbhiḥ rathyam sudānavaḥ marmṛjyante devayavaḥ

original: RV_8,103.07c ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādho maghonām //
analyzed: ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_8,103.08a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukraśociṣe /
analyzed: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukra śociṣe

original: RV_8,103.08c upastutāso agnaye //
analyzed: upastutāsaḥ agnaye

original: RV_8,103.09a ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravad yaśaḥ samiddho dyumny āhutaḥ /
analyzed: ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravat yaśaḥ samiddhaḥ dyumnī āhutaḥ

original: RV_8,103.09c kuvin no asya sumatir navīyasy acchā vājebhir āgamat //
analyzed: kuvid naḥ asya sumatiḥ navīyasī acchā vājebhiḥ āgamat

original: RV_8,103.10a preṣṭham u priyāṇāṃ stuhy āsāvātithim /
analyzed: preṣṭham u priyāṇām stuhi āsāva atithim

original: RV_8,103.10c agniṃ rathānāṃ yamam //
analyzed: agnim rathānām yamam

original: RV_8,103.11a uditā yo niditā veditā vasv ā yajñiyo vavartati /
analyzed: uditā yaḥ niditā veditā vasū ā yajñiyaḥ vavartati

original: RV_8,103.11c duṣṭarā yasya pravaṇe normayo dhiyā vājaṃ siṣāsataḥ //
analyzed: duṣṭarāḥ yasya pravaṇe na ūrmayaḥ dhiyā vājam siṣāsataḥ

original: RV_8,103.12a mā no hṛṇītām atithir vasur agniḥ purupraśasta eṣaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ hṛṇītām atithiḥ vasuḥ agniḥ puru praśastaḥ eṣaḥ

original: RV_8,103.12c yaḥ suhotā svadhvaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ su hotā su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_8,103.13a mo te riṣan ye acchoktibhir vaso 'gne kebhiś cid evaiḥ /
analyzed: mā u te riṣan ye acchoktibhiḥ vaso gne kebhiḥ cit evaiḥ

original: RV_8,103.13c kīriś cid dhi tvām īṭṭe dūtyāya rātahavyaḥ svadhvaraḥ //
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvām īṭṭe dūtyāya rāta havyaḥ su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_8,103.14a āgne yāhi marutsakhā rudrebhiḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: ā agne yāhi marut sakhā rudrebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,103.14c sobharyā upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare //
analyzed: sobharyāḥ upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare

original: Ṛgveda 9
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_9,001.01a svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā /
analyzed: svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_9,001.01c indrāya pātave sutaḥ //
analyzed: indrāya pātave sutaḥ

original: RV_9,001.02a rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇir abhi yonim ayohatam /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ hā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ abhi yonim ayaḥ hatam

original: RV_9,001.02c druṇā sadhastham āsadat //
analyzed: druṇā sadhastham āsadat

original: RV_9,001.03a varivodhātamo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vṛtrahantamaḥ /
analyzed: varivaḥ dhātamaḥ bhava maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vṛtra hantamaḥ

original: RV_9,001.03c parṣi rādho maghonām //
analyzed: parṣi rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_9,001.04a abhy arṣa mahānāṃ devānāṃ vītim andhasā /
analyzed: abhi arṣa mahānām devānām vītim andhasā

original: RV_9,001.04c abhi vājam uta śravaḥ //
analyzed: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ
