original: RV_9,001.05a tvām acchā carāmasi tad id arthaṃ dive-dive /
analyzed: tvām acchā carāmasi tat id artham dive dive

original: RV_9,001.05c indo tve na āśasaḥ //
analyzed: indo tve naḥ āśasaḥ

original: RV_9,001.06a punāti te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā /
analyzed: punāti te parisrutam somam sūryasya duhitā

original: RV_9,001.06c vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā //
analyzed: vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā

original: RV_9,001.07a tam īm aṇvīḥ samarya ā gṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇo daśa /
analyzed: tam īm aṇvīḥ samarye ā gṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇaḥ daśa

original: RV_9,001.07c svasāraḥ pārye divi //
analyzed: svasāraḥ pārye divi

original: RV_9,001.08a tam īṃ hinvanty agruvo dhamanti bākuraṃ dṛtim /
analyzed: tam īm hinvanti agruvaḥ dhamanti bākuram dṛtim

original: RV_9,001.08c tridhātu vāraṇam madhu //
analyzed: tri dhātu vāraṇam madhu

original: RV_9,001.09a abhīmam aghnyā uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum /
analyzed: abhi imam aghnyāḥ uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum

original: RV_9,001.09c somam indrāya pātave //
analyzed: somam indrāya pātave

original: RV_9,001.10a asyed indro madeṣv ā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate /
analyzed: asya id indraḥ madeṣu ā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_9,001.10c śūro maghā ca maṃhate //
analyzed: śūraḥ maghā ca maṃhate

original: RV_9,002.01a pavasva devavīr ati pavitraṃ soma raṃhyā /
analyzed: pavasva deva vīḥ ati pavitram soma raṃhyā

original: RV_9,002.01c indram indo vṛṣā viśa //
analyzed: indram indo vṛṣā viśa

original: RV_9,002.02a ā vacyasva mahi psaro vṛṣendo dyumnavattamaḥ /
analyzed: ā vacyasva mahi psaraḥ vṛṣā indo dyumnavattamaḥ

original: RV_9,002.02c ā yoniṃ dharṇasiḥ sadaḥ //
analyzed: ā yonim dharṇasiḥ sadaḥ

original: RV_9,002.03a adhukṣata priyam madhu dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: adhukṣata priyam madhu dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_9,002.03c apo vasiṣṭa sukratuḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ vasiṣṭa sukratuḥ

original: RV_9,002.04a mahāntaṃ tvā mahīr anv āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: mahāntam tvā mahīḥ anu āpaḥ arṣanti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_9,002.04c yad gobhir vāsayiṣyase //
analyzed: yat gobhiḥ vāsayiṣyase

original: RV_9,002.05a samudro apsu māmṛje viṣṭambho dharuṇo divaḥ /
analyzed: samudraḥ apsu māmṛje viṣṭambhaḥ dharuṇaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_9,002.05c somaḥ pavitre asmayuḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ pavitre asmayuḥ

original: RV_9,002.06a acikradad vṛṣā harir mahān mitro na darśataḥ /
analyzed: acikradat vṛṣā hariḥ mahān mitraḥ na darśataḥ

original: RV_9,002.06c saṃ sūryeṇa rocate //
analyzed: sam sūryeṇa rocate

original: RV_9,002.07a giras ta inda ojasā marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ /
analyzed: giraḥ te indo ojasā marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ

original: RV_9,002.07c yābhir madāya śumbhase //
analyzed: yābhiḥ madāya śumbhase

original: RV_9,002.08a taṃ tvā madāya ghṛṣvaya u lokakṛtnum īmahe /
analyzed: tam tvā madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ u loka kṛtnum īmahe

original: RV_9,002.08c tava praśastayo mahīḥ //
analyzed: tava praśastayaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_9,002.09a asmabhyam indav indrayur madhvaḥ pavasva dhārayā /
analyzed: asmabhyam indo indrayuḥ madhvaḥ pavasva dhārayā

original: RV_9,002.09c parjanyo vṛṣṭimāṃ iva //
analyzed: parjanyaḥ vṛṣṭimān iva

original: RV_9,002.10a goṣā indo nṛṣā asy aśvasā vājasā uta /
analyzed: go sāḥ indo nṛ sāḥ asi aśva sāḥ vāja sāḥ uta

original: RV_9,002.10c ātmā yajñasya pūrvyaḥ //
analyzed: ātmā yajñasya pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_9,003.01a eṣa devo amartyaḥ parṇavīr iva dīyati /
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ amartyaḥ parṇa vīḥ iva dīyati

original: RV_9,003.01c abhi droṇāny āsadam //
analyzed: abhi droṇāni āsadam

original: RV_9,003.02a eṣa devo vipā kṛto 'ti hvarāṃsi dhāvati /
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ vipā kṛtaḥ ti hvarāṃsi dhāvati

original: RV_9,003.02c pavamāno adābhyaḥ //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_9,003.03a eṣa devo vipanyubhiḥ pavamāna ṛtāyubhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ vipanyubhiḥ pavamānaḥ ṛtāyubhiḥ

original: RV_9,003.03c harir vājāya mṛjyate //
analyzed: hariḥ vājāya mṛjyate

original: RV_9,003.04a eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūro yann iva satvabhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūraḥ yan iva satvabhiḥ

original: RV_9,003.04c pavamānaḥ siṣāsati //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ siṣāsati

original: RV_9,003.05a eṣa devo ratharyati pavamāno daśasyati /
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ ratharyati pavamānaḥ daśasyati

original: RV_9,003.05c āviṣ kṛṇoti vagvanum //
analyzed: āvis kṛṇoti vagvanum

original: RV_9,003.06a eṣa viprair abhiṣṭuto 'po devo vi gāhate /
analyzed: eṣa vipraiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ u devaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_9,003.06c dadhad ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_9,003.07a eṣa divaṃ vi dhāvati tiro rajāṃsi dhārayā /
analyzed: eṣa divam vi dhāvati tiras rajāṃsi dhārayā

original: RV_9,003.07c pavamānaḥ kanikradat //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_9,003.08a eṣa divaṃ vy āsarat tiro rajāṃsy aspṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa divam vi āsarat tiras rajāṃsi a spṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,003.08c pavamānaḥ svadhvaraḥ //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_9,003.09a eṣa pratnena janmanā devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa pratnena janmanā devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,003.09c hariḥ pavitre arṣati //
analyzed: hariḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_9,003.10a eṣa u sya puruvrato jajñāno janayann iṣaḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ u sya puru vrataḥ jajñānaḥ janayan iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,003.10c dhārayā pavate sutaḥ //
analyzed: dhārayā pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,004.01a sanā ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ /
analyzed: sana ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ

original: RV_9,004.01c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.02a sanā jyotiḥ sanā svar viśvā ca soma saubhagā /
analyzed: sana jyotiḥ sana svar viśvā ca soma saubhagā

original: RV_9,004.02c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.03a sanā dakṣam uta kratum apa soma mṛdho jahi /
analyzed: sana dakṣam uta kratum apa soma mṛdhaḥ jahi

original: RV_9,004.03c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.04a pavītāraḥ punītana somam indrāya pātave /
analyzed: pavītāraḥ punītana somam indrāya pātave

original: RV_9,004.04c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.05a tvaṃ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ /
analyzed: tvam sūrye naḥ ā bhaja tava kratvā tava ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_9,004.05c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.06a tava kratvā tavotibhir jyok paśyema sūryam /
analyzed: tava kratvā tava ūtibhiḥ jyok paśyema sūryam

original: RV_9,004.06c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.07a abhy arṣa svāyudha soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim /
analyzed: abhi arṣa su āyudha soma dvibarhasam rayim

original: RV_9,004.07c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.08a abhy arṣānapacyuto rayiṃ samatsu sāsahiḥ /
analyzed: abhi arṣa an apacyutaḥ rayim samatsu sāsahiḥ

original: RV_9,004.08c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.09a tvāṃ yajñair avīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi /
analyzed: tvām yajñaiḥ avīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi

original: RV_9,004.09c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,004.10a rayiṃ naś citram aśvinam indo viśvāyum ā bhara /
analyzed: rayim naḥ citram aśvinam indo viśvāyum ā bhara

original: RV_9,004.10c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi //
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,005.01a samiddho viśvatas patiḥ pavamāno vi rājati /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ viśvatas patiḥ pavamānaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_9,005.01c prīṇan vṛṣā kanikradat //
analyzed: prīṇan vṛṣā kanikradat

original: RV_9,005.02a tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśāno arṣati /
analyzed: tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,005.02c antarikṣeṇa rārajat //
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa rārajat

original: RV_9,005.03a īḷenyaḥ pavamāno rayir vi rājati dyumān /
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ pavamānaḥ rayiḥ vi rājati dyumān

original: RV_9,005.03c madhor dhārābhir ojasā //
analyzed: madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,005.04a barhiḥ prācīnam ojasā pavamāna stṛṇan hariḥ /
analyzed: barhiḥ prācīnam ojasā pavamāna stṛṇan hariḥ

original: RV_9,005.04c deveṣu deva īyate //
analyzed: deveṣu devaḥ īyate

original: RV_9,005.05a ud ātair jihate bṛhad dvāro devīr hiraṇyayīḥ /
analyzed: ud ā ataiḥ jihate bṛhat dvāraḥ devīḥ hiraṇyayīḥ

original: RV_9,005.05c pavamānena suṣṭutāḥ //
analyzed: pavamānena suṣṭutāḥ

original: RV_9,005.06a suśilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamāno vṛṣaṇyati /
analyzed: su śilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamānaḥ vṛṣaṇyati

original: RV_9,005.06c naktoṣāsā na darśate //
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā na darśate

original: RV_9,005.07a ubhā devā nṛcakṣasā hotārā daivyā huve /
analyzed: ubhā devā nṛ cakṣasā hotārā daivyā huve

original: RV_9,005.07c pavamāna indro vṛṣā //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ indraḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_9,005.08a bhāratī pavamānasya sarasvatīḷā mahī /
analyzed: bhāratī pavamānasya sarasvatī iḍā mahī

original: RV_9,005.08c imaṃ no yajñam ā gaman tisro devīḥ supeśasaḥ //
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam ā gaman tisraḥ devīḥ supeśasaḥ

original: RV_9,005.09a tvaṣṭāram agrajāṃ gopām puroyāvānam ā huve /
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram agra jām gopām puras yāvānam ā huve

original: RV_9,005.09c indur indro vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: induḥ indraḥ vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: RV_9,005.10a vanaspatim pavamāna madhvā sam aṅgdhi dhārayā /
analyzed: vanaspatim pavamāna madhvā sam aṅgdhi dhārayā

original: RV_9,005.10c sahasravalśaṃ haritam bhrājamānaṃ hiraṇyayam //
analyzed: sahasra valśam haritam bhrājamānam hiraṇyayam

original: RV_9,005.11a viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtim pavamānasyā gata /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtim pavamānasya ā gata

original: RV_9,005.11c vāyur bṛhaspatiḥ sūryo 'gnir indraḥ sajoṣasaḥ //
analyzed: vāyuḥ bṛhaspatiḥ sūryaḥ gniḥ indraḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_9,006.01a mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ /
analyzed: mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ

original: RV_9,006.01c avyo vāreṣv asmayuḥ //
analyzed: avyaḥ vāreṣu asmayuḥ

original: RV_9,006.02a abhi tyam madyam madam indav indra iti kṣara /
analyzed: abhi tyam madyam madam indo indraḥ iti kṣara

original: RV_9,006.02c abhi vājino arvataḥ //
analyzed: abhi vājinaḥ arvataḥ

original: RV_9,006.03a abhi tyam pūrvyam madaṃ suvāno arṣa pavitra ā /
analyzed: abhi tyam pūrvyam madam suvānaḥ arṣa pavitre ā

original: RV_9,006.03c abhi vājam uta śravaḥ //
analyzed: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ

original: RV_9,006.04a anu drapsāsa indava āpo na pravatāsaran /
analyzed: anu drapsāsaḥ indavaḥ āpaḥ na pravatā asaran

original: RV_9,006.04c punānā indram āśata //
analyzed: punānāḥ indram āśata

original: RV_9,006.05a yam atyam iva vājinam mṛjanti yoṣaṇo daśa /
analyzed: yam atyam iva vājinam mṛjanti yoṣaṇaḥ daśa

original: RV_9,006.05c vane krīḷantam atyavim //
analyzed: vane krīḍantam atyavim

original: RV_9,006.06a taṃ gobhir vṛṣaṇaṃ rasam madāya devavītaye /
analyzed: tam gobhiḥ vṛṣaṇam rasam madāya deva vītaye

original: RV_9,006.06c sutam bharāya saṃ sṛja //
analyzed: sutam bharāya sam sṛja

original: RV_9,006.07a devo devāya dhārayendrāya pavate sutaḥ /
analyzed: devaḥ devāya dhārayā indrāya pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,006.07c payo yad asya pīpayat //
analyzed: payaḥ yat asya pīpayat

original: RV_9,006.08a ātmā yajñasya raṃhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā yajñasya raṃhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,006.08c pratnaṃ ni pāti kāvyam //
analyzed: pratnam ni pāti kāvyam

original: RV_9,006.09a evā punāna indrayur madam madiṣṭha vītaye /
analyzed: eva punānaḥ indrayuḥ madam madiṣṭha vītaye

original: RV_9,006.09c guhā cid dadhiṣe giraḥ //
analyzed: guhā cit dadhiṣe giraḥ

original: RV_9,007.01a asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharmann ṛtasya suśriyaḥ /
analyzed: asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharman ṛtasya su śriyaḥ

original: RV_9,007.01c vidānā asya yojanam //
analyzed: vidānāḥ asya yojanam

original: RV_9,007.02a pra dhārā madhvo agriyo mahīr apo vi gāhate /
analyzed: pra dhārāḥ madhvaḥ agriyaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_9,007.02c havir haviṣṣu vandyaḥ //
analyzed: haviḥ haviḥṣu vandyaḥ

original: RV_9,007.03a pra yujo vāco agriyo vṛṣāva cakradad vane /
analyzed: pra yujaḥ vācaḥ agriyaḥ vṛṣā ava cakradat vane

original: RV_9,007.03c sadmābhi satyo adhvaraḥ //
analyzed: sadma abhi satyaḥ adhvaraḥ

original: RV_9,007.04a pari yat kāvyā kavir nṛmṇā vasāno arṣati /
analyzed: pari yat kāvyā kaviḥ nṛmṇā vasānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,007.04c svar vājī siṣāsati //
analyzed: svar vājī siṣāsati

original: RV_9,007.05a pavamāno abhi spṛdho viśo rājeva sīdati /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ viśaḥ rājā iva sīdati

original: RV_9,007.05c yad īm ṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ //
analyzed: yat īm ṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_9,007.06a avyo vāre pari priyo harir vaneṣu sīdati /
analyzed: avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ hariḥ vaneṣu sīdati

original: RV_9,007.06c rebho vanuṣyate matī //
analyzed: rebhaḥ vanuṣyate matī

original: RV_9,007.07a sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gacchati /
analyzed: sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gacchati

original: RV_9,007.07c raṇā yo asya dharmabhiḥ //
analyzed: raṇā yaḥ asya dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,007.08a ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavanta ūrmayaḥ /
analyzed: ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavante ūrmayaḥ

original: RV_9,007.08c vidānā asya śakmabhiḥ //
analyzed: vidānāḥ asya śakmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,007.09a asmabhyaṃ rodasī rayim madhvo vājasya sātaye /
analyzed: asmabhyam rodasī rayim madhvaḥ vājasya sātaye

original: RV_9,007.09c śravo vasūni saṃ jitam //
analyzed: śravaḥ vasūni sam jitam

original: RV_9,008.01a ete somā abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran /
analyzed: ete somāḥ abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran

original: RV_9,008.01c vardhanto asya vīryam //
analyzed: vardhantaḥ asya vīryam

original: RV_9,008.02a punānāsaś camūṣado gacchanto vāyum aśvinā /
analyzed: punānāsaḥ camūṣadaḥ gacchantaḥ vāyum aśvinā

original: RV_9,008.02c te no dhāntu suvīryam //
analyzed: te naḥ dhāntu su vīryam

original: RV_9,008.03a indrasya soma rādhase punāno hārdi codaya /
analyzed: indrasya soma rādhase punānaḥ hārdi codaya

original: RV_9,008.03c ṛtasya yonim āsadam //
analyzed: ṛtasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_9,008.04a mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipo hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipaḥ hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_9,008.04c anu viprā amādiṣuḥ //
analyzed: anu viprāḥ amādiṣuḥ

original: RV_9,008.05a devebhyas tvā madāya kaṃ sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ /
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tvā madāya kam sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ

original: RV_9,008.05c saṃ gobhir vāsayāmasi //
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ vāsayāmasi

original: RV_9,008.06a punānaḥ kalaśeṣv ā vastrāṇy aruṣo hariḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ kalaśeṣu ā vastrāṇi aruṣaḥ hariḥ

original: RV_9,008.06c pari gavyāny avyata //
analyzed: pari gavyāni avyata

original: RV_9,008.07a maghona ā pavasva no jahi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: maghone ā pavasva naḥ jahi viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_9,008.07c indo sakhāyam ā viśa //
analyzed: indo sakhāyam ā viśa

original: RV_9,008.08a vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyā adhi /
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyāḥ adhi

original: RV_9,008.08c saho naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ //
analyzed: sahaḥ naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ

original: RV_9,008.09a nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā vayam indrapītaṃ svarvidam /
analyzed: nṛ cakṣasam tvā vayam indra pītam svar vidam

original: RV_9,008.09c bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam //
analyzed: bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam

original: RV_9,009.01a pari priyā divaḥ kavir vayāṃsi naptyor hitaḥ /
analyzed: pari priyā divaḥ kaviḥ vayāṃsi naptyoḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_9,009.01c suvāno yāti kavikratuḥ //
analyzed: suvānaḥ yāti kavi kratuḥ

original: RV_9,009.02a pra-pra kṣayāya panyase janāya juṣṭo adruhe /
analyzed: pra pra kṣayāya panyase janāya juṣṭaḥ adruhe

original: RV_9,009.02c vīty arṣa caniṣṭhayā //
analyzed: vītī arṣa caniṣṭhayā

original: RV_9,009.03a sa sūnur mātarā śucir jāto jāte arocayat /
analyzed: sa sūnuḥ mātarā śuciḥ jātaḥ jāte arocayat

original: RV_9,009.03c mahān mahī ṛtāvṛdhā //
analyzed: mahān mahī ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_9,009.04a sa sapta dhītibhir hito nadyo ajinvad adruhaḥ /
analyzed: sa sapta dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ nadyaḥ ajinvat adruhaḥ

original: RV_9,009.04c yā ekam akṣi vāvṛdhuḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ ekam akṣi vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_9,009.05a tā abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā dadhuḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā

original: RV_9,009.05c indum indra tava vrate //
analyzed: indum indra tava vrate

original: RV_9,009.06a abhi vahnir amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ /
analyzed: abhi vahniḥ amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ

original: RV_9,009.06c krivir devīr atarpayat //
analyzed: kriviḥ devīḥ atarpayat

original: RV_9,009.07a avā kalpeṣu naḥ pumas tamāṃsi soma yodhyā /
analyzed: ava kalpeṣu naḥ pumaḥ tamāṃsi soma yodhyā

original: RV_9,009.07c tāni punāna jaṅghanaḥ //
analyzed: tāni punāna jaṅghanaḥ

original: RV_9,009.08a nū navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhayā pathaḥ /
analyzed: nu navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhaya pathaḥ

original: RV_9,009.08c pratnavad rocayā rucaḥ //
analyzed: pratna vat rocaya rucaḥ

original: RV_9,009.09a pavamāna mahi śravo gām aśvaṃ rāsi vīravat /
analyzed: pavamāna mahi śravaḥ gām aśvam rāsi vīravat

original: RV_9,009.09c sanā medhāṃ sanā svaḥ //
analyzed: sana medhām sana svar

original: RV_9,010.01a pra svānāso rathā ivārvanto na śravasyavaḥ /
analyzed: pra svānāsaḥ rathāḥ iva arvantaḥ na śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_9,010.01c somāso rāye akramuḥ //
analyzed: somāsaḥ rāye akramuḥ

original: RV_9,010.02a hinvānāso rathā iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: hinvānāsaḥ rathāḥ iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,010.02c bharāsaḥ kāriṇām iva //
analyzed: bharāsaḥ kāriṇām iva

original: RV_9,010.03a rājāno na praśastibhiḥ somāso gobhir añjate /
analyzed: rājānaḥ na praśastibhiḥ somāsaḥ gobhiḥ añjate

original: RV_9,010.03c yajño na sapta dhātṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: yajñaḥ na sapta dhātṛbhiḥ

original: RV_9,010.04a pari suvānāsa indavo madāya barhaṇā girā /
analyzed: pari suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ madāya barhaṇā girā

original: RV_9,010.04c sutā arṣanti dhārayā //
analyzed: sutāḥ arṣanti dhārayā

original: RV_9,010.05a āpānāso vivasvato jananta uṣaso bhagam /
analyzed: āpānāsaḥ vivasvataḥ janantaḥ uṣasaḥ bhagam

original: RV_9,010.05c sūrā aṇvaṃ vi tanvate //
analyzed: sūrāḥ aṇvam vi tanvate

original: RV_9,010.06a apa dvārā matīnām pratnā ṛṇvanti kāravaḥ /
analyzed: apa dvārā matīnām pratnāḥ ṛṇvanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_9,010.06c vṛṣṇo harasa āyavaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ harasaḥ āyavaḥ

original: RV_9,010.07a samīcīnāsa āsate hotāraḥ saptajāmayaḥ /
analyzed: samīcīnāsaḥ āsate hotāraḥ sapta jāmayaḥ

original: RV_9,010.07c padam ekasya piprataḥ //
analyzed: padam ekasya piprataḥ

original: RV_9,010.08a nābhā nābhiṃ na ā dade cakṣuś cit sūrye sacā /
analyzed: nābhā nābhim naḥ ā dade cakṣuḥ cit sūrye sacā

original: RV_9,010.08c kaver apatyam ā duhe //
analyzed: kaveḥ apatyam ā duhe

original: RV_9,010.09a abhi priyā divas padam adhvaryubhir guhā hitam /
analyzed: abhi priyā divaḥ padam adhvaryubhiḥ guhā hitam

original: RV_9,010.09c sūraḥ paśyati cakṣasā //
analyzed: sūraḥ paśyati cakṣasā

original: RV_9,011.01a upāsmai gāyatā naraḥ pavamānāyendave /
analyzed: upa asmai gāyata naraḥ pavamānāya indave

original: RV_9,011.01c abhi devāṃ iyakṣate //
analyzed: abhi devān iyakṣate

original: RV_9,011.02a abhi te madhunā payo 'tharvāṇo aśiśrayuḥ /
analyzed: abhi te madhunā payaḥ tharvāṇaḥ aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_9,011.02c devaṃ devāya devayu //
analyzed: devam devāya devayu

original: RV_9,011.03a sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ gave śaṃ janāya śam arvate /
analyzed: sa naḥ pavasva śam gave śam janāya śam arvate

original: RV_9,011.03c śaṃ rājann oṣadhībhyaḥ //
analyzed: śam rājan oṣadhībhyaḥ

original: RV_9,011.04a babhrave nu svatavase 'ruṇāya divispṛśe /
analyzed: babhrave nu svatavase ruṇāya divispṛśe

original: RV_9,011.04c somāya gātham arcata //
analyzed: somāya gātham arcata

original: RV_9,011.05a hastacyutebhir adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam punītana /
analyzed: hasta cyutebhiḥ adribhiḥ sutam somam punītana

original: RV_9,011.05c madhāv ā dhāvatā madhu //
analyzed: madhau ā dhāvata madhu

original: RV_9,011.06a namased upa sīdata dadhned abhi śrīṇītana /
analyzed: namasā id upa sīdata dadhnā id abhi śrīṇītana

original: RV_9,011.06c indum indre dadhātana //
analyzed: indum indre dadhātana

original: RV_9,011.07a amitrahā vicarṣaṇiḥ pavasva soma śaṃ gave /
analyzed: amitra hā vicarṣaṇiḥ pavasva soma śam gave

original: RV_9,011.07c devebhyo anukāmakṛt //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ anukāma kṛt

original: RV_9,011.08a indrāya soma pātave madāya pari ṣicyase /
analyzed: indrāya soma pātave madāya pari sicyase

original: RV_9,011.08c manaścin manasas patiḥ //
analyzed: manaścit manasaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_9,011.09a pavamāna suvīryaṃ rayiṃ soma rirīhi naḥ /
analyzed: pavamāna su vīryam rayim soma rirīhi naḥ

original: RV_9,011.09c indav indreṇa no yujā //
analyzed: indo indreṇa naḥ yujā

original: RV_9,012.01a somā asṛgram indavaḥ sutā ṛtasya sādane /
analyzed: somāḥ asṛgram indavaḥ sutāḥ ṛtasya sādane

original: RV_9,012.01c indrāya madhumattamāḥ //
analyzed: indrāya madhumattamāḥ

original: RV_9,012.02a abhi viprā anūṣata gāvo vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ /
analyzed: abhi viprāḥ anūṣata gāvaḥ vatsam na mātaraḥ

original: RV_9,012.02c indraṃ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_9,012.03a madacyut kṣeti sādane sindhor ūrmā vipaścit /
analyzed: mada cyut kṣeti sādane sindhoḥ ūrmā vipaścit

original: RV_9,012.03c somo gaurī adhi śritaḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ gaurī adhi śritaḥ

original: RV_9,012.04a divo nābhā vicakṣaṇo 'vyo vāre mahīyate /
analyzed: divaḥ nābhā vicakṣaṇaḥ vyaḥ vāre mahīyate

original: RV_9,012.04c somo yaḥ sukratuḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ yaḥ su kratuḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_9,012.05a yaḥ somaḥ kalaśeṣv āṃ antaḥ pavitra āhitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ somaḥ kalaśeṣu ām antar pavitre āhitaḥ

original: RV_9,012.05c tam induḥ pari ṣasvaje //
analyzed: tam induḥ pari sasvaje

original: RV_9,012.06a pra vācam indur iṣyati samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi /
analyzed: pra vācam induḥ iṣyati samudrasya adhi viṣṭapi

original: RV_9,012.06c jinvan kośam madhuścutam //
analyzed: jinvan kośam madhuścutam

original: RV_9,012.07a nityastotro vanaspatir dhīnām antaḥ sabardughaḥ /
analyzed: nitya stotraḥ vanaspatiḥ dhīnām antar sabardughaḥ

original: RV_9,012.07c hinvāno mānuṣā yugā //
analyzed: hinvānaḥ mānuṣā yugā

original: RV_9,012.08a abhi priyā divas padā somo hinvāno arṣati /
analyzed: abhi priyā divaḥ padā somaḥ hinvānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,012.08c viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ //
analyzed: viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ

original: RV_9,012.09a ā pavamāna dhāraya rayiṃ sahasravarcasam /
analyzed: ā pavamāna dhāraya rayim sahasra varcasam

original: RV_9,012.09c asme indo svābhuvam //
analyzed: asme indo su ābhuvam

original: RV_9,013.01a somaḥ punāno arṣati sahasradhāro atyaviḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati sahasra dhāraḥ atyaviḥ

original: RV_9,013.01c vāyor indrasya niṣkṛtam //
analyzed: vāyoḥ indrasya niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,013.02a pavamānam avasyavo vipram abhi pra gāyata /
analyzed: pavamānam avasyavaḥ vipram abhi pra gāyata

original: RV_9,013.02c suṣvāṇaṃ devavītaye //
analyzed: suṣvāṇam deva vītaye

original: RV_9,013.03a pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ /
analyzed: pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasra pājasaḥ

original: RV_9,013.03c gṛṇānā devavītaye //
analyzed: gṛṇānāḥ deva vītaye

original: RV_9,013.04a uta no vājasātaye pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ vājasātaye pavasva bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,013.04c dyumad indo suvīryam //
analyzed: dyumat indo su vīryam

original: RV_9,013.05a te naḥ sahasriṇaṃ rayim pavantām ā suvīryam /
analyzed: te naḥ sahasriṇam rayim pavantām ā su vīryam

original: RV_9,013.05c suvānā devāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: suvānāḥ devāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_9,013.06a atyā hiyānā na hetṛbhir asṛgraṃ vājasātaye /
analyzed: atyāḥ hiyānāḥ na hetṛbhiḥ asṛgram vājasātaye

original: RV_9,013.06c vi vāram avyam āśavaḥ //
analyzed: vi vāram avyam āśavaḥ

original: RV_9,013.07a vāśrā arṣantīndavo 'bhi vatsaṃ na dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: vāśrāḥ arṣanti indavaḥ bhi vatsam na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_9,013.07c dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ //
analyzed: dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,013.08a juṣṭa indrāya matsaraḥ pavamāna kanikradat /
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ indrāya matsaraḥ pavamāna kanikradat

original: RV_9,013.08c viśvā apa dviṣo jahi //
analyzed: viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ jahi

original: RV_9,013.09a apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ pavamānāḥ svardṛśaḥ /
analyzed: apaghnantaḥ arāvṇaḥ pavamānāḥ svar dṛśaḥ

original: RV_9,013.09c yonāv ṛtasya sīdata //
analyzed: yonau ṛtasya sīdata

original: RV_9,014.01a pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ sindhor ūrmāv adhi śritaḥ /
analyzed: pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ sindhoḥ ūrmau adhi śritaḥ

original: RV_9,014.01c kāram bibhrat puruspṛham //
analyzed: kāram bibhrat puruspṛham

original: RV_9,014.02a girā yadī sabandhavaḥ pañca vrātā apasyavaḥ /
analyzed: girā yadī sabandhavaḥ pañca vrātāḥ apasyavaḥ

original: RV_9,014.02c pariṣkṛṇvanti dharṇasim //
analyzed: pariṣkṛṇvanti dharṇasim

original: RV_9,014.03a ād asya śuṣmiṇo rase viśve devā amatsata /
analyzed: āt asya śuṣmiṇaḥ rase viśve devāḥ amatsata

original: RV_9,014.03c yadī gobhir vasāyate //
analyzed: yadī gobhiḥ vasāyate

original: RV_9,014.04a niriṇāno vi dhāvati jahac charyāṇi tānvā /
analyzed: niriṇānaḥ vi dhāvati jahat śaryāṇi tānvā

original: RV_9,014.04c atrā saṃ jighnate yujā //
analyzed: atrā sam jighnate yujā

original: RV_9,014.05a naptībhir yo vivasvataḥ śubhro na māmṛje yuvā /
analyzed: naptībhiḥ yaḥ vivasvataḥ śubhraḥ na māmṛje yuvā

original: RV_9,014.05c gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam //
analyzed: gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ na nirṇijam

original: RV_9,014.06a ati śritī tiraścatā gavyā jigāty aṇvyā /
analyzed: ati śritī tiraścatā gavyā jigāti aṇvyā

original: RV_9,014.06c vagnum iyarti yaṃ vide //
analyzed: vagnum iyarti yam vide

original: RV_9,014.07a abhi kṣipaḥ sam agmata marjayantīr iṣas patim /
analyzed: abhi kṣipaḥ sam agmata marjayantīḥ iṣaḥ patim

original: RV_9,014.07c pṛṣṭhā gṛbhṇata vājinaḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhā gṛbhṇata vājinaḥ

original: RV_9,014.08a pari divyāni marmṛśad viśvāni soma pārthivā /
analyzed: pari divyāni marmṛśat viśvāni soma pārthivā

original: RV_9,014.08c vasūni yāhy asmayuḥ //
analyzed: vasūni yāhi asmayuḥ

original: RV_9,015.01a eṣa dhiyā yāty aṇvyā śūro rathebhir āśubhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa dhiyā yāti aṇvyā śūraḥ rathebhiḥ āśubhiḥ

original: RV_9,015.01c gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam //
analyzed: gacchan indrasya niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,015.02a eṣa purū dhiyāyate bṛhate devatātaye /
analyzed: eṣa purū dhiyāyate bṛhate devatātaye

original: RV_9,015.02c yatrāmṛtāsa āsate //
analyzed: yatra amṛtāsaḥ āsate

original: RV_9,015.03a eṣa hito vi nīyate 'ntaḥ śubhrāvatā pathā /
analyzed: eṣa hitaḥ vi nīyate ntar śubhrāvatā pathā

original: RV_9,015.03c yadī tuñjanti bhūrṇayaḥ //
analyzed: yadī tuñjanti bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_9,015.04a eṣa śṛṅgāṇi dodhuvac chiśīte yūthyo vṛṣā /
analyzed: eṣa śṛṅgāṇi dodhuvat śiśīte yūthyaḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_9,015.04c nṛmṇā dadhāna ojasā //
analyzed: nṛmṇā dadhānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,015.05a eṣa rukmibhir īyate vājī śubhrebhir aṃśubhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa rukmibhiḥ īyate vājī śubhrebhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ

original: RV_9,015.05c patiḥ sindhūnām bhavan //
analyzed: patiḥ sindhūnām bhavan

original: RV_9,015.06a eṣa vasūni pibdanā paruṣā yayivāṃ ati /
analyzed: eṣa vasūni pibdanā paruṣā yayivān ati

original: RV_9,015.06c ava śādeṣu gacchati //
analyzed: ava śādeṣu gacchati

original: RV_9,015.07a etam mṛjanti marjyam upa droṇeṣv āyavaḥ /
analyzed: etam mṛjanti marjyam upa droṇeṣu āyavaḥ

original: RV_9,015.07c pracakrāṇam mahīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: pracakrāṇam mahīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,015.08a etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sapta dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: etam u tyam daśa kṣipaḥ mṛjanti sapta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_9,015.08c svāyudham madintamam //
analyzed: su āyudham madintamam

original: RV_9,016.01a pra te sotāra oṇyo rasam madāya ghṛṣvaye /
analyzed: pra te sotāraḥ oṇyoḥ rasam madāya ghṛṣvaye

original: RV_9,016.01c sargo na takty etaśaḥ //
analyzed: sargaḥ na takti etaśaḥ

original: RV_9,016.02a kratvā dakṣasya rathyam apo vasānam andhasā /
analyzed: kratvā dakṣasya rathyam apaḥ vasānam andhasā

original: RV_9,016.02c goṣām aṇveṣu saścima //
analyzed: goṣām aṇveṣu saścima

original: RV_9,016.03a anaptam apsu duṣṭaraṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja /
analyzed: anaptam apsu duṣṭaram somam pavitre ā sṛja

original: RV_9,016.03c punīhīndrāya pātave //
analyzed: punīhi indrāya pātave

original: RV_9,016.04a pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati /
analyzed: pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_9,016.04c kratvā sadhastham āsadat //
analyzed: kratvā sadhastham āsadat

original: RV_9,016.05a pra tvā namobhir indava indra somā asṛkṣata /
analyzed: pra tvā namobhiḥ indavaḥ indra somāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,016.05c mahe bharāya kāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: mahe bharāya kāriṇaḥ

original: RV_9,016.06a punāno rūpe avyaye viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ rūpe avyaye viśvāḥ arṣan abhi śriyaḥ

original: RV_9,016.06c śūro na goṣu tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: śūraḥ na goṣu tiṣṭhati

original: RV_9,016.07a divo na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_9,016.07c vṛthā pavitre arṣati //
analyzed: vṛthā pavitre arṣati

original: RV_9,016.08a tvaṃ soma vipaścitaṃ tanā punāna āyuṣu /
analyzed: tvam soma vipaścitam tanā punānaḥ āyuṣu

original: RV_9,016.08c avyo vāraṃ vi dhāvasi //
analyzed: avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvasi

original: RV_9,017.01a pra nimneneva sindhavo ghnanto vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ /
analyzed: pra nimnena iva sindhavaḥ ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_9,017.01c somā asṛgram āśavaḥ //
analyzed: somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ

original: RV_9,017.02a abhi suvānāsa indavo vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva /
analyzed: abhi suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva

original: RV_9,017.02c indraṃ somāso akṣaran //
analyzed: indram somāsaḥ akṣaran

original: RV_9,017.03a atyūrmir matsaro madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati /
analyzed: atyūrmiḥ matsaraḥ madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_9,017.03c vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ //
analyzed: vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ

original: RV_9,017.04a ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari ṣicyate /
analyzed: ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari sicyate

original: RV_9,017.04c ukthair yajñeṣu vardhate //
analyzed: ukthaiḥ yajñeṣu vardhate

original: RV_9,017.05a ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam /
analyzed: ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam

original: RV_9,017.05c iṣṇan sūryaṃ na codayaḥ //
analyzed: iṣṇan sūryam na codayaḥ

original: RV_9,017.06a abhi viprā anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ /
analyzed: abhi viprāḥ anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ

original: RV_9,017.06c dadhānāś cakṣasi priyam //
analyzed: dadhānāḥ cakṣasi priyam

original: RV_9,017.07a tam u tvā vājinaṃ naro dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ /
analyzed: tam u tvā vājinam naraḥ dhībhiḥ viprāḥ avasyavaḥ

original: RV_9,017.07c mṛjanti devatātaye //
analyzed: mṛjanti devatātaye

original: RV_9,017.08a madhor dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ /
analyzed: madhoḥ dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ

original: RV_9,017.08c cārur ṛtāya pītaye //
analyzed: cāruḥ ṛtāya pītaye

original: RV_9,018.01a pari suvāno giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somo akṣāḥ /
analyzed: pari suvānaḥ giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somaḥ akṣār

original: RV_9,018.01c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,018.02a tvaṃ vipras tvaṃ kavir madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ /
analyzed: tvam vipraḥ tvam kaviḥ madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ

original: RV_9,018.02c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,018.03a tava viśve sajoṣaso devāsaḥ pītim āśata /
analyzed: tava viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ pītim āśata

original: RV_9,018.03c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,018.04a ā yo viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayor dadhe /
analyzed: ā yaḥ viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayoḥ dadhe

original: RV_9,018.04c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,018.05a ya ime rodasī mahī sam mātareva dohate /
analyzed: yaḥ ime rodasī mahī sam mātarā iva dohate

original: RV_9,018.05c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,018.06a pari yo rodasī ubhe sadyo vājebhir arṣati /
analyzed: pari yaḥ rodasī ubhe sadyas vājebhiḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,018.06c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,018.07a sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣv ā punāno acikradat /
analyzed: sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣu ā punānaḥ acikradat

original: RV_9,018.07c madeṣu sarvadhā asi //
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,019.01a yat soma citram ukthyaṃ divyam pārthivaṃ vasu /
analyzed: yat soma citram ukthyam divyam pārthivam vasu

original: RV_9,019.01c tan naḥ punāna ā bhara //
analyzed: tat naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_9,019.02a yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraś ca soma gopatī /
analyzed: yuvam hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraḥ ca soma gopatī

original: RV_9,019.02c īśānā pipyataṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: īśānā pipyatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_9,019.03a vṛṣā punāna āyuṣu stanayann adhi barhiṣi /
analyzed: vṛṣā punānaḥ āyuṣu stanayan adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_9,019.03c hariḥ san yonim āsadat //
analyzed: hariḥ san yonim āsadat

original: RV_9,019.04a avāvaśanta dhītayo vṛṣabhasyādhi retasi /
analyzed: avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ vṛṣabhasya adhi retasi

original: RV_9,019.04c sūnor vatsasya mātaraḥ //
analyzed: sūnoḥ vatsasya mātaraḥ

original: RV_9,019.05a kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punāno garbham ādadhat /
analyzed: kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punānaḥ garbham ādadhat

original: RV_9,019.05c yāḥ śukraṃ duhate payaḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ śukram duhate payaḥ

original: RV_9,019.06a upa śikṣāpatasthuṣo bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu /
analyzed: upa śikṣa apatasthuṣaḥ bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu

original: RV_9,019.06c pavamāna vidā rayim //
analyzed: pavamāna vida rayim

original: RV_9,019.07a ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyaṃ ni śuṣmaṃ ni vayas tira /
analyzed: ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyam ni śuṣmam ni vayaḥ tira

original: RV_9,019.07c dūre vā sato anti vā //
analyzed: dūre vā sataḥ anti vā

original: RV_9,020.01a pra kavir devavītaye 'vyo vārebhir arṣati /
analyzed: pra kaviḥ deva vītaye vyaḥ vārebhiḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,020.01c sāhvān viśvā abhi spṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: sāhvān viśvāḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_9,020.02a sa hi ṣmā jaritṛbhya ā vājaṃ gomantam invati /
analyzed: sa hi sma jaritṛbhyaḥ ā vājam gomantam invati

original: RV_9,020.02c pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam

original: RV_9,020.03a pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī /
analyzed: pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī

original: RV_9,020.03c sa naḥ soma śravo vidaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ soma śravaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_9,020.04a abhy arṣa bṛhad yaśo maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ rayim /
analyzed: abhī arṣa bṛhat yaśaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dhruvam rayim

original: RV_9,020.04c iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_9,020.05a tvaṃ rājeva suvrato giraḥ somā viveśitha /
analyzed: tvam rājā iva suvrataḥ giraḥ soma ā viveśitha

original: RV_9,020.05c punāno vahne adbhuta //
analyzed: punānaḥ vahne adbhuta

original: RV_9,020.06a sa vahnir apsu duṣṭaro mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: sa vahniḥ apsu duṣṭaraḥ mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,020.06c somaś camūṣu sīdati //
analyzed: somaḥ camūṣu sīdati

original: RV_9,020.07a krīḷur makho na maṃhayuḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi /
analyzed: krīḍuḥ makhaḥ na maṃhayuḥ pavitram soma gacchasi

original: RV_9,020.07c dadhat stotre suvīryam //
analyzed: dadhat stotre su vīryam

original: RV_9,021.01a ete dhāvantīndavaḥ somā indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ /
analyzed: ete dhāvanti indavaḥ somāḥ indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_9,021.01c matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ //
analyzed: matsarāsaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_9,021.02a pravṛṇvanto abhiyujaḥ suṣvaye varivovidaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛṇvantaḥ abhiyujaḥ suṣvaye varivaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_9,021.02c svayaṃ stotre vayaskṛtaḥ //
analyzed: svayam stotre vayaskṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,021.03a vṛthā krīḷanta indavaḥ sadhastham abhy ekam it /
analyzed: vṛthā krīḍantaḥ indavaḥ sadhastham abhi ekam id

original: RV_9,021.03c sindhor ūrmā vy akṣaran //
analyzed: sindhoḥ ūrmā vi akṣaran

original: RV_9,021.04a ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsa āśata /
analyzed: ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsaḥ āśata

original: RV_9,021.04c hitā na saptayo rathe //
analyzed: hitāḥ na saptayaḥ rathe

original: RV_9,021.05a āsmin piśaṅgam indavo dadhātā venam ādiśe /
analyzed: ā asmin piśaṅgam indavaḥ dadhāta venam ādiśe

original: RV_9,021.05c yo asmabhyam arāvā //
analyzed: yaḥ asmabhyam arāvā

original: RV_9,021.06a ṛbhur na rathyaṃ navaṃ dadhātā ketam ādiśe /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ na rathyam navam dadhātā ketam ādiśe

original: RV_9,021.06c śukrāḥ pavadhvam arṇasā //
analyzed: śukrāḥ pavadhvam arṇasā

original: RV_9,021.07a eta u tye avīvaśan kāṣṭhāṃ vājino akrata /
analyzed: ete u tye avīvaśan kāṣṭhām vājinaḥ akrata

original: RV_9,021.07c sataḥ prāsāviṣur matim //
analyzed: sataḥ prāsāviṣuḥ matim

original: RV_9,022.01a ete somāsa āśavo rathā iva pra vājinaḥ /
analyzed: ete somāsaḥ āśavaḥ rathāḥ iva pra vājinaḥ

original: RV_9,022.01c sargāḥ sṛṣṭā aheṣata //
analyzed: sargāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ aheṣata

original: RV_9,022.02a ete vātā ivoravaḥ parjanyasyeva vṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: ete vātāḥ iva uravaḥ parjanyasya iva vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_9,022.02c agner iva bhramā vṛthā //
analyzed: agneḥ iva bhramāḥ vṛthā

original: RV_9,022.03a ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
analyzed: ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_9,022.03c vipā vy ānaśur dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: vipā vi ānaśuḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_9,022.04a ete mṛṣṭā amartyāḥ sasṛvāṃso na śaśramuḥ /
analyzed: ete mṛṣṭāḥ amartyāḥ sasṛvāṃsaḥ na śaśramuḥ

original: RV_9,022.04c iyakṣantaḥ patho rajaḥ //
analyzed: iyakṣantaḥ pathaḥ rajaḥ

original: RV_9,022.05a ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasor viprayanto vy ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasoḥ viprayantaḥ vi ānaśuḥ

original: RV_9,022.05c utedam uttamaṃ rajaḥ //
analyzed: uta idam uttamam rajaḥ

original: RV_9,022.06a tantuṃ tanvānam uttamam anu pravata āśata /
analyzed: tantum tanvānam uttamam anu pravataḥ āśata

original: RV_9,022.06c utedam uttamāyyam //
analyzed: uta idam uttamāyyam

original: RV_9,022.07a tvaṃ soma paṇibhya ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ /
analyzed: tvam soma paṇibhyaḥ ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ

original: RV_9,022.07c tataṃ tantum acikradaḥ //
analyzed: tatam tantum acikradaḥ

original: RV_9,023.01a somā asṛgram āśavo madhor madasya dhārayā /
analyzed: somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ madhoḥ madasya dhārayā

original: RV_9,023.01c abhi viśvāni kāvyā //
analyzed: abhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_9,023.02a anu pratnāsa āyavaḥ padaṃ navīyo akramuḥ /
analyzed: anu pratnāsaḥ āyavaḥ padam navīyaḥ akramuḥ

original: RV_9,023.02c ruce jananta sūryam //
analyzed: ruce jananta sūryam

original: RV_9,023.03a ā pavamāna no bharāryo adāśuṣo gayam /
analyzed: ā pavamāna naḥ bhara aryaḥ a dāśuṣaḥ gayam

original: RV_9,023.03c kṛdhi prajāvatīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: kṛdhi prajāvatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,023.04a abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam /
analyzed: abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam

original: RV_9,023.04c abhi kośam madhuścutam //
analyzed: abhi kośam madhuścutam

original: RV_9,023.05a somo arṣati dharṇasir dadhāna indriyaṃ rasam /
analyzed: somaḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ dadhānaḥ indriyam rasam

original: RV_9,023.05c suvīro abhiśastipāḥ //
analyzed: su vīraḥ abhiśasti pāḥ

original: RV_9,023.06a indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ /
analyzed: indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ

original: RV_9,023.06c indo vājaṃ siṣāsasi //
analyzed: indo vājam siṣāsasi

original: RV_9,023.07a asya pītvā madānām indro vṛtrāṇy aprati /
analyzed: asya pītvā madānām indraḥ vṛtrāṇi aprati

original: RV_9,023.07c jaghāna jaghanac ca nu //
analyzed: jaghāna jaghanat ca nu

original: RV_9,024.01a pra somāso adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ /
analyzed: pra somāsaḥ adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_9,024.01c śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata //
analyzed: śrīṇānāḥ apsu mṛñjata

original: RV_9,024.02a abhi gāvo adhanviṣur āpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
analyzed: abhi gāvaḥ adhanviṣuḥ āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_9,024.02c punānā indram āśata //
analyzed: punānāḥ indram āśata

original: RV_9,024.03a pra pavamāna dhanvasi somendrāya pātave /
analyzed: pra pavamāna dhanvasi soma indrāya pātave

original: RV_9,024.03c nṛbhir yato vi nīyase //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vi nīyase

original: RV_9,024.04a tvaṃ soma nṛmādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇīsahe /
analyzed: tvam soma nṛ mādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇī sahe

original: RV_9,024.04c sasnir yo anumādyaḥ //
analyzed: sasniḥ yaḥ anumādyaḥ

original: RV_9,024.05a indo yad adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitram paridhāvasi /
analyzed: indo yat adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitram paridhāvasi

original: RV_9,024.05c aram indrasya dhāmne //
analyzed: aram indrasya dhāmne

original: RV_9,024.06a pavasva vṛtrahantamokthebhir anumādyaḥ /
analyzed: pavasva vṛtra hantama ukthebhiḥ anumādyaḥ

original: RV_9,024.06c śuciḥ pāvako adbhutaḥ //
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_9,024.07a śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ /
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ ucyate somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ

original: RV_9,024.07c devāvīr aghaśaṃsahā //
analyzed: devāvīḥ agha śaṃsa hā

original: RV_9,025.01a pavasva dakṣasādhano devebhyaḥ pītaye hare /
analyzed: pavasva dakṣa sādhanaḥ devebhyaḥ pītaye hare

original: RV_9,025.01c marudbhyo vāyave madaḥ //
analyzed: marudbhyaḥ vāyave madaḥ

original: RV_9,025.02a pavamāna dhiyā hito 'bhi yoniṃ kanikradat /
analyzed: pavamāna dhiyā hitaḥ bhi yonim kanikradat

original: RV_9,025.02c dharmaṇā vāyum ā viśa //
analyzed: dharmaṇā vāyum ā viśa

original: RV_9,025.03a saṃ devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kavir yonāv adhi priyaḥ /
analyzed: sam devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kaviḥ yonau adhi priyaḥ

original: RV_9,025.03c vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ //
analyzed: vṛtra hā deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_9,025.04a viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan punāno yāti haryataḥ /
analyzed: viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan punānaḥ yāti haryataḥ

original: RV_9,025.04c yatrāmṛtāsa āsate //
analyzed: yatra amṛtāsaḥ āsate

original: RV_9,025.05a aruṣo janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavata āyuṣak /
analyzed: aruṣaḥ janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavate āyuṣak

original: RV_9,025.05c indraṃ gacchan kavikratuḥ //
analyzed: indram gacchan kavi kratuḥ

original: RV_9,025.06a ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave /
analyzed: ā pavasva madintama pavitram dhārayā kave

original: RV_9,025.06c arkasya yonim āsadam //
analyzed: arkasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_9,026.01a tam amṛkṣanta vājinam upasthe aditer adhi /
analyzed: tam amṛkṣanta vājinam upasthe aditeḥ adhi

original: RV_9,026.01c viprāso aṇvyā dhiyā //
analyzed: viprāsaḥ aṇvyā dhiyā

original: RV_9,026.02a taṃ gāvo abhy anūṣata sahasradhāram akṣitam /
analyzed: tam gāvaḥ abhī anūṣata sahasra dhāram akṣitam

original: RV_9,026.02c induṃ dhartāram ā divaḥ //
analyzed: indum dhartāram ā divaḥ

original: RV_9,026.03a taṃ vedhām medhayāhyan pavamānam adhi dyavi /
analyzed: tam vedhām medhayā ahyan pavamānam adhi dyavi

original: RV_9,026.03c dharṇasim bhūridhāyasam //
analyzed: dharṇasim bhūri dhāyasam

original: RV_9,026.04a tam ahyan bhurijor dhiyā saṃvasānaṃ vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: tam ahyan bhurijoḥ dhiyā saṃvasānam vivasvataḥ

original: RV_9,026.04c patiṃ vāco adābhyam //
analyzed: patim vācaḥ adābhyam

original: RV_9,026.05a taṃ sānāv adhi jāmayo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: tam sānau adhi jāmayaḥ harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,026.05c haryatam bhūricakṣasam //
analyzed: haryatam bhūri cakṣasam

original: RV_9,026.06a taṃ tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham /
analyzed: tam tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham

original: RV_9,026.06c indav indrāya matsaram //
analyzed: indo indrāya matsaram

original: RV_9,027.01a eṣa kavir abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate /
analyzed: eṣa kaviḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate

original: RV_9,027.01c punāno ghnann apa sridhaḥ //
analyzed: punānaḥ ghnan apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_9,027.02a eṣa indrāya vāyave svarjit pari ṣicyate /
analyzed: eṣaḥ indrāya vāyave svar jit pari sicyate

original: RV_9,027.02c pavitre dakṣasādhanaḥ //
analyzed: pavitre dakṣa sādhanaḥ

original: RV_9,027.03a eṣa nṛbhir vi nīyate divo mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa nṛbhiḥ vi nīyate divaḥ mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ

original: RV_9,027.03c somo vaneṣu viśvavit //
analyzed: somaḥ vaneṣu viśva vid

original: RV_9,027.04a eṣa gavyur acikradat pavamāno hiraṇyayuḥ /
analyzed: eṣa gavyuḥ acikradat pavamānaḥ hiraṇyayuḥ

original: RV_9,027.04c induḥ satrājid astṛtaḥ //
analyzed: induḥ satrājit astṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,027.05a eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate pavamāno adhi dyavi /
analyzed: eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate pavamānaḥ adhi dyavi

original: RV_9,027.05c pavitre matsaro madaḥ //
analyzed: pavitre matsaraḥ madaḥ

original: RV_9,027.06a eṣa śuṣmy asiṣyadad antarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ /
analyzed: eṣa śuṣmī asiṣyadat antarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ

original: RV_9,027.06c punāna indur indram ā //
analyzed: punānaḥ induḥ indram ā

original: RV_9,028.01a eṣa vājī hito nṛbhir viśvavin manasas patiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vājī hitaḥ nṛbhiḥ viśva vid manasaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_9,028.01c avyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati //
analyzed: avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvati

original: RV_9,028.02a eṣa pavitre akṣarat somo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa pavitre akṣarat somaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,028.02c viśvā dhāmāny āviśan //
analyzed: viśvā dhāmāni āviśan

original: RV_9,028.03a eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate 'dhi yonāv amartyaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate dhi yonau amartyaḥ

original: RV_9,028.03c vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ //
analyzed: vṛtra hā deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_9,028.04a eṣa vṛṣā kanikradad daśabhir jāmibhir yataḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vṛṣā kanikradat daśabhiḥ jāmibhiḥ yataḥ

original: RV_9,028.04c abhi droṇāni dhāvati //
analyzed: abhi droṇāni dhāvati

original: RV_9,028.05a eṣa sūryam arocayat pavamāno vicarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sūryam arocayat pavamānaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_9,028.05c viśvā dhāmāni viśvavit //
analyzed: viśvā dhāmāni viśva vid

original: RV_9,028.06a eṣa śuṣmy adābhyaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati /
analyzed: eṣa śuṣmī adābhyaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,028.06c devāvīr aghaśaṃsahā //
analyzed: devāvīḥ agha śaṃsa hā

original: RV_9,029.01a prāsya dhārā akṣaran vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasā /
analyzed: pra asya dhārāḥ akṣaran vṛṣṇaḥ sutasya ojasā

original: RV_9,029.01c devāṃ anu prabhūṣataḥ //
analyzed: devān anu prabhūṣataḥ

original: RV_9,029.02a saptim mṛjanti vedhaso gṛṇantaḥ kāravo girā /
analyzed: saptim mṛjanti vedhasaḥ gṛṇantaḥ kāravaḥ girā

original: RV_9,029.02c jyotir jajñānam ukthyam //
analyzed: jyotiḥ jajñānam ukthyam

original: RV_9,029.03a suṣahā soma tāni te punānāya prabhūvaso /
analyzed: suṣahā soma tāni te punānāya prabhūvaso

original: RV_9,029.03c vardhā samudram ukthyam //
analyzed: vardha samudram ukthyam

original: RV_9,029.04a viśvā vasūni saṃjayan pavasva soma dhārayā /
analyzed: viśvā vasūni saṃjayan pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_9,029.04c inu dveṣāṃsi sadhryak //
analyzed: inu dveṣāṃsi sadhryak

original: RV_9,029.05a rakṣā su no araruṣaḥ svanāt samasya kasya cit /
analyzed: rakṣā su naḥ a raruṣaḥ svanāt samasya kasya cit

original: RV_9,029.05c nido yatra mumucmahe //
analyzed: nidaḥ yatra mumucmahe

original: RV_9,029.06a endo pārthivaṃ rayiṃ divyam pavasva dhārayā /
analyzed: ā indo pārthivam rayim divyam pavasva dhārayā

original: RV_9,029.06c dyumantaṃ śuṣmam ā bhara //
analyzed: dyumantam śuṣmam ā bhara

original: RV_9,030.01a pra dhārā asya śuṣmiṇo vṛthā pavitre akṣaran /
analyzed: pra dhārāḥ asya śuṣmiṇaḥ vṛthā pavitre akṣaran

original: RV_9,030.01c punāno vācam iṣyati //
analyzed: punānaḥ vācam iṣyati

original: RV_9,030.02a indur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat /
analyzed: induḥ hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ mṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_9,030.02c iyarti vagnum indriyam //
analyzed: iyarti vagnum indriyam

original: RV_9,030.03a ā naḥ śuṣmaṃ nṛṣāhyaṃ vīravantam puruspṛham /
analyzed: ā naḥ śuṣmam nṛṣāhyam vīravantam puruspṛham

original: RV_9,030.03c pavasva soma dhārayā //
analyzed: pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_9,030.04a pra somo ati dhārayā pavamāno asiṣyadat /
analyzed: pra somaḥ ati dhārayā pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat

original: RV_9,030.04c abhi droṇāny āsadam //
analyzed: abhi droṇāni āsadam

original: RV_9,030.05a apsu tvā madhumattamaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: apsu tvā madhumattamam harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,030.05c indav indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indo indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,030.06a sunotā madhumattamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: sunota madhumattamam somam indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_9,030.06c cāruṃ śardhāya matsaram //
analyzed: cārum śardhāya matsaram

original: RV_9,031.01a pra somāsaḥ svādhyaḥ pavamānāso akramuḥ /
analyzed: pra somāsaḥ svādhyaḥ pavamānāsaḥ akramuḥ

original: RV_9,031.01c rayiṃ kṛṇvanti cetanam //
analyzed: rayim kṛṇvanti cetanam

original: RV_9,031.02a divas pṛthivyā adhi bhavendo dyumnavardhanaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ adhi bhava indo dyumna vardhanaḥ

original: RV_9,031.02c bhavā vājānām patiḥ //
analyzed: bhavā vājānām patiḥ

original: RV_9,031.03a tubhyaṃ vātā abhipriyas tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: tubhyam vātāḥ abhipriyaḥ tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_9,031.03c soma vardhanti te mahaḥ //
analyzed: soma vardhanti te mahaḥ

original: RV_9,031.04a ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvatas soma vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_9,031.04c bhavā vājasya saṃgathe //
analyzed: bhava vājasya saṃgathe

original: RV_9,031.05a tubhyaṃ gāvo ghṛtam payo babhro duduhre akṣitam /
analyzed: tubhyam gāvaḥ ghṛtam payaḥ babhro duduhre akṣitam

original: RV_9,031.05c varṣiṣṭhe adhi sānavi //
analyzed: varṣiṣṭhe adhi sānavi

original: RV_9,031.06a svāyudhasya te sato bhuvanasya pate vayam /
analyzed: su āyudhasya te sataḥ bhuvanasya pate vayam

original: RV_9,031.06c indo sakhitvam uśmasi //
analyzed: indo sakhi tvam uśmasi

original: RV_9,032.01a pra somāso madacyutaḥ śravase no maghonaḥ /
analyzed: pra somāsaḥ mada cyutaḥ śravase naḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_9,032.01c sutā vidathe akramuḥ //
analyzed: sutāḥ vidathe akramuḥ

original: RV_9,032.02a ād īṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: āt īm tritasya yoṣaṇaḥ harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,032.02c indum indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indum indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,032.03a ād īṃ haṃso yathā gaṇaṃ viśvasyāvīvaśan matim /
analyzed: āt īm haṃsaḥ yathā gaṇam viśvasya avīvaśat matim

original: RV_9,032.03c atyo na gobhir ajyate //
analyzed: atyaḥ na gobhiḥ ajyate

original: RV_9,032.04a ubhe somāvacākaśan mṛgo na takto arṣasi /
analyzed: ubhe soma avacākaśan mṛgaḥ na taktaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_9,032.04c sīdann ṛtasya yonim ā //
analyzed: sīdan ṛtasya yonim ā

original: RV_9,032.05a abhi gāvo anūṣata yoṣā jāram iva priyam /
analyzed: abhi gāvaḥ anūṣata yoṣāḥ jāram iva priyam

original: RV_9,032.05c agann ājiṃ yathā hitam //
analyzed: agan ājim yathā hitam

original: RV_9,032.06a asme dhehi dyumad yaśo maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca /
analyzed: asme dhehi dyumat yaśaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ ca mahyam ca

original: RV_9,032.06c sanim medhām uta śravaḥ //
analyzed: sanim medhām uta śravaḥ

original: RV_9,033.01a pra somāso vipaścito 'pāṃ na yanty ūrmayaḥ /
analyzed: pra somāsaḥ vipaścitaḥ pām na yanti ūrmayaḥ

original: RV_9,033.01c vanāni mahiṣā iva //
analyzed: vanāni mahiṣā iva

original: RV_9,033.02a abhi droṇāni babhravaḥ śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā /
analyzed: abhi droṇāni babhravaḥ śukrāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā

original: RV_9,033.02c vājaṃ gomantam akṣaran //
analyzed: vājam gomantam akṣaran

original: RV_9,033.03a sutā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: sutāḥ indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_9,033.03c somā arṣanti viṣṇave //
analyzed: somāḥ arṣanti viṣṇave

original: RV_9,033.04a tisro vāca ud īrate gāvo mimanti dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ vācaḥ ud īrate gāvaḥ mimanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_9,033.04c harir eti kanikradat //
analyzed: hariḥ eti kanikradat

original: RV_9,033.05a abhi brahmīr anūṣata yahvīr ṛtasya mātaraḥ /
analyzed: abhi brahmīḥ anūṣata yahvīḥ ṛtasya mātaraḥ

original: RV_9,033.05c marmṛjyante divaḥ śiśum //
analyzed: marmṛjyante divaḥ śiśum

original: RV_9,033.06a rāyaḥ samudrāṃś caturo 'smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ /
analyzed: rāyaḥ samudrān caturaḥ smabhyam soma viśvatas

original: RV_9,033.06c ā pavasva sahasriṇaḥ //
analyzed: ā pavasva sahasriṇaḥ

original: RV_9,034.01a pra suvāno dhārayā tanendur hinvāno arṣati /
analyzed: pra suvānaḥ dhārayā tanā induḥ hinvānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,034.01c rujad dṛḷhā vy ojasā //
analyzed: rujat dṛḷhā vi ojasā

original: RV_9,034.02a suta indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: sutaḥ indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_9,034.02c somo arṣati viṣṇave //
analyzed: somaḥ arṣati viṣṇave

original: RV_9,034.03a vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣabhir yataṃ sunvanti somam adribhiḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣāṇam vṛṣabhiḥ yatam sunvanti somam adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,034.03c duhanti śakmanā payaḥ //
analyzed: duhanti śakmanā payaḥ

original: RV_9,034.04a bhuvat tritasya marjyo bhuvad indrāya matsaraḥ /
analyzed: bhuvat tritasya marjyaḥ bhuvat indrāya matsaraḥ

original: RV_9,034.04c saṃ rūpair ajyate hariḥ //
analyzed: sam rūpaiḥ ajyate hariḥ

original: RV_9,034.05a abhīm ṛtasya viṣṭapaṃ duhate pṛśnimātaraḥ /
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya viṣṭapam duhate pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_9,034.05c cāru priyatamaṃ haviḥ //
analyzed: cāru priyatamam haviḥ

original: RV_9,034.06a sam enam ahrutā imā giro arṣanti sasrutaḥ /
analyzed: sam enam ahrutāḥ imāḥ giraḥ arṣanti sasrutaḥ

original: RV_9,034.06c dhenūr vāśro avīvaśat //
analyzed: dhenūḥ vāśraḥ avīvaśat

original: RV_9,035.01a ā naḥ pavasva dhārayā pavamāna rayim pṛthum /
analyzed: ā naḥ pavasva dhārayā pavamāna rayim pṛthum

original: RV_9,035.01c yayā jyotir vidāsi naḥ //
analyzed: yayā jyotiḥ vidāsi naḥ

original: RV_9,035.02a indo samudramīṅkhaya pavasva viśvamejaya /
analyzed: indo samudramīṅkhaya pavasva viśvamejaya

original: RV_9,035.02c rāyo dhartā na ojasā //
analyzed: rāyaḥ dhartā naḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,035.03a tvayā vīreṇa vīravo 'bhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ /
analyzed: tvayā vīreṇa vīravaḥ bhi syāma pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_9,035.03c kṣarā ṇo abhi vāryam //
analyzed: kṣara naḥ abhi vāryam

original: RV_9,035.04a pra vājam indur iṣyati siṣāsan vājasā ṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: pra vājam induḥ iṣyati siṣāsan vāja sāḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_9,035.04c vratā vidāna āyudhā //
analyzed: vratā vidānaḥ āyudhā

original: RV_9,035.05a taṃ gīrbhir vācamīṅkhayam punānaṃ vāsayāmasi /
analyzed: tam gīrbhiḥ vācamīṅkhayam punānam vāsayāmasi

original: RV_9,035.05c somaṃ janasya gopatim //
analyzed: somam janasya gopatim

original: RV_9,035.06a viśvo yasya vrate jano dādhāra dharmaṇas pateḥ /
analyzed: viśvaḥ yasya vrate janaḥ dādhāra dharmaṇaḥ pateḥ

original: RV_9,035.06c punānasya prabhūvasoḥ //
analyzed: punānasya prabhūvasoḥ

original: RV_9,036.01a asarji rathyo yathā pavitre camvoḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: asarji rathyaḥ yathā pavitre camvoḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,036.01c kārṣman vājī ny akramīt //
analyzed: kārṣman vājī ni akramīt

original: RV_9,036.02a sa vahniḥ soma jāgṛviḥ pavasva devavīr ati /
analyzed: sa vahniḥ soma jāgṛviḥ pavasva deva vīḥ ati

original: RV_9,036.02c abhi kośam madhuścutam //
analyzed: abhi kośam madhuścutam

original: RV_9,036.03a sa no jyotīṃṣi pūrvya pavamāna vi rocaya /
analyzed: sa naḥ jyotīṃṣi pūrvya pavamāna vi rocaya

original: RV_9,036.03c kratve dakṣāya no hinu //
analyzed: kratve dakṣāya naḥ hinu

original: RV_9,036.04a śumbhamāna ṛtāyubhir mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: śumbhamānaḥ ṛtāyubhiḥ mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,036.04c pavate vāre avyaye //
analyzed: pavate vāre avyaye

original: RV_9,036.05a sa viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somo divyāni pārthivā /
analyzed: sa viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somaḥ divyāni pārthivā

original: RV_9,036.05c pavatām āntarikṣyā //
analyzed: pavatām āntarikṣyā

original: RV_9,036.06a ā divas pṛṣṭham aśvayur gavyayuḥ soma rohasi /
analyzed: ā divaḥ pṛṣṭham aśvayuḥ gavyayuḥ soma rohasi

original: RV_9,036.06c vīrayuḥ śavasas pate //
analyzed: vīrayuḥ śavasas pate

original: RV_9,037.01a sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā somaḥ pavitre arṣati /
analyzed: sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā somaḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_9,037.01c vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ //
analyzed: vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ

original: RV_9,037.02a sa pavitre vicakṣaṇo harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ /
analyzed: sa pavitre vicakṣaṇaḥ hariḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ

original: RV_9,037.02c abhi yoniṃ kanikradat //
analyzed: abhi yonim kanikradat

original: RV_9,037.03a sa vājī rocanā divaḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati /
analyzed: sa vājī rocanā divaḥ pavamānaḥ vi dhāvati

original: RV_9,037.03c rakṣohā vāram avyayam //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ hā vāram avyayam

original: RV_9,037.04a sa tritasyādhi sānavi pavamāno arocayat /
analyzed: sa tritasya adhi sānavi pavamānaḥ arocayat

original: RV_9,037.04c jāmibhiḥ sūryaṃ saha //
analyzed: jāmibhiḥ sūryam saha

original: RV_9,037.05a sa vṛtrahā vṛṣā suto varivovid adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: sa vṛtra hā vṛṣā sutaḥ varivaḥ vid adābhyaḥ

original: RV_9,037.05c somo vājam ivāsarat //
analyzed: somaḥ vājam iva asarat

original: RV_9,037.06a sa devaḥ kavineṣito 'bhi droṇāni dhāvati /
analyzed: sa devaḥ kavinā iṣitaḥ bhi droṇāni dhāvati

original: RV_9,037.06c indur indrāya maṃhanā //
analyzed: induḥ indrāya maṃhanā

original: RV_9,038.01a eṣa u sya vṛṣā ratho 'vyo vārebhir arṣati /
analyzed: eṣaḥ u sya vṛṣā rathaḥ vyaḥ vārebhiḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,038.01c gacchan vājaṃ sahasriṇam //
analyzed: gacchan vājam sahasriṇam

original: RV_9,038.02a etaṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: etam tritasya yoṣaṇaḥ harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,038.02c indum indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indum indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,038.03a etaṃ tyaṃ harito daśa marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ /
analyzed: etam tyam haritaḥ daśa marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ

original: RV_9,038.03c yābhir madāya śumbhate //
analyzed: yābhiḥ madāya śumbhate

original: RV_9,038.04a eṣa sya mānuṣīṣv ā śyeno na vikṣu sīdati /
analyzed: eṣa sya mānuṣīṣu ā śyenaḥ na vikṣu sīdati

original: RV_9,038.04c gacchañ jāro na yoṣitam //
analyzed: gaccham jāraḥ na yoṣitam

original: RV_9,038.05a eṣa sya madyo raso 'va caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sya madyaḥ rasaḥ caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ

original: RV_9,038.05c ya indur vāram āviśat //
analyzed: yaḥ induḥ vāram āviśat

original: RV_9,038.06a eṣa sya pītaye suto harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sya pītaye sutaḥ hariḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ

original: RV_9,038.06c krandan yonim abhi priyam //
analyzed: krandan yonim abhi priyam

original: RV_9,039.01a āśur arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā /
analyzed: āśuḥ arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā

original: RV_9,039.01c yatra devā iti bravan //
analyzed: yatra devāḥ iti bravan

original: RV_9,039.02a pariṣkṛṇvann aniṣkṛtaṃ janāya yātayann iṣaḥ /
analyzed: pariṣkṛṇvan a niṣkṛtam janāya yātayan iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,039.02c vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pari srava //
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ pari srava

original: RV_9,039.03a suta eti pavitra ā tviṣiṃ dadhāna ojasā /
analyzed: sutaḥ eti pavitre ā tviṣim dadhānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,039.03c vicakṣāṇo virocayan //
analyzed: vicakṣāṇaḥ virocayan

original: RV_9,039.04a ayaṃ sa yo divas pari raghuyāmā pavitra ā /
analyzed: ayam sa yaḥ divaḥ pari raghu yāmā pavitre ā

original: RV_9,039.04c sindhor ūrmā vy akṣarat //
analyzed: sindhoḥ ūrmā vi akṣarat

original: RV_9,039.05a āvivāsan parāvato atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: āvivāsan parāvataḥ atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,039.05c indrāya sicyate madhu //
analyzed: indrāya sicyate madhu

original: RV_9,039.06a samīcīnā anūṣata hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: samīcīnāḥ anūṣata harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,039.06c yonāv ṛtasya sīdata //
analyzed: yonau ṛtasya sīdata

original: RV_9,040.01a punāno akramīd abhi viśvā mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ akramīt abhi viśvāḥ mṛdhaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_9,040.01c śumbhanti vipraṃ dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: śumbhanti vipram dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_9,040.02a ā yonim aruṇo ruhad gamad indraṃ vṛṣā sutaḥ /
analyzed: ā yonim aruṇaḥ ruhat gamat indram vṛṣā sutaḥ

original: RV_9,040.02c dhruve sadasi sīdati //
analyzed: dhruve sadasi sīdati

original: RV_9,040.03a nū no rayim mahām indo 'smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ /
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim mahām indo smabhyam soma viśvatas

original: RV_9,040.03c ā pavasva sahasriṇam //
analyzed: ā pavasva sahasriṇam

original: RV_9,040.04a viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnānīndav ā bhara /
analyzed: viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnāni indo ā bhara

original: RV_9,040.04c vidāḥ sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: vidāḥ sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,040.05a sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ stotre suvīryam /
analyzed: sa naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara rayim stotre su vīryam

original: RV_9,040.05c jaritur vardhayā giraḥ //
analyzed: jarituḥ vardhaya giraḥ

original: RV_9,040.06a punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim /
analyzed: punānaḥ indo ā bhara soma dvibarhasam rayim

original: RV_9,040.06c vṛṣann indo na ukthyam //
analyzed: vṛṣan indo naḥ ukthyam

original: RV_9,041.01a pra ye gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā ayāso akramuḥ /
analyzed: pra ye gāvaḥ na bhūrṇayaḥ tveṣāḥ ayāsaḥ akramuḥ

original: RV_9,041.01c ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇām apa tvacam //
analyzed: ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇām apa tvacam

original: RV_9,041.02a suvitasya manāmahe 'ti setuṃ durāvyam /
analyzed: suvitasya manāmahe ti setum durāvyam

original: RV_9,041.02c sāhvāṃso dasyum avratam //
analyzed: sāhvāṃsaḥ dasyum avratam

original: RV_9,041.03a śṛṇve vṛṣṭer iva svanaḥ pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇve vṛṣṭeḥ iva svanaḥ pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ

original: RV_9,041.03c caranti vidyuto divi //
analyzed: caranti vidyutaḥ divi

original: RV_9,041.04a ā pavasva mahīm iṣaṃ gomad indo hiraṇyavat /
analyzed: ā pavasva mahīm iṣam gomat indo hiraṇyavat

original: RV_9,041.04c aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ //
analyzed: aśvāvat vājavat sutaḥ

original: RV_9,041.05a sa pavasva vicarṣaṇa ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa /
analyzed: sa pavasva vicarṣaṇe ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa

original: RV_9,041.05c uṣāḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: uṣāḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_9,041.06a pari ṇaḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvataḥ /
analyzed: pari naḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvatas

original: RV_9,041.06c sarā raseva viṣṭapam //
analyzed: sara rasā iva viṣṭapam

original: RV_9,042.01a janayan rocanā divo janayann apsu sūryam /
analyzed: janayan rocanā divaḥ janayan apsu sūryam

original: RV_9,042.01c vasāno gā apo hariḥ //
analyzed: vasānaḥ gāḥ apaḥ hariḥ

original: RV_9,042.02a eṣa pratnena manmanā devo devebhyas pari /
analyzed: eṣa pratnena manmanā devaḥ devebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_9,042.02c dhārayā pavate sutaḥ //
analyzed: dhārayā pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,042.03a vāvṛdhānāya tūrvaye pavante vājasātaye /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānāya tūrvaye pavante vājasātaye

original: RV_9,042.03c somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ //
analyzed: somāḥ sahasra pājasaḥ

original: RV_9,042.04a duhānaḥ pratnam it payaḥ pavitre pari ṣicyate /
analyzed: duhānaḥ pratnam id payaḥ pavitre pari sicyate

original: RV_9,042.04c krandan devāṃ ajījanat //
analyzed: krandan devān ajījanat

original: RV_9,042.05a abhi viśvāni vāryābhi devāṃ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: abhi viśvāni vāryā abhi devān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_9,042.05c somaḥ punāno arṣati //
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,042.06a goman naḥ soma vīravad aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ /
analyzed: gomat naḥ soma vīravat aśvāvat vājavat sutaḥ

original: RV_9,042.06c pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: pavasva bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,043.01a yo atya iva mṛjyate gobhir madāya haryataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ atyaḥ iva mṛjyate gobhiḥ madāya haryataḥ

original: RV_9,043.01c taṃ gīrbhir vāsayāmasi //
analyzed: tam gīrbhiḥ vāsayāmasi

original: RV_9,043.02a taṃ no viśvā avasyuvo giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā /
analyzed: tam naḥ viśvāḥ avasyuvaḥ giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā

original: RV_9,043.02c indum indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indum indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,043.03a punāno yāti haryataḥ somo gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ yāti haryataḥ somaḥ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,043.03c viprasya medhyātitheḥ //
analyzed: viprasya medhyātitheḥ

original: RV_9,043.04a pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma suśriyam /
analyzed: pavamāna vida rayim asmabhyam soma su śriyam

original: RV_9,043.04c indo sahasravarcasam //
analyzed: indo sahasra varcasam

original: RV_9,043.05a indur atyo na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitra ā /
analyzed: induḥ atyaḥ na vāja sṛt kanikranti pavitre ā

original: RV_9,043.05c yad akṣār ati devayuḥ //
analyzed: yat akṣār ati devayuḥ

original: RV_9,043.06a pavasva vājasātaye viprasya gṛṇato vṛdhe /
analyzed: pavasva vājasātaye viprasya gṛṇataḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_9,043.06c soma rāsva suvīryam //
analyzed: soma rāsva su vīryam

original: RV_9,044.01a pra ṇa indo mahe tana ūrmiṃ na bibhrad arṣasi /
analyzed: pra naḥ indo mahe tane ūrmim na bibhrat arṣasi

original: RV_9,044.01c abhi devāṃ ayāsyaḥ //
analyzed: abhi devān ayāsyaḥ

original: RV_9,044.02a matī juṣṭo dhiyā hitaḥ somo hinve parāvati /
analyzed: matī juṣṭaḥ dhiyā hitaḥ somaḥ hinve parāvati

original: RV_9,044.02c viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ //
analyzed: viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ

original: RV_9,044.03a ayaṃ deveṣu jāgṛviḥ suta eti pavitra ā /
analyzed: ayam deveṣu jāgṛviḥ sutaḥ eti pavitre ā

original: RV_9,044.03c somo yāti vicarṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ yāti vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_9,044.04a sa naḥ pavasva vājayuś cakrāṇaś cārum adhvaram /
analyzed: sa naḥ pavasva vājayuḥ cakrāṇaḥ cārum adhvaram

original: RV_9,044.04c barhiṣmāṃ ā vivāsati //
analyzed: barhiṣmān ā vivāsati

original: RV_9,044.05a sa no bhagāya vāyave vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ bhagāya vāyave vipra vīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_9,044.05c somo deveṣv ā yamat //
analyzed: somaḥ deveṣu ā yamat

original: RV_9,044.06a sa no adya vasuttaye kratuvid gātuvittamaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ adya vasuttaye kratu vid gātu vittamaḥ

original: RV_9,044.06c vājaṃ jeṣi śravo bṛhat //
analyzed: vājam jeṣi śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_9,045.01a sa pavasva madāya kaṃ nṛcakṣā devavītaye /
analyzed: sa pavasva madāya kam nṛ cakṣāḥ deva vītaye

original: RV_9,045.01c indav indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indo indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,045.02a sa no arṣābhi dūtyaṃ tvam indrāya tośase /
analyzed: sa naḥ arṣa abhi dūtyam tvam indrāya tośase

original: RV_9,045.02c devān sakhibhya ā varam //
analyzed: devān sakhibhyaḥ ā varam

original: RV_9,045.03a uta tvām aruṇaṃ vayaṃ gobhir añjmo madāya kam /
analyzed: uta tvām aruṇam vayam gobhiḥ añjmaḥ madāya kam

original: RV_9,045.03c vi no rāye duro vṛdhi //
analyzed: vi naḥ rāye duraḥ vṛdhi

original: RV_9,045.04a aty ū pavitram akramīd vājī dhuraṃ na yāmani /
analyzed: ati u pavitram akramīt vājī dhuram na yāmani

original: RV_9,045.04c indur deveṣu patyate //
analyzed: induḥ deveṣu patyate

original: RV_9,045.05a sam ī sakhāyo asvaran vane krīḷantam atyavim /
analyzed: sam ī sakhāyaḥ asvaran vane krīḍantam atyavim

original: RV_9,045.05c induṃ nāvā anūṣata //
analyzed: indum nāvāḥ anūṣata

original: RV_9,045.06a tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pīto vicakṣase /
analyzed: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pītaḥ vicakṣase

original: RV_9,045.06c indo stotre suvīryam //
analyzed: indo stotre su vīryam

original: RV_9,046.01a asṛgran devavītaye 'tyāsaḥ kṛtvyā iva /
analyzed: asṛgran deva vītaye tyāsaḥ kṛtvyāḥ iva

original: RV_9,046.01c kṣarantaḥ parvatāvṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: kṣarantaḥ parvatāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_9,046.02a pariṣkṛtāsa indavo yoṣeva pitryāvatī /
analyzed: pariṣkṛtāsaḥ indavaḥ yoṣā iva pitryāvatī

original: RV_9,046.02c vāyuṃ somā asṛkṣata //
analyzed: vāyum somāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,046.03a ete somāsa indavaḥ prayasvantaś camū sutāḥ /
analyzed: ete somāsaḥ indavaḥ prayasvantaḥ camū sutāḥ

original: RV_9,046.03c indraṃ vardhanti karmabhiḥ //
analyzed: indram vardhanti karmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,046.04a ā dhāvatā suhastyaḥ śukrā gṛbhṇīta manthinā /
analyzed: ā dhāvata suhastyaḥ śukrāḥ gṛbhṇīta manthinā

original: RV_9,046.04c gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram //
analyzed: gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram

original: RV_9,046.05a sa pavasva dhanañjaya prayantā rādhaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: sa pavasva dhanañjaya prayantā rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_9,046.05c asmabhyaṃ soma gātuvit //
analyzed: asmabhyam soma gātu vid

original: RV_9,046.06a etam mṛjanti marjyam pavamānaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ /
analyzed: etam mṛjanti marjyam pavamānam daśa kṣipaḥ

original: RV_9,046.06c indrāya matsaram madam //
analyzed: indrāya matsaram madam

original: RV_9,047.01a ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā mahaś cid abhy avardhata /
analyzed: ayā somaḥ su kṛtyayā mahaḥ cit abhī avardhata

original: RV_9,047.01c mandāna ud vṛṣāyate //
analyzed: mandānaḥ ud vṛṣāyate

original: RV_9,047.02a kṛtānīd asya kartvā cetante dasyutarhaṇā /
analyzed: kṛtāni id asya kartvā cetante dasyu tarhaṇā

original: RV_9,047.02c ṛṇā ca dhṛṣṇuś cayate //
analyzed: ṛṇā ca dhṛṣṇuḥ cayate

original: RV_9,047.03a āt soma indriyo raso vajraḥ sahasrasā bhuvat /
analyzed: āt somaḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ vajraḥ sahasra sāḥ bhuvat

original: RV_9,047.03c ukthaṃ yad asya jāyate //
analyzed: uktham yat asya jāyate

original: RV_9,047.04a svayaṃ kavir vidhartari viprāya ratnam icchati /
analyzed: svayam kaviḥ vidhartari viprāya ratnam icchati

original: RV_9,047.04c yadī marmṛjyate dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: yadī marmṛjyate dhiyaḥ

original: RV_9,047.05a siṣāsatū rayīṇāṃ vājeṣv arvatām iva /
analyzed: siṣāsatuḥ rayīṇām vājeṣu arvatām iva

original: RV_9,047.05c bhareṣu jigyuṣām asi //
analyzed: bhareṣu jigyuṣām asi

original: RV_9,048.01a taṃ tvā nṛmṇāni bibhrataṃ sadhastheṣu maho divaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā nṛmṇāni bibhratam sadhastheṣu mahaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_9,048.01c cāruṃ sukṛtyayemahe //
analyzed: cārum su kṛtyayā īmahe

original: RV_9,048.02a saṃvṛktadhṛṣṇum ukthyam mahāmahivratam madam /
analyzed: saṃvṛkta dhṛṣṇum ukthyam mahā mahi vratam madam

original: RV_9,048.02c śatam puro rurukṣaṇim //
analyzed: śatam puraḥ rurukṣaṇim

original: RV_9,048.03a atas tvā rayim abhi rājānaṃ sukrato divaḥ /
analyzed: atas tvā rayim abhi rājānam su krato divaḥ

original: RV_9,048.03c suparṇo avyathir bharat //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ avyathiḥ bharat

original: RV_9,048.04a viśvasmā it svar dṛśe sādhāraṇaṃ rajasturam /
analyzed: viśvasmai id svar dṛśe sādhāraṇam rajasturam

original: RV_9,048.04c gopām ṛtasya vir bharat //
analyzed: gopām ṛtasya viḥ bharat

original: RV_9,048.05a adhā hinvāna indriyaṃ jyāyo mahitvam ānaśe /
analyzed: adhā hinvānaḥ indriyam jyāyaḥ mahi tvam ānaśe

original: RV_9,048.05c abhiṣṭikṛd vicarṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: abhiṣṭi kṛt vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_9,049.01a pavasva vṛṣṭim ā su no 'pām ūrmiṃ divas pari /
analyzed: pavasva vṛṣṭim ā su naḥ pām ūrmim divaḥ pari

original: RV_9,049.01c ayakṣmā bṛhatīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: ayakṣmāḥ bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,049.02a tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgaman /
analyzed: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāvaḥ iha agaman

original: RV_9,049.02c janyāsa upa no gṛham //
analyzed: janyāsaḥ upa naḥ gṛham

original: RV_9,049.03a ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_9,049.03c asmabhyaṃ vṛṣṭim ā pava //
analyzed: asmabhyam vṛṣṭim ā pava

original: RV_9,049.04a sa na ūrje vy avyayam pavitraṃ dhāva dhārayā /
analyzed: sa naḥ ūrje vi avyayam pavitram dhāva dhārayā

original: RV_9,049.04c devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam //
analyzed: devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam

original: RV_9,049.05a pavamāno asiṣyadad rakṣāṃsy apajaṅghanat /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat rakṣāṃsi apajaṅghanat

original: RV_9,049.05c pratnavad rocayan rucaḥ //
analyzed: pratna vat rocayan rucaḥ

original: RV_9,050.01a ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhor ūrmer iva svanaḥ /
analyzed: ud te śuṣmāsaḥ īrate sindhoḥ ūrmeḥ iva svanaḥ

original: RV_9,050.01c vāṇasya codayā pavim //
analyzed: vāṇasya codaya pavim

original: RV_9,050.02a prasave ta ud īrate tisro vāco makhasyuvaḥ /
analyzed: prasave te ud īrate tisraḥ vācaḥ makhasyuvaḥ

original: RV_9,050.02c yad avya eṣi sānavi //
analyzed: yat avye eṣi sānavi

original: RV_9,050.03a avyo vāre pari priyaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: avyaḥ vāre pari priyam harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,050.03c pavamānam madhuścutam //
analyzed: pavamānam madhuścutam

original: RV_9,050.04a ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave /
analyzed: ā pavasva madintama pavitram dhārayā kave

original: RV_9,050.04c arkasya yonim āsadam //
analyzed: arkasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_9,050.05a sa pavasva madintama gobhir añjāno aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: sa pavasva madintama gobhiḥ añjānaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: RV_9,050.05c indav indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indo indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,051.01a adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja /
analyzed: adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutam somam pavitre ā sṛja

original: RV_9,051.01c punīhīndrāya pātave //
analyzed: punīhi indrāya pātave

original: RV_9,051.02a divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamam somam indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_9,051.02c sunotā madhumattamam //
analyzed: sunota madhumattamam

original: RV_9,051.03a tava tya indo andhaso devā madhor vy aśnate /
analyzed: tava tye indo andhasaḥ devāḥ madhoḥ vi aśnate

original: RV_9,051.03c pavamānasya marutaḥ //
analyzed: pavamānasya marutaḥ

original: RV_9,051.04a tvaṃ hi soma vardhayan suto madāya bhūrṇaye /
analyzed: tvam hi soma vardhayan sutaḥ madāya bhūrṇaye

original: RV_9,051.04c vṛṣan stotāram ūtaye //
analyzed: vṛṣan stotāram ūtaye

original: RV_9,051.05a abhy arṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitraṃ dhārayā sutaḥ /
analyzed: abhi arṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitram dhārayā sutaḥ

original: RV_9,051.05c abhi vājam uta śravaḥ //
analyzed: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ

original: RV_9,052.01a pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayir bharad vājaṃ no andhasā /
analyzed: pari dyukṣaḥ sanat rayiḥ bharat vājam naḥ andhasā

original: RV_9,052.01c suvāno arṣa pavitra ā //
analyzed: suvānaḥ arṣa pavitre ā

original: RV_9,052.02a tava pratnebhir adhvabhir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ /
analyzed: tava pratnebhiḥ adhvabhiḥ avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ

original: RV_9,052.02c sahasradhāro yāt tanā //
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ yāt tanā

original: RV_9,052.03a carur na yas tam īṅkhayendo na dānam īṅkhaya /
analyzed: caruḥ na yaḥ tam īṅkhaya indo na dānam īṅkhaya

original: RV_9,052.03c vadhair vadhasnav īṅkhaya //
analyzed: vadhaiḥ vadhasno īṅkhaya

original: RV_9,052.04a ni śuṣmam indav eṣām puruhūta janānām /
analyzed: ni śuṣmam indo eṣām puru hūta janānām

original: RV_9,052.04c yo asmāṃ ādideśati //
analyzed: yaḥ asmān ādideśati

original: RV_9,052.05a śataṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sahasraṃ vā śucīnām /
analyzed: śatam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ sahasram vā śucīnām

original: RV_9,052.05c pavasva maṃhayadrayiḥ //
analyzed: pavasva maṃhayat rayiḥ

original: RV_9,053.01a ut te śuṣmāso asthū rakṣo bhindanto adrivaḥ /
analyzed: ud te śuṣmāsaḥ asthuḥ rakṣaḥ bhindantaḥ adrivas

original: RV_9,053.01c nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ

original: RV_9,053.02a ayā nijaghnir ojasā rathasaṃge dhane hite /
analyzed: ayā nijaghniḥ ojasā ratha saṃge dhane hite

original: RV_9,053.02c stavā abibhyuṣā hṛdā //
analyzed: stavā a bibhyuṣā hṛdā

original: RV_9,053.03a asya vratāni nādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā /
analyzed: asya vratāni na ādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā

original: RV_9,053.03c ruja yas tvā pṛtanyati //
analyzed: ruja yaḥ tvā pṛtanyati

original: RV_9,053.04a taṃ hinvanti madacyutaṃ hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam /
analyzed: tam hinvanti mada cyutam harim nadīṣu vājinam

original: RV_9,053.04c indum indrāya matsaram //
analyzed: indum indrāya matsaram

original: RV_9,054.01a asya pratnām anu dyutaṃ śukraṃ duduhre ahrayaḥ /
analyzed: asya pratnām anu dyutam śukram duduhre ahrayaḥ

original: RV_9,054.01c payaḥ sahasrasām ṛṣim //
analyzed: payaḥ sahasra sām ṛṣim

original: RV_9,054.02a ayaṃ sūrya ivopadṛg ayaṃ sarāṃsi dhāvati /
analyzed: ayam sūryaḥ iva upadṛś ayam sarāṃsi dhāvati

original: RV_9,054.02c sapta pravata ā divam //
analyzed: sapta pravataḥ ā divam

original: RV_9,054.03a ayaṃ viśvāni tiṣṭhati punāno bhuvanopari /
analyzed: ayam viśvāni tiṣṭhati punānaḥ bhuvana upari

original: RV_9,054.03c somo devo na sūryaḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ devaḥ na sūryaḥ

original: RV_9,054.04a pari ṇo devavītaye vājāṃ arṣasi gomataḥ /
analyzed: pari naḥ deva vītaye vājān arṣasi gomataḥ

original: RV_9,054.04c punāna indav indrayuḥ //
analyzed: punānaḥ indo indrayuḥ

original: RV_9,055.01a yavaṃ-yavaṃ no andhasā puṣṭam-puṣṭam pari srava /
analyzed: yavam yavam naḥ andhasā puṣṭam puṣṭam pari srava

original: RV_9,055.01c soma viśvā ca saubhagā //
analyzed: soma viśvā ca saubhagā

original: RV_9,055.02a indo yathā tava stavo yathā te jātam andhasaḥ /
analyzed: indo yathā tava stavaḥ yathā te jātam andhasaḥ

original: RV_9,055.02c ni barhiṣi priye sadaḥ //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi priye sadaḥ

original: RV_9,055.03a uta no govid aśvavit pavasva somāndhasā /
analyzed: uta naḥ go vid aśva vid pavasva soma andhasā

original: RV_9,055.03c makṣūtamebhir ahabhiḥ //
analyzed: makṣūtamebhiḥ ahabhiḥ

original: RV_9,055.04a yo jināti na jīyate hanti śatrum abhītya /
analyzed: yaḥ jināti na jīyate hanti śatrum abhītya

original: RV_9,055.04c sa pavasva sahasrajit //
analyzed: sa pavasva sahasra jit

original: RV_9,056.01a pari soma ṛtam bṛhad āśuḥ pavitre arṣati /
analyzed: pari somaḥ ṛtam bṛhat āśuḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_9,056.01c vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ //
analyzed: vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ

original: RV_9,056.02a yat somo vājam arṣati śataṃ dhārā apasyuvaḥ /
analyzed: yat somaḥ vājam arṣati śatam dhārāḥ apasyuvaḥ

original: RV_9,056.02c indrasya sakhyam āviśan //
analyzed: indrasya sakhyam āviśan

original: RV_9,056.03a abhi tvā yoṣaṇo daśa jāraṃ na kanyānūṣata /
analyzed: abhi tvā yoṣaṇaḥ daśa jāram na kanyā anūṣata

original: RV_9,056.03c mṛjyase soma sātaye //
analyzed: mṛjyase soma sātaye

original: RV_9,056.04a tvam indrāya viṣṇave svādur indo pari srava /
analyzed: tvam indrāya viṣṇave svāduḥ indo pari srava

original: RV_9,056.04c nṝn stotṝn pāhy aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: nṝn stotṝn pāhi aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_9,057.01a pra te dhārā asaścato divo na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: pra te dhārāḥ asaścataḥ divaḥ na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_9,057.01c acchā vājaṃ sahasriṇam //
analyzed: acchā vājam sahasriṇam

original: RV_9,057.02a abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇo arṣati /
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,057.02c haris tuñjāna āyudhā //
analyzed: hariḥ tuñjānaḥ āyudhā

original: RV_9,057.03a sa marmṛjāna āyubhir ibho rājeva suvrataḥ /
analyzed: sa marmṛjānaḥ āyubhiḥ ibhaḥ rājā iva suvrataḥ

original: RV_9,057.03c śyeno na vaṃsu ṣīdati //
analyzed: śyenaḥ na sīdati

original: RV_9,057.04a sa no viśvā divo vasūto pṛthivyā adhi /
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvā divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ adhi

original: RV_9,057.04c punāna indav ā bhara //
analyzed: punānaḥ indo ā bhara

original: RV_9,058.01a tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasyāndhasaḥ /
analyzed: tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasya andhasaḥ

original: RV_9,058.01c tarat sa mandī dhāvati //
analyzed: tarat sa mandī dhāvati

original: RV_9,058.02a usrā veda vasūnām martasya devy avasaḥ /
analyzed: usrā veda vasūnām martasya devī avasaḥ

original: RV_9,058.02c tarat sa mandī dhāvati //
analyzed: tarat sa mandī dhāvati

original: RV_9,058.03a dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyor ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe /
analyzed: dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyoḥ ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe

original: RV_9,058.03c tarat sa mandī dhāvati //
analyzed: tarat sa mandī dhāvati

original: RV_9,058.04a ā yayos triṃśataṃ tanā sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe /
analyzed: ā yayoḥ triṃśatam tanā sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe

original: RV_9,058.04c tarat sa mandī dhāvati //
analyzed: tarat sa mandī dhāvati

original: RV_9,059.01a pavasva gojid aśvajid viśvajit soma raṇyajit /
analyzed: pavasva go jit aśva jit viśva jit soma raṇya jit

original: RV_9,059.01c prajāvad ratnam ā bhara //
analyzed: prajāvat ratnam ā bhara

original: RV_9,059.02a pavasvādbhyo adābhyaḥ pavasvauṣadhībhyaḥ /
analyzed: pavasva adbhyaḥ adābhyaḥ pavasva oṣadhībhyaḥ

original: RV_9,059.02c pavasva dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ //
analyzed: pavasva dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ

original: RV_9,059.03a tvaṃ soma pavamāno viśvāni duritā tara /
analyzed: tvam soma pavamānaḥ viśvāni duritā tara

original: RV_9,059.03c kaviḥ sīda ni barhiṣi //
analyzed: kaviḥ sīda ni barhiṣi

original: RV_9,059.04a pavamāna svar vido jāyamāno 'bhavo mahān /
analyzed: pavamāna svar vidaḥ jāyamānaḥ bhavaḥ mahān

original: RV_9,059.04c indo viśvāṃ abhīd asi //
analyzed: indo viśvān abhi id asi

original: RV_9,060.01a pra gāyatreṇa gāyata pavamānaṃ vicarṣaṇim /
analyzed: pra gāyatreṇa gāyata pavamānam vicarṣaṇim

original: RV_9,060.01c induṃ sahasracakṣasam //
analyzed: indum sahasra cakṣasam
