original: RV_9,060.02a taṃ tvā sahasracakṣasam atho sahasrabharṇasam /
analyzed: tam tvā sahasra cakṣasam atha u sahasrabharṇasam

original: RV_9,060.02c ati vāram apāviṣuḥ //
analyzed: ati vāram apāviṣuḥ

original: RV_9,060.03a ati vārān pavamāno asiṣyadat kalaśāṃ abhi dhāvati /
analyzed: ati vārān pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat kalaśām abhi dhāvati

original: RV_9,060.03c indrasya hārdy āviśan //
analyzed: indrasya hārdi āviśan

original: RV_9,060.04a indrasya soma rādhase śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: indrasya soma rādhase śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_9,060.04c prajāvad reta ā bhara //
analyzed: prajāvat retaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_9,061.01a ayā vītī pari srava yas ta indo madeṣv ā /
analyzed: ayā vītī pari srava yaḥ te indo madeṣu ā

original: RV_9,061.01c avāhan navatīr nava //
analyzed: avāhan navatīḥ nava

original: RV_9,061.02a puraḥ sadya itthādhiye divodāsāya śambaram /
analyzed: puras sadyas itthā dhiye divodāsāya śambaram

original: RV_9,061.02c adha tyaṃ turvaśaṃ yadum //
analyzed: adha tyam turvaśam yadum

original: RV_9,061.03a pari ṇo aśvam aśvavid gomad indo hiraṇyavat /
analyzed: pari naḥ aśvam aśva vid gomat indo hiraṇyavat

original: RV_9,061.03c kṣarā sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: kṣara sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_9,061.04a pavamānasya te vayam pavitram abhyundataḥ /
analyzed: pavamānasya te vayam pavitram abhyundataḥ

original: RV_9,061.04c sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: sakhi tvam ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_9,061.05a ye te pavitram ūrmayo 'bhikṣaranti dhārayā /
analyzed: ye te pavitram ūrmayaḥ bhikṣaranti dhārayā

original: RV_9,061.05c tebhir naḥ soma mṛḷaya //
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ soma mṛḍaya

original: RV_9,061.06a sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ vīravatīm iṣam /
analyzed: sa naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara rayim vīravatīm iṣam

original: RV_9,061.06c īśānaḥ soma viśvataḥ //
analyzed: īśānaḥ soma viśvatas

original: RV_9,061.07a etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sindhumātaram /
analyzed: etam u tyam daśa kṣipaḥ mṛjanti sindhu mātaram

original: RV_9,061.07c sam ādityebhir akhyata //
analyzed: sam ādityebhiḥ akhyata

original: RV_9,061.08a sam indreṇota vāyunā suta eti pavitra ā /
analyzed: sam indreṇa uta vāyunā sutaḥ eti pavitre ā

original: RV_9,061.08c saṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: sam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_9,061.09a sa no bhagāya vāyave pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān /
analyzed: sa naḥ bhagāya vāyave pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān

original: RV_9,061.09c cārur mitre varuṇe ca //
analyzed: cāruḥ mitre varuṇe ca

original: RV_9,061.10a uccā te jātam andhaso divi ṣad bhūmy ā dade /
analyzed: uccā te jātam andhasaḥ divi sat bhūmī ā dade

original: RV_9,061.10c ugraṃ śarma mahi śravaḥ //
analyzed: ugram śarma mahi śravaḥ

original: RV_9,061.11a enā viśvāny arya ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: enā viśvāni aryaḥ ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_9,061.11c siṣāsanto vanāmahe //
analyzed: siṣāsantaḥ vanāmahe

original: RV_9,061.12a sa na indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_9,061.12c varivovit pari srava //
analyzed: varivaḥ vid pari srava

original: RV_9,061.13a upo ṣu jātam apturaṃ gobhir bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam /
analyzed: upa u su jātam ap turam gobhiḥ bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,061.13c induṃ devā ayāsiṣuḥ //
analyzed: indum devāḥ ayāsiṣuḥ

original: RV_9,061.14a tam id vardhantu no giro vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva /
analyzed: tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ vatsam saṃśiśvarīḥ iva

original: RV_9,061.14c ya indrasya hṛdaṃsaniḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ indrasya hṛdaṃsaniḥ

original: RV_9,061.15a arṣā ṇaḥ soma śaṃ gave dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam /
analyzed: arṣa naḥ soma śam gave dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam

original: RV_9,061.15c vardhā samudram ukthyam //
analyzed: vardha samudram ukthyam

original: RV_9,061.16a pavamāno ajījanad divaś citraṃ na tanyatum /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ajījanat divaḥ citram na tanyatum

original: RV_9,061.16c jyotir vaiśvānaram bṛhat //
analyzed: jyotiḥ vaiśvānaram bṛhat

original: RV_9,061.17a pavamānasya te raso mado rājann aducchunaḥ /
analyzed: pavamānasya te rasaḥ madaḥ rājan aducchunaḥ

original: RV_9,061.17c vi vāram avyam arṣati //
analyzed: vi vāram avyam arṣati

original: RV_9,061.18a pavamāna rasas tava dakṣo vi rājati dyumān /
analyzed: pavamāna rasaḥ tava dakṣaḥ vi rājati dyumān

original: RV_9,061.18c jyotir viśvaṃ svar dṛśe //
analyzed: jyotiḥ viśvam svar dṛśe

original: RV_9,061.19a yas te mado vareṇyas tenā pavasvāndhasā /
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ vareṇyaḥ tena pavasva andhasā

original: RV_9,061.19c devāvīr aghaśaṃsahā //
analyzed: devāvīḥ agha śaṃsa hā

original: RV_9,061.20a jaghnir vṛtram amitriyaṃ sasnir vājaṃ dive-dive /
analyzed: jaghniḥ vṛtram amitriyam sasniḥ vājam dive dive

original: RV_9,061.20c goṣā u aśvasā asi //
analyzed: go sāḥ u aśva sāḥ asi

original: RV_9,061.21a sammiślo aruṣo bhava sūpasthābhir na dhenubhiḥ /
analyzed: sammiślaḥ aruṣaḥ bhava su upasthābhiḥ na dhenubhiḥ

original: RV_9,061.21c sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā //
analyzed: sīdam śyenaḥ na yonim ā

original: RV_9,061.22a sa pavasva ya āvithendraṃ vṛtrāya hantave /
analyzed: sa pavasva yaḥ āvitha indram vṛtrāya hantave

original: RV_9,061.22c vavrivāṃsam mahīr apaḥ //
analyzed: vavrivāṃsam mahīḥ apaḥ

original: RV_9,061.23a suvīrāso vayaṃ dhanā jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ /
analyzed: su vīrāsaḥ vayam dhanā jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ

original: RV_9,061.23c punāno vardha no giraḥ //
analyzed: punānaḥ vardha naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_9,061.24a tvotāsas tavāvasā syāma vanvanta āmuraḥ /
analyzed: tvotāsaḥ tava avasā syāma vanvantaḥ āmuraḥ

original: RV_9,061.24c soma vrateṣu jāgṛhi //
analyzed: soma vrateṣu jāgṛhi

original: RV_9,061.25a apaghnan pavate mṛdho 'pa somo arāvṇaḥ /
analyzed: apaghnan pavate mṛdhaḥ pa somaḥ arāvṇaḥ

original: RV_9,061.25c gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam //
analyzed: gacchan indrasya niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,061.26a maho no rāya ā bhara pavamāna jahī mṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: mahaḥ naḥ rāyaḥ ā bhara pavamāna jahi mṛdhaḥ

original: RV_9,061.26c rāsvendo vīravad yaśaḥ //
analyzed: rāsvā indo vīravat yaśaḥ

original: RV_9,061.27a na tvā śataṃ cana hruto rādho ditsantam ā minan /
analyzed: na tvā śatam cana hrutaḥ rādhaḥ ditsantam ā minan

original: RV_9,061.27c yat punāno makhasyase //
analyzed: yat punānaḥ makhasyase

original: RV_9,061.28a pavasvendo vṛṣā sutaḥ kṛdhī no yaśaso jane /
analyzed: pavasva indo vṛṣā sutaḥ kṛdhī naḥ yaśasaḥ jane

original: RV_9,061.28c viśvā apa dviṣo jahi //
analyzed: viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ jahi

original: RV_9,061.29a asya te sakhye vayaṃ tavendo dyumna uttame /
analyzed: asya te sakhye vayam tava indo dyumne uttame

original: RV_9,061.29c sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ //
analyzed: sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_9,061.30a yā te bhīmāny āyudhā tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe /
analyzed: yā te bhīmāni āyudhā tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe

original: RV_9,061.30c rakṣā samasya no nidaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣa samasya naḥ nidaḥ

original: RV_9,062.01a ete asṛgram indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ /
analyzed: ete asṛgram indavaḥ tiras pavitram āśavaḥ

original: RV_9,062.01c viśvāny abhi saubhagā //
analyzed: viśvāni abhi saubhagā

original: RV_9,062.02a vighnanto duritā puru sugā tokāya vājinaḥ /
analyzed: vighnantaḥ duritā puru sugā tokāya vājinaḥ

original: RV_9,062.02c tanā kṛṇvanto arvate //
analyzed: tanā kṛṇvantaḥ arvate

original: RV_9,062.03a kṛṇvanto varivo gave 'bhy arṣanti suṣṭutim /
analyzed: kṛṇvantaḥ varivaḥ gave bhi arṣanti suṣṭutim

original: RV_9,062.03c iḷām asmabhyaṃ saṃyatam //
analyzed: iḷām asmabhyam saṃyatam

original: RV_9,062.04a asāvy aṃśur madāyāpsu dakṣo giriṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: asāvi aṃśuḥ madāya apsu dakṣaḥ giriṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_9,062.04c śyeno na yonim āsadat //
analyzed: śyenaḥ na yonim āsadat

original: RV_9,062.05a śubhram andho devavātam apsu dhūto nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: śubhram andhaḥ deva vātam apsu dhūtaḥ nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,062.05c svadanti gāvaḥ payobhiḥ //
analyzed: svadanti gāvaḥ payobhiḥ

original: RV_9,062.06a ād īm aśvaṃ na hetāro 'śūśubhann amṛtāya /
analyzed: āt īm aśvam na hetāraḥ śūśubhan amṛtāya

original: RV_9,062.06c madhvo rasaṃ sadhamāde //
analyzed: madhvaḥ rasam sadhamāde

original: RV_9,062.07a yās te dhārā madhuścuto 'sṛgram inda ūtaye /
analyzed: yāḥ te dhārāḥ madhuścutaḥ sṛgram indo ūtaye

original: RV_9,062.07c tābhiḥ pavitram āsadaḥ //
analyzed: tābhiḥ pavitram āsadaḥ

original: RV_9,062.08a so arṣendrāya pītaye tiro romāṇy avyayā /
analyzed: saḥ arṣa indrāya pītaye tiras romāṇi avyayā

original: RV_9,062.08c sīdan yonā vaneṣv ā //
analyzed: sīdan yonā vaneṣu ā

original: RV_9,062.09a tvam indo pari srava svādiṣṭho aṅgirobhyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam indo pari srava svādiṣṭhaḥ aṅgirobhyaḥ

original: RV_9,062.09c varivovid ghṛtam payaḥ //
analyzed: varivaḥ vid ghṛtam payaḥ

original: RV_9,062.10a ayaṃ vicarṣaṇir hitaḥ pavamānaḥ sa cetati /
analyzed: ayam vicarṣaṇiḥ hitaḥ pavamānaḥ sa cetati

original: RV_9,062.10c hinvāna āpyam bṛhat //
analyzed: hinvānaḥ āpyam bṛhat

original: RV_9,062.11a eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣavrataḥ pavamāno aśastihā /
analyzed: eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣa vrataḥ pavamānaḥ aśasti hā

original: RV_9,062.11c karad vasūni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: karat vasūni dāśuṣe

original: RV_9,062.12a ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
analyzed: ā pavasva sahasriṇam rayim gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_9,062.12c puruścandram puruspṛham //
analyzed: puru ścandram puruspṛham

original: RV_9,062.13a eṣa sya pari ṣicyate marmṛjyamāna āyubhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sya pari sicyate marmṛjyamānaḥ āyubhiḥ

original: RV_9,062.13c urugāyaḥ kavikratuḥ //
analyzed: uru gāyaḥ kavi kratuḥ

original: RV_9,062.14a sahasrotiḥ śatāmagho vimāno rajasaḥ kaviḥ /
analyzed: sahasra ūtiḥ śatāmaghaḥ vimānaḥ rajasaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_9,062.14c indrāya pavate madaḥ //
analyzed: indrāya pavate madaḥ

original: RV_9,062.15a girā jāta iha stuta indur indrāya dhīyate /
analyzed: girā jātaḥ iha stutaḥ induḥ indrāya dhīyate

original: RV_9,062.15c vir yonā vasatāv iva //
analyzed: viḥ yonau vasatau iva

original: RV_9,062.16a pavamānaḥ suto nṛbhiḥ somo vājam ivāsarat /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ sutaḥ nṛbhiḥ somaḥ vājam iva asarat

original: RV_9,062.16c camūṣu śakmanāsadam //
analyzed: camūṣu śakmanā āsadam

original: RV_9,062.17a taṃ tripṛṣṭhe trivandhure rathe yuñjanti yātave /
analyzed: tam tri pṛṣṭhe tri vandhure rathe yuñjanti yātave

original: RV_9,062.17c ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām sapta dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_9,062.18a taṃ sotāro dhanaspṛtam āśuṃ vājāya yātave /
analyzed: tam sotāraḥ dhana spṛtam āśum vājāya yātave

original: RV_9,062.18c hariṃ hinota vājinam //
analyzed: harim hinota vājinam

original: RV_9,062.19a āviśan kalaśaṃ suto viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ /
analyzed: āviśan kalaśam sutaḥ viśvāḥ arṣan abhi śriyaḥ

original: RV_9,062.19c śūro na goṣu tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: śūraḥ na goṣu tiṣṭhati

original: RV_9,062.20a ā ta indo madāya kam payo duhanty āyavaḥ /
analyzed: ā te indo madāya kam payaḥ duhanti āyavaḥ

original: RV_9,062.20c devā devebhyo madhu //
analyzed: devāḥ devebhyaḥ madhu

original: RV_9,062.21a ā naḥ somam pavitra ā sṛjatā madhumattamam /
analyzed: ā naḥ somam pavitre ā sṛjata madhumattamam

original: RV_9,062.21c devebhyo devaśruttamam //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ deva śruttamam

original: RV_9,062.22a ete somā asṛkṣata gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe /
analyzed: ete somāḥ asṛkṣata gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe

original: RV_9,062.22c madintamasya dhārayā //
analyzed: madintamasya dhārayā

original: RV_9,062.23a abhi gavyāni vītaye nṛmṇā punāno arṣasi /
analyzed: abhi gavyāni vītaye nṛmṇā punānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_9,062.23c sanadvājaḥ pari srava //
analyzed: sanat vājaḥ pari srava

original: RV_9,062.24a uta no gomatīr iṣo viśvā arṣa pariṣṭubhaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ viśvāḥ arṣa pariṣṭubhaḥ

original: RV_9,062.24c gṛṇāno jamadagninā //
analyzed: gṛṇānaḥ jamadagninā

original: RV_9,062.25a pavasva vāco agriyaḥ soma citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: pavasva vācaḥ agriyaḥ soma citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_9,062.25c abhi viśvāni kāvyā //
analyzed: abhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_9,062.26a tvaṃ samudriyā apo 'griyo vāca īrayan /
analyzed: tvam samudriyāḥ apaḥ griyaḥ vācaḥ īrayan

original: RV_9,062.26c pavasva viśvamejaya //
analyzed: pavasva viśvamejaya

original: RV_9,062.27a tubhyemā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthire /
analyzed: tubhya imā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthire

original: RV_9,062.27c tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ //
analyzed: tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_9,062.28a pra te divo na vṛṣṭayo dhārā yanty asaścataḥ /
analyzed: pra te divaḥ na vṛṣṭayaḥ dhārāḥ yanti asaścataḥ

original: RV_9,062.28c abhi śukrām upastiram //
analyzed: abhi śukrām upastiram

original: RV_9,062.29a indrāyendum punītanograṃ dakṣāya sādhanam /
analyzed: indrāya indum punītana ugram dakṣāya sādhanam

original: RV_9,062.29c īśānaṃ vītirādhasam //
analyzed: īśānam vīti rādhasam

original: RV_9,062.30a pavamāna ṛtaḥ kaviḥ somaḥ pavitram āsadat /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ṛtaḥ kaviḥ somaḥ pavitram āsadat

original: RV_9,062.30c dadhat stotre suvīryam //
analyzed: dadhat stotre su vīryam

original: RV_9,063.01a ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ soma suvīryam /
analyzed: ā pavasva sahasriṇam rayim soma su vīryam

original: RV_9,063.01c asme śravāṃsi dhāraya //
analyzed: asme śravāṃsi dhāraya

original: RV_9,063.02a iṣam ūrjaṃ ca pinvasa indrāya matsarintamaḥ /
analyzed: iṣam ūrjam ca pinvase indrāya matsarintamaḥ

original: RV_9,063.02c camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi //
analyzed: camūṣu ā ni sīdasi

original: RV_9,063.03a suta indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat /
analyzed: sutaḥ indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat

original: RV_9,063.03c madhumāṃ astu vāyave //
analyzed: madhumān astu vāyave

original: RV_9,063.04a ete asṛgram āśavo 'ti hvarāṃsi babhravaḥ /
analyzed: ete asṛgram āśavaḥ ti hvarāṃsi babhravaḥ

original: RV_9,063.04c somā ṛtasya dhārayā //
analyzed: somāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā

original: RV_9,063.05a indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam /
analyzed: indram vardhantaḥ ap turaḥ kṛṇvantaḥ viśvam āryam

original: RV_9,063.05c apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ //
analyzed: apaghnantaḥ arāvṇaḥ

original: RV_9,063.06a sutā anu svam ā rajo 'bhy arṣanti babhravaḥ /
analyzed: sutāḥ anu svam ā rajaḥ bhi arṣanti babhravaḥ

original: RV_9,063.06c indraṃ gacchanta indavaḥ //
analyzed: indram gacchantaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_9,063.07a ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryam arocayaḥ /
analyzed: ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryam arocayaḥ

original: RV_9,063.07c hinvāno mānuṣīr apaḥ //
analyzed: hinvānaḥ mānuṣīḥ apaḥ

original: RV_9,063.08a ayukta sūra etaśam pavamāno manāv adhi /
analyzed: ayukta sūraḥ etaśam pavamānaḥ manau adhi

original: RV_9,063.08c antarikṣeṇa yātave //
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa yātave

original: RV_9,063.09a uta tyā harito daśa sūro ayukta yātave /
analyzed: uta tyāḥ haritaḥ daśa sūraḥ ayukta yātave

original: RV_9,063.09c indur indra iti bruvan //
analyzed: induḥ indraḥ iti bruvan

original: RV_9,063.10a parīto vāyave sutaṃ gira indrāya matsaram /
analyzed: parītaḥ vāyave sutam giraḥ indrāya matsaram

original: RV_9,063.10c avyo vāreṣu siñcata //
analyzed: avyaḥ vāreṣu siñcata

original: RV_9,063.11a pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma duṣṭaram /
analyzed: pavamāna vida rayim asmabhyam soma duṣṭaram

original: RV_9,063.11c yo dūṇāśo vanuṣyatā //
analyzed: yaḥ dūṇāśaḥ vanuṣyatā

original: RV_9,063.12a abhy arṣa sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
analyzed: abhi arṣa sahasriṇam rayim gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_9,063.12c abhi vājam uta śravaḥ //
analyzed: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ

original: RV_9,063.13a somo devo na sūryo 'dribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ devaḥ na sūryaḥ dribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,063.13c dadhānaḥ kalaśe rasam //
analyzed: dadhānaḥ kalaśe rasam

original: RV_9,063.14a ete dhāmāny āryā śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā /
analyzed: ete dhāmāni āryā śukrāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā

original: RV_9,063.14c vājaṃ gomantam akṣaran //
analyzed: vājam gomantam akṣaran

original: RV_9,063.15a sutā indrāya vajriṇe somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
analyzed: sutāḥ indrāya vajriṇe somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_9,063.15c pavitram aty akṣaran //
analyzed: pavitram ati akṣaran

original: RV_9,063.16a pra soma madhumattamo rāye arṣa pavitra ā /
analyzed: pra soma madhumattamaḥ rāye arṣa pavitre ā

original: RV_9,063.16c mado yo devavītamaḥ //
analyzed: madaḥ yaḥ deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_9,063.17a tam ī mṛjanty āyavo hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam /
analyzed: tam ī mṛjanti āyavaḥ harim nadīṣu vājinam

original: RV_9,063.17c indum indrāya matsaram //
analyzed: indum indrāya matsaram

original: RV_9,063.18a ā pavasva hiraṇyavad aśvāvat soma vīravat /
analyzed: ā pavasva hiraṇyavat aśvāvat soma vīravat

original: RV_9,063.18c vājaṃ gomantam ā bhara //
analyzed: vājam gomantam ā bhara

original: RV_9,063.19a pari vāje na vājayum avyo vāreṣu siñcata /
analyzed: pari vāje na vājayum avyaḥ vāreṣu siñcata

original: RV_9,063.19c indrāya madhumattamam //
analyzed: indrāya madhumattamam

original: RV_9,063.20a kavim mṛjanti marjyaṃ dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ /
analyzed: kavim mṛjanti marjyam dhībhiḥ viprāḥ avasyavaḥ

original: RV_9,063.20c vṛṣā kanikrad arṣati //
analyzed: vṛṣā kanikrad arṣati

original: RV_9,063.21a vṛṣaṇaṃ dhībhir apturaṃ somam ṛtasya dhārayā /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇam dhībhiḥ ap turam somam ṛtasya dhārayā

original: RV_9,063.21c matī viprāḥ sam asvaran //
analyzed: matī viprāḥ sam asvaran

original: RV_9,063.22a pavasva devāyuṣag indraṃ gacchatu te madaḥ /
analyzed: pavasva deva āyuṣak indram gacchatu te madaḥ

original: RV_9,063.22c vāyum ā roha dharmaṇā //
analyzed: vāyum ā roha dharmaṇā

original: RV_9,063.23a pavamāna ni tośase rayiṃ soma śravāyyam /
analyzed: pavamāna ni tośase rayim soma śravāyyam

original: RV_9,063.23c priyaḥ samudram ā viśa //
analyzed: priyaḥ samudram ā viśa

original: RV_9,063.24a apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ kratuvit soma matsaraḥ /
analyzed: apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ kratu vid soma matsaraḥ

original: RV_9,063.24c nudasvādevayuṃ janam //
analyzed: nudasva adevayum janam

original: RV_9,063.25a pavamānā asṛkṣata somāḥ śukrāsa indavaḥ /
analyzed: pavamānāḥ asṛkṣata somāḥ śukrāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_9,063.25c abhi viśvāni kāvyā //
analyzed: abhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_9,063.26a pavamānāsa āśavaḥ śubhrā asṛgram indavaḥ /
analyzed: pavamānāsaḥ āśavaḥ śubhrāḥ asṛgram indavaḥ

original: RV_9,063.26c ghnanto viśvā apa dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: ghnantaḥ viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_9,063.27a pavamānā divas pary antarikṣād asṛkṣata /
analyzed: pavamānāḥ divaḥ pari antarikṣāt asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,063.27c pṛthivyā adhi sānavi //
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ adhi sānavi

original: RV_9,063.28a punānaḥ soma dhārayendo viśvā apa sridhaḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ soma dhāraya indo viśvāḥ apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_9,063.28c jahi rakṣāṃsi sukrato //
analyzed: jahi rakṣāṃsi su krato

original: RV_9,063.29a apaghnan soma rakṣaso 'bhy arṣa kanikradat /
analyzed: apaghnan soma rakṣasaḥ bhi arṣa kanikradat

original: RV_9,063.29c dyumantaṃ śuṣmam uttamam //
analyzed: dyumantam śuṣmam uttamam

original: RV_9,063.30a asme vasūni dhāraya soma divyāni pārthivā /
analyzed: asme vasūni dhāraya soma divyāni pārthivā

original: RV_9,063.30c indo viśvāni vāryā //
analyzed: indo viśvāni vāryā

original: RV_9,064.01a vṛṣā soma dyumāṃ asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā soma dyumān asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣa vrataḥ

original: RV_9,064.01c vṛṣā dharmāṇi dadhiṣe //
analyzed: vṛṣā dharmāṇi dadhiṣe

original: RV_9,064.02a vṛṣṇas te vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo vṛṣā vanaṃ vṛṣā madaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ te vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ vṛṣā vanam vṛṣā madaḥ

original: RV_9,064.02c satyaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣed asi //
analyzed: satyam vṛṣan vṛṣā id asi

original: RV_9,064.03a aśvo na cakrado vṛṣā saṃ gā indo sam arvataḥ /
analyzed: aśvaḥ na cakradaḥ vṛṣā sam gāḥ indo sam arvataḥ

original: RV_9,064.03c vi no rāye duro vṛdhi //
analyzed: vi naḥ rāye duraḥ vṛdhi

original: RV_9,064.04a asṛkṣata pra vājino gavyā somāso aśvayā /
analyzed: asṛkṣata pra vājinaḥ gavyā somāsaḥ aśvayā

original: RV_9,064.04c śukrāso vīrayāśavaḥ //
analyzed: śukrāsaḥ vīrayā āśavaḥ

original: RV_9,064.05a śumbhamānā ṛtāyubhir mṛjyamānā gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: śumbhamānāḥ ṛtāyubhiḥ mṛjyamānāḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,064.05c pavante vāre avyaye //
analyzed: pavante vāre avyaye

original: RV_9,064.06a te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somā divyāni pārthivā /
analyzed: te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somāḥ divyāni pārthivā

original: RV_9,064.06c pavantām āntarikṣyā //
analyzed: pavantām āntarikṣyā

original: RV_9,064.07a pavamānasya viśvavit pra te sargā asṛkṣata /
analyzed: pavamānasya viśva vid pra te sargāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,064.07c sūryasyeva na raśmayaḥ //
analyzed: sūryasya iva na raśmayaḥ

original: RV_9,064.08a ketuṃ kṛṇvan divas pari viśvā rūpābhy arṣasi /
analyzed: ketum kṛṇvan divaḥ pari viśvā rūpā abhi arṣasi

original: RV_9,064.08c samudraḥ soma pinvase //
analyzed: samudraḥ soma pinvase

original: RV_9,064.09a hinvāno vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi /
analyzed: hinvānaḥ vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi

original: RV_9,064.09c akrān devo na sūryaḥ //
analyzed: akrān devaḥ na sūryaḥ

original: RV_9,064.10a induḥ paviṣṭa cetanaḥ priyaḥ kavīnām matī /
analyzed: induḥ paviṣṭa cetanaḥ priyaḥ kavīnām matī

original: RV_9,064.10c sṛjad aśvaṃ rathīr iva //
analyzed: sṛjat aśvam rathīḥ iva

original: RV_9,064.11a ūrmir yas te pavitra ā devāvīḥ paryakṣarat /
analyzed: ūrmiḥ yaḥ te pavitre ā devāvīḥ paryakṣarat

original: RV_9,064.11c sīdann ṛtasya yonim ā //
analyzed: sīdan ṛtasya yonim ā

original: RV_9,064.12a sa no arṣa pavitra ā mado yo devavītamaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ arṣa pavitre ā madaḥ yaḥ deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_9,064.12c indav indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indo indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,064.13a iṣe pavasva dhārayā mṛjyamāno manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: iṣe pavasva dhārayā mṛjyamānaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_9,064.13c indo rucābhi gā ihi //
analyzed: indoḥ rucā abhi gāḥ ihi

original: RV_9,064.14a punāno varivas kṛdhy ūrjaṃ janāya girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ varivaḥ kṛdhī ūrjam janāya girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,064.14c hare sṛjāna āśiram //
analyzed: hare sṛjānaḥ āśiram

original: RV_9,064.15a punāno devavītaya indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam /
analyzed: punānaḥ deva vītaye indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,064.15c dyutāno vājibhir yataḥ //
analyzed: dyutānaḥ vājibhiḥ yataḥ

original: RV_9,064.16a pra hinvānāsa indavo 'cchā samudram āśavaḥ /
analyzed: pra hinvānāsaḥ indavaḥ chā samudram āśavaḥ

original: RV_9,064.16c dhiyā jūtā asṛkṣata //
analyzed: dhiyā jūtāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,064.17a marmṛjānāsa āyavo vṛthā samudram indavaḥ /
analyzed: marmṛjānāsaḥ āyavaḥ vṛthā samudram indavaḥ

original: RV_9,064.17c agmann ṛtasya yonim ā //
analyzed: agman ṛtasya yonim ā

original: RV_9,064.18a pari ṇo yāhy asmayur viśvā vasūny ojasā /
analyzed: pari naḥ yāhi asmayuḥ viśvā vasūni ojasā

original: RV_9,064.18c pāhi naḥ śarma vīravat //
analyzed: pāhi naḥ śarma vīravat

original: RV_9,064.19a mimāti vahnir etaśaḥ padaṃ yujāna ṛkvabhiḥ /
analyzed: mimāti vahniḥ etaśaḥ padam yujānaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_9,064.19c pra yat samudra āhitaḥ //
analyzed: pra yat samudre āhitaḥ

original: RV_9,064.20a ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayam āśur ṛtasya sīdati /
analyzed: ā yat yonim hiraṇyayam āśuḥ ṛtasya sīdati

original: RV_9,064.20c jahāty apracetasaḥ //
analyzed: jahāti apracetasaḥ

original: RV_9,064.21a abhi venā anūṣateyakṣanti pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: abhi venāḥ anūṣata iyakṣanti pracetasaḥ

original: RV_9,064.21c majjanty avicetasaḥ //
analyzed: majjanti avicetasaḥ

original: RV_9,064.22a indrāyendo marutvate pavasva madhumattamaḥ /
analyzed: indrāya indo marutvate pavasva madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_9,064.22c ṛtasya yonim āsadam //
analyzed: ṛtasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_9,064.23a taṃ tvā viprā vacovidaḥ pari ṣkṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā viprāḥ vacaḥ vidaḥ pari skṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_9,064.23c saṃ tvā mṛjanty āyavaḥ //
analyzed: sam tvā mṛjanti āyavaḥ

original: RV_9,064.24a rasaṃ te mitro aryamā pibanti varuṇaḥ kave /
analyzed: rasam te mitraḥ aryamā pibanti varuṇaḥ kave

original: RV_9,064.24c pavamānasya marutaḥ //
analyzed: pavamānasya marutaḥ

original: RV_9,064.25a tvaṃ soma vipaścitam punāno vācam iṣyasi /
analyzed: tvam soma vipaścitam punānaḥ vācam iṣyasi

original: RV_9,064.25c indo sahasrabharṇasam //
analyzed: indo sahasrabharṇasam

original: RV_9,064.26a uto sahasrabharṇasaṃ vācaṃ soma makhasyuvam /
analyzed: uta u sahasrabharṇasam vācam soma makhasyuvam

original: RV_9,064.26c punāna indav ā bhara //
analyzed: punānaḥ indo ā bhara

original: RV_9,064.27a punāna indav eṣām puruhūta janānām /
analyzed: punānaḥ indo eṣām puru hūta janānām

original: RV_9,064.27c priyaḥ samudram ā viśa //
analyzed: priyaḥ samudram ā viśa

original: RV_9,064.28a davidyutatyā rucā pariṣṭobhantyā kṛpā /
analyzed: davidyutatyā rucā pariṣṭobhantyā kṛpā

original: RV_9,064.28c somāḥ śukrā gavāśiraḥ //
analyzed: somāḥ śukrāḥ gavāśiraḥ

original: RV_9,064.29a hinvāno hetṛbhir yata ā vājaṃ vājy akramīt /
analyzed: hinvānaḥ hetṛbhiḥ yataḥ ā vājam vājī akramīt

original: RV_9,064.29c sīdanto vanuṣo yathā //
analyzed: sīdantaḥ vanuṣaḥ yathā

original: RV_9,064.30a ṛdhak soma svastaye saṃjagmāno divaḥ kaviḥ /
analyzed: ṛdhak soma svastaye saṃjagmānaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_9,064.30c pavasva sūryo dṛśe //
analyzed: pavasva sūryaḥ dṛśe

original: RV_9,065.01a hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ svasāro jāmayas patim /
analyzed: hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ svasāraḥ jāmayaḥ patim

original: RV_9,065.01c mahām indum mahīyuvaḥ //
analyzed: mahām indum mahīyuvaḥ

original: RV_9,065.02a pavamāna rucā-rucā devo devebhyas pari /
analyzed: pavamāna rucā a rucā devaḥ devebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_9,065.02c viśvā vasūny ā viśa //
analyzed: viśvā vasūni ā viśa

original: RV_9,065.03a ā pavamāna suṣṭutiṃ vṛṣṭiṃ devebhyo duvaḥ /
analyzed: ā pavamāna suṣṭutim vṛṣṭim devebhyaḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_9,065.03c iṣe pavasva saṃyatam //
analyzed: iṣe pavasva saṃyatam

original: RV_9,065.04a vṛṣā hy asi bhānunā dyumantaṃ tvā havāmahe /
analyzed: vṛṣā hi asi bhānunā dyumantam tvā havāmahe

original: RV_9,065.04c pavamāna svādhyaḥ //
analyzed: pavamāna svādhyaḥ

original: RV_9,065.05a ā pavasva suvīryam mandamānaḥ svāyudha /
analyzed: ā pavasva su vīryam mandamānaḥ su āyudha

original: RV_9,065.05c iho ṣv indav ā gahi //
analyzed: iha u su indo ā gahi

original: RV_9,065.06a yad adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: yat adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,065.06c druṇā sadhastham aśnuṣe //
analyzed: druṇā sadhastham aśnuṣe

original: RV_9,065.07a pra somāya vyaśvavat pavamānāya gāyata /
analyzed: pra somāya vyaśva vat pavamānāya gāyata

original: RV_9,065.07c mahe sahasracakṣase //
analyzed: mahe sahasra cakṣase

original: RV_9,065.08a yasya varṇam madhuścutaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: yasya varṇam madhuścutam harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,065.08c indum indrāya pītaye //
analyzed: indum indrāya pītaye

original: RV_9,065.09a tasya te vājino vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasya te vājinaḥ vayam viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ

original: RV_9,065.09c sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: sakhi tvam ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_9,065.10a vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ

original: RV_9,065.10c viśvā dadhāna ojasā //
analyzed: viśvā dadhānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,065.11a taṃ tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svardṛśam /
analyzed: tam tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svar dṛśam

original: RV_9,065.11c hinve vājeṣu vājinam //
analyzed: hinve vājeṣu vājinam

original: RV_9,065.12a ayā citto vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā /
analyzed: ayā cittaḥ vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā

original: RV_9,065.12c yujaṃ vājeṣu codaya //
analyzed: yujam vājeṣu codaya

original: RV_9,065.13a ā na indo mahīm iṣam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ indo mahīm iṣam pavasva viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_9,065.13c asmabhyaṃ soma gātuvit //
analyzed: asmabhyam soma gātu vid

original: RV_9,065.14a ā kalaśā anūṣatendo dhārābhir ojasā /
analyzed: ā kalaśāḥ anūṣata indo dhārābhiḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,065.14c endrasya pītaye viśa //
analyzed: ā indrasya pītaye viśa

original: RV_9,065.15a yasya te madyaṃ rasaṃ tīvraṃ duhanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: yasya te madyam rasam tīvram duhanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,065.15c sa pavasvābhimātihā //
analyzed: sa pavasva abhimāti hā

original: RV_9,065.16a rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhi /
analyzed: rājā medhābhiḥ īyate pavamānaḥ manau adhi

original: RV_9,065.16c antarikṣeṇa yātave //
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa yātave

original: RV_9,065.17a ā na indo śatagvinaṃ gavām poṣaṃ svaśvyam /
analyzed: ā naḥ indo śatagvinam gavām poṣam su aśvyam

original: RV_9,065.17c vahā bhagattim ūtaye //
analyzed: vaha bhagattim ūtaye

original: RV_9,065.18a ā naḥ soma saho juvo rūpaṃ na varcase bhara /
analyzed: ā naḥ soma sahaḥ juvaḥ rūpam na varcase bhara

original: RV_9,065.18c suṣvāṇo devavītaye //
analyzed: suṣvāṇaḥ deva vītaye

original: RV_9,065.19a arṣā soma dyumattamo 'bhi droṇāni roruvat /
analyzed: arṣa soma dyumattamaḥ bhi droṇāni roruvat

original: RV_9,065.19c sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā //
analyzed: sīdam śyenaḥ na yonim ā

original: RV_9,065.20a apsā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: ap sāḥ indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_9,065.20c somo arṣati viṣṇave //
analyzed: somaḥ arṣati viṣṇave

original: RV_9,065.21a iṣaṃ tokāya no dadhad asmabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ /
analyzed: iṣam tokāya naḥ dadhat asmabhyam soma viśvatas

original: RV_9,065.21c ā pavasva sahasriṇam //
analyzed: ā pavasva sahasriṇam

original: RV_9,065.22a ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire /
analyzed: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire

original: RV_9,065.22c ye vādaḥ śaryaṇāvati //
analyzed: ye vā adaḥ śaryaṇāvati

original: RV_9,065.23a ya ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu ye madhye pastyānām /
analyzed: yaḥ ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu ye madhye pastyānām

original: RV_9,065.23c ye vā janeṣu pañcasu //
analyzed: ye vā janeṣu pañcasu

original: RV_9,065.24a te no vṛṣṭiṃ divas pari pavantām ā suvīryam /
analyzed: te naḥ vṛṣṭim divaḥ pari pavantām ā su vīryam

original: RV_9,065.24c suvānā devāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: suvānāḥ devāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_9,065.25a pavate haryato harir gṛṇāno jamadagninā /
analyzed: pavate haryataḥ hariḥ gṛṇānaḥ jamadagninā

original: RV_9,065.25c hinvāno gor adhi tvaci //
analyzed: hinvānaḥ goḥ adhi tvaci

original: RV_9,065.26a pra śukrāso vayojuvo hinvānāso na saptayaḥ /
analyzed: pra śukrāsaḥ vayaḥ juvaḥ hinvānāsaḥ na saptayaḥ

original: RV_9,065.26c śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata //
analyzed: śrīṇānāḥ apsu mṛñjata

original: RV_9,065.27a taṃ tvā suteṣv ābhuvo hinvire devatātaye /
analyzed: tam tvā suteṣu ābhuvaḥ hinvire devatātaye

original: RV_9,065.27c sa pavasvānayā rucā //
analyzed: sa pavasva anayā rucā

original: RV_9,065.28a ā te dakṣam mayobhuvaṃ vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā te dakṣam mayobhuvam vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_9,065.28c pāntam ā puruspṛham //
analyzed: pāntam ā puruspṛham

original: RV_9,065.29a ā mandram ā vareṇyam ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam /
analyzed: ā mandram ā vareṇyam ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam

original: RV_9,065.29c pāntam ā puruspṛham //
analyzed: pāntam ā puruspṛham

original: RV_9,065.30a ā rayim ā sucetunam ā sukrato tanūṣv ā /
analyzed: ā rayim ā sucetunam ā su krato tanūṣu ā

original: RV_9,065.30c pāntam ā puruspṛham //
analyzed: pāntam ā puruspṛham

original: RV_9,066.01a pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe 'bhi viśvāni kāvyā /
analyzed: pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe bhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_9,066.01c sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhā sakhibhyaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_9,066.02a tābhyāṃ viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī /
analyzed: tābhyām viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī

original: RV_9,066.02c pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ //
analyzed: pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ

original: RV_9,066.03a pari dhāmāni yāni te tvaṃ somāsi viśvataḥ /
analyzed: pari dhāmāni yāni te tvam soma asi viśvatas

original: RV_9,066.03c pavamāna ṛtubhiḥ kave //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ṛtubhiḥ kave

original: RV_9,066.04a pavasva janayann iṣo 'bhi viśvāni vāryā /
analyzed: pavasva janayan iṣaḥ bhi viśvāni vāryā

original: RV_9,066.04c sakhā sakhibhya ūtaye //
analyzed: sakhā sakhibhyaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_9,066.05a tava śukrāso arcayo divas pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate /
analyzed: tava śukrāsaḥ arcayaḥ divaḥ pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate

original: RV_9,066.05c pavitraṃ soma dhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pavitram soma dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,066.06a taveme sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣaṃ soma sisrate /
analyzed: tava ime sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣam soma sisrate

original: RV_9,066.06c tubhyaṃ dhāvanti dhenavaḥ //
analyzed: tubhyam dhāvanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_9,066.07a pra soma yāhi dhārayā suta indrāya matsaraḥ /
analyzed: pra soma yāhi dhārayā sutaḥ indrāya matsaraḥ

original: RV_9,066.07c dadhāno akṣiti śravaḥ //
analyzed: dadhānaḥ akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_9,066.08a sam u tvā dhībhir asvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ /
analyzed: sam u tvā dhībhiḥ asvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ

original: RV_9,066.08c vipram ājā vivasvataḥ //
analyzed: vipram ājā vivasvataḥ

original: RV_9,066.09a mṛjanti tvā sam agruvo 'vye jīrāv adhi ṣvaṇi /
analyzed: mṛjanti tvā sam agruvaḥ vye jīrau adhi svani

original: RV_9,066.09c rebho yad ajyase vane //
analyzed: rebhaḥ yat ajyase vane

original: RV_9,066.10a pavamānasya te kave vājin sargā asṛkṣata /
analyzed: pavamānasya te kave vājin sargāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,066.10c arvanto na śravasyavaḥ //
analyzed: arvantaḥ na śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_9,066.11a acchā kośam madhuścutam asṛgraṃ vāre avyaye /
analyzed: acchā kośam madhuścutam asṛgram vāre avyaye

original: RV_9,066.11c avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ //
analyzed: avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_9,066.12a acchā samudram indavo 'staṃ gāvo na dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: acchā samudram indavaḥ stam gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_9,066.12c agmann ṛtasya yonim ā //
analyzed: agman ṛtasya yonim ā

original: RV_9,066.13a pra ṇa indo mahe raṇa āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: pra naḥ indo mahe raṇe āpaḥ arṣanti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_9,066.13c yad gobhir vāsayiṣyase //
analyzed: yat gobhiḥ vāsayiṣyase

original: RV_9,066.14a asya te sakhye vayam iyakṣantas tvotayaḥ /
analyzed: asya te sakhye vayam iyakṣantaḥ tvotayaḥ

original: RV_9,066.14c indo sakhitvam uśmasi //
analyzed: indo sakhi tvam uśmasi

original: RV_9,066.15a ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛcakṣase /
analyzed: ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛ cakṣase

original: RV_9,066.15c endrasya jaṭhare viśa //
analyzed: ā indrasya jaṭhare viśa

original: RV_9,066.16a mahāṃ asi soma jyeṣṭha ugrāṇām inda ojiṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: mahān asi soma jyeṣṭhaḥ ugrāṇām indo ojiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_9,066.16c yudhvā sañ chaśvaj jigetha //
analyzed: yudhvā sam śaśvat jigetha

original: RV_9,066.17a ya ugrebhyaś cid ojīyāñ chūrebhyaś cic chūrataraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ugrebhyaḥ cit ojīyān śūrebhyaḥ cit śūrataraḥ

original: RV_9,066.17c bhūridābhyaś cin maṃhīyān //
analyzed: bhūri dābhyaḥ cit maṃhīyān

original: RV_9,066.18a tvaṃ soma sūra eṣas tokasya sātā tanūnām /
analyzed: tvam soma sūraḥ ā iṣaḥ tokasya sātā tanūnām

original: RV_9,066.18c vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya vṛṇīmahe yujyāya //
analyzed: vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya vṛṇīmahe yujyāya

original: RV_9,066.19a agna āyūṃṣi pavasa ā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ /
analyzed: agne āyūṃṣi pavase ā suva ūrjam iṣam ca naḥ

original: RV_9,066.19c āre bādhasva ducchunām //
analyzed: āre bādhasva ducchunām

original: RV_9,066.20a agnir ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ

original: RV_9,066.20c tam īmahe mahāgayam //
analyzed: tam īmahe mahā gayam

original: RV_9,066.21a agne pavasva svapā asme varcaḥ suvīryam /
analyzed: agne pavasva su apāḥ asme varcaḥ su vīryam

original: RV_9,066.21c dadhad rayim mayi poṣam //
analyzed: dadhat rayim mayi poṣam

original: RV_9,066.22a pavamāno ati sridho 'bhy arṣati suṣṭutim /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ati sridhaḥ bhī arṣati suṣṭutim

original: RV_9,066.22c sūro na viśvadarśataḥ //
analyzed: sūraḥ na viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_9,066.23a sa marmṛjāna āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ /
analyzed: sa marmṛjānaḥ āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ

original: RV_9,066.23c indur atyo vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: induḥ atyaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,066.24a pavamāna ṛtam bṛhac chukraṃ jyotir ajījanat /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ṛtam bṛhat śukram jyotiḥ ajījanat

original: RV_9,066.24c kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi jaṅghanat //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi jaṅghanat

original: RV_9,066.25a pavamānasya jaṅghnato hareś candrā asṛkṣata /
analyzed: pavamānasya jaṅghnataḥ hareḥ candrāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,066.25c jīrā ajiraśociṣaḥ //
analyzed: jīrāḥ ajira śociṣaḥ

original: RV_9,066.26a pavamāno rathītamaḥ śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ rathītamaḥ śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ

original: RV_9,066.26c hariścandro marudgaṇaḥ //
analyzed: hari ścandraḥ marut gaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,066.27a pavamāno vy aśnavad raśmibhir vājasātamaḥ /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ vi aśnavat raśmibhiḥ vāja sātamaḥ

original: RV_9,066.27c dadhat stotre suvīryam //
analyzed: dadhat stotre su vīryam

original: RV_9,066.28a pra suvāna indur akṣāḥ pavitram aty avyayam /
analyzed: pra suvānaḥ induḥ akṣār pavitram ati avyayam

original: RV_9,066.28c punāna indur indram ā //
analyzed: punānaḥ induḥ indram ā

original: RV_9,066.29a eṣa somo adhi tvaci gavāṃ krīḷaty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa somaḥ adhi tvaci gavām krīḍati adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,066.29c indram madāya johuvat //
analyzed: indram madāya johuvat

original: RV_9,066.30a yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamānābhṛtaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamāna ābhṛtam divaḥ

original: RV_9,066.30c tena no mṛḷa jīvase //
analyzed: tena naḥ mṛḍa jīvase

original: RV_9,067.01a tvaṃ somāsi dhārayur mandra ojiṣṭho adhvare /
analyzed: tvam soma asi dhārayuḥ mandraḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ adhvare

original: RV_9,067.01c pavasva maṃhayadrayiḥ //
analyzed: pavasva maṃhayat rayiḥ

original: RV_9,067.02a tvaṃ suto nṛmādano dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ /
analyzed: tvam sutaḥ nṛ mādanaḥ dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ

original: RV_9,067.02c indrāya sūrir andhasā //
analyzed: indrāya sūriḥ andhasā

original: RV_9,067.03a tvaṃ suṣvāṇo adribhir abhy arṣa kanikradat /
analyzed: tvam suṣvāṇaḥ adribhiḥ abhī arṣa kanikradat

original: RV_9,067.03c dyumantaṃ śuṣmam uttamam //
analyzed: dyumantam śuṣmam uttamam

original: RV_9,067.04a indur hinvāno arṣati tiro vārāṇy avyayā /
analyzed: induḥ hinvānaḥ arṣati tiras vārāṇi avyayā

original: RV_9,067.04c harir vājam acikradat //
analyzed: hariḥ vājam acikradat

original: RV_9,067.05a indo vy avyam arṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā /
analyzed: indo vi avyam arṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā

original: RV_9,067.05c vi vājān soma gomataḥ //
analyzed: vi vājān soma gomataḥ

original: RV_9,067.06a ā na indo śatagvinaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
analyzed: ā naḥ indo śatagvinam rayim gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_9,067.06c bharā soma sahasriṇam //
analyzed: bhara soma sahasriṇam

original: RV_9,067.07a pavamānāsa indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ /
analyzed: pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ tiras pavitram āśavaḥ

original: RV_9,067.07c indraṃ yāmebhir āśata //
analyzed: indram yāmebhiḥ āśata

original: RV_9,067.08a kakuhaḥ somyo rasa indur indrāya pūrvyaḥ /
analyzed: kakuhaḥ somyaḥ rasaḥ induḥ indrāya pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_9,067.08c āyuḥ pavata āyave //
analyzed: āyuḥ pavate āyave

original: RV_9,067.09a hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam /
analyzed: hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam

original: RV_9,067.09c abhi girā sam asvaran //
analyzed: abhi girā sam asvaran

original: RV_9,067.10a avitā no ajāśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani-yāmani /
analyzed: avitā naḥ aja aśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani yāmani

original: RV_9,067.10c ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ //
analyzed: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ

original: RV_9,067.11a ayaṃ somaḥ kapardine ghṛtaṃ na pavate madhu /
analyzed: ayam somaḥ kapardine ghṛtam na pavate madhu

original: RV_9,067.11c ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ //
analyzed: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ

original: RV_9,067.12a ayaṃ ta āghṛṇe suto ghṛtaṃ na pavate śuci /
analyzed: ayam te āghṛṇe sutaḥ ghṛtam na pavate śuci

original: RV_9,067.12c ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ //
analyzed: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ

original: RV_9,067.13a vāco jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā /
analyzed: vācaḥ jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_9,067.13c deveṣu ratnadhā asi //
analyzed: deveṣu ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_9,067.14a ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyeno varma vi gāhate /
analyzed: ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyenaḥ varma vi gāhate

original: RV_9,067.14c abhi droṇā kanikradat //
analyzed: abhi droṇā kanikradat

original: RV_9,067.15a pari pra soma te raso 'sarji kalaśe sutaḥ /
analyzed: pari pra soma te rasaḥ sarji kalaśe sutaḥ

original: RV_9,067.15c śyeno na takto arṣati //
analyzed: śyenaḥ na taktaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,067.16a pavasva soma mandayann indrāya madhumattamaḥ //
analyzed: pavasva soma mandayan indrāya madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_9,067.17a asṛgran devavītaye vājayanto rathā iva //
analyzed: asṛgran deva vītaye vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva

original: RV_9,067.18a te sutāso madintamāḥ śukrā vāyum asṛkṣata //
analyzed: te sutāsaḥ madintamāḥ śukrāḥ vāyum asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,067.19a grāvṇā tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi /
analyzed: grāvṇā tunnaḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram soma gacchasi

original: RV_9,067.19c dadhat stotre suvīryam //
analyzed: dadhat stotre su vīryam

original: RV_9,067.20a eṣa tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate /
analyzed: eṣa tunnaḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate

original: RV_9,067.20c rakṣohā vāram avyayam //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ hā vāram avyayam

original: RV_9,067.21a yad anti yac ca dūrake bhayaṃ vindati mām iha /
analyzed: yat anti yat ca dūrake bhayam vindati mām iha

original: RV_9,067.21c pavamāna vi taj jahi //
analyzed: pavamāna vi tat jahi

original: RV_9,067.22a pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ saḥ adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_9,067.22c yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ

original: RV_9,067.23a yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antar ā /
analyzed: yat te pavitram arciṣi agne vitatam antar ā

original: RV_9,067.23c brahma tena punīhi naḥ //
analyzed: brahma tena punīhi naḥ

original: RV_9,067.24a yat te pavitram arcivad agne tena punīhi naḥ /
analyzed: yat te pavitram arcivat agne tena punīhi naḥ

original: RV_9,067.24c brahmasavaiḥ punīhi naḥ //
analyzed: brahma savaiḥ punīhi naḥ

original: RV_9,067.25a ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca /
analyzed: ubhābhyām deva savitar pavitreṇa savena ca

original: RV_9,067.25c mām punīhi viśvataḥ //
analyzed: mām punīhi viśvatas

original: RV_9,067.26a tribhiṣ ṭvaṃ deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: tribhiḥ tvam deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,067.26c agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ //
analyzed: agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ

original: RV_9,067.27a punantu māṃ devajanāḥ punantu vasavo dhiyā /
analyzed: punantu mām deva janāḥ punantu vasavaḥ dhiyā

original: RV_9,067.27c viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā

original: RV_9,067.28a pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ /
analyzed: pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ

original: RV_9,067.28c devebhya uttamaṃ haviḥ //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ uttamam haviḥ

original: RV_9,067.29a upa priyam panipnataṃ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham /
analyzed: upa priyam panipnatam yuvānam āhutīvṛdham

original: RV_9,067.29c aganma bibhrato namaḥ //
analyzed: aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ

original: RV_9,067.30a alāyyasya paraśur nanāśa tam ā pavasva deva soma /
analyzed: alāyyasya paraśuḥ nanāśa tam ā pavasva deva soma

original: RV_9,067.30c ākhuṃ cid eva deva soma //
analyzed: ākhum cit eva deva soma

original: RV_9,067.31a yaḥ pāvamānīr adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam /
analyzed: yaḥ pāvamānīḥ adhyeti ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtam rasam

original: RV_9,067.31c sarvaṃ sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā //
analyzed: sarvam sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā

original: RV_9,067.32a pāvamānīr yo adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam /
analyzed: pāvamānīḥ yaḥ adhyeti ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtam rasam

original: RV_9,067.32c tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīraṃ sarpir madhūdakam //
analyzed: tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīram sarpiḥ madhūdakam

original: RV_9,068.01a pra devam acchā madhumanta indavo 'siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: pra devam acchā madhumantaḥ indavaḥ siṣyadanta gāvaḥ ā na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_9,068.01c barhiṣado vacanāvanta ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyā nirṇijaṃ dhire //
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ vacanāvantaḥ ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyāḥ nirṇijam dhire

original: RV_9,068.02a sa roruvad abhi pūrvā acikradad upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ /
analyzed: sa roruvat abhi pūrvāḥ acikradat upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ

original: RV_9,068.02c tiraḥ pavitram pariyann uru jrayo ni śaryāṇi dadhate deva ā varam //
analyzed: tiras pavitram pariyan uru jrayaḥ ni śaryāṇi dadhate devaḥ ā varam

original: RV_9,068.03a vi yo mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinvad akṣitā /
analyzed: vi yaḥ mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinvat akṣitā

original: RV_9,068.03c mahī apāre rajasī vivevidad abhivrajann akṣitam pāja ā dade //
analyzed: mahī apāre rajasī vivevidat abhivrajan akṣitam pājaḥ ā dade

original: RV_9,068.04a sa mātarā vicaran vājayann apaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam /
analyzed: sa mātarā vicaran vājayan apaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam

original: RV_9,068.04c aṃśur yavena pipiśe yato nṛbhiḥ saṃ jāmibhir nasate rakṣate śiraḥ //
analyzed: aṃśuḥ yavena pipiśe yataḥ nṛbhiḥ sam jāmibhiḥ nasate rakṣate śiraḥ

original: RV_9,068.05a saṃ dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kavir ṛtasya garbho nihito yamā paraḥ /
analyzed: sam dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kaviḥ ṛtasya garbhaḥ nihitaḥ yamā paras

original: RV_9,068.05c yūnā ha santā prathamaṃ vi jajñatur guhā hitaṃ janima nemam udyatam //
analyzed: yūnā ha santā prathamam vi jajñatuḥ guhā hitam janima nemam udyatam

original: RV_9,068.06a mandrasya rūpaṃ vividur manīṣiṇaḥ śyeno yad andho abharat parāvataḥ /
analyzed: mandrasya rūpam vividuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ śyenaḥ yat andhaḥ abharat parāvataḥ

original: RV_9,068.06c tam marjayanta suvṛdhaṃ nadīṣv āṃ uśantam aṃśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam //
analyzed: tam marjayanta suvṛdham nadīṣu ām uśantam aṃśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_9,068.07a tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutaṃ soma ṛṣibhir matibhir dhītibhir hitam /
analyzed: tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutam soma ṛṣibhiḥ matibhiḥ dhītibhiḥ hitam

original: RV_9,068.07c avyo vārebhir uta devahūtibhir nṛbhir yato vājam ā darṣi sātaye //
analyzed: avyaḥ vārebhiḥ uta deva hūtibhiḥ nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vājam ā darṣi sātaye

original: RV_9,068.08a pariprayantaṃ vayyaṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ somam manīṣā abhy anūṣata stubhaḥ /
analyzed: pariprayantam vayyam suṣaṃsadam somam manīṣāḥ abhī anūṣata stubhaḥ

original: RV_9,068.08c yo dhārayā madhumāṃ ūrmiṇā diva iyarti vācaṃ rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ dhārayā madhumān ūrmiṇā divaḥ iyarti vācam rayiṣāh amartyaḥ

original: RV_9,068.09a ayaṃ diva iyarti viśvam ā rajaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati /
analyzed: ayam divaḥ iyarti viśvam ā rajaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati

original: RV_9,068.09c adbhir gobhir mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punāna indur varivo vidat priyam //
analyzed: adbhiḥ gobhiḥ mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punānaḥ induḥ varivaḥ vidat priyam

original: RV_9,068.10a evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāno vayo dadhac citratamam pavasva /
analyzed: eva naḥ soma pariṣicyamānaḥ vayaḥ dadhat citratamam pavasva

original: RV_9,068.10c adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram //
analyzed: a dveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devāḥ dhatta rayim asme su vīram

original: RV_9,069.01a iṣur na dhanvan prati dhīyate matir vatso na mātur upa sarjy ūdhani /
analyzed: iṣuḥ na dhanvan prati dhīyate matiḥ vatsaḥ na mātuḥ upa sarji ūdhani

original: RV_9,069.01c urudhāreva duhe agra āyaty asya vrateṣv api soma iṣyate //
analyzed: uru dhārā iva duhe agre āyatī asya vrateṣu api somaḥ iṣyate

original: RV_9,069.02a upo matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antar āsani /
analyzed: upa u matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antar āsani

original: RV_9,069.02c pavamānaḥ saṃtaniḥ praghnatām iva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ saṃtaniḥ praghnatām iva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati

original: RV_9,069.03a avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīr aditer ṛtaṃ yate /
analyzed: avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīḥ aditeḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_9,069.03c harir akrān yajataḥ saṃyato mado nṛmṇā śiśāno mahiṣo na śobhate //
analyzed: hariḥ akrān yajataḥ saṃyataḥ madaḥ nṛmṇā śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śobhate

original: RV_9,069.04a ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavo devasya devīr upa yanti niṣkṛtam /
analyzed: ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavaḥ devasya devīḥ upa yanti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,069.04c aty akramīd arjunaṃ vāram avyayam atkaṃ na niktam pari somo avyata //
analyzed: ati akramīt arjunam vāram avyayam atkam na niktam pari somaḥ avyata

original: RV_9,069.05a amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā harir amartyo nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata /
analyzed: amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā hariḥ amartyaḥ nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata

original: RV_9,069.05c divas pṛṣṭham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛtopastaraṇaṃ camvor nabhasmayam //
analyzed: divaḥ pṛṣṭham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛta upastaraṇam camvoḥ nabhasmayam

original: RV_9,069.06a sūryasyeva raśmayo drāvayitnavo matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate /
analyzed: sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ drāvayitnavaḥ matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate

original: RV_9,069.06c tantuṃ tatam pari sargāsa āśavo nendrād ṛte pavate dhāma kiṃ cana //
analyzed: tantum tatam pari sargāsaḥ āśavaḥ na indrāt ṛte pavate dhāma kim cana

original: RV_9,069.07a sindhor iva pravaṇe nimna āśavo vṛṣacyutā madāso gātum āśata /
analyzed: sindhoḥ iva pravaṇe nimne āśavaḥ vṛṣa cyutāḥ madāsaḥ gātum āśata

original: RV_9,069.07c śaṃ no niveśe dvipade catuṣpade 'sme vājāḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ niveśe dvipade catuṣpade sme vājāḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_9,069.08a ā naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad aśvāvad gomad yavamat suvīryam /
analyzed: ā naḥ pavasva vasumat hiraṇyavat aśvāvat gomat yavamat su vīryam

original: RV_9,069.08c yūyaṃ hi soma pitaro mama sthana divo mūrdhānaḥ prasthitā vayaskṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yūyam hi soma pitaraḥ mama sthana divaḥ mūrdhānaḥ prasthitāḥ vayaskṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,069.09a ete somāḥ pavamānāsa indraṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sātim accha /
analyzed: ete somāḥ pavamānāsaḥ indram rathāḥ iva pra yayuḥ sātim accha

original: RV_9,069.09c sutāḥ pavitram ati yanty avyaṃ hitvī vavriṃ harito vṛṣṭim accha //
analyzed: sutāḥ pavitram ati yanti avyam hitvī vavrim haritaḥ vṛṣṭim accha

original: RV_9,069.10a indav indrāya bṛhate pavasva sumṛḷīko anavadyo riśādāḥ /
analyzed: indo indrāya bṛhate pavasva su mṛḍīkaḥ anavadyaḥ riśādāḥ

original: RV_9,069.10c bharā candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
analyzed: bhara candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ

original: RV_9,070.01a trir asmai sapta dhenavo duduhre satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani /
analyzed: tris asmai sapta dhenavaḥ duduhre satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani

original: RV_9,070.01c catvāry anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yad ṛtair avardhata //
analyzed: catvāri anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yat ṛtaiḥ avardhata

original: RV_9,070.02a sa bhikṣamāṇo amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe dyāvā kāvyenā vi śaśrathe /
analyzed: sa bhikṣamāṇaḥ amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ ubhe dyāvā kāvyena vi śaśrathe

original: RV_9,070.02c tejiṣṭhā apo maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sado viduḥ //
analyzed: tejiṣṭhāḥ apaḥ maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sadaḥ viduḥ

original: RV_9,070.03a te asya santu ketavo 'mṛtyavo 'dābhyāso januṣī ubhe anu /
analyzed: te asya santu ketavaḥ mṛtyavaḥ dābhyāsaḥ januṣī ubhe anu

original: RV_9,070.03c yebhir nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punata ād id rājānam mananā agṛbhṇata //
analyzed: yebhiḥ nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punate āt id rājānam mananāḥ agṛbhṇata

original: RV_9,070.04a sa mṛjyamāno daśabhiḥ sukarmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣu prame sacā /
analyzed: sa mṛjyamānaḥ daśabhiḥ su karmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣu prame sacā

original: RV_9,070.04c vratāni pāno amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe nṛcakṣā anu paśyate viśau //
analyzed: vratāni pānaḥ amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ ubhe nṛ cakṣāḥ anu paśyate viśau

original: RV_9,070.05a sa marmṛjāna indriyāya dhāyasa obhe antā rodasī harṣate hitaḥ /
analyzed: sa marmṛjānaḥ indriyāya dhāyase ā ubhe antar rodasī harṣate hitaḥ

original: RV_9,070.05c vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīr ādediśānaḥ śaryaheva śurudhaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīḥ ādediśānaḥ śaryahā iva śurudhaḥ

original: RV_9,070.06a sa mātarā na dadṛśāna usriyo nānadad eti marutām iva svanaḥ /
analyzed: sa mātarā na dadṛśānaḥ usriyaḥ nānadat eti marutām iva svanaḥ

original: RV_9,070.06c jānann ṛtam prathamaṃ yat svarṇaram praśastaye kam avṛṇīta sukratuḥ //
analyzed: jānan ṛtam prathamam yat svarṇaram praśastaye kam avṛṇīta su kratuḥ

original: RV_9,070.07a ruvati bhīmo vṛṣabhas taviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśāno hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ruvati bhīmaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ taviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśānaḥ hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,070.07c ā yoniṃ somaḥ sukṛtaṃ ni ṣīdati gavyayī tvag bhavati nirṇig avyayī //
analyzed: ā yonim somaḥ su kṛtam ni sīdati gavyayī tvac bhavati nirṇij avyayī

original: RV_9,070.08a śuciḥ punānas tanvam arepasam avye harir ny adhāviṣṭa sānavi /
analyzed: śuciḥ punānaḥ tanvam arepasam avye hariḥ ni adhāviṣṭa sānavi

original: RV_9,070.08c juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tridhātu madhu kriyate sukarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tri dhātu madhu kriyate su karmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,070.09a pavasva soma devavītaye vṛṣendrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa /
analyzed: pavasva soma deva vītaye vṛṣā indrasya hārdi soma dhānam ā viśa

original: RV_9,070.09c purā no bādhād duritāti pāraya kṣetravid dhi diśa āhā vipṛcchate //
analyzed: purā naḥ bādhāt duritā ati pāraya kṣetra vid hi diśaḥ āha ā vipṛcchate

original: RV_9,070.10a hito na saptir abhi vājam arṣendrasyendo jaṭharam ā pavasva /
analyzed: hitaḥ na saptiḥ abhi vājam arṣa indrasya indo jaṭharam ā pavasva

original: RV_9,070.10c nāvā na sindhum ati parṣi vidvāñ chūro na yudhyann ava no nida spaḥ //
analyzed: nāvā na sindhum ati parṣi vidvān śūraḥ na yudhyan ava naḥ nidaḥ spaḥ

original: RV_9,071.01a ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmy āsadaṃ veti druho rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ /
analyzed: ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmī āsadam veti druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ

original: RV_9,071.01c harir opaśaṃ kṛṇute nabhas paya upastire camvor brahma nirṇije //
analyzed: hariḥ opaśam kṛṇute nabhaḥ payaḥ upastire camvoḥ brahma nirṇije

original: RV_9,071.02a pra kṛṣṭiheva śūṣa eti roruvad asuryaṃ varṇaṃ ni riṇīte asya tam /
analyzed: pra kṛṣṭi hā iva śūṣaḥ eti roruvat asuryam varṇam ni riṇīte asya tam

original: RV_9,071.02c jahāti vavrim pitur eti niṣkṛtam upaprutaṃ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ tanā //
analyzed: jahāti vavrim pituḥ eti niṣkṛtam upaprutam kṛṇute nirṇijam tanā

original: RV_9,071.03a adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyor vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī /
analyzed: adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyoḥ vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī

original: RV_9,071.03c sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi //
analyzed: sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi

original: RV_9,071.04a pari dyukṣaṃ sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim /
analyzed: pari dyukṣam sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim

original: RV_9,071.04c ā yasmin gāvaḥ suhutāda ūdhani mūrdhañ chrīṇanty agriyaṃ varīmabhiḥ //
analyzed: ā yasmin gāvaḥ su hutāde ūdhani mūrdham śrīṇanti agriyam varīmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,071.05a sam ī rathaṃ na bhurijor aheṣata daśa svasāro aditer upastha ā /
analyzed: sam ī ratham na bhurijoḥ aheṣata daśa svasāraḥ aditeḥ upasthe ā

original: RV_9,071.05c jigād upa jrayati gor apīcyam padaṃ yad asya matuthā ajījanan //
analyzed: jigāt upa jrayati goḥ apīcyam padam yat asya matuthāḥ ajījanan

original: RV_9,071.06a śyeno na yoniṃ sadanaṃ dhiyā kṛtaṃ hiraṇyayam āsadaṃ deva eṣati /
analyzed: śyenaḥ na yonim sadanam dhiyā kṛtam hiraṇyayam āsadam devaḥ eṣati

original: RV_9,071.06c e riṇanti barhiṣi priyaṃ girāśvo na devāṃ apy eti yajñiyaḥ //
analyzed: ā riṇanti barhiṣi priyam girā aśvaḥ na devān api eti yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_9,071.07a parā vyakto aruṣo divaḥ kavir vṛṣā tripṛṣṭho anaviṣṭa gā abhi /
analyzed: parā vyaktaḥ aruṣaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ vṛṣā tri pṛṣṭhaḥ anaviṣṭa gāḥ abhi

original: RV_9,071.07c sahasraṇītir yatiḥ parāyatī rebho na pūrvīr uṣaso vi rājati //
analyzed: sahasraṇītiḥ yatiḥ parāyatī rebhaḥ na pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_9,071.08a tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute varṇo asya sa yatrāśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ /
analyzed: tveṣam rūpam kṛṇute varṇaḥ asya sa yatra aśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ

original: RV_9,071.08c apsā yāti svadhayā daivyaṃ janaṃ saṃ suṣṭutī nasate saṃ goagrayā //
analyzed: ap sāḥ yāti svadhayā daivyam janam sam suṣṭutī nasate sam go agrayā

original: RV_9,071.09a ukṣeva yūthā pariyann arāvīd adhi tviṣīr adhita sūryasya /
analyzed: ukṣā iva yūthā pariyan arāvīt adhi tviṣīḥ adhita sūryasya

original: RV_9,071.09c divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣata kṣāṃ somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ //
analyzed: divyaḥ suparṇaḥ va cakṣata kṣām somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ

original: RV_9,072.01a harim mṛjanty aruṣo na yujyate saṃ dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somo ajyate /
analyzed: harim mṛjanti aruṣaḥ na yujyate sam dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somaḥ ajyate

original: RV_9,072.01c ud vācam īrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ //
analyzed: ud vācam īrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ

original: RV_9,072.02a sākaṃ vadanti bahavo manīṣiṇa indrasya somaṃ jaṭhare yad āduhuḥ /
analyzed: sākam vadanti bahavaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ indrasya somam jaṭhare yat āduhuḥ

original: RV_9,072.02c yadī mṛjanti sugabhastayo naraḥ sanīḷābhir daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu //
analyzed: yadī mṛjanti su gabhastayaḥ naraḥ sanīḍābhiḥ daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu

original: RV_9,072.03a aramamāṇo aty eti gā abhi sūryasya priyaṃ duhitus tiro ravam /
analyzed: a ramamāṇaḥ ati eti gāḥ abhi sūryasya priyam duhituḥ tiras ravam

original: RV_9,072.03c anv asmai joṣam abharad vinaṅgṛsaḥ saṃ dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ //
analyzed: anu asmai joṣam abharat vinaṅgṛsaḥ sam dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ

original: RV_9,072.04a nṛdhūto adriṣuto barhiṣi priyaḥ patir gavām pradiva indur ṛtviyaḥ /
analyzed: nṛ dhūtaḥ adri sutaḥ barhiṣi priyaḥ patiḥ gavām pradivaḥ induḥ ṛtviyaḥ

original: RV_9,072.04c purandhivān manuṣo yajñasādhanaḥ śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te //
analyzed: purandhivān manuṣaḥ yajña sādhanaḥ śuciḥ dhiyā pavate somaḥ indra te

original: RV_9,072.05a nṛbāhubhyāṃ codito dhārayā suto 'nuṣvadham pavate soma indra te /
analyzed: nṛ bāhubhyām coditaḥ dhārayā sutaḥ nuṣvadham pavate somaḥ indra te

original: RV_9,072.05c āprāḥ kratūn sam ajair adhvare matīr ver na druṣac camvor āsadad dhariḥ //
analyzed: āprāḥ kratūn sam ajaiḥ adhvare matīḥ veḥ na druṣat camvoḥ āsadat hariḥ

original: RV_9,072.06a aṃśuṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitaṃ kaviṃ kavayo 'paso manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: aṃśum duhanti stanayantam akṣitam kavim kavayaḥ pasaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_9,072.06c sam ī gāvo matayo yanti saṃyata ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ //
analyzed: sam ī gāvaḥ matayaḥ yanti saṃyataḥ ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ

original: RV_9,072.07a nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divo 'pām ūrmau sindhuṣv antar ukṣitaḥ /
analyzed: nābhā pṛthivyāḥ dharuṇaḥ mahaḥ divaḥ pām ūrmau sindhuṣu antar ukṣitaḥ

original: RV_9,072.07c indrasya vajro vṛṣabho vibhūvasuḥ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ //
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vibhūvasuḥ somaḥ hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ

original: RV_9,072.08a sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ raja stotre śikṣann ādhūnvate ca sukrato /
analyzed: sa tu pavasva pari pārthivam rajaḥ stotre śikṣan ādhūnvate ca su krato

original: RV_9,072.08c mā no nir bhāg vasunaḥ sādanaspṛśo rayim piśaṅgam bahulaṃ vasīmahi //
analyzed: mā naḥ niḥ bhāk vasunaḥ sādana spṛśaḥ rayim piśaṅgam bahulam vasīmahi

original: RV_9,072.09a ā tū na indo śatadātv aśvyaṃ sahasradātu paśumad dhiraṇyavat /
analyzed: ā tu naḥ indo śata dātu aśvyam sahasra dātu paśumat hiraṇyavat

original: RV_9,072.09c upa māsva bṛhatī revatīr iṣo 'dhi stotrasya pavamāna no gahi //
analyzed: upa māsva bṛhatīḥ revatīḥ iṣaḥ dhi stotrasya pavamāna naḥ gahi

original: RV_9,073.01a srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ sam asvarann ṛtasya yonā sam aranta nābhayaḥ /
analyzed: srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ sam asvaran ṛtasya yonā sam aranta nābhayaḥ

original: RV_9,073.01c trīn sa mūrdhno asuraś cakra ārabhe satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan //
analyzed: trīn sa mūrdhnaḥ asuraḥ cakre ārabhe satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan

original: RV_9,073.02a samyak samyañco mahiṣā aheṣata sindhor ūrmāv adhi venā avīvipan /
analyzed: samyak samyañcaḥ mahiṣāḥ aheṣata sindhoḥ ūrmau adhi venāḥ avīvipan

original: RV_9,073.02c madhor dhārābhir janayanto arkam it priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan //
analyzed: madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ janayantaḥ arkam id priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan

original: RV_9,073.03a pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate pitaiṣām pratno abhi rakṣati vratam /
analyzed: pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate pitā eṣām pratnaḥ abhi rakṣati vratam

original: RV_9,073.03c mahaḥ samudraṃ varuṇas tiro dadhe dhīrā ic chekur dharuṇeṣv ārabham //
analyzed: mahaḥ samudram varuṇaḥ tiras dadhe dhīrāḥ id śekuḥ dharuṇeṣu ārabham

original: RV_9,073.04a sahasradhāre 'va te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ /
analyzed: sahasra dhāre va te sam asvaran divaḥ nāke madhu jihvāḥ asaścataḥ

original: RV_9,073.04c asya spaśo na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ pade-pade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ //
analyzed: asya spaśaḥ na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ pade pade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ

original: RV_9,073.05a pitur mātur adhy ā ye samasvarann ṛcā śocantaḥ saṃdahanto avratān /
analyzed: pituḥ mātuḥ adhi ā ye samasvaran ṛcā śocantaḥ saṃdahantaḥ avratān

original: RV_9,073.05c indradviṣṭām apa dhamanti māyayā tvacam asiknīm bhūmano divas pari //
analyzed: indra dviṣṭām apa dhamanti māyayā tvacam asiknīm bhūmanaḥ divaḥ pari

original: RV_9,073.06a pratnān mānād adhy ā ye samasvarañ chlokayantrāso rabhasasya mantavaḥ /
analyzed: pratnāt mānāt adhi ā ye samasvaram śloka yantrāsaḥ rabhasasya mantavaḥ

original: RV_9,073.06c apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: apāna kṣāsaḥ badhirāḥ ahāsata ṛtasya panthām na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,073.07a sahasradhāre vitate pavitra ā vācam punanti kavayo manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: sahasra dhāre vitate pavitre ā vācam punanti kavayaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_9,073.07c rudrāsa eṣām iṣirāso adruha spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśo nṛcakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: rudrāsaḥ eṣām iṣirāsaḥ adruhaḥ spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśaḥ nṛ cakṣasaḥ

original: RV_9,073.08a ṛtasya gopā na dabhāya sukratus trī ṣa pavitrā hṛdy antar ā dadhe /
analyzed: ṛtasya gopāḥ na dabhāya su kratuḥ trī sa pavitrā hṛdi antar ā dadhe

original: RV_9,073.08c vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paśyaty avājuṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān //
analyzed: vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanā abhi paśyati ava a juṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān

original: RV_9,073.09a ṛtasya tantur vitataḥ pavitra ā jihvāyā agre varuṇasya māyayā /
analyzed: ṛtasya tantuḥ vitataḥ pavitraḥ ā jihvāyāḥ agre varuṇasya māyayā

original: RV_9,073.09c dhīrāś cit tat saminakṣanta āśatātrā kartam ava padāty aprabhuḥ //
analyzed: dhīrāḥ cit tat saminakṣantaḥ āśata atrā kartam ava padātī aprabhuḥ

original: RV_9,074.01a śiśur na jāto 'va cakradad vane svar yad vājy aruṣaḥ siṣāsati /
analyzed: śiśuḥ na jātaḥ vaḥ cakradat vane svar yat vājī aruṣaḥ siṣāsati

original: RV_9,074.01c divo retasā sacate payovṛdhā tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ retasā sacate payaḥ vṛdhā tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_9,074.02a divo ya skambho dharuṇaḥ svātata āpūrṇo aṃśuḥ paryeti viśvataḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ yaḥ skambhaḥ dharuṇaḥ su ātataḥ āpūrṇaḥ aṃśuḥ paryeti viśvatas

original: RV_9,074.02c seme mahī rodasī yakṣad āvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra sam iṣaḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: sa ime mahī rodasī yakṣat āvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra sam iṣaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_9,074.03a mahi psaraḥ sukṛtaṃ somyam madhūrvī gavyūtir aditer ṛtaṃ yate /
analyzed: mahi psaraḥ su kṛtam somyam madhu urvī gavyūtiḥ aditeḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_9,074.03c īśe yo vṛṣṭer ita usriyo vṛṣāpāṃ netā ya itaūtir ṛgmiyaḥ //
analyzed: īśe yaḥ vṛṣṭeḥ itas usriyaḥ vṛṣā apām netā yaḥ itaūtiḥ ṛgmiyaḥ

original: RV_9,074.04a ātmanvan nabho duhyate ghṛtam paya ṛtasya nābhir amṛtaṃ vi jāyate /
analyzed: ātmanvat nabhaḥ duhyate ghṛtam payaḥ ṛtasya nābhiḥ amṛtam vi jāyate

original: RV_9,074.04c samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti taṃ naro hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ //
analyzed: samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti tam naraḥ hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ

original: RV_9,074.05a arāvīd aṃśuḥ sacamāna ūrmiṇā devāvyam manuṣe pinvati tvacam /
analyzed: arāvīt aṃśuḥ sacamānaḥ ūrmiṇā devāvyam manuṣe pinvati tvacam

original: RV_9,074.05c dadhāti garbham aditer upastha ā yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe //
analyzed: dadhāti garbham aditeḥ upasthe ā yena tokam ca tanayam ca dhāmahe

original: RV_9,074.06a sahasradhāre 'va tā asaścatas tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ /
analyzed: sahasra dhāre vai tāḥ asaścataḥ tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ

original: RV_9,074.06c catasro nābho nihitā avo divo havir bharanty amṛtaṃ ghṛtaścutaḥ //
analyzed: catasraḥ nābhaḥ nihitāḥ avas divaḥ haviḥ bharanti amṛtam ghṛtaścutaḥ

original: RV_9,074.07a śvetaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somo mīḍhvāṃ asuro veda bhūmanaḥ /
analyzed: śvetam rūpam kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somaḥ mīḍhvān asuraḥ veda bhūmanaḥ

original: RV_9,074.07c dhiyā śamī sacate sem abhi pravad divas kavandham ava darṣad udriṇam //
analyzed: dhiyā śamī sacate sem abhi pravat divaḥ kabandham ava darṣat udriṇam

original: RV_9,074.08a adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktaṃ kārṣmann ā vājy akramīt sasavān /
analyzed: adha śvetam kalaśam gobhiḥ aktam kārṣman ā vājī akramīt sasavān

original: RV_9,074.08c ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śatahimāya gonām //
analyzed: ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śata himāya gonām

original: RV_9,074.09a adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te raso 'vyo vāraṃ vi pavamāna dhāvati /
analyzed: adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te rasaḥ vyaḥ vāram vi pavamāna dhāvati

original: RV_9,074.09c sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhir madintama svadasvendrāya pavamāna pītaye //
analyzed: sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhiḥ madintama svadasva indrāya pavamāna pītaye

original: RV_9,075.01a abhi priyāṇi pavate canohito nāmāni yahvo adhi yeṣu vardhate /
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi pavate canohitaḥ nāmāni yahvaḥ adhi yeṣu vardhate

original: RV_9,075.01c ā sūryasya bṛhato bṛhann adhi rathaṃ viṣvañcam aruhad vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: ā sūryasya bṛhataḥ bṛhan adhi ratham viṣvañcam aruhat vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,075.02a ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyaṃ vaktā patir dhiyo asyā adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyam vaktā patiḥ dhiyaḥ asyāḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_9,075.02c dadhāti putraḥ pitror apīcyaṃ nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ //
analyzed: dadhāti putraḥ pitroḥ apīcyam nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ

original: RV_9,075.03a ava dyutānaḥ kalaśāṃ acikradan nṛbhir yemānaḥ kośa ā hiraṇyaye /
analyzed: ava dyutānaḥ kalaśām acikradat nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ kośe ā hiraṇyaye

original: RV_9,075.03c abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣatādhi tripṛṣṭha uṣaso vi rājati //
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya dohanāḥ anūṣata adhi tri pṛṣṭhaḥ uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_9,075.04a adribhiḥ suto matibhiś canohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarā śuciḥ /
analyzed: adribhiḥ sutaḥ matibhiḥ canohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarā śuciḥ

original: RV_9,075.04c romāṇy avyā samayā vi dhāvati madhor dhārā pinvamānā dive-dive //
analyzed: romāṇi avyā samayā vi dhāvati madhoḥ dhārā pinvamānā dive dive

original: RV_9,075.05a pari soma pra dhanvā svastaye nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vāsayāśiram /
analyzed: pari soma pra dhanva svastaye nṛbhiḥ punānaḥ abhi vāsaya āśiram

original: RV_9,075.05c ye te madā āhanaso vihāyasas tebhir indraṃ codaya dātave magham //
analyzed: ye te madāḥ āhanasaḥ vihāyasaḥ tebhiḥ indram codaya dātave magham

original: RV_9,076.01a dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso dakṣo devānām anumādyo nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ dakṣaḥ devānām anumādyaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_9,076.01c hariḥ sṛjāno atyo na satvabhir vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣv ā //
analyzed: hariḥ sṛjānaḥ atyaḥ na satvabhiḥ vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu ā

original: RV_9,076.02a śūro na dhatta āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svaḥ siṣāsan rathiro gaviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: śūraḥ na dhatte āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svar siṣāsan rathiraḥ gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_9,076.02c indrasya śuṣmam īrayann apasyubhir indur hinvāno ajyate manīṣibhiḥ //
analyzed: indrasya śuṣmam īrayan apasyubhiḥ induḥ hinvānaḥ ajyate manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_9,076.03a indrasya soma pavamāna ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇo jaṭhareṣv ā viśa /
analyzed: indrasya soma pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇaḥ jaṭhareṣu ā viśa

original: RV_9,076.03c pra ṇaḥ pinva vidyud abhreva rodasī dhiyā na vājāṃ upa māsi śaśvataḥ //
analyzed: pra naḥ pinva vidyut abhrā iva rodasī dhiyā na vājām upa māsi śaśvataḥ

original: RV_9,076.04a viśvasya rājā pavate svardṛśa ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāḷ avīvaśat /
analyzed: viśvasya rājā pavate svar dṛśaḥ ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāh avīvaśat

original: RV_9,076.04c yaḥ sūryasyāsireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnām asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ sūryasya asireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnām a samaṣṭa kāvyaḥ

original: RV_9,076.05a vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣasy apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat /
analyzed: vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣasi apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_9,076.05c sa indrāya pavase matsarintamo yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ indrāya pavase matsarintamaḥ yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ

original: RV_9,077.01a eṣa pra kośe madhumāṃ acikradad indrasya vajro vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraḥ /
analyzed: eṣa pra kośe madhumān acikradat indrasya vajraḥ vapuṣaḥ vapuṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_9,077.01c abhīm ṛtasya sudughā ghṛtaścuto vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ //
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya su dughāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ

original: RV_9,077.02a sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yaṃ divas pari śyeno mathāyad iṣitas tiro rajaḥ /
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yam divaḥ pari śyenaḥ mathāyat iṣitaḥ tiras rajaḥ

original: RV_9,077.02c sa madhva ā yuvate vevijāna it kṛśānor astur manasāha bibhyuṣā //
analyzed: sa madhvaḥ ā yuvate vevijānaḥ id kṛśānoḥ astuḥ manasā aha bibhyuṣā

original: RV_9,077.03a te naḥ pūrvāsa uparāsa indavo mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate /
analyzed: te naḥ pūrvāsaḥ uparāsaḥ indavaḥ mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate

original: RV_9,077.03c īkṣeṇyāso ahyo na cāravo brahma-brahma ye jujuṣur havir-haviḥ //
analyzed: īkṣeṇyāsaḥ ahyaḥ na cāravaḥ brahma brahma ye jujuṣuḥ haviḥ haviḥ

original: RV_9,077.04a ayaṃ no vidvān vanavad vanuṣyata induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ /
analyzed: ayam naḥ vidvān vanavat vanuṣyate induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_9,077.04c inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe gavām urubjam abhy arṣati vrajam //
analyzed: inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe gavām urubjam abhī arṣati vrajam

original: RV_9,077.05a cakrir divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso mahāṃ adabdho varuṇo hurug yate /
analyzed: cakriḥ divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ mahān adabdhaḥ varuṇaḥ huruk yate

original: RV_9,077.05c asāvi mitro vṛjaneṣu yajñiyo 'tyo na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat //
analyzed: asāvi mitraḥ vṛjaneṣu yajñiyaḥ tyaḥ na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat

original: RV_9,078.01a pra rājā vācaṃ janayann asiṣyadad apo vasāno abhi gā iyakṣati /
analyzed: pra rājā vācam janayan asiṣyadat apaḥ vasānaḥ abhi gāḥ iyakṣati

original: RV_9,078.01c gṛbhṇāti ripram avir asya tānvā śuddho devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam //
analyzed: gṛbhṇāti ripram aviḥ asya tānvā śuddhaḥ devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,078.02a indrāya soma pari ṣicyase nṛbhir nṛcakṣā ūrmiḥ kavir ajyase vane /
analyzed: indrāya soma pari sicyase nṛbhiḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ ūrmiḥ kaviḥ ajyase vane

original: RV_9,078.02c pūrvīr hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasram aśvā harayaś camūṣadaḥ //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasram aśvāḥ harayaḥ camūṣadaḥ

original: RV_9,078.03a samudriyā apsaraso manīṣiṇam āsīnā antar abhi somam akṣaran /
analyzed: samudriyāḥ apsarasaḥ manīṣiṇam āsīnāḥ antar abhi somam akṣaran

original: RV_9,078.03c tā īṃ hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇiṃ yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam //
analyzed: tāḥ īm hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam

original: RV_9,078.04a gojin naḥ somo rathajid dhiraṇyajit svarjid abjit pavate sahasrajit /
analyzed: go jit naḥ somaḥ ratha jit hiraṇya jit svar jit ap jit pavate sahasra jit

original: RV_9,078.04c yaṃ devāsaś cakrire pītaye madaṃ svādiṣṭhaṃ drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam //
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ cakrire pītaye madam svādiṣṭham drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam

original: RV_9,078.05a etāni soma pavamāno asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāny arṣasi /
analyzed: etāni soma pavamānaḥ asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāni arṣasi

original: RV_9,078.05c jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca ya urvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ ca nas kṛdhi //
analyzed: jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca yaḥ urvīm gavyūtim abhayam ca naḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_9,079.01a acodaso no dhanvantv indavaḥ pra suvānāso bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ /
analyzed: acodasaḥ naḥ dhanvantu indavaḥ pra suvānāsaḥ bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ

original: RV_9,079.01c vi ca naśan na iṣo arātayo 'ryo naśanta saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: vi ca naśan naḥ iṣaḥ arātayaḥ ryaḥ naśanta saniṣanta naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_9,079.02a pra ṇo dhanvantv indavo madacyuto dhanā vā yebhir arvato junīmasi /
analyzed: pra naḥ dhanvantu indavaḥ mada cyutaḥ dhanā vā yebhiḥ arvataḥ junīmasi

original: RV_9,079.02c tiro martasya kasya cit parihvṛtiṃ vayaṃ dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi //
analyzed: tiras martasya kasya cit parihvṛtim vayam dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi

original: RV_9,079.03a uta svasyā arātyā arir hi ṣa utānyasyā arātyā vṛko hi ṣaḥ /
analyzed: uta svasyāḥ arātyāḥ ariḥ hi sa uta anyasyāḥ arātyāḥ vṛkaḥ hi saḥ

original: RV_9,079.03c dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam arīta tāṃ abhi soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam arīta tām abhi soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ

original: RV_9,079.04a divi te nābhā paramo ya ādade pṛthivyās te ruruhuḥ sānavi kṣipaḥ /
analyzed: divi te nābhā paramaḥ yaḥ ādade pṛthivyāḥ te ruruhuḥ sānavi kṣipaḥ

original: RV_9,079.04c adrayas tvā bapsati gor adhi tvacy apsu tvā hastair duduhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: adrayaḥ tvā bapsati goḥ adhi tvaci apsu tvā hastaiḥ duduhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_9,079.05a evā ta indo subhvaṃ supeśasaṃ rasaṃ tuñjanti prathamā abhiśriyaḥ /
analyzed: eva te indo su bhvam supeśasam rasam tuñjanti prathamāḥ abhiśriyaḥ

original: RV_9,079.05c nidaṃ-nidam pavamāna ni tāriṣa āvis te śuṣmo bhavatu priyo madaḥ //
analyzed: nidaṃnidam pavamāna ni tāriṣaḥ āvis te śuṣmaḥ bhavatu priyaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_9,080.01a somasya dhārā pavate nṛcakṣasa ṛtena devān havate divas pari /
analyzed: somasya dhārā pavate nṛ cakṣasaḥ ṛtena devān havate divaḥ pari

original: RV_9,080.01c bṛhaspate ravathenā vi didyute samudrāso na savanāni vivyacuḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspate ravathena vi didyute samudrāsaḥ na savanāni vivyacuḥ

original: RV_9,080.02a yaṃ tvā vājinn aghnyā abhy anūṣatāyohataṃ yonim ā rohasi dyumān /
analyzed: yam tvā vājin aghnyāḥ abhī anūṣata ayaḥ hatam yonim ā rohasi dyumān

original: RV_9,080.02c maghonām āyuḥ pratiran mahi śrava indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ //
analyzed: maghonām āyuḥ pratiran mahi śravaḥ indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ

original: RV_9,080.03a endrasya kukṣā pavate madintama ūrjaṃ vasānaḥ śravase sumaṅgalaḥ /
analyzed: ā indrasya kukṣā pavate madintamaḥ ūrjam vasānaḥ śravase su maṅgalaḥ

original: RV_9,080.03c pratyaṅ sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paprathe krīḷan harir atyaḥ syandate vṛṣā //
analyzed: pratyaṅ sa viśvā bhuvanā abhi paprathe krīḍan hariḥ atyaḥ syandate vṛṣā

original: RV_9,080.04a taṃ tvā devebhyo madhumattamaṃ naraḥ sahasradhāraṃ duhate daśa kṣipaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā devebhyaḥ madhumattamam naraḥ sahasra dhāram duhate daśa kṣipaḥ

original: RV_9,080.04c nṛbhiḥ soma pracyuto grāvabhiḥ suto viśvān devāṃ ā pavasvā sahasrajit //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ soma pracyutaḥ grāvabhiḥ sutaḥ viśvān devān ā pavasva sahasra jit

original: RV_9,080.05a taṃ tvā hastino madhumantam adribhir duhanty apsu vṛṣabhaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā hastinaḥ madhumantam adribhiḥ duhanti apsu vṛṣabham daśa kṣipaḥ

original: RV_9,080.05c indraṃ soma mādayan daivyaṃ janaṃ sindhor ivormiḥ pavamāno arṣasi //
analyzed: indram soma mādayan daivyam janam sindhoḥ iva ūrmiḥ pavamānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_9,081.01a pra somasya pavamānasyormaya indrasya yanti jaṭharaṃ supeśasaḥ /
analyzed: pra somasya pavamānasya ūrmayaḥ indrasya yanti jaṭharam supeśasaḥ

original: RV_9,081.01c dadhnā yad īm unnītā yaśasā gavāṃ dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: dadhnā yat īm unnītāḥ yaśasā gavām dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ

original: RV_9,081.02a acchā hi somaḥ kalaśāṃ asiṣyadad atyo na voḷhā raghuvartanir vṛṣā /
analyzed: acchā hi somaḥ kalaśām asiṣyadat atyaḥ na voḍhā raghu vartaniḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_9,081.02c athā devānām ubhayasya janmano vidvāṃ aśnoty amuta itaś ca yat //
analyzed: athā devānām ubhayasya janmanaḥ vidvān aśnoti amutas itas ca yat

original: RV_9,081.03a ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kirā vasv indo bhava maghavā rādhaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kira vasū indo bhava maghavā rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_9,081.03c śikṣā vayodho vasave su cetunā mā no gayam āre asmat parā sicaḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa vayodhaḥ vasave su cetunā mā naḥ gayam āre asmat parā sicaḥ

original: RV_9,081.04a ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ surātayo mitro gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ su rātayaḥ mitraḥ gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_9,081.04c bṛhaspatir maruto vāyur aśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā suyamā sarasvatī //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ marutaḥ vāyuḥ aśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā su yamā sarasvatī

original: RV_9,081.05a ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devo aditir vidhātā /
analyzed: ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devaḥ aditiḥ vidhātā

original: RV_9,081.05c bhago nṛśaṃsa urv antarikṣaṃ viśve devāḥ pavamānaṃ juṣanta //
analyzed: bhagaḥ nṛśaṃsaḥ uru antarikṣam viśve devāḥ pavamānam juṣanta

original: RV_9,082.01a asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harī rājeva dasmo abhi gā acikradat /
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ aruṣaḥ vṛṣā hariḥ rājā iva dasmaḥ abhi gāḥ acikradat

original: RV_9,082.01c punāno vāram pary ety avyayaṃ śyeno na yoniṃ ghṛtavantam āsadam //
analyzed: punānaḥ vāram pari eti avyayam śyenaḥ na yonim ghṛtavantam āsadam

original: RV_9,082.02a kavir vedhasyā pary eṣi māhinam atyo na mṛṣṭo abhi vājam arṣasi /
analyzed: kaviḥ vedhasyā pari eṣi māhinam atyaḥ na mṛṣṭaḥ abhi vājam arṣasi

original: RV_9,082.02c apasedhan duritā soma mṛḷaya ghṛtaṃ vasānaḥ pari yāsi nirṇijam //
analyzed: apasedhan duritā soma mṛḍaya ghṛtam vasānaḥ pari yāsi nirṇijam

original: RV_9,082.03a parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇino nābhā pṛthivyā giriṣu kṣayaṃ dadhe /
analyzed: parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇinaḥ nābhā pṛthivyāḥ giriṣu kṣayam dadhe

original: RV_9,082.03c svasāra āpo abhi gā utāsaran saṃ grāvabhir nasate vīte adhvare //
analyzed: svasāraḥ āpaḥ abhi gāḥ uta asaran sam grāvabhiḥ nasate vīte adhvare

original: RV_9,082.04a jāyeva patyāv adhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyā garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te /
analyzed: jāyā iva patyau adhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyāḥ garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te

original: RV_9,082.04c antar vāṇīṣu pra carā su jīvase 'nindyo vṛjane soma jāgṛhi //
analyzed: antar vāṇīṣu pra cara su jīvase nindyaḥ vṛjane soma jāgṛhi

original: RV_9,082.05a yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śatasā amṛdhraḥ sahasrasāḥ paryayā vājam indo /
analyzed: yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śata sāḥ amṛdhraḥ sahasra sāḥ paryayaḥ vājam indo

original: RV_9,082.05c evā pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratam anv āpaḥ sacante //
analyzed: eva pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratam anu āpaḥ sacante

original: RV_9,083.01a pavitraṃ te vitatam brahmaṇas pate prabhur gātrāṇi pary eṣi viśvataḥ /
analyzed: pavitram te vitatam brahmaṇas pate prabhuḥ gātrāṇi pari eṣi viśvatas

original: RV_9,083.01c ataptatanūr na tad āmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantas tat sam āśata //
analyzed: a tapta tanūḥ na tat āmaḥ aśnute śṛtāsaḥ id vahantaḥ tat sam āśata

original: RV_9,083.02a tapoṣ pavitraṃ vitataṃ divas pade śocanto asya tantavo vy asthiran /
analyzed: tapoḥ pavitram vitatam divaḥ pade śocantaḥ asya tantavaḥ vi asthiran

original: RV_9,083.02c avanty asya pavītāram āśavo divas pṛṣṭham adhi tiṣṭhanti cetasā //
analyzed: avanti asya pavītāram āśavaḥ divaḥ pṛṣṭham adhi tiṣṭhanti cetasā

original: RV_9,083.03a arūrucad uṣasaḥ pṛśnir agriya ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ /
analyzed: arūrucat uṣasaḥ pṛśniḥ agriyaḥ ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ

original: RV_9,083.03c māyāvino mamire asya māyayā nṛcakṣasaḥ pitaro garbham ā dadhuḥ //
