analyzed: āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛta pvaḥ punantu

original: RV_10,017.10c viśvaṃ hi ripram pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi //
analyzed: viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ ud id ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā pūtaḥ emi

original: RV_10,017.11a drapsaś caskanda prathamāṃ anu dyūn imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ /
analyzed: drapsaḥ caskanda prathamām anu dyūn imam ca yonim anu yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ

original: RV_10,017.11c samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ //
analyzed: samānam yonim anu saṃcarantam drapsam juhomi anu sapta hotrāḥ

original: RV_10,017.12a yas te drapsa skandati yas te aṃśur bāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyā upasthāt /
analyzed: yaḥ te drapsaḥ skandati yaḥ te aṃśuḥ bāhu cyutaḥ dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthāt

original: RV_10,017.12c adhvaryor vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam //
analyzed: adhvaryoḥ vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt tam te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam

original: RV_10,017.13a yas te drapsa skanno yas te aṃśur avaś ca yaḥ paraḥ srucā /
analyzed: yaḥ te drapsaḥ skannaḥ yaḥ te aṃśuḥ avas ca yaḥ paras srucā

original: RV_10,017.13c ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase //
analyzed: ayam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ sam tam siñcatu rādhase

original: RV_10,017.14a payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ

original: RV_10,017.14c apām payasvad it payas tena mā saha śundhata //
analyzed: apām payasvat id payaḥ tena mā saha śundhata

original: RV_10,018.01a param mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas te sva itaro devayānāt /
analyzed: param mṛtyo anu parehi panthām yaḥ te svaḥ itaraḥ deva yānāt

original: RV_10,018.01c cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajāṃ rīriṣo mota vīrān //
analyzed: cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajām rīriṣaḥ mā uta vīrān

original: RV_10,018.02a mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto yad aita drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ padam yopayantaḥ yat aita drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,018.02c āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtā bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ //
analyzed: āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,018.03a ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahūtir no adya /
analyzed: ime jīvāḥ vi mṛtaiḥ āvavṛtran abhūt bhadrā deva hūtiḥ naḥ adya

original: RV_10,018.03c prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: prāñcaḥ agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,018.04a imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam /
analyzed: imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam

original: RV_10,018.04c śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīr antar mṛtyuṃ dadhatām parvatena //
analyzed: śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ antar mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena

original: RV_10,018.05a yathāhāny anupūrvam bhavanti yatha ṛtava ṛtubhir yanti sādhu /
analyzed: yathā ahāni anupūrvam bhavanti yathā ṛtavaḥ ṛtubhiḥ yanti sādhu

original: RV_10,018.05c yathā na pūrvam aparo jahāty evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām //
analyzed: yathā na pūrvam aparaḥ jahāti eva dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpaya eṣām

original: RV_10,018.06a ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati ṣṭha /
analyzed: ā rohata āyuḥ jarasam vṛṇānāḥ anupūrvam yatamānāḥ yati stha

original: RV_10,018.06c iha tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣā dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ //
analyzed: iha tvaṣṭā su janimā sajoṣāḥ dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ

original: RV_10,018.07a imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ viśantu /
analyzed: imāḥ nārīḥ avidhavāḥ su patnīḥ āñjanena sarpiṣā sam viśantu

original: RV_10,018.07c anaśravo 'namīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre //
analyzed: anaśravaḥ namīvāḥ su ratnāḥ ā rohantu janayaḥ yonim agre

original: RV_10,018.08a ud īrṣva nāry abhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsum etam upa śeṣa ehi /
analyzed: ud īrṣva nāri abhi jīva lokam gatāsum etam upa śeṣe ehi

original: RV_10,018.08c hastagrābhasya didhiṣos tavedam patyur janitvam abhi sam babhūtha //
analyzed: hasta grābhasya didhiṣoḥ tava idam patyuḥ janitvam abhi sam babhūtha

original: RV_10,018.09a dhanur hastād ādadāno mṛtasyāsme kṣatrāya varcase balāya /
analyzed: dhanuḥ hastāt ādadānaḥ mṛtasya asme kṣatrāya varcase balāya

original: RV_10,018.09c atraiva tvam iha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā spṛdho abhimātīr jayema //
analyzed: atra eva tvam iha vayam su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ jayema

original: RV_10,018.10a upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uruvyacasam pṛthivīṃ suśevām /
analyzed: upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uru vyacasam pṛthivīm su śevām

original: RV_10,018.10c ūrṇamradā yuvatir dakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātu nirṛter upasthāt //
analyzed: ūrṇamradā yuvatiḥ dakṣiṇāvataḥ eṣā tvā pātu nirṛteḥ upasthāt

original: RV_10,018.11a uc chvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmai bhava sūpavañcanā /
analyzed: ud śvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ su upāyanā asmai bhava su upavañcanā

original: RV_10,018.11c mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhy enam bhūma ūrṇuhi //
analyzed: mātā putram yathā sicā abhi enam bhūme ūrṇuhi

original: RV_10,018.12a ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mita upa hi śrayantām /
analyzed: ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mitaḥ upa hi śrayantām

original: RV_10,018.12c te gṛhāso ghṛtaścuto bhavantu viśvāhāsmai śaraṇāḥ santv atra //
analyzed: te gṛhāsaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ bhavantu viśvāhā asmai śaraṇāḥ santu atra

original: RV_10,018.13a ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīṃ tvat parīmaṃ logaṃ nidadhan mo ahaṃ riṣam /
analyzed: ud te stabhnāmi pṛthivīm tvat pari imam logam nidadhan mā u aham riṣam

original: RV_10,018.13c etāṃ sthūṇām pitaro dhārayantu te 'trā yamaḥ sādanā te minotu //
analyzed: etām sthūṇām pitaraḥ dhārayantu te trāḥ yamaḥ sādanā te minotu

original: RV_10,018.14a pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam ivā dadhuḥ /
analyzed: pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam iva ā dadhuḥ

original: RV_10,018.14c pratīcīṃ jagrabhā vācam aśvaṃ raśanayā yathā //
analyzed: pratīcīm jagrabhāḥ vācam aśvam raśanayā yathā

original: RV_10,019.01a ni vartadhvam mānu gātāsmān siṣakta revatīḥ /
analyzed: ni vartadhvam mā anu gāta asmān siṣakta revatīḥ

original: RV_10,019.01c agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayataṃ rayim //
analyzed: agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayatam rayim

original: RV_10,019.02a punar enā ni vartaya punar enā ny ā kuru /
analyzed: punar enāḥ ni vartaya punar enāḥ ni ā kuru

original: RV_10,019.02c indra eṇā ni yacchatv agnir enā upājatu //
analyzed: indraḥ eṇā ni yacchatu agniḥ enāḥ upājatu

original: RV_10,019.03a punar etā ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau /
analyzed: punar etāḥ ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau

original: RV_10,019.03c ihaivāgne ni dhārayeha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ //
analyzed: iha eva agne ni dhāraya iha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ

original: RV_10,019.04a yan niyānaṃ nyayanaṃ saṃjñānaṃ yat parāyaṇam /
analyzed: yat niyānam nyayanam saṃjñānam yat parāyaṇam

original: RV_10,019.04c āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve //
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve

original: RV_10,019.05a ya udānaḍ vyayanaṃ ya udānaṭ parāyaṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ udānaṭ vyayanam yaḥ udānaṭ parāyaṇam

original: RV_10,019.05c āvartanaṃ nivartanam api gopā ni vartatām //
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam api gopāḥ ni vartatām

original: RV_10,019.06a ā nivarta ni vartaya punar na indra gā dehi /
analyzed: ā nivarta ni vartaya punar naḥ indra gāḥ dehi

original: RV_10,019.06c jīvābhir bhunajāmahai //
analyzed: jīvābhiḥ bhunajāmahai

original: RV_10,019.07a pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā /
analyzed: pari vaḥ viśvatas dadhe ūrjā ghṛtena payasā

original: RV_10,019.07c ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyās te rayyā saṃ sṛjantu naḥ //
analyzed: ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyāḥ te rayyā sam sṛjantu naḥ

original: RV_10,019.08a ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya /
analyzed: ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya

original: RV_10,019.08c bhūmyāś catasraḥ pradiśas tābhya enā ni vartaya //
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ tābhyaḥ enāḥ ni vartaya

original: RV_10,020.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya manaḥ //
analyzed: bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ

original: RV_10,020.02a agnim īḷe bhujāṃ yaviṣṭhaṃ śāsā mitraṃ durdharītum /
analyzed: agnim īḍe bhujām yaviṣṭham śāsā mitram durdharītum

original: RV_10,020.02c yasya dharman svar enīḥ saparyanti mātur ūdhaḥ //
analyzed: yasya dharman svar enīḥ saparyanti mātuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10,020.03a yam āsā kṛpanīḷam bhāsāketuṃ vardhayanti /
analyzed: yam āsā kṛpa nīḍam bhāsā ketum vardhayanti

original: RV_10,020.03c bhrājate śreṇidan //
analyzed: bhrājate śreṇidan

original: RV_10,020.04a aryo viśāṃ gātur eti pra yad ānaḍ divo antān /
analyzed: aryaḥ viśām gātuḥ eti pra yat ānaṭ divaḥ antān

original: RV_10,020.04c kavir abhraṃ dīdyānaḥ //
analyzed: kaviḥ abhram dīdyānaḥ

original: RV_10,020.05a juṣad dhavyā mānuṣasyordhvas tasthāv ṛbhvā yajñe /
analyzed: juṣat havyā mānuṣasya ūrdhvaḥ tasthau ṛbhvāḥ yajñe

original: RV_10,020.05c minvan sadma pura eti //
analyzed: minvan sadma puras eti

original: RV_10,020.06a sa hi kṣemo havir yajñaḥ śruṣṭīd asya gātur eti /
analyzed: sa hi kṣemaḥ haviḥ yajñaḥ śruṣṭī id asya gātuḥ eti

original: RV_10,020.06c agniṃ devā vāśīmantam //
analyzed: agnim devāḥ vāśīmantam

original: RV_10,020.07a yajñāsāhaṃ duva iṣe 'gnim pūrvasya śevasya /
analyzed: yajñāsāham duvaḥ iṣe gnim pūrvasya śevasya

original: RV_10,020.07c adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ //
analyzed: adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ

original: RV_10,020.08a naro ye ke cāsmad ā viśvet te vāma ā syuḥ /
analyzed: naraḥ ye ke ca asmat ā viśvā id te vāme ā syuḥ

original: RV_10,020.08c agniṃ haviṣā vardhantaḥ //
analyzed: agnim haviṣā vardhantaḥ

original: RV_10,020.09a kṛṣṇaḥ śveto 'ruṣo yāmo asya bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇo yaśasvān /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ śvetaḥ ruṣaḥ yāmaḥ asya bradhnaḥ ṛjraḥ uta śoṇaḥ yaśasvān

original: RV_10,020.09c hiraṇyarūpaṃ janitā jajāna //
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpam janitā jajāna

original: RV_10,020.10a evā te agne vimado manīṣām ūrjo napād amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: eva te agne vimadaḥ manīṣām ūrjaḥ napāt amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,020.10c gira ā vakṣat sumatīr iyāna iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ //
analyzed: giraḥ ā vakṣat sumatīḥ iyānaḥ iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim viśvam ābhāḥ

original: RV_10,021.01a āgniṃ na svavṛktibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā agnim na svavṛktibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,021.01c yajñāya stīrṇabarhiṣe vi vo made śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ vivakṣase //
analyzed: yajñāya stīrṇa barhiṣe vi vaḥ made śīram pāvaka śociṣam vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.02a tvām u te svābhuvaḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ /
analyzed: tvām u te su ābhuvaḥ śumbhanti aśva rādhasaḥ

original: RV_10,021.02c veti tvām upasecanī vi vo mada ṛjītir agna āhutir vivakṣase //
analyzed: vā iti tvām upasecanī vi vaḥ madaḥ ṛjītiḥ agne āhutiḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.03a tve dharmāṇa āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīr iva /
analyzed: tve dharmāṇaḥ āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīḥ iva

original: RV_10,021.03c kṛṣṇā rūpāṇy arjunā vi vo made viśvā adhi śriyo dhiṣe vivakṣase //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā rūpāṇi arjunā vi vaḥ made viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dhiṣe vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.04a yam agne manyase rayiṃ sahasāvann amartya /
analyzed: yam agne manyase rayim sahasāvan amartya

original: RV_10,021.04c tam ā no vājasātaye vi vo made yajñeṣu citram ā bharā vivakṣase //
analyzed: tam ā naḥ vājasātaye vi vaḥ made yajñeṣu citram ā bhara vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.05a agnir jāto atharvaṇā vidad viśvāni kāvyā /
analyzed: agniḥ jātaḥ atharvaṇā vidat viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_10,021.05c bhuvad dūto vivasvato vi vo made priyo yamasya kāmyo vivakṣase //
analyzed: bhuvat dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ vi vaḥ made priyaḥ yamasya kāmyaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.06a tvāṃ yajñeṣv īḷate 'gne prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu īḍate gne prayati adhvare

original: RV_10,021.06c tvaṃ vasūni kāmyā vi vo made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase //
analyzed: tvam vasūni kāmyā vi vaḥ made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.07a tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijaṃ cārum agne ni ṣedire /
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam cārum agne ni sedire

original: RV_10,021.07c ghṛtapratīkam manuṣo vi vo made śukraṃ cetiṣṭham akṣabhir vivakṣase //
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkam manuṣaḥ vi vaḥ made śukram cetiṣṭham akṣabhiḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.08a agne śukreṇa śociṣoru prathayase bṛhat /
analyzed: agne śukreṇa śociṣā uru prathayase bṛhat

original: RV_10,021.08c abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vo made garbhaṃ dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase //
analyzed: abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vaḥ made garbham dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase

original: RV_10,022.01a kuha śruta indraḥ kasminn adya jane mitro na śrūyate /
analyzed: kuha śrutaḥ indraḥ kasmin adya jane mitraḥ na śrūyate

original: RV_10,022.01c ṛṣīṇāṃ vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā

original: RV_10,022.02a iha śruta indro asme adya stave vajry ṛcīṣamaḥ /
analyzed: iha śrutaḥ indraḥ asme adya stave vajrī ṛcīṣamaḥ

original: RV_10,022.02c mitro na yo janeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā //
analyzed: mitraḥ na yaḥ janeṣu ā yaśaḥ cakre asāmi ā

original: RV_10,022.03a maho yas patiḥ śavaso asāmy ā maho nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ /
analyzed: mahaḥ yaḥ patiḥ śavasaḥ asāmi ā mahaḥ nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ

original: RV_10,022.03c bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam //
analyzed: bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam

original: RV_10,022.04a yujāno aśvā vātasya dhunī devo devasya vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: yujānaḥ aśvā vātasya dhunī devaḥ devasya vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.04c syantā pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣy adhvanaḥ //
analyzed: syantā pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣi adhvanaḥ

original: RV_10,022.05a tvaṃ tyā cid vātasyāśvāgā ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai /
analyzed: tvam tyā cit vātasya aśvāgāḥ ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai

original: RV_10,022.05c yayor devo na martyo yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ //
analyzed: yayoḥ devaḥ na martyaḥ yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ

original: RV_10,022.06a adha gmantośanā pṛcchate vāṃ kadarthā na ā gṛham /
analyzed: adha gmantā uśanā pṛcchate vām kadarthāḥ naḥ ā gṛham

original: RV_10,022.06c ā jagmathuḥ parākād divaś ca gmaś ca martyam //
analyzed: ā jagmathuḥ parākāt divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca martyam

original: RV_10,022.07a ā na indra pṛkṣase 'smākam brahmodyatam /
analyzed: ā naḥ indra pṛkṣase smākam brahma udyatam

original: RV_10,022.07c tat tvā yācāmahe 'vaḥ śuṣṇaṃ yad dhann amānuṣam //
analyzed: tat tvā yācāmahe vaḥ śuṣṇam yat han amānuṣam

original: RV_10,022.08a akarmā dasyur abhi no amantur anyavrato amānuṣaḥ /
analyzed: akarmā dasyuḥ abhi naḥ amantuḥ anya vrataḥ amānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,022.08c tvaṃ tasyāmitrahan vadhar dāsasya dambhaya //
analyzed: tvam tasya amitra han vadhar dāsasya dambhaya

original: RV_10,022.09a tvaṃ na indra śūra śūrair uta tvotāso barhaṇā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra śūra śūraiḥ uta tvotāsaḥ barhaṇā

original: RV_10,022.09c purutrā te vi pūrtayo navanta kṣoṇayo yathā //
analyzed: purutrā te vi pūrtayaḥ navanta kṣoṇayaḥ yathā

original: RV_10,022.10a tvaṃ tān vṛtrahatye codayo nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: tvam tān vṛtra hatye codayaḥ nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.10c guhā yadī kavīnāṃ viśāṃ nakṣatraśavasām //
analyzed: guhā yadī kavīnām viśām nakṣatra śavasām

original: RV_10,022.11a makṣū tā ta indra dānāpnasa ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: makṣū tā te indra dānā apnasaḥ ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.11c yad dha śuṣṇasya dambhayo jātaṃ viśvaṃ sayāvabhiḥ //
analyzed: yat ha śuṣṇasya dambhayaḥ jātam viśvam sa yāvabhiḥ

original: RV_10,022.12a mākudhryag indra śūra vasvīr asme bhūvann abhiṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: mākudhryak indra śūra vasvīḥ asme bhūvan abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_10,022.12c vayaṃ-vayaṃ ta āsāṃ sumne syāma vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: vayam vayam te āsām sumne syāma vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.13a asme tā ta indra santu satyāhiṃsantīr upaspṛśaḥ /
analyzed: asme tā te indra santu satyā a hiṃsantīḥ upaspṛśaḥ

original: RV_10,022.13c vidyāma yāsām bhujo dhenūnāṃ na vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: vidyāma yāsām bhujaḥ dhenūnām na vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.14a ahastā yad apadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhir vedyānām /
analyzed: a hastā yat a padī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhiḥ vedyānām

original: RV_10,022.14c śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇid viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ //
analyzed: śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇit viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ

original: RV_10,022.15a pibā-pibed indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyo vasavāna vasuḥ san /
analyzed: piba a piba id indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyaḥ vasavāna vasuḥ san

original: RV_10,022.15c uta trāyasva gṛṇato maghono mahaś ca rāyo revatas kṛdhī naḥ //
analyzed: uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ mahaḥ ca rāyaḥ revataḥ kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_10,023.01a yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathyaṃ vivratānām /
analyzed: yajāmahe indram vajra dakṣiṇam harīṇām rathyam vivratānām

original: RV_10,023.01c pra śmaśru dodhuvad ūrdhvathā bhūd vi senābhir dayamāno vi rādhasā //
analyzed: pra śmaśru dodhuvat ūrdhvathā bhūt vi senābhiḥ dayamānaḥ vi rādhasā

original: RV_10,023.02a harī nv asya yā vane vide vasv indro maghair maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat /
analyzed: harī nu asya yā vane vide vasū indraḥ maghaiḥ maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat

original: RV_10,023.02c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavo 'va kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavaḥ vaḥ kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit

original: RV_10,023.03a yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyam id athā rathaṃ harī yam asya vahato vi sūribhiḥ /
analyzed: yadā vajram hiraṇyam id athā ratham harī yam asya vahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ

original: RV_10,023.03c ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indro vājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ //
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sana śrutaḥ indraḥ vājasya dīrgha śravasaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10,023.04a so cin nu vṛṣṭir yūthyā svā sacāṃ indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritābhi pruṣṇute /
analyzed: sā u cit nu vṛṣṭiḥ yūthyā svā sacā indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute

original: RV_10,023.04c ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūd id dhūnoti vāto yathā vanam //
analyzed: ava veti su kṣayam sute madhu ud id dhūnoti vātaḥ yathā vanam

original: RV_10,023.05a yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna /
analyzed: yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrā aśivā jaghāna

original: RV_10,023.05c tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yas taviṣīṃ vāvṛdhe śavaḥ //
analyzed: tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi pitā iva yaḥ taviṣīm vāvṛdhe śavaḥ

original: RV_10,023.06a stomaṃ ta indra vimadā ajījanann apūrvyam purutamaṃ sudānave /
analyzed: stomam te indra vimadāḥ ajījanan apūrvyam purutamam sudānave

original: RV_10,023.06c vidmā hy asya bhojanam inasya yad ā paśuṃ na gopāḥ karāmahe //
analyzed: vidma hi asya bhojanam inasya yat ā paśum na gopāḥ karāmahe

original: RV_10,023.07a mākir na enā sakhyā vi yauṣus tava cendra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ /
analyzed: mākir naḥ enā sakhyā vi yauṣuḥ tava ca indra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ

original: RV_10,023.07c vidmā hi te pramatiṃ deva jāmivad asme te santu sakhyā śivāni //
analyzed: vidma hi te pramatim deva jāmi vat asme te santu sakhyā śivāni

original: RV_10,024.01a indra somam imam piba madhumantaṃ camū sutam /
analyzed: indra somam imam piba madhumantam camū sutam

original: RV_10,024.01c asme rayiṃ ni dhāraya vi vo made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase //
analyzed: asme rayim ni dhāraya vi vaḥ made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase

original: RV_10,024.02a tvāṃ yajñebhir ukthair upa havyebhir īmahe /
analyzed: tvām yajñebhiḥ ukthaiḥ upa havyebhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_10,024.02c śacīpate śacīnāṃ vi vo made śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryaṃ vivakṣase //
analyzed: śacīpate śacīnām vi vaḥ made śreṣṭham naḥ dhehi vāryam vivakṣase

original: RV_10,024.03a yas patir vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā /
analyzed: yaḥ patiḥ vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā

original: RV_10,024.03c indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vo made dviṣo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase //
analyzed: indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vaḥ made dviṣaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,024.04a yuvaṃ śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nir amanthatam /
analyzed: yuvam śakrā māyāvinā samīcī niḥ amanthatam

original: RV_10,024.04c vimadena yad īḷitā nāsatyā niramanthatam //
analyzed: vimadena yat īḍitā nāsatyā niramanthatam

original: RV_10,024.05a viśve devā akṛpanta samīcyor niṣpatantyoḥ /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ akṛpanta samīcyoḥ niṣpatantyoḥ

original: RV_10,024.05c nāsatyāv abruvan devāḥ punar ā vahatād iti //
analyzed: nāsatyau abruvan devāḥ punar ā vahatāt iti

original: RV_10,024.06a madhuman me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam /
analyzed: madhumat me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam

original: RV_10,024.06c tā no devā devatayā yuvam madhumatas kṛtam //
analyzed: tā naḥ devā devatayā yuvam madhumataḥ kṛtam

original: RV_10,025.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya mano dakṣam uta kratum /
analyzed: bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ dakṣam uta kratum

original: RV_10,025.01c adhā te sakhye andhaso vi vo made raṇan gāvo na yavase vivakṣase //
analyzed: adhā te sakhye andhasaḥ vi vaḥ made raṇan gāvaḥ na yavase vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.02a hṛdispṛśas ta āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu /
analyzed: hṛdispṛśaḥ te āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu

original: RV_10,025.02c adhā kāmā ime mama vi vo made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavo vivakṣase //
analyzed: adhā kāmāḥ ime mama vi vaḥ made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.03a uta vratāni soma te prāham mināmi pākyā /
analyzed: uta vratāni soma te pra aham mināmi pākyā

original: RV_10,025.03c adhā piteva sūnave vi vo made mṛḷā no abhi cid vadhād vivakṣase //
analyzed: adhā pitā iva sūnave vi vaḥ made mṛḍa naḥ abhi cit vadhāt vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.04a sam u pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāso 'vatāṃ iva /
analyzed: sam u pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāsaḥ vatām iva

original: RV_10,025.04c kratuṃ naḥ soma jīvase vi vo made dhārayā camasāṃ iva vivakṣase //
analyzed: kratum naḥ soma jīvase vi vaḥ made dhārayā camasān iva vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.05a tava tye soma śaktibhir nikāmāso vy ṛṇvire /
analyzed: tava tye soma śaktibhiḥ nikāmāsaḥ vi ṛṇvire

original: RV_10,025.05c gṛtsasya dhīrās tavaso vi vo made vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinaṃ vivakṣase //
analyzed: gṛtsasya dhīrāḥ tavasaḥ vi vaḥ made vrajam gomantam aśvinam vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.06a paśuṃ naḥ soma rakṣasi purutrā viṣṭhitaṃ jagat /
analyzed: paśum naḥ soma rakṣasi purutrā viṣṭhitam jagat

original: RV_10,025.06c samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vo made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanā vivakṣase //
analyzed: samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vaḥ made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanā vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.07a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato gopā adābhyo bhava /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas gopāḥ adābhyaḥ bhava

original: RV_10,025.07c sedha rājann apa sridho vi vo made mā no duḥśaṃsa īśatā vivakṣase //
analyzed: sedha rājan apa sridhaḥ vi vaḥ made mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśatā vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.08a tvaṃ naḥ soma sukratur vayodheyāya jāgṛhi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma su kratuḥ vayodheyāya jāgṛhi

original: RV_10,025.08c kṣetravittaro manuṣo vi vo made druho naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase //
analyzed: kṣetra vittaraḥ manuṣaḥ vi vaḥ made druhaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.09a tvaṃ no vṛtrahantamendrasyendo śivaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ vṛtra hantama indrasya indo śivaḥ sakhā

original: RV_10,025.09c yat sīṃ havante samithe vi vo made yudhyamānās tokasātau vivakṣase //
analyzed: yat sīm havante samithe vi vaḥ made yudhyamānāḥ toka sātau vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.10a ayaṃ gha sa turo mada indrasya vardhata priyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam gha sa turaḥ madaḥ indrasya vardhata priyaḥ

original: RV_10,025.10c ayaṃ kakṣīvato maho vi vo made matiṃ viprasya vardhayad vivakṣase //
analyzed: ayam kakṣīvataḥ mahaḥ vi vaḥ made matim viprasya vardhayat vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.11a ayaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe vājāṃ iyarti gomataḥ /
analyzed: ayam viprāya dāśuṣe vājān iyarti gomataḥ

original: RV_10,025.11c ayaṃ saptabhya ā varaṃ vi vo made prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca tāriṣad vivakṣase //
analyzed: ayam saptabhyaḥ ā varam vi vaḥ made pra andham śroṇam ca tāriṣat vivakṣase

original: RV_10,026.01a pra hy acchā manīṣā spārhā yanti niyutaḥ /
analyzed: pra hi acchā manīṣā spārhāḥ yanti niyutaḥ

original: RV_10,026.01c pra dasrā niyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ //
analyzed: pra dasrā niyut rathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ

original: RV_10,026.02a yasya tyan mahitvaṃ vātāpyam ayaṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tyad mahi tvam vātāpyam ayam janaḥ

original: RV_10,026.02c vipra ā vaṃsad dhītibhiś ciketa suṣṭutīnām //
analyzed: vipraḥ ā vaṃsat dhītibhiḥ ciketa suṣṭutīnām

original: RV_10,026.03a sa veda suṣṭutīnām indur na pūṣā vṛṣā /
analyzed: sa veda suṣṭutīnām induḥ na pūṣā vṛṣā

original: RV_10,026.03c abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati vrajaṃ na ā pruṣāyati //
analyzed: abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati vrajam naḥ ā pruṣāyati

original: RV_10,026.04a maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākaṃ deva pūṣan /
analyzed: maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākam deva pūṣan

original: RV_10,026.04c matīnāṃ ca sādhanaṃ viprāṇāṃ cādhavam //
analyzed: matīnām ca sādhanam viprāṇām ca ādhavam

original: RV_10,026.05a pratyardhir yajñānām aśvahayo rathānām /
analyzed: pratyardhiḥ yajñānām aśva hayaḥ rathānām

original: RV_10,026.05c ṛṣiḥ sa yo manurhito viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ sa yaḥ manuḥ hitaḥ viprasya yāvayat sakhaḥ

original: RV_10,026.06a ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāś ca śucasya ca /
analyzed: ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāḥ ca śucasya ca

original: RV_10,026.06c vāsovāyo 'vīnām ā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat //
analyzed: vāsovāyo vīnām ā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat

original: RV_10,026.07a ino vājānām patir inaḥ puṣṭīnāṃ sakhā /
analyzed: inaḥ vājānām patiḥ inaḥ puṣṭīnām sakhā

original: RV_10,026.07c pra śmaśru haryato dūdhod vi vṛthā yo adābhyaḥ //
analyzed: pra śmaśru haryataḥ dūdhot vi vṛthā yaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_10,026.08a ā te rathasya pūṣann ajā dhuraṃ vavṛtyuḥ /
analyzed: ā te rathasya pūṣan ajāḥ dhuram vavṛtyuḥ

original: RV_10,026.08c viśvasyārthinaḥ sakhā sanojā anapacyutaḥ //
analyzed: viśvasya arthinaḥ sakhā sanaḥ jāḥ an apacyutaḥ

original: RV_10,026.09a asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ

original: RV_10,026.09c bhuvad vājānāṃ vṛdha imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam //
analyzed: bhuvat vājānām vṛdhaḥ imam naḥ śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_10,027.01a asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivego yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam /
analyzed: asat su me jaritar sa abhivegaḥ yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam

original: RV_10,027.01c anāśīrdām aham asmi prahantā satyadhvṛtaṃ vṛjināyantam ābhum //
analyzed: an āśīḥ dām aham asmi prahantā satya dhvṛtam vṛjināyantam ābhum

original: RV_10,027.02a yadīd ahaṃ yudhaye saṃnayāny adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān /
analyzed: yadi id aham yudhaye saṃnayāni adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān

original: RV_10,027.02c amā te tumraṃ vṛṣabham pacāni tīvraṃ sutam pañcadaśaṃ ni ṣiñcam //
analyzed: amā te tumram vṛṣabham pacāni tīvram sutam pañcadaśam ni siñcam

original: RV_10,027.03a nāhaṃ taṃ veda ya iti bravīty adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān /
analyzed: na aham tam veda yaḥ iti bravīti adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān

original: RV_10,027.03c yadāvākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvad ād id dha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti //
analyzed: yadā avākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvat āt id ha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti

original: RV_10,027.04a yad ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣv āsaṃ viśve sato maghavāno ma āsan /
analyzed: yat ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣu āsam viśve sataḥ maghavānaḥ me āsan

original: RV_10,027.04c jināmi vet kṣema ā santam ābhum pra taṃ kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya //
analyzed: jināmi vet kṣeme ā santam ābhum pra tam kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya

original: RV_10,027.05a na vā u māṃ vṛjane vārayante na parvatāso yad aham manasye /
analyzed: na vai u mām vṛjane vārayante na parvatāsaḥ yat aham manasye

original: RV_10,027.05c mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇo bhayāta eved anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt //
analyzed: mama svanāt kṛdhu karṇaḥ bhayāt eva id anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt

original: RV_10,027.06a darśan nv atra śṛtapāṃ anindrān bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān /
analyzed: darśan nu atra śṛta pām an indrān bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān

original: RV_10,027.06c ghṛṣuṃ vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam adhy ū nv eṣu pavayo vavṛtyuḥ //
analyzed: ghṛṣum vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam adhi u nu eṣu pavayaḥ vavṛtyuḥ

original: RV_10,027.07a abhūr v aukṣīr vy u āyur ānaḍ darṣan nu pūrvo aparo nu darṣat /
analyzed: abhūḥ u aukṣīḥ vi u āyuḥ ānaṭ darṣat nu pūrvaḥ aparaḥ nu darṣat

original: RV_10,027.07c dve pavaste pari taṃ na bhūto yo asya pāre rajaso viveṣa //
analyzed: dve pavaste pari tam na bhūtaḥ yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ viveṣa

original: RV_10,027.08a gāvo yavam prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāś carantīḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ yavam prayutāḥ aryaḥ akṣan tāḥ apaśyam saha gopāḥ carantīḥ

original: RV_10,027.08c havā id aryo abhitaḥ sam āyan kiyad āsu svapatiś chandayāte //
analyzed: havāḥ id aryaḥ abhitas sam āyan kiyat āsu sva patiḥ chandayāte

original: RV_10,027.09a saṃ yad vayaṃ yavasādo janānām ahaṃ yavāda urvajre antaḥ /
analyzed: sam yat vayam yavasādaḥ janānām aham yava ādaḥ urvajre antar

original: RV_10,027.09c atrā yukto 'vasātāram icchād atho ayuktaṃ yunajad vavanvān //
analyzed: atrā yuktaḥ vasātāram icchāt atha u a yuktam yunajat vavanvān

original: RV_10,027.10a atred u me maṃsase satyam uktaṃ dvipāc ca yac catuṣpāt saṃsṛjāni /
analyzed: atrā id u me maṃsase satyam uktam dvipād ca yat catuṣpād saṃsṛjāni

original: RV_10,027.10c strībhir yo atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyād ayuddho asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ //
analyzed: strībhiḥ yaḥ atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyāt ayuddhaḥ asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ

original: RV_10,027.11a yasyānakṣā duhitā jātv āsa kas tāṃ vidvāṃ abhi manyāte andhām /
analyzed: yasya anakṣā duhitā jātu āsa kaḥ tām vidvān abhi manyāte andhām

original: RV_10,027.11c kataro menim prati tam mucāte ya īṃ vahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt //
analyzed: kataraḥ menim prati tam mucāte yaḥ īm vahāte yaḥ īm vā vareyāt

original: RV_10,027.12a kiyatī yoṣā maryato vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa /
analyzed: kiyatī yoṣā maryataḥ vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa

original: RV_10,027.12c bhadrā vadhūr bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayaṃ sā mitraṃ vanute jane cit //
analyzed: bhadrā vadhūḥ bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayam sā mitram vanute jane cit

original: RV_10,027.13a patto jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham /
analyzed: pattas jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham

original: RV_10,027.13c āsīna ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṅṅ uttānām anv eti bhūmim //
analyzed: āsīnaḥ ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṅ uttānām anu eti bhūmim

original: RV_10,027.14a bṛhann acchāyo apalāśo arvā tasthau mātā viṣito atti garbhaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhan acchāyaḥ apalāśaḥ arvā tasthau mātā viṣitaḥ atti garbhaḥ

original: RV_10,027.14c anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ //
analyzed: anyasyāḥ vatsam rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10,027.15a sapta vīrāso adharād ud āyann aṣṭottarāttāt sam ajagmiran te /
analyzed: sapta vīrāsaḥ adharāt ud āyan aṣṭa uttarāttāt sam ajagmiran te

original: RV_10,027.15c nava paścātāt sthivimanta āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranty aśnaḥ //
analyzed: nava paścātāt sthivimantaḥ āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranti aśnaḥ

original: RV_10,027.16a daśānām ekaṃ kapilaṃ samānaṃ taṃ hinvanti kratave pāryāya /
analyzed: daśānām ekam kapilam samānam tam hinvanti kratave pāryāya

original: RV_10,027.16c garbham mātā sudhitaṃ vakṣaṇāsv avenantaṃ tuṣayantī bibharti //
analyzed: garbham mātā sudhitam vakṣaṇāsu a venantam tuṣayantī bibharti

original: RV_10,027.17a pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrā nyuptā akṣā anu dīva āsan /
analyzed: pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrāḥ nyuptāḥ akṣāḥ anu dīvaḥ āsan

original: RV_10,027.17c dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsv antaḥ pavitravantā carataḥ punantā //
analyzed: dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsu antar pavitravantā carataḥ punantā

original: RV_10,027.18a vi krośanāso viṣvañca āyan pacāti nemo nahi pakṣad ardhaḥ /
analyzed: vi krośanāsaḥ viṣvañcaḥ āyan pacāti nemaḥ nahi pakṣat ardhaḥ

original: RV_10,027.18c ayam me devaḥ savitā tad āha drvanna id vanavat sarpirannaḥ //
analyzed: ayam me devaḥ savitā tat āha dru annaḥ id vanavat sarpiḥ annaḥ

original: RV_10,027.19a apaśyaṃ grāmaṃ vahamānam ārād acakrayā svadhayā vartamānam /
analyzed: apaśyam grāmam vahamānam ārāt acakrayā svadhayā vartamānam

original: RV_10,027.19c siṣakty aryaḥ pra yugā janānāṃ sadyaḥ śiśnā pramināno navīyān //
analyzed: siṣakti aryaḥ pra yugā janānām sadyas śiśnā praminānaḥ navīyān

original: RV_10,027.20a etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mo ṣu pra sedhīr muhur in mamandhi /
analyzed: etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mā u su pra sedhīḥ muhur id mamandhi

original: RV_10,027.20c āpaś cid asya vi naśanty arthaṃ sūraś ca marka uparo babhūvān //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asya vi naśanti artham sūraḥ ca markaḥ uparaḥ babhūvān

original: RV_10,027.21a ayaṃ yo vajraḥ purudhā vivṛtto 'vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥ purīṣāt /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ vajraḥ purudhā vivṛttaḥ vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥ purīṣāt

original: RV_10,027.21c śrava id enā paro anyad asti tad avyathī jarimāṇas taranti //
analyzed: śravaḥ id enā paras anyat asti tat avyathī jarimāṇaḥ taranti

original: RV_10,027.22a vṛkṣe-vṛkṣe niyatā mīmayad gaus tato vayaḥ pra patān pūruṣādaḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣevṛkṣe niyatā mīmayat gauḥ tatas vayaḥ pra patān pūruṣādaḥ

original: RV_10,027.22c athedaṃ viśvam bhuvanam bhayāta indrāya sunvad ṛṣaye ca śikṣat //
analyzed: athā idam viśvam bhuvanam bhayāt indrāya sunvat ṛṣaye ca śikṣat

original: RV_10,027.23a devānām māne prathamā atiṣṭhan kṛntatrād eṣām uparā ud āyan /
analyzed: devānām māne prathamāḥ atiṣṭhan kṛntatrāt eṣām uparāḥ ud āyan

original: RV_10,027.23c trayas tapanti pṛthivīm anūpā dvā bṛbūkaṃ vahataḥ purīṣam //
analyzed: trayaḥ tapanti pṛthivīm anūpāḥ dvā bṛbūkam vahataḥ purīṣam

original: RV_10,027.24a sā te jīvātur uta tasya viddhi mā smaitādṛg apa gūhaḥ samarye /
analyzed: sā te jīvātuḥ uta tasya viddhi mā smā etādṛś apa gūhaḥ samarye

original: RV_10,027.24c āviḥ svaḥ kṛṇute gūhate busaṃ sa pādur asya nirṇijo na mucyate //
analyzed: āvis svar kṛṇute gūhate busam sa pāduḥ asya nirṇijaḥ na mucyate

original: RV_10,028.01a viśvo hy anyo arir ājagāma mamed aha śvaśuro nā jagāma /
analyzed: viśvaḥ hi anyaḥ ariḥ ājagāma mama id aha śvaśuraḥ nā jagāma

original: RV_10,028.01c jakṣīyād dhānā uta somam papīyāt svāśitaḥ punar astaṃ jagāyāt //
analyzed: jakṣīyāt dhānāḥ uta somam papīyāt su āśitaḥ punar astam jagāyāt

original: RV_10,028.02a sa roruvad vṛṣabhas tigmaśṛṅgo varṣman tasthau varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: sa roruvat vṛṣabhaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ varṣman tasthau variman ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10,028.02c viśveṣv enaṃ vṛjaneṣu pāmi yo me kukṣī sutasomaḥ pṛṇāti //
analyzed: viśveṣu enam vṛjaneṣu pāmi yaḥ me kukṣī suta somaḥ pṛṇāti

original: RV_10,028.03a adriṇā te mandina indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvam eṣām /
analyzed: adriṇā te mandinaḥ indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvam eṣām

original: RV_10,028.03c pacanti te vṛṣabhāṃ atsi teṣām pṛkṣeṇa yan maghavan hūyamānaḥ //
analyzed: pacanti te vṛṣabhān atsi teṣām pṛkṣeṇa yat maghavan hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_10,028.04a idaṃ su me jaritar ā cikiddhi pratīpaṃ śāpaṃ nadyo vahanti /
analyzed: idam su me jaritar ā cikiddhi pratīpam śāpam nadyaḥ vahanti

original: RV_10,028.04c lopāśaḥ siṃham pratyañcam atsāḥ kroṣṭā varāhaṃ nir atakta kakṣāt //
analyzed: lopāśaḥ siṃham pratyañcam atsāḥ kroṣṭā varāham niḥ atakta kakṣāt

original: RV_10,028.05a kathā ta etad aham ā ciketaṃ gṛtsasya pākas tavaso manīṣām /
analyzed: kathā te etat aham ā ciketam gṛtsasya pākaḥ tavasaḥ manīṣām

original: RV_10,028.05c tvaṃ no vidvāṃ ṛtuthā vi voco yam ardhaṃ te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ //
analyzed: tvam naḥ vidvān ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ yam ardham te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ

original: RV_10,028.06a evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ vardhayanti divaś cin me bṛhata uttarā dhūḥ /
analyzed: eva hi mām tavasam vardhayanti divaḥ cit me bṛhataḥ uttarā dhūḥ

original: RV_10,028.06c purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākam aśatruṃ hi mā janitā jajāna //
analyzed: purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākam aśatrum hi mā janitā jajāna

original: RV_10,028.07a evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ jajñur ugraṃ karman-karman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ /
analyzed: eva hi mām tavasam jajñuḥ ugram karman karman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ

original: RV_10,028.07c vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasāno 'pa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam //
analyzed: vadhīm vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ pa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam

original: RV_10,028.08a devāsa āyan paraśūṃr abibhran vanā vṛścanto abhi viḍbhir āyan /
analyzed: devāsaḥ āyan paraśūṃr abibhran vanā vṛścantaḥ abhi viḍbhiḥ āyan

original: RV_10,028.08c ni sudrvaṃ dadhato vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭam anu tad dahanti //
analyzed: ni su drvam dadhataḥ vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭam anu tat dahanti

original: RV_10,028.09a śaśaḥ kṣuram pratyañcaṃ jagārādriṃ logena vy abhedam ārāt /
analyzed: śaśaḥ kṣuram pratyañcam jagāra adrim logena vi abhedam ārāt

original: RV_10,028.09c bṛhantaṃ cid ṛhate randhayāni vayad vatso vṛṣabhaṃ śūśuvānaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhantam cit ṛhate randhayāni vayat vatsaḥ vṛṣabham śūśuvānaḥ

original: RV_10,028.10a suparṇa itthā nakham ā siṣāyāvaruddhaḥ paripadaṃ na siṃhaḥ /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ itthā nakham ā siṣāya avaruddhaḥ paripadam na siṃhaḥ

original: RV_10,028.10c niruddhaś cin mahiṣas tarṣyāvān godhā tasmā ayathaṃ karṣad etat //
analyzed: niruddhaḥ cit mahiṣaḥ tarṣyāvān godhā tasmai ayatham karṣat etat

original: RV_10,028.11a tebhyo godhā ayathaṃ karṣad etad ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipīyanty annaiḥ /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ godhāḥ ayatham karṣat etat ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipīyanti annaiḥ

original: RV_10,028.11c sima ukṣṇo 'vasṛṣṭāṃ adanti svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ //
analyzed: simaḥ ukṣṇaḥ adanti svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_10,028.12a ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ soma ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ soma ukthaiḥ

original: RV_10,028.12c nṛvad vadann upa no māhi vājān divi śravo dadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ //
analyzed: nṛvat vadan upa naḥ māhi vājān divi śravaḥ dadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ

original: RV_10,029.01a vane na vā yo ny adhāyi cākañ chucir vāṃ stomo bhuraṇāv ajīgaḥ /
analyzed: vane na vā yaḥ ni adhāyi cākam śuciḥ vām stomaḥ bhuraṇau ajīgaḥ

original: RV_10,029.01c yasyed indraḥ purudineṣu hotā nṛṇāṃ naryo nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān //
analyzed: yasya id indraḥ puru dineṣu hotā nṛṇām naryaḥ nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān

original: RV_10,029.02a pra te asyā uṣasaḥ prāparasyā nṛtau syāma nṛtamasya nṛṇām /
analyzed: pra te asyāḥ uṣasaḥ pra aparasyāḥ nṛtau syāma nṛtamasya nṛṇām

original: RV_10,029.02c anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahan nṝn kutsena ratho yo asat sasavān //
analyzed: anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahat nṝn kutsena rathaḥ yaḥ asat sasavān

original: RV_10,029.03a kas te mada indra rantyo bhūd duro giro abhy ugro vi dhāva /
analyzed: kaḥ te madaḥ indra rantyaḥ bhūt duraḥ giraḥ abhī ugraḥ vi dhāva

original: RV_10,029.03c kad vāho arvāg upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyām upamaṃ rādho annaiḥ //
analyzed: kad vāho arvāk upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyām upamam rādhaḥ annaiḥ

original: RV_10,029.04a kad u dyumnam indra tvāvato nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kan na āgan /
analyzed: kad u dyumnam indra tvāvataḥ nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kad naḥ āgan

original: RV_10,029.04c mitro na satya urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya yad asan manīṣāḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ na satyaḥ uru gāya bhṛtyāḥ anne samasya yat asan manīṣāḥ

original: RV_10,029.05a preraya sūro arthaṃ na pāraṃ ye asya kāmaṃ janidhā iva gman /
analyzed: preraya sūraḥ artham na pāram ye asya kāmam janidhāḥ iva gman

original: RV_10,029.05c giraś ca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīr nara indra pratiśikṣanty annaiḥ //
analyzed: giraḥ ca ye te tuvi jāta pūrvīḥ naraḥ indra pratiśikṣanti annaiḥ

original: RV_10,029.06a mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyaur majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena /
analyzed: mātre nu te su mite indra pūrvī dyauḥ majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena

original: RV_10,029.06c varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantu pītaye madhūni //
analyzed: varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantu pītaye madhūni

original: RV_10,029.07a ā madhvo asmā asicann amatram indrāya pūrṇaṃ sa hi satyarādhāḥ /
analyzed: ā madhvaḥ asmai asican amatram indrāya pūrṇam sa hi satya rādhāḥ

original: RV_10,029.07c sa vāvṛdhe varimann ā pṛthivyā abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiś ca //
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhe variman ā pṛthivyāḥ abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ ca

original: RV_10,029.08a vy ānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā āsmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: vi ānaṭ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ su ojāḥ ā asmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ

original: RV_10,029.08c ā smā rathaṃ na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse //
analyzed: ā smā ratham na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse

original: RV_10,030.01a pra devatrā brahmaṇe gātur etv apo acchā manaso na prayukti /
analyzed: pra devatrā brahmaṇe gātuḥ etu apaḥ acchā manasaḥ na prayukti

original: RV_10,030.01c mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim pṛthujrayase rīradhā suvṛktim //
analyzed: mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim pṛthujrayase rīradhā suvṛktim

original: RV_10,030.02a adhvaryavo haviṣmanto hi bhūtācchāpa itośatīr uśantaḥ /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ haviṣmantaḥ hi bhūtāt śa apaḥ ita uśatīḥ uśantaḥ

original: RV_10,030.02c ava yāś caṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇas tam āsyadhvam ūrmim adyā suhastāḥ //
analyzed: ava yāḥ caṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ tam āsyadhvam ūrmim adya su hastāḥ

original: RV_10,030.03a adhvaryavo 'pa itā samudram apāṃ napātaṃ haviṣā yajadhvam /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ paḥ ita samudram apām napātam haviṣā yajadhvam

original: RV_10,030.03c sa vo dadad ūrmim adyā supūtaṃ tasmai somam madhumantaṃ sunota //
analyzed: sa vaḥ dadat ūrmim adyā su pūtam tasmai somam madhumantam sunota

original: RV_10,030.04a yo anidhmo dīdayad apsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḷate adhvareṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antar yam viprāsaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu

original: RV_10,030.04c apāṃ napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāya //
analyzed: apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ yābhiḥ indraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāya

original: RV_10,030.05a yābhiḥ somo modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhir yuvatibhir na maryaḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ somaḥ modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ na maryaḥ

original: RV_10,030.05c tā adhvaryo apo acchā parehi yad āsiñcā oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt //
analyzed: tāḥ adhvaryo apaḥ acchā parehi yat āsiñcaḥ oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt

original: RV_10,030.06a eved yūne yuvatayo namanta yad īm uśann uśatīr ety accha /
analyzed: eva id yūne yuvatayaḥ namanta yat īm uśan uśatīḥ eti accha

original: RV_10,030.06c saṃ jānate manasā saṃ cikitre 'dhvaryavo dhiṣaṇāpaś ca devīḥ //
analyzed: sam jānate manasā sam cikitre dhvaryavaḥ dhiṣaṇāpaḥ ca devīḥ

original: RV_10,030.07a yo vo vṛtābhyo akṛṇod u lokaṃ yo vo mahyā abhiśaster amuñcat /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ vṛtābhyaḥ akṛṇot u lokam yaḥ vaḥ mahyāḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcat

original: RV_10,030.07c tasmā indrāya madhumantam ūrmiṃ devamādanam pra hiṇotanāpaḥ //
analyzed: tasmai indrāya madhumantam ūrmim deva mādanam pra hiṇotana apaḥ

original: RV_10,030.08a prāsmai hinota madhumantam ūrmiṃ garbho yo vaḥ sindhavo madhva utsaḥ /
analyzed: pra asmai hinota madhumantam ūrmim garbhaḥ yaḥ vaḥ sindhavaḥ madhvaḥ utsaḥ

original: RV_10,030.08c ghṛtapṛṣṭham īḍyam adhvareṣv āpo revatīḥ śṛṇutā havam me //
analyzed: ghṛta pṛṣṭham īḍyam adhvareṣu āpaḥ revatīḥ śṛṇutā havam me

original: RV_10,030.09a taṃ sindhavo matsaram indrapānam ūrmim pra heta ya ubhe iyarti /
analyzed: tam sindhavaḥ matsaram indra pānam ūrmim pra heta yaḥ ubhe iyarti

original: RV_10,030.09c madacyutam auśānaṃ nabhojām pari tritantuṃ vicarantam utsam //
analyzed: mada cyutam auśānam nabhaḥ jām pari tri tantum vicarantam utsam

original: RV_10,030.10a āvarvṛtatīr adha nu dvidhārā goṣuyudho na niyavaṃ carantīḥ /
analyzed: āvarvṛtatīḥ adha nu dvi dhārāḥ goṣuyudhaḥ na niyavam carantīḥ

original: RV_10,030.10c ṛṣe janitrīr bhuvanasya patnīr apo vandasva savṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣe janitrīḥ bhuvanasya patnīḥ apaḥ vandasva savṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ

original: RV_10,030.11a hinotā no adhvaraṃ devayajyā hinota brahma sanaye dhanānām /
analyzed: hinota naḥ adhvaram deva yajyā hinota brahma sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_10,030.11c ṛtasya yoge vi ṣyadhvam ūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīr bhūtanāsmabhyam āpaḥ //
analyzed: ṛtasya yoge vi syadhvam ūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīḥ bhūtana asmabhyam āpaḥ

original: RV_10,030.12a āpo revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ kratuṃ ca bhadram bibhṛthāmṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: āpaḥ revatīḥ kṣayatha hi vasvaḥ kratum ca bhadram bibhṛtha amṛtam ca

original: RV_10,030.12c rāyaś ca stha svapatyasya patnīḥ sarasvatī tad gṛṇate vayo dhāt //
analyzed: rāyaḥ ca stha su apatyasya patnīḥ sarasvatī tat gṛṇate vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_10,030.13a prati yad āpo adṛśram āyatīr ghṛtam payāṃsi bibhratīr madhūni /
analyzed: prati yat āpaḥ adṛśram āyatīḥ ghṛtam payāṃsi bibhratīḥ madhūni

original: RV_10,030.13c adhvaryubhir manasā saṃvidānā indrāya somaṃ suṣutam bharantīḥ //
analyzed: adhvaryubhiḥ manasā saṃvidānāḥ indrāya somam suṣutam bharantīḥ

original: RV_10,030.14a emā agman revatīr jīvadhanyā adhvaryavaḥ sādayatā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: ā imāḥ agman revatīḥ jīva dhanyāḥ adhvaryavaḥ sādayata sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,030.14c ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāso 'pāṃ naptrā saṃvidānāsa enāḥ //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāsaḥ pām naptrā saṃvidānāsaḥ enāḥ

original: RV_10,030.15a āgmann āpa uśatīr barhir edaṃ ny adhvare asadan devayantīḥ /
analyzed: āgman āpaḥ uśatīḥ barhiḥ ā idam ni adhvare asadan devayantīḥ

original: RV_10,030.15c adhvaryavaḥ sunutendrāya somam abhūd u vaḥ suśakā devayajyā //
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ sunuta indrāya somam abhūt u vaḥ su śakā deva yajyā

original: RV_10,031.01a ā no devānām upa vetu śaṃso viśvebhis turair avase yajatraḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ devānām upa vetu śaṃsaḥ viśvebhiḥ turaiḥ avase yajatraḥ

original: RV_10,031.01c tebhir vayaṃ suṣakhāyo bhavema taranto viśvā duritā syāma //
analyzed: tebhiḥ vayam su sakhāyaḥ bhavema tarantaḥ viśvā duritā syāma

original: RV_10,031.02a pari cin marto draviṇam mamanyād ṛtasya pathā namasā vivāset /
analyzed: pari cit martaḥ draviṇam mamanyāt ṛtasya pathā namasā vivāset

original: RV_10,031.02c uta svena kratunā saṃ vadeta śreyāṃsaṃ dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt //
analyzed: uta svena kratunā sam vadeta śreyāṃsam dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt

original: RV_10,031.03a adhāyi dhītir asasṛgram aṃśās tīrthe na dasmam upa yanty ūmāḥ /
analyzed: adhāyi dhītiḥ asasṛgram aṃśāḥ tīrthe na dasmam upa yanti ūmāḥ

original: RV_10,031.03c abhy ānaśma suvitasya śūṣaṃ navedaso amṛtānām abhūma //
analyzed: abhi ānaśma suvitasya śūṣam navedasaḥ amṛtānām abhūma

original: RV_10,031.04a nityaś cākanyāt svapatir damūnā yasmā u devaḥ savitā jajāna /
analyzed: nityaḥ cākanyāt sva patiḥ damūnāḥ yasmai u devaḥ savitā jajāna

original: RV_10,031.04c bhago vā gobhir aryamem anajyāt so asmai cāruś chadayad uta syāt //
analyzed: bhagaḥ vā gobhiḥ aryamā īm anajyāt saḥ asmai cāruḥ chadayat uta syāt

original: RV_10,031.05a iyaṃ sā bhūyā uṣasām iva kṣā yad dha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan /
analyzed: iyam sā bhūyāḥ uṣasām iva kṣā yat ha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan

original: RV_10,031.05c asya stutiṃ jaritur bhikṣamāṇā ā naḥ śagmāsa upa yantu vājāḥ //
analyzed: asya stutim jarituḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ ā naḥ śagmāsaḥ upa yantu vājāḥ

original: RV_10,031.06a asyed eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānābhavat pūrvyā bhūmanā gauḥ /
analyzed: asya id eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānā abhavat pūrvyā bhūmanā gauḥ

original: RV_10,031.06c asya sanīḷā asurasya yonau samāna ā bharaṇe bibhramāṇāḥ //
analyzed: asya sanīḍāḥ asurasya yonau samāne ā bharaṇe bibhramāṇāḥ

original: RV_10,031.07a kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ /
analyzed: kim svid vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ

original: RV_10,031.07c saṃtasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīr uṣaso jaranta //
analyzed: saṃtasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ jaranta

original: RV_10,031.08a naitāvad enā paro anyad asty ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti /
analyzed: na etāvat enā paras anyat asti ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti

original: RV_10,031.08c tvacam pavitraṃ kṛṇuta svadhāvān yad īṃ sūryaṃ na harito vahanti //
analyzed: tvacam pavitram kṛṇuta svadhāvān yat īm sūryam na haritaḥ vahanti

original: RV_10,031.09a stego na kṣām aty eti pṛthvīm mihaṃ na vāto vi ha vāti bhūma /
analyzed: stegaḥ na kṣām ati eti pṛthvīm miham na vātaḥ vi ha vāti bhūma

original: RV_10,031.09c mitro yatra varuṇo ajyamāno 'gnir vane na vy asṛṣṭa śokam //
analyzed: mitraḥ yatra varuṇaḥ ajyamānaḥ gniḥ vane na vi asṛṣṭa śokam

original: RV_10,031.10a starīr yat sūta sadyo ajyamānā vyathir avyathīḥ kṛṇuta svagopā /
analyzed: starīḥ yat sūta sadyas ajyamānā vyathiḥ avyathīḥ kṛṇuta sva gopā

original: RV_10,031.10c putro yat pūrvaḥ pitror janiṣṭa śamyāṃ gaur jagāra yad dha pṛcchān //
analyzed: putraḥ yat pūrvaḥ pitroḥ janiṣṭa śamyām gauḥ jagāra yat ha pṛcchān

original: RV_10,031.11a uta kaṇvaṃ nṛṣadaḥ putram āhur uta śyāvo dhanam ādatta vājī /
analyzed: uta kaṇvam nṛṣadaḥ putram āhuḥ uta śyāvaḥ dhanam ādatta vājī

original: RV_10,031.11c pra kṛṣṇāya ruśad apinvatodhar ṛtam atra nakir asmā apīpet //
analyzed: pra kṛṣṇāya ruśat apinvata udhar ṛtam atra nakir asmai apīpet

original: RV_10,032.01a pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhir varāṃ abhi ṣu prasīdataḥ /
analyzed: pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhiḥ varān abhi su prasīdataḥ

original: RV_10,032.01c asmākam indra ubhayaṃ jujoṣati yat somyasyāndhaso bubodhati //
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ ubhayam jujoṣati yat somyasya andhasaḥ bubodhati

original: RV_10,032.02a vīndra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasā puruṣṭuta /
analyzed: vi indra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasā puruṣṭuta

original: RV_10,032.02c ye tvā vahanti muhur adhvarāṃ upa te su vanvantu vagvanāṃ arādhasaḥ //
analyzed: ye tvā vahanti muhur adhvarān upa te su vanvantu vagvanām arādhasaḥ

original: RV_10,032.03a tad in me chantsad vapuṣo vapuṣṭaram putro yaj jānam pitror adhīyati /
analyzed: tat id me chantsat vapuṣaḥ vapuṣṭaram putraḥ yat jānam pitroḥ adhīyati

original: RV_10,032.03c jāyā patiṃ vahati vagnunā sumat puṃsa id bhadro vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: jāyā patim vahati vagnunā sumat puṃse id bhadraḥ vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10,032.04a tad it sadhastham abhi cāru dīdhaya gāvo yac chāsan vahatuṃ na dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: tat id sadhastham abhi cāru dīdhaya gāvaḥ yat śāsan vahatum na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_10,032.04c mātā yan mantur yūthasya pūrvyābhi vāṇasya saptadhātur ij janaḥ //
analyzed: mātā yat mantuḥ yūthasya pūrvyā abhi vāṇasya sapta dhātuḥ id janaḥ

original: RV_10,032.05a pra vo 'cchā ririce devayuṣ padam eko rudrebhir yāti turvaṇiḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ chā ririce devayuḥ padam ekaḥ rudrebhiḥ yāti turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_10,032.05c jarā vā yeṣv amṛteṣu dāvane pari va ūmebhyaḥ siñcatā madhu //
analyzed: jarā vā yeṣu amṛteṣu dāvane pari vaḥ ūmebhyaḥ siñcata madhu

original: RV_10,032.06a nidhīyamānam apagūḷham apsu pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca /
analyzed: nidhīyamānam apagūḍham apsu pra me devānām vrata pāḥ uvāca

original: RV_10,032.06c indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām //
analyzed: indraḥ vidvān anu hi tvā cacakṣa tena aham agne anuśiṣṭaḥ āgām

original: RV_10,032.07a akṣetravit kṣetravidaṃ hy aprāṭ sa praiti kṣetravidānuśiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: a kṣetra vid kṣetra vidam hi aprāṭ sa praiti kṣetra vidā anuśiṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10,032.07c etad vai bhadram anuśāsanasyota srutiṃ vindaty añjasīnām //
analyzed: etat vai bhadram anuśāsanasya uta srutim vindati añjasīnām

original: RV_10,032.08a adyed u prāṇīd amamann imāhāpīvṛto adhayan mātur ūdhaḥ /
analyzed: adyā id u prāṇīt amaman adhayat mātuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10,032.08c em enam āpa jarimā yuvānam aheḷan vasuḥ sumanā babhūva //
analyzed: ā īm enam āpa jarimā yuvānam a heḍan vasuḥ sumanāḥ babhūva

original: RV_10,032.09a etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadato maghāni /
analyzed: etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadataḥ maghāni

original: RV_10,032.09c dāna id vo maghavānaḥ so astv ayaṃ ca somo hṛdi yam bibharmi //
analyzed: dāne id vaḥ maghavānaḥ saḥ astu ayam ca somaḥ hṛdi yam bibharmi

original: RV_10,033.01a pra mā yuyujre prayujo janānāṃ vahāmi sma pūṣaṇam antareṇa /
analyzed: pra mā yuyujre prayujaḥ janānām vahāmi sma pūṣaṇam antareṇa

original: RV_10,033.01c viśve devāso adha mām arakṣan duḥśāsur āgād iti ghoṣa āsīt //
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ adha mām arakṣan duḥśāsuḥ āgāt iti ghoṣaḥ āsīt

original: RV_10,033.02a sam mā tapanty abhitaḥ sapatnīr iva parśavaḥ /
analyzed: sam mā tapanti abhitas sapatnīḥ iva parśavaḥ

original: RV_10,033.02c ni bādhate amatir nagnatā jasur ver na vevīyate matiḥ //
analyzed: ni bādhate amatiḥ nagna tā jasuḥ veḥ na vevīyate matiḥ

original: RV_10,033.03a mūṣo na śiśnā vy adanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato /
analyzed: mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vi adanti mā adhya stotāram te śatakrato

original: RV_10,033.03c sakṛt su no maghavann indra mṛḷayādhā piteva no bhava //
analyzed: sakṛt su naḥ maghavan indra mṛḍaya adha pitā iva naḥ bhava

original: RV_10,033.04a kuruśravaṇam āvṛṇi rājānaṃ trāsadasyavam /
analyzed: kuruśravaṇam āvṛṇi rājānam trāsadasyavam

original: RV_10,033.04c maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vāghatām ṛṣiḥ //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham vāghatām ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_10,033.05a yasya mā harito rathe tisro vahanti sādhuyā /
analyzed: yasya mā haritaḥ rathe tisraḥ vahanti sādhuyā

original: RV_10,033.05c stavai sahasradakṣiṇe //
analyzed: stavai sahasra dakṣiṇe

original: RV_10,033.06a yasya prasvādaso gira upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ /
analyzed: yasya prasvādasaḥ giraḥ upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ

original: RV_10,033.06c kṣetraṃ na raṇvam ūcuṣe //
analyzed: kṣetram na raṇvam ūcuṣe

original: RV_10,033.07a adhi putropamaśravo napān mitrātither ihi /
analyzed: adhi putra upamaśravaḥ napāt mitra atitheḥ ihi

original: RV_10,033.07c pituṣ ṭe asmi vanditā //
analyzed: pituḥ te asmi vanditā

original: RV_10,033.08a yad īśīyāmṛtānām uta vā martyānām /
analyzed: yat īśīya amṛtānām uta vā martyānām

original: RV_10,033.08c jīved in maghavā mama //
analyzed: jīvet id id maghavā mama

original: RV_10,033.09a na devānām ati vrataṃ śatātmā cana jīvati /
analyzed: na devānām ati vratam śata ātmā cana jīvati

original: RV_10,033.09c tathā yujā vi vāvṛte //
analyzed: tathā yujā vi vāvṛte

original: RV_10,034.01a prāvepā mā bṛhato mādayanti pravātejā iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ /
analyzed: prāvepāḥ mā bṛhataḥ mādayanti pravātejāḥ iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ

original: RV_10,034.01c somasyeva maujavatasya bhakṣo vibhīdako jāgṛvir mahyam acchān //
analyzed: somasya iva maujavatasya bhakṣaḥ vibhīdakaḥ jāgṛviḥ mahyam acchān

original: RV_10,034.02a na mā mimetha na jihīḷa eṣā śivā sakhibhya uta mahyam āsīt /
analyzed: na mā mimetha na jihīḍa eṣā śivā sakhibhyaḥ uta mahyam āsīt

original: RV_10,034.02c akṣasyāham ekaparasya hetor anuvratām apa jāyām arodham //
analyzed: akṣasya aham eka parasya hetoḥ anuvratām apa jāyām arodham

original: RV_10,034.03a dveṣṭi śvaśrūr apa jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthito vindate marḍitāram /
analyzed: dveṣṭi śvaśrūḥ apa jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthitaḥ vindate marḍitāram

original: RV_10,034.03c aśvasyeva jarato vasnyasya nāhaṃ vindāmi kitavasya bhogam //
analyzed: aśvasya iva jarataḥ vasnyasya na aham vindāmi kitavasya bhogam

original: RV_10,034.04a anye jāyām pari mṛśanty asya yasyāgṛdhad vedane vājy akṣaḥ /
analyzed: anye jāyām pari mṛśanti asya yasya agṛdhat vedane vājī akṣaḥ

original: RV_10,034.04c pitā mātā bhrātara enam āhur na jānīmo nayatā baddham etam //
analyzed: pitā mātā bhrātaraḥ enam āhuḥ na jānīmaḥ nayata baddham etam

original: RV_10,034.05a yad ādīdhye na daviṣāṇy ebhiḥ parāyadbhyo 'va hīye sakhibhyaḥ /
analyzed: yat ādīdhye na daviṣāṇi ebhiḥ parāyadbhyaḥ vai hīye sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_10,034.05c nyuptāś ca babhravo vācam akrataṃ emīd eṣāṃ niṣkṛtaṃ jāriṇīva //
analyzed: nyuptāḥ ca babhravaḥ vācam akratam emi id eṣām niṣkṛtam jāriṇī iva

original: RV_10,034.06a sabhām eti kitavaḥ pṛcchamāno jeṣyāmīti tanvā śūśujānaḥ /
analyzed: sabhām eti kitavaḥ pṛcchamānaḥ jeṣyāmi iti tanvā śūśujānaḥ

original: RV_10,034.06c akṣāso asya vi tiranti kāmam pratidīvne dadhata ā kṛtāni //
analyzed: akṣāsaḥ asya vi tiranti kāmam pratidīvne dadhataḥ ā kṛtāni

original: RV_10,034.07a akṣāsa id aṅkuśino nitodino nikṛtvānas tapanās tāpayiṣṇavaḥ /
analyzed: akṣāsaḥ id aṅkuśinaḥ nitodinaḥ nikṛtvānaḥ tapanāḥ tāpayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_10,034.07c kumāradeṣṇā jayataḥ punarhaṇo madhvā sampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā //
analyzed: kumāradeṣṇāḥ jayataḥ punarhaṇaḥ madhvā sampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā

original: RV_10,034.08a tripañcāśaḥ krīḷati vrāta eṣāṃ deva iva savitā satyadharmā /
analyzed: tripañcāśaḥ krīḍati vrātaḥ eṣām devaḥ iva savitā satya dharmā

original: RV_10,034.08c ugrasya cin manyave nā namante rājā cid ebhyo nama it kṛṇoti //
analyzed: ugrasya cit manyave nā namante rājā cit ebhyaḥ namaḥ id kṛṇoti

original: RV_10,034.09a nīcā vartanta upari sphuranty ahastāso hastavantaṃ sahante /
analyzed: nīcā vartantaḥ upari sphuranti ahastāsaḥ hastavantam sahante

original: RV_10,034.09c divyā aṅgārā iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santo hṛdayaṃ nir dahanti //
analyzed: divyāḥ aṅgārāḥ iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santaḥ hṛdayam niḥ dahanti

original: RV_10,034.10a jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kva svit /
analyzed: jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kva svid

original: RV_10,034.10c ṛṇāvā bibhyad dhanam icchamāno 'nyeṣām astam upa naktam eti //
analyzed: ṛṇāvā bibhyat dhanam icchamānaḥ ni eṣām astam upa naktam eti

original: RV_10,034.11a striyaṃ dṛṣṭvāya kitavaṃ tatāpānyeṣāṃ jāyāṃ sukṛtaṃ ca yonim /
analyzed: striyam dṛṣṭvāya kitavam tatāpa anyeṣām jāyām su kṛtam ca yonim

original: RV_10,034.11c pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn so agner ante vṛṣalaḥ papāda //
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn saḥ agneḥ ante vṛṣalaḥ papāda

original: RV_10,034.12a yo vaḥ senānīr mahato gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamo babhūva /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ senā nīḥ mahataḥ gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamaḥ babhūva

original: RV_10,034.12c tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśāham prācīs tad ṛtaṃ vadāmi //
analyzed: tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśa aham prācīḥ tat ṛtam vadāmi

original: RV_10,034.13a akṣair mā dīvyaḥ kṛṣim it kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahu manyamānaḥ /
analyzed: akṣaiḥ mā dīvyaḥ kṛṣim id kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahu manyamānaḥ

original: RV_10,034.13c tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tan me vi caṣṭe savitāyam aryaḥ //
analyzed: tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tat me vi caṣṭe savitā ayam aryaḥ

original: RV_10,034.14a mitraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ khalu mṛḷatā no mā no ghoreṇa caratābhi dhṛṣṇu /
analyzed: mitram kṛṇudhvam khalu mṛḍata naḥ mā naḥ ghoreṇa carata abhi dhṛṣṇu

original: RV_10,034.14c ni vo nu manyur viśatām arātir anyo babhrūṇām prasitau nv astu //
analyzed: ni vaḥ nu manyuḥ viśatām arātiḥ anyaḥ babhrūṇām prasitau nu astu

original: RV_10,035.01a abudhram u tya indravanto agnayo jyotir bharanta uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: abudhram u tye indravantaḥ agnayaḥ jyotiḥ bharantaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10,035.01c mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatām apo 'dyā devānām ava ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatām apaḥ dyāḥ devānām avaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,035.02a divaspṛthivyor ava ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatāñ charyaṇāvataḥ /
analyzed: divaspṛthivyoḥ avaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatām śaryaṇāvataḥ

original: RV_10,035.02c anāgāstvaṃ sūryam uṣāsam īmahe bhadraṃ somaḥ suvāno adyā kṛṇotu naḥ //
analyzed: anāgāstvam sūryam uṣāsam īmahe bhadram somaḥ suvānaḥ adyā kṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_10,035.03a dyāvā no adya pṛthivī anāgaso mahī trāyetāṃ suvitāya mātarā /
analyzed: dyāvā naḥ adya pṛthivī anāgasaḥ mahī trāyetām suvitāya mātarā

original: RV_10,035.03c uṣā ucchanty apa bādhatām aghaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: uṣāḥ ucchantī apa bādhatām agham svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.04a iyaṃ na usrā prathamā sudevyaṃ revat sanibhyo revatī vy ucchatu /
analyzed: iyam naḥ usrā prathamā su devyam revat sanibhyaḥ revatī vi ucchatu

original: RV_10,035.04c āre manyuṃ durvidatrasya dhīmahi svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: āre manyum durvidatrasya dhīmahi svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.05a pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhir jyotir bharantīr uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhiḥ jyotiḥ bharantīḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10,035.05c bhadrā no adya śravase vy ucchata svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: bhadrāḥ naḥ adya śravase vi ucchata svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.06a anamīvā uṣasa ā carantu na ud agnayo jihatāṃ jyotiṣā bṛhat /
analyzed: anamīvāḥ uṣasaḥ ā carantu naḥ ud agnayaḥ jihatām jyotiṣā bṛhat

original: RV_10,035.06c āyukṣātām aśvinā tūtujiṃ rathaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: āyukṣātām aśvinā tūtujim ratham svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.07a śreṣṭhaṃ no adya savitar vareṇyam bhāgam ā suva sa hi ratnadhā asi /
analyzed: śreṣṭham naḥ adya savitar vareṇyam bhāgam ā suva sa hi ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_10,035.07c rāyo janitrīṃ dhiṣaṇām upa bruve svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: rāyaḥ janitrīm dhiṣaṇām upa bruve svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.08a pipartu mā tad ṛtasya pravācanaṃ devānāṃ yan manuṣyā amanmahi /
analyzed: pipartu mā tat ṛtasya pravācanam devānām yat manuṣyāḥ amanmahi

original: RV_10,035.08c viśvā id usrā spaḷ ud eti sūryaḥ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: viśvāḥ id usrāḥ spaṣ ud eti sūryaḥ svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.09a adveṣo adya barhiṣa starīmaṇi grāvṇāṃ yoge manmanaḥ sādha īmahe /
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ adya barhiṣaḥ starīmaṇi grāvṇām yoge manmanaḥ sādhaḥ īmahe

original: RV_10,035.09c ādityānāṃ śarmaṇi sthā bhuraṇyasi svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: ādityānām śarmaṇi sthā bhuraṇyasi svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.10a ā no barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhad divi devāṃ īḷe sādayā sapta hotṝn /
analyzed: ā naḥ barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhat divi devān īḍe sādaya sapta hotṝn

original: RV_10,035.10c indram mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam sātaye bhagam svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.11a ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye vṛdhe no yajñam avatā sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: te ādityāḥ ā gata sarvatātaye vṛdhe naḥ yajñam avata sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,035.11c bṛhaspatim pūṣaṇam aśvinā bhagaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim pūṣaṇam aśvinā bhagam svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.12a tan no devā yacchata supravācanaṃ chardir ādityāḥ subharaṃ nṛpāyyam /
analyzed: tat naḥ devāḥ yacchata su pravācanam chardiḥ ādityāḥ subharam nṛ pāyyam

original: RV_10,035.12c paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
analyzed: paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10,035.13a viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantv agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ /
analyzed: viśve adya marutaḥ viśve ūtī viśve bhavantu agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ

original: RV_10,035.13c viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇaṃ vājo asme //
analyzed: viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇam vājaḥ asme

original: RV_10,035.14a yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ trāyadhve yam pipṛthāty aṃhaḥ /
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ vatha vājasātau yam trāyadhve yam pipṛtha ati aṃhaḥ

original: RV_10,035.14c yo vo gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāma devavītaye turāsaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāma deva vītaye turāsaḥ

original: RV_10,036.01a uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,036.01c indraṃ huve marutaḥ parvatāṃ apa ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ //
analyzed: indram huve marutaḥ parvatān apaḥ ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svar

original: RV_10,036.02a dyauś ca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasa ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṃhaso riṣaḥ /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasaḥ ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṃhasaḥ riṣaḥ

original: RV_10,036.02c mā durvidatrā nirṛtir na īśata tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: mā durvidatrā nirṛtiḥ naḥ īśata tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.03a viśvasmān no aditiḥ pātv aṃhaso mātā mitrasya varuṇasya revataḥ /
analyzed: viśvasmāt naḥ aditiḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ mātā mitrasya varuṇasya revataḥ

original: RV_10,036.03c svarvaj jyotir avṛkaṃ naśīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: svarvat jyotiḥ avṛkam naśīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.04a grāvā vadann apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣṣvapnyaṃ nirṛtiṃ viśvam atriṇam /
analyzed: grāvā vadan apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣṣvapnyam nirṛtim viśvam atriṇam

original: RV_10,036.04c ādityaṃ śarma marutām aśīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: ādityam śarma marutām aśīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.05a endro barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatām iḷā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhir ṛkvo arcatu /
analyzed: ā indraḥ barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatām iḍā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhiḥ ṛkvaḥ arcatu

original: RV_10,036.05c supraketaṃ jīvase manma dhīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: su praketam jīvase manma dhīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.06a divispṛśaṃ yajñam asmākam aśvinā jīrādhvaraṃ kṛṇutaṃ sumnam iṣṭaye /
analyzed: divispṛśam yajñam asmākam aśvinā jīra adhvaram kṛṇutam sumnam iṣṭaye

original: RV_10,036.06c prācīnaraśmim āhutaṃ ghṛtena tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: prācīna raśmim āhutam ghṛtena tat devānām avaḥ adya vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.07a upa hvaye suhavam mārutaṃ gaṇam pāvakam ṛṣvaṃ sakhyāya śambhuvam /
analyzed: upa hvaye su havam mārutam gaṇam pāvakam ṛṣvam sakhyāya śambhuvam

original: RV_10,036.07c rāyas poṣaṃ sauśravasāya dhīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣam sauśravasāya dhīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.08a apām peruṃ jīvadhanyam bharāmahe devāvyaṃ suhavam adhvaraśriyam /
analyzed: apām perum jīva dhanyam bharāmahe devāvyam su havam adhvara śriyam

original: RV_10,036.08c suraśmiṃ somam indriyaṃ yamīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: su raśmim somam indriyam yamīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.09a sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhir vayaṃ jīvā jīvaputrā anāgasaḥ /
analyzed: sanema tat su sanitā sanitvabhiḥ vayam jīvāḥ jīva putrāḥ anāgasaḥ

original: RV_10,036.09c brahmadviṣo viṣvag eno bharerata tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: brahma dviṣaḥ viṣvak enaḥ bharerata tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.10a ye sthā manor yajñiyās te śṛṇotana yad vo devā īmahe tad dadātana /
analyzed: ye stha manoḥ yajñiyāḥ te śṛṇotana yat vaḥ devāḥ īmahe tat dadātana

original: RV_10,036.10c jaitraṃ kratuṃ rayimad vīravad yaśas tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: jaitram kratum rayimat vīravat yaśaḥ tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.11a mahad adya mahatām ā vṛṇīmahe 'vo devānām bṛhatām anarvaṇām /
analyzed: mahat adya mahatām ā vṛṇīmahe vaḥ devānām bṛhatām anarvaṇām

original: RV_10,036.11c yathā vasu vīrajātaṃ naśāmahai tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: yathā vasu vīra jātam naśāmahai tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.12a maho agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇy anāgā mitre varuṇe svastaye /
analyzed: mahaḥ agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇi anāgāḥ mitre varuṇe svastaye

original: RV_10,036.12c śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,036.13a ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ /
analyzed: ye savituḥ satya savasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ

original: RV_10,036.13c te saubhagaṃ vīravad gomad apno dadhātana draviṇaṃ citram asme //
analyzed: te saubhagam vīravat gomat apnaḥ dadhātana draviṇam citram asme

original: RV_10,036.14a savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitottarāttāt savitādharāttāt /
analyzed: savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitā uttarāttāt savitā adharāttāt

original: RV_10,036.14c savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātiṃ savitā no rāsatāṃ dīrgham āyuḥ //
analyzed: savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātim savitā naḥ rāsatām dīrgham āyuḥ

original: RV_10,037.01a namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃ saparyata /
analyzed: namaḥ mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase mahaḥ devāya tat ṛtam saparyata

original: RV_10,037.01c dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata //
analyzed: dūredṛśe deva jātāya ketave divaḥ putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata

original: RV_10,037.02a sā mā satyoktiḥ pari pātu viśvato dyāvā ca yatra tatanann ahāni ca /
analyzed: sā mā satya uktiḥ pari pātu viśvatas dyāvā ca yatra tatanan ahāni ca

original: RV_10,037.02c viśvam anyan ni viśate yad ejati viśvāhāpo viśvāhod eti sūryaḥ //
analyzed: viśvam anyat ni viśate yat ejati viśvāhā apaḥ viśvāhā ud eti sūryaḥ

original: RV_10,037.03a na te adevaḥ pradivo ni vāsate yad etaśebhiḥ patarai ratharyasi /
analyzed: na te adevaḥ pradivaḥ ni vāsate yat etaśebhiḥ pataraiḥ ratharyasi

original: RV_10,037.03c prācīnam anyad anu vartate raja ud anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya //
analyzed: prācīnam anyat anu vartate rajaḥ ud anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya

original: RV_10,037.04a yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamo jagac ca viśvam udiyarṣi bhānunā /
analyzed: yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamaḥ jagat ca viśvam udiyarṣi bhānunā

original: RV_10,037.04c tenāsmad viśvām anirām anāhutim apāmīvām apa duṣṣvapnyaṃ suva //
analyzed: tena asmat viśvām an irām an āhutim apa amīvām apa duṣṣvapnyam suva

original: RV_10,037.05a viśvasya hi preṣito rakṣasi vratam aheḷayann uccarasi svadhā anu /
analyzed: viśvasya hi preṣitaḥ rakṣasi vratam a heḍayan uccarasi svadhāḥ anu

original: RV_10,037.05c yad adya tvā sūryopabravāmahai taṃ no devā anu maṃsīrata kratum //
analyzed: yat adya tvā sūrya upabravāmahai tam naḥ devāḥ anu maṃsīrata kratum

original: RV_10,037.06a taṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī tan na āpa indraḥ śṛṇvantu maruto havaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: tam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī tat naḥ āpaḥ indraḥ śṛṇvantu marutaḥ havam vacaḥ

original: RV_10,037.06c mā śūne bhūma sūryasya saṃdṛśi bhadraṃ jīvanto jaraṇām aśīmahi //
analyzed: mā śūne bhūma sūryasya saṃdṛśi bhadram jīvantaḥ jaraṇām aśīmahi

original: RV_10,037.07a viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ sucakṣasaḥ prajāvanto anamīvā anāgasaḥ /
analyzed: viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ su cakṣasaḥ prajāvantaḥ anamīvāḥ anāgasaḥ

original: RV_10,037.07c udyantaṃ tvā mitramaho dive-dive jyog jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya //
analyzed: udyantam tvā mitra mahas dive dive jyok jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya

original: RV_10,037.08a mahi jyotir bibhrataṃ tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantaṃ cakṣuṣe-cakṣuṣe mayaḥ /
analyzed: mahi jyotiḥ bibhratam tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantam cakṣuṣe cakṣuṣe mayaḥ

original: RV_10,037.08c ārohantam bṛhataḥ pājasas pari vayaṃ jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya //
analyzed: ārohantam bṛhataḥ pājasaḥ pari vayam jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya

original: RV_10,037.09a yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśante aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśante aktubhiḥ

original: RV_10,037.09c anāgāstvena harikeśa sūryāhnāhnā no vasyasā-vasyasod ihi //
analyzed: anāgāstvena hari keśa sūrya ahnā ahnā naḥ vasyasā avasyasā ud ihi

original: RV_10,037.10a śaṃ no bhava cakṣasā śaṃ no ahnā śam bhānunā śaṃ himā śaṃ ghṛṇena /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhava cakṣasā śam naḥ ahnā śam bhānunā śam himā śam ghṛṇena

original: RV_10,037.10c yathā śam adhvañ cham asad duroṇe tat sūrya draviṇaṃ dhehi citram //
analyzed: yathā śam adhvam śam asat duroṇe tat sūrya draviṇam dhehi citram

original: RV_10,037.11a asmākaṃ devā ubhayāya janmane śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade /
analyzed: asmākam devāḥ ubhayāya janmane śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade

original: RV_10,037.11c adat pibad ūrjayamānam āśitaṃ tad asme śaṃ yor arapo dadhātana //
analyzed: adat pibat ūrjayamānam āśitam tat asme śam yos arapaḥ dadhātana

original: RV_10,037.12a yad vo devāś cakṛma jihvayā guru manaso vā prayutī devaheḷanam /
analyzed: yat vaḥ devāḥ cakṛma jihvayā guru manasaḥ vā prayutī deva heḍanam

original: RV_10,037.12c arāvā yo no abhi ducchunāyate tasmin tad eno vasavo ni dhetana //
analyzed: arāvā yaḥ naḥ abhi ducchunāyate tasmin tat enaḥ vasavaḥ ni dhetana

original: RV_10,038.01a asmin na indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāva sātaye /
analyzed: asmin naḥ indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāva sātaye

original: RV_10,038.01c yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvak patanti didyavo nṛṣāhye //
analyzed: yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvak patanti didyavaḥ nṛṣāhye

original: RV_10,038.02a sa naḥ kṣumantaṃ sadane vy ūrṇuhi goarṇasaṃ rayim indra śravāyyam /
analyzed: sa naḥ kṣumantam sadane vi ūrṇuhi go arṇasam rayim indra śravāyyam

original: RV_10,038.02c syāma te jayataḥ śakra medino yathā vayam uśmasi tad vaso kṛdhi //
analyzed: syāma te jayataḥ śakra medinaḥ yathā vayam uśmasi tat vaso kṛdhi

original: RV_10,038.03a yo no dāsa āryo vā puruṣṭutādeva indra yudhaye ciketati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dāsaḥ āryaḥ vā puruṣṭutādevaḥ indra yudhaye ciketati

original: RV_10,038.03c asmābhiṣ ṭe suṣahāḥ santu śatravas tvayā vayaṃ tān vanuyāma saṃgame //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ te suṣahāḥ santu śatravaḥ tvayā vayam tān vanuyāma saṃgame

original: RV_10,038.04a yo dabhrebhir havyo yaś ca bhūribhir yo abhīke varivovin nṛṣāhye /
analyzed: yaḥ dabhrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhūribhiḥ yaḥ abhīke varivaḥ vid nṛṣāhye

original: RV_10,038.04c taṃ vikhāde sasnim adya śrutaṃ naram arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe //
analyzed: tam vikhāde sasnim adya śrutam naram arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe

original: RV_10,038.05a svavṛjaṃ hi tvām aham indra śuśravānānudaṃ vṛṣabha radhracodanam /
analyzed: svavṛjam hi tvām aham indra śuśrava anānudam vṛṣabha radhra codanam

original: RV_10,038.05c pra muñcasva pari kutsād ihā gahi kim u tvāvān muṣkayor baddha āsate //
analyzed: pra muñcasva pari kutsāt iha ā gahi kim u tvāvān muṣkayoḥ baddhaḥ āsate

original: RV_10,039.01a yo vām parijmā suvṛd aśvinā ratho doṣām uṣāso havyo haviṣmatā /
analyzed: yaḥ vām parijmā suvṛt aśvinā rathaḥ doṣām uṣāsaḥ havyaḥ haviṣmatā

original: RV_10,039.01c śaśvattamāsas tam u vām idaṃ vayam pitur na nāma suhavaṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: śaśvattamāsaḥ tam u vām idam vayam pituḥ na nāma su havam havāmahe

original: RV_10,039.02a codayataṃ sūnṛtāḥ pinvataṃ dhiya ut purandhīr īrayataṃ tad uśmasi /
analyzed: codayatam sūnṛtāḥ pinvatam dhiyaḥ ud purandhīḥ īrayatam tat uśmasi

original: RV_10,039.02c yaśasam bhāgaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no aśvinā somaṃ na cārum maghavatsu nas kṛtam //
analyzed: yaśasam bhāgam kṛṇutam naḥ aśvinā somam na cārum maghavatsu naḥ kṛtam

original: RV_10,039.03a amājuraś cid bhavatho yuvam bhago 'nāśoś cid avitārāpamasya cit /
analyzed: amājuraḥ cit bhavathaḥ yuvam bhagaḥ nāśoḥ cit avitārā apamasya cit

original: RV_10,039.03c andhasya cin nāsatyā kṛśasya cid yuvām id āhur bhiṣajā rutasya cit //
analyzed: andhasya cit nāsatyā kṛśasya cit yuvām id āhuḥ bhiṣajā rutasya cit

original: RV_10,039.04a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ sanayaṃ yathā ratham punar yuvānaṃ carathāya takṣathuḥ /
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam sanayam yathā ratham punar yuvānam carathāya takṣathuḥ

original: RV_10,039.04c niṣ ṭaugryam ūhathur adbhyas pari viśvet tā vāṃ savaneṣu pravācyā //
analyzed: niḥ taugryam ūhathuḥ adbhyaḥ pari viśvā id tā vām savaneṣu pravācyā

original: RV_10,039.05a purāṇā vāṃ vīryā pra bravā jane 'tho hāsathur bhiṣajā mayobhuvā /
analyzed: purāṇā vām vīryā pra bravā jane thaḥ hāsathuḥ bhiṣajā mayobhuvā

original: RV_10,039.05c tā vāṃ nu navyāv avase karāmahe 'yaṃ nāsatyā śrad arir yathā dadhat //
analyzed: tā vām nu navyau avase karāmahe yam nāsatyā śrath ariḥ yathā dadhat

original: RV_10,039.06a iyaṃ vām ahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā putrāyeva pitarā mahyaṃ śikṣatam /
analyzed: iyam vām ahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā putrāya iva pitarā mahyam śikṣatam

original: RV_10,039.06c anāpir ajñā asajātyāmatiḥ purā tasyā abhiśaster ava spṛtam //
analyzed: an āpiḥ ajñāḥ asajātyā amatiḥ purā tasyāḥ abhiśasteḥ ava spṛtam

original: RV_10,039.07a yuvaṃ rathena vimadāya śundhyuvaṃ ny ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām /
analyzed: yuvam rathena vimadāya śundhyuvam ni ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām

original: RV_10,039.07c yuvaṃ havaṃ vadhrimatyā agacchataṃ yuvaṃ suṣutiṃ cakrathuḥ purandhaye //
analyzed: yuvam havam vadhrimatyāḥ agacchatam yuvam suṣutim cakrathuḥ purandhaye

original: RV_10,039.08a yuvaṃ viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ punaḥ kaler akṛṇutaṃ yuvad vayaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ punar kaleḥ akṛṇutam yuvat vayaḥ

original: RV_10,039.08c yuvaṃ vandanam ṛśyadād ud ūpathur yuvaṃ sadyo viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ //
analyzed: yuvam vandanam ṛśyadāt ud ūpathuḥ yuvam sadyas viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ

original: RV_10,039.09a yuvaṃ ha rebhaṃ vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam ud airayatam mamṛvāṃsam aśvinā /
analyzed: yuvam ha rebham vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam ud airayatam mamṛvāṃsam aśvinā

original: RV_10,039.09c yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptam atraya omanvantaṃ cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye //
analyzed: yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptam atraye omanvantam cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye

original: RV_10,039.10a yuvaṃ śvetam pedave 'śvināśvaṃ navabhir vājair navatī ca vājinam /
analyzed: yuvam śvetam pedave śvinā aśvam navabhiḥ vājaiḥ navatī ca vājinam

original: RV_10,039.10c carkṛtyaṃ dadathur drāvayatsakham bhagaṃ na nṛbhyo havyam mayobhuvam //
analyzed: carkṛtyam dadathuḥ drāvayat sakham bhagam na nṛbhyaḥ havyam mayobhuvam

original: RV_10,039.11a na taṃ rājānāv adite kutaś cana nāṃho aśnoti duritaṃ nakir bhayam /
analyzed: na tam rājānau adite kutas cana na aṃhaḥ aśnoti duritam nakir bhayam

original: RV_10,039.11c yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī purorathaṃ kṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha //
analyzed: yam aśvinā su havā rudravartanī puroratham kṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha

original: RV_10,039.12a ā tena yātam manaso javīyasā rathaṃ yaṃ vām ṛbhavaś cakrur aśvinā /
analyzed: ā tena yātam manasaḥ javīyasā ratham yam vām ṛbhavaḥ cakruḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10,039.12c yasya yoge duhitā jāyate diva ubhe ahanī sudine vivasvataḥ //
analyzed: yasya yoge duhitā jāyate divaḥ ubhe ahanī sudine vivasvataḥ

original: RV_10,039.13a tā vartir yātaṃ jayuṣā vi parvatam apinvataṃ śayave dhenum aśvinā /
analyzed: tā vartiḥ yātam jayuṣā vi parvatam apinvatam śayave dhenum aśvinā

original: RV_10,039.13c vṛkasya cid vartikām antar āsyād yuvaṃ śacībhir grasitām amuñcatam //
analyzed: vṛkasya cit vartikām antar āsyāt yuvam śacībhiḥ grasitām amuñcatam

original: RV_10,039.14a etaṃ vāṃ stomam aśvināv akarmātakṣāma bhṛgavo na ratham /
analyzed: etam vām stomam aśvinau akarma atakṣāma bhṛgavaḥ na ratham

original: RV_10,039.14c ny amṛkṣāma yoṣaṇāṃ na marye nityaṃ na sūnuṃ tanayaṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: ni amṛkṣāma yoṣaṇām na marye nityam na sūnum tanayam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,040.01a rathaṃ yāntaṃ kuha ko ha vāṃ narā prati dyumantaṃ suvitāya bhūṣati /
analyzed: ratham yāntam kuha kaḥ ha vām narā prati dyumantam suvitāya bhūṣati

original: RV_10,040.01c prātaryāvāṇaṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśe vastor-vastor vahamānaṃ dhiyā śami //
analyzed: prātaryāvāṇam vibhvam viśeviśe vastoḥ vastoḥ vahamānam dhiyā śami

original: RV_10,040.02a kuha svid doṣā kuha vastor aśvinā kuhābhipitvaṃ karataḥ kuhoṣatuḥ /
analyzed: kuha svid doṣā kuha vastoḥ aśvinā kuha abhipitvam karataḥ kuha uṣatuḥ

original: RV_10,040.02c ko vāṃ śayutrā vidhaveva devaram maryaṃ na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhastha ā //
analyzed: kaḥ vām śayutrā vidhavā iva devaram maryam na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhasthe ā

original: RV_10,040.03a prātar jarethe jaraṇeva kāpayā vastor-vastor yajatā gacchatho gṛham /
analyzed: prātar jarethe jaraṇā iva kāpayā vastoḥ vastoḥ yajatā gacchathaḥ gṛham

original: RV_10,040.03c kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rājaputreva savanāva gacchathaḥ //
analyzed: kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rāja putrā iva savanā ava gacchathaḥ

original: RV_10,040.04a yuvām mṛgeva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavo doṣā vastor haviṣā ni hvayāmahe /
analyzed: yuvām mṛgā iva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavaḥ doṣā vastoḥ haviṣā ni hvayāmahe

original: RV_10,040.04c yuvaṃ hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate nareṣaṃ janāya vahathaḥ śubhas patī //
analyzed: yuvam hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate narā iṣam janāya vahathaḥ śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_10,040.05a yuvāṃ ha ghoṣā pary aśvinā yatī rājña ūce duhitā pṛcche vāṃ narā /
analyzed: yuvām ha ghoṣā pari aśvinā yatī rājñaḥ ūce duhitā pṛcche vām narā

original: RV_10,040.05c bhūtam me ahna uta bhūtam aktave 'śvāvate rathine śaktam arvate //
analyzed: bhūtam me ahne uta bhūtam aktave śvāvate rathine śaktam arvate

original: RV_10,040.06a yuvaṃ kavī ṣṭhaḥ pary aśvinā rathaṃ viśo na kutso jaritur naśāyathaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam kavī ṣṭhaḥ pari aśvinā ratham viśaḥ na kutsaḥ jarituḥ naśāyathaḥ

original: RV_10,040.06c yuvor ha makṣā pary aśvinā madhv āsā bharata niṣkṛtaṃ na yoṣaṇā //
analyzed: yuvoḥ ha makṣā pari aśvinā madhu āsā bharata niṣkṛtam na yoṣaṇā

original: RV_10,040.07a yuvaṃ ha bhujyuṃ yuvam aśvinā vaśaṃ yuvaṃ śiñjāram uśanām upārathuḥ /
analyzed: yuvam ha bhujyum yuvam aśvinā vaśam yuvam śiñjāram uśanām upārathuḥ

original: RV_10,040.07c yuvo rarāvā pari sakhyam āsate yuvor aham avasā sumnam ā cake //
analyzed: yuvoḥ rarāvā pari sakhyam āsate yuvoḥ aham avasā sumnam ā cake

original: RV_10,040.08a yuvaṃ ha kṛśaṃ yuvam aśvinā śayuṃ yuvaṃ vidhantaṃ vidhavām uruṣyathaḥ /
analyzed: yuvam ha kṛśam yuvam aśvinā śayum yuvam vidhantam vidhavām uruṣyathaḥ
