original: RV_10,064.13a kuvid aṅga prati yathā cid asya naḥ sajātyasya maruto bubodhatha /
analyzed: kuvid aṅga prati yathā cit asya naḥ sajātyasya marutaḥ bubodhatha

original: RV_10,064.13c nābhā yatra prathamaṃ saṃnasāmahe tatra jāmitvam aditir dadhātu naḥ //
analyzed: nābhā yatra prathamam saṃnasāmahe tatra jāmi tvam aditiḥ dadhātu naḥ

original: RV_10,064.14a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devāñ janmanā yajñiye itaḥ /
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devām janmanā yajñiye itaḥ

original: RV_10,064.14c ubhe bibhṛta ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purū retāṃsi pitṛbhiś ca siñcataḥ //
analyzed: ubhe bibhṛtaḥ ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purū retāṃsi pitṛbhiḥ ca siñcataḥ

original: RV_10,064.15a vi ṣā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatir aramatiḥ panīyasī /
analyzed: vi sā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatiḥ aramatiḥ panīyasī

original: RV_10,064.15c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad avīvaśanta matibhir manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate bṛhat avīvaśanta matibhiḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_10,064.16a evā kavis tuvīravāṃ ṛtajñā draviṇasyur draviṇasaś cakānaḥ /
analyzed: eva kaviḥ tuvīravān ṛta jñāḥ draviṇasyuḥ draviṇasaḥ cakānaḥ

original: RV_10,064.16c ukthebhir atra matibhiś ca vipro 'pīpayad gayo divyāni janma //
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ atra matibhiḥ ca vipraḥ pīpayat gayaḥ divyāni janma

original: RV_10,064.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī /
analyzed: eva plateḥ sūnuḥ avīvṛdhat vaḥ viśve ādityāḥ adite manīṣī

original: RV_10,064.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena //
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ naraḥ amartyena astāvi janaḥ divyaḥ gayena

original: RV_10,065.01a agnir indro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,065.01c ādityā viṣṇur marutaḥ svar bṛhat somo rudro aditir brahmaṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: ādityāḥ viṣṇuḥ marutaḥ svar bṛhat somaḥ rudraḥ aditiḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10,065.02a indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī mitho hinvānā tanvā samokasā /
analyzed: indra agnī vṛtra hatyeṣu sat patī mithas hinvānā tanvā samokasā

original: RV_10,065.02c antarikṣam mahy ā paprur ojasā somo ghṛtaśrīr mahimānam īrayan //
analyzed: antarikṣam mahi ā papruḥ ojasā somaḥ ghṛtaśrīḥ mahimānam īrayan

original: RV_10,065.03a teṣāṃ hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇāṃ stomāṃ iyarmy ṛtajñā ṛtāvṛdhām /
analyzed: teṣām hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇām stomān iyarmi ṛta jñāḥ ṛtāvṛdhām

original: RV_10,065.03c ye apsavam arṇavaṃ citrarādhasas te no rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ //
analyzed: ye apsavam arṇavam citra rādhasaḥ te naḥ rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ

original: RV_10,065.04a svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīṃ skambhur ojasā /
analyzed: svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīm skambhuḥ ojasā

original: RV_10,065.04c pṛkṣā iva mahayantaḥ surātayo devā stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: pṛkṣāḥ iva mahayantaḥ su rātayaḥ devā stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ

original: RV_10,065.05a mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ /
analyzed: mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ

original: RV_10,065.05c yayor dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhad yayor ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau //
analyzed: yayoḥ dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhat yayoḥ ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau

original: RV_10,065.06a yā gaur vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payo duhānā vratanīr avārataḥ /
analyzed: yā gauḥ vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payaḥ duhānā vratanīḥ avāratas

original: RV_10,065.06c sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyo dāśad dhaviṣā vivasvate //
analyzed: sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyaḥ dāśat haviṣā vivasvate

original: RV_10,065.07a divakṣaso agnijihvā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtasya yoniṃ vimṛśanta āsate /
analyzed: divakṣasaḥ agni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtasya yonim vimṛśantaḥ āsate

original: RV_10,065.07c dyāṃ skabhitvy apa ā cakrur ojasā yajñaṃ janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ //
analyzed: dyām skabhitvī apaḥ ā cakruḥ ojasā yajñam janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ

original: RV_10,065.08a parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā /
analyzed: parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā

original: RV_10,065.08c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payo mahiṣāya pinvataḥ //
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payaḥ mahiṣāya pinvataḥ

original: RV_10,065.09a parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇendravāyū varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇā indra vāyū varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,065.09c devāṃ ādityāṃ aditiṃ havāmahe ye pārthivāso divyāso apsu ye //
analyzed: devām ādityām aditim havāmahe ye pārthivāsaḥ divyāsaḥ apsu ye

original: RV_10,065.10a tvaṣṭāraṃ vāyum ṛbhavo ya ohate daivyā hotārā uṣasaṃ svastaye /
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram vāyum ṛbhavaḥ yaḥ ohate daivyā hotārau uṣasam svastaye

original: RV_10,065.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛtrakhādaṃ sumedhasam indriyaṃ somaṃ dhanasā u īmahe //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛtra khādam sumedhasam indriyam somam dhana sāḥ u īmahe

original: RV_10,065.11a brahma gām aśvaṃ janayanta oṣadhīr vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatāṃ apaḥ /
analyzed: brahma gām aśvam janayantaḥ oṣadhīḥ vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatān apaḥ

original: RV_10,065.11c sūryaṃ divi rohayantaḥ sudānava āryā vratā visṛjanto adhi kṣami //
analyzed: sūryam divi rohayantaḥ sudānavaḥ āryā vratā visṛjantaḥ adhi kṣami

original: RV_10,065.12a bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛtho nir aśvinā śyāvam putraṃ vadhrimatyā ajinvatam /
analyzed: bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛthaḥ niḥ aśvinā śyāvam putram vadhrimatyāḥ ajinvatam

original: RV_10,065.12c kamadyuvaṃ vimadāyohathur yuvaṃ viṣṇāpvaṃ viśvakāyāva sṛjathaḥ //
analyzed: kamadyuvam vimadāya ūhathuḥ yuvam viṣṇāpvam viśvakāya ava sṛjathaḥ

original: RV_10,065.13a pāvīravī tanyatur ekapād ajo divo dhartā sindhur āpaḥ samudriyaḥ /
analyzed: pāvīravī tanyatuḥ ekapād ajaḥ divaḥ dhartā sindhuḥ āpaḥ samudriyaḥ

original: RV_10,065.13c viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā //
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā

original: RV_10,065.14a viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_10,065.14c rātiṣāco abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ svar giro brahma sūktaṃ juṣerata //
analyzed: rātiṣācaḥ abhiṣācaḥ svar vidaḥ svar giraḥ brahma sūktam juṣerata

original: RV_10,065.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ /
analyzed: devān vasiṣṭhaḥ amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanā abhi pratasthuḥ

original: RV_10,065.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10,066.01a devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛto adhvarasya pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: devān huve bṛhat śravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛtaḥ adhvarasya pracetasaḥ

original: RV_10,066.01c ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataraṃ viśvavedasa indrajyeṣṭhāso amṛtā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataram viśva vedasaḥ indra jyeṣṭhāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10,066.02a indraprasūtā varuṇapraśiṣṭā ye sūryasya jyotiṣo bhāgam ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: indra prasūtāḥ varuṇa praśiṣṭāḥ ye sūryasya jyotiṣaḥ bhāgam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10,066.02c marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃ janayanta sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: marut gaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñam janayanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_10,066.03a indro vasubhiḥ pari pātu no gayam ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yacchatu /
analyzed: indraḥ vasubhiḥ pari pātu naḥ gayam ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_10,066.03c rudro rudrebhir devo mṛḷayāti nas tvaṣṭā no gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu //
analyzed: rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ devaḥ mṛḍayāti naḥ tvaṣṭā naḥ gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu

original: RV_10,066.04a aditir dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahad indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat /
analyzed: aditiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahat indrā viṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat

original: RV_10,066.04c devāṃ ādityāṃ avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāraṃ sudaṃsasam //
analyzed: devām ādityām avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāram su daṃsasam

original: RV_10,066.05a sarasvān dhībhir varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇur mahimā vāyur aśvinā /
analyzed: sarasvān dhībhiḥ varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇuḥ mahimā vāyuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10,066.05c brahmakṛto amṛtā viśvavedasaḥ śarma no yaṃsan trivarūtham aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: brahma kṛtaḥ amṛtāḥ viśva vedasaḥ śarma naḥ yaṃsan tri varūtham aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10,066.06a vṛṣā yajño vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyā vṛṣaṇo devā vṛṣaṇo haviṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā yajñaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ devāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10,066.06c vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyo vṛṣaṇo vṛṣastubhaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣa stubhaḥ

original: RV_10,066.07a agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye purupraśastā vṛṣaṇā upa bruve /
analyzed: agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye puru praśastā vṛṣaṇā upa bruve

original: RV_10,066.07c yāv ījire vṛṣaṇo devayajyayā tā naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsataḥ //
analyzed: yau ījire vṛṣaṇaḥ deva yajyayā tā naḥ śarma tri varūtham vi yaṃsataḥ

original: RV_10,066.08a dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyā yajñaniṣkṛto bṛhaddivā adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛta vratāḥ kṣatriyāḥ yajña niṣkṛtaḥ bṛhat divāḥ adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ

original: RV_10,066.08c agnihotāra ṛtasāpo adruho 'po asṛjann anu vṛtratūrye //
analyzed: agni hotāraḥ ṛtasāpaḥ adruhaḥ asṛjan anu vṛtratūrye

original: RV_10,066.09a dyāvāpṛthivī janayann abhi vratāpa oṣadhīr vanināni yajñiyā /
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī janayan abhi vratā apaḥ oṣadhīḥ vanināni yajñiyā

original: RV_10,066.09c antarikṣaṃ svar ā paprur ūtaye vaśaṃ devāsas tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ //
analyzed: antarikṣam svar ā papruḥ ūtaye vaśam devāsaḥ tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ

original: RV_10,066.10a dhartāro diva ṛbhavaḥ suhastā vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ /
analyzed: dhartāraḥ divaḥ ṛbhavaḥ su hastāḥ vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ

original: RV_10,066.10c āpa oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu no giro bhago rātir vājino yantu me havam //
analyzed: āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu naḥ giraḥ bhagaḥ rātiḥ vājinaḥ yantu me havam

original: RV_10,066.11a samudraḥ sindhū rajo antarikṣam aja ekapāt tanayitnur arṇavaḥ /
analyzed: samudraḥ sindhuḥ rajaḥ antarikṣam ajaḥ ekapād tanayitnuḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_10,066.11c ahir budhnyaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me viśve devāsa uta sūrayo mama //
analyzed: ahiḥ budhnyaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṃsi me viśve devāsaḥ uta sūrayaḥ mama

original: RV_10,066.12a syāma vo manavo devavītaye prāñcaṃ no yajñam pra ṇayata sādhuyā /
analyzed: syāma vaḥ manavaḥ deva vītaye prāñcam naḥ yajñam pra nayata sādhuyā

original: RV_10,066.12c ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sudānava imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata //
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata

original: RV_10,066.13a daivyā hotārā prathamā purohita ṛtasya panthām anv emi sādhuyā /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā purohitaḥ ṛtasya panthām anu emi sādhuyā

original: RV_10,066.13c kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devāṃ amṛtāṃ aprayucchataḥ //
analyzed: kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devān amṛtām aprayucchataḥ

original: RV_10,066.14a vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛvad vācam akrata devāṃ īḷānā ṛṣivat svastaye /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛ vat vācam akrata devān īḍānāḥ ṛṣi vat svastaye

original: RV_10,066.14c prītā iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etyāsme devāso 'va dhūnutā vasu //
analyzed: prītāḥ iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etya asme devāsaḥ vaḥ dhūnutā vasu

original: RV_10,066.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ /
analyzed: devān vasiṣṭhaḥ amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanā abhi pratasthuḥ

original: RV_10,066.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10,067.01a imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīm pitā na ṛtaprajātām bṛhatīm avindat /
analyzed: imām dhiyam sapta śīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ ṛta prajātām bṛhatīm avindat

original: RV_10,067.01c turīyaṃ svij janayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya uktham indrāya śaṃsan //
analyzed: turīyam svid janayat viśvajanyaḥ yā asyaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsan

original: RV_10,067.02a ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ

original: RV_10,067.02c vipram padam aṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta //
analyzed: vipram padam aṅgirasaḥ dadhānāḥ yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta

original: RV_10,067.03a haṃsair iva sakhibhir vāvadadbhir aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan /
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan

original: RV_10,067.03c bṛhaspatir abhikanikradad gā uta prāstaud uc ca vidvāṃ agāyat //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ uta prāstaut ud ca vidvān agāyat

original: RV_10,067.04a avo dvābhyām para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīr anṛtasya setau /
analyzed: avas dvābhyām paras ekayā gāḥ guhā tiṣṭhantīḥ anṛtasya setau

original: RV_10,067.04c bṛhaspatis tamasi jyotir icchann ud usrā ākar vi hi tisra āvaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tamasi jyotiḥ icchan ud usrāḥ ākaḥ vi hi tisraḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_10,067.05a vibhidyā puraṃ śayathem apācīṃ nis trīṇi sākam udadher akṛntat /
analyzed: vibhidya puram śayatha īm apācīm niḥ trīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat

original: RV_10,067.05c bṛhaspatir uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām arkaṃ viveda stanayann iva dyauḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uṣasam sūryam gām arkam viveda stanayan iva dyauḥ

original: RV_10,067.06a indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartā raveṇa /
analyzed: indraḥ valam rakṣitāram dughānām kareṇa iva vi cakarta raveṇa

original: RV_10,067.06c svedāñjibhir āśiram icchamāno 'rodayat paṇim ā gā amuṣṇāt //
analyzed: sveda añjibhiḥ āśiram icchamānaḥ rodayat paṇim ā gāḥ amuṣṇāt

original: RV_10,067.07a sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhir godhāyasaṃ vi dhanasair adardaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ godhāyasam vi dhanasaiḥ adardar

original: RV_10,067.07c brahmaṇas patir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ vy ānaṭ //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ varāhaiḥ gharma svedebhiḥ draviṇam vi ānaṭ

original: RV_10,067.08a te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ /
analyzed: te satyena manasā gopatim gāḥ iyānāsaḥ iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ

original: RV_10,067.08c bṛhaspatir mithoavadyapebhir ud usriyā asṛjata svayugbhiḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ mithoavadyapebhiḥ ud usriyāḥ asṛjata sva yugbhiḥ

original: RV_10,067.09a taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadataṃ sadhasthe /
analyzed: tam vardhayantaḥ matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadatam sadhasthe

original: RV_10,067.09c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bhare-bhare anu madema jiṣṇum //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam śūrasātau bharebhare anu madema jiṣṇum

original: RV_10,067.10a yadā vājam asanad viśvarūpam ā dyām arukṣad uttarāṇi sadma /
analyzed: yadā vājam asanat viśva rūpam ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma

original: RV_10,067.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santo bibhrato jyotir āsā //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā

original: RV_10,067.11a satyām āśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhy avatha svebhir evaiḥ /
analyzed: satyām āśiṣam kṛṇutā vayodhai kīrim cit hi avatha svebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_10,067.11c paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvās tad rodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve //
analyzed: paścā mṛdhaḥ apa bhavantu viśvāḥ tat rodasī śṛṇutam viśvaminve

original: RV_10,067.12a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinad arbudasya /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya

original: RV_10,067.12c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
analyzed: ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ

original: RV_10,068.01a udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ /
analyzed: uda prutaḥ na vayaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ vāvadataḥ abhriyasya iva ghoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,068.01c giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatim abhy arkā anāvan //
analyzed: giri bhrajaḥ nā ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ bṛhaspatim abhi arkāḥ anāvan

original: RV_10,068.02a saṃ gobhir āṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ived aryamaṇaṃ nināya /
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ āṅgirasaḥ nakṣamāṇaḥ bhagaḥ iva id aryamaṇam nināya

original: RV_10,068.02c jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr ivājau //
analyzed: jane mitraḥ na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājaya āśūn iva ājau

original: RV_10,068.03a sādhvaryā atithinīr iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇā anavadyarūpāḥ /
analyzed: sādhvaryāḥ atithinīḥ iṣirāḥ spārhāḥ su varṇāḥ anavadya rūpāḥ

original: RV_10,068.03c bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyo vitūryā nir gā ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyaḥ vitūrya niḥ gāḥ ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ

original: RV_10,068.04a āpruṣāyan madhuna ṛtasya yonim avakṣipann arka ulkām iva dyoḥ /
analyzed: āpruṣāyan madhunaḥ ṛtasya yonim avakṣipan arkaḥ ulkām iva dyoḥ

original: RV_10,068.04c bṛhaspatir uddharann aśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vi tvacam bibheda //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uddharan aśmanaḥ gāḥ bhūmyāḥ udnā iva vi tvacam bibheda

original: RV_10,068.05a apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣād udnaḥ śīpālam iva vāta ājat /
analyzed: apa jyotiṣā tamaḥ antarikṣāt udnaḥ śīpālam iva vātaḥ ājat

original: RV_10,068.05c bṛhaspatir anumṛśyā valasyābhram iva vāta ā cakra ā gāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ anumṛśya valasya abhram iva vātaḥ ā cakre ā gāḥ

original: RV_10,068.06a yadā valasya pīyato jasum bhed bṛhaspatir agnitapobhir arkaiḥ /
analyzed: yadā valasya pīyataḥ jasum bhet bṛhaspatiḥ agni tapobhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_10,068.06c dadbhir na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādad āvir nidhīṃr akṛṇod usriyāṇām //
analyzed: dadbhiḥ na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādat āvis nidhīṃr akṛṇot usriyāṇām

original: RV_10,068.07a bṛhaspatir amata hi tyad āsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadane guhā yat /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ amata hi tyad āsām nāma svarīṇām sadane guhā yat

original: RV_10,068.07c āṇḍeva bhittvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanājat //
analyzed: āṇḍā iva bhittvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanā ajat

original: RV_10,068.08a aśnāpinaddham madhu pary apaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udani kṣiyantam /
analyzed: aśnā apinaddham madhu pari apaśyat matsyam na dīne udani kṣiyantam

original: RV_10,068.08c niṣ ṭaj jabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣād bṛhaspatir viraveṇā vikṛtya //
analyzed: niḥ tat jabhāra camasam na vṛkṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ viraveṇa vikṛtya

original: RV_10,068.09a soṣām avindat sa svaḥ so agniṃ so arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi /
analyzed: sa uṣām avindat sa svar saḥ agnim saḥ arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi

original: RV_10,068.09c bṛhaspatir govapuṣo valasya nir majjānaṃ na parvaṇo jabhāra //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ go vapuṣaḥ valasya niḥ majjānam na parvaṇaḥ jabhāra

original: RV_10,068.10a himeva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinākṛpayad valo gāḥ /
analyzed: himā iva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinā akṛpayat valaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_10,068.10c anānukṛtyam apunaś cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mitha uccarātaḥ //
analyzed: anānukṛtyam apunar cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mithas uccarātaḥ

original: RV_10,068.11a abhi śyāvaṃ na kṛśanebhir aśvaṃ nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaro dyām apiṃśan /
analyzed: abhi śyāvam na kṛśanebhiḥ aśvam nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaraḥ dyām apiṃśan

original: RV_10,068.11c rātryāṃ tamo adadhur jyotir ahan bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ //
analyzed: rātryām tamaḥ adadhuḥ jyotiḥ ahan bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ

original: RV_10,068.12a idam akarma namo abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīr anv ānonavīti /
analyzed: idam akarma namaḥ abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīḥ anu ānonavīti

original: RV_10,068.12c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ so aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhir no vayo dhāt //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ saḥ aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhiḥ naḥ vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_10,069.01a bhadrā agner vadhryaśvasya saṃdṛśo vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇā upetayaḥ /
analyzed: bhadrāḥ agneḥ vadhryaśvasya saṃdṛśaḥ vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇāḥ upetayaḥ

original: RV_10,069.01c yad īṃ sumitrā viśo agra indhate ghṛtenāhuto jarate davidyutat //
analyzed: yat īm sumitrāḥ viśaḥ agre indhate ghṛtena āhutaḥ jarate davidyutat

original: RV_10,069.02a ghṛtam agner vadhryaśvasya vardhanaṃ ghṛtam annaṃ ghṛtam v asya medanam /
analyzed: ghṛtam agneḥ vadhryaśvasya vardhanam ghṛtam annam ghṛtam u asya medanam

original: RV_10,069.02c ghṛtenāhuta urviyā vi paprathe sūrya iva rocate sarpirāsutiḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtena āhutaḥ urviyā vi paprathe sūryaḥ iva rocate sarpiḥ āsutiḥ

original: RV_10,069.03a yat te manur yad anīkaṃ sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tad idaṃ navīyaḥ /
analyzed: yat te manuḥ yat anīkam sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tat idam navīyaḥ

original: RV_10,069.03c sa revac choca sa giro juṣasva sa vājaṃ darṣi sa iha śravo dhāḥ //
analyzed: sa revat śoca sa giraḥ juṣasva sa vājam darṣi saḥ iha śravaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_10,069.04a yaṃ tvā pūrvam īḷito vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne sa idaṃ juṣasva /
analyzed: yam tvā pūrvam īḍitaḥ vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne saḥ idam juṣasva

original: RV_10,069.04c sa na stipā uta bhavā tanūpā dātraṃ rakṣasva yad idaṃ te asme //
analyzed: sa na stipāḥ uta bhava tanū pāḥ dātram rakṣasva yat idam te asme

original: RV_10,069.05a bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśvota gopā mā tvā tārīd abhimātir janānām /
analyzed: bhava dyumnī vādhryaśva uta gopāḥ mā tvā tārīt abhimātiḥ janānām

original: RV_10,069.05c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nu vocaṃ vādhryaśvasya nāma //
analyzed: śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nu vocam vādhryaśvasya nāma

original: RV_10,069.06a sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā jigetha /
analyzed: sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇi āryā jigetha

original: RV_10,069.06c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavano janānāṃ tvam agne pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyāḥ //
analyzed: śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ janānām tvam agne pṛtanāyūn abhi syāḥ

original: RV_10,069.07a dīrghatantur bṛhadukṣāyam agniḥ sahasrastarīḥ śatanītha ṛbhvā /
analyzed: dīrgha tantuḥ bṛhat ukṣā ayam agniḥ sahasra starīḥ śata nīthaḥ ṛbhvā

original: RV_10,069.07c dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayo devayatsu //
analyzed: dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhiḥ mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayaḥ devayatsu

original: RV_10,069.08a tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedo 'saścateva samanā sabardhuk /
analyzed: tve dhenuḥ su dughā jātavedaḥ saścatā iva samanā sabarduh

original: RV_10,069.08c tvaṃ nṛbhir dakṣiṇāvadbhir agne sumitrebhir idhyase devayadbhiḥ //
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ dakṣiṇāvadbhiḥ agne sumitrebhiḥ idhyase devayadbhiḥ

original: RV_10,069.09a devāś cit te amṛtā jātavedo mahimānaṃ vādhryaśva pra vocan /
analyzed: devāḥ cit te amṛtāḥ jātavedaḥ mahimānam vādhryaśva pra vocan

original: RV_10,069.09c yat sampṛccham mānuṣīr viśa āyan tvaṃ nṛbhir ajayas tvāvṛdhebhiḥ //
analyzed: yat sampṛccham mānuṣīḥ viśaḥ āyan tvam nṛbhiḥ ajayaḥ tvāvṛdhebhiḥ

original: RV_10,069.10a piteva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan /
analyzed: pitā iva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan

original: RV_10,069.10c juṣāṇo asya samidhaṃ yaviṣṭhota pūrvāṃ avanor vrādhataś cit //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ asya samidham yaviṣṭha uta pūrvām avanoḥ vrādhataḥ cit

original: RV_10,069.11a śaśvad agnir vadhryaśvasya śatrūn nṛbhir jigāya sutasomavadbhiḥ /
analyzed: śaśvat agniḥ vadhryaśvasya śatrūn nṛbhiḥ jigāya suta somavadbhiḥ

original: RV_10,069.11c samanaṃ cid adahaś citrabhāno 'va vrādhantam abhinad vṛdhaś cit //
analyzed: samanam cit adahaḥ citrabhāno vaḥ vrādhantam abhinat vṛdhaḥ cit

original: RV_10,069.12a ayam agnir vadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā sanakāt preddho namasopavākyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ vadhryaśvasya vṛtra hā sanakāt preddhaḥ namasā upavākyaḥ

original: RV_10,069.12c sa no ajāmīṃr uta vā vijāmīn abhi tiṣṭha śardhato vādhryaśva //
analyzed: sa naḥ ajāmīn uta vā vijāmīn abhi tiṣṭha śardhataḥ vādhryaśva

original: RV_10,070.01a imām me agne samidhaṃ juṣasveḷas pade prati haryā ghṛtācīm /
analyzed: imām me agne samidham juṣasva iḷaḥ pade prati harya ghṛtācīm

original: RV_10,070.01c varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnām ūrdhvo bhava sukrato devayajyā //
analyzed: varṣman pṛthivyāḥ su dina tve ahnām ūrdhvaḥ bhava su krato deva yajyā

original: RV_10,070.02a ā devānām agrayāveha yātu narāśaṃso viśvarūpebhir aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: ā devānām agra yāvā iha yātu narāśaṃsaḥ viśva rūpebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_10,070.02c ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedho devebhyo devatamaḥ suṣūdat //
analyzed: ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedhaḥ devebhyaḥ devatamaḥ suṣūdat

original: RV_10,070.03a śaśvattamam īḷate dūtyāya haviṣmanto manuṣyāso agnim /
analyzed: śaśvattamam īḍate dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ manuṣyāsaḥ agnim

original: RV_10,070.03c vahiṣṭhair aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathenā devān vakṣi ni ṣadeha hotā //
analyzed: vahiṣṭhaiḥ aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena devān vakṣi ni sada iha hotā

original: RV_10,070.04a vi prathatāṃ devajuṣṭaṃ tiraścā dīrghaṃ drāghmā surabhi bhūtv asme /
analyzed: vi prathatām deva juṣṭam tiraścā dīrgham drāghmā surabhi bhūtu asme

original: RV_10,070.04c aheḷatā manasā deva barhir indrajyeṣṭhāṃ uśato yakṣi devān //
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā deva barhiḥ indra jyeṣṭhām uśataḥ yakṣi devān

original: RV_10,070.05a divo vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ pṛthivyā vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam /
analyzed: divaḥ vā sānu spṛśata varīyaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam

original: RV_10,070.05c uśatīr dvāro mahinā mahadbhir devaṃ rathaṃ rathayur dhārayadhvam //
analyzed: uśatīḥ dvāraḥ mahinā mahadbhiḥ devam ratham rathayuḥ dhārayadhvam

original: RV_10,070.06a devī divo duhitarā suśilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /
analyzed: devī divaḥ duhitarā su śilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau

original: RV_10,070.06c ā vāṃ devāsa uśatī uśanta urau sīdantu subhage upasthe //
analyzed: ā vām devāsaḥ uśatī uśantaḥ urau sīdantu subhage upasthe

original: RV_10,070.07a ūrdhvo grāvā bṛhad agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāny aditer upasthe /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ grāvā bṛhat agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāni aditeḥ upasthe

original: RV_10,070.07c purohitāv ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā draviṇam ā yajethām //
analyzed: purohitau ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā draviṇam ā yajethām

original: RV_10,070.08a tisro devīr barhir idaṃ varīya ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥ syonam /
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ idam varīyaḥ ā sīdata cakṛma vaḥ syonam

original: RV_10,070.08c manuṣvad yajñaṃ sudhitā havīṃṣīḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta //
analyzed: manuṣvat yajñam sudhitā havīṃṣi iḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta

original: RV_10,070.09a deva tvaṣṭar yad dha cārutvam ānaḍ yad aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ /
analyzed: deva tvaṣṭar yat ha cāru tvam ānaṭ yat aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ

original: RV_10,070.09c sa devānām pātha upa pra vidvāṃ uśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ //
analyzed: sa devānām pāthaḥ upa pra vidvān uśan yakṣi draviṇaḥ daḥ su ratnaḥ

original: RV_10,070.10a vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānām pātha upa vakṣi vidvān /
analyzed: vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānām pāthaḥ upa vakṣi vidvān

original: RV_10,070.10c svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavad dhavīṃṣy avatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī havam me //
analyzed: svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavat havīṃṣi avatām dyāvāpṛthivī havam me

original: RV_10,070.11a āgne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye na indraṃ divo maruto antarikṣāt /
analyzed: ā agne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye naḥ indram divaḥ marutaḥ antarikṣāt

original: RV_10,070.11c sīdantu barhir viśva ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
analyzed: sīdantu barhiḥ viśve ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām

original: RV_10,071.01a bṛhaspate prathamaṃ vāco agraṃ yat prairata nāmadheyaṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspate prathamam vācaḥ agram yat prairata nāmadheyam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,071.01c yad eṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yad aripram āsīt preṇā tad eṣāṃ nihitaṃ guhāviḥ //
analyzed: yat eṣām śreṣṭham yat aripram āsīt preṇā tat eṣām nihitam guhā āvis

original: RV_10,071.02a saktum iva titaunā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācam akrata /
analyzed: saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vācam akrata

original: RV_10,071.02c atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃ lakṣmīr nihitādhi vāci //
analyzed: atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci

original: RV_10,071.03a yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anv avindann ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām /
analyzed: yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anu avindan ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām

original: RV_10,071.03c tām ābhṛtyā vy adadhuḥ purutrā tāṃ sapta rebhā abhi saṃ navante //
analyzed: tām ābhṛtyāḥ vi adadhuḥ purutrā tām sapta rebhāḥ abhi sam navante

original: RV_10,071.04a uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoty enām /
analyzed: uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoti enām

original: RV_10,071.04c uto tvasmai tanvaṃ vi sasre jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ //
analyzed: uta u tvasmai tanvam vi sasre jāyā iva patye uśatī su vāsāḥ

original: RV_10,071.05a uta tvaṃ sakhye sthirapītam āhur nainaṃ hinvanty api vājineṣu /
analyzed: uta tvam sakhye sthira pītam āhuḥ na enam hinvanti api vājineṣu

original: RV_10,071.05c adhenvā carati māyayaiṣa vācaṃ śuśruvāṃ aphalām apuṣpām //
analyzed: a dhenvā carati māyayā eṣa vācam śuśruvām aphalām apuṣpām

original: RV_10,071.06a yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti /
analyzed: yaḥ tityāja sacividam sakhāyam na tasya vāci api bhāgaḥ asti

original: RV_10,071.06c yad īṃ śṛṇoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām //
analyzed: yat īm śṛṇoti alakam śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām

original: RV_10,071.07a akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyo manojaveṣv asamā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ manaḥ javeṣu asamāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: RV_10,071.07c ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre //
analyzed: ādaghnāsaḥ upakakṣāsaḥ u tve hradāḥ iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre

original: RV_10,071.08a hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manaso javeṣu yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manasaḥ javeṣu yat brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,071.08c atrāha tvaṃ vi jahur vedyābhir ohabrahmāṇo vi caranty u tve //
analyzed: atra aha tvam vi jahuḥ vedyābhiḥ oha brahmāṇaḥ vi caranti u tve

original: RV_10,071.09a ime ye nārvāṅ na paraś caranti na brāhmaṇāso na sutekarāsaḥ /
analyzed: ime ye na arvāk na paras caranti na brāhmaṇāsaḥ na sutekarāsaḥ

original: RV_10,071.09c ta ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīs tantraṃ tanvate aprajajñayaḥ //
analyzed: te ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīḥ tantram tanvate aprajajñayaḥ

original: RV_10,071.10a sarve nandanti yaśasāgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: sarve nandanti yaśasā āgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,071.10c kilbiṣaspṛt pituṣaṇir hy eṣām araṃ hito bhavati vājināya //
analyzed: kilbiṣa spṛt pituṣaṇiḥ hi eṣām aram hitaḥ bhavati vājināya

original: RV_10,071.11a ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyati śakvarīṣu /
analyzed: ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatram tvaḥ gāyati śakvarīṣu

original: RV_10,071.11c brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasya mātrāṃ vi mimīta u tvaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā tvaḥ vadati jāta vidyām yajñasya mātrām vi mimīte u tvaḥ

original: RV_10,072.01a devānāṃ nu vayaṃ jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā /
analyzed: devānām nu vayam jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā

original: RV_10,072.01c uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyād uttare yuge //
analyzed: uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyāt uttare yuge

original: RV_10,072.02a brahmaṇas patir etā saṃ karmāra ivādhamat /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ etā sam karmāraḥ iva adhamat

original: RV_10,072.02c devānām pūrvye yuge 'sataḥ sad ajāyata //
analyzed: devānām pūrvye yuge sataḥ sat ajāyata

original: RV_10,072.03a devānāṃ yuge prathame 'sataḥ sad ajāyata /
analyzed: devānām yuge prathame sataḥ sat ajāyata

original: RV_10,072.03c tad āśā anv ajāyanta tad uttānapadas pari //
analyzed: tat āśāḥ anu ajāyanta tat uttāna padaḥ pari

original: RV_10,072.04a bhūr jajña uttānapado bhuva āśā ajāyanta /
analyzed: bhūḥ jajñe uttānapadaḥ bhuvaḥ āśāḥ ajāyanta

original: RV_10,072.04c aditer dakṣo ajāyata dakṣād v aditiḥ pari //
analyzed: aditeḥ dakṣaḥ ajāyata dakṣāt u aditiḥ pari

original: RV_10,072.05a aditir hy ajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava /
analyzed: aditiḥ hi ajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava

original: RV_10,072.05c tāṃ devā anv ajāyanta bhadrā amṛtabandhavaḥ //
analyzed: tām devāḥ anu ajāyanta bhadrāḥ amṛta bandhavaḥ

original: RV_10,072.06a yad devā adaḥ salile susaṃrabdhā atiṣṭhata /
analyzed: yat devāḥ adaḥ salile su saṃrabdhāḥ atiṣṭhata

original: RV_10,072.06c atrā vo nṛtyatām iva tīvro reṇur apāyata //
analyzed: atrā vaḥ nṛtyatām iva tīvraḥ reṇuḥ apāyata

original: RV_10,072.07a yad devā yatayo yathā bhuvanāny apinvata /
analyzed: yat devāḥ yatayaḥ yathā bhuvanāni apinvata

original: RV_10,072.07c atrā samudra ā gūḷham ā sūryam ajabhartana //
analyzed: atrā samudre ā gūḍham ā sūryam ajabhartana

original: RV_10,072.08a aṣṭau putrāso aditer ye jātās tanvas pari /
analyzed: aṣṭau putrāsaḥ aditeḥ ye jātāḥ tanvaḥ pari

original: RV_10,072.08c devāṃ upa prait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat //
analyzed: devān upa prait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat

original: RV_10,072.09a saptabhiḥ putrair aditir upa prait pūrvyaṃ yugam /
analyzed: saptabhiḥ putraiḥ aditiḥ upa prait pūrvyam yugam

original: RV_10,072.09c prajāyai mṛtyave tvat punar mārtāṇḍam ābharat //
analyzed: prajāyai mṛtyave tvat punar mārtāṇḍam ābharat

original: RV_10,073.01a janiṣṭhā ugraḥ sahase turāya mandra ojiṣṭho bahulābhimānaḥ /
analyzed: janiṣṭhāḥ ugraḥ sahase turāya mandraḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ bahula abhimānaḥ

original: RV_10,073.01c avardhann indram marutaś cid atra mātā yad vīraṃ dadhanad dhaniṣṭhā //
analyzed: avardhan indram marutaḥ cit atra mātā yat vīram dadhanat dhaniṣṭhā

original: RV_10,073.02a druho niṣattā pṛśanī cid evaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuṣ ṭa indram /
analyzed: druhaḥ niṣattā pṛśanī cit evaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuḥ ṭe indram

original: RV_10,073.02c abhīvṛteva tā mahāpadena dhvāntāt prapitvād ud aranta garbhāḥ //
analyzed: abhīvṛtā iva tāḥ mahā padena dhvāntāt prapitvāt ud aranta garbhāḥ

original: RV_10,073.03a ṛṣvā te pādā pra yaj jigāsy avardhan vājā uta ye cid atra /
analyzed: ṛṣvā te pādā pra yat jigāsi avardhan vājāḥ uta ye cit atra

original: RV_10,073.03c tvam indra sālāvṛkān sahasram āsan dadhiṣe aśvinā vavṛtyāḥ //
analyzed: tvam indra sālāvṛkān sahasram āsan dadhiṣe aśvinā vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_10,073.04a samanā tūrṇir upa yāsi yajñam ā nāsatyā sakhyāya vakṣi /
analyzed: samanā tūrṇiḥ upa yāsi yajñam ā nāsatyā sakhyāya vakṣi

original: RV_10,073.04c vasāvyām indra dhārayaḥ sahasrāśvinā śūra dadatur maghāni //
analyzed: vasāvyām indra dhārayaḥ sahasrā aśvinā śūra dadatuḥ maghāni

original: RV_10,073.05a mandamāna ṛtād adhi prajāyai sakhibhir indra iṣirebhir artham /
analyzed: mandamānaḥ ṛtāt adhi prajāyai sakhibhiḥ indraḥ iṣirebhiḥ artham

original: RV_10,073.05c ābhir hi māyā upa dasyum āgān mihaḥ pra tamrā avapat tamāṃsi //
analyzed: ābhiḥ hi māyāḥ upa dasyum āgāt mihaḥ pra tamrāḥ avapat tamāṃsi

original: RV_10,073.06a sanāmānā cid dhvasayo ny asmā avāhann indra uṣaso yathānaḥ /
analyzed: sanāmānā cit dhvasayaḥ ni asmai avāhan indraḥ uṣasaḥ yathā anaḥ

original: RV_10,073.06c ṛṣvair agacchaḥ sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ sākam pratiṣṭhā hṛdyā jaghantha //
analyzed: ṛṣvaiḥ agacchaḥ sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ sākam pratiṣṭhāḥ hṛdyāḥ jaghantha

original: RV_10,073.07a tvaṃ jaghantha namucim makhasyuṃ dāsaṃ kṛṇvāna ṛṣaye vimāyam /
analyzed: tvam jaghantha namucim makhasyum dāsam kṛṇvānaḥ ṛṣaye vimāyam

original: RV_10,073.07c tvaṃ cakartha manave syonān patho devatrāñjaseva yānān //
analyzed: tvam cakartha manave syonān pathaḥ devatrā añjasā iva yānān

original: RV_10,073.08a tvam etāni papriṣe vi nāmeśāna indra dadhiṣe gabhastau /
analyzed: tvam etāni papriṣe vi nāma īśānaḥ indra dadhiṣe gabhastau

original: RV_10,073.08c anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madanty uparibudhnān vaninaś cakartha //
analyzed: anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madanti uparibudhnān vaninaḥ cakartha

original: RV_10,073.09a cakraṃ yad asyāpsv ā niṣattam uto tad asmai madhv ic cacchadyāt /
analyzed: cakram yat asya apsu ā niṣattam uta u tat asmai madhu id cacchadyāt

original: RV_10,073.09c pṛthivyām atiṣitaṃ yad ūdhaḥ payo goṣv adadhā oṣadhīṣu //
analyzed: pṛthivyām atiṣitam yat ūdhaḥ payaḥ goṣu adadhāḥ oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_10,073.10a aśvād iyāyeti yad vadanty ojaso jātam uta manya enam /
analyzed: aśvāt iyāya iti yat vadanti ojasaḥ jātam uta manye enam

original: RV_10,073.10c manyor iyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yataḥ prajajña indro asya veda //
analyzed: manyoḥ iyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yatas prajajñe indraḥ asya veda

original: RV_10,073.11a vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedur indram priyamedhā ṛṣayo nādhamānāḥ /
analyzed: vayaḥ suparṇāḥ upa seduḥ indram priyamedhāḥ ṛṣayaḥ nādhamānāḥ

original: RV_10,073.11c apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣur mumugdhy asmān nidhayeva baddhān //
analyzed: apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣuḥ mumugdhi asmān nidhayā iva baddhān

original: RV_10,074.01a vasūnāṃ vā carkṛṣa iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñair vā rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: vasūnām vā carkṛṣe iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñaiḥ vā rodasyoḥ

original: RV_10,074.01c arvanto vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanuṃ vā ye suśruṇaṃ suśruto dhuḥ //
analyzed: arvantaḥ vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanum vā ye suśruṇam su śrutaḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_10,074.02a hava eṣām asuro nakṣata dyāṃ śravasyatā manasā niṃsata kṣām /
analyzed: have eṣām asuraḥ nakṣata dyām śravasyatā manasā niṃsata kṣām

original: RV_10,074.02c cakṣāṇā yatra suvitāya devā dyaur na vārebhiḥ kṛṇavanta svaiḥ //
analyzed: cakṣāṇāḥ yatra suvitāya devāḥ dyauḥ na vārebhiḥ kṛṇavanta svaiḥ

original: RV_10,074.03a iyam eṣām amṛtānāṃ gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam /
analyzed: iyam eṣām amṛtānām gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam

original: RV_10,074.03c dhiyaṃ ca yajñaṃ ca sādhantas te no dhāntu vasavyam asāmi //
analyzed: dhiyam ca yajñam ca sādhantaḥ te naḥ dhāntu vasavyam asāmi

original: RV_10,074.04a ā tat ta indrāyavaḥ panantābhi ya ūrvaṃ gomantaṃ titṛtsān /
analyzed: ā tat te indra āyavaḥ pananta abhi yaḥ ūrvam gomantam titṛtsān

original: RV_10,074.04c sakṛtsvaṃ ye puruputrām mahīṃ sahasradhārām bṛhatīṃ dudukṣan //
analyzed: sakṛtsvam ye puru putrām mahīm sahasra dhārām bṛhatīm dudukṣan

original: RV_10,074.05a śacīva indram avase kṛṇudhvam anānataṃ damayantam pṛtanyūn /
analyzed: śacīvas indram avase kṛṇudhvam an ānatam damayantam pṛtanyūn

original: RV_10,074.05c ṛbhukṣaṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim bhartā yo vajraṃ naryam purukṣuḥ //
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇam maghavānam suvṛktim bhartā yaḥ vajram naryam purukṣuḥ

original: RV_10,074.06a yad vāvāna purutamam purāṣāḷ ā vṛtrahendro nāmāny aprāḥ /
analyzed: yat vāvāna purutamam purāṣāh ā vṛtra hā indraḥ nāmāni aprāḥ

original: RV_10,074.06c aceti prāsahas patis tuviṣmān yad īm uśmasi kartave karat tat //
analyzed: aceti prāsahaḥ patiḥ tuviṣmān yat īm uśmasi kartave karat tat

original: RV_10,075.01a pra su va āpo mahimānam uttamaṃ kārur vocāti sadane vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: pra su vaḥ āpaḥ mahimānam uttamam kāruḥ vocāti sadane vivasvataḥ

original: RV_10,075.01c pra sapta-sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ pra sṛtvarīṇām ati sindhur ojasā //
analyzed: pra sapta sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ pra sṛtvarīṇām ati sindhuḥ ojasā

original: RV_10,075.02a pra te 'radad varuṇo yātave pathaḥ sindho yad vājāṃ abhy adravas tvam /
analyzed: pra te radat varuṇaḥ yātave pathaḥ sindho yat vājām abhī adravaḥ tvam

original: RV_10,075.02c bhūmyā adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yad eṣām agraṃ jagatām irajyasi //
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yat eṣām agram jagatām irajyasi

original: RV_10,075.03a divi svano yatate bhūmyopary anantaṃ śuṣmam ud iyarti bhānunā /
analyzed: divi svanaḥ yatate bhūmyā upari anantam śuṣmam ud iyarti bhānunā

original: RV_10,075.03c abhrād iva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhur yad eti vṛṣabho na roruvat //
analyzed: abhrāt iva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhuḥ yat eti vṛṣabhaḥ na roruvat

original: RV_10,075.04a abhi tvā sindho śiśum in na mātaro vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: abhi tvā sindho śiśum id na mātaraḥ vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ

original: RV_10,075.04c rājeva yudhvā nayasi tvam it sicau yad āsām agram pravatām inakṣasi //
analyzed: rājā iva yudhvā nayasi tvam id sicau yat āsām agram pravatām inakṣasi

original: RV_10,075.05a imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stomaṃ sacatā paruṣṇy ā /
analyzed: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stomam sacata paruṣṇi ā

original: RV_10,075.05c asiknyā marudvṛdhe vitastayārjīkīye śṛṇuhy ā suṣomayā //
analyzed: asiknyā marut vṛdhe vitastayā ārjīkīye śṛṇuhi ā suṣomayā

original: RV_10,075.06a tṛṣṭāmayā prathamaṃ yātave sajūḥ susartvā rasayā śvetyā tyā /
analyzed: tṛṣṭā āmayā prathamam yātave sajūs su sartvā rasayā śvetyā tyā

original: RV_10,075.06c tvaṃ sindho kubhayā gomatīṃ krumum mehatnvā sarathaṃ yābhir īyase //
analyzed: tvam sindho kubhayā gomatīm krumum mehatnvā sa ratham yābhiḥ īyase

original: RV_10,075.07a ṛjīty enī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi /
analyzed: ṛjītī enī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi

original: RV_10,075.07c adabdhā sindhur apasām apastamāśvā na citrā vapuṣīva darśatā //
analyzed: adabdhā sindhuḥ apasām apastamā aśvā na citrā vapuṣi iva darśatā

original: RV_10,075.08a svaśvā sindhuḥ surathā suvāsā hiraṇyayī sukṛtā vājinīvatī /
analyzed: su aśvā sindhuḥ su rathā su vāsāḥ hiraṇyayī su kṛtā vājinīvatī

original: RV_10,075.08c ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvaty utādhi vaste subhagā madhuvṛdham //
analyzed: ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvatī uta adhi vaste subhagā madhu vṛdham

original: RV_10,075.09a sukhaṃ rathaṃ yuyuje sindhur aśvinaṃ tena vājaṃ saniṣad asminn ājau /
analyzed: sukham ratham yuyuje sindhuḥ aśvinam tena vājam saniṣat asmin ājau

original: RV_10,075.09c mahān hy asya mahimā panasyate 'dabdhasya svayaśaso virapśinaḥ //
analyzed: mahān hi asya mahimā panasyate dabdhasya sva yaśasaḥ virapśinaḥ

original: RV_10,076.01a ā va ṛñjasa ūrjāṃ vyuṣṭiṣv indram maruto rodasī anaktana /
analyzed: ā vaḥ ṛñjasaḥ ūrjām vyuṣṭiṣu indram marutaḥ rodasī anaktana

original: RV_10,076.01c ubhe yathā no ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥ-sado varivasyāta udbhidā //
analyzed: ubhe yathā naḥ ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥsadaḥ varivasyātaḥ udbhidā

original: RV_10,076.02a tad u śreṣṭhaṃ savanaṃ sunotanātyo na hastayato adriḥ sotari /
analyzed: tat u śreṣṭham savanam sunotana atyaḥ na hasta yataḥ adriḥ sotari

original: RV_10,076.02c vidad dhy aryo abhibhūti pauṃsyam maho rāye cit tarute yad arvataḥ //
analyzed: vidat hi aryaḥ abhibhūti pauṃsyam mahaḥ rāye cit tarute yat arvataḥ

original: RV_10,076.03a tad id dhy asya savanaṃ viver apo yathā purā manave gātum aśret /
analyzed: tat id hi asya savanam viveḥ apaḥ yathā purā manave gātum aśret

original: RV_10,076.03c goarṇasi tvāṣṭre aśvanirṇiji prem adhvareṣv adhvarāṃ aśiśrayuḥ //
analyzed: go arṇasi tvāṣṭre aśva nirṇiji pra īm adhvareṣu adhvarān aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_10,076.04a apa hata rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvata skabhāyata nirṛtiṃ sedhatāmatim /
analyzed: apa hata rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ skabhāyata nirṛtim sedhata amatim

original: RV_10,076.04c ā no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ sunotana devāvyam bharata ślokam adrayaḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim sarva vīram sunotana devāvyam bharata ślokam adrayaḥ

original: RV_10,076.05a divaś cid ā vo 'mavattarebhyo vibhvanā cid āśvapastarebhyaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ cit ā vaḥ mavattarebhyaḥ vibhvanā cit āśu apastarebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,076.05c vāyoś cid ā somarabhastarebhyo 'gneś cid arca pitukṛttarebhyaḥ //
analyzed: vāyoḥ cit ā soma rabhastarebhyaḥ gneḥ cit arca pitukṛttarebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,076.06a bhurantu no yaśasaḥ sotv andhaso grāvāṇo vācā divitā divitmatā /
analyzed: bhurantu naḥ yaśasaḥ sotu andhasaḥ grāvāṇaḥ vācā divitā divitmatā

original: RV_10,076.06c naro yatra duhate kāmyam madhv āghoṣayanto abhito mithasturaḥ //
analyzed: naraḥ yatra duhate kāmyam madhu āghoṣayantaḥ abhitas mithasturaḥ

original: RV_10,076.07a sunvanti somaṃ rathirāso adrayo nir asya rasaṃ gaviṣo duhanti te /
analyzed: sunvanti somam rathirāsaḥ adrayaḥ niḥ asya rasam gaviṣaḥ duhanti te

original: RV_10,076.07c duhanty ūdhar upasecanāya kaṃ naro havyā na marjayanta āsabhiḥ //
analyzed: duhanti ūdhar upasecanāya kam naraḥ havyā na marjayante āsabhiḥ

original: RV_10,076.08a ete naraḥ svapaso abhūtana ya indrāya sunutha somam adrayaḥ /
analyzed: ete naraḥ su apasaḥ abhūtana ye indrāya sunutha somam adrayaḥ

original: RV_10,076.08c vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ vo divyāya dhāmne vasu-vasu vaḥ pārthivāya sunvate //
analyzed: vāmam vāmam vaḥ divyāya dhāmne vasu vasu vaḥ pārthivāya sunvate

original: RV_10,077.01a abhrapruṣo na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmanto na yajñā vijānuṣaḥ /
analyzed: abhrapruṣaḥ na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmantaḥ na yajñāḥ vijānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,077.01c sumārutaṃ na brahmāṇam arhase gaṇam astoṣy eṣāṃ na śobhase //
analyzed: su mārutam na brahmāṇam arhase gaṇam astoṣi eṣām na śobhase

original: RV_10,077.02a śriye maryāso añjīṃr akṛṇvata sumārutaṃ na pūrvīr ati kṣapaḥ /
analyzed: śriye maryāsaḥ añjīṃr akṛṇvata su mārutam na pūrvīḥ ati kṣapaḥ

original: RV_10,077.02c divas putrāsa etā na yetira ādityāsas te akrā na vāvṛdhuḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ putrāsaḥ etāḥ na yetire ādityāsaḥ te akrāḥ na vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_10,077.03a pra ye divaḥ pṛthivyā na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrān na sūryaḥ /
analyzed: pra ye divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrāt na sūryaḥ

original: RV_10,077.03c pājasvanto na vīrāḥ panasyavo riśādaso na maryā abhidyavaḥ //
analyzed: pājasvantaḥ na vīrāḥ panasyavaḥ riśādasaḥ na maryāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_10,077.04a yuṣmākam budhne apāṃ na yāmani vithuryati na mahī śratharyati /
analyzed: yuṣmākam budhne apām na yāmani vithuryati na mahī śratharyati

original: RV_10,077.04c viśvapsur yajño arvāg ayaṃ su vaḥ prayasvanto na satrāca ā gata //
analyzed: viśvapsuḥ yajñaḥ arvāk ayam su vaḥ prayasvantaḥ na satrācaḥ ā gata

original: RV_10,077.05a yūyaṃ dhūrṣu prayujo na raśmibhir jyotiṣmanto na bhāsā vyuṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: yūyam dhūrṣu prayujaḥ na raśmibhiḥ jyotiṣmantaḥ na bhāsā vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10,077.05c śyenāso na svayaśaso riśādasaḥ pravāso na prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ //
analyzed: śyenāsaḥ na sva yaśasaḥ riśādasaḥ pravāsaḥ na prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ

original: RV_10,077.06a pra yad vahadhve marutaḥ parākād yūyam mahaḥ saṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ /
analyzed: pra yat vahadhve marutaḥ parākāt yūyam mahaḥ saṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ

original: RV_10,077.06c vidānāso vasavo rādhyasyārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota //
analyzed: vidānāsaḥ vasavaḥ rādhyasya ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota

original: RV_10,077.07a ya udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhā marudbhyo na mānuṣo dadāśat /
analyzed: yaḥ udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhāḥ marudbhyaḥ na mānuṣaḥ dadāśat

original: RV_10,077.07c revat sa vayo dadhate suvīraṃ sa devānām api gopīthe astu //
analyzed: revat sa vayaḥ dadhate su vīram sa devānām api gopīthe astu

original: RV_10,077.08a te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmā ādityena nāmnā śambhaviṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsaḥ ūmāḥ ādityena nāmnā śambhaviṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10,077.08c te no 'vantu rathatūr manīṣām mahaś ca yāmann adhvare cakānāḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ vantu manīṣām mahaḥ ca yāman adhvare cakānāḥ

original: RV_10,078.01a viprāso na manmabhiḥ svādhyo devāvyo na yajñaiḥ svapnasaḥ /
analyzed: viprāsaḥ na manmabhiḥ su ādhyaḥ na yajñaiḥ svapnasaḥ

original: RV_10,078.01c rājāno na citrāḥ susaṃdṛśaḥ kṣitīnāṃ na maryā arepasaḥ //
analyzed: rājānaḥ na citrāḥ su saṃdṛśaḥ kṣitīnām na maryāḥ arepasaḥ

original: RV_10,078.02a agnir na ye bhrājasā rukmavakṣaso vātāso na svayujaḥ sadyaūtayaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ na ye bhrājasā rukma vakṣasaḥ vātāsaḥ na sva yujaḥ sadyaūtayaḥ

original: RV_10,078.02c prajñātāro na jyeṣṭhāḥ sunītayaḥ suśarmāṇo na somā ṛtaṃ yate //
analyzed: prajñātāraḥ na jyeṣṭhāḥ su nītayaḥ su śarmāṇaḥ na somāḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_10,078.03a vātāso na ye dhunayo jigatnavo 'gnīnāṃ na jihvā virokiṇaḥ /
analyzed: vātāsaḥ na ye dhunayaḥ jigatnavaḥ gnīnām na jihvāḥ virokiṇaḥ

original: RV_10,078.03c varmaṇvanto na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇāṃ na śaṃsāḥ surātayaḥ //
analyzed: varmaṇvantaḥ na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇām na śaṃsāḥ su rātayaḥ

original: RV_10,078.04a rathānāṃ na ye 'rāḥ sanābhayo jigīvāṃso na śūrā abhidyavaḥ /
analyzed: rathānām na ye rāḥ sanābhayaḥ jigīvāṃsaḥ na śūrāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_10,078.04c vareyavo na maryā ghṛtapruṣo 'bhisvartāro arkaṃ na suṣṭubhaḥ //
analyzed: vareyavaḥ na maryāḥ ghṛta pruṣaḥ bhisvartāraḥ arkam na suṣṭubhaḥ

original: RV_10,078.05a aśvāso na ye jyeṣṭhāsa āśavo didhiṣavo na rathyaḥ sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ na ye jyeṣṭhāsaḥ āśavaḥ didhiṣavaḥ na rathyaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: RV_10,078.05c āpo na nimnair udabhir jigatnavo viśvarūpā aṅgiraso na sāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ na nimnaiḥ udabhiḥ jigatnavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ aṅgirasaḥ na sāmabhiḥ

original: RV_10,078.06a grāvāṇo na sūrayaḥ sindhumātara ādardirāso adrayo na viśvahā /
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ na sūrayaḥ sindhu mātaraḥ ādardirāsaḥ adrayaḥ na viśvahā

original: RV_10,078.06c śiśūlā na krīḷayaḥ sumātaro mahāgrāmo na yāmann uta tviṣā //
analyzed: śiśūlāḥ na krīḍayaḥ su mātaraḥ mahā grāmaḥ na yāman uta tviṣā

original: RV_10,078.07a uṣasāṃ na ketavo 'dhvaraśriyaḥ śubhaṃyavo nāñjibhir vy aśvitan /
analyzed: uṣasām na ketavaḥ dhvara śriyaḥ śubhaṃyavaḥ nā añjibhiḥ vi aśvitan

original: RV_10,078.07c sindhavo na yayiyo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ parāvato na yojanāni mamire //
analyzed: sindhavaḥ na bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ parāvataḥ na yojanāni mamire

original: RV_10,078.08a subhāgān no devāḥ kṛṇutā suratnān asmān stotṝn maruto vāvṛdhānāḥ /
analyzed: subhāgān naḥ devāḥ kṛṇutā su ratnān asmān stotṝn marutaḥ vāvṛdhānāḥ

original: RV_10,078.08c adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanād dhi vo ratnadheyāni santi //
analyzed: adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanāt hi vaḥ ratna dheyāni santi

original: RV_10,079.01a apaśyam asya mahato mahitvam amartyasya martyāsu vikṣu /
analyzed: apaśyam asya mahataḥ mahi tvam amartyasya martyāsu vikṣu

original: RV_10,079.01c nānā hanū vibhṛte sam bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūry attaḥ //
analyzed: nānā hanū vibhṛte sam bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūri attaḥ

original: RV_10,079.02a guhā śiro nihitam ṛdhag akṣī asinvann atti jihvayā vanāni /
analyzed: guhā śiraḥ nihitam ṛdhak akṣī asinvan atti jihvayā vanāni

original: RV_10,079.02c atrāṇy asmai paḍbhiḥ sam bharanty uttānahastā namasādhi vikṣu //
analyzed: atrāṇi asmai paḍbhiḥ sam bharanti uttāna hastāḥ namasā adhi vikṣu

original: RV_10,079.03a pra mātuḥ prataraṃ guhyam icchan kumāro na vīrudhaḥ sarpad urvīḥ /
analyzed: pra mātuḥ prataram guhyam icchan kumāraḥ na vīrudhaḥ sarpat urvīḥ

original: RV_10,079.03c sasaṃ na pakvam avidac chucantaṃ ririhvāṃsaṃ ripa upasthe antaḥ //
analyzed: sasam na pakvam avidat śucantam ririhvāṃsam ripaḥ upasthe antar

original: RV_10,079.04a tad vām ṛtaṃ rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamāno mātarā garbho atti /
analyzed: tat vām ṛtam rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamānaḥ mātarā garbhaḥ atti

original: RV_10,079.04c nāhaṃ devasya martyaś ciketāgnir aṅga vicetāḥ sa pracetāḥ //
analyzed: na aham devasya martyaḥ ciketa agniḥ aṅga vicetāḥ sa pracetāḥ

original: RV_10,079.05a yo asmā annaṃ tṛṣv ādadhāty ājyair ghṛtair juhoti puṣyati /
analyzed: yaḥ asmai annam tṛṣu ādadhāti ājyaiḥ ghṛtaiḥ juhoti puṣyati

original: RV_10,079.05c tasmai sahasram akṣabhir vi cakṣe 'gne viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ asi tvam //
analyzed: tasmai sahasram akṣabhiḥ vi cakṣe gne viśvatas pratyaṅ asi tvam

original: RV_10,079.06a kiṃ deveṣu tyaja enaś cakarthāgne pṛcchāmi nu tvām avidvān /
analyzed: kim deveṣu tyajaḥ enaḥ cakartha agne pṛcchāmi nu tvām a vidvān

original: RV_10,079.06c akrīḷan krīḷan harir attave 'dan vi parvaśaś cakarta gām ivāsiḥ //
analyzed: a krīḍan krīḍan hariḥ attave vi parvaśas cakarta gām iva asiḥ

original: RV_10,079.07a viṣūco aśvān yuyuje vanejā ṛjītibhī raśanābhir gṛbhītān /
analyzed: viṣūcaḥ aśvān yuyuje vanejāḥ ṛjītibhiḥ raśanābhiḥ gṛbhītān

original: RV_10,079.07c cakṣade mitro vasubhiḥ sujātaḥ sam ānṛdhe parvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ //
analyzed: cakṣade mitraḥ vasubhiḥ su jātaḥ sam ānṛdhe parvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_10,080.01a agniḥ saptiṃ vājambharaṃ dadāty agnir vīraṃ śrutyaṃ karmaniṣṭhām /
analyzed: agniḥ saptim vājambharam dadāti agniḥ vīram śrutyam karma niṣṭhām

original: RV_10,080.01c agnī rodasī vi carat samañjann agnir nārīṃ vīrakukṣim purandhim //
analyzed: agniḥ rodasī vi carat samañjan agniḥ nārīm vīra kukṣim purandhim

original: RV_10,080.02a agner apnasaḥ samid astu bhadrāgnir mahī rodasī ā viveśa /
analyzed: agneḥ apnasaḥ samidh astu bhadrā agniḥ mahī rodasī ā viveśa

original: RV_10,080.02c agnir ekaṃ codayat samatsv agnir vṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi //
analyzed: agniḥ ekam codayat samatsu agniḥ vṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi

original: RV_10,080.03a agnir ha tyaṃ jarataḥ karṇam āvāgnir adbhyo nir adahaj jarūtham /
analyzed: agniḥ ha tyam jarataḥ karṇam āva agniḥ adbhyaḥ niḥ adahat jarūtham

original: RV_10,080.03c agnir atriṃ gharma uruṣyad antar agnir nṛmedham prajayāsṛjat sam //
analyzed: agniḥ atrim gharme uruṣyat antar agniḥ nṛ medham prajayā asṛjat sam

original: RV_10,080.04a agnir dād draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā agnir ṛṣiṃ yaḥ sahasrā sanoti /
analyzed: agniḥ dāt draviṇam vīra peśāḥ agniḥ ṛṣim yaḥ sahasrā sanoti

original: RV_10,080.04c agnir divi havyam ā tatānāgner dhāmāni vibhṛtā purutrā //
analyzed: agniḥ divi havyam ā tatāna agneḥ dhāmāni vibhṛtā purutrā

original: RV_10,080.05a agnim ukthair ṛṣayo vi hvayante 'gniṃ naro yāmani bādhitāsaḥ /
analyzed: agnim ukthaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ vi hvayante gnim naraḥ yāmani bādhitāsaḥ

original: RV_10,080.05c agniṃ vayo antarikṣe patanto 'gniḥ sahasrā pari yāti gonām //
analyzed: agnim vayaḥ antarikṣe patantaḥ gniḥ sahasrā pari yāti gonām

original: RV_10,080.06a agniṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīr yā agnim manuṣo nahuṣo vi jātāḥ /
analyzed: agnim viśaḥ īḍate mānuṣīḥ yāḥ agnim manuṣaḥ nahuṣaḥ vi jātāḥ

original: RV_10,080.06c agnir gāndharvīm pathyām ṛtasyāgner gavyūtir ghṛta ā niṣattā //
analyzed: agniḥ gāndharvīm pathyām ṛtasya agneḥ gavyūtiḥ ghṛte ā niṣattā

original: RV_10,080.07a agnaye brahma ṛbhavas tatakṣur agnim mahām avocāmā suvṛktim /
analyzed: agnaye brahma ṛbhavaḥ tatakṣuḥ agnim mahām avocāma suvṛktim

original: RV_10,080.07c agne prāva jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭhāgne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva //
analyzed: agne prāva jaritāram yaviṣṭha agne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva

original: RV_10,081.01a ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ṛṣir hotā ny asīdat pitā naḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvat ṛṣiḥ hotā ni asīdat pitā naḥ

original: RV_10,081.01c sa āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchad avarāṃ ā viveśa //
analyzed: saḥ āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchad avarām ā viveśa

original: RV_10,081.02a kiṃ svid āsīd adhiṣṭhānam ārambhaṇaṃ katamat svit kathāsīt /
analyzed: kim svid āsīt adhiṣṭhānam ārambhaṇam katamat svid kathā āsīt

original: RV_10,081.02c yato bhūmiṃ janayan viśvakarmā vi dyām aurṇon mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ //
analyzed: yatas bhūmim janayan viśvakarmā vi dyām aurṇot mahinā viśva cakṣāḥ

original: RV_10,081.03a viśvataścakṣur uta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhur uta viśvataspāt /
analyzed: viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatomukhaḥ viśvatobāhuḥ uta viśvataspād

original: RV_10,081.03c sam bāhubhyāṃ dhamati sam patatrair dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ //
analyzed: sam bāhubhyām dhamati sam patatraiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10,081.04a kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ /
analyzed: kim svid vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ

original: RV_10,081.04c manīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated u tad yad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan //
analyzed: manīṣiṇaḥ manasā pṛcchata id u tat yat adhyatiṣṭhat bhuvanāni dhārayan

original: RV_10,081.05a yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yāvamā yā madhyamā viśvakarmann utemā /
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yā avamā yāḥ madhyamāḥ viśvakarman uta imāḥ

original: RV_10,081.05c śikṣā sakhibhyo haviṣi svadhāvaḥ svayaṃ yajasva tanvaṃ vṛdhānaḥ //
analyzed: śikṣa sakhibhyaḥ haviṣi svadhāvas svayam yajasva tanvam vṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_10,081.06a viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayaṃ yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām /
analyzed: viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayam yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_10,081.06c muhyantv anye abhito janāsa ihāsmākam maghavā sūrir astu //
analyzed: muhyantu anye abhitas janāsaḥ iha asmākam maghavā sūriḥ astu

original: RV_10,081.07a vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyā huvema /
analyzed: vācaḥ patim viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manaḥ juvam vāje adyā huvema

original: RV_10,081.07c sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūr avase sādhukarmā //
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāni havanāni joṣat viśva śambhūḥ avase sādhu karmā

original: RV_10,082.01a cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīro ghṛtam ene ajanan nannamāne /
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīraḥ ghṛtam ene ajanat nannamāne

original: RV_10,082.01c yaded antā adadṛhanta pūrva ād id dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām //
analyzed: yadā id antāḥ adadṛhanta pūrve āt id dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām

original: RV_10,082.02a viśvakarmā vimanā ād vihāyā dhātā vidhātā paramota saṃdṛk /
analyzed: viśvakarmā vimanāḥ āt vihāyāḥ dhātā vidhātā paramā uta saṃdṛś

original: RV_10,082.02c teṣām iṣṭāni sam iṣā madanti yatrā saptaṛṣīn para ekam āhuḥ //
analyzed: teṣām iṣṭāni sam iṣā madanti yatrā sapta ṛṣīn paras ekam āhuḥ

original: RV_10,082.03a yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ pitā janitā yaḥ vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10,082.03c yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eka eva taṃ sampraśnam bhuvanā yanty anyā //
analyzed: yaḥ devānām nāmadhāḥ ekaḥ eva tam sampraśnam bhuvanā yanti anyā

original: RV_10,082.04a ta āyajanta draviṇaṃ sam asmā ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāro na bhūnā /
analyzed: te āyajanta draviṇam sam asmai ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāraḥ na bhūnā

original: RV_10,082.04c asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvann imāni //
analyzed: asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvan imāni

original: RV_10,082.05a paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhir asurair yad asti /
analyzed: paras divā paras enā pṛthivyā paras devebhiḥ asuraiḥ yat asti

original: RV_10,082.05c kaṃ svid garbham prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta viśve //
analyzed: kam svid garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta viśve

original: RV_10,082.06a tam id garbham prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve /
analyzed: tam id garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve

original: RV_10,082.06c ajasya nābhāv adhy ekam arpitaṃ yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: ajasya nābhau adhi ekam arpitam yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_10,082.07a na taṃ vidātha ya imā jajānānyad yuṣmākam antaram babhūva /
analyzed: na tam vidātha yaḥ imā jajāna anyat yuṣmākam antaram babhūva

original: RV_10,082.07c nīhāreṇa prāvṛtā jalpyā cāsutṛpa ukthaśāsaś caranti //
analyzed: nīhāreṇa prāvṛtāḥ jalpyā ca asutṛpaḥ uktha śāsaḥ caranti

original: RV_10,083.01a yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak /
analyzed: yaḥ te manyo vidhat vajra sāyaka sahaḥ ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak

original: RV_10,083.01c sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā //
analyzed: sāhyāma dāsam āryam tvayā yujā sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā

original: RV_10,083.02a manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: manyuḥ indraḥ manyuḥ eva āsa devaḥ manyuḥ hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: RV_10,083.02c manyuṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīr yāḥ pāhi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: manyum viśaḥ īḍate mānuṣīḥ yāḥ pāhi naḥ manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,083.03a abhīhi manyo tavasas tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn /
analyzed: abhīhi manyo tavasaḥ tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn

original: RV_10,083.03c amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: amitra hā vṛtra hā dasyu hā ca viśvā vasūni ā bhara tvam naḥ

original: RV_10,083.04a tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi manyo abhibhūti ojāḥ svayambhūḥ bhāmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: RV_10,083.04c viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvān asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi //
analyzed: viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvān asmāsu ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi

original: RV_10,083.05a abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ /
analyzed: a bhāgaḥ san apa paretaḥ asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ

original: RV_10,083.05c taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḷāhaṃ svā tanūr baladeyāya mehi //
analyzed: tam tvā manyo akratuḥ jihīḍa aham svā tanūḥ bala deyāya mā ihi

original: RV_10,083.06a ayaṃ te asmy upa mehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadhāyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam te asmi upa mā ihi arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśva dhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,083.06c manyo vajrinn abhi mām ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhy āpeḥ //
analyzed: manyo vajrin abhi mām ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhi āpeḥ

original: RV_10,083.07a abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri /
analyzed: abhi prehi dakṣiṇatas bhava me dhāḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri

original: RV_10,083.07c juhomi te dharuṇam madhvo agram ubhā upāṃśu prathamā pibāva //
analyzed: juhomi te dharuṇam madhvaḥ agram ubhau upāṃśu prathamā pibāva

original: RV_10,084.01a tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇāso dhṛṣitā marutvaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā manyo sa ratham ārujantaḥ harṣamāṇāsaḥ dhṛṣitāḥ marutvas

original: RV_10,084.01c tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā abhi pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ //
analyzed: tigma iṣavaḥ āyudhā saṃśiśānāḥ abhi pra yantu naraḥ agni rūpāḥ

original: RV_10,084.02a agnir iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīr naḥ sahure hūta edhi /
analyzed: agniḥ iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senā nīḥ naḥ sahure hūtaḥ edhi

original: RV_10,084.02c hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdho nudasva //
analyzed: hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva vedaḥ ojaḥ mimānaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: RV_10,084.03a sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn /
analyzed: sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn

original: RV_10,084.03c ugraṃ te pājo nanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayasa ekaja tvam //
analyzed: ugram te pājaḥ nanu ā rurudhre vaśī vaśam nayase eka ja tvam

original: RV_10,084.04a eko bahūnām asi manyav īḷito viśaṃ-viśaṃ yudhaye saṃ śiśādhi /
analyzed: ekaḥ bahūnām asi manyo īḍitaḥ viśam viśam yudhaye sam śiśādhi

original: RV_10,084.04c akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃ vijayāya kṛṇmahe //
analyzed: a kṛtta ruc tvayā yujā vayam dyumantam ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmahe

original: RV_10,084.05a vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākam manyo adhipā bhaveha /
analyzed: vijeṣa kṛt indraḥ iva anavabravaḥ smākam manyo adhipāḥ bhava iha

original: RV_10,084.05c priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūtha //
analyzed: priyam te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidma tam utsam yatas ābabhūtha

original: RV_10,084.06a ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣy abhibhūta uttaram /
analyzed: ābhūtyā sahajāḥ vajra sāyaka sahaḥ bibharṣi abhibhūte uttaram

original: RV_10,084.06c kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji //
analyzed: kratvā naḥ manyo saha medī edhi mahā dhanasya puru hūta saṃsṛji

original: RV_10,084.07a saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dattāṃ varuṇaś ca manyuḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭam dhanam ubhayam samākṛtam asmabhyam dattām varuṇaḥ ca manyuḥ

original: RV_10,084.07c bhiyaṃ dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāso apa ni layantām //
analyzed: bhiyam dadhānāḥ hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāsaḥ apa ni layantām

original: RV_10,085.01a satyenottabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇottabhitā dyauḥ /
analyzed: satyena uttabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇa uttabhitā dyauḥ

original: RV_10,085.01c ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ //
analyzed: ṛtena ādityāḥ tiṣṭhanti divi somaḥ adhi śritaḥ

original: RV_10,085.02a somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī /
analyzed: somena ādityāḥ balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī

original: RV_10,085.02c atho nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ //
analyzed: atha u nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe somaḥ āhitaḥ

original: RV_10,085.03a somam manyate papivān yat sampiṃṣanty oṣadhim /
analyzed: somam manyate papivān yat sampiṃṣanti oṣadhim

original: RV_10,085.03c somaṃ yam brahmāṇo vidur na tasyāśnāti kaś cana //
analyzed: somam yam brahmāṇaḥ viduḥ na tasya aśnāti kaḥ cana

original: RV_10,085.04a ācchadvidhānair gupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ācchad vidhānaiḥ gupitaḥ bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ

original: RV_10,085.04c grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ //
analyzed: grāvṇām id śṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ

original: RV_10,085.05a yat tvā deva prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ /
analyzed: yat tvā deva prapibanti tatas ā pyāyase punar

original: RV_10,085.05c vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānām māsa ākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānām māsaḥ ākṛtiḥ

original: RV_10,085.06a raibhy āsīd anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanī /
analyzed: raibhī āsīt anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanī

original: RV_10,085.06c sūryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayaiti pariṣkṛtam //
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ bhadram id vāsaḥ gāthayā eti pariṣkṛtam

original: RV_10,085.07a cittir ā upabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur ā abhyañjanam /
analyzed: cittiḥ āḥ upabarhaṇam cakṣuḥ āḥ abhyañjanam

original: RV_10,085.07c dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim //
analyzed: dyauḥ bhūmiḥ kośaḥ āsīt yat ayāt sūryā patim

original: RV_10,085.08a stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chanda opaśaḥ /
analyzed: stomāḥ āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīram chandaḥ opaśaḥ

original: RV_10,085.08c sūryāyā aśvinā varāgnir āsīt purogavaḥ //
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ aśvinā varā agniḥ āsīt purogavaḥ

original: RV_10,085.09a somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā /
analyzed: somaḥ vadhūyuḥ abhavat aśvinā āstām ubhā varā

original: RV_10,085.09c sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīm manasā savitādadāt //
analyzed: sūryām yat patye śaṃsantīm manasā savitā adadāt

original: RV_10,085.10a mano asyā ana āsīd dyaur āsīd uta cchadiḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ asyāḥ anaḥ āsīt dyauḥ āsīt uta chadiḥ

original: RV_10,085.10c śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā gṛham //
analyzed: śukrau anaḍvāhau āstām yat ayāt sūryā gṛham

original: RV_10,085.11a ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanāv itaḥ /
analyzed: ṛk sāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanau itas

original: RV_10,085.11c śrotraṃ te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācāraḥ //
analyzed: śrotram te cakre āstām divi panthāḥ cara ācāraḥ

original: RV_10,085.12a śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ /
analyzed: śucī te cakre yātyāḥ vyānaḥ akṣaḥ āhataḥ

original: RV_10,085.12c ano manasmayaṃ sūryārohat prayatī patim //
analyzed: anaḥ manasmayam sūryā ārohat prayatī patim

original: RV_10,085.13a sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat /
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat

original: RV_10,085.13c aghāsu hanyante gāvo 'rjunyoḥ pary uhyate //
analyzed: aghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ rjunyoḥ pari uhyate

original: RV_10,085.14a yad aśvinā pṛcchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ /
analyzed: yat aśvinā pṛcchamānau ayātam tri cakreṇa vahatum sūryāyāḥ

original: RV_10,085.14c viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitarāv avṛṇīta pūṣā //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu tat vām ajānan putraḥ pitarau avṛṇīta pūṣā

original: RV_10,085.15a yad ayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryām upa /
analyzed: yat ayātam śubhaḥ patī vareyam sūryām upa

original: RV_10,085.15c kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ //
analyzed: kva ekam cakram vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ

original: RV_10,085.16a dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ /
analyzed: dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇaḥ ṛtuthā viduḥ

original: RV_10,085.16c athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ //
analyzed: atha ekam cakram yat guhā tat addhātayaḥ id viduḥ

original: RV_10,085.17a sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca /
analyzed: sūryāyai devebhyaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: RV_10,085.17c ye bhūtasya pracetasa idaṃ tebhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ //
analyzed: ye bhūtasya pracetasaḥ idam tebhyaḥ karam namaḥ

original: RV_10,085.18a pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḷantau pari yāto adhvaram /
analyzed: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyayā etau śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_10,085.18c viśvāny anyo bhuvanābhicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyate punaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāni anyaḥ bhuvanā abhicaṣṭe ṛtūṃr anyaḥ vidadhat jāyate punar

original: RV_10,085.19a navo-navo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām ety agram /
analyzed: navaḥ navaḥ bhavati jāyamānaḥ hnām ketuḥ uṣasām eti agram

original: RV_10,085.19c bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāty āyan pra candramās tirate dīrgham āyuḥ //
analyzed: bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāti āyan pra candramāḥ tirate dīrgham āyuḥ

original: RV_10,085.20a sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃ sucakram /
analyzed: su kiṃśukam śalmalim viśva rūpam hiraṇya varṇam suvṛtam su cakram

original: RV_10,085.20c ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonam patye vahatuṃ kṛṇuṣva //
analyzed: ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokam syonam patye vahatum kṛṇuṣva

original: RV_10,085.21a ud īrṣvātaḥ pativatī hy eṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasā gīrbhir īḷe /
analyzed: ud īrṣva atas pativatī hi eṣā viśvāvasum namasā gīrbhiḥ īḍe

original: RV_10,085.21c anyām iccha pitṛṣadaṃ vyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya viddhi //
analyzed: anyām iccha pitṛṣadam vyaktām sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi

original: RV_10,085.22a ud īrṣvāto viśvāvaso namaseḷā mahe tvā /
analyzed: ud īrṣva atas viśvāvaso namasā iḍā mahe tvā

original: RV_10,085.22c anyām iccha prapharvyaṃ saṃ jāyām patyā sṛja //
analyzed: anyām iccha prapharvyam sam jāyām patyā sṛja

original: RV_10,085.23a anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam /
analyzed: anṛkṣarāḥ ṛjavaḥ santu panthāḥ yebhiḥ sakhāyaḥ yanti naḥ vareyam

original: RV_10,085.23c sam aryamā sam bhago no ninīyāt saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam astu devāḥ //
analyzed: sam aryamā sam bhagaḥ naḥ ninīyāt sam jāspatyam suyamam astu devāḥ

original: RV_10,085.24a pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ /
analyzed: pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā su śevaḥ

original: RV_10,085.24c ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke 'riṣṭāṃ tvā saha patyā dadhāmi //
analyzed: ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke riṣṭām tvā saha patyā dadhāmi

original: RV_10,085.25a preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karam /
analyzed: pretaḥ muñcāmi na amutas su baddhām amutas karam

original: RV_10,085.25c yatheyam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati //
analyzed: yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ su putrā subhagā asati

original: RV_10,085.26a pūṣā tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena /
analyzed: pūṣā tvā itas nayatu hasta gṛhya aśvinā tvā pra vahatām rathena

original: RV_10,085.26c gṛhān gaccha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi //
analyzed: gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi

original: RV_10,085.27a iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi /
analyzed: iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi

original: RV_10,085.27c enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ sṛjasvādhā jivrī vidatham ā vadāthaḥ //
analyzed: enā patyā tanvam sam sṛjasva adhā jivrī vidatham ā vadāthaḥ

original: RV_10,085.28a nīlalohitam bhavati kṛtyāsaktir vy ajyate /
analyzed: nīla lohitam bhavati kṛtyā saktiḥ vi ajyate

original: RV_10,085.28c edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate //
analyzed: edhante asyāḥ jñātayaḥ patiḥ bandheṣu badhyate

original: RV_10,085.29a parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu /
analyzed: parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyaḥ vi bhajā vasu

original: RV_10,085.29c kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvy ā jāyā viśate patim //
analyzed: kṛtyā eṣā padvatī bhūtvī ā jāyā viśate patim

original: RV_10,085.30a aśrīrā tanūr bhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā /
analyzed: aśrīrā tanūḥ bhavati ruśatī pāpayā amuyā

original: RV_10,085.30c patir yad vadhvo vāsasā svam aṅgam abhidhitsate //
analyzed: patiḥ yat vadhvaḥ vāsasā svam aṅgam abhidhitsate

original: RV_10,085.31a ye vadhvaś candraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janād anu /
analyzed: ye vadhvaḥ candram vahatum yakṣmāḥ yanti janāt anu

original: RV_10,085.31c punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ //
analyzed: punar tān yajñiyāḥ devāḥ nayantu yatas āgatāḥ

original: RV_10,085.32a mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti dampatī /
analyzed: mā vidan paripanthinaḥ ye āsīdanti dampatī

original: RV_10,085.32c sugebhir durgam atītām apa drāntv arātayaḥ //
analyzed: sugebhiḥ durgam atītām apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: RV_10,085.33a sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata /
analyzed: su maṅgalīḥ iyam vadhūḥ imām sameta paśyata

original: RV_10,085.33c saubhāgyam asyai dattvāyāthāstaṃ vi paretana //
analyzed: saubhāgyam asyai dattvāya atha astam vi parā itana

original: RV_10,085.34a tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam etad apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave /
analyzed: tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam etat apāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etat attave

original: RV_10,085.34c sūryāṃ yo brahmā vidyāt sa id vādhūyam arhati //
analyzed: sūryām yaḥ brahmā vidyāt saḥ id vādhūyam arhati

original: RV_10,085.35a āśasanaṃ viśasanam atho adhivikartanam /
analyzed: āśasanam viśasanam atha u adhivikartanam

original: RV_10,085.35c sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati //
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati

original: RV_10,085.36a gṛbhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ /
analyzed: gṛbhṇāmi te saubhaga tvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asaḥ

original: RV_10,085.36c bhago aryamā savitā purandhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ //
analyzed: bhagaḥ aryamā savitā purandhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ

original: RV_10,085.37a tām pūṣañ chivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyā vapanti /
analyzed: tām pūṣam śivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyāḥ vapanti

original: RV_10,085.37c yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyām uśantaḥ praharāma śepam //
analyzed: yā naḥ ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyām uśantaḥ praharāma śepam

original: RV_10,085.38a tubhyam agre pary avahan sūryāṃ vahatunā saha /
analyzed: tubhyam agre pari avahan sūryām vahatunā saha

original: RV_10,085.38c punaḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha //
analyzed: punar patibhyaḥ jāyām dāḥ agne prajayā saha

original: RV_10,085.39a punaḥ patnīm agnir adād āyuṣā saha varcasā /
analyzed: punar patnīm agniḥ adāt āyuṣā saha varcasā

original: RV_10,085.39c dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam //
analyzed: dīrgha āyuḥ asyāḥ yaḥ patiḥ jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam

original: RV_10,085.40a somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ prathamaḥ vivide gandharvaḥ vivide uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,085.40c tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas te manuṣyajāḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ agniḥ te patiḥ turīyaḥ te manuṣya jāḥ

original: RV_10,085.41a somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye /
analyzed: somaḥ dadat gandharvāya gandharvaḥ dadat agnaye

original: RV_10,085.41c rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyam atho imām //
analyzed: rayim ca putrān ca adāt agniḥ mahyam atha u imām

original: RV_10,085.42a ihaiva stam mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnutam /
analyzed: iha eva stam mā vi viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnutam

original: RV_10,085.42c krīḷantau putrair naptṛbhir modamānau sve gṛhe //
analyzed: krīḍantau putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ modamānau sve gṛhe

original: RV_10,085.43a ā naḥ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ājarasāya sam anaktv aryamā /
analyzed: ā naḥ prajām janayatu prajāpatiḥ ājarasāya sam anaktu aryamā

original: RV_10,085.43c adurmaṅgalīḥ patilokam ā viśa śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: adurmaṅgalīḥ pati lokam ā viśa śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_10,085.44a aghoracakṣur apatighny edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvarcāḥ /
analyzed: aghora cakṣuḥ a pati ghnī edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvarcāḥ

original: RV_10,085.44c vīrasūr devakāmā syonā śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: vīra sūḥ deva kāmā syonā śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_10,085.45a imāṃ tvam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrāṃ subhagāṃ kṛṇu /
analyzed: imām tvam indra mīḍhvaḥ su putrām subhagām kṛṇu

original: RV_10,085.45c daśāsyām putrān ā dhehi patim ekādaśaṃ kṛdhi //
analyzed: daśa asyām putrān ā dhehi patim ekādaśam kṛdhi

original: RV_10,085.46a samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvām bhava /
analyzed: samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvām bhava

original: RV_10,085.46c nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu //
analyzed: nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu

original: RV_10,085.47a sam añjantu viśve devāḥ sam āpo hṛdayāni nau /
analyzed: sam añjantu viśve devāḥ sam āpaḥ hṛdayāni nau

original: RV_10,085.47c sam mātariśvā saṃ dhātā sam u deṣṭrī dadhātu nau //
analyzed: sam mātariśvā sam dhātā sam u deṣṭrī dadhātu nau

original: RV_10,086.01a vi hi sotor asṛkṣata nendraṃ devam amaṃsata /
analyzed: vi hi sotoḥ asṛkṣata na indram devam amaṃsata

original: RV_10,086.01c yatrāmadad vṛṣākapir aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu matsakhā viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: yatra amadat vṛṣākapiḥ aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu mad sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.02a parā hīndra dhāvasi vṛṣākaper ati vyathiḥ /
analyzed: parā hi indra dhāvasi vṛṣākapeḥ ati vyathiḥ

original: RV_10,086.02c no aha pra vindasy anyatra somapītaye viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: na u aha pra vindasi anyatra soma pītaye viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.03a kim ayaṃ tvāṃ vṛṣākapiś cakāra harito mṛgaḥ /
analyzed: kim ayam tvām vṛṣākapiḥ cakāra haritaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: RV_10,086.03c yasmā irasyasīd u nv aryo vā puṣṭimad vasu viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: yasmai irasyasīt u nu aryaḥ vā puṣṭimat vasu viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.04a yam imaṃ tvaṃ vṛṣākapim priyam indrābhirakṣasi /
analyzed: yam imam tvam vṛṣākapim priyam indra abhirakṣasi

original: RV_10,086.04c śvā nv asya jambhiṣad api karṇe varāhayur viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: śvā nu asya jambhiṣat api karṇe varāhayuḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.05a priyā taṣṭāni me kapir vyaktā vy adūduṣat /
analyzed: priyā taṣṭāni me kapiḥ vyaktā vi adūduṣat

original: RV_10,086.05c śiro nv asya rāviṣaṃ na sugaṃ duṣkṛte bhuvaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ nu asya rāviṣam na sugam duṣkṛte bhuvam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.06a na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat /
analyzed: na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat

original: RV_10,086.06c na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthy udyamīyasī viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthi udyamīyasī viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.07a uve amba sulābhike yathevāṅga bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: amba sulābhike yathā iva aṅga bhaviṣyati

original: RV_10,086.07c bhasan me amba sakthi me śiro me vīva hṛṣyati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: bhasad me amba sakthi me śiraḥ me vi iva hṛṣyati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.08a kiṃ subāho svaṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthujāghane /
analyzed: kim su bāho su aṅgure

original: RV_10,086.08c kiṃ śūrapatni nas tvam abhy amīṣi vṛṣākapiṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: kim śūra patni naḥ tvam abhī amīṣi vṛṣākapim viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.09a avīrām iva mām ayaṃ śarārur abhi manyate /
analyzed: avīrām iva mām ayam śarāruḥ abhi manyate

original: RV_10,086.09c utāham asmi vīriṇīndrapatnī marutsakhā viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: uta aham asmi vīriṇī indra patnī marut sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.10a saṃhotraṃ sma purā nārī samanaṃ vāva gacchati /
analyzed: saṃhotram sma purā nārī samanam vāva gacchati

original: RV_10,086.10c vedhā ṛtasya vīriṇīndrapatnī mahīyate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: vedhāḥ ṛtasya vīriṇī indra patnī mahīyate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.11a indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam /
analyzed: indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam

original: RV_10,086.11c nahy asyā aparaṃ cana jarasā marate patir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: nahi asyāḥ aparam cana jarasā marate patiḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.12a nāham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyur vṛṣākaper ṛte /
analyzed: na aham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyuḥ vṛṣākapeḥ ṛte

original: RV_10,086.12c yasyedam apyaṃ haviḥ priyaṃ deveṣu gacchati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: yasya idam apyam haviḥ priyam deveṣu gacchati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.13a vṛṣākapāyi revati suputra ād u susnuṣe /
analyzed: vṛṣākapāyi revati su putre āt u su snuṣe

original: RV_10,086.13c ghasat ta indra ukṣaṇaḥ priyaṃ kācitkaraṃ havir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: ghasat te indraḥ ukṣaṇaḥ priyam kācitkaram haviḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.14a ukṣṇo hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃśatim /
analyzed: ukṣṇaḥ hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃśatim

original: RV_10,086.14c utāham admi pīva id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: uta aham admi pīvaḥ id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.15a vṛṣabho na tigmaśṛṅgo 'ntar yūtheṣu roruvat /
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ na tigma śṛṅgaḥ ntar yūtheṣu roruvat

original: RV_10,086.15c manthas ta indra śaṃ hṛde yaṃ te sunoti bhāvayur viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: manthaḥ te indra śam hṛde yam te sunoti bhāvayuḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.16a na seśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt /
analyzed: na sa īśe yasya rambate ntarā kapṛth

original: RV_10,086.16c sed īśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
analyzed: sa id īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10,086.17a na seśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate /
analyzed: na sa īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate
