analyzed: tat indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvam yudhaḥ naraḥ iṣu hastena vṛṣṇā

original: RV_10,103.03a sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudha indro gaṇena /
analyzed: saḥ iṣu hastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhiḥ vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudhaḥ indraḥ gaṇena

original: RV_10,103.03c saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa jit soma pāḥ bāhuśardhī ugra dhanvā pratihitābhiḥ astā

original: RV_10,103.04a bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrāṃ apabādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspate pari dīya rathena rakṣaḥ hā amitrān apabādhamānaḥ

original: RV_10,103.04c prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayann asmākam edhy avitā rathānām //
analyzed: prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇaḥ yudhā jayan asmākam edhi avitā rathānām

original: RV_10,103.05a balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ /
analyzed: sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ

original: RV_10,103.05c abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govit //
analyzed: abhivīraḥ abhisatvā sahaḥ jāḥ jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha go vid

original: RV_10,103.06a gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā /
analyzed: gotrabhidam go vidam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā

original: RV_10,103.06c imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvam indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam //
analyzed: imam sajātāḥ anu vīrayadhvam indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam

original: RV_10,103.07a abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ /
analyzed: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ dayaḥ vīraḥ śata manyuḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10,103.07c duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ ayudhyo 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu //
analyzed: duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāh ayudhyaḥ smākam senāḥ avatu pra yutsu

original: RV_10,103.08a indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ āsām netā bṛhaspatiḥ dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ puras etu somaḥ

original: RV_10,103.08c devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnām maruto yantv agram //
analyzed: deva senānām abhibhañjatīnām jayantīnām marutaḥ yantu agram

original: RV_10,103.09a indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānām marutāṃ śardha ugram /
analyzed: indrasya vṛṣṇaḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ ādityānām marutām śardhaḥ ugram

original: RV_10,103.09c mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt //
analyzed: mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānām ghoṣaḥ devānām jayatām ud asthāt

original: RV_10,103.10a ud dharṣaya maghavann āyudhāny ut satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi /
analyzed: ud dharṣaya maghavan āyudhāni ud satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi

original: RV_10,103.10c ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājināny ud rathānāṃ jayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ //
analyzed: ud vṛtrahan vājinām vājināni ud rathānām jayatām yantu ghoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,103.11a asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu /
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣu asmākam yāḥ iṣavaḥ tāḥ jayantu

original: RV_10,103.11c asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmāṃ u devā avatā haveṣu //
analyzed: asmākam vīrāḥ uttare bhavantu asmān u devāḥ avata haveṣu

original: RV_10,103.12a amīṣāṃ cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi /
analyzed: amīṣām cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi

original: RV_10,103.12c abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantām //
analyzed: abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām

original: RV_10,103.13a pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yacchatu /
analyzed: pra ita jayata naraḥ indraḥ vaḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_10,103.13c ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavo 'nādhṛṣyā yathāsatha //
analyzed: ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ na adhṛṣyāḥ yathā asatha

original: RV_10,104.01a asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyaṃ haribhyāṃ yajñam upa yāhi tūyam /
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyam haribhyām yajñam upa yāhi tūyam

original: RV_10,104.01c tubhyaṃ giro vipravīrā iyānā dadhanvira indra pibā sutasya //
analyzed: tubhyam giraḥ vipra vīrāḥ iyānāḥ dadhanvire indra piba sutasya

original: RV_10,104.02a apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva /
analyzed: apsu dhūtasya harivas piba iha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva

original: RV_10,104.02c mimikṣur yam adraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhir vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ //
analyzed: mimikṣuḥ yam adrayaḥ indra tubhyam tebhiḥ vardhasva madam uktha vāhaḥ

original: RV_10,104.03a progrām pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam /
analyzed: pra ugrām pītim vṛṣṇe iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam

original: RV_10,104.03c indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: indra dhenābhiḥ iha mādayasva dhībhiḥ viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10,104.04a ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayaḥ dadhānāḥ uśijaḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_10,104.04c prajāvad indra manuṣo duroṇe tasthur gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ //
analyzed: prajāvat indra manuṣaḥ duroṇe tasthuḥ gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,104.05a praṇītibhiṣ ṭe haryaśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya pururuco janāsaḥ /
analyzed: praṇītibhiḥ te hari aśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya puru rucaḥ janāsaḥ

original: RV_10,104.05c maṃhiṣṭhām ūtiṃ vitire dadhānā stotāra indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhām ūtim vitire dadhānāḥ stotāraḥ indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_10,104.06a upa brahmāṇi harivo haribhyāṃ somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya /
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi harivas haribhyām somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya

original: RV_10,104.06c indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaḍ dāśvāṃ asy adhvarasya praketaḥ //
analyzed: indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaṭ dāśvān asi adhvarasya praketaḥ

original: RV_10,104.07a sahasravājam abhimātiṣāhaṃ suteraṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim /
analyzed: sahasra vājam abhimātiṣāham suta īraṇam maghavānam suvṛktim

original: RV_10,104.07c upa bhūṣanti giro apratītam indraṃ namasyā jarituḥ pananta //
analyzed: upa bhūṣanti giraḥ apratītam indram namasyāḥ jarituḥ pananta

original: RV_10,104.08a saptāpo devīḥ suraṇā amṛktā yābhiḥ sindhum atara indra pūrbhit /
analyzed: sapta apaḥ devīḥ su raṇāḥ amṛktāḥ yābhiḥ sindhum ataraḥ indra pūḥ bhid

original: RV_10,104.08c navatiṃ srotyā nava ca sravantīr devebhyo gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ //
analyzed: navatim srotyāḥ nava ca sravantīḥ devebhyaḥ gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ

original: RV_10,104.09a apo mahīr abhiśaster amuñco 'jāgar āsv adhi deva ekaḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ mahīḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ jāgar āsu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10,104.09c indra yās tvaṃ vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhir viśvāyus tanvam pupuṣyāḥ //
analyzed: indra yāḥ tvam vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhiḥ viśvāyuḥ tanvam pupuṣyāḥ

original: RV_10,104.10a vīreṇyaḥ kratur indraḥ suśastir utāpi dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe /
analyzed: vīreṇyaḥ kratuḥ indraḥ su śastiḥ uta api dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe

original: RV_10,104.10c ārdayad vṛtram akṛṇod u lokaṃ sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: ārdayat vṛtram akṛṇot u lokam sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ

original: RV_10,104.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_10,104.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_10,105.01a kadā vaso stotraṃ haryata āva śmaśā rudhad vāḥ /
analyzed: kadā vasoḥ stotram haryataḥ āva śmaśā rudhat vāḥ

original: RV_10,105.01c dīrghaṃ sutaṃ vātāpyāya //
analyzed: dīrgham sutam vātāpyāya

original: RV_10,105.02a harī yasya suyujā vivratā ver arvantānu śepā /
analyzed: harī yasya su yujā vivratā veḥ arvantā anu śepā

original: RV_10,105.02c ubhā rajī na keśinā patir dan //
analyzed: ubhā rajī na keśinā patiḥ

original: RV_10,105.03a apa yor indraḥ pāpaja ā marto na śaśramāṇo bibhīvān /
analyzed: apa yoḥ indraḥ pāpa jaḥ ā martaḥ na śaśramāṇaḥ bibhīvān

original: RV_10,105.03c śubhe yad yuyuje taviṣīvān //
analyzed: śubhe yat yuyuje taviṣīvān

original: RV_10,105.04a sacāyor indraś carkṛṣa āṃ upānasaḥ saparyan /
analyzed: sacā ayoḥ indraḥ carkṛṣe ām upānasaḥ saparyan

original: RV_10,105.04c nadayor vivratayoḥ śūra indraḥ //
analyzed: nadayoḥ vivratayoḥ śūraḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10,105.05a adhi yas tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai /
analyzed: adhi yaḥ tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai

original: RV_10,105.05c vanoti śiprābhyāṃ śipriṇīvān //
analyzed: vanoti śiprābhyām śipriṇīvān

original: RV_10,105.06a prāstaud ṛṣvaujā ṛṣvebhis tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā /
analyzed: prāstaut ṛṣva ojāḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā

original: RV_10,105.06c ṛbhur na kratubhir mātariśvā //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ na kratubhiḥ mātariśvā

original: RV_10,105.07a vajraṃ yaś cakre suhanāya dasyave hirīmaśo hirīmān /
analyzed: vajram yaḥ cakre su hanāya dasyave hirīmaśaḥ hirīmān

original: RV_10,105.07c arutahanur adbhutaṃ na rajaḥ //
analyzed: a ruta hanuḥ adbhutam na rajaḥ

original: RV_10,105.08a ava no vṛjinā śiśīhy ṛcā vanemānṛcaḥ /
analyzed: ava naḥ vṛjinā śiśīhi ṛcā vanema anṛcaḥ

original: RV_10,105.08c nābrahmā yajña ṛdhag joṣati tve //
analyzed: na abrahmā yajñaḥ ṛdhak joṣati tve

original: RV_10,105.09a ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūd yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman /
analyzed: ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūt yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman

original: RV_10,105.09c sajūr nāvaṃ svayaśasaṃ sacāyoḥ //
analyzed: sajūs nāvam sva yaśasam sacā ayoḥ

original: RV_10,105.10a śriye te pṛśnir upasecanī bhūc chriye darvir arepāḥ /
analyzed: śriye te pṛśniḥ upasecanī bhūt śriye darviḥ arepāḥ

original: RV_10,105.10c yayā sve pātre siñcasa ut //
analyzed: yayā sve pātre siñcase ud

original: RV_10,105.11a śataṃ vā yad asurya prati tvā sumitra itthāstaud durmitra itthāstaut /
analyzed: śatam vā yat asurya prati tvā sumitraḥ itthā astaut durmitraḥ itthā astaut

original: RV_10,105.11c āvo yad dasyuhatye kutsaputram prāvo yad dasyuhatye kutsavatsam //
analyzed: āvaḥ yat dasyu hatye kutsa putram prāvaḥ yat dasyu hatye kutsa vatsam

original: RV_10,106.01a ubhā u nūnaṃ tad id arthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyo vastrāpaseva /
analyzed: ubhau u nūnam tat id arthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyaḥ vastrā apasā iva

original: RV_10,106.01c sadhrīcīnā yātave prem ajīgaḥ sudineva pṛkṣa ā taṃsayethe //
analyzed: sadhrīcīnā yātave pra īm ajīgaḥ su dinā iva pṛkṣaḥ ā taṃsayethe

original: RV_10,106.02a uṣṭāreva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogeva śvātryā śāsur ethaḥ /
analyzed: uṣṭārā iva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogā iva śvātryā śāsuḥ ethaḥ

original: RV_10,106.02c dūteva hi ṣṭho yaśasā janeṣu māpa sthātam mahiṣevāvapānāt //
analyzed: dūtā iva hi sthaḥ yaśasā janeṣu mā apa sthātam mahiṣā iva avapānāt

original: RV_10,106.03a sākaṃyujā śakunasyeva pakṣā paśveva citrā yajur ā gamiṣṭam /
analyzed: sākaṃyujā śakunasya iva pakṣā paśū eva citrā yajuḥ ā gamiṣṭam

original: RV_10,106.03c agnir iva devayor dīdivāṃsā parijmāneva yajathaḥ purutrā //
analyzed: agniḥ iva devayoḥ dīdivāṃsā parijmānā iva yajathaḥ purutrā

original: RV_10,106.04a āpī vo asme pitareva putrogreva rucā nṛpatīva turyai /
analyzed: āpī vaḥ asme pitarā iva putrā ugrā iva rucā nṛpatī iva turyai

original: RV_10,106.04c iryeva puṣṭyai kiraṇeva bhujyai śruṣṭīvāneva havam ā gamiṣṭam //
analyzed: iryā iva puṣṭyai kiraṇā iva bhujyai havam ā gamiṣṭam

original: RV_10,106.05a vaṃsageva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitreva ṛtā śatarā śātapantā /
analyzed: vaṃsagā iva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitrā iva ṛtā śatarā

original: RV_10,106.05c vājevoccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣeveṣā saparyā purīṣā //
analyzed: vājā iva uccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣā iva īṣā saparyā purīṣā

original: RV_10,106.06a sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītū naitośeva turpharī parpharīkā /
analyzed: sṛṇyā iva jarbharī naitośā iva turpharī parpharīkā

original: RV_10,106.06c udanyajeva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyv ajaram marāyu //
analyzed: udanya jā iva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyū ajaram marāyu

original: RV_10,106.07a pajreva carcaraṃ jāram marāyu kṣadmevārtheṣu tartarītha ugrā /
analyzed: carcaram jāram marāyu kṣadma iva artheṣu tartarītha ugrā

original: RV_10,106.07c ṛbhū nāpat kharamajrā kharajrur vāyur na parpharat kṣayad rayīṇām //
analyzed: ṛbhū kharamajrā kharajruḥ vāyuḥ na kṣayat rayīṇām

original: RV_10,106.08a gharmeva madhu jaṭhare sanerū bhagevitā turpharī phārivāram /
analyzed: gharmā iva madhu jaṭhare sanerū turpharī

original: RV_10,106.08c patareva cacarā candranirṇiṅ manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī //
analyzed: patarā iva cacarā candra nirṇij manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī

original: RV_10,106.09a bṛhanteva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādeva gādhaṃ tarate vidāthaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhantā iva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādā iva gādham tarate vidāthaḥ

original: RV_10,106.09c karṇeva śāsur anu hi smarātho 'ṃśeva no bhajataṃ citram apnaḥ //
analyzed: karṇā iva śāsuḥ anu hi smarātha u ṃśā iva naḥ bhajatam citram apnaḥ

original: RV_10,106.10a āraṅgareva madhv erayethe sāragheva gavi nīcīnabāre /
analyzed: āraṅgarā iva madhū erayethe sāraghā iva gavi nīcīna bāre

original: RV_10,106.10c kīnāreva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmevorjā sūyavasāt sacethe //
analyzed: kīnārā iva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmā iva ūrjā sū yavasāt sacethe

original: RV_10,106.11a ṛdhyāma stomaṃ sanuyāma vājam ā no mantraṃ sarathehopa yātam /
analyzed: ṛdhyāma stomam sanuyāma vājam ā naḥ mantram sa rathā iha upa yātam

original: RV_10,106.11c yaśo na pakvam madhu goṣv antar ā bhūtāṃśo aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ //
analyzed: yaśaḥ na pakvam madhu goṣu antar ā bhūtāṃśaḥ aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ

original: RV_10,107.01a āvir abhūn mahi māghonam eṣāṃ viśvaṃ jīvaṃ tamaso nir amoci /
analyzed: āvis abhūt mahi māghonam eṣām viśvam jīvam tamasaḥ niḥ amoci

original: RV_10,107.01c mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhir dattam āgād uruḥ panthā dakṣiṇāyā adarśi //
analyzed: mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhiḥ dattam āgāt uruḥ panthāḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ adarśi

original: RV_10,107.02a uccā divi dakṣiṇāvanto asthur ye aśvadāḥ saha te sūryeṇa /
analyzed: uccā divi dakṣiṇāvantaḥ asthuḥ ye aśva dāḥ saha te sūryeṇa

original: RV_10,107.02c hiraṇyadā amṛtatvam bhajante vāsodāḥ soma pra tiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: hiraṇya dāḥ amṛta tvam bhajante vāsaḥ dāḥ soma pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_10,107.03a daivī pūrtir dakṣiṇā devayajyā na kavāribhyo nahi te pṛṇanti /
analyzed: daivī pūrtiḥ dakṣiṇā deva yajyā na kavā aribhyaḥ nahi te pṛṇanti

original: RV_10,107.03c athā naraḥ prayatadakṣiṇāso 'vadyabhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti //
analyzed: athā naraḥ prayata dakṣiṇāsaḥ vadya bhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti

original: RV_10,107.04a śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate haviḥ /
analyzed: śata dhāram vāyum arkam svar vidam nṛ cakṣasaḥ te abhi cakṣate haviḥ

original: RV_10,107.04c ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇāṃ duhate saptamātaram //
analyzed: ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇām duhate sapta mātaram

original: RV_10,107.05a dakṣiṇāvān prathamo hūta eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīr agram eti /
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvān prathamaḥ hūtaḥ eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīḥ agram eti

original: RV_10,107.05c tam eva manye nṛpatiṃ janānāṃ yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇām āvivāya //
analyzed: tam eva manye nṛpatim janānām yaḥ prathamaḥ dakṣiṇām āvivāya

original: RV_10,107.06a tam eva ṛṣiṃ tam u brahmāṇam āhur yajñanyaṃ sāmagām ukthaśāsam /
analyzed: tam eva ṛṣim tam u brahmāṇam āhuḥ yajñanyam sāma gām uktha śāsam

original: RV_10,107.06c sa śukrasya tanvo veda tisro yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇayā rarādha //
analyzed: sa śukrasya tanvaḥ veda tisraḥ yaḥ prathamaḥ dakṣiṇayā rarādha

original: RV_10,107.07a dakṣiṇāśvaṃ dakṣiṇā gāṃ dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yad dhiraṇyam /
analyzed: dakṣiṇā aśvam dakṣiṇā gām dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yat hiraṇyam

original: RV_10,107.07c dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmā dakṣiṇāṃ varma kṛṇute vijānan //
analyzed: dakṣiṇā annam vanute yaḥ naḥ ātmā dakṣiṇām varma kṛṇute vijānan

original: RV_10,107.08a na bhojā mamrur na nyartham īyur na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ /
analyzed: na bhojāḥ mamruḥ na nyartham īyuḥ na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ

original: RV_10,107.08c idaṃ yad viśvam bhuvanaṃ svaś caitat sarvaṃ dakṣiṇaibhyo dadāti //
analyzed: idam yat viśvam bhuvanam svar ca etat sarvam dakṣiṇā ebhyaḥ dadāti

original: RV_10,107.09a bhojā jigyuḥ surabhiṃ yonim agre bhojā jigyur vadhvaṃ yā suvāsāḥ /
analyzed: bhojāḥ jigyuḥ surabhim yonim agre bhojāḥ jigyuḥ vadhvam yā su vāsāḥ

original: RV_10,107.09c bhojā jigyur antaḥpeyaṃ surāyā bhojā jigyur ye ahūtāḥ prayanti //
analyzed: bhojāḥ jigyuḥ antaḥpeyam surāyāḥ bhojāḥ jigyuḥ ye a hūtāḥ prayanti

original: RV_10,107.10a bhojāyāśvaṃ sam mṛjanty āśum bhojāyāste kanyā śumbhamānā /
analyzed: bhojāya aśvam sam mṛjanti āśum bhojāya āste kanyā śumbhamānā

original: RV_10,107.10c bhojasyedam puṣkariṇīva veśma pariṣkṛtaṃ devamāneva citram //
analyzed: bhojasya idam puṣkariṇī iva veśma pariṣkṛtam deva mānā iva citram

original: RV_10,107.11a bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāho vahanti suvṛd ratho vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ /
analyzed: bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāhaḥ vahanti suvṛt rathaḥ vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ

original: RV_10,107.11c bhojaṃ devāso 'vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā //
analyzed: bhojam devāsaḥ vata bhareṣu bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā

original: RV_10,108.01a kim icchantī saramā predam ānaḍ dūre hy adhvā jaguriḥ parācaiḥ /
analyzed: kim icchantī saramā pra idam ānaṭ dūre hi adhvā jaguriḥ parācais

original: RV_10,108.01c kāsmehitiḥ kā paritakmyāsīt kathaṃ rasāyā ataraḥ payāṃsi //
analyzed: kā asmehitiḥ kā paritakmyā āsīt katham rasāyāḥ ataraḥ payāṃsi

original: RV_10,108.02a indrasya dūtīr iṣitā carāmi maha icchantī paṇayo nidhīn vaḥ /
analyzed: indrasya dūtīḥ iṣitā carāmi mahaḥ icchantī paṇayaḥ nidhīn vaḥ

original: RV_10,108.02c atiṣkado bhiyasā tan na āvat tathā rasāyā ataram payāṃsi //
analyzed: atiṣkadaḥ bhiyasā tat naḥ āvat tathā rasāyāḥ ataram payāṃsi

original: RV_10,108.03a kīdṛṅṅ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaraḥ parākāt /
analyzed: kīdṛś indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasya idam dūtīḥ asaraḥ parākāt

original: RV_10,108.03c ā ca gacchān mitram enā dadhāmāthā gavāṃ gopatir no bhavāti //
analyzed: ā ca gacchāt mitram enā dadhāma athā gavām gopatiḥ naḥ bhavāti

original: RV_10,108.04a nāhaṃ taṃ veda dabhyaṃ dabhat sa yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaram parākāt /
analyzed: na aham tam veda dabhyam dabhat sa yasya idam dūtīḥ asaram parākāt

original: RV_10,108.04c na taṃ gūhanti sravato gabhīrā hatā indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve //
analyzed: na tam gūhanti sravataḥ gabhīrāḥ hatāḥ indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve

original: RV_10,108.05a imā gāvaḥ sarame yā aicchaḥ pari divo antān subhage patantī /
analyzed: imāḥ gāvaḥ sarame yāḥ aicchaḥ pari divaḥ antān subhage patantī

original: RV_10,108.05c kas ta enā ava sṛjād ayudhvy utāsmākam āyudhā santi tigmā //
analyzed: kaḥ te enāḥ ava sṛjāt a yudhvī uta asmākam āyudhā santi tigmā

original: RV_10,108.06a asenyā vaḥ paṇayo vacāṃsy aniṣavyās tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ /
analyzed: asenyā vaḥ paṇayaḥ vacāṃsi aniṣavyāḥ tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ

original: RV_10,108.06c adhṛṣṭo va etavā astu panthā bṛhaspatir va ubhayā na mṛḷāt //
analyzed: adhṛṣṭaḥ vaḥ etavai astu panthāḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vaḥ ubhayā na mṛḷāt

original: RV_10,108.07a ayaṃ nidhiḥ sarame adribudhno gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir nyṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: ayam nidhiḥ sarame adri budhnaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ vasubhiḥ ni ṛṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10,108.07c rakṣanti tam paṇayo ye sugopā reku padam alakam ā jagantha //
analyzed: rakṣanti tam paṇayaḥ ye su gopāḥ reku padam alakam ā jagantha

original: RV_10,108.08a eha gamann ṛṣayaḥ somaśitā ayāsyo aṅgiraso navagvāḥ /
analyzed: ā iha gaman ṛṣayaḥ soma śitāḥ ayāsyaḥ aṅgirasaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_10,108.08c ta etam ūrvaṃ vi bhajanta gonām athaitad vacaḥ paṇayo vamann it //
analyzed: te etam ūrvam vi bhajanta gonām atha etat vacaḥ paṇayaḥ vaman id

original: RV_10,108.09a evā ca tvaṃ sarama ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena /
analyzed: evā ca tvam sarame ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena

original: RV_10,108.09c svasāraṃ tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gā apa te gavāṃ subhage bhajāma //
analyzed: svasāram tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gāḥ apa te gavām subhage bhajāma

original: RV_10,108.10a nāhaṃ veda bhrātṛtvaṃ no svasṛtvam indro vidur aṅgirasaś ca ghorāḥ /
analyzed: na aham veda bhrātṛ tvam no svasṛ tvam indraḥ viduḥ aṅgirasaḥ ca ghorāḥ

original: RV_10,108.10c gokāmā me acchadayan yad āyam apāta ita paṇayo varīyaḥ //
analyzed: go kāmāḥ me acchadayan yat āyam apa atas ita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ

original: RV_10,108.11a dūram ita paṇayo varīya ud gāvo yantu minatīr ṛtena /
analyzed: dūram ita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ ud gāvaḥ yantu minatīḥ ṛtena

original: RV_10,108.11c bṛhaspatir yā avindan nigūḷhāḥ somo grāvāṇa ṛṣayaś ca viprāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ yāḥ avindat nigūḍhāḥ somaḥ grāvāṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca viprāḥ

original: RV_10,109.01a te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilo mātariśvā /
analyzed: te vadan prathamāḥ brahma kilbiṣe kūpāraḥ salilaḥ mātariśvā

original: RV_10,109.01c vīḷuharās tapa ugro mayobhūr āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtena //
analyzed: vīḍu harāḥ tapaḥ ugraḥ mayaḥ bhūḥ āpaḥ devīḥ prathama jāḥ ṛtena

original: RV_10,109.02a somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyām punaḥ prāyacchad ahṛṇīyamānaḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ rājā prathamaḥ brahma jāyām punar prāyacchat a hṛṇīyamānaḥ

original: RV_10,109.02c anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya //
analyzed: anvartitā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ āsīt agniḥ hotā hasta gṛhya ā nināya

original: RV_10,109.03a hastenaiva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeyam iti ced avocan /
analyzed: hastena eva grāhyaḥ ādhiḥ asyāḥ brahma jāyā iyam iti ced avocan

original: RV_10,109.03c na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya //
analyzed: na dūtāya prahye tasthe eṣā tathā rāṣṭram gupitam kṣatriyasya

original: RV_10,109.04a devā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayas tapase ye niṣeduḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ etasyām avadanta pūrve sapta ṛṣayaḥ tapase ye niṣeduḥ

original: RV_10,109.04c bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyopanītā durdhāṃ dadhāti parame vyoman //
analyzed: bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasya upanītā durdhām dadhāti parame vyoman

original: RV_10,109.05a brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavaty ekam aṅgam /
analyzed: brahmacārī carati veviṣat viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavati ekam aṅgam

original: RV_10,109.05c tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na devāḥ //
analyzed: tena jāyām anu avindat bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītām juhvam na devāḥ

original: RV_10,109.06a punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ punar manuṣyāḥ uta

original: RV_10,109.06c rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvānā brahmajāyām punar daduḥ //
analyzed: rājānaḥ satyam kṛṇvānāḥ brahma jāyām punar daduḥ

original: RV_10,109.07a punardāya brahmajāyāṃ kṛtvī devair nikilbiṣam /
analyzed: punar dāya brahma jāyām kṛtvī devaiḥ nikilbiṣam

original: RV_10,109.07c ūrjam pṛthivyā bhaktvāyorugāyam upāsate //
analyzed: ūrjam pṛthivyāḥ bhaktvāya urugāyam upāsate

original: RV_10,110.01a samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_10,110.01c ā ca vaha mitramahaś cikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavir asi pracetāḥ //
analyzed: ā ca vaha mitra mahas cikitvān tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ

original: RV_10,110.02a tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadayā sujihva /
analyzed: tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadaya sujihva

original: RV_10,110.02c manmāni dhībhir uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhy adhvaraṃ naḥ //
analyzed: manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ

original: RV_10,110.03a ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaś cā yāhy agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,110.03c tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān //
analyzed: tvam devānām asi yahva hotā saḥ enān yakṣi iṣitaḥ yajīyān

original: RV_10,110.04a prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastor asyā vṛjyate agre ahnām /
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām

original: RV_10,110.04c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditaye syonam //
analyzed: vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam

original: RV_10,110.05a vyacasvatīr urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyo na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /
analyzed: vyacasvatīḥ urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_10,110.05c devīr dvāro bṛhatīr viśvaminvā devebhyo bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ devebhyaḥ bhavata su prāyaṇāḥ

original: RV_10,110.06a ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /
analyzed: ā yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau

original: RV_10,110.06c divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne //
analyzed: divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī su rukme adhi śriyam śukrapiśam dadhāne

original: RV_10,110.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñam manuṣo yajadhyai /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā su vācā mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai

original: RV_10,110.07c pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā //
analyzed: pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā

original: RV_10,110.08a ā no yajñam bhāratī tūyam etv iḷā manuṣvad iha cetayantī /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu iḷā manuṣvat iha cetayantī

original: RV_10,110.08c tisro devīr barhir edaṃ syonaṃ sarasvatī svapasaḥ sadantu //
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam sarasvatī su apasaḥ sadantu

original: RV_10,110.09a ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpair apiṃśad bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpaiḥ apiṃśat bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10,110.09c tam adya hotar iṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān //
analyzed: tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān devam tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān

original: RV_10,110.10a upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pātha ṛtuthā havīṃṣi /
analyzed: upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi

original: RV_10,110.10c vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena //
analyzed: vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena

original: RV_10,110.11a sadyo jāto vy amimīta yajñam agnir devānām abhavat purogāḥ /
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ vi amimīta yajñam agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ

original: RV_10,110.11c asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ //
analyzed: asya hotuḥ pradiśi ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ

original: RV_10,111.01a manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣāṃ yathā-yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām /
analyzed: manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣām yathā yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām

original: RV_10,111.01c indraṃ satyair erayāmā kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīro girvaṇasyur vidānaḥ //
analyzed: indram satyaiḥ ā īrayāma kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīraḥ girvaṇasyuḥ vidānaḥ

original: RV_10,111.02a ṛtasya hi sadaso dhītir adyaut saṃ gārṣṭeyo vṛṣabho gobhir ānaṭ /
analyzed: ṛtasya hi sadasaḥ dhītiḥ adyaut sam gārṣṭeyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ gobhiḥ ānaṭ

original: RV_10,111.02c ud atiṣṭhat taviṣeṇā raveṇa mahānti cit saṃ vivyācā rajāṃsi //
analyzed: ud atiṣṭhat taviṣeṇa raveṇa mahānti cit sam vivyāca rajāṃsi

original: RV_10,111.03a indraḥ kila śrutyā asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya /
analyzed: indraḥ kila śrutyāḥ asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya

original: RV_10,111.03c ān menāṃ kṛṇvann acyuto bhuvad goḥ patir divaḥ sanajā apratītaḥ //
analyzed: āt menām kṛṇvan acyutaḥ bhuvat goḥ patiḥ divaḥ sana jāḥ apratītaḥ

original: RV_10,111.04a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vratāminād aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vratā amināt aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10,111.04c purūṇi cin ni tatānā rajāṃsi dādhāra yo dharuṇaṃ satyatātā //
analyzed: purūṇi cit ni tatāna rajāṃsi dādhāra yaḥ dharuṇam satyatātā

original: RV_10,111.05a indro divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam /
analyzed: indraḥ divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam

original: RV_10,111.05c mahīṃ cid dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān //
analyzed: mahīm cit dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān

original: RV_10,111.06a vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ /
analyzed: vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ

original: RV_10,111.06c vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghanthāthābhavo maghavan bāhvojāḥ //
analyzed: vi dhṛṣṇaḥ atra dhṛṣatā jaghantha atha abhavaḥ maghavan bāhu ojāḥ

original: RV_10,111.07a sacanta yad uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrām asya ketavo rām avindan /
analyzed: sacanta yat uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrām asya ketavaḥ rām avindan

original: RV_10,111.07c ā yan nakṣatraṃ dadṛśe divo na punar yato nakir addhā nu veda //
analyzed: ā yat nakṣatram dadṛśe divaḥ na punar yataḥ nakir addhā nu veda

original: RV_10,111.08a dūraṃ kila prathamā jagmur āsām indrasya yāḥ prasave sasrur āpaḥ /
analyzed: dūram kila prathamāḥ jagmuḥ āsām indrasya yāḥ prasave sasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_10,111.08c kva svid agraṃ kva budhna āsām āpo madhyaṃ kva vo nūnam antaḥ //
analyzed: kva svid agram kva budhnaḥ āsām āpaḥ madhyam kva vaḥ nūnam antaḥ

original: RV_10,111.09a sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānāṃ ād id etāḥ pra vivijre javena /
analyzed: sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānām āt id etāḥ pra vivijre javena

original: RV_10,111.09c mumukṣamāṇā uta yā mumucre 'dhed etā na ramante nitiktāḥ //
analyzed: mumukṣamāṇāḥ uta yāḥ mumucre dhā id etāḥ na ramante nitiktāḥ

original: RV_10,111.10a sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīr ivāyan sanāj jāra āritaḥ pūrbhid āsām /
analyzed: sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīḥ iva āyan sanāt jāraḥ āritaḥ pūrbhid āsām

original: RV_10,111.10c astam ā te pārthivā vasūny asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtā indra pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: astam ā te pārthivā vasūni asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtāḥ indra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_10,112.01a indra piba pratikāmaṃ sutasya prātaḥsāvas tava hi pūrvapītiḥ /
analyzed: indra piba pratikāmam sutasya prātaḥsāvaḥ tava hi pūrva pītiḥ

original: RV_10,112.01c harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiṣ ṭe vīryā pra bravāma //
analyzed: harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiḥ te vīryā pra bravāma

original: RV_10,112.02a yas te ratho manaso javīyān endra tena somapeyāya yāhi /
analyzed: yaḥ te rathaḥ manasaḥ javīyān ā indra tena soma peyāya yāhi

original: RV_10,112.02c tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhir yāsi vṛṣabhir mandamānaḥ //
analyzed: tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhiḥ yāsi vṛṣabhiḥ mandamānaḥ

original: RV_10,112.03a haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhai rūpais tanvaṃ sparśayasva /
analyzed: haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhaiḥ rūpaiḥ tanvam sparśayasva

original: RV_10,112.03c asmābhir indra sakhibhir huvānaḥ sadhrīcīno mādayasvā niṣadya //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ indra sakhibhiḥ huvānaḥ sadhrīcīnaḥ mādayasva niṣadya

original: RV_10,112.04a yasya tyat te mahimānam madeṣv ime mahī rodasī nāviviktām /
analyzed: yasya tyad te mahimānam madeṣu ime mahī rodasī na aviviktām

original: RV_10,112.04c tad oka ā haribhir indra yuktaiḥ priyebhir yāhi priyam annam accha //
analyzed: tat okaḥ ā haribhiḥ indra yuktaiḥ priyebhiḥ yāhi priyam annam accha

original: RV_10,112.05a yasya śaśvat papivāṃ indra śatrūn anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha /
analyzed: yasya śaśvat papivān indra śatrūn anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha

original: RV_10,112.05c sa te purandhiṃ taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya suta indra somaḥ //
analyzed: sa te purandhim taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya sutaḥ indra somaḥ

original: RV_10,112.06a idaṃ te pātraṃ sanavittam indra pibā somam enā śatakrato /
analyzed: idam te pātram sanavittam indra piba somam enā śatakrato

original: RV_10,112.06c pūrṇa āhāvo madirasya madhvo yaṃ viśva id abhiharyanti devāḥ //
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āhāvaḥ madirasya madhvaḥ yam viśve id abhiharyanti devāḥ

original: RV_10,112.07a vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāso hitaprayaso vṛṣabha hvayante /
analyzed: vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāsaḥ hita prayasaḥ vṛṣabha hvayante

original: RV_10,112.07c asmākaṃ te madhumattamānīmā bhuvan savanā teṣu harya //
analyzed: asmākam te madhumattamāni imā bhuvan savanā teṣu harya

original: RV_10,112.08a pra ta indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnaṃ vīryā vocam prathamā kṛtāni /
analyzed: pra te indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnam vīryā vocam prathamā kṛtāni

original: RV_10,112.08c satīnamanyur aśrathāyo adriṃ suvedanām akṛṇor brahmaṇe gām //
analyzed: satīna manyuḥ aśrathāyaḥ adrim su vedanām akṛṇoḥ brahmaṇe gām

original: RV_10,112.09a ni ṣu sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvām āhur vipratamaṃ kavīnām /
analyzed: ni su sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvām āhuḥ vipratamam kavīnām

original: RV_10,112.09c na ṛte tvat kriyate kiṃ canāre mahām arkam maghavañ citram arca //
analyzed: na ṛte tvat kriyate kim cana are arkam maghavam citram arca

original: RV_10,112.10a abhikhyā no maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasupate sakhīnām /
analyzed: naḥ maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasu pate sakhīnām

original: RV_10,112.10c raṇaṃ kṛdhi raṇakṛt satyaśuṣmābhakte cid ā bhajā rāye asmān //
analyzed: raṇam kṛdhi raṇa kṛt satya śuṣma a bhakte cit ā bhaja rāye asmān

original: RV_10,113.01a tam asya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā viśvebhir devair anu śuṣmam āvatām /
analyzed: tam asya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ anu śuṣmam āvatām

original: RV_10,113.01c yad ait kṛṇvāno mahimānam indriyam pītvī somasya kratumāṃ avardhata //
analyzed: yat ait kṛṇvānaḥ mahimānam indriyam pītvī somasya kratumān avardhata

original: RV_10,113.02a tam asya viṣṇur mahimānam ojasāṃśuṃ dadhanvān madhuno vi rapśate /
analyzed: tam asya viṣṇuḥ mahimānam ojasā aṃśum dadhanvān madhunaḥ vi rapśate

original: RV_10,113.02c devebhir indro maghavā sayāvabhir vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ abhavad vareṇyaḥ //
analyzed: devebhiḥ indraḥ maghavā sa yāvabhiḥ vṛtram jaghanvān abhavat vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_10,113.03a vṛtreṇa yad ahinā bibhrad āyudhā samasthithā yudhaye śaṃsam āvide /
analyzed: vṛtreṇa yat ahinā bibhrat āyudhā samasthithāḥ yudhaye śaṃsam āvide

original: RV_10,113.03c viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanāvardhann ugra mahimānam indriyam //
analyzed: viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanā avardhan ugra mahimānam indriyam

original: RV_10,113.04a jajñāna eva vy abādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyad vīro abhi pauṃsyaṃ raṇam /
analyzed: jajñānaḥ eva vi abādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyat vīraḥ abhi pauṃsyam raṇam

original: RV_10,113.04c avṛścad adrim ava sasyadaḥ sṛjad astabhnān nākaṃ svapasyayā pṛthum //
analyzed: avṛścat adrim ava sasyadaḥ sṛjat astabhnāt nākam su apasyayā pṛthum

original: RV_10,113.05a ād indraḥ satrā taviṣīr apatyata varīyo dyāvāpṛthivī abādhata /
analyzed: āt indraḥ satrā taviṣīḥ apatyata varīyaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī abādhata

original: RV_10,113.05c avābharad dhṛṣito vajram āyasaṃ śevam mitrāya varuṇāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: avābharat dhṛṣitaḥ vajram āyasam śevam mitrāya varuṇāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_10,113.06a indrasyātra taviṣībhyo virapśina ṛghāyato araṃhayanta manyave /
analyzed: indrasya atra taviṣībhyaḥ virapśinaḥ ṛghāyataḥ araṃhayanta manyave

original: RV_10,113.06c vṛtraṃ yad ugro vy avṛścad ojasāpo bibhrataṃ tamasā parīvṛtam //
analyzed: vṛtram yat ugraḥ vi avṛścat ojasā apaḥ bibhratam tamasā parīvṛtam

original: RV_10,113.07a yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhir yatamānau samīyatuḥ /
analyzed: yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhiḥ yatamānau samīyatuḥ

original: RV_10,113.07c dhvāntaṃ tamo 'va dadhvase hata indro mahnā pūrvahūtāv apatyata //
analyzed: dhvāntam tamaḥ vaḥ dadhvase hate indraḥ mahnā pūrva hūtau apatyata

original: RV_10,113.08a viśve devāso adha vṛṣṇyāni te 'vardhayan somavatyā vacasyayā /
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ adha vṛṣṇyāni te vardhayan somavatyā vacasyayā

original: RV_10,113.08c raddhaṃ vṛtram ahim indrasya hanmanāgnir na jambhais tṛṣv annam āvayat //
analyzed: raddham vṛtram ahim indrasya hanmanā agniḥ na jambhaiḥ tṛṣu annam āvayat

original: RV_10,113.09a bhūri dakṣebhir vacanebhir ṛkvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyāni pra vocata /
analyzed: bhūri dakṣebhiḥ vacanebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyāni pra vocata

original: RV_10,113.09c indro dhuniṃ ca cumuriṃ ca dambhayañ chraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye //
analyzed: indraḥ dhunim ca cumurim ca dambhayam śraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye

original: RV_10,113.10a tvam purūṇy ā bharā svaśvyā yebhir maṃsai nivacanāni śaṃsan /
analyzed: tvam purūṇi ā bhara su aśvyā yebhiḥ maṃsai nivacanāni śaṃsan

original: RV_10,113.10c sugebhir viśvā duritā tarema vido ṣu ṇa urviyā gādham adya //
analyzed: sugebhiḥ viśvā duritā tarema vidaḥ su naḥ urviyā gādham adya

original: RV_10,114.01a gharmā samantā trivṛtaṃ vy āpatus tayor juṣṭim mātariśvā jagāma /
analyzed: gharmā samantā trivṛtam vi āpatuḥ tayoḥ juṣṭim mātariśvā jagāma

original: RV_10,114.01c divas payo didhiṣāṇā aveṣan vidur devāḥ sahasāmānam arkam //
analyzed: divaḥ payaḥ didhiṣāṇāḥ aveṣan viduḥ devāḥ sahasāmānam arkam

original: RV_10,114.02a tisro deṣṭrāya nirṛtīr upāsate dīrghaśruto vi hi jānanti vahnayaḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ deṣṭrāya nirṛtīḥ upāsate dīrgha śrutaḥ vi hi jānanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_10,114.02c tāsāṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo nidānam pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu //
analyzed: tāsām ni cikyuḥ kavayaḥ nidānam pareṣu yāḥ guhyeṣu vrateṣu

original: RV_10,114.03a catuṣkapardā yuvatiḥ supeśā ghṛtapratīkā vayunāni vaste /
analyzed: catur kapardā yuvatiḥ supeśāḥ ghṛta pratīkā vayunāni vaste

original: RV_10,114.03c tasyāṃ suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni ṣedatur yatra devā dadhire bhāgadheyam //
analyzed: tasyām suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni sedatuḥ yatra devāḥ dadhire bhāgadheyam

original: RV_10,114.04a ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram ā viveśa sa idaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi caṣṭe /
analyzed: ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram ā viveśa saḥ idam viśvam bhuvanam vi caṣṭe

original: RV_10,114.04c tam pākena manasāpaśyam antitas tam mātā reḷhi sa u reḷhi mātaram //
analyzed: tam pākena manasā apaśyam antitas tam mātā reḍhi saḥ u reḍhi mātaram

original: RV_10,114.05a suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhir ekaṃ santam bahudhā kalpayanti /
analyzed: suparṇam viprāḥ kavayaḥ vacobhiḥ ekam santam bahudhā kalpayanti

original: RV_10,114.05c chandāṃsi ca dadhato adhvareṣu grahān somasya mimate dvādaśa //
analyzed: chandāṃsi ca dadhataḥ adhvareṣu grahān somasya mimate dvādaśa

original: RV_10,114.06a ṣaṭtriṃśāṃś ca caturaḥ kalpayantaś chandāṃsi ca dadhata ādvādaśam /
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśān ca caturaḥ kalpayantaḥ chandāṃsi ca dadhataḥ ādvādaśam

original: RV_10,114.06c yajñaṃ vimāya kavayo manīṣa ṛksāmābhyām pra rathaṃ vartayanti //
analyzed: yajñam vimāya kavayaḥ manīṣe ṛk sāmābhyām pra ratham vartayanti

original: RV_10,114.07a caturdaśānye mahimāno asya taṃ dhīrā vācā pra ṇayanti sapta /
analyzed: caturdaśā anye mahimānaḥ asya tam dhīrāḥ vācā pra nayanti sapta

original: RV_10,114.07c āpnānaṃ tīrthaṃ ka iha pra vocad yena pathā prapibante sutasya //
analyzed: āpnānam tīrtham kaḥ iha pra vocat yena pathā prapibante sutasya

original: RV_10,114.08a sahasradhā pañcadaśāny ukthā yāvad dyāvāpṛthivī tāvad it tat /
analyzed: sahasradhā pañcadaśāni ukthā yāvat dyāvāpṛthivī tāvat id tat

original: RV_10,114.08c sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasraṃ yāvad brahma viṣṭhitaṃ tāvatī vāk //
analyzed: sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasram yāvat brahma viṣṭhitam tāvatī vāc

original: RV_10,114.09a kaś chandasāṃ yogam ā veda dhīraḥ ko dhiṣṇyām prati vācam papāda /
analyzed: kaḥ chandasām yogam ā veda dhīraḥ kaḥ dhiṣṇyām prati vācam papāda

original: RV_10,114.09c kam ṛtvijām aṣṭamaṃ śūram āhur harī indrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svit //
analyzed: kam ṛtvijām aṣṭamam śūram āhuḥ harī indrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svid

original: RV_10,114.10a bhūmyā antam pary eke caranti rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāso asthuḥ /
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ antam pari eke caranti rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_10,114.10c śramasya dāyaṃ vi bhajanty ebhyo yadā yamo bhavati harmye hitaḥ //
analyzed: śramasya dāyam vi bhajanti ebhyaḥ yadā yamaḥ bhavati harmye hitaḥ

original: RV_10,115.01a citra ic chiśos taruṇasya vakṣatho na yo mātarāv apyeti dhātave /
analyzed: citraḥ id śiśoḥ taruṇasya vakṣathaḥ na yaḥ mātarau apyeti dhātave

original: RV_10,115.01c anūdhā yadi jījanad adhā ca nu vavakṣa sadyo mahi dūtyaṃ caran //
analyzed: anūdhāḥ yadi jījanat adhā ca nu vavakṣa sadyas mahi dūtyam caran

original: RV_10,115.02a agnir ha nāma dhāyi dann apastamaḥ saṃ yo vanā yuvate bhasmanā datā /
analyzed: agniḥ ha nāma dhāyi dan apastamaḥ sam yaḥ vanā yuvate bhasmanā datā

original: RV_10,115.02c abhipramurā juhvā svadhvara ino na prothamāno yavase vṛṣā //
analyzed: abhipramurā juhvā su adhvaraḥ inaḥ na prothamānaḥ yavase vṛṣā

original: RV_10,115.03a taṃ vo viṃ na druṣadaṃ devam andhasa indum prothantam pravapantam arṇavam /
analyzed: tam vaḥ vim na druṣadam devam andhasaḥ indum prothantam pravapantam arṇavam

original: RV_10,115.03c āsā vahniṃ na śociṣā virapśinam mahivrataṃ na sarajantam adhvanaḥ //
analyzed: āsā vahnim na śociṣā virapśinam mahi vratam na sarajantam adhvanaḥ

original: RV_10,115.04a vi yasya te jrayasānasyājara dhakṣor na vātāḥ pari santy acyutāḥ /
analyzed: vi yasya te jrayasānasya ajara dhakṣoḥ na vātāḥ pari santi acyutāḥ

original: RV_10,115.04c ā raṇvāso yuyudhayo na satvanaṃ tritaṃ naśanta pra śiṣanta iṣṭaye //
analyzed: ā raṇvāsaḥ yuyudhayaḥ na satvanam tritam naśanta pra śiṣantaḥ iṣṭaye

original: RV_10,115.05a sa id agniḥ kaṇvatamaḥ kaṇvasakhāryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ id agniḥ kaṇvatamaḥ kaṇva sakhā āryaḥ parasya antarasya taruṣaḥ

original: RV_10,115.05c agniḥ pātu gṛṇato agniḥ sūrīn agnir dadātu teṣām avo naḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ pātu gṛṇataḥ agniḥ sūrīn agniḥ dadātu teṣām avaḥ naḥ

original: RV_10,115.06a vājintamāya sahyase supitrya tṛṣu cyavāno anu jātavedase /
analyzed: vājintamāya sahyase su pitrya tṛṣu cyavānaḥ anu jātavedase

original: RV_10,115.06c anudre cid yo dhṛṣatā varaṃ sate mahintamāya dhanvaned aviṣyate //
analyzed: anudre cit yaḥ dhṛṣatā varam sate mahintamāya dhanvanā id aviṣyate

original: RV_10,115.07a evāgnir martaiḥ saha sūribhir vasu ṣṭave sahasaḥ sūnaro nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: eva agniḥ martaiḥ saha sūribhiḥ vasu stave sahasaḥ sūnaraḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_10,115.07c mitrāso na ye sudhitā ṛtāyavo dyāvo na dyumnair abhi santi mānuṣān //
analyzed: mitrāsaḥ na ye sudhitāḥ ṛtāyavaḥ dyāvaḥ na dyumnaiḥ abhi santi mānuṣān

original: RV_10,115.08a ūrjo napāt sahasāvann iti tvopastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāk /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt sahasāvan iti tvā upastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāc

original: RV_10,115.08c tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: tvām stoṣāma tvayā su vīrāḥ drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,115.09a iti tvāgne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrā upastutāsa ṛṣayo 'vocan /
analyzed: iti tvā agne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrāḥ upastutāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ vocan

original: RV_10,115.09c tāṃś ca pāhi gṛṇataś ca sūrīn vaṣaḍ vaṣaḷ ity ūrdhvāso anakṣan namo nama ity ūrdhvāso anakṣan //
analyzed: tān ca pāhi gṛṇataḥ ca sūrīn vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭ iti ūrdhvāsaḥ anakṣan namaḥ namaḥ iti ūrdhvāsaḥ anakṣan

original: RV_10,116.01a pibā somam mahata indriyāya pibā vṛtrāya hantave śaviṣṭha /
analyzed: pibā somam mahate indriyāya pibā vṛtrāya hantave śaviṣṭha

original: RV_10,116.01c piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvas tṛpad indrā vṛṣasva //
analyzed: piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvaḥ tṛpat indra ā vṛṣasva

original: RV_10,116.02a asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasyendra somasya varam ā sutasya /
analyzed: asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasya indra somasya varam ā sutasya

original: RV_10,116.02c svastidā manasā mādayasvārvācīno revate saubhagāya //
analyzed: svasti dāḥ manasā mādayasva arvācīnaḥ revate saubhagāya

original: RV_10,116.03a mamattu tvā divyaḥ soma indra mamattu yaḥ sūyate pārthiveṣu /
analyzed: mamattu tvā divyaḥ somaḥ indra mamattu yaḥ sūyate pārthiveṣu

original: RV_10,116.03c mamattu yena varivaś cakartha mamattu yena niriṇāsi śatrūn //
analyzed: mamattu yena varivaḥ cakartha mamattu yena niriṇāsi śatrūn

original: RV_10,116.04a ā dvibarhā amino yātv indro vṛṣā haribhyām pariṣiktam andhaḥ /
analyzed: ā dvibarhāḥ aminaḥ yātu indraḥ vṛṣā haribhyām pariṣiktam andhaḥ

original: RV_10,116.04c gavy ā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedām aruśahā vṛṣasva //
analyzed: gavi ā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedām aruśa hā vṛṣasva

original: RV_10,116.05a ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyāny ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnām /
analyzed: ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyāni ava sthirā tanuhi yātu jūnām

original: RV_10,116.05c ugrāya te saho balaṃ dadāmi pratītyā śatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca //
analyzed: ugrāya te sahaḥ balam dadāmi pratītyā śatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca

original: RV_10,116.06a vy arya indra tanuhi śravāṃsy oja sthireva dhanvano 'bhimātīḥ /
analyzed: vi aryaḥ indra tanuhi śravāṃsi ojaḥ sthirā iva dhanvanaḥ bhimātīḥ

original: RV_10,116.06c asmadryag vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhir anibhṛṣṭas tanvaṃ vāvṛdhasva //
analyzed: asmadryak vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhiḥ a nibhṛṣṭaḥ tanvam vāvṛdhasva

original: RV_10,116.07a idaṃ havir maghavan tubhyaṃ rātam prati samrāḷ ahṛṇāno gṛbhāya /
analyzed: idam haviḥ maghavan tubhyam rātam prati samrāj a hṛṇānaḥ gṛbhāya

original: RV_10,116.07c tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyam pakvo 'ddhīndra piba ca prasthitasya //
analyzed: tubhyam sutaḥ maghavan tubhyam pakvaḥ ddhi indra piba ca prasthitasya

original: RV_10,116.08a addhīd indra prasthitemā havīṃṣi cano dadhiṣva pacatota somam /
analyzed: addhi id indra prasthita imā havīṃṣi canaḥ dadhiṣva pacata uta somam

original: RV_10,116.08c prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ //
analyzed: prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ

original: RV_10,116.09a prendrāgnibhyāṃ suvacasyām iyarmi sindhāv iva prerayaṃ nāvam arkaiḥ /
analyzed: pra indra agnibhyām suvacasyām iyarmi sindhau iva pra īrayam nāvam arkaiḥ

original: RV_10,116.09c ayā iva pari caranti devā ye asmabhyaṃ dhanadā udbhidaś ca //
analyzed: ayāḥ iva pari caranti devāḥ ye asmabhyam dhana dāḥ udbhidaḥ ca

original: RV_10,117.01a na vā u devāḥ kṣudham id vadhaṃ dadur utāśitam upa gacchanti mṛtyavaḥ /
analyzed: na vai u devāḥ kṣudham id vadham daduḥ uta āśitam upa gacchanti mṛtyavaḥ

original: RV_10,117.01c uto rayiḥ pṛṇato nopa dasyaty utāpṛṇan marḍitāraṃ na vindate //
analyzed: uta u rayiḥ pṛṇataḥ na upa dasyati uta a pṛṇan marḍitāram na vindate

original: RV_10,117.02a ya ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvo 'nnavān san raphitāyopajagmuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvaḥ unnavān san raphitāya upajagmuṣe

original: RV_10,117.02c sthiram manaḥ kṛṇute sevate puroto cit sa marḍitāraṃ na vindate //
analyzed: sthiram manaḥ kṛṇute sevate purā uta u cit sa marḍitāram na vindate

original: RV_10,117.03a sa id bhojo yo gṛhave dadāty annakāmāya carate kṛśāya /
analyzed: saḥ id bhojaḥ yaḥ gṛhave dadāti anna kāmāya carate kṛśāya

original: RV_10,117.03c aram asmai bhavati yāmahūtā utāparīṣu kṛṇute sakhāyam //
analyzed: aram asmai bhavati yāmahūtau kṛṇute sakhāyam

original: RV_10,117.04a na sa sakhā yo na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve sacamānāya pitvaḥ /
analyzed: na sa sakhā yaḥ na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve sacamānāya pitvaḥ

original: RV_10,117.04c apāsmāt preyān na tad oko asti pṛṇantam anyam araṇaṃ cid icchet //
analyzed: apa asmāt preyāt na tat okaḥ asti pṛṇantam anyam araṇam cit icchet

original: RV_10,117.05a pṛṇīyād in nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsam anu paśyeta panthām /
analyzed: pṛṇīyāt id nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsam anu paśyeta panthām

original: RV_10,117.05c o hi vartante rathyeva cakrānyam-anyam upa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ //
analyzed: ā u hi vartante rathyā iva cakra anyam anyam upa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ

original: RV_10,117.06a mogham annaṃ vindate apracetāḥ satyam bravīmi vadha it sa tasya /
analyzed: mogham annam vindate apracetāḥ satyam bravīmi vadhaḥ id sa tasya

original: RV_10,117.06c nāryamaṇam puṣyati no sakhāyaṃ kevalāgho bhavati kevalādī //
analyzed: na aryamaṇam puṣyati no sakhāyam kevala aghaḥ bhavati kevala ādī

original: RV_10,117.07a kṛṣann it phāla āśitaṃ kṛṇoti yann adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣan id phāle āśitam kṛṇoti yan adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ

original: RV_10,117.07c vadan brahmāvadato vanīyān pṛṇann āpir apṛṇantam abhi ṣyāt //
analyzed: vadan brahma a vadataḥ vanīyān pṛṇan āpiḥ a pṛṇantam abhi syāt

original: RV_10,117.08a ekapād bhūyo dvipado vi cakrame dvipāt tripādam abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: eka pād bhūyas dvi padaḥ vi cakrame dvi pād tri pādam abhī eti paścāt

original: RV_10,117.08c catuṣpād eti dvipadām abhisvare sampaśyan paṅktīr upatiṣṭhamānaḥ //
analyzed: catuṣpād eti dvipadām abhisvare sampaśyan paṅktīḥ upatiṣṭhamānaḥ

original: RV_10,117.09a samau cid dhastau na samaṃ viviṣṭaḥ sammātarā cin na samaṃ duhāte /
analyzed: samau cit hastau na samam viviṣṭaḥ sam mātarā cit na samam duhāte

original: RV_10,117.09c yamayoś cin na samā vīryāṇi jñātī cit santau na samam pṛṇītaḥ //
analyzed: yamayoḥ cit na samā vīryāṇi jñātī cit santau na samam pṛṇītaḥ

original: RV_10,118.01a agne haṃsi ny atriṇaṃ dīdyan martyeṣv ā /
analyzed: agne haṃsi ni atriṇam dīdyan martyeṣu ā

original: RV_10,118.01c sve kṣaye śucivrata //
analyzed: sve kṣaye śuci vrata

original: RV_10,118.02a ut tiṣṭhasi svāhuto ghṛtāni prati modase /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhasi su āhutaḥ ghṛtāni prati modase

original: RV_10,118.02c yat tvā srucaḥ samasthiran //
analyzed: yat tvā srucaḥ samasthiran

original: RV_10,118.03a sa āhuto vi rocate 'gnir īḷenyo girā /
analyzed: saḥ āhutaḥ vi rocate gniḥ īḍenyaḥ girā

original: RV_10,118.03c srucā pratīkam ajyate //
analyzed: srucā pratīkam ajyate

original: RV_10,118.04a ghṛtenāgniḥ sam ajyate madhupratīka āhutaḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtena agniḥ sam ajyate madhu pratīkaḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_10,118.04c rocamāno vibhāvasuḥ //
analyzed: rocamānaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: RV_10,118.05a jaramāṇaḥ sam idhyase devebhyo havyavāhana /
analyzed: jaramāṇaḥ sam idhyase devebhyaḥ havya vāhana

original: RV_10,118.05c taṃ tvā havanta martyāḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā havanta martyāḥ

original: RV_10,118.06a tam martā amartyaṃ ghṛtenāgniṃ saparyata /
analyzed: tam martāḥ amartyam ghṛtena agnim saparyata

original: RV_10,118.06c adābhyaṃ gṛhapatim //
analyzed: adābhyam gṛhapatim

original: RV_10,118.07a adābhyena śociṣāgne rakṣas tvaṃ daha /
analyzed: adābhyena śociṣā agne rakṣaḥ tvam daha

original: RV_10,118.07c gopā ṛtasya dīdihi //
analyzed: gopāḥ ṛtasya dīdihi

original: RV_10,118.08a sa tvam agne pratīkena praty oṣa yātudhānyaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam agne pratīkena prati oṣa yātudhānyaḥ

original: RV_10,118.08c urukṣayeṣu dīdyat //
analyzed: urukṣayeṣu dīdyat

original: RV_10,118.09a taṃ tvā gīrbhir urukṣayā havyavāhaṃ sam īdhire /
analyzed: tam tvā gīrbhiḥ urukṣayāḥ havyavāham sam īdhire

original: RV_10,118.09c yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane //
analyzed: yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane

original: RV_10,119.01a iti vā iti me mano gām aśvaṃ sanuyām iti /
analyzed: iti vai iti me manaḥ gām aśvam sanuyām iti

original: RV_10,119.01c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.02a pra vātā iva dodhata un mā pītā ayaṃsata /
analyzed: pra vātāḥ iva dodhataḥ ud mā pītāḥ ayaṃsata

original: RV_10,119.02c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.03a un mā pītā ayaṃsata ratham aśvā ivāśavaḥ /
analyzed: ud mā pītāḥ ayaṃsata ratham aśvāḥ iva aśavaḥ

original: RV_10,119.03c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.04a upa mā matir asthita vāśrā putram iva priyam /
analyzed: upa mā matiḥ asthita vāśrā putram iva priyam

original: RV_10,119.04c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.05a ahaṃ taṣṭeva vandhuram pary acāmi hṛdā matim /
analyzed: aham taṣṭā iva vandhuram pari acāmi hṛdā matim

original: RV_10,119.05c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.06a nahi me akṣipac canācchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: nahi me akṣipat cana acchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_10,119.06c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.07a nahi me rodasī ubhe anyam pakṣaṃ cana prati /
analyzed: nahi me rodasī ubhe anyam pakṣam cana prati

original: RV_10,119.07c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.08a abhi dyām mahinā bhuvam abhīmām pṛthivīm mahīm /
analyzed: abhi dyām mahinā bhuvam abhi imām pṛthivīm mahīm

original: RV_10,119.08c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.09a hantāham pṛthivīm imāṃ ni dadhānīha veha vā /
analyzed: hanta aham pṛthivīm imām ni dadhāni iha vā iha vā

original: RV_10,119.09c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.10a oṣam it pṛthivīm ahaṃ jaṅghanānīha veha vā /
analyzed: oṣam id pṛthivīm aham jaṅghanāni iha vā iha vā

original: RV_10,119.10c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.11a divi me anyaḥ pakṣo 'dho anyam acīkṛṣam /
analyzed: divi me anyaḥ pakṣaḥ dhaḥ anyam acīkṛṣam

original: RV_10,119.11c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.12a aham asmi mahāmaho 'bhinabhyam udīṣitaḥ /
analyzed: aham asmi mahā mahaḥ udīṣitaḥ

original: RV_10,119.12c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,119.13a gṛho yāmy araṅkṛto devebhyo havyavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhaḥ yāmi araṅkṛtaḥ devebhyaḥ havya vāhanaḥ

original: RV_10,119.13c kuvit somasyāpām iti //
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10,120.01a tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ /
analyzed: tat id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham yatas jajñe ugraḥ tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ

original: RV_10,120.01c sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yaṃ viśve madanty ūmāḥ //
analyzed: sadyas jajñānaḥ ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yam viśve madanti ūmāḥ

original: RV_10,120.02a vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūri ojāḥ śatruḥ dāsāya bhiyasam dadhāti

original: RV_10,120.02c avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu //
analyzed: a vyanat ca vyanat ca sasni sam te navanta prabhṛtāḥ madeṣu

original: RV_10,120.03a tve kratum api vṛñjanti viśve dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ /
analyzed: tve kratum api vṛñjanti viśve dvis yat ete tris bhavanti ūmāḥ

original: RV_10,120.03c svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi yodhīḥ //
analyzed: svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛja sam adaḥ su madhu madhunā abhi yodhīḥ

original: RV_10,120.04a iti cid dhi tvā dhanā jayantam made-made anumadanti viprāḥ /
analyzed: iti cit hi tvā dhanā jayantam mademade anumadanti viprāḥ

original: RV_10,120.04c ojīyo dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā durevāḥ //
analyzed: ojīyaḥ dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ durevāḥ

original: RV_10,120.05a tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri /
analyzed: tvayā vayam śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyantaḥ yudhenyāni bhūri

original: RV_10,120.05c codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi //
analyzed: codayāmi te āyudhā vacobhiḥ sam te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi

original: RV_10,120.06a stuṣeyyam puruvarpasam ṛbhvam inatamam āptyam āptyānām /
analyzed: stuṣeyyam puru varpasam ṛbhvam inatamam āptyam āptyānām

original: RV_10,120.06c ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri //
analyzed: ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri

original: RV_10,120.07a ni tad dadhiṣe 'varam paraṃ ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe /
analyzed: ni tat dadhiṣe varam param ca yasmin āvitha avasā duroṇe

original: RV_10,120.07c ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi //
analyzed: ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū atas inoṣi karvarā purūṇi

original: RV_10,120.08a imā brahma bṛhaddivo vivaktīndrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ /
analyzed: imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ vivakti indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ

original: RV_10,120.08c maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājo duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ gotrasya kṣayati svarājaḥ duraḥ ca viśvāḥ avṛṇot apa svāḥ

original: RV_10,120.09a evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva /
analyzed: eva mahān bṛhaddivaḥ atharvā avocat svām tanvam indram eva

original: RV_10,120.09c svasāro mātaribhvarīr ariprā hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca //
analyzed: svasāraḥ mātaribhvarīḥ ariprāḥ hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca

original: RV_10,121.01a hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt /
analyzed: hiraṇya garbhaḥ sam avartata agre bhūtasya jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt

original: RV_10,121.01c sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm dyām uta imām kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.02a ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātma dāḥ bala dāḥ yasya viśve upāsate praśiṣam yasya devāḥ

original: RV_10,121.02c yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.03a yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaika id rājā jagato babhūva /
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇataḥ nimiṣataḥ mahitvā ekaḥ id rājā jagataḥ babhūva

original: RV_10,121.03c ya īśe asya dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yaḥ īśe asya dvipadaḥ catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.04a yasyeme himavanto mahitvā yasya samudraṃ rasayā sahāhuḥ /
analyzed: yasya ime himavantaḥ mahitvā yasya samudram rasayā saha āhuḥ

original: RV_10,121.04c yasyemāḥ pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yasya imāḥ pradiśaḥ yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.05a yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḷhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ /
analyzed: yena dyauḥ ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā yena svar stabhitam yena nākaḥ

original: RV_10,121.05c yo antarikṣe rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yaḥ antarikṣe rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.06a yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhy aikṣetām manasā rejamāne /
analyzed: yam krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhī aikṣetām manasā rejamāne

original: RV_10,121.06c yatrādhi sūra udito vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yatra adhi sūraḥ uditaḥ vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.07a āpo ha yad bṛhatīr viśvam āyan garbhaṃ dadhānā janayantīr agnim /
analyzed: āpaḥ ha yat bṛhatīḥ viśvam āyan garbham dadhānāḥ janayantīḥ agnim

original: RV_10,121.07c tato devānāṃ sam avartatāsur ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: tatas devānām sam avartata āsuḥ ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.08a yaś cid āpo mahinā paryapaśyad dakṣaṃ dadhānā janayantīr yajñam /
analyzed: yaḥ cit āpaḥ mahinā paryapaśyat dakṣam dadhānāḥ janayantīḥ yajñam

original: RV_10,121.08c yo deveṣv adhi deva eka āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yaḥ deveṣu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.09a mā no hiṃsīj janitā yaḥ pṛthivyā yo vā divaṃ satyadharmā jajāna /
analyzed: mā naḥ hiṃsīt janitā yaḥ pṛthivyāḥ yaḥ vā divam satya dharmā jajāna

original: RV_10,121.09c yaś cāpaś candrā bṛhatīr jajāna kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yaḥ ca apaḥ candrāḥ bṛhatīḥ jajāna kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,121.10a prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva /
analyzed: prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva

original: RV_10,121.10c yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: yad kāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_10,122.01a vasuṃ na citramahasaṃ gṛṇīṣe vāmaṃ śevam atithim adviṣeṇyam /
analyzed: vasum na citra mahasam gṛṇīṣe vāmam śevam atithim adviṣeṇyam

original: RV_10,122.01c sa rāsate śurudho viśvadhāyaso 'gnir hotā gṛhapatiḥ suvīryam //
analyzed: sa rāsate śurudhaḥ viśva dhāyasaḥ gniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ su vīryam

original: RV_10,122.02a juṣāṇo agne prati harya me vaco viśvāni vidvān vayunāni sukrato /
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ agne prati harya me vacaḥ viśvāni vidvān vayunāni su krato

original: RV_10,122.02c ghṛtanirṇig brahmaṇe gātum eraya tava devā ajanayann anu vratam //
analyzed: ghṛta nirṇij brahmaṇe gātum eraya tava devāḥ ajanayan anu vratam

original: RV_10,122.03a sapta dhāmāni pariyann amartyo dāśad dāśuṣe sukṛte māmahasva /
analyzed: sapta dhāmāni pariyan amartyaḥ dāśat dāśuṣe su kṛte māmahasva

original: RV_10,122.03c suvīreṇa rayiṇāgne svābhuvā yas ta ānaṭ samidhā taṃ juṣasva //
analyzed: su vīreṇa rayiṇā agne yaḥ te ānaṭ samidhā tam juṣasva

original: RV_10,122.04a yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitaṃ haviṣmanta īḷate sapta vājinam /
analyzed: yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam haviṣmantaḥ īḍate sapta vājinam

original: RV_10,122.04c śṛṇvantam agniṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham ukṣaṇam pṛṇantaṃ devam pṛṇate suvīryam //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam agnim ghṛta pṛṣṭham ukṣaṇam pṛṇantam devam pṛṇate su vīryam

original: RV_10,122.05a tvaṃ dūtaḥ prathamo vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamāno amṛtāya matsva /
analyzed: tvam dūtaḥ prathamaḥ vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamānaḥ amṛtāya matsva

original: RV_10,122.05c tvām marjayan maruto dāśuṣo gṛhe tvāṃ stomebhir bhṛgavo vi rurucuḥ //
analyzed: tvām marjayan marutaḥ dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe tvām stomebhiḥ bhṛgavaḥ vi rurucuḥ

original: RV_10,122.06a iṣaṃ duhan sudughāṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ yajñapriye yajamānāya sukrato /
analyzed: iṣam duhan sudughām viśva dhāyasam yajña priye yajamānāya su krato

original: RV_10,122.06c agne ghṛtasnus trir ṛtāni dīdyad vartir yajñam pariyan sukratūyase //
analyzed: agne ghṛtasnuḥ tris ṛtāni dīdyat vartiḥ yajñam pariyan sukratūyase

original: RV_10,122.07a tvām id asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta mānuṣāḥ /
analyzed: tvām id asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu dūtam kṛṇvānāḥ ayajanta mānuṣāḥ

original: RV_10,122.07c tvāṃ devā mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhur ājyam agne nimṛjanto adhvare //
analyzed: tvām devāḥ mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhuḥ ājyam agne nimṛjantaḥ adhvare

original: RV_10,122.08a ni tvā vasiṣṭhā ahvanta vājinaṃ gṛṇanto agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: ni tvā vasiṣṭhāḥ ahvanta vājinam gṛṇantaḥ agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ

original: RV_10,122.08c rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10,123.01a ayaṃ venaś codayat pṛśnigarbhā jyotirjarāyū rajaso vimāne /
analyzed: ayam venaḥ codayat pṛśni garbhāḥ jyotiḥ jarāyūḥ rajasaḥ vimāne

original: RV_10,123.01c imam apāṃ saṃgame sūryasya śiśuṃ na viprā matibhī rihanti //
analyzed: imam apām saṃgame sūryasya śiśum na viprāḥ matibhiḥ rihanti

original: RV_10,123.02a samudrād ūrmim ud iyarti veno nabhojāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ haryatasya darśi /
analyzed: samudrāt ūrmim ud iyarti venaḥ nabhaḥ jāḥ pṛṣṭham haryatasya darśi

original: RV_10,123.02c ṛtasya sānāv adhi viṣṭapi bhrāṭ samānaṃ yonim abhy anūṣata vrāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtasya sānau adhi viṣṭapi bhrāj samānam yonim abhī anūṣata vrāḥ

original: RV_10,123.03a samānam pūrvīr abhi vāvaśānās tiṣṭhan vatsasya mātaraḥ sanīḷāḥ /
analyzed: samānam pūrvīḥ abhi vāvaśānāḥ tiṣṭhan vatsasya mātaraḥ sanīḷāḥ

original: RV_10,123.03c ṛtasya sānāv adhi cakramāṇā rihanti madhvo amṛtasya vāṇīḥ //
analyzed: ṛtasya sānau adhi cakramāṇāḥ rihanti madhvaḥ amṛtasya vāṇīḥ

original: RV_10,123.04a jānanto rūpam akṛpanta viprā mṛgasya ghoṣam mahiṣasya hi gman /
analyzed: jānantaḥ rūpam akṛpanta viprāḥ mṛgasya ghoṣam mahiṣasya hi gman

original: RV_10,123.04c ṛtena yanto adhi sindhum asthur vidad gandharvo amṛtāni nāma //
analyzed: ṛtena yantaḥ adhi sindhum asthuḥ vidat gandharvaḥ amṛtāni nāma

original: RV_10,123.05a apsarā jāram upasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman /
analyzed: apsarāḥ jāram upasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman

original: RV_10,123.05c carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyaye sa venaḥ //
analyzed: carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyaye sa venaḥ

original: RV_10,123.06a nāke suparṇam upa yat patantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhy acakṣata tvā /
analyzed: nāke suparṇam upa yat patantam hṛdā venantaḥ abhī acakṣata tvā

original: RV_10,123.06c hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonau śakunam bhuraṇyum //
analyzed: hiraṇya pakṣam varuṇasya dūtam yamasya yonau śakunam bhuraṇyum

original: RV_10,123.07a ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṅ citrā bibhrad asyāyudhāni /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ gandharvaḥ adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṅ citrā bibhrat asya āyudhāni

original: RV_10,123.07c vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svar ṇa nāma janata priyāṇi //
analyzed: vasānaḥ atkam surabhim dṛśe kam svar na nāma janata priyāṇi

original: RV_10,123.08a drapsaḥ samudram abhi yaj jigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasā vidharman /
analyzed: drapsaḥ samudram abhi yat jigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasā vidharman

original: RV_10,123.08c bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānas tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi //
analyzed: bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānaḥ tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi

original: RV_10,124.01a imaṃ no agna upa yajñam ehi pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum /
analyzed: imam naḥ agne upa yajñam ehi pañca yāmam trivṛtam sapta tantum

original: RV_10,124.01c aso havyavāḷ uta naḥ purogā jyog eva dīrghaṃ tama āśayiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: asaḥ havyavāṭ uta naḥ purogāḥ jyok eva dīrgham tamaḥ āśayiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10,124.02a adevād devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamāno amṛtatvam emi /
analyzed: adevāt devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamānaḥ amṛta tvam emi

original: RV_10,124.02c śivaṃ yat santam aśivo jahāmi svāt sakhyād araṇīṃ nābhim emi //
analyzed: śivam yat santam aśivaḥ jahāmi svāt sakhyāt araṇīm nābhim emi

original: RV_10,124.03a paśyann anyasyā atithiṃ vayāyā ṛtasya dhāma vi mime purūṇi /
analyzed: paśyan anyasyāḥ atithim vayāyāḥ ṛtasya dhāma vi mime purūṇi

original: RV_10,124.03c śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevam ayajñiyād yajñiyam bhāgam emi //
analyzed: śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevam ayajñiyāt yajñiyam bhāgam emi

original: RV_10,124.04a bahvīḥ samā akaram antar asminn indraṃ vṛṇānaḥ pitaraṃ jahāmi /
analyzed: bahvīḥ samāḥ akaram antar asmin indram vṛṇānaḥ pitaram jahāmi

original: RV_10,124.04c agniḥ somo varuṇas te cyavante paryāvard rāṣṭraṃ tad avāmy āyan //
analyzed: agniḥ somaḥ varuṇaḥ te cyavante paryāvart rāṣṭram tat avāmi āyan

original: RV_10,124.05a nirmāyā u tye asurā abhūvan tvaṃ ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse /
analyzed: nirmāyāḥ u tye asurāḥ abhūvan tvam ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse

original: RV_10,124.05c ṛtena rājann anṛtaṃ viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasyādhipatyam ehi //
analyzed: ṛtena rājan anṛtam viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasya ādhipatyam ehi

original: RV_10,124.06a idaṃ svar idam id āsa vāmam ayam prakāśa urv antarikṣam /
analyzed: idam svar idam id āsa vāmam ayam prakāśaḥ uru antarikṣam

original: RV_10,124.06c hanāva vṛtraṃ nirehi soma haviṣ ṭvā santaṃ haviṣā yajāma //
analyzed: hanāva vṛtram nirehi soma haviḥ tvā santam haviṣā yajāma

original: RV_10,124.07a kaviḥ kavitvā divi rūpam āsajad aprabhūtī varuṇo nir apaḥ sṛjat /
analyzed: kaviḥ kavi tvā divi rūpam āsajat a prabhūtīḥ varuṇaḥ niḥ apaḥ sṛjat

original: RV_10,124.07c kṣemaṃ kṛṇvānā janayo na sindhavas tā asya varṇaṃ śucayo bharibhrati //
analyzed: kṣemam kṛṇvānāḥ janayaḥ na sindhavaḥ tāḥ asya varṇam śucayaḥ bharibhrati

original: RV_10,124.08a tā asya jyeṣṭham indriyaṃ sacante tā īm ā kṣeti svadhayā madantīḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya jyeṣṭham indriyam sacante tāḥ īm ā kṣeti svadhayā madantīḥ

original: RV_10,124.08c tā īṃ viśo na rājānaṃ vṛṇānā bībhatsuvo apa vṛtrād atiṣṭhan //
analyzed: tāḥ īm viśaḥ na rājānam vṛṇānāḥ bībhatsuvaḥ apa vṛtrāt atiṣṭhan

original: RV_10,124.09a bībhatsūnāṃ sayujaṃ haṃsam āhur apāṃ divyānāṃ sakhye carantam /
analyzed: bībhatsūnām sayujam haṃsam āhuḥ apām divyānām sakhye carantam

original: RV_10,124.09c anuṣṭubham anu carcūryamāṇam indraṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo manīṣā //
analyzed: anuṣṭubham anu carcūryamāṇam indram ni cikyuḥ kavayaḥ manīṣā

original: RV_10,125.01a ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmy aham ādityair uta viśvadevaiḥ /
analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ carāmi aham ādityaiḥ uta viśvadevaiḥ

original: RV_10,125.01c aham mitrāvaruṇobhā bibharmy aham indrāgnī aham aśvinobhā //
analyzed: aham mitrāvaruṇā ubhā bibharmi aham indra agnī aham aśvinā ubhā

original: RV_10,125.02a ahaṃ somam āhanasam bibharmy ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam /
analyzed: aham somam āhanasam bibharmi aham tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam

original: RV_10,125.02c ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇaṃ haviṣmate suprāvye yajamānāya sunvate //
analyzed: aham dadhāmi draviṇam haviṣmate suprāvye yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_10,125.03a ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām /
analyzed: aham rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnām cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām

original: RV_10,125.03c tām mā devā vy adadhuḥ purutrā bhūristhātrām bhūry āveśayantīm //
analyzed: tām mā devāḥ vi adadhuḥ purutrā bhūri sthātrām bhūri āveśayantīm

original: RV_10,125.04a mayā so annam atti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti ya īṃ śṛṇoty uktam /
analyzed: mayā saḥ annam atti yaḥ vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti yaḥ īm śṛṇoti uktam

original: RV_10,125.04c amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śraddhivaṃ te vadāmi //
analyzed: amantavaḥ mām te upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śraddhivam te vadāmi

original: RV_10,125.05a aham eva svayam idaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devebhir uta mānuṣebhiḥ /
analyzed: aham eva svayam idam vadāmi juṣṭam devebhiḥ uta mānuṣebhiḥ

original: RV_10,125.05c yaṃ kāmaye taṃ-tam ugraṃ kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām //
analyzed: yam kāmaye tam tam ugram kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇam tam ṛṣim tam su medhām

original: RV_10,125.06a ahaṃ rudrāya dhanur ā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavā u /
analyzed: aham rudrāya dhanuḥ ā tanomi brahma dviṣe śarave hantavai u

original: RV_10,125.06c ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomy ahaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa //
analyzed: aham janāya samadam kṛṇomi aham dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa

original: RV_10,125.07a ahaṃ suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yonir apsv antaḥ samudre /
analyzed: aham suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yoniḥ apsu antar samudre

original: RV_10,125.07c tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanānu viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃ varṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi //
analyzed: tatas vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanā anu viśvā uta amūm dyām varṣmaṇā upa spṛśāmi

original: RV_10,125.08a aham eva vāta iva pra vāmy ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: aham eva vātaḥ iva pra vāmi ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10,125.08c paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahinā sam babhūva //
analyzed: paras divā paras enā pṛthivyā etāvatī mahinā sam babhūva

original: RV_10,126.01a na tam aṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam /
analyzed: na tam aṃhaḥ na duritam devāsaḥ aṣṭa martyam

original: RV_10,126.01c sajoṣaso yam aryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ yam aryamā mitraḥ nayanti varuṇaḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.02a tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman /
analyzed: tat hi vayam vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitra aryaman

original: RV_10,126.02c yenā nir aṃhaso yūyam pātha nethā ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: yena niḥ aṃhasaḥ yūyam pātha netha ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.03a te nūnaṃ no 'yam ūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: te nūnam naḥ yam ūtaye varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,126.03c nayiṣṭhā u no neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhā u naḥ parṣaṇy ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: nayiṣṭhāḥ u naḥ neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhāḥ u naḥ parṣaṇi ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.04a yūyaṃ viśvam pari pātha varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: yūyam viśvam pari pātha varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,126.04c yuṣmākaṃ śarmaṇi priye syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākam śarmaṇi priye syāma su praṇītayaḥ ti dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.05a ādityāso ati sridho varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ ati sridhaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,126.05c ugram marudbhī rudraṃ huvemendram agniṃ svastaye 'ti dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: ugram marudbhiḥ rudram huvema indram agnim svastaye ti dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.06a netāra ū ṣu ṇas tiro varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: netāraḥ u su naḥ tiras varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,126.06c ati viśvāni duritā rājānaś carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: ati viśvāni duritā rājānaḥ carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.07a śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,126.07c śarma yacchantu sapratha ādityāso yad īmahe ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: śarma yacchantu saprathaḥ ādityāsaḥ yat īmahe ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,126.08a yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ /
analyzed: yathā ha tyad vasavaḥ gauryam cit padi sitām amuñcata yajatrāḥ

original: RV_10,126.08c evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ //
analyzed: eva u su asmat muñcata vi aṃhaḥ pra tāri agne prataram naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_10,127.01a rātrī vy akhyad āyatī purutrā devy akṣabhiḥ /
analyzed: rātrī vi akhyat āyatī purutrā devī akṣabhiḥ

original: RV_10,127.01c viśvā adhi śriyo 'dhita //
analyzed: viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dhita

original: RV_10,127.02a orv aprā amartyā nivato devy udvataḥ /
analyzed: ā uru aprāḥ amartyā nivataḥ devī udvataḥ

original: RV_10,127.02c jyotiṣā bādhate tamaḥ //
analyzed: jyotiṣā bādhate tamaḥ

original: RV_10,127.03a nir u svasāram askṛtoṣasaṃ devy āyatī /
analyzed: niḥ u svasāram askṛta uṣasam devī āyatī

original: RV_10,127.03c aped u hāsate tamaḥ //
analyzed: apa id u hāsate tamaḥ

original: RV_10,127.04a sā no adya yasyā vayaṃ ni te yāmann avikṣmahi /
analyzed: sā naḥ adya yasyāḥ vayam ni te yāman avikṣmahi

original: RV_10,127.04c vṛkṣe na vasatiṃ vayaḥ //
analyzed: vṛkṣe na vasatim vayaḥ

original: RV_10,127.05a ni grāmāso avikṣata ni padvanto ni pakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ni grāmāsaḥ avikṣata ni padvantaḥ ni pakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_10,127.05c ni śyenāsaś cid arthinaḥ //
analyzed: ni śyenāsaḥ cit arthinaḥ

original: RV_10,127.06a yāvayā vṛkyaṃ vṛkaṃ yavaya stenam ūrmye /
analyzed: yāvaya vṛkyam vṛkam yavaya stenam ūrmye

original: RV_10,127.06c athā naḥ sutarā bhava //
analyzed: athā naḥ sutarā bhava

original: RV_10,127.07a upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vyaktam asthita /
analyzed: upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇam vyaktam asthita

original: RV_10,127.07c uṣa ṛṇeva yātaya //
analyzed: uṣaḥ ṛṇā iva yātaya

original: RV_10,127.08a upa te gā ivākaraṃ vṛṇīṣva duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: upa te gāḥ iva akaram vṛṇīṣva duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_10,127.08c rātri stomaṃ na jigyuṣe //
analyzed: rātri stomam na jigyuṣe

original: RV_10,128.01a mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvam puṣema /
analyzed: mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema

original: RV_10,128.01c mahyaṃ namantām pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā jayema //
analyzed: mahyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ tvayā adhyakṣeṇa pṛtanāḥ jayema

original: RV_10,128.02a mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ /
analyzed: mama devāḥ vihave santu sarve indravantaḥ marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ agniḥ

original: RV_10,128.02c mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāme asmin //
analyzed: mama antarikṣam uru lokam astu mahyam vātaḥ pavatām kāme asmin

original: RV_10,128.03a mayi devā draviṇam ā yajantām mayy āśīr astu mayi devahūtiḥ /
analyzed: mayi devāḥ draviṇam ā yajantām mayi āśīḥ astu mayi deva hūtiḥ

original: RV_10,128.03c daivyā hotāro vanuṣanta pūrve 'riṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: daivyāḥ hotāraḥ vanuṣanta pūrve riṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā su vīrāḥ

original: RV_10,128.04a mahyaṃ yajantu mama yāni havyākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu /
analyzed: mahyam yajantu mama yāni havyā ākūtiḥ satyā manasaḥ me astu

original: RV_10,128.04c eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devāso adhi vocatā naḥ //
analyzed: enaḥ mā ni gām katamat cana aham viśve devāsaḥ adhi vocata naḥ

original: RV_10,128.05a devīḥ ṣaḷ urvīr uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa iha vīrayadhvam /
analyzed: devīḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsaḥ iha vīrayadhvam

original: RV_10,128.05c mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan //
analyzed: mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhiḥ mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan

original: RV_10,128.06a agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām adabdho gopāḥ pari pāhi nas tvam /
analyzed: agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām adabdhaḥ gopāḥ pari pāhi naḥ tvam

original: RV_10,128.06c pratyañco yantu nigutaḥ punas te 'maiṣāṃ cittam prabudhāṃ vi neśat //
analyzed: pratyañcaḥ yantu nigutaḥ punar te mā eṣām cittam prabudhām vi neśat

original: RV_10,128.07a dhātā dhātṝṇām bhuvanasya yas patir devaṃ trātāram abhimātiṣāham /
analyzed: dhātā dhātṝṇām bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ devam trātāram abhimātiṣāham

original: RV_10,128.07c imaṃ yajñam aśvinobhā bṛhaspatir devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nyarthāt //
analyzed: imam yajñam aśvinā ubhā bṛhaspatiḥ devāḥ pāntu yajamānam nyarthāt

original: RV_10,128.08a uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsad asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ /
analyzed: uru vyacāḥ naḥ mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsat asmin have puru hūtaḥ purukṣuḥ

original: RV_10,128.08c sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḷayendra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ prajāyai hari aśva mṛḍaya indra mā naḥ rīriṣaḥ mā parā dāḥ

original: RV_10,128.09a ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān /
analyzed: ye naḥ sapatnāḥ apa te bhavantu indra agnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān

original: RV_10,128.09c vasavo rudrā ādityā uparispṛśam mograṃ cettāram adhirājam akran //
analyzed: vasavaḥ rudrāḥ ādityāḥ uparispṛśam mā ugram cettāram adhirājam akran

original: RV_10,129.01a nāsad āsīn no sad āsīt tadānīṃ nāsīd rajo no vyomā paro yat /
analyzed: na asat āsīt na u sat āsīt tadānīm na āsīt rajaḥ na u vyomā paras yat

original: RV_10,129.01c kim āvarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarmann ambhaḥ kim āsīd gahanaṃ gabhīram //
analyzed: kim āvarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarman ambhaḥ kim āsīt gahanam gabhīram

original: RV_10,129.02a na mṛtyur āsīd amṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahna āsīt praketaḥ /
analyzed: na mṛtyuḥ āsīt amṛtam na tarhi na rātryāḥ ahnaḥ āsīt praketaḥ

original: RV_10,129.02c ānīd avātaṃ svadhayā tad ekaṃ tasmād dhānyan na paraḥ kiṃ canāsa //
analyzed: ānīt a vātam svadhayā tat ekam tasmāt na paraḥ kim cana āsa

original: RV_10,129.03a tama āsīt tamasā gūḷham agre 'praketaṃ salilaṃ sarvam ā idam /
analyzed: tamaḥ āsīt tamasā gūḍham agre praketam salilam sarvam ā idam

original: RV_10,129.03c tucchyenābhv apihitaṃ yad āsīt tapasas tan mahinājāyataikam //
analyzed: tucchyena ābhu apihitam yat āsīt tapasaḥ tat mahinā ajāyata ekam

original: RV_10,129.04a kāmas tad agre sam avartatādhi manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīt /
analyzed: kāmaḥ tat agre sam avartata adhi manasaḥ retaḥ prathamam yat āsīt

original: RV_10,129.04c sato bandhum asati nir avindan hṛdi pratīṣyā kavayo manīṣā //
analyzed: sataḥ bandhum asati niḥ avindan hṛdi pratīṣyā kavayaḥ manīṣā

original: RV_10,129.05a tiraścīno vitato raśmir eṣām adhaḥ svid āsī3d upari svid āsī3t /
analyzed: tiraścīnaḥ vitataḥ raśmiḥ eṣām adhas svid upari svid

original: RV_10,129.05c retodhā āsan mahimāna āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt //
analyzed: retaḥ dhāḥ āsan mahimānaḥ āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt

original: RV_10,129.06a ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocat kuta ājātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pra vocat kutas ājātā kutas iyam visṛṣṭiḥ

original: RV_10,129.06c arvāg devā asya visarjanenāthā ko veda yata ābabhūva //
analyzed: arvāk devāḥ asya visarjanena atha kaḥ veda yatas ābabhūva

original: RV_10,129.07a iyaṃ visṛṣṭir yata ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na /
analyzed: iyam visṛṣṭiḥ yatas ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na

original: RV_10,129.07c yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman so aṅga veda yadi vā na veda //
analyzed: yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman saḥ aṅga veda yadi vā na veda

original: RV_10,130.01a yo yajño viśvatas tantubhis tata ekaśataṃ devakarmebhir āyataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yajñaḥ viśvatas tantubhiḥ tatas ekaśatam deva karmebhiḥ āyataḥ

original: RV_10,130.01c ime vayanti pitaro ya āyayuḥ pra vayāpa vayety āsate tate //
analyzed: ime vayanti pitaraḥ ye āyayuḥ pra vaya apa vaya iti āsate tate

original: RV_10,130.02a pumāṃ enaṃ tanuta ut kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nāke asmin /
analyzed: pumān enam tanute ud kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nāke asmin

original: RV_10,130.02c ime mayūkhā upa sedur ū sadaḥ sāmāni cakrus tasarāṇy otave //
analyzed: ime mayūkhāḥ upa seduḥ u sadaḥ sāmāni cakruḥ tasarāṇi otave

original: RV_10,130.03a kāsīt pramā pratimā kiṃ nidānam ājyaṃ kim āsīt paridhiḥ ka āsīt /
analyzed: kā āsīt pramā pratimā kim nidānam ājyam kim āsīt paridhiḥ kaḥ āsīt

original: RV_10,130.03c chandaḥ kim āsīt praugaṃ kim ukthaṃ yad devā devam ayajanta viśve //
analyzed: chandaḥ kim āsīt praugam kim uktham yat devāḥ devam ayajanta viśve

original: RV_10,130.04a agner gāyatry abhavat sayugvoṣṇihayā savitā sam babhūva /
analyzed: agneḥ gāyatrī abhavat sayugvā uṣṇihayā savitā sam babhūva

original: RV_10,130.04c anuṣṭubhā soma ukthair mahasvān bṛhaspater bṛhatī vācam āvat //
analyzed: anuṣṭubhā somaḥ ukthaiḥ mahasvān bṛhaspateḥ bṛhatī vācam āvat

original: RV_10,130.05a virāṇ mitrāvaruṇayor abhiśrīr indrasya triṣṭub iha bhāgo ahnaḥ /
analyzed: virāj mitrāvaruṇayoḥ abhiśrīḥ indrasya triṣṭubh iha bhāgaḥ ahnaḥ

original: RV_10,130.05c viśvān devāñ jagaty ā viveśa tena cākḷpra ṛṣayo manuṣyāḥ //
analyzed: viśvān devān jagatī ā viveśa tena cākḷpre ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: RV_10,130.06a cākḷpre tena ṛṣayo manuṣyā yajñe jāte pitaro naḥ purāṇe /
analyzed: cākḷpre tena ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ yajñe jāte pitaraḥ naḥ purāṇe

original: RV_10,130.06c paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ya imaṃ yajñam ayajanta pūrve //
analyzed: paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ye imam yajñam ayajanta pūrve

original: RV_10,130.07a sahastomāḥ sahachandasa āvṛtaḥ sahapramā ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ /
