analyzed: saha stomāḥ saha chandasaḥ āvṛtaḥ saha pramāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ

original: RV_10,130.07c pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrā anvālebhire rathyo na raśmīn //
analyzed: pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrāḥ anvālebhire rathyaḥ na raśmīn

original: RV_10,131.01a apa prāca indra viśvāṃ amitrān apāpāco abhibhūte nudasva /
analyzed: apa prācaḥ indra viśvān amitrān apa apācaḥ abhibhūte nudasva

original: RV_10,131.01c apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarman madema //
analyzed: apa udīcaḥ apa śūra adharācaḥ urau yathā tava śarman madema

original: RV_10,131.02a kuvid aṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya /
analyzed: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ yavam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya

original: RV_10,131.02c ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ //
analyzed: iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namovṛktim na jagmuḥ

original: RV_10,131.03a nahi sthūry ṛtuthā yātam asti nota śravo vivide saṃgameṣu /
analyzed: nahi sthūri ṛtuthā yātam asti na uta śravaḥ vivide saṃgameṣu

original: RV_10,131.03c gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ //
analyzed: gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ

original: RV_10,131.04a yuvaṃ surāmam aśvinā namucāv āsure sacā /
analyzed: yuvam su rāmam aśvinā namucau āsure sacā

original: RV_10,131.04c vipipānā śubhas patī indraṃ karmasv āvatam //
analyzed: vipipānā śubhaḥ patī indram karmasu āvatam

original: RV_10,131.05a putram iva pitarāv aśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyair daṃsanābhiḥ /
analyzed: putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā indra āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ

original: RV_10,131.05c yat surāmaṃ vy apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavann abhiṣṇak //
analyzed: yat su rāmam vi apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavan abhiṣṇak

original: RV_10,131.06a indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā svavān avobhiḥ su mṛḷīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_10,131.06c bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
analyzed: bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_10,131.07a tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma /
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_10,131.07c sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asme ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu //
analyzed: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asme ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu

original: RV_10,132.01a ījānam id dyaur gūrtāvasur ījānam bhūmir abhi prabhūṣaṇi /
analyzed: ījānam id dyauḥ gūrtāvasuḥ ījānam bhūmiḥ abhi prabhūṣaṇi

original: RV_10,132.01c ījānaṃ devāv aśvināv abhi sumnair avardhatām //
analyzed: ījānam devau aśvinau abhi sumnaiḥ avardhatām

original: RV_10,132.02a tā vām mitrāvaruṇā dhārayatkṣitī suṣumneṣitatvatā yajāmasi /
analyzed: tā vām mitrāvaruṇā dhārayat kṣitī suṣumnā iṣitatvatā yajāmasi

original: RV_10,132.02c yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyair abhi ṣyāma rakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyaiḥ abhi syāma rakṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,132.03a adhā cin nu yad didhiṣāmahe vām abhi priyaṃ rekṇaḥ patyamānāḥ /
analyzed: adhā cit nu yat didhiṣāmahe vām abhi priyam rekṇaḥ patyamānāḥ

original: RV_10,132.03c dadvāṃ vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ sam v āran nakir asya maghāni //
analyzed: dadvām vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ sam u ārat nakir asya maghāni

original: RV_10,132.04a asāv anyo asura sūyata dyaus tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā /
analyzed: asau anyaḥ asura sūyata dyauḥ tvam viśveṣām varuṇa asi rājā

original: RV_10,132.04c mūrdhā rathasya cākan naitāvatainasāntakadhruk //
analyzed: mūrdhā rathasya cākan na etāvatā enasā antaka druh

original: RV_10,132.05a asmin sv etac chakapūta eno hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān /
analyzed: asmin su etat śaka pūte enaḥ hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān

original: RV_10,132.05c avor vā yad dhāt tanūṣv avaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsv arvā //
analyzed: avoḥ vā yat dhāt tanūṣu avaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsu arvā

original: RV_10,132.06a yuvor hi mātāditir vicetasā dyaur na bhūmiḥ payasā pupūtani /
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi mātā aditiḥ vicetasā dyauḥ na bhūmiḥ payasā pupūtani

original: RV_10,132.06c ava priyā didiṣṭana sūro ninikta raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: ava priyā didiṣṭana sūraḥ ninikta raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_10,132.07a yuvaṃ hy apnarājāv asīdataṃ tiṣṭhad rathaṃ na dhūrṣadaṃ vanarṣadam /
analyzed: yuvam hi apnarājau asīdatam tiṣṭhat ratham na dhūrṣadam vanarṣadam

original: RV_10,132.07c tā naḥ kaṇūkayantīr nṛmedhas tatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhas tatre aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ kaṇūkayantīḥ nṛmedhaḥ tatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhaḥ tatre aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10,133.01a pro ṣv asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata /
analyzed: pra u su asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata

original: RV_10,133.01c abhīke cid u lokakṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahāsmākam bodhi coditā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
analyzed: abhīke cit u loka kṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahā asmākam bodhi coditā nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10,133.02a tvaṃ sindhūṃr avāsṛjo 'dharāco ahann ahim /
analyzed: tvam sindhūṃr avāsṛjaḥ dharācaḥ ahan ahim

original: RV_10,133.02c aśatrur indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryaṃ taṃ tvā pari ṣvajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
analyzed: a śatruḥ indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryam tam tvā pari svajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10,133.03a vi ṣu viśvā arātayo 'ryo naśanta no dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: vi su viśvāḥ arātayaḥ ryaḥ naśanta naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_10,133.03c astāsi śatrave vadhaṃ yo na indra jighāṃsati yā te rātir dadir vasu nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
analyzed: astāsi śatrave vadham yaḥ naḥ indra jighāṃsati yā te rātiḥ dadiḥ vasu nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10,133.04a yo na indrābhito jano vṛkāyur ādideśati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ indra abhitas janaḥ vṛkāyuḥ ādideśati

original: RV_10,133.04c adhaspadaṃ tam īṃ kṛdhi vibādho asi sāsahir nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
analyzed: adhaspadam tam īm kṛdhi vibādhaḥ asi sāsahiḥ nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10,133.05a yo na indrābhidāsati sanābhir yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ indra abhidāsati sanābhiḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ

original: RV_10,133.05c ava tasya balaṃ tira mahīva dyaur adha tmanā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
analyzed: ava tasya balam tira mahī iva dyauḥ adha tmanā nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10,133.06a vayam indra tvāyavaḥ sakhitvam ā rabhāmahe /
analyzed: vayam indra tvāyavaḥ sakhitvam ā rabhāmahe

original: RV_10,133.06c ṛtasya naḥ pathā nayāti viśvāni duritā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
analyzed: ṛtasya naḥ pathā naya ati viśvāni duritā nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10,133.07a asmabhyaṃ su tvam indra tāṃ śikṣa yā dohate prati varaṃ jaritre /
analyzed: asmabhyam su tvam indra tām śikṣa yā dohate prati varam jaritre

original: RV_10,133.07c acchidrodhnī pīpayad yathā naḥ sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ //
analyzed: acchidra udhnī pīpayat yathā naḥ sahasra dhārā payasā mahī gauḥ

original: RV_10,134.01a ubhe yad indra rodasī āpaprāthoṣā iva /
analyzed: ubhe yat indra rodasī āpaprātha uṣāḥ iva

original: RV_10,134.01c mahāntaṃ tvā mahīnāṃ samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
analyzed: mahāntam tvā mahīnām samrājam carṣaṇīnām devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10,134.02a ava sma durhaṇāyato martasya tanuhi sthiram /
analyzed: ava sma durhaṇāyataḥ martasya tanuhi sthiram

original: RV_10,134.02c adhaspadaṃ tam īṃ kṛdhi yo asmāṃ ādideśati devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
analyzed: adhaspadam tam īm kṛdhi yaḥ asmān ādideśati devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10,134.03a ava tyā bṛhatīr iṣo viśvaścandrā amitrahan /
analyzed: ava tyāḥ bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ viśvaścandrāḥ amitra han

original: RV_10,134.03c śacībhiḥ śakra dhūnuhīndra viśvābhir ūtibhir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
analyzed: śacībhiḥ śakra dhūnuhi indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10,134.04a ava yat tvaṃ śatakratav indra viśvāni dhūnuṣe /
analyzed: ava yat tvam śatakrato indra viśvāni dhūnuṣe

original: RV_10,134.04c rayiṃ na sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhir ūtibhir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
analyzed: rayim na sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10,134.05a ava svedā ivābhito viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ /
analyzed: ava svedāḥ iva abhitas viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ

original: RV_10,134.05c dūrvāyā iva tantavo vy asmad etu durmatir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
analyzed: dūrvāyāḥ iva tantavaḥ vi asmat etu durmatiḥ devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10,134.06a dīrghaṃ hy aṅkuśaṃ yathā śaktim bibharṣi mantumaḥ /
analyzed: dīrgham hi aṅkuśam yathā śaktim bibharṣi mantumas

original: RV_10,134.06c pūrveṇa maghavan padājo vayāṃ yathā yamo devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
analyzed: pūrveṇa maghavan padā ajaḥ vayām yathā yamaḥ devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10,134.07a nakir devā minīmasi nakir ā yopayāmasi mantraśrutyaṃ carāmasi /
analyzed: nakir devāḥ minīmasi nakir ā yopayāmasi mantraśrutyam carāmasi

original: RV_10,134.07c pakṣebhir apikakṣebhir atrābhi saṃ rabhāmahe //
analyzed: pakṣebhiḥ apikakṣebhiḥ atra abhi sam rabhāmahe

original: RV_10,135.01a yasmin vṛkṣe supalāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin vṛkṣe su palāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ

original: RV_10,135.01c atrā no viśpatiḥ pitā purāṇāṃ anu venati //
analyzed: atrā naḥ viśpatiḥ pitā purāṇām anu venati

original: RV_10,135.02a purāṇāṃ anuvenantaṃ carantam pāpayāmuyā /
analyzed: purāṇām anuvenantam carantam pāpayā amuyā

original: RV_10,135.02c asūyann abhy acākaśaṃ tasmā aspṛhayam punaḥ //
analyzed: asūyan abhi acākaśam tasmai aspṛhayam punar

original: RV_10,135.03a yaṃ kumāra navaṃ ratham acakram manasākṛṇoḥ /
analyzed: yam kumāra navam ratham a cakram manasā akṛṇoḥ

original: RV_10,135.03c ekeṣaṃ viśvataḥ prāñcam apaśyann adhi tiṣṭhasi //
analyzed: ekeṣam viśvatas prāñcam a paśyan adhi tiṣṭhasi

original: RV_10,135.04a yaṃ kumāra prāvartayo rathaṃ viprebhyas pari /
analyzed: yam kumāra prāvartayaḥ ratham viprebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_10,135.04c taṃ sāmānu prāvartata sam ito nāvy āhitam //
analyzed: tam sāma anu prāvartata sam itas nāvi āhitam

original: RV_10,135.05a kaḥ kumāram ajanayad rathaṃ ko nir avartayat /
analyzed: kaḥ kumāram ajanayat ratham kaḥ niḥ avartayat

original: RV_10,135.05c kaḥ svit tad adya no brūyād anudeyī yathābhavat //
analyzed: kaḥ svid tat adya naḥ brūyāt anudeyī yathā abhavat

original: RV_10,135.06a yathābhavad anudeyī tato agram ajāyata /
analyzed: yathā abhavat anudeyī tatas agram ajāyata

original: RV_10,135.06c purastād budhna ātataḥ paścān nirayaṇaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: purastāt budhnaḥ ātataḥ paścāt nirayaṇam kṛtam

original: RV_10,135.07a idaṃ yamasya sādanaṃ devamānaṃ yad ucyate /
analyzed: idam yamasya sādanam deva mānam yat ucyate

original: RV_10,135.07c iyam asya dhamyate nāḷīr ayaṃ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: iyam asya dhamyate nāḷīḥ ayam gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10,136.01a keśy agniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī /
analyzed: keśī agnim keśī viṣam keśī bibharti rodasī

original: RV_10,136.01c keśī viśvaṃ svar dṛśe keśīdaṃ jyotir ucyate //
analyzed: keśī viśvam svar dṛśe keśīdam jyotiḥ ucyate

original: RV_10,136.02a munayo vātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malā /
analyzed: munayaḥ vāta raśanāḥ piśaṅgāḥ vasate

original: RV_10,136.02c vātasyānu dhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso avikṣata //
analyzed: vātasya anu dhrājim yanti yat devāsaḥ avikṣata

original: RV_10,136.03a unmaditā mauneyena vātāṃ ā tasthimā vayam /
analyzed: unmaditāḥ mauneyena vātān ā tasthima vayam

original: RV_10,136.03c śarīred asmākaṃ yūyam martāso abhi paśyatha //
analyzed: śarīrā id asmākam yūyam martāsaḥ abhi paśyatha

original: RV_10,136.04a antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā rūpāvacākaśat /
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā rūpā avacākaśat

original: RV_10,136.04c munir devasya-devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ //
analyzed: muniḥ devasya devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ

original: RV_10,136.05a vātasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhātho deveṣito muniḥ /
analyzed: vātasya aśvaḥ vāyoḥ sakhā atho deva iṣitaḥ muniḥ

original: RV_10,136.05c ubhau samudrāv ā kṣeti yaś ca pūrva utāparaḥ //
analyzed: ubhau samudrau ā kṣeti yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ uta aparaḥ

original: RV_10,136.06a apsarasāṃ gandharvāṇām mṛgāṇāṃ caraṇe caran /
analyzed: apsarasām gandharvāṇām mṛgāṇām caraṇe caran

original: RV_10,136.06c keśī ketasya vidvān sakhā svādur madintamaḥ //
analyzed: keśī ketasya vidvān sakhā svāduḥ madintamaḥ

original: RV_10,136.07a vāyur asmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunannamā /
analyzed: vāyuḥ asmai upāmanthat pinaṣṭi sma kunannamā

original: RV_10,136.07c keśī viṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha //
analyzed: keśī viṣasya pātreṇa yat rudreṇa apibat saha

original: RV_10,137.01a uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ /
analyzed: uta devāḥ avahitam devāḥ ud nayathā punar

original: RV_10,137.01c utāgaś cakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ //
analyzed: uta āgaḥ cakruṣam devāḥ devāḥ jīvayathā punar

original: RV_10,137.02a dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ /
analyzed: dvau imau vātau vātaḥ ā sindhoḥ ā parāvataḥ

original: RV_10,137.02c dakṣaṃ te anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣam te anyaḥ ā vātu parā anyaḥ vātu yat rapaḥ

original: RV_10,137.03a ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ /
analyzed: ā vāta vāhi bheṣajam vi vāta vāhi yat rapaḥ

original: RV_10,137.03c tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase //
analyzed: tvam hi viśva bheṣajaḥ devānām dūtaḥ īyase

original: RV_10,137.04a ā tvāgamaṃ śantātibhir atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā agamam śantātibhiḥ atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ

original: RV_10,137.04c dakṣaṃ te bhadram ābhārṣam parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te //
analyzed: dakṣam te bhadram ābhārṣam parā yakṣmam suvāmi te

original: RV_10,137.05a trāyantām iha devās trāyatām marutāṃ gaṇaḥ /
analyzed: trāyantām iha devāḥ trāyatām marutām gaṇaḥ

original: RV_10,137.05c trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam arapā asat //
analyzed: trāyantām viśvā bhūtāni yathā ayam arapāḥ asat

original: RV_10,137.06a āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ

original: RV_10,137.06c āpaḥ sarvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam //
analyzed: āpaḥ sarvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam

original: RV_10,137.07a hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhābhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī /
analyzed: hastābhyām daśa śākhābhyām jihvā vācaḥ purogavī

original: RV_10,137.07c anāmayitnubhyāṃ tvā tābhyāṃ tvopa spṛśāmasi //
analyzed: anāmayitnubhyām tvā tābhyām tvā upa spṛśāmasi

original: RV_10,138.01a tava tya indra sakhyeṣu vahnaya ṛtam manvānā vy adardirur valam /
analyzed: tava tye indra sakhyeṣu vahnayaḥ ṛtam manvānāḥ vi adardiruḥ valam

original: RV_10,138.01c yatrā daśasyann uṣaso riṇann apaḥ kutsāya manmann ahyaś ca daṃsayaḥ //
analyzed: yatrā daśasyan uṣasaḥ riṇan apaḥ kutsāya manman ahyaḥ ca daṃsayaḥ

original: RV_10,138.02a avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayo girīn ud āja usrā apibo madhu priyam /
analyzed: avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayaḥ girīn ud ājaḥ usrāḥ apibaḥ madhu priyam

original: RV_10,138.02c avardhayo vanino asya daṃsasā śuśoca sūrya ṛtajātayā girā //
analyzed: avardhayaḥ vaninaḥ asya daṃsasā śuśoca sūryaḥ ṛta jātayā girā

original: RV_10,138.03a vi sūryo madhye amucad rathaṃ divo vidad dāsāya pratimānam āryaḥ /
analyzed: vi sūryaḥ madhye amucat ratham divaḥ vidat dāsāya pratimānam āryaḥ

original: RV_10,138.03c dṛḷhāni pipror asurasya māyina indro vy āsyac cakṛvāṃ ṛjiśvanā //
analyzed: dṛḍhāni piproḥ asurasya māyinaḥ indraḥ vi āsyat cakṛvān ṛjiśvanā

original: RV_10,138.04a anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣito vy āsyan nidhīṃr adevāṃ amṛṇad ayāsyaḥ /
analyzed: anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣitaḥ vi āsyan nidhīṃr adevān amṛṇat ayāsyaḥ

original: RV_10,138.04c māseva sūryo vasu puryam ā dade gṛṇānaḥ śatrūṃr aśṛṇād virukmatā //
analyzed: māsā iva sūryaḥ vasu puryam ā dade gṛṇānaḥ śatrūṃr aśṛṇāt virukmatā

original: RV_10,138.05a ayuddhaseno vibhvā vibhindatā dāśad vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate /
analyzed: a yuddha senaḥ vibhvā vibhindatā dāśat vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate

original: RV_10,138.05c indrasya vajrād abibhed abhiśnathaḥ prākrāmac chundhyūr ajahād uṣā anaḥ //
analyzed: indrasya vajrāt abibhet abhiśnathaḥ prākrāmat śundhyūḥ ajahāt uṣāḥ anaḥ

original: RV_10,138.06a etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yad eka ekam akṛṇor ayajñam /
analyzed: etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yat ekaḥ ekam akṛṇoḥ a yajñam

original: RV_10,138.06c māsāṃ vidhānam adadhā adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnam bharati pradhim pitā //
analyzed: māsām vidhānam adadhāḥ adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnam bharati pradhim pitā

original: RV_10,139.01a sūryaraśmir harikeśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotir ud ayāṃ ajasram /
analyzed: sūrya raśmiḥ hari keśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotiḥ ud ayām ajasram

original: RV_10,139.01c tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ //
analyzed: tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ

original: RV_10,139.02a nṛcakṣā eṣa divo madhya āsta āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam /
analyzed: nṛ cakṣāḥ eṣa divaḥ madhye āste āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam

original: RV_10,139.02c sa viśvācīr abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīr antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum //
analyzed: sa viśvācīḥ abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīḥ antarā pūrvam aparam ca ketum

original: RV_10,139.03a rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ viśvā rūpābhi caṣṭe śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: rāyaḥ budhnaḥ saṃgamanaḥ vasūnām viśvā rūpā abhi caṣṭe śacībhiḥ

original: RV_10,139.03c deva iva savitā satyadharmendro na tasthau samare dhanānām //
analyzed: devaḥ iva savitā satya dharmā indraḥ na tasthau samare dhanānām

original: RV_10,139.04a viśvāvasuṃ soma gandharvam āpo dadṛśuṣīs tad ṛtenā vy āyan /
analyzed: viśvāvasum soma gandharvam āpaḥ dadṛśuṣīḥ tat ṛtena vi āyan

original: RV_10,139.04c tad anvavaid indro rārahāṇa āsām pari sūryasya paridhīṃr apaśyat //
analyzed: tat anvavait indraḥ rārahāṇaḥ āsām pari sūryasya paridhīn apaśyat

original: RV_10,139.05a viśvāvasur abhi tan no gṛṇātu divyo gandharvo rajaso vimānaḥ /
analyzed: viśvāvasuḥ abhi tat naḥ gṛṇātu divyaḥ gandharvaḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ

original: RV_10,139.05c yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na vidma dhiyo hinvāno dhiya in no avyāḥ //
analyzed: yat vā gha satyam uta yat na vidma dhiyaḥ hinvānaḥ dhiyaḥ id naḥ avyāḥ

original: RV_10,139.06a sasnim avindac caraṇe nadīnām apāvṛṇod duro aśmavrajānām /
analyzed: sasnim avindat caraṇe nadīnām apāvṛṇot duraḥ aśma vrajānām

original: RV_10,139.06c prāsāṃ gandharvo amṛtāni vocad indro dakṣam pari jānād ahīnām //
analyzed: pra āsām gandharvaḥ amṛtāni vocat indraḥ dakṣam pari jānāt ahīnām

original: RV_10,140.01a agne tava śravo vayo mahi bhrājante arcayo vibhāvaso /
analyzed: agne tava śravaḥ vayaḥ mahi bhrājante arcayaḥ vibhāvaso

original: RV_10,140.01c bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyaṃ dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave //
analyzed: bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyam dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave

original: RV_10,140.02a pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcā anūnavarcā ud iyarṣi bhānunā /
analyzed: pāvaka varcāḥ śukra varcāḥ anūna varcāḥ ud iyarṣi bhānunā

original: RV_10,140.02c putro mātarā vicarann upāvasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe //
analyzed: putraḥ mātarā vicaran upa avasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe

original: RV_10,140.03a ūrjo napāj jātavedaḥ suśastibhir mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt jātavedaḥ su śastibhiḥ mandasva dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_10,140.03c tve iṣaḥ saṃ dadhur bhūrivarpasaś citrotayo vāmajātāḥ //
analyzed: tve iṣaḥ sam bhūri varpasaḥ citra ūtayaḥ vāma jātāḥ

original: RV_10,140.04a irajyann agne prathayasva jantubhir asme rāyo amartya /
analyzed: irajyan agne prathayasva jantubhiḥ asme rāyaḥ amartya

original: RV_10,140.04c sa darśatasya vapuṣo vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratum //
analyzed: sa darśatasya vapuṣaḥ vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasim kratum

original: RV_10,140.05a iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ kṣayantaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasam kṣayantam rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_10,140.05c rātiṃ vāmasya subhagām mahīm iṣaṃ dadhāsi sānasiṃ rayim //
analyzed: rātim vāmasya subhagām mahīm iṣam dadhāsi sānasim rayim

original: RV_10,140.06a ṛtāvānam mahiṣaṃ viśvadarśatam agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtāvānam mahiṣam viśva darśatam agnim sumnāya dadhire puras janāḥ

original: RV_10,140.06c śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyam mānuṣā yugā //
analyzed: śrutkarṇam saprathastamam tvā girā daivyam mānuṣāḥ yugā

original: RV_10,141.01a agne acchā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava /
analyzed: agne acchā vada iha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ su manāḥ bhava

original: RV_10,141.01c pra no yaccha viśas pate dhanadā asi nas tvam //
analyzed: pra naḥ yaccha viśaḥ pate dhana dāḥ asi naḥ tvam

original: RV_10,141.02a pra no yacchatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ

original: RV_10,141.02c pra devāḥ prota sūnṛtā rāyo devī dadātu naḥ //
analyzed: pra devāḥ pra uta sūnṛtā rāyaḥ devī dadātu naḥ

original: RV_10,141.03a somaṃ rājānam avase 'gniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe /
analyzed: somam rājānam avase gnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_10,141.03c ādityān viṣṇuṃ sūryam brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim //
analyzed: ādityān viṣṇum sūryam brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim

original: RV_10,141.04a indravāyū bṛhaspatiṃ suhaveha havāmahe /
analyzed: indra vāyū bṛhaspatim su havā iha havāmahe

original: RV_10,141.04c yathā naḥ sarva ij janaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asat //
analyzed: yathā naḥ sarvaḥ id janaḥ saṃgatyām su manāḥ asat

original: RV_10,141.05a aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya /
analyzed: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indram dānāya codaya

original: RV_10,141.05c vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam //
analyzed: vātam viṣṇum sarasvatīm savitāram ca vājinam

original: RV_10,141.06a tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne agnibhiḥ brahma yajñam ca vardhaya

original: RV_10,141.06c tvaṃ no devatātaye rāyo dānāya codaya //
analyzed: tvam naḥ devatātaye rāyaḥ dānāya codaya

original: RV_10,142.01a ayam agne jaritā tve abhūd api sahasaḥ sūno nahy anyad asty āpyam /
analyzed: ayam agne jaritā tve abhūt api sahasaḥ sūno nahi anyat asti āpyam

original: RV_10,142.01c bhadraṃ hi śarma trivarūtham asti ta āre hiṃsānām apa didyum ā kṛdhi //
analyzed: bhadram hi śarma tri varūtham asti te āre hiṃsānām apa didyum ā kṛdhi

original: RV_10,142.02a pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sācīva viśvā bhuvanā ny ṛñjase /
analyzed: pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sāci iva viśvā bhuvanā ni ṛñjase

original: RV_10,142.02c pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ puraś caranti paśupā iva tmanā //
analyzed: pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta naḥ dhiyaḥ puras caranti paśu pāḥ iva tmanā

original: RV_10,142.03a uta vā u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsad bahor agna ulapasya svadhāvaḥ /
analyzed: uta vai u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsat bahoḥ agne ulapasya svadhāvas

original: RV_10,142.03c uta khilyā urvarāṇām bhavanti mā te hetiṃ taviṣīṃ cukrudhāma //
analyzed: uta khilyāḥ urvarāṇām bhavanti mā te hetim taviṣīm cukrudhāma

original: RV_10,142.04a yad udvato nivato yāsi bapsat pṛthag eṣi pragardhinīva senā /
analyzed: yat udvataḥ nivataḥ yāsi bapsat pṛthak eṣi pragardhinī iva senā

original: RV_10,142.04c yadā te vāto anuvāti śocir vapteva śmaśru vapasi pra bhūma //
analyzed: yadā te vātaḥ anuvāti śociḥ vaptā iva śmaśru vapasi pra bhūma

original: RV_10,142.05a praty asya śreṇayo dadṛśra ekaṃ niyānam bahavo rathāsaḥ /
analyzed: prati asya śreṇayaḥ dadṛśre ekam niyānam bahavaḥ rathāsaḥ

original: RV_10,142.05c bāhū yad agne anumarmṛjāno nyaṅṅ uttānām anveṣi bhūmim //
analyzed: bāhū yat agne anumarmṛjānaḥ nyaṅ uttānām anveṣi bhūmim

original: RV_10,142.06a ut te śuṣmā jihatām ut te arcir ut te agne śaśamānasya vājāḥ /
analyzed: ud te śuṣmāḥ jihatām ud te arciḥ ud te agne śaśamānasya vājāḥ

original: RV_10,142.06c uc chvañcasva ni nama vardhamāna ā tvādya viśve vasavaḥ sadantu //
analyzed: ud śvañcasva ni nama vardhamānaḥ ā tvā adya viśve vasavaḥ sadantu

original: RV_10,142.07a apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ samudrasya niveśanam /
analyzed: apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam

original: RV_10,142.07c anyaṃ kṛṇuṣvetaḥ panthāṃ tena yāhi vaśāṃ anu //
analyzed: anyam kṛṇuṣva itas panthām tena yāhi vaśām anu

original: RV_10,142.08a āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ /
analyzed: āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ

original: RV_10,142.08c hradāś ca puṇḍarīkāṇi samudrasya gṛhā ime //
analyzed: hradāḥ ca puṇḍarīkāṇi samudrasya gṛhāḥ ime

original: RV_10,143.01a tyaṃ cid atrim ṛtajuram artham aśvaṃ na yātave /
analyzed: tyam cit atrim ṛtajuram artham aśvam na yātave

original: RV_10,143.01c kakṣīvantaṃ yadī punā rathaṃ na kṛṇutho navam //
analyzed: kakṣīvantam yadī punā ratham na kṛṇuthaḥ navam

original: RV_10,143.02a tyaṃ cid aśvaṃ na vājinam areṇavo yam atnata /
analyzed: tyam cit aśvam na vājinam areṇavaḥ yam atnata

original: RV_10,143.02c dṛḷhaṃ granthiṃ na vi ṣyatam atriṃ yaviṣṭham ā rajaḥ //
analyzed: dṛḷham granthim na vi syatam atrim yaviṣṭham ā rajaḥ

original: RV_10,143.03a narā daṃsiṣṭhāv atraye śubhrā siṣāsataṃ dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: narā daṃsiṣṭhau atraye śubhrā siṣāsatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_10,143.03c athā hi vāṃ divo narā puna stomo na viśase //
analyzed: athā hi vām divaḥ narā punar stomaḥ na

original: RV_10,143.04a cite tad vāṃ surādhasā rātiḥ sumatir aśvinā /
analyzed: cite tat vām su rādhasā rātiḥ sumatiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10,143.04c ā yan naḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣatho narā //
analyzed: ā yat naḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣathaḥ narā

original: RV_10,143.05a yuvam bhujyuṃ samudra ā rajasaḥ pāra īṅkhitam /
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum samudre ā rajasaḥ pāre īṅkhitam

original: RV_10,143.05c yātam acchā patatribhir nāsatyā sātaye kṛtam //
analyzed: yātam acchā patatribhiḥ nāsatyā sātaye kṛtam

original: RV_10,143.06a ā vāṃ sumnaiḥ śaṃyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśvavedasā /
analyzed: ā vām sumnaiḥ śaṃyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśva vedasā

original: RV_10,143.06c sam asme bhūṣataṃ narotsaṃ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: sam asme bhūṣatam narā utsam na pipyuṣīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_10,144.01a ayaṃ hi te amartya indur atyo na patyate /
analyzed: ayam hi te amartyaḥ induḥ atyaḥ na patyate

original: RV_10,144.01c dakṣo viśvāyur vedhase //
analyzed: dakṣaḥ viśvāyuḥ vedhase

original: RV_10,144.02a ayam asmāsu kāvya ṛbhur vajro dāsvate /
analyzed: ayam asmāsu kāvyaḥ ṛbhuḥ vajraḥ dāsvate

original: RV_10,144.02c ayam bibharty ūrdhvakṛśanam madam ṛbhur na kṛtvyam madam //
analyzed: ayam bibharti ūrdhva kṛśanam madam ṛbhuḥ na kṛtvyam madam

original: RV_10,144.03a ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvana āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ /
analyzed: ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvane āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_10,144.03c ava dīdhed ahīśuvaḥ //
analyzed: ava dīdhet ahīśuvaḥ

original: RV_10,144.04a yaṃ suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putra ābharat /
analyzed: yam suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putraḥ ābharat

original: RV_10,144.04c śatacakraṃ yo 'hyo vartaniḥ //
analyzed: śata cakram yaḥ hyas vartaniḥ

original: RV_10,144.05a yaṃ te śyenaś cārum avṛkam padābharad aruṇam mānam andhasaḥ /
analyzed: yam te śyenaḥ cārum avṛkam padā abharat aruṇam mānam andhasaḥ

original: RV_10,144.05c enā vayo vi tāry āyur jīvasa enā jāgāra bandhutā //
analyzed: enā vayaḥ vi tāri āyuḥ jīvase enā jāgāra bandhu tā

original: RV_10,144.06a evā tad indra indunā deveṣu cid dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ /
analyzed: eva tat indraḥ indunā deveṣu cit dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ

original: RV_10,144.06c kratvā vayo vi tāry āyuḥ sukrato kratvāyam asmad ā sutaḥ //
analyzed: kratvā vayaḥ vi tāri āyuḥ su krato kratvā ayam asmat ā sutaḥ

original: RV_10,145.01a imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ vīrudham balavattamām /
analyzed: imām khanāmi oṣadhim vīrudham balavattamām

original: RV_10,145.01c yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim //
analyzed: yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim

original: RV_10,145.02a uttānaparṇe subhage devajūte sahasvati /
analyzed: uttāna parṇe subhage deva jūte sahasvati

original: RV_10,145.02c sapatnīm me parā dhama patim me kevalaṃ kuru //
analyzed: sapatnīm me parā dhama patim me kevalam kuru

original: RV_10,145.03a uttarāham uttara uttared uttarābhyaḥ /
analyzed: uttarā aham uttaraḥ uttaret uttarābhyaḥ

original: RV_10,145.03c athā sapatnī yā mamādharā sādharābhyaḥ //
analyzed: athā sapatnī yā mama adharā sā adharābhyaḥ

original: RV_10,145.04a nahy asyā nāma gṛbhṇāmi no asmin ramate jane /
analyzed: nahi asyāḥ nāma gṛbhṇāmi na u asmin ramate jane

original: RV_10,145.04c parām eva parāvataṃ sapatnīṃ gamayāmasi //
analyzed: parām eva parāvatam sapatnīm gamayāmasi

original: RV_10,145.05a aham asmi sahamānātha tvam asi sāsahiḥ /
analyzed: aham asmi sahamānā atha tvam asi sāsahiḥ

original: RV_10,145.05c ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī sapatnīm me sahāvahai //
analyzed: ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī sapatnīm me sahāvahai

original: RV_10,145.06a upa te 'dhāṃ sahamānām abhi tvādhāṃ sahīyasā /
analyzed: upa te dhām sahamānām abhi tvā adhām sahīyasā

original: RV_10,145.06c mām anu pra te mano vatsaṃ gaur iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu //
analyzed: mām anu pra te manaḥ vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu

original: RV_10,146.01a araṇyāny araṇyāny asau yā preva naśyasi /
analyzed: araṇyāni araṇyāni asau yā pra iva naśyasi

original: RV_10,146.01c kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi na tvā bhīr iva vindatī3ṃ //
analyzed: kathā grāmam na pṛcchasi na tvā bhīḥ iva

original: RV_10,146.02a vṛṣāravāya vadate yad upāvati ciccikaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣāravāya vadate yat upāvati ciccikaḥ

original: RV_10,146.02c āghāṭibhir iva dhāvayann araṇyānir mahīyate //
analyzed: āghāṭibhiḥ iva dhāvayan araṇyāniḥ mahīyate

original: RV_10,146.03a uta gāva ivādanty uta veśmeva dṛśyate /
analyzed: uta gāvaḥ iva adanti uta veśma iva dṛśyate

original: RV_10,146.03c uto araṇyāniḥ sāyaṃ śakaṭīr iva sarjati //
analyzed: uta u araṇyāniḥ sāyam śakaṭīḥ iva sarjati

original: RV_10,146.04a gām aṅgaiṣa ā hvayati dārv aṅgaiṣo apāvadhīt /
analyzed: gām aṅga eṣaḥ ā hvayati dāru aṅga eṣaḥ apāvadhīt

original: RV_10,146.04c vasann araṇyānyāṃ sāyam akrukṣad iti manyate //
analyzed: vasan araṇyānyām sāyam akrukṣat iti manyate

original: RV_10,146.05a na vā araṇyānir hanty anyaś cen nābhigacchati /
analyzed: na vai araṇyāniḥ hanti anyaḥ ced na abhigacchati

original: RV_10,146.05c svādoḥ phalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmaṃ ni padyate //
analyzed: svādoḥ phalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmam ni padyate

original: RV_10,146.06a āñjanagandhiṃ surabhim bahvannām akṛṣīvalām /
analyzed: āñjana gandhim surabhim bahu annām akṛṣīvalām

original: RV_10,146.06c prāham mṛgāṇām mātaram araṇyānim aśaṃsiṣam //
analyzed: pra aham mṛgāṇām mātaram araṇyānim aśaṃsiṣam

original: RV_10,147.01a śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave 'han yad vṛtraṃ naryaṃ viver apaḥ /
analyzed: śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave han yat vṛtram naryam viveḥ apaḥ

original: RV_10,147.01c ubhe yat tvā bhavato rodasī anu rejate śuṣmāt pṛthivī cid adrivaḥ //
analyzed: ubhe yat tvā bhavataḥ rodasī anu rejate śuṣmāt pṛthivī cit adrivas

original: RV_10,147.02a tvam māyābhir anavadya māyinaṃ śravasyatā manasā vṛtram ardayaḥ /
analyzed: tvam māyābhiḥ anavadya māyinam śravasyatā manasā vṛtram ardayaḥ

original: RV_10,147.02c tvām in naro vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvāṃ viśvāsu havyāsv iṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: tvām id naraḥ vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvām viśvāsu havyāsu iṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10,147.03a aiṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāso ye maghavann ānaśur magham /
analyzed: ā eṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāsaḥ ye maghavan ānaśuḥ magham

original: RV_10,147.03c arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medhasātā vājinam ahraye dhane //
analyzed: arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medhasātā vājinam ahraye dhane

original: RV_10,147.04a sa in nu rāyaḥ subhṛtasya cākanan madaṃ yo asya raṃhyaṃ ciketati /
analyzed: saḥ id nu rāyaḥ su bhṛtasya cākanat madam yaḥ asya raṃhyam ciketati

original: RV_10,147.04c tvāvṛdho maghavan dāśvadhvaro makṣū sa vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: tvāvṛdhaḥ maghavan dāśu adhvaraḥ makṣū sa vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_10,147.05a tvaṃ śardhāya mahinā gṛṇāna uru kṛdhi maghavañ chagdhi rāyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam śardhāya mahinā gṛṇānaḥ uru kṛdhi maghavan śagdhi rāyaḥ

original: RV_10,147.05c tvaṃ no mitro varuṇo na māyī pitvo na dasma dayase vibhaktā //
analyzed: tvam naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ na māyī pitvaḥ na dasma dayase vibhaktā

original: RV_10,148.01a suṣvāṇāsa indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaś ca tuvinṛmṇa vājam /
analyzed: suṣvāṇāsaḥ indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaḥ ca tuvi nṛmṇa vājam

original: RV_10,148.01c ā no bhara suvitaṃ yasya cākan tmanā tanā sanuyāma tvotāḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara suvitam yasya cākan tmanā tanā sanuyāma tvotāḥ

original: RV_10,148.02a ṛṣvas tvam indra śūra jāto dāsīr viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣvaḥ tvam indra śūra jātaḥ dāsīḥ viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ

original: RV_10,148.02c guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsu bibhṛmasi prasravaṇe na somam //
analyzed: guhā hitam guhyam gūḍham apsu bibhṛmasi prasravaṇe na somam

original: RV_10,148.03a aryo vā giro abhy arca vidvān ṛṣīṇāṃ vipraḥ sumatiṃ cakānaḥ /
analyzed: aryaḥ vā giraḥ abhī arca vidvān ṛṣīṇām vipraḥ sumatim cakānaḥ

original: RV_10,148.03c te syāma ye raṇayanta somair enota tubhyaṃ rathoḷha bhakṣaiḥ //
analyzed: te syāma ye raṇayanta somaiḥ enā uta tubhyam ratha ūḷha bhakṣaiḥ

original: RV_10,148.04a imā brahmendra tubhyaṃ śaṃsi dā nṛbhyo nṛṇāṃ śūra śavaḥ /
analyzed: imā brahma indra tubhyam śaṃsi dāḥ nṛbhyaḥ nṛṇām śūra śavaḥ

original: RV_10,148.04c tebhir bhava sakratur yeṣu cākann uta trāyasva gṛṇata uta stīn //
analyzed: tebhiḥ bhava sakratuḥ yeṣu cākan uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ uta stīn

original: RV_10,148.05a śrudhī havam indra śūra pṛthyā uta stavase venyasyārkaiḥ /
analyzed: śrudhi havam indra śūra pṛthyāḥ uta stavase venyasya arkaiḥ

original: RV_10,148.05c ā yas te yoniṃ ghṛtavantam asvār ūrmir na nimnair dravayanta vakvāḥ //
analyzed: ā yaḥ te yonim ghṛtavantam asvār ūrmiḥ na nimnaiḥ dravayanta vakvāḥ

original: RV_10,149.01a savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīm aramṇād askambhane savitā dyām adṛṃhat /
analyzed: savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīm aramṇāt a skambhane savitā dyām adṛṃhat

original: RV_10,149.01c aśvam ivādhukṣad dhunim antarikṣam atūrte baddhaṃ savitā samudram //
analyzed: aśvam iva adhukṣat dhunim antarikṣam a tūrte baddham savitā samudram

original: RV_10,149.02a yatrā samudra skabhito vy aunad apāṃ napāt savitā tasya veda /
analyzed: yatra samudraḥ skabhitaḥ vi aunat apām napāt savitā tasya veda

original: RV_10,149.02c ato bhūr ata ā utthitaṃ rajo 'to dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām //
analyzed: atas bhūḥ atas ā utthitam rajaḥ tas dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām

original: RV_10,149.03a paścedam anyad abhavad yajatram amartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā /
analyzed: paścā idam anyat abhavat yajatram amartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā

original: RV_10,149.03c suparṇo aṅga savitur garutmān pūrvo jātaḥ sa u asyānu dharma //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ aṅga savituḥ garutmān pūrvaḥ jātaḥ saḥ u asya anu dharma

original: RV_10,149.04a gāva iva grāmaṃ yūyudhir ivāśvān vāśreva vatsaṃ sumanā duhānā /
analyzed: gāvaḥ iva grāmam yūyudhiḥ iva aśvān vāśrā iva vatsam sumanāḥ duhānā

original: RV_10,149.04c patir iva jāyām abhi no ny etu dhartā divaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ //
analyzed: patiḥ iva jāyām abhi naḥ ni etu dhartā divaḥ savitā viśva vāraḥ

original: RV_10,149.05a hiraṇyastūpaḥ savitar yathā tvāṅgiraso juhve vāje asmin /
analyzed: hiraṇya stūpaḥ savitar yathā tvā aṅgirasaḥ juhve vāje asmin

original: RV_10,149.05c evā tvārcann avase vandamānaḥ somasyevāṃśum prati jāgarāham //
analyzed: eva tvā arcan avase vandamānaḥ somasya iva aṃśum prati jāgara aham

original: RV_10,150.01a samiddhaś cit sam idhyase devebhyo havyavāhana /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ cit sam idhyase devebhyaḥ havya vāhana

original: RV_10,150.01c ādityai rudrair vasubhir na ā gahi mṛḷīkāya na ā gahi //
analyzed: ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ naḥ ā gahi mṛḍīkāya naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_10,150.02a imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi /
analyzed: imam yajñam idam vacaḥ jujuṣāṇaḥ upāgahi

original: RV_10,150.02c martāsas tvā samidhāna havāmahe mṛḷīkāya havāmahe //
analyzed: martāsaḥ tvā samidhāna havāmahe mṛḷīkāya havāmahe

original: RV_10,150.03a tvām u jātavedasaṃ viśvavāraṃ gṛṇe dhiyā /
analyzed: tvām u jātavedasam viśva vāram gṛṇe dhiyā

original: RV_10,150.03c agne devāṃ ā vaha naḥ priyavratān mṛḷīkāya priyavratān //
analyzed: agne devān ā vaha naḥ priya vratān mṛḷīkāya priya vratān

original: RV_10,150.04a agnir devo devānām abhavat purohito 'gnim manuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sam īdhire /
analyzed: agniḥ devaḥ devānām abhavat purohitaḥ gnim manuṣyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sam īdhire

original: RV_10,150.04c agnim maho dhanasātāv ahaṃ huve mṛḷīkaṃ dhanasātaye //
analyzed: agnim mahaḥ dhana sātau aham huve mṛḍīkam dhana sātaye

original: RV_10,150.05a agnir atrim bharadvājaṃ gaviṣṭhiram prāvan naḥ kaṇvaṃ trasadasyum āhave /
analyzed: agniḥ atrim bharadvājam gaviṣṭhiram prāvat naḥ kaṇvam trasadasyum āhave

original: RV_10,150.05c agniṃ vasiṣṭho havate purohito mṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ //
analyzed: agnim vasiṣṭhaḥ havate purohitaḥ mṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ

original: RV_10,151.01a śraddhayāgniḥ sam idhyate śraddhayā hūyate haviḥ /
analyzed: śraddhayā agniḥ sam idhyate śraddhayā hūyate haviḥ

original: RV_10,151.01c śraddhām bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayāmasi //
analyzed: śraddhām bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayāmasi

original: RV_10,151.02a priyaṃ śraddhe dadataḥ priyaṃ śraddhe didāsataḥ /
analyzed: priyam śraddhe dadataḥ priyam śraddhe didāsataḥ

original: RV_10,151.02c priyam bhojeṣu yajvasv idam ma uditaṃ kṛdhi //
analyzed: priyam bhojeṣu yajvasu idam me uditam kṛdhi

original: RV_10,151.03a yathā devā asureṣu śraddhām ugreṣu cakrire /
analyzed: yathā devāḥ asureṣu śraddhām ugreṣu cakrire

original: RV_10,151.03c evam bhojeṣu yajvasv asmākam uditaṃ kṛdhi //
analyzed: evam bhojeṣu yajvasu asmākam uditam kṛdhi

original: RV_10,151.04a śraddhāṃ devā yajamānā vāyugopā upāsate /
analyzed: śraddhām devāḥ yajamānāḥ vāyu gopāḥ upāsate

original: RV_10,151.04c śraddhāṃ hṛdayyayākūtyā śraddhayā vindate vasu //
analyzed: śraddhām hṛdayyayā ākūtyā śraddhayā vindate vasu

original: RV_10,151.05a śraddhām prātar havāmahe śraddhām madhyandinam pari /
analyzed: śraddhām prātar havāmahe śraddhām madhyandinam pari

original: RV_10,151.05c śraddhāṃ sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrad dhāpayeha naḥ //
analyzed: śraddhām sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrat dhāpaya iha naḥ

original: RV_10,152.01a śāsa itthā mahāṃ asy amitrakhādo adbhutaḥ /
analyzed: śāsaḥ itthā mahān asi amitra khādaḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_10,152.01c na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana //
analyzed: na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana

original: RV_10,152.02a svastidā viśas patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī /
analyzed: svasti dāḥ viśaḥ patiḥ vṛtra hā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī

original: RV_10,152.02c vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṅkaraḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā indraḥ puras etu naḥ soma pāḥ abhayaṅkaraḥ

original: RV_10,152.03a vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja /
analyzed: vi rakṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja

original: RV_10,152.03c vi manyum indra vṛtrahann amitrasyābhidāsataḥ //
analyzed: vi manyum indra vṛtrahan amitrasya abhidāsataḥ

original: RV_10,152.04a vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ /
analyzed: vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_10,152.04c yo asmāṃ abhidāsaty adharaṃ gamayā tamaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ asmām abhidāsati adharam gamaya tamaḥ

original: RV_10,152.05a apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham /
analyzed: apa indra dviṣataḥ mano pa jijyāsataḥ vadham

original: RV_10,152.05c vi manyoḥ śarma yaccha varīyo yavayā vadham //
analyzed: vi manyoḥ śarma yaccha varīyaḥ yavaya vadham

original: RV_10,153.01a īṅkhayantīr apasyuva indraṃ jātam upāsate /
analyzed: īṅkhayantīḥ apasyuvaḥ indram jātam upāsate

original: RV_10,153.01c bhejānāsaḥ suvīryam //
analyzed: bhejānāsaḥ su vīryam

original: RV_10,153.02a tvam indra balād adhi sahaso jāta ojasaḥ /
analyzed: tvam indra balāt adhi sahasaḥ jātaḥ ojasaḥ

original: RV_10,153.02c tvaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣed asi //
analyzed: tvam vṛṣan vṛṣā id asi

original: RV_10,153.03a tvam indrāsi vṛtrahā vy antarikṣam atiraḥ /
analyzed: tvam indra asi vṛtra hā vi antarikṣam atiraḥ

original: RV_10,153.03c ud dyām astabhnā ojasā //
analyzed: ud dyām astabhnāḥ ojasā

original: RV_10,153.04a tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ /
analyzed: tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ

original: RV_10,153.04c vajraṃ śiśāna ojasā //
analyzed: vajram śiśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_10,153.05a tvam indrābhibhūr asi viśvā jātāny ojasā /
analyzed: tvam indra abhibhūḥ asi viśvā jātāni ojasā

original: RV_10,153.05c sa viśvā bhuva ābhavaḥ //
analyzed: sa viśvāḥ bhuvaḥ ābhavaḥ

original: RV_10,154.01a soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eka upāsate /
analyzed: somaḥ ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eke upāsate

original: RV_10,154.01c yebhyo madhu pradhāvati tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
analyzed: yebhyaḥ madhu pradhāvati tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10,154.02a tapasā ye anādhṛṣyās tapasā ye svar yayuḥ /
analyzed: tapasā ye anādhṛṣyāḥ tapasā ye svar yayuḥ

original: RV_10,154.02c tapo ye cakrire mahas tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
analyzed: tapaḥ ye cakrire mahaḥ tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10,154.03a ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye tanūtyajaḥ /
analyzed: ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāsaḥ ye tanūtyajaḥ

original: RV_10,154.03c ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
analyzed: ye vā sahasra dakṣiṇāḥ tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10,154.04a ye cit pūrva ṛtasāpa ṛtāvāna ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: ye cit pūrve ṛtasāpaḥ ṛtāvānaḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10,154.04c pitṝn tapasvato yama tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
analyzed: pitṝn tapasvataḥ yama tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10,154.05a sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam /
analyzed: sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayaḥ ye gopāyanti sūryam

original: RV_10,154.05c ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gacchatāt //
analyzed: ṛṣīn tapasvataḥ yama tapaḥ jām api gacchatāt

original: RV_10,155.01a arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe giriṃ gaccha sadānve /
analyzed: arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe girim gaccha sadānve

original: RV_10,155.01c śirimbiṭhasya satvabhis tebhiṣ ṭvā cātayāmasi //
analyzed: śirimbiṭhasya satvabhiḥ tebhiḥ tvā cātayāmasi

original: RV_10,155.02a catto itaś cattāmutaḥ sarvā bhrūṇāny āruṣī /
analyzed: cattā u itas cattā amutas sarvā bhrūṇāni āruṣī

original: RV_10,155.02c arāyyam brahmaṇas pate tīkṣṇaśṛṇgodṛṣann ihi //
analyzed: arāyyam brahmaṇas pate tīkṣṇa śṛṇga udṛṣan ihi

original: RV_10,155.03a ado yad dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam /
analyzed: adaḥ yat dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam

original: RV_10,155.03c tad ā rabhasva durhaṇo tena gaccha parastaram //
analyzed: tat ā rabhasva durhaṇo tena gaccha parastaram

original: RV_10,155.04a yad dha prācīr ajagantoro maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ /
analyzed: yat ha prācīḥ ajaganta uraḥ maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ

original: RV_10,155.04c hatā indrasya śatravaḥ sarve budbudayāśavaḥ //
analyzed: hatāḥ indrasya śatravaḥ sarve budbudayāśavaḥ

original: RV_10,155.05a parīme gām aneṣata pary agnim ahṛṣata /
analyzed: pari ime gām aneṣata pari agnim ahṛṣata

original: RV_10,155.05c deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imāṃ ā dadharṣati //
analyzed: deveṣu akrata śravaḥ kaḥ imān ā dadharṣati

original: RV_10,156.01a agniṃ hinvantu no dhiyaḥ saptim āśum ivājiṣu /
analyzed: agnim hinvantu naḥ dhiyaḥ saptim āśum iva ājiṣu

original: RV_10,156.01c tena jeṣma dhanaṃ-dhanam //
analyzed: tena jeṣma dhanaṃdhanam

original: RV_10,156.02a yayā gā ākarāmahe senayāgne tavotyā /
analyzed: yayā gāḥ ākarāmahe senayā agne tava ūtyā

original: RV_10,156.02c tāṃ no hinva maghattaye //
analyzed: tām naḥ hinva maghattaye

original: RV_10,156.03a āgne sthūraṃ rayim bhara pṛthuṃ gomantam aśvinam /
analyzed: ā agne sthūram rayim bhara pṛthum gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_10,156.03c aṅdhi khaṃ vartayā paṇim //
analyzed: aṅdhi kham vartaya paṇim

original: RV_10,156.04a agne nakṣatram ajaram ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi /
analyzed: agne nakṣatram ajaram ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi

original: RV_10,156.04c dadhaj jyotir janebhyaḥ //
analyzed: dadhat jyotiḥ janebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,156.05a agne ketur viśām asi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha upasthasat /
analyzed: agne ketuḥ viśām asi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ upastha sad

original: RV_10,156.05c bodhā stotre vayo dadhat //
analyzed: bodha stotre vayaḥ dadhat

original: RV_10,157.01a imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ //
analyzed: imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ

original: RV_10,157.02a yajñaṃ ca nas tanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityair indraḥ saha cīkḷpāti //
analyzed: yajñam ca naḥ tanvam ca prajām ca ādityaiḥ indraḥ saha cīkḷpāti

original: RV_10,157.03a ādityair indraḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmākam bhūtv avitā tanūnām //
analyzed: ādityaiḥ indraḥ sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmākam bhūtu avitā tanūnām

original: RV_10,157.04a hatvāya devā asurān yad āyan devā devatvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: hatvāya devāḥ asurān yat āyan devāḥ deva tvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_10,157.05a pratyañcam arkam anayañ chacībhir ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan //
analyzed: pratyañcam arkam anayam śacībhiḥ āt id svadhām iṣirām pari apaśyan

original: RV_10,158.01a sūryo no divas pātu vāto antarikṣāt /
analyzed: sūryaḥ naḥ divaḥ pātu vātaḥ antarikṣāt

original: RV_10,158.01c agnir naḥ pārthivebhyaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ pārthivebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,158.02a joṣā savitar yasya te haraḥ śataṃ savāṃ arhati /
analyzed: joṣā savitar yasya te haraḥ śatam savān arhati

original: RV_10,158.02c pāhi no didyutaḥ patantyāḥ //
analyzed: pāhi naḥ didyutaḥ patantyāḥ

original: RV_10,158.03a cakṣur no devaḥ savitā cakṣur na uta parvataḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ naḥ devaḥ savitā cakṣuḥ naḥ uta parvataḥ

original: RV_10,158.03c cakṣur dhātā dadhātu naḥ //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ dhātā dadhātu naḥ

original: RV_10,158.04a cakṣur no dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣur vikhyai tanūbhyaḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ naḥ dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣuḥ vikhyai tanūbhyaḥ

original: RV_10,158.04c saṃ cedaṃ vi ca paśyema //
analyzed: sam ca idam vi ca paśyema

original: RV_10,158.05a susaṃdṛśaṃ tvā vayam prati paśyema sūrya /
analyzed: su saṃdṛśam tvā vayam prati paśyema sūrya

original: RV_10,158.05c vi paśyema nṛcakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: vi paśyema nṛ cakṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,159.01a ud asau sūryo agād ud ayam māmako bhagaḥ /
analyzed: ud asau sūryaḥ agāt ud ayam māmakaḥ bhagaḥ

original: RV_10,159.01c ahaṃ tad vidvalā patim abhy asākṣi viṣāsahiḥ //
analyzed: aham tat vidvalā patim abhī asākṣi viṣāsahiḥ

original: RV_10,159.02a ahaṃ ketur aham mūrdhāham ugrā vivācanī /
analyzed: aham ketuḥ aham mūrdhā aham ugrā vivācanī

original: RV_10,159.02c mamed anu kratum patiḥ sehānāyā upācaret //
analyzed: mama id anu kratum patiḥ sehānāyāḥ upācaret

original: RV_10,159.03a mama putrāḥ śatruhaṇo 'tho me duhitā virāṭ /
analyzed: mama putrāḥ śatru haṇaḥ me duhitā virāj

original: RV_10,159.03c utāham asmi saṃjayā patyau me śloka uttamaḥ //
analyzed: uta aham asmi saṃjayā patyau me ślokaḥ uttamaḥ

original: RV_10,159.04a yenendro haviṣā kṛtvy abhavad dyumny uttamaḥ /
analyzed: yena indraḥ haviṣā kṛtvī abhavat dyumnī uttamaḥ

original: RV_10,159.04c idaṃ tad akri devā asapatnā kilābhuvam //
analyzed: idam tat akri devāḥ asapatnā kila abhuvam

original: RV_10,159.05a asapatnā sapatnaghnī jayanty abhibhūvarī /
analyzed: asapatnā sapatna ghnī jayantī abhibhūvarī

original: RV_10,159.05c āvṛkṣam anyāsāṃ varco rādho astheyasām iva //
analyzed: āvṛkṣam anyāsām varcaḥ rādhaḥ astheyasām iva

original: RV_10,159.06a sam ajaiṣam imā ahaṃ sapatnīr abhibhūvarī /
analyzed: sam ajaiṣam imāḥ aham sapatnīḥ abhibhūvarī

original: RV_10,159.06c yathāham asya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca //
analyzed: yathā aham asya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca

original: RV_10,160.01a tīvrasyābhivayaso asya pāhi sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca /
analyzed: tīvrasya abhivayasaḥ asya pāhi sarva rathā vi harī iha muñca

original: RV_10,160.01c indra mā tvā yajamānāso anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ //
analyzed: indra mā tvā yajamānāsaḥ anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ

original: RV_10,160.02a tubhyaṃ sutās tubhyam u sotvāsas tvāṃ giraḥ śvātryā ā hvayanti /
analyzed: tubhyam sutāḥ tubhyam u sotvāsaḥ tvām giraḥ śvātryāḥ ā hvayanti

original: RV_10,160.02c indredam adya savanaṃ juṣāṇo viśvasya vidvāṃ iha pāhi somam //
analyzed: indra idam adya savanam juṣāṇaḥ viśvasya vidvān iha pāhi somam

original: RV_10,160.03a ya uśatā manasā somam asmai sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti /
analyzed: yaḥ uśatā manasā somam asmai sarva hṛdā deva kāmaḥ sunoti

original: RV_10,160.03c na gā indras tasya parā dadāti praśastam ic cārum asmai kṛṇoti //
analyzed: na gāḥ indraḥ tasya parā dadāti praśastam id cārum asmai kṛṇoti

original: RV_10,160.04a anuspaṣṭo bhavaty eṣo asya yo asmai revān na sunoti somam /
analyzed: anuspaṣṭaḥ bhavati eṣaḥ asya yaḥ asmai revān na sunoti somam

original: RV_10,160.04c nir aratnau maghavā taṃ dadhāti brahmadviṣo hanty anānudiṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: niḥ aratnau maghavā tam dadhāti brahma dviṣaḥ hanti anānudiṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10,160.05a aśvāyanto gavyanto vājayanto havāmahe tvopagantavā u /
analyzed: aśvāyantaḥ gavyantaḥ vājayantaḥ havāmahe tvā upagantavai u

original: RV_10,160.05c ābhūṣantas te sumatau navāyāṃ vayam indra tvā śunaṃ huvema //
analyzed: ābhūṣantaḥ te sumatau navāyām vayam indra tvā śunam huvema

original: RV_10,161.01a muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñātayakṣmād uta rājayakṣmāt /
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam a jñāta yakṣmāt uta rājayakṣmāt

original: RV_10,161.01c grāhir jagrāha yadi vaitad enaṃ tasyā indrāgnī pra mumuktam enam //
analyzed: grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi vā etat enam tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam

original: RV_10,161.02a yadi kṣitāyur yadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyor antikaṃ nīta eva /
analyzed: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam nītaḥ eva

original: RV_10,161.02c tam ā harāmi nirṛter upasthād aspārṣam enaṃ śataśāradāya //
analyzed: tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt aspārṣam enam śata śāradāya

original: RV_10,161.03a sahasrākṣeṇa śataśāradena śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam /
analyzed: sahasra akṣeṇa śata śāradena śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam

original: RV_10,161.03c śataṃ yathemaṃ śarado nayātīndro viśvasya duritasya pāram //
analyzed: śatam yathā imam śaradaḥ nayāti indraḥ viśvasya duritasya pāram

original: RV_10,161.04a śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantāñ chatam u vasantān /
analyzed: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān

original: RV_10,161.04c śatam indrāgnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣā haviṣemam punar duḥ //
analyzed: śatam indra agnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā imam punar duḥ

original: RV_10,161.05a āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarnava /
analyzed: āhārṣam tvā avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarnava

original: RV_10,161.05c sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam //
analyzed: sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te vidam

original: RV_10,162.01a brahmaṇāgniḥ saṃvidāno rakṣohā bādhatām itaḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇā agniḥ saṃvidānaḥ rakṣaḥ hā bādhatām itas

original: RV_10,162.01c amīvā yas te garbhaṃ durṇāmā yonim āśaye //
analyzed: amīvā yaḥ te garbham durṇāmā yonim āśaye

original: RV_10,162.02a yas te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye /
analyzed: yaḥ te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye

original: RV_10,162.02c agniṣ ṭam brahmaṇā saha niṣ kravyādam anīnaśat //
analyzed: agniḥ tam brahmaṇā saha niḥ kravyādam anīnaśat

original: RV_10,162.03a yas te hanti patayantaṃ niṣatsnuṃ yaḥ sarīsṛpam /
analyzed: yaḥ te hanti patayantam niṣatsnum yaḥ sarīsṛpam

original: RV_10,162.03c jātaṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi //
analyzed: jātam yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10,162.04a yas ta ūrū viharaty antarā dampatī śaye /
analyzed: yaḥ te ūrū viharati antarā dampatī śaye

original: RV_10,162.04c yoniṃ yo antar āreḷhi tam ito nāśayāmasi //
analyzed: yonim yaḥ antar āreḍhi tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10,162.05a yas tvā bhrātā patir bhūtvā jāro bhūtvā nipadyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā bhrātā patiḥ bhūtvā jāraḥ bhūtvā nipadyate

original: RV_10,162.05c prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi //
analyzed: prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10,162.06a yas tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate

original: RV_10,162.06c prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi //
analyzed: prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10,163.01a akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukād adhi /
analyzed: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi

original: RV_10,163.01c yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāj jihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te //
analyzed: yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10,163.02a grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt /
analyzed: grīvābhyaḥ te uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt

original: RV_10,163.02c yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te //
analyzed: yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10,163.03a āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor hṛdayād adhi /
analyzed: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ hṛdayāt adhi

original: RV_10,163.03c yakṣmam matasnābhyāṃ yaknaḥ plāśibhyo vi vṛhāmi te //
analyzed: yakṣmam matasnābhyām yaknaḥ plāśibhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10,163.04a ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām /
analyzed: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām

original: RV_10,163.04c yakṣmaṃ śroṇibhyām bhāsadād bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te //
analyzed: yakṣmam śroṇibhyām bhāsadāt bhaṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10,163.05a mehanād vanaṅkaraṇāl lomabhyas te nakhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: mehanāt vanaṅkaraṇāt lomabhyaḥ te nakhebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,163.05c yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te //
analyzed: yakṣmam sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ tam idam vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10,163.06a aṅgād-aṅgāl lomno-lomno jātam parvaṇi-parvaṇi /
analyzed: aṅgāt aṅgāt lomnaḥ lomnaḥ jātam parvaṇi parvaṇi

original: RV_10,163.06c yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te //
analyzed: yakṣmam sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ tam idam vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10,164.01a apehi manasas pate 'pa krāma paraś cara /
analyzed: apehi manasaḥ pate pa krāma paras cara

original: RV_10,164.01c paro nirṛtyā ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvato manaḥ //
analyzed: paras nirṛtyāḥ ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvataḥ manaḥ

original: RV_10,164.02a bhadraṃ vai varaṃ vṛṇate bhadraṃ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: bhadram vai varam vṛṇate bhadram yuñjanti dakṣiṇam

original: RV_10,164.02c bhadraṃ vaivasvate cakṣur bahutrā jīvato manaḥ //
analyzed: bhadram vaivasvate cakṣuḥ bahutrā jīvataḥ manaḥ

original: RV_10,164.03a yad āśasā niḥśasābhiśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ /
analyzed: yat āśasā niḥśasā abhiśasā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ

original: RV_10,164.03c agnir viśvāny apa duṣkṛtāny ajuṣṭāny āre asmad dadhātu //
analyzed: agniḥ viśvāni apa duṣkṛtāni a juṣṭāni āre asmat dadhātu

original: RV_10,164.04a yad indra brahmaṇas pate 'bhidrohaṃ carāmasi /
analyzed: yat indra brahmaṇas pate bhidroham carāmasi

original: RV_10,164.04c pracetā na āṅgiraso dviṣatām pātv aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: pracetāḥ naḥ āṅgirasaḥ dviṣatām pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10,164.05a ajaiṣmādyāsanāma cābhūmānāgaso vayam /
analyzed: ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam

original: RV_10,164.05c jāgratsvapnaḥ saṃkalpaḥ pāpo yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ sa ṛcchatu yo no dveṣṭi tam ṛcchatu //
analyzed: jāgrat svapnaḥ saṃkalpaḥ pāpaḥ yam dviṣmaḥ tam saḥ ṛcchatu yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi tam ṛcchatu

original: RV_10,165.01a devāḥ kapota iṣito yad icchan dūto nirṛtyā idam ājagāma /
analyzed: devāḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ yat icchan dūtaḥ nirṛtyāḥ idam ājagāma

original: RV_10,165.01c tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: tasmai arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtim śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_10,165.02a śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astv anāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛheṣu /
analyzed: śivaḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ naḥ astu anāgāḥ devāḥ śakunaḥ gṛheṣu

original: RV_10,165.02c agnir hi vipro juṣatāṃ havir naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī no vṛṇaktu //
analyzed: agniḥ hi vipraḥ juṣatām haviḥ naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī naḥ vṛṇaktu

original: RV_10,165.03a hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāty asmān āṣṭryām padaṃ kṛṇute agnidhāne /
analyzed: hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāti asmān āṣṭryām padam kṛṇute agnidhāne

original: RV_10,165.03c śaṃ no gobhyaś ca puruṣebhyaś cāstu mā no hiṃsīd iha devāḥ kapotaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ gobhyaḥ ca puruṣebhyaḥ ca astu mā naḥ hiṃsīt iha devāḥ kapotaḥ

original: RV_10,165.04a yad ulūko vadati mogham etad yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti /
analyzed: yat ulūkaḥ vadati mogham etat yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti

original: RV_10,165.04c yasya dūtaḥ prahita eṣa etat tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave //
analyzed: yasya dūtaḥ prahitaḥ eṣaḥ etat tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave

original: RV_10,165.05a ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gāṃ nayadhvam /
analyzed: ṛcā kapotam nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gām nayadhvam

original: RV_10,165.05c saṃyopayanto duritāni viśvā hitvā na ūrjam pra patāt patiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: saṃyopayantaḥ duritāni viśvā hitvā naḥ ūrjam pra patāt patiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10,166.01a ṛṣabham mā samānānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim /
analyzed: ṛṣabham mā samānānām sapatnānām viṣāsahim

original: RV_10,166.01c hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām //
analyzed: hantāram śatrūṇām kṛdhi virājam go patim gavām

original: RV_10,166.02a aham asmi sapatnahendra ivāriṣṭo akṣataḥ /
analyzed: aham asmi sapatna hā indraḥ iva ariṣṭaḥ akṣataḥ

original: RV_10,166.02c adhaḥ sapatnā me pador ime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ //
analyzed: adhas sapatnāḥ me padoḥ ime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ

original: RV_10,166.03a atraiva vo 'pi nahyāmy ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā /
analyzed: atra eva vaḥ pi nahyāmi ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā

original: RV_10,166.03c vācas pate ni ṣedhemān yathā mad adharaṃ vadān //
analyzed: vācaḥ pate ni sedha imān yathā mat adharam vadān

original: RV_10,166.04a abhibhūr aham āgamaṃ viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā /
analyzed: abhibhūḥ aham āgamam viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā

original: RV_10,166.04c ā vaś cittam ā vo vratam ā vo 'haṃ samitiṃ dade //
analyzed: ā vaḥ cittam ā vaḥ vratam ā vaḥ ham samitim dade

original: RV_10,166.05a yogakṣemaṃ va ādāyāham bhūyāsam uttama ā vo mūrdhānam akramīm /
analyzed: yogakṣemam vaḥ ādāya aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ā vaḥ mūrdhānam akramīm

original: RV_10,166.05d adhaspadān ma ud vadata maṇḍūkā ivodakān maṇḍūkā udakād iva //
analyzed: adhaspadān me ud vadata maṇḍūkāḥ iva udakāt maṇḍūkāḥ udakāt iva

original: RV_10,167.01a tubhyedam indra pari ṣicyate madhu tvaṃ sutasya kalaśasya rājasi /
analyzed: tubhya idam indra pari sicyate madhu tvam sutasya kalaśasya rājasi

original: RV_10,167.01c tvaṃ rayim puruvīrām u nas kṛdhi tvaṃ tapaḥ paritapyājayaḥ svaḥ //
analyzed: tvam rayim puru vīrām u naḥ kṛdhi tvam tapaḥ paritapya ajayaḥ svar

original: RV_10,167.02a svarjitam mahi mandānam andhaso havāmahe pari śakraṃ sutāṃ upa /
analyzed: svar jitam mahi mandānam andhasaḥ havāmahe pari śakram sutām upa

original: RV_10,167.02c imaṃ no yajñam iha bodhy ā gahi spṛdho jayantam maghavānam īmahe //
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam iha bodhi ā gahi spṛdhaḥ jayantam maghavānam īmahe

original: RV_10,167.03a somasya rājño varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspater anumatyā u śarmaṇi /
analyzed: somasya rājñaḥ varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspateḥ anumatyai u śarmaṇi

original: RV_10,167.03c tavāham adya maghavann upastutau dhātar vidhātaḥ kalaśāṃ abhakṣayam //
analyzed: tava aham adya maghavan upastutau dhātar vidhātar kalaśām abhakṣayam

original: RV_10,167.04a prasūto bhakṣam akaraṃ carāv api stomaṃ cemam prathamaḥ sūrir un mṛje /
analyzed: prasūtaḥ bhakṣam akaram carau api stomam ca imam prathamaḥ sūriḥ ud mṛje

original: RV_10,167.04c sute sātena yady āgamaṃ vām prati viśvāmitrajamadagnī dame //
analyzed: sute sātena yadī āgamam vām prati viśvāmitra jamadagnī dame

original: RV_10,168.01a vātasya nu mahimānaṃ rathasya rujann eti stanayann asya ghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: vātasya nu mahimānam rathasya rujan eti stanayan asya ghoṣaḥ

original: RV_10,168.01c divispṛg yāty aruṇāni kṛṇvann uto eti pṛthivyā reṇum asyan //
analyzed: divispṛś yāti aruṇāni kṛṇvan uta u eti pṛthivyāḥ reṇum asyan

original: RV_10,168.02a sam prerate anu vātasya viṣṭhā ainaṃ gacchanti samanaṃ na yoṣāḥ /
analyzed: sam pra īrate anu vātasya viṣṭhāḥ ā enam gacchanti samanam na yoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,168.02c tābhiḥ sayuk sarathaṃ deva īyate 'sya viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā //
analyzed: tābhiḥ sayuj sa ratham devaḥ īyate sya viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_10,168.03a antarikṣe pathibhir īyamāno na ni viśate katamac canāhaḥ /
analyzed: antarikṣe pathibhiḥ īyamānaḥ na ni viśate katamat cana ahar

original: RV_10,168.03c apāṃ sakhā prathamajā ṛtāvā kva svij jātaḥ kuta ā babhūva //
analyzed: apām sakhā prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā kva svid jātaḥ kutas ā babhūva

original: RV_10,168.04a ātmā devānām bhuvanasya garbho yathāvaśaṃ carati deva eṣaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā devānām bhuvanasya garbhaḥ yathā vaśam carati devaḥ eṣaḥ

original: RV_10,168.04c ghoṣā id asya śṛṇvire na rūpaṃ tasmai vātāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: ghoṣāḥ id asya śṛṇvire na rūpam tasmai vātāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10,169.01a mayobhūr vāto abhi vātūsrā ūrjasvatīr oṣadhīr ā riśantām /
analyzed: mayaḥ bhūḥ vātaḥ abhi vātu usrāḥ ūrjasvatīḥ oṣadhīḥ ā riśantām

original: RV_10,169.01c pīvasvatīr jīvadhanyāḥ pibantv avasāya padvate rudra mṛḷa //
analyzed: pīvasvatīḥ jīva dhanyāḥ pibantu avasāya padvate rudra mṛḍa

original: RV_10,169.02a yāḥ sarūpā virūpā ekarūpā yāsām agnir iṣṭyā nāmāni veda /
analyzed: yāḥ sarūpāḥ virūpāḥ eka rūpāḥ yāsām agniḥ iṣṭyā nāmāni veda

original: RV_10,169.02c yā aṅgirasas tapaseha cakrus tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha //
analyzed: yāḥ aṅgirasaḥ tapasā iha cakruḥ tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha

original: RV_10,169.03a yā deveṣu tanvam airayanta yāsāṃ somo viśvā rūpāṇi veda /
analyzed: yāḥ deveṣu tanvam airayanta yāsām somaḥ viśvā rūpāṇi veda

original: RV_10,169.03c tā asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīr indra goṣṭhe rirīhi //
analyzed: tāḥ asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīḥ indra goṣṭhe rirīhi

original: RV_10,169.04a prajāpatir mahyam etā rarāṇo viśvair devaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ mahyam etāḥ rarāṇaḥ viśvaiḥ devaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: RV_10,169.04c śivāḥ satīr upa no goṣṭham ākas tāsāṃ vayam prajayā saṃ sadema //
analyzed: śivāḥ satīḥ upa naḥ goṣṭham ākaḥ tāsām vayam prajayā sam sadema

original: RV_10,170.01a vibhrāḍ bṛhat pibatu somyam madhv āyur dadhad yajñapatāv avihrutam /
analyzed: vibhrāj bṛhat pibatu somyam madhu āyuḥ dadhat yajñapatau a vihrutam

original: RV_10,170.01c vātajūto yo abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati //
analyzed: vāta jūtaḥ yaḥ abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati

original: RV_10,170.02a vibhrāḍ bṛhat subhṛtaṃ vājasātamaṃ dharman divo dharuṇe satyam arpitam /
analyzed: vibhrāj bṛhat su bhṛtam vāja sātamam dharman divaḥ dharuṇe satyam arpitam

original: RV_10,170.02c amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhantamaṃ jyotir jajñe asurahā sapatnahā //
analyzed: amitra hā vṛtra hā dasyu hantamam jyotiḥ jajñe asura hā sapatna hā

original: RV_10,170.03a idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir uttamaṃ viśvajid dhanajid ucyate bṛhat /
analyzed: idam śreṣṭham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ uttamam viśva jit dhana jit ucyate bṛhat

original: RV_10,170.03c viśvabhrāḍ bhrājo mahi sūryo dṛśa uru paprathe saha ojo acyutam //
analyzed: viśva bhrāj bhrājaḥ mahi sūryaḥ dṛśe uru paprathe sahaḥ ojaḥ acyutam

original: RV_10,170.04a vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: vibhrājam jyotiṣā svar agacchaḥ rocanam divaḥ

original: RV_10,170.04c yenemā viśvā bhuvanāny ābhṛtā viśvakarmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā //
analyzed: yena imā viśvā bhuvanāni ābhṛtā viśva karmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā

original: RV_10,171.01a tvaṃ tyam iṭato ratham indra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ /
analyzed: tvam tyam iṭataḥ ratham indra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ

original: RV_10,171.01c aśṛṇoḥ somino havam //
analyzed: aśṛṇoḥ sominaḥ havam

original: RV_10,171.02a tvam makhasya dodhataḥ śiro 'va tvaco bharaḥ /
analyzed: tvam makhasya dodhataḥ śiraḥ vaḥ tvacaḥ bharaḥ

original: RV_10,171.02c agacchaḥ somino gṛham //
analyzed: agacchaḥ sominaḥ gṛham

original: RV_10,171.03a tvaṃ tyam indra martyam āstrabudhnāya venyam /
analyzed: tvam tyam indra martyam āstrabudhnāya venyam

original: RV_10,171.03c muhuḥ śrathnā manasyave //
analyzed: muhur śrathnāḥ manasyave

original: RV_10,171.04a tvaṃ tyam indra sūryam paścā santam puras kṛdhi /
analyzed: tvam tyam indra sūryam paścā santam puras kṛdhi

original: RV_10,171.04c devānāṃ cit tiro vaśam //
analyzed: devānām cit tiras vaśam

original: RV_10,172.01a ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartaniṃ yad ūdhabhiḥ //
analyzed: ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartanim yat ūdhabhiḥ

original: RV_10,172.02a ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭho jārayanmakhaḥ sudānubhiḥ //
analyzed: ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭhaḥ jārayan makhaḥ sudānubhiḥ

original: RV_10,172.03a pitubhṛto na tantum it sudānavaḥ prati dadhmo yajāmasi //
analyzed: pitu bhṛtaḥ na tantum id sudānavaḥ prati dadhmaḥ yajāmasi

original: RV_10,172.04a uṣā apa svasus tamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā //
analyzed: uṣāḥ apa svasuḥ tamaḥ sam vartayati vartanim sujāta tā

original: RV_10,173.01a ā tvāhārṣam antar edhi dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācaliḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā ahārṣam antar edhi dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha a vicācaliḥ

original: RV_10,173.01c viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat //
analyzed: viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat

original: RV_10,173.02a ihaivaidhi māpa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvata ivāvicācaliḥ /
analyzed: iha eva edhi mā apa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvataḥ iva avicācaliḥ

original: RV_10,173.02c indra iveha dhruvas tiṣṭheha rāṣṭram u dhāraya //
analyzed: indraḥ iva iha dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha iha rāṣṭram u dhāraya

original: RV_10,173.03a imam indro adīdharad dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā /
analyzed: imam indraḥ adīdharat dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā

original: RV_10,173.03c tasmai somo adhi bravat tasmā u brahmaṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat tasmai u brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10,173.04a dhruvā dyaur dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime /
analyzed: dhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatāḥ ime

original: RV_10,173.04c dhruvaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagad dhruvo rājā viśām ayam //
analyzed: dhruvam viśvam idam jagat dhruvaḥ rājā viśām ayam

original: RV_10,173.05a dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: dhruvam te rājā varuṇaḥ dhruvam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: RV_10,173.05c dhruvaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam //
analyzed: dhruvam te indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rāṣṭram dhārayatām dhruvam

original: RV_10,173.06a dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣābhi somam mṛśāmasi /
analyzed: dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā abhi somam mṛśāmasi

original: RV_10,173.06c atho ta indraḥ kevalīr viśo balihṛtas karat //
analyzed: atha u te indraḥ kevalīḥ viśaḥ bali hṛtaḥ karat

original: RV_10,174.01a abhīvartena haviṣā yenendro abhivāvṛte /
analyzed: abhīvartena haviṣā yena indraḥ abhivāvṛte

original: RV_10,174.01c tenāsmān brahmaṇas pate 'bhi rāṣṭrāya vartaya //
analyzed: tena asmān brahmaṇas pate bhi rāṣṭrāya vartaya

original: RV_10,174.02a abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yā no arātayaḥ /
analyzed: abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yāḥ naḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_10,174.02c abhi pṛtanyantaṃ tiṣṭhābhi yo na irasyati //
analyzed: abhi pṛtanyantam tiṣṭha abhi yaḥ naḥ irasyati

original: RV_10,174.03a abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi somo avīvṛtat /
analyzed: abhi tvā devaḥ savitā abhi somaḥ avīvṛtat

original: RV_10,174.03c abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāny abhīvarto yathāsasi //
analyzed: abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāni abhīvartaḥ yathā asasi

original: RV_10,174.04a yenendro haviṣā kṛtvy abhavad dyumny uttamaḥ /
analyzed: yena indraḥ haviṣā kṛtvī abhavat dyumnī uttamaḥ

original: RV_10,174.04c idaṃ tad akri devā asapatnaḥ kilābhuvam //
analyzed: idam tat akri devāḥ asapatnaḥ kila abhuvam

original: RV_10,174.05a asapatnaḥ sapatnahābhirāṣṭro viṣāsahiḥ /
analyzed: asapatnaḥ sapatna hā abhirāṣṭraḥ viṣāsahiḥ

original: RV_10,174.05c yathāham eṣām bhūtānāṃ virājāni janasya ca //
analyzed: yathā aham eṣām bhūtānām virājāni janasya ca

original: RV_10,175.01a pra vo grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā /
analyzed: pra vaḥ grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā

original: RV_10,175.01c dhūrṣu yujyadhvaṃ sunuta //
analyzed: dhūrṣu yujyadhvam sunuta

original: RV_10,175.02a grāvāṇo apa ducchunām apa sedhata durmatim /
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ apa ducchunām apa sedhata durmatim

original: RV_10,175.02c usrāḥ kartana bheṣajam //
analyzed: usrāḥ kartana bheṣajam

original: RV_10,175.03a grāvāṇa upareṣv ā mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ upareṣu ā mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,175.03c vṛṣṇe dadhato vṛṣṇyam //
analyzed: vṛṣṇe dadhataḥ vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_10,175.04a grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vo devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā /
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vaḥ devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā

original: RV_10,175.04c yajamānāya sunvate //
analyzed: yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_10,176.01a pra sūnava ṛbhūṇām bṛhan navanta vṛjanā /
analyzed: pra sūnavaḥ ṛbhūṇām bṛhat navanta vṛjanā

original: RV_10,176.01c kṣāmā ye viśvadhāyaso 'śnan dhenuṃ na mātaram //
analyzed: kṣāmāḥ ye viśva dhāyasaḥ śnan dhenum na mātaram

original: RV_10,176.02a pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā bharatā jātavedasam /
analyzed: pra devam devyā dhiyā bharata jātavedasam

original: RV_10,176.02c havyā no vakṣad ānuṣak //
analyzed: havyā naḥ vakṣat ānuṣak

original: RV_10,176.03a ayam u ṣya pra devayur hotā yajñāya nīyate /
analyzed: ayam u sya pra devayuḥ hotā yajñāya nīyate

original: RV_10,176.03c ratho na yor abhīvṛto ghṛṇīvāñ cetati tmanā //
analyzed: rathaḥ na yoḥ abhīvṛtaḥ ghṛṇīvān cetati tmanā

original: RV_10,176.04a ayam agnir uruṣyaty amṛtād iva janmanaḥ /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ uruṣyati amṛtāt iva janmanaḥ

original: RV_10,176.04c sahasaś cit sahīyān devo jīvātave kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sahasaḥ cit sahīyān devaḥ jīvātave kṛtaḥ

original: RV_10,177.01a pataṅgam aktam asurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasā vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: pataṅgam aktam asurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasā vipaścitaḥ

original: RV_10,177.01c samudre antaḥ kavayo vi cakṣate marīcīnām padam icchanti vedhasaḥ //
analyzed: samudre antar kavayaḥ vi cakṣate marīcīnām padam icchanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_10,177.02a pataṅgo vācam manasā bibharti tāṃ gandharvo 'vadad garbhe antaḥ /
analyzed: pataṅgaḥ vācam manasā bibharti tām gandharvaḥ vadat garbhe antar

original: RV_10,177.02c tāṃ dyotamānāṃ svaryam manīṣām ṛtasya pade kavayo ni pānti //
analyzed: tām dyotamānām svaryam manīṣām ṛtasya pade kavayaḥ ni pānti

original: RV_10,177.03a apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam /
analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam

original: RV_10,177.03c sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ //
analyzed: sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_10,178.01a tyam ū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahāvānaṃ tarutāraṃ rathānām /
analyzed: tyam u su vājinam deva jūtam sahāvānam tarutāram rathānām

original: RV_10,178.01c ariṣṭanemim pṛtanājam āśuṃ svastaye tārkṣyam ihā huvema //
analyzed: ariṣṭa nemim pṛtanājam āśum svastaye tārkṣyam iha ā huvema

original: RV_10,178.02a indrasyeva rātim ājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvam ivā ruhema /
analyzed: indrasya iva rātim ājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvam iva ā ruhema

original: RV_10,178.02c urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vām etau mā paretau riṣāma //
analyzed: urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vām etau mā paretau riṣāma

original: RV_10,178.03a sadyaś cid yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna /
analyzed: sadyas cit yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna

original: RV_10,178.03c sahasrasāḥ śatasā asya raṃhir na smā varante yuvatiṃ na śaryām //
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ śata sāḥ asya raṃhiḥ na smā varante yuvatim na śaryām

original: RV_10,179.01a ut tiṣṭhatāva paśyatendrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhata ava paśyata indrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam

original: RV_10,179.01c yadi śrāto juhotana yady aśrāto mamattana //
analyzed: yadi śrātaḥ juhotana yadi a śrātaḥ mamattana

original: RV_10,179.02a śrātaṃ havir o ṣv indra pra yāhi jagāma sūro adhvano vimadhyam /
analyzed: śrātam haviḥ ā u su indra pra yāhi jagāma sūraḥ adhvanaḥ vimadhyam

original: RV_10,179.02c pari tvāsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kulapā na vrājapatiṃ carantam //
analyzed: pari tvā āsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kulapāḥ na vrāja patim carantam

original: RV_10,179.03a śrātam manya ūdhani śrātam agnau suśrātam manye tad ṛtaṃ navīyaḥ /
analyzed: śrātam manye ūdhani śrātam agnau su śrātam manye tat ṛtam navīyaḥ

original: RV_10,179.03c mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ pibendra vajrin purukṛj juṣāṇaḥ //
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ piba indra vajrin puru kṛt juṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_10,180.01a pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūñ jyeṣṭhas te śuṣma iha rātir astu /
analyzed: pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūm jyeṣṭhaḥ te śuṣmaḥ iha rātiḥ astu

original: RV_10,180.01c indrā bhara dakṣiṇenā vasūni patiḥ sindhūnām asi revatīnām //
analyzed: indra ā bhara dakṣiṇena vasūni patiḥ sindhūnām asi revatīnām

original: RV_10,180.02a mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthā parasyāḥ /
analyzed: mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ parāvataḥ ā jagantha parasyāḥ

original: RV_10,180.02c sṛkaṃ saṃśāya pavim indra tigmaṃ vi śatrūn tāḷhi vi mṛdho nudasva //
analyzed: sṛkam saṃśāya pavim indra tigmam vi śatrūn tāḷhi vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: RV_10,180.03a indra kṣatram abhi vāmam ojo 'jāyathā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: indra kṣatram abhi vāmam ojaḥ jāyathāḥ vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_10,180.03c apānudo janam amitrayantam uruṃ devebhyo akṛṇor u lokam //
analyzed: apānudaḥ janam amitrayantam urum devebhyaḥ akṛṇoḥ u lokam

original: RV_10,181.01a prathaś ca yasya saprathaś ca nāmānuṣṭubhasya haviṣo havir yat /
analyzed: prathaḥ ca yasya sa prathaḥ ca nāma ānuṣṭubhasya haviṣaḥ haviḥ yat

original: RV_10,181.01c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇo rathantaram ā jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ rathantaram ā jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10,181.02a avindan te atihitaṃ yad āsīd yajñasya dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat /
analyzed: avindan te atihitam yat āsīt yajñasya dhāma paramam guhā yat

original: RV_10,181.02c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇor bharadvājo bṛhad ā cakre agneḥ //
analyzed: dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ bharadvājaḥ bṛhat ā cakre agneḥ

original: RV_10,181.03a te 'vindan manasā dīdhyānā yaju ṣkannam prathamaṃ devayānam /
analyzed: te vindan manasā dīdhyānāḥ yaju ṣkannam prathamam deva yānam

original: RV_10,181.03c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇor ā sūryād abharan gharmam ete //
analyzed: dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ ā sūryāt abharan gharmam ete

original: RV_10,182.01a bṛhaspatir nayatu durgahā tiraḥ punar neṣad aghaśaṃsāya manma /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ nayatu durgahā tiras punar neṣat agha śaṃsāya manma

original: RV_10,182.01c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_10,182.02a narāśaṃso no 'vatu prayāje śaṃ no astv anuyājo haveṣu /
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ naḥ vatu prayāje śam naḥ astu anuyājaḥ haveṣu

original: RV_10,182.02c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_10,182.03a tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣaso ye brahmadviṣaḥ śarave hantavā u /
analyzed: tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣasaḥ ye brahma dviṣaḥ śarave hantavai u

original: RV_10,182.03c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_10,183.01a apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapaso vibhūtam /
analyzed: apaśyam tvā manasā cekitānam tapasaḥ jātam tapasaḥ vibhūtam

original: RV_10,183.01c iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāma //
analyzed: iha prajām iha rayim rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putra kāma

original: RV_10,183.02a apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanū ṛtvye nādhamānām /
analyzed: apaśyam tvā manasā dīdhyānām svāyām tanū ṛtvye nādhamānām

original: RV_10,183.02c upa mām uccā yuvatir babhūyāḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāme //
analyzed: upa mām uccā yuvatiḥ babhūyāḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putra kāme

original: RV_10,183.03a ahaṃ garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣv ahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ /
analyzed: aham garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣu aham viśveṣu bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_10,183.03c aham prajā ajanayam pṛthivyām ahaṃ janibhyo aparīṣu putrān //
analyzed: aham prajāḥ ajanayam pṛthivyām aham janibhyaḥ aparīṣu putrān

original: RV_10,184.01a viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ yonim kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu

original: RV_10,184.01c ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te //
analyzed: ā siñcatu prajāpatiḥ dhātā garbham dadhātu te

original: RV_10,184.02a garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati /
analyzed: garbham dhehi sinīvāli garbham dhehi sarasvati

original: RV_10,184.02c garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ā dhattām puṣkarasrajā //
analyzed: garbham te aśvinau devau ā dhattām puṣkara srajā

original: RV_10,184.03a hiraṇyayī araṇī yaṃ nirmanthato aśvinā /
analyzed: hiraṇyayī araṇī yam nirmanthataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10,184.03c taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave //
analyzed: tam te garbham havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave

original: RV_10,185.01a mahi trīṇām avo 'stu dyukṣam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ /
analyzed: mahi trīṇām avaḥ stu dyukṣam mitrasya aryamṇaḥ

original: RV_10,185.01c durādharṣaṃ varuṇasya //
analyzed: durādharṣam varuṇasya

original: RV_10,185.02a nahi teṣām amā cana nādhvasu vāraṇeṣu /
analyzed: nahi teṣām amā cana na adhvasu vā araṇeṣu

original: RV_10,185.02c īśe ripur aghaśaṃsaḥ //
analyzed: īśe ripuḥ agha śaṃsaḥ

original: RV_10,185.03a yasmai putrāso aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya /
analyzed: yasmai putrāsaḥ aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya

original: RV_10,185.03c jyotir yacchanty ajasram //
analyzed: jyotiḥ yacchanti ajasram

original: RV_10,186.01a vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde /
analyzed: vātaḥ ā vātu bheṣajam śambhu mayobhu naḥ hṛde

original: RV_10,186.01c pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat //
analyzed: pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: RV_10,186.02a uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā /
analyzed: uta vāta pitā asi naḥ uta bhrātā uta naḥ sakhā

original: RV_10,186.02c sa no jīvātave kṛdhi //
analyzed: sa naḥ jīvātave kṛdhi

original: RV_10,186.03a yad ado vāta te gṛhe 'mṛtasya nidhir hitaḥ /
analyzed: yat adaḥ vāta te gṛhe mṛtasya nidhiḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_10,186.03c tato no dehi jīvase //
analyzed: tatas naḥ dehi jīvase

original: RV_10,187.01a prāgnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām /
analyzed: pra agnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām

original: RV_10,187.01c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,187.02a yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvatas tiro dhanvātirocate /
analyzed: yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvataḥ tiras dhanva atirocate

original: RV_10,187.02c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,187.03a yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā /
analyzed: yaḥ rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_10,187.03c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,187.04a yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati bhuvanā sam ca paśyati

original: RV_10,187.04c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,187.05a yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnir ajāyata /
analyzed: yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ śukraḥ agniḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10,187.05c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10,188.01a pra nūnaṃ jātavedasam aśvaṃ hinota vājinam /
analyzed: pra nūnam jātavedasam aśvam hinota vājinam

original: RV_10,188.01c idaṃ no barhir āsade //
analyzed: idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_10,188.02a asya pra jātavedaso vipravīrasya mīḷhuṣaḥ /
analyzed: asya pra jātavedasaḥ vipra vīrasya mīḍhuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,188.02c mahīm iyarmi suṣṭutim //
analyzed: mahīm iyarmi suṣṭutim

original: RV_10,188.03a yā ruco jātavedaso devatrā havyavāhanīḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ rucaḥ jātavedasaḥ devatrā havya vāhanīḥ

original: RV_10,188.03c tābhir no yajñam invatu //
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ yajñam invatu

original: RV_10,189.01a āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaram puraḥ /
analyzed: ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt asadat mātaram puras

original: RV_10,189.01c pitaraṃ ca prayan svaḥ //
analyzed: pitaram ca prayan svar

original: RV_10,189.02a antaś carati rocanāsya prāṇād apānatī /
analyzed: antar carati rocanā asya prāṇāt apānatī

original: RV_10,189.02c vy akhyan mahiṣo divam //
analyzed: vi akhyat mahiṣaḥ divam

original: RV_10,189.03a triṃśad dhāma vi rājati vāk pataṅgāya dhīyate /
analyzed: triṃśat dhāma vi rājati vāc pataṅgāya dhīyate

original: RV_10,189.03c prati vastor aha dyubhiḥ //
analyzed: prati vastoḥ aha dyubhiḥ

original: RV_10,190.01a ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ cābhīddhāt tapaso 'dhy ajāyata /
analyzed: ṛtam ca satyam ca abhīddhāt tapasaḥ dhi ajāyata

original: RV_10,190.01c tato rātry ajāyata tataḥ samudro arṇavaḥ //
analyzed: tatas rātrī ajāyata tatas samudraḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_10,190.02a samudrād arṇavād adhi saṃvatsaro ajāyata /
analyzed: samudrāt arṇavāt adhi saṃvatsaraḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10,190.02c ahorātrāṇi vidadhad viśvasya miṣato vaśī //
analyzed: ahorātrāṇi vidadhat viśvasya miṣataḥ vaśī

original: RV_10,190.03a sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayat /
analyzed: sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayat

original: RV_10,190.03c divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam atho svaḥ //
analyzed: divam ca pṛthivīm ca antarikṣam atha u svar

original: RV_10,191.01a saṃ-sam id yuvase vṛṣann agne viśvāny arya ā /
analyzed: saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣan agne viśvāni aryaḥ ā

original: RV_10,191.01c iḷas pade sam idhyase sa no vasūny ā bhara //
analyzed: iḷaḥ pade sam idhyase sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara

original: RV_10,191.02a saṃ gacchadhvaṃ saṃ vadadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām /
analyzed: sam gacchadhvam sam vadadhvam sam vaḥ manāṃsi jānatām

original: RV_10,191.02c devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve saṃjānānā upāsate //
analyzed: devāḥ bhāgam yathā pūrve saṃjānānāḥ upāsate

original: RV_10,191.03a samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam manaḥ saha cittam eṣām /
analyzed: samānaḥ mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam manaḥ saha cittam eṣām

original: RV_10,191.03c samānam mantram abhi mantraye vaḥ samānena vo haviṣā juhomi //
analyzed: samānam mantram abhi mantraye vaḥ samānena vaḥ haviṣā juhomi

original: RV_10,191.04a samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ /
analyzed: samānī vaḥ ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ

original: RV_10,191.04c samānam astu vo mano yathā vaḥ susahāsati //
analyzed: samānam astu vaḥ manaḥ yathā vaḥ su sahā asati
